the  ice facade is approximately 60 m high

A glacier cave is a cave formed  भीतर  the  बर्फ  of a glacier .
Glacier caves are often called  बर्फ   गुफाएं  , but this term  is  properly used to describe bedrock caves that contain year-round ice .
In physics , circular motion is a movement of an object  साथ  the circumference of a circle or rotation along a  गोलाकार  path .
It can be uniform , with constant angular rate of rotation ( and constant speed ) ,  or  non-uniform with a changing rate of rotation  .
The rotation around a fixed axis of a three-dimensional body involves  गोलाकार  motion of  इसके  parts  .
The equations of motion describe the  गति  of the center  of  mass of a body .
Examples of circular motion include : an artificial satellite  orbiting  the Earth at constant height , a stone which is tied to a rope and is  होने   swung  in  वृत्त  , a car turning through a curve  in  a race  track  ,  an  electron moving  लम्बवत  to  a  uniform magnetic  फ़ील्ड  ,  और   a  gear  turning  inside a mechanism .
Since the object 's velocity vector is constantly  बदलना  direction , the moving object is undergoing acceleration by a centripetal force in  the  direction of the  बीच   of  rotation .
Without this  त्वरण  , the object would  मूव  in  a  straight line ,  according  to Newton 's laws  of  motion .
Apollo Creed  is  a fictional  अक्षर  from  the   रॉकी  films  ,  initially portrayed as the Undisputed Heavyweight Champion  of  the  संसार  .
He was played by Carl Weathers .
Creed had  अनेक  nicknames , including The Master of Disaster , The King of Sting ,  the  Dancing  विनाशक  , The Prince  of  Punch , The One and Only and The Count  of   मोंटे  Fisto .
Urban legend states  कि   अपोलो   पंथ  's name is a wordplay  on  the Apostles '  पंथ  , a statement of  विश्वास   प्रयुक्त  in Christian churches .
All of Apollo 's championship fights were  अनुसूचित  for the 15  गोलाकार   अलहदा  .
Championship fights  किया  not convert from 15  rounds   to  12 rounds until 1987 .
रॉकी  Balboa is often wrongly credited with popularizing  the  red , white ,  और  blue trunks  ;  Creed was the first man to wear them  (  latterly worn by Rocky  बाल्बोआ  in the 3rd  और  4th installments and finally by Tommy `` The Machine ''  gunn  ( Tommy Morrison )  in  the 5th installment ) although normally he  पहना  red and white , as seen in Rocky II .
Balboa 's  हस्ताक्षर  colors  यहूद   ब्लैक  and gold—colors he used in the latest movie .
In the United  राज्य   ,  the title of federal judge usually means  a  judge appointed by the President of the  संयुक्त  States and confirmed by the United States Senate  pursuant  to the Appointments Clause in Article  ii  of  the  United States Constitution  .
in   जोड  to the Supreme  अदालत   of  the United States , whose existence and  कुछ  aspects  of  whose jurisdiction are beyond the  संवैधानिक  power of Congress  to  alter , acts of Congress have established 13 courts of appeals  (  also called `` circuit courts '' ) with appellate jurisdiction  over  different regions  of   the  United States ,  और  94 United States district  न्यायालयों  .
Every judge appointed to  ऐसे  a court may be categorized as a federal judge ; such positions  शामिल  the Chief Justice and Associate  justices  of the Supreme Court , Circuit Judges of the courts of appeals , and district judges of the United States district courts .
All of these judges described  यूँ  far are  referred  to  sometimes  as `` Article III  न्यायाधीशों  '' because they exercise the  न्यायिक   शक्ति  vested in the judicial branch of the federal government  by  Article III of the U.S. Constitution  .
In  जोड  , judges of  the  Court  of  International Trade exercise  न्यायिक  power pursuant to Article III .
Other judges serving in the federal courts , including magistrate judges and  दिवालियापन  judges , are also  sometimes  referred to as `` federal  न्यायाधीशों  '' ; however , they are neither appointed by the President  nor  confirmed by  the  Senate , and  उनके  power derives from Article I instead .
देखिए   आलेख  I and Article III tribunals .
The  beretta  21A Bobcat is a small pocket-sized semi-automatic pistol designed  by   beretta   in  Italy .
उत्पादन  began in late  1984   ,  solely in the Beretta U.S.A.  सुविधा  in Accokeek , Maryland .
it  is a further development of the Beretta Model 20 , whose production ended  in  1985 .
Variable Universal Life Insurance ( often shortened to VUL ) is  a  type of life insurance that  builds  a cash value .
In a VUL , the  नकदी  value  can  be invested  in  a wide variety of separate  खाते  , similar  to  mutual funds  ,  and the choice of  जिससे  of the available separate accounts to use is entirely up  to  the  अनुबंध  owner .
the  'variable ' component in the name  refers  to this ability to invest  in  separate accounts whose values vary—they vary because they are invested in stock  and/or  bond markets .
The  'universal  ' component  in  the  नाम  refers to the flexibility the owner has  in   बनाना   प्रीमियम   भुगतान  .
the  premiums can vary  इससे  nothing in a given month up  to  maximums defined by the Internal Revenue Code  लिये  life  बीमे  .
इस  flexibility is in contrast to  पूरे  life insurance  कि  has fixed premium payments  कि  typically  can  not be missed  बगैर  lapsing  the   नीति  ( although one may exercise an Automatic  प्रीमियम  Loan feature ,  or  surrender dividends to pay  a  Whole Life  प्रीमियम  ) .
Variable universal  जीवन   is   a  type of permanent  जीवन  insurance  ,  because the  मौत  benefit will be  सशुल्क   if   the  insured dies any time as long as there is  sufficient  cash value  to  pay  the   लागत  of insurance in the policy .
With most if  नहीं  all VULs , unlike whole life  ,  there is  no  endowment age ( the  आयु  at which the cash value equals the death benefit amount , which for whole life is typically 100  )   .
This is yet another key advantage  of  VUL over Whole  जीवन  .
With a typical whole  जीवन   नीति  ,  the   मौत   लाभ   is  limited  to  the face  राशि  specified in the policy  ,   और  at endowment  आयु  ,  the   फेस   राशि  is all that is paid out .
Thus  साथ  either death or endowment ,  the  insurance company keeps any  नकदी  value  निर्मित  up over the years .
However  ,  some  participating  whole life policies offer  राइडर्स   जिससे   बताएँ   कि  any  dividends  paid  on   the  policy be used  to  purchase ``  सशुल्क  up additions '' to the policy which increase both the cash value  और  the death benefit over time .
If  निवेश  made in the separate accounts out-perform the general account of the  बीमे  company  ,   a  higher rate-of-return can occur than the fixed rates-of-return typical for whole life .
The combination over the years of no endowment age , continually  increasing   मौत  benefit , and if  a   ऊँची  rate-of-return  is  earned in the separate accounts of a VUL policy , this could result in higher  मान  to the owner or beneficiary  than  that of a whole life policy with  the  same amounts of money paid in  as  premiums .
the  outdoor wood boiler is  a  variant of  the  classic wood  स्टोव  adapted for set-up outdoors while still transferring the  ऊष्मा  to interior  इमारतें   .
A mound of Girl Scout cookies .
इस  mound  contains  74 boxes of cookies
Girl Scout Cookies are cookies  बेची  by Girl Scouts  of  the USA ( GSUSA ) as one of its  प्रमुख  fundraisers  लिये  local Scout  इकाई  .
Members of  the  GSUSA have  महरूम   selling  cookies since 1917 to raise funds .
Girls who participate can earn prizes for their  प्रयत्न   .
There are also unit incentives if  the  unit as a whole does well .
As of 2007 , sales were estimated at about 200 million boxes per year .
University Hall
Purdue  विश्वविद्यालयों   ,  located in West Lafayette , Indiana , is  the  flagship university of the six-campus Purdue  विश्वविद्यालयों   प्रणाली   .
purdue  was founded on  may   6  , 1869  ,  as  a  land-grant  विश्वविद्यालयों  when the Indiana General Assembly  ,  taking advantage of the Morrill Act  ,  accepted a donation of land and  धन   इससे  Lafayette businessman  जॉन  Purdue to establish a college  of   विज्ञान   ,   प्रौद्योगिकी   ,  and agriculture in  उसके  name  .
The first classes were held on  सितंबर  16  ,   1874  , with six  instructors  and  39  students  .
आज  , Purdue is a member of the Big Ten  सम्मेलन  ,  और  is a well known world-class research institution .
Purdue enrolls the second  largest   छात्र  body of any university in Indiana as  खूब  as the  चौथी  largest international student  जनसांख्यिकी   of   कोई  university in  the  United States .
Purdue offers both undergraduate and graduate programs in over 211 major areas  of  study , and is well known for its competitive engineering curricula .
The university has also been highly influential in America 's history of aviation  ,   having   स्थापित  the  पहला  college  क्रेडिट  offered in flight training  ,  the first four-year bachelor 's degree in aviation , and  the  first university  विमानक्षेत्र  ( Purdue University Airport  )  .
Purdue 's aviation technology program  remains   एक  of the most competitive aviation-specific  कार्यक्रम  in the world .
in  the mid-20th century , Purdue 's aviation program expanded  to  encompass advanced spaceflight technology giving  वृद्धि   to  Purdue 's nickname , Cradle of Astronauts  .
Twenty-three Purdue  graduates  have gone on to become astronauts , including Gus Grissom ( one of the original Mercury  सात   astronauts  ) , Neil Armstrong ( the first  व्यक्ति  to walk on  the  moon ) , and Eugene  cernan  ( the most recent person to walk on  the  moon ) .
A  वसामय  cyst ( ) is a term  कि   loosely   refers  to either epidermoid cysts  (  also known  as  epidermal cysts ;  l72.0  ) or pilar cysts  (  also  ज्ञात   as  trichilemmal cysts  ;  L72.1 ) .
Because an epidermoid  गाँठ  originates  in  the epidermis  और  a  पिलर  cyst originates from hair follicles , by definition , neither type of cyst is  सख्ती  a sebaceous cyst  .
the  name is regarded as a misnomer as  the  fatty  ,  white , semi-solid material in both of these cyst  entities  is not  sebum  , but  keratin  .
Furthermore , under  the  microscope neither entity  contains   वसामय  glands .
in  practice , however , the  शर्तें  are often used interchangeably .
`` True '' sebaceous cysts  हैं  relatively rare and are  ज्ञात  as steatocystomas  or  , if multiple , as steatocystoma multiplex .
Modern pointe shoes .
the  edge of the toe pad , which is inserted between the foot and  टो  box for cushioning , can be seen  on  the right foot  .
a   pointe  shoe is  a  type of shoe worn by ballet dancers when performing  pointe   कार्य  .
Pointe shoes developed from  the   ख्वाहिश   लिये  dancers to  appear  weightless  और  sylph  -like   और   have   विकसित   to  enable dancers to dance en pointe ( on the tips of their toes ) for extended  अवधि  of time .
They are  सामान्यतः  worn by female dancers  ,  though male dancers may  पहनें  them  लिये  unorthodox roles such as the ugly stepsisters in Cinderella  ,  Bottom in A Midsummer Night  's  Dream ,  or  men performing as women in dance companies such as Les Ballets Trockadero and Grandiva .
They  हैं  manufactured in a variety of colors , most commonly  in  shades of light pink .
This  tablespoon  has  a  capacity of about 15 mL .
Measuring Spoons
in  the  us  and parts  of  Canada , a tablespoon is  the  largest type of spoon used for  खाने  from a bowl .
In the UK , Europe and most Commonwealth  देशों  , a tablespoon is a type of large spoon  प्रायः   प्रयुक्त  for serving .
In countries where a  tablespoon   is  a  सेवारत   चमचा  ,  the  nearest equivalent to the US tablespoon is  either  the dessert  चमचा  or the soup spoon  .
A tablespoonful ,  nominally   the  capacity of  एक  tablespoon , is commonly used as  a  measure  of   आवाज़  in  कुकिंग  .
It is abbreviated  as  T  ,  tb ,  tbs  , tbsp , tblsp , or tblspn .
The capacity of ordinary  tablespoons   is  not regulated by  विधि  and is subject  to  considerable variation .
In the USA one tablespoon  (  measurement unit ) is  लगभग  15  ml   ;  the capacity of an actual tablespoon ( dining utensil ) ranges  इससे  7 mL to 14  ml  .
In Australia one  tablespoon  ( measurement unit  )  is  20   ml  .
हैरी  Potter is  a  series of seven fantasy novels written by the British author J. K. Rowling .
The books chronicle the  adventures  of  a  wizard , Harry  कुम्हार  , and his friends Ronald Weasley  और   हर्माइनी  Granger  ,   सब  of  जिसको  are students at Hogwarts School of  चुड़ैल  and Wizardry .
the  main  स्टोरी  arc concerns  हैरी  's quest to overcome  the  Dark wizard  रब  Voldemort , whose aims  हैं  to become immortal  ,  conquer the wizarding world , subjugate non-magical  लोगों  ,  और   नष्ट  all those who stand in  उसके   रास्ता  , especially Harry Potter .
Since  the  release of the first novel Harry Potter and  the  Philosopher  's  Stone on 30 June  1997   ,  the  किताबे  have gained immense popularity , critical  acclaim  and commercial success worldwide  .
The  श्रेणी  has also had some  share  of criticism ,  सहित  concern for  the  increasingly dark tone .
,  the  book series  रै  sold about  450  million  नक़ल  , making it  the  best-selling book series in history ,  और  has been translated into 67  भाषाएं  .
the  last four books consecutively  नियत   रिकॉर्ड  as the  fastest-selling  books in history .
a  series of many genres  ,  including fantasy and  coming  of age ( with  तत्व  of mystery , thriller ,  एडवेंचर  , and romance ) ,  it  has many cultural meanings  और  references  .
according  to Rowling  ,  the main theme is  मौत  .
वहीँ  are  भी  many other themes in the series  ,  such  as   पूर्वाग्रह  and corruption .
The initial major publishers of the books  यहूद  Bloomsbury in the United Kingdom and Scholastic Press in  the  United States  .
The books have since been published by many  प्रकाशक  worldwide .
the  books  ,  with the seventh book split into  दो  parts ,  have  been made into an  eight-part  film series  by   warner  Bros.  तस्वीरें  , the highest-grossing film series of all time  .
The series also originated much tie-in  merchandise  , making the Harry Potter  ब्रांड  worth in excess of $ 15 billion  .
Also due  to   the  success of the books and films , Harry  कुम्हार  has been used for  a   थीम  park , The  wizarding   संसार  of Harry Potter in Universal Parks &  रिसॉर्ट  's  आइलैंड्स  of Adventure .
RS-68  होने  tested  at  NASA 's Stennis  स्पेस  Center .
The  nearly  transparent exhaust  is  due to this engine 's exhaust  होने  mostly  अतितप्त   भाप   (   जल  vapor from  इसके   propellants  , hydrogen and oxygen )
Viking 5C rocket engine
a  rocket engine ,  or  simply `` rocket  ''  , is a jet  इंजन  that uses  तभी  stored propellant  द्रव्यमान   लिये  forming its high speed propulsive jet .
प्रक्षेपास्त्र  engines are reaction engines and obtain thrust in accordance with  न्यूटन   's  third law  .
Since they need no external material to form their jet ,  प्रक्षेपास्त्र  engines can be used  लिये   spacecraft   नोदन  as well as terrestrial uses ,  ऐसे  as  मिसाइलें  .
Most rocket  इंजन  are internal combustion engines ,  हालांकि  non-combusting  फ़ॉर्म  also exist .
Rocket engines as a group  have  the  उच्चतम  exhaust velocities , are by  दूर  the  lightest  ,  लकिन   हैं  the least propellant efficient  of  all types  of  jet  इंजन  .
`` ...  baby  One More Time '' is a song by  अमरीकी  recording artist Britney Spears  .
It served as Spears 's debut single and title track from her debut  स्टुडियो   एल्बम  , ... Baby One More Time ( 1999 )  .
Written by Max Martin and produced by Martin  और  Rami , `` ... Baby  एक  More  समय  '' was released on September  30  , 1998 , by  jive   रिकॉर्ड  .
After recording  और  sending a demo tape with  an   अप्रयुक्त  song from Toni  braxton  , Spears signed a multi-album deal with Jive .
`` ... Baby One More Time  ''  is a teen pop and dance-pop  सोंग  that refers to  a  girl  जो  regrets  तोड़कर  up with her  बॉयफ्रेंड  .
The song received generally favorable reviews  इससे  critics  ,  who praised its composition  .
``  ...  Baby One More Time  ''  attained global success , reaching number one in every country it charted .
It  भी  received  numerous  certifications around the  संसार  ,  और  is one of the  best-selling  singles of all time , with over 10 million copies sold .
An accompanying music  वीडियो   ,   निर्देशित   by  Nigel Dick , portrays  स्पीयर्स   as  a student from a Catholic high school , who starts to  daydream   कि  she  is  singing and dancing around the school , while watching her  प्रेम  interest from afar .
The music video was later  संदर्भित   in  the music video of `` If U Seek  एमी  `` ( 2008  )   ,  where Spears 's fictional daughter  is   वेश  with a similar schoolgirl outfit while wearing pink ribbons in her  बाल  .
In 2010  ,   the  music video for `` ... Baby One  अधिक  Time '' was voted the third most influential video in the history of pop music  ,  in a poll held by Jam  !  .
Spears has  performed  ``  ...  Baby One More Time '' in a number of  सजीव   दिखावे  and in all of her  कॉन्सर्ट  tours .
It was  the  encore of the ...  baby   एक   अधिक  Time  दौरे  ( 1999  )  and Dream Within a Dream Tour  (  2001  )  ; Spears  भी  performed remixed versions of  the   सोंग  during the Oops ! ...
I Did It Again World Tour ( 2000 ) ,  the  Onyx  होटल  Tour (  2004  ) , The M+M  's  Tour ( 2007 )  ,  The  सर्कस  Starring Britney Spears ( 2009  )  ,  और  the Femme  fatale  Tour ( 2011 ) .
``  ... Baby One  अधिक  Time '' was  मनोनीत  for a Grammy Award  लिये  Best Female Pop Vocal Performance  ,  and has been included in lists  by   ब्लेंडर   ,  Rolling Stone  और  VH1  .
It has been noted for  redefining  the sound  of   लेट  1990s music .
Spears  रै  named `` ... Baby  एक  More Time '' as one of  उसके   पसंदीदा  songs from  उसके  career  .
It was also  the  final song to  be  played on the BBC 's music programme Top of the Pops .
हैजा  is an  संक्रमण   in  the small  आंत  caused by  the  bacterium Vibrio cholerae  .
The main symptoms are watery  अतिसार  and vomiting .
Transmission occurs primarily by drinking water or eating food  कि   रै  been contaminated by the feces ( waste  उत्पाद  ) of an infected  व्यक्ति  , including one with  no  apparent symptoms .
The severity of the  अतिसार   और  vomiting can  सीसे  to rapid dehydration and electrolyte imbalance , and death  in  some cases .
The primary treatment is oral rehydration  चिकित्सा   ,  typically with oral rehydration  समाधान  , to replace water and electrolytes .
If this is not tolerated or does  नहीं  provide improvement fast enough , intravenous fluids can  भी  be used .
Antibacterial drugs are  फायदेमंद  in  those  with  कठोर  disease  to  shorten its duration and severity .
विश्वव्यापी  ,  it   affects  3–5  लाख  people  और  causes  100,000–130,000   मौतों   a  year  .
Cholera  थी  one of the earliest infections to  be  studied by epidemiological methods  .
The  चित्र   of  Dorian Gray is the only published  अनोखा  by Oscar Wilde , appearing as  the  lead story in Lippincott 's Monthly Magazine on 20 June 1890 , printed  as  the  जुलाई  1890 issue of this magazine  .
The magazine 's editors feared the story was indecent as  सुपुर्द  , so  वे   censored  roughly  500  words , without Wilde 's knowledge , before publication  .
But even  साथ  that ,  the  story was still greeted with outrage by British reviewers , some of  जिसको   सुझाया  that Wilde should be prosecuted  on  moral grounds , leading Wilde to  बचाव  the novel  aggressively  in letters to the British press .
Wilde  बाद  revised the story for book publication , making substantial alterations  ,   हटाना  controversial passages , adding new chapters and including an aphoristic Preface  जिससे  has since become famous in its own  सही  .
The  amended   संस्करण  was published by Ward , Lock and Company  in  April 1891 .
कुछ   विद्वानों  believe that  वाइल्ड  would today have  चाही  us to  पढ़ा  the  संस्करण  he originally submitted to Lippincott 's .
The novel tells of a young man named  डोरियन   धूसर  , the  विषय   of  a painting by artist Basil Hallward .
बेसिल  is impressed by Dorian  's  beauty and becomes infatuated  साथ   उसे   ,  believing his beauty is responsible  लिये  a new mode  in  his  आर्ट  .
डोरियन  meets  रब  Henry Wotton , a friend  of  Basil 's , and becomes enthralled by Lord  हेनरी  's  संसार   दृश्य   .
Espousing a new  hedonism  , Lord Henry suggests  the  only things  लायक  pursuing in life are  सौंदर्य  and fulfilment of  the  senses .
realizing  that one day his beauty will  फीका  , Dorian ( whimsically  )  expresses a desire to sell his soul to ensure the portrait Basil has painted  होता  age rather  than  he  .
डोरियन  's wish is fulfilled , and when  he  subsequently pursues  a  life of debauchery , the portrait serves as a reminder of  the  effect each act  रै  upon his soul , with  प्रत्येक  sin  प्रदर्शित  as  a  disfigurement of his form  ,  or through a  चिह्न  of aging .
The  चित्र  of Dorian Gray is considered a work of  क्लासिक   गोथिक  fiction with a strong Faustian  थीम  .
Sári Gábor (  born   6  February 1917  )  , known as  ज़ा  Zsa Gabor  (   )  , is a  हंगेरियाई  -born American actress  जो  acted in supporting roles in  फिल्मों  ,  on  Broadway , and occasionally on  टेलीविज़न  .
Gabor was also a socialite .
She  began  her stage  करियर  in Vienna at age 15 ,  और   थी  crowned  मिस  Hungary in 1936 .
She emigrated to the United States in 1941 and became  a  sought-after actress with `` European flair and style '' ,  साथ  a personality that `` exuded charm and grace  ''   .
Her first movie role was as supporting actress in  प्यारे   to  Look At .
She  बाद  acted in We  're  Not Married !
and played  एक  of  उसके  few leading roles  in   moulin  Rouge  (   1952  ) , directed by  जॉन   हस्टन   ,  who described  उसके  as a  ``  creditable '' actress  .
Besides her film  और  television appearances , she is best known for having nine husbands ,  सहित  hotel magnate Conrad  हिल्टन  and actor George Sanders .
She once stated  ,  `` Men  have  always liked me and I have always liked men .
लकिन  I like a mannish  man  ,  a  man who knows how to  बात  to and treat  a  woman – not just a man with muscles . ''
ब्रूस   ली  ( traditional :  李小龍  ; born Lee Jun-fan  ;  27  नवम्बर   1940   –   20  July 1973  )  was  a  Chinese American martial  कलाकार  , actor , martial arts instructor , philosopher , and filmmaker  .
The founder  of  Jeet  kune   do  ,  ली  was the son  of   cantonese  opera star Lee Hoi-Chuen .
He is widely considered by  टीकाकारों  , critics , media and other martial artists to be one of the most  influential   martial  artists  of  all time , and  a  pop culture icon  of  the  20th  century .
he  is often credited with  helping  to change the way Asians were presented  in  American films .
Lee was  born  in Chinatown , San Francisco on 27 November 1940 to  अभिभावक  from Hong  काँग  and was raised in  कोलून  with his family until his late teens .
He was introduced to the film industry  by  his father and appeared  in  several films  as   a  child  कर्ता  .
ली  moved  to  the  संयुक्त  States at  the  age of  18  to receive  उसके  higher education , and  it   थी  during this time  कि  he  began  teaching martial arts .
His Hong Kong and Hollywood -produced films  elevated  the traditional Hong Kong martial arts  फिल्मी   to  a new  स्तर  of popularity  और   acclaim  , sparking  a  surge of  ब्याज  in Chinese martial  कला  in the West in the 1970s  .
The direction  और  tone of  उसके   films  changed and influenced martial arts and martial arts films in Hong  काँग  and  the  rest  of  the world .
He is noted  लिये  his roles in  पाँच   feature-length  films : Lo Wei 's  the  Big Boss ( 1971 ) and Fist of Fury ( 1972 ) ; Way of the Dragon  (  1972 ) , directed and  लिखा  by Lee ; Warner Brothers  '  Enter the Dragon ( 1973 ) and The Game of Death ( 1978 ) , both  निर्देशित  by Robert Clouse .
Lee became an iconic  फिगर   ज्ञात  throughout the world , particularly among the Chinese  ,  as he  portrayed  Chinese nationalism  in  his films .
He  initially  trained in Wing Chun ,  लकिन  later rejected well-defined martial art styles , favouring  बजाय  the use of techniques from various sources , in the spirit of his personal martial  कला  philosophy , which he dubbed Jeet Kune Do ( The Way of  the  Intercepting Fist ) .
ली  held dual citizenship of Hong Kong and  the  United States .
He died in Kowloon Tong on 20 July 1973 at age 32 .
Chronic  obstructive   pulmonary  disease ( COPD ) , also known as  दीर्घकालिक  obstructive lung disease ( COLD ) , chronic obstructive  airway  disease (  coad   )   ,  chronic airflow limitation ( CAL ) and chronic  obstructive   respiratory  disease (  cord   )  ,  is  the  occurrence  of chronic bronchitis or emphysema ,  a  pair  of  commonly co-existing diseases of the lungs in  जिससे   the  airways narrow over time .
इस   हद   airflow   to   और   इससे   the  lungs  ,  causing shortness of breath ( dyspnea ) .
in   नैदानिक   अभ्यास  , COPD is  पारिभाषित   by  its characteristically low airflow on lung function tests  .
In contrast to  दमा   ,  this limitation is poorly reversible and usually gets progressively worse over time .
copd  is caused by noxious  अणु  or gas  ,  most  commonly   इससे  tobacco smoking , which triggers an  असामान्य   जलन  response in the lung .
The diagnosis of COPD  requires  lung function  परीक्षण  .
Important management strategies are smoking cessation , vaccinations , rehabilitation , and drug therapy  (   प्रायः  using inhalers )  .
Some patients go on  to  require long-term oxygen therapy or lung  प्रत्यारोपण   .
Worldwide , COPD ranked as the sixth leading cause  of   मौत  in 1990  .
It is projected to become the fourth  अग्रणी  cause of death  विश्वव्यापी  by 2030  ,   due  to  an  increase in smoking  दरों  and demographic changes in  अनेक  countries .
COPD is the third leading cause  of  death in the U.S.  ,  and the economic  बोझ  of COPD in the U.S. in 2007 was $ 42.6 billion  in  health  परवाह  costs and lost productivity .
Annelies `` Anne '' Marie  फ़्रैंक   (  , ? , ;  12  June 1929early March 1945 ) is  एक  of the most discussed Jewish victims of the  holocaust  .
Her diary has been the basis for several plays and films .
Born in  the   नगर  of Frankfurt  am  Main  in  Weimar Germany , she  जिया   सबसे  of her life in or  निकट  Amsterdam ,  in  the Netherlands  .
Born a  जर्मनी  national  ,   फ़्रैंक  lost her citizenship in 1941 .
She  gained  international fame posthumously  बाद  her diary was published .
it  documents her experiences  छुपाना  during the German occupation of the  नीदरलैंड्स  in World War  ii  .
the  Frank  परिवार  moved from  जर्मनी  to Amsterdam in 1933 ,  the  year the Nazis gained control over Germany .
By  the  beginning of 1940 ,  वे  were trapped in Amsterdam by the Nazi occupation  of   the  Netherlands .
as  persecutions of  the   यहूदी  population increased in  जुलाई  1942 , the family  गई  into hiding in the hidden  कक्ष  of Anne 's father , Otto Frank 's , office building .
बाद  two years , the group was betrayed and  transported  to  विशेषज्ञता  camps .
Anne  फ़्रैंक  and her sister  ,  Margot , were  आखिरकार  transferred to  the  Bergen-Belsen concentration camp  ,  where  वे   died  of typhus  in  March  1945  .
Otto Frank , the only survivor of the  परिवार  , returned to  एम्सटर्डम  after the war to find that Anne 's diary  था  been saved , and his efforts  led   to   इसके  publication in 1947 .
It was  अनूदित  from its original Dutch  और  first  प्रकाशित  in English in 1952  as  The Diary of a Young  लड़की  .
It has  चूंकि  been translated into  अनेक  languages  .
the  diary  ,  which  थी  given to Anne  on  her  13th  birthday , chronicles her life from 12  जून  1942  जबतक  1 August 1944 .

Kurt Donald  कोबेन  ( February 20 , 1967 – April 5 , 1994  )  was an American musician and artist , best known as the lead singer , guitarist and primary  songwriter  of the grunge band Nirvana .
Cobain formed Nirvana  साथ  Krist Novoselic in Aberdeen  ,  Washington in 1985 and established  it  as part of the Seattle music scene  ,  having its debut album  ब्लीच  released on the independent record label Sub Pop  in  1989 .
After signing with  प्रमुख  label DGC Records  ,  the band found  भेदन  success with `` Smells Like Teen Spirit `` from its second album Nevermind (  1991  ) .
Following the  कामयाबी  of  nevermind   ,  Nirvana was labeled `` the  फ्लैगशिप   बैंड  ''  of  Generation X , and Cobain hailed  as   ``  the  प्रवक्ता  of a generation ''  .
Cobain , however  ,   थी   प्रायः  uncomfortable and frustrated , believing  उसके  message  और   कलाकारी  vision  to  have been misinterpreted by the public  ,   साथ  his personal issues often subject to media  ध्यान  .
He challenged Nirvana 's  दर्शक  with its final studio  एल्बम  In Utero ( 1993 ) .
During the last years  of  his life , Cobain struggled with heroin addiction ,  बीमारी  and depression .
He also had difficulty coping with his fame  और   पब्लिक   चित्र  ,  और   the   पेशेवर  and  lifelong  personal pressures surrounding himself  और  his wife  ,   संगीतकार  Courtney Love .
on  April 8 , 1994  ,  Cobain was  मिला   मुर्दे  at his home in Seattle , the victim of what  थी   officially  ruled  a  suicide  by  a self-inflicted shotgun  घाव  to the head .
the   हालातों  of his  मौत  at  आयु  27 have  become   a  topic  of  public fascination  और  debate .
Since their debut  ,  Nirvana , with Cobain as a songwriter , has sold  over  25 million albums in the U.S. , and over  50  million  विश्वव्यापी  .

the  radial engine is a reciprocating type internal combustion engine configuration in  जिससे  the cylinders point outward from a central crankshaft like the spokes of a wheel  .
It resembles a stylized  स्टार  when viewed from the front , and is called a `` star engine '' ( German Sternmotor ) in some languages .
the  radial configuration was very commonly used in aircraft engines  पहले  turbine engines became predominant .
the  Golden Girls is an American  sitcom  , created  by  Susan Harris , that originally aired on NBC from September  13  , 1985 , to May 9  ,  1992 .
अभिनीत  Bea Arthur , Betty White , Rue  mcclanahan  and Estelle Getty , the show centers on four older women sharing a home in  मियामी  , Florida .
It was produced by  witt/thomas/harris  Productions , in association with Touchstone Television , and  पॉल  Junger  witt  , Tony Thomas , and Harris  परोसा   as  the original executive  निर्माता  .
The  सुनहरी  Girls received critical acclaim throughout most of its run and won several awards , including  the  Primetime  एमी  Award  लिये   बकाया  Comedy Series twice .
it   भी  won  तीन  Golden Globe Awards  लिये  Best Television Series – Musical or Comedy  .
All four stars each  प्राप्त  an Emmy  पुरस्कार  throughout the series ' run and had multiple nominations  .
The  श्रेणी  also ranked among  the  top ten highest-rated programs for six out of its seven seasons .
Deepwater  खुदाई  is  the  process of  आयल  and  गैस  exploration  और  production in depths of more than  500  feet .
By this definition , there  हैं   लगभग  600 deepwater wells in the Gulf of Mexico .
It has been  economically  infeasible for many years  ,   लकिन   साथ  rising oil prices , more companies are investing in this area .
प्रमुख  companies  working  in this sector  शामिल  Diamond Offshore , TransOcean ,  और  Baker  ह्यूजेस  .
There  हैं   मूलरूप  two kinds of mobile deepwater drilling rigs : semi-submersible  खुदाई  rigs and drillships .
Drilling can also be  performed  from a fixed-position installation such as a floating spar (  मंच   )  or tension-leg platform .
Recent industry analysis has estimated that the total expenditure  in  the global  deepwater   अवसंरचना  market will reach $ 145bn in 2011 .
“Not all  आयल   is  accessible on land or in shallow water  .
You  can  find some oil deposits buried deep under the  समंदर  floor.”  ...  Using sonic equipment , oil companies determine the drilling sites most likely to  उपज  oil .
Then they  उपयोग  a mobile offshore  खुदाई  unit ( MODU )  to  dig the  आरंभिक  well .
Some units are  परिवर्तित  into  उत्पादन   rigs  , meaning they switch from drilling  लिये  oil to capturing oil once it 's  मिला  .
Most of the time ,  the   आयल  company will replace the MODU  साथ  a more permanent oil production rig to capture oil.”  ...  The MODU 's job is to drill down into the ocean 's  मंजिल  to find  आयल  deposits .
The part of the drill that extends below the deck and through the water is called  the  riser .
The riser allows for drilling fluids  to  move between the floor and the rig .
Engineers lower a drill string --  a  series of  पाइप   designed  to drill down to the oil deposit -- through the riser.”
“The expansion of deepwater  खुदाई   is  happening despite accidents in offshore fields ... ”
In 2010 a large explosion occurred killing 11 workers and  spilling  millions  of  gallons of oil into  the  Gulf of Mexico while a BP oil  रिग  was  खुदाई  in deep waters  .
“ ... Despite the risks  ,  the deepwater drilling trend is  spreading  in the Mediterranean and off  the  coast of East Africa after a string of huge discoveries of natural  gas.”
“The  कारण  for the resumption  of  such drilling  ,   विश्लेषक  say , is continuing high demand for energy  worldwide.”
America  needs  the oil so it  is  almost  जरुरी  to face the  ऊँची   risks   कि   आइये   साथ  deepwater drilling  in  order for Americans to continue  to  carry on their  रोज  lives  .
“The Energy  विभाग  recently projected that gulf oil  उत्पादन  would expand from  इसके  2011  स्तर  of 1.3  लाख  barrels a day ,  स्टिल   nearly  a quarter of total domestic production , to 2 million barrels a day by 2020.”
Deepwater drilling affects the  पर्यावरण   in  both  ऋणात्मक  and positive ways  .
Although Deepwater drilling rarely causes oil spills it is still a hazardous possible outcome .
आयल  spills result in oil sinking to  the   नीचे  of  the  ocean smothering  संयंत्र  life leaving fish without  खाना  and shelter to survive  .
On the other hand  deepwater  drilling effects the  पर्यावरण   in  a positive  तरीके  too .
In  समय  once the deepwater oil well is  नहीं  in use  anymore  plants will grow on and around  the  well making a cave or cavern like shelter ideal for  पशु   to  thrive in  .
Deepwater drilling also lets us see the  गहराइयों  of the ocean floor that  हैं  hardly ever  देखी  .
”Cameras on rovers at the bottom of the wells record footage and take photos of rare fish that are in there  प्राकृतिक  habitat , giving scientist a look at animals they rarely  seen”  ( Chevron Corporation ) .  ''
मोनिका  Samille  lewinsky  ( born  जुलाई  23 , 1973  )  is an American woman with whom United  राज्य  President Bill Clinton admitted to having had an `` improper relationship '' while she worked at the White House in  1995  and 1996 .
The affair and its repercussions ( which included Clinton 's impeachment ) became known as  the  Lewinsky scandal  .
Francis Albert `` Frank '' Sinatra , ,  (   दिसम्बर  12 , 1915 – May 14  ,  1998  )  was an American singer and film  कर्ता  .
Beginning his  musical  career in the swing era with Harry James and Tommy Dorsey  ,  Sinatra found  unprecedented  success as a  सोलो  artist from the early to mid-1940s after being signed to Columbia Records in 1943 .
Being the idol of the `` bobby soxers  ``  , he  released  his first  एल्बम  , The Voice of Frank Sinatra in 1946  .
His professional  करियर  had  stalled  by the  1950s  , but it was reborn in 1953 after he  जीती  the Academy  पुरस्कार  for Best  supporting   कर्ता   लिये  his performance in From Here  to  Eternity .
He signed with Capitol  रिकॉर्ड  in 1953 and released several critically  lauded  albums ( such as In the Wee  छोटी  Hours ,  गीतों   लिये  Swingin ' Lovers ! , Come Fly with Me ,  तभी  the Lonely and Nice 'n '  आसान  ) .
Sinatra left  कैपिटल   to  found his  अपना  record label , Reprise Records in 1961 (  ढूंढना   कामयाबी  with  एल्बम  such as Ring-a-Ding-Ding ! , Sinatra at the Sands  और  Francis Albert Sinatra & Antonio Carlos Jobim ) , toured internationally , was  a  founding member of the Rat Pack and fraternized with celebrities and statesmen , including John F. Kennedy .
Sinatra turned 50 in  1965  , recorded the retrospective September of  my   सालो  , starred in  the  Emmy -winning  टेलीविज़न  special Frank Sinatra : A Man  और  His Music , and scored  हिट्स  with  ``   अजनबी  in  the  Night `` and ``  my  Way `` .
साथ   बिक्री  of his music  dwindling  and after appearing in several poorly  प्राप्त  films ,  सिनात्रा  retired for the first time in 1971 .
Two years later , however ,  he  came out of retirement and  in  1973 recorded several albums  ,  scoring a Top 40 hit with `` ( Theme  इससे   )   नई   यॉर्क  , New York `` in 1980 .
using  his  लास  Vegas shows  as  a home base , he toured  दोनो  within the United States  और  internationally  ,  until a short time before his death in  1998  .
Sinatra also forged a highly successful  करियर   as  a  फिल्मी   कर्ता  .
After winning Best Supporting Actor in 1953  ,  he  भी  garnered a nomination for  बेहतरीन  Actor  लिये   the   man  with the  सुनहरी  Arm , and  नाजुक  acclaim for his performance  in  The Manchurian  प्रत्याशी  .
He  भी  starred in such musicals as High Society , Pal Joey  ,  Guys and Dolls and On the Town .
Sinatra  थी  honored at  the  Kennedy Center Honors in 1983 and was awarded  the   अध्यक्षीय  Medal  of  Freedom by Ronald Reagan in 1985 and the Congressional Gold  पदक   in   1997   .
He was the  प्राप्तकर्ता  of eleven Grammy Awards , including the Grammy Trustees Award , Grammy Legend Award and  the  Grammy Lifetime Achievement Award .
सिनात्रा   is  also one  of  world’s best-selling artists of all time , having  बेची   अधिक  than 150 million copies worldwide .
Typical cornhole  फलक
Cornhole  ,  also known as bean  थैला   टॉस  , corn  टॉस  , baggo  or  bags , is a lawn game in which players take turns throwing corn hole bags at  a  raised platform  साथ  a hole  in  the far end  .
A bag in the hole scores 3 points  ,   जबकि  one on the platform  स्कोर  1 point .
Play continues until a team or  खिलाड़ी   पहुँच  the score of  21  .
The American Gold Eagle is an  आधिकारिक  gold bullion coin  of   the  United States .
प्राधिकृत  under  the  Gold Bullion Coin Act of  1985  , it was first released by the United States Mint  in  1986 .
Bikram Yoga is a system of yoga  कि  Bikram Choudhury synthesized from traditional hatha yoga techniques and popularized beginning in the early 1970s .
All Bikram Yoga classes run for 90 minutes  और   consist  of the same series of 26 postures and 2 breathing exercises .
बिक्रम  Yoga is ideally practiced in a  रूम   heated  to 105°F  (  ≈  40.6°c  ) with  a   आर्द्रता  of 40 % , .
क्रिस्टोफर  Michael Massey ( born  26  January 1990 )  is  an American  कर्ता  , comedian  और  rapper best known for starring as Michael Barret in Nickelodeon television series Zoey 101 .
Massey  रै  received  अनेक   पुरस्कार  and nomination  सहित   a  Young Artist Award and Emmy  पुरस्कार  nominations  .
he  is  भी  known for appearing in  अनेक  commercials in the  जल्दी   2000s  .
a  conventional teaspoon  बना  of stainless steel .
A teaspoon is an item of  cutlery  and/or a measuring  यंत्र   ,  as well as a unit of  मापन  of  आवाज़  in some countries and customs .
a  fern is any one or more of a group of about  12,000  species of plants belonging to  the  botanical group known as Pteridophyta .
Unlike mosses  ,  they have  जाइलम  and phloem  (   बनाना  them vascular plants ) .
They have stems , leaves , and roots like other vascular plants .
Ferns reproduce via spores  और  have neither seeds nor  पुष्प  .
By far the largest  समूह  of  ferns   is  the leptosporangiate ferns ,  लकिन   ferns  as defined here ( also called monilophytes ) include  horsetails  , whisk  ferns  , marattioid  ferns  , and ophioglossoid ferns  .
The term pteridophyte  भी  refers  to  ferns  और  a few  अन्य  seedless vascular plants  (  see classification section below ) .
Ferns first appear in  the   चट्टान  record 360 million years ago  in  the Carboniferous but many  of  the current families and species did not appear until roughly  145   लाख  years  पहले  in the  जल्दी  Cretaceous (  बाद  flowering plants came to  dominate  many environments ) .
Ferns are not of major economic importance  ,  but some  हैं  grown  or  gathered  लिये  food  ,  as ornamental plants ,  लिये   remediating   contaminated  soils  ,   और  have  महरूम  the subject  of  research for their ability to remove some chemical pollutants from the air .
कुछ  are significant weeds .
They  भी  play  a   भूमिका   in  mythology  ,  medicine , and art .
Flat  roofs  in Israel
चपटा  roof  in  Los Angeles
A flat roof is a type  of  covering for a building .
in  contrast to the more sloped form of roof , a flat roof is horizontal or nearly horizontal .
The slope of a roof is properly known  as   इसके  pitch  :  Roofs which are nearly  चपटा  are known as  low-pitch  roofs ( as the angle of  ढलान  increases , so  the  pitch is said to increase )  .
Any sheet of material used  to  cover a flat or low-pitched  छत  is usually known as  a  membrane and the primary purpose of these membranes is to waterproof the roof area  .
Materials  कि  cover flat roofs typically allow the water to run off from a slight inclination or camber  into   a   gutter  system  .
Water from some flat roofs such as  on  garden sheds sometimes flows freely off  the  edge of a roof , though gutter systems are of advantage in  keeping  both  दीवारें  and foundations dry .
Gutters on smaller roofs often lead water directly onto  the   मैदान  , or better  ,  into  a  specially made soakaway .
Gutters  on  larger roofs usually lead water  into  the rainwater drainage system of any built up area .
Occasionally flat roofs  हालांकि  are designed  to  collect water in a pool , usually for aesthetic purposes , or for rainwater buffering .
Flat roofs exist  सब   over  the world and each area has its  अपना  tradition or preference for materials used .
In warmer climes where rainfall is less  और  freezing is unlikely to  occur   ,  many flat roofs are  बस  built of masonry or  कंक्रीट  and this is good at  keeping  out the heat of the sun and cheap and easy to  निर्माण  where timber is not  readily   उपलब्धियाँ  .
In  क्षेत्रों  where the roof  could  become saturated  by   बरसात  and leak , or where water  soaked  into  the  brickwork could  फ्रीज   to  ice and thus lead to  'blowing  ' (  तोड़कर  up of the  mortar/brickwork/concrete   by  the expansion of  बर्फ  as  it  forms )  ये   roofs  are not suitable .
Traditionally most flat  roofs  in  the  western  संसार  make use  of  tar or more usually tar paper  लागू  over  छत  decking to keep a  भवन  watertight  .
the  tar  or  tarpaper is in  फेरे  covered in gravel  to  keep  the  sun 's heat , UV rays and weather off  it  and helps  protect  it from cracking or  blistering  and degradation .
Roof decking is  प्रायः   of  plywood  ,  chipboard or OSB boards ( OSB = Oriented Strand  फलक  ,  भी  known as Sterling  फलक  ) of around 18mm thickness .
The tar coating is applied in one  or  more coats  as  a  hot  liquid , heated in  a  tar kettle , or as  चादरें   of  tar impregnated  'paper  ' glued down and sealed together at joints by  hot  tar - once it has cooled  ,  the gravel is spread evenly over it .
A main reason  लिये  failure of these traditional  roofs  is ignorance  or  lack  of  maintenance where people or events cause  the  gravel to be moved  or  removed from the tar  or  tarpaper waterproofing , thus exposing it  to   मौसम  and sun whereupon cracking and blistering occurs over time and eventually  जल  gets in  .
Tarpaper is  प्रायः  a 'paper  '  or fibre material  soaked  or impregnated in tar .
As gravel can not protect tarpaper surfaces where they rise vertically  इससे  the roof such as on parapet walls or upstands , tarpaper variants  हैं  produced with fine gravel applied  to  the hot  तारकोल  during the process  of  manufacture such that a permanent layer of gravel is stuck  to   it  in  अनुक्रम   to  give it ongoing protection .
tarpapers  vary in quality  as  does the workmanship and training  of  those applying it  to  produce more or less successful results .
In some micro climates or shaded areas  ये  rather  'basic  ' tarpaper roofs  can  last well in relation to the cost  of  materials purchase  और  cost of  लेटा   उन्हें  ,  however  the cost of  आधुनिक  membranes such  as  EPDM has come down over recent years to  मेक  them more  और  more affordable .
There are  अभी   अधिक  firms  supplying   आधुनिक  alternatives and there  is  generally  a   growing  awareness of their  प्रदर्शन   और   उपलब्धता  .
if  a  लीक  does occur on  a  flat roof then  क्षति  often goes unnoticed for long  अवधि  of time  दौरान  which water  penetrates   और  soaks the decking and  कोई  insulation and/or structure beneath it .
This can lead to  महंगी  damage from the rot  जिससे  often  develops  and if left  can   weaken  the roof structure .
There are also various health risks to people and animals breathing the mould spores : the  गंभीरता  of this  स्वास्थ्य  risk remains a debated point .
एक  problem  साथ  maintaining flat roofs is that if  जल   करता  penetrate the barrier covering ( be it traditional or a modern membrane ) it can travel a long way before causing visible damage or leaking into a building where it can  be  seen  .
Thus it is not easy to see where it  is  leaking in order to repair it .
Once underlying roof decking is soaked  it  often  sags  causing a further collection or puddling of  जल  in that area and the  प्रॉब्लम  worsens .
A CD-ROM  (  ) is  a  pre-pressed compact  डिस्क  which contains data .
The  नाम  is an acronym  जिससे   स्टैंड  for ``  कॉम्पैक्ट  Disc Read-only memory  ``  .
Computers can  पढ़ा  CD-ROMs  ,  but  can   नहीं   लिखें  on  उन्हें   .
CD-ROMs are popularly used to distribute computer software  ,  including video games and multimedia applications  ,   हालांकि  any data  can  be stored ( up to the capacity  सीमा  of a disc ) .
कुछ  CDs , called enhanced CDs ,  थाम  both computer data and  ऑडियो  with the latter capable  of  being played on a CD player , while data ( such as  तन्त्र  or digital video ) is only usable on  a  computer (  ऐसे  as ISO 9660 format PC CD-ROMs )  .
The Yellow Book is  the  technical standard that defines the format of CD-ROMs .
One of a set of  color-bound  books that contain the technical specifications for all CD  स्वरुप  , the Yellow Book , created  by  Sony  और   फिलिप्स  , was the  पहला  extension of Compact Disc Digital Audio .
It adapted the format to hold any  रूप  of data .
Joanne `` Jo ''  रोलिंग  (  )   ,   (  born 31  जुलाई  1965 ) , pen name J. K. Rowling ,  is  a British novelist  ,  best known as the  लेखक   of  the Harry Potter fantasy  श्रेणी  .
The Potter books  have  gained worldwide attention , won  अनेक  awards , and sold more than 400 million copies .
वे  have become  the  best-selling book  श्रेणी  in history , and been  the   आधार  for a series of  films  which has  become  the highest-grossing film series  in   इतिहास  .
Rowling had overall approval  on  the scripts as  खूब   as   maintaining  creative control by serving as  a  producer  on  the final instalment .
Born in Yate ,  ग्लॉस्टरशायर   ,  Rowling was working as a researcher and  दुभाषिया  secretary  लिये   माफ़ी  International when she conceived  the  idea for the  हैरी   कुम्हार  series on a delayed train  इससे   मैनचेस्टर  to  लंदन  in 1990  .
The  seven-year  period that followed entailed  the   मौत  of her mother  ,  divorce from her first husband and  गरीबी  until Rowling finished the first novel in the series , Harry  कुम्हार   और  the  पारस  's Stone (  1997  ) .
Rowling subsequently published 6 sequels—the last , Harry  कुम्हार   और  the Deathly Hallows ( 2007 ) —as well as 3 supplements to  the  series .
In 2012 ,  रोलिंग  parted with her agency and resumed writing in the  रूप  of a tragicomedy novel aimed at adult readership  ,   हकदार  The Casual Vacancy .
Rowling  रै   कहा   वो  is currently working on two books—one aimed for  वयस्कों  , the  अन्य  for  children  younger  than  the Harry Potter audience ,  और  she expects the  latter   to  be published  पहला  .
Rowling has led a `` rags to  अमीरी  `` life story ,  in  which she  progressed  from living on state  लाभ  to multi-millionaire status  भीतर  five years  .
वो  is the United Kingdom 's best-selling author since records began , with sales in excess  of  £238m .
The 2008 Sunday Times Rich List estimated Rowling 's fortune at £560 million ( $ 798 million ) , ranking her  as  the  बारहवीं  richest woman in the United  किंगडम  .
Forbes ranked Rowling  as  the forty-eighth most  शक्तिशाली  celebrity of 2007 , and TIME  पत्रिका  named her  as   a   runner-up  for its  2007  Person of the Year , noting the social ,  moral   ,  and political  प्रेरणा   वो  has  दिए   उसके  fans .
In October 2010 , Rowling  थी  named  the  `` Most Influential Woman in Britain '' by leading magazine editors .
वो   रै  become a notable philanthropist , supporting such charities  as  Comic Relief  ,  One Parent Families ,  अनेक  Sclerosis Society of Great Britain and Lumos (  formerly  the Children 's High Level Group ) .
auburndale   is  a city in Polk  काउंटी  ,  फ्लोरिडा  , United States .
The population was 11,032 at the  2000  census .
according  to the  u.s   जनसांख्यिकी  estimates of 2005 ,  the  city  था  a population of  12,381  .
It  is  part of the Lakeland – Winter Haven  महानगर  Statistical Area .
Hurricane Isabel ( 2003 )  as  seen from orbit during Expedition 7 of the International Space Station .
The  नजर   ,  eyewall , and  surrounding  rainbands  ,  characteristics of tropical  cyclones  , are clearly visible in this view from space .
A  तीव्र  cyclone is a storm system characterized by a low-pressure center surrounded by  a  spiral arrangement  of  thunderstorms that produce strong winds  और  heavy rain .
Tropical cyclones strengthen when water evaporated from the ocean is released as the saturated air rises  ,  resulting in condensation of water vapor contained in the  नम   एयर  .
They are fueled by a different heat mechanism  than  other cyclonic  windstorms  such as  nor'easters  ,  यूरोपीय  windstorms , and polar lows .
The characteristic that separates tropical cyclones  इससे  other  cyclonic  systems is that at any height in the atmosphere , the center  of  a tropical cyclone will be  warmer  than its  परिवेश   ;  a phenomenon called ``  गरम  core `` storm systems .
The term `` tropical '' refers both to the  भौगोलिक  origin of these systems  ,  which  प्रायः  form in tropical regions  of   the  globe ,  और  to their formation in maritime  तीव्र  air masses  .
The term `` cyclone ''  refers  to such storms ' cyclonic nature , with counterclockwise wind flow in  the  Northern Hemisphere  और   clockwise   हवा   प्रवाह  in the Southern  गोलार्ध   .
The opposite  दिशा   of  the wind flow is  a  result of the Coriolis  फ़ोर्स   .
Depending  on  its location  और  strength , a tropical  चक्रवात  is  referred  to  by  names such as hurricane ( , ) , typhoon ( )  ,  tropical storm , cyclonic  तूफ़ान  , tropical depression , and  बस  cyclone .
जबकि  tropical cyclones can produce  अत्यधिक  powerful winds and torrential  बरसात  , they  हैं  also able to produce high  लहरें   ,  damaging storm surge  ,  and  tornadoes  .
They develop over  विशाल  bodies  of   गरम   जल  , and lose their  शक्ति  if they move over land  due  to increased surface friction  और  loss of the  गरम  ocean  as  an energy  सोर्स  .
This is why coastal  regions  can receive significant damage from  a  tropical cyclone ,  जबकि  inland regions are relatively safe from receiving strong winds .
Heavy rains , however , can  उपज  significant flooding inland , and storm  surges  can produce extensive coastal flooding up to  इससे  the coastline .
Although their effects on human populations can be devastating , tropical cyclones can relieve drought conditions  .
They also carry heat energy away from the tropics and transport it toward temperate latitudes , which makes them an important part of the global atmospheric  परिसंचरण   यांत्रिकी  .
As a result ,  तीव्र  cyclones help  to   maintain  equilibrium in the Earth 's troposphere  ,  and to maintain  a  relatively stable and warm temperature worldwide .
Many tropical cyclones develop when  the   वायुमंडलीय  conditions around a weak disturbance in the atmosphere are favorable .
The background environment is modulated by  climatological  cycles  और  patterns such  as  the Madden-Julian  दोलन  , El Niño-Southern Oscillation , and  the  Atlantic multidecadal  दोलन  .
अन्य  form when other  प्रकार  of cyclones acquire tropical  विशेषताएँ  .
Tropical systems  हैं   तब   स्थानांतरित  by steering winds in the troposphere  ;   if  the conditions remain favorable , the tropical disturbance intensifies , and can even develop an eye .
On the other end of the  वर्णक्रम  ,  if  the conditions  around  the system deteriorate or  the  tropical  चक्रवात  makes landfall , the system weakens and  आखिरकार  dissipates .
it   is  not possible to  artificially   induce  the dissipation of these systems with current technology .
Kirk Douglas ( born Issur Danielovitch , ; December 9 , 1916 )  is  an American stage and film  कर्ता   ,  film producer and author .
His popular films include  आउट  of  the   पास्ट   (   1947  ) , Champion ( 1949 )  ,  Ace in the  छेद  (  1951  ) , The Bad and the Beautiful ( 1952  )  ,  20,000  Leagues Under the Sea ( 1954 ) , Lust for Life ( 1956 ) , Paths of Glory  (  1957 ) , Gunfight at the O.K . Corral ( 1957 )  ,   the  Vikings (  1958  ) , Spartacus ( 1960 ) , Lonely Are the Brave (  1962  ) , Seven Days  in  May ( 1964 ) , The  नायक   of  Telemark (  1965  ) and Tough Guys  (  1986 ) .
He is  no.17  on the American  फिल्मी  Institute 's list of the greatest male American screen  महापुरूष  of  सब  time , making him the  highest-ranked  living person on the list .
In 1996 , he received the  अकादमी  Honorary  पुरस्कार  `` for 50 years as a creative  और  moral force in  the  motion picture community . ''
He  is  one of  the  last surviving actors from Hollywood 's  ``  golden age '' .
Robert Clark `` Bob '' Seger (  born  May 6 , 1945 ) is an  अमरीकी   चट्टान   और  roll singer-songwriter , guitarist and  pianist  .
As  a  locally successful Detroit-area  कलाकार  , he performed and recorded  as   bob  Seger  और  the Last Heard and Bob Seger System throughout  the  1960s .
By the early 1970s  ,  he had dropped the `` System '' from his recordings and  जारी  to strive for broader success with other  विभिन्न  bands  .
In 1973  ,  he put  साथ  The  चांदी  Bullet Band , a  समूह  of Detroit-area musicians , with whom  he  became most successful on  the  national level  साथ  the  एल्बम  Live Bullet , recorded live  साथ  the Silver Bullet Band in 1975 at Cobo  हॉल  in Detroit , Michigan .
in  1976  ,  he  हासिल  a national breakout  साथ  the  स्टुडियो  album Night Moves .
On his  स्टुडियो  albums , he also  worked  extensively with the Alabama-based  मांसपेशी  Shoals Rhythm Section , which appeared on  अनेक  of Seger 's  best-selling  singles and albums .
A roots rocker  साथ   a  classic raspy ,  चिल्लाना  voice , Seger wrote and recorded songs that dealt with love , women , blue-collar themes and was an exemplar of heartland rock .
seger   रै  recorded many hits , including `` Night Moves , '' `` Turn the Page , '' `` We 've Got Tonight , '' `` Against the  हवा  ,  ''   और  Shakedown that was  लिखा  for Beverly Hills Cop II and `` Like  a  Rock  ,  '' and also co-wrote the Eagles ' number-one hit `` Heartache  tonight  . ''
His iconic recording of `` Old  समय   चट्टान  and Roll `` was named  एक  of  the   गीतों   of   the  Century in 2001 .
With  a  career spanning  पाँच  decades , Seger  continues  to  perform  and record today .
seger  was inducted  into  the  चट्टान  and Roll Hall of Fame in 2004 and the Songwriters Hall  of  Fame  in  2012 .
Richard Milhous Nixon ( January  9  , 1913 –  अप्रैल  22 , 1994 ) was the 37th President of the United States , serving from 1969  to  1974 , when he became the only president  to  resign the office  .
निक्सन  had previously served as  a  Republican U.S.  प्रतिनिधि  and senator from California and  as  the  36th  Vice President of the United States from 1953 to 1961 .
Nixon  थी   born   in  Yorba Linda ,  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  .
He  ग्रैजुएट  from Whittier College in  1934  and Duke University  स्कूल  of Law in 1937 , returning to California to  अभ्यास   विधि   .
He and his wife  ,  Pat Nixon  ,  moved to Washington to work for  the  federal government  in  1942 .
He subsequently served in the  संयुक्त  States  नेवी  during World War II .
निक्सन   थी  elected in California to the House  of  Representatives  in  1946 and to the  सीनेट  in 1950 .
His  pursuit  of the Alger Hiss case established his reputation  as  a  अग्रणी   anti-communist  ,  और  elevated him to national prominence .
he  was the running mate of  ड्वाइट  D.  आइज़नहावर  , the Republican Party presidential nominee  in  the  1952  election .
Nixon  परोसा  for  आठ  years  as   वाइस  president  .
He waged an unsuccessful presidential campaign in 1960 , narrowly  खोने  to John  F.  Kennedy , and lost  a  race for Governor  of  California in 1962 .
In 1968 , he  भागा  again for  the  presidency and was elected .
हालांकि   निक्सन  initially escalated America 's  भागीदारी  in the  वियतनाम  War , he  subsequently  ended  u.S.  involvement  in   1973  .
Nixon 's  विज़िट  to the People 's Republic of China in 1972 opened diplomatic relations between the two nations , and he initiated détente  और   the  Anti-Ballistic Missile Treaty  साथ  the Soviet Union the same year .
Domestically , his administration generally embraced  नीतियों   कि   transferred  power from Washington to the states  .
Among other things  ,  he  शुभारम्भ  initiatives to fight  कर्कट  and illegal  दवाएँ  , imposed wage and price  नियंत्रण  ,  enforced  desegregation of some Southern  स्कूलों  , and established the Environmental Protection  एजेंसी   .
Though he presided  over  the lunar landings beginning with Apollo 11 ,  he   scaled  back  मानवयुक्त  space exploration .
He was re-elected by a landslide in 1972 .
Nixon 's second term saw an Arab oil embargo  ,  the resignation of his vice president , Spiro Agnew , and a continuing series  of   खुलासे  about  the  Watergate scandal and other misconduct by  सदस्यों  of the administration  .
The scandal  escalated   ,  costing Nixon much of his political  support  , and on August 9 , 1974 , he resigned in the  फेस   of  almost certain impeachment and removal from office .
After his resignation ,  he  controversially received  a  pardon  जारी  by his successor ,  जेराल्ड  Ford .
in  retirement , Nixon 's work as an  elder  statesman , authoring several books and  undertaking   अनेक  foreign trips , helped to rehabilitate his public image  .
He  suffered  a debilitating stroke on  अप्रैल  18 , 1994 , and died four days later  at  the age of 81 .
{ { Infobox Senator
The Dominican Republic annexation treaty caused bitter contention  between  President Grant and Sen. Sumner .
Brady 1869 ]  ]
Sen.  sumner  , opposed to American imperialism in  the  Caribbean and fearful that annexation would lead to  the   conquest   of  the neighboring black republic of  हैती  , became convinced that corruption  lay  behind the treaty ,  और   कि  men  बंद  to the president shared in the corruption  .
As chairman of  the  Senate Foreign  संबंध  Committee  ,   sen.  Sumner initially withheld  उसके  opinion on the treaty on January 18 ,  1870  .
sen.  Sumner had  महरूम   लीक  information from Assistant Secretary  of  State , Bancroft  डेविस  , that U.S . Naval ships were being used to  protect  President  báez  .
Sen. Sumner 's committee voted against  annexation  and  at  Sen.  sumner’s  suggestion and quite  संभवतः  to save the  पार्टी   इससे  an ugly  लड़ो  or  the  president from embarrassment ,  the  Senate held its debate of  the   सन्धि  behind closed  द्वार   in   कार्यपालिका  session .
अध्यक्ष  Grant persisted and sent messages  to  Congress in favor  of  annexation  on  March 14 ,  1870   ,  and May 31 , 1870  .
in  closed session , Sen. Sumner spoke out against  the  treaty ; warnng that  वहीँ  would be difficulty with  the  foreign nationals  ,  noting the chronic rebellion  कि  took place on the island  ,  and the risk  कि  the independence of Haiti , recognized by the United States in 1862 , would be lost  .
Sumner stated  कि  Grant 's use  of  the  u.S.  Navy as a  प्रोटेक्टोरेट  was  a  violation of International law and unconstitutional  .
Finally , on June  30  ,  1870  the treaty  थी  voted  on  by the Senate  और  failed to gain the required  2/3  majority for treaty  ड्योढ़ी  .
The following  दिन  , President Grant , feeling betrayed by  sen.  Sumner  ,  retaliated by ordering the dismissal of Sumner’s close friend J. Lothrop Motley  ,  Ambassador to Britain .
By  पतझड़  , Sumner 's personal hostility to the president was public knowledge , and he  blamed   the  Secretary of State for  failing  to  have  resigned  ,  rather than let Grant have his way .
The  दो  men ,  मित्रों  until then , cooled into bitter enemies  .
In December , 1870 , still  fearful  that Grant meant to acquire Santo  डोमिंगो  somehow  ,  Sumner gave  a  fiercely critical speech accusing the president of usurpation and Babcock of  unethical  conduct .
Already , President Grant , supported by  उसके   सचिव  of State Hamilton Fish  ,   था  initiated a campaign  to  depose Sumner  इससे   the   अध्यक्षता  of the Senate  विदेशी  Relations Committee .
हालांकि  Sumner stated  he  was  an  ``  प्रशासन  man '' , in addition to having stopped Grant 's Dominican Republic  सन्धि  attempt , Sumner had defeated Grant 's full repeal  of  the Tenure  of  Office Act , blocked Grant 's nomination of Alexander  स्टीवर्ट  to  u.S.   सचिव   of  Treasury  ,  and been  a  constant harassing force pushing Reconstruction policies faster than Grant had been  willing  to go .
Grant  resented  Sumner  's  superiority of manner  ,  as well .
बताई  once that Sumner did not believe in the Bible  ,  the president is  supposed  to  have   कहा  that he was not surprised : `` he did  n't  write  it  . ''
As the rift between Grant  और  Sumner increased , Sumner’s health  began   to  decline .
When the 42nd U.S. Congress convened on March 4 , 1871 , Senators  संबद्ध  with President Grant , known  as  ‘’New Radicals’’ voted  to  oust Sen. Sumner from the  सीनेट  Foreign  संबंध  Committee chairmanship .
Business ethics ( also corporate ethics ) is a form  of  applied ethics  or   पेशेवर  ethics that examines ethical principles and moral or ethical problems  कि  arise in a business environment .
It  applies  to all  पहलुओं  of business  conduct  and is relevant  to  the conduct  of  individuals and  संपूर्ण  organizations .
Business ethics has both normative and descriptive dimensions .
As a corporate practice and a career specialization , the field is primarily normative .
Academics attempting  to  understand  कारोबार  behavior employ descriptive  विधि   .
The range and  मात्रा  of  कारोबार  ethical issues reflects the interaction of profit-maximizing behavior with non-economic  चिंताएं  .
Interest in business ethics  त्वरित  dramatically during the 1980s and 1990s ,  दोनो  within major  corporations  and  भीतर   academia  .
For example , today most major corporations promote their commitment to non-economic values  अंतर्गत  headings  ऐसे   as  ethics codes  और  social responsibility charters  .
Adam Smith said  ,  ``  लोगों   of  the  वही  trade seldom meet together  ,  even  लिये  merriment and diversion , but the conversation ends in a conspiracy against the public , or in some contrivance to raise prices .  ''
Governments use laws and regulations to point business behavior in what  वे  perceive  to  be beneficial directions  .
Ethics implicitly regulates areas and details of  बर्ताव  that  झूठ  beyond  सरकारी  control .
the  emergence of large  corporations   साथ  limited relationships and  संवेदनशीलता  to the  समुदायों  in which they operate accelerated the development of formal  आचार  regimes .
A burn is a type of  चोट   to  flesh or skin  caused  by heat , electricity , chemicals , friction , or  विकिरण  .
Most burns  affect  only the superficial skin ( known as  सतही   or  first degree  )  or extend  into   the  deeper skin but do not involve the full thickness of the skin ( known as  आंशिक  thickness or second degree )  .
Rarely all layers of the skin or deeper  ऊतकों  , such as muscle or bone can be injured in which case the burn is  either  full  मोटाई   (  third degree  )   or  fourth degree .
The treatment required depends  on  the severity of the burn .
सतही  burns maybe managed with little more than simple pain killers while  प्रमुख  burns may require prolonged treatment in specialized  बर्न  centers  .
Cooling with tap water may  सहायता  pain and decrease damage however if exposure is prolonged it  may   परिणाम   in  low body temperature .
Partial  मोटाई  burns may  आवश्यकता  cleaning  साथ  soap  और  water followed by dressings  .
Blisters should  typically  be left unbroken .
Full thickness burns usually require surgical treatments  ऐसे   as   स्किन  grafting and extensive burns often require large amount of intravenous fluids .
The most common complications  of  burns  हैं  related to infection .
While large  burns  can be fatal , modern  उपचार  developed in the last  50  years  have  significantly improved the outcomes , especially in children and young adults  .
Globally about 11 million  लोगों  seek medical treatment and 300,000 people die from burns .
In the  संयुक्त  States , of those  admitted  to a burn center ,  लगभग  4 % die from their injuries .
The long term outcome is primarily  सम्बन्धित   to  the size of  बर्न  and the age of the person  effected  .
The  अटलांटिक  Ocean , not including  आर्कटिक  and  अंटार्कटिक  regions
This video was taken  by  the crew of Expedition  29   on  board the ISS .
The  pass  starts  इससे  just north-east  of   the  Island of Newfoundland over  the   उत्तर  Atlantic Ocean to central Africa , over  दक्षिण  Sudan .
The Atlantic  समंदर  is the second-largest of the world 's oceanic divisions .
With a total area of about ,  it  covers  लगभग  20 percent  of  the Earth 's  सतह  and  परिचय  29 percent  of  its water surface  क्षेत्रफल  .
the  first part  of   इसके  name refers to Atlas of Greek mythology , making the Atlantic the `` Sea of Atlas  ''  .
The oldest known mention of  ``  Atlantic '' is in  the  Histories  of  Herodotus around 450 BC (  hdt  .  1.202.4  ) : Atlantis thalassa ( Greek : Ἀτλαντὶς  θάλασσα  ; English : Sea of Atlas )  .
the   पद  Ethiopic Ocean ,  निकला  from Ethiopia , was  लागू  to the southern  अटलांटिक  as late as the mid-19th century .
Before Europeans discovered other oceans ,  the  term `` ocean '' itself  थी  synonymous with the waters beyond the Strait of Gibraltar that  we   अभी   जान  as the  अटलांटिक  .
The early  यूनानियों   believed  this ocean to be a  gigantic   नदी  encircling the world .
The Atlantic Ocean  occupies   an  elongated , S-shaped basin extending  longitudinally  between  यूरेशिया   और  Africa to  the  east ,  और  the Americas to  the   वेस्ट   .
As  एक  component of the interconnected  वैश्विक  ocean , it  is  connected in the north to the Arctic Ocean ( which is sometimes considered a  समुद्र  of the Atlantic )  ,  to  the  Pacific Ocean in the southwest , the Indian Ocean in the southeast ,  और   the  Southern Ocean in the south .
(  अन्य   परिभाषाएं  describe  the  Atlantic as extending southward to Antarctica . )
The  equator  subdivides it into the North Atlantic Ocean and South  अटलांटिक  Ocean .
Due to their  long-term   हठ  , and the  need  for a  अद्वितीय  identifier in  issuing  forecasts  और   चेतावनियाँ  ,  तीव्र  cyclones  और  subtropical cyclones are given names according to  नीति  (  देखिए  Tropical cyclone naming ) .
the  following  हैं  lists from which these tropical and subtropical cyclone names are  निकला  .
श्वेत  light is dispersed  by  a prism into the colors  of  the optical spectrum .
The visible spectrum is the portion of the electromagnetic  वर्णक्रम  that is visible to ( can be detected by  )  the human  नजर  .
Electromagnetic radiation  in  this range of wavelengths is called visible  लाइट   or  simply  लाइट  .
A  ठेठ  human eye  होगा  respond to wavelengths from about 390 to 700 nm .
In  शर्तें  of frequency ,  इस  corresponds to  a  band in  the   vicinity  of  430–790  THz .
A light-adapted eye generally has  इसके  maximum sensitivity at around 555  nm  ( 540 THz ) , in the green region of the optical spectrum (  देखिए  : luminosity function ) .
The spectrum does not , however , contain all the colors that the human eyes and brain can distinguish .
असंतृप्त  colors such as pink , or purple variations such as magenta ,  हैं   अनुपस्थित   ,   लिये  example , because  वे  can be made only by a mix of multiple wavelengths  .
Colors  containing   तभी  one wavelength are also called pure colors .
Visible wavelengths pass  through   the  `` optical window `` ,  the  region of the electromagnetic spectrum  जिससे  allows wavelengths to pass largely unattenuated through the Earth 's atmosphere .
an  example of  इस  phenomenon is that  साफ  air  scatters  blue light more than red wavelengths ,  और  so  the  midday sky appears blue .
The optical window is also  पुकारा  the visible window because it overlaps the human visible  जवाब  spectrum .
The  निकट  infrared  (  NIR ) window lies just  आउट  of the human vision ,  as  well as the  मीडियम  Wavelength  ir  ( MWIR ) window and  the  Long Wavelength or Far Infrared ( LWIR or FIR ) window though other animals  may  experience them .
Many species  can   देखिए   लाइट  with  बारंबारता  outside  the  `` visible  वर्णक्रम  , '' which is defined  in   शर्तें  of  इंसान  vision .
Bees and many other insects can detect ultraviolet light , which helps  उन्हें  find nectar  in  flowers .
Plant  प्रजाति  that depend on insect  परागण  may owe  reproductive  success to their appearance in ultraviolet light , rather than how colorful they appear to humans .
पक्षियों  , too , can see  into   the   पराबैंगनी   (  300–400 nm )  ,  and some have sex-dependent markings  on  their plumage  कि   हैं  visible  तभी   in  the ultraviolet range .
Many animals that can see into the ultraviolet range , however  ,  can not  देखिए   रेड   लाइट  or any other reddish wavelengths .
Bees  '  visible spectrum ends at about 590nm  ,  just  पहले   the   नारंगी  wavelengths start .
Birds , however  ,  can  देखिए  some  रेड   wavelengths  , but not as many as  इंसानो   .
Zebras  (   or  ) are several species of African equids ( horse family ) united by their distinctive black and white stripes .
Their stripes come in different patterns , unique to each individual .
वे  are  generally   सोशल  animals that  सजीव  in small harems  to  large herds .
Unlike their closest  रिश्तेदारों  , horses and asses , zebras have never been truly domesticated .
There are three  प्रजाति  of zebras : the plains zebra , the Grévy  's  zebra  और  the mountain zebra .
the  plains zebra  और  the  पहाड़  zebra belong  to  the subgenus Hippotigris , but Grévy 's  जेब्रा  is the sole species of subgenus  dolichohippus  .
The latter resembles an ass ,  to  which it is closely related , while the former two are more horse-like .
All  तीन  belong to the  genus   equus  ,  साथ  with other living equids .
the   अद्वितीय   धारियाँ  of  zebras  make them one of  the  animals most familiar to people .
They occur in a variety of habitats , such  as  grasslands , savannas , woodlands , thorny scrublands , mountains , and coastal  पहाड़ियाँ  .
However  ,  various anthropogenic factors have had  a  severe impact on zebra populations  ,  in particular hunting for skins  और  habitat destruction .
Grévy 's  जेब्रा  and the mountain zebra are endangered .
जबकि  plains zebras are much more plentiful , one subspecies , the quagga , became extinct in the late 19th century – though  वहीँ  is currently a  योजना  , called  the  Quagga Project  ,   कि  aims to  नस्ल  zebras  कि  are  phenotypically  similar  to  the  quagga  in a process  पुकारा  breeding back .
Barry White , born Barry  यूजीन  Carter ( – )  ,  was an American composer and singer-songwriter .
A two-time Grammy Award -winner known for his distinctive bass voice and romantic  चित्र  ,  श्वेत  's greatest success came  in  the  1970s  as a solo singer  और  with the  प्रेम  Unlimited Orchestra , crafting many enduring soul ,  दुर्गंध  ,  और  disco songs such as  उसके  two biggest  हिट्स  , `` You 're the First ,  the   पिछला  , My Everything  ``   और  `` Ca n't Get  पर्याप्त  of Your Love , Babe . ''
Along with  इसहाक़   हेज़  , White is  माना  by Allmusic.com as a  पायोनियर  of disco music in  the  early 1970s .
During the course of his career  in  the music  कारोबार   ,  White achieved 106 gold albums worldwide  ,  41  of  which also attained platinum  औकात  .
श्वेत  had 20 gold and 10 platinum singles  ,  with worldwide sales in  excess  of  100  million , according to critics Ed Hogan and  वेड  Kergan .
His influences included Rev  .   जेम्स  Cleveland  ,  Ray Charles ,  एरीथा  Franklin plus Motown  कलाकारों  The Supremes ,  the  Four Tops and Marvin Gaye .
Angelina  जोली  ( , born  एंजेलीना  Jolie Voight ; June 4 , 1975  )  is  an  American  अभिनेत्री  , film director , and screenwriter .
वो   रै  received an Academy Award , two Screen Actors Guild Awards  ,  and  तीन  Golden Globe Awards ,  और   थी  named Hollywood 's highest-paid actress by Forbes  in  2009 and 2011 .
Jolie promotes humanitarian causes  ,  and is  विख्यात  for her work with  शरणार्थियों  as a Special  envoy   और  former Goodwill Ambassador for the  संयुक्त  Nations  ऊँची  Commissioner for Refugees ( UNHCR )  .
She has often been cited  as  the  संसार  's `` most beautiful  ''  woman ,  a  title for which she has received substantial  मीडिया   ध्यान  .
जोली  made her screen debut as a child  alongside  her father Jon  वोइट  in Lookin ' to Get Out ( 1982 ) , but  उसके  film  करियर   began  in earnest a decade later with  the  low-budget production  साइबोर्ग  2 (  1993  ) .
Her first leading role in  a   प्रमुख   फिल्मी  was in the cyber-thriller Hackers ( 1995 ) .
She starred  in   the  critically acclaimed biographical  टेलीविज़न  films George Wallace ( 1997 ) and Gia (  1998  ) , and  जीती  an  अकादमी  Award for Best Supporting Actress for her performance in the drama  लड़की  , Interrupted (  1999  )  .
Jolie achieved wide fame after her portrayal of video game heroine  लारा  Croft in Lara Croft : Tomb  रेडर  (  2001  )  ,   और  established herself among the highest-paid actresses in  हॉलीवुड  with the sequel The Cradle of Life ( 2003 ) .
She continued her action star  करियर  with Mr. & Mrs. Smith  (  2005  )  and Wanted ( 2008  )  —her biggest  non-animated  commercial successes to date—and received further critical acclaim for her  प्रदर्शन  in  the  dramas A Mighty  दिल  (  2007  )  और  Changeling ( 2008 ) , which earned her a nomination for an Academy Award for Best Actress .
Jolie  बना  her directorial debut  साथ  the wartime drama In the Land of Blood and Honey  (   2011  )  .
Divorced  इससे   अभिनेताओं  Jonny Lee Miller and  बिली  Bob  थॉर्नटन  , Jolie now lives with  कर्ता  Brad Pitt , in  a   संबंध  notable for fervent media attention .
Jolie  और  Pitt have three biological children  और  three adopted children .
A natural arch produced by the erosion of differentially weathered rock in Jebel Kharaz , Jordan
Erosion is the process by which soil  और  rock are  removed   इससे   the  Earth  's  surface by exogenetic processes such as wind  or   जल  flow , and then transported and deposited in other locations  .
While erosion is a natural process  ,  human activities have increased by 10-40  टाइम्स  the rate at which  अपरदन  is  occurring  globally .
Excessive  अपरदन  causes problems such as desertification , decreases in agricultural productivity due to  जमीन   degradation  , sedimentation  of   जलमार्गों  , and ecological  पतन  due to loss of the nutrient rich upper soil layers .
Water and wind erosion are now the two primary causes of land degradation  ;  combined , they are responsible  लिये  84 %  of  degraded acreage , making excessive erosion one of the  सबसे  significant global environmental problems  .
औद्योगिक  agriculture , deforestation , roads , anthropogenic climate change and urban sprawl  हैं  amongst the  सबसे  significant human activities in regard to their  प्रभाव  on stimulating erosion  .
However  ,  there are many available  वैकल्पिक   जमीन  use practices that  can  curtail or limit erosion , such as terrace -building , no-till agriculture ,  और  revegetation  of  denuded soils .
Jersey Shore  is  an American reality television series  जिससे  ran on  एमटीवी  from December 3  ,  2009 to December 20 , 2012 in the United States .
The  श्रेणी  follows  the  lives of eight housemates spending  उनके   गर्मियाँ  at the Jersey Shore in the U.S. state of New  जर्सी   .
Season 2 followed the cast  escaping  the cold northeast winter to Miami Beach ,  साथ  Season  3   returning  to the Jersey Shore .
The fourth season  ,  filmed in Italy , premiered on August 4 , 2011 .
The  दिखाएँ  returned for a fifth season , at Seaside Heights on January 5 , 2012 .
The fifth season finale aired  on  March 15 , 2012 .
On March  19  ,  2012   ,  MTV confirmed  कि   the  series would return for  उनके  sixth season .
On August 30  ,   2012   ,  MTV announced that the series will end after the sixth season  ,  which premiered on  अक्तूबर  4 .
The series finale aired on December 20 , 2012 .
The show debuted amid large amounts of controversy  regarding  the use of the  शब्द   ``  Guido  /  Guidette ,  ''  portrayals of Italian-American stereotypes , and  scrutiny  from locals  क्युकी  the cast members were not residents of the area  .
The  श्रेणी   garnered  record ratings for MTV , making  it   the  network 's most viewed series telecast ever .
The series  '  cast have also been credited with introducing unique lexicon and phrases  into   अमरीकी  popular culture .
the  University of Chicago and  the  University of Oklahoma  हैं  among the educational institutions  कि  have had classes or conferences about the  दिखाएँ  .
In  2010  , the cast of  जर्सी   shore  was  नामित   on  Barbara Walters ' 10 Most Fascinating People  सूची  , and the series has since  महरूम  exported to  दर्जनों  of countries worldwide .
There  हैं  several remakes of the show  in  other countries , with  दो  set in the United Kingdom  ;  the well known  geordie  Shore , set in Newcastle upon  tyne   ,   इंग्लैण्ड  .
The  अन्य   is  The  घाटियों  , the Welsh equivalent , which  is  filmed  और   नियत  in Cardiff .
The only  अन्य  official remake of  the   दिखाएँ   is   gandía   shore  , set in Gandía , Spain .
right
United States territory  is  any extent  of  region under the jurisdiction  of   the  federal government of the United States  ,  including all waters (  around  islands or continental  tracts  )  और  all  u.s  . Naval vessels .
The United  राज्य  has traditionally proclaimed  the  sovereign rights for exploring , exploiting , conserving , and managing  इसके  territory .
This extent of territory is  सब   the  area belonging to , and under the dominion of , the United States  संघीय   सरकारी  ( which includes tracts lying at  a  distance from the country ) for  प्रशासनिक  and other purposes .
