The United States total territory includes a subset of  राजनैतिक  divisions .
the   u.S.  government is a  सरकारी  with delegated powers under the United States  संविधान  .
``  the  powers not  प्रतिनिधित्व  to the United States by the Constitution , nor prohibited  by  it  to  the States , are reserved to  the  States respectively , or to  the   लोगों  '' by the Tenth Amendment .
Terminator 3 : Rise of  the  Machines ( commonly abbreviated as  t3  ) is a 2003 science fiction  कार्रवाई  film directed by Jonathan  mostow  and starring Arnold  श्वार्ज़नेगर  , Nick Stahl , Claire Danes and Kristanna Loken  .
It is the second sequel to The Terminator ( 1984 )  .
After  स्काईनेट  fails to  मार  Sarah Connor before  उसके  son is born and to kill John himself  as  a child , it sends back another  टर्मिनेटर  , the  t-x  , in an  attempt  to wipe out as many Resistance officers  as  possible .
This includes John 's  भविष्य   बीवी   ,  but  नहीं  John himself as his whereabouts are unknown  to   स्काईनेट  .
John 's life is  लगाई  in  खतरे  when the T-X accidentally finds him .
A  cord  of wood
The cord is a  ईकाई  of measure of  शुष्क  volume  प्रयुक्त  in  कनाडा   और   the  United States to  माप  firewood and pulpwood .
A cord is the amount of  लकडी  that  ,  when `` ranked and well stowed '' (  arranged  so pieces are  लकीर   ,  parallel  ,  touching and compact ) ,  occupies  a volume of .
इस  corresponds to a well stacked woodpile  ऊँची  , long , and  गहन  ;  or  any  अन्य   व्यवस्था  of linear measurements that  yields  the same volume  .
The  नाम  cord probably comes from the use of  a  cord  or  string to measure it .
The ,  is  an 8-bit handheld  वीडियो  game device developed and manufactured by Nintendo .
It was released  in  Japan on , in North  अमेरिका  in  ,   और  in Europe on .
It is the first handheld  कंसोल  in  the   खेल   लड़के  line , and was created by Gunpei Yokoi and Nintendo Research & Development 1  —the  same staff  जो   था  designed the Game & Watch series  as  well as several  लोकप्रिय  games for the Nintendo  entertainment   प्रणाली  .
Redesigned versions were released  in  1996 and 1998 , in  the   रूप  of Game Boy Pocket , and Game Boy Light  (  Japan only ) , respectively .
The Game Boy is Nintendo 's second  हैंडहेल्ड   प्रणाली  following the Game & Watch  श्रेणी  introduced  in  ,  और  it combined  सुविधाएँ  from both the Nintendo Entertainment System and Game & Watch .
It  थी  originally bundled with the  पहेली  game Tetris  .
As part of the fourth generation of gaming  ,  the Game  लड़के  competed  साथ  the Sega Game Gear , Atari Lynx , and  the   turboexpress  .
Despite these  अन्य  technologically superior handheld  consoles  , the Game Boy was a tremendous success  .
the   खेल  Boy  और  its successor ,  the  Game Boy Color , have both combined sold 118.69 million  इकाई  worldwide .
Upon  इसके   रिलीज  in the United States , it sold  इसके  entire shipment of  एक  million units within weeks .
The World  व्यापार  Center is a complex of buildings under  निर्माण  in Lower Manhattan  ,  New York City ,  संयुक्त  States , replacing an earlier complex of seven buildings with the same  नाम  on the same site  .
The  असली  World Trade Center featured  लैंडमार्क  twin towers ,  जिससे  opened on April  4   ,  1973 and were destroyed in  the  September 11 attacks of 2001 ,  साथ  with 7 World  व्यापार  Center .
The other buildings  in   the  complex  यहूद  damaged in the attacks , and  उनके   तबाह  were eventually demolished .
The site is being rebuilt with five new skyscrapers and a memorial to those killed in the attacks .
, only one skyscraper has been completed ; the other four are expected to be completed before 2020  .
One World Trade Center will be the lead  भवन  for  the  new complex , reaching more than 100 stories at its completion .
it  became  the  tallest building  in   नई   यॉर्क  City on April 30 , 2012 , and is expected to be finished by  2013  .
A sixth tower is awaiting  पुष्टि  .
At the time of  उनके   पूर्णता  , the original 1  संसार  Trade Center (  the  North Tower ) and 2 World Trade Center ( the South Tower ) , known collectively as the ``  जुड़वा  Towers '' , were the tallest buildings in  the  world .
the  other buildings included 3  wtc  ( the Marriott  संसार   व्यापार  Center )  ,   4  WTC , 5 WTC , 6 WTC  ,  and 7 WTC .
All of these buildings were built between  1975  and  1985  .
The cost for the construction was $ 400 million (  $   in  dollars ) .
The complex was located in the heart of New York  नगर  's downtown financial district  और   contained  13.4  लाख  square feet ( 1.24 million m2 ) of office space .
The  संसार  Trade Center  अनुभवी  a fire on , 1975  ,  a bombing on , 1993 and a robbery on , 1998 .
In 1998  ,  the Port Authority decided to privatize the  संसार   व्यापार  Center , leasing  the  buildings to a  निजी  company  to  manage , and awarded  the  lease to Silverstein Properties in .
On the morning of  सितंबर  11 , 2001 , Al-Qaeda -affiliated hijackers  उड़ाया  two Boeing  767   jets  into the complex , one into each  मीनार   ,  in a coordinated terrorist attack  .
After burning for 56 minutes , the South Tower ( 2 ) collapsed , followed a half-hour later  by  the North  मीनार  ( 1 ) , with the attacks on the World Trade Center resulting  in   2,753  deaths .
Falling debris from  the  towers , combined with  फ़ायर   कि  the debris initiated in several surrounding buildings , led to the partial  or  complete collapse of all  the  other buildings in the complex  और  caused catastrophic damage to ten other large structures in the  surrounding   क्षेत्रफल  .
The process of cleanup and recovery at  the  World Trade Center site took eight months .
Over the following  सालो  , plans for a rebuilt World Trade Center took form .
The first new building at the site was 7 World Trade Center , which opened in .
The Lower Manhattan  विकास  Corporation (  lmdc  ) , established in  to   oversee  the rebuilding process ,  व्यवस्थित  competitions to  चुनें  a site plan and memorial  डिज़ाइन  .
Memory  मूलाधार  ,  designed  by Daniel Libeskind , was selected as  the   निपुण  plan , but  इस  went  through  substantial changes in  डिज़ाइन  .
The new World Trade  बीच  complex  होगा  include One World Trade Center ,  तीन  other high-rise office towers , and the National  सितंबर  11 Memorial & Museum .
San  जिबरील   kyu
San Bernardino  kyu  , with Mt . San Gorgonio in the foreground and Big Bear Lake  in  the background .
the  Transverse  सीमाएँ  are  a   समूह  of mountain  सीमाएँ  of southern California , in the Pacific Coast  सीमाएँ  physiographic region  in   उत्तर  America .
The Transverse Ranges begin at the southern  समाप्त  of the California Coast Ranges and lie between Santa Barbara and San Diego counties .
They derive the name Transverse Ranges due to their East-West orientation , making them transverse to the general North-South orientation  of  most of  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  's coastal mountains  .
आवधिक   तालिका  with electron shells
An  इलेक्ट्रॉन  shell may be  विचार  of  as  an  कक्षा  followed by  electrons  around an  अणु   's  nucleus .
the  closest shell to the nucleus is called the `` 1 shell '' ( also called `` K shell '' ) , followed by the  ``  2 shell '' ( or ``  l  shell  ''  ) , then the `` 3 shell ''  (  or `` M shell ''  )   ,  and so  on   दूर  and farther from  the  nucleus .
The shell letters K , L , M , ...  ,  used in  the   x-ray  notation , are alphabetical .
Each shell  can  contain  तभी   a  fixed number of electrons : The  1st   शेल  can hold up to two electrons  ,  the 2nd shell can hold up to  आठ   electrons   ,  the 3rd  शेल  can hold  up  to 18 ,  और  4th  शेल   can   थाम  up to 32 and so on .
चूंकि   electrons  are electrically attracted to the nucleus , an atom 's electrons will generally occupy outer shells only if the more inner shells have already been completely filled by other electrons .
However , this is not a  सख्त   आवश्यकता  : Atoms may  have  two or even three incomplete  बाहरी  shells .
( See  madelung   नियम   लिये   अधिक  details  .  )
For  an  explanation of why electrons exist in these shells  देखिए  electron configuration .
The electrons in the outermost occupied  शेल   (  or  शेल  ) determine the chemical properties of the atom  ;  it is called the valence  शेल  .
प्रत्येक   शेल  consists of  एक  or more  subshells  , and each subshell consists of one or more atomic orbitals .
Vickie Lynn Marshall (  née  Hogan ;  नवम्बर  28 , 1967 –  फ़रवरी  8 , 2007 )  ,   ज्ञात  by her moniker Anna Nicole Smith  ,  was an American  मॉडल  , actress ,  और  television personality .
Smith  पहला  gained popularity  in  Playboy  ,   बनने  the 1993 Playmate of the Year .
She modeled  लिये  clothing companies , including Guess  जीन्स  and Lane Bryant .
Smith dropped  आउट  of high school and  थी  married in 1985 .
उसके  highly  publicized  second marriage to  आयल  business mogul , J. Howard  मार्शल  , 62  सालो  her senior ,  resulted   in   अटकलें  that  वो  married  the  octogenarian for  उसके  money  ,   जिससे  she  अस्वीकृत  .
Following Marshall 's  मौत  , Smith began a lengthy legal battle over  a  share of his estate .
उसके  case , Marshall v. Marshall ,  पहुँचे  the  u.S.  Supreme  अदालत  on a  सवाल  of federal jurisdiction ,  और  again  on  a question of bankruptcy court  प्राधिकार   (  now called Stern v. Marshall ) .
Smith died on February 8 , 2007  in  a Hollywood , Florida hotel room  as  a result  of  an overdose of prescription drugs .
भीतर  the  फाइनल  six months of her life ,  स्मिथ  was the focus  of  a renewed press  कवरेज  surrounding the  मौत  of her son , Daniel ,  और  the paternity and custody battle over her  नवजात   बेटी  , Dannielynn .
The is one denomination of Japanese yen .
The current design was first minted in 1959 using Japanese characters  ज्ञात  as  the  `` new script `` ,  और  were also  minted  from 1949-1958 using `` old-script '' Japanese characters .
Five-yen  सिक्के  date to  1870   (  when ,  due  to the much higher value of the yen ,  वे   यहूद  minted in gold  )  .
The front of the coin  depicts  a rice plant growing  आउट  of the water , with `` five yen ''  लिखा  in kanji ; the back  is  stamped with  ``   जापानी  '' and the year  of  issue  ,  also  in  kanji ,  अलग  by sprouts  of   a   पेड़  .
The three graphic elements  of  the coin  represent  agriculture  और  fisheries , the key  तत्व  of the Japanese first-sector economy .
Around a hole , there is a  गियर  that  represents  industry .
It is  the  only Japanese coin in  परिसंचरण  to lack  अरबी  numerals on either face .
tlc  is an American  लड़की  group whose repertoire  spanned   r  & B , hip hop , soul , funk ,  और  new jack  झूले   .
Originally consisting of singer Tionne `` T-Boz  ''  Watkins  ,   rapper  Lisa `` Left Eye ''  lopes  and singer Rozonda `` Chilli '' Thomas , the group found unprecedented success  in   the   1990s  while also enduring a series of spats  साथ  the law , each other  ,   और  the group  's  record label .
Initially  ,  TLC  हासिल  commercial  कामयाबी  following the release  of  their  डेब्यू  album  ooooooohhh  ...
On the TLC Tip , which sold 6  लाख  copies worldwide  .
However , it was their second album ,  crazysexycool  , that catapulted the group to superstar status .
CrazySexyCool went on to be  certified   डायमंड  by the RIAA — a first for  a  female  समूह   ,  and eventually sold 23 million copies worldwide .
Five  सालो  later  ,  the group released their third  एल्बम  FanMail , which became the group 's first  एल्बम   to  debut  at  number  एक  and sold more than 11 million copies worldwide .
The subsequent tour following FanMails  रिलीज  became the highest grossing tour of all  समय  by a female band .
In 2002 , Lisa  ``  Left Eye ''  lopes  died  in  a car  दुर्घटना  in Honduras .
सात  months later , T-Boz and  chilli   released  the group 's fourth album 3D ,  जिससे  sold 2 million copies worldwide  ,  it  प्रदर्शित  unreleased vocals from Left Eye .
Billboard magazine ranked TLC as one  of  the greatest musical trios .
Between 1992 and 2003  ,  the band accumulated  टेन  top  टेन   singles  , four number one singles  ,   चार  multi-platinum  एल्बम   ,  and four Grammy Awards .
At the end  of  1999 , TLC was  क्रमित  as  the  seventh most successful act of the 1990s by Billboard  .
In 2008 ,  the  group  थी   inducted  into the  सब  Time Hot 100 Artist  हॉल   of  Fame by the same magazine , at 56th place .
That year it was also  सूचीबद्ध   as   the  # 25  r  & B/hip-hop artist of the preceding  25  years .
TLC has sold more than 65 million  रिकॉर्ड  worldwide and they are ranked  as  the second best selling  मादा  group of all time , and the best selling female R & B  समूह  of all time .
In 2012 ,  tlc  ranked 12th on VH1 's  100   महानतम  Women in Music , being ranked the number one all girl  समूह   on  that list .
Tarzan is a 1999 American animated adventure  फिल्मी   उत्पादित  by Walt Disney Feature  एनिमेशन   और  distributed  by  Walt Disney Pictures .
The 37th film in the Walt Disney Animated Classics , it is based on the story Tarzan of the Apes by Edgar Rice Burroughs  ,  and is the only major motion picture version of the story Tarzan property to be  एनिमेटेड  .
Directed by Chris  buck  and  केविन  Lima with a screenplay by  tab  Murphy , Bob Tzudiker , and Noni White , Tarzan  सुविधाएँ  the voices of Tony Goldwyn  ,   minnie   ड्राइवर  , Glenn Close  ,  and Rosie O'Donnell  साथ  Brian Blessed , Lance Henriksen , Wayne Knight  ,  and  निगेल   hawthorne  .
It was the last bona fide hit before the Disney  slump  of the early 2000s  grossing  $ 171,091,819  domestically  and  $  448,191,819 worldwide ,  outgrossing  its  पूर्ववर्तियों  Hercules (  1997  ) and Mulan ( 1998 ) .
At the  समय  of its release ,  इसके  production  बजट  of  $  130 million made it the most expensive animated film ever  बना  ,  जबतक  topped  by  Disney 's own  $  140 million Treasure Planet in 2002 .
It was also the  पहला  Disney animated feature  to  open at #  1  since Pocahontas .
This was the  पिछला  major box office success of the Disney Renaissance  .
Oil Platform P-51 off the  ब्राज़ीलियाई   coast  is a semi-submersible platform .
Oil platform Mittelplate in the North sea
an  oil platform , (  offshore   मंच  or colloquially oil rig ) is a  विशाल  structure with facilities  to  drill wells , to  निकालें  and process oil and natural  गैस  ,  और  to temporarily store product until  it  can be brought  to  shore for refining and marketing .
In many cases , the platform  contains  facilities to house the workforce as well .
Depending  on  the circumstances  ,  the platform may be  फिक्स्ड  to the ocean floor , may  consist   of  an  कृत्रिम  island ,  or  may float .
रिमोट  subsea wells may also be connected to  a   मंच  by flow  लाइनों  and by umbilical connections .
ये  subsea solutions may  consist  of one or more subsea  कुएं  , or of one or more manifold centres for multiple wells .
वध   is   the  killing of animals , usually  कि  of domestic livestock for food  .
the  animals most  commonly  slaughtered for food are cattle , water buffalo ( for beef and veal ) , sheep ,  बकरियों   (  for lamb and mutton ) , pigs ( for pork  )  , horses ( for  घोड़ा  meat ) , and fowl  ,  largely chickens , turkeys  ,  and  बतखों  and increasingly fish from the  aquaculture  industry (  मछली  farming ) .
The  श्वेत   हाउस  , the president 's official residence and  बीच   of  the administration
Under the United States Constitution , the  अध्यक्ष   of  the United  राज्य  is the head of state and head of government  of  the United States .
As chief  of  the executive branch and head of the federal government as a whole , the  प्रेसिडेंसी  is the highest political  दफ्तर  in the United  राज्य  by  influence  and recognition .
The president  is  also the  commander-in-chief  of the United  राज्य  Armed Forces  .
The  अध्यक्ष  is indirectly elected to a  four-year  term  by   an  Electoral College (  or  by the House of Representatives  चाहिए   the  Electoral College fail to  पुरस्कार   an  absolute majority of votes to any  व्यक्ति  ) .
Since  the  ratification of the  twenty-second  Amendment  to   the  United States  संविधान  in  1951  , no person may be  निर्वाचित  President  अधिक   than  twice , and no  एक  who  रै  served more than two years of a term to which someone  else  was elected may  be   निर्वाचित  more than once  .
Upon the death ,  इस्तीफा  , or  हटाना  from office of an  लाज़िम  President ,  the  Vice President assumes the office .
The President  जरूर  be at  तनिक   35  years of age and a `` natural born '' citizen of the United States .
This  सूची  includes only those persons who were sworn  into  office as  अध्यक्ष  following the ratification  of  the United States Constitution  ,   जिससे  took effect on March 4 , 1789 .
For American leaders before this ratification , see President of the Continental  कॉंग्रेस  .
The list does not include  कोई  Acting Presidents under  the  Twenty-fifth  amendment  to  the  United States Constitution  .
There have been 43 people sworn into office , and  44  presidencies , as Grover Cleveland served two non-consecutive terms and is counted chronologically as both  the  22nd and 24th president  .
Of  the  individuals elected as  अध्यक्ष  ,  चार  died in office of natural causes ( William Henry  हैरिसन  ,  zachary  Taylor , Warren  G.  Harding , and Franklin D.  रूज़वेल्ट  ) , four were assassinated ( Abraham Lincoln , James A.  गारफ़ील्ड  , William McKinley , and John F.  कैनेडी  ) and one resigned ( Richard Nixon ) .
George  वॉशिंगटन  ,  the   पहला   अध्यक्ष   ,  was inaugurated in 1789  बाद  a  सर्वसम्मत   vote   of   the  Electoral College .
विलियम   हेनरी   हैरिसन  spent the shortest time in office with 32 days  in  1841 , and Franklin D. Roosevelt spent the longest  साथ  over twelve years , but  died   shortly  into his fourth term  in  1945 .
He is the only president to serve more than two terms , and a  संवैधानिक  amendment , affecting presidents after Harry  ट्रूमैन  ,  थी  passed to  सीमा  the number of times an individual can be elected president .
Andrew  जैक्सन   ,   the  seventh  अध्यक्ष  , was the first to be elected by men of  सब   वर्ग  in 1828 after  सबसे  laws barring non-land-owners from  मतदान   यहूद  repealed .
वारेन  Harding  थी  the first elected after  महिलाओं  gained voting rights  in  1920 .
History  रिकॉर्ड  four presidents  –   जॉन   q  Adams , Rutherford  B.  Hayes  ,  Benjamin Harrison and  जार्ज  W. Bush –  जो  lost the popular vote  लकिन  assumed office  .
जॉन  F. Kennedy has  महरूम   the  only president of Roman  कैथोलिक  faith , and  the  current president , Barack Obama , is the  पहला  president  of  African descent .
Several firearms  साथ   detachable  suppressors , from top  to   नीचे   :  An Uzi , An AR-15 , A Heckler & Koch USP Tactical ,  a  Beretta 92FS , and  a  SIG  मच्छर  .
bolt  action rimfire  राइफल  with suppressor
AWM-F sniper rifle with attached  suppressor  .
a   suppressor  , sound suppressor , or  ध्वनि  moderator , is a device attached to or part  of  the barrel of a firearm which reduces the amount of noise ,  और  usually the amount of muzzle flash ,  उत्पन्न  by  फायरिंग  the  हथियार  .
a  suppressor can be used both with a firearm and with compressed air gun .
Though it is  sometimes  referred to as a silencer , this term is a misnomer  popularized  by cinematic  fiction  :  the  sound of a projectile  ,  especially one moving  तेज़  than the speed of  ध्वनि  , through  the  air can not be eliminated  .
Using a  suppressor  in long distance shooting ( i.e . greater than  300  meters ) can lessen , or  retard  , the report at the  पल  of impact ,  और   बनाएँ   the  impression  of  silence near the target .
The  रव  heard near the muzzle as a projectile leaves  the  barrel  ,  though subdued  ,  is not silent at all .
a  suppressor  is  usually a metal cylinder  साथ  internal  mechanisms  to  reduce   the  sound of firing by slowing the escaping  propellant  gas and sometimes by reducing the velocity  of  the bullet .
Early suppressors were created around the beginning of the 20th century by several inventors .
American inventor Hiram  पर्सी  Maxim ( not to  be   उलझन  with Hiram  स्टीवंस  Maxim ,  hiram  Percy 's father ,  और  the inventor of the Maxim Machine Gun ) , is credited with inventing and selling the first commercially successful models circa 1902  (  patented  30  March 1909 ) .
Maxim  दिया  his device  the  trademarked name  कहावत  Silencer .
The muffler for  आतंरिक  combustion engines was developed in parallel with the firearm  suppressor  by Maxim in the early 20th  सदी   ,  using many  of  the  वही  techniques to  provide  quieter-running engines ( in many  यूरोपीय  countries automobile mufflers are still called silencers  )  .
The word silencer in  सन्दर्भ   to  gun suppressor remains in widespread  उपयोग  , although it  रै  since  गिरे   आउट  of favor  साथ  some , especially among the firearms industry , being replaced with  the  more literally accurate  पद   ध्वनि   suppressor   or  just suppressor ,  क्युकी  a  ``  sound suppressor  ''  does not  ``  silence '' any  हथियार  , rather it eliminates  muzzle  flash and reduces the sonic pressure of  a  firearm discharging .
Common usage and U.S. legislative language favor the historically earlier term , silencer .
In U.S.  विधि   ,  the  शर्तें  ``  firearm  muffler '' and `` firearm silencer '' are synonymous  .
Suppressors were regularly used  by   एजेंटों  of the  संयुक्त  States Office of Strategic Services , who favored  the  newly  designed  High Standard HDM .22  long  Rifle  पिस्टल  during World  युद्ध  II .
OSS Director  विलियम   जोसेफ  `` Wild Bill '' Donovan demonstrated  the  pistol for President Franklin D.  रूज़वेल्ट  at  the  White House .
According  to  OSS  शोध  chief Stanley  लोवेल  , Donovan ( an old and trusted friend of the  अध्यक्ष  ) was waved  into   the  Oval Office , where Roosevelt was  dictating  a letter .
जबकि  Roosevelt finished  उसके   संदेश  , Donovan turned his back and fired ten shots into a sandbag he had brought with him ,  घोषित  what he had done and handed  the  smoking gun to  the  astonished  अध्यक्ष  .
the  British SOE ( Special Operations Executive ) Welrod assassination pistol with an integral suppressor was also used  by   the  American OSS on clandestine  परिचालन  in Nazi  occupied  Europe during  the  Second World War  .
beatrice   ``  Bea '' Arthur ( May 13  ,   1922  – April  25  ,  2009  ) was an  अमरीकी  actress ,  comedienne  , and singer  जिनकी  career spanned seven decades .
Arthur achieved fame as the character  maude  Findlay  on   the  1970s sitcoms  सब  in the Family and Maude , and as Dorothy Zbornak on the 1980s sitcom The Golden Girls , winning Emmy Awards for both roles .
a  stage actress  दोनो  before and after her television success ,  वो  won  the   टोनी  Award  लिये  Best Featured Actress in  a   musical  for her performance  as  Vera Charles in the  असली   डाल  of  mame  ( 1966  )   .
is a 2011 Japanese 3D computer-animated film based on the  tekken   वीडियो  game series  ,  produced by Digital Frontier and distributed  by  Asmik Ace Entertainment  in  association with Bandai Entertainment .
The film  premiered   in  North America  by  Bandai Entertainment on  जुलाई   26  , 2011 ,  और   in  Australia on July 27 , 2011  in  a special exclusive one-off screening .
It was released on September 3 , 2011 in Japan .
The film was released on Blu-ray  डिस्क  on November 22  ,  2011 for  यूएसए  , and December 1 , 2011 for Japan .
This film was also released on DVD on November  22  , 2011 ( 2D Version only  )  .
The film was additionally included with the PlayStation 3 game , Tekken Hybrid ,  और  the Nintendo 3DS  शीर्षक   ,  Tekken 3D :  प्रधान  Edition .
For  a  discussion of  nonprofit  , voluntary neighborhood advocacy groups ,  देखिए  neighborhood association .
in  the United States  ,  a  homeowner  association is a corporation formed by a  रियल   एस्टेट  developer  लिये  the purpose of marketing  ,  managing , and  selling  of homes and lots in  a   आवासीय  subdivision  .
It grants the  डेवलपर  privileged voting rights in governing the association , while allowing the developer to exit financial and legal responsibility of the organization , typically by transferring ownership of the association to the homeowners after  selling   बंद  a predetermined number of lots .
Membership in the homeowners association by a residential buyer is typically  a   कंडीशन  of  खरीदें  ; a  खरीदार  is n't given an option  to  reject it .
Most homeowner associations are  incorporated  , and are subject to state statutes  कि  govern non-profit corporations and homeowner associations .
State oversight of homeowner  एसोसिएशन  is minimal ,  और  mainly takes  the   रूप   of  laws which are  असंगत  from state  to  state  .
कुछ  states , such as Florida and California , have  a  large  देह  of homeowner association law  ,  and some states , such as Massachusetts , have virtually  no   homeowner   संघ  law  .
The fastest  growing  form of housing in  the  United  राज्य   आज  is common-interest  developments  ( CIDs ) , a  श्रेणी  that includes planned-unit developments of single-family homes ,  condominiums  ,  और  cooperative apartments .
Since 1964 , homeowner associations have become increasingly common in the USA .
The Community  एसोसिएशन   संस्थान  trade association  अनुमानित   कि   hoas  governed 24.8 million American homes  और   62  million residents in 2010 .
A  prize-winning  lilac-and-white Silkie
There are many breeds of Guinea pig which have been developed since its domestication ca  .  5000 BC  .
Breeds vary widely in appearance  और   purpose  ,  ranging  from  दिखाएँ  breeds with long , flowing hair to those  in  use as model organisms  by   विज्ञान  .
From ca . 1200 AD to the Spanish conquest of the  इन्का  Empire in 1532 ,  चयनात्मक   प्रजनन  by indigenous  दक्षिण  American  peoples  resulted in many varieties of domestic Guinea pigs  ,  which form the basis for some of  the   आधुनिक  domestic breeds .
Early Andean breeds were primarily kept as agricultural stock for food , and efforts at  improving  the Guinea pig  as  a food  सोर्स   continue  to  the  modern era  .
With the  निर्यात  of Guinea pigs to Europe in the 15th century  ,  the goal in breeding shifted to focus on the development of appealing pets .
To this end , various competitive breeding organizations were founded by fanciers .
The American Cavy  प्रजनक  Association  ,  an adjunct to the American Rabbit Breeders  संघ  , is the governing body  in  the United States  और  Canada .
The  अंग्रेजों  Cavy Council governs cavy clubs  in  the United  किंगडम  .
Similar  संगठन  exist  in  Australia ( Australian  नेशनल  Cavy Council )  और  New Zealand ( New Zealand Cavy Club ) .
Each  क्लबों  publishes  इसके  own Standard of Perfection and determines which breeds are eligible for showing .
New breeds continue to emerge in  the  21st century  .
Though  वहीँ  are many breeds of  गिनी  pig , only a few breeds are commonly found on the  दिखाएँ   तालिका  as pets .
Most Guinea pigs  मिला  as pets were either found  अवांछनीय   by  breeders or were bred to be pleasant pets regardless of how well they meet the breed standard  of  perfection .
The short hair ,  abyssinian  , Peruvian and Sheltie ( aka  silkie  ) breeds are those most frequently seen as pets , and  the  former three are the core breeds in the history  of  the competitive showing  of   गिनी  pigs  .
In addition  to   उनके  standard  रूप  , nearly  सब  breeds  आइये  in a Satin variant .
Satins , due to their hollow  बाल  shafts , possess coats of a special gloss and shine .
however  ,  वहीँ  is growing  प्रमाण  that the genes responsible  लिये  the Satin coat also can cause  कठोर   अस्थि  problems , including Osteodystrophy and  पेजेट  's disease .
प्रर्दशित  Satin variations is prohibited by some cavy breeders ' associations because of animal welfare reasons .
All cavy breeds have some shared general standards  :  the head profile should  be   rounded   ,   साथ  large eyes and large  ,  smooth ears .
The  देह  should be strong and of compact  निर्माण  .
कोट  colour should in all variations be clearly defined and thorough  इससे  root to  टिप  .
ये  standards are  बेहतरीन  met by long  स्थापित  ,  commonly   करवाया  breeds , as their breeders have had enough time and animals to effectively breed for these qualities  .
The coat colour ideal of good definition  और  thoroughness is  rarely  met by  अन्य   than  the smooth coated breeds ,  जिससे   have  had well  स्थापित  , separate  प्रजनन   लाइनों  for different colours  .
State  स्कूलों  (  भी  known  as  public schools or government  स्कूलों   )  generally refer to primary  or  secondary schools mandated for or offered to  सब   children  without  चार्ज  paid for , in whole  or   in  part , by taxation .
The  पद  may also  refer  to institutions of post-secondary education funded  ,  in  पूरे  or in part , and  overseen  by government .
The ribosome assembles  polymeric   प्रोटीन  molecules whose  अनुक्रम  is controlled by the sequence of messenger RNA molecules .
This is required by all living cells and associated viruses  .
The ribosome (  इससे   ribonucleic  acid and the Greek soma , meaning `` body  ''  ) is a large and complex molecular machine , found within all living cells , that serves  as   the  primary site  of  biological protein synthesis ( translation ) .
Ribosomes link amino acids together in  the  order specified by messenger RNA ( mRNA ) molecules .
Ribosomes consist  of  two major subunits—the small ribosomal  subunit  reads the  mrna  ,  जबकि   the  large subunit joins amino acids to form  a   polypeptide  chain .
Each subunit is composed of one or more ribosomal RNA ( rRNA ) molecules  और   a   किस्में   of  proteins  .
the  sequence of DNA encoding for  a  protein  may   be  copied many times  into  messenger RNA ( mRNA )  जंजीरों  of a  समान   अनुक्रम  .
Ribosomes can bind to an  mrna  chain and use it as a template for determining the correct sequence  of  amino acids in a  particular  protein .
अमीनो  acids are selected ,  एकत्रित   और  carried to the ribosome by  ट्रांसफ़र   rna  (  trna  molecules  )   ,  which  डालें   एक  part of the ribosome and bind to the messenger RNA chain  .
The attached amino  acids   हैं  then linked together by another part of  the  ribosome .
Once the  प्रोटीन  is produced , it can then 'fold  '  to produce a  विशिष्ट  functional three-dimensional structure .
A ribosome is made from complexes of  rnas  and  प्रोटीन   और  is therefore a ribonucleoprotein .
Each ribosome is divided into two subunits : the smaller subunit binds to the  mrna   पैटर्न  , while the  larger  subunit binds to the tRNA and the  अमीनो  acids .
When a ribosome finishes reading an mRNA molecule  ,  these  दो  subunits split apart .
Ribosomes are ribozymes , because the catalytic peptidyl  transferase   कार्यकलाप  that links amino  acids  together is performed  by   the  ribosomal RNA .
Ribosomes from bacteria , archaea  और  eukaryotes ( the three domains  of  life  on  Earth ) differ in their size , sequence , structure , and the ratio of protein  to  RNA  .
The differences in structure allow some  एंटीबायोटिक  to kill bacteria  by  inhibiting their ribosomes , while leaving human ribosomes unaffected .
in  bacteria  और   आर्किया   ,  more than  एक  ribosome may move  साथ   a  single  mrna  chain at one time , each `` reading ''  इसके  sequence  और  producing a corresponding protein molecule  .
the  ribosomes in the mitochondria of eukaryotic cells  functionally  resemble many features of those in bacteria , reflecting  the   संभावित  evolutionary origin of mitochondria  .
Albert Claude , Christian de Duve ,  और  George Emil Palade  यहूद  jointly awarded the  नोबेल  Prize in Physiology or Medicine , in  1974  ,  लिये  the discovery of the ribosomes .
The Nobel Prize  in  Chemistry  2009  was  awarded  to Venkatraman  रामकृष्णन  ,  थामस  A. Steitz and  एडीए  E.  yonath  for determining the  विस्तृत  structure and mechanism of the ribosome .
The simplified internal structure of a chloroplast
Overview of the Calvin cycle  और  carbon fixation
The  light-independent  reactions of  photosynthesis   हैं  chemical reactions  कि   बदलें  carbon dioxide and other  यौगिकों  into glucose  .
These  प्रतिक्रियाएँ  occur in  the  stroma ,  the  fluid-filled area of a chloroplast outside of the thylakoid membranes  .
These  प्रतिक्रियाएँ  take the light-dependent reactions and  perform  further chemical processes on them .
There  हैं  three phases to the light-independent  प्रतिक्रियाएँ  , collectively  पुकारा  the Calvin cycle : carbon  fixation   ,  reduction reactions  ,  and ribulose 1,5-bisphosphate ( RuBP ) regeneration  .
Despite its  नाम  , this process  occurs   तभी  when light is available  .
पौधे   do  not carry  आउट  the Calvin  साईकिल   by  night .
They , instead , release  sucrose  into the phloem from  उनके  starch reserves .
इस   प्रक्रम  happens when  लाइट  is available independent of the kind of  photosynthesis  ( C3 carbon fixation , C4 carbon fixation , and Crassulacean Acid Metabolism ) ; CAM plants store malic  एसिड   in  their vacuoles every night and release  it  by  दिन  in order to make this process  कार्य  .
in  mathematics  ,   a  square  क्रमांक  or perfect square  is  an integer  कि  is the square  of  an integer ; in other words  ,  it is the product of some integer with itself .
For example  ,  9 is  a   वर्गाकार  number , since it can be written as .
the  usual notation  लिये  the  सूत्र  for the square  of   a  number is not the product , but the equivalent exponentiation , usually pronounced as `` squared '' .
The name square number comes from  the  name of the shape  ;  see below .
Square numbers are non-negative .
Another way of saying that  a   (   non-negative  )  क्रमांक  is  a   वर्गाकार   क्रमांक  , is that its square roots  हैं  again integers .
For example , =  ±3  , so  9  is  a  square number .
A positive integer that  रै  no perfect square  divisors  except  1  is called square-free .
लिये  a non-negative integer , the th square number is , with being the zeroth square .
the   अवधारणा  of square can  be  extended to some other number systems .
If rational numbers are included ,  तब   a  square is  the  ratio of  दो  square integers , and  ,   conversely  , the ratio of two  वर्गाकार  integers is a  वर्गाकार   (  e.g. ,  4/9  = ( 2/3 ) 2 ) .
Starting with 1 , there are square numbers up to and including , where the expression represents the floor of the number .
The Era  of   शुभ  Feelings marked a period  in   the  political history of the United States that  reflected  a sense of national purpose  और   a  desire  लिये  unity among Americans in the  aftermath   of   the   napoleonic  Wars .
The era saw the  पतन  of the Federalist Party and an end to the bitter partisan  विवादों  between  it  and the dominant Democratic-Republican party during the First Party System .
President James Monroe  endeavored   to   downplay  partisan affiliation in  बनाना  his  nominations  ,  साथ  the  परम  goal  of   नेशनल  unity and eliminating parties altogether  इससे  national politics .
the  period is so closely associated with Monroe 's presidency ( 1817–1825 )  और  his  प्रशासनिक  goals that  उसके   नाम  and the era are virtually  synonymous  .
The Era of Good Feelings marked a transition in  अमरीकी  politics with the end of the  federalist  Party  as   अमेरिका  began to  develop  after the War  of   1812  .
While America was  experiencing   विकास  and prosperity after the war with  ब्रिटेन  ,  इस  era  भी  marks the first instance  of  economic troubles in  the  growing United States .
Mirroring the American System proposed by Henry Clay  ,  protective tariffs and the chartering of the Second Bank of the United  राज्य  complicated the  टेंशन  between the North  और  South with the coming  of  the first financial crisis .
जबकि  the term  “era  of Good Feelings” is usually viewed with irony  क्युकी  of the political  turmoil   ,  economic factors caused animosity between the North and  दक्षिण  .
The designation of  the  period by historians as one of “good  feelings”  is often conveyed with irony or  skepticism  , as  the   इतिहास  of the era was  एक   in  which the political atmosphere was strained and divisive , especially among  गिरोहों  within the Monroe administration and the Republican Party .
The phrase “Era of Good Feelings” was coined by  बेंजामिन  Russell  ,  in the  बोस्टन  Federalist newspaper ,  columbian  Centinel  ,  on July 12 , 1817 ,  following   मुनरो  's visit  to  Boston , Massachusetts  as  part of his good will tour of America .
Mariel Margaret `` Mia '' Hamm ( born March 17 , 1972 ) is  a  retired American  पेशेवर  soccer player  .
hamm  played many  सालो   as  a  आगे  for the United States women 's national soccer  टोली  and was a founding member of the Washington  स्वतंत्रता  .
Hamm scored 158 international goals , more than  कोई   अन्य   खिलाड़ी  ,  पुरूष  or  मादा   ,  in the  इतिहास  of soccer and is the third most capped  मादा  player in soccer history behind Kristine Lilly and Christie Rampone , appearing  in  275 international matches .
hamm  was named the women 's FIFA World Player of the  साल  the first two times that award was given (  in   2001  and 2002  )  , and is listed as one of FIFA  's  125 best living players ( as  चुनी  by Pelé ) .
She was inducted into the National Soccer  हॉल   of  Fame as well as the Alabama Sports  हॉल  of Fame and Texas Sports Hall of  कीर्ति   .
She is  the  author of Go For  the  Goal : A Champion  's   मार्गदर्शिका   to  Winning in Soccer  और  Life and appeared in the  एचबीओ   वृत्तचित्र  Dare to Dream : The Story of the U.S. Women 's  सॉकर  Team .
Washington Post  columnist  Michael Wilbon  पुकारा   hamm  , `` Perhaps the most important athlete  of  the last 15 years . ''
Hamm  takes  a corner kick .
The New York Red Bulls is an American professional soccer team based  in  Harrison , New  जर्सी   ,  representing the New York metropolitan area .
The  टोली  competes in the  पूर्वी  Conference of Major League Soccer ( MLS ) .
It is one of the ten charter clubs of MLS , having competed in the league  चूंकि  its inception .
The team was a founding member  of  MLS ( 1996 ) , but has  गए   through  several  नाम   परिवर्तन  .
The team  थी  originally known as the New York/New Jersey  metrostars  through 1997 .
From the 1998 season  through  the 2005 season , the team  थी  known  as  the MetroStars  .
On  कूच  9 , 2006  ,  the team was sold to Red Bull  gmbh   ,  leading to the team 's current name .
वे  are the only original MLS franchise not to have won any significant trophy ( including regular  ऋतु  , playoffs ,  और  knockout competition )  चूंकि  inception .
The team 's best result in the MLS was  the  MLS Cup final  in  2008 .
In the  us  Open Cup  ,  the  metrostars  reached three semifinals  (  1997 ,  1998  ,  2000  ) ,  पहले  reaching their first final in 2003 , losing 1–0 to the Chicago Fire .
On August 26 ,  2000  , the Metros ' Clint Mathis set  an  MLS record by  स्कोरिंग  five goals in a game against the Dallas Burn .
Some well-known players that have played for  the  team include Giovanni Savarese , Tim Howard , Tony Meola  ,  Tab Ramos  ,  Alexi  lalas  , Clint  mathis  , Jozy Altidore  ,  Michael Bradley  ,   क्लाउडियो   reyna  ,  एडी  Pope  ,  Roberto Donadoni ,  lothar  Matthäus ,  एडोल्फो  Valencia ,  youri   djorkaeff   ,   amado  Guevara , Juan Pablo Ángel , Thierry Henry , Juninho Pernambucano , Jan  गुन्नार  Solli , Rafael Márquez  ,  and  टिम   काहिल  .
the  team  रै  also had well-known  कोच   ,  including Carlos Queiroz ,  कार्लोस   अल्बर्टो  Parreira  ,  Bora Milutinović , Bob Bradley , Mo Johnston  ,  Bruce  एरिना   और  Hans Backe .
Confucianism , Taoism ,  और  Buddhism are one , a painting  in  the litang style portraying three  मेन  laughing by  a  river stream , 12th century , Song Dynasty .
Estimating the number of  बौद्धों  in the world , or in  अनेक  countries , is difficult due to  definitional   मुद्दे  as well as practical problems  of   enumeration  .
To begin with , the  धार्मिक  beliefs , practices , and  पहचान  of East Asians  (  who comprise  the  majority of the world 's Buddhists by any measure ) often blend Buddhism  साथ  other traditions including Confucianism , the Chinese  लोक  religion , Daoism , Shinto  ,   और   कोरियाई  shamanism .
Most followers of Buddhism  do  not belong to structured congregations , or observe a  definite  ritual of adherence such  as   लेने  Refuge , making it difficult to accurately estimate the number of practitioners .
An  अतिरिक्त   चुनौती  is the hostility of several national governments ( often  कम्युनिस्ट  ones such as China or North Korea  )   to  religion generally  or   to  Buddhism specifically .
Government policies in these countries may  प्रोत्साहित  the  under-reporting  or non-reporting of religious adherence , resulting  in   आधिकारिक  totals that  may  drastically underestimate the number  of  religious practitioners  in  these countries  .
Estimate of the worldwide Buddhist population range from 350 million  to  over one billion , but cluster nearer to the first figure  .
Adherents.com ( as of 2012 ) suggests a figure of 397  लाख  .
By  प्रमुख  branches , the numbers are  as  follows:
( 1 ) Mahayana Buddhism , including East Asian Buddhism , with no fewer  than  185 million adherents ,  और  possibly  अनेक  times that many ( again ,  depending   on   definitional  issues  )  .
This is the  predominant   रूप   of  Buddhism practiced in  चीन  , South Korea , Japan  ,  Taiwan , Singapore  ,  and Vietnam .
(  2 ) Theravada Buddhism , with  no  fewer than 125 million adherents .
This is the predominant form  of  Buddhism practiced in  कंबोडिया  , Thailand , Laos , Sri Lanka , and  बर्मा  .
(  3  ) Vajrayana Buddhism ,  साथ   लगभग  20 million adherents .
This form predominates in the greater Tibetan and Mongolian regions , as well as in the Himalayas .
Besides the independent  देशों  of Mongolia and  भूटान  , and various territories within what is now western China  ,  Vajrayana  is   परंपरागत  to certain  regions   of  Russia ( e.g . Kalmykia , Buryatia )  ,  India  (   e.g   .  Ladakh  ,  Sikkim )  ,  and  नेपाल  ( e.g . Khumbu ) .
Vajrayana , also known  as  Tibetan  buddhism  ,  is  often conflated with Tantric Buddhism , but this is imprecise , as  shingon  and other  फ़ॉर्म  of East Asian Buddhism  भी  practice tantra .
At  तनिक  7  देशों  ( Sri  लंका  , Thailand , Cambodia ,  लाओस   ,  Burma , Bhutan , and Mongolia  )  have unambiguous Buddhist  majorities  .
Depending  on  how one calculates Chinese and  अन्य  East Asian adherents , this figure might  विस्तार  to include several  अधिक  countries .
In addition , Buddhism is the state religion of Cambodia  और  Bhutan , and  receives  prominent mention in the constitutions  of  Thailand and  श्री  Lanka  .
In northern  इण्डिया   और   नेपाल  , the land where Buddhism was  born  , the religion severely declined during the first millennium .
Whether  इस  decline was  due  to the Islamic conquest of northern India ,  or   to  other factors  ,  remains controversial  .
See the  आलेख  Decline of Buddhism in India .
James Butler  hickok   (  May 27 ,  1837   –  August 2 ,  1876  ) , better  ज्ञात  as Wild  विधेयक  Hickok , was a folk hero of the American Old West  .
His skills as a gunfighter and scout , along with his  प्रतिष्ठा  as  a  lawman  ,  provided the basis for his  कीर्ति  , although  कुछ   of  his reported exploits are fictionalized .
born  and  उठाया  on a  फार्म  in rural Illinois , Hickok went  वेस्ट  at  आयु   18  as a fugitive from justice , first working as a stagecoach driver , before he became  a  lawman  in  the frontier territories of Kansas and  नेब्रास्का  .
he  fought  लिये   the  Union Army  दौरान  the  अमरीकी  Civil War , and  gained  publicity after the war as a scout , marksman , actor , and professional gambler .
Between his law-enforcement duties  और  gambling  ,  which easily  overlapped  , Hickok was involved in several notable shootouts .
He was shot and killed while playing  पोकर  in the Nuttal & Mann  's  Saloon in  deadwood  , Dakota Territory ( now South Dakota ) .
कलाकार   's  conception of the Curiosity  रोवर  vaporizing rock on  मंगल  .
The rover landed on Mars in August 2012 .
A Mars rover is an automated motor vehicle which  propels  itself across  the  surface of  the  planet Mars  बाद  landing .
रोवर्स  have several advantages over stationary landers : they examine more territory ,  वे  can be directed to interesting features , they can place themselves in sunny positions  to  weather winter  महीने   और  they can advance the knowledge of how  to  perform very  रिमोट  robotic vehicle control .
There have  महरूम  four successful robotically  संचालित  Mars rovers .
The Jet Propulsion Laboratory managed  the  Mars  pathfinder  mission and  इसके  now inactive Sojourner rover .
It currently manages the  मंगल  Exploration Rover mission  's   क्रियाशील  Opportunity  रोवर  and inactive  स्पिरिट  , and , as part of the Mars  विज्ञान  Laboratory mission  ,   the  Curiosity rover .
A financial audit , or more accurately , an audit  of  financial statements , is  the  verification of  the  financial  कथन  of a legal entity , with a view to express an audit opinion .
The  ऑडिट  opinion is intended to provide  उचित   परख  , but  नहीं  absolute assurance , that the financial  कथन  are presented fairly , in all material respects , and/or give a true and fair view in accordance with  the  financial reporting framework .
The  purpose  of an audit is provide and objective independent examination of  the  financial statements , which increases  the  value and credibility of the financial statements produced by management , thus  बढ़ाएँ  user confidence  in  the financial statement , reduce investor risk and consequently reduce  the  cost of  पूंजी  of the preparer of  the  financial statements .
Financial audits are typically performed  by  firms of  practicing  accountants who are experts in financial  रिपोर्टिंग   .
The  वित्तीय  audit is one of many  परख  functions provided by  हिसाब  firms .
अनेक  organizations separately employ or  hire  internal auditors , who do not attest to financial reports but  फ़ोकस  mainly on the internal controls of the organization .
External auditors may choose to  प्लेस  limited reliance on the work of internal auditors .
Auditing promotes transparency and accuracy in the financial  disclosures  made by an  संगठन  , therefore would  संभावित  to  reduce  of such corporations to  छिपाते   unscrupulous  dealings .
internationally   ,  the International Standards on Auditing ( ISA )  जारी  by the International Auditing and Assurance Standards Board  (  IAASB ) is considered  as  the benchmark for audit  प्रक्रम  .
Almost all jurisdictions require auditors to follow the ISA or a local  विभिन्नता  of the ISA .
डालर  coins have been  minted  in the United States in gold  ,  silver , and base metal versions  .
The term silver dollar is often used  लिये  any large  श्वेत  metal coin issued by the United States  साथ  a face value of one  डालर  , although  purists  insist that a  डालर  is  नहीं  silver unless it  contains  some of that metal .
चांदी   डॉलर  , the first dollar coin  समस्या  , were minted beginning in 1794 .
Gold dollars and gold-colored dollars have also  महरूम  produced by the United States  .
The Sacagawea  और   अध्यक्षीय  dollars are often referred  to  as  ``  golden dollars ''  .
In modern times , dollar  सिक्के  have not been very popular in  the  United States .
Despite efforts by  the  government  to  promote their use  ,  most Americans currently use the  एक   डालर  bill  बल्कि  than dollar coins .
in  straight and  स्तर  flight lift ( L )  बराबरी  weight ( W )  .
in  a banked turn of 60°  ,  lift equals double the weight  (  L=2W  )   .
The pilot experiences 2g and a doubled  वज़न  .
The  steeper  the bank ,  the  greater the g-forces .
This top-fuel  dragster  can accelerate from zero to in 0.86 seconds .
This is a horizontal acceleration of 5.3 g. Combined  साथ   the  vertical g-force in the stationary case the Pythagorean theorem yields a g force of  5.4  g  .
g-force  ( with g from gravitational ) is a term for accelerations  लगा  as weight and measurable by accelerometers .
It is not a force , per se , but a force per unit mass .
Since such a  फ़ोर्स   is   आभास  as a weight , any g-force can be  वर्णित   as  a ``  वज़न  per unit mass '' ( see the synonym  विशिष्ट   वज़न  ) .
The g-force  त्वरण   अधिनियमों   as  a multiplier of weight-like  शक्तियां  for every unit  of  an  ऑब्जेक्ट  's  द्रव्यमान   ,  and  (  save for certain electromagnetic force influences ) is the  कारण  of an  ऑब्जेक्ट  's acceleration  in   संबंध  to free-fall  .
This acceleration experienced  by   an  object is due to the vector sum of non-gravitational forces acting on an object free to move .
The accelerations that are not  उत्पादित  by  गम्भीरता   हैं   termed  proper accelerations , and it is only these  कि   हैं  measured in g-force units  .
They cause stresses  और  strains on objects .
Because of  ये  strains , large g-forces may  be  destructive .
Gravitation acting alone does not produce a g-force  ,  even though  g-forces  are expressed in  multiples   of  the acceleration of a standard gravity .
Thus , the standard gravitational acceleration at  the  Earth 's surface produces g-force only indirectly  ,   as  a result of  प्रतिरोध   to  it by mechanical forces .
The 1 g-force on an object sitting  on  the Earth 's surface is caused by mechanical force  exerted  in the upward direction by the  मैदान  , keeping the object from going into  free-fall   .
The upward force from the ground ensures  कि   an  object at  बाकी  on  the  Earth  's  surface is accelerating relative to the free-fall condition  ,  which is the path that  the  object would follow when falling freely toward  the  Earth  's  center  .
वस्तुएँ  allowed  to  free-fall in an inertial  trajectory  under the influence  of  gravitation-only ,  महसूस  no g-force .
This is demonstrated  by   the  ``  zero-g  ''  शर्तें  inside a  freely  falling elevator falling toward the Earth 's center ( in  वैक्यूम  ) , or ( to  शुभ  approximation ) conditions inside a spacecraft in Earth orbit .
These are examples of coordinate acceleration ( a change in velocity  )  without a sensation of weight .
the   अनुभव   of  no g-force ( zero-g ) , however it is produced  ,  is  synonymous  with weightlessness .
In the  अनुपस्थिति  of gravitational fields , or in  दिशानिर्देश  at right  कोण  to  उन्हें  ,  उचित  and coordinate accelerations are the same , and any coordinate acceleration must be produced by a corresponding g-force acceleration  .
An example  यहाँ  is a rocket in  फ़्री  space , in which  सरल  changes in  गति  are produced by the  इंजन  , and produce  g-forces   on   the  rocket and  यात्री  .
An augur  पकड़कर   a  lituus , the curved  wand  often used as a symbol of augury on Roman coins
The augur was a priest and official  in  the classical world  ,  especially ancient  रोम  and  etruria  .
His main role was  to   interpret  the  होगा  of the  देवताओं   by  studying the flight of birds :  whether  they are flying in groups  or  alone , what noises they  मेक  as they fly , direction of flight and what  दयालु   of   पक्षियों   वे  are  .
This was known  as  `` taking  the  auspices  .   ''
The ceremony and function of the augur was  सेंट्रल  to any  प्रमुख  undertaking in Roman society—public or  private—including   matters  of war ,  कॉमर्स  , and religion .
The  रोमन  historian Livy  तनावों  the importance of the augurs : ``  जो  does not  जान  that this  नगर  was founded  तभी   बाद  taking the auspices , that  सबकुछ  in war and in  सलाम  , at home and abroad , was done  तभी  after  लेने  the auspices ? ''
farmington   पहाड़ियाँ  is an  affluent  community in southeastern Michigan  .
It is the second largest city  in  Oakland County in the U.S. state of Michigan  .
Its population was 79,740 at the 2010 census .
It is part of the upscale northwestern suburbs of Metropolitan Detroit  और   is  also northeast  of  downtown Ann Arbor .
farmington  Hills consistently ranks as one of the safest cities in  the  United States  ,  as  खूब  as in the state of Michigan .
In 2010 , the area ranked  as  the 30th safest city in America .
Although the two cities have separate services and addresses , Farmington and Farmington Hills are often thought  of  as  the  same  जातियाँ  .
सुविधाएँ  of  the  community include a recently renovated downtown , boutiques , a vintage cinema , numerous restaurants , exotic car dealerships , art galleries , and public parks including Heritage Park  .
There are several historical sites including the Longacre House and the  राज्यपाल  Warner Mansion  .
Both cities are served  by  Farmington Public Schools  .
Farmington Hills  serves  as a  प्रमुख  business center for the greater Detroit area .
Present-day impression of  a   लेट  Bronze Age seal
Town  मुहर  (  मेट्रिक्स   )  of Náchod from  1570
a  seal is a device for making  an  impression in wax , clay , paper , or  कुछ  other  मीडियम   ,  including  an  embossment on  पेपर   ,   और  is also the impression thus made .
The original  purpose  was to authenticate a document , a wrapper for  एक   ऐसे   as  a modern envelope ,  or  the cover of  a  container or package holding  valuables  or other objects .
The sealing process is essentially  कि  of a mould  ,  with the final image represented on  the  device for making the impression by a mirror-image design ,  incised  in sunken-  (  or counter- ) relief or intaglio .
The  seal-making  device is also referred to  as  the seal  मेट्रिक्स   or  die  ;  the imprint  it   creates  as the seal impression (  or  , more rarely , the sealing  )   .
If the impression  is  made purely as a relief resulting from the greater pressure on the paper where  the  high parts of the matrix touch , the seal is known as  a  dry seal ; in all  अन्य   मामले  a liquid or liquified medium ( such as ink or wax ) is used , usually  in  another  रंग  than the paper  .
For legal purposes ,  the  definition  of  a  मुहर   may  be extended to include rubber stamps , or writing  निर्दिष्ट  words ( `` seal ''  or  `` L.S  .  `` ) .
In  the   संयुक्त   राज्य  , the word ``  मुहर  ''  is  sometimes assigned to a  facsimile  of the seal design ( in monochrome  or   रंग  ) , which may be used  in  a  किस्में  of contexts including architectural settings , on flags , or on official letterheads .
Thus , for example  ,  the Great Seal of the United States , among other uses  ,  appears  on  the reverse of the one-dollar bill ;  और  several of the seals of  the  U.S. states  appear   on  their respective  राज्य  flags .
In Europe , although coats of arms and heraldic badges may well feature  in  such  contexts  as well as on seals , the  मुहर  design in  इसके   entirety  rarely appears as  an  emblem  .
The study  of  seals is known as sigillography or  sphragistics  .
Groundhog Day  (  Pennsylvania German : Grundsaudaag , Murmeltiertag ) is a day celebrated  on  February 2  .
According to folklore , if it is cloudy when a groundhog emerges from its burrow on this day , then spring will  आइये   जल्दी  ; if it is sunny , the groundhog will supposedly see its  छाया  and retreat back into its  burrow  , and the winter weather  होगा  continue for six more weeks .
Modern customs of  the   अवकाश  involve celebrations where early morning festivals are held to watch  the  groundhog emerging  इससे   इसके  burrow .
In southeastern Pennsylvania  ,  Groundhog Lodges  (  Grundsow Lodges ) celebrate the holiday with  fersommlinge   ,  social  कार्यक्रम  in which food is served  ,   भाषणों  are  बना  ,  और  one or  अधिक  g'spiel ( plays or skits )  हैं  performed for entertainment .
The Pennsylvania German dialect is the  तभी  language spoken at  the  event  ,  and those who speak English pay  a  penalty , usually in the form  of  a nickel , dime  ,  or  क्वार्टर  per word spoken , with  the  money  put  into a  कटोरी  in the  बीच  of the table .
The largest Groundhog Day celebration is held in Punxsutawney ,  पेन्सिलवेनिया  .
Groundhog Day , already a widely recognized and popular tradition , received widespread attention  as  a result of  the  1993  फिल्मी  Groundhog Day ,  जिससे  was set  in   punxsutawney   ,  PA ( though filmed primarily in Woodstock , IL ) and portrayed Punxsutawney Phil .
High resolution  चित्र   of  Tampa Bay  प्रदेश
The  tampa  Bay area  रै  a humid subtropical climate ( Koppen  cfa  ) , with  गरम  and humid  ग्रीष्म   साथ  frequent thunderstorms and drier winters with freezing temperatures  occurring  every 2–3 years .
The area experiences a significant summer wet season , as nearly two-thirds of the annual precipitation falls in the months of June through September  .
The area is listed by the United States Department  of  Agriculture ( USDA ) as being  in  hardiness  मण्डल  10  ,  which  is  about the northern limit of where coconut  हथेलियां  and royal palms  can   be  grown .
Highs usually range between  65   और   95  °F  (  18 and 35 °C ) year round .
Though  ज्ञात   लिये   hot   ग्रीष्म  ,  tampa  's official high has never reached 100 °F  (  38  °c   )  – the city 's all-time record temperature  is  99  °f   (  37 °C ) .
St.  पीटर्सबर्ग  's all-time record high is exactly 100 °F ( 38 °C ) .
Pinellas County  झूठ  on a peninsula between Tampa  खाड़ी  and  the   गल्फ  of Mexico , and much of the city of Tampa lies on a smaller peninsula jutting  आउट  into Tampa Bay .
This proximity to large  लाशें  of  जल  both moderates temperatures and introduces large amounts of humidity into the atmosphere .
In general , the local communities  farthest  from the coast  have  larger temperature ranges  ,  both during a single  दिन  and  throughout  the seasons of the year .
A  आरेख  of  the  electromagnetic spectrum ,  प्रर्दशित  various properties  आरपार  the  दायरा  of frequencies and wavelengths
The electromagnetic spectrum is the range of all possible frequencies  of  electromagnetic radiation .
the  `` electromagnetic spectrum '' of an  ऑब्जेक्ट  has a different meaning , and is instead  the  characteristic distribution of electromagnetic radiation emitted  or  absorbed by that particular object .
The electromagnetic spectrum  extends  from below the low frequencies used for modern  रेडियो   संचार  to gamma radiation  at   the  short-  wavelength  ( high-frequency )  समाप्त  , thereby  covering  wavelengths  इससे  thousands  of  kilometers down to a fraction of the size of an atom .
The limit for long  wavelengths  is the size of the  ब्रह्मांड   itself   ,   जबकि  it is thought that the short  wavelength  limit  is  in the vicinity of the Planck length , although  in  principle the spectrum is  अनन्त  and continuous .
सबसे  parts of the electromagnetic spectrum are used in science for spectroscopic and  अन्य   probing  interactions , as ways to study and characterize matter .
In  जोड  , radiation  इससे  various  भाग  of the  वर्णक्रम  has  मिला  many other uses  लिये  communications and manufacturing (  देखिए  electromagnetic radiation for more  अनुप्रयोग  ) .
Legend
Franklin Delano Roosevelt ( or ; January 30 , 1882 – April 12 ,  1945  ) , also  ज्ञात   by  his  आद्याक्षर  ,  fdr  , was the  32nd  President of the United  राज्य  (  1933–1945   )  and a central figure in  संसार  events during the mid-20th century ,  अग्रणी   the  United States  दौरान  a time of  विश्वव्यापी  economic depression and total war  .
a  dominant leader of the Democratic Party and the  तभी  American president elected to more than two terms , he built a New  सौदे  Coalition  कि  realigned American politics after 1932 , as  उसके   घरेलू  policies defined American liberalism for the middle third of the 20th century .
With the bouncy  लोकप्रिय  song `` Happy  दिनों   हैं  Here Again `` as his  अभियान  theme  ,  FDR defeated incumbent  रिपब्लिकन  Herbert Hoover in November 1932 , at the  गहराई  of the Great Depression .
सक्रिय   by  his personal  विजय   over   पोलियो   ,  FDR 's unfailing  आशावाद  and activism contributed to a renewal  of   the  national spirit .
He worked closely with British Prime Minister Winston  चर्चिल  and Soviet General Secretary Joseph  स्टालिन   in  leading the Allies against Germany and  जापानी  in World War II , and  restoring   समृद्धि  to the nation  's  economy .
in  his first hundred days in office ,  जिससे  began March 4 , 1933 , Roosevelt spearheaded  प्रमुख   विधान  and issued a profusion of executive orders  कि  instituted  the   नई  Deal —a variety of programs designed to produce relief  (  government jobs for the unemployed ) , recovery ( economic growth  )  , and reform  (  through regulation of Wall Street , banks and transportation ) .
The economy improved rapidly from 1933 to 1937 , but  तब  relapsed  into  a  गहन  recession  .
The bipartisan Conservative Coalition that formed in 1937  prevented  his  पैकिंग   the   परम्  Court or  गुजर  any considerable legislation ; it abolished many  of  the relief programs when unemployment diminished  दौरान  World  युद्ध  II .
Most of the regulations on  कारोबार  were ended about 1975–85 , except  लिये  the regulation of Wall Street by the Securities and Exchange Commission , which still exists .
Along with  अनेक  smaller programs ,  प्रमुख   surviving   कार्यक्रम   शामिल  the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation , which was created  in  1933 , and  सोशल  Security ,  जिससे  Congress  passed  in 1935 .
as  World War II loomed after 1938 , with  the  Japanese  आक्रमण  of China and the aggression  of  Nazi Germany , FDR gave strong diplomatic and financial  support  to China and Great  ब्रिटेन  , while remaining officially neutral .
His  लक्ष्य  was to make America the `` Arsenal of Democracy `` which would  सप्लाई  munitions to  the   allies  .
In March  1941  , Roosevelt , with Congressional approval , provided Lend-Lease aid to the countries fighting against Nazi  जर्मनी  with Britain .
With very strong national support , he made war on Japan and Germany after  the  Japanese attack on Pearl  हार्बर  on December 7  ,  1941  ,  calling it a `` date which will live in infamy  ``  .
He  पर्यवेक्षित   the  mobilization  of  the U.S. economy  to  support the Allied war effort  .
As an active military  नेता  , Roosevelt  implemented  an overall war strategy on two fronts that ended in the defeat of the Axis  शक्तियां  and  the   विकास  of the world 's first atom bomb .
In 1942 Roosevelt  ordered  the internment of 100,000 Japanese  अमरीकी   नागरिकों  .
Unemployment  dropped  to 2  %   ,  relief programs largely ended , and the  औद्योगिक  economy grew  rapidly   to  new heights as  लाखो  of people moved  to  new  कार्य   in  war centers ,  और  16  लाख  men and 300,000 women were drafted or volunteered  लिये  military service .
Roosevelt  वर्चस्व   the   अमरीकी   राजनैतिक  scene not  तभी  during  the   बारह  years of his presidency , but also for decades afterward .
He orchestrated the realignment of voters that created the Fifth Party System .
FDR 's New Deal Coalition united labor unions ,  बिग  city machines ,  श्वेत  ethnics , African Americans and rural white Southerners .
He  भी  influenced the later creation  of  the  संयुक्त  Nations and Bretton Woods .
Roosevelt  is  consistently rated by scholars as  एक  of the top  तीन  U.S. Presidents ,  साथ  with Abraham Lincoln and George Washington .
A liberal Democrat  ,  Roosevelt defined his ideological position as `` a  छोटी  left of center  .  ''
a  Joint Committee is a term  in  politics  कि  is used to refer to a committee made up of members of both chambers of a bicameral legislature  .
In  अन्य   contexts  , it refers to a committee with  सदस्यों  from more than  एक  organization  .
The regulation of  वेश्यावृति  in  the   संयुक्त  States is  नहीं  among the enumerated powers of  the  federal government ; Under the Tenth Amendment to the United States Constitution  ,  it is therefore exclusively  the  domain of the states to permit , prohibit , or otherwise regulate  वाणिज्यिक  sex , except insofar as Congress may regulate it as part of interstate commerce with laws like the  मन  Act .
In most states , prostitution is considered a misdemeanor in the  श्रेणी   of  public  अनुक्रम  crime , a crime that disrupts the order of a  जातियाँ  .
it   थी  at one time considered to be a vagrancy crime .
Currently , Nevada is the  तभी  state to allow brothel prostitution , the terms of which are stipulated in the Nevada Revised Statutes .
तभी  8  काउंटी  currently contain active brothels .
All forms  of  prostitution  हैं  illegal in Clark County (  जिससे  contains the Las Vegas–Paradise metropolitan area  )   ,  Washoe County ( which contains Reno ) , Carson City  ,   डगलस  County , and Lincoln County .
The other counties theoretically  allow  brothel prostitution ,  लकिन  some of these  काउंटी  currently have no active brothels .
Street prostitution ,  ``  pandering , '' and  जीना  off of the proceeds of a prostitute remain illegal under Nevada  विधि  , as elsewhere in the country .
As  साथ  other countries ,  वेश्यावृति  in  the  United States can be  विभाजित  into three broad  श्रेणी  : street prostitution ,  वेश्यालय   वेश्यावृति  , and escort prostitution .
The national flag of the United States of  अमेरिका  ,  प्रायः   बस  referred to as the American flag , consists of thirteen equal  आड़ा  stripes of red  (  top  और   नीचे  ) alternating  साथ   श्वेत  , with  a  blue rectangle  in  the  कैण्टन   (  referred to specifically as the `` union ''  )  bearing fifty small , white , five-pointed stars arranged in nine offset horizontal rows  of   छह  stars ( top and bottom ) alternating with rows  of  five stars  .
The 50  सितारों  on the flag represent the 50 states  of   the  United States of America and the  13  stripes  represent  the thirteen  अंग्रेजों  colonies that declared independence from the Kingdom  of  Great Britain  और  became the first states  in  the Union  .
nicknames   लिये  the flag include the `` Stars and Stripes ''  ,  `` Old Glory ``  ,  and  ``   the  Star-Spangled  ध्वज  . ''
India is a federal union of states comprising twenty-eight states and seven union territories .
the  states and  territories  are further subdivided into  जिले   और  so on .
Congressional districts for the 113th United  राज्य  Congress

Change  in  apportionment of congressional districts ,  starting  in 2013 , as a result of the 2010 census  .
2000 Census change:
Change in apportionment of congressional districts , from 2003 to 2013 , as a  परिणाम  of the 2000 census .
This is a complete list of congressional  जिले   लिये  representation  in  the United States  हाउस  of Representatives .
the  quantity (  apportionment  ) and boundaries ( redistricting ) of districts are determined after each census , although in some cases states  have  changed  the  boundaries more than once  प्रति  census .
इस  list includes the 435  वर्तमान   और  over 200 obsolete districts .
For example , since the 2000  जनसांख्यिकी   ,  Nebraska has  था  three districts  ,  but  it   प्रयुक्त  to have as many  as  six .
In the first decade of the twenty-first century , Texas had 32 districts , but  रै  since added four due to reapportionment as  a  result of the 2010 census .
Other states have lost districts since the number of congressional  सीटे   रै   महरूम  set  at  435 by  statute  .
Also included here are non-voting delegations  :  six current and  चार  obsolete  .
the  boundaries of districts  प्रायः   शिफ़्ट  with each  redistricting  .
Over time  ,  the region and demographics  represented  in a district can change substantially  .
furthermore  ,  जिले  sometimes retain the same  सीमाएँ  while  बदलना  their district numbers .
mariah  Carey ( born  कूच  27 , 1970 ) is  an   अमरीकी   सिंगर  ,  songwriter   ,  record  निर्माता  , actress ,  और   लोकसेवक  .
Under the guidance of Columbia Records executive  टॉमी  Mottola , Carey released her self-titled debut  स्टुडियो  album Mariah Carey in  1990   ;  it went multi-platinum and  शाखित  four consecutive number one singles on the  u.s   .  Billboard  hot   100  chart  .
Following her marriage  to  Mottola in  1993  and success with hit records Emotions ( 1991 ) ,  म्यूज़िक  Box  (  1993  )  , and Merry Christmas  (   1994  ) ,  कैरी  was established as Columbia 's  highest-selling  act .
Daydream ( 1995 ) made music  इतिहास  when  इसके  second single `` One Sweet Day `` , a duet with  बॉयज  II Men , spent a record sixteen weeks on top of  the  Billboard Hot  100  , and remains  the  longest-running number-one song in U.S. chart history .
During the recording  of  the album , Carey began to deviate  इससे  her  r  &  b  and pop beginnings and  धीरे  traversed into hip hop  .
इस  musical  बदलें  became evident with the release of Butterfly ( 1997 ) , at which time Carey had separated  इससे  Mottola  .
Carey left Columbia in  2000   ,  and signed  a  record-breaking $ 100 million recording  अनुबंध  with Virgin Records .
पहले  the release  of  her first feature  फिल्मी   glitter  ( 2001  )  , she  suffered   a   शारीरिक  and emotional breakdown and  थी  hospitalized for  कठोर   थकावट  .
Following the film 's poor reception , she was bought out  of   उसके  recording  अनुबंध  for $  50  million , which led to  a  decline  in  her career .
She  हस्ताक्षरित   a   multi-million  dollar contract deal with Island Records in 2002 ,  और  after an unsuccessful period , returned  to  the top of music charts with The Emancipation of Mimi  (   2005  )  .
Its second single `` We Belong Together `` became  उसके  most successful single of the 2000s  ,   और   थी   बाद  named  ``  Song of the Decade '' by Billboard .
Carey once again  ventured  into film with  a   well-received  starring role in ( 2009 ) ; she was  awarded  the  ``  Breakthrough Performance  पुरस्कार   ''   at   the  Palm Springs International Film Festival , and  ब्लैक  Reel  और   naacp  Image  पुरस्कार  nominations .
In a career spanning over two decades  ,  Carey has  बेची  more than  200  million records worldwide , making  उसके  one of the  best-selling  music artists of all time .
In  1998  ,  वो  was honored as the world  's  best-selling recording  कलाकार  of  the  1990s at the  संसार  Music  पुरस्कार  .
Carey  थी  also named the best-selling female artist  of  the millennium in 2000 .
According  to   the   रिकॉर्डिंग  Industry Association of America , she is the  तीसरा  best-selling female artist in  the  United  राज्य  , with  63.5  million  certified  albums  .
साथ  the release  of  `` Touch My  देह   ``  ( 2008 ) , Carey gained her eighteenth number one  सिंगल   in  the United States ,  अधिक  than any other solo artist .
In 2012  ,  Carey  थी  ranked second  on  VH1 's list  of  the ``  100  Greatest Women  in  Music '' .
Aside from her commercial  accomplishments  , Carey has won five  ग्रैमी  Awards , 17 World Music Awards , 11 American  म्यूज़िक  Awards ,  और  31 Billboard  म्यूज़िक  Awards  .
Referred  to  as the `` songbird supreme ''  by  the  गिनीज  World Records , she is famed for her five-octave vocal range , power , melismatic style and signature use of  the  whistle register  .
Stratocumulus  stratiformis   cumulogenitus
In meteorology , a cloud is a visible mass of liquid droplets  or  frozen  crystals   बना   of  water  or  various chemicals suspended in the atmosphere above the surface  of  a planetary body .
ये  suspended  अणु  are also  ज्ञात  as aerosols  .
Clouds in Earth 's atmosphere  हैं   पढ़ाई  in  the  cloud  भौतिकी  branch  of  meteorology .
Two processes  ,  possibly acting together , can lead  to   एयर  becoming saturated ;  कूलिंग  the  एयर  or adding water vapor  to  the  एयर  .
In general ,  वर्षण  will fall to  the   सतह  ; an exception is virga , which evaporates before reaching the surface .
The  अंतरराष्ट्रीय   बादल  classification  प्रणाली  is based on the fact clouds in their most basic forms can  दिखाएँ   free-convective  upward growth like  कपासी  , appear in non-convective layered sheets such as stratus ,  or  take  the  form of thin fibrous wisps ,  as   in  the case of cirrus  .
Prefixes are used in connection with clouds to express variations or complexities in  ये  basic forms or to specify middle or  ऊँची  altitude ranges .
These include  strato-  for low  बादल   साथ  limited  संवहन  that form  ज़्यादातर  in uneven layers ,  cumulo-   लिये   जटिल  highly-convective storm  बादल  , nimbo- for thick layered clouds of some complexity that can produce moderate to heavy precipitation  ,  alto- for  मध्य  clouds , and  cirro-  for high clouds ; the latter two of which may be of simple or moderately  जटिल  structure .
whether  or not  a  cloud is  कम  , middle ,  or  high level depends on how far above  the  ground its base forms .
Cloud  प्रकार  with significant vertical extent can form in the low or middle altitude  सीमाएँ   depending  on the moisture content of the air .
Clouds  in  the troposphere have Latin names  due  to the popular adaptation of Luke Howard 's cloud categorization system , which  began  to spread in popularity  दौरान   दिसम्बर  1802 .
Synoptic surface weather observations use code numbers to  रिकार्ड  and report  the   प्रकार  of tropospheric cloud visible at each scheduled observation time based  on  the height and physical appearance of the  बादल  .
While a majority  of  clouds  रूप   in  Earth 's troposphere  ,   वहीँ  are occasions when clouds  in  the  stratosphere  and mesosphere  can  be observed .
These three main layers of  the  atmosphere where clouds  may  be  देखी  are collectively known as the homosphere .
Above this lies the thermosphere and exosphere , which together  मेक  up  the  heterosphere that marks the transition to  बाहरी   स्पेस   .
Clouds have been observed on other planets  और  moons within the Solar System , but , due to their different  तापमान  characteristics , they are composed of other substances such as methane , ammonia ,  और  sulfuric acid  .
Galveston County is a county located in  the  U.S. state of  टेक्सास  within  the  Houston–Sugar Land–Baytown metropolitan area .
As of the 2010 census , the  जनसांख्यिकी   थी  291,309 .
Its county seat is Galveston .
लीग  City is the  largest  city in Galveston County in  शर्तें   of  population ; URL_http between 2000 and  2005  it  surpassed  Galveston as the county 's  largest  city .
Galveston County  थी  founded in 1838 .
