This is  a  list  of  cities in the Bahamas .
The following  तालिका  lists the city or town name , the  भौगोलिक  coordinates ,  the  population as of the 1990  जनसांख्यिकी  , an estimate of the population as of 2009 , and the island name .
The Big Ten Conference , formerly Western Conference and Big Nine Conference , is  the  oldest Division  i  college athletic conference  in  the United States .
Its twelve member institutions ( which are primarily flagship research universities  in  their respective states ,  well-regarded  academically , and  साथ  relatively large student enrollment ) are  स्तिथ   primarily  in the Midwest  ,  stretching from Nebraska in the west to Penn State in the  ईस्ट  .
the  conference competes in the NCAA 's  प्रभाग  I ; its  फ़ुटबॉल  teams  compete  in  the  Football Bowl Subdivision (  fbs  ) , formerly known as Division  i-a  ,  the  highest level of NCAA competition in  कि  sport  .
Member schools of the Big  टेन  ( or , in two  मामले  , their  जनक  university systems  )  also are  सदस्यों  of the Committee on Institutional Cooperation ,  a  leading educational and research consortium .
Despite  the  conference 's name , the Big  टेन   दरअसल  consists  of  12 schools , following the  जोड  of The  पेन्सिलवेनिया  State University in 1993 and  the  University of  nebraska–lincoln  in  2011  .
In 2014  ,  the conference will expand to 14 members with the additions of the University  of  Maryland , College Park and Rutgers , The State  विश्वविद्यालयों  of New Jersey .
it  is not to be confused  साथ   the  Big  12  Conference , which has only ten schools and represents a different region of the country .
सिंगल   malt  Scotch is single malt whisky made in Scotland using a pot still distillation process at a single distillery , with malted barley  as  the only grain ingredient .
As with any Scotch  व्हिस्की  , a single malt Scotch must be distilled in Scotland and matured in oak casks in  स्कॉटलैंड  for at least  तीन  years ( most single malts are matured longer ) .
`` Malt '' indicates that the whisky is distilled  इससे  a `` malted ''  अनाज  .
Several  प्रकार  of grains can be  malted  ( for example  ,  barley , rye and wheat are all grains which can be malted )  ;   however   ,  in the case  of   सिंगल  malt Scotch , barley is always the only grain used  .
``  सिंगल  '' indicates that all the malts in the bottle  आइये   इससे  a  सिंगल  distillery .
Bottlings containing  malt  whisky from  अनेक  distilleries are called `` blended  malt   ``  .
Until the  स्कॉच  Whisky Regulations 2009 (  swr  2009 ) ,  the  word  ``   blended  '' only appeared ( in the context of Scotch whisky )  on  bottles of whisky that contained a mixture of  दोनो  barley  और  non-barley grain whisky , but this is no longer the  मामला  .
अंतर्गत  the terminology established by the SWR 2009 , a ``  blended  malt Scotch  व्हिस्की   ''  is a mixture of  सिंगल  malt Scotch whiskies  ,  not  a   मिश्रण   of   malted   जौ  whisky and non-barley  व्हिस्की  ; those are called ``  blended  Scotch whisky  ''  , without the word `` malt '' .
The term `` blended malt  ''  replaced `` vatted malt  ''   प्रयुक्त  under the prior labelling conventions .
The age statement on a  बोतल  of single malt Scotch is the number of years the whisky spent  maturing   in  cask .
As very few whiskies are bottled  इससे  a single cask  the  age statement reflects the  आयु   of  the  youngest  malt  in  the mix  .
A texture may be  arranged  so as  to  , `` closely approach the single-object  औकात  of fused-ensemble timbres  ,  for example , the  खूबसूरत  'northern lights ' chord ... , in a  बहुत  interesting  वितरण  of  pitches  , produces a fused sound  समर्थित  by  a  suspended  झांझ  roll  ``  ( Erickson ( 1975 ) , p.166 & 168  )  .
In  कंट्रास्ट  to more  परंपरागत  musical textures ,  ध्वनि  mass composition `` minimizes the importance  of  individual pitches  in  preference for  बनावट  , timbre  ,  and dynamics as primary shapers of gesture and impact . ''
Developed from  the  modernist tone clusters and spread to orchestral writing by  the  late 1950s and 1960s , sound-mass `` obscures the boundary between  ध्वनि  and noise `` (  एडवर्ड्स  2001  ,  pp . 326–27 ) .
Techniques which may  बनाएँ  or  be   प्रयुक्त  with sound mass include extended techniques such  as  muted brass or  स्ट्रिंग्स  , flutter tonguing , wide  vibrato  , extreme ranges  ,  and glissandos  .
Composers and works include Barbara  kolb   ,  Pauline Oliveros ' Sound  पैटर्न  for  कोरस  ( 1961 ) , Norma Beecroft 's From Dreams  of  Brass for chorus  (  1963–1964 ) , and  नैंसी  Van de Vate .
beecroft  `` blurs  व्यक्तिगत  pitches in favor of a collective timbre through the use of vocal and instrumental clusters , choral  वाक  , narrator , and a wash of  ध्वनि  from an electronic tape .  ''
(  ibid  )
A very early example is the opening of Jean-Féry Rebel 's ballet Les Elémens ( 1737–38 ) , where chaos  is  represented  by  a gradually cumulating orchestral cluster of all seven  टीप  of the D minor scale ( Henck 2004 , pp . 52–54 ) .
A later example is  the   तीसरा  movement of Ruth Crawford Seeger 's  स्ट्रिंग  Quartet 1931 ( Nonesuch H-71280  )  while more recently Phill  niblock  's multiple  ड्रोन  based music serves as  an  example  .
The use of `` chords approaching timbres  ''  begins  साथ  Debussy and Edgard Varèse often carefully  scored  individual instrumental parts  so  that they  होता  fuse into one ensemble  timbre   or  sound  द्रव्यमान   (  Erickson 1975  ,  pp . 18 and 21 ) .
अन्य  examples include European `` textural  ''  compositions of  the  fifties  और  sixties such as Krzysztof Penderecki 's Threnody to the Victims of Hiroshima ( 1959 )  और  György Ligeti  's  works  featuring  micropolyphony in works like Atmosphères  (  1961 ) and  उसके  Requiem ( 1963-65 ) .
Other  composers  with works  using  this  तकनीक  include Henryk Górecki , Karel Husa , Witold Lutosławski , Kazimierz Serocki , and Steven Stucky .
Sound mass  तकनीकों  also appear in  the   म्यूज़िक  of George Crumb (  anon  . n.d. ) .

a  student is a learner ,  or   किसी  who attends an educational  संस्था  .
In some nations , the English term ( or its cognate in another language  )  is reserved for those who  attend  university , while a schoolchild under the age of  अठारह  is called  a  pupil in English ( or an equivalent  in  other  भाषाएं  ) , although in  the   संयुक्त  States a person enrolled  in   ग्रेड   k–12  is often called a  छात्र  .
In its  widest  use ,  छात्र  is used for anyone who is learning .
Australia  is  a  महाद्वीप   comprising  mainland Australia , Tasmania ,  नई  Guinea  ,  Seram  ,   संभवतः  Timor , and neighbouring islands .
The continent is  sometimes  known in technical contexts by the  names  Sahul , Australinea or Meganesia , to  फर्क  it from the Australian mainland .
It is the smallest of the seven  परंपरागत  continents in the English conception .
New Zealand  is  not  भाग  of the continent  of  Australia , but of the separate  ,   submerged   महाद्वीप  of Zealandia .
Zealandia and  ऑस्ट्रेलिया  are  दोनो  part  of  the wider regions known  as  Australasia and Oceania .
The continent of Australia lies on a continental shelf overlain by shallow  समंदर  which divide it into several landmasses —  the  Arafura  समुद्र  and Torres Strait between mainland Australia and New  गिनी  , and Bass  जलसन्धि  between  मेनलैंड   ऑस्ट्रेलिया  and  तस्मानिया  .
When sea  स्तर   यहूद  lower during  the  Pleistocene ice age , including the last glacial maximum about 18,000 BC , they  यहूद  connected by dry  जमीन   .
During the past ten  हजार  years , rising sea  स्तर  overflowed the  lowlands   और  separated the continent  into  today  's  low-lying arid  to   semi-arid  mainland and the two mountainous islands of New Guinea and Tasmania .
geologically   ,  a continent extends to the edge of its continental shelf , so the now-separate islands are  माना  part of  the  continent .
due  to the  स्प्रेड   of   पशु  , fungi  और  plants  आरपार  the single Pleistocene landmass the separate lands have a related biota .
Central Park is  nearly  twice as big as the world 's second-smallest country , Monaco .
Historically its reservoirs  यहूद   महत्वपूर्ण  components of the city 's water supply .
Environmental issues  in  New York City are affected by the  नगर  's size  ,  density , abundant  पब्लिक  transportation infrastructure , and location at the mouth of the Hudson River .
New  यॉर्क  's  जनसांख्यिकी  density has environmental pros and  ठग  .
It facilitates the highest mass transit  उपयोग  in the  संयुक्त  States , but  भी  concentrates  प्रदूषण  .
Gasoline consumption in the  नगर  is at  the  rate the national average  थी  in  the   1920s  , and greenhouse gas emissions are a  भिन्न  of the national average , at 7.1 metric tons per person per  साल  , below San Francisco  ,  at  11.2  metric tons ,  और  the national average , at 24.5 metric  टन  .
New York City accounts  लिये   तभी   1  % of  संयुक्त   राज्य   ग्रीनहाउस  gas emissions while housing 2.7 % of its population  .
In September 2012 , New York was  नामित  the # 1 `` America 's Dirtiest City , '' by a Travel+Leisure readership survey  कि  rated the environmental quality of 35 prominent cities in the  संयुक्त   राज्य  .
अटलांटा  ( , stressed , locally ) is  the  capital of and the most  populous  city in the U.S. state of Georgia , with an estimated 2011 population  of  432,427  .
Atlanta is the cultural  और  economic center of  the  Atlanta  महानगर   क्षेत्रफल  ,  घर  to 5,457,831 people and the ninth largest metropolitan area in the United  राज्य  .
Atlanta is the county seat of Fulton County  ,  and a small portion of the city  extends  eastward into DeKalb  काउंटी  .
Atlanta was  स्थापित   in  1837 at the intersection of  दो  railroad lines ,  और  the city rose  इससे  the ashes of  the  Civil War to become a national center of commerce .
in  the decades following the  सिविल  Rights  गति  , during which the city earned a  प्रतिष्ठा  as `` too busy to hate ''  लिये  the progressive views of its citizens and leaders ,  अटलांटा   attained   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  prominence  .
Atlanta is the primary transportation hub of the Southeastern United  राज्य  , via highway , railroad , and air  ,  with Hartsfield–Jackson Atlanta International Airport being the world  's  busiest airport  चूंकि  1998 .
Atlanta  is   माना  an `` alpha ( - ) world  नगर   ,  '' and , with a gross domestic  उत्पाद  of US $ 270 billion , Atlanta’s  अर्थव्यवस्था  ranks 15th among world cities and sixth  in  the nation .
Although Atlanta’s economy is considered  विविध  , dominant sectors include logistics  ,   पेशेवर  and  कारोबार  services , media operations ,  सरकारी  administration  ,  and  उच्चतर  education  .
Topographically , Atlanta  is  marked by rolling hills  और  dense  पेड़  coverage .
Revitalization of Atlanta 's neighborhoods ,  initially  spurred by the 1996 Olympics ,  रै   intensified  in  the  21st century , altering the city 's  जनसांख्यिकी  , politics , and  संस्कृति  .
A  1947  propaganda comic  किताब  published  by  the Catechetical Guild  शैक्षणिक   समाज  raising  the   specter  of a Communist takeover
McCarthyism is the practice of making accusations of  disloyalty  , subversion  ,  or treason without proper regard for evidence  .
it  also means `` the practice of  बनाना  unfair allegations or using  अन्यायपूर्ण   investigative  techniques  ,  especially in order  to  restrict  dissent   or   राजनैतिक  criticism .  ''
The term has its origins in the  काल   in  the United States known as the Second Red Scare , lasting roughly from 1950 to 1956 and  characterized  by  heightened   fears  of communist influence on American institutions and espionage by Soviet agents  .
originally  coined to criticize the anti-communist pursuits of Republican U.S . Senator  जोसेफ  McCarthy of  विस्कॉन्सिन  , `` McCarthyism '' soon took on a broader meaning , describing the excesses of similar efforts  .
The term is also  अभी  used more generally to  describe  reckless , unsubstantiated  आरोपों   ,   as  well as demagogic attacks on the  अक्षर  or patriotism of  राजनैतिक   adversaries  .
During  the  McCarthy era , thousands of Americans were accused of being Communists  or  communist  sympathizers  and became the  विषय  of aggressive investigations and questioning  पहले  government or  private-industry  panels , committees and agencies .
The primary targets of such  suspicions  were government employees , those  in  the entertainment industry , educators and union activists .
Suspicions were often given  credence  despite inconclusive or questionable evidence ,  और  the level  of  threat posed by a person 's real or supposed  वामपंथी  associations or beliefs  थी   प्रायः  greatly exaggerated .
Many people suffered loss of employment and/or destruction of their careers ; some even  suffered  imprisonment .
Most of these punishments came about through trial verdicts  बाद  overturned , laws that would be declared unconstitutional ,  dismissals  for reasons later declared illegal  or  actionable , or extra-legal procedures that  होता  come  into   सामान्य  disrepute .
The  सबसे  famous  उदाहरण   of  McCarthyism include the  भाषणों  ,  investigations  , and hearings of Senator McCarthy himself  ;  the Hollywood  ब्लैकलिस्ट  , associated with  hearings  conducted by the House  un-american   क्रियाएँ   कमेटी  ( HUAC )  ;  and the various anti-communist activities  of  the  संघीय   ब्यूरो  of Investigation ( FBI ) under Director J.  एडगर  Hoover .
McCarthyism  थी  a widespread social and cultural  घटना  that  प्रभावित  all levels of society and was  the  source of  a   ग्रेट  deal of debate and conflict in  the  United States .
Napoleon  is  a fictional character and the main antagonist  in  George Orwell 's  एनिमल  Farm .
While  he  is  at  first a common farm pig , he gets rid of Snowball  ,  another pig which shares the power .
He  तब  takes advantage  of   the  animals ' uprising against  उनके  masters to eventually become the tyrannical `` President of Animal  फार्म   ,  '' which he turns into a dictatorship .
NEPTUNE logo
the  NEPTUNE  कनाडा  project is  the  world’s first regional-scale underwater ocean observatory  कि  plugs directly into the Internet .
Since December 2009 , it  रै  allowed people  to  `` surf '' the seafloor while ocean scientists run  deep-water   प्रयोग  from labs  और  universities  around  the  संसार  .
Along with  इसके  sister  प्रोजेक्ट  ,  शुक्र  ,  वरुण  offers a unique approach to ocean science .
Traditionally , ocean  वैज्ञानिकों  have relied  on  infrequent ship cruises or space-based satellites to  carry  out their research ,  जबकि  the NEPTUNE project uses a remotely operated  क्रॉलर  .
The Coronet was a full-size car from Dodge in the 1950s , initially the  प्रभाग  's highest trim line but  ,  starting in 1955 , the  न्यूनतम  trim line .
In  the  1960s , the name was transferred to Dodge 's mid-size entry .
ARM9 is  an  ARM architecture 32-bit RISC CPU family  .
Commonwealth is a traditional English  पद  for  a   राजनैतिक  community founded for the  आम  good  .
Historically  ,  it has  sometimes  been synonymous with `` republic `` .
More recently it has  महरूम  used for fraternal  एसोसिएशन   of  some  sovereign  nations .
सबसे  notably , the Commonwealth of Nations  ,  an association primarily of former members of the British Empire , is often  referred  to as simply `` the  राष्ट्रमंडल  '' .
The  सितंबर   11  attacks ( also referred to as September  11  , September  11th  , or 9/11  )  were a series of four coordinated terrorist attacks launched by  the   इस्लामी  terrorist group al-Qaeda upon the United  राज्य  in New York City and the Washington  ,  D.C.  क्षेत्रफल  on September 11 , 2001 .
Four passenger airliners were hijacked by 19  al-qaeda  terrorists  so  they could be flown into buildings in suicide  हमले  .
Two of those planes ,  अमरीकी  Airlines Flight  11   और  United Airlines Flight 175 , were crashed into the North and South towers , respectively  ,  of the World Trade  बीच  complex in New  यॉर्क   नगर  .
Within two  घंटों  , both towers collapsed with debris and  the  resulting fires causing partial  or  complete collapse of all other buildings in  the   wtc  complex , as well as major  क्षति  to  टेन  other  विशाल   surrounding   structures  .
A  तीसरा   प्लेन  ,  अमरीकी  Airlines Flight  77  , was crashed into the Pentagon (  the  headquarters of the United States  विभाग   of  Defense ) , leading to a partial collapse in its western side .
The fourth plane , United Airlines  उड़ान   93  , was  targeted  at the United States  कैपिटल  in Washington  ,  D.C.  ,  but crashed  into  a field  निकट  Shanksville , Pennsylvania , after its  यात्री  tried to overcome  the  hijackers .
In total , almost 3,000 people  died  in the attacks , including the 227 civilians and 19 hijackers aboard the  चार  planes .
Suspicion quickly  गिरी  on al-Qaeda .
Although the group  's  leader ,  ओसामा  bin Laden , initially denied  कोई  involvement ,  in  2004 he  claimed  responsibility for the  हमले  .
Al-Qaeda  और   बिन  Laden cited  u.S.  support of Israel  ,   the  presence  of  U.S. troops in Saudi Arabia , and sanctions against Iraq as motives  लिये  the  हमले  .
The United States responded  to   the  attacks by  शुभारंभ  the War on Terror and invading Afghanistan to depose the Taliban  ,  which  था  harbored al-Qaeda .
Many countries strengthened their  anti-terrorism  legislation and  विस्तारित  law  प्रवर्तन  powers .
Having evaded  कैप्चर  for years ,  बिन  Laden was located  और   मारे  by U.S. forces in May 2011 .
The  विनाश   of  the Twin Towers and other properties caused serious damage to the economy of Lower Manhattan and had a  significant  effect on global markets .
क्लीनअप  of  the  World Trade Center site was completed in May 2002 , and the Pentagon  थी  repaired within a year  .
Numerous  memorials  have been constructed , including the  नेशनल  September  11  Memorial &  संग्रहालय  in New  यॉर्क  , the Pentagon Memorial ,  और  the Flight 93 National Memorial in  पेन्सिलवेनिया  .
After a lengthy delay ,  the  One World Trade Center is  अपेक्षित  to be completed  at  Ground Zero in New York City in 2013 .
Crater Lake National Park is a  संयुक्त  States National Park located in southern Oregon  .
Established in  1902   ,  Crater Lake  नेशनल  Park is the fifth  oldest  national park  in  the United States and the only one in  the  state of Oregon .
The park encompasses the caldera  of  Crater  झील  , a  remnant  of a destroyed volcano , Mount Mazama , and the  surrounding   पहाड़ियाँ  and  वनों  .
the  lake is  गहन  at its deepest point , which makes it the deepest lake  in  the United States , the second deepest in North America and the  नवीं  deepest in  the   संसार  .
Crater Lake is often  referred  to  as  the seventh deepest  झील  in  the  world  ,   लकिन  this  पूर्व  listing excludes the approximately depth of subglacial Lake  वोस्तोक  in Antarctica ,  जिससे  resides under nearly of ice  ,  and the recent report  of  a maximum  गहराई  for Lake O'Higgins /San Martin , located  on  the border of Chile  और  Argentina .
however  , when comparing its average depth of to the average depth of other deep lakes  ,  Crater Lake becomes the deepest in the  पश्चिमी  Hemisphere and the third deepest in the world .
the  impressive average depth of this volcanic lake  is  due to  the  nearly  सममित  deep caldera formed  7,700  years ago during the violent  climactic  eruptions and subsequent collapse  of   माउंट  Mazama and the  अपेक्षाकृत  moist  जलवायु   कि  is typical of the crest of the Cascade Range .
The  caldera  rim ranges in elevation from .
The  संयुक्त  States Geological Survey benchmarked elevation  of   the  lake  सतह   itself  is .
इस  National  पार्क   encompasses  .
Crater Lake  रै  no streams flowing into or  आउट  of it .
All water that enters  the  lake is eventually lost from  वाष्पीकरण  or subsurface seepage .
The lake 's water commonly has  a  striking blue hue , and  the  lake is re-filled entirely  इससे  direct precipitation in the form  of   हिम  and rain .
The Supreme Court  of   the  United  राज्य  is the highest  अदालत  in  the  United States .
It  रै  ultimate ( and largely discretionary  )  appellate jurisdiction over all federal  न्यायालयों  and over state court cases involving issues  of  federal law , and original jurisdiction over a small  दायरा  of cases .
The Court , which meets in the United States Supreme Court Building in Washington , D.C. , consists  of  a  मुख्य  justice and eight associate justices who are nominated by  the   अध्यक्ष  and confirmed by the  संयुक्त  States  सीनेट  .
Once appointed , justices have life tenure unless they resign , retire , or are removed after impeachment .

It  is  located about north of  ह्यूस्टन  .
As of July 2011 ,  the  city population was 58,973 , up  इससे   36,811  in  2000   .
The Book of Mormon is a sacred text  of  the Latter Day Saint movement , which  adherents  believe contains writings of ancient prophets  जो  lived on the  अमरीकी  continent from approximately 2200 BC to AD  421  .
It was first published in March 1830 by Joseph Smith as The Book of Mormon : An Account Written by the Hand of Mormon upon  प्लेटों  Taken from the Plates of Nephi .
according   to  Smith 's account , and also according to  the  book  's  narrative , the Book of Mormon was originally written in  वरना  unknown characters referred to as ``  reformed  Egyptian `` engraved on golden plates .
Smith claimed that the last prophet  to  contribute to the book , a man  नामित  Moroni  ,  buried  it   in  a hill in  present-day  New  यॉर्क  and then returned to earth in 1827 as an  देवदूत  ,  revealing   the  location  of  the book to Smith and instructing him to translate and  disseminate  it  as  evidence of the restoration of Christ 's true  गिरिजाघर  in the latter  दिनों  .
The Book of  mormon  has a  क्रमांक  of original and distinctive doctrinal discussions on subjects such  as  the fall of Adam and Eve  ,  the nature of the Atonement ,  eschatology  ,  मोचन  from physical and spiritual death , and the organization of the latter-day  गिरिजाघर  .
The pivotal event of  the   किताब   is  an  रूप   of  Jesus Christ to the Americas  shortly  after his resurrection .
The Book of Mormon is the earliest of the unique writings of  the  Latter Day  संत  movement , the denominations of  जिससे  typically regard  the  text not only as scripture but  भी   as  a historical record of God  's  dealings  साथ   the   प्राचीन  inhabitants  of  the Americas .
The Book of Mormon is divided into  छोटी  books  ,  titled  बाद  the individuals named as primary  लेखक  and , in most versions  ,  divided into chapters  और   आयतें   .
It is written in English , very similar to the  जल्दी  Modern English linguistic  स्टाइल  of the King  जेम्स  Version of the Bible ,  और   रै  since been fully or partially translated  into  108 languages .
an   आयोजिक  rank  (  also known  as  an enlisted grade  or  enlisted rate ) is , in most militaries , any  रैंक  below that  of  a commissioned  अधिकारी  or  वारंट  officer .
The  पद  can also be inclusive of non-commissioned officers  .
In most  मामले   ,  enlisted service personnel perform jobs specific  to  their own occupational specialty , as opposed to the  अधिक  generalized command responsibilities of  commissioned  officers .
`` What a Wonderful  संसार  '' is a song written by  bob  Thiele  (   as  ``  जार्ज  Douglas '' ) and George David Weiss .
it  was first  अंकित  by Louis Armstrong and  released  as a single  in  1967 .
Thiele and Weiss were both prominent  in  the music world ( Thiele as a producer and Weiss as a composer/performer ) .
Armstrong 's recording was inducted in the Grammy  हॉल  of Fame in  1999  .
The publishing  लिये  this song is controlled by Memory Lane Music  समूह  , Carlin Music Corp. ,  और  Bug Music , Inc .
