A steam engine  is  a heat engine that performs mechanical work using steam as its working fluid .
Using boiling water to produce mechanical motion  goes   वापस  about 2,000 years ,  लकिन  early  डिवाइस  were not practical  .
Since the late 1700s steam engines  have  become  a  major source of mechanical power .
The first applications were removing water from mines .
In  1781  James Watt patented a steam engine that produced continuous  rotative   गति  .
These  10  hp engines enabled a wide range of manufacturing machinery to be powered .
The engines could be sited  anywhere  that water and coal or  लकडी  fuel could be obtained  .
By 1883 ,  इंजन  that could provide  10,000  hp had become feasible .
Steam engines could also  be  applied to vehicles  ऐसे  as  कर्षण  engines  और  the railway locomotives  जिससे   हैं  commonly just called steam engines outside  अमेरिका  .
The stationary steam  इंजन  was  a  key component of the Industrial Revolution  ,  allowing factories to locate  जहाँ  water  शक्ति  was unavailable .
आज  steam turbines generate about 90  %  of the electric  शक्ति   in  the United States using  a  variety of heat sources .
Steam engines  हैं  external combustion  इंजन  , where the working fluid is separate  इससे  the combustion products .
Non-combustion heat  स्त्रोत  such as solar  शक्ति  , nuclear power  or  geothermal energy may  be  used .
the  ideal thermodynamic  साईकिल  used to analyze this process is called the Rankine cycle .
In the cycle , water is heated into steam in a boiler until  it  reaches a high pressure .
When expanded through pistons or  turbines  , mechanical work is  किया  .
the  reduced-pressure  भाप   is  then condensed  और  pumped back into  the  boiler .
In general usage ,  the  term steam  इंजन  can refer to either  the  integrated steam plants ( including boilers etc .  )  such as railway steam locomotives and portable engines , or may refer to  the  piston or turbine machinery alone , as in the beam engine and stationary steam engine .
Specialized devices such as  भाप  hammers and  भाप  pile drivers are dependent  on  steam supplied from  a  separate boiler .
A mill engine from Stott Park Bobbin Mill  ,   cumbria  , England
a  steam locomotive in  जर्मनी  .This class of engine was built in 1942 – 1950 and operated commercially until 1988 .
``  मूव  Bitch ''  (   संपादित  version titled `` Move B***h '' or simply `` Move '' )  is   the   तीसरा  official  सिंगल  from rapper Ludacris ' album Word of Mouf .
The single  सुविधाएँ   mystikal  and I-20  .
The single  पहुँचे  # 10  on  the Billboard Hot  100  making it Ludacris 's  पहला  top ten hit on the  चार्ट  ,  it  also reached # 3  on   hot  Rap Tracks and # 3 on Hot  r  & B/Hip-Hop Singles &  ट्रैक्स   .
प्यूर्टो  Rican  reggaeton  duo Maicol  &   मैनुएल  sampled the  सोंग  on `` Hoy  me  Levanté '' on their 2002 release Yakaleo  .
The  सोंग  is also featured  in  episode 2  ,  Series One of  अंग्रेजों  teen  comedy/drama  Skins .
The song  थी  also used by  संसार  Wrestling  entertainment   superstar  Montel Vontavious  पोर्टर  during  उसके  short stint  in  Ring of Honor  .
It was also used for  अप्रैल   शिकारी  in  विभिन्न  Independent  circuits  .
It was featured in  the  movie ATL starring T.I . , and ' Hancock , ' although in the  latter   ,  the clean version was used .
A snippet of the song is played during traffic reports on many radio  स्टेशन   ,  usually carrying  an  urban/hip-hop format .
Retired NBA star and now ESPN analyst Jalen Rose is featured in the  म्यूज़िक   वीडियो  .
The  सोंग  has been  covered  by  चट्टान  band  प्रारंभ  Trouble , on their album Every Solution Has Its Problem .
It was featured  on  British sitcom The Inbetweeners when the characters Jay  और  Neil took  होगा  on a 'pussy patrol  '  in Jay 's red Nissan Micra .
it   थी  sampled by Girl Talk on the first track of his album All Day ,  ``   oh  No '' .
Elizabeth II  (  Elizabeth Alexandra Mary ; born 21 April 1926 ) is the constitutional monarch of 16  sovereign  states  ,  known as the Commonwealth realms , and their territories and dependencies , and head of the 54-member Commonwealth of Nations .
She  is  Supreme Governor of the  गिरिजाघर  of England  और   ,   in  some of her realms , carries the title of Defender of the Faith as part of her full  शीर्षक  .
On her accession on 6 February 1952 , Elizabeth became Head of  the  Commonwealth and queen regnant of seven  स्वतंत्र  Commonwealth countries : the United Kingdom  ,  Canada , Australia , New Zealand , South Africa , Pakistan and Ceylon .
From 1956 to 1992  ,  the number of her  realms  varied as territories gained independence and some  realms  became republics .
at  present , in addition to the first four aforementioned countries  ,   एलिज़ाबेथ  is Queen of Jamaica ,  बारबाडोस   ,  the  बहामा  ,  हरा  ,  पापुआ   नई  Guinea ,  the  Solomon Islands , Tuvalu , Saint Lucia , Saint Vincent and  the  Grenadines , Belize , Antigua and Barbuda  और  Saint Kitts and Nevis  .
Her reign of years is currently the second longest for a British monarch ; only Queen Victoria has  reigned  longer at  over  63 years .
Elizabeth was born in London and educated privately  at   घर  .
उसके  father acceded to the throne as  जार्ज  VI in 1936 on the abdication  of   उसके  brother Edward VIII ,  इससे   जिससे  time  वो   थी  the heir  presumptive  .
She began  to  undertake public duties during  the  Second World War ,  in  which she served in  the  Auxiliary Territorial Service .
In 1947 , she married Prince Philip ,  ड्यूक  of  एडिनबर्ग  , with  जिसको  she has  चार  children :  चार्ल्स  , Anne  ,  Andrew  ,  and Edward .
Her  राजतिलक  service took  प्लेस  in  1953  and was the  पहला  to be televised .
the  Queen 's many historic visits and meetings include a state visit to the Republic of Ireland  और   reciprocal  visits to and from the Pope .
The Queen  रै  seen major  संवैधानिक  changes in her realms , such as  devolution   in  the United Kingdom and the patriation of the  कनाडाई   संविधान   .
Times of personal significance have included the  births  and marriages of  उसके  children , the  births  of her grandchildren ,  the  investiture of the  प्रिंस  of Wales  ,  and the celebration of milestones such as her Silver , Golden ,  और  Diamond Jubilees in  1977   ,  2002 , and  2012  , respectively .
Major events in the Queen 's reign have  शामिल   the   परेशानियों  in Northern Ireland , the Falklands War ,  युद्धों  with Iraq and the War in  अफगानिस्तान   .
There  have  been times of personal sorrow for  उसके  which include  the  death of her father at 56 ,  the  assassination of Prince Philip 's uncle , Lord Mountbatten , the breakdown of her children 's marriages in 1992  (  a year deemed her annus horribilis ) , the death in 1997 of her former  daughter-in-law  , Diana , Princess of Wales ,  और  the deaths of her mother and  सिस्टर   in  2002 .
The Queen has occasionally faced severe press criticism of the  royal  family and republican sentiments , but support for the  साम्राज्य  and her personal popularity remain high .
christianity  is the largest religion  सूचीबद्ध  by Australians in the national census .
In the 2011  जनसांख्यिकी  , 61.1 % of Australians were listed as Christian .
ऑस्ट्रेलिया  has no official state religion and the Australian Constitution protects freedom of religion .
The  उपस्थिति  of  christianity  in Australia  began  with the arrival of the First Fleet of British convicts in 1788 .
The religion grew to  खाता  for 96.1 % of the national population  at  the time of  the  Federation  of  Australia  in  1901 .
the  Anglican Church  of  Australia  (  formerly known  as  the Church of England  in  Australia )  remained   the  largest denomination until 1986  ,  when it was surpassed by the  रोमन  Catholic Church  in  Australia .
Post-war multiculturalism and a decline in religious observance among some sections  of   the  population have diversified  the   जनसांख्यिकी  of religion in Australia .
Of  the  roughly 61 %  identifying  as Christian in 2011 , the largest denominations were either Roman  कैथोलिक   (  25 % )  or  Anglican ( 17  %   )  , with the third largest denomination being the 5 % affiliated with  the  Uniting Church in  ऑस्ट्रेलिया  .
Post-war immigration has grown  the  numbers belonging to churches like the Greek Orthodox Archdiocese of  ऑस्ट्रेलिया   और  there are large and growing Pentecostal groups , such as Sydney 's Hillsong Church .
the  festivals of Easter  और  Christmas are public holidays in Australia .
around  a quarter of students attend church schools and  ईसाई  organisations are leading non-government providers of  स्वास्थ्य   और  welfare services  through  organisations like Catholic Health Australia , Anglicare , UnitingCare  ऑस्ट्रेलिया  , the Salvation Army and St  विंसेंट   de   पॉल   समाज  .
Historically significant  ऑस्ट्रेलियाई  Christians have  शामिल  Rev  dr  John Dunmore Lang  ,  Saint Mary MacKillop , Catherine  हेलेन  Spence , Pastor  दाउद   unaipon  , the Reverend John Flynn and Pastor Sir Doug Nicholls .
High profile contemporary Australian Christians include : Tim Costello Baptist minister  और  current CEO of World Vision Australia , Frank Brennan  ,  Jesuit human rights lawyer ,  कार्डिनल  George Pell , Catholic Archbishop  of  Sydney ,  फिलिप  Aspinall the current Anglican  primate   और   archbishop  of Brisbane  ,  Kevin Rudd  ,  former Labor Prime  मंत्री  , and Tony  एबॉट   ,   नेता   लिये  the Federal Opposition Liberal Party .
चार्टर  creating Collegiate School , which became Yale  कॉलेज  ,  अक्तूबर  9 , 1701
Yale University is a  निजी  Ivy League research university located in  नई  Haven , Connecticut .
संस्थापित  in 1701 in  the  Colony of  कनेक्टिकट  ,  the  university  is   the  third-oldest institution of higher education in the United  राज्य  .
Originally chartered as the  ``  Collegiate School '' , the institution traces its roots to 17th-century clergymen who  sought  to establish a college  to  train clergy and  राजनैतिक  leaders for the  उपनिवेश  .
In 1718  ,  the College was  renamed  `` Yale College  ''  to  सम्मान  a  तोहफा  from  elihu  Yale , a governor of the British East India Company .
in  1861 ,  the   ग्रैजुएट   स्कूल  of  कला   और  Sciences became the  पहला  U.S. institution to award the PhD . Yale became  a  founding member  of   the  Association of  अमरीकी  Universities in 1900  .
Yale College was transformed , beginning in the  1930s  , through the  स्थापना   of  residential  कॉलेजों  : 12 now  मौजूद  and two more are planned .
Yale employs  over  1,100 faculty to teach and advise about 5,300 undergraduate and  6,100   ग्रैजुएट   और   पेशेवर  students .
Almost all tenured  professors  teach undergraduate courses  ,  more  than  2,000 of which  हैं  offered annually .
The  विश्वविद्यालयों   's   एसेट  include an endowment valued at $ 19.4 billion  ,  the second-largest  of   कोई  academic institution in the  संसार  .
Yale  's  system of more  than  two  दर्जन  libraries holds  12.5  million volumes  .
49 Nobel Laureates have been  संबद्ध  with the University as  विद्यार्थी   ,  faculty  ,  and  स्टाफ  .
Yale  रै   उत्पादित  many notable alumni , including five U.S. Presidents , 19 U.S.  परम्  Court Justices , and several foreign heads of state .
At the  ग्रैजुएट   स्तर  , Yale Law School , Yale  स्कूल  of Art , and Yale School of Drama are consistently  क्रमित  the  शीर्ष  programs in their field  .
Yale Law  स्कूल   is   the   सबसे   चयनात्मक  law school in the  संयुक्त  States .
Yale students compete intercollegiately as the Yale Bulldogs in the NCAA Division I Ivy League  .
The  oldest  intercollegiate athletic event in the United States is the Yale-Harvard  regatta  .
Artemisia tridentata ( `` big sagebrush ''  or  ``  sagebrush   ''  ) is  an  aromatic shrub from the family Asteraceae ,  जिससे   grows   in  arid and semi-arid conditions ,  throughout  a range of cold desert , steppe , and mountain habitats in the Intermountain  वेस्ट  of North America .
The vernacular name  ``   sagebrush  '' is also used for  अनेक  related  सदस्यों  of  the  genus Artemisia , such as California  sagebrush  ( Artemisia californica ) .
Big Sagebrush  और  other  artemisia  species are the dominant plants across  विशाल  portions of the Great Basin , covering some 422,000 square miles in  11  western U.S.  &  Canadian states .
It is  the  state flower  of  Nevada  .
Sagebrush provides food and habitat for a variety of species , such as  ऋषि   grouse  , pronghorn  antelope  ,  धूसर  vireo , pygmy rabbit , and mule deer .
Big sagebrush was  प्रयुक्त  as  an   हर्बल  medicine by  देशी  Americans throughout the  intermountain  West of North America—especially for preventing infection  in  wounds , stopping internal  bleeding  , and treating  headaches   और  colds .
Chemically ,  the  active medicinal constituents include  camphor  , terpenoids , and  tannins  .
Several major threats  मौजूद  to sage  ब्रश   ecosystems  ,  सहित   इंसान  settlements  ,  conversion to agricultural land , livestock grazing ,  हृदयरोग  plant species  ,   wildfires  ,  और  climate change  .
Yahoo ! Mail  is  a  फ़्री  email service  offered   by  the American search engine  कम्पनी  Yahoo !
It  थी  launched in 1997 , and  ,  according  to  comScore , Yahoo ! Mail is the third-largest web-based email service with 281  लाख   उपयोक्ता  as of  दिसम्बर  2012 .
Currently , Yahoo ! offers three versions  of  Yahoo  !   मेल  .
The traditional ``  याहू  ! Mail  क्लासिक   ''  continues the availability of the original interface introduced in  1997  .
a  version introduced in 2005 included a new Ajax  इंटरफ़ेस   ,  drag-and-drop features , improved search  कार्यक्षमता  , keyboard shortcuts , address auto-complete ,  टैब्स   ,  and  अन्य  updated  सुविधाएँ  .
in  October 2010 , Yahoo ! released  a  beta version of Yahoo !  मेल  , which included improvements to the design , performance  ,  search functionality , and Facebook integration .
In May 2011 ,  बीटा  testing for the new  संस्करण  stopped  ,  and it became the default  इंटरफ़ेस  for Yahoo  !   मेल  .
In early 2008 ,  याहू  ! began offering unlimited  मेल  storage to  इसके  users in response  to   heated  competition in  the  free web-mail market segment .
On June 27 , 2009  ,  Yahoo ! Messenger  थी  integrated  साथ  Yahoo  !  Mail  .
Tacoma ( , ) is a mid-sized urban port  नगर  and the  काउंटी  seat of Pierce County  ,   वॉशिंगटन  , United States .
the  city is on  वॉशिंगटन   's   puget  Sound , southwest  of  Seattle , northeast of the state capital , Olympia , and northwest of Mount Rainier  नेशनल  Park .
The population  थी   198,397   ,   according  to the 2010 census .
Tacoma is the second-largest  नगर  in the Puget  ध्वनि  area and the third largest in the state .
टकोमा  also serves as  the  center of business activity  लिये  the South  ध्वनि  region , which has  a  population of around 1 million people .
Tacoma adopted its name after the nearby Mount Rainier , originally called Mount Tahoma .
It is known as the  ``  City of  नियति  '' because the area was chosen to be the western terminus of the  उत्तरी  Pacific Railroad in the  लेट  19th century  .
The decision of the railroad  थी   बहकावे  by Tacoma 's neighboring deep-water harbor ,  शुरुआत  Bay .
By connecting the  खाड़ी  with the railroad Tacoma 's motto  became  `` When rails meet sails  .  ''
Today Commencement  खाड़ी   serves  the Port of Tacoma  ,  a center of international trade on the Pacific Coast  और  Washington state 's largest port .
Like most central cities , Tacoma suffered a prolonged decline in the mid-20th century as a result  of  suburbanization and divestment .
Since the 1990s  ,  developments in the  शहर  core include the University  of  Washington Tacoma ;  टकोमा  Link , the first modern electric light rail service in  the  state ; the state 's highest  घनत्व   of  art  और  history museums ; and a restored urban waterfront , the Thea Foss  जलमार्ग  .
साथ  a  long  history of blue-collar labor politics — from  the   रेलरोड  workers  of   the  19th century , to the  longshoremen  of  the  20th century , to the Labor Ready workers of today  —  Tacoma has long been  ज्ञात   लिये  its rough ,  किरकिरी  image  .
A song about Tacoma , `` Thrice All American '' , by American singer-songwriter and  पूर्व  resident Neko Case , describes it as `` a dusty old  गहना   in  the  दक्षिण  Puget Sound /  जहाँ   the  factories churn  /  and the timber  's  all cut down  ''  .
tacoma-pierce   काउंटी  has been named one of the most  livable  areas  in  the country  .
Tacoma was also recently  सूचीबद्ध  as the 19th  सबसे  walkable city in the country .
In contrast ,  the  city is also ranked as the most  stressed-out  city in the country  in  a 2004 survey  .
In  2006  , women 's magazine Self named Tacoma the `` Most Sexually Healthy City  ''  in the  संयुक्त  States .
In 2012  ,  The Advocate gave Tacoma the title of `` Gayest City  in  America '' , in part because of the large diversity of  पब्लिक   कार्यालयों  held ,  और   वॉशिंगटन  State passing  a  bill in 2012 allowing LGBT  युगल  to  निकाह   .
टकोमा  is famous for the 1940 collapse  of   the   टकोमा  Narrows Bridge .
Chula  विस्टा  ( ; ) is the second largest city in the San Diego  महानगर  area ,  the  seventh largest city in Southern California ,  the   fourteenth  largest  नगर  in  the   राज्य  of  कैलिफ़ोर्निया   ,   और   the  77th-largest city in  the  United States .
The  जनसांख्यिकी  was 243,916 as of the 2010  जनसांख्यिकी  .
स्तिथ   बस   इससे   शहर  San Diego and from  the  Mexican border in the South Bay region of the metropolitan area , the  नगर  is  at  the center  of   एक  of the richest economic  और   culturally  diverse zones in  the  United States .
Chula Vista is  so  named because of its  दर्शनीय  location between  the  San  डिएगो  Bay and coastal mountain foothills  .
Founded  in  the early 19th century , fast population growth has  recently  been observed  in   the   नगर  .
as  the second largest city in San Diego County , Chula Vista has  जल्दी  become a  गंतव्य  popular to many  पर्यटकों  .
Located in the city is  एक  of  अमेरिका  's few  year-round  United States Olympic Training centers and popular  पर्यटक  destinations  शामिल  Cricket Wireless Amphitheater , the Chula  विस्टा   मरीना  , and the Chula Vista Nature Center .
metes   और  bounds  is  a  प्रणाली  or method  of  describing land , real  प्रॉपर्टी  ( in  कंट्रास्ट   to  personal property ) or real estate .
The system  रै   महरूम  used in  इंग्लैण्ड  for many centuries ,  और  is still  प्रयुक्त  there in the  परिभाषा   of  general boundaries .
By custom ,  it  was applied in  the  original  तेरह  Colonies  कि  became the United  राज्य  ,  और  in  अनेक   अन्य  land jurisdictions based on  अंग्रेज़ी  common law .
typically  the system uses physical features of  the  local geography  ,  along with directions  और  distances , to define and describe the boundaries  of   a  parcel  of  land .
the   सीमाएँ   हैं  described in a running  गद्य   स्टाइल  , working around the parcel  in  sequence , from  a  point  of  beginning , returning back to the same point ; compare with the oral ritual of beating the  bounds  .
it  may include  सन्दर्भ   to  other  adjoining  parcels ( and their owners ) , and  it  , in turn , could also be referred  to  in later  सर्वेक्षण  .
at  the  समय  the description  is   compiled  , it may have been marked on the  मैदान  with permanent monuments placed where there were no suitable natural monuments .
The term  ``  metes  ''  refers to a boundary  पारिभाषित  by the measurement  of  each  सीधा  run  ,  specified  by  a  अलहदा  between the  टर्मिनल  points , and an  अभिविन्यास  or direction  .
A direction may be  a  simple  कम्पास   bearing  , or  a  precise orientation determined by  सटीक  survey  विधि   .
The  पद  `` bounds '' refers to a more general boundary description , such as along a certain watercourse  ,  a stone wall , an adjoining public road way , or an existing building .
The system is often used to define larger pieces of property ( e.g  .  farms  )   ,  and political subdivisions ( e.g .  कस्बा  boundaries ) where precise definition is  नहीं  required or would be far too expensive ,  or  previously designated boundaries can be incorporated into the description .
सर  Isaac Newton ( 25 December 164220 March 1727 ) was an English physicist and  गणितज्ञ  who is widely  regarded  as one of  the  most influential  वैज्ञानिकों   of  all time and  as  a key  फिगर   in  the scientific revolution .
His book  philosophiæ   naturalis  Principia Mathematica  (  `` Mathematical Principles of  प्राकृतिक  Philosophy  ''   )  , first  प्रकाशित  in 1687 , laid the  मूलाधार  for  सबसे  of classical mechanics .
Newton also made seminal contributions  to   प्रकाशिकी  and shares  क्रेडिट  with Gottfried Leibniz for  the  invention of the infinitesimal  कलन  .
Newton 's Principia formulated the laws of motion and  सार्वभौमिक  gravitation that dominated scientists ' view  of  the physical  ब्रह्मांड  for the next three centuries .
It also  demonstrated  that the motion of objects  on  the Earth  और  that of celestial bodies  could  be described by the  वही  principles .
by  deriving Kepler  's  laws of planetary motion  इससे  his  गणितीय   वर्णन  of gravity , Newton removed the last  संदेह  about  the  validity of the  heliocentric  model of the cosmos .
न्यूटन   निर्मित  the  पहला  practical reflecting  दूरदर्शी   और  developed a  सिद्धान्त  of colour based on the observation that  a   प्रिज़्म  decomposes white light into the many colours of the  दृश्य  spectrum .
He also  प्रतिपादित  an empirical law of cooling  और  studied the speed of sound  .
In addition to his work on  the  calculus , as a mathematician Newton contributed  to  the study of power series , generalised the binomial theorem to non-integer exponents  ,  and  विकसित  Newton 's method  लिये   approximating  the  जड़ें  of a function  .
Newton was a fellow of Trinity  कॉलेज  and  the  second  lucasian  Professor of  गणित  at the University of Cambridge  .
He was a devout  लकिन  unorthodox Christian and , unusually for a member of the  कैम्ब्रिज  faculty , he refused to take holy orders in the Church of England  ,  perhaps because he privately rejected  the  doctrine  of  trinitarianism .
In addition to his work on the  गणितीय   sciences  , Newton  भी  dedicated much of  उसके  time  to  the study of alchemy  और   biblical  chronology , but most of his  कार्य  in those areas remained unpublished until long  बाद  his death .
In his later life , Newton became president  of  the Royal  समाज  .
he  also served  the   अंग्रेजों  government as Warden and Master  of   the   royal  Mint .
Prof.  वाल्टर  Lewin explains Newton 's  विधि   of  gravitation in MIT  कोर्स  8.01
satellites  and projectiles all obey Newton 's law of gravitation
Newton  's  law  of  universal gravitation states  कि  every  पाइंट   द्रव्यमान  in the universe  attracts  every  अन्य  point mass with a force  कि  is directly proportional to the product of their masses  और  inversely proportional to the  वर्गाकार  of the distance between them .
( Separately it was shown  कि   विशाल  spherically symmetrical masses attract and are attracted as  if  all their mass  यहूद   concentrated  at their centers  .   )
This  is  a  सामान्य  physical law derived from empirical observations  by  what Newton called induction .
It is a  भाग  of classical  यांत्रिकी  and  थी  formulated in  न्यूटन   's  work Philosophiæ  naturalis  Principia Mathematica (  ``  the Principia '' ) , first published on 5 July  1687   .
( When Newton 's  किताब  was presented in 1686 to  the  Royal Society , Robert Hooke made  a  claim that  न्यूटन  had obtained the inverse square law from him – see History section below . )
In  आधुनिक  language , the  विधि   राज्य   the  following:
Assuming SI  इकाई  , F  is  measured in  newtons   (  N ) , m1 and  m2   in  kilograms (  kg   )  , r  in   मीटर  ( m ) , and the constant G is approximately equal to .
The value of the constant G was first accurately  संकल्पित   इससे  the results of the Cavendish experiment conducted by  the   अंग्रेजों  scientist Henry Cavendish in 1798 , although  कैवेंडिश   किया  not himself calculate a  numerical  value  लिये  G  .
This experiment was  भी   the  first test of Newton 's theory of  gravitation  between  masses  in the laboratory  .
it  took place 111  सालो  after  the  publication of Newton 's Principia and  71  years after  न्यूटन  's death , so  none  of Newton 's  calculations  could use the value of G ;  बजाय  he could only  गणना   a  force relative to another  फ़ोर्स  .
Newton 's law of gravitation resembles Coulomb  's   विधि  of electrical forces , which is used to calculate  the   परिमाण  of electrical force between two charged bodies .
Both are inverse-square laws , in which force is  inversely   आंशिक  to the square of the distance between the bodies .
Coulomb 's Law has the product of two charges  in  place of the  उत्पाद  of the masses , and the  electrostatic  constant in  प्लेस  of the gravitational constant .
Newton 's law has since been superseded  by  Einstein 's theory of general  आपेक्षिकता  , but it continues to be used as an excellent approximation  of  the effects of gravity  .
Relativity is required only when there is a need  लिये  extreme precision , or when  dealing  with gravitation for extremely  विशाल  and dense objects .
White and  रेड   ध्वज  , representing Iraqi and  अमरीकी   मौतों  , sit in  the  grass quadrangle of The Valley Library on the Corvallis  ,  Oregon , campus of Oregon State University .
as   भाग  of the traveling Iraq Body  गिनती   प्रदर्शनी  from 2008  to  2009  (  not related to  इराकी  Body Count project ) , the  ध्वज  aim to `` raise awareness of the human cost  of  the  इराकी  War .  ''
( May 2008 )
Casualties of the conflict in  इराकी   चूंकि  2003 ( beginning with the  2003  invasion of Iraq , and continuing with  the  ensuing occupation of Iraq , as  खूब  as the activities of the  विभिन्न  armed  समूह  operating in the country ) have  आइये  in many  फ़ॉर्म  ,  और  the accuracy of the information  उपलब्धियाँ  on different types  of  Iraq War casualties varies greatly .
the  table below  summarizes  various estimates of the Iraqi casualty figures  .
लिये   सैनिकों  in the U.S.-led  बहुराष्ट्रीय   गठबन्धन  , the death toll is carefully  tracked   और  updated  रोज़  ,  और  the names  और  photographs of those killed in  कार्रवाई  as well as in accidents have  महरूम  published widely  .
a   कुल  of 4,486  u.S.  soldiers  यहूद  killed in Iraq between  2003  and 2012 .
Regarding the Iraqis , however , information on both  सैन्य  and  civilian   हताहत  is both less precise and  कम  consistent .
Estimates of casualty levels are available from reporters on the scene , from  officials  of involved organizations ,  और  from groups  कि  summarize information on  incidents   reported  in the  न्यूज  media .
The  शब्द  `` casualties `` in its most general sense includes  the  injured as well as the dead .
Accounts of the number of coalition wounded vary widely  ,  partly because  it   is  not  स्पष्ट  what should be counted : should  तभी  those injuries serious enough to put a soldier out of  आयोग  be included ?
Do illnesses or  चोटों  caused by accidents count  ,  or should the focus be restricted to wounds caused by hostile engagement ?
स्त्रोत  using different definitions may arrive at  बहुत   अलग  numbers ,  और  sometimes the precise definition is not clearly  निर्दिष्ट  .
Asalto al  coche  ( Robbery of  the   कोच   )  ,  by  Francisco de  गोया
A highwayman was  a   चोर  and  brigand  who  preyed  on travellers .
इस  type of  गैरकानूनी  usually travelled  और   robbed  by horse , as compared to a footpad who travelled and  robbed   on  foot .
Mounted robbers were widely considered to  be   socially   श्रेष्ठ   to  footpads .
Such  लुटेरों  operated in Great Britain  और  Ireland from the Elizabethan era until  the  early 19th century .
The  शब्द   highwayman  is first known to be  प्रयुक्त  in the year 1617 ; other euphemisms included ``  शूरवीरों  of the  सड़क  ''  और   ``   सज्जनों  of the road . ''
Two terms applied to 19th-century  उत्तर  American highwaymen were road agents in some instances  लिये  mountain  डाकुओं  while in  अन्य  cases the term  is  Rlallaala for mountain-based  ruffians  .
In the same  समय   काल  in  ऑस्ट्रेलिया  , they were known  as   bushrangers  .
Earvin `` Magic '' Johnson , Jr. ( born  अगस्त  14 , 1959  )  is  a   रिटायर्ड  American professional basketball player who played point  गार्ड  for  the  Los Angeles Lakers  of   the  National Basketball Association ( NBA ) .
बाद  winning championships in high  स्कूल  and college  ,  Johnson was selected  पहला  overall in the 1979 NBA Draft by the Lakers .
He won a championship and  an  NBA Finals Most Valuable Player Award in his rookie season  ,  and won four  अधिक  championships with the Lakers  दौरान  the 1980s .
Johnson retired abruptly in 1991 after announcing that he had  contracted   hiv  ,  लकिन  returned to play in the 1992  all-star  Game , winning the  all-star  MVP Award  .
After protests  इससे  his fellow players  ,  he retired again for four years , but returned in 1996 , at age  36  , to play 32 games for the Lakers before  retiring  for the third and final time .
जॉनसन  's career  उपलब्धियाँ   शामिल   तीन   एनबीए  MVP Awards , nine  एनबीए  Finals appearances , twelve All-Star games , and  टेन  All-NBA First and Second  टोली  nominations  .
he  led  the  league in regular-season assists four times  ,  and is the NBA  's  all-time leader in average assists per game ,  at   11.2  .
Johnson was a member of the `` Dream  टोली  `` ,  the  U.S. basketball team that  जीती  the Olympic gold medal in 1992 .
After leaving the  एनबीए  in 1992 , Johnson formed  the  Magic Johnson All-Stars  ,  a barnstorming team  कि  travelled around the  संसार  playing exhibition games .
Johnson was  सम्मानित  as  एक  of  the  50 Greatest Players  in  NBA History in  1996  ,  और  enshrined in the Basketball  हॉल  of Fame in  2002  .
he  was rated the greatest NBA point guard of all time  by  ESPN  in  2007  .
His friendship and rivalry with Boston Celtics  स्टार  Larry Bird , whom he faced  in  the 1979 NCAA finals and three NBA championship series , were well documented  .
चूंकि  his  रिटायरमेंट  , Johnson  रै  been  an  advocate for HIV/  एड्स  prevention  और   सुरक्षित  sex , as well as an  उद्योगों  ,  लोकसेवक  , broadcaster and motivational speaker .
Johnson was a part-owner of the Lakers  लिये  several years , and was part of  a  group that purchased the Los Angeles Dodgers in 2012 .
Allium cells in different phases of the cell cycle
The cells  of  eukaryotes ( left ) and prokaryotes ( right )
The cell is the basic  संरचनात्मक  , functional  और   biological  unit of all known living organisms .
It is the smallest unit  of  life  कि   is   वर्गीकृत   as  a  जीना  thing ( except virus , which consists only  इससे  DNA/RNA covered by protein and lipids ) , and is often called the building block of life .
it  consists of a protoplasm enclosed within a membrane  ,  which contains many biomolecules such  as  proteins and nucleic acids .
Organisms can be classified as  एककोशिकीय  ( consisting of a single cell ; including most bacteria  )  or multicellular ( including plants and animals ) .
While the number of cells in plants and animals varies from species to species ,  इंसानो  contain  परिचय  100 trillion ( 1014 )  कोशिकाएं  .
सबसे   संयंत्र  and  एनिमल   कोशिकाएं  are between 1 and 100 micrometres and  इसलिए   हैं  visible only under the microscope .
The cell was discovered by  रॉबर्ट  Hooke in  1665  .
the  cell theory , first developed in 1839 by Matthias Jakob Schleiden and Theodor Schwann , states that  सब  organisms are composed of one or more cells , that all cells come from preexisting  कोशिकाएं  , that vital functions of an  सजीव  occur  भीतर  cells , and that all cells contain the  खानदानी   सूचना  necessary for  regulating  cell functions and for transmitting  सूचना   to   the  next generation of cells .
Cells emerged on planet Earth  at  least 4.0–4.3  अरब   सालो  ago  .
The word cell comes  इससे  the Latin cella  ,   अर्थ  ``  छोटी  room '' .
The descriptive  पद   लिये  the  smallest  living biological structure was  coined  by  रॉबर्ट  Hooke in a book he published in 1665 when he  compared  the  कॉर्क  cells he saw through  उसके  microscope to the  छोटी  rooms monks lived in .
Grecian Formula is a men 's hair coloring product  in  the United  राज्य  .
कनाडा  and Europe previously banned  the   उत्पाद  because  of   इसके  use of lead acetate  .
A motor scooter 's front  साथ  an impractical number  और  variety of  headlamps  ,  added  for decorative purposes
A headlamp is a lamp attached to the front  of  a vehicle to light the road ahead .
Headlamp performance has steadily improved throughout the automobile  आयु  , spurred by the great disparity between daytime  और  nighttime traffic fatalities : the  u.S.  National  राजमार्ग  Traffic Safety Administration states that nearly half of all traffic-related fatalities occur in the dark , despite only 25  %  of traffic travelling during  अंधेरा  .
While it is common for  the  term headlight to be used interchangeably  in  informal discussion , headlamp is the term for the device itself ,  जबकि   हेडलाइट  properly refers to the beam  of  light  उत्पादित  and distributed by  the  device  .
अन्य  vehicles ,  ऐसे  as trains and aircraft  ,   हैं  required to have headlamps .
Bicycle headlamps are often used on bicycles , and are required in some jurisdictions .
They can be powered by a battery or a small electrical generator on the  व्हील   .
Additionally automotive  रात्रि  vision  प्रणालियों  work to supplement headlamps .
महिलाओं  's rights are the rights and entitlements claimed for women and girls of many societies worldwide  .
in  some places these rights are institutionalized or  समर्थित   by  law ,  लोकल  custom , and behaviour , whereas in  अन्य  they may be  उपेक्षित  or suppressed  .
They differ  इससे  broader notions of human rights through claims  of  an inherent historical and traditional bias  विरूद्ध   the  exercise of rights  by  women and girls  in   पक्ष  of  मेन  and boys .
Issues commonly associated with notions of women 's rights  शामिल  , though are not limited to  ,  the right  :  to bodily integrity and autonomy ; to vote ( suffrage ) ; to hold public  दफ्तर  ; to work ; to  मेला  wages or  बराबर  pay ;  to   अपना  property ; to education ; to serve in the military or be conscripted ; to enter into legal contracts ; and  to  have  वैवाहिक   ,  parental and religious rights .
Caryn Elaine Johnson , best  ज्ञात   as   whoopi  Goldberg ( , ( born November 13 , 1955 ) is an American comedienne , actress , singer-songwriter , political activist , author and talk  दिखाएँ  host .
Goldberg made her film debut  in  The Color Purple  (  1985  )  , playing  celie  , a mistreated black  स्त्री  in the Deep South .
She received a nomination  लिये  the Academy Award for Best Actress  और   जीती  her first Golden Globe Award for her role  in  the film .
In 1990  ,  she played Oda Mae Brown , a wacky psychic helping a  slain  man ( Patrick  swayze  ) save his  प्रेमी  ( Demi Moore ) in the blockbuster Ghost .
This performance won her a second Golden  ग्लोब  and  an   अकादमी  Award for  बेहतरीन   supporting  Actress ; this made  गोल्डबर्ग  only the second  ब्लैक  woman in the history of the  अकादमी  Awards to  जीत  an  एक्टिंग  Oscar—the  पहला  being  हैटी   mcdaniel   जो  won  लिये  Gone  साथ  the Wind in 1939 .
notable  later  films  include Sister Act and Sister Act 2 , The Player  ,  Made in  अमेरिका  ,  कैसा   स्टेला  Got Her  नाली  Back , Girl , Interrupted and Rat Race .
She is also acclaimed for her  भूमिकाएँ  as the bartender  guinan   in  Star  ट्रेक  : The Next Generation , as Terry Doolittle in Jumpin ' Jack Flash ,  और  as Carmen Tibideaux in  ग्ली  , as well as the voice of Shenzi the hyena in  the  Lion King .
Goldberg has been nominated for  13   एमी  Awards for her work in television .
She was co-producer of the popular  खेल  show Hollywood Squares from  1998  to  2004  .
She has been the moderator of the daytime talk show The View  चूंकि  2007 .
Goldberg has a Grammy , two Daytime Emmys  ,  two Golden  ग्लोब्स  , a Tony  (  for production , not acting ) , and an Oscar  .
In  जोड  ,  गोल्डबर्ग  has a  अंग्रेजों   अकादमी  Film Award  ,  four People 's Choice Awards , and  रै  been honored with a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame .
She  is  one of the  few  entertainers who have won an Emmy , Grammy , Oscar ,  और   टोनी  Award .
The National Hockey League ( NHL ; ) is an  ``  unincorporated  not-for-profit  association '' which operates a major professional ice hockey league of 30  franchised  member clubs , of which  सात  are currently located in Canada and  23  in  the  United States .
Headquartered in  नई  York City  ,  the NHL is  widely  considered  to  be the  प्रीमियर   पेशेवर   बर्फ   हॉकी  league in the  संसार  ,  और  one of the major professional  खेल   लीग  in  the  United  राज्य  and Canada .
the   स्टेनली   कप  , the oldest professional  खेल  trophy  in  North America ,  is  awarded  annually  to the league playoff champion at the end of each season .
The league was organized on  नवम्बर  26 , 1917 ,  in  Montreal , Quebec , Canada , after  the  suspension of  परिचालन  of  इसके  predecessor organization  ,   the  National Hockey Association ( NHA ) ,  जिससे  had been founded in 1909 .
It started  साथ   चार  teams and , through a series  of  expansions  ,  contractions , and relocations , the league is now composed of 30 active franchises .
The  स्वदेश  to which the  नाम   of  the  लीग  originally referred was Canada  ,   हालांकि  the  लीग   रै   अभी  been  binational  since 1924  जब   it   विस्तारित  into the United States  .
बाद   a  labour dispute that led to the cancellation  of   the  entire 2004–05 season , the  लीग  resumed play under a new collective bargaining agreement that included  a   सैलरी  cap  .
In 2009 , the NHL enjoyed  रिकार्ड  highs in terms of sponsorships , attendance , and television audiences  .
The NHL  draws   अनेक  highly skilled  खिलाड़ी  from all over the world and currently has players from about 20 different countries .
Although Canadians have historically constituted  the   बहुमत  of the  खिलाड़ी  in the NHL , over the past four plus decades the  percentages  of  us   और  European players have increased both  क्युकी  of the NHL  's  continued expansion from six to thirty clubs since 1967  ,   और  the increased  उपलब्धता  of highly skilled European players  .
Maggots feeding  on   carrion  .
A maggot is  the  larva of a fly  (  order  diptera  ) ; it is  लागू  in  particular  to the  लार्वे  of  brachyceran  flies ,  ऐसे   as   houseflies  , cheese flies , and blowflies , rather than larvae of  the  Nematocera , such as mosquitoes and Crane  उड़ता  .
``  maggot  '' is not a technical  पद  and should not be taken as such  ;  in many standard textbooks of entomology  it  does not appear in  the   अनुक्रमणिका  at  सब   .
in  many non-technical texts the term  is  used for  कीट  larvae in general .
Other sources have coined their own definitions ; for example : `` ...
The term applies to  a  grub when all trace of limbs  रै  disappeared ... '' and `` ... Applied to the footless larvae of  dipters  . ''
Maggot-like fly larvae are  of   चौड़ी  importance in  पारिस्थितिकी  and medicine ; among other roles , various species are prominent in recycling carrion and  कचरा  , attacking crops and foodstuffs ,  spreading  microbial infections  ,  and causing  myiasis  .
हेरोदेस  ( , Hordos  ,  Greek : , Hērōdēs ) , also known as Herod the Great ( 73/74 BCE – 4 BCE in  जेरिको  )  ,  was a Roman client  किंग   of   judea  .
His epithet of ``  the  Great  ''  is  widely  disputed as he  is  described as ``  a   madman   जो  murdered  उसके  own family and  a  great many rabbis `` .
He is also known for  उसके  colossal  भवन  projects in Jerusalem  और  elsewhere , including his expansion of the Second  टेम्पल  in Jerusalem ( sometimes  referred  to as  हेरोदेस   's  Temple ) and the  निर्माण  of the port at Caesarea Maritima .
महत्वपूर्ण  details of his biography are gleaned from the works of the 1st century  ce  Roman–Jewish  इतिहासकार   josephus  Flavius .
The Romans made Herod 's son , Herod Archelaus , ethnarch of Judea , Samaria , and Idumea (  biblical   edom  ) from 4 BCE to 6 CE , referred to  as  the tetrarchy of Judea .
archelaus  was judged incompetent by the  रोमन  emperor Augustus  जो  then combined Samaria , Judea  उचित  and Idumea into  iudaea  province under rule  of  a prefect until age  41  .
Herod 's other son Herod  antipas  was tetrarch of  galilee   इससे  4 BCE–39 CE .
ABO blood  समूह  antigens present  on  red blood cells and IgM antibodies present in the serum
The ABO blood group system is  the  most important blood type system ( or  रक्त  group system ) in  इंसान  blood  transfusion   .
The  संबद्ध  anti-A and anti-B antibodies  हैं   प्रायः   igm   antibodies   ,  which are  प्रायः  produced in the first years of life by  sensitization   to  environmental substances  ऐसे  as food , bacteria , and viruses .
abo  blood types  हैं  also present in some  अन्य   पशु  , for example apes such  as  chimpanzees , bonobos , and gorillas  .
Year 1907  (  MCMVII ) was a common year starting on  मंगलवार   (  link will display the full calendar ) of the  gregorian  calendar  और  a common  साल  starting  on   सोमवार   of  the 13-day-slower Julian calendar .
Northville  is  an  affluent   नगर  located in and divided by Oakland and Wayne counties in the  u.S.   राज्य  of Michigan .
the   क्षेत्रफल  is a suburb  of  Metropolitan Detroit .
the  population was 5,970 at the 2010  जनसांख्यिकी   .
सबसे  of the city is in  ओकलैंड  County , and  is  surrounded  by  the city  of   novi  .
The  वेन  County portion is surrounded by Northville  township  .
northville   is   परोसा  by Northville Public Schools  .
The city  is  located northeast of Ann  arbor   और  northwest  of  Detroit .
Elaine  stritch  ( born February 2  ,  1925 ) is an American  अभिनेत्री  and vocalist  .
She has appeared in  numerous  stage plays and musicals  ,  feature films ,  और  many television programs .

misfits  is a  अंग्रेजों   विज्ञान  fiction  comedy-drama  television show about a group of young offenders sentenced to work in a community service programme , where they obtain supernatural powers after a  अजीब  electrical storm .
The series opened in 2009  और  is currently ongoing  .
Antonia Thomas , Iwan Rheon  ,  Lauren Socha , Nathan Stewart-Jarrett , and Robert Sheehan are introduced as Alisha Daniels , Simon Bellamy , Kelly Bailey , Curtis Donovan ,  और  Nathan Young respectively .

Brett Lorenzo Favre ( born  अक्तूबर   10  , 1969 ) is a  पूर्व  American football quarterback who spent the majority of  उसके  career with the  ग्रीन  Bay Packers  of  the National Football League ( NFL ) .
He was a 20-year  दिग्गज  of the  एनएफएल   ,  having played quarterback for  the  Atlanta Falcons ( 1991 )  ,   ग्रीन  Bay  पैकर्स   (  1992  –   2007   )   ,  New York Jets ( 2008 ) and Minnesota Vikings (  2009  – 2010 )  .
Favre is the only  क्वार्टरबैक  in NFL history to  throw  for over 70,000 yards , over 500  touchdowns  , over 300 interceptions , over  6,000  completions , and  over  10,000 pass attempts .
Favre started at the  क्वार्टरबैक  position for the University of Southern Mississippi  लिये   चार  years before being selected in  the  second round of the 1991 NFL  ड्राफ्ट  by Atlanta ( 33rd overall ) .
he  was traded to Green Bay on  फ़रवरी  10 , 1992 , for the 19th pick in the 1992 NFL Draft .
Favre became the  पैकर्स  ' starting quarterback in the fourth game of the 1992  ऋतु  ,  stepping  in for injured quarterback Don Majkowski  ,  and started every game through the 2007 season .
He was traded to  the  New York Jets and started at  क्वार्टरबैक  for the 2008 season  पहले  signing  साथ  the Vikings on August 18 ,  2009  as their starting  क्वार्टरबैक  .
he  made an  एनएफएल  record 297 consecutive  starts  ( 321 including playoffs ) .
He  is  the only  खिलाड़ी  to win the AP Most Valuable  खिलाड़ी  three consecutive  टाइम्स  ( 1995–97 )  .
He has led teams to  आठ  division championships  (  1995 , 1996  ,   1997  , 2002 , 2003 ,  2004   ,  2007 , 2009 ) ,  पाँच  NFC Championship Games  (   1995  , 1996 , 1997  ,  2007 , 2009 ) , and  दो  Super  कटोरी  appearances  (  Super Bowl XXXI  ,  Super  कटोरी   xxxii  ) ,  जीतना  one ( Super  कटोरी  XXXI ) .
he  holds  अनेक  NFL records  ,  including most career touchdown passes , most career passing yards , most career pass completions , most career pass attempts , most  करियर   interceptions   thrown  ,  सबसे  consecutive starts by a player , most  लगातार  starts by  a  quarterback , most career victories as a starting quarterback , most  बर्खास्त  , and most fumbles .
He is also referred to by his nickname `` The Gunslinger '' .

the  World Wide Web ( abbreviated as  www  or W3  ,  commonly known as the web  )  , is a system of interlinked hypertext  दस्तावेज़  accessed via the Internet .
With a web browser ,  एक   can   दृश्य  web pages that may contain text  ,  images , videos , and other multimedia , and navigate between them via hyperlinks .
using  concepts from his earlier hypertext systems like  enquire  , British engineer , computer scientist  और  at that time employee of the CERN , Sir Tim  berners-lee  , now  निदेशक  of the World  चौड़ी  Web Consortium ( W3C ) , wrote  a   प्रस्ताव  in March 1989  लिये  what  होता  eventually become the World Wide Web .
At CERN ,  a  European research organisation  निकट   जेनेवा   straddling  the border between France and Switzerland , Berners-Lee and Belgian computer scientist Robert Cailliau proposed in 1990 to use hypertext  ``  to  कड़ी   और  access  सूचना  of  विभिन्न  kinds as a web of  नोड  in which the  उपयोक्ता  can browse at will '' , and they publicly introduced the project in December of the same year .
वेन   lyman  Morse ( October 20 , 1900July 22  ,  1974  )   थी  a politician and  attorney   इससे   ऑरेगॉन   ,  United  राज्य  , known for  उसके  proclivity  लिये  opposing his parties ' leadership ,  और  specifically for  उसके  opposition to  the  Vietnam War on constitutional grounds  .
Born in  मैडिसन  , Wisconsin , and educated at the University of Wisconsin-Madison and the University of  मिनेसोटा  Law School , Morse moved to Oregon in 1930 and  began  teaching at the University of Oregon School  of  Law  .
During World War II he was  निर्वाचित  to the United  राज्य  Senate as  a  Republican ; he became an  स्वतंत्र  after Dwight D. Eisenhower 's election to the presidency in 1952 .
While  an  independent  ,  he set a record  लिये   performing   the  second  longest   one-person  filibuster in the history of the Senate .
Morse joined the Democratic Party in 1955 , and was reelected twice  जबकि  a member of that  पार्टी  .
मोर्स   बना  a brief run for the  लोकतांत्रिक  Party  's  presidential nomination in  1960  .
A  few  years later , Morse was one of only two Senators who opposed the Gulf  of  Tonkin Resolution , which authorized the president to take military action in Vietnam without a declaration  of  war .
He continued to  बोलो  out against the war in  the  ensuing years , and  खोया  his 1968  बोली  for reelection to Bob Packwood , who criticized his strong opposition to the war .
Morse  बना   दो  more bids  लिये   reelection  to the Senate before his death in  1974  .
In parliamentary  कार्यविधि   ,  a  गति  to  तालिका  has  दो  different and  contradictory   अर्थs:
in   the  United States  ,   to  table usually means the  to  lay [ the  टॉपिक  ] on the table or to move  लिये  postponement of consideration ; a proposal to suspend consideration  of  a pending motion  .
Much less often , it means a motion to `` put on the table '' : a proposal to begin consideration ( or  reconsideration  ) ,  a  usage consistent with the rest of the English-speaking world  .
In the rest of the English-speaking world such as the United  किंगडम   ,  to table means to move to  प्लेस  [ the topic ]  upon   the   तालिका  ( or to move to place on  the  table ) :  a  proposal  to  begin consideration  (  or reconsideration  )  of a proposal .
Both the American and the  अंग्रेजों  dialects have the sense of `` to table '' as to  lay  [ the topic  ]  on the table or  to  cause [ the topic ]  to  lie  on  the table .
the  difference is the  विचार   of  what the table is for , that of a shelf off  to  the side , or  an   क्रियाशील  work  बेंच  .
the  British meaning  रै  the sense  of  the table as being an  क्रियाशील  work  बेंच  ,  साथ   the  topic being the center of attention , considered  और  discussed by all until it can be resolved , at which point it is taken  बंद  the  'table  ' .
The American sense  is  that the  तालिका   is  like that of a shelf , archive  ,   or  long-term storage device  ,  where the  टॉपिक   रै  been disposed of  by   sending  it to  the   'table  ' and leaving it there  .
Toy  स्टोरी  3  is  a 2010 American 3D  कंप्यूटर   एनिमेटेड   comedy-drama  prison film  ,  and  the   तीसरा  installment in the Toy Story series .
It was produced by Pixar Animation Studios and  वितरित  by Walt  डिज़्नी  Pictures .
निर्देशित  by Lee  unkrich  , the  फिल्मी  was released worldwide from June  through  October in Disney Digital 3-D , RealD , and IMAX 3D .
Toy Story 3  थी  also the first film  to  be released theatrically  साथ  Dolby Surround 7.1  ध्वनि  .
The screenplay was written by Michael Arndt ,  जबकि  Unkrich wrote  the  story along  साथ   जॉन   lasseter  and Andrew Stanton ,  क्रमशः  director and co-writer of the two first films .
The plot  focuses  on  the  toys Woody , Buzz Lightyear , and  उनके   मित्रों   dealing  with an uncertain  भविष्य  as their owner ,  एंडी  , prepares to leave for college .
Actors Tom Hanks  ,  Tim Allen , Joan  cusack  , Don  rickles  , Estelle Harris ,  जॉन  Ratzenberger  ,  Wallace Shawn  ,  Jeff Pidgeon , Jodi  बेंसन   ,  R. Lee  ermey  , John Morris , and  लॉरी  Metcalf reprised their voice-over  भूमिकाएँ  from the previous films .
Jim Varney ,  जो  played Slinky Dog  in  the first two films ,  और  Joe Ranft , who portrayed Lenny and Wheezy , both died before production began  on  Toy Story  3   .
The role of Slinky Dog was taken over  by  Blake  क्लार्क  ( a friend of  varney  )  ,  while Ranft 's characters and various others were  लिखा   आउट   of  the story .
New characters include  प्रदर्शन  by Ned Beatty , Timothy Dalton , Kristen  schaal  , Bonnie Hunt , Whoopi Goldberg , Jeff  garlin  ,  रिचर्ड  Kind  ,  and Michael Keaton .
The  विशेषता  broke  shrek  the Thirds record  as  the biggest opening day North American gross for an animated film unadjusted  लिये   महंगाई  , and  a  big opening  साथ  an unadjusted  सकल  of $ 110,307,189 .
It is also the highest-grossing opening weekend for  a  Pixar film , as  खूब   as  the highest-grossing  खोलने  weekend for a  फिल्मी   to  have opened in the  माह   of  June .
This  is  the highest-grossing film  of   2010  , both in the United States and Canada , and worldwide  .
In early August , it became  पिक्चर्स  's highest-grossing film  at  the North  अमरीकी  box office ( surpassing Finding Nemo ) , and the highest-grossing animated film of all time worldwide (  surpassing  Shrek 2 ) ; later that month , Toy Story  3  became the  पहला  ever animated film  in  history to  मेक  over  $  1 billion worldwide  .
It is currently the 10th-highest-grossing film of all time .
Toy Story 3 was nominated for  पाँच  Academy Awards  ,  including Best Picture , Best Adapted Screenplay , and  बेहतरीन  Sound Editing  .
It was  the  third  एनिमेटेड   फिल्मी   (   बाद  Beauty and the Beast  और  Up ) to be  मनोनीत  for Academy Award for Best Picture  .
It won the  पुरस्कार  for Best Animated Feature  और  Best Original Song .
जॉन   levell  Starks ( born August 10  ,  1965  )  is an American retired professional basketball shooting guard .
Starks was listed  at  6'5 '' and 190 pounds during his NBA  playing   करियर  .
Although he was not drafted in the 1988 NBA Draft after attending four  कॉलेजों  in  उसके  native Oklahoma ,  सहित  Oklahoma  राज्य  University , he gained fame while playing  लिये   the  New York Knicks  of  the National Basketball Association in  the  1990s .
Secure  डिजिटल  or ( SD )  is  a  non-volatile  memory card format for use in portable  डिवाइस   ,  such  as  mobile phones , digital cameras , GPS navigation devices ,  और  tablet computers .
the  Secure Digital standard is maintained by  the  SD Card Association ( SDA ) .
sd  technologies have been implemented in more  than  400  ब्रांड्स  across dozens of product categories  और  more than 8,000  मॉडल   .
the  Secure Digital  स्वरूप  includes four card families available in three  अलग   रूप  factors .
The four families are the original Standard-Capacity ( SDSC )  ,  the High-Capacity (  sdhc  ) , the eXtended-Capacity ( SDXC ) , and the SDIO  ,  which combines  input/output  functions with data storage .
the  three  रूप  factors  हैं  the original size , the `` mini '' size , and the `` micro '' size  (  see illustration ) .
वहीँ   हैं  many combinations of form factors  और  device families .
electrically  passive adapters allow the  उपयोग  of a smaller  कार्ड  in a  मेजबान  device built  to  hold a larger card .
मेजबान  devices that comply with newer versions of the specification provide  पिछड़ा  compatibility and accept older SD cards , but this article  explains   अनेक  factors that can  prevent  the use  of  a  नए  SD card:
A  नए  card may offer greater capacity than the host device can handle .
A newer card may use  a  file  प्रणाली  the host device can not navigate  .
Use of an SDIO card requires the host device be designed for  the  input/output functions  the  card provides  .
the  organization of the  कार्ड   थी  changed starting  साथ  the SDHC family  .
Some vendors produced SDSC  ताश  above 1  gb  before  the  SDA had standardized a method of doing so .
The  sda  uses several trademarked logos to enforce compliance with its specifications and  assure  users of  संगतता  .
Hugh John Mungo Grant  (  born 9 September 1960 ) is a  अंग्रेजों  actor and film producer .
He has received a  सुनहरी  Globe  ,  a BAFTA ,  और  an Honorary César .
His  films  have  अर्जित  more  than  US  $  2.4 billion  इससे   25   नाट्य  releases worldwide .
Grant achieved  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  stardom after appearing  in  Richard Curtis 's successful Four  विवाह  and a Funeral (  1994  ) .
He used  इस  breakthrough  भूमिका  as  a   बारंबार  cinematic  persona  during the 1990s , delivering comic performances in mainstream films like Mickey  ब्लू  Eyes ( 1999 ) and  नॉटिंग  Hill (  1999  ) .
by  the  फेरे  of  the   21st  century , he had established himself as a leading man skilled with a satirical comic talent .
Grant has expanded his oeuvre with critically acclaimed turns as a cad in Bridget Jones 's Diary ( 2001 ) , About A Boy (  2002  ) , Love  दरअसल  ( 2003 )  ,  and  अमरीकी   dreamz  ( 2006 ) .
he  later  निभाई  against type with multiple cameo roles in the epic drama film Cloud Atlas (  2012   )  .
Within  the  film  उद्योग   ,   ग्रान्ट  is  cited  as an anti-film star  जो  approaches  उसके  roles like a character actor , and attempts to make his  एक्टिंग  appear spontaneous .
hallmarks  of his comic skills  शामिल  a  nonchalant  touch of irony / sarcasm  और  studied physical mannerisms  as  well as his precisely-timed dialogue  डिलीवरी  and facial expressions .
The entertainment media 's coverage of Grant 's life off the big screen has often  निष्प्रभ  his work as a thespian .
He has  महरूम  vocal about his  अनादर  for  the   व्यवसायिक  of acting ,  और  in his disdain towards  the   संस्कृति  of celebrity and hostility towards the media .
in  a career spanning 30 years ,  ग्रान्ट  has repeatedly claimed that acting is not a true  कॉलिंग   लकिन   बस  a job he  गिरी  into .
The Han Dynasty (  ;   )  ( 206  bc  – 220 AD ) was an  इम्पीरियल  dynasty  of  China , preceded by the Qin Dynasty  (  221–207 BC  )  and succeeded by the Three Kingdoms ( 220–280 AD ) .
It was founded by the rebel leader Liu Bang  ,  known posthumously as Emperor Gaozu  of  Han .
It was briefly  बाधित  by the Xin  राजवंश  ( 9–23 AD  )  of the former regent  वांग  Mang  .
This interregnum  separates  the Han into two periods : the Western Han  (  206 BC  –   9  AD )  और  Eastern Han  (  25–220 AD ) .
Spanning over four centuries , the period of the Han  राजवंश  is considered  a   सुनहरी   आयु  in Chinese history .
To this day , China 's  बहुमत  ethnic group refers to itself as the  ``  Han people '' and the Chinese script  is  referred to as `` Han characters `` .
The Han  साम्राज्य   थी  divided  into  areas directly controlled by the central government ,  ज्ञात   as  commanderies  ,  and a number of semi-autonomous kingdoms .
These kingdoms gradually lost all  vestiges  of their independence  ,  particularly following the  विद्रोह  of the Seven  राज्य  .
the  Xiongnu ,  a   nomadic  confederation  जिससे   वर्चस्व   the   पूर्वी  Eurasian Steppe , defeated the Han  फौज  in  बैटल  in 200 BC  .
following  the defeat ,  a  political marriage alliance was negotiated in which the  हान  became the de facto inferior partner .
When  ,  despite  the  treaty , the  xiongnu  continued  to   रेड   हान  borders  ,  Emperor  wu  of Han ( r.  141–87  BC  )   शुभारम्भ  several military campaigns against them .
the  ultimate  हान  victory in these  युद्धों  eventually forced the Xiongnu to  accept  vassal  औकात  as Han  tributaries   .
These  अभियान  expanded Han sovereignty into the Tarim Basin of Central Asia and helped establish the vast trade network known as the Silk Road , which reached as far as  the   भूमध्यसागरीय  world  .
Han forces managed  to  divide the Xiongnu  into  two competing  राष्ट्र  ,  the   दक्षिणी  and Northern Xiongnu , and forced  the  Northern  xiongnu   आरपार  the  इली  River .
Despite  ये  victories , the territories north of Han 's  सीमायें  were quickly  overrun  by the nomadic Xianbei Confederation .
After 92  ad  , the palace eunuchs  increasingly  involved  themselves  in court politics  ,   engaging  in violent power struggles between the various  consort  clans of the empresses  और  empress dowagers , causing the Han 's ultimate downfall .
Imperial authority was also seriously  challenged  by large Daoist  धार्मिक   समाजों  which  instigated  the Yellow Turban Rebellion and the Five Pecks of Rice Rebellion .
Following the  मौत  of Emperor Ling ( r. 168–189 AD ) , the palace eunuchs suffered wholesale massacre  by  military officers  ,  allowing members of  the  aristocracy  और  military governors to  become  warlords and divide the empire .
When Cao Pi  ,   किंग  of  वेई  , usurped the throne from  सम्राट  Xian , the Han Dynasty ceased to exist .
The Han Dynasty was an age of economic prosperity and saw a significant growth  of  the money economy  पहला   स्थापित  during the  झोऊ   राजवंश   (  c. 1050–256 BC ) .
The coinage issued by the central government mint in 119 BC  remained  the standard  coinage  of China until the Tang Dynasty ( 618–907 AD ) .
To pay for its military campaigns and the settlement of newly conquered frontier territories ,  the  government nationalized the private  नमक  and iron  उद्योग  in 117  bc  .
These government monopolies were repealed during the Eastern Han period , and the lost  आय  was recouped through  heavily   taxing   निजी  entrepreneurs .
The emperor was at the  शिखर  of Han society  .
He  presided  over the Han government but shared power with  दोनो   the   धामों  and appointed  मंत्रियों  who came largely from the scholarly gentry  क्लास  .
From the reign  of  Emperor Wu onward  ,   the  Chinese court  officially  sponsored Confucianism in education and court politics , synthesized with  the   cosmology  of later scholars such as Dong  zhongshu  .
This  नीति   endured  until the fall of the Qing Dynasty  in  1911  ad  .
Science and technology during the Han period saw significant advances , including papermaking , the nautical steering rudder ,  the  use of negative numbers in mathematics ,  the  raised-relief map  ,  the hydraulic -powered armillary sphere for astronomy , and a seismometer employing  an  inverted pendulum .
Tourette syndrome ( also called Tourette  's   सिंड्रोम  , Tourette 's disorder  ,  Gilles de la  tourette   सिंड्रोम  , GTS or , more  commonly  , simply Tourette 's or TS  )  is  an   inherited  neuropsychiatric  विकार  with onset in childhood ,  characterized   by  multiple physical  (  motor ) tics and at least one vocal  (  phonic ) tic .
These tics characteristically wax and wane , can be suppressed temporarily  ,  and are preceded by  a   premonitory  urge .
Tourette  's  is defined as part of  a  spectrum  of  tic disorders , which includes transient and chronic tics .
Tourette  's   थी  once  माना  a rare and bizarre syndrome , most often associated with the exclamation of  obscene  words or socially inappropriate and  अपमानजनक   remarks  ( coprolalia  )  , but this  लक्षण  is  उपस्थित  in only a small minority of people  साथ  Tourette 's .
Tourette 's is  no  longer  माना  a rare condition , but  it  is not always correctly identified because  सबसे  cases are mild and  the  severity  of  tics decreases for most children as they pass through adolescence .
Between 0.4  %  and 3.8 % of children  आयु  5 to 18 may have  tourette   's   ;  the prevalence of transient and  दीर्घकालिक   tics  in school-age children is  उच्चतर  , with  the  more common tics of eye blinking , coughing , throat  clearing   ,  sniffing , and  फेशियल  movements  .
Extreme  tourette  's in adulthood  is  a rarity , and Tourette 's does not adversely affect intelligence or life  प्रत्याशा  .
Genetic and  पर्यावरणीय  factors play a role in the etiology  of  Tourette 's , but the exact causes  हैं   अनजान  .
In most cases , medication is unnecessary  .
There is no effective treatment for every  मामला  of tics , but certain medications and therapies  can  help when  उनके   उपयोग   is  warranted  .
Education is  an  important part of any  उपचार  plan , and explanation and reassurance alone are  प्रायः   sufficient  treatment .
Comorbid conditions ( co-occurring  diagnoses  other than Tourette 's  )  such as  attention-deficit  hyperactivity disorder ( ADHD ) and obsessive–compulsive disorder ( OCD ) are present  in   अनेक  patients seen in tertiary specialty clinics  .
These other conditions often cause more functional  पुतलियों   to   the  individual than the tics that are the hallmark  of  Tourette  's   ,  hence it is  महत्वपूर्ण  to correctly identify comorbid conditions and treat them .
The eponym was bestowed by Jean-Martin Charcot ( 1825–1893 ) on behalf  of  his resident , Georges Albert Édouard Brutus Gilles de la  tourette  ( 1859–1904 ) ,  a   फ्रेंच  physician  और   neurologist  , who  प्रकाशित  an  खाता  of  नौ   मरीजों  with Tourette 's in 1885 .
Sunbeam badge .
Sunbeam was a marque registered by John  marston   co.   ltd   of  Wolverhampton , England ,  in  1888 .
the  company  पहला  made bicycles , then motorcycles and  गाड़ियाँ   इससे   the  late 19th century until about 1936 , and  लागू  the marque  to   सब  three forms of transportation .
The company  भी  manufactured aero engines in the First  संसार  War and 647 aircraft during the Second World War .
A Sunbeam  थी   the   पहला  British car to win  a  Grand  प्रिक्स  race  ,  and set a number of land  गति  records .
The  कम्पनी  went into receivership in 1935 and was purchased by the Rootes Group  ,  which continued  to  use the Sunbeam  marque   .
Fox News Channel (  fnc   )   ,  also known as Fox  न्यूज  , is a cable  न्यूज  channel owned by the  फॉक्स  Entertainment Group ,  a   subsidiary  of News Corporation .
As of April 2009 , the channel was  उपलब्धियाँ  to 102 million households  in   the  United States and to viewers  internationally  , broadcasting  primarily  from its  नई  York studios .
The channel was created  by   australian-american  media mogul Rupert Murdoch ,  जो  hired former NBC executive Roger Ailes as its founding CEO .
It launched on October 7 , 1996 to 17 million cable subscribers .
it  grew during the late 1990s  और  2000s to become the dominant cable news network in the United States  .
Critics have stated that  फॉक्स  News Channel  promotes  conservative political positions  और  biased reporting  .
Commentators , news anchors , and reporters at Fox News Channel have responded that news reporting and political commentary operate  independently  of each other , and have denied any bias  in  news reporting .
The mandibular  पहला  molar  or  six-year molar is the tooth located distally ( away from the  midline  of  the  face ) from both  the  mandibular second premolars of  the   मुँह  but mesial ( toward the midline of the face )  इससे  both mandibular second molars .
It  is  located on the mandibular ( lower  )  arch of  the  mouth , and generally opposes the maxillary ( upper  )  first molars and the maxillary 2nd premolar in normal  क्लास  I occlusion  .
The function of this molar is  समान  to  कि  of all molars in regard to  पीस  being the principal action during mastication , commonly known  as  chewing .
वहीँ  are usually five well-developed cusps  on  mandibular  पहला  molars :  दो  on the buccal ( side nearest the cheek ) ,  दो  lingual ( side nearest the  जीभ  ) , and one distal .
वहीँ  are great differences between the deciduous ( baby ) mandibular molars and  those  of  the  permanent  mandibular  molars ,  भी   हालांकि  their function are similar  .
The permanent mandibular molars are not considered  to  have any teeth  कि  precede it  .
Despite being named molars , the deciduous molars are followed by permanent premolars .
in  the  सार्वभौमिक  system  of   संकेतन   ,   the  deciduous mandibular first molars are designated by a  अक्षर  written in uppercase  .
The right deciduous mandibular  पहला   molar   is  known as ``  s  '' ,  और  the  बाएँ  one is  ज्ञात  as  ``  L '' .
the  international  संकेतन  has a different system of notation .
Thus  ,  the  सही  deciduous mandibular first molar is  ज्ञात  as `` 84  ''   ,  and the left one is known as `` 74 '' .
In the universal system  of  notation  ,  the permanent mandibular first molars are  designated  by a  क्रमांक  .
The right permanent mandibular first  molar  is known  as  ``  30  '' , and the left  एक  is  ज्ञात  as  ``  19 '' .
The  पामर  notation  उपयोग  a number in conjunction with a symbol designating in which quadrant  the  tooth is  मिला  .
For this  दाँत  , the left and right first molars would have the  वही  number  ,  `` 6 '' , but the right one would have the symbol  ,   ``  ┐ '' , over it ,  जबकि  the left one would have , `` ┌ '' .
The  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  notation has a different numbering system than  the  previous two  ,  and the  सही  permanent mandibular first molar is known as ``  46  '' , and  the  left one  is  known as `` 36 '' .
Mandibular  प्राथमिक  first molars usually have four pulp horns .
the  first molar is usually the first permanent  दाँत  to erupt and  रै  adult undertones .
anatomy  : The  mandibular  first  molar  has five cusps :  the  mesiobuccal  (  MB , toward  midline  and cheek ) , mesiolingual  (   ml  ,  toward  midline and  जीभ  )  ,  distolingual ( DL , away  इससे   midline   और  towards tongue ) ,  distobuccal  ( DB , away from midline  और  toward  गाल  ) , and distal  (  D , away  इससे  midline  )  , listed in order  of  decreasing size .
सूचीबद्ध  in order of decreasing height they are :  ml  ,  dl  ,  df  ,  mf  , and D. An eighth cusp was found in a primary second lower molar in an Argentinean child  .
viewed  from the top of the tooth ( occlusal  दृश्य   )  , the  mandibular  first molar is  pentagonal  ( five sided ) in shape and tapers toward the lingual , with the sides being the buccal  सतह  , the mesial surface , the lingual surface , distal surface , and the  distobuccal  surface .
The occlusal surface  रै  four grooves .
The central groove is not straight but runs  bas  the center of the tooth mesially to  distally  and contains four pits  (   mesial  ,  सेंट्रल  ,  सेंट्रल  , and distal  )   .
The distobuccal  नाली  runs from the distal pit in the central groove  distobuccally   separating   the   distal   और  distobuccal cusps .
the  lingual groove runs  इससे   the  more distal of the central pits  in  the central groove toward the lingual surface between the mesiolingual and  distolingual   पुलिन  .
The buccal  नाली  runs from the more mesial of the central pits in the central  नाली  toward the buccal surface  between  the  mesiobuccal  and distobuccal cusps  समाप्ति  in the buccal pit  .
The portion of the central groove between the central pits is termed the Lewis offset and is mandatory  to   खाता  for the locations of the buccal and lingual grooves (  buccal  groove  होने  more mesial than  the  lingual groove while they are parallel ) .
From the buccal  (  buccal view  )  , two roots are present .
The  distal  root is  generally   straighter   ,  although  दोनो  often have a slight distal curvature  .
The  हाइट्स   of  contour on  the  mesial and distal contact the adjacent teeth  और  are located at the junction  of   the  occlusal and  मध्य  thirds  of  the crown .
The  फ्लोरिडा   विधानमंडल  is  the   दो  houses that  अधिनियम  as the state  विधानमंडल  of the U.S. state of Florida .
The Florida  संविधान  states that ``  the  legislative power of the state shall be vested in a legislature of the  राज्य  of Florida , ''  रचित   of  a Senate and House of Representatives .
the  legislature  is  seated at the Florida State Capitol in Tallahassee  .
Stained glass  चित्रण  of Daniel interceding with Arioch  ,   the  king 's guard  .
Arioch had been  चार्ज  with killing all the wise men after they were not able to interpret Nebuchadnezzar 's dream .
Daniel  2  is the  दूसरी  chapter of the  किताब  of  डेनियल  in  the  Hebrew Bible .
The  अध्याय  's source  टेक्स्ट   is  predominantly written  in  Aramaic .
According to the text ,  nebuchadnezzar  is  the  king of Babylon who is troubled  by  his dreams  .
He  मांगे  an interpretation  लिये  his dreams or will have his mystic  interpreters  executed .
Daniel seeks Divine Wisdom  to   interpret  the king 's dreams and praises God with a  छोटी  psalm .
God gives Daniel  a  vision in the night to reveal the king 's dream .
Able to satisfy the  किंग  , Daniel is promoted  over  the whole province of Babylon .
One Comcast Center , the headquarters of  comcast   in   फिलाडेल्फिया  , PA .
The old  comcast  logo from  1969  to 1999 ,  जब   it  was  replaced  with the crescent logo .
The Comcast Corporation is an American  प्रदाता  of  entertainment  , information and communications  उत्पाद  and services .
It is the  largest   केबल  operator , one of the  biggest  mass  मीडिया  , home Internet service  प्रदाता  ,  और  third  largest  home telephone service provider in the United  राज्य   ,  providing  केबल   टेलीविज़न  ,  ब्रॉडबैंड  Internet ,  टेलीफोन  service and in  कुछ  areas home  सुरक्षा  (  सहित  burglar alarms , surveillance cameras , fire alarm systems and  घर   स्वचालन   )  to both residential  और  commercial customers in 40 states and the District of  कोलंबिया  .
The company is headquartered in Philadelphia , Pennsylvania .
In  2011   ,  Comcast acquired a 51 % majority stake in media conglomerate  nbcuniversal  from  ge  in January 2011 , and began  the  process of purchasing the remaining  49  % on  फ़रवरी   12  , 2013 , at a cost of $ 16.7  अरब   .
It completed the purchase on March 19 , 2013 .
Comcast also  रै  significant holding  in   अनेक   केबल  networks ( including E !
entertainment  Television ,  स्टाइल  Network , G4  ,  the Golf  चैनल  and  एनबीसी  Sports Network )  ,  distribution  (  ThePlatform ) ,  और  related businesses .
comcast  has been the subject of criticism for activities including  इसके  stance on  जाल  neutrality  ,  as well as  ग़रीब  results on  ग्राहक  satisfaction surveys .
Porcupines are rodents with a coat of  शार्प  spines , or quills  ,  that defend and camouflage them  इससे   परभक्षी  .
They are indigenous to the Americas , southern Asia ,  और  Africa  .
Porcupines are the third largest of the rodents , behind the capybara  और  the beaver .
Most  porcupines  are about long , with an long tail .
weighing  ,  वे   हैं  rounded , large  और  slow  .
Porcupines  आइये  in  विभिन्न   शेड्स   of  brown , gray , and  the   असामान्य   श्वेत  .
Porcupines ' spiny protection resembles that of the unrelated erinaceomorph hedgehogs and monotreme echidnas  .
The common porcupine is a  herbivore  .
It eats leaves , herbs ,  टहनियों  and green plants like skunk cabbage and clover and  in  the winter it may eat bark .
The  उत्तर  American  साही  often climbs  पेड़  to find  खाना  .
the  African  साही  is  नहीं  a climber  और   forages  on the ground .
It is mostly nocturnal , but will sometimes forage for food in the day .
Porcupines have become a pest in Kenya and  हैं  eaten  as  a delicacy .
the  name porcupine comes from Middle French porc espin ( spined pig ) .
A regional American name  लिये  the animal is quill pig .
