इलियास  J. McCoy (  may  2 , 1844 – October 10 ,  1929  ) was a black Canadian-American inventor and engineer , who was notable  लिये  his 57  u.S.  patents ,  सबसे  to do with lubrication  of  steam engines  .
born   फ़्री  in Canada  ,  he returned as a five-year-old child with his family to the United  राज्य  in 1847 , where he lived for the rest of his life and became a US citizen .
Honda FCX  स्पष्टता   ,  a  हाइड्रोजन  fuel cell demonstration vehicle introduced in 2008
a  hydrogen vehicle is a vehicle that uses hydrogen as  इसके  onboard fuel for motive power .
Hydrogen vehicles include hydrogen fueled space rockets  ,  as  खूब  as automobiles  और  other  परिवहन  vehicles  .
The  शक्ति  plants of such vehicles convert  the  chemical  उर्जा  of hydrogen to mechanical energy  either  by burning hydrogen in an internal combustion engine , or by reacting  हाइड्रोजन  with  ऑक्सीजन   in  a fuel  कोशिका  to run electric  मोटर्स   .
Widespread use of hydrogen for fueling transportation is  a  key  तत्व  of a  प्रस्तावित   हाइड्रोजन  economy .
Hydrogen fuel does  नहीं   occur  naturally on Earth and thus is not an energy source ; rather it is an energy  वाहक  .
It is most  अक्सर   बना  from methane or other  चट्टान  fuels , but  it   can   be   उत्पादित  using  स्त्रोत  ( such as wind , solar , or  नाभिकीय  )  कि  are intermittent , too diffuse or too  cumbersome  to directly propel vehicles .
एकीकृत  wind-to-hydrogen plants  ,  using electrolysis  of  water , are exploring  technologies  to  उद्धार  costs  कम  enough  ,  and quantities great enough , to compete  साथ  traditional energy sources .
Many companies are working to develop technologies  कि  might efficiently exploit the  संभावित   of   हाइड्रोजन   उर्जा  for mobile uses .
The  आकर्षण  of using hydrogen as an energy currency is that , if  हाइड्रोजन  is  prepared  without using fossil fuel inputs , vehicle propulsion would not contribute to  कार्बन  dioxide emissions .
The  कमियां  of hydrogen  उपयोग   हैं  high capital  लागत  , low energy content per  ईकाई  volume , high tankage weights ,  बहुत  high storage vessel pressures , the  भंडार  , transportation and filling of gaseous  or  liquid hydrogen in vehicles ,  the  large investment in infrastructure  कि   होता  be  जरूरी   to  fuel vehicles , and the  inefficiency  of production processes .
Sacramento is the  पूंजी  city of the  u.S.   राज्य   of  California and the seat of  सरकारी  of Sacramento County .
It is located at the confluence of the  sacramento  River and the American River in the northern portion of California  's   expansive   सेंट्रल  Valley .
With an estimated 2011 population  of  477,891  ,  it is the sixth-largest city in California and  the  35th largest  नगर  in the United States  .
Sacramento is the core  सांस्कृतिक  and economic center of  the  Sacramento metropolitan area which includes seven counties with an estimated 2009 population of 2,527,123 .
Its metropolitan area  is   the  fourth largest in California after  the   वृहद  Los  एंजिल्स   क्षेत्रफल   ,  San Francisco Bay Area , and the San Diego metropolitan  क्षेत्रफल   ,  as  खूब  as  the  25th largest  in  the United States .
sacramento  was cited  by  Time  पत्रिका  as America 's most  ethnically  and racially integrated city in  2002  .
Sacramento became a city through  the  efforts  of  the Swiss immigrant  जॉन  Sutter , Sr.  ,  his son John  sutter  , Jr.  ,  and James W.  मार्शल  .
Sacramento  grew  quickly thanks to the protection of Sutter  's  Fort , which  थी  established by Sutter in 1839 .
दौरान  the California Gold  फटाफट  , Sacramento was a major distribution point , a  वाणिज्यिक  and agricultural center , and a  टर्मिनस  for wagon trains , stagecoaches  ,  riverboats ,  the   टेलीग्राफ   ,  the  टट्टू  Express , and the First  transcontinental  Railroad .
कैलिफ़ोर्निया  State University  ,  Sacramento , more commonly  ज्ञात  as Sacramento State or Sac  राज्य  , is the largest local  विश्वविद्यालयों  .
It is one  of  the twenty-three campuses of the California State  विश्वविद्यालयों  system .
Drexel University Sacramento  is  located  in   शहर  , Sacramento .
University of the Pacific 's McGeorge School of  विधि  is located in  the   ओक   पार्क  neighborhood .
In  जोड  , the University of California , Davis is located  in  nearby Davis , west of the capital .
The UC Davis Medical Center , a world-renowned  शोध  hospital , is located  in   the  city  of  Sacramento .
The  ठहराना  Store is a chain of retail stores  स्वामित्व   और  operated by Apple  inc.  , dealing in computers and consumer  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स  .
The stores sell  मैकिंटोश  personal  कंप्यूटर  , software ,  ipods  , iPads , iPhones ,  third-party   accessories  , and other  उपभोक्ता  electronics such as Apple TV .
Some high profile stores feature a Theatre for presentations and  वर्कशॉप  and a Studio for  प्रशिक्षण  with Apple  उत्पाद  ;  सब  stores offer a Genius Bar for technical  support  and repairs  ,  as  खूब  as free  वर्कशॉप  available  to  the public .
Under the leadership of Ron  जॉनसन  , the former Senior Vice President  of  Retail Operations , the Apple  स्टोर्स   have  , according to  an  article in the New York Times  ,   महरूम  responsible for `` [ turning ] the boring computer sales  मंजिल  into a  sleek  playroom filled  साथ   गैजेट  ''  .
,  ठहराना  has 405 stores worldwide  ,   साथ  global sales of  अरब  in merchandise in 2011  ,  and they lead the United States retail market in  शर्तें  of sales per  ईकाई  area .
Steven Paul `` Steve '' Jobs ( ; February 24 , 1955 – October 5 , 2011 ) was an American entrepreneur and inventor , best  ज्ञात  as  the  co-founder , chairman , and CEO of Apple Inc .
Through Apple , he was widely recognized as a charismatic pioneer of the personal computer revolution  और  for his influential career  in  the computer and consumer  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स  fields  ,  transforming ``  एक  industry  बाद  another , from computers and smartphones to music and movies ... ''
Jobs  भी  co-founded and served as  मुख्य   कार्यपालिका  of Pixar Animation Studios ; he became  a  member of the  फलक  of directors of  the  Walt Disney Company in 2006 , when  डिज़्नी  acquired  पिक्चर्स  .
Jobs was among the  पहला  to see the commercial potential  of  Xerox PARC 's mouse -driven  आलेखीय  user interface , which led to the  सृष्टि  of  the  Apple Lisa and , one  साल  later ,  the  Macintosh .
He also played a role in introducing the  laserwriter  , one  of   the  first widely available laser printers , to the market .
After a power struggle  साथ  the board of directors in 1985 , Jobs left Apple  और  founded NeXT , a computer  मंच   विकास  company  specializing  in the higher-education and business  बाज़ार  .
In 1986 , he acquired the  कंप्यूटर  graphics division of Lucasfilm , which was spun off as  पिक्चर्स  .
He was  credited   in  Toy Story ( 1995  )   as  an executive producer  .
He served as CEO and majority shareholder until Disney 's purchase of Pixar in  2006  .
In 1996 ,  बाद   ठहराना  had failed to deliver its operating  प्रणाली  , Copland , Gil  amelio  turned  to  NeXT Computer , and the NeXTSTEP  मंच  became the foundation for the Mac  os   x  .
Jobs  लौटे  to Apple as  an  advisor  ,  and took control of the company as an  अंतरिम  CEO .
Jobs brought Apple from  निकट  bankruptcy to profitability by 1998  .
as  the  नई  CEO of the company , Jobs oversaw the development of the  imac  , iTunes , iPod , iPhone , and iPad , and  on   the  services side , the company 's Apple Retail Stores  ,  iTunes Store and the App Store .
The success of these products and services provided several years of stable financial returns , and  propelled   ठहराना   to  become the world 's most valuable publicly  traded  company in 2011  .
the  reinvigoration of the company is regarded by many commentators as one of the greatest turnarounds in business  इतिहास   .
in  2003 ,  कार्य  was diagnosed with a pancreas neuroendocrine  ट्यूमर  .
Though it was initially treated , he reported a hormone imbalance , underwent a liver transplant in 2009  ,  and  appeared  progressively thinner  as  his health declined .
On medical leave  लिये  most of  2011  , Jobs resigned in August that year ,  और  was elected Chairman of the Board .
he   died   of  respiratory arrest related to his  metastatic  tumor on October 5 ,  2011  .
कार्य  received  a   क्रमांक  of honors and public recognition for  उसके  influence  in  the technology and  म्यूज़िक  industries .
He  रै   महरूम  referred to as `` legendary '' , a ``  futurist  '' or simply `` visionary ''  ,   और  has been  वर्णित   as  the `` Father  of  the  डिजिटल  Revolution '' , a  ``  master of innovation '' , and  a  ``  डिज़ाइन  perfectionist '' .

Roman numerals  ,  the numeric system in ancient  रोम   ,  uses combinations of letters from  the   लैटिन  alphabet to signify values  .
The numbers 1 to 10 can be  expressed  in  रोमन  numerals as  follows:
and  .
the   रोमन  numeral system is a cousin of  etruscan  numerals  .
Use of Roman numerals continued after the decline of the Roman Empire .
From the  14th  century  on  , Roman  numerals  began to be replaced  in   सबसे  contexts by  अधिक   सुविधाजनक  Hindu-Arabic numerals  ;  however this process was gradual , and the use of Roman numerals in  कुछ  minor applications continues  to  this day .
Effective  नाभिकीय  Charge Diagram
the   प्रभावी  nuclear charge ( often symbolize  as   or  Z* )  is   the  net positive charge experienced by an electron in a multi-electron atom .
The term `` effective '' is used because the shielding effect of negatively charged electrons prevents  उच्चतर  orbital electrons from experiencing the  पूरा  nuclear charge by the repelling effect of inner-layer electrons .
The effective nuclear  चार्ज   अनुभवी  by the outer  शेल  electron is also  पुकारा  the core charge .
it  is possible to determine the strength of the nuclear charge by looking at  the  oxidation number of the  अणु  .

The Dwight D.  आइज़नहावर  National System of Interstate and Defense Highways ( commonly known as the Interstate  राजमार्ग  System ,  अंतरराज्यीय  Freeway System , Interstate System  ,  or simply  the  Interstate ) is a network of freeways  कि  forms  a   भाग  of the National  राजमार्ग  System of the  संयुक्त  States .
the  system is  नामित   लिये  President Dwight D.  आइज़नहावर  ,  जो   championed   इसके  formation .
Construction was authorized by  the  Federal Aid Highway Act  of  1956 , and the original portion  थी  completed 35 years later .
The  संजाल  has since been extended , and  ,  it  था  a total length  of  , making it the world 's second longest after China 's . , about one-quarter of all vehicle miles driven  in  the country use the Interstate system .
The cost  of  construction has  महरूम  estimated at  $  425 billion (  in  2006 dollars ) , making it the `` largest public  works  program since  the  Pyramids `` .
The system has contributed  in  shaping the  संयुक्त  States into  a   संसार   आर्थिक  superpower and a  अत्यधिक   industrialized   स्वदेश  .
.eu  is  the country  कोड  top-level domain (  cctld  ) for the European  संघ   (  EU ) .
Launched on 7 December 2005  ,  the domain  is  available for organisations in and  निवासियों   of  EU  सदस्य  states .
The TLD  is  administered  by  EURid , a consortium originally consisting of the  नेशनल  ccTLD registry operators of Belgium  ,   स्वीडन  , and Italy , joined later by the national registry operator of the  चेक  Republic .
Trademark owners were able to submit registrations  through  a sunrise period  ,  in  an  effort to prevent  cybersquatting  .
Full  पंजीकरण  started on 7 April 2006 .
Meister means master in German ( as in master craftsman ,  or  as  an  honorific title such as Meister  eckhart  ) .
The word is akin to maestro .
In  खेल  , Meister is used  लिये  the current national , European or world champion ( Deutscher Meister ,  *europameister  , Weltmeister ) .
Many modern day German police  शक्तियां   उपयोग  the  शीर्षक  Meister .
During the Second  संसार  War  ,   meister  was  the  highest  आयोजिक  rank of the Ordnungspolizei  .
meister   रै  been borrowed into  अंग्रेज़ी  slang  ,  where it is used in compound nouns  .
a   व्यक्ति  referred to  as  “Meister” is one who has extensive theoretical knowledge and practical skills in his profession , business , or some other  दयालु  of work or activity  .
For example ,  a   “puzzle-meister”  would be someone highly  skilled  at solving puzzles  .
These neologisms sometimes have a sarcastic intent ( for example ,  “stubble-meister”  for someone with a short , neat  दाढ़ी   or  “crier-meister”  लिये  someone who  प्रायः  cries ) .
Mighty Morphin Power Rangers is an American  live-action  children 's television series about  teenagers  with super-powers ,  आधारित  on the 16th installment of the Japanese Super Sentai franchise  ,  Kyōryū Sentai Zyuranger .
Both the  दिखाएँ   और  its related merchandise saw  unbridled  overnight success , becoming a staple of 1990s  पॉप  culture in  mere  months .
Under the original name ,  ``  Mighty Morphin Power Rangers ''  the  series ran  इससे  1993 to 1995 and  शाखित  the feature film Mighty  morphin  Power  रेंजरों  : The Movie  .
The second and third seasons of the show drew on footage and elements from  the  Super Sentai series Gosei Sentai Dairanger and Ninja Sentai Kakuranger respectively , though the Zyuranger costumes were  स्टिल   प्रयुक्त  for the five main  रेंजरों  and several regular villains .
तभी  the mecha and  the  Kiba  रेंजर  costume ( worn  by   the  White Ranger ) were  retained   इससे  Dairanger  लिये  the second season  ,  while only the mecha  इससे  Kakuranger were  प्रदर्शित   in  the third  ऋतु  .
However the Kakuranger costumes were later used for  the  title characters of the  mini-series  , Mighty Morphin  एलियन   रेंजरों  .
The series  थी  produced by  mmpr  Productions , distributed  by  Saban Entertainment , and aired  on  Fox Kids  .
The show 's  merchandise  was  उत्पादित  and  वितरित  by Bandai  entertainment  .
In 1996 , the series was rebranded as  the  Power  रेंजरों   मताधिकार   ;  renaming the series every year after , and using costumes  ,  props , and footage from subsequent Super Sentai series , as well as changing the cast and storyline .
While an overarching storyline would continue until  शक्ति  Rangers Lost Galaxy , subsequent series  बाद   mmpr  are not sequels or spin-offs in the  परंपरागत  sense  .
In 2010  ,  a re-version of Mighty  morphin  Power Rangers  ,  with a new  लोगो  , comic book-referenced graphics ,  और   अतिरिक्त  alternative special  प्रभाव  , was broadcast  on   एबीसी  Kids ,  और  Bandai  उत्पादित  brand new toys to  coincide  with the series .
Edgar Allan Poe ( born Edgar  पो  ; January 19 , 1809 –  अक्तूबर  7 ,  1849  ) was an American author  ,   कवि  , editor and  साहित्यिक   आलोचक  , considered part  of  the American Romantic  गति  .
Best known for  उसके  tales  of  mystery  और  the macabre , Poe was  एक  of the  earliest  American practitioners of  the  short story and is  generally  considered the inventor  of   the   जासूस  fiction genre .
He is further credited with contributing  to   the  emerging  विधा  of science  fiction  .
He was the  पहला  well-known American writer  to  try to earn a living through writing alone , resulting in a financially difficult life and career  .
He was born as  एडगर  Poe in Boston  ,   मैसाचुसेट्स  ;  he  was orphaned  यंग  when  उसके  mother died  shortly  after his father abandoned the family  .
पो  was taken in by John and Frances Allan , of Richmond , Virginia , but they never formally  अपनाया  him .
He attended the  विश्वविद्यालयों  of  वर्जिनिया  for one semester but left due to lack of  धन  .
After enlisting in the Army  और  later  failing  as an  अधिकारी   's  cadet at  वेस्ट  Point , Poe  parted   तरीके  with the Allans .
His publishing career began humbly , with an anonymous collection of poems , Tamerlane and Other  कविताएं   (  1827  )  , credited only to ``  a  Bostonian '' .
Poe  switched  his focus to prose  और  spent the next several years working  लिये  literary  जर्नल्स  and periodicals  ,  becoming known for his own  स्टाइल  of literary criticism .
His work forced him to move among several cities , including Baltimore  ,  Philadelphia , and New York City .
in   बाल्टीमोर  in 1835 , he married Virginia Clemm , his 13-year-old cousin .
In January 1845 Poe published his  कविता  , `` The  रेवेन  ``  ,  to instant success .
His wife died of tuberculosis two years after its publication .
He  began  planning to produce his own journal ,  the  Penn ( later renamed  the  Stylus ) , though he died before it could be produced .
On  अक्तूबर  7 ,  1849  , at age 40 , Poe  died   in  Baltimore ; the cause  of  his death is unknown and has been variously attributed to alcohol , brain  जमघट  , cholera ,  दवाएँ  , heart disease , rabies  ,  suicide , tuberculosis , and other agents .
पो  and his works influenced literature  in  the United States and around the world  ,  as well as in specialized fields , such  as  cosmology  और  cryptography .
Poe and his work appear  throughout  popular culture in literature , music ,  films  , and  टेलीविज़न  .
A number of his homes are dedicated museums today  .
The Mystery  लेखक  of America present an annual award known as the Edgar Award for distinguished work in  the  mystery genre  .
Lions are obligate carnivores ; they require  up  to  सात   गामा  ( 15  पाउंड  ) of meat per  दिन  .
A  प्रमुख  component of their  आहार  is the flesh of  विशाल  mammals , like this  अफ़्रीकी  buffalo .
A  carnivore   (  ) meaning 'meat eater ' ( Latin , caro meaning 'meat ' or 'flesh ' and vorare  अर्थ  'to devour '  )  is an organism  कि  derives its energy and nutrient  आवश्यकताएँ  from a diet consisting mainly or  exclusively  of animal  ऊतक  , whether through predation or  scavenging  .
Animals that  निर्भर  solely on animal flesh for their nutrient  आवश्यकताएँ  are  माना  carnivores while those  कि  also consume non-animal food are  माना   carnivores  .
Omnivores  भी  consume both animal and non-animal food , and  अलावा  from the more general definition , there  is   no  clearly defined ratio  of  plant to animal  सामग्री  that  होता   फर्क  a  facultative  carnivore from  an  omnivore .
A  carnivore  that  sits  at  the  top of the  foodchain  is an apex predator .
Plants that capture and digest insects are called carnivorous plants  .
Similarly , fungi that  कैप्चर  microscopic animals are often  पुकारा  carnivorous fungi .
The FIFA World Cup , often simply the World Cup , is an international association football competition contested  by  the senior men 's national teams of the members of Fédération  internationale  de Football  संघ   (  FIFA ) , the  खेल   's  global  शासी  body  .
The  चैंपियनशिप  has been awarded every four years since the inaugural tournament in 1930  ,  except in 1942 and  1946  when it was not held because  of   the  Second World War  .
the  current  champions   हैं   स्पेन  , who won the  2010  tournament .
The current format of the tournament involves 32 teams competing for the title at venues  भीतर  the  मेजबान  nation (  s  ) over a  काल  of about a month ; this phase is often called the World Cup Finals .
A qualification phase  ,  which currently takes  प्लेस  over  the  preceding  तीन  years , is used  to  determine which teams qualify for the tournament together with the host nation (  s   )  .
The 19 World Cup tournaments  have  been won by eight different  नेशनल   टीमों  .
Brazil have won five times , and they are the only team to have played  in   प्रत्येक  tournament .
The  अन्य  World  कप  winners are Italy , with four  शीर्षक   ;   जर्मनी  , with three titles  ;  Argentina and  inaugural  winners Uruguay , with two titles  प्रत्येक  ; and England , France  ,  and  स्पेन  , with one  शीर्षक   प्रत्येक  .
The World Cup is the world 's most widely viewed sporting event ; an estimated 715.1 million people watched the  फाइनल   मैच  of the 2006 FIFA World Cup held in Germany .
The next three World Cups will  be  hosted by  ब्राज़ील  in 2014 , Russia in  2018   ,  and  क़तर  in 2022 .
नायक  is  an  American science  fiction  television drama series created by  टिम  Kring that appeared on  एनबीसी  for four  सीज़न  from September 25  ,  2006 through February 8 , 2010  .
The  श्रेणी  tells the  कहानियां  of ordinary people who discover superhuman abilities  ,  and how these  abilities  take  प्रभाव  in  the  characters '  जीवनदान  .
The series emulates the aesthetic style and storytelling  of  American comic books , using  multi-episode  story arcs that build upon a larger , more encompassing  चाप  .
the  series was produced by Tailwind  प्रोडक्शन्स   in  association with Universal Media Studios .
It was filmed primarily  in  Los Angeles , California  .
Four complete seasons aired  ,  ending on February 8 , 2010  .
The critically acclaimed first season had a run of 23 episodes  और  garnered an average of 14.3 million viewers  in  the United  राज्य  , receiving the highest rating for an NBC drama premiere  in   पाँच  years .
The second season of Heroes attracted an average  of  13.1 million viewers  in  the U.S. , and marked NBC 's sole series among  the   शीर्ष  20  क्रमित   कार्यक्रम  in total viewership for the  2007–2008  season .
Heroes  रै   अर्जित  a  क्रमांक  of awards  और   nominations  , including Primetime  एमी  Awards , Golden Globes  ,  People  's   चुनाव   पुरस्कार   और  British Academy Television Awards .
An online extension of the series ,  नायक  360  अनुभव  , later rebranded as Heroes Evolutions , was created to explore the Heroes universe and provides insight into the show 's mythology .
अन्य  official Heroes media include magazines , action figures , tie-in and interactive websites , a mobile game ,  a  novel ,  कपडे  and other merchandise .
In the fall of 2008 , NBC  डिजिटल  Entertainment released a series of online content for the summer , including more original web  सामग्री   ,   बेतार  iTV interactivity , graphic novels available for mobile viewing and webisodes .
NBC announced  नायक  cancellation on May 14 ,  2010  .
Afterward  ,  the network considered making a television special event to  conclude  the series ; however , on September 9 , 2010 , NBC  घोषित  the decision to stop any further development of the  नायक   मताधिकार  .
टिम   क्रिंग  then suggested that the  व्यापक  premise of Heroes storylines allowed for the franchise to return for fans , but he did not specify when or in what media  स्वरूप  .
on   अप्रैल  17  ,  2013 , TV Line reported that  एमएसएन   थी  in talks to  revive   the  series with a new cast .
John Pierpont `` J. P  .  ''
Morgan  (   अप्रैल  17  ,  1837  –  March 31 , 1913 ) was an American financier , banker  ,  philanthropist and art  कलेक्टर  who dominated  कॉरपोरेट  finance  और  industrial consolidation during his time  .
In 1892 Morgan  arranged  the merger  of  Edison General Electric  और  Thomson-Houston Electric  कम्पनी   to  form General Electric .
After  financing  the  सृष्टि  of the Federal Steel Company , he merged in 1901 with the Carnegie Steel Company and several  अन्य  steel and iron businesses ,  सहित  Consolidated Steel and Wire Company owned  by  William  edenborn  ,  to   रूप  the United States Steel Corporation  .
Morgan  died   in  Rome ,  इटली  ,  in  his sleep in 1913  at  the age  of  75 , leaving his fortune and business  to  his  बेटे  , John Pierpont `` Jack '' Morgan , Jr. , and  bequeathing  his mansion and large book collections  to  The Morgan Library & Museum in New York .
At the height of Morgan 's career during the  जल्दी  1900s  ,  he and his  साझेदार   था  financial  निवेश  in many large corporations and were  अभियुक्त  by  आलोचकों  of controlling the nation 's high finance .
He directed the  बैंकिंग  coalition  कि  stopped the  दहशत   of  1907 .
he  was the leading financier of the  प्रगतिशील  Era , and his dedication to efficiency and modernization helped transform American  कारोबार  .
This  is   a  list of episodes  of  the television series .
The episodes were directed by Shigeru  ueda   और   उत्पादित   by  the  yggdrasil  Executive Committee which included Xebec  और  Genco  .
The plot of  the  episodes is set in Tokyo and  घूमती   around  Rin Asōgi  ,  an immortal private investigator , as she explores the secrets  of  modern and near-future world  और  the  अलौकिक   कार्यक्रम  that surround  the   fictional  society of immortals like herself .
There are large time  गैप  in the internal chronology between the first five episodes , ranging from one  to  thirty  सालो  .
The six episodes were broadcast monthly  on  AT-X channel in Japan , between February 3  और  July 6  ,   2008  .
Each episode is 45 minutes long .
Two pieces  of  theme music  हैं  used  लिये  the  एपीसोड   :  the opening  थीम  ``  alsatia  '' and the  समाप्ति  theme  ``  Cause Disarray '' .
Both were composed and  performed   by  the Japanese metal band Galneryus .
the  series was produced to commemorate the tenth  वर्षगांठ   of  the AT-X network it originally  aired   on  .
aerial  photo of  fletc  , where US digital forensics  मानकों  were  विकसित  in the 1980s and '90s
डिजिटल  forensics ( sometimes known  as  digital forensic science ) is  a  branch of forensic science encompassing the recovery and investigation of material found in digital devices ,  प्रायः   in  relation to computer crime .
The term digital  forensics  was originally used as a synonym for  कंप्यूटर  forensics but has expanded  to   कवर  investigation of all devices  सक्षम  of storing  डिजिटल  data .
With roots in  the  personal  कम्प्यूटिंग  revolution of the late 1970s and early '80s  ,  the  अनुशासन  evolved  in   a  haphazard manner  दौरान  the 1990s , and it was  नहीं   जबतक  the early 21st century  कि  national policies emerged .
Digital forensics  investigations  have a  किस्में  of applications .
The  सबसे  common is to support or  खण्डन   a  hypothesis before criminal  or  civil ( as  भाग  of  the  electronic discovery process ) courts .
Forensics may also  विशेषता  in  the  private sector ;  ऐसे  as during  आतंरिक  corporate investigations or intrusion investigation ( a specialist probe into  the   प्रकृति  and extent of an  अनधिकृत  network intrusion ) .
The technical aspect  of  an investigation is divided into several  sub-branches  , relating to  the  type  of  digital devices involved  ;  computer forensics ,  संजाल   forensics  ,  forensic  data analysis and mobile device forensics .
The  ठेठ  forensic process encompasses  the   seizure  , forensic  इमेजिंग  ( acquisition ) and analysis  of  digital media and the production of a report  into  collected evidence .
As well as identifying direct evidence of a crime , digital forensics can be used  to   विशेषता  evidence to specific suspects ,  confirm   alibis  or  कथन  , determine intent  ,  identify sources ( for example , in  कापीराइट  cases )  ,  or authenticate documents .
Investigations are much broader in  पैमाना  than other areas of forensic analysis ( where  the  usual  उद्देश्य  is to provide answers to  a  series of simpler questions ) often involving complex time-lines  or  hypotheses .
A comparison  of  the chromaticities enclosed by some color spaces  .
A color model is an abstract mathematical model describing the  रास्ता  colors can be represented as tuples of numbers , typically as three or four  मान  or color components ( e.g  .  RGB and CMYK are  रंग  models ) .
However ,  a   रंग  model with no associated  मानचित्रण  function to an absolute color space is a more  or   कम  arbitrary  रंग  system with  no   कनेक्शन  to any  globally  understood system  of   रंग  interpretation .
Adding a certain  मानचित्रण  function between  the  color model and a certain reference color space results in  a  definite `` footprint '' within the reference  रंग   स्पेस  .
This `` footprint '' is  ज्ञात  as a  gamut  , and , in combination  साथ  the color model , defines a new color  स्पेस  .
For example , Adobe RGB  और   srgb   हैं  two different absolute color  स्पेसेस  , both  आधारित  on the RGB model .
in  the most generic sense  of  the definition above , color  स्पेसेस   can  be  पारिभाषित   बगैर  the  उपयोग  of  a  color model .
These spaces , such as Pantone , are in effect  a  given set of names or  संख्याएँ  which are  पारिभाषित  by the existence of a  सम्बन्धित  set of physical color swatches  .
This article focuses on the mathematical model concept .
Labor Day is  an  American federal holiday observed on the  पहला  Monday in September , that celebrates the economic  और  social contributions of  मजदूर  .
Life insurance is a contract between an insured ( insurance  नीति  holder  )  and an insurer , where the insurer promises to pay a designated beneficiary  a  sum of money ( the `` benefits '' ) upon  the  death of the insured person .
Depending  on  the contract  ,   अन्य  events such as terminal illness or  नाजुक   बीमारी  may also  ट्रिगर   भुगतान   .
The policy holder typically  pays   a  premium  ,  either  regularly  or as a lump sum .
अन्य  expenses  (  such as funeral  खर्च  ) are also sometimes  शामिल  in the  लाभ  .
जीवन   नीतियों  are legal contracts and the terms of  the   अनुबंध  describe the limitations of the  insured  events .
Specific exclusions are  प्रायः   लिखा  into  the   अनुबंध  to  सीमा   the  liability of the insurer ; common examples are claims  relating  to suicide , fraud ,  युद्ध  , riot and civil  commotion  .
Life-based  अनुबंध   tend  to fall into two major  categories:
Protection policies – designed to  provide  a benefit in  the  event of specified event , typically a lump sum  भुगतान  .
A common  रूप   of  this design  is   पद  insurance .
Investment policies – where the main  उद्देश्य  is to  सुकर  the growth of capital by regular or single premiums .
Common forms ( in the US ) are whole life , universal  जीवन  and variable life policies .
