Mitzi Gaynor Donahue ( born May 2 , 1962  in  Yorba Linda , Orange County , California ) is  an  American actress  ,   भी  credited and more popularly known as  mitzi  Kapture  .
Kapture began her career in  films  , most of which were  नहीं  huge  वाणिज्यिक  successes  .
वो  went on to make a few television guest appearances ( MacGyver , 1st & Ten , and as a contestant on The $ 100,000 Pyramid ) before she gained international  एक्सपोज़र  with her first major television role as Sergeant  रीता  Lee Lance  in   the  television series Silk  stalkings  .
Kapture 's role  as  Rita  ,  the other half of the two `` Sams '' for almost 5 years , cemented her popularity .
Paired with  रोब  Estes who  निभाई  Sergeant Chris Lorenzo ,  kapture   gained   वैश्विक  recognition along with her costar since the show  थी   ब्रॉडकास्ट   in  several countries .
Sergeant  तलवार  eventually became Lieutenant Lance by the time Kapture left the series in 1995 to have her first child Madison .
दौरान   उसके  time with the  श्रेणी  , Kapture briefly sat in the  निदेशक   's  chair  ,  for two  एपीसोड  .
She  थी   interviewed  for  the   रेशा   stalkings   ऋतु  1 DVD which was distributed by Anchor Bay  entertainment  and released in September 2004  .
After  a  short hiatus from the screen following her exit from Silk Stalkings , Kapture returned in 1997 to the small screen and USA Network .
She played lead roles in two  यूएसए   तस्वीरें  Originals  telemovies   ,  Perfect Crime ( based on a true story ,  भी  called Hide  और  Seek  :  The  जोआन  Jensen Story ) , which  भी   स्ट्रक्चर  Jasmine Guy and  उसके   अंगरक्षक  .
She later starred in  a  few other independent film projects  और  theatre productions and had several television guest appearances .
Kapture also  था  a recurring role on  बेवाच  as Alexis  ryker   .
वो  played Anita Hodges  on  The Young and the Restless from 2002 through 2004  ,   जहाँ   वो   थी   credited  as Mitzi  kapture  Donahue , and  स्ट्रक्चर  in the made-for-TV movie Night of Terror which premiered March 26 , 2006 on Lifetime  संजाल  .
Her latest is a supporting role in God  's  Ears  ,  released  in  2007 .
kapture  is the  आधिकारिक  celebrity spokesperson for the Xeroderma Pigmentosum Society  .
the  Xbox 360 is the second video game console developed by and produced for Microsoft and the successor to the Xbox .
The  एक्सबॉक्स   360  competes  साथ  Sony 's PlayStation 3 and  निन्टेंडो  's Wii  as  part of the  सातवाँ  generation of video game consoles .
As  of  September 30 , 2012 , 70  लाख  Xbox 360 consoles have been  बेची  worldwide .
The Xbox  360  was  officially  unveiled  on  MTV on May  12  ,  2005  , with  विस्तृत  launch and game information divulged later that month at the Electronic Entertainment Expo ( E3 ) .
The console  बेची  out  completely  upon release in all regions except  in  Japan .
Several major features  of   the  Xbox 360 are its  एकीकृत  Xbox Live  सेवा   कि  allows players to compete  ऑनलाइन  ; download arcade games ,  खेल  demos , trailers , TV  shows  , music and movies ; and its Windows Media  बीच   मल्टीमीडिया   सामर्थ्य  .
The Xbox Live also  offers   अभिगम  to various ( often region-specific )  third-party  media streaming applications .
At their E3 presentation on June  14   ,  2010 , Microsoft  घोषित  a redesigned Xbox 360 that would ship on the  वही  day  .
The redesigned console is  slimmer  than the  पिछला   एक्सबॉक्स   360  model and features integrated 802.11 b/g/n Wi-Fi , TOSLINK  s/pdif   ऑप्टिकल  audio output , five  usb  2.0 ports ( compared to the three from  पुरानी  versions ) and a special AUX port .
पुरानी  models of  the   एक्सबॉक्स  360  have   चूंकि  been discontinued .
The first new console to be released features a 250 GB hard  ड्राइव  , while a later , less expensive SKU features  4   gb  internal storage .
backpack  may also refer to  a  2001  अनोखा   by   एमिली  Barr
a  modern  backpack
Swiss army backpack ca . 1960
Integrated  तुमको  frame .
A backpack (  भी  called rucksack , knapsack , packsack , pack  )   is  ,  in  its simplest form , a  cloth  sack carried  on  one 's  वापस   और   secured  with two straps that go over the shoulders , but there can be exceptions  .
Lightweight  प्रकार  of backpacks are sometimes worn on only  एक   कंधे  strap .
Backpacks  हैं  often preferred to handbags for carrying heavy loads or  carrying  any sort of equipment  ,   क्युकी  of the  सीमित  capacity to carry heavy weights for long periods of  समय  in  the   हैंड्स   .
Large backpacks ,  प्रयुक्त  to carry loads over  10   kg  ( 22 lbs ) , usually offload the largest part ( up  to  about  90   %  )  of   उनके  weight onto padded hip belts , leaving the shoulder straps  मुख्यतः  for  stabilising  the load  .
This improves the potential to carry heavy loads  ,   as  the hips are  stronger  than the shoulders , and also increases agility  और  balance , since the load rides nearer the wearer 's own center  of  mass .
In ancient  टाइम्स  , the backpack was used as a means to  carry  the hunter 's larger game and other types of prey and as a way of easier transport for  अन्य  materials  .
In  the  cases of larger hunts , the hunters would  dismember  their prey and  वितरित  the  टुकड़े  of the animal around  ,  each one packing the  मांस  into many wrappings and then  into  bags which they placed on to their backs .
The bag  itself  was made  up  of  अलग  animal hide and skin ( depending on what  sorts  of  पशु   यहूद  in the area )  और  sewn  साथ  by  the  intestines of said animals , which were woven together  tightly  to make a sturdy  thread-like  material  .
Mexico ( ;  ;  ) , officially the  संयुक्त  Mexican States  (  ) , is  a  federal constitutional republic in North America  .
It is bordered on the north by the  संयुक्त  States ; on the south  और   वेस्ट  by the Pacific Ocean ; on the southeast by Guatemala , Belize , and the Caribbean Sea  ;  and  on  the east by the Gulf of Mexico .
Covering almost two million square kilometres ( over  760,000  sq mi ) , Mexico is the fifth largest country in the Americas by  कुल   क्षेत्रफल  and the  13th   largest  independent nation in the world .
With an estimated  जनसांख्यिकी  of  over   113  million , it is the world 's eleventh most populous  देश  and the most populous Spanish-speaking country .
Mexico is a federation comprising thirty-one states and a Federal District ,  the  capital city .
In pre-Columbian Mexico many cultures  matured  into  उन्नत  civilizations such  as  the Olmec , the Toltec , the Teotihuacan ,  the  Zapotec , the Maya  और   the  Aztec before first contact with Europeans .
In 1521 ,  स्पेन  conquered and colonized the territory  इससे  its base in México-Tenochtitlan , which was administered as  the  Viceroyalty of  नई  Spain  .
इस  territory would eventually  become   मैक्सिको  following recognition of the colony 's  स्वतंत्रता  in  1821  .
The  post-independence  period was  characterized  by economic instability , the Mexican-American War and territorial cession to the  संयुक्त  States , a civil war ,  दो   empires   और  a domestic dictatorship .
The latter  led  to the Mexican Revolution in  1910  ,  जिससे  culminated with  the  promulgation  of   the  1917  संविधान  and the emergence of the country 's current political system .
Elections held in July 2000  चिह्नित  the  पहला  time that an opposition party won the presidency from the Institutional Revolutionary Party .
चूंकि  2006 the country has been in  the  midst of a  ड्रग  war  जिससे   रै  caused 60,000 deaths .
मैक्सिको  has one of the  संसार  's largest economies  ,   और  is considered both a regional power and middle power .
in  addition  ,   मैक्सिको  was the first Latin American member of the Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development OECD ( since  1994  ) , and  माना  an upper-middle income  देश   by  the World Bank .
Mexico is considered a  newly  industrialized country and an emerging power  .
It has the fourteenth largest nominal GDP and the  eleventh  largest GDP by purchasing power parity .
the   अर्थव्यवस्था  is strongly linked to those of its  उत्तर  American Free  व्यापार   अनुबंध  ( NAFTA ) partners , especially the United States of America .
Mexico ranks sixth in the world and first  in  the Americas by number of  युनेस्को  World Heritage  साइट  with 31 ,  और   in   2007  was the tenth most visited  देश  in the world with  21.4  million international arrivals  प्रति  year  .
Babe  रुथ  holds  the  MLB career  slugging  percentage record (  .690  ) .
In baseball statistics ,  slugging   प्रतिशत  ( abbreviated SLG  )  is a popular measure  of  the power of a hitter .
It is calculated as total  bases  divided by  at  bats :
where AB is the  क्रमांक  of at-bats for a given player , and 1B , 2B  ,  3B , and HR are  the  number of singles , doubles , triples , and home runs , respectively .
Walks are specifically excluded from this calculation .
For example  ,  in 1920 , Babe Ruth played his first season for the New York Yankees  .
In  458  at  bats   ,  Ruth had 172 hits , comprising 73 singles  ,  36 doubles , 9 triples , and 54 home  रनों  , which brings the total base count  to  ( 73 ×  1  ) + ( 36 × 2 ) +  (  9 × 3 )  +  (  54  ×  4  )  =  388 .
His total number of bases  (   388  )  विभाजित  by his total at-bats ( 458 ) is  .847  , his  slugging  percentage for the season .
The next  साल  he slugged .846 , and these records  गई  unbroken until 2001  ,  when Barry  bonds  achieved  411   bases  in 476  at-bats  , bringing his slugging percentage to .863 , unmatched  चूंकि  .
is   a  role-playing video game developed and  प्रकाशित   by  Square ( now Square Enix  )  for the Super Nintendo Entertainment System in  1995  .
Chrono Trigger 's  विकास  team included three designers that Square dubbed the  ``   सपना   टोली   ''  : Hironobu Sakaguchi , the creator  of  Square 's Final Fantasy  श्रेणी  ;  yuji  Horii , a  freelance  designer and creator of  एनिक्स  's popular  ड्रैगन   क्वेस्ट  series ; and Akira  toriyama   ,  a freelance manga artist  famed  for his work with  ड्रैगन  Quest and Dragon Ball .
Kazuhiko Aoki produced the game , Masato  काटो   लिखा  most of the  प्लाट   ,   जबकि  composer Yasunori Mitsuda scored most of the game before falling ill and deferring  बाकी  tracks to  फाइनल  Fantasy composer Nobuo  uematsu  .
The game 's story follows a group of adventurers who travel through time to prevent a  वैश्विक  catastrophe .
Square re-released  a  ported version  by  Tose in Japan  लिये  Sony 's PlayStation in 1999 , later repackaged with a Final Fantasy  iv   बंदरगाहों  as Final  काल्पनिक  Chronicles in 2001 for the North American market .
A slightly enhanced Chrono Trigger was released for  the   निन्टेंडो  DS on November  25  , 2008 , in  उत्तर   अमेरिका  and Japan , and  गई  on sale in Australia on February 3 ,  2009  and in Europe on February 6 , 2009  .
The game was never released  in  PAL territories before the Nintendo DS version  .
Chrono Trigger was a critical and  वाणिज्यिक   कामयाबी  upon release and is considered today  to  be one  of  the greatest video games of all  समय  .
Nintendo  शक्ति   पत्रिका  described aspects of Chrono  ट्रिगर  as revolutionary , including  इसके  multiple endings  ,  plot-related  sidequests  focusing on  अक्षर  development  ,  unique battle  प्रणाली   ,  and detailed graphics  .
Chrono Trigger  थी  the third best-selling game of 1995 , and the game 's SNES and PlayStation iterations have shipped 2.65 million copies  as  of March 2003 .
The version for the Nintendo DS sold 790,000  नक़ल  as of March 2009 .
Chrono Trigger was also ported to  मोबाईल   फोन  , Virtual Console , the PlayStation Network  (  only in  the  USA ) , iOS devices ,  और  Android devices .
Goat cheese
बकरी   चीज  , or chèvre ( from the French word for goat ) , is cheese made out of  the  milk of  बकरियों  .
Hyperthermia is elevated body temperature due to failed thermoregulation  कि  occurs when a body produces  or   absorbs  more  ऊष्मा  than it dissipates .
Extreme temperature elevation then becomes  a  medical  आपात  requiring  तात्कालिक  treatment to prevent disability or death  .
The most common  कल्याणकारी  include heat stroke and adverse reactions to drugs .
the  former is an  अधि   तापमान  elevation caused by exposure to excessive heat , or combination  of   ऊष्मा  and humidity , that overwhelms the heat-regulating mechanisms  .
the   latter  is  a  relatively rare side effect of many drugs , particularly those that affect the central nervous system .
Malignant  अतिताप  is  a  rare complication of  कुछ  types of general anesthesia .
Hyperthermia can also be deliberately induced using drugs or medical devices  और  may be used in the treatment  of  some kinds  of  cancer and  अन्य  conditions , most commonly in conjunction with radiotherapy  .
Hyperthermia  differs  from fever in that  the  body 's temperature  नियत  point  remains  unchanged .
the   विपरीत  is hypothermia  ,   जिससे  occurs when the  तापमान  drops below that required to maintain normal metabolism  .
Belize , is a country located on the  northeastern  coast of Central America .
It is the  तभी  country in the area where English is the official language  ,  although Kriol  और  Spanish  हैं  more commonly spoken .
बेलीज़  is bordered on the north by Mexico  ,  to the south and west by Guatemala  और  to the east by the Caribbean Sea .
इसके  mainland is  परिचय  long and wide .
With of land and a population  of  only 312,698 inhabitants (  2010  census ) , Belize  possesses  the lowest  जनसांख्यिकी  density  in  Central America .
The country 's population  विकास  rate of 3.15 % ( 2012  est  . ) is the  दूसरी  highest in the region and one of  the  highest  in  the  पश्चिमी  hemisphere  .
Belize 's abundance  of  terrestrial and marine  प्रजाति   ,  and its diversity  of  ecosystems  दे   it  a key place within the  globally  significant Mesoamerican Biological Corridor .
Belize has a diverse society , comprising many cultures and languages .
it  is the only nation in the region  साथ  a British  औपनिवेशिक   विरासत  ,  लकिन  as a  भाग  of the Western Caribbean  मण्डल   ,  it also  साझा  a common heritage with the fellow Anglophone Caribbean  देशों  .
In general , Belize is considered to be  a  Central  अमरीकी  and  caribbean  nation  साथ  strong ties to both the  caribbean  and Latin America .
बेलीज़   is  a member of the Caribbean Community ( CARICOM ) ,  the  Community of Latin American  और  Caribbean States ( CELAC )  ,  and  सेंट्रल  American Integration System ( SICA ) .
Belize is known  लिये  its September  जश्न  ,  और  is the birthplace of chewing gum and Punta Rock .
The `` Betsy Ross  ''  flag
A `` Betsy Ross '' flag flying outside San Francisco  नगर  Hall
The  बेट्सी   रॉस  flag is an early  डिज़ाइन  of the flag  of  the  संयुक्त  States , popularly attributed to Betsy Ross , using the common motifs of  प्रत्यावर्ती  red-and-white striped field with  five-pointed   सितारों  in  a   ब्लू  canton  .
The flag was designed during  the   अमरीकी  Revolution and features  13   सितारों  to represent the  असली  13 colonies .
the  distinctive  विशेषता  of the Ross flag is the arrangement of the stars in a  वृत्त  .
Although the  बेट्सी  Ross  स्टोरी  is accepted by most Americans , some flag  इतिहासकारों  and  revisionists  do not accept the  बेट्सी  Ross design as the first American flag .
According to the traditional  खाता  , the  असली  flag was made in June 1776 , when a small committee—including George Washington , Robert  मॉरिस  and relative George Ross  —visited  Betsy and discussed the need for  a  new American flag  .
Betsy accepted the  जॉब  to  manufacture  the flag , altering the committee 's design by replacing the six-pointed stars with five-pointed stars .
जबकि  the Betsy  रॉस  legend is  questionable  , the flag design is known to  have  been in  उपयोग  by  1777  ; Alfred B . Street described it at  the  surrender  of   सामान्य  Burgoyne and understood the circle of  सितारों   to  represent equality among the American states .
it  is one of  the  oldest versions of  u.S.  flags known  to   मौजूद  ; while it is  नहीं   the  oldest  surviving   ध्वज  artifact in cloth form , its likeness  appears   on   पुरानी  physical relics , namely  ,   the   समकालीन  battlefield  paintings  by  जॉन   trumbull  and  चार्ल्स  Willson Peale .
They  depict  the circular star arrangement being flown from ship masts  और  many other places  ,  and thus provide the first  ज्ञात  historical documentation of  the  flag 's appearance .
The seal of the U.S. Department of  दिग्गजों  Affairs  उपयोग  the Betsy Ross flag to represent service to all veterans from the American Revolution to the present day .
The Betsy Ross design  of  13-star US flags has  महरूम  featured in many popular  artworks  (  sometimes  inaccurately  ,  as  in  Washington Crossing the Delaware )  और  films  ,   ऐसे  as the 1960 version  of  Pollyanna .
The flag continues to  be   एक  of the most popular symbols  of  the American Revolution .
A purr is a  ध्वनि  made by all species of felids and is a  भाग  of cat communication  .
it   varies  between cats  (   लिये  example by  loudness  and tone ) , and  इससे   प्रजाति  to  प्रजाति  ,  लकिन   can  be characterized as a tonal buzzing .
The term  ``  purring  ''  has been  प्रयुक्त  liberally in  साहित्य  , and it has been  claimed   कि  viverrids  (  civet  ,  mongoose , genet  )  ,  bears  , badgers ,  hyaenas  (  et  cetera )  purr  .
Other animals that  have   महरूम  said to purr are rabbits , squirrels , guinea pigs , tapirs , ring-tailed lemurs , elephants ,  raccoons  and gorillas while eating .
However  ,  using  a  strict definition of purring that continuous sound production must alternate between pulmonic egressive and ingressive airstream (  और  usually go on for minutes ) , Peters ( 2002  )  , in an exhaustive review of the  वैज्ञानिक  literature , reached the conclusion that until then only ‘purring  cats’  (  फ़ेलिडाए   )  and  दो  species  of   genets   ,   genetta  tigrina , and most likely also Genetta genetta , had been documented to  purr  .
The  platypus  ( Ornithorhynchus anatinus )  is  a  semiaquatic  mammal endemic to eastern Australia  ,   सहित  Tasmania .
Together  साथ  the four species of echidna , it is  एक  of the  पाँच  extant species of  monotremes  , the only mammals that lay eggs instead of giving birth .
it  is  the  sole living representative of its family  (  Ornithorhynchidae  )  and genus ( Ornithorhynchus ) , though a number of related species have been found  in  the fossil record .
The unusual appearance of this egg-laying ,  बतख  -billed , beaver -tailed , otter -footed mammal baffled  यूरोपीय   naturalists  when  वे  first  encountered  it , with some considering  it  an elaborate fraud .
It is one  of  the few  विषैला   स्तनधारियों   ,   the  male platypus having a spur  on  the hind  पैर  that delivers a  venom  capable  of  causing severe pain  to  humans .
The unique features of the platypus  मेक   it   an  important subject in  the   पढ़ाई  of  विकासवादी  biology  और  a recognisable  और   iconic  symbol of Australia ; it has appeared  as  a mascot at  नेशनल  events and is featured on the  रिवर्स  of its  20-cent   सिक्का  .
the  platypus is the animal emblem of the state  of   नई  South  वेल्स  .
Until the early 20th century  ,  it was hunted for its fur  ,  but it is now  सुरक्षित  throughout its range  .
Although captive breeding programmes have had  तभी   सीमित   कामयाबी   और  the platypus  is  vulnerable to  the   प्रभाव  of pollution ,  it  is  नहीं  under any  तात्कालिक  threat  .
st.  Elizabeth  is  a village in Miller County , Missouri ,  संयुक्त  States  .
The population was 336 at the 2010  जनसांख्यिकी  .
Wilton is a census-designated place ( CDP ) in Sacramento County , California , United States .
It is  भाग  of the Sacramento – Arden-Arcade – Roseville Metropolitan  सांख्यिकीय   क्षेत्रफल  .
the  population was 5,363 at the 2010 census , up from 4,551 at the 2000 census .
In human-computer interaction , cut and paste and copy and  paste  are related commands that offer a user-interface  बातचीत  technique for transferring text ,  आंकड़ा  , files  or  objects  इससे  a source to a destination .
Most ubiquitously ,  उपयोक्ता  require the ability to cut  और   paste   भाग  of plain text .
The cut command removes  the  selected data from its original position , while the  नक़ल   कमांड  creates  a  duplicate ; in both cases the selected  आंकड़ा   is  placed in a clipboard .
The data in the clipboard is later inserted in the position where  the  paste command is issued .
The command names are an  इंटरफ़ेस  metaphor based on the physical procedure used in manuscript editing to create  a  page  लेआउट   .
इस  interaction technique has  बंद  associations with  सम्बन्धित  techniques in graphical user  अंतरफलक  that use pointing  डिवाइस  such  as   a   कंप्यूटर  mouse ( by  खीचें  and drop ,  लिये  example  )  .
Economic order quantity is the order  मात्रा   कि   minimizes  total inventory holding costs and  ordering  costs .
It is one of  the   oldest   शास्त्रीय  production scheduling models .
The  फ्रेमवर्क  used to determine this order quantity is also known as Barabas EOQ Model or Barabas  सूत्र   .
The model was  विकसित   by  Ford W. Harris in 1913 ,  लकिन  R. H. Wilson ,  a  consultant  जो  applied it extensively ,  is  given  क्रेडिट  for his in-depth  विश्लेषण  .
Stephen `` Stevie  ''  Ray Vaughan ( October  3  , 1954 – August  27  , 1990 )  थी  an American  guitarist  , singer-songwriter , and record producer .
प्रायः  referred to  by  his initials SRV  ,  Vaughan is best known as  a  founding member and leader of Double Trouble .
साथ  with  वादक  Chris Layton and bassist  टॉमी   शैनन   ,  they ignited the blues revival  of  the 1980s  .
With a career spanning seven years ,  vaughan   और  Double Trouble consistently sold out concerts  जबकि   उनके   एल्बम  frequently went gold .
He was born and raised in Dallas , Texas , and for a short period of time  जिया   in  Graham , Texas .
As the younger brother  of  Jimmie Vaughan  ,  Vaughan  प्रारंभ  playing  the  guitar at age  सात  and formed several bands that occasionally performed  in  local nightclubs .
At age 17  ,  he  dropped  out of  ऊँची  school  और  moved to  ऑस्टिन  to further pursue his musical career , joining groups such as Krackerjack ,  the  Nightcrawlers ,  और  the Cobras .
In 1977 , he formed Triple Threat Revue  ,  a  बैंड  that eventually  विकसित  into  दोगुना  Trouble  और  regularly performed  around  Austin  .
in  1982 , Vaughan and  दोगुना  Trouble  performed   at  the Montreux Jazz Festival  in  Switzerland ,  catching  the attention of musicians David  बोवी  and Jackson  browne  .
Bowie asked Vaughan to play on his upcoming  स्टुडियो  album Let  's   नृत्य  ,  जबकि  Browne offered the band free use of  उसके  personal  स्टुडियो  in  लॉस  Angeles to record  an  album  .
In March 1983  ,  Vaughan and Double Trouble were signed to Epic Records  by  veteran record  निर्माता  John Hammond Sr. and released their debut album ,  टेक्सास  Flood in June of that year  .
After  कामयाब  touring , the group released  the  albums , Could n't Stand the Weather ( 1984 )  और  Soul  to   आत्मा  ( 1985  )  , the  latter  of which featured new keyboardist Reese Wynans .
Although his career had progressed  सफलतापूर्वक  , Vaughan  checked  into a rehabilitation hospital in Atlanta ,  जॉर्जिया  to give up a cocaine and alcohol habit  और  returned to touring  साथ  the  बैंड  .
In June  1989  , In Step was released  और  earned them a Grammy  पुरस्कार  for Best Contemporary Blues Performance .
On  अगस्त   27  , 1990 , Vaughan was killed in a helicopter crash following  a  performance in East Troy , Wisconsin .
Vaughan 's uniquely eclectic yet intense style was derived from a variety of  musical   जाति  .
He was influenced  by  blues musicians including Albert King , Freddie King ,  ओटिस  Rush , and Muddy Waters  ,  and  चट्टान  guitarists  ऐसे  as Jimi  हेंड्रिक्स  and Lonnie Mack  .
His guitar playing reflected the classic blues and  pentatonic   तराजू  .
he  has received wide critical recognition for his guitar playing , ranking  at  # 6 on Rolling Stones  सूची  of `` 100  महानतम  Guitarists '' in  2011  .
He  थी  posthumously inducted into the Blues Hall of Fame in 2000 and a memorial statue was erected in  ऑस्टिन   's  Auditorium Shores park  .
Stevie Ray  vaughan  is widely considered  to  be one of the greatest musicians to  आइये  from the state of  टेक्सास  .
The Las  वेगास  Strip World of Coca-Cola museum in 2003
Coca-Cola  is   a  carbonated soft drink sold in stores , restaurants , and vending machines in  प्रत्येक  country except Cuba  और   उत्तर  Korea  .
It is produced by  the  Coca-Cola Company of Atlanta , Georgia ,  और  is often referred to simply as Coke ( a registered trademark of The Coca-Cola Company in  the   संयुक्त  States since  कूच  27 ,  1944  ) .
Originally  intended  as a  पेटेंट  medicine when it was  invented  in the  लेट   19th  century by John Pemberton ,  coca-cola  was bought out  by  businessman Asa Griggs Candler , whose marketing tactics led Coke to its dominance of the  संसार  soft-drink market throughout the 20th  सदी   .
The company produces concentrate , which is then sold to licensed Coca-Cola  bottlers  throughout the world .
the  bottlers  ,  who hold territorially  विशेष   अनुबंध  with  the  company , produce finished product in cans and bottles from the concentrate  in  combination with filtered water and sweeteners  .
The bottlers then  बेचें  , distribute and merchandise Coca-Cola to retail stores and vending machines .
Such bottlers include Coca-Cola  उद्यमों  ,  जिससे  is the  largest  single Coca-Cola bottler  in  North America  और  western  यूरोपीय   .
The Coca-Cola Company also sells concentrate for  सोडा  fountains to major restaurants  और   खाना  service distributors .
The Coca-Cola  कम्पनी  has ,  on   अवसर  , introduced other  कोला  drinks under the Coke brand name .
The most  आम  of these is Diet Coke  ,   साथ  others including Caffeine-Free Coca-Cola , Diet Coke Caffeine-Free , Coca-Cola Cherry  ,  Coca-Cola Zero , Coca-Cola Vanilla , and special versions with lemon , lime or coffee  .
Based  on  Interbrand 's best  वैश्विक  brand 2011 ,  coca-cola  was  the  world 's most  मूल्यवान  brand .
Barry  लुई   larkin   (   born  April 28 , 1964 )  is   a  retired Major  लीग   बेसबॉल  player .
Larkin played shortstop for the  सिनसिनाटी  Reds  इससे  1986 to  2004   और  was one  of  the pivotal players on the 1990  लाल  ' World Series championship team .
Larkin was elected  to  the National Baseball Hall  of  Fame in  जनवरी   2012  and  थी  inducted on  जुलाई  22 .
Larkin is considered one of  the   शीर्ष  players of his  era  , winning nine Silver Slugger awards  और  three Gold  दस्ताने  awards  .
He was selected to the  प्रमुख   लीग   all-star  Game twelve times , and was elected the 1995 National  लीग  Most  मूल्यवान   खिलाड़ी  .
Brasília ( ) is the federal capital of Brazil and the seat of government of the Federal  ज़िला  .
Administratively , the city is located in the  संघीय   ज़िला  which is in the Central-West Region .
physically  , it is located in the Brazilian Highlands .
It has  a  population of about 2,562,963 ( 3,716,996  in   the  metropolitan  क्षेत्रफल  ) as  of  the 2008 IBGE  अनुमान  , making it the  चौथी  largest city in Brazil .
however  , as  a  metropolitan area ,  it  ranks  निम्नतर  at  छठे  in population .
Brasília is the  largest  city in  the  world that did not exist at the  शुरूआत  of the 20th  सदी   .
Brasília has the fifth largest GDP among Latin American  शहरों  and the third in  ब्राज़ील  .
At around  r   $  62,000 Brazilian  reais  ( equal to approximately $ 30,900 US dollars or €23,000 euros ) , the city 's per capita income  is  the  उच्चतम  among Brazil 's  largest  cities .
As  the  national capital , Brasília is the seat  of  all three branches  of  the  संघीय  government  of  Brazil  .
The  नगर  also hosts  the  headquarters of many Brazilian companies .
Planning policies such as the location of residential  इमारतें  around expansive urban areas , as well as  भवन  the city  around  large avenues and  dividing  it into sectors , have sparked a debate and  प्रतिबिंब  on life in big cities in the 20th  सदी  .
The city 's  डिज़ाइन  divides it into numbered blocks  as  well as sectors for specified activities , such as  the   होटल  Sector  ,  the Banking Sector or the Embassy Sector  .
Brasília hosts 124 foreign embassies  .
The city was planned and developed in  1956  with Lúcio Costa  as   the   प्रिंसिपल  urban  प्लानर  ,  ऑस्कर  Niemeyer  as  the principal  वास्तु  and  रॉबर्टो  Burle  मार्क्स  as the  लैंडस्केप   पंक्तियां  .
Brasilia is  in  the Unesco  's  World Hertitage  सूची  due  to  its architecture  .
On April  22  , 1960  ,  it  formally  became Brazil 's national capital .
Viewed from above , the  प्रमुख  portion  of  the city resembles  an  airplane or a  तितली  .
The city  is  commonly referred to  as   पूंजी  Federal , or simply BSB .
Residents of Brasília are  ज्ञात  as  brasilienses  or candangos (  the  latter referring to those not born in the city but who migrated there after it was established ) .
in  local usage ,  the  word ``  brasília  ''  प्रायः   refers  only to the First Administrative Region (  ra  I ) within  the  Federal District ( Distrito Federal ) , where  the   सबसे  important  सरकारी  buildings  हैं  located .
Brasília  रै  a unique status in Brazil ,  as  it is an administrative  प्रभाग  rather than  a  legal  नगरपालिका   जैसे  nearly all cities in Brazil .
Nationally , the term is almost always used synonymously with the  संघीय   ज़िला  , which constitutes an indivisible Federative  ईकाई  ,  analogous   to  a state .
Several `` satellite cities  ''   मौजूद  which are  भी   भाग  of the Federal District .
Brasília  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Airport  is  the main airport  in  Brasília , connecting the  पूंजी  to all major Brazilian cities and many international destinations  .
It is the third  सबसे  important airport in  ब्राज़ील  , in terms of passengers  और  aircraft  आंदोलनों   .
personifications  of Germany , France  ,  Russia , Austria-Hungary  ,   और  the  संयुक्त   किंगडम  attempting to keep  the   ढक्कन  on the simmering cauldron  of  imperialist and nationalist tensions in the Balkans to prevent a general European war .
They were successful in  1912  and 1913  लकिन  did not succeed  in  in 1914 .
The causes of World War I ,  जिससे  began  in  central Europe in late July 1914 and finished in 1918  ,   शामिल  many  कारकों  , such as  the  conflicts and  दुश्मनी  of the four decades leading up to the war .
Militarism , alliances , imperialism , and nationalism played major roles in the conflict as  खूब  .
The immediate origins of the war ,  however  , lay  in   the  decisions taken by  कूटनीतिज्ञों  and generals during the Crisis of 1914 , casus belli  लिये  which  थी  the  हत्या   of  Archduke Franz Ferdinand ( the Archduke of Austria Hungary )  और  his wife Sophie  by  Gavrilo Princip , an irredentist Serb .
The crisis  आए  after a long and difficult series of diplomatic clashes between  the  Great Powers (  इटली  , France , Germany , the  अंग्रेजों  Empire  ,   the  Austria-Hungarian  साम्राज्य  and Russia  )  over European and colonial  मुद्दे  in  the  decade  पहले   1914  that had  बाएँ  tensions high .
in   फेरे  these  राजनयिक  clashes can be traced  to  changes  in  the balance of power in Europe since 1867 .
The more immediate cause  लिये  the war was  तनाव  over territory in  the  Balkans .
Austria-Hungary competed  साथ  Serbia  और  Russia for territory and influence in the  प्रदेश  and they pulled the rest of the Great Powers into the conflict through their various  alliances  and treaties .
Although  the  chain of events unleashed by the assassination triggered the war , the war 's origins go deeper  ,  involving national politics ,  संस्कृतियों  , economics  ,  and a complex web of alliances and counterbalances that  था   विकसित  between the various European  शक्तियां  since 1870 .
Some of  the  most important long term or structural causes are :  the  growth of  राष्ट्रवाद  across Europe , unresolved  territorial  disputes , an intricate system of  alliances  , the perceived breakdown of  the  balance of power in Europe , convoluted and fragmented governance , the  बाहें  races of the previous decades , previous military planning , imperial and colonial rivalry  लिये  wealth , power  और  prestige  ,  and  आर्थिक  and military rivalry in  उद्योग  and trade  –  e.g. ,  the  Pig War between Austria and Serbia .
Other causes that came into  खेल  during the  राजनयिक  crisis that  preceded  the war included misperceptions of intent ( e.g.  ,   the  German belief that the United Kingdom would remain neutral ) and delays and misunderstandings  in  diplomatic communications .
The various categories  of  explanation for World War  i  correspond to different historians ' overall methods .
Most historians  और  popular commentators  शामिल  causes from more than one  श्रेणी  of explanation  to   provide  a rounded  खाता  of the causes  of  the war .
the  deepest distinction among these accounts is between stories that see it as  the  inevitable and predictable outcome of certain  कारकों  , and those that describe it as an  मनमानी   और  unfortunate mistake  .
In attributing  कल्याणकारी  for the war , historians and  लड  had to deal with an unprecedented  बाढ़  of memoirs and official documents , released as each country involved tried to avoid blame  लिये   starting  the war .
जल्दी  releases of information by governments , particularly those  released  for use by the `` Commission on the Responsibility of the Authors of the War '' were  दिखाया  to be incomplete and biased .
in  addition some documents , especially diplomatic cables between Russia and France , were found to have been doctored  .
Even in later decades however ,  जब  much more information had been  released  , historians from the same  संस्कृति  have been shown to come to differing conclusions on the causes of the war .
जॉनसन  's new chart of national  प्रतीक   ,  published c. 1868  .
The large flags shown  in  the corners are the 37-star flag  of  the United States ( flown 1867-1877 ) , the Royal  मानक  of the United Kingdom , the Russian Imperial Standard  ,  and the French tricolore with inset Imperial Eagle .
Various  अन्य   ध्वज  flown by  जहाजों  are shown .
The Flag of  क्यूबा  is labelled `` Cuban ( so called ) `` .
The Chinese dragon on the Flag of China  थी  drawn mistakenly as a western  ड्रैगन   .
A national  ध्वज  is a flag  कि   symbolizes  a  देश  .
The flag  is  flown by  the   सरकारी  , but usually can also be flown by citizens of the country .
Both public and private buildings  ऐसे  as schools and courthouses may fly  the  national flag  .
In some countries , the national flags are only  flown  from non-military  इमारतें  on certain  ध्वज  days .
There are  तीन  distinct types of national flag for use on  जमीन  , and  तीन  for  उपयोग  at sea , though many countries use identical designs for several ( and sometimes all )  of  these types of flag .
The American  सिविल  War ( ACW ) , also known as the War between the States or simply the Civil War ( see naming )  ,  was a civil war fought from 1861 to 1865 between the United States (  the  `` Union '' or the ``  उत्तर  ''  )  and several Southern slave  राज्य  that declared their secession and formed the Confederate States of America  (  the  ``  Confederacy  ''   or  the ``  दक्षिण   ''  ) .
The war had its origin in the  समस्या  of slavery , especially  the  extension of slavery  into  the western territories .
Foreign powers did not intervene .
बाद  four  सालो  of bloody  कॉम्बैट  that left over 600,000 soldiers dead and  नष्ट  much  of  the South  's   अवसंरचना  ,  the  Confederacy  collapsed  , slavery was abolished , and  the  difficult Reconstruction  प्रक्रम  of restoring national unity and guaranteeing rights to the  freed  slaves  began  .
in  the 1860  अध्यक्षीय  election ,  republicans  , led by Abraham Lincoln , opposed expanding slavery into United States  '  territories  .
Lincoln won , but before his inauguration on March  4  , 1861 , seven cotton-based slave  राज्य  formed the  confederacy  .
Outgoing  लोकतांत्रिक  President James Buchanan and  the   आवक  Republicans rejected secession  as  illegal .
Lincoln  's  inaugural address declared his  प्रशासन  would not  initiate  civil war .
Eight remaining slave states continued to reject calls for secession .
Confederate forces  जब्त  numerous federal forts within territory  claimed   by  the Confederacy .
a  Peace  सम्मेलन  failed to find a compromise , and  दोनो  sides prepared  लिये  war .
The Confederates assumed that European  देशों  were  so  dependent on `` King  कपास   ``   कि  they would  intervene  ;  none  did and  none  recognized the new Confederate  राज्य  of America .
Hostilities  began  on April  12  , 1861 , when Confederate forces  fired  upon Fort Sumter , a key fort held by Union troops in South Carolina .
Lincoln called for each state  to  provide troops to retake the fort ; consequently , four  अधिक  slave states  joined  the Confederacy , bringing their total to eleven .
The Union  जल्द   नियंत्रित   the  border states and established a naval blockade  कि  crippled the southern economy .
The Eastern Theater  थी  inconclusive in 1861–62 .
The autumn 1862 Confederate campaign into Maryland (  a  Union state ) ended  साथ  Confederate retreat at  the  Battle of Antietam , dissuading British  हस्तक्षेप  .
Lincoln issued the Emancipation  उदघोषणा  , which made ending slavery a  युद्ध  goal .
to  the west , by summer 1862  the  Union destroyed the Confederate river  नेवी  , then much of their  पश्चिमी  armies , and the Union  at   vicksburg  split  the  Confederacy in two at the Mississippi River .
In 1863 , Robert E. Lee 's Confederate incursion north ended  at  the Battle  of  Gettysburg .
Western successes led to Ulysses S. Grant command of all Union armies in 1864 .
In the Western Theater , William T. Sherman drove east  to  capture Atlanta and  marched  to the sea ,  destroying  Confederate infrastructure along the way .
The Union marshaled the resources and manpower to  आक्रमण  the Confederacy  इससे   सब  directions , and could  afford  to fight  लड़ाइयों  of attrition through  the  Overland  अभियान  towards Richmond , the Confederate capital .
The defending Confederate army failed ,  अग्रणी   to   ली  's surrender  to  Grant at Appomattox Court House  on   अप्रैल  9 , 1865 .
The American Civil  युद्ध  was one of the  earliest  true  औद्योगिक  wars .
Railroads , the telegraph , steamships , and mass-produced weapons were  employed   extensively  .
The mobilization  of  civilian factories  ,   खानों  , shipyards , banks  ,  transportation and  खाना  supplies all foreshadowed World War I .
It remains  the  deadliest war in American history  ,  resulting in the deaths  of  an estimated 750,000 soldiers and  an  undetermined number of  civilian   हताहत  .
इतिहासकार  John Huddleston  estimates   the  death  टोल   at  ten percent of  सब  Northern males 20–45 years old , and 30 percent of all Southern white males aged 18–40 .
Norrie disease  is  a genetic disorder that primarily affects the eye and  लगभग   सदा  leads to blindness .
In addition to the congenital  ocular   लक्षण   ,  some  मरीजों  suffer from a progressive hearing loss  starting  mostly in  उनके  2nd decade of life  ,  while another portion  may  be  मानसिक  challenged  .
मरीजों  with Norrie disease  may   develop  cataracts  ,  leukocoria ( a  कंडीशन  where the pupils  appear  white  जब  light is  shone  on them ) , along with other developmental  मुद्दे  in the eye , such as shrinking of  the  globe  और  the wasting away of the iris .
Around 30–50 %  of  them will also  have  developmental  डेलाy/  mental retardation , psychotic-like features , incoordination of movements or behavioral abnormalities .
Most patients  हैं  born with normal hearing ; however , the onset of hearing loss is very  आम  in early adolescence .
About 15 % of the  मरीजों  are estimated to  develop   सब  the features of the disease .
The disease affects almost only male infants at birth or soon after birth , because the  बीमारी  is  inherited  X-linked recessive .
Only in very rare cases , females have been diagnosed with Norrie disease  as  well .
The exact incidence number is unknown ;  तभी  a few hundred cases have  महरूम   reported   so  far .
It is a very rare disorder that is  नहीं  associated with any specific ethnic or racial groups .
a  contract is an agreement having a lawful object  डाला  into voluntarily by two or more parties , each of whom  intends  to  बनाएँ  one or more legal obligations between them .
the  elements of  a  contract  हैं  `` offer '' and `` acceptance '' by ``  competent  persons '' having  विधिक  capacity who exchange ``  विचार  '' to create `` mutuality  of  obligation  .   ''
Proof of some or all of these elements may be done in  लिखने  , though contracts may be made  entirely  orally or by conduct .
The  उपाय  for breach of contract can be `` damages '' in the form of compensation of money or  विशिष्ट  performance enforced through  an  injunction .
Both of these remedies award  the  party at loss the  ``  benefit of the bargain ''  or  expectation damages ,  जिससे  are greater than mere reliance damages ,  as  in promissory estoppel .
The parties may be  प्राकृतिक  persons or juristic persons .
A contract is a  legally  enforceable promise  or  undertaking that  कुछ   होगा  or will not occur .
The  शब्द  promise can be  प्रयुक्त  as a legal synonym for contract , although care  is  required as a promise  may  not have the full  खड़ा  of a contract , as  जब  it is an agreement without consideration .
Contract law varies greatly from  एक  jurisdiction to another , including differences in  आम  law  compared  to civil law  ,   the  impact of  प्राप्त  law ,  विशेषकर  from England in common law countries , and of law codified in  क्षेत्रीय  legislation .
Regarding Australian  अनुबंध   विधि   लिये  example  ,  there are 40  प्रासंगिक  acts which impact on the interpretation of contract at the Commonwealth (  संघीय  /  नेशनल  ) level , and an  अतिरिक्त  26 acts  at   the   स्तर   of  the  राज्य  of NSW .
In addition there are 6 international instruments or conventions which are applicable for international dealings , such  as  the United Nations Convention  on  Contracts for  the  International  बिक्री  of  goods  .
ASP.NET is a server-side  वेब  application framework  designed  for Web development to produce dynamic  वेब  pages .
it  was  विकसित  by Microsoft to allow programmers to build dynamic web sites , web applications and web services .
It was first  released  in  जनवरी  2002 with  संस्करण  1.0 of  the   .neT   फ्रेमवर्क  , and is  the   successor  to Microsoft  's  Active Server Pages ( ASP  )  technology .
ASP.NET is built on  the  Common Language Runtime (  clr  ) , allowing programmers to write ASP.NET  कोड  using any supported .NET language .
The ASP.NET SOAP extension framework  allows  ASP.NET components  to  process  साबुन  messages .
Lysergic  एसिड  diethylamide , abbreviated LSD or LSD-25 , also  ज्ञात  as lysergide ( INN )  और  colloquially as acid , is a  semisynthetic   साइकेडेलिक  drug of the ergoline family , well known  लिये  its  मनोवैज्ञानिक   प्रभाव   जिससे   can  include altered thinking processes , closed and open eye visuals , synesthesia , an altered sense  of  time and  आध्यात्मिक  experiences  ,   as   खूब  as for its key role in  1960s   counterculture  .
It  is  used mainly as an entheogen  ,  recreational drug , and  as  an  एजेंट  in  साइकेडेलिक  therapy .
LSD is non-addictive ,  is  not known  to  cause brain damage , and  रै  extremely low toxicity  सापेक्ष  to dose .
However  ,  adverse psychiatric reactions such as anxiety ,  paranoia   ,  and delusions are  संभावित  .
LSD was first synthesized by Albert Hofmann in 1938  इससे  ergotamine , a chemical derived  by  Arthur Stoll  इससे   ergot  , a grain  कवक   कि  typically grows  on  rye .
The short form `` LSD '' comes from  इसके  early code name LSD-25 , which  is  an  संक्षिप्त  for the  जर्मनी  `` Lysergsäure-diethylamid  ''  followed by a sequential number .
LSD is sensitive to oxygen , ultraviolet  लाइट  , and  क्लोराइड  , especially in solution ,  हालांकि  its potency may last  लिये  years if it  is  stored away from light and moisture  at  low temperature  .
In pure form it is a colorless , odorless , tasteless  ठोस  .
LSD is typically delivered orally , usually on a  substrate  such as  absorbent  blotter paper  ,  a sugar cube  ,  or gelatin .
in  its liquid form , it can  भी  be administered  by  intramuscular or intravenous injection .
LSD is  बहुत  potent , with  20–30  μg (  micrograms  ) being the threshold dose  .
नई   प्रयोग  with LSD started  in  2009  लिये   the  first time in 40 years .
Introduced  by  Sandoz Laboratories , with trade-name  delysid  , as a  ड्रग  with  विभिन्न  psychiatric  उपयोग  in 1947 , LSD quickly became a therapeutic agent that appeared to show great  वादा  .
In  the  1950s , officials at  the  U.S. Central Intelligence Agency  (  CIA ) thought the drug might be applicable to mind control  और  chemical warfare  ;  the agency 's MKULTRA research program  propagated   the  drug among young servicemen and students .
The subsequent recreational use of the  ड्रग  by youth culture in the Western world during the 1960s led to a  राजनैतिक  firestorm that resulted in its prohibition .
Currently , a number of organizations—including the  beckley  Foundation , MAPS , Heffter Research  संस्थान  and the  अल्बर्ट  Hofmann Foundation—exist to fund , encourage  और   निर्देशांक  research  into   the  medicinal and spiritual uses of LSD  और  related psychedelics .
The United States Navy 's Sea , Air  ,  Land  टीमों  , commonly  ज्ञात  as the Navy SEALs , are the U.S. Navy 's principal special operations force and a  भाग  of the Naval Special  warfare  Command and United States Special Operations Command  .
`` SEAL '' is always capitalized in reference  to  members  of  the Naval Special Warfare community .
The acronym is derived from their  क्षमता   to   operate  at  समुद्र  ,  in   the  air , and on land .
seals  are  पुरूष  members of  the  United States Navy .
An exchange  कार्यक्रम   साथ   the  Coast Guard ,  जिससे   ग्रैजुएट  three Coast Guardsmen as SEALs , was suspended  in   2011  .
the  CIA 's highly secretive Special Activities Division ( SAD )  और  more specifically its elite  खास  Operations  समूह   (  SOG )  रंगरूटों  operators from the SEAL Teams .
Joint Navy SEALs and CIA  परिचालन  go back to  the  famed MACV-SOG during the  वियतनाम  War .
This cooperation  स्टिल  exists today and  is  seen  in  the wars in Iraq and Afghanistan ,  और  in  the  finding and killing of Osama bin Laden in Pakistan .
World population estimates from  1800  to 2100 , based on UN 2010 projections ( red  ,  orange  ,  green )  और  US Census Bureau historical estimates ( black )  .
Actual recorded population figures are in  ब्लू  .
According  to  the highest estimate , the world population may  वृद्धि  to  16  billion  by  2100  ;   according   to  the  न्यूनतम  estimate , it  may  decline to 6 billion  .
The world population is  the  total number of living humans on Earth  .
As of today , it is estimated to number billion  by  the United States Census Bureau ( USCB ) .
the   uscb   estimates  that the world population exceeded 7  अरब  on  कूच  12 , 2012  .
According to a separate estimate by the United Nations Population Fund , it reached this milestone  on   अक्तूबर  31 ,  2011  .
The world population  रै  experienced continuous  विकास  since  the  end of  the  Great Famine and the Black Death in 1350 ,  जब   it  stood at around  370  million .
the  highest rates  of  growth  –  global population increases  ऊपर  1.8 % per year  –   यहूद  seen  briefly  during the 1950s , and  लिये   a  longer period during the 1960s and 1970s .
the  growth  रेट  peaked at 2.2 % in 1963 , and had  अस्वीकृत  to  1.1  % by 2011 .
कुल  annual births were  उच्चतम  in the late 1980s at  परिचय  138  लाख  , and are now  अपेक्षित  to  remain  essentially constant  at  their 2011 level of 134 million  ,  while deaths number 56 million per year , and are expected to increase  to  80 million per year by  2040  .
Current projections  दिखाएँ  a continued increase in  जनसांख्यिकी   in  the near future ( but a steady decline in the population growth rate ) , with the global population expected to reach between 7.5 and 10.5 billion by 2050 .
Various longer-term estimates predict further growth ,  stagnation  , or  भी   overall  decline  in   the  global population by 2150 .
Some analysts  have   questioned  the sustainability of further world population  विकास  , citing  the   growing  pressures on the  पर्यावरण  , global food  आपूर्तियाँ   ,  and energy resources .
Memphis is a city in the southwestern  कोने  of the U.S. state of  टेनेसी  , and the county  सीट  of Shelby County .
The  नगर   is  located on the  4th   chickasaw  Bluff , south of the confluence  of   the  Wolf and Mississippi rivers .
Memphis had a population of 672,277 in 2011  बनाना  it the largest city in the state of Tennessee , the largest  नगर  on  the  Mississippi River , the third largest in  the   southeastern  United  राज्य   ,  and  the  20th largest in  the  United  राज्य  .
The greater Memphis metropolitan area , including adjacent counties  in  Mississippi  और   अरकंसास   ,  had a  2010  population  of  1,316,100 .
इस  makes  मेम्फिस  the second largest metropolitan  क्षेत्रफल  in Tennessee , surpassed only  by  metropolitan Nashville ,  जिससे  has overtaken Memphis in  हाल   सालो   .
Memphis is the youngest of Tennessee 's major cities .
A resident of Memphis  is  referred to as a Memphian ,  और  the Memphis region is known , particularly to media outlets ,  as  ``  मेम्फिस  & The Mid-South `` .
The Cattenom Nuclear Power Plant in France .
France  produces  around three quarters of  इसके   विद्युत  by nuclear power .
The Grafenrheinfeld Nuclear  शक्ति  Plant in Germany  .
Chancellor  एंजेला  Merkel 's coalition announced on May 30 , 2011  ,  that  germany’s  17 nuclear power stations will  be  shut down by  2022  , in  a  policy reversal following Japan 's Fukushima Daiichi  नाभिकीय  disaster .
Currently , 68 reactors are under construction in 15 countries .
Nuclear power stations  operate  in thirty countries .
In 2010 , before the  फुकुशिमा  Daiichi nuclear disaster , it was reported that  an  average of about 10 nuclear reactors were expected to become operational  प्रति  year  ,  although according to the World  नाभिकीय  Association  ,   of  the 17 civilian reactors  नियोजित  to become operational between 2007 and 2009  ,  only five actually came on stream .
As of June  2011  , Germany and Switzerland are phasing-out nuclear power  .
As of June 2011 , countries such  as   ऑस्ट्रेलिया  , Austria ,  डेनमार्क  , Greece , Ireland , Italy , Latvia ,  liechtenstein  , Luxembourg , Malaysia , Malta , New Zealand , Norway  और  Portugal remain opposed to nuclear power .
skeletal   मांसपेशियां  homo sapiens
This is a table  of  muscles of the human anatomy .
There are approximately 642 skeletal  मांसपेशियां  within the  ठेठ   इंसान  , and  लगभग  every muscle constitutes one part of  a  pair of identical bilateral muscles , found on both  पहलू  , resulting in approximately 320 pairs of muscles  ,   as  presented in this article .
Nevertheless , the  सटीक  number  is  difficult to define  क्युकी  different sources group muscles differently , e.g  .  regarding what is defined as  अलग  parts of a  सिंगल  muscle or  as  several muscles .
Examples range from 640 to 850 .
The muscles of the  इंसान  body can be categorized into  a   क्रमांक   of   समूह  which  शामिल  muscles  relating  to the  सिर  and neck , muscles  of  the torso or trunk ,  मांसपेशियां  of the upper limbs ,  और   मांसपेशियां  of the lower limbs .
The action  refers  to the action of each muscle  इससे  the  मानक  anatomical position  .
In other positions ,  अन्य  actions may be  performed  .
A reenactment  of  a battle  at  Fort  फोस्टर  , 1837 ( at Hillsborough  नदी  State Park )
The Seminole Wars  ,  also known as  the  Florida Wars , were  तीन  conflicts  in  Florida  between   the   seminole  — the collective  नाम   दिए  to the amalgamation of various groups  of  native  अमेरिकी   और  Black people who settled  in  Florida in the  जल्दी  18th century — and  the  United States Army .
The First Seminole War was from 1814 to 1819 ( although sources differ )  ,  the Second Seminole  युद्ध   इससे   1835  to  1842  , and the Third Seminole  युद्ध  from 1855 to 1858 .
The first conflict with  the  Seminoles arose  आउट   of  tensions relating to General Andrew  जैक्सन  's  आक्रमण  and destruction of Negro Fort in Florida in 1816  .
Jackson also attacked  the  Spanish at Pensacola  .
ultimately  , the Spanish Crown ceded the colony  to  United States rule .
orono   is   a   कस्बा  in Penobscot County , Maine  ,  United States .
It  थी  first settled in 1774 and  नामित   in  honor of Chief Joseph Orono of the  penobscot  Nation  .
It  is  home to The University of  maine  .

Luxor Las  वेगास  is  a  hotel and casino on  the  Las Vegas  स्ट्रिप  in Paradise , Nevada .
The 30-story  होटल  , owned and operated  by   mgm  Resorts International  ,   रै  a casino with over 2,000 slot machines and 87  तालिका  games  .
In the 2008  to   2009   नवीकरण  , it has a new , highly modernized  ,  and contemporary design and  contains  a total of 4,400  कक्ष  ,  सहित  442 suites , lining the interior walls of a pyramid style tower and  भीतर  twin  22-story  ziggurat towers that were built  as  later additions  .
The hotel is named after the city  of  Luxor ( ancient  thebes   )  in Egypt .
Luxor is the second largest hotel in  लास   वेगास  ( the largest being the MGM Grand ) and  the  eighth largest in the world .
As of 2010  ,  the  लक्सर  has a 4 Key rating from the Green Key Eco-Rating Program , which evaluates `` sustainable '' hotel operations  .
a   पायलट  experiment  ,  also  पुकारा   a  pilot study  ,  is a small scale preliminary study  conducted   in  order to  evaluate   feasibility  , time ,  लागत  ,  प्रतिकूल  events , and effect size ( statistical variability  )  in an  attempt  to predict an appropriate sample size and improve upon the study design prior to performance of a full-scale  शोध  project .
Pilot studies , therefore ,  may  not  be  appropriate  लिये  case studies .
the  Los Angeles Fire  विभाग   (  LAFD )  is  the agency  कि  provides fire protection and  आपात   चिकित्सा  services for the city of Los Angeles .
It may be unofficially referred  to  as the Los Angeles City Fire Department to distinguish it from the Los Angeles County  आग  Department .
The acre  is   a   ईकाई  of area  प्रयुक्त   in  the  इम्पीरियल  and  u.S.  customary systems  .
an  acre is about 40 % of a hectare – slightly  छोटी  than an  अमरीकी  football field .
The acre is no longer commonly used , although a  few  notable exceptions  शामिल  the United States , Australia  ,   बर्मा  and  the   संयुक्त  Kingdom  (  as of 2010 , the  एकड़  is no longer officially used in the United Kingdom , though  is   स्टिल  used in  रियल  estate descriptions ) .
it  is still used , to some  extent  , in Canada .
The international  प्रतीक  of the acre  is  ac  ,  and is defined as  1/640  of a square mile .
The most commonly used  एकड़   आज   is  the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  acre .
In the  संयुक्त  States both the international acre  और  the slightly different US survey acre are in use  .
The most  आम  use of  the  acre is  to  measure tracts  of  land  .
One international acre is defined as  4046.8564224  square metres .
दौरान  the Middle Ages , an acre was  the  amount of land that could be plowed in one day with a yoke of  oxen  .

Pawnee people

Language processing refers  to  the way human beings  उपयोग  words  to  communicate ideas and feelings  ,  and how such communications are processed and understood  .
Thus it is  कैसा  the  दिमाग  creates and understands  भाषा  .
Most recent theories  consider  that this process is carried  आउट  entirely by and inside the brain .
This is  माना   एक  of the  सबसे  characteristic abilities of the  इंसान  species - perhaps the  सबसे  characteristic .
However  बहुत  little is known  परिचय   it   और  there is huge scope for research on  it  .
सबसे  of the knowledge acquired to date on  the   विषय  has come from patients who have suffered  कुछ  type  of  significant head injury , whether external  (   wounds   ,  bullets  )   or  internal ( strokes  ,  tumors , degenerative diseases ) .
Studies have shown that most of  the   भाषा  processing functions are carried out in  the  cerebral cortex .
The essential function  of  the cortical language areas is symbolic representation  .
भी  though language  exists  in  अलग  forms , all of them are based on symbolic representation .
The Bugatti Veyron EB 16.4 is a mid-engined grand touring  car  , designed  और  developed  by  the  volkswagen  Group and manufactured in Molsheim , France by Bugatti Automobiles S.A.S  .
The Super  खेल  version of the Veyron  is  the fastest street-legal production  car  in the world , with a top speed of  .
the  original version  रै  a top  गति  of .
It was named Car of the  दशक  (  2000–2009  ) by the BBC television programme Top Gear  .
The standard  veyron  won Top Gears  बेहतरीन  Car Driven  सब  Year award  in   2005   .
On 6 April 2013 , Bugatti set the record for the fastest roadster  in  the  संसार  with the  veyron  Grand Sport Vitesse , reaching on  औसत  a top speed of .
the  Veyron 's  मुख्य  designer was Hartmut Warkuss , and  the  exterior was designed by Jozef Kabaň of Volkswagen ,  साथ  much of  the  engineering work  होने  conducted under the  मार्गदर्शन  of  अभियान्त्रिकी  chief  वुल्फगांग   schreiber  .
A number of special  विसंगतियाँ  have been  उत्पादित  .
in  December  2010  , Bugatti began offering prospective buyers the ability to customize  exterior   और  interiors colours by using  the  Veyron 16.4 Configurator application on  the  marque  's   आधिकारिक  website .
DVD is an optical  डिस्क  storage format ,  invented  and  विकसित  by Philips , Sony , Toshiba  ,  and Panasonic in 1995 .
DVDs offer higher storage  क्षमता  than compact discs while having the  वही  dimensions .
Pre-recorded DVDs are mass-produced using molding machines that physically  स्टैम्प  data onto the DVD .
Such discs are known as DVD- ROM  ,  because data can only be read and not written  nor  erased .
Blank recordable DVD discs ( DVD-R and DVD+R )  can  be recorded once using a DVD recorder and then function as a DVD-ROM . Rewritable  dvds  (  dvd-rw  , DVD+RW , and DVD-RAM ) can be recorded  और  erased multiple times .
dvds  are used in DVD-Video consumer digital video format and  in  DVD-Audio consumer digital audio format , as well as for authoring AVCHD discs .
DVDs containing other types of information may be referred to as DVD  आंकड़ा   discs  .
कया  Chilli Wants  is  an  अमरीकी  reality series on VH1  अभिनीत  Chilli  ,   one-third  of the  ग्रैमी  Award  -winning  R  &  B trio TLC .
the  show  क्रॉनिकल्स  Chilli  's   क्वेस्ट  to find love with the help of Tionna T. Smalls , an author and relationship coach .
the  series premiered on April  11  , 2010  ,  and has since been renewed for a second season .
The second season premiered on Sunday ,  जनवरी  2 , 2011 .
Peter Gene Hernandez ( born October  8   ,  1985 ) ,  ज्ञात   by  his stage name Bruno Mars ,  is   an  American singer-songwriter and record producer .
Raised in Honolulu , Hawaii , by a family of musicians , Mars  began  making music at a young age  और   performed  in various  musical  venues in his  गृहनगर  throughout his childhood .
He  ग्रैजुएट  from high school and then moved to Los Angeles , California , to  pursue  a musical career .
Mars produced songs for other  कलाकारों  , joining production  टोली   the  Smeezingtons .
Mars had  an  unsuccessful stint with Motown Records ,  लकिन  then signed with Atlantic in 2009 .
He became recognized as a solo artist after lending  उसके   vocals   और  co-writing the hooks for the songs `` Nothin ' on You `` by B.o.B , and  ``  Billionaire `` by Travie McCoy .
He  भी  co-wrote the  हिट्स  ``  सही  Round `` by Flo Rida featuring Ke $ ha ,  और  ``  wavin   '   ध्वज  `` by K'naan .
In October 2010 , he released his debut album , Doo-Wops & Hooligans  .
Anchored by the worldwide  number-one   singles   ``  Just the Way You Are  ``  and `` Grenade  ``  , the album peaked  at  number three on the Billboard 200 .
Mars was  मनोनीत  for seven Grammys at  the  53rd  ग्रैमी  Awards  ,  winning Best Male Pop Vocal Performance for `` Just  the  Way You Are ''  .
His second studio album , Unorthodox Jukebox  ,  was released  on  December 11 , 2012 .
Mars ' music is noted for displaying a wide variety of styles and  प्रभाव  , and contains elements of  अनेक  musical genres .
he  has  worked  with  an  assortment of artists from  विभिन्न  genres .
As a child , he was highly influenced by artists such  as   छोटी  Richard , Elvis  प्रेस्ली  and Michael Jackson and would often impersonate these artists  इससे   a  young  आयु  .
मंगल  also incorporates reggae  -   और  Motown -inspired  ध्वनि   into   उसके  work  .
Worldwide , Mars became the best-selling  डिजिटल  artist in 2011 .
He had three singles in the top ten  ,  including first place with ``  बस  the Way  तुम  Are  ''  , which sold 12.5 million  नक़ल  .
Mars won  बेहतरीन   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Male Solo Artist at  the  2012 BRIT Awards .
Bruno Mars  रै  sold 6  लाख  albums and 40 million singles worldwide as a singer  .
Althought as  a  song-writer ,  निर्माता  and  सिंगर  his total single download  बिक्री  surpass 100 million worldwide .
बस्ट  of Zeus  ,  Otricoli ( Sala Rotonda , Museo Pio-Clementino , Vatican ) .
यूनानी   mythology  is the body  of  myths  और  teachings that belong to the ancient Greeks ,  concerning  their gods and heroes , the nature of the world , and the origins and  significance  of  उनके  own cult and  अनुष्ठान  practices .
It was a part  of   the  religion in ancient Greece and  is  part of  धर्म  in modern  यूनानियों  and  around  the world , known  as  Hellenismos .
Modern scholars refer to and study the myths in an attempt  to  throw light  on  the  धार्मिक   और  political institutions  of  Ancient Greece  और  its civilization  ,   और  to gain understanding of  the  nature of myth-making itself .
Greek mythology is explicitly embodied in a large collection of narratives  ,  and implicitly in Greek representational arts , such as vase-paintings  और  votive gifts .
Greek myth  कोशिशें  to explain the origins  of  the  संसार   ,   और   विवरण  the  जीवनदान  and adventures of  a  wide variety of gods ,  देवियाँ  , heroes , heroines ,  और  mythological  जीव  .
ये  accounts initially were disseminated in an oral-poetic tradition ; today the Greek myths are known primarily from Greek literature  .
The  oldest  known Greek  साहित्यिक  sources , Homer 's  एपिक  poems Iliad  और  Odyssey , focus on  कार्यक्रम  surrounding the  trojan  War .
Two poems  by  Homer 's near contemporary Hesiod , the Theogony and the Works and Days  ,  contain accounts of the genesis of the world , the succession of divine  शासकों   ,  the succession of human ages , the origin of human woes , and the origin of sacrificial practices .
मिथकों   हैं  also preserved in the Homeric  hymns  , in fragments of epic poems of the Epic Cycle  ,  in lyric poems , in the works of  the  tragedians of the fifth century BC , in writings  of  scholars and poets of the Hellenistic Age ,  और  in texts from the time of the  रोमन  Empire by writers such as Plutarch  और   pausanias   .
पुरातत्व   निष्कर्षों  provide a principal source of detail about Greek mythology , with gods and heroes featured prominently  in  the decoration of many artifacts  .
ज्यामितीय  designs  on  pottery of the  आठवीं  century BC depict scenes from the Trojan cycle as well as the adventures of Heracles .
in  the succeeding Archaic , Classical , and  hellenistic  periods , Homeric and various other mythological scenes appear , supplementing the existing  साहित्यिक  evidence .
Greek mythology has had  an   extensive  influence on  the  culture ,  कला  ,  और  literature of Western civilization  और  remains part of  पश्चिमी  heritage  और  language .
कवियों  and artists  इससे  ancient times  to   the  present have derived inspiration  इससे  Greek  mythology  and have discovered contemporary significance and relevance  in  the themes .

The Boise State Broncos football program represents Boise State University in  कॉलेज  football and compete in the Football Bowl Subdivision ( FBS  )  of Division I as a member  of  the Mountain  वेस्ट  Conference .
They are currently led by head  कोच  Chris Petersen and play their home games  at  Bronco Stadium  .
the   फ़्रैंक  ( sign :  fr  . or SFr . ;  जर्मनी   :   franken  , French and Romansh  :  franc ,  इतालवी  :  फ्रेंको   ;  code  :  CHF ) is  the  currency  और  legal tender of Switzerland  और  Liechtenstein ; it  is  also legal tender in the Italian exclave Campione  d'italia  .
Although not  formally  legal tender in the German exclave  büsingen  ( the sole  विधिक  currency is the euro ) , it is in  चौड़ी  daily use  वहीँ  .
The Swiss National Bank issues banknotes  और  the federal mint Swissmint issues coins .
The  स्विस  franc is the only version of the franc still issued in Europe .
The  छोटी  denomination ,  a   hundredth  of a franc , is a Rappen ( Rp . ) in German ,  centime   (  c. )  in  French  ,  centesimo ( ct. ) in Italian , and rap ( rp . )  in  Romansh .
The ISO code of the currency used  by  banks  और   वित्तीय  institutions  is  CHF , although `` Fr .  ''  is used  by  most  व्यवसायों  and advertisers ; some use SFr . ; the Latinate ``  ch  ''  स्टैंड  for Confoederatio  helvetica  .
Given the  अलग  languages used in Switzerland ,  लैटिन  is used for language-neutral inscriptions on the coins .
Sir Charles Spencer `` Charlie '' Chaplin  ,  ( 16 April 188925 December 1977 ) was a British  कॉमिक  actor and filmmaker who rose to fame  in  the silent era  .
Chaplin became a worldwide  प्रतीक  through his screen persona  ``  the  ट्रैम्प   ``  and  is  considered  एक  of the  सबसे  important figures  of  the film industry  .
His career spanned more than 75 years , from a  चाइल्ड  in the Victorian era to close to  उसके  death at the age  of  88  ,  and encompassed both adulation and controversy .
Raised in London  ,   चैपलिन  's childhood was defined  by   गरीबी  and hardship .
He was sent to a workhouse twice before  the  age  of   नौ  ; his father was absent  ,  and  उसके   माँ  was committed to a mental asylum .
Chaplin  began  performing from a young age ,  touring  music halls  और   बाद   working  as  a  stage actor and comedian .
At  19  he  थी  signed  to   the  prestigious  फ्रेड  Karno  कम्पनी  ,  जिससे  took him to America .
Chaplin was scouted by the film  उद्योग  , and made his first  दिखावे  in 1914  साथ   keystone  Studios .
He soon developed  the  Tramp persona and formed a large fan base .
Chaplin directed his films from  an  early stage  ,  and continued  to  hone his  शिल्प  as he moved to the Essanay , Mutual , and First National corporations .
By 1918 , he  थी  one of the most famous men in the world .
In 1919 , Chaplin  co-founded  the distribution company United Artists  ,  giving him complete control over his films .
उसके  first feature-length picture was The  बच्चा   (  1921  )  , followed by A Woman of Paris (  1923  ) , The Gold  फटाफट  ( 1925 ) , and The Circus ( 1928 ) .
he   refused  to  मूव  to sound films in the 1930s  ,  instead producing City  लाइट्स  (  1931  ) and Modern Times  (  1936 )  बगैर  dialogue .
Chaplin became increasingly political and his  अगला  film , The Great Dictator  (  1940 ) ,  satirised  Adolf Hitler .
the   1940s  was a decade marked with controversy for Chaplin , and his popularity declined rapidly .
He was accused of communist sympathies ,  जबकि  his involvement in  a  paternity suit  और  marriages  to  much younger  महिलाओं  were considered scandalous  .
An  एफबीआई   छानबीन  was opened on Chaplin , and  he  was eventually forced to leave the United States and  settle   in  Switzerland .
He abandoned the Tramp for  उसके  later films , which  शामिल  Monsieur Verdoux ( 1947 ) , Limelight ( 1952  )   ,  A King in  नई  York ( 1957 )  ,  and A Countess From  हांग  Kong ( 1967  )   .
Chaplin  लिखा  , directed , produced , edited  ,  scored , and  स्ट्रक्चर   in  most of his films .
He was a  perfectionist  , and his financial independence meant he  प्रायः  spent  सालो   on  the development  और  production of a picture .
His films are characterised by slapstick combined  साथ  pathos , and often feature the Tramp struggling against adversity .
अनेक  contain social and political themes , as well as autobiographical elements  .
in  1972 ,  as  part  of   a  renewed appreciation  लिये  his work , Chaplin received  an  Honorary Academy Award for ``  the  incalculable effect he has had in  बनाना  motion pictures the art  रूप  of this century ''  .
He continues to  be  held in high  लिहाज़  ,  साथ  The Gold Rush , City Lights , Modern  टाइम्स  , and The Great Dictator often ranked among the greatest films  of  all time .
Planned Parenthood Federation of America ( PPFA )  ,   commonly  shortened to Planned Parenthood , is  the   u.S.  affiliate of the International  नियोजित   parenthood   संघ  ( IPPF  )  and one  of  its  larger   सदस्यों  .
PPFA is  a  non-profit  संगठन   providing  reproductive health and maternal and  चाइल्ड  health services .
The Planned Parenthood Action Fund  ,  Inc. (  ppaf  ) is a  सम्बन्धित   संगठन  which lobbies for  pro-choice  legislation , comprehensive sex  शिक्षा  , and access to  सस्ती  health  परवाह  in the United States .
Planned  parenthood  is the largest U.S. provider of reproductive health services  ,  including cancer screening ,  hiv   स्क्रीनिंग  and counseling , contraception ,  और  abortion .
Contraception accounts for 35 % of PPFA 's total services and  abortions  account for 3 % ; PPFA conducts roughly 300,000  abortions   प्रत्येक  year , among 3  लाख  people served  .
The organization has its roots in Brooklyn , New York , where  मार्गरेट  Sanger opened the country 's  पहला  birth-control clinic .
Sanger  संस्थापित  the American Birth  कंट्रोल  League in 1921 , which in 1942 became part  of  the Planned Parenthood Federation of  अमेरिका   .
Since then ,  नियोजित  Parenthood has grown  to  have over 820  क्लिनिक  locations  in  the U.S. ,  साथ  a total budget of US $ 1 billion .
PPFA provides an array of services to over three million people in the United States ,  और  supports services for over one million clients outside the United States .
Mens rea is Latin  लिये  `` guilty  दिमाग  '' .
In criminal law ,  it   is   viewed   as  one  of  the necessary elements of some  अपराधों   .
The standard  आम  law test of criminal liability  is  usually expressed in the Latin phrase , actus  गैर  facit reum nisi mens  बैठना  rea , which means  ``  the act is not  culpable  unless the mind is guilty  ''  .
Thus , in  jurisdictions  with due process  ,   वहीँ  must be an actus reus , or  ``  guilty  अधिनियम  , ''  accompanied   by  some level of  पुरुषों  rea to constitute the crime with which the defendant is charged (  देखिए  the technical requirement  of  concurrence  )  .
as   a   सामान्य  rule , criminal liability does  नहीं  attach to a person who acted with the absence  of  mental fault .
The exception is strict liability crimes .
In civil law  ,   it  is  प्रायः  not necessary to  prove   a  subjective mental element to establish  देयता  for breach of contract  or  tort ,  लिये   उदाहरण  .
However  ,  if a  अपकृत्य  is intentionally  वचनबद्ध  or a contract  is  intentionally breached , such intent  may  increase the scope  of  liability  as  well as the measure  of  damages payable to the plaintiff  .
Therefore , mens rea  refers  to the mental  तत्व   of   the  offence  कि  accompanies the actus reus .
In  कुछ   jurisdictions  , the terms mens rea  और  actus reus have been replaced by alternative terminology .
in  Australia , for example , the elements  of  the federal offences  हैं  now designated as ``  दोष  elements '' or `` mental elements ''  (  mens rea  )  and `` physical elements '' or `` external  तत्व  '' ( actus reus )  .
This terminology was adopted to replace  the  obscurity  of   the  Latin terms with simple  और   सटीक  phrasing .
Ulysses S. Grant ( born  hiram  Ulysses Grant ; April 27  ,  1822 –  जुलाई  23 , 1885  )  was the 18th  अध्यक्ष  of the United States ( 1869–1877  )  following his  अत्यधिक  successful role as a war general in  the  second half of the  सिविल  War .
Under Grant , the Union Army defeated the Confederate military ; having effectively ended the war and secession  साथ  the surrender  of  Robert E. Lee 's army at Appomattox .
As president he led the Radical Republicans in their effort  to  eliminate all vestiges of Confederate nationalism and slavery  .
Upset over uncontrolled violence  in   the  South and having  desired  to protect  अफ़्रीकी   अमरीकी  citizenship , President Grant effectively destroyed the Ku  klux  Klan  in  1871 .
Grant was  the  first  अध्यक्ष  to establish Civil Service reform having created a two-year federally funded Civil Service Commission in 1871 .
In terms of foreign policy , Grant revealed an `` unexpected capacity for deliberation and consultation '' that promoted the national interest .
उसके  reputation was marred by his repeated defense of  भ्रष्ट  appointees , and  by   अमेरिका  's first industrial  आयु  economic depression ( called the  ``  Panic of  1873  `` ) that dominated his second term .
हालांकि  his Republican Party split in  1872   साथ  reformers denouncing him  ,  Grant  थी  easily reelected .
By 1875 the conservative white  दक्षिणी  opposition regained control of every  राज्य  in the South and as he  बाएँ   the   श्वेत  House in  कूच  1877 his policies were being undone .
a  career soldier ,  he  graduated from the  संयुक्त  States Military Academy at West Point and served in the Mexican–American War .
जब   the  Civil War began  in  1861 , Grant trained Union volunteer regiments in Illinois .
In  1862   ,  as  a  general he fought a series of battles and was promoted to major  सामान्य  after forcing the surrender of a large  confederate  army and gaining control  of   केंटकी  and most of Tennessee  .
He then led Union forces to victory after initial setbacks in the Battle of Shiloh , earning a reputation as an aggressive commander .
In  जुलाई  1863 ,  बाद  a long  ,  complex campaign , Grant defeated five uncoordinated Confederate armies ( capturing one of them ) and seized Vicksburg .
This famous victory gave  the  Union full  कंट्रोल  of the Mississippi River , split off the western  confederacy   ,  and opened the way for more Union triumphs .
After another win at the  बैटल  of Chattanooga in late  1863  , President Abraham Lincoln made him lieutenant general  और  commander of all of the Union Armies .
as  commanding  सामान्य   of  the army , Grant confronted Robert  E.  Lee in a series of very bloody battles in 1864 known as the Overland  अभियान  that ended with the bottling up of Lee  at  Petersburg , outside the  confederate  capital of Richmond .
During the siege  ,  Grant coordinated a  श्रेणी  of  विनाशकारी  campaigns launched by William Tecumseh Sherman , Philip Sheridan , and George  थामस  .
Finally breaking through Lee 's trenches , the Union Army captured Richmond in April 1865 .
Lee surrendered his depleted forces to  ग्रान्ट   at  Appomattox as the Confederacy collapsed .
Although pro-Confederate  इतिहासकारों  attacked Grant as a ruthless butcher  जो  won by  brute  force  ,  most historians have hailed his military genius .
Grant 's two consecutive terms as  अध्यक्ष   stabilized  the nation  बाद  the American Civil War and during the turbulent Reconstruction period that followed .
As president , he enforced Reconstruction by enforcing civil rights laws and fighting Ku Klux Klan  हिंसा  .
Grant  जीती  passage of the Fifteenth Amendment ;  giving  constitutional protection  लिये  African-American voting rights .
He used  the  army to build the Republican Party in the South , based  on  black voters ,  उत्तरी  newcomers ( `` Carpetbaggers `` )  और  native white supporters ( `` Scalawags . '' )
As a result , African Americans  यहूद   represented  in the  u.S.   कॉंग्रेस  for the first time in American history in 1870 .
Reformers praised Grant 's Indian peace policy by  having  broken  the  deadlock on Indian  appropriations  in Congress  ,   the  creation of  the  Board of Indian Commissioners to make reform recommendations , and his  enlistment  of Quaker Protestants who controlled mid western Indian agencies , that effectively curbed Congressional patronage .
ग्रान्ट  remained determined in keeping  इंडियंस  from being exterminated from white settler encroachment or by the U.S. military .
Grant 's reputation as  अध्यक्ष  by  1875  was  at  an all-time  ऊँची  for  उसके   पिछला   वीटो   of  the Inflation  विधेयक  ,  the  passage of the Resumption of  specie   अधिनियम  , and  सचिव  Bristow 's successful raids that shut down  the  Whiskey  रिंग  .
Grant 's  विदेशी  policy , led by Secretary of State  हैमिल्टन  Fish , implemented International Arbitration  ,   settled  the Alabama Claims with Britain  और  avoided war  साथ  Spain  over  the Virginius Affair .
a   ज्यूकबॉक्स   is  a partially automated music-playing device , usually a coin-operated machine , that will play a  संरक्षक  's selection from self-contained media  .
the  classic jukebox has buttons  साथ   अक्षर  and numbers on them that , when entered in combination ,  हैं  used to play a  विशिष्ट  selection  .
A drug test is a technical analysis of a biological specimen – for  उदाहरण  urine ,  बाल  , blood , sweat ,  or  oral fluid /  लार  – to  determine  the presence or absence of specified  जनक  drugs or their metabolites  .
प्रमुख   उपयोग  of drug  परीक्षण  are to detect the presence of performance enhancing steroids in sport or for  दवाएँ  prohibited by  कानून  , such as  कैनबिस  , cocaine and heroin .
a   ``  10-panel urine  स्क्रीन  '' consists of the following:
Amphetamines ( including Methamphetamine )
Barbiturates
benzodiazepines
Cannabinoids ( THC )
Cocaine
Methadone
Methaqualone
Opiates ( Codeine , Morphine , Heroin , Oxycodone , Hydrocodone , etc . )
phencyclidine  ( PCP )
Propoxyphene

स्पेस  exploration is the discovery and exploration of outer  स्पेस  by  अर्थात्  of space technology .
Physical exploration of space is conducted  दोनो  by human spaceflights and by  रोबोटिक   spacecraft  .
जबकि  the  अवलोकन  of  वस्तुएँ  in space  ,   ज्ञात  as astronomy , predates reliable recorded history , it was the development of large and relatively  कुशल  rockets during the early  20th  century that  अनुमत   शारीरिक  space  खोजी  to become a reality .
Common rationales for exploring space include  advancing   वैज्ञानिक  research ,  uniting  different nations , ensuring the future  अस्तित्व  of humanity and developing military and  रणनीतिक  advantages against other  देशों  .
विभिन्न   आलोचनाओं  of  स्पेस  exploration are sometimes made .
स्पेस  exploration has often been  प्रयुक्त  as  a  proxy  प्रतियोगिता  for geopolitical rivalries  ऐसे  as the Cold War .
