The early era  of   स्पेस  exploration was driven by a `` Space Race  ``   between  the  सोवियत  Union and the United States , the launch of the first man-made object to orbit the Earth , the USSR 's Sputnik 1 ,  on  4 October 1957 , and the first Moon landing by the American Apollo 11  शिल्प  on  20  July 1969 are often taken as the boundaries for this initial period .
The Soviet space  कार्यक्रम   हासिल  many of the  पहला  milestones , including the first  जीना  being in orbit in 1957 , the first human  spaceflight  ( Yuri Gagarin  सवार  Vostok 1 ) in 1961 , the  पहला  spacewalk  (  by  aleksei  Leonov ) on 18 March 1965 ,  the  first  स्वचालित  landing on another celestial body in 1966 , and the launch  of  the first space station ( Salyut  1  ) in 1971 .
After the first 20 years of  खोजी  , focus shifted from one-off flights to  बेदर्दी  hardware ,  ऐसे   as   the  Space Shuttle program  ,  and from competition to cooperation as  साथ  the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Space Station  (  ISS )  .
With the substantial completion of the ISS following STS-133 in March 2011  ,  plans  लिये   स्पेस  exploration by the USA remain in  फ्लक्स  .
Constellation  ,  a Bush Administration program for a return to  the   चंद्रमा  by  2020  was judged inadequately  वित्तपोषित  and unrealistic by an expert review panel reporting in 2009  .
The Obama  प्रशासन  proposed a revision  of  Constellation in 2010 to focus  on  the development of the capability for  crewed   मिशन  beyond low earth orbit  (  LEO ) , envisioning extending the  आपरेशन  of the  iss  beyond 2020  ,  transferring  the  development  of  launch vehicles for  इंसान  crews from  नासा  to  the  private sector  ,   और  developing technology  to  enable missions to  परे  LEO , such as Earth/Moon L1 , the Moon , Earth/Sun L2 , near-earth asteroids , and Phobos  or  Mars orbit .
As of March  2011   ,  the US  सीनेट  and House of  प्रतिनिधि  are still working towards  a  compromise NASA funding bill ,  जिससे  will probably terminate Constellation and fund development of a heavy lift launch vehicle ( HLLV  )  .
In the 2000s  ,  the People 's Republic of China initiated a successful  मानवयुक्त  spaceflight  कार्यक्रम  ,  जबकि   the  European  संघ  , Japan , and India have also planned future manned space  मिशन   .
चीन  , Russia  ,  Japan , and India have advocated manned missions to the Moon during the 21st century , while the European Union has  advocated  manned missions to both  the  Moon and Mars during the 21st  सदी  .
From the 1990s onwards , private interests began promoting space tourism and then  निजी   स्पेस   खोजी   of  the Moon ( see Google Lunar X Prize )  .
John Calvin Coolidge  ,   jr.   (   जुलाई  4 ,  1872january   5   ,  1933 ) was the 30th  अध्यक्ष   of  the  संयुक्त  States ( 1923–1929 ) .
A Republican lawyer from Vermont , Coolidge worked  उसके   रास्ता  up  the  ladder of  मैसाचुसेट्स   राज्य  politics ,  आखिरकार   बनने  governor of that state .
His conduct during the Boston  पुलिस  Strike of 1919 thrust him into the  नेशनल  spotlight  और  gave him a reputation as a man of decisive  कार्रवाई  .
Soon after , he  थी  elected  as  the 29th Vice President in 1920 and  succeeded  to the Presidency upon  the  sudden death of  वारेन  G. Harding in 1923 .
Elected in his own right in 1924  ,   he  gained a reputation as a small-government conservative  ,  and also as a man  जो  said very little .
Coolidge restored public confidence in the White House after the scandals of his predecessor 's administration  ,  and left office with considerable  लोकप्रियता  .
As a Coolidge biographer  put  it ,  ``  He  समाविष्ट  the  स्पिरिट  and hopes of the  मध्य  class  ,  could interpret their longings and express  उनके  opinions .
That he did represent  the  genius of the average is  the   सबसे  convincing proof of his strength . ''
Some  बाद  criticized Coolidge  as  part  of  a  सामान्य  criticism of laissez-faire government .
His reputation underwent  a  renaissance during the Ronald Reagan Administration  ,  but  the  ultimate  मूल्यांकन  of his presidency is still  विभाजित  between those who approve  of  his reduction  of  the size of  सरकारी  programs and those who believe  the   संघीय   सरकारी  should be more involved  in   regulating   और  controlling the economy .
Espresso is  a  concentrated beverage brewed by  forcing  a  छोटी  amount of nearly boiling  जल   अंतर्गत  pressure through finely ground coffee beans  .
Espresso often has a  thicker   संगति  than coffee brewed  by  other methods  ,  a  उच्चतर  concentration of suspended and dissolved  solids  ,  और  crema ( meaning cream , but being a reference to the foam with a  मलाईदार  texture that forms as a result of  the  pressure  )  .
as  a result of the pressurized brewing process the flavors and chemicals in a typical cup of espresso are very concentrated .
एस्प्रेसो   is  the base for other drinks , such as a latte , cappuccino , macchiato , mocha , or americano  .
Espresso has more caffeine per unit  आवाज़  than most beverages , but the usual serving size is smaller—a typical 60 mL ( 2  us  fluid ounce ) of espresso has 80 to  150  mg of  कैफीन   ,  little less than the 95  to  200  mg  of a standard 240 mL (  8  US fluid  औंस  ) cup of drip-brewed coffee  .
Brian  कैथ  Kelly ( born October 25 , 1961 ) is an American football  कोच  and former player .
He is currently the head football coach for  the  Notre Dame  लड़  Irish , a position  he  has  आयोजित  since  दिसम्बर  2009 .
Kelly was previously  सिर  coach at Grand Valley State University (  1991–2003  ) ,  सेंट्रल   मिशिगन   विश्वविद्यालयों  ( 2004–2006 ) ,  और  University of Cincinnati ( 2006–2009 ) .
A contract is an agreement having a lawful object entered  into  voluntarily by two or more parties , each of whom intends to create one or  अधिक  legal  दायित्वों  between them .
the  elements of  a  contract  हैं  `` offer ''  और  `` acceptance '' by `` competent persons  ''  having legal capacity who exchange `` consideration '' to  बनाएँ  ``  mutuality  of obligation . ''
Proof  of   कुछ   or  all of these  तत्व  may  be  done in writing ,  हालांकि  contracts may be made entirely orally  or  by conduct .
The  उपाय   लिये   उल्लंघन  of contract can be `` damages  ''  in the  रूप  of compensation of  धन  or specific  प्रदर्शन  enforced through an injunction .
Both of  ये  remedies award the party  at  loss the ``  लाभ  of  the   सौदेबाजी  '' or expectation damages , which are greater than mere reliance  क्षतिपूर्ति  , as in promissory estoppel  .
The parties may  be   प्राकृतिक   व्यक्तियों  or juristic persons .
a  contract is  a   legally  enforceable promise or undertaking that something will or will not  occur  .
The word promise can be used as a legal synonym for contract ,  हालांकि  care is required  as  a promise  may   नहीं  have the full standing of a contract , as when it is an agreement without consideration .
Contract law  varies   greatly  from one  क्षेत्राधिकार  to another , including differences in  आम  law compared to civil law , the impact of received law , particularly from England in  आम  law  देशों  ,  और  of law  संहिताबद्ध  in regional legislation .
Regarding  ऑस्ट्रेलियाई  Contract Law for example , there are  40  relevant  अधिनियमों   जिससे  impact on  the  interpretation of contract  at  the Commonwealth (  संघीय  / national ) level  ,  and an additional 26 acts  at  the level  of   the  state of NSW .
In addition there are  6  international instruments or conventions which are applicable for international  dealings  ,  ऐसे  as the  संयुक्त   राष्ट्र  Convention on  अनुबंध   लिये  the International  बिक्री   of  Goods .
Sidney Patrick Crosby  ,  ONS ( born August 7 , 1987 ) is a Canadian professional ice hockey player who is  कप्तान   of  the Pittsburgh Penguins of the National Hockey League (  एनएचएल  ) .
Crosby was drafted first overall by the Penguins out  of  the Quebec  प्रमुख  Junior Hockey League ( QMJHL ) .
During his two-year major junior career with the Rimouski  océanic   ,  he earned back-to-back CHL Player  of  the Year  पुरस्कार  and  led  his club to the 2005 Memorial  कप  final .
Nicknamed `` The Next One `` , he was one of the most highly regarded draft picks in hockey history , leading  अनेक   to  refer to the 2005 Draft Lottery as the `` Sidney Crosby  sweepstakes  ''  .
In his first NHL  ऋतु   ,  Crosby finished sixth  in  league scoring with  102  points ( 39 goals , 63 assists ) and was a runner-up for the Calder  मेमोरियल  Trophy ( won by  सिकंदर  Ovechkin  )   .
By his second  ऋतु  , he  led  the  एनएचएल  with 120  अंक  ( 36 goals , 84 assists  )  to capture the Art Ross  ट्रॉफी  ,  बनने  the youngest player and the only  किशोरावस्था  to win a scoring  शीर्षक   in  any major  उत्तर  American sports league .
That same season ,  crosby  also won the  हार्ट  Memorial Trophy as  the   पेशेवर   हॉकी   लेखक   संघ   's   चुनाव  for most valuable  खिलाड़ी  and  the  Lester B. Pearson Award  as  the NHL Players  संघ   's  choice for most  बकाया   खिलाड़ी  ,  बनने  the seventh player in NHL history  to  earn all three awards in one year .
Crosby  प्रारंभ  the 2007–08 season with the team 's  कप्तानी   और   subsequently  led them  to  the 2008 Stanley Cup Finals  ,  where  वे  were defeated  by   the  Detroit Red Wings in six games .
The Penguins returned to the  फाइनल  against  डेट्रॉयट   the  following  साल  and won  in  seven  खेल   ;  Crosby became  the  youngest captain in NHL history to win  the  Stanley Cup .
In the  2009–10  season ,  crosby  scored a career-high  51  goals , tying him with Steven Stamkos for the Rocket Richard Trophy as  the  league-leader ; with 58  assists   ,   he  totaled 109 points , second in the NHL  .
दौरान  the  off-season   ,  Crosby received  the  Mark Messier Leadership Award .
In  2010–11  , Crosby sustained  a  concussion as a result of hits  to  the head in back-to-back games .
The injury left him sidelined for ten and a  हाफ  months .
However , after playing eight games  in  the 2011–12  ऋतु   ,  Crosby 's concussion-like  लक्षण  returned in December  2011   ,   और  he did  नहीं   वापसी   जबतक  mid-March 2012 .
Internationally , Crosby  रै  represented Canada in numerous tournaments for the country 's junior and men  's  teams .
बाद  competing  in  the 2003 U-18  जूनियर  World Cup  ,  he represented Canada in back-to-back IIHF World U20 Championships , winning silver in 2004 and gold  in  2005 .
At the 2006 IIHF World Championship  ,  he led  the   टूर्नामेंट   in  scoring  ,   जबकि   भी  earning Top Forward and  all-star   टोली  honours .
Four years later , Crosby  थी  named to Team Canada for the 2010 Winter Olympics  in   वैंकूवर  .
Playing the United States  in   the  gold medal  खेल   ,  he scored  the  game-winning goal  in   ओवरटाइम  .
a  United States  cent  , also known  as  a penny .
`` My  दो  cents '' (  2¢  )  और   इसके  longer version `` put  my  two cents in '' is an United States ( US ) idiomatic expression  ,  taken from the original English idiom expression : to put in  ``  my two pennies worth '' or `` my tuppence worth  .   ''
It  is  used  to  preface  the  tentative stating of  one’s   राय   .
By deprecating the opinion to follow – suggesting its value is only two cents , a very small amount  –   the  user of the phrase hopes to lessen  the  impact  of   a  possibly statement , showing  politeness  and humility  .
However , it  is   भी  sometimes used with irony when expressing  a  strongly felt opinion .
the  phrase is also  प्रयुक्त  out of habit to preface uncontentious opinions  .
लिये  example:
The  चाइनीज  Civil  युद्ध   थी  a civil war in China fought between forces  वफ़ादार  to  the  government of  the  Republic of China led by the  kuomintang   (  KMT  )  and  शक्तियां  of the Communist Party of China ( CPC  )  .
The war began  in  April 1927 , amidst the  उत्तरी   expedition   ,  and  essentially  ended when major active battles ceased in  1950  .
The conflict  आखिरकार  resulted in two de  facto  states ,  the  Republic of China  (  ROC ) in Taiwan and the People 's Republic of China ( PRC ) in mainland China , both claiming to be  the  legitimate government of China  .
The  युद्ध  represented an  वैचारिक  split ( Left vs . Right ) between the Communist CPC  ,   और  the KMT 's brand of  राष्ट्रवाद   .
The civil  युद्ध   जारी   intermittently  until late 1937 ,  जब  the two parties formed a Second United Front to  काउंटर  a  जापानी   आक्रमण   .
China 's  full-scale  civil  युद्ध  resumed in  1946  , a year after the end of  hostilities  with Japan  .
After four more  सालो   ,  1950  देखी  the cessation of major military hostilities—with the  newly  founded People 's Republic of China controlling mainland China ( including Hainan ) , and the Republic of China  's  jurisdiction being restricted to Taiwan , Penghu , Quemoy , Matsu and  अनेक   outlying  islands .
The  kuomintang   शिकस्त  is attributed to several factors  :  Corruption - Chiang  लिखा  in his  डायरी  on  जून  1948 that the KMT  था  failed , not because of external enemies but because of rot from within  .
दमदार  initial support from the U.S.  diminished  ,  और   तब  , stopped .
(  Partly because of KMT  भ्रष्टाचार   और  anti-democratic regime , and partly because  of   the  uncertain U.S. foreign policy  towards  Communism  between  1945  और  1950 ) ; Communist land  सुधार   नीति  promised poor  peasants  farmland  इससे  their  जमींदार  .
इस  ensured  pla  popular support .
After the surrender  of  Japan at the end  of   संसार  War II  ,  Soviet forces  turned   over  their captured Japanese  हथियार   to  the CPC and allowed the CPC  to  take  कंट्रोल  of territory in  मंचूरिया  .
To this day , no armistice or peace treaty has ever been signed , and  it  is  debated  as to the whether the Civil War has legally ended .
Cross-Strait  संबंध   have  been hindered  by  military threats and political and economic pressure ,  विशेषकर  over Taiwan  's  political status , with both governments officially adhering to a `` One-China policy . ''
The  पीआरसी  still  actively  claims  ताईवान  as part  of  its territory and continues to threaten the ROC with a military invasion if the ROC officially  declares  independence by changing its name to and gaining international recognition as the Republic of Taiwan  .
The ROC  mutually  claims mainland China , and they both continue the fight over  राजनयिक  recognition .
Today ,  the  war as such occurs on  the  political  और  economic fronts in the form of cross-Strait  संबंध   ;  however , the two separate de facto states have close  आर्थिक  ties .
The  एक  Hundred Twelfth  संयुक्त  States Congress was the meeting of the legislative  शाखा   of   the  United States federal government , from January 3 , 2011 until January  3  , 2013 .
it   convened  in Washington , D.C.  on  January 3 , 2011 , and ended on January 3 ,  2013  , 17 days  पहले  the  समाप्त   of  the  अध्यक्षीय  term  to  which Barack Obama was elected in  2008  .
Senators  निर्वाचित  to regular terms in  2006  completed those terms in this  कॉंग्रेस  .
This Congress included  the  last House of  प्रतिनिधि  elected from  congressional  districts  कि  were  apportioned   आधारित  on the 2000 census  .
In the 2010 midterm elections , the Republican Party won the majority  in  the House of Representatives .
While  the   डेमोक्रेट  kept  उनके  Senate majority , it was reduced  इससे  the previous Congress .
This was the first  कॉंग्रेस  in which  the  House and Senate were controlled by  अलग   पार्टियों  since the 107th Congress ( 2001–2003  )   ,  and the first Congress to  शुरू  that way since the  99th   कॉंग्रेस  ( 1985–1987 ) .
In this Congress , the House  of  Representatives had the largest number of  रिपब्लिकन  members ,  242  , since the 80th Congress (  1947–1949  ) .
It was also the first Congress  चूंकि  1947 in which no member of the Kennedy family served , as well as the most politically polarized Congress since Reconstruction , with record low  स्वीकृति  ratings .
Wealth in  the  United States is commonly measured in terms of net worth  ,  which is the sum of all assets , including home equity , minus all  देनदारी  .
The total net worth of US households and nonprofit  संगठन   1945–2009   ,   unadjusted  for inflation or population change  .
For example , a  household   in  possession  of   an  $  800,000  house  ,  $ 5,000 in  परस्पर  funds , $ 30,000 in cars , $  20,000  worth  of  stock in their  अपना   कम्पनी  , and a  $  45,000  ira  would have assets totaling $ 900,000 .
Assuming that this household would have a $ 250,000 mortgage , $ 40,000 in  car  loans , and $ 10,000  in  credit card debt , its debts  होता   कुल  $  300,000  .
Subtracting the debts from  the  worth of  इस   household  's assets  (  900,000 - $ 300,000 =  $  600,000 ) , this household would have a  जाल   लायक  of $ 600,000 .
Net worth can vary with fluctuations in value of the underlying  एसेट  .
The wealth —more specifically , the median net worth—of households in the United States  is  varied  साथ   संबंध  to race ,  शिक्षा  , geographic location and gender .
As  एक  would expect  ,  households with greater income  विशेषता  the highest net worths , though high  आय  can not be taken as an always accurate  indicator  of net worth  .
Overall the number of wealthier households is on the rise , with baby boomers  hitting   the  highs of their  करियर   .
In addition  ,  wealth is unevenly distributed ,  साथ  the wealthiest 25 % of US  households  owning 87 % of the wealth in the United States , which  थी  $ 54.2 trillion in 2009 .
Including  इंसान  capital such as skills , the United Nations estimated the total wealth  of  the United States in 2008 to be $ 118  खरब   .
This article deals with Selective  पृष्ठीय  Rhizotomy  (   sdr  ) rather than the rhizotomy procedures for pain relief ; for those procedures , which have begun to take the  नाम  ``  rhizotomy  ''  in   निश्चित  instances , see  facet  rhizotomy and  समान   .
A rhizotomy ( ) is a term chiefly referring to  a  neurosurgical procedure  कि  selectively destroys  समस्यापूर्ण  nerve roots in the spinal cord , most often to  relieve  the symptoms of neuromuscular conditions  ऐसे  as spastic diplegia  और  other forms of spastic cerebral palsy .
The selective dorsal rhizotomy ( SDR )  लिये  spastic cerebral palsy has been the main  उपयोग  of rhizotomy for neurosurgeons specialising in spastic CP  चूंकि   the  1980s ; in this surgery , the spasticity-causing nerves  हैं  isolated and then targeted  और  destroyed .
The sensory nerve  जड़ें  , where spasticity is located , are first separated from the motor ones ,  और   the   तंत्रिका  fibres to be  काटें  are  तब  identified via  electromyographic  stimulation .
The ones producing spasticity are  तब   selectively   lesioned  with  छोटा  electrical  pulses  .
In spasticity , rhizotomy precisely targets  और  destroys the damaged  nerves   कि  don’t receive gamma amino butyric  एसिड  , which is the core  प्रॉब्लम  for people with spastic cerebral palsy .
These over-firing , non-GABA-absorbing nerves generate unusual electrical activity during the EMG  परीक्षण  phase in SDR  और  are thus  माना  to be the source of the  रोगी  's  hypertonia  ; they are eliminated with the  विद्युत  pulses  एकबार  identified  ,  while  the  remaining nerves and nerve routes carrying the  सही   संदेश  remain fully intact and untouched .
This means that the spasticity is permanently dissolved ,  और  that  इस  is done  बगैर  affecting nervous system sensitivity or function in  अन्य  areas , because the only nerves  नष्ट   हैं  the  over-firing  ones  जिम्मेदार  for the  मांसपेशी  tightness .
The terms rhizotomy and neurotomy are  भी  increasingly becoming interchangeable in the treatment of chronic back pain from degenerative disc disease .
This is a procedure called a  facet  rhizotomy  और  is  नहीं  a surgical procedure  लकिन  is instead done  on  an outpatient basis using a simple probe to apply  radiofrequency  waves  to  the  impinged  pain-causing nerve root  lying  between  the  facet joint and  the  vertebral body  .
Such radio frequency nerve lesioning results in five to  आठ  or more months of pain relief before  the  nerve regenerates and another round  of  the  कार्यविधि  needs to be performed .
a  facet rhizotomy is just one  of   अनेक  different forms of radiofrequency ablation ,  और  its use of the `` rhizotomy '' name should  नहीं  be confused with the SDR procedure .
migrant  workers in California , 1935
the  term  migrant  worker has different  आधिकारिक   meanings  and connotations in different parts of the world .
The United  राष्ट्र  '  परिभाषा  is  व्यापक  , including any people  working   बाहर  of  उनके  home country .
The term can  भी  be used to describe  किसी  who migrates  भीतर  a country , possibly their  अपना  , in  अनुक्रम  to pursue work such  as  seasonal work  .
Photograph of Lil Wayne with teardrop tattoos below his eyes .
The  teardrop  tattoo  or   आंसू  tattoo is a  सांकेतिक  tattoo that is placed underneath the eye .
It has no fixed meaning but  लगभग   सब  meanings  (  see below ) have some  कनेक्शन  to prison .
U.S.  रूट  75 is a north–south  u.S.  Highway .
The highway 's northern terminus is in  kittson  County , Minnesota  ,  at the Canadian border , where it once continued  as  Manitoba Highway 75 on the other side of  the  now-closed border crossing .
Its  दक्षिणी  terminus  is  at  अंतरराज्यीय   30  and Interstate 45  in  Dallas , Texas , where it is known  as  North  सेंट्रल   एक्सप्रेसवे  .
U.S. 75 was a  border-to-border  route , from Canada to the Gulf of Mexico at  galveston  , Texas .
However ,  the  entire segment  दक्षिण   of   डलास  , Texas has been decommissioned in favor  of  Interstate 45 , a cutoff section of town-to-town surface road having become State Highway 75 .
निम्नतर  Ninth Ward is  a  neighborhood  of  the city of New  ऑरलियन्स   .
as  the name  implies  , it is part of the  नवीं  Ward of New Orleans .
The Lower Ninth Ward is  प्रायः  thought  of  as the entire  क्षेत्रफल  within  नई  Orleans downriver of the Industrial  कनाल  ; however  ,   the  City Planning Commission divides  इस  area into the Lower Ninth Ward ( 2 ) and  पावन  Cross  (   3  ) neighborhoods .
The  पद  `` Lower ''  refers  to its location farther towards the  मुँह   of   the  Mississippi River , `` down '' or  ``   नीचे  '' the rest of the  नगर  in local geographic terminology .
But the 9th Ward , like all  wards  in  नई  Orleans , is a voting district .
The 9th Ward was added as a voting district  in  1852  .
The `` lower '' 9th Ward is composed of Ward 9 Districts 1 ,  2  , 4 , and  7   जिससे   मेक  up  the  Holy Cross Area and  वार्ड   9  Districts 3 , 5 , 6 , and 8 .
Higher voting district numbers in the 9th Ward ( 8-27 ) are on  the  upriver side  of   the   औद्योगिक  Canal .
The area came  to  national attention for  इसके   devastation  in the aftermath of Hurricane Katrina  in  2005 .
Hubble  दृश्य  of Copernicus  crater  ( inset ) , which is about 58  मील  ( 93 km  )   चौड़ी
रेड   और  orange tinted  चंद्रमा  ,  as  seen from Earth  दौरान  a lunar eclipse  ,  where the Earth  आता  between  the  Moon and Sun
the  Moon is the only  प्राकृतिक  satellite of the Earth , and the fifth  largest  satellite in the  सौर  System .
it   is  the  largest  natural satellite of a planet in  the  Solar System relative to the size of its primary , having 27 %  the  diameter and 60 % the density of Earth , resulting in its mass .
The Moon is the second  densest  satellite after Io ,  a  satellite  of   बृहस्पति  .
The Moon is in synchronous rotation  साथ   धरती   ,  always  प्रर्दशित  the same face with its near side marked by  अंधेरा  volcanic maria that fill between the bright ancient crustal highlands  और  the prominent impact craters .
It  is  the brightest object  in  the sky after the Sun , although its  सतह  is  दरअसल  very dark , with  a   reflectance  similar to that of coal .
Its prominence in the sky  और  its  नियमित   साईकिल  of  phases  have , since ancient times  ,  made the Moon  an  important cultural  influence   on   भाषा   ,  calendars , art  और  mythology  .
the  Moon 's gravitational influence produces  the  ocean tides  और   the  minute  lengthening  of the day .
The Moon 's  वर्तमान   कक्षीय   अलहदा   ,  about thirty times the diameter  of   the  Earth , causes it to appear almost the same  आकार   in   the  sky  as  the Sun , allowing it to cover the  सूर्य   nearly  precisely in total solar eclipses .
This  मिलान  of apparent visual  आकार   is  a coincidence .
the  Moon 's linear distance from the Earth is currently increasing at  a  rate of 3.82±0.07cm per  साल  , but this rate is not constant .
The Moon is  विचार   to   have  formed nearly 4.5 billion  सालो  ago , not long after the  धरती  .
Although there have been several hypotheses for its origin  in  the past , the current  सबसे  widely accepted explanation is  कि   the  Moon  formed  from  the   मलबा  left  over  after a giant  प्रभाव   between  Earth  और  a Mars -sized body .
The Moon is the only celestial body  अन्य  than Earth  on   जिससे  humans have  नियत  foot .
the  Soviet Union 's Luna programme was  the  first  to  reach  the  Moon  साथ  unmanned spacecraft in 1959 ; the United States '  नासा  Apollo program achieved  the  only manned  मिशन  to  तिथि  , beginning with the first manned lunar orbiting mission by Apollo 8 in 1968  ,   और   छह  manned  चंद्र  landings between 1969 and 1972 , with the first being  अपोलो  11  .
These missions returned  over  380 kg  of  lunar  रॉक्स  , which have been used  to  develop  a   geological  understanding of the Moon 's  origins  , the  गठन  of its internal structure , and its  subsequent   इतिहास  .
After the Apollo 17 mission  in  1972 , the Moon  रै   महरूम  visited  तभी  by unmanned  spacecraft  ,  notably  by  the  final Soviet  lunokhod  rover .
Since 2004  ,  Japan , China , India , the United States , and the European Space Agency  have  each sent lunar orbiters .
These spacecraft have contributed to confirming the discovery  of  lunar water ice in permanently  shadowed  craters at the  डंडे  and bound into the lunar regolith .
Future manned missions to the  चंद्रमा   have   महरूम  planned , including government as well as privately funded efforts .
The Moon remains , under the  बाहरी  Space Treaty  ,  free to all  राष्ट्र  to explore for peaceful purposes  .
Ronald Wilson  reagan  ( ; February 6 , 1911  –  June 5 , 2004 ) was  the  40th President of  the  United States (  1981–1989  )  .
Prior to that , he was the 33rd Governor  of   कैलिफ़ोर्निया  ( 1967–1975  )  , and a radio  ,  film  और   टेलीविज़न   कर्ता  .
born  in  tampico   ,   इलिनोइस   ,   और  raised  in  Dixon , Reagan was educated at Eureka  कॉलेज  , earning a Bachelor of Arts  उपाधि  in economics and sociology .
बाद  graduating , Reagan moved first to Iowa to work as a  रेडियो  broadcaster and then , in 1937 , to Los  एंजिल्स   जहाँ  he began  a  career  as  an actor , first in films  और   बाद  television .
Some  of   उसके  most notable  films  include  knute  Rockne , All American ( 1940 ) ,  किंग्स  Row ( 1942 ) , and Bedtime  लिये  Bonzo ( 1951 ) .
reagan  served as President of the  स्क्रीन   अभिनेताओं   गिल्ड  and later as  a   प्रवक्ता  for General  इलेक्ट्रिक  ( GE  )  ; his start in politics occurred  दौरान  his work for GE .
originally  a member of the Democratic  पार्टी  , his positions began shifting rightward in the 1950s ,  और  he switched to the Republican Party in 1962  .
After delivering  a  rousing  वाक  in support of Barry Goldwater 's presidential candidacy in 1964 , he was persuaded to seek the  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  governorship  ,  winning  दो  years later and again in 1970 .
He  थी  defeated  in  his run for the  रिपब्लिकन  presidential  नामांकन  in 1968 and in 1976 , but won both the nomination  और  general election in 1980 ,  defeating  incumbent  jimmy   कार्टर  .
As president , Reagan implemented sweeping new political and  आर्थिक  initiatives .
उसके   supply-side  economic policies , dubbed  ``   reaganomics  `` , advocated reducing tax rates to spur economic growth ,  controlling  the money supply to reduce inflation ,  deregulation  of the economy , and reducing government spending .
In his first term he survived  an  assassination attempt ,  took  a hard line against  मजदूर  unions  ,  announced a new War on Drugs , and ordered an invasion of  हरा   .
He was re-elected in a landslide in 1984 , proclaiming that it was `` Morning in America  ``  .
His  दूसरी  term was  primarily  marked by foreign matters , such as the ending of the Cold War , the 1986 bombing of Libya , and the revelation of the Iran-Contra affair .
Publicly describing the  सोवियत  Union as an  ``  evil empire `` , he supported anti-communist movements worldwide  और  spent his first term forgoing the strategy  of  détente by  ordering  a massive military buildup  in  an arms  रेस  with the USSR  .
Reagan  negotiated   साथ   सोवियत  General Secretary Mikhail Gorbachev , culminating in the INF Treaty  और  the decrease of  दोनो  countries  '  nuclear arsenals .
Reagan left office in 1989  .
In 1994 ,  the  former president  disclosed   कि  he had been diagnosed with  अल्जाइमर  's disease earlier in the year ;  he   died  ten years  बाद  at the age of  93   .
A conservative icon , he ranks highly in public opinion  पोल  of  u.S.   राष्ट्रपतियों  and  is  credited for generating an ideological renaissance on the American  राजनैतिक  right .
Complete set  of  scrolls  ,  constituting the entire Tanakh .
the  Tanakh (  ,  or  ;  also Tenakh , Tenak  ,  Tanach ) is a name used in Judaism for the canon of the Hebrew Bible .
The Tanakh is also known  as  the Masoretic Text or the Miqra  .
The name is an acronym formed from the initial Hebrew letters of the Masoretic Text 's three traditional subdivisions : The Torah ( `` Teaching  ''  , also known  as   the  Five Books  of  Moses )  ,  Nevi'im  (  `` Prophets ''  )  and Ketuvim ( `` Writings  ''  ) —hence TaNaKh .
the  name `` Miqra ''  (  מקרא ) , meaning  ``   कि  which is read ''  ,  is an alternative Hebrew term for the Tanakh .
the  books  of   the  Tanakh were relayed with an accompanying oral tradition  passed   on  by each generation  ,   पुकारा  the Oral Torah .
The Kawasaki Ninja ZX-6R  is  a  कावासाकी  600 cc class  खेल  motorcycle .
it  was introduced in  1995  ,  और   रै   महरूम  constantly  अद्यतनीकृत  throughout the years in response to new products from Honda  ,   suzuki   ,  and Yamaha .
The ZX series  is  what was known as the Ninja line of Kawasaki motorcycles in the 1980s and still carries the name  आज  .
Assassination attempts and  भूखंड  on Presidents of the United States have been  numerous   :  more than 20 attempts  to   मार  sitting and former presidents , as well as the Presidents-elect , are known  .
Four  बैठे   राष्ट्रपतियों   have  been killed  :  Abraham Lincoln ( the 16th President  )  , James A. Garfield ( the 20th President  )   ,  William McKinley (  the   25th   अध्यक्ष   )  and John F. Kennedy  (   the  35th President ) .
Two presidents were injured in attempted assassinations  :  former  अध्यक्ष   थियोडोर  Roosevelt  (  the 26th President ) , and President Ronald Reagan ( the 40th President ) .
Although  the  historian J.W .  क्लार्क  has suggested  कि  most American assassinations were politically motivated  क्रियाएँ   ,  carried  आउट  by rational men , not all such attacks have been  undertaken  for political  कारण  .
Some  हमलावर  had questionable mental stability ,  और  a few were judged legally insane .
चूंकि   the   वाइस  President  of   the  United  राज्य  has for  अधिक  than a century been elected  इससे   the   वही  political party as the  अध्यक्ष   ,  the assassination of the President is unlikely  to  result  in  major  नीति  changes .
This may explain why political groups typically do not make such attacks  .
जहाँ  the  रेड  Fern  grows  is a novel  लिखा  by Wilson Rawls  in  1961  परिचय   a  boy who  खरीदता  and trains two Redbone Coonhound hunting  कुत्तो  .
Oklahoma  (   )  (  pawnee  : Uukuhuúwa , Cayuga : Gahnawiyoˀgeh ) is a state located in  वेस्ट  South Central United  राज्य  .
Oklahoma is the 20th  सबसे  extensive and the 28th most populous of the 50 United  राज्य  .
The state 's name  is  derived from the  choctaw   शब्द  okla and  humma  , meaning  ``  red people '' , and it  is  known informally by its  उपनाम  , The Sooner State .
formed  by  the  combination of Oklahoma Territory  और  Indian Territory  on   नवम्बर   16  , 1907 , Oklahoma was  the  46th  राज्य  to enter  the  union .
Its residents are known  as  Oklahomans or  ,  informally  ``  Okies ''  ,  and its  पूंजी  and largest  नगर  is Oklahoma City  .
a  major producer of natural gas , oil , and agriculture , Oklahoma relies on an economic base of aviation , energy ,  दूरसंचार  , and  जैवप्रौद्योगिकी  .
it  has one  of   the  fastest  growing   economies  in  the  nation , ranking among the top states in per  capita   आय   विकास  and gross domestic product growth .
Oklahoma  नगर  and Tulsa serve as Oklahoma 's primary economic anchors , with nearly two thirds  of   oklahomans   जीना  within  उनके   महानगर   सांख्यिकीय  areas  .
With small  पहाड़   सीमाएँ  , prairie ,  mesas  , and eastern forests , most of  ओक्लाहोमा  lies in the Great  मैदान  and the U.S . Interior Highlands —a region especially prone to severe weather .
In addition to having a prevalence of  अंग्रेज़ी  , German , Scottish , Irish and Native American ancestry , more than  25  Native American languages are spoken  in  Oklahoma  ,   दूसरी  only to California .
Oklahoma is located on a  संगम   of  three major American  सांस्कृतिक  regions and  historically  served  as  a route for  चौपायों  drives , a destination for southern settlers  ,  and  a   government-sanctioned   territory  for Native Americans .
Redwall ,  by  Brian  ज़ाक   ,  is  a   श्रेणी  of  children  's  काल्पनिक  novels .
It is  the   शीर्षक   of  the  पहला  book of the series ,  प्रकाशित  in 1986 , as well as the name  of  the  ऐबी  featured in the book and the name of an animated TV series based on  तीन  of the novels  (   redwall  , Mattimeo , and Martin the Warrior  )  , which first aired in 1999 .
the  books are primarily aimed at older children , but have fans of all ages  .
There have been twenty-two  novels  and  दो  picture books published .
The  twenty-second  , and final , novel , The Rogue Crew , was posthumously released on May 3 , 2011 .
प्राकृतिक  Gas is usually  measured  by volume in the United States and is stated  in  cubic feet .
A cubic  पैर   of  gas is  the  amount of gas needed to fill a volume  of  one cubic foot under set conditions of pressure and temperature.To measure larger  amounts  of natural gas , a  ``   therm  '' is used to denote 100  घन   फीट  , and `` mcf '' is  प्रयुक्त  to denote 1,000 cubic feet .
To provide greater accuracy in comparing fuels , energy content  is  measured in terms of ``  अंग्रेजों  Thermal Units ( BTU 's )  .  ''
A BTU is the  राशि  of heat required to raise one pound  of  water ( approximately a pint  )   ,  one degree Fahrenheit at or close to its point of maximum density .
One  अंग्रेजों  therm ( symbol thm ) is a non-  si  unit  of  heat  उर्जा   बराबर  to 100,000 British thermal units  (  BTU  )  .
It  is  approximately the energy equivalent of burning  100   घन  feet ( often referred to as 1 CCF ) of natural gas .
Since ( Natural Gas  )   मीटर  measure volume and not energy  सामग्री  ,  a  therm factor  is  used by ( Natural ) gas companies  to  convert the volume of gas  प्रयुक्त   to  its heat equivalent  ,  and thus calculate the actual energy use .
The  therm   फ़ैक्टर   is   प्रायः  in the units therms/CCF  .
it   होगा  vary with the mix of hydrocarbons  in  the  प्राकृतिक  gas .
Natural gas with a  उच्चतर  than average  विशेषज्ञता  of ethane , propane or  ब्यूटेन   होगा   have  a higher therm  फ़ैक्टर  .
Impurities ,  ऐसे  as carbon dioxide  or   नाइट्रोजन  , lower the therm factor .
The volume of the gas is calculated  as  if  measured  at  मानक  temperature and pressure ( STP )  .
The  ऊष्मा  content of  प्राकृतिक  gas is solely dependent on the composition of the gas  ,   और  is  स्वतंत्र  of temperature and pressure .
One  therm  is equal to about 105.5 megajoules ,  25,200   kilocalories  or 29.3 kilowatt-hours .
One therm can also be  provided  by about of natural gas  .
The therm  sometimes   रै  been confused with the thermie  (  see below ) .
the  names of both units come  इससे   the  Greek  शब्द  for  ऊष्मा  .
A thermie ( th ) is a  मीट्रिक   ईकाई  of heat energy ,  भाग  of  the  meter-tonne-second system sometimes used by European  इंजीनियर्स  .
The thermie is equal to the amount of energy  जरूरी  to raise the temperature of 1 tonne of water by  1  °C .
The thermie is equivalent  to  1,000 kilocalories , 4.1868  megajoules  or 3968.3 BTU .
The American Civil War ( ACW ) , also  ज्ञात  as the  युद्ध   between  the States or simply  the  Civil War ( see naming  )   ,  was a  सिविल  war  लड़ा  from 1861  to  1865 between the United States ( the  ``  Union '' or the `` North '' ) and several Southern slave states that declared their  secession  and  formed   the  Confederate States of America  (  the `` Confederacy  ''  or the `` South '' ) .
The war had its origin in the  समस्या  of slavery , especially the  एक्सटेंशन   of  slavery into the western territories .
Foreign  शक्तियां  did not intervene .
After four years  of  bloody combat that left over 600,000 soldiers  मुर्दे  and destroyed much of the South 's infrastructure ,  the  Confederacy collapsed , slavery  थी  abolished , and the difficult  पुनर्निर्माण  process of restoring  नेशनल   एकता  and guaranteeing  अधिकारों   to  the freed  स्लेव  began .
In  the  1860 presidential election , Republicans , led  by  Abraham Lincoln , opposed expanding slavery  into  United States ' territories .
Lincoln won ,  लकिन  before his inauguration on March 4 ,  1861  , seven cotton-based slave states formed  the  Confederacy  .
Outgoing Democratic President  जेम्स  Buchanan and the incoming Republicans rejected secession as  illegal  .
Lincoln 's inaugural address declared  उसके  administration  होता   नहीं  initiate civil war .
Eight remaining slave  राज्य  continued to  अस्वीकृत  calls for  secession  .
Confederate forces seized numerous federal forts  भीतर  territory  claimed  by  the  Confederacy .
a  Peace Conference failed to find a compromise , and both sides prepared for war .
The Confederates  assumed  that European  देशों  were so dependent  on  ``  किंग   कपास  `` that they would intervene ;  none  did and none recognized the new Confederate  राज्य   of  America  .
Hostilities began on April 12 , 1861 , when Confederate forces fired upon Fort  sumter  , a key fort  आयोजित  by Union troops in  दक्षिण  Carolina .
Lincoln called for each state to provide troops to  retake  the fort ;  नतीजतन   ,  four more slave states joined the Confederacy , bringing their total to eleven  .
the   संघ  soon controlled the  किनारा  states and established a naval blockade that crippled the  दक्षिणी  economy .
The  पूर्वी  Theater  थी  inconclusive  in   1861–62  .
The autumn 1862 Confederate  अभियान  into Maryland  (  a Union state )  ended   साथ  Confederate retreat at the Battle of Antietam , dissuading British intervention .
Lincoln issued the  emancipation  Proclamation , which made ending  गुलामी   a  war goal .
To  the  west ,  by  summer 1862 the Union destroyed the Confederate river navy ,  तब   much  of their western  सेना  , and the Union at Vicksburg split the Confederacy in  दो  at the Mississippi River .
In 1863 , Robert E. Lee 's Confederate incursion  उत्तर   ended  at the Battle of Gettysburg  .
Western successes  led  to Ulysses  S.  Grant  कमांड  of all Union  सेना  in 1864 .
In  the  Western Theater , William T. Sherman drove east to  कैप्चर  Atlanta  और  marched to  the  sea , destroying Confederate  अवसंरचना  along the way .
The Union marshaled the resources and manpower to  आक्रमण  the Confederacy from  सब  directions ,  और  could afford  to   लड़ो   लड़ाइयों  of attrition through the Overland Campaign towards Richmond  ,   the  Confederate capital .
The defending Confederate army  विफल  ,  अग्रणी  to  ली  's surrender to Grant at Appomattox  अदालत  House on April 9 , 1865  .
The American Civil War was  एक  of the  earliest  true industrial wars .
Railroads , the  टेलीग्राफ  , steamships , and  mass-produced  weapons  यहूद  employed extensively  .
The  mobilization  of civilian factories , mines , shipyards  ,  banks  ,  transportation and food supplies all foreshadowed  संसार  War I  .
It remains the deadliest war in American history , resulting  in  the deaths of an  अनुमानित  750,000 soldiers and an  undetermined  number of civilian casualties .
Historian John  huddleston   estimates  the death toll at ten percent of all Northern males 20–45  सालो  old , and 30  प्रतिशत  of all Southern white  males  aged 18–40 .
William Bruce Jenner ( born October 28  ,  1949 ) is a  पूर्व  U.S.  track   और  field athlete , motivational speaker  ,  socialite , television personality and businessman .
He won the gold  पदक  for decathlon in  the  Montreal 1976 Summer Olympics  .
Following his Olympic  जीत   और  the  सम्बन्धित  recognition  ,  he married Kris Kardashian ,  और  his professional  करियर  evolved into being a television celebrity .
by  1981 , he had starred in several made-for-TV movies and was Erik Estrada 's replacement on the top rated TV series CHiPs .
He has six children : Burt , Casey , Brandon , Brody  ,  Kendall and Kylie .
Since his 1991  विवाह  to Kris Jenner , he  is  the stepfather to Kourtney , Kim ,  khloe  and  रोब  Kardashian .
चूंकि   2007  ,  he  has appeared  साथ  his blended family on Keeping Up with the  kardashians   .
Escherichia coli ( ; commonly abbreviated E. coli )  is  a  gram-negative  , rod-shaped bacterium that is  commonly   मिला  in the lower intestine of warm-blooded organisms ( endotherms )  .
सबसे  E. coli strains are harmless ,  लकिन  some serotypes can  कारण  serious  खाना  poisoning in  इंसानो   ,  and are occasionally responsible for product recalls due to food  संदूषण  .
The harmless strains  हैं  part of the normal flora of the gut ,  और  can  लाभ  their hosts by producing vitamin K2 , and by preventing the  स्थापना  of  रोगजनक  bacteria within the intestine .
E. coli and related bacteria constitute about  0.1   %  of  आंत  flora  ,  and fecal–oral transmission is the  प्रमुख  route through which pathogenic strains of the bacterium cause disease .
Cells are able to survive outside the body for a limited amount of time , which makes them ideal indicator organisms  to  test environmental  नमूने  for  fecal  contamination .
There is  ,  however , a growing body  of  research that  रै   examined  environmentally persistent E. coli  जिससे  can survive  लिये  extended periods  बाहर  of  the  host .
The  bacterium  can also  be  grown  easily  and inexpensively in a laboratory setting , and has been intensively investigated for over 60 years .
E. coli  is  the most widely studied prokaryotic model  सजीव  , and an important species in  the  fields of biotechnology and microbiology ,  जहाँ  it  रै  served  as  the host organism for  the   बहुमत  of work with recombinant DNA .
Area  कोड  217 is  the  North  अमरीकी  telephone  क्षेत्रफल   कोड  for much  of   पश्चिमी  and central  इलिनोइस  .
The  217  area includes Illinois '  पूंजी  , Springfield  ,  plus Champaign , Urbana ,  decatur  ,  danville  , Quincy , and Rantoul .
217 was  एक  of the original area codes , which were  निर्मित  in 1947 .
The only significant  बदलें   in  217 's  सीमाएँ  was in 1957 , when its northern portion was combined with part of area code 815 to form area code 309 .
चित्र  of the  largest  Antarctic ozone hole ever recorded (  सितंबर  2006 ) , over the Southern pole
Layers of the atmosphere ( not  to  scale )
Ozone depletion describes two distinct  लकिन  related phenomena observed since the late 1970s :  a  steady  मनाही  of about 4 % per  दशक  in the total volume of  ओज़ोन  in Earth 's stratosphere  (  the ozone layer )  ,  and  a  much  larger   springtime  decrease in stratospheric  ओज़ोन   over  Earth 's polar regions  .
The latter phenomenon is referred to as the ozone hole .
In addition to these well-known stratospheric phenomena , there are  भी  springtime polar  tropospheric  ozone depletion events .
the   विवरण  of polar ozone hole formation differ  इससे   कि  of mid-latitude thinning , but the  सबसे  important process in both is catalytic destruction of ozone by atomic halogens .
the   प्रमुख  source of  ये  halogen atoms in the stratosphere is photodissociation of man-made  halocarbon  refrigerants ( CFCs  ,  freons ,  halons  ) .
These  यौगिकों  are transported into  the  stratosphere after  होने   उत्सर्जित  at  the  surface  .
Both types of ozone depletion were observed to increase  as  emissions of halo-carbons  increased   .
CFCs and other  contributory  substances are  referred  to  as  ozone-depleting substances ( ODS ) .
चूंकि  the  ओज़ोन  layer  रोकता  most harmful UVB wavelengths ( 280–315 nm )  of  ultraviolet light ( UV light )  इससे  passing through the Earth 's atmosphere , observed and projected  decreases  in ozone have generated worldwide concern leading to  अपनाना  of  the  Montreal Protocol that bans the production of CFCs , halons , and other ozone-depleting chemicals such as carbon tetrachloride and trichloroethane .
It  is  suspected that a variety  of   biological   consequences  such as increases in skin cancer , cataracts ,  क्षति   to  plants , and reduction of plankton populations in  the  ocean 's photic zone  may  result from the increased UV exposure due to ozone depletion .
The  प्रस्तावना  to the United  राज्य  Constitution is a brief introductory statement of the Constitution 's fundamental purposes and guiding  सिद्धान्त   .
It states  in  general terms ,  और  courts  have  referred to it  as  reliable evidence of , the Founding Fathers ' intentions regarding the Constitution 's meaning and what they hoped the Constitution would  achieve  as it pertains  to  all of the people of the  संयुक्त  States .
As  the   phrase  ,  ``  we the people '' suggests that the new government originates  इससे   the  people of the United States and it sets into motion a question as it  pertains   to  that  विशाल  population concerning the individual  अधिकारों  and equality among all people ;  इस  can be seen  सबसे  broadly in the divide between republicanism and social democracy  .
Czechoslovakian shot putter Plihan at the 1957 East  जर्मनी   अंदर   एथलेटिक्स  Championships
The  शॉट  put (  सुनाया  ) is a track  और  field event involving `` throwing  ''  / ''  putting  ''  (   फेंकना  in a pushing motion  )  a  भारी  spherical object —the  shot—as  far as possible .
The  शॉट  put competition for men has been a part of the modern Olympics since  उनके  revival in 1896  ,  women 's competition began in 1948 .
Map of  the  United Nations ( UN ) member states , with their territories ( including dependent territories ) recognized  by  the UN in blue
There  हैं   संयुक्त  Nations ( UN )  सदस्य  states ,  और  each of them  is   a   सदस्य   of  the United  राष्ट्र   सामान्य   सभा  .
The criteria for  प्रवेश  of new members are set out in the United  राष्ट्र  Charter , Chapter  ii  , Article 4:
A recommendation for admission from the Security  परिषद  requires  affirmative  votes from at least  नौ   of  the council 's  पंद्रह  members  ,  with none of the five permanent  सदस्यों  voting against .
The  सुरक्षा  Council  's   अनुशंसा  must  तब  be subsequently approved in the General Assembly by a two-thirds majority vote  .
in  principle , only sovereign states can become  un  members , and  फिलहाल  all  un  members are sovereign states ( although  a  few members  यहूद  not sovereign when they joined the  un  ) .
Because a  राज्य  can only be admitted  to  the UN by the approval of  the  Security Council and the General Assembly  ,  a number  of   राज्य  that may  be  considered sovereign  राज्य  according to the Montevideo Convention  मापदण्ड  are not members because the UN does  नहीं  consider them to possess sovereignty  ,  mainly due to the  कमी  of international recognition  or  opposition from certain members .
In addition to  the   सदस्य  states , the  un  also invites non-member  राज्य  ( currently two  :  the Holy  देखिए   और  Palestine  )   ,  intergovernmental organizations , and other  अंतरराष्ट्रीय   संगठन  and entities whose statehood or sovereignty are not precisely defined , to become observers at the General Assembly , allowing them to participate and speak , but  नहीं  vote , in General Assembly meetings .
The Eiffel  मीनार  ( , ) is an iron lattice tower located on the  champ  de Mars in Paris , named after the engineer Gustave Eiffel , whose company designed and built the tower .
Erected in  1889  as  the  entrance arch  to  the 1889 World 's Fair , it has  become  both a global  सांस्कृतिक  icon of France and one of the most recognizable structures in the world .
The tower  is  the  tallest  structure  in  Paris and the most-visited  सशुल्क   स्मारक  in the world  ;  7.1  लाख  people ascended it in 2011 .
The  तीसरा   स्तर  observatory 's  अपर  platform  is  at the highest accessible to public in the  यूरोपीय  Union and the highest in  यूरोपीय   as  long  as  the platform of the Ostankino Tower , at , remains closed as a result  of   the   आग  of August 2000 .
The tower received its  250  millionth visitor in 2010 .
The tower stands  लम्बा  , about the same  ऊँचाई  as an 81-storey building .
During its  निर्माण  , the Eiffel Tower surpassed the Washington Monument to assume the title of the  tallest  man-made  ढांचा  in the world  ,   a   शीर्षक  it held for  41  years  ,   जबतक  the  क्रिसलर  Building in New York  नगर  was built  in  1930 .
क्युकी  of the addition , in 1957  ,  of the antenna atop the Eiffel Tower , it is now taller than the  क्रिसलर   भवन  .
Not including broadcast  एन्टेना  ,  it  is  the  second-tallest structure in France , after  the   millau  Viaduct  .
The tower has  तीन  levels for visitors .
Tickets  can  be purchased to ascend , by stairs or lift ( elevator ) , to the first and second levels .
The  चलना  from ground level to the first level is over 300 steps ,  as  is the walk from the first  to  the second level .
The third  और  highest  स्तर  is accessible only  by  lift—stairs do exist but  हैं  usually closed to the public .
The  पहला  and second levels have  रेस्तरां  .
The  मीनार  has become the  सबसे  prominent  प्रतीक  of both Paris and  फ़्रांस  ,  प्रायः  in  the  establishing shot of films set in the city .
Kenneth Wayne `` Ken '' Jennings  iii  ( born May 23 , 1974 )  is  an  अमरीकी  game show contestant and  लेखक   .
Jennings is noted  लिये  holding the record for the longest winning streak  on  the  u.S.  syndicated game show  jeopardy  !
and as being the all-time leading money winner on American game shows  .
In 2004 , Jennings won 74 Jeopardy !
games before he was  पराजित   by  challenger  नैंसी   zerg   on   उसके  75th  रूप  .
उसके  total  आय  on Jeopardy !
are  $   3,172,700  , consisting of $ 2,520,700 over his  74  wins , a $ 2,000 second-place prize in his  75th  appearance , a $ 500,000 second-place prize in the Jeopardy !
Ultimate Tournament of Champions ,  as   खूब  as half of a $ 300,000 prize in the  ibm  Challenge .
During  उसके   पहला  run  of   jeopardy  !
दिखावे  , Jennings earned the record for the highest American  खेल  show winnings .
His total was surpassed by Brad Rutter , who defeated  जेनिंग्स   in  the finals of the Jeopardy !
Ultimate Tournament of Champions  (  first  aired  on May 25 ,  2005  )  ,  adding $  2,000,000  to Rutter 's existing Jeopardy !
winnings .
Jennings regained the  रिकार्ड  after  appearing  on  अनेक   अन्य  game shows  ,  culminating in an appearance on Are You Smarter Than a  5th  Grader  ?
( first aired  on  October  10  , 2008 ) , though Rutter retains the Jeopardy !
रिकार्ड   .
After his success on  jeopardy  !  ,  Jennings wrote  परिचय  his  अनुभव  and explored American trivia history and culture in his  किताब  Brainiac :  adventures  in the  जिज्ञासु  , Competitive , Compulsive World  of  Trivia Buffs  ,  published in 2006 .
The Canadian Football League or CFL ( ' [ LCF ] in French ) is a professional  खेल   लीग  located in  कनाडा  .
The  cfl  is the highest level of competition in Canadian  फ़ुटबॉल  ,  a  form of gridiron football  closely  related to American  फ़ुटबॉल  .
Its eight current teams , which are located  in  eight separate cities , are divided into  दो  divisions of four  टीमों  each — the East Division and  the  West Division .
The  लीग   's  19-week regular  ऋतु   रनों  from late  जून  to  जल्दी  November ; each team  plays  18 games  साथ  one bye  सप्ताह  .
Following the regular season  ,  the  तीन  teams with the best records in their  प्रभाग  (  मगर  if the fourth place team in one  प्रभाग  has a better record than  the   तीसरा  place team in  the  other division  ,  when the team with the better record makes the  playoffs  and `` crosses over '' to the other division 's playoff ) compete in the league 's three-week divisional  playoffs  , which  culminate  in the late-November Grey Cup championship  ,  the country 's largest annual sports  और  television event .
The  cfl  was  officially  founded on January 19 , 1958  ,  making it the second  oldest  gridiron football league in North America still in  आपरेशन  ,  हालांकि  all its  टीमों  long predate the modern formation  of  the league .
It is the highest level  of  play in Canadian football , the  सबसे   लोकप्रिय  football league in Canada ,  और  the second-most popular major sports league in  कनाडा  ,  बाद   the  National Hockey  लीग  .
Although  बर्फ  hockey is Canada 's most popular sport , the CFL has  increased  the popularity  of  Canadian  फ़ुटबॉल  in Quebec  और  Western Canada .
Canadian football  is  also played at amateur levels (  i.e  . youth , high school  ,  CJFL , QJFL , CIS and  वरिष्ठ  leagues such as the Alberta Football League )  .
The  2010s   होगा  be a significant decade for  the  CFL  in  terms of growth , as  टीमों   have   संवर  , expanded stadiums , or plan to  निर्माण  entirely  नई  stadiums  .
The  मॉन्ट्रियल  Alouettes accomplished this  पहला   ,  adding 5,000  सीटे  to Percival Molson  मेमोरियल   स्टेडियम   in  time for the 2010 CFL season .
The  एडमॉन्टन  Eskimos and Calgary Stampeders also renovated their respective stadiums and facilities for the 2010 season .
In 2011 , the BC  शेर  played under a new , retractable roof in BC Place after spending  एक   और  a  हाफ   सीज़न   at  Empire  फ़ील्ड  .
Then the Winnipeg Blue Bombers will  खेल  in an entirely new stadium at the  विश्वविद्यालयों  of Manitoba , scheduled to open in time for the 2013 season .
The  हैमिल्टन  Tiger-Cats ,  saskatchewan  Roughriders and the  नई   ओटावा  franchise are also looking at new or extensively-renovated stadiums in  the   following  years .
There are also  उम्मीदें  of  expanding  the  लीग  to Atlantic Canada (  ideally  basing a team in either the more populated Halifax  ,  or the more centralized Moncton ) , as 2010 and 2011  था  regular  ऋतु  games hosted in Moncton .
According to sports  इतिहासकार  Douglas Brei ,  the  Canadian Football League  holds  the distinction of being the only professional sports  लीग   in   उत्तर  America ,  प्रमुख  or minor league , in  जिससे  each existing franchise has won  at   तनिक  one league title  जबकि  in their current location .
Each  एंटीबॉडी  binds to a  विशिष्ट  antigen ; an interaction similar  to  a lock and  कुंजी  .
An antibody  (  Ab ) , also known as an immunoglobulin ( Ig ) , is a large Y-shaped protein  उत्पादित  by B-cells that is  प्रयुक्त  by the immune system to  पहचानो   और  neutralize foreign objects  ऐसे  as  जीवाणु  and viruses .
The antibody  recognizes   a  unique part  of  the foreign  निशाना   ,  called an antigen .
प्रत्येक  tip of  the  `` Y  ''  of an antibody  contains  a paratope ( a structure analogous to  a  lock  )  that is specific for one particular epitope ( similarly analogous to a key ) on  an  antigen , allowing these  दो  structures to bind together with precision .
Using this  बाइंडिंग  mechanism , an antibody can tag a  microbe  or an infected cell for attack  by  other parts of the immune system , or can neutralize its target directly ( for  उदाहरण  ,  by  blocking a  भाग   of  a microbe that  is  essential for its invasion and survival ) .
The production of  antibodies  is the main  फलन  of the  humoral  immune  प्रणाली  .
Antibodies  हैं  secreted by  a  type of  श्वेत  blood cell  पुकारा   a   प्लाज्मा  cell .
Antibodies can occur in two  शारीरिक  forms , a soluble form that is secreted  इससे  the cell  ,  and a membrane -bound form that is attached to the surface of a B cell and is referred to as the B cell receptor  (   bcr  ) .
the  BCR  is   तभी  found on the surface of B cells  और  facilitates  the  activation of these cells and  उनके  subsequent differentiation into either  एंटीबॉडी  factories called plasma cells ,  or  memory B cells  कि  will survive in the body and remember that  वही  antigen so the B cells can respond faster upon future exposure  .
In most cases  ,   बातचीत  of the B  कोशिका  with a T helper cell is necessary to  उपज  full  सक्रियण   of  the B  कोशिका   और  , therefore  ,  antibody generation following antigen  बाइंडिंग   .
Soluble  antibodies  are released into the blood and tissue fluids  ,  as well  as  many secretions to continue to survey  लिये  invading microorganisms .
antibodies   हैं  glycoproteins belonging to the immunoglobulin  superfamily   ;  the  शर्तें   एंटीबॉडी   और  immunoglobulin are  प्रायः   प्रयुक्त  interchangeably .
Antibodies are typically made of basic structural units—each with  दो  large heavy chains and  दो   छोटी  light chains .
There are several different types of antibody heavy chains  ,  and several different kinds of  antibodies  ,  जिससे   हैं  grouped into  अलग  isotypes  आधारित  on which heavy chain they possess .
Five different antibody isotypes are known  in  mammals  ,  which perform  अलग  roles , and  सहायता  direct the appropriate immune response for each different type of foreign object  वे  encounter .
हालांकि  the general  ढांचा  of all antibodies is very  समान  , a  छोटी  region  at  the tip of the  प्रोटीन  is extremely variable , allowing millions of antibodies with slightly  अलग  tip structures  ,   or  antigen binding  साइट   ,  to exist .
This region is known as  the  hypervariable region  .
Each of these variants can bind to a different antigen  .
This enormous diversity of antibodies allows the immune system  to  recognize an  बराबर  wide  किस्में  of antigens .
The large and diverse population of antibodies is generated  by   यादृच्छिक   combinations  of a set of  जीन   खण्ड   कि  encode different  प्रतिजन  binding sites ( or paratopes ) , followed by random mutations in this area of  the  antibody gene , which create  further  diversity .
Antibody  जीनों  also  re-organize  in a process called class switching that changes  the  base of the heavy chain to another , creating a  अलग  isotype of  the  antibody that retains the  प्रतिजन   विशिष्ट  variable region .
This allows  a   सिंगल  antibody  to  be used by several different parts of the immune system .
The  प्रतीक  used by  the  Zodiac Killer to sign his correspondence
The  zodiac  Killer was a  सीरियल  killer  जो  operated  in  Northern California  in  the late  1960s  and  जल्दी  1970s  .
The killer 's identity remains unknown .
The Zodiac murdered victims in  benicia  , Vallejo , Lake Berryessa , and San  फ्रांसिस्को  between December 1968 and  अक्तूबर  1969 .
चार   मेन  and three women between the ages of 16 and  29  were targeted  .
the   कातिल  originated the name ``  zodiac  '' in a series  of  taunting  अक्षर  sent to the  लोकल  Bay Area press .
These letters  शामिल   चार  cryptograms ( or ciphers  )  .
of   the  four cryptograms sent , only  एक   रै   महरूम  definitively solved .
Suspects  have  been named  by   विधि   प्रवर्तन   और  amateur investigators ,  लकिन  no conclusive evidence has surfaced .
in  April 2004 ,  the  San Francisco Police  विभाग   चिह्नित  the case `` inactive '' , yet re-opened the case at some point prior to March 2007 .
The case also remains open  in  the city of Vallejo  ,   as  well as  in  Napa  काउंटी  and Solano County  .
the  California Department of Justice  रै  maintained an open case file  on  the Zodiac  हत्याएं  since 1969  .
Jennings  is  a small  नगर   in   और  the parish seat  of  Jefferson Davis Parish ,  louisiana  , United States ,  निकट  Lake Charles  .
The population was 10,383 at the  2010  census ,  a   छोटी  decline from the 2000 tabulation .
the  city is 68 percent white .
Jennings  is  the principal city  of  the Jennings Micropolitan Statistical Area , which includes all of Jefferson Davis Parish .
It is also part of the larger Lake Charles-Jennings Combined Statistical Area  .
nanotechnology  ( sometimes shortened to `` nanotech '' ) is the manipulation of matter  on   an  atomic and molecular scale .
The earliest , widespread  वर्णन  of nanotechnology referred to the particular technological goal of precisely manipulating  अणु  and molecules for fabrication of macroscale products  ,  also now referred to as molecular nanotechnology .
a  more generalized description of nanotechnology  थी  subsequently established by  the  National Nanotechnology  पहल  ,  जिससे  defines nanotechnology as the  हेरफेर  of  पदार्थ  with at least  एक  dimension sized from 1 to 100  nanometers  .
This definition reflects the fact that quantum mechanical  प्रभाव  are important  at  this quantum-realm scale , and so  the  definition shifted from a particular  technological  goal  to  a research category  समावेशी  of  सब   प्रकार  of research and technologies  कि  deal with the special  गुण  of matter that  occur  below the given size  दहलीज  .
It is therefore common  to  see the plural form  ``  nanotechnologies '' as well  as  `` nanoscale technologies '' to refer to the  व्यापक  range  of  research and applications whose common trait  is  size .
Because  of  the variety of  संभावित  applications ( including industrial and military  )  , governments  have  invested billions  of  dollars  in   nanotechnology  research .
Through  इसके   नेशनल   nanotechnology  Initiative ,  the  USA has invested  3.7  billion  डॉलर  .
the  European Union has invested 1.2  अरब  and Japan 750 million  डॉलर  .
nanotechnology  as defined by size  is  naturally very broad ,  सहित  fields of  विज्ञान  as diverse  as  surface science , organic chemistry  ,  molecular biology ,  सेमीकंडक्टर  physics ,  microfabrication  ,  इत्यादि  .
The associated research and applications are equally diverse , ranging from  एक्सटेंशन  of conventional device  भौतिकी  to completely new approaches  आधारित  upon  आणविक  self-assembly , from developing new materials with dimensions on the nanoscale  to  direct control of matter on the atomic scale .
Scientists currently debate the future implications  of  nanotechnology  .
Nanotechnology may be able to create many new materials and devices with a vast range  of  applications  ,  such  as   in  medicine , electronics ,  biomaterials   और   उर्जा  production .
On the other hand , nanotechnology raises many of  the  same  मुद्दे  as any new technology  ,  including concerns about the toxicity and environmental impact of  nanomaterials   ,  and  उनके  potential effects on global economics , as well  as   अटकलें  about various  doomsday  scenarios .
These concerns have led to a  बहस  among  वकालत   समूह  and governments on  whether  special regulation of nanotechnology  is  warranted  .
Map of the Eastern Bloc
The term Eastern Bloc or Communist Bloc  refers  to the  पूर्व  communist states  of  Central and Eastern Europe , generally  the  Soviet  संघ  and the countries of the Warsaw  अनुबंध   .
The terms Communist  bloc  and  सोवियत   bloc  were  भी  used to denote groupings of states aligned with the Soviet Union ,  हालांकि  these terms might include states outside Central and Eastern Europe .
The  नई  Jersey gubernatorial election of 2009 took place on November 3 , 2009 .
Democratic  राज्यपाल  Jon Corzine was running  लिये  a  दूसरी  term and  थी  being challenged  by  Republican Chris Christie , Independent Christopher Daggett and nine  अन्य  , in  जोड  to  अनेक  write-in candidates .
Christie won the election , with  परिचय  48.5 percent of the  vote  , to  44.9   प्रतिशत  for  corzine   और  5.8  प्रतिशत   लिये  Daggett .
Christie won the largest margin for a first  पद  Republican since 1969 .
क्रिस्टी   assumed   दफ्तर  on January  19  , 2010 .
This was the first  चुनाव   to  fill the newly created office  of  Lieutenant  राज्यपाल  .
the  candidates for governor and lieutenant  राज्यपाल   यहूद  joined  साथ  as a single  चुनाव  , so that  मतदाता  did not  have  the  अवसर  to split the ticket .
Kim Guadagno , Christie 's running mate ,  became  New  जर्सी  's first  लेफ्टिनेंट  governor following her inauguration .
Health care in the United States is provided by many distinct organizations .
स्वास्थ्य   परवाह   सुविधाएं  are largely owned and operated by private sector  व्यवसायों   .
Health insurance for public sector employees  is  primarily provided by the government .
60-65 %  of  healthcare  प्रावधान  and spending comes  इससे  programs such  as  Medicare , Medicaid  ,   tricare   ,  the  children  's Health Insurance Program  ,  and the Veterans Health  प्रशासन  .
Most of  the  population under 65  is   insured  by  उनके  or  a  family  सदस्य  's  नियोक्ता  , some buy health insurance on  उनके  own  ,   और  the remainder are  uninsured  .
Of 17 high-income  देशों  studied  by  the National Institutes of  स्वास्थ्य  in 2013 , the United States was at or  निकट  the bottom in infant mortality , heart and lung  बीमारी  , sexually transmitted infections  ,  adolescent pregnancies , injuries , homicides ,  और  rates of disability  .
Together , such issues  प्लेस  the U.S. at the bottom of the list for  जीवन  expectancy  .
On average  ,  a U.S. male can be expected to live  लगभग  four  कम   सालो  than those in the top-ranked country .
according  to the  संसार   स्वास्थ्य  Organization ( WHO ) , the United States spent more on health  परवाह  per capita ( $ 7,146 ) , and more  on  health care as  प्रतिशत  of its GDP  (  15.2 % )  ,  than  कोई  other nation in 2008  .
the  Commonwealth Fund ranked  the   संयुक्त  States last  in  the quality of  स्वास्थ्य   परवाह  among similar countries , and  टीप   u.S.   परवाह  costs the most .
The  u.S.  Census  ब्यूरो  reported that 49.9 million residents , 16.3 %  of  the population ,  यहूद   uninsured  in 2010  (  up from 49.0  लाख  residents , 16.1 % of the population , in 2009 )  .
A 2004  संस्थान  of Medicine ( IOM )  रपट  said : ``  the  United States  is  among the  few   industrialized  nations in the world that  करता   नहीं  guarantee  अभिगम   to  health  परवाह  for its population .  ''
A 2004 OECD report said  :  `` With the exception  of  Mexico , Turkey , and the  संयुक्त  States , all OECD countries  था  achieved  सार्वभौमिक  or  near-universal  ( at least 98.4 % insured  )  coverage  of  their populations by 1990 . ''
a  2010 report observed that lack of health insurance causes roughly 48,000  अनावश्यक  deaths  प्रत्येक  year in  the   संयुक्त  States .
In  2007   ,  62.1 % of  filers  for  bankruptcies  claimed high medical expenses .
A 2013  पढ़ाई   मिला  that about  25   %  of all senior citizens declare bankruptcy due to medical expenses , and  43  % are  मजबूर  to mortgage or  बेचें  their  प्राथमिक  residence  .
On March  23  , 2010 ,  the  Patient Protection and  सस्ती  Care Act  (  PPACA ) became law , providing for  प्रमुख   परिवर्तन  in health insurance  .
In physiology , body  जल  is the water  सामग्री  of the human  देह  .
A  significant   भिन्न  of the human body is water .
Arthur Guyton 's Textbook  of  Medical Physiology states that `` the  कुल  amount of water in  a  man of average  वज़न  ( 70 kilograms ) is approximately 40 litres , averaging  57  percent of his  कुल  body weight .
in   a  newborn infant ,  इस  may be as high as 75 percent of the body weight , but it progressively decreases  इससे  birth to old  आयु   ,  most of  the   घटी  occurring during the first 10 years of life .
Also , obesity decreases the percentage of water  in  the body  ,  sometimes to  as  low as 45 percent  ''  .
These figures are statistical  averages  , so are illustrative  ,   और  like  सब  biostatistics , will vary with things  जैसे  type of population , age and number of people sampled , and methodology .
So there  is  not , and can not be , a figure that is  exactly   the  same for all  लोगों  , for this  or  any other physiological measure .
For example  ,  Jackson 's ( 1985 )  anatomy   &   physiology  for Nurses  देता  a figure  of  60 % for the proportion of body-weight attributable  to  water , which approximates  guyton  's 57 %  .
In diseased states where  देह   जल  is affected , the compartment or  compartments  that have changed can give clues to the  प्रकृति  of the problem .
Body  जल  is  regulated  by hormones , including anti-diuretic hormone ( ADH  )  , aldosterone and atrial natriuretic peptide .
प्रति   netter   's  Atlas of  इंसान   physiology  ,  देह   जल  is broken down into the following compartments:
Intracellular fluid (  2/3   of  body water ) .
Per  guyton  , in a body containing 40 litres of fluid , about 25 litres is intracellular  ,   जिससे  amounts to 62.5 %  (  5/8 ) , close enough to the 2/3 rule  of  thumb .
जैक्सन  's texts  राज्य  70  %   of  body fluid is intracellular .
Extracellular fluid  (  1/3  of  body water ) .
Per Guyton 's illustration , for a 40  लीटर   देह   ,  about  15  litres is  extracellular  , which amounts  to  37.5 %  again  , this  is  close to the 1/3 rule of thumb cited here .
Plasma ( 1/5 of extracellular fluid ) .
Per Guyton 's illustration , of the 15  लीटर  of  extracellular  fluid , plasma volume averages 3  लीटर  .
This amounts to 20  %  , the same  as  per Netter 's Atlas .
अंतरालीय  fluid ( 4/5  of  extracellular fluid  )
Transcellular fluid ( a.k.a . `` third space , ''  सामान्यतः  ignored  in  calculations )
Contained inside organs  ,  such as the gastrointestinal ,  प्रमस्तिष्कमेरु  ,  उदरावरणीय  , and ocular fluids .
self-esteem  is a  पद  used in  मनोविज्ञान   to  reflect  a  person 's overall emotional  मूल्यांकन   of   उसके  or her own worth .
It  is   a  judgement of oneself as well  as  an attitude toward the self .
Self-esteem  encompasses   मान्यताओं  ( for example , `` I am competent , '' `` I am worthy '' ) and emotions such as triumph ,  despair   ,  pride and  शर्म  .
Smith  और  Mackie define  it  by  saying  `` The  self-concept  is  कया   we  think about the self ;  self-esteem   ,  is the positive or negative evaluations of the self , as in how we feel  परिचय  it . ''
self-esteem  is also known as the  evaluative  dimension of the self that  शामिल  feelings of worthiness , prides  और   discouragement   .
One 's self-esteem  is  also  closely   संबद्ध  with  self-consciousness  .
Self-esteem  is  a disposition  कि  a person has which represents their judgements of  उनके  own worthiness .
in  the  mid-1960s  , Morris  rosenberg  and social-learning theorists defined self-esteem  as   a  personal worth or worthiness .
nathaniel  Branden in  1969   पारिभाषित  self-esteem as `` the experience of  होने   competent  to  cope  with the basic challenges of life  और  being worthy of happiness . ''
According to Branden , self-esteem  is  the sum of self-confidence ( a  अहसास  of  निजी  capacity ) and self-respect ( a feeling of personal worth ) .
It exists  as  a consequence of  the  implicit judgement that every person has of  उनके  ability  to  face life 's challenges , to understand  और  solve problems ,  और  their right to achieve happiness , and be given respect  .
As  a  social psychological construct , self-esteem is  आकर्षक  because researchers  have  conceptualized it as an  influential  predictor  of   प्रासंगिक  outcomes , such as  अकादमिक  achievement (  दलदल  1990  )  or exercise behavior ( Hagger et al . 1998 ) .
In addition , self-esteem has also been treated as an important outcome due to its close relation  साथ  psychological  well-being   (  Marsh 1989  )  .
Self-esteem can apply specifically to a particular dimension (  लिये  example , `` I believe I am a  शुभ   लेखक  and  i  feel happy about that '' ) or a global extent ( for example , ``  i   मानना  I am  a  bad person , and feel bad about myself in  सामान्य  '' ) .
psychologists   प्रायः  regard self-esteem  as  an enduring personality characteristic ( ``  trait   ''  self-esteem ) ,  हालांकि  normal  ,  short-term  विसंगतियाँ   (  `` state '' self-esteem ) also exist .
Synonyms or near-synonyms of self-esteem  शामिल  : self-worth ,  self-regard  , self-respect ,  और   self-integrity   .
A Masonic Lodge , often termed a Private Lodge  or   constituent  Lodge  ,  is  the  basic organisational  ईकाई  of  freemasonry  .
Every  नई  Lodge must  be  warranted or chartered by a Grand Lodge  ,   लकिन  is subject to its direction only  in  enforcing the published Constitution of  the   क्षेत्राधिकार   .
By exception the  तीन  surviving lodges that  formed  the  संसार  's  पहला  known Grand Lodge in London ( today called the  संयुक्त   ग्रैंड  Lodge of  इंग्लैण्ड  ) have the unique privilege  to  operate as time  immemorial  i.e .  बगैर  such warrant ;  तभी  one other lodge  operates  without a warrant - this  is  the Grand  stewards   '  Lodge in London , although it is not also entitled to the ``  समय  immemorial '' title .
A Freemason  is  generally entitled to visit any  आवास  ,  in  any jurisdiction ( i.e . under any Grand Lodge ) in  सौहार्द  with his  अपना  .
in  some jurisdictions this privilege is restricted  to  Master Masons ( that is , Freemasons who have attained the  अनुक्रम  's third  उपाधि  ) .
He is  पहला  usually  जरूरी  to  जाँच   ,  and certify , the  नियमितता  of the relationship of the Lodge - and  be  able to  satisfy  that  आवास  of  उसके  regularity of membership  .
Freemasons gather together  as  a  आवास  to work the three basic Degrees of  डाला   प्रशिक्षु  , Fellowcraft  और  Master Mason  .
pilkington   समूह  Limited is  a  multinational glass manufacturing company headquartered in St Helens  ,  United Kingdom and a wholly owned subsidiary of the  japan-based   एनएसजी  Group .
Prior to its acquisition by  एनएसजी  in 2006  it  was an independent  कम्पनी  listed on the London Stock Exchange and for a time was a constituent of  the   ftse  100 Index .
A quotation is the repetition of  एक  expression as part of another one , particularly when the quoted expression is well-known or  explicitly  attributed  by  citation to its original source , and it is indicated by ( punctuated with )  quotation  marks  .
A quotation can also refer to the repeated use of units  of  any other form of expression , especially parts of artistic works :  तत्व  of a painting , scenes  इससे  a movie or sections  इससे  a musical  संयोजन  .
Year 1877 ( MDCCCLXXVII ) was  a  common year starting on Monday ( link will display the full calendar  )  of the Gregorian calendar and a common year starting on Saturday of the 12-day slower Julian calendar .
Black pepper  (  Piper nigrum ) is a  flowering  vine in the family Piperaceae , cultivated for its fruit ,  जिससे  is usually dried and used  as   a  spice and seasoning .
The  फल  , known  as  a peppercorn when dried , is approximately in diameter  ,  dark red  जब  fully mature  ,  and ,  जैसे   सब   drupes  ,  contains  a single  बीज  .
Peppercorns , and the ground pepper derived from them , may be described simply as pepper ,  or  more precisely as  ब्लैक  pepper ( cooked and dried unripe  फल   )  , green pepper ( dried unripe fruit ) and white pepper ( dried ripe seeds )  .
Black pepper is native to south India ,  और  is  extensively   cultivated   वहीँ  and elsewhere  in  tropical regions  .
Currently Vietnam is the world 's  largest  producer and exporter of pepper  ,   producing  34 % of the world 's Piper nigrum crop as of 2008 .
Dried ground pepper has been used since  प्राचीनता  for both its flavour and  as  a medicine .
Black pepper  is   the  world 's most traded  मसाला  .
It is one of the  सबसे  common  मसाले  added to European  भोजन  and its descendants .
The  spiciness  of black pepper  is  due to the chemical  piperine  , not to be confused with the capsaicin that gives fleshy peppers theirs .
It  is  in the modern world  ,  often  युग्म  with salt .
Fire hydrant  in  Charlottesville , Virginia , USA
A fire hydrant  (  also known colloquially as a fire plug in  the  United States  or  as  a  johnny pump in New York City ) ,  is  an active fire protection measure ,  और   a  source  of  water provided  in  most urban , suburban and rural areas with municipal  जल  service to enable firefighters  to  tap into the municipal water supply to assist in extinguishing  a  fire .
Buildings near  a   hydrant  may qualify for an  बीमे   छूट  since firefighters should be able to more rapidly extinguish a fire on the insured property .
The  अवधारणा   of  fire plugs dates to  at  least the 17th century  .
This was a time when firefighters responding to a call would dig  bas  to the  लकड़ी   जल  mains and hastily bore  a  hole to  सुरक्षित  water  to   लड़ो   फ़ायर  .
The water  होता  fill the  छेद  creating  a  temporary well ,  और  be transported from the well to the fire by  बाल्टी  brigades or , later ,  by   hand-pumped  fire engines  .
the  holes  यहूद   तब   plugged  with stoppers , normally redwood , which  over  time  आए  to be known as fire  plugs  .
The location of the plug would often be recorded  or   चिह्नित  so that  it  could be reused  in   भविष्य  fires .
This is the  सोर्स  of  the  colloquial term fire plug still  प्रयुक्त  for fire hydrants today .
बाद  the Great Fire of London in 1666  ,  the  नगर  installed water mains  साथ   छेद  drilled  at  intervals , equipped with risers  ,  allowing an access point  to  the wooden fire plugs from street  स्तर   .
The invention of a post- or  pillar-type  fire hydrant  is   generally  credited to Frederick Graff Sr. ,  मुख्य  Engineer of  the   फिलाडेल्फिया   जल  Works  around  the year  1801  .
It had a  संयोजन  hose/faucet outlet  और  was of `` wet  बैरल  '' design  साथ   the  valve in the top  .
It is said that  graff  held the first patent  लिये  a fire  hydrant  , but this can not  be   सत्यापित  because the  पेटेंट  office  in   वॉशिंगटन  D.C. caught on fire in 1836 destroying many patent  रिकॉर्ड  from that period in  the  process .
The President of the Republic of South Africa is the head  of  state and head of government under South  अफ़्रीकी  's Constitution .
From 1961 to 1994 ,  the  head of  राज्य  was called the State President .
The President is elected by  सदस्यों  of the  नेशनल  Assembly , the lower house of Parliament , and  is  usually the leader of the largest party , which  रै  been  the  African National  कॉंग्रेस  since the first non-racial elections were held on 27 April 1994 .
The role was originally  संस्थापित  to  be  distinct from  the  now  defunct   भूमिका  of prime minister ,  लकिन  the two roles were merged in the 1983 constitution which  निर्दिष्ट  a four-year  पद  of  दफ्तर  .
The 1993 and later constitutions limits  the  president 's time in office to two five-year terms .
the   पहला  President  to   be  elected under the new constitution was  नेल्सन  Mandela , and  the  incumbent president  is  Jacob  zuma  .
