Under  the  interim Constitution (  मान्य  from 1994  to   1996  ) , there  थी  a Government of National Unity , in which an MP  इससे  the largest opposition party was entitled to a position as Deputy President .
साथ   साथ  Thabo Mbeki , the last  राज्य  President  ,   f.w   .  De  klerk   भी  served as Deputy President , in  उसके  capacity  as  the  नेता  of  the  National Party which was the second-largest party in the new Parliament .
But  de  Klerk  बाद  resigned and went into opposition with  उसके  party  .
A  voluntary  coalition government continues to exist under the new constitution (  अपनाया  in 1996 ) , although there have been no appointments of opposition politicians  to   the   पोस्ट  of deputy president .
Special  शिक्षा  or special  needs  education is the education  of   विद्यार्थी  with special needs in a way that addresses the students  '  individual differences  और  needs .
Ideally , this process involves the individually planned and systematically monitored arrangement of teaching procedures ,  adapted  equipment and materials  ,  accessible settings , and  अन्य   interventions   designed  to help  learners  with special needs achieve  a  higher level of personal self-sufficiency and success in  स्कूल  and  जातियाँ   than  would be available  if  the student were only given access  to  a typical classroom education  .
Common special needs  शामिल  challenges with learning , communication challenges , emotional and  behavioral   विकार  , physical  disabilities  , and developmental disorders  .
Students with these kinds of special needs are likely to benefit from additional educational  सेवाएं  such as different  approaches  to teaching  ,  use of technology ,  a  specifically adapted teaching area  ,  or resource room .
Intellectual giftedness is a difference in learning and  can  also  लाभ   इससे   specialized  teaching techniques or  अलग  educational  कार्यक्रम  , but the term `` special education ''  is  generally used to specifically  indicate  instruction of students whose special needs reduce  उनके   क्षमता  to learn  independently  or in an ordinary  कक्षा  , and gifted education is  संभाला  separately .
In most developed countries , educators are  modifying  teaching methods and environments so that the maximum number  of   विद्यार्थी  are served in general education  environments  .
Special education in developed countries is often regarded less as  a  `` place  ''  and more as `` a  दायरा  of services ,  उपलब्धियाँ  in every school . ''
Integration can reduce social stigmas  और  improve  अकादमिक  achievement for many students .
the  opposite  of  special education is general education .
General education  is  the standard  curriculum  presented  साथ  standard teaching methods and without additional supports .
George Soros ( or ;  ;  ; born  अगस्त  12 , 1930 , as  schwartz   györgy  ) is a Hungarian-American business magnate , investor  ,   और  philanthropist .
He is the  अध्यक्ष  of  सोरोस  Fund Management .
Soros supports progressive-liberal causes .
He is known as ``  the  Man Who Broke the Bank of England `` because  of  his in  निवेश  profits during the  1992   ब्लैक  Wednesday UK currency  संकट  .
Between 1979  और  2011 , Soros gave  दूर  over $ 8 billion to human rights , public health ,  और  education causes .
He  निभाई  a significant  भूमिका  in the  शांतिपूर्ण  transition from communism  to  capitalism  in  Hungary ( 1984–89 ) and provided one  of  Europe  's  largest higher education endowments to Central European University in  बुडापेस्ट  .
Soros is  भी  the chairman of the Open Society Institute .
an   कर्ता   portraying  Alexander  ग्राहम   घंटी  speaking into an early model telephone .
The invention of the telephone is the culmination of work done  by  many individuals , the history of which involves a collection of claims and counterclaims .
the  development of the modern electrical telephone involved  an  array  of  lawsuits founded  upon  the patent claims  of  several individuals and numerous companies .
This article covers  the  early years from  1844   to  1898 , from conception of the idea of an  इलेक्ट्रिक  voice-transmission device , to  विफल  attempts to use `` make-and-break '' current , to  कामयाब  experiments with  इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक  telephones  by  Alexander Graham Bell and Thomas Watson ,  और  finally to commercially successful  telephones  in the late 19th century .
A Master  of   ठीक  Arts ( MFA , M.F.A  .  ) is a  ग्रैजुएट   उपाधि  typically requiring 2–3 years of postgraduate  पढ़ाई  beyond the bachelor 's degree ( BFA ) , although the term of study will vary by country or by university .
the  MFA is a creative degree  प्रायः   awarded  as  a  terminal degree  in   विज़ुअल  arts , creative  लिखने  , filmmaking , dance , or theatre and other performing arts .
coursework  is  primarily  of an applied or performing nature  साथ  the program often culminating  in  a major work or performance  .
Master of Fine  कला  programs have generally required a bachelor  's  degree prior to admission ,  लकिन  many do not require  कि  the undergraduate major be the same as the MFA  फ़ील्ड  of study .
the   सबसे  important admissions requirement has often been a  नमूना  portfolio or a performance audition  .
The  निपुण  of Fine Arts differs  इससे   the  Master of Arts  in  that the MFA , while an academic  कार्यक्रम  ,  centers  around practice  in  the particular field , whereas programs  अग्रणी  to the MA usually center on the scholarly  ,  academic , or critical  पढ़ाई  of the field .
additionally   ,  in  the  United States , an MFA is  पहचाना  as a terminal  उपाधि  for practitioners of Visual Art , Design , Dance , Theatre , Film/Video  ,  New Media , and  रचनात्मक  Writing - meaning that it is considered  to  be the highest degree in its  फ़ील्ड  , and  is  used  as  a minimum qualification to be able to  लागू  to become a  full-time   प्राध्यापक  teaching at the University  स्तर   in  these  disciplines  .
There are exceptions to this standard in the Arts , notably in the case of music performance , where  the   mfa  is  नहीं  seen  as  a terminal degree in the context of the more standardized DMA degree .
it  is also  नाजुक  to note that in  the  interest of extending the connection between creative  उत्पादन  and continued  अकादमिक  research ,  कुछ  universities have established practice-based Ph.D programs in fields such as  रचनात्मक  writing , visual arts , new media , design and theater .
While this has  था  an effect in Creative Writing , and to a lesser extent in design  और  new  मीडिया  ,  the   influx  of graduates from practice-based PhD programs  रै  not appreciably changed the standard for the MFA as the terminal degree  in  most Arts disciplines yet  .
This is  an   जारी  contentious  टॉपिक  , and is  the  frequent subject of academic panels  ,  especially at the annual College Art Association conference .
The CAA 2008 guidelines regarding the MFA  strongly  re-affirms that the PhD is  नहीं  required as a terminal  उपाधि  in  the  visual arts .
The atomic bombings  of  the cities of Hiroshima and Nagasaki in  जापानी  were conducted by the United States during the final stages of World War  ii  in 1945 .
The two events are the only use of  नाभिकीय  weapons in war  to  date .
Following a firebombing  अभियान  that destroyed  अनेक  Japanese  शहरों  , the Allies prepared  लिये  a costly invasion  of  Japan .
The war in Europe ended when Nazi Germany  हस्ताक्षरित  its instrument of surrender on 8  may   ,   लकिन  the Pacific War continued .
Together with the United  किंगडम  and the Republic  of  China , the United States called for a surrender of Japan in the Potsdam Declaration on  26  July 1945  ,  threatening Japan  साथ  ``  संकेत   और  utter destruction '' .
The Japanese government ignored  इस  ultimatum , and the United  राज्य  deployed two nuclear  हथियार  developed by the Manhattan Project .
American airmen dropped Little Boy on the city of Hiroshima on  6  August 1945 ,  followed  by Fat Man over Nagasaki  on   9  August .
Within the first two to four  महीने  of the bombings , the acute effects  मारे  90,000–166,000  लोगों  in Hiroshima and 60,000–80,000 in  नागासाकी  , with roughly half of the deaths in each city occurring on the first day .
the   हिरोशिमा  prefecture health department estimated  कि   ,  of the people who  died  on the day of the explosion , 60 % died  इससे  flash or flame burns ,  30  % from falling debris and  10  % from other causes .
During  the  following months ,  विशाल  numbers died  इससे  the effect of burns  ,  radiation sickness , and other injuries , compounded by illness .
In a US estimate of the  कुल  immediate and short  पद   कारण  of death ,  15–20   %  died from radiation sickness ,  20–30  % from burns , and  50–60  %  इससे  other  चोटों   ,  compounded by illness .
In both cities ,  सबसे  of the  मुर्दे  were  नागरिकों  , although Hiroshima had a sizeable garrison .
on  15 August  ,  six  दिनों  after the bombing  of   नागासाकी  ,  जापानी  announced its surrender to the Allies , signing the Instrument of Surrender on  2   सितंबर   ,  officially ending  संसार   युद्ध  II .
The bombings  led   ,  in part ,  to  post-war Japan 's adopting Three  non-nuclear  Principles  ,  forbidding  the  nation from nuclear armament .
the  role of the  bombings  in  जापानी   's  surrender  और   उनके  ethical justification are  स्टिल  debated .
Mohandas Karamchand Gandhi ( ; 2  अक्तूबर  1869 – 30 January  1948  ) ,  commonly  known as Mahatma Gandhi , was the preeminent leader of Indian  राष्ट्रवाद  in British-ruled India .
employing  non-violent civil  disobedience  , Gandhi led India to independence  और  inspired movements for  non-violence   ,  civil rights  और  freedom across the world .
The son of a senior government official , Gandhi  थी  born and raised in a Hindu  bania  community in coastal  गुजरात  , and trained in law  in  London .
Gandhi became  प्रसिद्ध  by fighting for  the  civil  अधिकारों   of  Muslim and  हिन्दू  Indians in South Africa , using new techniques of  non-violent  civil disobedience that he developed .
Returning to India in  1915  , he set about organising  peasants  to  विरोध  excessive land-taxes .
A lifelong opponent of `` communalism  ``  ( i.e . basing politics on religion ) he reached  आउट  widely  to  all religious groups .
He became a leader of Muslims  protesting  the declining status of the Caliphate  .
Assuming leadership of the Indian National  कॉंग्रेस  in 1921 , Gandhi led nationwide  अभियान  for easing poverty , expanding  महिलाओं  's rights , building  धार्मिक  and ethnic amity , ending  अस्पृश्यता  , increasing economic self-reliance , and above all for achieving Swaraj —the independence of  इण्डिया  from British  हुकूमत  .
गांधी  led Indians in  protesting  the national salt  कर  with  the   dandi  Salt March in 1930 , and later in demanding the British to  तत्काल  Quit India in  1942  , during World  युद्ध  II  .
He was imprisoned  लिये   कि   और  for numerous other political  offenses  over  the   सालो   .
Gandhi sought to practice non-violence  और  truth in all situations , and advocated  कि  others do the same  .
He saw the villages as the core of the true India and promoted self-sufficiency ; he did not support the industrialization  कार्यक्रम  of his disciple Jawaharlal Nehru .
He lived  modestly  in a self-sufficient residential community  और  wore the traditional Indian dhoti and shawl ,  woven  with yarn  he  had hand spun on a charkha .
His chief political enemy in Britain  थी  Winston  चर्चिल   ,  who ridiculed  उसे  as a `` half-naked fakir  .  ''
he  was a dedicated vegetarian  ,  and  undertook   long   fasts   as  means of both self-purification  और   राजनैतिक   mobilization  .
In his last year ,  अप्रसन्न   at   the  partition of India  ,  Gandhi worked  to  stop  the   carnage  between  मुसलमान  , Hindus  और  Sikhs that  raged  in the  किनारा  area  between  India  और   पाकिस्तानी  .
He was  assassinated  on 30  जनवरी  1948 by Nathuram Godse who  विचार  Gandhi was too sympathetic to  इण्डिया  's  मुसलमान  .
30 January is observed  as  Martyrs ' Day  in  India  .
The honorific Mahatma ( `` Great Soul '' ) was applied to him  by  1914 .
In India he  थी  also called Bapu (  ``   पिता  ''  )  .
He is  ज्ञात   in  India as the Father of the Nation ; his birthday , 2 October , is  commemorated  there as Gandhi  jayanti  ,  a  national holiday  ,   और  world-wide  as  the International Day of Non-Violence .
Gandhi 's philosophy was not theoretical  लकिन  one  of  pragmatism , that is , practicing his principles in  the  moment .
Asked to give a  संदेश  to  the   लोगों  ,  he  would respond , `` My life is my message . ''
Joan Crawford ( March 23  ,  ca . 1904 – May 10 ,  1977  ) , born  lucille  Fay LeSueur , was an American actress in film , television and theatre .
starting  as a dancer in traveling theatrical  कंपनियाँ  before debuting on Broadway  ,  Crawford was signed to a motion picture contract by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer in 1925 .
Initially frustrated  by  the  आकार  and quality of her parts , Crawford began a campaign of self-publicity and became  nationally  known as a flapper  by  the  समाप्त  of the 1920s .
In the 1930s , Crawford 's fame rivaled , and later outlasted , MGM  सहयोगियों  Norma Shearer and Greta Garbo  .
Crawford often played hardworking young women  जो  find  रोमांस   और  financial success .
These `` rags-to-riches '' stories were  खूब  received by Depression -era audiences  और  were popular with women  .
क्रॉफर्ड  became one  of  Hollywood 's most prominent movie  सितारों   और  one  of   the  highest paid women in the United States , but her films began losing money and  by  the  समाप्त  of the 1930s she was labeled `` box office poison '' .
After an absence of nearly two years from the screen , Crawford staged  a  comeback by starring in Mildred Pierce ( 1945 ) ,  लिये  which she won the Academy Award for Best Actress  .
In 1955  ,  she  became  involved with the Pepsi-Cola Company through her marriage  to   कम्पनी  Chairman Alfred  स्टील   .
After his  मौत  in 1959 , Crawford was elected to  भरण  his vacancy on the board  of  directors but was forcibly retired in  1973  .
She continued acting in film and television  regularly   through  the 1960s , when her performances became fewer ; after the release of the British horror film  trog  in 1970 , Crawford retired  इससे  the  स्क्रीन   .
following  a public appearance in 1974 , after which unflattering photographs were published , Crawford withdrew from public life  और  became  increasingly   reclusive  until her death  in  1977 .
Crawford married  चार   टाइम्स  .
Her first  तीन  marriages ended in divorce ; the last ended with the  मौत   of  husband  अल्फ्रेड  Steele .
She  अपनाया  five  children   ,  one of whom was reclaimed by his birth  माँ  .
Crawford 's relationships with her two older children , Christina  और   क्रिस्टोफर  , were acrimonious .
Crawford disinherited the  दो  and , after Crawford  's  death ,  क्रिस्टीना  wrote a `` tell-all '' memoir  ,  Mommie Dearest , in which she alleged a lifelong pattern of physical and emotional abuse perpetrated  by  Crawford .
She was voted the tenth greatest  मादा   स्टार  in the history of American  सिनेमा  by the  अमरीकी  Film Institute .

Tonneau  कवर  (  or  )  describes  a hard or soft cover used to protect unoccupied passenger  सीटे   in   a  convertible or  roadster  ,  or  the cargo  bed  in a pickup truck  .
Hard  tonneau   कवर  open  by  a  hinging   or  folding mechanism while soft covers open by rolling up .
The tonneau  कवर  is used to conceal cargo .
When the cover is pulled out ,  it  keeps items out  of   the  sun and  provides   अतिरिक्त   सुरक्षा  by keeping personal items out of sight , as well as shielding the driver from  दृश्य   .
Twitter  is  an online social networking service and microblogging  सेवा   कि  enables its users to send and read  text-based  messages of up to 140 characters ,  ज्ञात   as  ``  tweets  '' .
Twitter was created in March  2006  by  जोकर  Dorsey and by July , the  सोशल  networking site was launched  .
The service  rapidly  gained worldwide popularity ,  साथ  over 500 million  पंजीकृत  users as of 2012 , generating over 340 million  tweets  daily and handling over 1.6 billion  ढूंढें  queries  प्रति  day .
Since its launch ,  ट्विटर   रै  become one of the ten most  visited  websites on  the  Internet , and  रै  been described as  ``   the  SMS of the Internet . ''
अपंजीकृत  users can  पढ़ा   tweets  ,  जबकि  registered users can post tweets  through   the  website  इंटरफ़ेस   ,  SMS , or a range of apps  लिये   मोबाईल  devices .
Twitter Inc. is based in San  फ्रांसिस्को  ,  साथ  additional servers and offices in New York  नगर   ,  Boston , and  सैन   अंतोनियो  .
The Hangover is a 2009 American comedy film ,  co-produced  and directed by Todd Phillips  और  written by Jon Lucas and Scott Moore  .
It  is  the first  फिल्मी  of The Hangover franchise  .the  film stars Bradley Cooper , Ed  helms  ,  zach  Galifianakis , Heather Graham , Justin Bartha  ,  and Jeffrey Tambor .
The Hangover tells  the  story of  फिल  Wenneck , Stu  दाम  and Alan Garner , who travel  to  Las Vegas for a  स्नातक  party  to  celebrate their  dost  Doug Billings '  impending  marriage .
However , Phil , Stu and  एलन  have no memory of the previous night 's events  और  must find Doug before the wedding can take place .
Lucas and Moore wrote  the  script after  कार्यपालिका  producer Chris Bender 's friend disappeared and had a large bill after  होने  sent to a strip  क्लबों  .
After Lucas and Moore  बेची  it to the studio for $ 2 million ,  फिलिप्स  and Jeremy Garelick rewrote the script to include a tiger  as   खूब  as a subplot involving a baby and a  पुलिस   क्रूजर  , and also including  boxer  Mike Tyson .
Filming  took  place in  नेवाडा  for 15  दिनों  , and during filming , the three  प्रमुख  actors (  कूपर   ,   helms  and Galifianakis ) formed a friendship  .
The Hangover was released on June 5 ,  2009   ,  becoming  a  critical and commercial  कामयाबी  .
It  became  the  tenth-highest-grossing   फिल्मी   of  2009 , with a  विश्वव्यापी  gross of over US $ 467 million .
Critics praised the film 's  comedic  approach but criticized it  लिये   इसके   vulgarity  .
The film won the Golden Globe  पुरस्कार   लिये  Best Motion  चित्र  – Musical or Comedy  ,  and received multiple  अन्य  accolades .
It is the tenth-highest-grossing film of 2009 in the world ,  as  well  as  the second highest-grossing  r-rated  comedy ever in the  संयुक्त  States , surpassing a  रिकार्ड  previously held by Beverly Hills Cop for  लगभग  25 years  और  later  होने  surpassed  by   टेड   in  2012 .
Out of  सब   r-rated  films , it  is  the third highest-grossing ever in the U.S. ,  पीछे  only The Passion  of   the   मसीह  and The Matrix  reloaded  .
a  sequel ,  the  Hangover Part II ,  थी  released  in  2011  ,  and  a  third and final film  ,  The Hangover Part III , is set  लिये  release in  2013  .
Events involving  meiosis  ,  प्रर्दशित  chromosomal crossover
Meiosis (  )  is a special type of cell division necessary for sexual reproduction in eukaryotes .
the  cells produced by meiosis  हैं  gametes or spores  .
In  अनेक   जीवों   ,  including all  पशु   और  land plants ( but not  कुछ  other groups such  as  fungi ) , gametes  हैं   पुकारा  sperm and egg cells  .
Whilst the process of meiosis bears a number of  similarities  with the 'life-cycle  '  cell division process of mitosis , it differs in  दो  important respects:
the chromosomes in  meiosis  undergo a recombination which shuffles  the  genes producing a different genetic combination  in  each  gamete  , compared with the co-existence  of  each of  the  two separate  pairs  of  प्रत्येक  chromosome ( one  प्राप्त  from each parent  )  in  प्रत्येक  cell which results from mitosis  .
the outcome of meiosis  is  potentially four ( genetically unique ) haploid  कोशिकाएं  , compared with the two ( genetically identical )  द्विगुणित  cells produced from mitosis .
Meiosis begins with one  द्विगुणित  cell containing two  नक़ल  of each chromosome  —one  from  the  organism  's  mother and  एक  from  इसके  father .
The cell divides twice  ,  potentially producing up to four  अगुणित   कोशिकाएं  containing one copy of  प्रत्येक  chromosome .
(  ``  Potentially '' because in some cases  ,  such as  the  formation of  oocytes  in mammals ,  तभी  one of the possible four haploid  कोशिकाएं  survives .  )
in   पशु  the haploid cell resulting from meiosis is  a  male or female gamete .
प्रत्येक   of   the  resulting  गुणसूत्रों  in the  gamete  cells is a unique mixture  of  maternal and paternal DNA ,  resulting  in offspring that are  genetically  distinct from either  जनक  .
इस   देता  rise to genetic diversity in sexually reproducing populations .
This  जेनेटिक  diversity can provide  the  variation of physical and  behavioural  attributes ( phenotypes )  upon  which natural selection can act ,  लकिन   ,   as  described below in Section  6  , Origin and function of  meiosis  , the genetic diversity may  be  largely a by-product  of  the homologous recombination that is primarily employed for its DNA repair function during meiosis .
It is also noteworthy that during meiosis , specific  जीनों  are more highly transcribed , and these are  पुकारा  the meiome , the term  प्रयुक्त  in functional genomics  लिये   the  meiotic  transcriptome  .
meiosis  is a  कुंजी  feature for all  sexually  reproducing eukaryotes in which homologous chromosome pairing , synapse and  recombination  occur .
In addition to strong meiotic stage-specific  अभिव्यक्ति  of mRNA ( the meiome  )  , however  ,  there are also pervasive translational controls ( e.g . selective  उपयोग  of preformed mRNA ) ,  regulating   the  ultimate meiotic stage-specific  प्रोटीन  expression of genes during meiosis .
यूँ  , both the meiome and translational controls determine the broad restructuring  of  meiotic cells needed to carry out meiosis .
Prior to the meiosis process the cell 's chromosomes are duplicated  by  a round of DNA replication  ,  creating from the maternal and  पैतृक  versions of each chromosome ( homologs )  दो  exact  नक़ल  , sister chromatids , attached at the  centromere  region .
in   the  beginning of meiosis the  मातृ  and paternal homologs pair to each other .
Then they  typically   एक्सचेंज  parts  by  homologous  recombination  leading to crossovers of DNA  between  the maternal  और   पैतृक  versions of the chromosome  .
Spindle fibers bind to the centromeres of each pair  of  homologs and arrange the pairs at the spindle equator  .
Then the fibers pull the recombined homologs to opposite poles of  the  cell .
As the chromosomes move away from  the  center the cell divides into two  बेटी  cells  ,  each containing  a   अगुणित  number of chromosomes composed of  दो  chromatids .
After  the  recombined maternal and paternal homologs have separated into the two daughter cells , a second round of cell division occurs  .
There meiosis ends as the  दो  sister  chromatids  making up  प्रत्येक  homolog are  अलग  and move into  एक  of the four resulting  gamete   कोशिकाएं   .
upon   fertilization  , for example when a sperm enters  an  egg cell , two gamete  कोशिकाएं   उत्पादित  by  meiosis  fuse .
The gamete from the mother and the  gamete  from the  पिता  each  योगदान  one half  of  the set of chromosomes that make up  the  new offspring 's genome .
Meiosis uses  अनेक  of the same mechanisms as mitosis ,  a  type of cell division  प्रयुक्त  by eukaryotes like plants and  पशु  to split one cell into two  एकसमान  daughter cells  .
In all plants and in  अनेक  protists meiosis results  in  the formation  of  spores : haploid cells that can divide vegetatively without undergoing fertilization  .
Boxing ( pugilism , prize  लड़   ,   the   मीठी   विज्ञान  or in Greek pygmachia ) is a martial  आर्ट  and  कॉम्बैट  sport in which two people engage  in  a contest of strength , speed , reflexes , endurance and will by throwing punches with gloved hands .
amateur  boxing  is  an  ओलम्पिक  and Commonwealth sport  और  is a common fixture in most of  the   प्रमुख   अंतरराष्ट्रीय   खेल  - it also has its own World Championships .
Boxing is supervised  by  a referee  over  a series of one- to three-minute intervals called rounds .
The result  is  decided when  an  opponent is  deemed  incapable to  continue  by a referee , is  disqualified  for breaking a rule , resigns  by  throwing in a towel  ,  or is pronounced the winner or loser based  on  the judges ' scorecards at the end  of   the  contest  .
The birth hour of boxing as a sport  may   be  its acceptance  by  the ancient Greeks as an Olympic  खेल  as  जल्दी   as   688   bc  .
मुक्केबाज़ी  evolved from  16th-  and  18th-century  prizefights  ,   largely  in Great Britain , to the forerunner of modern boxing in the  mid-19th  century  ,  again initially  in   ग्रेट  Britain and  बाद  in  the  United States .
In  2004  , ESPN ranked boxing  as  the most  मुश्किल   खेल  in the  संसार  .
Agreement or concord happens when a word  परिवर्तन   रूप   depending  on the other words to  जिससे  it  relates  .
It  is  an instance of  inflection   ,  and usually  involves  making the value of some grammatical category ( such as gender  or   व्यक्ति  ) `` agree  ''  between different words or parts  of  the  वाक्य  .
For example , in  मानक  English , one may  कह  I am  or  he is , but not `` I  is  '' or  ``  he am '' .
This is  क्युकी  the grammar of the language  requires  that the  क्रिया  and its subject agree  in  person  .
The pronouns  i  and  he  are first and third  व्यक्ति  respectively , as  हैं  the  क्रिया  forms am and is .
the  verb form must be  चयनित   so  that it has the same person  as  the subject .
the  agreement based on overt grammatical categories as above is formal agreement ,  in  contrast to notional agreement , which is based  on  meaning  .
For  उदाहरण  ,  the  phrase The  संयुक्त  States is treated as  एकवचन  for  उद्देश्य  of agreement ,  भी  though  it  is formally plural .
This is a  सूची  of places below mean sea level  कि  are on land .
Places in tunnels , mines  ,  basements , dug holes ( also with open  आसमान  ) , under water  ,  under  बर्फ  , or  मौजूदा  temporarily as a result of ebbing  of   समुद्र  tide etc . are not included  .
सब  figures  हैं  in meters below sea level:
Debbie Macomber (  born   अक्तूबर   22   ,  1948 in Yakima , Washington  )  is a  best-selling   अमरीकी  author of over 150 romance novels and contemporary women 's  fiction  .
Over 140 million copies of her books are  in   छपाई  throughout the world , and four have  become  made-for-TV-movies .
Macomber was the  inaugural  winner of the fan-voted  quill  Award  लिये  romance in 2005 and has been awarded both a Romance  लेखक   of  America  रीता   और   a   आजीवन  achievement award by the  रोमांस   लेखक  of America .
Catonsville is a census-designated place ( CDP ) in Baltimore County , Maryland , United States  .
The  जनसांख्यिकी  was 41,567 at the 2010 census .
The community lies to the west of Baltimore along the city  's  border .
Catonsville is the home of the University  of  Maryland , Baltimore County ( UMBC ) , a public research  विश्वविद्यालयों  with over 12,000 students .
A lawyer , according to Black  's   विधि   शब्दकोष   ,  is `` a person learned in the  विधि  ; as an attorney  ,  counsel  or  solicitor  ;  a person who  is  practicing law . ''
Law is the system of rules of conduct established by the sovereign  सरकारी  of  a  society to correct wrongs , maintain the stability of political and social authority ,  और  deliver justice .
Working as a lawyer involves the  व्यावहारिक  application of abstract legal theories  और  knowledge to solve specific individualized problems , or to  अग्रिम  the interests  of   those  who retain ( i.e. , hire )  वकील  to perform legal services .
The role of the lawyer varies significantly across  विधिक  jurisdictions , and so it can be treated here in only the most general  शर्तें  .
Vector Marketing is the domestic  बिक्री  arm of  cutco  Corporation , an Olean , New York  आधारित  cutlery manufacturer .
The  परिवार   और  Medical Leave Act  of  1993  (   fmla  ) is a United  राज्य  federal law requiring covered employers  to  provide employees job-protected  और  unpaid leave  लिये  qualified medical and family reasons .
Qualified medical and  परिवार   कारण  include  :  personal  or  family illness , family military  छोड़  , pregnancy , adoption , or the foster care placement  of  a  चाइल्ड  .
The FMLA is administered by  the  Wage  और  Hour Division of  the  United States Department of Labor .
The bill was  a  major part of President Bill Clinton  's  agenda  in  his first term .
अध्यक्ष   क्लिंटन  signed the  विधेयक  into law on February  5  , 1993 ( ;  29  U.S.C  .  sec . 2601 ; 29 CFR 825 ) and  it  took effect on August 5  ,  1993 ,  छह  months later .
The FMLA was intended `` to balance the demands of  the   कार्यस्थल  with the needs of families . ''
The Act  allows  eligible employees to take up to 12  कार्य  weeks  of  unpaid leave  दौरान  any 12-month period to  attend  to  the  serious health condition of the employee , parent , spouse or child , or for pregnancy or care  of  a  नवजात  child  ,  or  लिये  adoption  or  foster  परवाह  of a child .
in  order to be  योग्य  for FMLA leave ,  an  employee  जरूर  have been at the  कारोबार  at least 12 months  ,  and worked  at  least 1,250 hours over the past 12 months , and work  at  a location where the company employs 50 or more employees  भीतर   75  miles  .
The FMLA covers  दोनो  public-  और  private-sector  कर्मचारी  , but certain categories of employees are  excluded  , including elected officials and their  निजी  staff members .
The Vietnam  युद्ध  ( )  थी  a Cold War -era military  विरोध  that occurred in Vietnam , Laos  ,  and  कंबोडिया  from  1  November 1955 to the fall  of  Saigon on 30  अप्रैल  1975 .
इस   युद्ध   followed  the First Indochina  युद्ध  and was  लड़ा  between  उत्तर  Vietnam  ,   समर्थित  by its communist allies , and  the  government of  दक्षिण   वियतनाम  , supported by  the  United States and other anti-communist countries  .
The  viet  Cong  (  also  ज्ञात  as the National Liberation Front , or NLF ) , a  हलके   हथियारबंद  South  वियतनामी  communist common front directed by  the  North , largely fought a guerrilla war against anti-communist forces in  the  region .
The Vietnam  लोगों  's Army  (  North Vietnamese Army ) engaged in a more conventional war , at  टाइम्स   committing  large units into  बैटल  .
U.S. and South Vietnamese forces relied  on   एयर  superiority and overwhelming firepower to conduct search and destroy operations ,  involving  ground  शक्तियां  , artillery , and  airstrikes   .
The U.S. government viewed  भागीदारी   in  the  युद्ध  as a  रास्ता  to  prevent  a communist takeover  of  South  वियतनाम  as  भाग  of their wider strategy  of  containment .
the  North Vietnamese  सरकारी   और  Viet Cong were fighting to reunify Vietnam under  कम्युनिस्ट  rule .
They viewed the conflict  as  a colonial war , fought initially against France  ,   समर्थित  by the U.S. ,  और  later  विरूद्ध  South Vietnam , which it regarded  as  a U.S.  कठपुतली   राज्य  .
अमरीकी  military advisors  arrived   in  what was then French Indochina beginning  in  1950 .
U.S. involvement escalated in the early 1960s , with troop levels  tripling   in  1961 and tripling  again  in 1962 .
u.S.  combat  इकाई  were deployed beginning  in   1965  .
Operations spanned international borders , with  लाओस  and Cambodia  heavily  bombed .
अमरीकी  involvement in the war peaked in 1968 , at  the  time of  the   tet   अप्रिय  .
After this  ,  U.S.  मैदान  forces  यहूद   धीरे   withdrawn  as part of a  नीति  known as Vietnamization .
Despite the Paris Peace Accords , signed by all parties in January 1973 , fighting continued .
U.S.  सैन्य  involvement ended on 15 August 1973 as a result of the Case–Church Amendment passed  by  the U.S.  कॉंग्रेस  .
The  कैप्चर  of Saigon by the Vietnam People 's Army  in  April 1975 marked the end of  the  war , and North and South Vietnam were reunified the following year .
The war  exacted  a huge human cost in terms of  fatalities  ( see Vietnam  युद्ध  casualties ) .
estimates  of the number of Vietnamese soldiers and civilians killed  vary   इससे  800,000 to 3.1 million  .
Some 200,000–300,000 Cambodians  ,  20,000–200,000  laotians  , and 58,220 U.S. service members also died in  the  conflict .
क्लीवलैंड   ज्वालामुखी  in the Aleutian Islands of  अलास्का  photographed from the International  स्पेस  Station  ,  May 2006 .
Ash plumes reached  a  height of 19  km  during  the  climactic eruption at Mount Pinatubo , Philippines in 1991  .
A volcano is  an  opening , or rupture ,  in  a planet  's   सतह  or crust  ,  which allows hot  मैग्मा   ,  volcanic ash  और  gases  to   एस्केप  from  the  magma chamber below the  सतह   .
Volcanoes are generally found where  tectonic   प्लेटों  are diverging or  converging   .
A mid-oceanic ridge , for example the Mid-Atlantic Ridge , has examples of volcanoes caused  by  divergent tectonic  प्लेटों  pulling  अलावा  ; the Pacific Ring of Fire has examples of volcanoes  caused  by convergent tectonic  प्लेटों  coming together .
By contrast  ,  volcanoes are  प्रायः  not created where two tectonic plates  स्लाइड  past one  another  .
Volcanoes can  भी  form where  वहीँ  is stretching and thinning of the Earth 's crust in the interiors of plates , e.g. , in the East African  दरार  , the Wells Gray-Clearwater volcanic field  और  the Rio Grande Rift in North  अमेरिका  .
This type  of  volcanism falls under the umbrella of ``  थाली  hypothesis  ''  volcanism  .
Volcanism away from plate boundaries has also  महरूम  explained  as  mantle plumes .
These so-called  ``  hotspots `` , for example Hawaii , are postulated to arise from upwelling diapirs with magma from the core–mantle boundary , 3,000 km  गहन  in the  धरती  .
Erupting volcanoes can pose many hazards , not only in the  तात्कालिक  vicinity  of  the eruption .
Volcanic ash  can  be a threat to aircraft , in  particular  those with jet  इंजन  where ash particles can be melted by  the  high  ऑपरेटिंग  temperature .
विशाल  eruptions can affect temperature as ash and droplets  of  sulfuric acid obscure  the  sun  और  cool the Earth 's lower atmosphere or troposphere ; however , they also absorb heat  radiated  up from  the  Earth  ,  thereby warming the stratosphere .
Historically ,  so-called   volcanic  winters have caused  अनर्थकारी  famines .

a  pothole ( sometimes called  a  kettle  और  known in parts of the Western United States as a chuckhole ) is a type of disruption in the surface of a roadway where  a  portion  of   the  road  सामग्री   रै   टूटा  away , leaving a  छेद  .
Renal cell carcinoma (  rcc  , also known as hypernephroma  )  is  a  kidney cancer  कि  originates in  the   अस्तर  of the proximal convoluted tubule  ,  the very small tubes  in  the kidney  कि  transport GF ( glomerular  filtrate  ) from the glomerulus to  the  descending limb of the nephron .
rcc  is the most  आम  type of kidney cancer  in  adults , responsible for  लगभग  80 % of cases .
It is also known to  be   the   सबसे  lethal of all the genitourinary tumors .
Initial treatment  is  most commonly a radical or  आंशिक  nephrectomy and remains the mainstay of curative treatment .
Where the  ट्यूमर  is confined  to  the renal parenchyma , the  5-year  survival rate is  60-70  % , but this is lowered considerably where  metastases  have spread  .
It  is  relatively resistant to  विकिरण  therapy and  कीमोथेरेपी  , although some cases respond to immunotherapy .
Targeted cancer therapies  ऐसे  as  sunitinib  ,  temsirolimus  , bevacizumab  ,  interferon-alpha , and sorafenib have improved the outlook for RCC  .
Estée Lauder Companies  ,  Inc. is a manufacturer and marketer of  प्रतिष्ठा   skincare   ,  makeup ,  महक   और  hair care products .
the  company  रै  its headquarters in Midtown Manhattan , New York City .
The peritoneum ( ) is  the  serous membrane that forms the lining of  the  abdominal cavity or  the  coelom —it covers  सबसे  of the intra-abdominal (  or  coelomic ) organs—in amniotes and  कुछ   invertebrates  ( annelids ,  लिये  instance  )  .
It is composed of a layer of  mesothelium  supported by a thin layer  of  connective  ऊतक   .
The peritoneum both  supports  the abdominal organs  और  serves  as   a   conduit  for their blood and  लसीका  vessels and nerves .
The abdominal cavity ( the space bounded  by  the  vertebrae   ,  abdominal muscles , diaphragm and pelvic floor ) should  नहीं  be confused  साथ  the intraperitoneal space ( located within the abdominal cavity , but  लपेटा  in peritoneum ) .
The structures within the intraperitoneal space are called  ``  intraperitoneal '' ( e.g . the stomach ) , the structures  in   the  abdominal cavity that are located behind the intraperitoneal space are called `` retroperitoneal `` (  e.g  . the kidneys )  ,  and those structures below the intraperitoneal space are  पुकारा  `` subperitoneal '' or `` infraperitoneal '' ( e.g . the bladder ) .
Modern  2.5  '' SSD used  in   उपभोक्ता   लैपटॉप  and desktop computers .
DDR SDRAM based SSD .
Max and  .
पीसीआई  attached IO Accelerator SSD
PCI-E  ,   dram   ,  and NAND based SSD  .
It uses an external  शक्ति  supply to make  the  DRAM non-volatile .
A solid-state drive ( SSD  )   (  also known as a solid-state disk or electronic disk , though  it  contains no  वास्तविक  `` disk ''  of  any kind  )  is  a   आंकड़ा   भंडार  device  using  integrated circuit assemblies as memory to store data persistently .
SSD technology uses  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक  interfaces compatible with traditional block input/output ( I/O ) hard disk drives .
SSDs have no moving mechanical  components  , which distinguish them from traditional electromechanical magnetic disks such  as   मुश्किल  disk drives ( HDDs )  or   फ्लॉपी  disks , which contain  घूम  disks and movable read/write heads .
Compared with  electromechanical  disks , SSDs are typically less susceptible  to   शारीरिक  shock  ,  much quieter , have lower access time , and less latency .
however  , while the price of SSDs has continued to decline in  2012  , SSDs are still about 7 to 8  टाइम्स  more expensive per unit of storage than  hdds   .
अनेक   ssds   उपयोग  I/O interfaces developed for hard disk drives , thus permitting simple replacement in common applications .
, most SSDs use NAND-based flash  मेमोरी  , which retains data without power .
लिये  applications requiring fast access  ,  but  नहीं   necessarily  data persistence after power loss , SSDs may  be   constructed  from random-access memory ( RAM )  .
Such devices  may   employ  separate power sources , such as  बैटरी  , to maintain data  बाद  power  घाटा   .
Hybrid drives or solid  राज्य  hybrid drives ( SSHD ) combine the features of SSDs and HDDs in the same  ईकाई  , containing  a  large hard disk drive  और  an SSD cache to  improve  performance of frequently accessed data .
These devices may offer near-SSD performance for  अनेक  applications .

Caviar , according to the Food and Agriculture Organization , is a  उत्पाद  made  इससे  salt-cured fish-eggs of the Acipenseridae family .
The roe can be `` fresh ''  (  non-pasteurized )  or  pasteurized ,  साथ   pasteurization   reducing  its culinary and economic value  .
Traditionally the  पद   caviar  refers  तभी  to roe from wild sturgeon  in   the  Caspian and  ब्लैक  Seas  (  Beluga  ,  Ossetra and Sevruga  caviars  )  .
depending  on the country , caviar may also be used to describe the roe of other fish such as salmon , steelhead , trout ,  lumpfish   ,  whitefish , and other species of  sturgeon   .
Caviar is considered a luxury delicacy  और  is eaten  as  a garnish or a  स्प्रेड  .
in  2012 , caviar sold for $ 2,500 per  पाउंड  , or $ 3,000  to  $  5,500  per  किलो  .
the   सेक  Network  is  a television  अनुप्रयोग  network featuring live broadcasts of  कॉलेज  football and  बास्केट  events  इससे  the Southeastern  सम्मेलन  .
it  is owned and operated by ESPN  प्लस   और   is  shown  in  more than 50  प्रतिशत  of households in the United States , mostly Southeastern United States  बाज़ार  .
The  सेक  Network typically airs in the noon eastern slot that was  पूर्व  home to the Raycom Sports SEC game  of   the  week  .
Games are shown  locally  on broadcast  स्टेशन  , regional  खेल  networks  ,  as well  as  on  ईएसपीएन  GamePlan  ,  ESPN Full Court , and ESPN3.com .
the  SEC Network is also available  in   कनाडा  via Atlanta 's WPCH-TV .
The SEC Network  उपयोग  the same on-screen  ग्राफिक्स  currently used by ESPN on ABC ,  a  version of ESPN  's  graphics package .
SEC Network 's football programming still uses a title safe area because  सबसे  of its  affiliates  do not Letterbox their Standard Definition feeds ,  जबकि   ईएसपीएन  's television networks have allowed  उनके  graphics to abandon the title safe  ,   लकिन  letterbox for SD  दर्शक  .
Starting  साथ  the  सेक  2012 Basketball season , SEC  संजाल  's  ग्राफिक्स  have been converted to  a   16:9  Widescreen-only format .
This  is  also being used  लिये  the 2013 Basketball season , but had still  adapted  the former 4:3-safe graphics format for the 2012 SEC football season .
the  1990s , pronounced and also known as  ``  the Nineteen-Nineties '' or  abbreviated  as `` the Nineties  ''  or `` the '90s  ''  , was a  दशक   कि  began  on  January 1 , 1990 ,  और  ended on December 31  ,   1999  .
it  was the 10th  और   पिछला   दशक  of  the  20th century and the 100th and last decade of the 2nd millennium  .
the  decade is  बेहतरीन  known for the end of the Cold War at the beginning of the decade and the  विस्तार   और  commercialization  of  the Internet  दौरान  the  दूसरी  half of  the   दशक  .
In much of  the  West the 1990s is remembered  as  a period of unprecedented peace and prosperity  ,   हालांकि   अनेक  parts of  the  so-called Third World  faced  various problems including genocide  ,  AIDS and new or  continuing  ethnic tensions and civil  युद्धों  .
culturally  speaking the  दशक  was  characterized  by the  वृद्धि   of  multiculturalism and alternative media .
Movements such as grunge , the rave scene and  हिप  hop spread  around   the  world to young people during  the   दशक   ,   aided   by  then-new technology  ऐसे  as cable  टेलीविज़न   और  the Internet .
a  combination of  कारकों  , including the mass mobilization of capital markets  through   neoliberalism   ,   the  beginning of the widespread proliferation  of  new media such as the Internet , and  the   विच्छेद  of the  सोवियत  Union led  to  a  realignment   और   reconsolidation  of economic and political  शक्ति  across  the  world , and within countries .
Income inequality among countries  in  the world rose sharply between the 1980s and the mid-1990s , before  levelling  off  और  then falling  बाद  2000 .
नई  ethnic conflicts emerged in  अफ़्रीकी  , the Balkans and the Caucasus ,  the  former two which led to the  rwandan  genocide and Bosnian genocide ,  क्रमशः  .
The United States  began  its current military occupation of the Middle  ईस्ट  during the summer of 1990 with  मरुस्थल  Shield after it cut off a  विशाल  portion of the world 's petroleum supply .
Signs of any resolution of tensions between  इसराईल  and  the  Arab  संसार  remained elusive ,  हालांकि  the Irish Troubles came to a standstill in 1998 with the Good  शुक्रवार  Agreement  बाद   30  years of violence .
The gray wolf or grey wolf ( Canis  lupus  ) is a  प्रजाति  of canid native to the wilderness and remote areas of North America  ,  Eurasia , and North Africa .
it  is  the  largest member of its family , with males averaging  ,   और  females .
It is similar in general appearance  और  proportions  to  a German shepherd ,  or   sled   श्वान  , but  रै  a larger head , narrower chest , longer legs , straighter tail and bigger paws .
Its  शीत   फर   is   long  and bushy ,  और  predominantly a mottled gray in colour , although nearly pure white ,  रेड  , or  भूरा  to black also occur .
Within the genus Canis ,  the  gray wolf represents  a  more specialised and progressive  रूप  than  इसके  smaller cousins ( the coyote and  सुनहरी   jackal  ) , as demonstrated by its morphological  adaptations  to hunting large prey , its more  मिलनसार  nature and its highly advanced expressive  बर्ताव  .
It is a social animal , travelling  in  nuclear families consisting of a mated pair  ,  accompanied by the pair  's  adult offspring .
The gray wolf is typically an apex predator  throughout  its range , with only humans and tigers posing a serious  threat  to it .
it  feeds primarily on large ungulates ,  हालांकि  it also eats smaller  पशु  , livestock ,  carrion  ,  और  garbage .
The gray  भेड़िया  is one of the world 's most well researched animals , with probably more  किताबे  written  परिचय  it than any other wildlife species .
It has a long history of association with humans ,  having  been  despised  and hunted in  सबसे   agricultural  communities due to its attacks on  पशुधन  ,  जबकि  conversely being respected by some Native American  जनजातियों  .
It is the sole ancestor  of  the dog  ,   जिससे  was first domesticated  in  the Middle  ईस्ट  .
हालांकि  the fear of  भेड़ियों   is  prevalent in many human  समाजों  , the majority of recorded attacks on people have been attributed to animals suffering from rabies .
Non-rabid wolves have attacked and  मारे  people  ,   मुख्यतः   children  ,  लकिन  this is unusual , as  भेड़ियों  are relatively few ,  सजीव   दूर  from people , and have been taught to fear  इंसानो  by hunters and  गड़रिये   .
Hunting and trapping has  घटाया  the  प्रजाति  '  दायरा  to , though its  स्टिल  relatively widespread  दायरा  and stable population means that the species is not threatened  at   a  global  स्तर  , and  is  therefore  वर्गीकृत   by   the  IUCN as Least Concern .
The  रोमन   साम्राज्य   (  ) was the post- Republican  काल   of  the ancient Roman civilization , characterised by  an  autocratic  रूप  of government  और   विशाल   territorial  holdings around the Mediterranean in Europe , Africa , and  एशिया   .
The  500-year-old  Roman Republic  ,  which  preceded  it , had been destabilized through a series  of  civil wars .
Several  कार्यक्रम   चिह्नित  the transition from Republic to  साम्राज्य  , including Julius Caesar  's  appointment as perpetual dictator ( 44  bc  )  ;  the Battle of Actium  (  31  bc  ) ; and the  granting   of  the honorific  augustus  to  octavian  by the Roman Senate (  27  BC ) .
the   पहला  two centuries of the Empire were a period of unprecedented stability and prosperity known as the Pax Romana (  ``  Roman Peace  ''  ) .
It reached its greatest expanse during the reign of Trajan ( 98–117 AD  )  .
In the 3rd century  ,  the Empire underwent  a  crisis that threatened its  अस्तित्व  , but was  reunified  and stabilized under the emperors Aurelian  और  Diocletian .
ईसाइयों  rose to  शक्ति  in the 4th century , during which time a system of dual rule was  विकसित  in the Latin West and Greek East  .
बाद   the  collapse of central government in the West in  the  5th century ,  the  eastern half continued as what would later be  ज्ञात  as the Byzantine Empire  .
Because of the Empire  's   विशाल   extent  and long endurance , the institutions and culture  of  Rome had  a  profound and lasting influence on  the  development of  भाषा  ,  धर्म  , architecture  ,  philosophy , law ,  और  forms of government in the  territory  it governed  ,   विशेषकर  Europe  ,   और   by  means of European expansionism throughout the modern  संसार  .
Education in the  संयुक्त   राज्य  is mainly provided by the  पब्लिक  sector ,  साथ  control  और  funding coming  इससे  three levels :  लोकल  , state ,  और  federal , in  कि  order .
चाइल्ड  education is  अनिवार्य  , and there are also a large number  और  wide variety of  उच्चतर  education  संस्थानों  throughout the  देश  that one  can  choose to attend  ,  both  सरेआम   और  privately administered  .
पब्लिक  education is universally  उपलब्धियाँ  .
School curricula  ,  funding , teaching , employment , and other  नीतियों  are  नियत  through locally elected school boards with jurisdiction over school districts with many  directives  from state  विधानमंडलों  .
School districts are  प्रायः  separate from other local jurisdictions  ,  with independent officials and budgets .
Educational standards and standardized testing decisions are usually made by  राज्य  governments .
The ages  लिये   अनिवार्य  education  vary   by  state  .
it  begins from  आयु  five to eight and ends from ages  चौदह  to eighteen .
अनिवार्य  education requirements can  generally  be satisfied by educating children  in  public schools ,  state-certified  private  स्कूलों  , or an approved home  स्कूल  program .
In most public and  निजी  schools , education  is  divided into three levels  :  elementary school , middle school ( sometimes called junior high school  )  , and high  स्कूल  ( sometimes referred to as secondary  शिक्षा   )  .
In almost all schools at these levels ,  children  are divided by age  समूह  into  ग्रेड   ,  ranging from kindergarten ( followed by first grade )  लिये  the youngest children in elementary school , up to twelfth  ग्रेड  , the final year of high school .
The exact age range  of  students in these  ग्रेड   स्तर  varies slightly from area to area .
Post-secondary education ,  बेहतर   ज्ञात  as `` college ``  in  the United States , is generally governed separately from the elementary  और  high school system , and is described in a separate section below .
Government  समर्थित  , free public schools for all started being established  बाद  the revolution ,  और   विस्तारित  in the 19th century  ,  as the results of efforts of men like  होरेस   मन  and  बुकर  T. Washington .
By 1870 , all states had free  elementary  schools  ,   albeit  only in  शहरी   centers  .
as  the  20th  century drew nearer , states  प्रारंभ  passing laws to make schooling compulsory , and by 1910 , 72 percent of children attended school .
Private schools continued to  स्प्रेड   दौरान  this time , as well as colleges and—in the rural centers— land grant colleges .
The year of 1910  भी  saw the first  सच्चा  high schools .
During the  बाकी  of the 20th century ,  शैक्षणिक  efforts  केन्द्रित  on reducing the inequality  of  the  schooling  system .
The landmark Supreme Court case Brown  v.  Board  of  Education made the desegregation of elementary  और  high schools a  नेशनल   प्रधानता   ,  while  the   pell  Grant program helped  ग़रीब  minorities gain access  to  college  .
खास  education was made into  संघीय  law  in  1975 .
The Elementary and Secondary Education  अधिनियम  of 1965 made standardized testing a requirement , and in 1983 , a commission  थी  established to evaluate their results and propose a  कोर्स  of action .
The resulting No  चाइल्ड  Left Behind Act of 2001 was controversial  और   इसके  goals proved to be unrealistic  .
A commission established in 2006 evaluated higher education  ,  but its recommendations  have   yet  to be fully implemented  .
पॉल  Bragg ( February 6  ,  1895 – December 7 , 1976 ) , nutritionist  ,  was a pioneer in America’s wellness movement .
Health spending per capita , in $  us   ppp-adjusted   ,  with the US  और  Canada compared amongst other first world  राष्ट्र  .
Comparison of the health care systems in Canada  और  the United States are often made by government  ,   पब्लिक   स्वास्थ्य   और  public  नीति  analysts .
The two countries  था  similar health care systems before  कनाडा  reformed its  प्रणाली  in the 1960s and 1970s .
the  United States spends much  अधिक  money on health care  than  Canada , on  दोनो  a  per-capita   आधार  and as a percentage  of   जीडीपी  .
In 2006 ,  per-capita   बिता  for health  परवाह  in Canada was US $ 3,678  ;  in  the  U.S. , US $ 6,714 .
The U.S. spent 15.3 % of GDP on health  परवाह  in  कि   साल   ;  Canada  खर्च  10.0 % .
In 2006 , 70 % of health care spending  in  Canada was financed  by  government  ,  versus 46 % in the United States  .
Total government spending per  capita  in  the   u.S.   on  health care  थी   23  % higher than Canadian government  बिता   ,   और  U.S.  सरकारी  expenditure on  स्वास्थ्य  care was just under 83 % of total  कनाडाई  spending ( public and private ) though these statistics do n't take into  खाता  population  मतभेद  .
Studies  have  come  to   अलग  conclusions  परिचय  the  परिणाम  of this disparity in spending .
A  2007  review of all studies comparing health outcomes in Canada and the US in  a  Canadian peer-reviewed  चिकित्सा  journal found  कि  `` health outcomes may be superior in patients cared for in  कनाडा  versus the United States , but differences are not consistent . ''
Life expectancy  is  longer in Canada , and its  शिशु   मृत्यु  rate is lower than that of  the   u.S.  , but there is debate about  the   underlying  causes of these  मतभेद  .
One commonly cited comparison , the  2000  World Health Organization 's ratings  of  ``  overall   स्वास्थ्य  service  प्रदर्शन  '' , which used a `` composite measure of  उपलब्धि  in the level  of  health , the distribution of health , the level of responsiveness  और  fairness of financial contribution '' ,  क्रमित  Canada  30th  and the US 37th among 191  सदस्य  nations .
इस  study rated the US `` responsiveness  ''  , or quality  of  service for  individuals   receiving  treatment , as 1st , compared with 7th for Canada  .
जबकि   the   औसत   जीवन   प्रत्याशा  for Canadians was 80.34 years compared with 78.6  सालो  for residents of the US , simply  comparing  the  जीवन  expectancy  of  two groups with different racial makeup and different  मोटापा  rates is likely not an effective way  of  determining which healthcare system is superior .
the   जो   's  study  विधि  were  criticized  by some analyses .
Although  वहीँ  is a  माप  of consensus that life-expectancy and infant mortality  चिह्नित   the  most  विश्वसनीय   तरीके   to  compare  nation-wide   स्वास्थ्य  care , assuming the population makeup is similar , a  हाल  report  by  the Congressional Research Service carefully summarizes some recent data  और  notes  the  `` difficult research  मुद्दे   ''   facing  international comparisons  .
The sound source has now broken through the sound speed barrier , and is traveling at 1.4 times the speed  of   ध्वनि  , (  mach  1.4 ) .
Since  the  source is moving  तेज़  (  साथ  a speed  )  than  the  sound waves it creates , it  दरअसल  leads  the  advancing  तरंगाग्र  .
The sound source will  pass  by a stationary observer ( with a speed  )   पहले  the observer actually  hears  the sound it creates .
As  a  result , an observer in front of the source will detect
and  an  observer behind the  सोर्स  .
a  sonic  बूम   उत्पादित  by  an  aircraft moving at M=2.92 , calculated from the  कोन  angle of 20 degrees .
An observer hears the  बूम  when the shock wave , on the  किनारे  of  the  cone , crosses his or  उसके  location  .
Mach cone  कोण
a  sonic boom is the sound associated with the shock waves created by an  ऑब्जेक्ट  traveling through the  एयर  faster  than  the speed of sound .
Sonic booms generate enormous  amounts  of sound energy , sounding much like an explosion .
The crack of  a  supersonic bullet passing overhead  is  an  उदाहरण  of a sonic  बूम  in miniature .
The Tonight Show with Jay Leno is an  अमरीकी   late-night  talk show  hosted  by Jay Leno that initially aired from May  25   ,  1992  to  May 29 , 2009 , and resumed  उत्पादन  on March 1 , 2010 .
The  चौथी  incarnation of the Tonight Show franchise  बना  its  डेब्यू  on May 25 , 1992 , three  दिनों  following Johnny Carson 's retirement as host of the program  .
The  कार्यक्रम  originates  इससे   एनबीसी  Studios in Burbank ,  कैलिफ़ोर्निया   ,  and is broadcast  सोमवार  through Friday at  11:35  PM in the Eastern and Pacific  समय  zones  (  10:35 PM Central / Mountain time ) .
Unlike Carson or his  पूर्ववर्ती  Jack Paar  ,  Leno only once utilized a guest host , preferring to host the series by himself .
On April 26 ,  1999  ,  the  show  began  broadcasting  in  1080i HDTV , becoming the first American  nightly   बात  show  to   be   शॉट   in  high  परिभाषा  .
the  show is shot in  16:9  aspect  अनुपात   .
The series , which  followed  the  वही  basic format as that of his predecessors (  an  opening monologue followed by comedy routines  ,  interviews and performances ) , ran  जबतक  May 29 , 2009 , after  जिससे  Leno  थी  succeeded by  कोनन  O'Brien .
एनबीसी   हस्ताक्षरित  Leno to  a   नई  deal for a nightly talk  दिखाएँ   in  the 10:00  pm  ET timeslot .
The primetime series , titled  the  Jay Leno Show , debuted on September 14 , 2009 ,  following  a similar format to  the  Leno incarnation of  tonight  .
Neither O'Brien 's version of the program , which premiered June 1 ,  2009  , nor The Jay Leno Show generated the ratings that NBC  था  expected .
the  network decided to move a condensed 30-minute version of  लीनो  's show to  o'brien  's time slot , and O'Brien 's Tonight Show a half-hour later  .
This decision met with opposition from O'Brien , whose stint on The Tonight Show ended January  22  ,  2010  , after which  he   began  his own talk  दिखाएँ   on   tbs   .
The Tonight Show with Jay  लीनो  then began its second and current incarnation  ,  the  छठे  of the franchise , on March  1  , 2010 .
RFID chip next to a grain of  राइस  .
This chip contains a radio-frequency electromagnetic field coil that  modulates  an  बाह्य  magnetic field to  ट्रांसफ़र  a  coded  identification  क्रमांक  when  queried  by  a   रीडर   यंत्र   .
This  छोटी   प्रकार  is incorporated in consumer products , and implanted  in   पालतु   ,  for identification  उद्देश्य   .
radio-frequency  identification  (  RFID )  is   the  wireless  non-contact  use  of   radio-frequency  electromagnetic fields to transfer data , for the purposes of automatically  identifying   और  tracking tags attached to  वस्तुएँ  .
The tags contain electronically stored information  .
Some tags are powered and read at short ranges ( a few meters  )  via magnetic fields ( electromagnetic  प्रेरण   )  .
अन्य   उपयोग  a local  शक्ति  source such as a battery , or else have no battery but  collect  energy from the  interrogating  EM field  ,  and then act as a passive transponder to  emit  microwaves or UHF  रेडियो  waves ( i.e. ,  इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक  radiation at high frequencies ) .
Battery powered tags  may  operate at hundreds of  मीटर  .
नापसंद  a bar code , the tag does not necessarily  need  to be within line of sight  of  the reader ,  और  may be embedded in the tracked object .
rfid  tags are used  in  many industries  .
An RFID  टैग  attached to an automobile during  उत्पादन  can be used to track its  प्रगति  through the assembly line  .
Pharmaceuticals  can  be tracked through warehouses  .
पशुधन  and pets may  have   टैग  injected , allowing  धनात्मक  identification  of  the animal .
Since RFID  टैग  can be attached to clothing , possessions , or even implanted within people ,  the  possibility of reading  personally-linked   सूचना   बगैर  consent has  उठाया  privacy concerns .
id  , ego and super-ego are  the  three  भाग  of the psychic apparatus defined in  सिग्मुंड  Freud  's  structural model  of  the psyche ; they  हैं  the three theoretical  constructs   in  terms of whose  कार्यकलाप  and interaction mental life is described .
According to this  मॉडल  of the  psyche   ,  the id is the set of  uncoordinated  instinctual  रुझान   ;  the  super-ego  plays the critical and moralizing role ; and the ego is the organized , realistic part that mediates  between  the desires of the id  और  the super-ego .
The  super-ego  can stop  तुम  from  doing  certain things  कि  your id may want you to do .
Even though the model is structural and  makes  reference to an apparatus  ,   the  id , ego and super-ego are functions of the mind  बल्कि  than parts  of  the brain  और  do not correspond one-to-one with actual  दैहिक  structures of the kind dealt with by  neuroscience   .
The concepts themselves arose  at  a late stage in the development  of  Freud  's  thought :  the  `` structural model ''  (  which succeeded his `` economic model '' and  ``  topographical model '' ) was first  discussed  in his 1920  निबन्ध  `` Beyond the Pleasure Principle ``  और   थी   formalized  and elaborated  upon   तीन   सालो  later in  उसके  `` The Ego and the Id  ``  .
Freud 's proposal  थी  influenced by  the  ambiguity of  the  term ``  बेहोश  `` and its many  conflicting   उपयोग  .
Air Force ROTC emblem
The Air Force Reserve Officer Training Corps ( AFROTC  )   is  one of the three  प्राथमिक  commissioning sources for officers  in  the United States Air Force , the other  दो  being  the   संयुक्त   राज्य  Air Force Academy ( USAFA )  और  Air Force Officer  प्रशिक्षण  School ( OTS ) .
a  subordinate command of the  एयर   विश्वविद्यालयों  within the Air  शिक्षा  and Training Command ( AETC ) , AFROTC is  लकीर  under the Jeanne  M.  Holm Center for Officer Accessions and Citizen Development at Maxwell  afb  ,  अलबामा  .
The Holm Center , formerly known as  the  Air  फ़ोर्स  Officer Accession and Training Schools  (   afoats   )  , retains direct  जिम्मेदारी  for both AFROTC  और  OTS .
afrotc  is  the  largest and oldest source of commissioned officers  लिये  the U.S. Air Force .
afrotc  's stated mission is  to  produce quality leaders for the U.S. Air Force .
AFROTC units are located on 144 college and university campuses with  984  additional institutions of higher learning participating  in  cross-town agreements  कि  allow their  विद्यार्थी  to attend AFROTC classes at a nearby ``  मेजबान  ''  कॉलेज   or   विश्वविद्यालयों  .
According to  afoats  HQ , in  2006   ,  AFROTC commissioned 2,083 USAF  दूसरी  Lieutenants , with AFROTC enrollment  ranging  from  23,605  in  1985  to 10,231 in 1993 , and around 13,000 enrolled today  .
AFROTC units at colleges and universities are  पुकारा  `` detachments , '' and are  typically  headed by an active duty USAF officer in  the  rank  of  colonel or lieutenant  कर्नल  who functions as both the Detachment Commander for USAF purposes and  साथ  the nominal title of  प्राध्यापक  of Aerospace Studies (  pas  )  भीतर  the institution 's academic community .
Most colleges and universities will designate the  afrotc  detachment as  the  Department of Aerospace Studies .
The PAS is assisted by  तीन  to four  सहायक  Professors of  aerospace   अध्ययन   (   apas  )  ,  all active duty USAF officers in  the  ranks of major  or  captain .
Three USAF non-commissioned  अधिकारियों  and one senior non-commissioned officer will  typically  provide  सैन्य  administrative  support  and are often augmented  by  one to two civilian  स्टाफ  support  कर्मचारी   of   the  academic  संस्था  .
Within  afrotc  detachments , the  विद्यार्थी  ( referred to  as  `` cadets  ''   )  are organized  into  wings , groups , squadrons , and flights , mirroring the USAF functional wing structure .
The AFROTC detachment  's  cadet wing or  cadet   समूह  is separated into two divisions : the  सामान्य  Military Course  (  GMC ) consisting of the  पहला  two  सालो  of training , and the  पेशेवर   अधिकारी  Course ( POC ) consisting  of   the  last two  सालो  of training .
The AFROTC program  is  also divided into two training  कृत्यों  : the Academic Classroom  कार्यक्रम  ( Aerospace Studies  वर्ग  ) and  cadet  Activities ( i.e. ,  नेतृत्व   प्रयोगशाला  , Physical Training , and other training ) .
पेपर  density ( also known as  आधार  weight and grammage ) is a term used  in  the pulp and paper industry and also for fabric industry to  denote  a measure of mass  of  the product per unit of area for a type of  कपड़ा  , paper or paperboard .
the  term ``  घनत्व   ''  is not  प्रयुक्त   in  its  परंपरागत  sense  of  mass  प्रति  unit volume .
`` Paper  घनत्व  '' , rather ,  is  a measure of the area density  .
Paper products that  let  little or  no   लाइट   pass   through  (  e.g   .  poster board ) are considered dense  or  heavy .
पेपर  products  कि   allow  some light to  pass  through ( e.g  .  tissue paper ) are considered lightweight  .
In the  गूदा  and paper industry ,  it   is  common  to  set a commercial paper machine to produce paper to a target paper density .
Paper density  can   भी  be used  to  distinguish paper from paperboard  as  the latter  प्रायः  has a  grammage   वृहद  than 134 g/m2 .
Two  तरीके  of expressing paper density are commonly  उपयोगd:
Expressed  in  grams per square meter ( g/m2 )  ,  paper density  is  also known as grammage .
इस   is  the measure used in most parts of  the  world .
Expressed in terms of the  द्रव्यमान  ( expressed as weight ) per  क्रमांक  of  चादरें  , it is known as  आधार   वज़न  .
The convention used in the United  राज्य   और  a few other  देशों  using US paper sizes is pounds  of  a ream of 500 ( or  in  some cases 1000 )  चादरें  of a given  (   कच्चा  , still uncut )  आधार  size .
Japanese paper is  expressed  as the weight in  kg  of  1000  sheets .
Candace  निकोल  Parker (  born  April 19 ,  1986   )  is  an  American basketball player  लिये  the WNBA 's Los Angeles Sparks and UMMC Ekaterinburg of Russia .
She is the younger sister of NBA player Anthony  पार्कर  .
She attended the University of Tennessee and was  drafted  by the Sparks in 2008 .
She may be best  ज्ञात   लिये   होने  the first woman to dunk in an NCAA tournament game and the first woman to dunk  twice  in a college game—she set both milestones as a redshirt  freshman  on March 19 , 2006 .
She also became  तभी  the second  खिलाड़ी  to dunk in a WNBA game on  जून  22 , 2008 .
A versatile player , she is mainly a forward , but was listed on Tennessee 's roster as a  आगे  , center  ,  and guard  .
She  थी  a starter  on  the Lady Vols basketball team , winners of the 2007 and 2008 NCAA championships .
Parker won the 2009  निकलोडियन  Kids '  चुनाव  award as the favorite  मादा  athlete in the sports category .
And she  थी  a guest  स्टार  on Figure  it  Out .
A food guide pyramid  is  a pyramid shaped guide of healthy foods divided into sections to show the recommended intake for each food group .
The first food  पिरामिड  was published in  स्वीडन  in  1974   .
The most widely known food pyramid was introduced by  the  United States Department of  कृषि  in the year 1992 , was updated  in  2005 , and then  replaced  in 2011 .
Over 25 other countries and organisations have also published  खाना   पिरामिडों  .
Hans Christian  andersen   (  ; often referred to in Scandinavia as H. C. Andersen ;  अप्रैल   2   ,  1805August 4 , 1875 ) was a Danish author and poet .
Although  a  prolific writer  of  plays , travelogues , novels , and poems , Andersen  is  best  remembered  for his fairy tales , a literary genre he  so  mastered that he  खुद  has become  as  mythical as  the   किस्से  he wrote  .
andersen  's popularity is not limited  to  children ;  उसके  stories—called  ,  or `` fantastic tales '' —express themes that transcend age and nationality .
During his  आजीवन  he was  acclaimed  for having  प्रसन्न   children  worldwide and  थी  feted  by   रॉयल्टी  .
Andersen 's fairy tales , which have been translated into more than  125   भाषाएं  , have become culturally embedded in the  वेस्ट  's collective consciousness , readily  accessible  to children ,  लकिन  presenting lessons of virtue and resilience in  the  face  of   adversity  for mature  पाठक  as well .
They have  प्रेरित  motion  तस्वीरें  , plays , ballets , and animated  films  .

Eye contact  occurs  when `` two people look  at   प्रत्येक  other  's  eyes  at   the  same  समय   .   ''
in  human beings  ,   नजर   सम्पर्क  is a  रूप  of nonverbal communication and is thought to  have  a  विशाल  influence  on  social behavior  .
Coined in  the  early to mid-1960s , the term has come  in  the West to often  define   the   अधिनियम  as a meaningful and important sign  of  confidence and social communication .
the  customs and significance of eye contact vary widely between  संस्कृतियों  , with  धार्मिक  and social differences often altering  इसके  meaning  greatly  .
The study of eye contact is sometimes known as  oculesics  .
Bed bugs  हैं  parasitic insects of  the  cimicid family that feed exclusively on blood .
the   पद   सबसे   commonly  refers to members of the genus Cimex of which  cimex  lectularius , the common  bed  bug  ,   is  the best known as  it  prefers  to  feed  on  human blood  हालांकि  other Cimex species  हैं  specialized to other animals ,  e.g.  , bat  बग  , C.  pipistrelli  ( Europe ) ,  C.   pilosellus  ( western US  )  , and C. adjunctus  (   संपूर्ण  eastern US ) .
The name  of  the `` bed bug '' is  निकला  from the preferred habitat of Cimex lectularius :  गरम  houses and especially nearby or inside of beds and bedding  or  other sleep areas .
Bed bugs are  मुख्यतः  active at night  ,   लकिन  are not exclusively nocturnal .
They usually feed on their hosts without being noticed .
A number of adverse health effects may result from bed bug bites  ,  including skin rashes , psychological effects ,  और  allergic symptoms  .
Diagnosis involves both finding bed bugs and  the  occurrence of compatible symptoms .
Bed bugs have been known as  इंसान  parasites for  हज़ारों  of years .
at  a point in the early  1940s  , they were mostly eradicated in the  विकसित  world  ,  but have increased in prevalence since 1995 .
Because infestation of human habitats has been on  the  increase , bed  कीड़ा  bites  और  related conditions have been on the rise as well .
The Book of  यशायाह  ( ) is the  पहला  of the Latter Prophets in the Hebrew Bible  ,   preceding   ezekiel   ,  Jeremiah and the Book  of   the  Twelve .
( The order of the subsequent  किताबे  differs somewhat  in  the Christian Old  वसीयत  ) .
The first 39 chapters prophesy doom for a sinful Judah  और  for all the nations  of  the world  कि  oppose God , while the  पिछला  27  prophesy  the  बहाली  of the nation  of  Israel and a new  सृष्टि  in God 's glorious  भविष्य  kingdom ; this  खण्ड  includes the Songs  of  the Suffering Servant ,  चार  separate passages referring  to  the nation  of   इसराईल  , interpreted by Christians as prefiguring  the  coming of Jesus  मसीह  .
Tradition ascribes  authorship  of  the   किताब   to  Isaiah son  of  Amoz , but now scholars widely agree that the book is the  कार्य  of three different authors - few scholars deny this view ,  और   those  that do  ,  do so  लिये  theological reasons .
The first , termed  proto-isaiah   (   अध्याय  1–39 ) , contains the words  of  the 8th-century BCE prophet with  7th-century  BCE  expansions  ; the second , Deutero-Isaiah ( chapters  40–55   )  , is the work of  a  6th-century BCE author writing near the  समाप्त  of the  babylonian   captivity  ; and  the  third  ,  the poetic  trito-isaiah  ( chapters 56–66 ) , was composed in Jerusalem shortly after the return from  निर्वासन  ,  संभवतः  by multiple authors .
Oregon  राज्य  University  (  OSU ) is a coeducational , public research university located in Corvallis  ,  Oregon  ,  United  राज्य  .
the  university offers undergraduate  ,  graduate and doctoral degrees  और   a  multitude of research opportunities  .
वहीँ  are more than 200 academic  उपाधि  programs offered through the university .
OSU 's programs  in  microbiology , nuclear engineering  ,   पारिस्थितिकी  , forestry , public health , biochemistry , zoology , oceanography ,  खाना   विज्ञान  and pharmacy are recognized  nationally  as  शीर्ष  tier programs .
The OSU 's liberal  कला  programs have also grown significantly and the department is considered a  ``  cornerstone '' of the institution  .
More  than   200,000  people have  attended  OSU since its founding  .
The Carnegie Foundation classifies  ऑरेगॉन   राज्य  University as part of its top tier  of  research  संस्थानों  .
As of 2008 , OSU  is  one of only seventy-three land-grant universities .
The school is also recognized as a sea-grant , space-grant and sun-grant institution , making it one of only two US institutions to  retain  all four designations and  the   तभी  public university to do so  (  Cornell is the only other with similar  designations  ) .
As one of the two flagship universities of the Oregon University System , OSU receives more funding for research  ,  annually , than all  अन्य  public higher education institutions in Oregon combined .
Female  स्खलन  is the  expulsion  of fluid by  इंसान   महिलाओं  from the paraurethral ducts through and around the female urethra  दौरान   or  before an orgasm .
It is also known colloquially as gushing or  squirting  , although these are considered to be different phenomena in some  शोध  publications .
The exact source  और  nature of the fluid continue to  be  a topic of debate among medical professionals , which is also related to doubts over  the  existence of the G-Spot .
the   kanab  ambersnail ,  वैज्ञानिक  name Oxyloma haydeni kanabensis or  oxyloma  kanabense , is a critically endangered subspecies  or  species of small  ,  air-breathing  जमीन  snail , a terrestrial  pulmonate  gastropod mollusc in  the  family  succineidae  , the amber snails .
the  common  नाम  of the amber snails is  आधारित  on  the  shell , which  is  translucent and  जब   खाली  usually resembles  एम्बर  in  रंग  .
This species is  endemic  to the United  राज्य  , specifically  the  state of Arizona and Utah ,  जहाँ  it was first collected in the early 20th century .
It has been  सूचीबद्ध  as endangered  on   the  United States Fish and Wildlife  सेवा  list of endangered species  चूंकि  8  अगस्त  1991 .
इस  snail lives  in  wetlands  ,  springs , and  seeps  , and only two of its natural habitats are  ज्ञात  to  मौजूद   :   तीन   झीलों  , a  मर्ग   निकट   kanab  , Utah , and Vasey 's Paradise , a spring along the Colorado  नदी  within Grand  canyon  National Park .
In its natural  आवास  it  is  rather  polyphagous  ,  feeding   मुख्यतः  on  जीवाणु  , plants  और  fungi , and reproduces  दौरान  the summer .
Now considered a  critically   endangered   प्रजाति  on the  आईयूसीएन   रेड  List of Threatened Species due  to  a series  of  factors (  सहित   influence  ) , the Kanab ambersnail has been reintroduced to three springs  ऊपर  the historic high water level along the Colorado River .
The Spanish language is the second  सबसे  used language in the United States .
There are more Spanish speakers in  the  United States than there are speakers of Chinese  ,   फ्रेंच  , German , Italian ,  हवाई  , and the Native American languages combined .
According to the 2010 American Community Survey  conducted   by  the U.S. Census Bureau , Spanish is the  प्राथमिक  language  बोला  at home by  लगभग  37  लाख   लोगों   aged  five or older ,  a  figure more than double that of 1990  .
There are 45 million Hispanophones who  बोलो  Spanish as a first or second language  ,   as  well  as  six million Spanish language  विद्यार्थी  ,  composing   the  largest  नेशनल   spanish-speaking  community outside of Mexico and making  स्पेनी  the Romance language and the Indo-European language  साथ  largest number of native  अध्यक्षों  in the world .
Roughly  हाफ  of all U.S. Spanish speakers also speak  अंग्रेज़ी  `` very well ,  ''  based  on  the self-assessment Census question respondents .
The  भाषा  came to the country since  the  16th and 17th centuries with the arrival of  स्पेनी  colonists in  क्षेत्रों  that would later become the states of Florida , Texas , Colorado ,  नई   मैक्सिको  , Arizona , Nevada , Utah ,  और  California and of the Spanish explorers - who explored  क्षेत्रों  of 42 states- .
Also west  of   louisiana   territory  was Spanish between 1763 -  1800  ( year of the French recovery of territory ) ,  बाद  the French and Indian War .
बाद  of the  incorporation  of these states to the U.S. in first half of 19th century ,  the   स्पेनी  language  थी   बाद   reinforced   by  the acquisition  of  Puerto Rico in 1898 and  by  later waves of the Hispanic emigration , basically from Hispanic America , to the  संयुक्त  States beginning in the second half of 19th century until today .
is   a  Latin  शब्द  that means  ``  thus '' or , in  लिखने  , `` it was thus in  the  source material '' .

Sic , Cluj ,  a  commune  in  Romania

The Tokyo Mew Mew manga and anime series features  a  cast of characters designed by  मिया  Ikumi .
The series takes place in  टोकियो  , Japan ,  जहाँ   पाँच  adolescent girls , called Mew Mews , are  infused  with the DNA of endangered species to combat aliens attempting to take  over   the  Earth .
The manga series is followed  by   a  short  sequel  series , Tokyo Mew Mew  a  la Mode ,  जिससे  introduces  a  new Mew  mew  and a new threat .
The Mew Mews are  led   by  the  प्रमुख  character  ,  Ichigo Momomiya  ,  whose first task is to gather the  अन्य   चार   mew  Mews : Mint Aizawa , Lettuce  midorikawa  , Pudding Fong , and Zakuro Fujiwara  .
As  the  series progresses , Ichigo goes from having a crush on Masaya  aoyama  to becoming his girlfriend while trying to hide her secret double  जीवन  from him .
The series antagonists include  तीन  aliens  ,   kish  , Pie , and Tart ,  और  their leader , Deep  ब्लू  .
Originally from Earth ,  the  aliens  यहूद  forced to leave long ago due to deadly environmental changes .
They have returned to kill the humans , who they feel are destroying their planet , and reclaim the  ग्रह  .
In a la Mode  ,  middle school student Berry Shirayuki is introduced as  the  sixth Mew Mew and ,  in   the  absence of Ichigo , the temporary leader of the  mew  Mews .
a  la Mode also  introduces  new set of antagonists ,  the  Saint Rose Crusaders , a group  of   इंसान  teenagers with various psychic abilities with a  ख्वाहिश  to create their  अपना  utopia .
Led by  ड्यूक  , they make several attempts  to   मार  Berry ,  आखिरकार  turning the local populace against the Mew Mews .
Ikumi 's initial vision for Tokyo Mew  mew  was a story called Tokyo Black Cat Girl  कि  featured a cat-girl battling alien  आक्रमणकारियों  .
After  the  story was transitioned  to   a  more  upbeat  story of five female superheroes , the character designs were redone to  have  a lighter ,  अधिक   रंगीन  feel .
The main series characters were  praised  for being a  पूर्ण   अनुरूप  for the  overall  story , as well as for their cute appearances .
The characters introduced in a la Mode were also praised for their  विज़ुअल  appearances , but criticized as being repeats of the original series .
The character  ड्यूक  was  भी  criticized for having a design reminiscent of the white supremacy  समूह   ,  the Ku Klux Klan .
