Sedimentary rocks are types of rock that are formed by the deposition of material at the Earth 's surface and within bodies  of  water .
Sedimentation is the collective name for processes  कि  cause mineral and/or organic particles ( detritus )  to  settle and  accumulate  or minerals  to  precipitate from a solution .
Particles that form  a  sedimentary rock by  accumulating  are  पुकारा  sediment .
पहले  being deposited , sediment  थी  formed by weathering and erosion in a source area , and then transported to the place of deposition by  जल  , wind  ,  ice , mass movement or glaciers which are  पुकारा  agents of denudation .
The sedimentary rock cover of the continents  of  the Earth 's crust is extensive ,  लकिन  the total  योगदान   of  sedimentary rocks is estimated  to  be only 8 % of the  कुल  volume of  the   क्रस्ट  .
Sedimentary rocks are  तभी  a thin  veneer  over a crust consisting mainly  of  igneous and metamorphic  रॉक्स  .
Sedimentary rocks are deposited  in  layers as strata , forming  a  structure called bedding  .
the  study of  sedimentary  rocks and  चट्टान  strata provides information  परिचय  the subsurface  कि  is useful for civil engineering ,  लिये  example in the  निर्माण  of roads  ,  houses , tunnels , canals  or   अन्य  constructions  .
Sedimentary rocks are also important sources of natural resources like  कोयले  , fossil  fuels  , drinking water or ores .
The  पढ़ाई  of the sequence of sedimentary rock  strata  is  the   प्रमुख  source for scientific  ज्ञान  about the Earth  's  history , including palaeogeography ,  paleoclimatology  and the  इतिहास  of  जीवन  .
The scientific discipline that studies  the  properties and  उत्पत्ति  of sedimentary rocks is called sedimentology  .
Sedimentology  is  both part of geology and physical  भूगोल   और  overlaps partly with other disciplines  in  the Earth sciences , such as  pedology  , geomorphology , geochemistry or structural geology .

इंसानो  are born with over 270 bones , some of which fuse together into a longitudinal axis , the axial skeleton  ,  to which the appendicular  कंकाल  is attached .
Saint Patrick ( ; ; Modern ; ; c.  387  – 17 March c. 460  or  c. 492 ) was a Romano-British Christian missionary and bishop in  आयरलैंड  .
Known as the `` Apostle of Ireland '' , he  is  the primary  संरक्षक  saint of the  द्वीप   साथ  with  संतो  Brigid and Columba .
Two authentic letters from  उसे  survive ,  इससे  which  आइये  the only  generally  accepted details of his  जीवन  .
When he was about 16 , he  थी   captured   इससे  his  घर  and taken as a  स्लेव   to  Ireland  ,   जहाँ  he lived for six  सालो  before escaping and returning to  उसके  family .
After becoming a cleric , he returned to northern and  पश्चिमी   आयरलैंड  as an  ordained  bishop , but little is known about the  स्थान  where he worked .
By the seventh century , he had  already   आइये  to be revered as the patron saint of Ireland .
Most available details of his life are from subsequent hagiographies , and these are now not accepted without detailed  आलोचना  .
the  Annals of Ulster  राज्य   कि  he arrived in Ireland in 432 , ministered in  ulster  around 443  ,  and  died  in  457   or  461  .
The text , however , distinguishes  between  `` Old Patrick  ''  ( thought  to  mean Palladius  )  and  ``  Patrick , archapostle of the Scots , '' who died in 492 .
The actual dates of Patrick 's life can not be fixed with certainty  लकिन  , on  a  widespread  निर्वचन   ,   he   थी   क्रियाशील  as a  मिशनरी  in  आयरलैंड  during the second  हाफ  of the 5th  सदी  .
He is generally credited with  होने  the first bishop of Armagh , Primate  of  All Ireland .
संत  Patrick  's  Day is observed on March  17  , the date of his death .
it   is  celebrated both inside and  बाहर  Ireland , as  दोनो  a religious and , especially outside Ireland ,  धर्मनिरपेक्ष  holiday  .
In the dioceses of  आयरलैंड   ,  it is both a  solemnity  and  a  holy  दिन  of obligation ; outside Ireland ,  it  can  be  a celebration of Ireland itself .
Line segments in the golden ratio
a  golden  आयताकार  with longer side a and  shorter  side b  ,  when placed adjacent to a square with sides  of  length a  ,  will produce a  समान  golden rectangle with longer side a + b and  shorter  side a .
This illustrates the relationship .
in  mathematics and the  कला  , two quantities are  in  the golden ratio if the ratio  of  the sum  of  the quantities to the  larger  quantity  is  equal to the ratio of the larger quantity to the smaller one .
The  फिगर  on the right illustrates the geometric  संबंध  .
Expressed algebraically:
where the Greek letter phi ( )  represents  the golden ratio .
Its value is:
The golden ratio is also called  the  golden section (  लैटिन  : sectio aurea ) or  सुनहरी  mean .
Other names include extreme and mean ratio , medial  खण्ड  ,  दैवी  proportion , divine section ( Latin : sectio divina ) ,  सुनहरी   proportion  ,  सुनहरी  cut , and golden  क्रमांक   .
Many 20th century artists and architects have proportioned their works  to  approximate the golden  ratio—especially   in  the form  of  the golden  आयताकार  , in  जिससे  the  अनुपात  of the longer side to the shorter  is  the golden ratio—believing this proportion to  be  aesthetically pleasing ( see Applications  और  observations below )  .
Mathematicians since Euclid have studied the properties of the golden ratio , including its  रूप  in the dimensions of a  नियमित  pentagon  और  in  a  golden rectangle , which can be cut into a square and a smaller rectangle  साथ   the  same aspect ratio .
The golden ratio has also  महरूम   प्रयुक्त   to  analyze the proportions of natural  वस्तुएँ  as well  as  man-made  प्रणालियों  such as financial markets ,  in  some cases based  on  dubious fits to data .
North Myrtle Beach is a  तटीय   रिज़ॉर्ट  city  in  Horry County  ,  South Carolina , United States .
It was created in  1968  from four existing municipalities north of  myrtle  Beach , and serves as one of the primary tourist towns  साथ  the Grand  strand  .
The population was 13,752  at  the 2010 census .
World War I ( WWI ) was a global war centred in Europe  कि  began on 28 July  1914   और  lasted until 11 November 1918 .
it   थी  predominantly  पुकारा   the  World War or  the  Great War from its occurrence  जबतक  the start of  संसार   युद्ध  II in 1939 , and the  पहला  World  युद्ध  or World War I thereafter  .
it   शामिल   सब  the world 's  ग्रेट  powers , which were assembled in two opposing alliances : the  allies   (  based on  the  Triple Entente of the  संयुक्त  Kingdom , France and Russia ) and  the   सेंट्रल  Powers ( originally the Triple Alliance of Germany  ,  Austria-Hungary and Italy ; but , as  austria–hungary  had taken the offensive against the agreement , Italy did not  डालें   into  the war ) .
These alliances were both reorganised and expanded as  अधिक  nations entered the war : Italy ,  जापानी  and the United  राज्य  joined the Allies , and the Ottoman Empire and Bulgaria  the  Central Powers .
Ultimately ,  अधिक   than  70 million military  कर्मियों  , including 60 million Europeans , were mobilised in  एक  of  the  largest  युद्धों  in history .
More  than   9  million combatants  यहूद  killed , largely because of technological advancements that led to enormous  increases  in the lethality  of  weapons without  सम्बन्धित   सुधार  in  सुरक्षा   or  mobility .
it  was the fifth- deadliest conflict in  संसार   इतिहास  , subsequently  paving  the way for various political changes , such as revolutions  in   अनेक  of the nations involved .
One of the long-term  कल्याणकारी  of the war was  the  resurgence of imperialism  in   the  foreign policies of the great powers of Europe .
अधिक  immediately , the assassination of Archduke Franz  फर्डिनेंड   of   ऑस्ट्रिया  ,  the  heir to the  सिंहासन   of   austria-hungary  , on 28 June  1914  by Yugoslav nationalist Gavrilo Princip in Sarajevo triggered a diplomatic crisis when  austria-hungary  subsequently delivered an ultimatum to the Kingdom of  सर्बिया   .
Several alliances  formed  over  the  previous decades were invoked  .
Within weeks , the major powers were at war and , via their colonies , the conflict soon spread around the world .
on  28 July , the Austro-Hungarians  fired   the  first shots  of  the war as preparation for the invasion of  सर्बिया  .
जबकि  the Russians mobilised , the Germans invaded neutral Belgium  और  Luxembourg on the way  to   फ़्रांस  , providing a casus  belli  for  ब्रिटेन  's declaration of war against Germany .
After the German march on Paris was brought to a halt—the  so-called   चमत्कार  of the Marne —the  पश्चिमी   सामने  settled into a  स्थिर   बैटल  of attrition with a trench  लकीर  that changed little until 1917 .
On the Eastern Front ,  the  Russian  फौज   थी  successful against  the  Austro-Hungarians ,  लकिन  was stopped in its invasion  of  East Prussia by the  germans   .
In November the Ottoman  साम्राज्य   joined  the war , opening up fronts in the Caucasus , Mesopotamia  और  the Sinai .
Italy and  बुल्गारिया  went to war in  1915   और  Romania in 1916 .
in  Russia , the tsar 's government collapsed in March 1917  और  a  subsequent   क्रान्ति  in November brought the Russians to terms with the  सेंट्रल  Powers .
After a 1918  जर्मनी  offensive along  the  western front , the Allies drove back the Germans in a series of successful offensives and American forces began  प्रवेश   the   trenches  .
Germany  ,  which had its own  ट्रबल  with  क्रांतिकारियों  , agreed to an  armistice  on  11  November 1918 .
The  युद्ध  ended in victory  लिये  the Allies .
Events on  the  home fronts were as tumultuous as on the battle fronts  ,  as the participants  आजमाया  to  mobilize   उनके  manpower and economic resources  to  fight  a  total war .
by  the end  of  the war , four major imperial  powers—the   जर्मनी  , Russian , Austro-Hungarian and Ottoman empires—ceased to exist .
The successor states of the former  दो  lost  a  great amount  of   territory   ,  while the latter two were dismantled entirely .
The map of central Europe was redrawn into several smaller states  .
The  लीग  of  राष्ट्र  was formed in  the  hope of preventing another such  विरोध   .
The European nationalism  शाखित   by  the war and the breakup  of   empires  ,  the   परखना  of Germany  's  defeat and problems  साथ  the Treaty of Versailles are agreed  to  be factors  contributing  to World War II .
camden  is  a  city in  camden  County ,  नई  Jersey , United  राज्य  .
It is  the  county seat , located  आरपार   the  Delaware River from Philadelphia .
as   of   the  2010 United States Census the city had a total  जनसांख्यिकी  of 77,344 , representing a decline  of  2,560 ( 3.2  %   )   इससे  the 79,904 residents  enumerated  during  the  2000 Census  ,  which had in  फेरे   अस्वीकृत   by  7,588  (  8.7 % ) from  the   87,492  counted  in  the 1990 Census .
Camden ranked  as  the  12th-most  populous municipality in the  राज्य   in  2010 after having been  क्रमित  10th in  2000   .
Camden was originally incorporated  as   a   नगर  on  फ़रवरी  13 , 1828 ,  इससे   portions  of the now-defunct Newton Township  ,  while the  क्षेत्रफल  was still part of  gloucester  County .
On March 13 ,  1844  , Camden  became  part of the newly  formed  Camden County .
Although once a thriving center for manufacturing and industry ,  camden  is perhaps best known for its  struggles   साथ  urban dysfunction .
तीन   camden  mayors have been jailed for corruption  ,   the   सबसे  recent being Milton Milan  in  2000  .
Since  2005  the school system and police department have been operated by the state of New Jersey  ;  the takeover  समाप्त  in 2012 .
in  2008 , Camden had  the   उच्चतम  crime rate in the U.S. with 2,333 violent crimes per 100,000 people  जबकि  the  नेशनल  average  थी  455 per 100,000 .
camden  public schools  खर्च  $ 23,770 per student ( $ 19,118 on a budgetary per-pupil  आधार  ) in the 2009–10 school year and  two-thirds   of  the students  ग्रैजुएट  .
Two out of every five  निवासियों  are below the national poverty line .
amitriptyline  ( Tryptomer  ,   elavil  , Tryptizol , Laroxyl  ,  Saroten , Sarotex , Lentizol , Endep ) is a tricyclic antidepressant ( TCA ) .
It  is   the  most  widely   प्रयुक्त  TCA  और  has at least equal efficacy against depression as the newer class  of   ssris  according to a  पढ़ाई  from early 2001 .
As well  as  reducing depressive symptoms , these  प्रकार  of tricyclics also ease  migraines  , tension headaches , anxiety  हमले  and  कुछ  schizophrenic symptoms .
It is also known  to  reduce aggression and violent behavior  .
A computer is  a  general purpose device that can be programmed to carry  आउट  a finite set of arithmetic or  लॉजिकल  operations .
Since a sequence of operations can be readily changed , the computer can solve more than one  दयालु  of problem .
conventionally  , a computer consists of at least one processing element  ,  typically a central processing unit ( CPU  )  and  कुछ   रूप  of memory .
the  processing element carries  आउट  arithmetic and logic operations , and a sequencing and control unit that can change the  अनुक्रम  of operations based on stored  सूचना  .
Peripheral devices allow information to be retrieved from an  बाह्य  source , and  the  result of operations saved  और  retrieved .
The first  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक   डिजिटल  computers were developed between 1940  और  1945  in  the United Kingdom and  संयुक्त   राज्य  .
originally  they were the  आकार   of  a large  रूम   ,  consuming as much  शक्ति  as several hundred modern personal computers  (  PCs ) .
In  इस  era mechanical analog computers were used for military  अनुप्रयोग   .
Modern  कंप्यूटर  based on integrated  circuits  are millions to billions of times more capable  than  the early machines ,  और  occupy  a  fraction of the  स्पेस  .
Simple computers are small enough to fit into mobile devices ,  और  mobile computers  can   be  powered by small  बैटरी  .
निजी  computers in  उनके  various forms are icons of the Information Age and are what most people think  of  as “computers.”
However , the embedded computers found in many devices from MP3 players to fighter aircraft and from toys to industrial robots  हैं  the most  numerous  .
``  barefoot  and pregnant  ''  is  a  phrase most  commonly  associated with the  विवादास्पद  idea that  महिलाओं  should not work outside the home and should have many children during their reproductive years .
It has several  अन्य  meanings as  खूब  .
It is a figure  of  speech .
The phrase `` barefoot and pregnant '' was probably first used sometime  पहले  1950 .
An article from 1949 states  ,  ``  by  early 1949 , TWA was—in the words of  इसके  new president , Ralph S. Damon—both 'barefoot and pregnant . ' ''
Its usage  may  date as early as the 1910s  .
An article published in  1958  states the phrase  थी   पहला  used by  a  `` Dr. Hertzler '' 40 years earlier .
``  Some forty years ago , Dr. Hertzler advanced a hypothesis which young women of today seem bent on  proving  correct.  '
The  तभी  way to keep a woman  प्रसन्न  , '  he  said  ,  'is to keep her barefoot  और  pregnant .  '  ''
oakhurst  is a census-designated place and unincorporated community within Ocean Township , in Monmouth  काउंटी  , New Jersey , United States .
As of the  2010  United  राज्य  Census , the CDP  's  population was 3,995 .
University of Phoenix Stadium ,  खोली   अगस्त  1 , 2006  ,  is a multipurpose football stadium located  in  Glendale , Arizona .
it  is the home  of   the  Arizona Cardinals of the National Football League (  एनएफएल  ) and  the  annual Fiesta Bowl .
The stadium is located next door  to  the Jobing.com  एरिना  and  it  features the first fully  retractable  natural grass  playing  surface built in the United  राज्य   on  top  of   an  AirField  प्रणालियों  drainage system  .
An opening on one side of the stadium allows the playing  फ़ील्ड  to move to the exterior of the building  ,  allowing  the  entire natural turf playing surface to be  उजागर  to daylight .
the  stadium has hosted Super Bowl XLII , and the 2011 BCS  नेशनल  Championship Game  ,  a game  कि  it hosts every four years , which set the venue 's entertainment attendance  रिकार्ड  of 78,603 on January 11 ,  2011  .
it  will again host Super Bowl XLIX in 2015  .
The University of Phoenix acquired the naming rights  in  September 2006  ,  shortly after the stadium had opened  अंतर्गत  the name  कार्डिनल्स  Stadium .
the   ``  University  of  Phoenix ``  नाम  is applied as  a  corporate  प्रायोजक   ,  and not as the home stadium of the University ( which has no intercollegiate athletics program ) .
The  स्टेडियम  has  भी  hosted the WWE event WrestleMania  xxvi  with  72,219  fans  in  attendance .
The event was held in  the   स्टेडियम  on  कूच   28th   2010  .
Joshua  लॉरेंस  Chamberlain ( September 8 , 1828 – February 24  ,   1914  ) , born as Lawrence Joshua Chamberlain , was an American college professor  इससे  the State of Maine , who volunteered during the American Civil War  to  join the  संघ  Army .
Although having no  पहले  education in military strategies  ,  he became a  अत्यधिक   आदरणीय  and decorated Union officer , reaching the rank of brigadier general ( and  brevet  major general ) .
लिये  his gallantry  at  Gettysburg , he was awarded the Medal of  सम्मान  .
he  was given the honor of  commanding  the Union  सैनिकों  at the surrender  रस्म  for the infantry of  रॉबर्ट  E. Lee 's Army at Appomattox , Virginia .
After  the  war ,  he  entered politics as a  रिपब्लिकन  and served four one-year terms  of  office as the  32nd  Governor of Maine .
he  served on the faculty , and as president  ,  of  उसके   अल्मा  mater , Bowdoin College .
An  inning  , or  पारी  ,  is  a  fixed-length  segment of a game  in   कोई  of a variety of sports – most notably cricket and baseball during which one team attempts to score while the other team  कोशिशें  to prevent  the   पहला  from scoring .
In cricket ,  the  term  पारी  is both singular and plural and is  सदा  spelled  और  pronounced with  the  terminal `` s '' .
In  बेसबॉल  and softball  ,  the singular form is inning and only  the   बहुवचन   takes  an `` s '' .
In many other  खेल  , the length of the  खेल  is dictated by a  क्लॉक   और   टीमों  swap offensive and defensive roles  dynamically  by taking possession of  a  ball or similar item  .
In baseball and cricket , however ,  एक  team , said to be `` batting '' , attempts to score  ``  runs '' —see  चलाएं  ( baseball )  और  run (  क्रिकेट   )   —while  the other  टोली  , said to be `` fielding  ''  ,  कोशिशें  to prevent the  स्कोरिंग  of  रनों   और  get members of the batting team out .
the  teams  स्विच  places  बाद  the fielding team has  succeeded  in getting a fixed number of players out , making a clock unnecessary .
In  क्रिकेट  , the  पद   पारी  is also used to refer to the play of  एक  particular player ( Smith  था  a poor  पारी  ,  स्कोरिंग  only 12 ) .
By extension , this term can  be  used  in   अंग्रेजों  English  लिये  almost any activity  जिससे  takes a period of time ( The Liberal  सरकारी  had a good innings , but finally lost  दफ्तर  in 1972 , or You  've   था  a fair innings , now it 's  my  turn  ,  meaning  ``  you have spoken for long enough , now let me  बोलो  '' )  .
It is also used in reference  to  someone who has died at a reasonably old age  or   जिया  a rich and rewarding life (  ah  , well .
John was 89 .
At least he had a good innings )  .
The baseball-derived parallel to this  in  American English is  the  term at bat .
According to the Oxford  अंग्रेज़ी  Dictionary  ,  the term innings  रै  been used in  सन्दर्भ   to  cricket since at least 1735 .
As cricket was a  वयस्क  ,  अत्यधिक  organized sport in the 1600s in England , the term 's origin could  खूब  precede this first recorded usage .
The word  inning  meaning 'a gathering in '  is  first recorded in 1522 , and could be related .
Adenosine  deaminase  deficiency , also called  एडीए  deficiency or ADA-SCID , is an autosomal recessive metabolic  विकार  that causes  immunodeficiency  .
It occurs  in  fewer than one in 100,000  सजीव  births worldwide .
It accounts for  परिचय  15  %  of all cases of severe  संयुक्त   immunodeficiency  ( SCID ) .
it  is very rare ,  तुम  have a  3  % chance of getting this gene .
ADA  कमियां   may  be present in infancy , childhood ,  adolescense  ,  or  adulthood .
आयु   of  onset and severity  is   सम्बन्धित   to   कुछ  29 known  genotypes   संबद्ध  with  the   विकार  .
An example  of  urban poverty in this slum in Jakarta  ,  Indonesia
गरीबी  is the state of one who  lacks  a certain amount  of   सामग्री  possessions  or  money .
Absolute  गरीबी  or destitution refers to the deprivation  of  basic human needs  ,  which  commonly   शामिल   खाना  , water ,  स्वच्छता  , clothing  ,  shelter , health care and education .
सापेक्ष   गरीबी  is defined contextually as economic inequality in the location  or   समाज  in which people live .
For  much  of  इतिहास  , poverty was considered largely unavoidable  as  traditional modes  of   उत्पादन  were insufficient  to  give an entire population a comfortable standard of living  .
बाद  the industrial  क्रान्ति   ,   द्रव्यमान   उत्पादन  in factories made wealth  increasingly  more inexpensive  और  accessible .
Of  अधिक  importance is  the  modernization of agriculture  ,  such as fertilizers , in order to provide  पर्याप्त  yield to feed the population  .
The supply  of  basic  needs   can  be restricted by  constraints  on government  सेवाएं  such as corruption , tax avoidance , debt and loan conditionalities and by the brain  नाली  of  स्वास्थ्य  care and educational  पेशेवर  .
Strategies of increasing income to make basic needs more affordable typically include  welfare   ,  economic freedoms  ,  and  providing  financial  सेवाएं   .
Poverty reduction is  a   प्रमुख  goal  और  issue for many international  संगठन  such  as  the  संयुक्त  Nations and the World  बैंको  .
The World Bank  अनुमानित  1.29 billion people  यहूद  living in absolute poverty in  2008  .
Of these , about 400 million people in absolute  गरीबी  lived in  इण्डिया   और  173 million people in China  .
In USA 1 in  5  children lives in poverty .
in   शर्तें  of percentage  of  regional populations ,  sub-saharan  Africa at 47  %  had the  उच्चतम  incidence rate of absolute poverty in  2008  .
between  1990 and  2010   ,  about 663 million people moved above the  निरपेक्ष   गरीबी  level .
स्टिल  , extreme  गरीबी  is a global  चुनौती  ; it is observed in all parts of  the  world , including the  विकसित  economies .
Mushroom poisoning  (   भी  known as mycetism )  refers  to harmful effects from ingestion of toxic  substances  present  in  a mushroom .
ये  symptoms can vary from slight gastrointestinal discomfort to death .
The toxins present are secondary metabolites produced in  विशिष्ट  biochemical  pathways  in the fungal  कोशिकाएं   .
Mushroom poisoning is usually the  परिणाम  of ingestion of wild mushrooms after misidentification of a toxic  मशरूम  as an edible species .
The most common reason for this misidentification is close resemblance in terms of colour and general morphology  of   the  toxic mushrooms  प्रजाति  with edible  प्रजाति  .
Even very experienced wild mushroom gatherers are upon  विरल  occasion poisoned by eating  विषाक्त  species ,  despite  being well aware of the  risks  , through carelessness .
To prevent mushroom poisoning , mushroom gatherers need to be very familiar with  the  mushrooms they  intend   to  collect as well as with any  similar-looking  toxic  प्रजाति  .
In addition , edibility of mushrooms may depend  on  methods  of  preparation for  कुकिंग  .
Collectors also  need  to  be  well  जागरूक  that edibility or  toxicity   of  some species varies with geographic location .
Human height is the distance  इससे  the bottom of the feet to the top of the head  in  a human body , standing erect .
When populations  share  genetic  पृष्ठभूमि  and environmental  कारकों   ,  average height is frequently characteristic within the group .
Exceptional height variation ( around 20 % deviation  इससे   औसत  ) within such a population is sometimes due to gigantism or dwarfism , which are medical conditions caused by specific genes or endocrine abnormalities  .
In regions of extreme poverty or  prolonged  warfare  ,  environmental factors like chronic malnutrition during childhood or adolescence  may  account  लिये  delayed  विकास  and/or ( in severe cases  )  marked  reductions  in adult stature  भी  without the presence of any  of  these medical conditions  .
Apollo 11  थी   the  spaceflight that landed  the  first humans  ,   अमेरिकी  Neil Armstrong and Buzz Aldrin  ,  on  the  Moon on July 20 ,  1969  ,  at   20:18  UTC  .
Armstrong  became  the first  to  step onto the lunar  सतह   6  hours later on July 21 at  02:56  UTC  .
Armstrong spent  परिचय  two and  a  half hours outside the  spacecraft  , Aldrin slightly less ; and together they collected of  चंद्र  material for return  to  Earth .
A third member  of  the  मिशन  ,  माइकल  Collins , piloted the  कमांड  spacecraft  अलोन  in lunar orbit until  आर्मस्ट्रांग  and Aldrin returned to it  बस  under  a  day later for the  ट्रिप  back  to  Earth .
Launched by a Saturn V rocket from Kennedy Space Center  in  Merritt Island  ,  Florida  on  July 16  ,  Apollo 11  थी  the fifth manned  मिशन  of  नासा   's  Apollo program .
The Apollo spacecraft  था  three  भाग   :   a  Command Module with a cabin for the three  astronauts   जिससे  was the only part  जिससे  landed back on Earth ; a Service Module which supported the  कमांड  Module with propulsion , electrical power , oxygen  और   जल  ;  और  a Lunar Module for landing on the Moon .
बाद  being sent to the Moon by the Saturn V  's  upper stage , the astronauts separated the  spacecraft  from  it  and travelled  लिये  three days  जबतक  they entered into lunar orbit .
Armstrong and Aldrin then moved into  the  Lunar Module and  उतरा  in the  समुद्र  of Tranquility .
They stayed a total of about  21  and  a  half hours on the lunar surface .
बाद  lifting off in the  अपर  part of the Lunar  मोड्यूल  and rejoining Collins  in   the  Command Module , they returned to Earth and landed in  the  Pacific  समंदर  on July 24 .
Broadcast on live TV  to  a  world-wide  audience , Armstrong stepped onto  the  lunar  सतह  and described the  इवेंट  as `` one small step for [ a ] man , one giant leap for  mankind  . ''
Apollo 11 effectively ended the Space Race  और   fulfilled  a national goal proposed  in   1961  by  the  late U.S. President John F.  कैनेडी   in  a speech before the United States Congress , `` before this decade is out , of landing a man  on   the  Moon and  returning  him safely  to   the  Earth  .  ''
The  फीफा  World Cup , often simply the  संसार  Cup  ,  is  an  international association football  प्रतियोगिता   लडे   by  the senior men 's  नेशनल  teams of the members of Fédération Internationale de Football Association (  फीफा  )  ,   the  sport 's global governing body .
The championship has been awarded every  चार   सालो  since the inaugural  टूर्नामेंट  in 1930 ,  मगर  in  1942  and 1946 when it was not held because of the Second World War .
The current champions are Spain ,  जो   जीती   the  2010 tournament .
The current format of the  टूर्नामेंट   involves  32 teams competing for the  शीर्षक   at   venues  within the host nation ( s ) over  a  period of about a month ;  इस  phase is often called the World Cup Finals .
a   योग्यता  phase ,  जिससे  currently  takes  place  over  the preceding three years , is used to determine which teams qualify for the tournament together  साथ  the host  स्वदेश  (  s  )  .
The 19  संसार  Cup tournaments have been won  by  eight different  नेशनल   टीमों  .
Brazil have won  पाँच  times , and they are  the  only team to  have  played in every  टूर्नामेंट  .
The other World Cup  विजेता  are Italy  ,  with four titles ; Germany , with three titles  ;  Argentina  और  inaugural  विजेता  Uruguay , with  दो  titles each ; and England , France , and  स्पेन  , with one title each .
the  World Cup is the world  's  most widely viewed sporting  इवेंट  ; an estimated  715.1  million people watched the final match  of  the 2006 FIFA World Cup held in Germany  .
The next  तीन  World Cups will be hosted  by  Brazil in 2014 ,  रूस  in  2018  , and Qatar in 2022 .
नरसंहार  is  a  term coined  in   1944  by Raphael Lemkin to describe the deliberate and systematic destruction , in whole or in part  ,  of an  जातीय  , racial , religious , or national group .
it  is defined in Article  2  of  the   सम्मेलन  on the Prevention and Punishment of the Crime of Genocide ( CPPCG ) of 1948 as `` any of the following  अधिनियमों  committed with  intent   to  destroy , in whole or in part , a  नेशनल  , ethnical , racial or religious group , as such : killing members of  the  group ; causing serious  bodily  or  दिमागी   नुक़सान  to members of  the  group ; deliberately inflicting  on  the groups  शर्तें  of life , calculated to bring about its  शारीरिक  destruction in whole or  in   भाग  ;  imposing  measures intended to prevent births within the group ; [ and  ]  forcibly transferring children of  the  group to another group .  ''
Skulls of victims of the Rwandan Genocide
The preamble  to  the CPPCG not only states that `` genocide is a crime under  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  law , contrary  to  the spirit and  aims  of the United Nations and  condemned  by the civilized world  ''   ,   लकिन  also that `` at all periods of history  नरसंहार  has  inflicted  great losses on humanity '' .
Determining  कया  historical events  constitute   a  genocide and which are merely criminal  or  inhuman  बर्ताव  is not  a  clear-cut matter .
In nearly every  मामला  where accusations of  नरसंहार  have  परिचालित  , partisans of various sides  have  fiercely disputed the interpretation and details of the event , often to the point of promoting wildly different versions of the facts .
An accusation of genocide  is   कतई   नहीं  taken  हलके  and will almost always be controversial .
The following  सूची   of   genocides  and alleged genocides should be understood in  इस  context  और  can not be regarded  as  the final word on these subjects  .
a   समय   बेल्ट  is a  non-slipping   mechanical  drive belt and the term may refer to either:
Toothed belt , a flexible  बेल्ट  with teeth moulded onto its inner surface
Timing belt ( camshaft ) ,  a  toothed belt used to drive the camshaft  (  s ) within an internal combustion engine
The  संस्कृति  of  the  United  राज्य  is primarily a Western culture , but is  भी   बहकावे  by Native American ,  अफ़्रीकी   ,  Asian , Polynesian , and Latin American cultures .
American culture started its formation over 10,000 years ago with the migration of Paleo-Indians from Asia into the region that is today the continental United  राज्य  .
It  रै  its own unique social and  सांस्कृतिक  characteristics such  as  dialect , music , arts  ,  social  आदतें  , cuisine , and folklore  .
the  United States of  अमेरिका  is an  ethnically  and racially  विविध  country  as  a result  of   large-scale  immigration from many different countries  throughout  its history  .
Its chief early  यूरोपीय  influences came from  अंग्रेज़ी  , Scottish , Welsh and Irish  settlers  of colonial America during British rule .
British culture  ,  due to colonial ties with Britain that  स्प्रेड  the English language , legal system and other  सांस्कृतिक  inheritances  ,  had a formative influence  .
अन्य  important  प्रभाव   आए  from other parts of  पश्चिमी  Europe  ,   विशेषकर  Germany , France , and Italy .
Original  तत्व  also play a strong role , such  as   the   आविष्कार  of Jeffersonian democracy .
थामस  Jefferson 's Notes on the State of Virginia was perhaps the  पहला   influential  domestic cultural  critique  by an American and a  प्रतिक्रियावादी  piece to the prevailing European  सर्वसम्मति  that America 's domestic  मौलिकता  was degenerate .
Prevalent ideas and ideals that evolved domestically , such as  नेशनल  holidays , uniquely  अमरीकी   खेल  , military tradition ,  और  innovations  in  the arts and entertainment give a strong sense of national pride among the population as a whole .
American culture includes  दोनो  conservative and liberal elements  ,  scientific and religious competitiveness , political structures ,  रिस्क  taking and free expression ,  भौतिकवादी  and  moral  elements .
Despite certain consistent ideological principles ( e.g . individualism , egalitarianism , and  आस्था  in freedom  और  democracy ) , American culture has a  किस्में   of  expressions due  to  its geographical scale and demographic  विविधता  .
the  flexibility of  u.S.  culture and its highly  सांकेतिक  nature  सीसे  some researchers to categorize American culture as a mythic identity ; others see it as  अमरीकी  exceptionalism .
It also includes  तत्व  that evolved from Indigenous Americans , and other ethnic  cultures—most  prominently the culture of African Americans , cultures from Latin America , and Asian  अमरीकी  cultures .
Many American  सांस्कृतिक  elements  ,  especially from popular culture  ,  have  स्प्रेड  across the globe through modern mass media .
The United States  रै   प्रायः  been thought of  as  a melting pot ,  लकिन  beginning in the  लेट  1990s and early 2000s  ,  it  रुझान  towards cultural diversity , pluralism and the image of a  सलाद  bowl instead .
Due to the extent of American culture  ,  there  हैं   अनेक  integrated but  अद्वितीय  social subcultures  भीतर   the   संयुक्त  States .
the  cultural affiliations an individual in  the  United States  may  have  commonly  depend  on   सोशल   क्लास  , political orientation and a multitude of demographic  विशेषताएँ   ऐसे  as religious background , occupation and ethnic group  सदस्यता  .
Samoan  (   gagana  fa'a Sāmoa or Gagana  sāmoa  — IPA : ) is the language of the Samoan Islands , comprising the independent country of Samoa and the United  राज्य  territory of American Samoa .
It  is   an  official language—alongside  अंग्रेज़ी  —in  दोनो   jurisdictions  .
Samoan , a Polynesian language , is the  पहला  language for most of the  समोआ  Islands  '   जनसांख्यिकी  of about 246,000  .
With  अनेक  Samoan people living in other countries , the  कुल   क्रमांक   of  speakers worldwide is estimated at 370,000 .
The language is  notable  for the phonological differences between formal and informal speech  as  well  as  a  ceremonial  form  प्रयुक्त  in Samoan  छाये   .
A glucose  सहिष्णुता  test is a medical test in which glucose is given and blood samples taken afterward to determine how quickly  it  is cleared from the blood .
The  परीक्षण  is usually used to test  लिये  diabetes ,  इंसुलिन  resistance , and sometimes reactive hypoglycemia and acromegaly , or rarer disorders of  शर्करा   चयापचय  .
In  the  most commonly  performed  version  of   the  test , an oral glucose tolerance test ( OGTT ) , a standard  खुराक  of  ग्लूकोज  is  ingested  by mouth  और  blood levels are checked two hours later .
Many variations of the GTT have been devised over the  सालो  for  विभिन्न   उद्देश्य  , with different standard  doses  of glucose , different routes of administration , different intervals and durations of  sampling  , and various substances measured in  जोड  to blood glucose .
`` What  परिचय  Me ''  is   a   सोंग   लिखा  by Garry  तुषार  and Frances Swan  ,  first recorded by Australian rock  बैंड  Moving Pictures from their  एल्बम   दिनों  of  innocence  .
it  was the band 's  पहला  number-one single in Australia spending  छह  consecutive weeks on  the  top ; there , it was the  second-highest  selling single  of   1982  .
The success of the song  led  them to America  जहाँ  it became  a  hit , reaching  #  29  on  the U.S . Billboard  hot  100 chart .
the   सोंग  stayed in the U.S. charts for  ऐसे  a long time that it managed to make Billboards top 100 Pop Singles  of  1983 ,  at  #  88  , a rare  feat  for a single with such  a   कम   शिखर  position .
The song made an unusual comeback  in  1989 , peaking at # 46  .

Eggs are laid by females of many different species , including birds , reptiles , amphibians , and fish , and have  महरूम   खाया  by mankind for  हज़ारों  of  सालो  .
Bird and reptile eggs consist of a protective eggshell , albumen ( egg white ) ,  और  vitellus ( egg yolk ) ,  contained   भीतर  various thin  झिल्लियों  .
Popular  चुनाव  for egg consumption  हैं  chicken , duck , quail  ,  roe , and caviar ,  लकिन  the egg  सबसे   प्रायः   खपत  by humans is the chicken egg  ,  by a wide  हाशिया  .
Egg yolks and whole eggs  स्टोर   significant  amounts of protein  और   choline   ,  and are widely used in  cookery   .
Due to their protein content , the United States Department of Agriculture (  यूएसडीए  ) categorizes eggs as Meats within  the  Food Guide Pyramid .
Despite the nutritional value  of  eggs , there are some potential  स्वास्थ्य   मुद्दे   arising  from egg quality , storage , and individual allergies .
Chickens and other egg-laying creatures are widely kept throughout  the   संसार   ,  and mass production of  मुर्गा  eggs is a global industry .
In 2009 , an estimated 62.1 million metric  टन  of eggs were  उत्पादित  worldwide from a total  लेटा  flock of approximately  6.4  billion  मुर्गियां  .
There  हैं  issues of regional variation  in  demand  और   अपेक्षा  , as  खूब   as  current debates concerning methods of mass production , with the European Union  's  ban  on  battery farming of chickens .
Major League Soccer  (  MLS )  is  a professional soccer league representing  the  sport  's  highest level  in  the United States  और  Canada .
Sanctioned by the  संयुक्त  States Soccer Federation  (   u.S.  Soccer  )  , the league is composed of 19  टीमों  —  16  in the U.S. and 3 in Canada  .
Seasons  presently  run from March  to   दिसम्बर  , with each team  playing  34 games in the regular season .
टेन  teams compete in  the   postseason  MLS Cup Playoffs culminating in the championship game , the MLS  कप  .
Major  लीग   सॉकर  was founded in 1993 as part  of   the  United  राज्य   '  bid to host  the  1994  फीफा  World Cup .
The  पहला  season took  प्लेस  in 1996 beginning with ten teams  .
Instead  of  operating  as  an association of  independently  owned  टीमों   ,  MLS is a single entity where each team is owned and controlled by the league  's  investors .
The  लीग  's closed  सदस्यता  makes it one of  the  world 's few soccer leagues not  using  promotion and relegation .
The legality of cannabis varies from country  to  country  .
Possession of cannabis is illegal in most countries and has  महरूम   चूंकि  the beginning of  फैली  cannabis prohibition  in   the  late 1930s .
However  ,  many  देशों  have decriminalized the possession of small quantities of cannabis , particularly  in  North America , South America and Europe .
furthermore  , possession  is  legal or effectively legal  in  the Netherlands  ,  North Korea  और   होता  be in the U.S. states of  कोलोराडो  and Washington if  it  were not for federal  विधि  ,  जिससे  governs persons in all states .
The medicinal use of cannabis is legal in a number  of  countries , including Canada , the Czech Republic and Israel  .
While  संघीय  law in the United  राज्य  bans all  बिक्री  and  कब्ज़ा  of  कैनबिस  , enforcement  varies  widely at  the  state level and  कुछ  states have  स्थापित  medicinal  मारिजुआना  programs in that  खण्डन  federal law  ;  two  राज्य  (  कोलोराडो  and Washington )  have  repealed their laws prohibiting the recreational use of  कैनबिस  and replaced them with a regulatory regime , also  contrary  to federal  statute  .
Some countries have  कानून  that are  नहीं   as  vigorously prosecuted as others but , apart from  the  countries that offer access to medical marijuana ,  सबसे   देशों  have  विभिन्न  penalties ranging from lenient to  बहुत  severe .
Some infractions  हैं  taken  अधिक   seriously  in some countries than others in regard to the cultivation  ,   उपयोग  , possession or transfer of cannabis  लिये  recreational  उपयोग  .
A few jurisdictions  have  lessened penalties for possession of small quantities of cannabis , making it punishable by confiscation  और  a fine , rather than imprisonment .
Some jurisdictions/ drug courts use mandatory  उपचार  programs for young or frequent users , with freedom  इससे  narcotic drugs as  the  goal and a few jurisdictions permit cannabis use for  औषधीय  purposes .
वहीँ  are also changes in a  अधिक  restrictive direction as  in  Canada .
Drug tests to detect cannabis are increasingly  आम  in  अनेक  countries  और  have resulted in jail sentences and people losing their jobs  .
however  , simple possession can carry  long  jail sentences  in  some countries ,  विशेषकर   in  parts of East Asia and Southeast Asia where the sale of cannabis may  सीसे  to a sentence of life in  थाना   or  even execution .
In  cardiovascular   physiology  , ejection  भिन्न  ( EF ) represents the volumetric  भिन्न  of blood pumped out of the ventricle  (   दिल  ) with each heart  ताल  or cardiac cycle  .
it  can  be  applied to either  the  right ventricle which ejects via the pulmonary  वाल्व   into  the pulmonary circulation  or  the left ventricle  जिससे  ejects via the aortic valve into the  प्रणालीगत  circulation .
Imaging of the physiology of the mammalian heart is  the  art that allows meaningful mathematical expression  धमक  EF  .
Noninvasive cardiac imaging has  become  a worldwide utility enabling study of cardiac performance reproducibly and inexpensively .
Simplified  ,  Ejection fraction is a mathematical product allowed  by   हृदय  imaging .
As a mathematical term , Ejection Fraction is an extension of the work of  एडाल्फ  Fick in cardiac output  .
Dedicated  प्रौद्योगिकी   ऐसे  as Echocardiography ,  computed  Tomography , Magnetic Resonance Imaging and MUGA scanning have definitively allowed clinically relevant mathematics regarding Ischemia , Congenital  दिल  Disease and Heart Failure .
State Route 14 (  sr   14  ) is a north–south state highway in the U.S. state of California , largely  in  the Mojave Desert  .
The southern portion of the highway is  हस्ताक्षरित  as the  antelope  Valley  फ्रीवे   .
The route connects Interstate 5  ,  or Golden  राज्य  Freeway , near Santa Clarita and  साथ  U.S. Route 395  निकट  Inyokern .
Legislatively  ,  the route extends  दक्षिण  of I-5 to State  रूट   1   in  the Pacific  palisades  area of Los Angeles , however the portion south  of  the junction with I-5 has not been constructed  .
the  southern part of the constructed route is a busy commuter freeway serving and connecting the communities of  सांता   clarita  , Palmdale and  lancaster   साथ  the rest of the  वृहद  Los Angeles area .
The northern portion , from Vincent  (   दक्षिण   of   palmdale  )  to  Route  395  , is  legislatively  named the Aerospace  राजमार्ग  , as the highway serves Edwards Air Force Base , once one of  the   प्राथमिक  landing strips for NASA 's  स्पेस  Shuttle .
This section is  ग्रामीण  ,  following   the  line between the hot Mojave  मरुस्थल   और  the forming Sierra Nevada mountain range .
Most of  रूट  14 is loosely paralleled by a main line of the  दक्षिणी   प्रशांत  Railroad  ,   प्रयुक्त   लिये  the Antelope Valley  लकीर  of  the  Metrolink commuter rail system as well as a connection between  लॉस   एंजिल्स   और  the California Central  घाटी  via Tehachapi Pass .
Linked with US 395 , this  सड़क  connects Los Angeles with such places as Mammoth  पहाड़  , Mono Lake  ,  Yosemite National Park and Reno  ,  Nevada .
Route 14 was  भाग  of  u.S.  Route 6  prior  to truncation in 1964 , when U.S. 6 was a coast-to-coast route  इससे  Long Beach  to   provincetown  , Massachusetts .
The  non-freeway  segment of SR 14 from  चांदी  Queen Road north of Rosamond  to  Mojave is  ज्ञात  as Sierra Highway , as  is  the old routing between Interstate 5  और  Silver Queen Road  जहाँ  SR 14 has  महरूम   स्थानांतरित  to a newer  फ्रीवे  alignment .
Portions of Route 14  remain  signed with  names  associated with US 6  ,  including  मिडलैंड  Trail ,  थियोडोर  Roosevelt Highway  और  Grand Army of  the   गणतंत्र   राजमार्ग  .
This  रूट  is part of the California  फ्रीवे  and  एक्सप्रेसवे   प्रणाली  .
Blindness is  the  condition  of  lacking visual perception due to physiological or neurological factors .
Various scales have been developed to describe the extent of  दृष्टि  loss and define blindness .
Total blindness  is  the complete lack of form and visual light  बोध  and is clinically recorded as NLP , an abbreviation for ``  no  light  बोध   .  ''
Blindness  is  frequently used to describe severe visual impairment with vision  .
those  described as  having  only light perception have no more sight than the ability to tell  लाइट  from dark and the general direction  of  a  लाइट  source .
To determine which people may need special assistance  क्युकी   of  their  विज़ुअल  disabilities  ,  various governmental jurisdictions have formulated  अधिक  complex definitions referred to as legal blindness .
In North America and most of  यूरोपीय   ,  legal blindness  is  defined as  विज़ुअल   तीक्ष्णता  ( vision )  of  20/200 ( 6/60  )  or less in the  बेहतर   नजर  with best correction possible .
This  अर्थात्  that a legally blind individual  होता   have  to stand  इससे  an  ऑब्जेक्ट  to see  it—with  corrective lenses —with the same degree  of  clarity as a normally sighted person could from .
In many areas  ,  people with  औसत   तीक्ष्णता   जो  nonetheless have a visual field of less than 20 degrees ( the norm being 180 degrees  )  are also classified as being legally blind .
Approximately  टेन  percent  of  those deemed legally  अँधा  , by any measure ,  have  no vision .
the  rest have some vision ,  इससे  light perception alone to relatively good acuity .
Low vision is sometimes used to describe visual acuities from 20/70 to 20/200 .
By the 10th Revision of  the  WHO International Statistical Classification of Diseases  ,  Injuries and Causes of Death , low vision is defined as visual  तीक्ष्णता  of  कम  than 20/60 ( 6/18 ) , but equal to or better than  20/200  ( 6/60 ) , or  सम्बन्धित  visual field  घाटा  to less than 20 degrees ,  in  the  बेहतर  eye with  बेहतरीन  possible correction  .
दृष्टिहीनता  is defined as  विज़ुअल  acuity of less than 20/400 ( 6/120 ) ,  or  corresponding visual  फ़ील्ड  loss to less  than  10 degrees , in the better eye with best possible correction  .
Blind people  साथ  undamaged eyes may still  पंजीकरण   लाइट  non-visually  लिये  the  purpose  of circadian entrainment to the 24-hour light/dark cycle .
Light signals for this purpose travel through the retinohypothalamic  ट्रैक्ट   और  are not affected by optic nerve damage  परे   जहाँ  the retinohypothalamic tract exits .
Earl Simmons ( born December 18  ,  1970 ) , better known by  उसके  stage names  dmx  and Dark Man  x  , is an American rapper  और  actor .
In 1999 , DMX released his  best-selling  album ...  और  Then There Was X , which  प्रदर्शित  the hit single `` Party Up  (   up  in Here ) ``  .
He has acted  in  films such as Belly , Romeo Must Die , Exit Wounds , Cradle 2 The Grave ,  और  Last Hour .
In 2006 ,  he   स्ट्रक्चर   in  the  वास्तविकता  television series ,  जिससे  was primarily aired on the BET cable television network .
In 2003 ,  dmx   प्रकाशित   a  book of his memoirs entitled , E.A.R.L  .  : The Autobiography of DMX .
DMX released a mixtape The Weigh In as a prelude/promotion towards  उसके   एल्बम  Undisputed ( 2012 ) .
DMX has sold over  30   लाख  records worldwide , making him one  of  the best-selling  hip-hop  artists of all  समय  .
Professional  प्रमाणन  ,  व्यापार  certification , or professional designation , often called  बस  certification  or   योग्यता  ,  is  a designation earned  by   a  person to  assure  qualification to  perform  a  जॉब   or  task .
Not all certifications that use  post-nominal  letters  हैं  an  स्वीकृति  of educational achievement , or an  एजेंसी  appointed  to   safeguard   the  public  ब्याज  .
बग   बनी  is  a  funny animal  कार्टून  character , best remembered for his starring  भूमिकाएँ  in the Looney Tunes and Merrie Melodies series of theatrical short films produced by  warner   भाईs.  during the Golden  आयु  of  अमरीकी   एनिमेशन  .
His popularity during this era led to  उसके   बनने   a  corporate mascot of Warner Bros. Entertainment .
Bugs is an  anthropomorphic   धूसर  hare or rabbit who is famous for his  flippant  ,  व्यक्तित्व  , a pronounced New York accent  ,   उसके  portrayal as a trickster , and his catch phrase `` Eh  ...
What  's  up ,  दस्तावेज़  ?  ''
( usually said while chewing a  गाजर  ) .
Bugs has appeared  in  more films than any other cartoon character and is the ninth most portrayed  फिल्मी  personality in  the  world .
according  to his 1990 `` biography  ''   बग  Bunny : 50  सालो  and Only One  धूसर  Hare  ,  Bugs  थी  born on July 27 , 1940 in Brooklyn , New York in a warren under Ebbets Field , home of the Brooklyn Dodgers .
In reality  ,  he  थी  brought  to  life  by  the animators and staff of  लिओन  Schlesinger Productions  (  later Warner Bros. Cartoons ) :  सहित  Tex Avery , who directed Bugs ' early definitive short A Wild  हरे   (  1940 ) ; Robert McKimson , who created Bugs '  निर्णायक  character design ; and  mel  Blanc , who  originated  the  आवाज़  of Bugs  .
the  mucous  झिल्लियों  ( or mucosae or mucosas ; singular mucosa ) are linings of mostly endodermal origin , covered in epithelium , which  हैं  involved in  अवशोषण  and secretion .
They line cavities that are exposed  to  the external environment and  आतंरिक   अंगों   .
They are at several places contiguous  साथ  skin : at the  नथुनों  , the lips  of   the  mouth  ,   the  eyelids , the ears , the genital area ,  और  the anus .
The sticky , thick fluid secreted by the  श्लेष्मक  membranes  और   ग्रंथियों  is termed mucus .
The term mucous  झिल्ली  refers to where they are found  in  the body  और  not  प्रत्येक  mucous membrane secretes mucus .
the  glans clitoridis , glans penis  (  head  of  the  शिश्न  ) , along with the inside of the foreskin and the  clitoral  hood  ,  are  श्लेष्मक  membranes .
The urethra is  भी  a mucous membrane .
The secreted  mucus  traps the  pathogens  in the body , preventing  कोई  further activities  of  diseases  .
A master sergeant is the military rank for a senior non-commissioned officer in some armed forces .
Cake is a form of  ब्रैड   or  bread-like food .
In  इसके  modern  फ़ॉर्म  , it is typically  a  sweet baked dessert  .
In its  oldest  forms , cakes were normally fried breads or cheesecakes ,  और  normally  था  a disk shape .
Determining whether a given food  चाहिए  be classified as bread  ,  cake , or pastry can be difficult .
Modern cake , especially layer  cakes  , normally contain a combination  of  flour , sugar , eggs , and butter  or  oil , with  कुछ  varieties  भी  requiring liquid ( typically milk or water ) and leavening agents ( such as yeast or baking powder ) .
flavorful  ingredients like fruit purées , nuts , dried or candied fruit ,  or  extracts are often added ,  और   numerous  substitutions for the primary ingredients  हैं  possible .
Cakes are often filled with fruit preserves  or  dessert sauces ( like pastry cream ) , iced with  buttercream  or  अन्य  icings  ,  and decorated with marzipan ,  piped  borders  or  candied fruit .
केक  is often the dessert of choice for meals at ceremonial occasions ,  विशेषकर   विवाह   ,   वर्षगांठ  , and birthdays  .
There are  अनगिनत   केक   व्यंजनों   ;   कुछ  are bread-like , some rich and elaborate , and  अनेक   हैं  centuries old .
केक  making  is  no longer  a  complicated procedure ;  जबकि  at one time  considerable  labor  गई   into   केक  making ( particularly the whisking of egg foams ) ,  बेकिंग  equipment and directions have been simplified so  कि  even the most amateur cook may bake a  केक  .
Tamara Faye  lavalley  Bakker Messner ( March 7 , 1942 –  जुलाई  20 , 2007 ) was an American Christian singer , evangelist  ,  entrepreneur , author , talk  दिखाएँ  host , and television personality  .

She  co-hosted  with him on The PTL Club  (  1976–1987 )  .
She  थी  a participant  in  the 2004 season of the reality show  the  Surreal Life .
Cambria is a  गाँव  in Columbia  काउंटी  , Wisconsin  ,   संयुक्त   राज्य   .
The population was 767  at   the  2010 census .
It is part  of  the Madison  महानगर  Statistical Area .
Public policy is the principled guide  to   कार्रवाई  taken by  the   प्रशासनिक  executive branches of  the  state with regard to a class of issues in  a  manner  सतत  with law and institutional customs  .
in  general , the foundation is the pertinent national  और  substantial constitutional law and implementing legislation such as the US Federal code .
further  substrates include both  न्यायिक  interpretations  और  regulations  जिससे  are generally authorized by legislation .
अन्य  scholars define it as a system  of  ``  पाठ्यक्रम   of  action ,  नियामक  measures , laws  ,   और  funding priorities concerning a given topic promulgated  by  a governmental entity or  इसके  representatives . ''
पब्लिक  policy is commonly embodied `` in constitutions , legislative acts , and judicial decisions .  ''
In the United  राज्य  , this concept refers  नहीं  only to the result of policies , but  अधिक  broadly to the decision-making and analysis of  सरकारी   निर्णय  .
As an academic discipline , public policy is studied by professors and  विद्यार्थी  at public policy schools  of  major universities throughout the  देश   .
The U.S. professional association of public policy practitioners ,  शोधकर्ताओं  ,  विद्वानों  , and students  is  the Association  लिये  Public Policy Analysis  और  Management .
Digestion is the mechanical and chemical breakdown  of   खाना   into  smaller  components  that are more easily absorbed into a blood stream , for instance .
Digestion is a form of catabolism  :  a breakdown of large food  अणुओं  to smaller ones .
When  खाना  enters  the  mouth  ,  digestion of the food  starts  by the action  of   mastication  , a form of mechanical digestion  ,  and  the   wetting  contact of saliva  .
Saliva , a liquid secreted  by  the salivary glands  ,   contains  salivary  amylase   ,  an  एंजाइम  which starts  the   पाचन  of starch  in  the food .
After undergoing mastication and  मंड  digestion ,  the  food  होगा  be in the form of a  छोटी  ,  गोलाकार  slurry mass called a bolus .
It will then travel down the esophagus  और  into the stomach by the  कार्रवाई  of peristalsis .
Gastric  रस  in the stomach starts protein digestion .
Gastric juice mainly contains hydrochloric  एसिड   और  pepsin  .
As these two  रसायन  may damage the stomach wall , mucus is secreted by the stomach , providing a slimy layer that acts as a shield against the damaging effects of the chemicals .
At  the  same time protein digestion  is  occurring  ,  mechanical mixing occurs by  peristalsis  , which are waves of muscular contractions that move along the stomach wall .
This allows the mass of  खाना   to  further  मिक्सर  with the digestive enzymes .
After some  समय  ( typically an hour or two in humans  ,  4–6 hours  in  dogs  ,  somewhat shorter  अवधि  in house  बिल्लियों  )  ,  the resulting thick liquid is called  chyme  .
जब  the  pyloric  sphincter valve opens ,  chyme  enters  the   duodenum  where  it  mixes with digestive enzymes from the  अग्न्याशय  , and  तब  passes through  the  small intestine , in which digestion continues .
When the chyme is fully digested , it  is  absorbed into the  रक्त  .
95  % of  अवशोषण  of nutrients  occurs   in  the small intestine .
Water and  खनिज   हैं  reabsorbed back into the blood in  the  colon (  विशाल  intestine )  जहाँ   the  pH is slightly  अम्लीय  about 5.6 ~ 6.9  .
Some vitamins  ,  such  as  biotin and  विटामिन  K ( K2MK7 ) produced by bacteria in  the   कोलन   हैं  also absorbed into the blood  in  the colon .
बर्बाद   सामग्री  is eliminated from  the   मलाशय  during defecation .
Henry  viii  ( 28 June 1491 – 28  जनवरी  1547  )  was  किंग  of England from 21 April 1509  जबतक   उसके  death .
He  थी  lord ,  और   बाद  king , of Ireland  ,  as well as  continuing  the  नाममात्र   अर्जी  by the English  monarchs  to the Kingdom of France .
Henry was the second monarch of the Tudor dynasty , succeeding his  पिता  , Henry  सात   .
Besides his six marriages , Henry VIII is known  लिये  his role in the separation of the Church of England from the Roman Catholic Church .
Henry 's struggles with Rome led  to  the separation of the Church of England from papal authority , the Dissolution of  the  Monasteries , and  उसके  own  स्थापना  as the Supreme Head of  the  Church of England .
Yet he remained  a  believer in core Catholic  theological  teachings , even after his excommunication from  the  Roman  कैथोलिक  Church .
Henry oversaw the legal union of England and Wales with the Laws in Wales Acts 1535 and  1542  .
In 1513 , the  नई  king allied with the Holy  रोमन  Emperor , Maximillian I  ,   और  invaded France in 1513 with a large , well-equipped army , but achieved little at  a  considerable financial cost .
Maximillian , for his part , used the English invasion to his own ends , and this prejudiced  इंग्लैण्ड  's  क्षमता  to defeat the French .
This foray would prove  the   प्रारंभ  of  an   obsession  for Henry , who  invaded  again in  1544  .
This time , Henry 's  शक्तियां   captured  the important city  of  Boulogne  ,  but again the Holy Roman Emperor , Charles  v  ,  समर्थित  Henry  तभी  as long as he needed to and England , strained by  the  enormous  लागत   of  the  युद्ध   ,  ransomed the city back for peace .
His contemporaries considered  हेनरी  in his  प्रधान  to be an attractive  ,  educated  और  accomplished king , and he has been described as `` one of the most  charismatic  rulers to sit on the English throne '' .
Besides ruling with absolute power , he also engaged  खुद  as an author  और  composer .
His desire  to   provide  England with a male heir  –  which  stemmed   partly   इससे   निजी  vanity and partly because he believed a  बेटी  would be  असमर्थ  to consolidate the Tudor dynasty and the fragile peace that existed following the Wars  of  the  गुलाब  – led to the two things  लिये  which  हेनरी  is most  remembered  :  उसके  six marriages and the English Reformation .
Henry became morbidly obese and his health  suffered  ,  contributing  to his death in 1547 .
He is frequently characterised in his later life as a lustful  ,  egotistical , harsh  ,   और   असुरक्षित  king .
Bongos ( Spanish : bongó  )  are an  afro-cuban  percussion  यंत्र  .
The  ड्रम  are of  अलग  size : the larger drum  is  called in  स्पेनी  the hembra ( female  )  and the smaller the macho  (  male ) .
वे  are membranophones  ,  or  यंत्र  that create sound by a vibration of a stretched membrane .
Different religious groups include different  किताबे   in  their Biblical canons  ,   in  varying  आदेश  ,  और  sometimes divide or combine  किताबे  , or incorporate additional material into canonical  किताबे  .
Christian Bibles range from the sixty-six books of the Protestant canon to the  eighty-one   किताबे  of the Ethiopian Orthodox  tewahedo  Church canon  .
The Hebrew  बाइबल   ,  or Tanakh , contains twenty-four books divided into  तीन   भाग   ;  the five books of the Torah  (  `` teaching '' or ``  विधि  '' ) , the  nevi'im  ( `` prophets ''  )   ,   और  the Ketuvim  (  `` writings '' ) .
The first part  of  Christian Bibles  is  the  बूढ़ा  Testament , which contains ,  at  minimum  ,  the twenty-four books of the Hebrew Bible divided into thirty-nine  किताबे   और  ordered differently from the Hebrew Bible .
The Catholic Church and Eastern Christian churches also hold certain deuterocanonical  किताबे  and passages to be part  of  the  बूढ़ा  Testament canon  .
The  दूसरी  part is the New  वसीयत  , containing twenty-seven books ; the four  canonical  gospels , Acts of the Apostles , twenty-one  epistles  or letters and the Book of Revelation .
The Eastern Orthodox , Oriental Orthodox  और   पूर्वी  Catholic churches may have  नाबालिग  differences in their  सूचियाँ   of  accepted books .
the  list given here for these churches is the  सबसे  inclusive : if at  तनिक   एक  Eastern church  स्वीकृत  the book it is included here  .
The national flag of the United States of  अमेरिका  , often simply referred to as the American flag ,  consists  of thirteen equal  आड़ा  stripes of  रेड  ( top and bottom ) alternating with white , with a blue rectangle in  the  canton ( referred to specifically as the ``  संघ   ''   )  bearing fifty small ,  श्वेत  , five-pointed stars arranged in nine offset horizontal rows of six stars ( top  और  bottom ) alternating with rows  of  five stars .
The 50 stars on the flag represent the 50  राज्य  of  the  United States  of  America and the 13  धारियाँ   represent  the thirteen  अंग्रेजों   colonies  that declared  स्वतंत्रता  from the Kingdom of Great Britain and became the first  राज्य  in the Union .
nicknames   लिये   the  flag include the `` Stars and Stripes '' , `` Old Glory `` , and `` The Star-Spangled  ध्वज  .  ''
Dred  स्कॉट  v. Sandford , , also  ज्ञात  as the  dred  Scott Decision  ,  was a landmark decision by the U.S. Supreme Court .
It made two main rulings .
The first ruling was that African-Americans  यहूद  not citizens ,  और  therefore had no standing  to  sue in federal court .
the  second ruling  थी   कि  the federal government  था  no power to regulate slavery in any  territory  acquired subsequent  to   the  creation of the United States .
Given the first ruling ,  सबसे  scholars and many contemporary  राजनैतिक  figures ( including the leadership of the then-new Republican Party )  माना  that the second ruling was not binding precedent ,  लकिन   mere  dictum .
The rationale  of   the  Supreme  अदालत  regarding the jurisdictional  सत्ताधारी  implied that people of African  descent  ( both slave  और   फ़्री  ) were not protected by the Constitution and  यहूद  not U.S. citizens .
Since passage  of  the 14th Amendment to the U.S. Constitution , both rulings are superseded and no longer  मान्य  precedent  .
Nonetheless  ,   the  case retains historical significance as it is  widely  regarded as the worst  निर्णय  ever made by the Supreme Court .
The opinion of the court , written by Chief Justice Roger B. Taney  ,  stirred debate  .
The decision was 7–2 , and every Justice besides Taney wrote a separate concurrence or  dissent  .
For the first  समय  since Marbury v. Madison , the Court held an Act of Congress to be unconstitutional .
Dred  स्कॉट   ,   an   african-american   स्लेव  , had asked a United States Circuit Court to award him his freedom  क्युकी  he and his master had resided in a  राज्य  ( Illinois )  और  a territory (  विस्कॉन्सिन  Territory ) where  गुलामी  had been banned .
Chief Justice Roger Taney  ,  writing  लिये  the  अदालत  ,  आयोजित  that  स्कॉट  , as a  व्यक्ति  of African ancestry ,  थी  not a citizen of the United States and therefore had no right to  मुकदमा  in federal court .
This  पकड़कर  was contrary to the practice of numerous  राज्य  at the  समय  ,  विशेषकर  Free states , where free blacks  किया  in  फैक्ट  enjoy the rights of citizens , such as  the  right to vote and hold public office .
In what  is  sometimes considered mere  obiter  dictum , the Court went  on  to hold that Congress had no authority to prohibit  गुलामी   in  federal territories because slaves are personal property and the Fifth Amendment to the Constitution protects  प्रॉपर्टी  owners  विरूद्ध  deprivation of their  प्रॉपर्टी  without due process of law .
In  reaching  this decision  ,  Taney had  hoped   to  settle the  growing  controversy surrounding slavery in the United  राज्य  , but it had the opposite effect .
the  decision was fiercely  debated  across the  देश  , as perhaps best  सरंचनाओं  by  the   lincoln–douglas  debates of  1858  .
Abraham Lincoln  ,  the second-ever Republican nominee  लिये  President , was  समर्थ  to win the presidential  चुनाव  in 1860 ; the stopping of the further expansion  of  slavery  थी  a key  रिपब्लिकन  party plank .
the  decision  निभाई  an important role in  the   समय  of state secession and the Civil War  ,  although it is  चरम  to say the decision `` caused ''  the  war  .
The decision  is   acknowledged  for the  influential  role it played in  altering  the national political  लैंडस्केप   :  it is  credited   साथ  launching Abraham Lincoln’s  नेशनल   राजनैतिक  career and ultimately allowing for his  चुनाव  .
हालांकि  the Supreme  अदालत  has never explicitly overruled the Dred Scott case , the  अदालत  stated in the Slaughter-House  मामले   कि  at  तनिक  one part of it  था   already  been overruled by the Fourteenth Amendment in 1868 , which begins by stating , `` All  व्यक्तियों   born  or naturalized in  the  United  राज्य  , and  विषय  to  the  jurisdiction thereof , are citizens  of  the  संयुक्त  States and of the State wherein  वे   reside  . ''
To which the  अदालत  noted:
The  पहला  observation  we  have to  मेक  on  इस  clause is  ,   कि  it puts at rest both the  सवाल  which we stated  to  have been the subject of differences  of  opinion .
It declares that persons may be citizens of the  संयुक्त   राज्य  without regard to their citizenship of a particular State , and  it  overturns the Dred  स्कॉट  decision by making all persons born within the United States  और   विषय  to its  क्षेत्राधिकार  citizens  of  the United  राज्य  .
There are dozens  of  neighborhoods in Columbus  ,  Ohio .
Some are  मुश्किल  to  define   ,  as they encompass large areas developed at  अलग   times—often  with sub-neighborhoods within them .
Borders  can  also change based  on  popular understanding  of  the area , as  खूब   as  the whims of the  निवासियों  .
This  आलेख  uses  आंकड़ा  from  the  Datasourcecolumbus  वेब  site  ,  Spotcrime.com , HelloColumbus.com ,  as  well as the various Columbus  क्षेत्रफल  Commissions to define the various areas .
Excerpts  और  border information are drawn directly from the main  आलेख  .
A biologist is a scientist who studies  जीना  organisms and their relationship to their environment .
Biologists involved in basic research attempt  to  discover underlying mechanisms that govern  कैसा   जीवों  work .
Biologists involved in applied research attempt to develop or improve medical  ,  industrial or  agricultural  processes .
Martinus Willem Beijerinck , a botanist and microbiologist
आधार   कूद  from a cliff in a wingsuit .
आधार  jumping , also sometimes written as  b.a.s.e   .   कूद  , is an  कार्यकलाप  where participants  जम्प  from fixed objects and  उपयोग  a parachute to break their fall  .
`` BASE '' is an acronym that stands for  चार  categories of  फिक्स्ड  objects from which one can jump :  इमारतें  , antennas , spans  (  bridges  )  , and earth ( cliffs ) .
the  British  shorthair  is a domesticated cat whose features  मेक  it a popular breed  in  cat shows .
It has been the most popular breed of cat registered  by  the UK 's Governing Council of the Cat Fancy ( GCCF ) since 2001 ,  जब  it overtook the Persian breed  .
The USA Basketball Men 's Senior National  टोली   ,  commonly known as the United  राज्य  men 's national basketball team , represents the  संयुक्त  States  of  America in international men 's basketball .
The USA is the  सबसे  successful team in international competition , winning medals in all seventeen Olympic tournaments it has entered , coming away with fourteen golds .
Two of its gold medal-winning  दस्तों  were inducted to  the  Naismith  मेमोरियल  Basketball Hall  of   कीर्ति  as teams  in  August  2010—the   1960  team , which featured six Hall  of  Famers  (  4 players ,  2  coaches ) , and  the   1992  ``  सपना  Team '' ,  featuring  14 Hall of Famers  (   11  players , 3 coaches  )   .
the   संयुक्त  States is currently ranked first in the FIBA World Rankings .
Traditionally composed of amateur players , a 1989 rule change by  fiba  allowed USA  बास्केट  to field  टीमों  with professional players .
The  पहला  such team , known  as  the `` Dream Team '' , won the gold medal  at  the 1992 Summer Olympics in Barcelona , Spain  ,   playing   in  the final against Croatia .
With the  परिचय   of  professionals , the team was able to spark a second run of  दबदबा  after capturing  तभी  a  कांस्य  medal in 1988 .
A team of  पेशेवर   खिलाड़ी  competed at the  1994  FIBA  संसार   चैंपियनशिप  , finishing  पहला  .
In 1996  ,  2000  ,  2008 , and 2012 the USA  again  captured gold medals .
Facing increased  प्रतियोगिता  , the USA failed  to  win a medal  at  the 2002 FIBA World Championship  ,  finishing sixth .
The 2004  गर्मियाँ   ओलम्पिक  team lost three  खेल  on its way  to  a bronze  पदक  ,  a  record  कि  represented more losses  in  a single year than the country 's Olympic teams had suffered in all previous  olympiads  combined .
Determined to  put  an end to  ये  failures , USA Basketball initiated a  long-term  project aimed  at  creating better , more cohesive teams  .
The USA  जीती  its  पहला  seven games at  the   2006  FIBA World  चैंपियनशिप  in Japan before losing against Greece  in   the   semi-finals  , ending  the  competition  साथ  the bronze medal .
the  USA  जीती  gold two years later , though ,  at   the  2008  गर्मियाँ  Olympics with a dominant performance .
This success was followed  up  at the 2010 FIBA World Championship , where despite fielding a roster featuring  no  players from the 2008 Olympic  टोली  , the USA  किया  not lose  a  single  खेल  en route  to  defeating host Turkey for the gold medal .
the   यूएसए   जारी   इस  streak of dominance by going undefeated and capturing gold once more at the 2012 Summer Olympics  .

The Super Bowl ring is an  पुरस्कार  in the National Football League given  to   the  winners of the  लीग  's annual World  चैंपियनशिप  game ,  the  Super Bowl  .
चूंकि  only  एक   विंस  Lombardi Trophy is  awarded  to  the  team ( ownership  )  itself , the Super Bowl ring offers  a  collectible  memento  for the actual players and team members  to  keep for themselves to symbolize the victory .
