A stalagmite ( or ; from the Greek  σταλαγμίτης   -  stalagmitês , from  σταλαγμίας  - stalagmias , ``  छोड़ने  , trickling '' )  is  a type of speleothem that rises from the  मंजिल  of a limestone cave due to the  टपकता  of mineralized solutions and the deposition of calcium carbonate  .
इस  stalagmite formation occurs only under certain pH conditions within the underground cavern  .
The corresponding formation on  the  ceiling of a cave  is  known as a  stalactite  .
If these formations  grow  together , the result  is  known as  a  column .
the   हॉल   of  Giants  in  the Carlsbad Caverns
Stalagmites should normally  नहीं  be touched , since  the  rock buildup is formed by minerals  precipitating  out of  the  water solution onto the  बूढ़ा  surface ;  स्किन  oils  can  alter the  सतह  where the mineral water  होगा  cling , thus  affecting  the growth of  the  formation  .
Oils and dirt  इससे  human  सम्पर्क   can  also  दाग  the  गठन  and change its color permanently .
समान  structures  can   भी   रूप  in lava tubes  ,  associated with some types  of  lavacicles ,  हालांकि  the mechanism of  गठन  is very  अलग  .
Stalactites and  stalagmites  can also form on concrete ceilings and floors , although  वे  form much more rapidly there than in the natural cave  पर्यावरण  .
The largest stalagmite in  the   संसार  is high and  is   स्तिथ  in the  गुफा  of Cueva  मार्टिन  Infierno  ,  Cuba .
In the Zagros  kyu  of south Iran ,  लगभग  from the ancient city of Bishapur ,  in  the Shapur cave on the fourth of five terraces stands the  3rd  century  ce  statue of Shapur I , second  शासक  of  the  Sassanid  साम्राज्य  .
The statue , carved from one stalagmite ,  is   nearly  high .
How I  मिले  Your Mother  is  an American sitcom that  premiered  on CBS  on  September 19 , 2005  .
the  show was created by  क्रेग  Thomas and Carter Bays .
How I  मिले  Your Mother  is   framed  by the  साल  2030 , when Ted Mosby ( voiced by Bob Saget ) gathers his daughter (  lyndsy  Fonseca )  और  son ( David  henrie  ) to tell them the story of how he met their mother .
we  flashback to where it  begins   in  2005 with Ted  mosby   (  Josh Radnor ) as a single , 27-year-old architect living with his two best  मित्रों  from Wesleyan University , Marshall  eriksen   (  Jason Segel ) , a law student , and Lily Aldrin ( Alyson Hannigan ) , a  किंडरगार्टन  teacher  ,  who have been dating for almost nine years  जब  Marshall proposes .
Their engagement causes Ted to think about finding his own soul mate ,  much  to  the   disgust  of his friend Barney  stinson  (  neil  Patrick Harris ) , a womanizer with an unnamed corporate job .
And  यूँ  , Ted begins his search for his perfect mate , and meets Robin Scherbatsky  (  Cobie  स्मल्डर्स   )  ,  जिसको  he also befriends .
The 100th episode of How I Met Your Mother  aired  on January 11 , 2010 .
On  दिसम्बर   21  , 2012  ,   the  series was renewed for a ninth season .
On  जनवरी  30 , 2013 , it  थी  announced that Season 9 will be its final season .
Gringo ( ,  ,   )  is a  कठबोली  Spanish and  पुर्तगाली  word used in Ibero-America , to denote  विदेशियों  , often from the United States .
The term can be applied to  किसी   जो  is actually a foreigner ,  or  it can  denote   a  strong association or assimilation into foreign  (   विशेषकर  US ) society and culture .
In Spanish it does not have a negative connotation  .
Roger Axtell , a  सफर  etiquette expert ,  टीप   कि  `` [ t  ]  he  शब्द  gringo is not necessarily  a   ख़राब  word .
It is slang but is  अपमानजनक  only in its use and context . ''
The word was used  in  Spain long before it crossed the Atlantic to denote foreign ,  non-native  speakers of Spanish  .
the  great white shark ,  carcharodon  carcharias , also  ज्ञात  as the great  श्वेत  , white pointer , white  शार्क   ,  or  श्वेत  death , is  a  species of large  lamniform  shark which can be found in the coastal surface waters of all the major oceans .
The  ग्रेट   श्वेत  shark is mainly known for its size , with the largest individuals known to  have  approached or exceeded in  लंबाई  , and in weight  .
This shark reaches its maturity around  15   सालो  of age and can have a  जीवन  span of over 30 years .
The great white shark is arguably  the  world 's largest known extant macropredatory fish ,  और   is  one of the primary predators  of  marine mammals .
It is also known to  शिकार  upon a variety of other marine animals , including fish and seabirds .
It is the only known surviving species of its genus Carcharodon , and is ranked first in having the most attacks on  इंसानो  .
The IUCN list the great white shark as a vulnerable species , while  it  is  शामिल  in Appendix II of CITES  .
the  bestselling novel Jaws by  पीटर   benchley  and the subsequent  ब्लॉकबस्टर  film by  स्टीवन   स्पिलबर्ग  depicted the great white shark as a `` ferocious  man  eater `` .
In reality ,  इंसानो  are not the  पसन्दीदा  prey of the  ग्रेट   श्वेत  shark .
The United  राज्य  Armed Forces are the military forces  of   the  United States of America .
They  consist  of the Army , Navy , Marine  corps  , Air Force  ,   और  Coast  गार्ड   .
The  u.S.  has a strong tradition  of  civilian control  of  the military .
The President is the military  's   overall  head  ,  and helps  रूप  military policy  साथ  the U.S. Department of Defense ( DoD ) , a  संघीय  executive department , acting as the principal  अंग   by  which military policy is carried out  .
The DoD is  headed  by  the  Secretary of Defense ,  जो   is  a civilian and Cabinet  सदस्य  .
the  Defense Secretary is second in  the  military 's chain  of  command ,  बस  below the President  ,  and serves as the principal assistant to the President  in  all  dod-related  matters .
to  coordinate military action with diplomacy , the  अध्यक्ष  has an advisory National Security Council headed by a National Security Advisor .
Both the President  और  Secretary of Defense are advised by a  seven-member  Joint Chiefs of Staff , which  शामिल   the  head of  प्रत्येक  of the Defense Department 's  सेवा   शाखाओं  as well as the chief of the National Guard Bureau .
नेतृत्व  is provided by the Chairman of the Joint  chiefs  of Staff and the Vice  अध्यक्ष   of  the Joint  chiefs  of Staff .
The Commandant  of   the  Coast Guard is not a member of the Joint Chiefs of Staff  .
All of the branches  कार्य   साथ  during operations and joint missions  ,  under the  एकीकृत  Combatant  कमांड  , under the authority of the Secretary of Defense  साथ   the  exception of the Coast Guard .
The Coast Guard falls under the administration of the Department of  मातृभूमि  Security  और  receives its operational orders  इससे  the Secretary of Homeland Security .
The Coast Guard may be transferred to the Department  of  the Navy by the President  or  Congress during a  समय  of war .
All five armed services are  among   the   सात  uniformed services  of  the United States ; the others are the  u.S.  Public Health Service Commissioned Corps and the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration Commissioned  corps  .
From the  समय  of its inception ,  the   सैन्य  played a  निर्णायक   भूमिका  in the history  of  the United States .
A sense of  नेशनल  unity and identity was forged as a result  of  victory in the First Barbary War and the Second Barbary War .
Even so , the  संस्थापकों  were suspicious of  a  permanent military  फ़ोर्स  and not until the outbreak  of  World War II did a large standing army become officially  स्थापित  .
The National  सुरक्षा  Act  of  1947 , adopted following World War II and during the Cold War 's onset  ,  created the modern U.S. military framework ; the Act merged previously Cabinet-level Department of War and the  विभाग  of the Navy into the National  सैन्य  Establishment ( renamed the Department of  रक्षा  in  1949  ) , headed  by  the Secretary  of  Defense ; and created  the  Department of the Air Force and National Security  परिषद  .
The U.S.  सैन्य   is  one of the largest militaries in terms  of  number  of  personnel .
it  draws its  जनशक्ति  from a large pool of paid volunteers ; although conscription has been used  in  the past in  विभिन्न  times of both war and peace  ,  it has  नहीं  been used  चूंकि   1972  .
As of 2013 , the U.S.  खर्च  about $ 554.2  अरब  annually to fund  इसके   सैन्य  forces  ,   और  appropriates approximately $ 88.5 billion  to  fund Overseas Contingency  परिचालन  .
Put together ,  the   u.S.   constitutes   roughly  43 percent of the world 's military expenditures  .
The U.S. Armed Forces as a  पूरे  possess  विशाल  quantities  of  advanced and  शक्तिशाली  equipment  ,  along with widespread placement of forces around  the   संसार  , giving them significant  सामर्थ्य  in both defense and power  प्रक्षेप  .
स्वतंत्रता  of speech is the political right  to  communicate one 's opinions  और  ideas using one 's body and property to anyone who  is  willing to  प्राप्त  them  .
the  term freedom  of  expression is sometimes used  synonymously  , but includes  कोई  act of seeking , receiving  और  imparting  सूचना  or ideas , regardless of the medium  प्रयुक्त  .
In practice ,  the  right to  स्वतंत्रता  of speech is not absolute in any country and the right is  commonly   विषय   to  limitations , as  साथ  libel  ,  slander , obscenity  ,   राजद्रोह  ( including ,  लिये  example inciting ethnic hatred ) , copyright  उल्लंघन   ,   रहस्योद्घाटन  of  सूचना  that  is  classified or otherwise  .
the  right to  स्वतंत्रता  of expression is  पहचाना  as a human  सही  under Article 19 of the Universal Declaration of Human Rights and  पहचाना  in international human  अधिकारों  law in the International Covenant on Civil and Political  अधिकारों  ( ICCPR ) .
Article 19  of   the  ICCPR  राज्य  that `` [ e ] veryone  shall  have the right to hold opinions without interference '' and `` everyone  shall   have  the right  to  freedom of  अभिव्यक्ति  ; this right shall include freedom to seek , receive and impart  सूचना  and  विचार  of all kinds , regardless of frontiers , either orally , in writing or in print ,  in  the form  of   आर्ट  , or through any  अन्य  media of his choice '' .
Article 19 goes on to  कह   कि  the exercise of these rights carries `` special  कर्तव्य  and responsibilities `` and may `` therefore be subject to  निश्चित   प्रतिबंध  ''  जब  necessary ``  [   f  ] or  आदर  of the rights or reputation of  अन्य  '' or ``  [  f ]  or  the protection of national security or of public order (  अनुक्रम  public  )  ,  or   of  public  स्वास्थ्य  or  नैतिकता  '' .
Freedom of  वाक  may be legally curtailed in some  धार्मिक  legal systems and in  धर्मनिरपेक्ष  jurisdictions where it is found to cause religious offense , such as the  अंग्रेजों  Racial and Religious Hatred Act  2006   .
The  बिग   बंग  Theory logo .
The Big Bang Theory is an American comedy television series created and  कार्यपालिका   उत्पादित   by  Chuck Lorre and  विधेयक  Prady  .
Like the name of the series itself , with the exception  of  the first episode—  ''  Pilot '' —episode  शीर्षक  of  the  Big Bang  सिद्धान्त  always start with  ``   the  ''  और  resemble the name of a scientific principle ,  सिद्धान्त  or experiment , whimsically referencing a  प्लाट  point or quirk .
,  133  episodes have  aired  .
The Big  बंग  Theory has been renewed for a seventh  ऋतु  .
Dwight David ``  आइक  '' Eisenhower ( pronounced  ,  ;  अक्तूबर  14  ,   1890   –  March 28 , 1969  )  was the 34th President  of  the  संयुक्त  States  इससे  1953 until 1961 .
He had previously been a five-star  सामान्य  in  the  United States Army during World War II and served  as  Supreme Commander  of   the  Allied Forces in Europe ; he had responsibility for planning and supervising the invasion of  उत्तर   अफ़्रीकी  in Operation Torch  in   1942–43   और   the  successful invasion of  फ़्रांस  and Germany in 1944–45 from the  पश्चिमी  Front .
In  1951  , he became the first  परम्   कमांडर  of NATO .
आइज़नहावर  was of Pennsylvania Dutch  ancestry  and was reared  in  a large family in Kansas by parents with  a  robust work ethic and religious background .
As  एक  of six  बेटे  , he was  conditioned  by  a  competitive  माहौल  which instilled  self-reliance   .
He attended and graduated from West Point and  बाद   शादीशुदा  and had  दो   बेटे  .
After World War II ,  आइज़नहावर   परोसा  as Army Chief of Staff under President  हैरी  S. Truman  ,  then assumed the post of President  at  Columbia University .
Eisenhower entered the 1952  अध्यक्षीय  race as a Republican to counter the  non-interventionism  of Senator Robert A.  taft  and  to  crusade against `` Communism , Korea  और  corruption '' .
He  जीती  by a landslide ,  defeating   डेमोक्रेट  Adlai  stevenson  and ending  दो  decades of the New Deal Coalition .
In the first year of his  प्रेसिडेंसी   ,   आइज़नहावर  deposed the leader of  इरान  in the 1953  ईरानी  coup  d'état  and  प्रयुक्त  nuclear threats  to  conclude the  कोरियाई  War with  चीन   .
उसके  New  dekh  policy of  नाभिकीय  deterrence gave priority to inexpensive nuclear weapons while reducing the funding for conventional military forces  ;  the goal was  to  keep pressure on the Soviet Union and  reduce   संघीय   deficits   .
in  1954 , Eisenhower first  articulated  the domino  सिद्धान्त  in his description of the  threat  presented by the spread of communism .
The Congress agreed to his request in 1955 for the Formosa Resolution  ,  which enabled him to prevent Chinese communist aggression against  चाइनीज  nationalists and  स्थापित   the  U.S. policy  of  defending Taiwan .
When the  soviets  launched Sputnik in  1957  ,  he   था  to play catch-up in the  स्पेस  race .
Eisenhower forced Israel , the UK ,  और  France to end their invasion of Egypt during the Suez Crisis  of  1956 .
in  1958 , he sent 15,000 US troops to Lebanon to prevent the pro-Western  सरकारी  from falling to a Nasser -inspired revolution .
Near  the  end  of  his term , his  प्रयत्न   to   नियत  up a summit meeting with the Soviets collapsed because of the U-2 incident .
On the domestic front , he covertly opposed Joseph McCarthy and contributed  to   the   समाप्त  of McCarthyism by  खुलकर  invoking the modern expanded version of executive privilege .
He otherwise left  सबसे  political activity to his Vice  अध्यक्ष  , Richard  निक्सन  .
He was a moderate conservative  जो   जारी  New Deal agencies and expanded Social Security  .
Among his enduring innovations , he launched  the  Interstate Highway System  ;  the Defense Advanced  शोध  Projects  एजेंसी  ( DARPA ) ,  जिससे  led  to   the  internet ,  among  many  invaluable  outputs ; the National Aeronautics and Space Administration ( NASA  )  , driving peaceful discovery in space ; the  स्थापना  of strong science education via the National Defense Education Act ; and encouraging  शांतिपूर्ण  use of nuclear power via amendments  to  the Atomic  उर्जा  Act .
In social policy  ,   he  sent federal  सैनिकों  to Little  चट्टान  , Arkansas , for the  पहला   समय  since  पुनर्निर्माण  to enforce federal  अदालत   आदेश  to desegregate public schools .
He also  हस्ताक्षरित  civil  अधिकारों  legislation in 1957 and 1960 to protect  the   सही  to  vote  .
He implemented desegregation of the armed forces in two years and made  पाँच  appointments to  the  Supreme Court  .
He was  the  first term-limited  अध्यक्ष   in   accordance  with the 22nd  amendment  .
Eisenhower 's two terms  यहूद   शांतिपूर्ण  ones  लिये  the most part and saw considerable economic prosperity except for a sharp recession in 1958–59 .
Eisenhower  is  often ranked highly among the U.S.  राष्ट्रपतियों  .
Air Force One is the  आधिकारिक  air traffic control call  चिह्न  of a United States Air Force aircraft carrying the President of the United States  .
in  common parlance the term refers to those Air Force aircraft specifically  designed  ,  निर्मित  , and used  लिये  the  purpose  of transporting the  अध्यक्ष  .
the  Presidential aircraft is a  prominent  symbol  of  the American presidency and its power .
the  idea of designating specific military aircraft to transport the  अध्यक्ष  arose in 1943 , when officials of the United States Army  एयर  Forces – the predecessor to  the   u.S.  Air Force –  became  concerned with relying on commercial airlines to transport  the  President .
A  c-87  Liberator Express was reconfigured for use as  a  presidential transport ;  however  , it was rejected by the Secret Service amid concerns  over  the aircraft  's  safety record  .
a  C-54 Skymaster was  तब  converted for presidential use ; this aircraft , dubbed the  पवित्र  Cow , transported  अध्यक्ष  Franklin D. Roosevelt to the Yalta Conference  in  February 1945 ,  और  was  subsequently   प्रयुक्त  for another two years by President Harry S. Truman .
the  `` Air Force One '' call  चिह्न  was created after a  1953  incident  दौरान  which a flight carrying President Dwight D. Eisenhower entered the same airspace  as  a commercial airline flight using the same call sign .
अनेक  aircraft have been used as Air Force One since the creation of  the  presidential  बेड़े  ,  सहित  two Boeing 707s  introduced  in  the   1960s  and 1970s , respectively  ;   चूंकि  1990 ,  the   अध्यक्षीय  fleet has consisted of two  बोइंग  VC-25As – specifically configured , highly customized Boeing  747-200b  series  वायुयान   .
The  एयर  Force is looking into replacing the two VC-25 aircraft with three replacement aircraft  शुरूआत  in 2017  .
a  wedding anniversary is the anniversary of the date a  विवाह  took place  .
Traditional names  मौजूद  for  सबसे   of   उन्हें  : for instance  ,  50 years  of  marriage is called a ``  सुनहरी  wedding anniversary '' or simply a  ``  golden anniversary '' .
A scanner with Duplexing Automatic Document Feeder .
In multifunction or all-in-one printers  ,  fax machines  ,  photocopiers and scanners  ,  an automatic document  फीडर  or ADF is  a  feature which  takes  several pages and feeds the paper one page at a time into a scanner or copier , allowing the user  to  scan , and thereby copy  ,  print , or fax  ,  multiple-page  दस्तावेज़   बगैर  having to manually replace each page .
सबसे  copiers allow scanning on  the  flatbed or platen (  the  ``  कांच  ''  )  or through a  दस्तावेज़  feeder .
The vast  बहुमत  of fax machines have an ADF , allowing the unattended sending  of  multi-page faxes .
Due to the ubiquity  of  ADF in fax machines  ,  some fax machine owners use the fax machine as a scanner , faxing multi-page documents to  themselves  .
दस्तावेज़   feeders   हैं  described by speed , in pages per minute or ppm ,  और   क्षमता  , usually in a range from  10  sheets to  200  .
There  हैं  two kinds of  दस्तावेज़  feeders  सक्षम  of two-sided ( duplex )  स्कैनिंग  : a reversing  स्वचालित  document  फीडर  or RADF  scans  one side of a page , then flips it and scans the  अन्य  side .
a  duplexing automatic document feeder or DADF  scans  both sides in one pass .
The advantage of  the  DADF is faster speed for two-sided originals  .
RADFs and DADFs  हैं  rated in images per minute ( IPM  )  , the  क्रमांक  of sides  वे  can  स्कैन  each minute .
Fair Park  is   a  recreational and educational complex located in Dallas , Texas ( USA  )  .
The complex is registered as a Dallas Landmark  ,   नेशनल  Historic Landmark and is home to  नौ  museums , six performance  सुविधाएं  , a lagoon  ,  and  the  largest Ferris wheel in North America .
अनेक  of the  इमारतें   on   the   जटिल  were constructed  लिये  the Texas  centennial   exposition  in 1936  जिससे  drew  over  six million visitors .
Most  of  the buildings built for the exposition still survive and it is  पहचाना  as a significant  उदाहरण   of  Art  डेको  architecture .
Fair Park has been designated a Great Place in America  by  the American Planning Association .
The American Planning  संघ  (  apa  )  “is   an  independent , not-for-profit educational organization that provides leadership in the development of vital communities.”
The Great Places  in  American  कार्यक्रम  helps to celebrate  क्षेत्रों  with “exemplary character , quality ,  और  planning.”
Being designated as  a  Great Place in America  ,  Fair Park was one of only ten  शहरों  chosen in 2011 .
सैन  Jose ( ; Spanish : St. Joseph  )  is  the  third-largest city in  कैलिफ़ोर्निया   ,   the  tenth-largest  in  the  u.S.  , and the county seat of Santa  क्लारा  County which is  स्तिथ  at the southern end of San Francisco  खाड़ी  .
सैन  Jose is the largest city  भीतर  Silicon Valley , which  is  a major component of the greater San  फ्रांसिस्को   खाड़ी   क्षेत्रफल  , a region of 8.4 million people and the fifth largest metropolitan  क्षेत्रफल  ( CSA ) in the United States .
it  is  the  largest city in Northern California .
San Jose was  संस्थापित  on November  29  , 1777 , as  el  Pueblo de San José  de  Guadalupe , the first civilian town in  the  Spanish colony of Nueva California , which later became Alta  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  .
The city served  as  a farming community to support  स्पेनी  military installations at San Francisco and Monterey .
When California gained statehood in 1850 ,  सैन  Jose  परोसा  as its first capital .
After  अधिक  than 150 years as a small farming city ,  सैन  Jose and  the  surrounding Santa Clara  घाटी  became  the  last ( and largest  )  contiguous area of undeveloped land surrounding the San Francisco Bay .
सैन   जोस  experienced increased demand for  आवास  from soldiers and  दिग्गजों  returning from World War  ii  .
San Jose then continued its aggressive expansion during the 1950s and 1960s by annexing more land area .
the  rapid growth  of   the   high-technology   और  electronics industries further  त्वरित  the transition from  an  agricultural center , to an urbanized metropolitan  क्षेत्रफल   .
by   the  1990s , San Jose 's location within the  booming  local technology  उद्योग  earned the city its nickname  ,   पूंजी   of  Silicon  घाटी  .
सैन  Jose now maintains global city  औकात  and  is   the  largest city in the  सैन  Francisco Bay Area in terms of population , land area , and industrial development .
The U.S. Census Bureau reported the population  of  the  नगर   to  be  945,942  as  of  the 2010  जनसांख्यिकी   .
as  of April 2013 , the estimated  जनसांख्यिकी  of San Jose was 984,000 .
San Jose , along with the Santa  क्लारा  Valley  ,  experienced about half a century of spectacular suburban  sprawl  , with characteristics  of  intense  शहरी  similar to the Los Angeles area of Southern California .
The city has  लिया  definite steps to  avoid  becoming  ``  L.A. North '' .
however  , the sprawl in San Jose is worse than in Los  एंजिल्स  by measures such  as   जनसांख्यिकी  density and  पब्लिक  transit safety ,  निवेश  ,  और  ridership  .
Europe depicted by Antwerp cartographer  अब्राहम  Ortelius in 1595
The  इतिहास  of Europe  कवर  the people inhabiting the European  महाद्वीप  since it  थी  first populated in prehistoric times to present , with the  पहला   होमो  sapiens arriving between 45,000 and 25,000 BC .
The  earliest  settlers to Prehistoric Europe  आए  during  the  paleolithic era .
The arrival of agriculture  around  7000 BC ushered in the  पाषाणकालीन   आयु  .
Neolithic Europe lasted for 4000 years , overlapping with  metal-using  cultures that gradually spread  throughout  the continent .
technological   अग्रिम  during the prehistoric age tended to arrive from the Middle East , spreading gradually to the northwest .
कुछ  of the best-known civilizations of prehistoric Europe were Minoan and  माइसीनियाई  , which flourished during the  कांस्य  Age until they collapsed in a  छोटी  period of time around 1200 BC .
The period known as classical  प्राचीनता   began  with the rise of the city-states of Ancient Greece .
Greek influence  पहुँचे   इसके  zenith  अंतर्गत   the  expansive empire of  सिकंदर  the Great , spreading throughout Asia .
Northern and western Europe were dominated  by  the La Tène  संस्कृति  , a  precursor  to the Celts .
Rome , a small city-state traditionally founded in 753 BC  ,  would grow to  become  the Roman Republic in 509 BC and would  सफल  Greek culture as the dominant  भूमध्यसागरीय  civilization .
The  कार्यक्रम  of  the  rule of Julius  सीज़र  led to reorganization of the Republic into the Roman Empire .
The empire was later divided by  the  emperor Diocletian into the Western and Eastern empires .
During the later years of the Roman Empire , the Germanic peoples  of   उत्तरी  Europe  grew  in strength and repeated  हमले  led  to  the  पतन  of the Western Roman Empire in AD 476 , a date  जिससे  traditionally marks  the  end of the classical period and the start of the Middle Ages .
During  the  Middle  आयु   ,  the Eastern Roman  साम्राज्य  survived , though modern historians refer to this state as the  बीज़ान्टिन   साम्राज्य  .
In Western  यूरोपीय  , Germanic peoples moved into positions of power in  the  remnants of the  पूर्व  Western Roman Empire and established kingdoms and empires of their own .
Of all of the  germanic   peoples  , the  franks  would  वृद्धि  to a position of  आधिपत्य   over  western Europe , the Frankish  साम्राज्य  reaching its peak under Charlemagne around AD 800 .
Francia  थी  divided into  अनेक  parts ; West Francia would  evolve  into the Kingdom of France , while East Francia would evolve into  the  Holy  रोमन  Empire , a  precursor  to modern  जर्मनी  .
The British Isles were the site of several large-scale  migrations  .
Native  सेल्टिक  peoples had been marginalized  दौरान  the  काल  of Roman Britain , and  जब  the Romans abandoned the  अंग्रेजों  Isles during the 400s , waves  of  Germanic Anglo-Saxons migrated  to  southern Britain and established a  श्रेणी  of petty  kingdoms   in   कया  would  आखिरकार   develop  into the Kingdom  of  England by AD 927  .
During  इस  period  ,  the  किंगडम  of Poland and Kingdom of Hungary  (  1000–1945 )  यहूद  organized  as  well .
The Viking Age , a period of migrations of Scandinavian  peoples  , dominated the period from the late 700s to  the   मध्य  1000s .
Chief among the  viking  states  थी  the Empire of Cnut the Great , a Danish leader who would become king  of  England  ,  Denmark , and  नार्वे  .
The Normans , a Viking people who  settled  in Northern  फ़्रांस   और   संस्थापित  the  duchy  of Normandy , would  have  a significant impact on  अनेक  parts of Europe , from  the  Norman conquest of England to Southern Italy and Sicily .
Another Scandinavian people , the  rus  '  लोगों  , would go on to found Kievan Rus ' , an  जल्दी  state which was a precursor for the  आधुनिक  country of Russia .
as  the Viking Age drew to a close  ,  the period known as the  क्रूसेड  ,  a  series of religiously-motivated military expeditions originally  intended   to  bring the Levant back into  ईसाई  rule  ,  began .
Several  जेहादी  states were founded in the  पूर्वी  Mediterranean .
These were all short-lived  .
The Crusaders would have a  profound  impact  on  many parts of Europe .
Their Sack of Constantinople  in  1204 brought  an  abrupt end to the Byzantine Empire .
Extinct  श्वान   breeds   is  a compilation of  श्वान  breeds that have become extinct .
Wii Speak  is  a microphone accessory  लिये   निन्टेंडो  's Wii video game console .
Connected  to   the  console via  usb   ,  the device can be placed  निकट   the  video  प्रदर्शक   ,   allowing  voice chat to be  conducted  with the entire room .
The device features an LED to indicate when the microphone  is   क्रियाशील   .
वी  Speak was announced at Nintendo  's  2008 E3 media briefing .
It  थी  released  separately   और  bundled with Animal Crossing : City Folk on November 16  ,  2008 , in  उत्तर  America , and  थी  released on December 5 , 2008  ,   in  Europe .
The  वी  Speak accessory is succeeded by the embedded microphone on the Wii U 's  gamepad  controller .
Nissan Intelligent Key®
a  smart  कुंजी   is  an electronic  अभिगम  and authorization system which is  उपलब्धियाँ  as an option or  मानक  in several  गाड़ियाँ  .
it  was first  विकसित   by   siemens  in the mid-1990s and introduced  by  Mercedes-Benz under  the  name  ``  Keyless Go '' in 1998 on the W220 S-Class following its design patent filed by Daimler-Benz on May 17 , 1997 .
Univisión ( ) is  a  Spanish-language television network in the United States .
the  network is primarily dedicated for Latin American families who reside in the United States  .
It has the  largest  audience of Spanish-language  टेलीविज़न  viewers in the world according to Nielsen ratings  .
Randy Falco , ( CEO as of June 29 , 2011 ) COO , has been in charge of the company  चूंकि  the  प्रस्थान  of Univision Communications president and CEO Joe Uva in April 2010 .
in  recent years the network has  पहुँचे  parity with the U.S.  's  five major English-language television networks , and is often a  दमदार   पांचवां  , outranking The CW , with some  fourth-place  weekly placings , and as of 2012 , even  पहला  place rankings for individual programs  over   सब  five English networks due to  the   संजाल   's  consistent  अनुसूची   of   नई  telenovelas all 52 weeks of the  साल  .
univisión  is headquartered in  नई  York  ,  and  रै  its  प्रमुख  studios , production facilities  ,  and operations in Doral , Florida , a suburb of Miami .
In  2009  , another  टेलीविज़न  studio  थी  announced , Univision  studios   ,  to  be   निर्मित  in  doral  .
Univision  is  available on cable and satellite  in  most of the country , with  लोकल   स्टेशन  in  over  50 markets with large Hispanic and Latino populations and a national  केबल  network feed  वितरित  in markets without  either  the availability or the demand for a locally-based  स्टेशन  .
Most of these  स्टेशन  air full local news and other  लोकल  programming  in  addition to network  shows  , and in major markets  ऐसे  as Los  एंजिल्स  , New York  ,   और  Miami the local  newscasts   carried   by  the network 's  owned-and-operated  station ( O & O )  स्टेशन  are equally competitive  साथ  their English-language counterparts ratings-wise .
Univisión was  acquired  on  कूच  29 , 2007 by  a  consortium  led  by Haim Saban 's  saban  Capital Group (  जो  had previously owned the entity Saban  entertainment  )  ,  TPG  पूंजी  , L.P. , Providence  इक्विटी   साझेदार  ,  मैडिसन  Dearborn Partners , and Thomas H. Lee Partners  लिये  $ 13.7 billion or $ 36.25 per share plus  $  1.4 billion in  acquired   कर्ज़  .
The buyout left the  कम्पनी   साथ  a debt level of twelve times its  सालाना  cash flow ,  जिससे  was  twice  the norm in buyouts done over  the  previous two years .
कलाकार  's conception of a  आदिग्रह  disk
The formation  और  of the  सौर  System is estimated  to  have begun 4.6 billion years  पहले  with the gravitational collapse  of  a small  भाग  of a giant molecular cloud .
Most of the collapsing mass collected  in   the  centre ,  forming   the  Sun , while the  बाकी  flattened into a protoplanetary disk out  of   जिससे  the planets , moons  ,  asteroids , and other small Solar System bodies formed .
This widely accepted model , known as the nebular hypothesis , was  पहला  developed  in  the 18th century by Emanuel Swedenborg , Immanuel  kant   ,  and Pierre-Simon Laplace  .
Its subsequent development  रै  interwoven a variety of scientific disciplines  सहित  astronomy , physics , geology , and planetary science  .
Since  the  dawn of the space age in the 1950s and  the  discovery  of  extrasolar  ग्रह  in the  1990s  , the model  रै  been both challenged and refined to account for new observations .
the  Solar System has evolved considerably since its initial formation .
Many moons have formed from circling discs of gas  और  dust around their parent planets ,  जबकि  other moons are  विचार   to   have  formed independently and later been captured by  उनके  planets  .
Still others ,  as  the Earth 's Moon , may be the result of  दानव  collisions .
टक्करों  between bodies have occurred continually up to the  उपस्थित  day and have been central to the evolution of  the   सौर  System .
The  स्थितियाँ   of   the   ग्रह  often  shifted  , and planets have switched  स्थान  .
इस  planetary migration is now thought to  have   महरूम  responsible for much of the Solar System  's  early evolution .
in  roughly 5 billion years , the Sun will cool and  विस्तार  outward  अनेक  times its current  व्यास  ( becoming a red giant  )   ,  before casting off its outer layers  as  a  ग्रहीय  nebula and  leaving   पीछे  a stellar remnant known as  a  white dwarf .
In  the   दूर  distant future  ,  the gravity of passing stars will gradually reduce the Sun  's  retinue of planets .
कुछ   ग्रह  will be destroyed , others ejected into  अंतरतारकीय  space  .
Ultimately , over the course of tens of billions  of  years , it is likely that  the  Sun will be left with none of the original bodies in  कक्षा   around  it .
The Trial ( Kafka 's  असली  German title : , later as , and )  is  a novel written by Franz  काफ्का  in 1914 and 1915 but not published until 1925 .
One  of   काफ्का  's best-known works , it tells the story of a man arrested  और   prosecuted  by a  रिमोट  , inaccessible authority  ,  with the nature of his crime revealed to neither him nor  the  reader .
Like  काफ्का   's  other novels  ,  The Trial  थी   never  completed ,  हालांकि   it   करता  include a chapter which brings  the  story to an end  .
क्युकी  of this  वहीँ   हैं  certain inconsistencies which exist within the novel , such as disparities in timing  in  addition to  अन्य  discontinuities in  narration   .
बाद  Kafka 's  मौत  in 1924 his friend and literary  executor  Max Brod edited the  टेक्स्ट  for  प्रकाशन  by Verlag Die Schmiede .
The original  पाण्डुलिपि  is held at the Museum of  आधुनिक   साहित्य  , Marbach am Neckar , Germany .
In  1999  , the book was  सूचीबद्ध  in  le  Mondes 100 Books  of  the Century and as  no  . 2 of  the   बेहतरीन  German  novels  of the Twentieth Century .
लिसा  Anne  लोएब  ( born March  11  , 1968 )  is  an American singer-songwriter and  अभिनेत्री  .
She launched her career in 1994 with the song  ,  `` Stay  (  I  छूटी  You  )   ``   ,  which was included  in  the film Reality  bites  .
She was the first  कलाकार   to  have a number one single  in  the United States  जबकि   नहीं  signed to a recording contract  .
Her  पाँच  studio CDs include her major label  डेब्यू  , the gold-selling Tails and its follow-up ,  the  Grammy-nominated , gold-selling Firecracker .
Loeb  रै  also worked in film ,  टेलीविज़न  , voice-over work and children’s recordings .
लोएब  has  appeared  in two television series , Dweezil  &   लिसा  , a weekly  culinary   एडवेंचर  for  the   खाना  Network and Number 1 Single ,  a   वास्तविकता  show on the  e  !
Network in 2006 focused  on  her quest for love , success , career , and  परिवार  .
Her  children  's  म्यूज़िक  includes  the  albums Catch  the   चंद्रमा  (  2003  ) ,  और  Camp Lisa (  2008  )  .
Her first joint children 's  किताब   और   एल्बम  Lisa Loeb 's Silly Sing-Along : The  निराशाजनक  Pancake and Other Zany Songs was published  in  2011  .
in  2010 she  संस्थापित  the Lisa Loeb Eyewear  संग्रहण  , which is based on her own designs .
The Coat of  बाहें   of  the State of New Jersey includes:
a  shield with three plows  emblazoned  , representative of New Jersey 's agricultural  परंपरा  .
A forward-facing knight 's helmet .
A horse 's head as the crest  of  the  हेल्मेट  .
The female  आंकड़े  Liberty and Ceres , representative of the  राज्य  's motto  (  see  अगला   मद  ) .
स्वतंत्रता  is holding a staff  supporting  a  ``  liberty cap  ``   ;  Ceres is holding  an  overflowing cornucopia .
the  streamer at the foot of  the  emblem contains the State Motto of New Jersey  ,  `` Liberty and Prosperity  ''  ,  और  the  साल  of statehood , 1776 .
It was originally designed by Pierre Eugene du Simitiere in 1777 and  थी  modified  थोड़ा  in 1928 .
The seal is the central motif  in  the flag of New Jersey and the  ग्रेट  Seal  of  the State of New Jersey .
the  Coat of  बाहें   contains   a  horse 's head .
A helmet showing that New Jersey governs itself accordingly and three plows on a  शील्ड  referring  to   the  State 's agriculture  परंपरा  , giving it the nickname `` Garden State '' .
The two  देवियाँ  represent  the  State motto , `` Liberty  और  Prosperity ''  .
Liberty is  on  the left  .
She is holding  a  staff with  a  liberty cap on  it  , and the  शब्द  liberty underneath her .
The  देवी   on  the right is Ceres , goddess of agriculture .
She is holding a cornucopia with prosperity written  नीचे  her  .
According to the minutes of the New Jersey General Assembly for March 11 , 1896 , the date in which the Assembly  officially  approved  the  flag as the state emblem , the buff  रंग   is  due indirectly to  जार्ज  Washington ,  जो  had ordered on October 2 ,  1779  , that the uniform coats of  the   नई  Jersey  महाद्वीपीय  Line be dark  (  Jersey )  ब्लू  , with  buff   facings  .
Buff-colored facings had until then  महरूम   सुरक्षित   तभी  for his  अपना  uniform and those of other Continental generals and their  aides  .
Then ,  on  February 28  ,  1780 , the Continental  युद्ध   अधिकारियों   in   फिलाडेल्फिया  directed  कि  the uniform coat facings of all regiments were  to  be  the  same as  the  background color of the  regiments   '  state flag .
The  मुहर  is described in New Jersey statute Title 52 ,  §2-1:
`` We Can Work  it  Out  ''  is  a   सोंग   by  the Beatles , written by Paul McCartney and  जॉन  Lennon  .
It was  released  as a `` double  a-sided   ``   सिंगल  with  ``   दिन   tripper   ``  , the first time both sides of a single were so designated in an initial  रिलीज  .
Both songs were recorded during the Rubber Soul sessions  .
The song  is  an  उदाहरण   of  Lennon–McCartney  सहयोग   at   a  depth that happened only rarely after  वे  wrote the hit  singles  of 1963 .
This song , `` A  दिन  in  the  Life `` ,  ``  Baby , You 're a Rich Man ``  और  ``  i  've Got a Feeling `` , are among  the  notable exceptions .
As a medical diagnosis , pedophilia or  paedophilia  is a psychiatric disorder in persons  16  years  of  age or older typically  characterized  by a  प्राथमिक  or exclusive sexual interest toward prepubescent children ( generally age 11 years or  younger  ,  हालांकि  specific diagnosis criteria  लिये  the disorder extends the cut-off point for prepubescence to age 13 ) .
An adolescent  जो   is  16 years of age  or  older must be  at  least five years  पुरानी  than the prepubescent child before the attraction can  be  diagnosed as  pedophilia  .
The term has  a  range of definitions , as found in  psychiatry  , psychology ,  the   देशी  , and  विधि  enforcement .
the  International Classification of Diseases  (  ICD ) defines pedophilia as  a  `` disorder of adult personality and behaviour '' in which there is a  यौन  preference for children of prepubertal or early pubertal age .
According to the  निदान  and Statistical Manual of Mental Disorders (  dsm  ) , it is a paraphilia in  जिससे  adults or adolescents 16 years  of  age or  पुरानी   have  intense and recurrent sexual urges  towards  and fantasies  परिचय   prepubescent  children that they have either  acted   on  or which cause  उन्हें  distress or interpersonal difficulty .
In popular usage , pedophilia means  कोई  sexual interest in children  or  the act of child sexual abuse , often termed `` pedophilic behavior '' .
For example ,  the  American Heritage Stedman 's Medical Dictionary states ,  ``   pedophilia  is the act  or  fantasy on the  भाग  of  an  adult of engaging  in  sexual activity  साथ  a child  or   children  . ''
This common use application also extends  to  the sexual  ब्याज  in and sexual contact with pubescent or  post-pubescent  minors .
Researchers recommend that these imprecise uses be avoided because although people who  कमिट  child sexual abuse commonly exhibit  the  disorder  ,  some offenders do not meet the clinical  निदान  standards  लिये  pedophilia and these standards  pertain   to  prepubescents  .
Additionally , not all pedophiles  दरअसल  commit such abuse .
Pedophilia  थी  first formally recognized and  नामित  in the late 19th century .
A significant  राशि  of research in  the   क्षेत्रफल  has taken place since the 1980s  .
Although mostly documented in men , there are  भी  women who  प्रदर्शनी  the disorder , and researchers assume available  estimates   underrepresent  the true number of female  pedophiles  .
No cure for pedophilia  रै  been developed ,  लकिन  there are therapies that  can  reduce  the  incidence  of  a person  committing   चाइल्ड  sexual abuse .
In the United States ,  following  Kansas v. Hendricks  ,   sex  offenders who are  diagnosed  with certain mental disorders  ,  particularly  pedophilia   ,  can be subject to indefinite civil commitment , under various state laws ( generically called SVP laws ) and the  संघीय  Adam Walsh Child Protection and Safety Act of 2006 .
At present , the  सटीक  causes of pedophilia have not  महरूम  conclusively established  .
Research suggests  कि  pedophilia may be correlated with  अनेक  different neurological abnormalities , and often  co-exists  with other personality disorders and psychological pathologies  .
In the contexts of forensic psychology  और  law enforcement , a variety of  typologies  have  महरूम  suggested to  categorize  pedophiles according to  बर्ताव  and motivations  .
Julio César  chávez  ( born Julio  césar  Chávez González on July 12 , 1962  )   is  a retired Mexican professional boxer .
Chávez is considered by many people for their sport statistics the greatest fighter  कभी  to come out  of  Mexico .
He  is  a six-time world champion in three  वज़न   विभाजन  , and for several  सालो  he was considered one of the best pound-for-pound boxer in the world .
in  a career  कि  spanned over  25  years  ,   chávez  won  पाँच  world titles  in  three weight divisions : WBC Super Featherweight in 1984 , WBA Lightweight  in   1987  , WBC Lightweight in 1988 , WBC Light  welterweight  in 1989 , IBF  लाइट   welterweight   in  1990  ,  and WBC Light Welterweight in  1994  .
He holds records for most successful consecutive defenses of world titles ( 27 ) , most  शीर्षक  fights (  37  ) , most title-fight victories ( 31 ) and he is after  जो  Louis with ( 23  )  for most title defenses won by  नॉकआउट  ( 21 ) .
Chávez also has the longest undefeated streak  in   मुक्केबाज़ी  history , 13 years .
His  रिकार्ड  was 89-0-1  going  into his first loss to  फ्रेंकी  Randall and had an 87 fight win streak until his ``  चित्रण  '' with  whitaker  .
Julio César Chávez was  ज्ञात   लिये  his outstanding punching  शक्ति  , devastating body  आक्रमण  , remarkably strong chin and the relentless stalking  of  his opponents .
He ranks #  24  on ESPN 's 50 Greatest Boxers  of   सब  Time .
On December 7 ,  2010   ,  he  थी   inducted   in  the prestigious International Boxing Hall of Fame for the Class of 2011 .
he  is the father  of  prospect  ओमर  Chávez and former WBC Middleweight Champion Julio César Chávez , Jr .

To be sent to the right meant slave labor  ;  to the left  ,   the  gas chamber .

The  holocaust  ( from the Greek ' : hólos ,  ``  whole '' and  kaustós  , `` burnt '' ) also  ज्ञात  as the Shoah ( Hebrew  :  ,  hashoah  , `` catastrophe '' ;  यहूदी  :  ,  Churben or  hurban   ,   इससे  the Hebrew for `` destruction  ''   )  , was the  द्रव्यमान  murder or genocide  of   लगभग  six million Jews  दौरान  World War II , a programme of  व्यवस्थित   state-sponsored  murder by Nazi Germany , led by Adolf Hitler and the Nazi Party , throughout German-occupied territory .
of  the  नौ  million  यहूदियों  who had resided in Europe  पहले  the Holocaust , approximately two-thirds were killed  .
Over one  लाख  Jewish children  यहूद   मारे  in the Holocaust ,  as  were  लगभग  two million Jewish women  और  three million  यहूदी  men .
a  network of over 40,000 facilities in Germany and German-occupied territory were used to concentrate ,  थाम  , and kill Jews and other victims .
Some scholars argue that the mass murder of  the  Romani and  लोगों  with disabilities should be  शामिल  in the definition , and  कुछ  use  the  common  संज्ञा  ``  holocaust  '' to describe  अन्य  Nazi mass murders , including those of Soviet prisoners of war ,  पॉलिश  and  सोवियत  civilians  ,  and homosexuals .
Recent estimates based  on  figures obtained since the fall of the Soviet Union  indicates  some ten to eleven million  नागरिकों   और  prisoners of war  यहूद  intentionally murdered by  the  Nazi regime .
The persecution  और   नरसंहार  were carried out in stages .
विभिन्न  laws  to  remove  the  Jews from civil society , most prominently  the  Nuremberg Laws  ,  were enacted in Germany years before  the  outbreak  of   संसार  War II .
Concentration camps  यहूद  established in which inmates  यहूद  subjected to slave  मजदूर   जबतक  they died of exhaustion or  बीमारी  .
Where  जर्मनी   conquered   नई  territory in eastern  यूरोपीय   ,  specialized units  पुकारा  Einsatzgruppen murdered Jews and political opponents in mass shootings  .
The occupiers  जरूरी  Jews and Romani to be confined in  overcrowded  ghettos before being transported by freight  ट्रैन  to extermination camps where , if they survived the journey , most  यहूद  systematically killed in gas chambers .
Every arm of Germany 's bureaucracy  थी  involved in the logistics that  led  to the genocides ,  turning  the Third Reich into what one Holocaust scholar has  पुकारा  ``  a  genocidal state  ''  .
4-h  in the United  राज्य  is a youth organization administered by  the   नेशनल  Institute  of  Food and Agriculture of the  संयुक्त  States  विभाग  of Agriculture ( USDA ) , with  the  mission of `` engaging youth to reach their  fullest  potential while advancing the field of youth  विकास  .  ''
The name represents  चार  personal  विकास  areas of focus for the organization : head , heart , hands , and health .
The organization has over 6.5 million members  in  the United  राज्य   ,   इससे  ages five  to  twenty-one , in  लगभग  90,000 clubs .
the  goal of  4-h   is  to develop citizenship  ,  leadership , responsibility and life skills of youth  through  experiential learning programs and a positive youth development approach .
Though typically  विचार  of as an agriculturally focused organization as a  परिणाम  of its history , 4-H today focuses on citizenship , healthy living  ,   विज्ञान  , engineering , and  प्रौद्योगिकी  programs .
Today , 4-H  और  related programs exist in over  अस्सी   देशों   around  the world ; the organization and administration varies  इससे  country  to  country  .
Each of these programs operates independently  ,  but  cooperatively  through international  exchanges   ,  global education programs ,  और  communications .
The 4-H motto  is  `` To make the best better '' , while its slogan  is  `` Learn by  doing  '' (  sometimes  written as `` Learn  to   do  by  doing  '' ) .
The national flag of Chile  ,  consists  of   दो  unequal  आड़ा   bands  of white and red and  a   ब्लू   वर्गाकार  the same height  as  the white band  in  the canton  ,  which bears  a  white five-pointed star in the center  .
It was adopted on 18  अक्तूबर   1817   .
The Chilean flag  is  also  ज्ञात  in  स्पेनी  as  la  Estrella Solitaria ( The Lone Star ) .
The star represents a guide to progress  और  honor ;  ब्लू  symbolizes  the   आसमान  and the Pacific Ocean , white is for the snow-covered Andes ,  और  red stands for the  रक्त  spilled to achieve independence .
According to the  एपिक  poem La Araucana  ,  the colors were derived from those from the flag flown by the Mapuche during the  arauco  War  .
`` Flag Day ''  is  held each year  on  the ninth of July to commemorate the 77 soldiers who  died  in  the  1882 Battle  of  La Concepción .
Generation  y  , also known as the Millennial Generation  ,  is the demographic cohort following Generation  x  .
There are  no  precise dates for  जब   पीढी  Y starts and  ends  .
टीकाकारों  use beginning birth dates from the latter 1970s ,  or   इससे  the early  1980s  to  the  early  2000s  .
The Torches  of  Nero , by Henryk Siemiradzki .
according  to  tacitus  ,  नीरो  targeted Christians as  those   जिम्मेदार  for  the  fire .
the  Great Fire of  रोम  (  )  was an  शहरी   आग  that occurred  शुरूआत  19 July AD 64  .
Virginia  (  ) , officially the  राष्ट्रमंडल  of Virginia , is a U.S.  राज्य   स्तिथ  in  the  South Atlantic region of the  संयुक्त  States .
Virginia is nicknamed the `` Old Dominion '' and the `` Mother of  राष्ट्रपतियों  ''  बाद   the  eight U.S. presidents born there .
The geography and climate of the Commonwealth are shaped by  the   ब्लू  Ridge Mountains and the Chesapeake Bay , which provide habitat for  much   of  its flora and fauna .
the  capital of the Commonwealth is Richmond ; and  वर्जिनिया  Beach is the  सबसे  populous city .
Fairfax County is the most populous political subdivision .
the  wealthiest  is  Loudoun County .
The  राष्ट्रमंडल  's population is over eight million .
The area  's  history begins with several indigenous groups , including the  powhatan  .
In 1607 the London Company established the Colony of  वर्जिनिया  as the first permanent  नई  World English colony .
Slave labor and the land  acquired  from  विस्थापित   देशी  American tribes each  निभाई  a significant role in the colony 's early  राजनीती  and plantation economy .
Virginia  थी  one of  the  13  colonies   in   the  American Revolution  और  joined the Confederacy in the American Civil War ,  दौरान  which  रिचमंड   थी  made the Confederate  पूंजी  and Virginia  's  northwestern counties seceded to form the  राज्य  of  वेस्ट  Virginia  .
हालांकि   the  Commonwealth was under conservative single-party rule for  nearly  a century following Reconstruction  ,   दोनो   प्रमुख  national  पार्टियों  are competitive in  आधुनिक  Virginia .
The Virginia General Assembly is  the   oldest  legislature in  the  Western Hemisphere .
The state government  रै  been repeatedly ranked most effective by the Pew Center on the  राज्य  .
It is unique  in  how it treats cities  और  counties equally ,  manages  local roads , and prohibits its  राज्यपालों  from serving  लगातार  terms .
Virginia 's economy has many sectors  :  agriculture in the Shenandoah  घाटी  ; federal agencies  in  Northern  वर्जिनिया   ,  including the headquarters of  the  Department of Defense and CIA ; and military facilities  in  Hampton Roads , the site of the region 's main  seaport  .
Virginia 's public schools and many colleges and universities have contributed to growing media and technology sectors .
As a result , computer chips  have  become  the  state  's  leading export .
Windows Movie Maker  (  formerly known as Windows Live Movie Maker , codenamed Sundance ) is a freeware video editing software by Microsoft .
It is a part of Windows Essentials software suite and offers the ability to create and edit  वीडियो  as well  as  to publish them on  skydrive  , Facebook  ,  YouTube  ,  and Flickr  .
`` Brenda 's  मिला  A Baby '' is the solo debut  सिंगल   by  Tupac Shakur , and tenth track  इससे  his debut album  ,  2Pacalypse  अभी   .
The  सोंग   ,   जिससे  features R & B singer Dave Hollister ,  is  about a twelve year-old girl named Brenda who  जीवनदान   in  a  ghetto  , has a baby , and is incapable of supporting it .
The  सोंग   explores  the issue  of  teen pregnancy and its effect on the young mothers and their families .
Like many of Shakur 's songs , `` Brenda 's Got a baby  ''  draws from the plight of the impoverished .
Using Brenda to represent young mothers  in   सामान्य  , Shakur criticises the low level of support from the  baby   's   पिता  , the government , and society in general  .
Shakur wrote  the   सोंग  when he read a newspaper article about a twelve-year-old girl who got  गर्भवती  from her cousin and ,  क्युकी  she did not want her  अभिभावक  to  जान  about the baby , threw it in a  कचरा   can  .
The official logo of Pokémon for its international  रिलीज  ;  ``  Pokémon  ''  is short for the original  जापानी   शीर्षक   of  ``  जेब  Monsters  ''   .
is a media  मताधिकार  published and owned by Japanese video game  कम्पनी  Nintendo and created by  सातोशी  Tajiri in 1996 .
Originally released as  a  pair of interlinkable  खेल   लड़के  role-playing  वीडियो  games developed by  खेल  Freak , Pokémon has since become the second-most successful and  lucrative   वीडियो   game-based  media franchise in the world ,  पीछे  only Nintendo 's own  मारियो  franchise .
Pokémon properties have since been merchandised into anime , manga ,  व्यापार   ताश  , toys ,  किताबे  ,  और   अन्य  media .
The franchise  मनाये  in 2006  ,   और  , cumulative sales of the video  खेल  ( including home  कंसोल  versions , such  as  the ``  pikachu  '' Nintendo 64  )  have  पहुँचे  more than 200 million copies .
In November 2005 , 4Kids  entertainment  , which had  प्रबंधित  the non-game  सम्बन्धित  licensing of  पोकीमॉन  , announced that it  था  agreed not to renew the  पोकीमॉन  representation agreement .
Pokémon USA Inc. ( now The Pokémon Company  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  ) , a  subsidiary   of  Japan 's Pokémon Co. , now oversees all Pokémon licensing outside  of   एशिया   .
The name Pokémon is the romanized contraction of the  जापानी  brand .
The term  पोकीमॉन  , in addition to referring  to   the   पोकीमॉन  franchise itself , also collectively refers to  the  649  fictional  species that have made appearances in Pokémon media as  of  the  रिलीज  of the fifth generation titles Pokémon Black  2  and White  2  ; with the upcoming releases of  पोकीमॉन  X and Y ,  6  new Pokémon have  महरूम  featured in promotions for the  खेल  .
`` Pokémon ''  is  identical in both the singular  और  plural , as is each individual species name ; it is grammatically correct to  कह  `` one Pokémon ''  और  `` many Pokémon '' ,  as  well as  ``  one Pikachu `` and `` many Pikachu '' .
Cover  of   the  first  संस्करण  of the publication Dada  by   ट्रिस्टन  Tzara ; Zurich , 1917
Dada  (  ) or Dadaism  थी  an art movement of the European avant-garde in the  जल्दी  20th century  .
अनेक  claim Dada began in Zurich  ,  Switzerland in  1916  ,  spreading  to Berlin shortly thereafter but the height of  नई  York Dada  थी   the  year  पहले  in 1915 .
to  quote Dona Budd 's The Language of Art Knowledge , Dada was born out of negative reaction to the horrors of  संसार   युद्ध  I .
This  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  movement was begun by a group  of  artist and poets associated  साथ  the Cabaret Voltaire in Zurich  .
Dada rejected reason and logic ,  prizing   बकवास  , irrationality and intuition .
the   उत्पत्ति  of the  नाम  Dada is unclear ; some believe that it is a  nonsensical  word .
Others maintain that it  originates  from the  रोमानियाई  artists Tristan  tzara  and Marcel Janco 's frequent use  of  the words  da  ,  da  , meaning yes ,  यस  in the Romanian language  .
Another  सिद्धान्त  says that the name `` Dada  ''  came during a meeting of the group  जब  a paper  चाकू  stuck  into  a French-German dictionary happened  to  point to  'डैडa   '  , a French word for 'hobbyhorse  '  .
The movement primarily involved visual arts  ,  literature , poetry  ,  art manifestoes  ,  art theory  ,  theatre , and graphic  डिज़ाइन   ,   और  concentrated its anti-war  राजनीती  through a rejection of the prevailing standards in art through anti-art cultural works .
In addition to being anti-war ,  दादा  was also anti-  बुर्जुआ  and had  राजनैतिक  affinities with  the  radical left .
दादा   क्रियाएँ   शामिल  public gatherings , demonstrations , and publication of  art/literary  journals ; passionate coverage of art  ,  politics ,  और   संस्कृति  were topics often discussed in a variety of media .
Key figures in the movement included Hugo Ball ,  एमी   hennings  , Hans Arp , Raoul  hausmann   ,   हन्ना  Höch  ,   योहानेस  Baader , Tristan Tzara , Francis Picabia , Richard Huelsenbeck , Georg  grosz   ,  John Heartfield , Marcel  duchamp  , Beatrice Wood , Kurt Schwitters , and Hans  रिक्टर  , among others  .
The movement influenced later  शैलियाँ   जैसे  the avant-garde and downtown music movements , and groups including surrealism  ,  Nouveau réalisme , pop  आर्ट   और  Fluxus .
Dada is the groundwork  to  abstract  आर्ट  and  ध्वनि  poetry , a starting point  लिये  performance  आर्ट  , a prelude to postmodernism , an influence on pop art , a celebration of antiart to be later embraced for anarcho-political uses in the 1960s and the  गति  that  lay  the foundation  लिये  Surrealism .
First trophic level .
the  plants in this image , and the algae and phytoplankton  in   the   झील  ,  हैं  primary producers .
They  लो  nutrients from the soil or the water  ,  and manufacture their own food by photosynthesis , using energy from the  सूर्य   .
the  trophic level of an  सजीव  is  the  position it occupies in a food  कड़ी  .
the  word trophic derives from the Greek τροφή ( trophē  )   referring  to food  or  feeding  .
A  खाना  chain represents  a   उत्तराधिकार   of  organisms that  खा   another  organism and are , in turn , eaten  themselves  .
The number of steps an organism is  इससे  the start of the  कड़ी  is a  माप  of its trophic level .
Food chains start at trophic  स्तर  1 with primary producers such as  पौधे   ,  move to  herbivores  at level 2  ,  predators at level 3 and  typically   समाप्त  with carnivores or apex predators at level 4 or  5  .
The  पाथ  along the chain  can   रूप  either a  one-way  flow , or  a  food `` web . ''
Ecological communities with higher biodiversity  रूप  more complex trophic paths .
Four of the most important domesticated silk moths .
Top  to  bottom :  bombyx  mori ,  hyalophora   cecropia  ,  antheraea  pernyi  ,  Samia cynthia .
From Meyers Konversations-Lexikon ( 1885-1892  )
a   silk-producing  raspy cricket  .
Silk is  a  natural protein  fibre  , some forms of which can be  woven   into  textiles .
the   प्रोटीन  fibre  of  silk  is   रचित  mainly of fibroin and produced by  निश्चित   कीट  larvae  to  form cocoons .
The best-known type of silk is obtained from the cocoons of the larvae of the mulberry  silkworm  Bombyx  mori  reared  in  captivity ( sericulture  )  .
the   shimmering  appearance of silk is due  to  the triangular prism -like structure of  the  silk fibre , which allows silk cloth to refract  आवक   लाइट   at  different angles ,  यूँ  producing different  रंगों  .
Silks are  उत्पादित  by  अनेक  other  कीट   ,  but generally  तभी  the silk of moth caterpillars has  महरूम  used  लिये   वस्त्र  manufacturing .
There has  महरूम  some research into other silks , which differ at the  आणविक  level .
Many  silks  are mainly produced by the larvae of insects undergoing complete  metamorphosis  , but  कुछ  adult  कीट  such as webspinners produce silk , and some insects such as raspy crickets produce silk throughout  उनके  lives .
रेशा  production also occurs in Hymenoptera ( bees , wasps , and  चींटियों  ) , silverfish , mayflies , thrips  ,  leafhoppers , beetles , lacewings ,  fleas  , flies  और  midges .
Other  प्रकार  of arthropod produce silk , most notably various arachnids such as spiders  (  see spider silk ) .
Late Show  साथ   दाउद  Letterman is an American late-night talk show hosted by David Letterman on  सीबीएस  .
The show debuted on August  30  ,  1993  , and is produced by Letterman 's production  कम्पनी  , Worldwide  पैंट  Incorporated .
The show 's music director and band-leader  of   the  house  बैंड   ,  the CBS Orchestra , is Paul  shaffer  .
The  सिर  writer is Matt Roberts and the  उद्घोषक  is Alan Kalter .
Of  the  major U.S. late-night programs , Late Show ranks second in cumulative  औसत  viewers  over  time and third in number  of  episodes  over  time .
The show leads other  लेट  night shows in ad revenue with $ 271 million  in  2009 .
In most U.S. markets the show airs at 11:35 p.m. Eastern/Pacific time , but is recorded Monday through Wednesday at 4:30 p.m. , and Thursdays at 3:30 p.m and 6:00 p.m .
the   दूसरी  Thursday episode usually airs on  शुक्रवार  of that week .
In 2002 , Late  दिखाएँ   साथ  David Letterman was ranked No . 7  on  TV Guide 's 50  महानतम  TV Shows of  सब  Time  .
CBS  रै   a   अनुबंध   साथ  Worldwide Pants to continue the show through 2014 ; by then , Letterman will surpass  जॉनी  Carson as the longest tenured late-night talk show host .
the  Real Housewives of Orange County is an American reality  वृत्तचित्र  television program on Bravo ,  नियत  in Orange  काउंटी   ,   कैलिफ़ोर्निया  .
it  was  the  first  the  Real Housewives program in the series .
The series  is  a voyeuristic look into the wealthy lives of these housewives , as they shop  ,  get plastic surgery , gossip , fight and live lavishly  .
The financial crisis ,  the  beginning  of  which coincided almost exactly with the first season 's  ब्रॉडकास्ट   ,   रै  since trimmed the housewives ' lifestyles with  जॉब  losses , evictions ,  बंधक   मूलभूत  , foreclosures , and marital stress—all recorded in  प्रगतिशील  seasons of the show .
Cyberstalking is the use of the Internet  or  other electronic means to stalk or harass an individual , a group of  individuals   ,  or an organization .
It may include the making of false accusations or statements  of  fact ( as  in  defamation )  ,   निगरानी  ,  बनाना  threats , identity theft , damage to data  or  equipment ,  the  solicitation of  नाबालिग  for sex , or gathering information that may be  प्रयुक्त  to harass  .
The  परिभाषा   of  `` harassment '' must meet  the  criterion that a reasonable person ,  in  possession of the same information  ,  would regard it as sufficient to  कारण  another reasonable person  तकलीफ  .
Cyberstalking is  अलग  from spatial or offline stalking in that  it  occurs through  the  use of  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक   संचार  technology such as the internet .
however   ,  it sometimes leads  to  it , or is accompanied  by  it .
Both are criminal offenses .
Cyberstalking shares important  विशेषताएँ   साथ  offline stalking .
Many stalkers  –   ऑनलाइन  or off –  हैं  motivated by  a   ख्वाहिश   to  control their victims .
A  cyberstalker   may  be an online stranger or  a  person whom the target knows .
a  cyberstalker  may  be anonymous and may solicit involvement  of  other people online who do not even know the target .
Cyberstalking is a criminal offense that comes into play under state anti-stalking  कानून  , slander  कानून  ,  और  harassment laws .
A  cyberstalking  conviction can result in a  restraining  order  ,  probation  ,  or even criminal penalties against  the  assailant , including jail .
A business letter is  प्रायः  used when  लिखने   इससे  one company to another ,  or  for correspondence  between  such organizations and their customers  ,  clients and  अन्य  external parties .
The overall  स्टाइल  of letter  होगा  depend on the  संबंध  between the parties concerned .
There  हैं  many reasons to  लिखें  a business letter  .
it   could  be to request  सीधा  information  or   कार्रवाई  from another party , to order supplies from a  प्रदायक  , to  पहचानो  a  गलती  that was  वचनबद्ध   ,   to  reply directly to a request  ,   to  apologize for a wrong or simply to convey goodwill .
Even today ,  the  business letter is still  बहुत  useful  क्युकी  it produces  a  permanent record  ,  is confidential ,  औपचारिक  and delivers persuasive , well-considered messages .
Tilapia ( ) is the common name for nearly a hundred species of  cichlid  fish from  the  tilapiine  cichlid   जनजाति  .
Tilapia are mainly  freshwater   मछली  , inhabiting  उथले  streams , ponds , rivers and  झीलों  , and less commonly found living in brackish  जल  .
Historically , they have  महरूम  of major importance  in  artisan fishing in Africa and the Levant ,  और  are of increasing importance  in  aquaculture .
tilapia  can  become  problematic invasive  प्रजाति  in new warm-water habitats , whether deliberately or accidentally  introduced  , but generally not in  शीतोष्ण  climates due to their inability to survive in cooler waters below  परिचय  .
Turner & Hooch  is  a  1989  comedy drama crime film starring Tom  हैंक्स   और   beasley  the Dog  as  the eponymous characters ,  टर्नर  and Hooch respectively .
The film also stars Mare  winningham  , Craig T. Nelson ,  और  Reginald VelJohnson .
it  was directed by Roger Spottiswoode ; the film was originally slated to be  निर्देशित  by Henry  winkler  ,  लकिन  he was terminated due to `` creative differences '' .
It  थी  co-written by Michael Blodgett from  परे  the Valley  of  the Dolls fame .
Although K-9 ( with  जेम्स  Belushi ) was released prior to this film ( exactly three  महीने  earlier )  ,  Turner & Hooch became  अधिक   लोकप्रिय  and seemingly overshadowed its greater success ,  भी  though K-9 had a  बहुत  similar plot .
A pilot for  a   टर्नर  & Hooch TV series was made and ran as  a  part of  the  Magical World of  डिज़्नी  .

Adolf Hitler (  ;  20  अप्रैल  1889 – 30 April 1945 ) was an Austrian  -born  German politician  और  the leader of  the  Nazi  पार्टी  ( ( NSDAP ) ; National Socialist German Workers Party  )  .
He was  चांसलर  of Germany from 1933 to 1945  और  dictator of Nazi Germany (  as  Führer und Reichskanzler  )   इससे  1934 to 1945 .
Hitler  थी  at the centre of Nazi  जर्मनी  , World War II  in  Europe  ,  and the Holocaust .
Hitler was a decorated  दिग्गज  of World  युद्ध   i  .
He joined  the  German Workers ' Party (  precursor  of  the  NSDAP  )  in 1919  ,  and became  नेता  of the NSDAP in 1921 .
In 1923 , he attempted a coup d'état in Munich , known as  the  Beer Hall Putsch .
The failed  तख्तापलट  resulted in Hitler 's imprisonment ,  दौरान  which  समय   he  wrote his memoir , Mein Kampf ( My Struggle  )  .
After  उसके  release in 1924 , Hitler  gained   लोकप्रिय  support  by  attacking the Treaty  of  Versailles and  promoting  Pan-Germanism , antisemitism , and anti-communism with charismatic oratory and Nazi propaganda .
After  उसके  appointment as chancellor in 1933 , he  रूपांतरित  the Weimar Republic into the  तीसरा  Reich , a  single-party  dictatorship based  on  the totalitarian and  निरंकुश  ideology of Nazism .
Hitler 's aim was to  स्थापित   a  New Order of absolute Nazi German hegemony in continental Europe .
to   इस  end , his foreign  और  domestic policies had the aim of  seizing  Lebensraum ( `` living space '' ) for  the  Germanic people .
He directed the rearmament of Germany and the invasion of Poland  by  the  wehrmacht   in   सितंबर   1939  , resulting in  the  outbreak of  संसार  War II in Europe  .
अंतर्गत  Hitler 's rule , in 1941 German forces and their European allies occupied most of  यूरोपीय  and North Africa .
In 1943 , Germany had been forced onto the defensive  और  suffered a series of escalating defeats .
In  the  final days of the war  ,  during the  बैटल  of Berlin in 1945 , Hitler married his long-time  संगी   ,  Eva Braun .
On 30 April 1945 , less than two days  बाद  , the two committed suicide to avoid capture  by  the Red  फौज  , and their corpses were burned .
Hitler 's aggressive foreign policy is  माना   the  main cause of the  outbreak  of World War II in  यूरोपीय   .
His antisemitic  नीतियों   और  racially motivated ideology resulted  in  the deaths of at least 5.5 million Jews  ,  and  लाखो  of other people deemed racially inferior .
