A domain name is an identification string  कि  defines a realm  of  administrative autonomy , authority , or  कंट्रोल   on  the Internet .
Domain  names  are formed by the rules and  प्रक्रियाओं  of  the  Domain Name System ( DNS )  .
Technically ,  कोई  name registered in the DNS is  a  domain name .
Domain names are used in various  नेटवर्किंग  contexts  और  application-specific  नामकरण  and addressing  उद्देश्य  .
In general , a domain name represents  an  Internet Protocol  (   ip  ) resource ,  ऐसे  as  a  personal computer used to access the  अंतरजाल  , a server computer hosting  a  web site , or the web site itself  or  any other service communicated  via  the Internet .
Domain names are organized  in  subordinate levels  (  subdomains )  of  the DNS  रूट  domain , which is nameless .
The first-level set  of  domain names are the top-level domains ( TLDs ) , including  the  generic top-level  डोमेन   (   gtlds  )  ,  such as the prominent domains com ,  सूचना   ,  net and org , and the country code top-level domains  (  ccTLDs ) .
Below these  top-level  domains in  the  DNS hierarchy are the second-level and third-level domain names that are typically open for reservation by end-users who wish  to  connect local area  संजाल  to the  अंतरजाल  , create other publicly accessible Internet  संसाधन   or  run web sites .
The registration  of   ये   डोमेन  names is usually administered  by  domain name registrars who sell their services to the public .
A fully qualified  डोमेन   नाम  (  fqdn  ) is a  डोमेन  name that is completely specified in the hierarchy  of  the  डीएनएस  , having no omitted parts .
Domain names are usually written in lowercase ,  हालांकि  labels in  the  Domain  नाम  System are  case-insensitive  .
Nitrate is a polyatomic ion with the  आणविक   सूत्र  NO3− and a molecular mass of  62.0049   g/mol  . Nitrates  भी  describe the  सशुल्क  functional  समूह  RONO2 .
These nitrate esters are  a  specialized class of explosives  .
A wheat  कटाई  in Idaho
इस   फ़ोटो   इससे  a 1921 encyclopedia shows a  ट्रैक्टर  ploughing  a  crop field .
Agriculture  is  a major industry in  the  United States and  the  country  is  a  जाल  exporter of food .
As of the last census of agriculture in 2007 , there were 2.2 million farms , covering an area of , an average of per  फार्म  .
Although agricultural activity occurs  in  most states , it is particularly concentrated  in  the  विशाल  expanse of flat ,  arable  land  ज्ञात  as the Great Plains , which encompasses the central region of  the  nation .
The Mpemba effect  ,   नामित   बाद  Tanzanian student  erasto  Mpemba , is the assertion that warmer water  can  freeze  तेज़  than colder water .
Although there is anecdotal support for the effect , there is no agreement on exactly  कया   the  effect is and under  कया  circumstances it occurs  .
There have been reports of similar phenomena since  प्राचीन  times , although  साथ  insufficient detail for the claims to be replicated .
The phenomenon seems  contrary  to thermodynamics , but a number of possible explanations for  the  effect have been proposed .
further  investigations will need  to  decide  on  a precise definition of ``  जमने  '' and control a vast number of starting parameters in order  to  confirm or explain the effect .
The  siamese  ( ,  )  is  एक  of the  पहला   distinctly  recognized breeds of  प्राच्य  cat  .
The breed originated in Thailand ( formerly known as Siam  )   ,   जहाँ  they are one of several native breeds  और  are called Wichian Mat ( วิเชียรมาศ , a name meaning `` moon diamond ''  )  .
In the 20th century the Siamese  बिल्ली  became  एक  of the most  लोकप्रिय  breeds in Europe and  उत्तर  America .
Quality Food Centers ( QFC ) is a supermarket chain based in Bellevue ,  वॉशिंगटन  , with 64 stores in the Puget  ध्वनि  region  of   वॉशिंगटन  state and in the Portland , Oregon metropolitan area .
in  economics , the money supply  or  money stock  ,  is the total amount of  मौद्रिक  assets  उपलब्धियाँ   in   an  economy  at  a specific time .
वहीँ   हैं  several ways  to  define `` money , '' but  मानक  measures usually include currency  in  circulation and  माँग   जमा  ( depositors  '   easily  accessed  एसेट  on  the  books of financial institutions ) .
Money supply data  हैं  recorded and  प्रकाशित  , usually by the  सरकारी  or the central  बैंको  of the country .
पब्लिक  and private sector analysts have  long  monitored changes in  धन  supply because of its  प्रभाव   on  the price level  ,  inflation , the exchange rate and  the  business cycle .
कि   संबंध  between money  और  prices is historically associated  साथ   the  quantity theory of money  .
There is strong  अनुभवजन्य  evidence of a direct relation between money-supply growth and long-term price inflation , at least for rapid increases  in  the amount of  धन  in  the  economy .
That is ,  a  country such as Zimbabwe  जिससे  saw rapid increases in its money supply also saw rapid  increases  in prices ( hyperinflation ) .
This  is  one reason for the reliance on  मौद्रिक  policy as a means of controlling  महंगाई  .
The nature of this  causal  chain  is  the subject of contention .
Some heterodox economists argue that the money supply is  endogenous  (  संकल्पित  by the workings of the economy  ,  not by the central bank ) and that the sources of  महंगाई  must be found in the distributional structure  of  the  अर्थव्यवस्था  .
In addition ,  those  economists seeing the  सेंट्रल  bank 's  कंट्रोल  over the money  सप्लाई  as feeble say that there are  दो  weak links between the growth of the money supply  और  the inflation  रेट   .
First , in the aftermath of a  मंदी  ,  जब  many resources are underutilized ,  an  increase in the money supply  can  cause  a  sustained increase in real production instead of inflation .
Second , if the velocity of money , i.e.  ,  the  अनुपात   between  nominal GDP and money supply  ,  changes , an  बढ़ाएँ   in  the money supply could have either no effect , an exaggerated effect ,  or  an unpredictable  प्रभाव  on the growth of nominal GDP  .
Logo for IMAX .
Warren  थिएटर  IMAX cinema , Wichita , Kansas , USA ,  601  seats .
A  तुलना  between 35 mm  और  15/70 mm negative areas .
IMAX ( an abbreviation for Image  अधिकतम   )  is a motion picture film format  और   a   नियत  of cinema projection standards created by the Canadian company  imax  Corporation .
IMAX has  the   क्षमता  to record  और  display images of far greater  आकार  and resolution than conventional film systems .
Since 2002 , some feature films have been converted  (   or  upgraded  )  into IMAX  स्वरूप  for  प्रदर्शक  in IMAX theatres and some have also been partially shot in IMAX  .
IMAX  is  the most widely used  प्रणाली   लिये   special-venue  film presentations  .
, there are 697 IMAX theatres in  52  countries .
आज  's Special is a Canadian children 's television  दिखाएँ  produced by Clive VanderBurgh at TVOntario from  1981  to 1987 .
it   भी  ran  on  Nickelodeon and the Faith and  मान   channel/odyssey  ( now the  hallmark  Channel ) as well  as  many  pbs  stations throughout the United  राज्य  .
It was set in a  विभाग  store ,  आधारित  on the flagship location  of  the now defunct Simpson 's in  टोरंटो  .
Many sequences for  it  were shot at the Queen Street West and Yonge Street store after hours  .
संविधानवाद  , in  इसके   सबसे   सामान्य  meaning , is `` a complex of ideas , attitudes , and  पैटर्न  of  बर्ताव   elaborating  the principle that the authority of government  गर्भाशयी  from and is  सीमित  by a body of fundamental law '' .
A political organization is constitutional to the extent that it `` contain [ s ] institutionalized mechanisms of  शक्ति   कंट्रोल  for the protection of  the  interests  और  liberties  of  the citizenry  ,  including those that may be in the minority `` .
As described by political scientist and constitutional scholar David Fellman  :
An  ice-cream  headache , also known as brain freeze  ,   cold-stimulus  headache , or  इसके  given  वैज्ञानिक  name sphenopalatine ganglioneuralgia ( meaning `` nerve  पीड़ा  of the sphenopalatine  गंडिका  `` ) , is a form  of  brief cranial pain or headache commonly associated with consumption ( particularly quick  खपत  )  of  cold beverages  or  foods such  as  ice cream and ice pops  .
It is caused  by  having something cold touch the roof of the mouth ( palate ) ,  और  is believed  to  result from  a   तंत्रिका  response causing rapid constriction and  सूजन  of blood  बरतन   or   a  `` referring `` of pain from the roof of the mouth to the  सिर  .
The rate of  सेवन  for cold foods  रै   महरूम  studied as a contributing factor .
There are  लोगों  who can  नहीं  experience `` brain freeze '' or similar symptoms .
The term ice-cream headache has  महरूम  in  उपयोग  since at least 31 January 1937 , contained in a journal entry by Rebecca  timbres  published  in  the 1939 book We did n't  पूछो   यूटोपिया  : a Quaker family in Soviet Russia .
The first published use of  the  term brain freeze , as  it  pertains to cold-induced headaches , was on 27  may  1991 .
`` Auld Lang Syne  ''  (  :  note `` s  ''  rather than ``  z   ''  ) is a Scots poem written by Robert Burns in 1788  और  set to the tune of  a  traditional  लोक  song ( Roud # 6294 ) .
It is well known in many  देशों  ,  विशेषकर  in the English-speaking world ; its traditional use being to  celebrate  the start of the New Year  at  the stroke of midnight .
By extension  ,  it  is  also sung at funerals ,  graduations  and as a farewell or ending to other occasions  .
The international  लड़के  Scout youth  गति  , in  अनेक   देशों  , uses it as a close to jamborees and other functions .
The song  's   स्कॉट्स  title may be translated into  अंग्रेज़ी  literally as ``  बूढ़ा  long since '' , or more idiomatically , `` long long ago '' ,  ``   दिनों  gone by '' or  ``   बूढ़ा  times  ''  .
Consequently `` For auld lang syne '' , as it appears in the first line of the chorus , might be loosely translated as  ``   लिये  ( the sake of ) old times ''  .
The phrase `` Auld Lang Syne '' is also used in  समान  poems by Robert Ayton ( 1570–1638 ) , Allan  ramsay   (  1686–1757 )  ,  and  जेम्स  Watson ( 1711 ) as well as older folk songs predating  burns  .
Matthew Fitt  उपयोग  the phrase `` In the  दिनों  of auld lang syne '' as the equivalent of `` Once upon a time ...
`` in his retelling of fairy tales in the Scots language .
Ben  schulz  , player of  leeroy  Jenkins at BlizzCon 2007
Leeroy Jenkins , sometimes  misspelled   लेरॉय  Jenkins and often elongated with numerous  अतिरिक्त  letters , is an Internet meme named  लिये  a player character created by  बेन  Schulz in Blizzard Entertainment  's  MMORPG ,  संसार  of  warcraft  .
The character became  लोकप्रिय  due  to  a video of the game  कि  circulated around the  अंतरजाल  .
The phenomenon has since spread beyond the boundaries of the  गेमिंग  community into other online and mainstream  मीडिया  .
Oscar Grant was fatally shot by BART police officer Johannes Mehserle in Oakland ,  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  , United States , in the early  morning  hours  of  New Year 's Day 2009 .
Responding to reports of a fight on a crowded  खाड़ी  Area Rapid Transit train returning from  सैन   फ्रांसिस्को   ,  BART Police officers detained Oscar  ग्रान्ट  and several other passengers on the platform at the Fruitvale  बार्ट  Station .
Officer Johannes Mehserle  और   another  officer  यहूद  restraining Grant , who was prostrate and allegedly resisting  गिरफ़्तार  .
Officer Mehserle stood and ,  according  to witnesses , said  :   ``  Get back  ,  I 'm gon na tase him . ''
Then Mehserle drew his gun  और   शॉट  Grant once in the back ; Mehserle appeared stunned , put his  हैंड्स  to his head and exclaimed , `` Oh ,  my  God !  ''
दौरान  his court testimony ,  mehserle  said that Grant  तब  exclaimed ,  ``  You shot me ! ''
Grant turned out to be unarmed ; he was pronounced dead  the  next morning  at  Highland Hospital in Oakland  .
the  events were captured  on  multiple digital video and cell phone cameras  .
the   फुटेज  was disseminated to media outlets and  to  various websites , where it  थी  watched millions of times .
The following days saw both peaceful and  हिंसक  protests .
The shooting has  महरूम  variously labeled an involuntary manslaughter and a summary execution .
on  January 13 , Alameda  काउंटी  prosecutors  चार्ज   mehserle  with murder  लिये  the shooting .
He resigned  उसके   स्थिति  and  pleaded  not  अपराधी  .
The trial began  on   जून  10 , 2010 .
Michael  rains  ,  mehserle  's criminal defense attorney , argued  कि  Mehserle mistakenly  शॉट  Grant with his pistol ,  intending  to use  उसके  Taser when he saw Grant reaching for his waistband .
pretrial  filings  argue  that his client did not commit first-degree murder and  पूछा  a Los  एंजिल्स  judge to instruct the  जूरी  to limit its deliberations to  either  second-degree  हत्या  or  acquittal  .
Oakland civil rights  attorney  John Burris  दायर  a $ 25 million wrongful death claim against BART on behalf of  ग्रान्ट  's family .
On  जुलाई  8 , 2010 , the jury returned its  verdict  :  mehserle  was found guilty of involuntary  manslaughter  and not  अपराधी  of second-degree murder and voluntary manslaughter .
आरंभिक  protests against the ruling were peacefully  व्यवस्थित   ;   लूटने  , arson ,  विनाश   of  property  ,  and small  दंगे  broke out  बाद   अंधेरा   .
nearly  80  लोगों  were eventually arrested .
On  शुक्रवार   ,  July 9 , 2010 , the U.S. Justice Department opened a civil  अधिकारों  case against Mehserle ; the federal government can prosecute him  independently  for  the  same act under  the   पृथक  sovereigns exception to  दोगुना  jeopardy .
The Department of  इंसाफ  will be working with the U.S. Attorney 's office in  सैन   फ्रांसिस्को   और  the FBI .
On November 5 , 2010 , Mehserle  थी  sentenced to  दो  years  ,  minus time served .
He served his time in the Los Angeles County  कारावास  ,  occupying   a  private cell away  इससे  other prisoners .
He  थी  released  on   जून  13  ,  2011 and is  अभी  on parole .
Major representatives of the Harlem Renaissance .
The Harlem Renaissance was a cultural movement that  spanned   the  1920s .
At the time , it was known as  the  ``  नई   नीग्रो  Movement ''  ,  named  बाद   the   1925  anthology by Alain Locke .
Though  it   थी  centered in the Harlem neighborhood of  नई  York City  ,   अनेक  French-speaking black writers from African and Caribbean colonies who lived in  पेरिस   यहूद   भी  influenced by the Harlem Renaissance .
the  Harlem Renaissance is unofficially recognized  to   have   spanned  from about 1919  जबतक  the early  or  mid-1930s .
Many of  इसके  ideas lived on much longer .
The zenith of  इस  `` flowering of Negro literature '' ,  as  James Weldon Johnson preferred  to  call the Harlem  पुनर्जागरण  , was placed between 1924 ( the year that Opportunity : A Journal of Negro Life hosted a party for black writers where many white publishers  यहूद  in attendance ) and 1929  (  the year of the  भण्डार  market  क्रैश  and the  शुरूआत  of  the  Great Depression  )  .
African States between 500 BCE and 1500 CE
obelisk  at temple of  लक्सर  , Egypt  .
c. 1200 BCE .
अफ़्रीकी  knight  of  Baguirmi in full padded  armour   सूट  .
The history of Africa begins  साथ  the prehistory of Africa and  the  emergence of Homo sapiens in East Africa  ,  continuing into the present as a patchwork of diverse and  नीतियां  developing nation states .
Some early  प्रमाण  of  कृषि  in Africa dates from 16,000 BCE ,  और  metallurgy from about 4000 BCE .
The recorded history of early civilization arose in Egypt , and later in Nubia , the Maghreb and the Horn of Africa  .
During the  मध्य  Ages , Islam spread  through   the  regions .
Crossing the Maghreb  और   the  Sahel , a  प्रमुख  center of Muslim culture was Timbuktu  .
Some notable pre-colonial states and  समाजों   in  Africa include the Nok culture , Mali Empire , Ashanti Empire ,  किंगडम   of  Mapungubwe , Kingdom of Sine , Kingdom of  saloum  , Kingdom of Baol , Kingdom of Zimbabwe , Kingdom of Kongo , Ancient Carthage , Numidia , Mauretania ,  the  Aksumite Empire , the Ajuuraan State and the Adal Sultanate .
From the late 15th century , Europeans and Arabs took slaves  इससे  West ,  सेंट्रल  and Southeast Africa overseas  in  the African slave trade .
European colonization  of  Africa developed rapidly in the  हाथापाई  for Africa of the late 19th  और  early  20th  centuries  .
Following  struggles  for independence in  अनेक  parts of the continent , as well as a weakened Europe after the Second World War ; decolonization  took  place .
Africa 's  इतिहास  has been challenging for researchers in the field of African studies  क्युकी  of the scarcity of  लिखा  sources in  विशाल  parts of sub-Saharan Africa .
Scholarly  तकनीकों  such as the  रिकॉर्डिंग   of  oral history ,  ऐतिहासिक  linguistics , archaeology and genetics  have   महरूम   निर्णायक  .
curry  Foley  थी  the first player in Major League Baseball history to hit for the cycle .
In baseball , hitting for the cycle is the accomplishment of one  बैटर  hitting a single , a double  ,   a  triple , and a home  चलाएं  in the same game .
collecting   the   हिट्स  in that order is known  as  a `` natural cycle  ''  .
चक्र  are uncommon in Major League Baseball ( MLB  )   ,  and have occurred 294 times  चूंकि  the first  by  Curry Foley in 1882 .
The  साईकिल  is roughly as common as a  no-hitter   (  279 occurrences  in  MLB history ) ;  it  has  महरूम  called  ``  one of the rarest '' and `` most difficult feats '' in baseball .
Based on  2009  offensive levels , the  संभाव्यता  of an average MLB player hitting for a cycle against an average team in a game is approximately 0.00590 %  ;   इस   corresponds  to about 2.5 cycles in a 162-game  ऋतु   साथ  30 teams  .
In other baseball leagues , the cycle is achieved  कम   अक्सर  .
Through  सितंबर  4  ,  2008 ,  62  players  in   निप्पन  Professional Baseball ( NPB ) , the top-level baseball organization in Japan , have hit for the cycle  ,  the most recent being Michihiro Ogasawara  .
Two  खिलाड़ी   have   hit  for the  साईकिल  on the same  दिन  once in NPB history  ;  this has  occurred  twice in MLB history  .
एक  NPB player  रै  also hit for the  साईकिल   in  an  npb  All-Star  खेल  .
No player has ever  hit  for the cycle in the MLB All-Star Game or the postseason .
The main  स्लेव   रूट  in medieval  अफ़्रीकी  .
This article discusses  प्रणालियों  ,  इतिहास   ,  and  प्रभाव  of slavery  भीतर  Africa .
See Arab slave trade , Atlantic slave  व्यापार  ,  maafa  , and Slavery in contemporary  अफ़्रीकी   लिये  other discussions .
``  स्लेव  transport in Africa '' .
europeans  usually did not  डालें  the interior regions .
Slavery in Africa has existed throughout the continent for many centuries  ,  and continues  in  the current day .
Systems of servitude and slavery  यहूद  common in many parts of the continent , as they were in much of  the  ancient world .
in  most African societies where slavery was prevalent , the enslaved people  यहूद  largely treated as indentured servants and not  treated  as  chattel  slaves .
When  the  Arab slave trade and Atlantic slave trade began  ,  many of the local slave systems changed  और   began  supplying  captives  for slave markets outside of  अफ़्रीकी  .
Slavery in historical  अफ़्रीकी  was  practiced  in many different forms  और  some of these do not clearly fit  the  definitions of slavery elsewhere in the world .
Debt slavery , enslavement of war captives ,  सैन्य   गुलामी  , and criminal slavery were all practiced  in  various parts of Africa .
Although  वहीँ  had been  कुछ  trans-Saharan trade  इससे  the interior of Sub-Saharan Africa to other regions , slavery was a small part  of  the economic life of many societies in Africa until  the   परिचय   of  transcontinental slave trades (  अरब  and  अटलांटिक  )  .
Slave practices were again transformed  साथ   यूरोपीय   colonization  of Africa  और  the formal abolition of  गुलामी  in  the  early 1900s .
Windows Task Manager is  a  task  मैनेजर  or  प्रणाली  monitor application included with the Microsoft Windows NT family of operating systems  कि  provides limited information about computer performance and running  अनुप्रयोग  , processes  और  CPU usage ,  कमिट  charge and  मेमोरी  information , network  कार्यकलाप  and  आंकडे  , logged-in users ,  और   प्रणाली   सेवाएं  ( and  as  often is the case with software  टूल्स   provided  by  microsoft   लिये  Windows , 3rd party software is  उपलब्धियाँ  which fills the requirements more thoroughly , e.g , ``  प्रक्रम  Explorer '' , `` Extended Task Manager '' , `` Anvir Task Manager  ''   ,   ``   प्रक्रम  Hacker ''  ,  and `` System Explorer ''  )  .
the  Task Manager can also be used to  नियत   प्रक्रम  priorities ,  प्रोसेसर  affinity  ,  forcibly terminate processes ,  और  shut down ,  restart  , hibernate or log off from Windows .
Windows Task Manager was introduced with Windows NT 4.0 .
Previous  संस्करण  of Windows NT included the Task List application , which had far fewer features .
The  कार्य  list was capable of listing currently running processes and killing them  ,   or  creating a new  प्रक्रम  .
In Windows  xp  only ,  a  Shutdown menu is also  उपस्थित  that  allows   अभिगम   to  Standby , Hibernate  ,  Turn off  ,   restart  ,  log  Off and Switch  उपयोक्ता  .
Earlier versions of Microsoft Windows  (  Microsoft Windows 3.x  ,   खिड़कियाँ  95 , Windows 98 )  था   a  program known as tasks to  प्रदर्शक  the  कार्यक्रम  currently running  .
This file was executed by running the taskman.exe file from the  c  : \Windows  निर्देशिका  .
The Troop is an American-Canadian  live-action   ,  single camera comedy -adventure television  श्रेणी   परिचय  a trio of teenagers who fight and capture monsters and other supernatural phenomena that  invade  the fictional town  of  Lakewood .
Created and executive produced by Max  burnett  , Greg Coolidge and Chris  मॉर्गन  ,  the  series premiered  on  Nickelodeon on September 18 ,  2009  .
The second  ऋतु  premiered  on  June 25 , 2011 and Nickelodeon  रद्द  the series  मिडवे  through it  's   दूसरी   ऋतु  .
The remaining episodes of season 2  यहूद  aired on Nicktoons except the last  3..
Sparsely populated in relation  to  its area ,  the  Democratic Republic of the Congo  (  DRC ) is home to a vast potential  of  natural resources and  खनिज  wealth , its untapped  जमा  of raw minerals are estimated  to  be worth in excess  of  US $ 24 trillion , yet the economy of  the   drc  has declined drastically since the mid-1980s .
At the time of  इसके  independence in 1960 ,  drc  was the second  सबसे  industrialized country in Africa  बाद  South Africa ; it boasted  a  thriving mining  सेक्टर   और  its agriculture sector was relatively  उत्पादक  .
If the viewer stares  at   इस   चित्र  for 20–60 seconds  और   stares   at  a white object  ,  a negative afterimage will  appear  ( in this case ,  it  will be cyan on  magenta  ) .
This can also be achieved by the viewer closing  his/her  eyes and tilting  उनके   सिर  up  .
An  afterimage   or  ghost image or image burn-in is  an  optical illusion that refers to an image continuing to appear in  एक  's vision after the exposure to the original image  रै  ceased .
One of  the  most  आम  afterimages  is  the  उज्जवल  glow  कि  seems  to  float before  एक  's  आँखें  after looking into a light source for  a  few seconds .
Closing  the  eye can  सहायता  achieve  a  better  भाव  of the color in its  अपना  aspect .
Afterimages come in two forms , negative ( inverted )  और  positive (  retaining  original color ) .
The process behind  धनात्मक  afterimages is unknown ,  हालांकि  thought to be related  to  neural  अनुकूलन   .
On the other hand , negative afterimages  हैं  a retinal phenomenon and are well  समझा  .
Lost is an American serial  नाटक  television series that  premiered  on September 22 , 2004 on  the  American Broadcasting Company  (  ABC )  .
The series was created by J. J. Abrams and Damon Lindelof , based upon an original  पायलट  script titled  nowhere  written by Jeffrey Lieber .
Six seasons of the  दिखाएँ  aired  ,  in  जोड   to  numerous  काटें  shows to recap previous episodes .
ABC announced that Lost would  समाप्त   बाद  six seasons , having produced a total of 121 episodes .
The series follows  the  past , present ,  और   भविष्य  experience ( s ) of the survivors of  a  plane crash on a passenger jet ,  oceanic  Flight 815 , flying  इससे  Sydney to Los Angeles after  it   क्रैश  on a  तीव्र   द्वीप  in the South Pacific  .
The series also  शामिल  stories of the  जीवनदान  of  लोगों   already  living  on  the island  —  they include the `` Others  ``  ,  जो   initially  antagonize the survivors , as well as a group of people  जो  arrive on the  freighter  Kahana .
Each episode  typically  features action on  the   द्वीप  as well as a secondary  कथानक  from  another   पाइंट  in a character 's life  .
Season 6 features  a  detailing of the lives of the survivors in a different reality ,  as  if the flight had never crashed .
in  the following list  ,   the  term `` featured character ( s )  ''  refers  to  the character or characters who are featured in the secondary storyline  of  each episode .
``  No .
in series '' refers to the  एपीसोड   's  number in the  overall  series ,  whereas   ``  No .
in season '' refers to the episode  's   क्रमांक  in each  particular  season .
`` U.S.  दर्शक   (  million ) '' refers to the  क्रमांक   of  Americans in millions who watched the episode live .
a  total of 121 episodes of Lost  यहूद  produced  ,   the  last of which aired  on   may  23 , 2010 .
All seasons  हैं  available on DVD in Regions 1–4 and  on  Blu-ray  in  Regions A  और  B .
Flat feet (  भी  called pes  planus   or  fallen arches ) is a formal reference to a medical  कंडीशन  in which the arch of the foot collapses ,  साथ  the  संपूर्ण  sole of the foot coming into complete or near-complete contact with the ground .
in  some individuals  (  an estimated 20–30 % of the general population  )  the arch simply  never  develops in one foot (  unilaterally  ) or both feet (  bilaterally  ) .
Three studies  (  see citations  नीचे  in  सैन्य  section ) of military recruits have shown no evidence of later increased injury , or foot  समस्याएं  , due to flat feet , in a population of people who reach military service  आयु  without prior foot problems .
However , these studies can not be  प्रयुक्त  to judge possible future damage from this  कंडीशन  when diagnosed at  younger  ages  .
वे  also can not be applied to persons whose flat  फीट  are  संबद्ध  with foot symptoms , or certain symptoms in other parts of the body  (  such as the leg or back )  संभवतः  referable to the  पैर   .
Generation  x  ,  commonly  abbreviated to Gen  x  ,  is  the generation born after the Western post-World War II baby  बूम  .
Demographers , historians and commentators use beginning birth dates from the early 1960s to the early 1980s .
The  पद  was popularized by Douglas Coupland 's 1991  अनोखा  Generation X  :  Tales  लिये   an  Accelerated Culture .
Before that , it had been used for various  subcultures  or countercultures  बाद   the  1950s .
Pressure ulcers , also known as decubitus ulcers or  bedsores  , are  स्थानीयकृत  injuries to  the   स्किन  and/or underlying tissue usually over a bony  prominence   ,  as a result  of  pressure , or pressure  in  combination with shear  and/or  friction .
सबसे  commonly this will be the sacrum , coccyx , heels  or  the hips , but other sites such as the elbows , knees , ankles or the back of the cranium can be affected .
The cause of pressure ulcers is pressure applied to soft tissue so that blood flow to the soft tissue is  completely  or partially  obstructed  .
shear  is also a cause ; shear pulls on blood vessels that feed  the  skin .
Pressure ulcers most commonly  develop  in persons  जो  are  नहीं  moving about or are confined  to  wheelchairs .
It  is  widely believed that other factors can influence  the  tolerance of skin  लिये  pressure and shear thereby increasing  the  risk of pressure ulcer development .
These factors are protein-calorie  कुपोषण   ,  microclimate (  स्किन  wetness caused by  sweating  or incontinence ) , diseases  कि  reduce blood flow to the skin , such  as  arteriosclerosis  or  diseases that reduce the feeling in the skin , such as paralysis or neuropathy .
The healing  of  pressure ulcers may  be  slowed by the age of the person ,  चिकित्सा  conditions ( such as arteriosclerosis  ,  diabetes or infection  )  , smoking  or   medications  such as  antiinflammatory  drugs  .
Although  प्रायः  prevented and treatable if  मिला  early , pressure ulcers  can  be very difficult to prevent in critically ill patients , frail elders ,  व्हीलचेयर  users ( especially where spinal  चोट   is  involved  )   और  terminally ill  मरीजों   .
प्राथमिक  prevention is to redistribute  दबाव  by  turning   the  patient regularly .
The benefit  of  turning to avoid further sores is well documented since at least the 19th century  .
In addition  to   turning  and re-positioning  the   रोगी  in bed or wheelchair , eating a balanced  आहार  with adequate protein and keeping the skin free from exposure to urine and stool is  बहुत  important .
The prevalence of pressure ulcers in hospital settings is high  ,   लकिन  improvements  हैं  being made .
According to  the  2010  ipup  ( International  दबाव  Ulcer Prevalence Survey ) conducted in Canada  ,  there was a significant  घटी  in  the  overall facility-acquired prevalence  of   दबाव  ulcers from 2009-2010 .
Ulcers  यहूद   सबसे  commonly  पहचाना   at  the sacral/coccyx ulcer location ; however ,  एड़ी  ulcers  यहूद  the most common facility-acquired  स्थान  in the survey .
overboard   is  a 1987  अमरीकी  romantic comedy film starring Goldie Hawn and Kurt  रसेल  .
It was directed by Garry Marshall , produced by Roddy McDowell , and loosely inspired by the 1974  इतालवी   फिल्मी  Swept  दूर  .
in  turn , Overboard was adapted into the  2006  South Korean television  श्रेणी  ,  युगल  or Trouble .
Green Bay is a city in and the county seat  of  Brown County in the U.S. state  of   विस्कॉन्सिन  , located at the head  of  Green Bay , a sub-basin of Lake Michigan , at the mouth of the Fox River .
it  has an  उन्नयन  of above sea level and  is  located north of  मिल्वौकी  .
The population was 104,057  at  the 2010  जनसांख्यिकी  .
it  is  the  third-largest  नगर  in  the   राज्य   of  Wisconsin  ,  after  मिल्वौकी  and Madison .
It is  भी  the  third-largest  city on  the   वेस्ट  shore  of  Lake Michigan  ,  after  शिकागो  and Milwaukee .
Green Bay is  घर  to the  ग्रीन  Bay Packers of the National Football League , making it by  दूर  the smallest metropolitan area in  the  USA to host a major professional sports  मताधिकार  .
Green Bay is the principal city of the Green Bay Metropolitan Statistical Area ,  जिससे  covers Brown , Kewaunee , and  oconto  Counties and had a  संयुक्त  population of 282,599  at  the 2000  जनसांख्यिकी   .
Green Bay is an industrial city  साथ  several meatpacking and paper plants ,  और  a  बंदरगाहों  on  ग्रीन  Bay , an arm  of  Lake Michigan  कि   स्थानीय  call the Bay of Green Bay , to avoid conflating it with the eponymous  नगर  .
It  is   घर   to  the  नेशनल  Railroad Museum ;  the  Neville Public Museum , with  प्रदर्शनियों  of art , history  ,  and science  ;   और  the University  of  Wisconsin–Green Bay .
luteinizing   हार्मोन  ( LH ,  भी  known as  lutropin  and  sometimes   lutrophin  ) is a hormone produced by gonadotroph cells in the anterior pituitary gland .
In  महिलाओं  , an acute rise of LH (  ``  LH surge '' ) triggers ovulation and development of the corpus  luteum  .
In males , where LH had  भी   महरूम  called interstitial cell-stimulating hormone  (   icsh   )  , it stimulates Leydig cell production of testosterone .
It acts synergistically with FSH  .
Selena Quintanilla-Pérez (  अप्रैल  16 , 1971 – March  31  , 1995  )   ,  known simply as Selena  ,  was an American singer-songwriter .
She was named the  ``   शीर्ष  Latin artist of the '90s ''  और  `` Best selling Latin artist of  the   दशक  '' by Billboard  लिये  her fourteen top-ten singles  in  the Top Latin Songs  चार्ट   ,  including seven number-one hits  .
सेलिना  had the most successful singles of 1994 and 1995 ,  ``  Amor Prohibido ``  और  `` No Me  queda  Más `` .
She was  पुकारा   ``  The Queen of Tejano music  ``  and the Mexican equivalent of  मैडोना  .
Selena released her first album  ,  Selena y Los Dinos , at the age of twelve  .
She won Female Vocalist of the  साल  at the  1987  Tejano  म्यूज़िक  Awards and  उतरा  a recording contract with EMI a few years later .
Her fame grew throughout  the  early 1990s , especially in Spanish-speaking countries  ,   और  she had begun  रिकॉर्डिंग  in English as well .
Selena  थी   murdered  at the age of  23  on March 31 , 1995 by Yolanda Saldívar , the former president of her  प्रशंसक   क्लबों   .
On  अप्रैल   12  , 1995 ,  दो  weeks after her death , George W. Bush , governor of  टेक्सास  at the time ,  घोषित  her birthday `` Selena Day '' in Texas .
warner  Bros. produced Selena , a film  आधारित  on her  जीवन  starring Jennifer Lopez , in 1997  .
सेलिना  's life  थी  also  the  basis of the musical  सेलिना  Forever  अभिनीत  Veronica Vazquez as Selena .
In  जून  2006  सेलिना  was  commemorated  with a life-sized bronze  प्रतिमा  ( Mirador de la Flor in Corpus Christi  ,   टेक्सास  ) and a Selena museum opened there  .
She has sold over 60 million albums worldwide , making her one of the best-selling artists of all time  .
She is also the  तभी  female  कलाकार  to  have  five albums in U.S  .  Billboard 200 at the same time  .
German Stahlhelm from World War II
Insignia  of  the Bolivian Army Colorados regiment , showing a Stahlhelm and two crossed bayonets
Stahlhelm ( plural , Stahlhelme ) is German for `` steel helmet '' .
The Imperial German Army  began   to   बदलें  the traditional boiled-leather Pickelhaube  (  spiked  कॉम्बैट   हेल्मेट  ) with the  stahlhelm  during World War I in 1916 .
The  पद  Stahlhelm refers  दोनो  to a generic steel helmet , and more specifically to  the  distinctive ( and  iconic  ) German design .
The Stahlhelm  ,  with its distinctive `` coal scuttle  ``  shape  ,  was  an   तुरन्त  recognizable icon  लिये  military imagery and became a common element  of  military propaganda on both sides  ,   बस  like  the  Pickelhaube before it .
Its name was also used by  the  Stahlhelm  ,  a paramilitary nationalist organization established at the  समाप्त  of 1918 .
Glow-in-the-dark may refer to:
Bioluminescence , the production and emission of light by a living organism
Chemiluminescence , is the emission of light ( luminescence ) without  उत्सर्जन  of heat
Phosphorescence , a specific  प्रकार  of photoluminescence related to fluorescence
Radioluminescence , production of  संदीप्ति  in a material  by  the  बमबारी   of  ionizing radiation
glow  in  the  Dark Tour , a 2008  कॉन्सर्ट  tour by Kanye West
Frankfurt Airport serves as a  हब  city for Lufthansa and  receives  flights  इससे  Star Alliance  वाहक  .
एयरलाइन  hubs are airports ranked as large , medium , small , and non-hubs as one  of  the FAA airport categories which are re-evaluated every year based on number  of  commercial passengers .
The  अधिक  common but  अनौपचारिक  use  लिये   the  phrase airline hub is  an   विमानक्षेत्र   कि   an   एयरलाइन  uses as a transfer point to  मिलेंगी   यात्री  to their intended destination  .
It is part of  a  hub and spoke model  ,   जहाँ  travelers  चलती  between airports not served by direct flights  बदलें  planes en route to their destinations .
इस  is as opposed to the Point to Point model .
Many  hubs  of the airlines  हैं  also situated at  एयरपोर्ट  in the cities of the respective head offices  .
कुछ  airlines may use only  a  single hub , while other airlines use multiple hubs .
Hubs are used for both passenger flights  as   खूब  as cargo flights .
Many airlines  भी  use focus cities , which function much the same  as  hubs  .
Airlines may  भी  use secondary hubs , a non-technical term for large  फ़ोकस  cities  .
A  हब   in  the middle of a route is more effective than at either end as connecting  ट्रैफ़िक   अधिक  easily fills the plane  -  passengers prefer a one-stop ( two-leg ) route over a two-stop ( three-leg )  रूट  .
Hollow Lacedaemon .
Site of the Menelaion , the shrine to Helen  और  Menelaus  constructed  anciently  in   the   कांस्य  Age city that stood on the hill  of  Therapne on the left bank of the Eurotas River overlooking the future site of Dorian Sparta .
Across the valley the successive  ridges  of Mount Taygetus are in evidence .
Sparta  (  Doric Greek : ; Attic Greek : ) , or Lacedaemon , was  a  prominent city-state in ancient Greece , situated on the banks of  the  Eurotas River in Laconia , in south-eastern  पेलोपोनीज़   .
it   उभरा  as a political entity  around  the 10th century BC , when the  आक्रमणकारी  Dorians subjugated the local  ,  non-Dorian population  .
around  650 BC , it  रोज़  to become the dominant military land-power in  प्राचीन  Greece .
Given its military pre-eminence , Sparta was recognized as the overall  नेता  of  the  combined Greek forces during the Greco-Persian Wars .
between  431 and 404  bc  , Sparta  थी  the principal enemy  of  Athens  दौरान  the  peloponnesian  War  ,  from  जिससे  it emerged victorious , though at great  लागत  .
Sparta 's defeat by Thebes in the Battle of Leuctra in 371 BC ended  स्पार्टा  's prominent  भूमिका  in  यूनानियों  .
However , it  कायम  its political independence until  the  Roman conquest of  यूनानियों  in 146 BC .
It then underwent a long period of decline ,  विशेषकर  in the Middle Ages , when many Spartans  स्थानांतरित  to live in Mystras  .
Modern  स्पार्टा  is the  पूंजी  of  the  Greek regional  ईकाई   of   laconia  and a  बीच  for the processing of goods  ऐसे  as  citrus  and olives  .
Sparta was unique in ancient Greece for its social system and constitution ,  जिससे  completely focused  on  military training  और  excellence .
Its inhabitants were classified as Spartiates  (   spartan  citizens  ,  who enjoyed full rights ) , Mothakes ( non-Spartan free  मेन  raised as Spartans ) , Perioikoi ( freedmen )  ,  and Helots  (  state-owned  serfs  , enslaved non-Spartan  लोकल  population ) .
Spartiates underwent the rigorous  agoge  training and education  regimen   ,  and  spartan   phalanges  were widely considered  to  be  among  the best in battle .
spartan  women  enjoyed  considerably more rights and equality to men than  elsewhere  in the classical world .
Sparta  थी  the subject  of  fascination in its own day , as well as  in  the West following the  पुनरुद्धार  of  शास्त्रीय   सीखना  .
This love or admiration  of   स्पार्टा  is known as Laconism  or  Laconophilia  .
काल्पनिक   फ़ुटबॉल  is an interactive competition in which users compete  विरूद्ध  each other as general managers of  आभासी  teams  .
the  players that an individual is able to manage are professional American football  खिलाड़ी  in the National Football League .
The different actions  लोगों  are able to make are  drafting  ,  व्यापार  , adding or dropping players , and changing  rosters  .
Due  to  the growth of the Internet , Fantasy football has  vastly  increased in popularity  ,  particularly because Fantasy football providers such  as   ईएसपीएन  , Yahoo , CBS ,  और  the NFL itself are able to keep track of statistics entirely online , eliminating  the  need to check box scores and newspapers regularly to keep track  of  players  .
Most leagues have  a  single week championship in  सप्ताह   16  of the NFL season  .
World  जनसांख्यिकी  estimates from 1800 to  2100   ,  based on UN  2010   projections  ( red , orange ,  ग्रीन   )   और  US Census Bureau historical estimates ( black ) .
Actual recorded population figures are in  ब्लू  .
According to the highest estimate , the  संसार  population may rise to  16  billion  by  2100 ; according  to  the lowest estimate  ,   it   may   मनाही   to  6 billion  .
The world population is the total number of living humans  on   धरती  .
As of  आज  , it is estimated to number billion  by  the United States Census Bureau ( USCB  )  .
The USCB estimates that the world population  exceeded  7  अरब  on March  12  ,  2012  .
According to a separate estimate by  the  United Nations  जनसांख्यिकी  Fund  ,  it  पहुँचे  this  पड़ाव  on October  31  ,  2011  .
The  संसार  population has  अनुभवी  continuous  विकास  since the  समाप्त  of the Great Famine and the Black Death in  1350   ,  when it stood at around 370 million  .
The highest rates of growth –  वैश्विक  population increases above  1.8  % per  साल   –   यहूद  seen briefly  दौरान  the 1950s , and for a longer  काल  during  the  1960s and  1970s  .
The growth rate peaked at  2.2   %  in  1963   ,   और  had declined to 1.1 % by 2011 .
Total  सालाना  births were highest in the late 1980s at about 138 million , and  हैं  now expected to remain  essentially  constant  at  their  2011  level of 134 million  ,   जबकि  deaths number  56  million  प्रति  year , and are expected to increase to 80 million  प्रति  year by  2040  .
Current projections show a continued increase in population in the  निकट   भविष्य  ( but a steady  मनाही  in the population  विकास  rate  )  ,  साथ  the global population expected to  पहुँचें  between 7.5 and 10.5 billion by  2050   .
विभिन्न  longer-term  estimates   भविष्यवाणी  further growth , stagnation  ,  or even  overall  decline in the global  जनसांख्यिकी  by 2150 .
Some analysts  have  questioned the sustainability of further world population  विकास  , citing the growing  pressures  on the environment  ,  global  खाना   आपूर्तियाँ   ,  and energy resources  .
Skeletal muscles homo sapiens
This  is  a table of muscles  of   the  human anatomy .
There are  लगभग  642 skeletal muscles within  the  typical human , and almost every muscle constitutes one  भाग  of  a  pair of identical bilateral muscles , found on  दोनो  sides  ,  resulting in approximately  320   pairs  of muscles , as presented in this article  .
Nevertheless  ,   the  exact  क्रमांक  is  मुश्किल  to  define  because  अलग   स्त्रोत  group muscles differently , e.g .  regarding  what is defined  as   अलग  parts of a single muscle or as several muscles  .
Examples range from 640 to 850 .
The muscles of the human body can be categorized into a number of  समूह  which include muscles relating to the head and neck , muscles of the torso  or   ट्रंक  ,  मांसपेशियां  of the  अपर   limbs  , and muscles of the lower  limbs  .
The action refers to  the   कार्रवाई  of each  मांसपेशी  from the standard anatomical position  .
In other  स्थितियाँ  , other  क्रियाएँ   may  be  performed  .
A gold bar is a quantity of refined metallic gold of  कोई  shape that is made by a bar producer meeting standard conditions of manufacture  ,  labeling ,  और  record keeping .
Larger  सुनहरा  bars that are  उत्पादित  by pouring the molten metal into molds are called ingots .
Smaller  बार  may  be  manufactured by minting or stamping from appropriately rolled gold sheets  .
The standard gold bar held as  सुनहरा  reserves  by  central banks and  traded  among  bullion  dealers  is  the 400-troy-ounce ( 12.4 kg or 438.9 ounces  )  Good Delivery gold bar .
the  kilobar , which is  to  say 1000 grams in mass , is the bar  कि   is  more manageable  और  is used extensively for trading and  निवेश  .
the  premium on these bars when traded is  बहुत  low over  the  spot value of  the  gold making it ideal for small transfers  between   बैंको  and traders .
Most kilobars are flat , although some investors , particularly in Europe , prefer the brick shape  .
Elisha Archibald `` Archie '' Manning III ( born May 19 , 1949 ) is a former American football quarterback  in  the  नेशनल  Football League , playing for the  नई  Orleans Saints from 1971  to   1982  , then for the Houston Oilers and Minnesota Vikings  .
He is the father of  वर्तमान   डेनवर  Broncos quarterback Peyton  मैनिंग  , current New York Giants starting quarterback Eli  मैनिंग  , and  पूर्व   ओले  Miss receiver Cooper Manning .
Advocacy is  a  political process by an individual or  समूह   जिससे  aims to  influence  public-policy  और   संसाधन  allocation decisions within political , economic , and social systems and institutions .
Advocacy  can  include many activities  कि  a person or  संगठन  undertakes including media campaigns  ,  public  बोलना  , commissioning  और  publishing research or polls or the  दाखिल  of an  amicus  brief .
Lobbying  (   प्रायः  by lobby groups ) is a form of advocacy where a direct  दृष्टिकोण  is made to legislators on an  समस्या  which plays a  significant  role  in  modern politics .
Research is beginning to explore  कैसा   वकालत  groups  in   the  U.S. and Canada are using social  मीडिया  to facilitate civic engagement  और  collective action  .
The flag of Mexico ( Spanish : Bandera de México ) is a vertical tricolor of green ,  श्वेत  , and red with the national coat of arms charged in  the  center of the white stripe .
While  the  meaning of the colors has changed  over  time ,  ये  three colors were adopted by Mexico following independence  इससे  Spain during the country  's  War of Independence , and subsequent First Mexican Empire .
The current flag was adopted in 1968 , but  the  overall design has been used since 1821 , when the First National  ध्वज   थी  created .
The current law  of  national symbols , Law on  the  National Arms , Flag , and  गान  , that governs the use of the national flag  रै  been in place  चूंकि  1984 .
रेड  , white , and green are the colors of the national liberation army in Mexico .
The central emblem is the Aztec  pictogram  for Tenochtitlan ( now Mexico City ) , the center of their empire .
It recalls the legend  कि  inspired the Aztecs to settle on what was originally a lake-island .
The form of the coat of arms was most recently revised in 1968  .
A ribbon  in   the  national colors is at the  नीचे  of  the  coat of  बाहें  .
Throughout history , the flag has changed four times , as  the   डिज़ाइन  of the coat of arms and  the  length-width ratios of the flag have been modified .
However , the  कोट  of arms has had  the   वही  features throughout  :  an  त्रिभुज  , holding a serpent  in  its talon ,  is  perched on top  of  a prickly pear cactus ; the cactus is  situated   on  a rock that rises above a  झील  .
The coat of arms is derived from an Aztec legend that their gods told them to build a  नगर  where they spot an eagle on a nopal  खाने  a serpent , which is  अभी  Mexico City .
The current national flag , the Fourth National Flag , is also used as  the   मैक्सिकन  naval ensign by  जहाजों   पंजीकृत  in Mexico .
A destination marketing organization or convention and visitor bureau promotes a town , city ,  प्रदेश  , or country in  अनुक्रम  to increase the number of visitors .
It promotes  the  development and marketing of a destination  ,  focusing on convention sales , tourism  विपणन  , and services .
Such organizations  प्रचार  economic development  of   a  destination by increasing visits from tourists and business travelers , which  generates  overnight lodging for a destination , visits to  रेस्तरां  , and shopping revenues .
Convention and  आगंतुक  bureaus are the  सबसे  important tourism marketing  संगठन  in their respective tourist destinations  ,  as  वे  are  सीधे  responsible  लिये  marketing the  गंतव्य  brand through travel  और  tourism `` product  जागरूकता  ''  to  visitors  .
DMOs produce billions of  डॉलर  in direct and indirect revenue  और  taxes for their destinations ' economies with their  विपणन   और  sales expertise .
Destination marketing organizations are often  पुकारा  travel , convention , visitors  ,   or  tourism bureaux  ,  welcome centers , information centers and more .
Regardless of the name  ,  these organizations offer many  सेवाएं   to  the traveling public .
The elk or  wapiti  ( Cervus canadensis ) is one of the largest species of deer in the world  ,  and one of the largest  जमीन  mammals in North America and eastern  एशिया  .
It was long  believed  to be a subspecies  of  the European  रेड  deer  (  Cervus elaphus ) , but  प्रमाण  from a 2004  पढ़ाई  of the mitochondrial DNA  indicates  that the two are  पृथक  species  .
This animal  चाहिए  not be confused with the larger moose ( Alces alces )  ,  to which  the  name `` elk '' applies in  यूरेशिया  .
Apart from the moose ,  the  only  अन्य  member of  the  deer family to rival the  नीलगाय   in  size is the south Asian sambar (  rusa  unicolor ) .
Elk range  in  forest and  forest-edge  habitat ,  feeding  on grasses , plants ,  पत्ते   ,   और  bark .
Although native to North America  और  eastern  एशिया   ,  they have adapted well to countries where they have been introduced , including Argentina  ,  Australia  ,  and  नई  Zealand .
Their great adaptability may threaten endemic species and ecosystems into which they have been introduced .
Male elk  have   विशाल  antlers which are  शेड   प्रत्येक  year .
Males also engage in  ritualized   समागम  behaviors during the rut , including posturing ,  antler  wrestling ( sparring ) , and bugling , a loud series of vocalizations which establishes dominance  over   अन्य   males   और  attracts  महिलाओं  .
Elk are susceptible to a number of infectious diseases , some  of  which can  be  transmitted to livestock .
Efforts  to  eliminate infectious diseases from  नीलगाय  populations ,  largely  through vaccination , have had  मिश्रित  success .
Some cultures  आदर  the elk as a spiritual force .
In parts of Asia ,  antlers  and  उनके  velvet are used in traditional medicines .
नीलगाय   हैं  hunted as a game species ; the  मांस  is  leaner  and higher in  प्रोटीन   than  beef or  मुर्गा  .
The  जार्ज  Washington University (  gw  , GWU  ,   or   जार्ज  Washington ) is a comprehensive private , coeducational  शोध  university located in Washington , D.C.  .
It awards certificates , Bachelor  डिग्री  , Masters degrees , and PhDs across  अनेक  dozen disciplines  .
the  university  थी  chartered  by  an Act of  कॉंग्रेस  on February  9  ,  1821  as The Columbian  कॉलेज  in  the  District of Columbia .
The lion ( Panthera leo ) is one  of  the four  बिग  cats in the genus Panthera and a member of the family  फ़ेलिडाए  .
With  कुछ  males exceeding in weight , it is the second-largest living cat  बाद   the  tiger .
Wild  शेर  currently exist in sub-Saharan Africa and in Asia ( where an endangered remnant population resides in Gir Forest National Park in  इण्डिया  ) while  अन्य  types of lions  have  disappeared from  उत्तर  Africa and Southwest Asia  in  historic times .
Until the  लेट  Pleistocene , about 10,000  सालो  ago  ,   the  lion was the  सबसे  widespread large  जमीन  mammal after humans .
They were found in  सबसे   of  Africa ,  आरपार   यूरेशिया  from western  यूरोपीय  to India , and in the Americas from the Yukon to Peru .
The  शेर  is a vulnerable species  ,  having seen  a   प्रमुख  population  मनाही  of 30–50 % over the  पास्ट   दो  decades in  इसके  African  दायरा  .
Lion  populations  are untenable outside designated reserves  और  national parks .
Although the cause  of  the  मनाही  is not fully understood , habitat loss  और  conflicts  साथ  humans  हैं  currently the greatest causes of concern  .
भीतर  Africa , the West African  शेर  population is particularly endangered .
शेर  live for 10–14 years in the wild  ,  while in captivity  वे  can live longer than  20  years .
In the  जंगली   ,  males seldom  सजीव  longer than 10 years , as injuries sustained from continual fighting with rival  males  greatly reduce  उनके   आयु   .
They typically inhabit savanna and grassland , although they may  लो  to bush and  वन  .
Lions  हैं  unusually social compared to other cats .
A  अभिमान  of lions consists of  सम्बन्धित  females and offspring and  a  small number of adult males .
Groups of  मादा  lions typically hunt together , preying  ज़्यादातर  on large ungulates .
शेर  are apex and keystone predators ,  हालांकि  they scavenge  as  opportunity allows .
While lions do  नहीं   typically   हंट  humans ,  कुछ  have been  ज्ञात  to do  so  .
Sleeping  मुख्यतः  during the day , lions are primarily  nocturnal   ,  although  bordering   on  crepuscular in nature .
अत्यधिक  distinctive , the male lion is  easily  recognised by its mane , and its face is one of the most widely  recognised  animal symbols in human culture .
Depictions  have  existed from the Upper Paleolithic period , with carvings and  paintings  from the Lascaux and  chauvet  Caves , through virtually all ancient and medieval  संस्कृतियों  where they once occurred .
It has  महरूम  extensively  चित्रित  in sculptures , in paintings  ,  on  नेशनल  flags  ,  and in contemporary films and  साहित्य  .
Lions  have  been  रखा  in menageries since the time of the Roman Empire  ,   और  have been a  कुंजी  species sought for exhibition in zoos over the world  चूंकि  the late 18th century .
Zoos  हैं  cooperating worldwide in breeding  कार्यक्रम  for the  endangered  Asiatic subspecies .
In the  इतिहास  of video games , the seventh generation of consoles is the previous  पीढी  , and  शामिल  consoles released since late by Nintendo , Microsoft , and Sony .
For  घर  consoles , the seventh generation began on 22 November 2005 with the release of Xbox 360  और   जारी  with the release of PlayStation 3  on  11 November  2006  , and Wii on 19 November 2006 .
Each new  कंसोल   introduced  a new type of breakthrough  in  technology .
the  Xbox 360 offered  खेल  rendered natively  at   hd  resolutions  ,  the PlayStation 3 offered , in addition  to   fhd  gaming , HD movie playback via a built-in 3D Blu-ray Disc player , and the Wii focused on integrating  परिरक्षक  with movement sensors  as  well as joysticks .
joining  Nintendo in the motion market , Sony released the PlayStation Move  in   सितंबर  2010 .
The PlayStation Move  सुविधाएँ  motion sensing gaming , similar to that of  the  Wii .
Microsoft also joined Sony and Nintendo , with its Kinect .
Unlike the other  दो  systems ( PlayStation 3 and Wii ) , Kinect does not use any controllers of any sort and makes the users the `` controller . ''
having  sold 8  लाख  units in its first 60 days  on  the market ,  kinect  has claimed the Guinness World  रिकार्ड   of  being  the  `` fastest selling  उपभोक्ता  electronics  यंत्र  '' .
While the Xbox 360 offers wired controllers  as  a standalone product ,  सब  PlayStation 3 controllers can be used  in   तार  and wireless configurations .
starting  with  हैंडहेल्ड  consoles , the seventh  पीढी   began  on 21 November 2004 with  the  North American introduction of the Nintendo DS as  a   ``  third  pillar  '' , alongside Nintendo  's  existing Game  लड़के  Advance and GameCube consoles  .
the   निन्टेंडो  DS ( NDS ) features a touch screen and built-in microphone , and supports wireless  आईईईई   802.11  ( Wi-Fi ) standards .
Additionally , the revised version of the NDS ,  the  DSi , features two  निर्मित  in  कैमरे  , the ability to download  खेल  from  the  DSi store ,  और  a web browser .
The PlayStation  पोर्टेबल  , or PSP , released later the same  साल  on 12 December  2004  , followed  a  different pattern .
It  became   the  first handheld video game  कंसोल   to  use an optical disc format , Universal Media  डिस्क  ( UMD ) , as its primary storage media .
Sony  भी  gave the PSP robust multi-media  काबिलियत  , connectivity with the  प्लेस्टेशन  3 and other PSPs , and Internet connectivity .
the  Nintendo DS likewise  रै  connectivity  to  the internet  through  the Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection and Nintendo  ds  Browser , as well as wireless connectivity  to   अन्य  DS systems and  वी   consoles   .
Despite high sales numbers for  दोनो  consoles , PlayStation Portable sales have consistently lagged behind those of the Nintendo DS ; nevertheless , the  प्लेस्टेशन  Portable has the distinction of being the best-selling  non-nintendo  handheld gaming system .
Sgt  .  Pepper 's Lonely Hearts  क्लबों  Band ( often  shortened  to Sgt .  pepper  ) is the eighth  स्टुडियो   एल्बम   by  English  चट्टान  band  the  Beatles  .
Released  in  June 1967 , the album  शामिल  songs such  as  `` With a Little Help from  my  Friends `` , ``  लुसी  in the Sky  साथ  Diamonds  ``   ,  and `` A  दिन  in the Life ``  .
Continuing the artistic  maturation   देखी  on the  बैंड  's  एल्बम  Revolver (  1966  ) , Sgt . Pepper further  रजि  from the conventional pop rock idiom of the time and incorporated  balladry   ,  psychedelic , music hall , and symphonic influences .
During the Sgt .  pepper  sessions , the group  improved  upon the quality of  उनके  music 's production while exploring experimental recording techniques  .
Producer George  मार्टिन  's innovative approach included the use of an orchestra .
Widely acclaimed and imitated , the album cover , designed  by  English pop artists Peter Blake and Jann Haworth ,  थी  inspired by  a  sketch by Paul McCartney that depicted the band posing in front of a collage of some of  उनके  favourite celebrities  .
Sgt  .  Pepper  थी  a worldwide critical and commercial success ,  बिता  27  सप्ताह  at the top of the UK Album Chart and  15  weeks at number one on the US Billboard  200   .
A seminal work in  the  emerging  साइकेडेलिक   चट्टान  style , the album was  critically  acclaimed upon release and won four  ग्रैमी   पुरस्कार  in 1968 .
With an estimated  32  million copies sold , it is one of the world  's  best selling albums .
Sgt . Pepper is considered by  अनेक   to   be  the most influential and famous rock album ever ,  और  has been  नामित  the greatest album of all time by  दोनो  All Time Top 1000 Albums and Rolling Stone  .
The temporal lobe is a  प्रदेश  of the cerebral cortex  कि   is   स्तिथ   beneath  the lateral fissure on both cerebral  बांटती  of the mammalian brain .
the   temporal  lobes are involved in the retention of visual  यादें  , processing  संवेदी  input ,  comprehending  language , storing new memories ,  जज्बात  ,  और  deriving meaning .
the   इंसान  lungs are the  अंगों  of respiration in humans .
Humans have two lungs , a right  फेफड़ों   और  a left lung .
the  right lung consists of three lobes  जबकि  the left lung is  थोड़ा  smaller consisting of only two lobes ( the left lung has a `` cardiac notch '' allowing space for  the   दिल  within  the  chest ) .
साथ   ,  the lungs contain approximately of airways and 300  to  500 million alveoli  ,  having a  कुल   सतह  area of about  (  ) in  वयस्कों  —  roughly  the same area as  एक  side of  a  tennis court .
furthermore  , if all  of  the capillaries that  घेर  the alveoli were unwound  और  laid end to end  ,  they would extend for  परिचय  .
Each  फेफड़ों  weighs , therefore making the entire organ  परिचय   .
Human  फेफड़े
The trachea divides into two  bronchi  ( one for each  पक्ष   )   at   the  level  of  T4  .
This  जंक्शन  is also known as the  carina  .
The conducting zone contains  the  trachea , the  bronchi  , the bronchioles , and  the   टर्मिनल  bronchioles The  respiratory   मण्डल  contains the respiratory  bronchioles  , the alveolar ducts , and the alveoli .
The  conducting  zone and the respiratory stuffers ( but not  the  alveoli ) are  बना   up   of  airways .
The conducting zone has no  गैस   एक्सचेंज  with the  रक्त   ,  and is reinforced  साथ  cartilage in order to hold  खोलें  the  एयरवेज़  .
the   conducting  zone warms the air  to   और  humidifies the air .
It also cleanses the air by removing particles via cilia located on the walls of all the  passageways  .
The lungs are  घिरी   by  the rib cage  .
The respiratory zone is the site of gas exchange with blood .
The sympathetic  बेचैन  system via noradrenaline  एक्टिंग  on the beta receptors causes  bronchodilation  .
the  parasympathetic nervous system via acetylcholine , which acts on  the  M-3 muscarinic receptors  ,  maintains  the  resting  टोन  of the bronchiolar smooth muscle .
This action is  सम्बन्धित   ,  although considered distinct from  bronchoconstriction  .
अनेक  other non-autonomic nervous  और   biochemical  stimuli , including carbon  डाइऑक्साइड  and oxygen , are also involved in  the  regulation  प्रक्रम  .
The pleural cavity is the  संभावित  space between the parietal pleura , lining the inner wall of the thoracic cage , and the visceral  pleura  lining the lungs  .
The lung parenchyma is strictly used to refer solely to alveolar tissue with respiratory  bronchioles  ,  alveolar  ducts  और   टर्मिनल  bronchioles .
However , it often includes any form of  फेफड़ों   ऊतक  , also including bronchioles , bronchi  ,  blood vessels and  फेफड़ों  interstitium .
the   मार्गरिटा  is a Mexican cocktail  consisting  of tequila  मिश्रित  with Cointreau or  समान  orange -flavoured liqueur and lime or lemon juice  ,  often served with salt on the glass rim .
It is  the  most common  tequila-based   कॉकटेल  in the United  राज्य  .
The  पेय  is served shaken with ice (  on   the  rocks ) , blended with ice ( frozen  मार्गरिटा  )  ,  or  बगैर  ice ( straight up  )  .

Burgundy  is   a  dark  रेड  color associated  साथ  the Burgundy wine  of  the  वही  name , which in turn is named after the  बरगंडी   प्रदेश   of  France .
The color burgundy is similar  to  other shades  of  dark  रेड  such as maroon .
जब  referring to  the  color  ,  `` burgundy ''  is  usually not capitalized .
The  पहला  recorded  उपयोग  of `` burgundy '' as a  रंग  name  in  English was  in   1881  .

लापता  in action  (  MIA ) is a casualty Category assigned under the Status of Missing  to   हथियारबंद   सेवाएं   कर्मियों  who are reported missing  दौरान   क्रियाशील  service .
वे  may have  महरूम   मारे  , wounded ,  become  a prisoner  of  war  ,  or  उजाड़   .
If deceased , neither  उनके  remains nor  संगीन  can be positively identified .
Becoming MIA  रै  been  an   occupational  risk  लिये  service personnel for as long  as  there has been warfare .

बीच  is a city in Shelby County  ,  Texas , United States .
The population  थी  5,193  at  the  2010  census .
it  is the  काउंटी   सीट  of Shelby County .
It  is  named for its  स्थान   निकट  the center of Shelby County  ,  not for its location in Texas as it is  स्तिथ  near the Louisiana border .
Intense red-eye  प्रभाव  in  ब्लू  eyes with dilated  pupil
The red-eye effect in photography is the common appearance of red pupils  in  color photographs of eyes .
it  occurs when using a  फ़ोटोग्राफ़िक  flash very close to the camera lens ( as  साथ  most  कॉम्पैक्ट  cameras  )   ,  in ambient  कम  light  .
The  प्रभाव   appears  in the eyes of humans and animals  कि  have  tapetum  lucidum  .
Theatrical  followspot   ऑपरेटर  , positioned nearly coincidentally with a very bright light and somewhat distant  इससे  the actors  ,  occasionally witness red-eye in actors on  स्टेज   .
The effect is  नहीं  visible to the rest of the audience because  it   is  reliant  on  the very small angle between  the  followspot  ऑपरेटर  and the light .
The University  of   कैलिफ़ोर्निया  , Santa Barbara ( commonly referred to as UC Santa Barbara or UCSB ) is a public  शोध  university  और  one  of  the  टेन  general campuses  of  the University of California system .
The main campus is located on a site in Goleta  ,  California , United States , from Santa Barbara and northwest of Los Angeles .
Tracing  इसके  roots back to 1891 as an  स्वतंत्र   शिक्षक  ' college , UCSB joined  the   विश्वविद्यालयों   of  California system in 1944 and  is   the  third-oldest general-education  कैम्पस  in  the  system .
UCSB is one  of  America 's Public Ivy universities , which  recognizes   शीर्ष  public  शोध   विश्वविद्यालयों  in the United States  .
the  university is a  व्यापक  doctoral university  और   is  organized into five  कॉलेजों   और  schools offering  87   undergraduate  degrees and 55  ग्रैजुएट  degrees .
The campus is the 6th-largest in the UC system by enrollment  साथ  18,977 undergraduate  और  2,950 graduate students .
in  2012 , UCSB was ranked 41st among `` National Universities '' and 10th among public universities  by   u.S.  News & World Report .
The university was  भी  ranked 35th worldwide by the Times Higher  शिक्षा  World University  rankings   और  34th  विश्वव्यापी  ( 6th worldwide for engineering )  by   the  Academic Ranking of  संसार  Universities in 2012. < ref name= '' Shanghairanking.com/FieldENG2012 '' >
UC Santa Barbara is a `` very high activity '' research university and spent  $  191.2 million on research expenditures in the 2007 fiscal year , 97th-largest in  the  United States .
UCSB houses twelve national research  centers   ,   सहित  the renowned Kavli Institute for  सैद्धांतिक  Physics .
UCSB faculty includes five Nobel Prize laureates , one Fields Medalist , 29 members of the  नेशनल   अकादमी  of Sciences ,  27  members of  the   नेशनल  Academy  of   अभियान्त्रिकी  , and 31 members of the American Academy of Arts and Sciences  .
UCSB was the No  .  3 host  on  the ARPAnet  और  was elected to the  संघ   of   अमरीकी  Universities in 1995 .
The UC Santa Barbara Gauchos  compete   in  the NCAA Division I Big West  सम्मेलन  .
The  gauchos  have won NCAA  नेशनल   championships  in men 's soccer and men 's water  पोलो  .
