Saint Joseph 's Day , March 19 , the  feast   of  St. Joseph is  in  Western Christianity  the  principal  feast  day of Saint Joseph , Spouse  of  the Blessed  वर्जिन  Mary .
He is also the  step-father  of Jesus  of  Nazareth /Jesus Christ .
It has  the  rank  of  a solemnity in the Roman Catholic Church ; Catholics who follow the  missal  of 1962  celebrate  it  as   a   पहला  class  feast  .
Previous to 1962  it  was celebrated  as  a feast  of  the rank of double of the  पहला  class .
It is a feast or commemoration  in  the provinces of the Anglican  नियाज़  , and a feast or festival in  the  Lutheran Church .
Saint  जोसेफ   's  Day  is  the Patronal Feast day for  कैंडल   as  well as  लिये   कनाडा  , persons named  जोसेफ  , Josephine , etc. , for religious institutes , schools and parishes bearing  उसके  name  ,   और   लिये   बढ़ई  .
It is  भी  Father 's Day in  कुछ  Catholic countries , mainly Spain ,  पुर्तगाल   ,   और  Italy .
कूच  19 was dedicated to Saint  जोसेफ  in  अनेक  Western calendars by the  दसवाँ  century ,  और  this custom was established in Rome by 1479 .
Pope St. Pius V extended its use to  the  entire  रोमन   रीति   by  his  अपोस्टोलिक  Constitution Quo Primum ( July  14  , 1570 ) .
Since 1969 , Episcopal Conferences  may  , if  वे  wish , transfer it to a date  बाहर  Lent .
Between 1870 and  1955  , a  feast  was celebrated in honor of St. Joseph  as   जीवनसाथी  of the  धन्य  Virgin Mary and Patron of the Universal Church , the latter title having been given  to  him by Pope Pius IX .
Originally celebrated on the  तीसरा  Sunday after Easter with  an  octave , after Divino Afflatu  of   st.  Pius  x  ( see Reform of the Roman Breviary by  पोप   पायस  X ) , it was moved to the preceding Wednesday .
The  feast  was also  retitled  The Solemnity of Saint Joseph .
इस  celebration  और  its accompanying octave  थी  abolished  दौरान  the  आधुनिकीकरण   और  simplification  of  rubrics under Pope Pius  बारहवीं   in  1955 .
it  is still maintained  by  Catholics  जो   follow  the missal of 1962 or earlier missals .
As the traditional holiday of the  रसूलों  Ss . Philip and James ,  may  1 , had faded from  the  memory of most Catholics  by  the mid-twentieth century , that  of  Joseph the Worker was created in order to  coincide   साथ  the celebration of international Labour Day ( May Day  )  in many countries .
The feast of  ss  .  फिलिप  and James  ,   जिससे  had been  मनाये  on that date since the sixth century ,  थी   स्थानांतरित  from its traditional place  .
In the new calendar  प्रकाशित  in 1969 , the  feast  , which at  एक  time occupied the  उच्चतम  possible  रैंक   in  the Church calendar , was reduced  to  an optional Memorial , the  न्यूनतम  rank for a saint 's day .
the  Eastern Orthodox Church celebrates Saint Joseph  on  the Sunday  बाद  Christmas .
Mariah Carey ( born March 27 , 1970  )  is an American singer , songwriter , record  निर्माता  , actress  ,  and philanthropist .
अंतर्गत   the  guidance of  कोलंबिया  Records executive Tommy  mottola  , Carey released her  self-titled   डेब्यू   स्टुडियो  album Mariah  कैरी   in   1990   ;  it went multi-platinum and spawned four consecutive number one singles  on   the  U.S .  बिलबोर्ड  Hot 100 chart .
Following her marriage to Mottola in 1993 and success  साथ  hit records Emotions (  1991  )  ,  Music Box ( 1993 )  ,  and Merry  क्रिसमस  ( 1994 ) , Carey was established as  कोलंबिया  's highest-selling act .
Daydream  (  1995 ) made music history when its second  सिंगल   ``  One  मीठी  Day `` , a  duet  with  बॉयज   ii  Men , spent a record sixteen weeks  on   शीर्ष  of the Billboard Hot 100 , and remains the  longest-running  number-one song in U.S. chart history .
During the recording  of  the album ,  कैरी  began to deviate from her  r  & B and pop beginnings  और  slowly traversed into hip hop .
This musical  बदलें  became evident with the release of Butterfly (  1997  )  ,  at which time  कैरी  had separated from  mottola  .
Carey left Columbia in 2000 ,  और  signed  a  record-breaking $ 100 million recording contract  साथ   वर्जिन  Records  .
पहले  the release of her  पहला  feature film Glitter ( 2001 ) , she suffered a physical and emotional breakdown and was hospitalized for  कठोर  exhaustion .
Following the film 's poor reception ,  वो  was bought out of  उसके  recording contract for  $  50 million  ,  which led to  a  decline in  उसके  career .
वो   हस्ताक्षरित  a  multi-million  dollar  अनुबंध  deal with Island Records in  2002  , and  बाद  an  unsuccessful  period ,  लौटे  to the top of music charts with The Emancipation of Mimi (  2005  )  .
Its second  सिंगल  `` We Belong Together `` became her most successful single of the 2000s , and was later named ``  सोंग  of the Decade '' by  बिलबोर्ड  .
कैरी  once again ventured into film  साथ  a well-received starring role in ( 2009 ) ; she was  awarded  the  ``  Breakthrough Performance Award '' at  the  Palm Springs  अंतरराष्ट्रीय   फिल्मी  Festival , and Black Reel and NAACP Image Award  nominations  .
In a career spanning over two decades , Carey  रै   बेची  more than  200  million records worldwide  ,  making her one  of  the best-selling  म्यूज़िक  artists of all time .
In 1998 , she was honored as  the  world  's   best-selling  recording artist of the 1990s  at  the World  म्यूज़िक  Awards  .
Carey  थी  also named the  best-selling  female artist of the millennium in 2000  .
According to the Recording Industry Association of America  ,  she is the third best-selling female artist in the United  राज्य  , with 63.5  लाख  certified albums .
With the release of `` Touch My Body ``  (   2008  ) , Carey gained her  eighteenth  number  एक  single in the United States  ,   अधिक  than any other  सोलो  artist  .
in  2012 ,  कैरी  was ranked  दूसरी   on   vh1  's  सूची   of  the `` 100 Greatest Women  in  Music '' .
aside   इससे  her commercial accomplishments ,  कैरी  has won five Grammy Awards , 17 World Music Awards , 11 American Music  पुरस्कार  , and 31 Billboard Music Awards .
Referred to as the `` songbird  परम्  '' by the Guinness World Records , she is famed  लिये  her five-octave vocal range , power  ,   melismatic  style and  हस्ताक्षर  use  of  the whistle  पंजीकरण  .
A bumblebee is any member of the bee genus Bombus , in the family Apidae .
वहीँ  are over 250  ज्ञात  species , existing primarily in the Northern Hemisphere  हालांकि  they also occur in South America .
They have been introduced to New  जीलैंड  and the  ऑस्ट्रेलियाई  state of Tasmania .
bumblebees  are social insects that  हैं   characterised  by black and  पीला  body hairs ,  प्रायः   in  bands  .
However , some species have orange  or  red on their bodies  ,   or   may  be entirely black .
another  obvious ( but not unique  )  characteristic  is  the soft nature of the hair ( long , branched setae ) , called pile ,  कि  covers their entire body , making them  appear  and  महसूस  fuzzy .
वे  are best distinguished from  similarly  large , fuzzy bees by  the  form of the female hind leg  ,  which is modified to form a corbicula : a shiny concave surface that  is  bare , but surrounded  by  a fringe of hairs used to transport pollen ( in similar bees  ,  the hind leg  is  completely hairy , and pollen  दाने   हैं   wedged  into the  बालों  for transport ) .
Like their relatives the honey bees , bumblebees feed on nectar  और  gather  पराग   to  feed their young  .
a  man openly carrying  a  handgun in a Burger  किंग   in  Eagle , Colorado  .
In  the  United States , open carry is shorthand terminology for ``  खुलकर   carrying  a firearm in public '' , as distinguished from concealed carry , where  firearms   can  not be seen by the casual  निरीक्षक  .
The practice of open carry , where gun  स्वामी  openly carry  firearms  while they go about their daily business , has seen an increase  in  the U.S. in recent  सालो  .
This has  महरूम  marked by a number of organized events intended to  बढ़ाएँ  the visibility  of  open  carry   और  public  जागरूकता  about the practice .
Proponents of open carry point to history and  आंकडे  ,  noting  that criminals usually  छिपाते   उनके  weapons .
Encouraged  by  groups like OpenCarry.org , GeorgiaCarry.org  और  some participants of the Free  राज्य  Project , open carry has seen  a   पुनरुद्धार  in  हाल  years , but it is not yet  साफ  if this represents  बस  a short-term trend  .
the   गन  rights community has been mixed in its response .
Alan Gottlieb of the Second Amendment  न्यास   और  the NRA have  महरूम  cautious in expressing support  ,  while special-interest  समूह   ऐसे  as  the  aforementioned OpenCarry.org and GeorgiaCarry.org , and certain national groups  ऐसे   as  the Gun  स्वामी  of  अमेरिका  ( GOA ) have been more  outspoken  in favor of  the  practice .
Open carry is strongly opposed by gun control groups  ऐसे   as  the Brady Campaign and the  गठबन्धन   to  Stop  गन  Violence  .
the   cattenom  Nuclear Power Plant in France .
फ़्रांस   produces  around three quarters  of   इसके  electricity by nuclear  शक्ति  .
The  grafenrheinfeld  Nuclear Power Plant in  जर्मनी  .
Chancellor Angela Merkel 's coalition  घोषित  on May 30 , 2011 ,  कि  Germany’s 17 nuclear power stations  होगा  be shut down by 2022  ,  in a policy reversal  following  Japan 's Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster .
Currently , 68 reactors are under construction in  15  countries .
Nuclear power  स्टेशन   operate  in thirty countries  .
In  2010  ,  पहले  the  फुकुशिमा   daiichi  nuclear disaster , it was reported that an average  of  about 10 nuclear reactors were expected to become operational per year , although according  to  the World Nuclear Association , of the  17  civilian reactors planned to become operational  between  2007  और   2009  , only five actually came on stream  .
as   of  June 2011  ,   जर्मनी  and Switzerland  हैं  phasing-out nuclear power .
As of June 2011 , countries  ऐसे   as  Australia , Austria , Denmark , Greece  ,   आयरलैंड   ,  Italy  ,  Latvia , Liechtenstein , Luxembourg , Malaysia , Malta , New Zealand , Norway and  पुर्तगाल  remain opposed to nuclear power .
Color motion picture film refers both to unexposed  रंग   फ़ोटोग्राफ़िक  film in a format suitable for use in a motion picture camera ,  और  to finished motion picture film , ready for  उपयोग  in a projector ,  जिससे  bears images  in   रंग   .
The first color  cinematography  was  by  means of additive color systems such as the one patented in England by Edward Raymond Turner  in  1899 and tested in  1902  .
a  simplified additive system was developed by George Albert  स्मिथ   और  successfully commercialized in 1909  as   kinemacolor  .
These early systems  प्रयुक्त  black-and-white film to photograph and project two or more component images through different color filters .
Still  इससे  footage recorded by Edward Turner in  1902
With  the  present-day technology  ,  there  हैं   दो  distinct  प्रक्रियाओं  :  eastman   रंग  Negative 2 chemistry  (   कैमरा  negative stocks , duplicating interpositive  और  internegative stocks  )  and Eastman  रंग  Positive 2 chemistry ( positive prints for direct  प्रक्षेप  ) , usually abbreviated as  ecn-2   और  ECP-2 .
Fuji  's  products are compatible with ECN-2  और   ecp-2  .
ashanti  Shequoiya Douglas ( born October 13 , 1980 ) is an American singer-songwriter , record producer ,  और  actress .
Ashanti is most  प्रसिद्ध  for her eponymous debut album , which featured the hit song `` Foolish `` , and sold  over   503,000  copies in its first week  of  release throughout the  u.S.  in April 2002 .
the  album set a Soundscan record as the biggest opening week sales for a new female artist  ,   outselling   debuts  by Alicia  कुंजियाँ   और  Lauryn  हिल  .
In the  वही   सप्ताह  , she became the first female performer to simultaneously hold the top two  स्थान  on the Billboard Hot 100 singles chart with `` Foolish ''  ,  and `` What 's Luv ?  ``
( with Fat Joe ) .
Ashanti broke records again  by  having three  शीर्ष   टेन   गीतों  , ``  foolish  , '' `` What  's  Luv  ?  ''  और  ``  सदा  on Time  ``   ,  on the  बिलबोर्ड  Hot 100 charts in the same week  ,   होने  the first woman  to  accomplish this feat and  होने  second  तभी  to  the  Beatles .
In 2003 , the self-titled debut album  जीती  Ashanti  उसके  first Grammy Award for Best Contemporary  r  & B album .
As of April 1st 2013 , Ashanti has sold over 27.7  लाख  records worldwide .
Ashanti  ended  the decade (  2000–09  ) as  the   तीसरा   शीर्ष   नई   r  & B artist behind Alicia Keys  और  Beyoncé  .
She also ended the  दशक  at number 38  on  the Top Artist of the  दशक  list .
She is currently on the list of  the  Twenty Best Selling Music Singles Since 1990 for  उसके  single  foolish  for selling 7.2 million copies to-date .
Ashanti  रै   an  estimated net worth of $ 40  लाख  dollars [ USD ] .
Ashanti wrote and sang background  on  Jennifer  लोपेज़   's  `` Ai n't It  मजेदार  ( Murder Remix  )  `` ,  जिससे  reached number one  on  Billboard  hot  100 , which was also in the top  10   चार्ट  at the same time as `` Foolish '' , `` Always on Time ''  (  with Ja Rule  )  , and ``  कया  's Luv '' ( with Fat Joe ) .
Later that  साल  , she was acclaimed as the `` Princess Of  hip-hop  &  r  &  b  ''  by  her label and capped  बंद  her  कामयाब  debut  by  winning eight Billboard awards and two American Music Awards .
Within seven years  of  Ashanti 's career , she has scored  16   शीर्ष   40   हिट्स  on  the  Hot 100 .
Ashanti  रै  endorsed numerous products including  गैप  ,  हर्बल  Essences and  mudd  Jeans .
ashanti   cites  Whitney Houston , Janet Jackson , Prince  ,   मैडोना   ,   तुपाक  Shakur , Mary J. Blige ,  एला  Fitzgerald , Smokey Robinson , Donna Summer ,  और  Blue Magic  as  her musical influences .
Praised  as  a gifted songwriter by  उसके  peers and critics alike , Ashanti has written/co-written the bulk of all her music  .
She  is   फिलहाल  working on her own publishing company  हकदार  Written  entertainment   .
वो  released her fourth  स्टुडियो   एल्बम  entitled  the  Declaration on June 3 , 2008 and is currently in the  स्टुडियो  working on  उसके  fifth .
She also performed the  दान   धुन  `` Just Stand Up `` alongside 15  अन्य  female singers for  the   ``  Stand Up to Cancer  ''  live television special which helped raise $ 100 million  डॉलर  for cancer  शोध  .
The United States  फौज  Air Forces ( USAAF or  aaf   )  was the military aviation arm of the  संयुक्त  States of America  दौरान  and  तत्काल  after World War II , and the direct predecessor  of  the United States  एयर  Force  .
the  AAF was  a   घटक   of  the United States Army , which in  1942  was  विभाजित  functionally by executive order into three autonomous forces : the Army Ground Forces , the  सेवाएं  of Supply  (  which  in  1943 became the Army Service Forces  )  , and  the   aaf  .
Each  of  these forces had a commanding  सामान्य  who reported directly to the Chief of Staff  of  the United  राज्य  Army .
The AAF  administered  all parts of military aviation formerly distributed among  the  Army Air  corps   ,  General Headquarters Air Force , and ground forces corps area commanders , and  यूँ  became the  पहला  air organization of the U.S. Army to  कंट्रोल  its own installations  और  support personnel .
In  अभ्यास  , the  aaf  was virtually autonomous inside the Army .
The peak size of the AAF was over 2.4 million men and  महिलाओं  in service and  nearly  80,000 aircraft in 1944 , and 783  घरेलू  bases in December 1943 .
By  ve  Day it had 1.25 million men  stationed  overseas and  संचालित   इससे  more  than  1,600 airfields worldwide .
The Air Corps  became  the  फौज   एयर  Forces in June 1941 to provide  the   एयर  arm a  वृहद   स्वायत्तता   in   जिससे  to  विस्तार   अधिक  efficiently , and to provide  a  structure for the additional command echelons required  by   a  vastly  increased   फ़ोर्स  .
Although  अन्य   राष्ट्र  already had  पृथक   एयर  forces independent  of  the army  or   नेवी  ( such as  the  British Royal  एयर  Force and the German Luftwaffe ) , the AAF remained a part of the United  राज्य  Army until the United States Air Force came  into  being in September 1947 .
However , in its expansion  और  conduct of the war , the AAF became more than just an arm of the  वृहद  organization .
by  the  समाप्त  of World War  ii  the  aaf  had become virtually an  स्वतंत्र  service .
By regulation and executive  अनुक्रम  ,  the  AAF  थी   a  subordinate agency of the  युद्ध  Department tasked only with organizing ,  प्रशिक्षण  , and equipping combat units , limited in responsibility to the continental United States , as were  the  Army Ground Forces and the  फौज  Service Forces  .
In reality ,  मुख्यालय  AAF controlled the conduct  of  all aspects of  the  air war in every part  of  the  संसार  , determining air policy and issuing orders without  transmitting  them through  the  Chief of Staff .
This `` contrast  between  theory  और  fact is ... fundamental  to  an understanding of  the  AAF  .  ''
The Freedom  of  Information Act  (  FOIA ) is a federal freedom of  सूचना  law  कि  allows for the  पूरा  or partial  प्रकटीकरण  of previously unreleased  सूचना  and documents controlled by the United  राज्य  government  .
The Act defines  एजेंसी  records subject to disclosure , outlines mandatory disclosure  प्रक्रियाओं  and grants nine exemptions to the statute  .
It was originally signed  into  law by President Lyndon B. Johnson ,  despite  his misgivings , on July 4 , 1966 as and went into effect the following  साल  .
The  संघीय  Government  's  Freedom of Information Act should not be confused with the different and  varying  Freedom  of  Information  अधिनियमों  passed by the  व्यक्तिगत  states .
Many of those state acts may  be  similar  लकिन  not identical to the federal act  .
The European  संघ   (   eu  ) is  an   आर्थिक  and political union of 27 member  राज्य  that are located primarily in Europe .
The EU operates through  a  system of supranational independent institutions and intergovernmental negotiated decisions  by  the member states  .
Institutions of the EU include the European Commission  ,  the Council of the European Union , the European Council ,  the  Court of  इंसाफ  of the European Union , the European Central  बैंको  , the Court of Auditors  ,  and the European Parliament .
The European  पार्लियामेंट  is elected every five  सालो  by EU citizens .
The EU 's de  facto  capital is Brussels .
The EU traces its origins from the European  कोयले  and Steel Community ( ECSC  )  and the European Economic Community (  eec   )  ,  formed  by  the  Inner Six countries  in  1951 and  1958  respectively .
In the intervening years the community and its  successors   have  grown in size by the accession  of  new member  राज्य  and in power by  the  addition of policy areas  to  its  remit   .
The Maastricht Treaty  स्थापित  the European  संघ  under its current  नाम  in  1993  .
The latest major  amendment  to the constitutional  आधार  of  the  EU , the Treaty of Lisbon , came into force  in  2009 .
The  eu  has  विकसित  a  सिंगल   मार्केट  through  a  standardised system of  कानून  that apply in all member  राज्य  .
Within  the  Schengen  क्षेत्रफल   (  which includes 22 EU and 4  non-eu  states ) passport controls have been abolished .
EU policies aim to ensure the free  गति  of people , goods ,  सेवाएं  , and capital , enact legislation in justice and  घर  affairs  ,   और   maintain  common policies on trade , agriculture , fisheries and regional development .
A monetary union  ,  the eurozone ,  थी  established in 1999 and is  रचित  of  17  member states .
through  the Common Foreign and Security Policy  the  EU has developed a  भूमिका  in external relations  और  defence .
स्थाई  diplomatic missions  have  been established  around  the world .
The EU is represented at the United Nations  ,  the WTO ,  the   g8  and  the   g-20   .
With a combined  जनसांख्यिकी  of over 500 million inhabitants , or 7.3 % of the  संसार  population , the EU , in  2012  , generated a nominal  सकल  domestic product (  जीडीपी  ) of 16.584 trillion US  डॉलर   ,   representing  approximately 20 % of the  वैश्विक  GDP  जब  measured in terms  of  purchasing power parity , and  represents  the largest nominal GDP and GDP PPP in the world .
The EU was the recipient of the 2012 Nobel Peace Prize .
The Wales national rugby  लीग   टोली  represent  वेल्स  in international rugby league football matches .
Currently  the  team is seventh  in  the RLIF  संसार  Rankings .
The team  यहूद  run under the auspices of the Rugby Football League  ,  but  an   स्वतंत्र  body , Wales Rugby League , now runs the team from  कार्डिफ  .
A total of three  वेल्श  players have been entered  into  the Rugby League Hall Of  कीर्ति  .
Similar to  अनेक  other Welsh national sporting  टीमों  , Wales strip has  महरूम  primarily red for many years  ,  including  अभी  .
However in their last World Cup  अभियान  in 2000 they did  पहनें  a shirt featuring the Welsh flag  ,  adding a  टच   of  green  और  white  .
The  टोली  is  ज्ञात   as  `` The Dragons '' and so  the  teams  लोगो  on  the  shirt is a  रेड   ड्रैगन   .
The team date  वापस  to 1907 ,  बनाना  them the third oldest national side after England and New Zealand .
And it was a touring New  जीलैंड  side that Wales first played against in 1908 , winning 9-8 at  aberdare  .
Since then Wales have regularly played England , since 1935 France , as well as welcomed the touring Australia  और   नई   जीलैंड  teams , although they rarely toured  themselves  ,  नहीं  playing  a  match in the  दक्षिणी  Hemisphere until 1975  .
लिये  twenty-six years Wales competed against their two  biggest  rivals ,  इंग्लैण्ड  and France  ,  in the European  राष्ट्र  Cup , winning the trophy four times  .
Wales have also competed in the World Cup on three  अवसरों  , the first time being  in  1975 .
In  1995   और  2000 they had their most successful tournaments to  तिथि  , surprisingly making the  semi-finals  on both  अवसरों  before being beaten  by  England and Australia  क्रमशः  .
वेल्स  failed to qualify for the  2008  World  कप  , being  the  second highest ranked side  नहीं  to do so ,  having  lost  to  Scotland on  अंक  difference over two matches .
In 2008 Australian John Dixon became the new head coach and appointed  ली  Briers as  कप्तान  , having  निभाई  for  वेल्स   चूंकि  1998  .
In recent seasons Wales  have  taken massive strides  अंतर्गत  former player Iestyn  हैरिस  who has  coached  Wales to  वापस  to  वापस  European Cup  सफलताओं  , which culminated  in  a Four  राष्ट्र  appearance  in  2011 .
Cardiomyopathy ( literally `` heart muscle disease '' ) is the measurable deterioration of the  फलन  of the myocardium ( the heart muscle ) for any reason ,  प्रायः  leading to heart failure ; common symptoms are dyspnea  (  breathlessness  )  and peripheral edema  (  swelling of the legs ) .
People with cardiomyopathy are often at  रिस्क  of  खतरनाक  forms of irregular  दिल  beat and sudden cardiac death .
The most common form  of  cardiomyopathy is dilated  cardiomyopathy  .
Fuck in its literal meaning refers  to  the  अधिनियम  of sexual  मैथुन  .
It is an English  शब्द  that is often  प्रयुक्त  as  a  profanity , either to denote disdain or as an  intensifier   .
The origin of the word is obscure .
it  is usually considered to be first attested to around 1475 ,  लकिन  it may be considerably older .
in   आधुनिक  usage  ,  fuck and its  डेरिवेटिव  ( such as fucker and fucking ) can  be   प्रयुक्त  in the position of a noun , a verb ,  an  adjective or an adverb  .
There are many common phrases which make use  of   the  word , as well as a number of compounds incorporating it , such as motherfucker .
Note : this article  adopts  the  u.S.  Department of Transportation  's   परिभाषा   of  a passenger vehicle , to  औसत  a car or truck , used  लिये  passengers  ,  excluding buses  और  trains .
the  United  राज्य  is home to the  largest  passenger vehicle market of any country  in   the  world .
overall  , there were an  अनुमानित  254.4  लाख  registered passenger vehicles  in  the United States  according   to  a 2007  बिन्दु  study .
This number  ,   साथ  with the average  आयु  of vehicles ,  रै  increased steadily since  1960  ,  indicating   a  growing  क्रमांक  of vehicles per capita .
The Chinese car market , however , is poised  to  soon exceed the United  राज्य  ;  by  the end of  2012  ,  वहीँ  were over 240 million cars on  the  road in  चीन   .
The United States is also home to three large vehicle manufacturers : General Motors , Ford Motor Company and Chrysler , which  have  historically been referred to as the `` Big Three . ''
Chrysler however is no longer among  the  top three ;  लकिन  is number five ,  पीछे  Toyota and Honda .
the  motor car has clearly become  an  integral part of American  जीवन  ,  साथ  vehicles outnumbering licensed drivers  .
Clinical laboratory in a Hospital setting showing several automated analysers .
A medical laboratory or  नैदानिक  laboratory  is  a laboratory where tests are done on clinical  नमूनों  in  अनुक्रम  to get information about the health of a  रोगी   as  pertaining  to  the diagnosis , treatment  ,  and prevention of disease .
In poker , players construct hands  of  five  ताश  according to  predetermined  rules , which vary according  to  which variant of poker is being  निभाई  .
These hands are compared using a  हाथ  ranking system that  is  standard  आरपार  all variants of  पोकर   ,   the  player  साथ  the  highest-ranking  hand  जीतना  that  particular  deal in most variants  of  poker .
In some variants , the lowest-ranking hand can win  or  tie .
These hand rankings  हैं   भी  used in some other card games  ,  and in  पोकर   dice  .
The ranking of a  particular  hand is increased by including multiple cards of the same card rank ,  by  all five cards being from the same suit  ,  or  by  all five cards being of consecutive  रैंक  .
the  relative ranking of the  विभिन्न  hand  श्रेणी  is based on  the  probability of being randomly dealt such a  हाथ  from a well- shuffled deck  .
Bruce Randall Hornsby ( born November 23 , 1954 ) is an American virtuoso ; a singer , pianist , synthesizer ,  accordion  , and dulcimer player , and  songwriter  .
Known  लिये  the spontaneity and creativity of  उसके  live performances , Hornsby draws frequently from classical ,  जैज़  , bluegrass ,  लोक  , Motown , gospel ,  चट्टान  , blues , and jam band musical  परंपराओं  with  उसके  songwriting and  the   seamless  improvisations contained within .
Hornsby 's recordings have been recognised on a number of occasions with  उद्योग  awards  ,  including the Best  नई   कलाकार   ग्रैमी  in 1987 with Bruce Hornsby and the Range  ,  the  बेहतरीन  Bluegrass Recording Grammy in 1990 , and the  बेहतरीन  Pop  इंस्ट्रूमेंटल   ग्रैमी   in  1993 .
Hornsby has  भी   हासिल   मान्यता   लिये   उसके   सोलो  albums  और  performances , his  touring  band Bruce Hornsby and the Noisemakers , his bluegrass project with Ricky Skaggs and  उसके   दिखावे   as  a session- and guest-musician  .
he  also collaborated with Grateful Dead and was a member of the band  इससे  September 1990 to March 1992 , playing at over one hundred shows during  कि  period .
Sugarcane  वृक्षारोपण  in rural Cuba
Agriculture  in  Cuba has played an important part in the  अर्थव्यवस्था   लिये  several hundred  सालो   .
Agriculture  contributes  less than  10  percent to the gross domestic product (  जीडीपी  )  ,  but it employs roughly 20 percent  of  the  working  population .
परिचय  30  प्रतिशत  of the country 's  जमीन  is used for crop cultivation .
The inefficient agricultural  उद्योग  in Cuba has led to the  need  to import large amounts of foods  .
Cuba now imports about 80 % of  the  food it rations to  the  public .
The rationing program accounts for  परिचय   a  third  of  the food energy the average Cuban  consumes  .
overall  , however , Cuba is  निर्भर   on  imports for only 16  %  of its food .

Mega Millions  (  initially called The Big Game  आचमन  Millions as  the  successor of The Big  खेल  ) is an American multi-jurisdictional $  1  lottery game .
the  first  (  The  बिग   खेल  ) Mega  लाखो   आरेखण   थी  in 2002 ( see  नीचे  ) .
The minimum Mega Millions advertised jackpot  is  $ 12,000,000 , paid in 26 equal yearly installments (  जबतक  the cash option is chosen )  ;   प्रायः  , the jackpot increases  जब   वहीँ  is  no  top-prize winner .
However , despite no  जैकपॉट  winner for  the  $ 12,000,000 December 18 , 2012 drawing  ,  the jackpot remained at $ 12,000,000 for the drawing to be  आयोजित  on  दिसम्बर  21 .
(  देखिए  below for information on how the game  's  jackpot is funded . )
Reflecting common practice among American  lotteries  ,  the  jackpot is advertised as a nominal  मान  of annual installments  .
a  cash value option ( the usual  चुनाव   )  , when chosen by  a  jackpot  विजेता  ( see below  )  , pays the approximate  उपस्थित  value of the installments .
आचमन   लाखो  currently uses a 5/56 ( white balls ) plus  1/46  ( the  आचमन   बॉल  ) double matrix  to  select its winning numbers .
प्रत्येक  game  लागत  $  1  .
In  43  of the 44 Mega Millions jurisdictions (  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  is  the  exception ) ,  वहीँ  is an option ,  पुकारा  Megaplier ( such games  हैं  $ 2 each ) where  non-jackpot  prizes are multiplied by 2 ,  3   ,  or 4  .
the  Megaplier was made available  to   सब   आचमन  Millions jurisdictions in January 2011 ; it  began  as  a   टेक्सास  -only option .
Mega Millions is drawn at 10:59 p.m. Eastern time Tuesdays and Fridays , including  छुट्टियाँ  .
Mega  लाखो  is administered by a consortium  of  its 12 original lotteries  और  the  drawings  are  आयोजित  at  wsb-tv  in Atlanta , Georgia .
supervised  by  the Georgia  लॉटरी  .
The largest jackpot in  आचमन  Millions , as  खूब  as  in  American lottery history , was $ 656,000,000 annuitized  (   साथ  a cash option of $ 474,000,000 ) for the March  30  , 2012  आरेखण  in which there were three jackpot-winning tickets ; one  प्रत्येक  in Illinois , Kansas ,  और  Maryland .
सब   तीन  tickets  था   महरूम  claimed as of April 18 , with  प्रत्येक  set of winners choosing the cash option .
is a Japanese manga series created by writer Tsugumi Ohba and  manga  artist Takeshi Obata .
The main character  is   लाइट  Yagami , a high  स्कूल  student who discovers a supernatural notebook , the `` Death Note '' , dropped on  धरती   by  a shinigami ( a god  of  death ) named  ryuk  .
The Death Note grants its  उपयोक्ता  the ability to kill  anyone  whose name and  फेस   वे  know  ,   by  writing the  नाम  in the notebook while picturing their face  .
The series centers  around  Light 's attempt  to   बनाएँ  and rule a world ``  cleansed  of evil '' as `` God '' using the notebook , and the efforts of a detective known  as   l  to  रोकें  him  .
Death Note  थी  first  serialized  in 108 chapters by  shueisha  in the Japanese manga magazine Weekly Shōnen Jump from December 2003 to May 2006 .
The  श्रेणी  was also published  in  tankōbon format in  जापानी   starting   in  May  2004   और  ending in October 2006 with a total of thirteen volumes .
the   दुश्मनी  series aired in Japan  इससे  October 3  ,  2006 , to June 26  ,  2007 .
रचित  of  37  episodes , the anime was developed by  madhouse   और  directed by Tetsuro  araki  .
A light novel based on the series , written by Nisio Isin , was released  in  Japan  .
Additionally  ,  various video games  have   महरूम  published by  कोनामी  for  निन्टेंडो  DS .
the  series  थी  adapted into live-action films  released  in Japan on June 17 , 2006 , November  3  , 2006  ,  and February  2   ,  2008 .
Viz Media licensed the Death  नोट  manga in  उत्तर  America and has published all the twelve volumes from the series , a 13th volume which serves as a ``  रीडर  's guide  ''  , as well as the  लाइट   novels  .
The episodes from the anime  पहला   appeared  in North America as downloadable by IGN  .
Viz later licensed the anime series and it  aired  on Bionix in Canada and  on   कार्टून  Network in the United States .
The live-action films  briefly   निभाई  in certain North American  थिएटर   चूंकि  2008 .
However  ,  none of the  वीडियो  games have  यूँ   दूर  been published in North America or  यूरोपीय  .
Death  नोट  is one of Weekly Shōnen Jumps best-selling  manga  series  of  all time  ,  with sales  over  26.5 million copies .
Halloween or Hallowe'en ( a contraction of  ``  All Hallows ' Evening `` ) ,  भी  known as All  hallows  '  संध्या   ,  is a  वार्षिक  celebration observed  in  a number of countries on October 31 ,  the  eve of the Western Christian feast of All Hallows ( or All Saints ) and the day initiating  the  triduum of Hallowmas .
According to many scholars , All  hallows  ' Eve is  a  Christianised feast  originally  influenced by  पश्चिमी  European harvest festivals , and festivals of the dead  साथ   संभावित  pagan  जड़ें   ,  particularly the Celtic Samhain  .
Other scholars  maintain  that it originated independently of Samhain and has solely Christian roots .
Typical festive Halloween activities include trick-or-treating ( also  ज्ञात  as `` guising ``  )  , attending costume parties  ,  carving pumpkins into jack-o'-lanterns , lighting bonfires  ,  apple bobbing  ,  visiting haunted attractions , playing  pranks  ,  telling  scary  कहानियां  , and watching horror films .
New York City taxicabs during  midtown  rush hour in Manhattan
The taxicabs  of  New York City ,  साथ  their distinctive yellow paint , are a widely recognized icon of the city .
taxicabs  are operated by private companies and licensed by the New York  नगर  Taxi and Limousine Commission ( TLC )  .
It also oversees over 40,000 other  for-hire  vehicles ,  सहित   ``   ब्लैक  cars ''  ,  commuter  वैन  and ambulettes .
``  medallion  taxis , '' the  परिचित  yellow cabs ,  हैं  the only vehicles in the city  permitted  to pick up passengers  in  response to  a  street hail .
Schematic cross section of part of leaf , xylem shown  as  red circles at  फिगर  8  .
Xylem is one of the two types of transport  ऊतक  in vascular  पौधे  ( phloem is  the  other ) .
The word xylem is derived from the Greek word ξύλον  (   xylon  ) , meaning `` wood ''  ;  the best-known xylem tissue is wood  ,  though it  is  found throughout the plant .
इसके  basic function is to transport water ,  लकिन  it also transports some  nutrients  through  the  plant .
u.S.  women suffragists demonstrating for  the  right to vote ,  फ़रवरी  1913 .
Women 's suffrage also known  as  woman suffrage is the right of women to vote and to run for office .
Limited  मतदान  rights were  gained  by women in Sweden , Finland  और  some western U.S. states  in  the late  19th  century .
International organizations were formed to coordinate efforts , especially the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Council of Women  (  1888  )   और   the  International  स्त्री  Suffrage Alliance ( 1904 )  .
In  1893  , New  जीलैंड  , then a self-governing British colony , granted  वयस्क  women the right to vote and  the  self-governing British colony of  दक्षिण  Australia did the same in 1895 , but  भी   permitted  women to  चलाएं   लिये  office  .
Australia federated in 1901 , and women acquired the right to vote and stand in federal elections from 1902 ,  हालांकि   uneven  restrictions on Aboriginal  महिलाओं  voting in  नेशनल  elections  यहूद  not  completely  removed until 1962 .
The  पहला  European country to introduce women 's suffrage was the Grand Duchy of Finland , then part of  the  Russian Empire  ,   जिससे  also  उत्पादित  the  संसार  's first female members of  पार्लियामेंट  in the 1907 parliamentary elections .
Norway followed ,  granting  full women 's suffrage  in   1913  .
In most Western countries  ,  women  's  suffrage came after World I War I I , with some important late  अनुकूलक  being France in 1944  और  Switzerland in  1971  .
Women 's  suffrage   रै  generally been recognized after political campaigns to obtain it were waged .
In many countries  it  was granted before universal suffrage .
Women 's suffrage is explicitly stated as a  सही  under the Convention on the  विलोपन   of  All  फ़ॉर्म  of Discrimination Against Women ,  अपनाया  by the United Nations in  1979   .
The Thirteenth  टेल  (  2006  ) by Diane Setterfield is a gothic suspense novel , the author 's first published book .
यहोवा  's Witnesses  is  a millenarian  restorationist  Christian denomination with nontrinitarian beliefs  पृथक  from mainstream Christianity .Sources for  descriptors  : •  millenarian  :  •  Restorationist : • Christian : • Denomination  :  The organization  रिपोर्ट्स  worldwide membership of over 7.78 million adherents involved  in  evangelism , convention attendance of over  12  million , and  सालाना  Memorial attendance of over 19  लाख  .
वे  are directed  by  the  शासी   देह  of Jehovah 's Witnesses , a group  of  elders in Brooklyn  ,   नई  York , that  establishes  all doctrines .
Jehovah 's Witnesses  '   मान्यताओं  are based on  उनके  interpretations of the Bible and they prefer to use their own translation , the New World Translation  of  the  पावन  Scriptures .
They believe that the destruction of  the  present world  प्रणाली  at  armageddon  is imminent ,  और  that the establishment of God 's kingdom on earth is  the   तभी   समाधान  for  सब  problems faced by mankind  .
The group emerged from the Bible Student movement —founded in the late 1870s by Charles  taze  Russell  साथ  the formation of Zion 's Watch Tower Tract Society —with  significant  organizational and doctrinal changes under the leadership of Joseph Franklin Rutherford .
The name Jehovah  's   गवाह  , based on Isaiah  43:10–12  ,  थी   अपनाया  in 1931 to distinguish themselves from other Bible Student  समूह  and symbolize a break with the legacy of Russell 's traditions .
Jehovah 's Witnesses  हैं  best known for their  door-to-door   उपदेश   ,  distributing literature such  as  The  बुर्ज  and  जाग  !
, and refusing military  सेवा  and blood transfusions  .
They  consider  use of the name Jehovah vital for proper  इबादत  .
वे  reject Trinitarianism , inherent immortality of  the   आत्मा  ,  और  hellfire , which  वे  consider to be unscriptural doctrines  .
They do not observe Christmas , Easter , birthdays , or other holidays and  कस्टम  they consider to have pagan  origins  incompatible  साथ   christianity  .
Adherents commonly refer to their body of beliefs as  ``  the truth '' and consider themselves to be ``  in   the  truth  ''  .
They consider secular society to be morally corrupt  और  under the influence  of   शैतानी  , and  सबसे  limit their  सोशल  interaction with non-Witnesses .
Congregational  अनुशासनात्मक   क्रियाएँ  include disfellowshipping  ,  their term for formal expulsion and shunning .
Baptized individuals who formally leave are considered disassociated  और   हैं  also shunned .
Disfellowshipped and  disassociated  individuals may eventually be reinstated  if  deemed repentant  .
The religion 's position  regarding  conscientious  आपत्ति  to  सैन्य  service and  refusal  to salute national flags has brought it into conflict with some governments .
Consequently , Jehovah 's  गवाह  have been persecuted and  उनके  activities  हैं   बैन  or restricted in some countries .
persistent  legal challenges by Jehovah 's Witnesses have influenced legislation  सम्बन्धित  to civil rights in several countries .
Last Tango  in  Paris  (  ) is a 1972 Franco-Italian romantic  नाटक  film directed by Bernardo Bertolucci which portrays a recent American widower who begins an anonymous sexual relationship with a  यंग  , betrothed Parisian woman .
It stars  मार्लोन   ब्रैंडो   ,   मरिया  Schneider , and Jean-Pierre Léaud .
The film 's raw portrayal  of  sexual violence and emotional turmoil led to international controversy and drew various  स्तर  of government censorship .
The  mpaa  gave the film an X rating upon release in the United States .
After revisions were made to  the  MPAA ratings  कोड  ,  it  was classified  as  an NC-17 in 1997 .
mgm  released a  censored  R-rated cut in 1981 .
the  film  रै  its NC-17  दरजा  for `` some explicit  यौन  content  .  ''
खिड़कियाँ  XP  is  an  ऑपरेटिंग  system produced by Microsoft for use  on  personal computers , including home and  कारोबार  desktops , laptops  और   मीडिया  centers .
First  released   to   कंप्यूटर  manufacturers on August 24 , 2001 , it is the second most popular  संस्करण  of Windows , based on installed  उपयोक्ता  base .
The  नाम  ``  xp  '' is short  लिये   ``  eXPerience '' , highlighting the enhanced  उपयोक्ता  experience .
Windows XP  ,   the  successor  to  Windows 2000 and Windows ME , was the first consumer-oriented operating system produced by Microsoft to be  निर्मित  on the Windows NT kernel .
Windows  xp  was released  विश्वव्यापी  for retail  बिक्री  on October 25 , 2001 , and over 400  लाख  copies were in use  in  January 2006  .
It was succeeded by Windows Vista  in  January  2007  .
Direct OEM  और   खुदरा  sales of Windows XP ceased  on  June 30 , 2008 .
Microsoft continued to sell Windows XP through  उनके  System Builders ( smaller OEMs who sell assembled computers )  कार्यक्रम   जबतक  January 31 , 2009 .
On April  10  , 2012 , Microsoft reaffirmed that  विस्तारित  support for Windows XP and Office 2003 would end on  अप्रैल  8 , 2014 and suggested that administrators begin preparing  to  migrate to  a  newer  os  .
The NT -based versions of Windows ,  जिससे  are programmed in C  ,  C++ , and assembly , are known for their improved  स्थिरता  and efficiency over the 9x versions of  microsoft  Windows .
Windows XP presented a  significantly  redesigned graphical  उपयोक्ता  interface , a change  microsoft  promoted as more user-friendly than previous versions of Windows .
in  an attempt to further ameliorate the `` DLL hell  ``   कि  plagued the past  संस्करण  of Windows , improved side-by-side assembly technology in  खिड़कियाँ   xp  allows side-by-side installation  ,  registration  और  servicing of  अनेक  versions of globally shared  तन्त्र  components in  पूरा  isolation .
It is also the first  संस्करण  of Windows to use  उत्पाद  activation to combat illegal copying  .
During Windows XP 's development , the project  थी  codenamed ``  whistler   ''   ,  after Whistler , British  कोलंबिया  , as many Microsoft employees skied at the Whistler-Blackcomb ski resort .
According to web  analytics  data  उत्पन्न  by Net Applications , Windows  xp   थी  the  सबसे  widely used operating  प्रणाली   जबतक  August 2012 ,  जब   खिड़कियाँ   7  overtook it .
, Windows XP market share is at 38.99 % ,  having  decreased  लगभग  every month since at least November 2007 , the  पहला  month for which statistics are publicly available from Net  अनुप्रयोग  .
`` Por  ऊना  Cabeza '' is an Argentine tango with  म्यूज़िक  and lyrics written  in  1935 by Carlos Gardel and Alfredo Le Pera respectively .
The  नाम   is  a  स्पेनी  horse-racing  phrase   अर्थ  ``  by   a  head '' , which refers to  a  horse winning a race  by  the length of  एक  head .
The  गीत  speak of a compulsive  horse-track  gambler who compares his addiction  लिये  horses  साथ  his attraction to  महिलाओं  .
Alfredo Le Pera  थी  a Brazilian from São Paulo , a much Italian-influenced  क्षेत्रफल  in Brazil , and also the birthplace of Zequinha de Abreu , composer of Tico-Tico  no  Fubá .
le  Pera and Gardel died in an airplane crash  in  Medellín , ( Colombia ) , on June 24 ,  1935  .
Por una Cabeza
The tango has since been performed by numerous tango orchestras .
Tango scenes  साथ   ``  Por una Cabeza '' appear in Delicatessen ( 1991 )  ,  Scent of a Woman ( 1992  )  , Schindler 's List ( 1993  )  , True  झूठ  ( 1994 ) , Titanic ( 1996 ) , Bad Santa ( Uncut  संस्करण  , 2003 ) , All the King 's Men ( 2006  )  , Planet 51 (  2009  ) , episode 37 of  nip/tuck  ( 2003–2010  )  , episode  9  of South Korean drama series  मीठी  Spy ( 2005–08 ) , the beginning and ending credits of the South Korean drama broadcast I 'm  sorry  , I Love You (  2004  ) , and  the   एपीसोड  ``  bas  the  खरगोश  Hole ``  (  2007 ) .
In  the  movie Frida ( Salma Hayek , 2002 ) , Gardel is heard singing it  on  a  रेडियो  .
It is also quoted in David  डेल  Tredici  's  `` Good  न्यूज   !
Nilda is Back ''  (  from the song cycle Miz  inez  Sez ) .
In Scent of a Woman (  1992   )  , the tango is performed by the ``  the  Tango Project '' , who actually appear in the dancing scene  अभिनीत   al  Pacino  (  the recording  प्रयुक्त   is  available on  एक  of  उनके  CD albums )  .
John Williams arranged a version of the  टुकड़ा  that appears on the album `` Cinema Serenade '' with the  सारंगी  solo performed by Itzhak Perlman .
Perlman and Williams ( conducting ) have  भी   performed  the piece together  in   सजीव  concerts .
in  2012 a dance version was released by  the  group ``  da  Carrera '' featuring the original vocal recording by Carlos Gardel  .
The baroreflex or baroreceptor reflex is one of the  देह   's  homeostatic mechanisms for  maintaining   रक्त  pressure .
It  provides  a negative feedback loop in which an elevated blood pressure reflexively causes heart rate  to  decrease  इसलिए  causing blood pressure  to   घटी  ; likewise , decreased  रक्त  pressure activates the baroreflex , causing heart rate to increase thus causing an increase in blood  दबाव  .
The system relies on specialized neurons , known as baroreceptors , in  the  aortic arch , carotid sinuses ,  और  elsewhere to  मॉनिटर  changes in  रक्त  pressure and relay them to the brainstem .
Subsequent  परिवर्तन   in  blood pressure are mediated by the  autonomic  nervous system .
Atrial  natriuretic  peptide forms a  समानांतर  negative feedback  लूप  in an endocrinological  कंट्रास्ट  to the renin-angiotensin system .
The Loma  prieta  earthquake , also known as the Quake of '89 and the World Series Earthquake , was a major earthquake that struck the San Francisco  खाड़ी  Area of California on October 17 , 1989 , at 5:04 pm local time  .
Caused by a slip along  the  San Andreas Fault , the quake lasted 10–15 seconds and  measured  6.9 on  दोनो  the moment magnitude scale (  surface-wave  magnitude 7.1 ) and on the open-ended Richter Scale  .
The  भूकंप  killed 63 people throughout northern California , injured 3,757 and left some  3,000–12,000  people homeless .
The earthquake occurred during  the  warm-up practice for  the   तीसरा   खेल  of  the   1989  World Series ,  featuring   दोनो   of   the  Bay Area  's  Major League Baseball teams  ,  the Oakland  एथलेटिक्स   और   the  San Francisco Giants .
Because of game-related sports coverage , this  थी  the first major earthquake in the United States to have its  आरंभिक   धक्का  broadcast live on television  .
Pawn in the standard  staunton   पैटर्न
The pawn ( ♙♟ ) is  the  most numerous  और  in most circumstances  the  weakest piece in the game of chess ,  historically  representing infantry or , more particularly , armed peasants or  pikemen  .
In chess , each player begins the  खेल  with eight pawns ,  एक   on  each square of the rank  तत्काल   in  front of  the  other pieces .
(   in  algebraic notation , the white pawns start on a2 ,  b2  ,  c2  , ... , h2 ,  जबकि  black pawns start on a7 , b7 , c7 ,  ...  , h7  .  )
Individual pawns are referred to by the file on which they stand  .
लिये  example , one speaks of `` White 's f-pawn ''  or  `` Black 's  b-pawn  ''  ,  or less commonly  (  using descriptive notation  )  , `` White 's king 's bishop pawn  ''  or `` Black 's queen 's  नाईट  pawn  ''   .
it   is  also common to  refer  to a rook pawn  ,  meaning any  साहूकार  on the a- or  h-file  , a knight  साहूकार  (  on  the b- or g-file ) ,  a  bishop pawn (  on  the  c-  or f-file  )  , a queen pawn ( on the  d-file   )  , a king pawn  (  on the  e-file  ) ,  और  a central pawn ( on either  the  d- or  e-file  ) .
The military forces of the world  have  differing approaches to  the   enlistment  of homosexual ( gay and lesbian ) and bisexual individuals  .
The armed forces of most developed  देशों  have  अभी  removed policies excluding  non-heterosexual  individuals  (  with strict  नीतियों  on sexual harassment ) .
Nations that permit gay people to serve openly in the military  शामिल  the 4 of the 5  सदस्यों  of the UN  सुरक्षा  Council ( United  राज्य  ,  संयुक्त   किंगडम   ,   फ़्रांस   ,  and Russia  )   ,  the Republic of  चीन  ( Taiwan ) , Australia ,  इसराईल  , South Africa , Argentina , and all  नाटो   सदस्यों  excluding Turkey .
Hydrogen production is  the  family of industrial methods for generating hydrogen .
फिलहाल  the dominant technology for direct production  is  steam reforming  इससे  hydrocarbons .
अनेक  other  विधि  are known including electrolysis and thermolysis .
In 2006 , the United States was estimated to have a production capacity of 11 million tonnes of hydrogen .
5   लाख  tonnes of hydrogen  यहूद   खपत  on-site in oil refining  ,  and in the production of ammonia ( Haber process ) and methanol ( reduction of carbon  मोनोऑक्साइड  ) .
0.4  million tonnes were an incidental  by-product  of the chlor-alkali  प्रक्रम  .
हाइड्रोजन  production is an  अनुमानित  $ 100  अरब   उद्योग  .
a  basis point ( often denoted as bp , colloquially referred to in the plural as `` bips  ''   ,  also  ज्ञात  as  a  ``  बीप  '' ) is a unit  बराबर  to one hundredth of a percentage  पाइंट  , or one part per ten thousand ,  1/10000  .
the  same  ईकाई  is also ( rarely ) called a permyriad , literally meaning  'for  ( every  )  myriad ( ten thousand ) ' ,  और   in  that  कॉन्टेक्स्ट  is written with which looks like a percent sign ( % ) with  दो  extra zeroes at  the  end ( like a stylized form  of  the four  zeros   in  the denominator , although it  originates  as  a  natural  एक्सटेंशन  of the percent ( % ) and  permille  ( ‰  )   लक्षण  ) .
A basis point is defined  as:
1 basis point = 1 permyriad =  एक  one-hundredth percent
1 bp = 1 = 0.01 %  =  0.1‰ =  10−4   =  = 0.0001
1   %  =  100  bp  =  100
Basis points are  प्रयुक्त   as  a convenient unit of measurement  in  contexts where  प्रतिशत  differences of  कम   than  1 % are discussed .
The most common example is interest rates , where  मतभेद  in interest rates of less than 1 %  प्रति  year are usually  सार्थक   to  talk  परिचय  .
लिये   उदाहरण  , a difference of  0.10   प्रतिशत  points is equivalent  to  a change of  10  basis points ( e.g . a  4.67  % rate increases by  10  basis points to  4.77  % )  .
Like percentage points , basis points  avoid   the  ambiguity  between  relative  और   निरपेक्ष  discussions about interest rates by dealing  तभी  with the absolute change  in  numeric value of a rate .
For example , if a  रपट  says there has been  a  `` 1 % increase '' from a  10   %  interest rate ,  इस  could refer to an increase either from 10 % to 10.1 % ( relative  ,   1  %  of   10  % )  ,  or from  10  % to 11 % (  निरपेक्ष  , 1 % plus 10  %  ) .
if  , however , the report says there  रै  been a `` 10 basis point increase '' from a 10  %  interest rate , then we know that the interest rate of 10 % has increased by 0.10 % ( the  निरपेक्ष  change ) to a 10.1 %  रेट  .
It is  आम  practice in the  वित्तीय  industry to use  आधार  points to  denote  a rate change in a financial instrument  ,  or the difference ( spread ) between two interest rates , including the yields of fixed-income securities .
Since certain  लोन  and bonds may commonly be quoted in relation to some index or underlying security , they will often be quoted as  a  spread over ( or under ) the index .
For  उदाहरण  , a loan that bears interest of 0.50 % per annum above the London Interbank Offered Rate ( LIBOR ) is said to be  50   आधार  points  over  LIBOR ,  जिससे  is commonly expressed as `` L+50bps '' or simply `` L+50 ''  .
The term `` basis  पाइंट  '' has its  origins  in trading the  ``  basis '' or the spread between two interest rates .
चूंकि  the  आधार  is usually small ,  ये  are quoted multiplied up  by  10000 , and hence a `` full point  ''  movement in  the  `` basis '' is  a  basis point .
Contrast with  pips   in  FX forward markets .
the  relationship between  प्रतिशत  changes and  आधार  points can be summarized  as  follows : 1 percentage  पाइंट  change = 100 basis  अंक  , and 0.01 percentage  अंक  = 1 basis point .
So , a bond whose yield increases from 5  %  to 5.5  %  is  कहा  to increase by  50  basis  अंक  ;  or  interest rates  कि   have  risen 1 percentage point are said  to  have increased  by   100  basis points .
The British Royal Family is  the  group of close relatives of the  monarch  of the United Kingdom .
the  term is also commonly applied to the same group of people  जो  are the relations of the monarch in  उसके  or his role  as  sovereign  of  any of the  अन्य   राष्ट्रमंडल  realms , thus sometimes at variance with official national terms for the family .
Members of the Royal Family belong to  ,  either by  जनम  or marriage ,  the  House  of  Windsor , since 1917 , when George  v  changed  the  name of the royal house from  saxe-coburg  and Gotha  .
This decision was primarily taken because Britain  और  her Empire were at  युद्ध  with Germany and given  the  British Royal Family 's strong German  ancestry  ;  it   थी  felt that its public  चित्र  could be improved by  चुनना  a more British  हाउस  name .
the  new name  चुनी   ,  Windsor , had absolutely no  कनेक्शन  other than  as   the   नाम  of  the  castle which was and  continues  to be a royal residence .
Although in the United Kingdom there is  no  strict legal or formal definition  of  who is  or  is not a member of the Royal  परिवार   ,  and different lists will include  अलग  people , those carrying the style Her or His  majesty  ( HM  )  , or Her or His Royal Highness ( HRH )  हैं  always considered members ,  जिससे  usually  परिणाम  in the  अनुप्रयोग  of the term to the monarch  ,  the consort of the monarch  ,   the  widowed  consorts  of previous monarchs , the children of the  monarch  and  पिछला   monarchs  , the male-line grandchildren of the monarch and previous monarchs , and the  spouses   और  the widows of a monarch 's and previous monarch 's  बेटे  and male-line grandsons  .
on  30 November 1917 , King George V issued Letters Patent defining who are members of the Royal Family  ;  the  टेक्स्ट  of the notice from the  लंदन  Gazette is as follows:
In 1996 , Her Majesty  the   महारानी  modified these Letters Patent , as was evidenced by  इस  Notice from the London Gazette:
In 2013  अक्षर   पेटेंट   यहूद  issued to  extend  a title and a style borne by  सदस्यों   of  the Royal Family to additional persons to be  born  ,  evidenced  by  इस  Notice  इससे  the  लंदन  Gazette:
सदस्यों  and relatives of the British  royal  Family historically represented the monarch in various  स्थान   throughout  the  अंग्रेजों   साम्राज्य  , sometimes for extended periods  as  viceroys ,  or  for specific  ceremonies  or events  .
आज  ,  वे  often perform  ceremonial  and social duties throughout  the  United  किंगडम  and  विदेश  on behalf of the United Kingdom .
Aside from  the  monarch ,  उनके  only  संवैधानिक  role in the affairs of government is to serve , if eligible and when appointed by  अक्षर  patent , as  a  Counsellor  of   राज्य  , two  or  more of  जिसको  exercise the authority  of   the  Crown  (  within stipulated limits )  in   the  indisposal or absence  इससे  the British realm of the  monarch  .
In the other realms  of  the Commonwealth royalty do not serve as Counsellors  of  State  .
However in  प्रत्येक  such realm  the  monarch 's family members may act  on  behalf of  ,  are funded by , and represent  the  sovereign of that particular state  ,  and not the United Kingdom .
The Queen , her consort , her children and grandchildren  ,  as well as  सब  former  अधिपति  ' children and grandchildren hold places in the first sections of the  आधिकारिक  orders of precedence in England  और  Wales , Scotland , and Northern Ireland  .
Wives of the said  आनंद   उनके  husbands  '   पूर्वता  , and husbands of  राजकुमारियों   हैं  unofficially but  habitually  placed with their wives  as  well .
However , the Queen changed the private order of precedence in  the  Royal Family in favour of  राजकुमारियों  Anne and Alexandra  ,   जो   henceforth  take  निजी  precedence  over  the Duchess  of  Cornwall , who is otherwise  the  realm 's  उच्चतम  ranking woman after  the  Queen herself  .
वो  did not  alter  the  सापेक्ष  precedence of other born-princesses  ,  such as  the  daughters  of  her younger  बेटे  .
Haiti ( ; Haitian Creole Ayiti )  ,   officially  the  गणतंत्र  of Haiti (  ;  ) , is a Caribbean country  .
it  occupies the western , smaller portion of the  द्वीप  of Hispaniola  ,  in the Greater  antillean  archipelago  ,  which  it   साझा  with the Dominican Republic  .
ayiti  (  जमीन  of high  kyu  ) was the indigenous Taíno or Amerindian  नाम  for the island .
The country 's highest point  is  Pic la Selle ,  at   .
The  कुल  area of Haiti is  और  its capital is  port-au-prince  .
Haitian Creole and French  हैं  the official  भाषाएं  .
Haiti 's regional  ,  historical  ,  and ethno-linguistic position is unique for several reasons .
It was the first independent nation  of  Latin America and the  caribbean   ,  the first black -led republic in the world , and the second republic in  the   americas  when it  gained  independence in 1804 as part of a  कामयाब  slave revolution lasting nearly a decade .
In 2012  ,  Haiti announced its  इरादे  to seek associate membership status  in  the African Union .
हैती  is the most  populous  of the predominantly Francophone independent nations in the  americas   .
It is one of only two  स्वतंत्र   राष्ट्र  in  the   americas  ( along  साथ  Canada ) to  designate  French as an official language ; the other French-speaking areas are all overseas départements , or  collectivités  , of France .
Haiti is  the  most populous full member-state of the Caribbean Community  (  CARICOM ) .
It is  the  poorest country in the Americas  as  measured  by  the Human Development Index .
राजनैतिक  violence has occurred regularly throughout  इसके  history , leading to government  अस्थिरता  .
Most recently  ,  in February 2004 , a coup d'état originating  in  the  उत्तर  of the  देश   मजबूर   the  resignation and exile of  अध्यक्ष  Jean-Bertrand Aristide .
a  provisional government took control with  सुरक्षा  provided by the United Nations Stabilization  मिशन  in Haiti ( MINUSTAH ) .
Michel Martelly , the  वर्तमान  president , was  निर्वाचित   in  the  haitian   सामान्य   चुनाव  , 2011 .
The island has had a history of destructive earthquakes .
A  7.0  magnitude earthquake struck  हैती  on  12  January 2010  और  devastated Port-au-Prince .
The highest reliable  मौत  count was estimated at 220,000 .
Haitian  सरकारी   estimates   यहूद  higher .
The Presidential  राजमहल  , Parliament and many other important structures  यहूद  destroyed , along with countless homes and businesses , leaving  सैंकड़ों   of  thousands of  लोगों  homeless .
The country has yet to recover from the 2010 earthquake  (  and subsequent incidents ) due to both the severity of the damage Haiti  endured   in  2010 ,  as  well as a government that was  अप्रभावी  well  पहले  the earthquake .
संयुक्त   राज्य  aid organizations have donated $ 2 billion  .
Combined with other international donations , these funds are intended to contribute to the rebuilding of the country .
The Bloody Beetroots is the pseudonym of Sir Bob Cornelius Rifo , the Italian electro house and dance-punk music producer , DJ and photographer .
The Bloody Beetroots  is  well-known for the black Venom mask he  wears  during performances  .
in  fact , the  तभी   identifying  public feature of Rifo is  the  year  ``  1977 '' tattooed across his chest , which is both  the   साल  that the producer and punk-rock was born .
``  The Bloody  beetroots  DJ set '' contains Sir Bob Cornelius Rifo  और  Tommy Tea  .
A Motorola  सलाहकार   alphanumeric  pager used in Brazil in the 1990s , operated by Teletrim
A pager is a wireless telecommunications device that receives and displays numeric or  टेक्स्ट  messages , or receives and announces voice messages .
One-way  pagers  can only receive messages , while  जवाब  pagers and  two-way  pagers can also acknowledge  ,  reply to ,  और  originate messages using an  आतंरिक  transmitter .
Pagers operate as part  of  a paging system which  शामिल  one or more  फिक्स्ड  transmitters ( or  in  the case of response pagers and two-way pagers  ,  one or  अधिक  base stations ) , as well  as  a number of pagers carried by mobile users .
These systems can range  इससे  a  रेस्तरां  system with a single low-power  ट्रांसमीटर   ,  to  a  nationwide system with thousands of high-power base stations  .
One of the first  व्यावहारिक  paging  सेवाएं  was launched in 1950  लिये  physicians in the New York City area .
Physicians  सशुल्क  US $  12  per month for  the  service  और  carried  a  ( 6 oz ) pager that would receive phone messages within (  25  mi ) of a  सिंगल  transmitter tower .
The system was manufactured by the  reevesound   कम्पनी  and  संचालित   by  Telanswerphone  .
In 1960 ,  जॉन   फ्रांसिस   मिशेल  combined elements  of   मोटोरोला  's Walkie Talkie and automobile radio technologies  to  create the first  transistorized  pager , and from  इस  point ,  paging  technology continued to  अग्रिम   ,  and pager  अपनाना  continued to  विस्तार  , until the early 1990s  .
However , by the mid-1990s , as cellular technologies  became  cheaper and more widely available , advanced services began to displace paging as a  वाणिज्यिक  product .
आज  , pagers exist  largely   as  niche  उत्पाद   ,   ढूंढना   preferential  use in  अनुप्रयोग  such as  अस्पताल  , public safety , and retail locations  जहाँ   उनके  simplicity , high reliability , and low cost represent significant advantages .
Reevesville is a town  in  Dorchester County , South Carolina , United States  .
The population was  196  at the 2010  जनसांख्यिकी  .
As defined by  the  U.S. Office of Management and  बजट  , and used by the U.S. Census  ब्यूरो  for statistical purposes only , Reevesville  is  included within the Charleston-North Charleston-Summerville metropolitan area .
frida  Kahlo de Rivera ( born  magdalena  Carmen Frieda Kahlo y Calderón ; July 6  ,  1907 –  जुलाई  13 ,  1954  ) was  a  Mexican painter , born in Coyoacán , who is best known for her self-portraits .
Kahlo 's life began and ended  in  Mexico City  ,  in her  घर  known as the Blue House .
She gave her  जनम  date as July 7 , 1910  ,  but her birth certificate shows July 6 , 1907  .
Kahlo had allegedly wanted  the  year of her birth to  coincide  with  the  year of  the  beginning of the Mexican revolution so that her life would begin with  the  birth of modern  मैक्सिको  .
Her work  रै  been celebrated in Mexico as emblematic of  नेशनल  and  स्वदेशी  tradition , and by feminists for its uncompromising depiction of the female experience and form .
Mexican culture  और  Amerindian cultural tradition are important in her work , which has  महरूम  sometimes characterized  as  Naïve art or folk art  .
Her work has also been  वर्णित   as  ``  surrealist  '' , and in  1938  André Breton ,  प्रिंसिपल   initiator  of the  surrealist  movement , described Kahlo 's art  as   a  `` ribbon around a  बमबारी   ''  .
Kahlo had a volatile  विवाह  with  the  famous Mexican artist  डिएगो  Rivera  .
She suffered lifelong health problems .
Many of her health  समस्याएं  were the result of  a  traffic accident she survived as a teenager .
Recovering from her injuries isolated her from  अन्य  people and this isolation influenced her works , many of which are self-portraits  of  one sort or  another   .
kahlo  suggested  ,  `` I paint myself because  i  am  so  often alone  और  because I am the subject I know best . ''
वो   भी  stated , `` I was born  a   कुतिया  .
I was  born  a painter .  ''

Theresienwiese  on  the day before Oktoberfest 2006
Oktoberfest is a 16-day  पर्व   celebrating  beer held annually in Munich , Bavaria  ,  Germany , running  इससे   लेट  September to the first  वीकेंड  in October .
It is one of  the  most famous events  in  Germany and is the world  's  largest fair , with more than  6  million  लोगों  from around the  संसार  attending the event every year .
To the locals , it  is   नहीं  called Oktoberfest , but  ``  die Wiesn '' ,  बाद   the  colloquial name of  the   fairgrounds  themselves .
The Oktoberfest  is  an  महत्वपूर्ण  part of  bar  culture , having been held since  1810  .
Other cities across the world also hold Oktoberfest celebrations , modeled after the original Munich event  .
The Munich Oktoberfest originally took place during the sixteen days  up  to ,  और  including , the first Sunday in October .
In  1994   ,  the  अनुसूची  was modified  in  response to  जर्मनी  reunification  so  that  if  the first Sunday  in  October falls on the 1st or 2nd , then  the  festival would go  on  until October 3 ( German  एकता  Day  )  .
Thus , the festival is now  17  days when the first Sunday is  अक्तूबर  2 and 18  दिनों  when it  is   अक्तूबर   1  .
In 2010  ,  the  पर्व  lasted until the first Monday  in  October , to mark  the  anniversary  of  the event .
The festival is held in an area named the Theresienwiese ( field , or meadow , of Therese ) ,  प्रायः  called Wiesn  लिये  short , located near Munich 's center .
Large quantities  of  Oktoberfest Beer are consumed , with almost 7  लाख  liters served during the  16  day festival  in  2007 .
Visitors may also enjoy a wide variety of traditional food such as Hendl ( chicken ) , Schweinebraten ( roast pork ) , Schweinshaxe ( grilled ham hock  )  , Steckerlfisch ( grilled fish on a stick  )  , Würstl ( sausages  )  along with Brezeln (  pretzel  ) , Knödel ( potato or bread dumplings  )  , Käsespätzle (  चीज  noodles ) , Reiberdatschi ( potato pancakes ) ,  sauerkraut  or Rotkohl/Blaukraut ( red cabbage ) along with  ऐसे  Bavarian delicacies as Obatzda ( a spiced cheese-butter spread  )  and Weisswurst (  a  white sausage  )  .

Wheels of Gouda
Cheese is  a  generic term for a diverse group of milk-based food products  .
Cheese is produced in  wide-ranging  flavors ,  बनावट  , and forms .
Cheese consists of  प्रोटीन  and fat from milk , usually the milk of  गायों  ,  भैंस   ,  goats ,  or  sheep .
It is produced by coagulation of the milk protein  casein  .
Typically , the milk is acidified and addition  of  the enzyme  rennet   कल्याणकारी  coagulation .
The solids are separated and pressed into final form .
Some cheeses have molds on the rind or throughout .
Most cheeses  melt  at cooking temperature  .
Hundreds of types  of  cheese from various  देशों  are produced .
Their  शैलियाँ  ,  बनावट  and flavors depend on  the  origin  of  the  मिल्क   (  including the  एनिमल  's diet )  ,   whether  they  have   महरूम  pasteurized , the butterfat  सामग्री  , the bacteria and mold , the processing ,  और  aging .
Herbs  ,  spices  ,  or wood smoke may be used as flavoring agents .
The yellow to  रेड  color of  अनेक  cheeses ,  ऐसे  as  रेड  Leicester  ,  is normally formed from adding  annatto  .
For a  few   cheeses   ,  the milk is curdled by adding acids such as vinegar or lemon juice .
Most cheeses are acidified to  a  lesser  उपाधि  by  जीवाणु  , which turn milk sugars into  लैक्टिक  acid ,  तब   the  addition of rennet completes the curdling .
Vegetarian alternatives to rennet are  उपलब्धियाँ  ; most are produced by fermentation  of  the fungus Mucor miehei , but others have  महरूम  extracted from  विभिन्न  species  of   the  Cynara thistle family .
Cheese is valued for its  पोर्टेबिलिटी   ,  long life  ,  and high content  of  fat ,  प्रोटीन  , calcium  ,  and phosphorus  .
Cheese is  अधिक  compact and has a longer shelf life than milk ,  हालांकि  how long  a   चीज   होगा  keep may  निर्भर  on the type of cheese  ;  labels on packets of cheese often claim that a cheese  चाहिए  be consumed within three to five days of  खोलने   .
Generally  बोलना  ,  मुश्किल  cheeses last longer than soft cheeses , such  as  Brie  or  goat 's milk cheese .
Cheesemakers  निकट  a dairy region may benefit  इससे  fresher , lower-priced milk  ,  and lower  शिपिंग  costs .
The long storage life of some cheese , especially if it is encased  in  a protective  rind   ,   allows  selling  जब   बाज़ार  are favorable .
अतिरिक्त   संघटक  may be added  to  some  cheeses  , such as  ब्लैक  peppers ,  लहसुन  , chives or cranberries  .
A specialist seller  of  cheese is sometimes  ज्ञात  as a cheesemonger  .
To  become   an   विशेषज्ञ  in this field  ,   जैसे   वाइन   or  cooking , requires  कुछ  formal education and years  of   चख  and hands-on experience .
This position is  typically  responsible for all aspects of the cheese inventory ; selecting the  चीज   मेनू   ,   खरीदना  , receiving , storage , and ripening .
Legal citation signals are  a  set of brief abbreviated phrases  or  words used  to   clarify  the authority  or  significance of a legal citation as  it  relates to a proposition .
Signals help  a  reader  जल्दी  discern meaning or usefulness of a particular reference when the reference itself does not  provide  adequate information .
Most citation signals are placed in front of the citation to which they apply .
For example ,  in   the  paragraph When  लिखने  a legal argument , it  is  important to refer to primary sources .
To  assist  readers in locating these  स्त्रोत  ,  it  is desirable to use a standardized citation format .
See generally Harvard Law Review Association  ,  The  bluebook  : A Uniform System of Citation ( 18th ed . 2005 ) .
Note ,  however   ,   कि  some courts may  आवश्यकता  any legal papers that  हैं  submitted  to  them  to  conform to a different citation format  .
the  सिग्नल  is the phrase ``  देखिए  generally , '' which indicates that the citation ``  the  Bluebook : A  वर्दी  System of Citation ( 18th  ed  . 2005 ) '' provides general background information on the topic .
Neil  एल्डन  Armstrong ( August 5 , 1930 – August 25  ,  2012 )  थी  an  अमरीकी   astronaut  and the first person to walk on the Moon .
He was also an  aerospace  engineer , naval aviator ,  परीक्षण   पायलट  , and university professor  .
Before becoming an astronaut , Armstrong  थी  an officer  in   the  U.S. Navy and served in the Korean War .
After the  युद्ध  ,  he   अर्जित  his bachelor 's  उपाधि  at Purdue University  और  served as  a  test pilot at  the  National Advisory Committee for  aeronautics  High-Speed Flight Station , now known  as  the Dryden Flight Research Center ,  जहाँ  he logged  over  900 flights  .
He later  समाप्त  graduate  अध्ययन  at the University of Southern California .
A participant in the U.S. Air Force 's Man in  स्पेस  Soonest and X-20 Dyna-Soar  इंसान   spaceflight  programs  ,   आर्मस्ट्रांग   joined  the NASA Astronaut Corps in 1962  .
He made his  पहला  space  उड़ान  , as command  पायलट  of Gemini 8 , in 1966 , becoming  नासा  's first civilian astronaut to fly  in   स्पेस  .
On this mission , he performed the first docking of two spacecraft , with pilot  दाउद  Scott .
Armstrong 's second and last spaceflight was as  मिशन  commander of  the  Apollo 11 moon landing  ,  in July 1969 .
On this mission  ,  Armstrong and Buzz Aldrin descended  to  the  चंद्र  surface and spent two and a  हाफ   घंटों  exploring  ,   जबकि  Michael  कॉलिन्स  remained in lunar orbit  in  the Command  मोड्यूल  .
Along  साथ  Collins and Aldrin  ,  Armstrong  थी   awarded  the Presidential  पदक  of Freedom by President  रिचर्ड  Nixon ; in 1978  ,  President Jimmy Carter presented Armstrong the Congressional Space Medal of Honor in 1978 ; he and  उसके  former  crewmates  received  the  Congressional  सुनहरा   पदक  in 2009  .
Armstrong died  in  Cincinnati , Ohio , on August 25 ,  2012  , at the age of 82 , after complications  इससे  coronary artery bypass surgery .
Secretariat  (   कूच   30  , 1970 – October  4  , 1989 )  थी  an American Thoroughbred racehorse that  in   1973  became  the  first U.S . Triple Crown champion in 25 years .
He set race  रिकॉर्ड  in all three events in the Series — the Kentucky Derby ( 1:59.4 ) , the Preakness Stakes  (  1:53 ) , and the Belmont  stakes  (  2:24  ) — records that still stand today .
He is  माना  to  be  one of  the  greatest  thoroughbreds   of  all time .
In 1999 , ESPN ranked Secretariat the 35th best athlete of the 20th century ,  the  highest ranking racehorse on the list  url_http  .
He ranked  दूसरी  behind Man o '  युद्ध  in The Blood-Horse 's List  of   the  Top  100   u.S.  Racehorses of  the  20th Century .
सचिवालय  was sired by Bold Ruler out of Somethingroyal  ,   by  Princequillo .
He was foaled  at  The Meadow in Caroline County , Virginia  .
Like  उसके  famous predecessor Man o ' War ,  सचिवालय  was a  विशाल   शाहबलूत  colt  और  was given the same  उपनाम  , `` Big  रेड  .  ''
Secretariat  's   grandsire  , Nasrullah  ,  is also the  great-great-grandsire  of 1977  ट्रिपल  Crown winner Seattle Slew .
स्वामित्व   by  Penny Chenery  ,  he was trained by Lucien  laurin  and mainly ridden by Canadian jockey  रॉन   turcotte  ,  साथ   साथ  apprentice jockey Paul Feliciano ( first two races ) , and  दिग्गज  Eddie Maple ( last race ) .
He raced in Chenery 's Meadow Stable 's  ब्लू  and  श्वेत  checkered colors and his groom  थी  Eddie  स्वेद   .
Secretariat stood  लगभग  tall , and weighed , with a 75-inch girth , in his racing  प्रधान   .
Madrid ( , ) is the capital and largest city of Spain .
the  population  of  the city  is  roughly 3.3  लाख  and the entire  जनसांख्यिकी  of the Madrid metropolitan area is  गणना  to be  around   6.5   लाख  .
It  is  the third-largest city  in  the European  संघ  , after London and Berlin ,  और  its metropolitan area is the third-largest in  the  European  संघ  after London  और  Paris .
The  नगर  spans a  कुल  of .
the  city is located on  the  Manzanares river in the centre of  दोनो  the  देश  and the Community of  मैड्रिड  ( which comprises the city of Madrid ,  इसके  conurbation and extended  उपनगरों   और  villages ) ;  इस  community  is  bordered by the autonomous communities of Castile and León  और  Castile-La Mancha .
As the capital city of Spain , seat  of  government , and residence of the Spanish  monarch  , Madrid is also  the   राजनैतिक  ,  आर्थिक  and  सांस्कृतिक   केन्द्र  of Spain  .
The current mayor is Ana Botella  इससे  the People  's   पार्टी  ( PP ) .
The Madrid urban agglomeration  रै  the third-largest GDP  in   the  European Union  और  its influences in  राजनीती  ,  शिक्षा  ,  entertainment  , environment , media  ,   फ़ैशन  , science , culture  ,  and the  कला  all contribute  to  its status as one of the world  's  major  वैश्विक   शहरों  .
Due to its economic output  ,  high  मानक   of  living  ,  and market size , Madrid  is  considered the major financial  केन्द्र   of  Southern Europe and the Iberian Peninsula ; it hosts  the  head offices of the vast majority of the major  स्पेनी  companies , such as Telefónica , Iberia or  repsol  .
Madrid is the most touristic  नगर   of  Spain , the fourth-most  touristic  of the continent  ,  and the seventh most visited city in the world according  to  Forbes .
Is  the  10th most livable city in the world according to Monocle magazine , in  इसके  2010 index  .
Madrid also ranks among the 12  greenest  European cities in 2010. < ref name=  ''  http : //www.citymayors.com/environment/greenest-cities-europe.html '' > Madrid is currently a Candidate City for the  2020   गर्मियाँ  Olympics .
Madrid houses the  मुख्यालय  of the World Tourism Organization ( WTO )  ,   belonging  to the United  राष्ट्र  Organization ( UN ) , the  segib   ,  the Organization  of  Ibero-American States ( OEI ) ,  और  the Public Interest Oversight  फलक  ( PIOB ) .
It  भी  hosts  प्रमुख  international institutions regulators  of  Spanish : the Standing  कमेटी  of the Association of Spanish  भाषा   अकादमियों  , headquarters of the Royal Spanish Academy (  rae  )  ,  the Cervantes Institute and the Foundation of Urgent Spanish ( Fundéu ) .
Madrid organizes fairs  as   fitur  ,  आरको  , SIMO TCI and the Cibeles Madrid Fashion Week .
While Madrid possesses  a  modern infrastructure , it has preserved the  dekh  and  महसूस   of  many of  इसके  historic neighbourhoods and streets .
Its landmarks include the  royal   राजमहल  of Madrid ; the Teatro  रियल  ( Royal  थिएटर  ) with its restored 1850 Opera House ; the Buen  retiro  Park , founded in  1631  ; the 19th-century National  पुस्तकालयों  building ( founded in 1712 )  containing  some of Spain 's historical archives ; a  विशाल  number of National  संग्रहालय  , and the  सुनहरी   त्रिभुज  of  आर्ट  , located along the Paseo  डेल  Prado and comprising three art museums : Prado Museum , the Museo Nacional Centro de Arte Reina Sofía ,  a  museum of  आधुनिक  art  ,  and the Thyssen-Bornemisza Museum , which completes the shortcomings of the other two  संग्रहालय  .
Cibeles Palace and Fountain have become  the  monument symbol of the city .
