remains  of  the  Appian Way in Rome , near Quarto  miglio
Near Rome .
The Appian  रास्ता  ( Latin  और  Italian : Via Appia ) was one of  the  earliest and  रणनीतिक  most important Roman roads of  the   प्राचीन  republic .
It connected Rome to  brindisi  ,  apulia  , in southeast Italy  .
Its importance is  indicated  by its  आम  name , recorded by Statius :
Appia teritur  रेजिना  longarum viarum
``  the  Appian  रास्ता   is  the queen of the long roads ''
The road  is   नामित  after  appius  Claudius Caecus , the Roman censor who began and  समाप्त  the first section as a military road to the  दक्षिण  in  312  BC during the  samnite  Wars .
The Draupner  वेव  ,  a  single  दानव  wave measured on New Year  's  Day 1995  ,  finally confirmed the existence of freak waves , which  था   previously  been considered near-mythical
दुष्ट  waves ( also known  as   freak  waves , monster waves , killer waves , extreme  लहरें  , and  असामान्य  waves ) are  अपेक्षाकृत   विशाल   और  spontaneous ocean surface waves  कि  occur far out  at  sea , and  हैं  a threat even to  विशाल   जहाजों   और  ocean  liners  .
In  oceanography  ,  वे  are more precisely defined as waves  जिनकी  height is more  than  twice the significant wave height ( SWH ) , which is itself defined as the  औसत  of the  largest  third of waves  in  a wave record .
Therefore rogue waves are not  necessarily  the biggest waves  मिला  at sea ;  वे  are , rather  ,  surprisingly large waves for  a   दिए  sea  राज्य   .
दुष्ट  waves seem not to have a single distinct cause , but occur where physical factors such  as  high  हवाएँ   और  strong  currents  cause waves to merge to create a single exceptionally  विशाल  wave .
Electress Sophia of Hanover ( 1630–1714 )
The line of succession to the  अंग्रेजों  throne is the ordered sequence of all those people eligible to succeed to the  सिंहासन  of the United Kingdom and the  अन्य  15  राष्ट्रमंडल   realms  .
The  अधिनियम  of Settlement 1701 bestowed  उत्तराधिकार  on the  electress  Sophia  of  Hanover and her descendants while excluding Roman Catholics .
The British government does not publish an  आधिकारिक   सूची   of   सब  those in  लकीर  to succeed , but  the  work  of  genealogical authors  और  amateur researchers suggests that  वहीँ  are several thousand people  potentially   in  line .
At a summit  in   पर्थ  , Western Australia in 2011 , the  heads  of government of all 16 Commonwealth realms  सहमत  to  लो   कदम  to adopt absolute primogeniture , end the  exclusion  of people married to Roman Catholics , and make other changes in the  उत्तराधिकार  rules  .
The  लकीर  of succession is also used to select the  counsellors  of State ( and a  रीजेंट   if  the  need  arises  )  under the provisions  of  the Regency Act  1937   .
For  पहले  versions of the line of succession , see  इतिहास  of  the   अंग्रेजों  line  of  succession .
Edward Montgomery Clift ( October 17 , 1920July 23 , 1966 ) was an American film and  स्टेज   कर्ता  The New York Times’ obituary noted his  portrayal  of  ``   मूडी  , sensitive young men '' .
He often played outsiders  और  `` victim-heroes '' ; examples include the  सोशल  climber in George Stevens 's  a  Place in the  सूर्य  , the  anguished   कैथोलिक  priest in  हिचकॉक  's  i  Confess ,  the  doomed regular soldier Robert E. Lee Prewitt  in  Fred Zinnemann 's From Here  to  Eternity , and the Jewish GI bullied by antisemites in Edward Dmytryk 's The Young Lions .
Later , after a disfiguring car crash in 1956 , and alcohol and prescription  ड्रग   गाली  ,  he  became erratic  .
Nevertheless important roles  यहूद  still his  ,  including `` the reckless , alcoholic , mother-fixated  रोडियो  performer ''  in  John  हस्टन  's The Misfits , the title  भूमिका  in Huston  's  , and the concentration camp victim in  स्टेनली   क्रेमर  's Judgment at Nuremberg . ''
Clift  प्राप्त  four Academy Award nominations during his career , three for Best  कर्ता  and one for Best Supporting Actor .
The  युद्ध  on Terror ( also known  as  the  वैश्विक   युद्ध  on Terrorism  )  is a term  commonly   लागू  to an international military campaign which  प्रारंभ  as a result  of  the  11  September 2001 terrorist attacks on the United States  .
This  resulted  in an  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  military campaign to eliminate al-Qaeda and other militant organizations .
the  United  किंगडम   और  many other NATO  और  non-NATO nations participate in the conflict  .
the  phrase 'War  on  Terror  '  was first used by US President  जार्ज   W.  Bush  on  20 September 2001 .
The Bush administration and the Western media  have   चूंकि  used the  पद   to  signify a global military , political , lawful , and  conceptual  struggle—targeting  दोनो  organizations designated as terrorist and  regimes  accused of supporting them .
It was typically used with a particular focus on  उग्रवादी  Islamists , al-Qaeda , and  अन्य   जिहादी  groups .
Although  the  term is not officially used by  the   प्रशासन  of US President Barack Obama ( which instead  उपयोग  the term Overseas Contingency Operation ) ,  it  is  स्टिल   commonly  used by politicians , in the media and by some aspects of government  officially  ,  ऐसे  as the United  राज्य  ' Global  युद्ध  on Terrorism Service Medal  .
German battleship Schleswig-Holstein  ,   westerplatte  , September 1 , 1939
Destroyer USS Shaw  exploding  after her forward magazine  थी  detonated during the  आक्रमण   on   पर्ल   हार्बर
The main causes of World  युद्ध  II  यहूद  nationalistic issues , unresolved  मुद्दे   ,  and resentments resulting from World War I and the interwar  काल  in Europe  ,  in addition to the effects  of  the Great Depression in the  1930s  .
The culmination of  कार्यक्रम  that led  to  the outbreak of  युद्ध  are  generally   समझा  to be the 1939 invasion  of   कैंडल  by Germany and  सोवियत   रूस  and the 1937 invasion  of  the  गणतंत्र  of China by the Empire of  जापानी   .
These military aggressions were the result of decisions made  by  the  सत्तावादी  ruling Nazi elite  in  Germany and  by  the  नेतृत्व  of the Kwantung Army in Japan  .
संसार  War  ii  started after these aggressive actions were met with  an  official  घोषणा  of war and/or armed resistance .

The Mitsubishi Galant is an automobile  manufactured  by  मित्सुबिशी  Motors between 1969 and 2012 .
The name was  निकला  from the French word  galant  , meaning ``  chivalrous  '' .
वहीँ  have been nine distinct generations  ,  and cumulative sales now exceed  पाँच  million .
It  began  as a compact sedan  ,  but over the  कोर्स  of its life has evolved into a  larger  mid-size car .
Initial  उत्पादन  was only based in Japan , but  चूंकि  1994 the American market has  महरूम  served by vehicles assembled at  the  former  diamond-star  Motors  (   dsm  )  सुविधा  in Normal ,  इलिनोइस  .
Blood pressure ( BP ) , sometimes  referred  to as arterial blood  दबाव  , is the  दबाव   exerted  by circulating blood upon the walls of blood vessels  ,   और  is one  of  the principal vital  लक्षण  .
When used without further specification , `` blood pressure '' usually refers to the arterial pressure of  the  systemic circulation .
During each heartbeat , blood pressure varies  between  a  अधिकतम  ( systolic )  और  a minimum ( diastolic  )  pressure  .
The blood pressure in the circulation  is  principally  due  to  the  pumping action of the heart .
Differences in mean blood pressure are responsible for blood flow from one location to another in the circulation  .
The  रेट  of  औसत  blood flow depends  on  the resistance to flow presented by the blood vessels .
Mean blood pressure decreases as the  circulating  blood moves away from the heart through arteries and capillaries  due  to viscous losses of energy .
Mean blood pressure  बूंदें  over the whole circulation , although most  of  the fall occurs along  the  small arteries  और  arterioles .
Gravity affects  रक्त  pressure via hydrostatic forces (  e.g.  ,  दौरान  standing )  और  valves  in  veins , breathing ,  और   pumping  from contraction of skeletal muscles also influence blood pressure in veins  .
रक्त  pressure without  further  specification usually refers  to  the systemic arterial pressure measured at a person  's  upper  भुजा  and is a measure of the pressure  in  the brachial  धमनी   ,  the major artery in the upper arm .
A person’s blood  दबाव  is  प्रायः  expressed in  शर्तें  of  the  systolic pressure  over  diastolic  दबाव  and is measured  in  millimetres of  पारा  ( mmHg ) , for  उदाहरण   120/80  .
A veto  –  Latin for `` I forbid  ''  – is the power ( used by an officer  of  the state  ,  for example ) to unilaterally stop  an  official action  ,  especially the enactment of legislation .
a  veto can  be  absolute , as for instance in the  संयुक्त  Nations Security Council ,  जिनकी   स्थाई   सदस्यों   (  China ,  फ़्रांस  , Russia , United Kingdom , United States of  अमेरिका  ) can block any resolution .
Or it  can  be limited ,  as  in the legislative process of the United States , where  a  two-thirds vote in both the House and Senate  may  override a Presidential  वीटो  of legislation .
a  veto only  देता  power to  रोकें   परिवर्तन  , not to  अपनाना  them ( except for the rare `` amendatory  वीटो   ''  ) .
Thus a  वीटो   allows   इसके  holder to protect the status quo .
The concept of a veto  देह   originated  with the  रोमन  consuls  और  tribunes .
either   of  the two consuls holding  दफ्तर  in a given year could block a military or civil  निर्णय   by  the  अन्य  ;  कोई  tribune had the  शक्ति  to unilaterally block legislation passed  by  the Roman Senate .
Sulfur dioxide (  भी  sulphur dioxide ) is the  रासायनिक   यौगिक  with the formula .
it  is a  विषाक्त  gas with  a  pungent  ,  irritating smell , that  is   released  by  ज्वालामुखी  and  in  various  औद्योगिक   प्रक्रियाओं  .
चूंकि   कोयले  and petroleum often contain  गंधक   यौगिकों   ,  their  दहन  generates sulfur dioxide  जबतक  the sulfur compounds are removed before  burning  the fuel .
Further oxidation  of   so2  , usually in the presence  of  a catalyst such  as  NO2  ,   फ़ॉर्म  H2SO4 , and thus acid rain .
Sulfur dioxide emissions are also  a  precursor to  अभिकण   in  the atmosphere .
दोनो  of these impacts are cause for concern over the environmental impact of these fuels .
myasthenia   ग्रेविस   (  from Greek μύς `` muscle '' , `` weakness  ''  ,  और  `` serious ''  ;  abbreviated MG )  is   an  autoimmune  neuromuscular   बीमारी  leading to  fluctuating  muscle weakness and  fatigability   .
It  is  an  असंक्राम्य  disorder , in which weakness is caused by circulating antibodies that block acetylcholine  receptors  at  the  postsynaptic neuromuscular junction , inhibiting the excitatory effects of the neurotransmitter acetylcholine on nicotinic receptors throughout neuromuscular  junctions   .
Myasthenia is treated medically with acetylcholinesterase inhibitors or immunosuppressants  ,   और  , in selected cases , thymectomy .
The  बीमारी  incidence is 3–30 cases per  लाख  per year and rising as a  परिणाम  of increased awareness  .
MG must be distinguished from congenital  myasthenic  syndromes  कि  can present similar symptoms but offer no response to immunosuppressive treatments .
Reflective  मुड़  nematic liquid crystal display .
polarizing  filter  फिल्मी  with a vertical  अक्ष  to  polarize  light as it enters .
Glass  substrate   साथ   ito  electrodes .
The shapes of  ये  electrodes  होगा   determine  the shapes that will appear when the  एलसीडी  is turned  on  .
लंबवत  ridges  etched  on the surface are smooth .
Twisted nematic liquid  क्रिस्टल  .
Glass substrate with common electrode film (  ito  ) with  आड़ा  ridges to line  up  with the horizontal filter .
Polarizing  फिल्टर   फिल्मी  with a horizontal axis to block/pass light .
Reflective surface to send light back to viewer .
( In a backlit LCD , this layer is replaced with a light source . )
A  liquid-crystal  display ( LCD )  is   a  flat  फलक  display , electronic visual  प्रदर्शक   ,  or video display  कि  uses the light modulating properties of liquid crystals .
Liquid crystals do  नहीं  emit light directly .
LCDs are available to display  मनमानी  images ( as in  a  general-purpose  कंप्यूटर  display ) or  फिक्स्ड   बिंब  which can be displayed or hidden  ,  such as preset words  ,  digits  ,  and 7-segment displays as in a digital clock .
वे  use the same basic technology , except that arbitrary  बिंब  are made  up  of  a  large number of small pixels ,  जबकि  other displays have larger elements .
lcds  are used in a wide range  of  applications including  कंप्यूटर   मॉनीटर  , televisions , instrument  panels   ,   वायुयान  cockpit displays , and signage  .
They are  आम  in  उपभोक्ता  devices  ऐसे  as video  खिलाड़ी  , gaming  डिवाइस  , clocks , watches ,  calculators  , and telephones  ,  and have  replaced  cathode ray tube ( CRT ) displays in most applications .
वे  are available in a wider range of screen sizes than CRT and  प्लाज्मा  displays , and since they do not use phosphors , they do  नहीं  suffer  चित्र  burn-in .
LCDs are , however  ,  susceptible to image persistence .
the  LCD  स्क्रीन   is  more energy efficient and can  be  disposed of more safely than a CRT .
इसके   कम   विद्युत  power  खपत  enables  it  to be  प्रयुक्त  in battery  -powered  electronic equipment .
It is an  electronically   modulated   ऑप्टिकल  device made  up  of any  क्रमांक  of  खण्ड   भर   साथ  liquid crystals  और   arrayed  in front of  a   लाइट  source  (   backlight  ) or reflector to produce images  in  color  or  monochrome .
Liquid crystals were first discovered in 1888 .
By 2008 , worldwide  बिक्री  of televisions with  एलसीडी  screens  exceeded  annual  बिक्री   of  CRT units  ;  the CRT became obsolete for most  उद्देश्य  .
the  Borgata Hotel  कसीनो  and  स्पा  is a luxury hotel , casino  ,  and  स्पा  in Atlantic City ,  नई  Jersey , United States .
It  is  owned  by   मरीना  District Development , a joint venture  between  Boyd Gaming and  a  divesture trust established by  mgm  Resorts International .
The  $  1.1 billion casino hotel features 2,002 rooms and  is  the largest hotel in New  जर्सी  .
the  Borgata opened  in  July 2003 as a  लास  Vegas-style  megaresort  and is the top-grossing  कसीनो  in  अटलांटिक  City .
a  bottle of high potency B-complex vitamin supplement pills .
A vitamin ( or )  is  an organic compound required  by   an  organism as a vital nutrient in limited amounts  .
An organic chemical compound ( or related  नियत   of  compounds ) is called  a  vitamin when it  can   नहीं  be synthesized in sufficient quantities by  an   सजीव  , and must be obtained from the diet .
Thus , the  पद  is  सशर्त  both on the circumstances and  on  the particular  सजीव  .
For  उदाहरण  , ascorbic acid (  विटामिन   c  ) is a vitamin for humans ,  लकिन  not for most other animals , and biotin and  विटामिन   d  are required in the human  आहार  only in certain  हालातों  .
by  convention  ,  the  पद  vitamin includes neither other essential nutrients ,  ऐसे  as dietary minerals , essential fatty acids  ,  or essential  अमीनो  acids ( which are needed in larger amounts than vitamins )  nor  the large number  of  other  nutrients   कि  promote health but are otherwise required  कम  often .
Thirteen  विटामिन   हैं  universally recognized at present .
Vitamins are classified  by  their biological and chemical activity  ,  not their  ढांचा   .
Thus  ,  each  ``  vitamin '' refers to a number  of   vitamer   यौगिकों  that all show the  biological  activity associated  साथ  a particular vitamin .
ऐसे  a  नियत  of chemicals is  grouped  under an alphabetized vitamin `` generic  वर्णनकर्ता  '' title , such as `` vitamin  a  `` ,  जिससे  includes the compounds retinal , retinol , and four known carotenoids .
Vitamers by definition are  convertible  to the  क्रियाशील  form  of  the vitamin  in  the body , and are sometimes inter-convertible to  एक  another , as  खूब   .
Vitamins have  विविध  biochemical functions .
Some  have   hormone-like  functions as regulators of mineral metabolism (  ऐसे  as vitamin D  )  , or regulators  of  cell and tissue growth and differentiation ( such as some  फ़ॉर्म  of vitamin  a  ) .
Others function as antioxidants  (  e.g. , vitamin E and  sometimes  vitamin C ) .
The  largest  number of vitamins  (  such  as  B complex vitamins ) function as  precursors   लिये  enzyme cofactors ,  कि  help enzymes  in  their work as catalysts in metabolism  .
In this role , vitamins may be tightly  बंधी  to  एंजाइमों  as part of prosthetic  समूह  : For  उदाहरण  , biotin  is   भाग  of enzymes involved  in  making fatty acids .
Vitamins may also be less tightly bound to enzyme catalysts  as  coenzymes  ,  detachable molecules that function  to  carry chemical groups or electrons between molecules .
For example , folic acid may carry methyl , formyl , and methylene groups in the cell .
Although these roles in assisting enzyme-substrate reactions are vitamins '  best-known  function , the other  विटामिन  functions are equally important .
Until  the  mid-1930s , when the first commercial yeast-extract  विटामिन  B  जटिल   और  semi-synthetic  विटामिन   c  supplement  टैबलेट  were sold , vitamins  यहूद   प्राप्त  solely through food intake , and changes in diet (  जिससे  , for example , could occur  दौरान  a  particular  growing season ) usually greatly altered the  प्रकार  and amounts of vitamins ingested .
However , vitamins  have   महरूम  produced as  कमोडिटी  chemicals and made  widely   उपलब्धियाँ  as inexpensive semisynthetic and synthetic-source multivitamin dietary and food  पूरक  and  एडिटिव  , since the middle  of   the  20th century .
संसार  Muslim population by percentage ( Pew Research Center , 2009  )
World Muslim population in millions
Islam is the world 's second  largest  religion after Christianity .
According to a 2010  पढ़ाई  , Islam  रै  1.62  अरब  adherents ,  बनाना  up over 23 % of the world population .
Islam  is  the predominant religion in the Middle East ,  in  Sahel  ,  in the Horn  of  Africa and northern  अफ़्रीकी  , and in some  भाग   of  Asia .
Large communities of Muslims are also found in China , the Balkans  ,  and Russia .
अन्य  parts of the world host large Muslim immigrant communities ; in Western Europe ,  लिये  instance , Islam  is  the  दूसरी   largest  religion after Christianity ,  जहाँ  it represents 6 % of the total population  .
according  to  the   pew  Research Center in 2010 there were 49 Muslim-majority countries .
Around  62  % of the world  's  Muslims live in  दक्षिण  and  southeast   एशिया   ,  with over 1 billion adherents  .
The largest Muslim country is Indonesia  ,   घर   to  12.7 % of the world 's Muslims  ,  followed by  पाकिस्तानी  ( 11.0 % ) , India ( 10.9 % ) , and Bangladesh ( 9.2 % ) .
About  20  %  of   मुसलमान  live  in   अरब  countries  .
in  the Middle East , the non-Arab countries  of  Turkey and Iran  हैं  the largest Muslim-majority countries ; in Africa , Egypt  और  Nigeria have  the  most populous Muslim communities .
A study  conducted   by  the Pew  शोध  Center  in  2010 and released January 2011 found that there are 1.62 billion  मुसलमान   around  the world .
The  पढ़ाई  found more Muslims in the United Kingdom than in Lebanon and more in  चीन  than in Syria .
rhode  Island ( or ) , officially the State of Rhode Island and Providence Plantations , is a state  in  the  नई  England region of the United States .
Rhode Island  is  the smallest in area , the  आठवीं   तनिक  populous , but the second  सबसे  densely  आबादी  of  the  50 US states  पीछे   नई  Jersey  .
Rhode Island is bordered by Connecticut to the west and Massachusetts to  the   उत्तर   और  east  ,  and it shares a  जल  boundary with New  यॉर्क  's Long Island to the southwest .
Rhode Island was the first of  the  13 original  colonies  to declare independence from British rule , declaring itself independent on May 4 ,  1776  ,  दो  months before  कोई  other colony .
The  राज्य  was also  the  last of  the  thirteen original  colonies  to ratify the United States  संविधान  .
Rhode Island 's official nickname is `` The  समंदर  State '' , a  सन्दर्भ  to the State  's  geography , since Rhode Island has several large bays and inlets  कि   राशि  to about 14 % of its total area .
Its land  क्षेत्रफल  is  ,  but its total area  is  significantly larger .
Dubai  (  ; ' ,  )  is a  नगर  in the United Arab Emirates  ,  located within the emirate of  the  same name .
The  अमीर  of Dubai is  स्तिथ  on  the  southeast coast of  the  Persian Gulf on the Arabian Peninsula and is one of the seven emirates  कि  make  up  the country .
it   रै  the largest population  in  the UAE ( 2,106,177 ) and the second-largest land territory by area ( 4,114  km2  ) after Abu Dhabi .
Dubai and Abu  धाबी   ,  the  नेशनल  capital , are the  तभी  two emirates to  have  veto power over critical matters of  नेशनल  importance in the country 's  विधानमंडल  .
The  नगर  of Dubai is located on the  अमीर  's northern coastline and heads up the Dubai-Sharjah-Ajman metropolitan  क्षेत्रफल  .
Dubai is  आजकल  often  misperceived   as   a   देश  or city-state and , in some cases , the UAE as  a  whole has been described as 'Dubai '  .
The earliest mention of Dubai  is  in 1095 AD ,  और  the earliest recorded settlement in the region dates from 1799 .
The Sheikhdom of Dubai was formally  स्थापित   in  1833 by Sheikh  maktoum  bin Butti Al-Maktoum when  he  persuaded around 800 members  of  his tribe of  the  Bani Yas , living  in  what was then the  दूसरी   सऊदी  State and now part of Saudi Arabia , to  follow  him to the Dubai Creek  by   the   abu  Falasa clan of the Bani Yas .
It remained under  the  tribe 's control when the United Kingdom assumed protection of the Sheikhdom in  1892  and joined the nascent United Arab Emirates upon independence in  1971  as the  देश  's second emirate .
इसके   रणनीतिक  geographic location  बना  the town an important trading hub and  by  the beginning of the  20th  century  ,  Dubai was already an important  क्षेत्रीय  port .
Today , Dubai has emerged as a cosmopolitan metropolis that has  grown  steadily to become a global city and a business and cultural hub of the Middle East and  the  Persian Gulf  प्रदेश   .
Although Dubai 's economy  थी  historically built on the oil  उद्योग  , the emirate 's Western-style model of business drives its economy  साथ  the main revenues now coming  इससे  tourism , real estate , and financial services .
Dubai has recently  आकर्षित  world  ध्यान  through  अनेक   अभिनव  large construction  प्रोजेक्ट  and sports events .
The  नगर  has  become  symbolic for its skyscrapers and high-rise buildings ,  ऐसे   as   the   संसार  's tallest  burj   खलीफा  , in addition to  महत्वाकांक्षी  development  प्रोजेक्ट  including man-made  आइलैंड्स  ,  होटल  ,  और  some of the  largest  shopping malls in the  प्रदेश  and the world .
इस   increased   ध्यान  has  भी  highlighted labor  और  human rights issues concerning  the  city  's  largely South Asian paid workforce  .
Dubai 's  प्रॉपर्टी  market experienced a major deterioration in 2008–2009 as a  परिणाम  of the worldwide  आर्थिक   downturn   following  the financial crisis of 2007-2008  .
however  , Dubai has made a  स्थिर  and gradual recovery with help coming  इससे  neighboring  अमीरात  .
The handful of  नई  projects that are in  the  pipeline  have   महरूम  able to help Dubai real estate make a comeback .
As of 2012 , Dubai is the 22nd most expensive  नगर  in the  संसार   ,  and the most expensive  नगर  in  the  Middle  ईस्ट  , surpassing Israel 's  tel   aviv  ( 31st ) .
दुबई  has also been rated as one of the best places  to  live in  the   मध्य  East , including by US  अमरीकी  global consulting firm Mercer who rated the  नगर   as  the best place to live in the Middle East in 2011  .
The  following   is  a list  of   कॉलेजों  and universities in  the  U.S. state of Illinois  .
सतह  of  the  Atlantic ocean meeting the Earth 's planetary boundary layer and troposphere  .
लहरें  on an ocean coast .
This  एनिमेशन  uses Earth science  आंकड़ा   इससे  a variety of sensors on  नासा  Earth observing satellites to measure physical oceanography  पैरामीटर्स  such as ocean currents , ocean winds , sea surface height  और  sea surface temperature  .
An  समंदर  ( ; the  संसार  Ocean  of  classical  प्राचीनता  ) is a body of saline  जल  that composes a large part  of  a planet 's hydrosphere .
In the context of  धरती  , it  refers  to one or all of the  प्रमुख  divisions  of  the  ग्रह  's World Ocean –  वे  are , in descending order of area  ,  the Pacific , Atlantic ,  भारतीय  , Southern ( Antarctic ) , and Arctic Oceans .
The word `` sea `` is  प्रायः  used interchangeably with  ``  ocean  ''  , but strictly speaking a sea  is  a body of saline water ( possibly  a  division  of  the World Ocean )  partly  or fully  enclosed  by land .
Earth is the only planet known to have an ocean (  or  any large amounts of open liquid water  )  .
Approximately 72 % of  the   ग्रह  's surface ( ~3.6x108 km2 )  is  covered by saline  जल   कि  is  customarily  divided  into  several principal oceans and smaller seas  ,  with  the  ocean  covering   लगभग   71   %  of the Earth 's surface  .
In terms  of  the  जलमंडल  of  the  Earth , the ocean contains 97 % of the Earth 's  जल  .
Oceanographers  have  stated  कि  out of  97   %  , only 5 %  of  the ocean  as  a whole on Earth has been explored .
Because it is the principal component  of  Earth 's  जलमंडल  , the world  समंदर  is integral to all known life ,  फ़ॉर्म  part of the carbon cycle , and influences climate and weather patterns .
The total volume is approximately 1.3 billion  घन  kilometres ( 310 million cu  mi  ) with an  औसत  depth of .
It is the habitat of 230,000  ज्ञात   प्रजाति  , although  much  of the ocean 's  गहराइयों  remain  unexplored  and it  is  estimated that over two million  समुद्री  species exist .
The origin of Earth 's oceans is  स्टिल  unknown  ,  but oceans  हैं  believed to have  formed  in the Hadean period and  may  have been  the   impetus  for  the   emergence  of life .
extraterrestrial  oceans may be composed of a wide  दायरा  of elements and compounds .
The  तभी  confirmed large stable bodies of extraterrestrial surface  liquids  are  the  lakes of Titan , although there is evidence  लिये   the  existence of oceans elsewhere in the Solar System  .
Early in their  भूगर्भिक  histories , Mars and Venus are theorized to have had large water oceans  .
The Mars ocean hypothesis  suggests   कि  nearly a third of the surface of  मंगल   थी  once  covered  by water , though  the  water on Mars  is  no longer oceanic , and  a  runaway  ग्रीनहाउस  effect may have boiled away the global ocean of Venus .
Compounds  ऐसे  as salts and ammonia dissolved in water lower its freezing point , so that water might exist in large quantities in extraterrestrial environments as brine or convecting ice .
Unconfirmed oceans  हैं  speculated beneath  the  surface of many dwarf planets and natural satellites ;  notably  , the ocean of Europa  is  believed  to   have  over twice the water volume of Earth .
The Solar System 's gas giant planets  हैं  also believed to  possess  liquid atmospheric layers of yet to  be   पुष्टि  compositions .
Oceans may also  मौजूद  on  exoplanets  and exomoons ,  सहित  surface oceans of  द्रव  water within a circumstellar habitable zone .
Ocean planets are a hypothetical  प्रकार  of  ग्रह  with a surface completely  covered  with liquid .
Elvis Aaron Presley (  जनवरी  8 , 1935  –  August 16 ,  1977   )  was an American singer  और  actor .
a  cultural icon ,  he  is  commonly  known  by  the  सिंगल   नाम  Elvis .
One of the  सबसे  popular musicians of the  20th  century  ,  he is often referred to as  the  `` King of Rock and Roll '' or ``  the  King '' .
Born in Tupelo , Mississippi , Presley moved  to   मेम्फिस  , Tennessee , with his family  at  the age  of  13 .
He began his  करियर  there in  1954  , working with Sun Records owner Sam  phillips  , who  चाही  to bring the sound of African-American music to a  wider  audience .
Accompanied  by   guitarist   स्कॉटी  Moore and bassist  विधेयक  Black , Presley was the most  महत्वपूर्ण   popularizer   of   rockabilly  , an uptempo  ,  backbeat -driven fusion of  देश   और  rhythm and blues .
RCA Victor acquired  उसके  contract in a deal arranged by Colonel Tom Parker , who went on to manage the singer for over two decades .
प्रेस्ली   's  first RCA single , `` Heartbreak  होटल  `` , released in  जनवरी  1956  ,  was a number-one hit .
He became the leading figure of the newly popular sound of  चट्टान  and roll with  a  series of network television appearances  और  chart-topping records .
His energized interpretations of songs , many from  african-american  sources , and his uninhibited performance style made  उसे   enormously  popular—and controversial .
In November 1956 , he made his film debut in  प्रेम  Me Tender .
Drafted  into  military service in 1958 , Presley  relaunched  his recording career two years later with  कुछ  of his most commercially  कामयाब  work .
He staged few concerts  however  ,  और  guided by Parker  ,  proceeded to devote much of  the  1960s to  बनाना  Hollywood  फिल्मों  and soundtrack albums , most of them  critically  derided .
In  1968  , after seven years away from the stage ,  he  returned to live  प्रदर्शन  in a celebrated comeback television special that led to  an  extended Las Vegas concert residency and a string of  लाभप्रद  tours .
in  1973 Presley staged the first concert broadcast globally via satellite , Aloha from  हवाई  .
Prescription drug  गाली  severely  deteriorated  his health , and he died  एकाएक   in  1977  at   the   आयु  of  42  .
Presley is regarded  as  one of  the   सबसे   महत्वपूर्ण  figures of 20th-century popular culture .
he  had a versatile voice and  unusually   चौड़ी  success encompassing many genres , including country , pop ballads , gospel , and blues .
He is the  best-selling   सोलो   कलाकार  in the history of popular music .
Nominated for 14  प्रतिस्पर्धी  Grammys , he won three ,  और  received  the  Grammy Lifetime Achievement Award at  आयु  36 .
he  has been inducted into multiple music halls of fame .
A glass of root beer with foam
रूट  beer is a  कार्बोनेटेड  , sweetened beverage ,  originally   बना  using  the  root  of  a  sassafras  plant ( or  the  bark  of  a sassafras  पेड़  ) as  the   प्राथमिक  flavor .
रूट  beer , popularized  in  North America  ,   आता  in two  फ़ॉर्म   :  alcoholic and soft drink .
The historical  रूट  beer  थी   analogous  to small beer in that the process provided  a  drink with a very low alcohol content .
Although roots  हैं  used as  the   सोर्स  of many soft drinks throughout the world ,  प्रायः   अलग   names   हैं  used .
Fluorescent minerals emit visible light when exposed to ultraviolet light
Fluorescence is  the  emission  of   लाइट  by a substance that  रै  absorbed light  or  other electromagnetic radiation  .
It is a  रूप  of luminescence .
In most  मामले   ,   the  emitted light has a longer wavelength , and therefore lower  उर्जा  , than  the  absorbed radiation  .
However , when the absorbed  इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक  radiation is intense , it is possible  लिये  one electron to  अवशोषित  two photons  ;  this two-photon absorption can lead to  उत्सर्जन   of  radiation  having   a  shorter wavelength than  the  absorbed radiation .
The  उत्सर्जित   विकिरण  may also  be  of the same wavelength as  the  absorbed radiation  ,   termed  ``  अनुनाद   प्रतिदीप्ति  ''  .
The most  striking  examples of fluorescence  occur  when the absorbed radiation is in  the  ultraviolet region of the spectrum , and thus invisible  to   the  human eye  ,   और  the  उत्सर्जित  light is in the visible region .
प्रतिदीप्ति   रै  many practical  अनुप्रयोग  , including  mineralogy  , gemology , chemical sensors  (  fluorescence spectroscopy  )  , fluorescent labelling , dyes ,  biological  detectors  ,  and , most commonly , fluorescent lamps .
अनौपचारिक  logic , intuitively , refers to  the  principles  of   लॉजिक  and  लॉजिकल  thought outside of a  औपचारिक   सेटिंग   .
However , perhaps because of the informal  in  the  शीर्षक  , the precise definition of informal  लॉजिक  is a matter of  कुछ  dispute .
Ralph H. Johnson and J. Anthony Blair define informal  लॉजिक  as `` a branch of logic whose task  is  to develop non-formal  मानकों  , criteria , procedures for  the  analysis , interpretation  ,  evaluation , criticism and construction of argumentation . ''
This definition reflects what had been implicit in their practice and what  अन्य  were doing in  उनके  informal logic  ग्रन्थ  .
अनौपचारिक  logic is associated with (  अनौपचारिक  ) fallacies , critical thinking  ,  the  सोच  Skills Movement and the interdisciplinary  पूछताछ  known as  argumentation  theory .
frans  H. van Eemeren  writes  that the  लेबल  ``  अनौपचारिक  logic  ''  covers a `` collection of normative approaches  to  the  पढ़ाई  of reasoning in  ordinary  language that remain closer  to  the practice of argumentation  than  formal logic . ''
USA annual real GDP 1910–60  ,  with the years of the Great Depression ( 1929–1939 ) highlighted .
Unemployment rate in the US 1910–1960 , with the years of the Great Depression (  1929–1939  ) highlighted .
the  Great Depression began in August of 1929 , when the United  राज्य   अर्थव्यवस्था  first went into an  आर्थिक  recession .
Although the country spent two months with declining GDP , it was  नहीं  until the Wall  गली  Crash of  अक्तूबर  , 1929 that  the  effects  of   a  declining economy were felt , and a major  विश्वव्यापी  economic downturn  ensued  .
The market crash  चिह्नित  the beginning of  a  decade of high unemployment , poverty , low profits  ,  deflation , plunging farm incomes , and lost opportunities for economic growth and  निजी  advancement .
Although its  कल्याणकारी   हैं  still uncertain and controversial  ,  the  जाल  effect was a sudden and general  घाटा  of confidence  in  the  आर्थिक  future .
The usual explanations  शामिल   numerous  factors , especially high consumer debt , ill-regulated markets  कि  permitted overoptimistic loans by banks and investors , and the lack  of  high-growth  नई  industries ,  सब  interacting  to  create a downward economic spiral of reduced spending  ,  falling confidence , and  lowered  production  .
Industries that  suffered  the most included construction , agriculture  as  dust-bowl conditions persisted in the agricultural  heartland  , shipping , mining , and logging as well  as  durable goods like automobiles and appliances that  could  be postponed .
The economy reached bottom in the winter of 1932–33  ;  then  आए  four years of very rapid growth until 1937 , when the Recession  of   1937  brought  वापस  1934 levels of unemployment .
The  अवसाद   caused  major political changes in  अमेरिका  .
Three years into the depression ,  हर्बर्ट  Hoover  खोया  the 1932 presidential election to Franklin Delano Roosevelt in a sweeping landslide .
Roosevelt 's economic  रिकवरी   योजना  , the New Deal , instituted  unprecedented  programs  लिये  relief , recovery and  सुधार   ,  and brought about  a  major realignment of American politics .
The  अवसाद  also resulted in an increase  of  emigration of people to other countries for the first time in  अमरीकी   इतिहास  .
For example , some immigrants went back to their native countries  ,   और  some  देशी  US  नागरिकों  went to  कनाडा  , Australia  ,  and  दक्षिण  Africa .
It also resulted in the  द्रव्यमान  migration of people  इससे   badly  hit areas in the Great Plains and  the   दक्षिण  to places such as California  और   the  North , respectively ( see Okies and the  ग्रेट  Migration of African Americans ) .
Racial tensions also increased during  इस  time .
By  the  1940s  आव्रजन  had returned back  to  normal ,  और  emigration  अस्वीकृत  .
A  well-known  example of  an   emigrant  was  फ़्रैंक  McCourt  ,   जो   गई  to Ireland , as  recounted   in   उसके  book Angela 's Ashes .
The  मेमोरी  of  the  Depression also shaped modern theories  of  economics  और   resulted   in   अनेक   परिवर्तन   in  how the government dealt with economic downturns ,  ऐसे  as  the  use of stimulus packages ,  keynesian   अर्थशास्त्र   ,  and  सोशल  Security .
It also shaped modern American  साहित्य  , resulting in famous novels  ऐसे  as John  steinbeck   's  `` The Grapes of Wrath `` and `` Of Mice and Men  ``   .
The Great Depression of the 1930s started with the stock market crash of October  1929  .
Turkey ( ) , officially the Republic of Turkey , is  a   transcontinental  country , located  ज़्यादातर  on Anatolia in Western  एशिया  and on East Thrace  in  Southeastern Europe .
Turkey is bordered by eight countries  :  Bulgaria to the northwest  ;  Greece to the west ; Georgia to the  पूर्वोत्तर  ;  अर्मेनिया  ,  इरान  and the Azerbaijani exclave  of  Nakhchivan to the east ;  और  Iraq  और  Syria  to   the  southeast .
The Mediterranean Sea is to the south ; the  ईजियन  Sea is to  the  west ; and the Black  समुद्र  is  to  the  उत्तर  .
The Sea of Marmara  ,  the Bosphorus and  the  Dardanelles  (   जिससे   साथ  form the Turkish Straits ) demarcate  the  boundary between Thrace and Anatolia  ;  they also  पृथक  Europe  और   एशिया  .
Turkey 's location at the crossroads  of  Europe and Asia makes  it  a country  of  significant  geostrategic   महत्व   .
The country 's official language is Turkish  ,  a  turkic   भाषा  , which is spoken by approximately 85  %  of the population as  माँ  tongue .
The most  numerous  ethnic group is the  turks  , who constitute  between  70 % and 75 % of the population according to The World Factbook .
Kurds are the  largest  ethnic  अल्पसंख्यक  and , according to the same source  ,  number  around  18  %  of the  जनसांख्यिकी   जबकि  other ethnic minorities are estimated to be  at  7–12  %   .
The vast majority  of  the  जनसांख्यिकी  is Muslim .
The area now called  तुर्कों   रै   महरूम  inhabited since the Paleolithic , including various Ancient Anatolian civilizations and  thracian  peoples .
After Alexander  the  Great  's  conquest , the  क्षेत्रफल  was Hellenized , which continued with the  रोमन   नियम  and the transition into the  बीज़ान्टिन  Empire .
the  Seljuk Turks began migrating into the area in  the   11th   सदी   ,  starting the process of Turkification , which was greatly accelerated by the Seljuk victory over the Byzantines at the Battle of Manzikert in 1071 .
The Seljuk Sultanate  of  Rûm ruled Anatolia until the Mongol invasion in 1243 ,  upon  which it disintegrated into several small Turkish beyliks .
starting  from  the   लेट  13th  सदी  , the Ottoman beylik united  आनातोलिया   और  created  an  empire encompassing  much   of  Southeastern Europe , Western Asia and North Africa .
After the Ottoman Empire collapsed following its  शिकस्त  in World War I ,  भाग  of it  यहूद  occupied by the victorious Allies .
A cadre of young military officers , led by  mustafa   kemal  Atatürk and  उसके  colleagues ,  व्यवस्थित  a successful resistance to the Allies ; in 1923 they established  the  modern Republic of Turkey , with Atatürk as  इसके   पहला  president .
Turkey is a democratic , secular , unitary  ,  constitutional republic with a diverse cultural heritage .
Turkey has become increasingly integrated with the West through membership  in   संगठनों   ऐसे  as the Council of Europe , NATO ,  oecd  ,  osce  and  the  G-20 major economies  .
Turkey began full membership negotiations with the European Union in 2005 ,  having  been  an  associate member  of   the  European Economic Community  चूंकि  1963 and having joined the  eu  Customs Union in 1995  .
Turkey  रै  also fostered close cultural , political and economic relations  साथ  the  मध्य  East , Caucasus  ,   the  Turkic states of Central Asia and the African countries through membership in organisations such  as  the Turkic Council , Joint Administration of Turkic  कला  and  संस्कृति  , Organisation  of  Islamic Cooperation and the Economic Cooperation Organisation  .
Turkey 's growing economy  और  diplomatic initiatives have led to its recognition as a regional power .
तुर्कों  is the world 's  17th  largest economy  by  nominal  जीडीपी  and  the  16th largest by purchasing power parity .
caryn  Elaine Johnson , best known as Whoopi Goldberg (  ,  ( born November  13  , 1955 ) is an American comedienne , actress , singer-songwriter , political activist , author and  बात  show host  .
गोल्डबर्ग   बना  her film debut in The  रंग  Purple  (  1985 ) , playing  celie  ,  a  mistreated black woman in the Deep South .
She received  a  nomination for the  अकादमी   पुरस्कार  for Best Actress and won her first Golden Globe Award for her role in  the   फिल्मी  .
In  1990  , she played Oda Mae Brown ,  a  wacky psychic helping a  slain  man ( Patrick  swayze  ) save his lover ( Demi  मूर  )  in  the blockbuster Ghost .
This performance won her a second Golden Globe and an Academy Award for  बेहतरीन  Supporting Actress ; this made Goldberg only the  दूसरी  black woman in the history  of  the Academy Awards to win an acting Oscar—the first being  हैटी  McDaniel who won for Gone With  the  Wind in 1939 .
Notable later films  शामिल  Sister Act and  सिस्टर   अधिनियम   2  , The Player , Made in America , How Stella Got Her Groove Back  ,  Girl  ,  Interrupted and Rat  रेस  .
She  is  also  acclaimed  for her  भूमिकाएँ  as the bartender Guinan in Star Trek : The Next  पीढी  , as Terry Doolittle  in  Jumpin '  जोकर  Flash  ,  and  as  Carmen Tibideaux in Glee , as well as the voice of  shenzi  the hyena  in  The Lion King .
Goldberg has been nominated for 13  एमी  Awards for  उसके  work in television .
She  थी  co-producer  of  the popular  खेल  show Hollywood Squares from 1998  to  2004 .
She has been  the  moderator  of  the daytime talk show The View since 2007 .
गोल्डबर्ग  has a Grammy  ,  two Daytime Emmys , two Golden Globes , a Tony ( for production , not acting  )   ,  and an Oscar .
In addition , Goldberg has  a  British Academy Film Award ,  चार  People  's   चुनाव  Awards , and has  महरूम  honored with a star on the Hollywood Walk of  कीर्ति  .
वो   is  one of the  few   मनोरंजनकर्ता  who have won an Emmy  ,  Grammy , Oscar  ,   और  Tony Award .
Augusta is  a  consolidated city  in  the U.S. state of Georgia ,  स्तिथ  at the fall line of the Savannah River , at the head of its  navigable  portion .
As of  the  2010 census , the Augusta– Richmond County population was 195,844 not counting  the  unconsolidated cities  of   hephzibah   और  Blythe  .
augusta  is the principal city of the Augusta  –  Richmond County  महानगर  Statistical Area ,  जिससे  as of 2010 had an  अनुमानित  population of  556,877  , making it both the  second-largest  city and the second-largest metro area in the state after Atlanta .
it  is the 116th-largest city  in  the United  राज्य   .
Internationally ,  augusta  is best known for hosting The Masters Tournament in golf each spring .
a  CD-ROM ( ) is a  pre-pressed  compact disc which contains data .
The name is an acronym which stands  लिये  `` Compact  डिस्क  Read-only memory ``  .
Computers can  पढ़ा  CD-ROMs , but can not write on them .
CD-ROMs  हैं  popularly used to  वितरित   कंप्यूटर  software  ,  including video games and  मल्टीमीडिया   अनुप्रयोग  , though  कोई  data can be stored ( up to the capacity  सीमा  of a disc ) .
कुछ  CDs , called enhanced CDs ,  थाम  both computer data and audio with the  latter   सक्षम   of  being played  on  a CD player , while data  (  such as software or digital video ) is only usable on a  कंप्यूटर   (   ऐसे  as ISO 9660 format PC CD-ROMs ) .
The Yellow Book is the technical  मानक  that defines the format of CD-ROMs .
One  of  a  नियत  of color-bound books that contain the  तकनीकी  specifications  लिये  all CD formats , the Yellow Book , created by Sony and Philips ,  थी  the first extension of Compact Disc Digital Audio .
It adapted the format to hold  कोई   रूप  of data  .
The Chicago Blackhawks (  spelled  as Black Hawks before  1986  , and known colloquially as the Hawks )  हैं  a  पेशेवर  ice hockey team  आधारित  in Chicago , Illinois .
They  हैं  members  of  the  सेंट्रल  Division of the Western Conference of the  नेशनल   हॉकी  League ( NHL ) .
वे  have won four  स्टेनली   कप   championships  since  उनके  founding in 1926 , most recently in 2009–10 .
the  Blackhawks are one of  the  Original Six NHL  टीमों  , along  साथ  the Detroit Red Wings , Montreal Canadiens ,  टोरंटो   मेपल  Leafs , Boston Bruins and  नई   यॉर्क   रेंजरों  .
चूंकि  the Blackhawks  have  played their home games  at  the United Center after having  खर्च  65 years  playing  at  शिकागो  Stadium .

the  violet color is often associated  साथ   penance  and detachment .
समान  Christian penitential practice is seen in other  कैथोलिक  countries , sometimes  संबद्ध  with  mortification  of the flesh .

Lent ( Latin  :  Quadragesima ) is  a   solemn  observance  in  the liturgical  साल  of  अनेक  Christian denominations  ,  lasting for a period of approximately six weeks leading up to Easter Sunday .
In the general Latin-rite and most Western denominations Lent is taken  to   चलाएं  from Ash  बुधवार  to Maundy Thursday ( Holy  गुरुवार  ) morning or to Easter  संध्या   .
In  the  Catholic Church , Lent lasts until  पावन  Thursday , while  अन्य  denominations run until Easter Eve .
The traditional purpose  of  Lent  is   the   तैयारी  of the believer through prayer  ,  penance  ,  repentance  ,  almsgiving , and self-denial .
Its institutional  purpose  is heightened in the annual  commemoration  of Holy  सप्ताह  , marking the death  ,   दफ़न  and resurrection of  यीशु  , which  recalls  the  कार्यक्रम  of  the  Bible when Jesus is  crucified  on  शुभ  Friday , which  तब  culminates  in  the celebration on Easter Sunday of the Resurrection of  यीशु  Christ .
During Lent , many  of  the faithful commit to  उपवास  or  giving  up  निश्चित  types of luxuries as a  रूप  of penitence  .
The Stations of the Cross , a devotional  commemoration  of  मसीह  's carrying the Cross and of his  निष्पादन  , are often  observed  .
Many Roman Catholic  और  some Protestant  चर्च  remove flowers  इससे  their altars , while crucifixes , religious  मूर्तियाँ  , and other elaborate religious symbols are  प्रायः  veiled  in  violet fabrics in  solemn  observance of the event .
In certain  परहेज़गारों  Catholic countries , some adherents mark the season with the traditional abstention from  the  consumption of  मांस  .
In  कुछ  countries , grand religious processions and  सांस्कृतिक  customs are observed , and the faithful attempt to visit seven churches during Holy Week in honor of Jesus Christ heading  to  Mount Calvary .
lent  is traditionally described  as  lasting for forty days ,  in  commemoration  of   the  forty days  जिससे  , according to the  gospels  of Matthew , Mark  और  Luke , Jesus spent fasting in  the  desert before the beginning of his public ministry , where he endured temptation by the Devil .
However ,  अलग  Christian denominations calculate the  चालीस  days of  lent  differently .
In most Western traditions  the   sundays   हैं  not  गिने  as  भाग  of Lent ; thus  the  period from Ash Wednesday until Easter consists of 40 days  जब  the Sundays are  excluded   .
However in the Roman Catholic Church Lent is now  लिया  to end on  पावन   गुरुवार  rather  than  Easter Eve , and hence lasts  38   दिनों  excluding  sundays  , or  44  days in total .
This event , along with  इसके  pious customs are observed by Catholics , Lutherans , Methodists , Presbyterians , and Anglicans  .
स्थान   of  Chernobyl nuclear power  संयंत्र

The Chernobyl disaster  (  , Chornobylska Katastrofa  –  Chornobyl Catastrophe ) was a catastrophic nuclear accident that occurred  on  26 April 1986 at  the  Chernobyl Nuclear Power  संयंत्र   in  Ukraine ( then officially the Ukrainian SSR )  ,  which was under the direct jurisdiction of the central authorities  of   the  Soviet Union .
an   विस्फोट  and fire released large  quantities   of  radioactive particles into the  माहौल   ,  which spread over  much   of   the  western USSR and Europe .
The Chernobyl disaster is  widely  considered to  have  been the worst nuclear  शक्ति  plant accident in  इतिहास   ,   और  is one of  तभी  two  वर्गीकृत  as  a  level 7 event on the International Nuclear Event Scale ( the other being the Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster in 2011  )  .
The battle to contain the contamination and avert a greater catastrophe ultimately involved over 500,000 workers and cost an estimated  18  billion rubles .
The official Soviet casualty count of 31 deaths has  महरूम  disputed  ,  and long-term effects such as  cancers   और  deformities are still being accounted for .
in  grammar  ,  a subject complement  is  a predicative  अभिव्यक्ति  that follows  a  linking verb  (  copula ) and  कि  complements ( completes ) the  विषय  of the sentence by either  (   1  ) renaming it or (  2  ) describing it .
in  the former case , a renaming noun phrase such as a noun  or  pronoun is called a predicative  नाममात्र  .
An adjective following the copula  और   describing  the subject  is  called  a  predicative adjective .
In either case the predicative  पूरक  in effect mirrors the subject .
Subject complements are used  साथ  a small class of verbs  पुकारा  linking verbs or  copula  ,  of   जिससे  be is the most common .
Since copula are stative verbs , subject complements are not  प्रभावित  by any  कार्रवाई   of  the verb .
Subject complements are typically not clause  वितर्क  , nor are they clause adjuncts .
throughout  the fifty-five  साल  history of  the  Grammy Awards ,  अनेक  significant records  have  been  नियत  .
This  पेज   तभी  includes the competitive awards won by various  कलाकारों  .
This does not include the various  खास  awards that are presented  by   the   नेशनल   अकादमी  of Recording Arts and Sciences such as Lifetime  उपलब्धि   पुरस्कार  , Trustees Awards  ,  Technical Awards  or   लेजेंड  Awards  .
The page however does include other  non-performance  related Grammys  (  known as the Craft & Production Fields ) that  may  have been presented to  the  artist  (  s ) .
मार्शल  Bruce Mathers III (  born   अक्तूबर   17  , 1972 ) , better known by his stage name Eminem (  stylized  as EMINƎM ) and by his alter  अहंकार  Slim Shady ,  is  an  अमरीकी  rapper , record producer , songwriter and  कर्ता  .
Eminem , along with  उसके   सोलो  career , is a member  of   उसके  group D12 , and also one half of the hip hop duo  ख़राब  Meets Evil  ,  with Royce da 5'9 '' .
Eminem is one of the  best-selling  artists  in   the  world and is the best-selling artist of the 2000s .
He  रै  been  सूचीबद्ध  and ranked as  एक   of  the greatest artists of all time  by   अनेक  magazines , including Rolling Stone magazine which  क्रमित  him 82nd on its list of The 100 Greatest Artists of All Time  .
The same magazine declared him The King  of  Hip  हॉप  .
Including his  कार्य   साथ  D12 and Bad Meets Evil , Eminem  रै  achieved  टेन  number-one albums on the Billboard 200 .
He has  बेची  more  than  100 million records worldwide , including 42 million tracks and 49.1 million  एल्बम  in the United  राज्य  .
as  an  भूमिगत  rapper Eminem  released  his debut solo album  ,  Infinite in 1996 .
The album  थी  a critical and commercial failure .
He gained mainstream popularity  in  1999 after the release of  उसके  major-label debut album  the  Slim  छायादार  LP .
The LP also  अर्जित  Eminem his  पहला  Grammy Award for  बेहतरीन  Rap  एल्बम  .
His next two records The Marshall Mathers  lp   ,  and The Eminem Show , also won Best Rap Album Grammy  पुरस्कार  , making Eminem the first  कलाकार  to win  बेहतरीन  Rap Album  लिये  three  लगातार  LPs .
This was  followed  by  another   स्टुडियो   रिलीज  in 2004  titled   encore  .
Eminem then went on  अंतराल  after  touring  in 2005 .
He released his  पहला  album in five years titled Relapse , on May 15 , 2009 .
in  2010 ,  एमिनेम  released his seventh  स्टुडियो  album  रिकवरी  .
Recovery was an international success  और  was  नामित  the best selling album of 2010 worldwide , joining The Eminem  दिखाएँ  , which was the best  विक्रेता   of  2002 .
Eminem  जीती  Grammy Awards  लिये  both  पतन  and Recovery  ,   giving  him a total of 13 Grammys  in  his career .
Eminem has opened  अन्य  ventures ,  सहित  his own record label Shady  रिकॉर्ड  with his manager Paul Rosenberg  .
He also  रै  his own radio channel ,  शेड   45  on  sirius  XM  रेडियो  .
एमिनेम  began an  एक्टिंग   करियर  in 2002 , when he  स्ट्रक्चर  in the hip hop drama film 8 Mile .
He won the Academy  पुरस्कार  for  बेहतरीन  Original  सोंग   ,   बनने  the first rap artist ever  to  win  the  award .
He has also  बना   कैमियो  appearances  in  The Wash  (  2001 ) ,  मजेदार   लोगों  ( 2009 ) and  the  television  श्रेणी   अनुगामी  .
The acre is a unit of  क्षेत्रफल  used in  the  imperial  और  U.S. customary systems .
An acre is about 40 % of a hectare – slightly  छोटी   than  an  अमरीकी  football field .
The acre is no longer commonly used , although a few notable exceptions include the United  राज्य  , Australia  ,   बर्मा   और  the United Kingdom ( as  of  2010  ,   the  acre is no  longer  officially used in the United Kingdom  ,   हालांकि  is still used in real estate descriptions )  .
It is still used , to some extent , in Canada .
The international symbol of the acre is ac  ,  and is defined as 1/640 of a  वर्गाकार  mile .
The most commonly used acre today is the international acre .
In the United States  दोनो  the international acre and  the  slightly different US survey  एकड़  are in use .
The most common use of the acre is to measure  tracts   of  land .
One international acre is defined  as  4046.8564224 square metres  .
During the Middle Ages  ,  an acre was the amount of land that could be plowed in one day with  a  yoke of oxen  .
एंटोनी  Lavoisier 's discovery of the Law of Conservation of Mass led to many new findings in the 19th century .
Joseph Proust 's law of  definite   proportions   और  John Dalton 's atomic theory branched from the discoveries of Antoine Lavoisier .
Lavoisier 's quantitative experiments revealed that  दहन  involved oxygen  बल्कि  than what  थी  previously thought  to   be  phlogiston  .
The law  of  conservation of mass , or  principle  of mass conservation ,  राज्य  that for  कोई  system closed  to  all transfers of matter and energy (  दोनो  of which have mass  )  ,  the  mass  of   the  system must remain constant over  समय  , as system mass can not change quantity  if  it is  नहीं  added or removed .
Hence , the quantity of mass is `` conserved '' over time .
The law implies  कि  mass can neither  be   निर्मित  nor destroyed  ,  although it may be  rearranged  in  स्पेस  , or  the  entities associated with  it  may be changed in form  ,  as for example  जब  light or physical work is transformed into particles  कि   योगदान  the same mass  to  the system as the light or work  था   contributed  .
The law implies ( requires )  कि  during any  रासायनिक  reaction , nuclear reaction ,  or  radioactive decay in an  पृथक  system ,  the  mass of the reactants  or   starting  material must equal the mass of the products  .
The concept of  द्रव्यमान   संरक्षण  is widely used in many fields such as chemistry ,  यांत्रिकी  , and fluid dynamics .
Historically , mass conservation was discovered in chemical reactions  by  Antoine Lavoisier in the late 18th  सदी  , and was of crucial importance in the progress  इससे   alchemy  to the  आधुनिक  natural science of chemistry .
The closely related concept of matter conservation  थी  found  to  hold good  in  chemistry to such  ऊँची   सन्निकटन  that it failed only for the  ऊँची  energies treated by  the  later refinements of relativity theory , but  वरना   remains  useful  और  sufficiently accurate for most chemical  calculations  , even  in  modern  अभ्यास  .
In special relativity  ,  needed for accuracy when large energy transfers between systems is  शामिल   ,   the  difference between thermodynamically closed and isolated systems becomes important ,  चूंकि  conservation of mass is strictly and perfectly  upheld  only for so-called  पृथक   प्रणालियों  , i.e . those completely  पृथक   इससे   सब  exchanges with the environment .
In this  परिस्थिति  ,  the  mass-energy equivalence theorem states  कि  mass conservation  is  equivalent to total  उर्जा  conservation , which is the  पहला  law of thermodynamics .
By  कंट्रास्ट  , for  a  thermodynamically closed  प्रणाली   (  i.e. ,  एक  which  is   बंद  to exchanges of matter , but open to exchanges of non-material  उर्जा  ,  ऐसे  as heat and work , with the  परिवेश   )  mass is ( usually ) only approximately conserved .
The input or output of non-material energy must  बदलें  the mass  of  the  प्रणाली  in relativity  सिद्धान्त  , although the change is usually small , since relatively  विशाल   amounts  of  ऐसे  energy  (  by comparison with  ordinary  experience ) carry only a small amount of mass (  again  by ordinary standards of measurement ) .
in   खास  relativity , mass is not converted to  उर्जा  , since energy in all of  इसके  forms always retains  इसके  equivalent amount of  द्रव्यमान   throughout  any transformation or translocation  into  ,  or  out  of  ,  a   प्रणाली  .
however   ,  certain types of matter (  a  different  अवधारणा  ) may be converted to energy ,  so  long  as  the  द्रव्यमान  of the system is unchanged in the process .
However ,  if  such energy is removed from systems , they must  खोना   the  mass that is associated with it .
In general relativity , mass ( and energy  )  conservation in expanding volumes of space is a  जटिल   अवधारणा   ,  subject  to  different definitions , and neither mass nor energy  is  as strictly and  बस  conserved  as  is the case in special relativity and  in  Minkowski  स्पेस  .
For a discussion ,  देखिए  mass  in   सामान्य  relativity .
A pig  is  any of the animals in the genus  सस  , within the Suidae family  of  even-toed ungulates .
Pigs include the domestic pig  ,  its ancestor the wild boar , and several other wild relatives .
Young and small pigs are  ज्ञात  as piglets .
Pigs are  omnivores  and are highly social and intelligent  पशु  .

8-inch ,  -inch  ( full height )  ,  and  -inch   ड्राइव
a  3.5-inch diskette 's  ``   फ्लॉपी  ''  चुम्बकीय  material , removed  इससे  its housing
A floppy disk , or diskette , is  a  disk storage medium composed of a  डिस्क  of thin and flexible  चुम्बकीय  storage  मीडियम  , sealed  in   a  rectangular plastic carrier lined with fabric that removes dust particles .
They are  पढ़ा  and written by  a  floppy disk  ड्राइव  (  fdd  ) .
फ्लॉपी  disks  ,  initially as  मीडिया  and later in and 3.5-inch ( 90  mm  ) sizes  ,  were  a  ubiquitous form of data  भंडार  and  एक्सचेंज  from  the  mid-1970s well into the  पहला  decade of the 21st century .
by  2010  ,  computer motherboards were rarely manufactured with floppy drive support ;  ``   floppies  could be  प्रयुक्त  as an external  usb   ड्राइव  , but ``  ,  8 `` , and non-standard  ड्राइव   could   तभी  be handled  by  old equipment .
While floppy disk  ड्राइव  still  have   कुछ  limited uses , especially with legacy industrial  कंप्यूटर  equipment , they have  महरूम   superseded  by data storage methods with much greater capacity , such  as  USB flash  ड्राइव  , portable  बाह्य  hard disk drives , optical  discs   ,  memory  ताश   ,  and computer networks  .
An animated diagram of a cutter
In baseball , a cutter , or  काटें  fastball , is a type of fastball which breaks slightly toward the pitcher 's glove side as it reaches home  थाली  .
इस  pitch is somewhere between a slider and a fastball , as it  is  usually  thrown   तेज़  than a slider  लकिन   साथ   अधिक  motion than  a   ठेठ  fastball .
कुछ   pitchers  use a cutter as  a  way to prevent hitters from  expecting  their regular fastballs .
A common  तकनीक   प्रयुक्त  to throw a  कटर  is to use a four-seam  fastball  grip with the baseball set slightly off center  in  the hand .
When a batter  is  able to hit a cutter pitch  ,  it often results in  नरम  contact and an  आसान  out , due to the  पिच  's movement keeping the ball away  इससे  the  चमगादड़  's  मीठी   स्पॉट  .
The cutter  is  typically 2–5 mph slower than a pitcher  's  four-seam  fastball   .
In 2010 , the average  पिच  classified as a cutter by PITCHf/x thrown by a right-handed pitcher was  88.6   किमी  ; the average four-seamer  थी  92.1 mph .
``  कया   it  Takes '' is  a   शक्ति  ballad by American hard rock band Aerosmith .
It was written by Steven Tyler , Joe Perry  ,  and Desmond Child .
It was  released  in 1990 as the third  सिंगल   इससे  Aerosmith 's critically and commercially successful  1989  album Pump .
In the video The Making of Pump , A & R  man  John  kalodner  described the song  as  `` a masterpiece  ''  .
During live performances ,  टायलर  sings the first verse a  cappella  and belts out one  of  his signature screams right before  the   कोरस   .
The album version of the song is  followed  by an untitled  छुपा   track   .

odysseus  (  or  ; Greek  :  , ) ,  भी   ज्ञात  by the  रोमन  name Ulysses ( ; ) , was a legendary  यूनानी   किंग   of   ithaca   और  a hero  of   होमर  's epic  कविता  the Odyssey .
Odysseus also plays a key role in  होमर  's Iliad  और  other works  in  that  वही  Epic Cycle .
Husband  of  Penelope , father  of   telemachus  , and son of Laërtes ( or Sisyphus ) and Anticlea , Odysseus is renowned for his brilliance , guile , and versatility ( polytropos ) ,  और  is hence known by the epithet  odysseus  the Cunning  (  mētis , or `` cunning intelligence  ``  ) .
He is most famous for  the  ten eventful years he took  to  return home  बाद   the  decade-long Trojan War and his famous Trojan Horse ploy to  कैप्चर  the city  of  Troy .
erie  is a Statutory Town in Boulder  और  Weld counties in the U.S. state of Colorado .
The population  according   to  the 2010 census is 18,135  और   थी  recorded as 6,291 at the 2000 census  .
The Town  of  Erie is located  बस  west of I-25 for easy  अभिगम  to I-70 , Denver International Airport and Colorado 's entire  सामने  Range  .
Erie 's Planning Area spans 48  वर्गाकार  miles ,  extending  from the north  पक्ष  of State Highway 52 south to State  राजमार्ग  7 , and  between  US 287 on the  वेस्ट  and Interstate 25 to the east .
erie  is approximately 35 minutes from Denver International  विमानक्षेत्र   ,  25 minutes  to  Denver and  20   मिनट्स   इससे  Boulder .
The Board of Trustees serves  as  the legislative and governing body of the Town of Erie and is responsible for establishing Town policies and goals .
The Board has the authority to adopt laws , ordinances  और  resolutions as needed  to  conduct the  कारोबार  of the Town , and by ordinance may enter into contracts  or   intergovernmental   समझौतों  to furnish , receive services or to provide  लिये   सहकारी  service  डिलीवरी  .
Appointed by and serving at the pleasure of the  फलक  of Trustees  ,  the Town Administrator  is  the chief operating and administrative officer of the  कस्बा   और  is responsible for providing professional  नेतृत्व  in the administration and execution of policies and objectives formulated  by  the Board .
The mission of the Erie Police Department is to  communicate  and work with the community to  maintain  a safe environment , prevent crime and  enforce  the  विधि  , while protecting  the   अधिकारों  of all .
Erie Municipal Airport (  eik  )  is  owned and operated by the Town of Erie and is strategically located in the Denver-Boulder metropolitan area  on  Colorado Highway 7 , a little over  तीन  miles west of Interstate 25 .
The main runway is concrete paved and 4,700 feet long  .
The is a home  वीडियो  game console produced by  सोनी  Computer Entertainment .
It is  the  successor to  the  PlayStation 2 , as part  of  the  प्लेस्टेशन  series .
the  PlayStation 3  competes  with Microsoft 's Xbox 360 and Nintendo 's  वी   as  part  of   the  seventh generation of video  खेल  consoles .
It was  पहला  released on November 11 , 2006  ,  in Japan , with international markets following shortly thereafter .
The console was first officially  घोषित  at E3  2005  .
Originally set  लिये  a spring 2006 release date , it was delayed several times until finally hitting stores at the end of  the  year .
It was the first and currently  तभी  console to use Blu-ray  डिस्क  as  इसके  primary storage medium .
प्रमुख  features of the console  शामिल  its unified online gaming service  ,  the  प्लेस्टेशन   संजाल  , and  इसके   कनेक्टिविटी  with the PlayStation Portable and PlayStation Vita , In September  2009   the  updated  प्लेस्टेशन  3 Slim , was released .
This Slim is lighter  और  thinner than the original version , although  it  lacks PlayStation 2 backwards compatibility (  removed  on  बाद  original models ) , but notably featured a re-designed logo and marketing design .
As  of  November 4 , 2012 , 70 million PlayStation 3s have been sold worldwide  .
Its successor ,  प्लेस्टेशन  4 , is  नियत  for a Q4 2013 release .
Salvador  डोमिंगो   फेलिप   jacinto  Dalí  i  Domènech  ,   1st  Marqués de  dalí   de  Pubol  (  May  11  , 1904January 23 , 1989 ) , known as  साल्वाडोर  Dalí ( ) , was a prominent Spanish surrealist  चित्रकार  born in  figueres  , Spain .
Dalí was a skilled draftsman , best known for  the   striking  and  विचित्र   बिंब  in his surrealist work .
His painterly skills are often attributed to  the   influence  of Renaissance  मास्टर्स   .
His  best-known   कार्य  ,  the  Persistence of Memory , was  समाप्त  in 1931 .
Dalí  's  expansive artistic repertoire included film , sculpture  ,  and photography , in  सहयोग  with a range of artists  in  a variety of media .
Dalí attributed his `` love of  सबकुछ  that is  gilded  and excessive , my  जुनून  for luxury and  my  love of oriental clothes ''  to  a self-styled `` Arab lineage '' ,  claiming  that his ancestors were  descended  from the Moors .
Dalí was highly imaginative , and  भी  enjoyed  indulging  in unusual and grandiose behavior .
उसके  eccentric manner and attention-grabbing public actions  sometimes  drew more  ध्यान  than his artwork , to the dismay of  those  who held his work in high  esteem  , and to  the  irritation of his critics .
