the   मानवता  are academic disciplines that study human culture , using methods  कि  are primarily analytical , critical  ,  or  सट्टे  , and having a significant historical element , as distinguished from the mainly  अनुभवजन्य  approaches of  the   प्राकृतिक  sciences .
The humanities  शामिल  ancient and modern languages , literature ,  दर्शनशास्त्र  , religion , and visual and performing arts  ऐसे  as music  और  theatre .
The humanities that are also regarded as social sciences include history , anthropology  ,  area  अध्ययन  , communication studies ,  सांस्कृतिक   अध्ययन  ,  विधि  , economics  और  linguistics  .
Scholars working in  the  humanities are  sometimes  described as `` humanists  ''   .
However , that term also describes the philosophical position of humanism , which some ``  antihumanist  `` scholars  in  the humanities reject .
Some secondary schools offer humanities classes , usually consisting  of  English literature , global studies , and art .
Human disciplines like  इतिहास   ,  cultural anthropology and psychoanalysis study subject  matters  to which the experimental method does not apply , and they have access instead  to  the comparative method and  तुलनात्मक  research .
The 2005 Blue  रूम  Christmas Tree
The White House Christmas Tree ,  भी  known as the Blue  रूम   क्रिसमस  Tree , is  the   आधिकारिक  indoor Christmas  पेड़   at  the  निवास  of the President  of  the United States  ,  the  श्वेत  House .
The first indoor Christmas tree was installed  in  the White House sometime  in  the  19th  century (  वहीँ  are  varying  claims as to the exact  साल  )  और   चूंकि  1961 the  पेड़  has had a themed motif  at  the discretion of  the   पहला  Lady of the United States  .
The  अध्यक्ष  of the United States of America ( POTUS ) is the head of state and head  of  government of the United  राज्य  .
the  president leads the executive branch of the federal  सरकारी  and  is  the commander-in-chief of the United States Armed Forces .
Article II  of  the U.S. Constitution vests the executive power of the United States in the  अध्यक्ष   और  charges  उसे  with  the  execution of federal law  ,   alongside  the responsibility of  appointing  federal executive , diplomatic , regulatory , and judicial officers , and concluding treaties with foreign powers ,  साथ  the advice and consent of the Senate .
the  president  is  further empowered to grant  संघीय  pardons  और   reprieves   ,  and to convene and adjourn either or both houses of Congress under extraordinary circumstances .
चूंकि  the founding of the United States  ,  the  शक्ति  of the president and the  संघीय  government  have  grown substantially and each  आधुनिक  president , despite  possessing  no formal legislative powers beyond signing or  vetoing  congressionally passed bills ,  is  largely responsible for  dictating  the legislative agenda of his  पार्टी   और  the foreign and domestic policy  of  the United States  .
The president is frequently described as the  सबसे  powerful person in the  संसार  .
The president is indirectly elected by the  लोगों  through the Electoral College to  a  four-year  पद  , and  is  one of  तभी  two  nationally   निर्वाचित  federal officers  ,  the other being the Vice President of the United States .
The Twenty-second  amendment   ,  adopted in 1951 , prohibits  anyone  from ever  होने  elected to the presidency for a third full term .
It  भी  prohibits a  व्यक्ति  from  होने  elected to the presidency more than  एकबार  if that person previously had served as president , or acting  अध्यक्ष  , for more than  दो  years of another person  's  term as president  .
In all  ,  43 individuals have served 55 four-year terms .
On  जनवरी  20 , 2009 , Barack Obama became the 44th and  वर्तमान  president .
On November 6  ,  2012 , he was re-elected and is scheduled to serve until  जनवरी   20  , 2017 .
होश  are physiological capacities of organisms that provide  आंकड़ा   लिये  perception  .
The senses and  उनके   आपरेशन  , classification  ,  and theory are overlapping  विषय  studied  by   a  variety of fields  ,  most  notably   neuroscience   ,  cognitive psychology (  or  cognitive science ) , and philosophy of perception  .
The nervous system  रै   a  specific sensory  प्रणाली  or  अंग  , dedicated to each sense .
Humans have a multitude of senses  .
Sight  (  ophthalmoception ) ,  सुनना  (  audioception  ) , taste  (   gustaoception  ) , smell  (  olfacoception or olfacception ) , and touch ( tactioception ) are the five  traditionally  recognized .
While the ability  to  detect other stimuli beyond those governed by the traditional senses  exists  , including  तापमान  ( thermoception ) , kinesthetic sense ( proprioception ) , pain  (  nociception ) , balance ( equilibrioception )  ,  acceleration ( kinesthesioception ) , and various  आतंरिक  stimuli (  e.g  . the  अलग   chemoreceptors  for detecting salt and carbon dioxide concentrations in the blood ) , only a  छोटी  number  of  these can safely be classified as separate  होश   in  and of themselves .
What constitutes a sense  is   a  matter of  कुछ  debate , leading to  कठिनाइयों  in defining what exactly  a  sense is .
Animals also have  receptors  to sense  the   संसार  around them  ,  with degrees of capability varying greatly between species  .
इंसानो   have  a comparatively weak sense  of  smell  ,  while some  पशु  may lack one or more of  the  traditional five senses .
कुछ  animals may also intake and interpret sensory stimuli in  बहुत  different ways .
Some species of  पशु  are able to sense the world in a  रास्ता  that humans can not , with some species  समर्थ   to  sense  विद्युत  and magnetic fields  ,  and  detect  water pressure  और  currents .
Spiders  (   अनुक्रम  Araneae ) are  air-breathing   arthropods  that have eight legs and chelicerae with fangs that inject  venom   .
They are the  largest  order of arachnids and rank seventh in total species diversity among all  अन्य  groups of  जीवों  .
Spiders are  मिला  worldwide on  प्रत्येक   महाद्वीप  except for Antarctica  ,  and  have  become established in nearly every habitat with  the  exception of air and sea colonization .
As of 2008 , at least  43,678  spider  प्रजाति  , and  109  families  have  been recorded by  taxonomists   ;  however , there has been  भ्रम  within  the   वैज्ञानिक   जातियाँ  as to how  सब  these  परिवारों  should be  वर्गीकृत  , as evidenced by the over 20 different classifications that have been proposed since 1900 .
Anatomically , spiders differ  इससे  other arthropods  in   कि  the  usual  body  खण्ड  are fused into two tagmata , the cephalothorax and abdomen , and  joined   by  a small , cylindrical pedicel .
नापसंद  insects , spiders do  नहीं  have antennae .
In all except the most primitive group , the Mesothelae ,  मकड़ियों  have the most centralized  बेचैन   प्रणालियों  of all arthropods , as  सब  their ganglia are fused into one mass in  the  cephalothorax .
Unlike  सबसे  arthropods , spiders have no  extensor  muscles in their limbs and instead extend them by hydraulic pressure  .
Their  abdomens  bear appendages that  have  been modified into  spinnerets  that  extrude  silk from up to six types  of  silk glands  भीतर  their abdomen .
Spider webs vary widely  in  size , shape and the amount of sticky thread used  .
It now appears that the spiral  orb  web may be one of the earliest forms ,  और  spiders that produce  उलझे   cobwebs  are  अधिक  abundant and diverse than orb-web spiders .
Spider-like arachnids with silk-producing spigots appeared  in  the Devonian  काल  about , but these animals apparently lacked spinnerets .
सच्चा  spiders have been found in Carboniferous rocks  इससे  , and are very similar to the  सबसे  primitive surviving order , the Mesothelae .
The main groups  of   आधुनिक   मकड़ियों  , Mygalomorphae and Araneomorphae  ,  first appeared  in  the Triassic  काल   ,  before .
a  herbivorous species , Bagheera kiplingi , was described in 2008  ,  but all other known species are predators , mostly  preying  on insects  और   on  other spiders , although a few large species also take birds and lizards .
Spiders use a wide range of  रणनीति  to capture  शिकार   :  trapping it in  स्टिकी  webs , lassoing  it  with sticky bolas  ,  mimicking the  शिकार  to avoid detection ,  or  running it down  .
Most detect prey mainly by sensing  कंपन   ,   लकिन  the active hunters have acute vision , and  hunters   of  the genus Portia  दिखाएँ  signs of  प्रज्ञा   in  their choice of tactics and  क्षमता  to develop new ones .
मकड़ियों  ' guts are too narrow to take solids  ,  and they liquidize their food by  बाढ़   it  with digestive enzymes and grinding it with the bases of  उनके  pedipalps , as they  do   नहीं   have  true jaws  .
Male spiders identify themselves by a variety of complex courtship rituals to  avoid  being eaten by the females  .
Males of most species  जीवित  a  few  matings , limited mainly by  उनके   छोटी  life  spans  .
Females weave silk  egg-cases  , each of which may contain hundreds of eggs .
Females  of  many species care for their young , for example by carrying them around or by  sharing   खाना   साथ  them .
a  minority of species are social , building  सांप्रदायिक  webs that may house anywhere  इससे  a few  to  50,000 individuals .
Social behavior  सीमाएँ  from precarious toleration , as  in   the  widow spiders ,  to  co-operative hunting  और   food-sharing  .
हालांकि   सबसे  spiders  सजीव   लिये  at  सबसे  two years , tarantulas and  अन्य  mygalomorph spiders can live up to  25  years  in  captivity .
While the venom of a few species is dangerous to humans , scientists are now researching the use of  मकड़ी  venom in medicine and as non-polluting pesticides  .
Spider silk provides a combination  of  lightness  ,  strength and elasticity that is superior  to  that of  सिंथेटिक   सामग्री  ,  और  spider  रेशा  genes have  महरूम  inserted into mammals and plants to see if these can  be  used as silk factories .
as  a result of their wide range of behaviors , spiders have become common  प्रतीकों  in  आर्ट  and mythology symbolizing various combinations of patience , cruelty and creative powers .
Grey 's Anatomy is an American  टेलीविज़न  medical drama that premiered on the American Broadcasting Company  (  ABC  )  , as a mid-season  बदलना   on  March  27  , 2005  .
The series has aired nine seasons , and focuses on the  fictional  lives  of  surgical interns  और  residents as they gradually evolve into seasoned doctors , while trying to maintain personal  जीवनदान  .
The show 's premise originated with Shonda Rhimes , who serves as an executive producer , along with Betsy Beers , Mark Gordon , Krista Vernoff  ,  Rob  मकई  ,  चिह्नित  Wilding , and Allan Heinberg .
the  series  थी  created  to  be racially diverse , utilizing a color-blind casting technique .
It is primarily filmed in Los Angeles , California  .
the  series ' protagonist is Dr.  मेरेडिथ  Grey (  एलेन  Pompeo ) ,  जो   originally   is  accepted  into  the residency program at the fictional Seattle Grace Hospital .
Meredith  is   आबंटित  to work under Dr. Miranda Bailey ( Chandra Wilson ) ,  साथ  with Dr. Cristina Yang (  सैंड्रा  Oh ) ,  dr.  George O'Malley ( T. R.  नाईट  ) , Dr. Izzie Stevens  (  Katherine  heigl  ) , and Dr. Alex Karev (  जस्टिन  Chambers )  .
following  O'Malley 's death and  स्टीवंस  '  प्रस्थान  , the  हॉस्पिटल  's merger with Mercy  वेस्ट  brings in Dr.  जैक्सन  Avery ( Jesse Williams ) and  dr.   अप्रैल   kepner  ( Sarah Drew ) ,  in  the  छठे   ऋतु  .
the  surgical wing is primarily supervised by Dr. Richard Webber ( James Pickens  ,  Jr.  )  , who is eventually  replaced  by Dr. Derek Shepherd  (   पैट्रिक  Dempsey )  ,  and later Dr. Owen Hunt  (  Kevin  mckidd  ) .
Dr. Preston Burke ( Isaiah  वॉशिंगटन  ) departs at the conclusion  of  the  तीसरा   ऋतु  , and is replaced by  dr.  Erica Hahn ( Brooke Smith )  ,  who leaves the show during the fifth season , and  बाद  Dr.  टेडी  Altman ( Kim Raver ) ,  जो  departs at the end of the eighth season .
Introduced in the second season is Dr.  एडीसन  Montgomery  (   केट   वाल्श  ) , who leaves  the  show at  the  end of the  तीसरा  season , in  अनुक्रम  to launch her  अपना  spin-off medical drama Private Practice .
dr.  Callie Torres  (  Sara Ramirez ) and Dr. Mark Sloan (  eric  Dane ) also  डालें  the show in the second season , while  the  latter dies in the  प्रीमियर  of the ninth  ऋतु  .
Meredith 's  half-sister   ,  Dr. Lexie Grey  (  Chyler Leigh ) , appears from season three and dies at  the  end of season eight .
dr.  Arizona Robbins ( Jessica Capshaw ) is given  श्रेणी  regular status at the beginning of the sixth season  .
धूसर  's  anatomy   is   the  highest-rated drama in the key  18–49   जनसांख्यिकी  .
previously  among  the  overall top-ten  रेटेड  shows in the United  राज्य   ,  Grey 's  anatomy  has been well received  by   आलोचकों   .
Considered  an  impact on  संस्कृति  , the  श्रेणी  has received numerous awards , and has also  महरूम   शामिल  in various critics  '  top  टेन  lists .
The  दिखाएँ   रै  produced several specials , as well as distributed all seasons to  dvd  , and released  a  collection of merchandise .
In 2012 ,  धूसर   's  Anatomy was named  the  fifth-highest revenue  कमाई  show , in terms of advertising per half-hour .
On May 11  ,   2012   ,  the  श्रेणी  was renewed for a ninth season , which premiered on September  27  , 2012 .
schizophrenia  ( or  )  is a mental disorder characterized by a  विश्लेषण   of  thought processes and by a deficit of typical emotional responses .
आम   लक्षण   शामिल  auditory hallucinations  ,  paranoid or  विचित्र  delusions  ,  or disorganized speech and thinking , and it  is   accompanied  by  significant  social or  occupational  dysfunction .
The onset of symptoms typically occurs in  यंग  adulthood , with a global lifetime prevalence of about  0.3–0.7  % .
Diagnosis is based on observed behavior and the patient 's reported  अनुभवों  .
आनुवंशिकी  , early environment , neurobiology , and psychological and social processes appear  to  be  महत्वपूर्ण   contributory  factors ; some recreational  और  prescription drugs appear to cause or worsen symptoms .
Current research is focused  on   the  role of neurobiology , although no single isolated organic cause  रै  been found .
The many possible combinations of symptoms have triggered debate about whether the diagnosis represents a  सिंगल  disorder or a  क्रमांक  of discrete syndromes .
Despite the etymology of the term  इससे  the Greek roots skhizein  (  σχίζειν ,  ``  to split  ''   )  and  phrēn  , phren-  (  φρήν , φρεν-  ;  `` mind '' ) , schizophrenia does not imply a  ``  split personality  ''  , or `` multiple personality disorder  ''  ( which is known these  दिनों  as dissociative  पहचान  disorder ) —a condition with which  it  is often confused  in  public perception .
Rather  ,   the   पद  means a ``  splitting  of mental  कृत्यों  '' , because of  the  symptomatic presentation of  the  illness .
The  mainstay  of treatment is antipsychotic  दवा  ,  जिससे  primarily suppresses dopamine ( and sometimes serotonin  )  receptor  कार्यकलाप  .
Psychotherapy and vocational and social rehabilitation are also important  in  treatment .
In more serious cases—where there  is  risk to self and others— involuntary hospitalization  may  be necessary ,  हालांकि  hospital stays are now shorter  और   कम   बारंबार  than they  एकबार  were .
The  विकार  is thought  मुख्यतः  to  affect  cognition  ,  but it  भी  usually contributes  to  chronic problems with behavior and emotion .
People  साथ  schizophrenia are  संभावित  to have additional ( comorbid )  शर्तें  , including major depression and anxiety disorders ; the  आजीवन  occurrence of substance use  विकार  is almost  50  % .
Social  समस्याएं   ,  such as long-term  बेरोजगारी  , poverty , and  homelessness  are common .
The average life expectancy of people  साथ  the  विकार   is  12 to 15 years less than those without  ,  the result of increased physical  स्वास्थ्य  problems and a higher suicide rate ( about 5  %  ) .
पॉल  Leslie  snider  (  अप्रैल  15 , 1951–August 14 ,  1980  )  थी  the estranged husband and manager of Playboy model Dorothy Stratten ,  जिसको   he   murdered  before killing himself  the  same day .
The Epic of Gilgamesh , an epic poem from  मेसोपोटामिया  , is  amongst  the earliest surviving works of literature  .
the  literary history  of  Gilgamesh begins with  पाँच  independent Sumerian  कविताएं   परिचय  'Bilgamesh ' ( Sumerian for Gilgamesh ) , king of Uruk .
Four of these were  प्रयुक्त  as  सोर्स  material for a combined epic  in  Akkadian .
This first combined  एपिक  ,  ज्ञात  as  the  `` Old Babylonian '' version , dates  to  the 18th  सदी  BC and is titled after its incipit , Shūtur eli sharrī ( `` Surpassing All Other Kings  ''  ) .
तभी  a few fragments  of  it have survived .
The later `` Standard Babylonian ''  संस्करण  dates from the 13th  to  the 10th centuries  bc  and bears the incipit Sha  naqba   īmuru  (  ``  He who Saw the Deep '' ) .
Fragments of approximately two thirds of this longer , twelve-tablet version have been recovered .
Some of  the  best copies were discovered in the library  तबाह  of the 7th-century BC Assyrian king Ashurbanipal .
The story centers on a friendship between  gilgamesh   और  Enkidu  .
Enkidu  is  a wild man created by the gods as Gilgamesh 's equal  to  distract him from oppressing the  लोगों  of Uruk .
साथ  , they journey to the Cedar Mountain to defeat Humbaba , its monstrous guardian  .
Later they kill the Bull of Heaven , which the goddess Ishtar sends to punish Gilgamesh for spurning her advances .
As a punishment for these  क्रियाएँ   ,  the gods sentence Enkidu  to   मौत  .
The second half of the  एपिक   focuses  on Gilgamesh 's distress at Enkidu  's  death ,  और   उसके  quest for immortality .
In order to learn  the  secret of eternal life  ,  Gilgamesh undertakes a  long  and perilous journey .
He learns that `` The  जीवन  that you are  seeking  you will never  ढूँढें  .
जब  the  देवताओं  created man  वे  allotted to him death , but life they retained in  उनके  own keeping . ''
This quote  थी  originally attributed to  siduri  in the Old  babylonian  version of the epic , and  तब  attributed to  the  immortal flood hero Utnapishtim  in  the Akkadian version  of  the epic  .
Nevertheless , Gilgamesh 's  कीर्ति  lived on after his  मौत   ,  because of his great building projects , and his account  of  what Utnapishtim told him  happened  during the flood .
the  story has been translated into many  अलग  languages , and Gilgamesh has since become adapted  in  works of  लोकप्रिय  fiction .
a  eukaryote (  or  )  is   an  organism whose cells contain  जटिल  structures enclosed within membranes .
Eukaryotes may more formally be  referred  to as the taxon  eukarya   or   eukaryota  .
The defining membrane-bound structure that sets eukaryotic cells  अलावा  from prokaryotic cells is the nucleus , or nuclear envelope  ,  within which the genetic material is carried .
The presence  of  a  केंद्रक   देता  eukaryotes their name , which  आता  from  the  Greek ( eu , `` good '' ) and  (  karyon  ,  ``  नट   ''  or `` kernel '' ) .
Most eukaryotic cells  भी  contain other membrane-bound organelles such as mitochondria , chloroplasts and the Golgi apparatus .
All large complex organisms are  eukaryotes  , including animals ,  पौधे  and fungi  .
The group  भी  includes many unicellular organisms .
Cell division in  eukaryotes  is different  इससे  that  in  organisms without a nucleus (  prokaryote  ) .
It  involves  separating the duplicated chromosomes , through movements directed  by   microtubules  .
There  हैं  two types  of  division processes  .
In mitosis , one cell divides  to  produce two  genetically  identical cells  .
In meiosis , which is required in sexual reproduction , one diploid  कोशिका  ( having  दो  instances of each chromosome , one from each  जनक   )  undergoes  recombination   of  each  जोड़ी   of  parental chromosomes , and then two stages of cell division  ,   resulting  in four haploid cells (  गैमीट  ) .
Each gamete has just one complement of chromosomes , each a unique mix of the corresponding  जोड़ी  of parental chromosomes .
Eukaryota  appears  to be monophyletic , and so makes up one of the three domains of  जीवन  .
The two other domains  ,  Bacteria and Archaea , are prokaryotes and  have  none of the above features .
Eukaryotes represent a tiny  अल्पसंख्यक  of  सब  living things ; even in  a  human  देह  there are 10 times more microbes  than  human cells .
However ,  due  to their much larger size their collective worldwide biomass is estimated at about equal to  कि   of  prokaryotes .
They are considered  to  have first developed  लगभग   1.6–2.1  billion years ago .
The use of Internet  सेवाएं   or  software with Internet access  to  defraud  पीड़ितों  or  to   वरना  take advantage of them , for example  by  stealing personal information , which can  भी  lead  to  identity theft .
a  very common  रूप  of Internet fraud  is   the  distribution of rogue  सुरक्षा   तन्त्र   .
अंतरजाल  services  can  be  प्रयुक्त  to present fraudulent solicitations to prospective victims , to  conduct  fraudulent  ट्रांजेक्शन  , or to transmit  the  proceeds of fraud to financial  संस्थानों  or to  अन्य  connected with the  योजना  .
Internet fraud can  occur  in chat rooms  ,  email , message boards , or  on   वेबसाइटों  .
the  International  सुरक्षा  Assistance Force  (   isaf  )  is   a   नाटो  -led security mission in Afghanistan that was established by the United Nations Security Council in  दिसम्बर  2001 by Resolution 1386 , as envisaged by  the  Bonn Agreement .
Its main purpose is to train the Afghan National Security Forces (  ansf   )   और   assist   अफगानिस्तान  in rebuilding  कुंजी  government institutions but is also engaged  in  the 2001-present  युद्ध  with insurgent groups .
ISAF was initially charged  साथ  securing Kabul and  surrounding  areas from  the  Taliban ,  al  Qaeda and  factional  warlords , so as to allow for the establishment of the Afghan  transitional  Administration headed by Hamid  करज़ई  .
In  अक्तूबर  2003 , the UN  सुरक्षा  Council authorized the expansion of the ISAF mission throughout Afghanistan ,  और  ISAF subsequently  विस्तारित   the   मिशन  in four main stages  over  the whole of the  देश  .
From 2006 to 2011 ,  isaf  had been involved  in   increasingly  more  intensive  combat  परिचालन  in southern and eastern Afghanistan .
Troop contributors include  इससे  the United States , United Kingdom  ,  NATO member states and a number  of   अन्य  countries  .
The intensity of the combat faced by  contributing  nations varies greatly , with the United States , United Kingdom , and Canada sustaining the majority  of   हताहत  in intensive combat  परिचालन   ,  with  अन्य  contributors sustaining  significantly  less .
As  of  early 2010 ,  वहीँ  were at least 700 military bases inside  अफगानिस्तान   लकिन  more were expected to be built  in  the coming years  .
About 400 of these were used by American‐led  नाटो  forces and 300 by ANSF .
कोका   (  benzoylmethylecgonine ) ( INN ) is a crystalline tropane alkaloid that  is  obtained  इससे  the leaves of the coca plant  .
The  नाम  comes from `` coca '' and the alkaloid suffix -ine ,  forming   कोका  .
It  is  a stimulant  ,   an  appetite suppressant , and a topical anesthetic .
Biologically , cocaine acts  as  a serotonin–norepinephrine–dopamine reuptake inhibitor , also known  as  a triple reuptake  inhibitor  (  ट्राई  ) .
It  is  addictive because  of  its effect on the mesolimbic reward pathway .
Unlike  सबसे  molecules  ,  cocaine has  pockets  with both high hydrophilic and lipophilic efficiency , violating the rule  of  hydrophilic-lipophilic balance .
This causes it  to  cross  the  blood–brain barrier  दूर  better than other  psychoactive  chemicals and  may   भी  induce  blood-brain  barrier  विश्लेषण  .
It is illegal to possess , produce ,  or  distribute  कोका  for  non-medicinal  and  non-government-sanctioned  purposes in almost every country .
Whole beef tri-tip rump  ,  roasted medium rare
The tri-tip  is  a cut  of  beef from the  नीचे  sirloin primal  काटें   .
It is a small triangular muscle ,  प्रायः   1.5  to 2.5 lbs . ( 675 to 1,150g ) per side of beef .
The scientific name of this muscle is tensor  fasciae  latae , inserted in the fascia lata , the connective tissue covering  the  quadriceps femoris ,  भी   पुकारा  quadriceps  extensor   ,  a  समूह  of four muscles which in turn insert in the patella , or  घुटना  cap of the animal .
willmar  is a city in ,  और  the county  सीट   of   ,  Kandiyohi County ,  मिनेसोटा   ,  United States .
the  population was 19,610  at   the  2010 census  .
Willmar has been assigned ZIP code 56201 by the United States Postal Service .
U.S . Routes 12 and  71   और  Minnesota State  राजमार्गों  23  और  40 are four of the main  रूट  in the  नगर  .
The Speaker of  the  United States House of Representatives ( or Speaker of the House ) is  the  presiding officer of the chamber .
The office was  स्थापित  in 1789 by Article I , Section 2  of  the  संयुक्त  States Constitution , which  राज्य  in part ,  ``   the  House  of   प्रतिनिधि  shall  chuse  their Speaker ... ''
The  वर्तमान  Speaker  is  John Boehner , a Republican who represents Ohio 's 8th congressional district .
The Constitution does not require that the  स्पीकर  be a Member  of  Congress , but no non-member has  कभी  been elected to  the  office .
The  स्पीकर  is second in the United States presidential line of  उत्तराधिकार  ,  बाद  the Vice President and ahead of the  अध्यक्ष  pro tempore of the U.S. Senate .
Unlike some Westminster system parliaments ,  in  which the  दफ्तर  of Speaker is  माना  non-partisan  ,  in the United States the Speaker of the House is a  नेतृत्व  position  और  the  office-holder  actively works to  नियत  the  बहुमत  party  's  legislative agenda  .
The Speaker usually does not personally preside  over  debates  ,  instead delegating the duty to members  of  the House  इससे  the majority party  .
Aside from duties relating to heading the House  और   the  majority political party , the Speaker also performs administrative and  प्रक्रियात्मक   कृत्यों  , and represents his or her  congressional  district .
a   सायकिल  frame is  the  main component of a  सायकिल  , on to which wheels and  अन्य  components are  fitted  .
The  आधुनिक  and  सबसे  common frame design for  an  upright bicycle  is  based on the safety bicycle , and consists of two triangles  ,  a  प्रमुख  triangle and a  युग्म  rear  त्रिभुज  .
This is known  as  the  डायमंड   फ़्रेम   .
Frames are required to be strong , stiff and light ,  जिससे  they do  by  combining different materials and shapes .
`` Simple gravity pendulum ''  मॉडल  assumes  no   घर्षण  or air  प्रतिरोध  .
An exemplar animation of a pendulum  प्रर्दशित   the  velocity  और  acceleration vectors
A pendulum is a  वज़न  suspended  इससे  a so  कि   it  can swing  freely  .
When a pendulum is displaced  बगलों  from its resting equilibrium position ,  it  is subject to  a  restoring force  due   to   गम्भीरता  that will accelerate  it   वापस  toward  the  equilibrium  स्थिति   .
When released , the restoring force combined with the pendulum  's  mass causes it  to  oscillate about  the  equilibrium position , swinging back and  forth  .
The time for one complete cycle , a left swing  और  a right swing  ,  is called the period .
A  लोलक  swings with a  विशिष्ट  period which depends ( mainly ) on its  लंबाई  .
From its discovery  around   1602  by Galileo Galilei the  नियमित  motion  of  pendulums was used  लिये   timekeeping  , and was the world 's most accurate timekeeping  प्रौद्योगिकी   जबतक  the 1930s .
pendulums  are used to  विनियमित  pendulum clocks , and  हैं  used  in  scientific instruments such as accelerometers and  seismometers   .
historically  they were used as gravimeters  to   माप  the acceleration of gravity in geophysical surveys , and even as a  मानक  of  लंबाई  .
the  word 'pendulum ' is new Latin , from the Latin pendulus , meaning  'टहलतेg  ' .
the  simple gravity pendulum is an idealized mathematical model of a pendulum .
This is a weight ( or bob ) on the end of a massless  cord  suspended  इससे  a , without friction .
When given an initial push  ,   it  will swing back and  forth  at a  निरंतर  amplitude .
Real pendulums  हैं  subject to friction  और  air drag ,  so  the amplitude of their  swings   गिरावट  .
The First Battle of Bull Run , also known as First Manassas ( the name used  by   confederate  forces ) , was fought on July  21  , 1861 , in Prince William  काउंटी  , Virginia , near  the  city of Manassas .
It was the  पहला  major land battle of the  अमरीकी  Civil War .
बस  months  बाद   the  start of  the  war at Fort  sumter  , the Northern public clamored for a march  विरूद्ध   the  Confederate  पूंजी  of Richmond ,  वर्जिनिया   ,  which  वे  expected to bring an early end to  the  rebellion .
Yielding to political pressure , Brig . Gen. Irvin  mcdowell  led his  unseasoned  Union Army  आरपार  Bull Run against  the  equally inexperienced Confederate Army  of  Brig . Gen. P. G. T. Beauregard camped near  manassas   जंक्शन  .
McDowell 's ambitious plan  लिये  a surprise flank attack on the Confederate  बाएँ  was  poorly  executed by his officers  और   मेन  ; nevertheless  ,  the Confederates , who had been planning to attack the Union left flank , found themselves  at   an   आरंभिक  disadvantage .
confederate  reinforcements under Brig  .  Gen. Joseph E. Johnston arrived from the Shenandoah  घाटी  by  रेलरोड  and the course of the battle quickly changed .
A brigade of Virginians under a relatively  अनजान   कर्नल  from the Virginia Military Institute , Thomas J.  जैक्सन   ,  stood  उनके  ground and Jackson received his famous nickname , `` Stonewall Jackson '' .
The Confederates  तब  launched a  दमदार  counterattack ,  और  as the Union troops began withdrawing under fire  ,  many  panicked   और  it turned into a  rout  as McDowell  's  men frantically ran without order in the direction of Washington  ,  D.C .
Both armies were sobered  by   the  fierce  लड़  and many casualties  ,  and realized the war  थी  going to be much longer  और  bloodier than either  था   anticipated  .

Weather is the state of the atmosphere , to  the  degree that it is hot  or   ठंडा  , wet or dry , calm or  stormy   ,  clear  or  cloudy .
Most  मौसम  phenomena occur in the troposphere , just below the stratosphere .
मौसम  generally  refers  to day-to-day temperature and precipitation activity  ,   whereas  climate is the term  लिये  the  औसत  atmospheric conditions  over  longer periods of time .
जब  used without qualification  ,  ``  मौसम  '' is understood  to  be the weather  of  Earth  .
Weather is driven by air pressure ( temperature  और  moisture  )  differences  between  one place and  another  .
These pressure and  तापमान  differences can occur due to the  सूर्य   कोण  at any particular spot , which varies by latitude from the tropics  .
The strong temperature  कंट्रास्ट   between  polar and  तीव्र  air gives rise to  the  jet  स्ट्रीम   .
Weather systems in  the  mid-latitudes , such as extratropical cyclones  ,  are  caused  by instabilities  of  the jet  स्ट्रीम  flow .
Because the Earth 's  अक्ष  is tilted relative to its orbital plane , sunlight is incident at different angles at different times of the year .
On Earth  's   सतह  , temperatures  प्रायः  range ±40  °c   (   −40  °F to  100  °F ) annually .
Over thousands of years ,  परिवर्तन  in Earth 's orbit  affect  the  राशि  and distribution of  सौर  energy received by the Earth and influence  long-term  climate and global  जलवायु  change .
Surface temperature differences in turn cause pressure differences .
उच्चतर  altitudes  हैं  cooler than lower altitudes  due  to differences in compressional heating .
Weather forecasting is the application  of  science and technology to predict the state of  the  atmosphere for a future  समय  and a given location .
The  माहौल  is a chaotic system ,  so  small changes to one part of the system can grow to have large effects on the system as a whole .
Human attempts to control the weather have occurred throughout human history  ,  and there  is  evidence that human activity such as agriculture and industry has inadvertently  परिवर्धित  weather patterns  .
Studying how the weather works on other planets has been  सहायक  in  समझना  how weather works on Earth .
A famous landmark  in  the  सौर   प्रणाली  , Jupiter  's  Great Red  स्पॉट  , is an anticyclonic storm known to  have   existed  for at least  300  years .
However , weather  is  not limited to planetary bodies .
A star 's corona is constantly  होने  lost to  स्पेस  , creating what is  essentially  a very thin atmosphere throughout the Solar System .
The movement of mass ejected from the Sun is known as the solar wind .
Katy Perry is an American singer-songwriter from Santa Barbara  ,  California .
She  हस्ताक्षरित  with  कैपिटल  Records .
Perry has released three studio albums  ,  including her debut Christian effort Katy Hudson , One of the Boys , and  teenage  Dream .
Perry  's  mainstream career  थी   kicked  off with the massive chart success of her debut single `` I  चूमा  a Girl `` .
दौरान  her career , Perry has been nominated for numerous major music awards , primarily for  teenage   सपना  and One of the Boys .
the   following  is a list of  sovereign  states and territories where English  is  an official language or  भाषा  of  सरकारी   .
In  2012  ,  वहीँ   यहूद   88  states in  कुल  ( 60  sovereign  states  और  28 non-sovereign states )  .
in  many countries English is the dominant language ,  लकिन  does not have official status .
In Australia , English is spoken  by  the  विशाल  majority  of  the population  और  is the only language  प्रयुक्त  in government institutions , but Australia  करता  not have an official language .
The case is  the  same in the United Kingdom and the United States , though many  राज्य   और  regions  भीतर  the U.S.  do  have English as  an  official language  .
English is the dominant  भाषा  of New Zealand and an official language  of  Canada (  साथ  with French ) , India  (  along  साथ  Hindi and several other languages  )  , Ireland  (  along with Irish ) , and the Philippines  (  along  साथ  Tagalog ) .
English is the sole official language of the Commonwealth of  राष्ट्र   और  the Commonwealth  खेल  .
English is one of the official languages of the  संयुक्त  Nations ,  the  European  संघ   और  the International Olympic Committee .
Many  of  these  देशों  are  वर्तमान  or  पूर्व   colonies   or   dependencies  of  the  United Kingdom  (  see  भी  British Empire ) , or  of   the  United States , itself a former  उपनिवेश  of the UK .
Notable exceptions  शामिल  Rwanda , which was a  पूर्व  Belgian colony and Eritrea , which was  an  Italian  उपनिवेश  where  the  British Empire spanned  इसके  control only in World War II and shortly after (  1941-1952   )  .
India 's linguistic picture  is   जटिल  .
According to the  संविधान  of India , `` Hindi in  the  Devanagari script '' is the official language of  the  union ; and English the  'subsidiary  official language ' ; however , English is mandated for the authoritative texts of all federal  कानून  and Supreme Court decisions and ( along with Hindi ) is  एक  of  the  two languages of the  भारतीय  Parliament  .
English is used almost exclusively for higher education , business and science .
Courses in majority of the  स्कूलों  are taught  exclusively  in English .
English is  extensively  used for administrative purposes in  इण्डिया  .
India is the second-largest English-speaking  देश  in the world by  क्रमांक   of  speakers ,  बाद  the United  राज्य  .
As such ,  अनेक  consider English to  be  the de facto official language of India .
See Official languages of India .
The linguistic makeup of Pakistan  is  similarly  जटिल  .
While the  नेशनल  language  is  Urdu  ,   अंग्रेज़ी  is an  आधिकारिक   भाषा   और  used in  कारोबार   ,  government and law .
English is a  अनिवार्य   भाषा  in schools  .
All school courses are taught in English  .
Pakistan  is  the 9th  largest   english-speaking  country in the  संसार  by population .
Southern Cone ( , ) is  a  geographic region composed of the southernmost areas of South America  ,  south of  the  Tropic of Capricorn .
Although geographically this  शामिल  Southern and part of Southeast ( São Paulo )  of  Brazil  ,  in terms of political  भूगोल   the  Southern cone has traditionally comprised  अर्जेंटीना  , Chile ,  पैराग्वे  , and  उरुग्वे  .
In the narrowest  भाव   ,  it  तभी  covers  अर्जेंटीना  , Chile  और   उरुग्वे   ,   bounded  on the north by the  राज्य   of  Brazil , Paraguay  ,  Bolivia and Peru ,  on  the west by the Pacific Ocean ,  और  south to the junction between the Pacific and Atlantic Oceans , which it  is   the   closest  continental area of Antarctica ( 1000 km ) .
High  जीवन  expectancy  ,   the  highest  इंसान  Development Index of Latin America  ,  high Standard of living  ,  significant participation in the global markets and  the   उभरते  economy of its members make the Southern Cone  the  most  prosperous  macro-region in South America .
For multi-event athletic  प्रतियोगिताओं  see Track and  फ़ील्ड  Competitions , section `` Meetings '' .
Meetings are sometimes held around conference  टेबल   .
In a  बैठक  , two or more people come  साथ  to discuss one  or  more topics , often in a  औपचारिक  setting .
An official game in baseball , also sometimes called a  विनियमन  game ,  is   a  game that has progressed beyond  the   पाइंट  at which it  can  be considered complete if necessary .
This is approximately the halfway point of the game  .
In  the   मामला  of inclement weather , any game which has reached this point may be  रोका  and shortened as needed , with the result being final  ,  and all records and  आंकडे  counted .
A game  जिससे  has not reached this point before being  रोका  is  either  considered a  निलंबित  game ( to be continued at  a  later date from the point of stoppage  )  ,  or   is  simply canceled and  replayed  from the start .
(  This depends on the rules  of  each individual league . )
In either case , no statistics are counted until  the  game  becomes  official .
Since most professional baseball games  हैं  nine innings long ,  the  fifth inning  is  used as  the  threshold for an  आधिकारिक  game .
If the visiting team is leading , or the  खेल  is tied ,  the  end  of  the fifth inning marks this point .
If the  घर  team  (  which bats last ) is already ahead  in   the  score , and theoretically would not need its half of the fifth inning , then 41⁄2 innings ( i.e. , the middle of the fifth ) is considered an  आधिकारिक   खेल   .
The game is also considered  आधिकारिक  if the home team  स्कोर  to take the lead in the bottom of the  पांचवां  inning , since the game would end immediately if the same thing happened in the ninth .
in  nearly all cases ,  the  `` official game '' status is used  to  determine whether a rain check will  be  honored for fans holding tickets .
if  a game is  प्रारंभ   लकिन  does not reach the  पाइंट  of becoming official , fans are entitled to a new ticket for the make-up game or (  in  most cases  )  any other available game of their choice  .
If a game is halted after it  becomes  official , the game is simply shortened and no rain check is given .
The  ``  official game  ''   statistic  received some attention during the 1995  ऋतु   ,  when Cal  ripken  , Jr.  थी  approaching the record  लिये  consecutive  खेल  played  ,  previously held by Lou Gehrig .
विशाल  numbers  यहूद  hung on the side of the B & O  गोदाम  at Oriole Park at Camden Yards to show  the  number of games  in  Ripken 's streak .
Each day , a  नई  number was unfurled during the fifth inning after each  खेल   था  become official ( since the  statistic  would  नहीं  have counted  if  the game had been stopped before  कि  point ) .
A similar  अभ्यास  has  महरूम   प्रयुक्त  to count  bas   toward   the  demolition of several stadiums ( including Veterans Stadium in Philadelphia in 2003 , Busch Memorial Stadium in St. Louis in 2005 , and the original  यांकी  Stadium  और  Shea Stadium in New York City in  2008  ) ; as each game became official , the team  होता  unveil a new (  निम्नतर  )  क्रमांक  showing the number of  खेल  left  to  be played in  the   स्टेडियम  .
A telephone  क्रमांक   or  phone number  is  a sequence of  अंक  used to  कॉल  from  एक  telephone line to another in  a  public switched telephone network .
When telephone numbers were invented ,  वे  were  छोटी  — as few as  एक   ,  two or three digits — and were given orally  to  a  switchboard   ऑपरेटर  .
as  phone systems have grown  और   interconnected  to encompass the world  ,  telephone numbers  have  become longer .
In addition  to  telephones , they  अभी  access other devices , such as computers  और   फैक्स  machines .
The  क्रमांक  contains  the  information necessary to identify uniquely  the  intended  endpoint  for the telephone  कॉल  .
Each  ऐसे  endpoint must have a unique number within the public  switched  telephone network .
Most  देशों  use fixed length numbers ( for normal  लाइनों   at  least  )   और  therefore the number of endpoints determines the necessary length of  the  telephone number .
It is also possible for each subscriber to have a set of shorter numbers for the endpoints most often used .
These  ``  shorthand  ''  or `` speed calling ''  संख्याएँ  are automatically translated to unique telephone numbers before the call can be connected .
Some  खास  services have their  अपना  short numbers ( e.g. ,  1-1-9  , 9-1-1 , 0-0-0 , 9-9-9  ,  1-1-1 , and 1-1-2 being the Emergency Services  संख्याएँ   लिये  China  ,  Japan , South Korea , Taiwan  और  Sri Lanka ; Canada and the United States  ;   ऑस्ट्रेलिया  ; the United  किंगडम  , Ireland ,  दक्षिण  Africa , Poland , Saudi Arabia , the United Arab Emirates , Morocco , Macao , Bahrain , Qatar , Bangladesh , Botswana ,  घाना  , Kenya  ,  Hong Kong , Malaysia , Mauritius , Singapore , Zimbabwe  ,  Trinidad , Tobago ; New Zealand ; Kuwait and the European Union  ,  respectively . )
Many systems also allow  काल्स  within  a  local area  to  be made  बगैर   डायलिंग  the local area code .
For  उदाहरण  , a phone number in North  अमेरिका  will start  साथ  three numbers ( such as 661 ) , which is the area code , followed  by  seven  अंक  split into sections  of  three  और  four ( such as 550-1212 )  ,   जिससे  is the local number .
Some areas  अभी  have mandatory  ten-digit   डायलिंग  in place ,  भी  for local calls .
Most telephone networks today (  अपवाद   होने  private intercom and  सुरक्षित  phone  संजाल  ) are  interconnected  in the international telephone network  ,  where the format  of  telephone numbers is  मानकीकृत  by ITU-T in  the  recommendation E.164 .
This specifies that  the  entire number should  be  15  अंक  or  shorter  , and begin with a country prefix .
लिये  most countries  ,  this is followed  by  an area code or city code and the subscriber number ,  जिससे  might consist of the  कोड  for a  particular  telephone exchange .
ITU-T recommendation E.123 describes how to represent an international telephone number in writing or  छपाई  , starting with a plus sign  (  `` + '' ) and the country code .
When calling an international number from a fixed line phone ,  the  + must be replaced  साथ  the international  कॉल   उपसर्ग  chosen  by  the country  the  call is being made from .
Some mobile phones  allow  the +  to  be entered directly .
The format and allocation of local phone numbers are controlled by each nation 's respective government , either  सीधे  or  by  sponsored organizations ( such as NANPA overseen by NeuStar Inc. ) .
Before a telephone  कॉल  is connected  ,   the  telephone number must be  dialed  by the calling party or  कॉलर  .
The called party  might   have  equipment that presents caller ID  पहले  the call is answered .
A collection agency is a business  कि   pursues  payments of debts  owed  by  individuals  or businesses .
सबसे  collection agencies  operate   as  agents  of   लेनदारों  and collect debts for  a   शुल्क  or percentage of the total amount owed .
There are many types  of  collection  एजेंसियों   .
First-party agencies are oftentimes  subsidiaries  of the  असली   कम्पनी  the debt is  owed  to  .
Third-party agencies are separate companies  contracted  by a company to collect debts on  उनके  behalf for a  शुल्क  .
Debt  खरीदार  purchase the debt at a percentage of its value  ,  then attempt to collect it .
Each country has its own rules and regulations regarding  उन्हें  .

Cannabis , also known  as  marijuana ( from  the  Mexican  स्पेनी  marihuana ) ,  और  by other  names  , is a preparation of  the  Cannabis  संयंत्र  intended for use as a psychoactive drug and  as   आयुर्विज्ञान  .
Pharmacologically , the principal psychoactive constituent of cannabis  is  tetrahydrocannabinol  (  THC ) ;  it   is  one of 483 known compounds in the plant , including at  तनिक  84 other cannabinoids , such as cannabidiol ( CBD ) , cannabinol  (  CBN  )   ,  tetrahydrocannabivarin ( THCV ) .
और  cannabigerol ( CBG ) .
This is  a  list of American  फ़ुटबॉल  quarterbacks  जो  have started for the Washington Redskins ,  as  well as its predecessors  the  Boston Braves ( 1932  )  and Boston Redskins (  1933  – 1936  )  ,  in   the  National Football  लीग   (   एनएफएल   )  .
The Washington Redskins franchise was  originally  founded in Boston , Massachusetts as  the   बोस्टन  Braves , named  बाद  the  लोकल   बेसबॉल  franchise .
the  name was changed the following  साल  to the Redskins .
In 1937  ,  the franchise moved to  वॉशिंगटन  ,  d.c   .
Of  the  49 Redskins starting quarterbacks , two have been inducted  into   the   प्रो  Football Hall of  कीर्ति  :  सैमी  Baugh and  सन्नी  Jurgensen  .

1st Special Forces Operational  detachment-delta  ( 1st SFOD-D ) , popularly  ज्ञात  as Delta  फ़ोर्स  , is one of  the  United States ' four secretive tier-one counter-terrorism and Special Mission Units .
It  थी  formerly listed as  the  Combat  अनुप्रयोग  Group  by  the Department of Defense but has since been officially re-designated the Army Compartmented Elements ( ACE ) .
While 1st  sfod-d  is administratively supported  by  USASOC , it falls under  the   operational  control of  the  Joint Special Operations  कमांड   .
Delta Force and its Navy counterpart , the Naval Special Warfare Development Group , are the  संयुक्त  States military 's primary counter-terrorism units .
डेल्टा  Force 's primary tasks are counter-terrorism  ,  direct action , and  नेशनल  intervention operations , although it is an extremely versatile  समूह  capable  of  conducting many types of covert  मिशन   ,  including ,  लकिन  not limited to , hostage rescues and  छापे   .
The Central Intelligence Agency 's highly secretive Special Activities Division (  उदास  ) and more  specifically   इसके  elite Special Operations Group ( SOG  )  often works  साथ  – and recruits – operators from Delta Force .
Alpha  क्षय  is one example type of radioactive  क्षय  , in which an atomic nucleus emits an alpha  कण  ,  और   thereby  transforms ( or 'decays  '   )  into an atom with a mass  क्रमांक   4  less and atomic number 2 less .
Many other types  of  decays are possible .
Radioactive decay , also known as nuclear decay  or   radioactivity  , is the process  by  which a nucleus  of  an unstable atom loses  उर्जा   by  emitting particles of ionizing radiation  .
A material that spontaneously emits this  दयालु   of  radiation — which  शामिल   the  emission of energetic alpha particles  ,  beta particles ,  और  gamma rays — is considered radioactive .
There are  अनेक   अलग  types of radioactive decay ( see table below ) .
A  क्षय  , or loss of energy , results when an atom with one type  of  nucleus , called the parent radionuclide , transforms to an atom with a  केंद्रक  in a  अलग  state , or to a  अलग  nucleus containing different numbers of protons and neutrons .
Either of  ये  products is named  the   बेटी  nuclide .
In some decays the  जनक  and daughter are different  रासायनिक  elements , and thus the decay process  परिणाम  in nuclear transmutation  (  creation  of  an  अणु  of a new element )  .
the  first decay processes to be discovered were alpha decay , beta decay ,  और  gamma decay  .
Alpha  क्षय  occurs when  the  nucleus  ejects  an alpha  कण  ( helium nucleus ) .
This is the most  आम  process  of  emitting nucleons , but  in  rarer types of  decays  , nuclei  can  eject protons , or specific nuclei of  अन्य  elements (  in  the process called cluster decay ) .
Beta decay  occurs  when the nucleus emits an  इलेक्ट्रॉन   or   positron  and a type of neutrino  ,  in a process that changes a proton  to  a  न्यूट्रॉन  or the other way around .
The nucleus  may   कैप्चर   an  orbiting  इलेक्ट्रॉन  ,  converting   a  proton into a neutron ( electron capture ) .
All of  ये  processes result in  नाभिकीय  transmutation .
By contrast , there exist radioactive  क्षय   प्रक्रियाओं  that  do  not result in transmutation  .
the  energy of an excited nucleus may be emitted as a gamma  रे  in gamma  क्षय   ,  or  प्रयुक्त  to eject an orbital electron  by  interaction with  the  excited nucleus in  a   प्रक्रम   पुकारा   आतंरिक  conversion .
radioisotopes  occasionally emit neutrons  ,   और  this results in  a  change in an element from one isotope to another .
One type of radioactive  क्षय  results in products which are not defined , but appear  in  a  दायरा  of  ``  pieces '' of  the  original nucleus  .
इस  decay is called spontaneous fission .
इस  decay happens when a large unstable nucleus spontaneously splits into two ( and  occasionally   तीन  ) smaller  बेटी  nuclei  ,   और  usually emits gamma rays ,  neutrons  , or other particles  as  a consequence .
Radioactive decay is a stochastic (  i.e.  , random )  प्रक्रम  at the level of single atoms , in that , according to quantum theory  ,  it is impossible to  भविष्यवाणी   जब  a particular  अणु  will decay .
However , the  मौका  that a  दिए  atom will decay is  निरंतर  over  समय  .
For a large number of atoms , the  क्षय  rate for the collection is computable from the measured decay constants of the  न्यूक्लाइड  ( or equivalently from the  half-lifes  ) .
Waxing is a form of  semi-permanent  hair removal which removes the hair from  the  root  .
New  बाल   होगा  not grow back in the previously waxed area for  दो  to eight weeks , although some people will start  to  see regrowth in  तभी  a week .
Almost any area of the body can be waxed , including eyebrows , face , bikini  क्षेत्रफल  , legs , arms , back , abdomen and feet  .
There are many  प्रकार  of waxing suitable for removing unwanted hair .
Strip waxing is  संपन्नता  by spreading a wax thinly over the  स्किन   .
a  cloth or paper strip is then pressed  on  the top and ripped off the direction of hair growth .
इस  removes the wax  साथ  with the hair .
Strip wax can also be made at home using lemon juice  ,  water , sugar and honey .
Hot waxing utilizes Hot wax  (  as opposed to strip  मोम  ) .
In this case  ,  the wax is applied somewhat  thickly  and with no cloth or paper strips .
The wax then hardens  जब  it cools ,  यूँ  allowing the easy removal by a therapist without the aid of  cloths  .
This waxing method  is   बहुत  beneficial to people  जो  have  संवेदनशील   स्किन  .
Wall painting (  1st  century AD )  इससे   pompeii  depicting  a  multigenerational banquet
Ancient Roman culture existed throughout  the  almost 1200-year  इतिहास  of the civilization of Ancient Rome .
The term  refers  to the culture of the  रोमन  Republic , later the  रोमन   साम्राज्य  , which , at its peak , covered  an  area from Lowland Scotland and Morocco to the Euphrates .
जीवन  in ancient Rome revolved around  the  city  of  Rome , its famed seven hills ,  और  its monumental structures such  as  the Flavian Amphitheatre ( now called the Colosseum ) ,  the  Forum of Trajan , and the Pantheon .
The city also had several theaters ,  gymnasiums  ,  और   अनेक  taverns , baths  ,   और  brothels .
Throughout  the   territory  under  प्राचीन  Rome 's control ,  आवासीय  architecture ranged  इससे  very modest houses  to  country villas ,  और  in  the   पूंजी  city of Rome , there  यहूद  imperial residences on the elegant Palatine  हिल  , from which  the  word palace is derived .
The vast majority of  the  population  जिया  in the city center , packed into insulae  (  apartment blocks  )  .
The city of Rome was the  largest   megalopolis  of that time , with a population that  may  well have exceeded one million  लोगों  , with a high end estimate of 3.6 million  और  a  कम  end  अनुमान  of 450,000 .
Historical estimates indicate that around 30 percent of the population under the city 's jurisdiction  जिया   in   innumerable   शहरी  centers ,  साथ  population  of  at least 10,000 and several military settlements , a very high  रेट  of urbanization by  pre-industrial  standards .
The most  urbanized  part  of  the Empire was Italy ,  जिससे  had an estimated rate of urbanization of 32 % , the same rate of urbanization  of   इंग्लैण्ड  in 1800 .
Most Roman towns and cities had  a   फ़ोरम  ,  मंदिरों   और  the same type of buildings , on  a  smaller scale ,  as  found in Rome .
The large urban population required an endless  सप्लाई  of food which was  a   जटिल  logistical  कार्य   ,   सहित   acquiring  , transporting ,  storing   और  distribution of food for  रोम   और   अन्य  urban centers .
Italian farms supplied vegetables and fruits , but fish  और  meat were luxuries  .
Aqueducts  यहूद  built  to   लाओ  water to urban centers and wine  और   आयल   यहूद  imported  इससे  Hispania , Gaul and Africa .
There was  a   बहुत  large amount of commerce  between  the provinces  of  the Roman Empire ,  चूंकि  its transportation technology was very efficient .
the  average costs of transport and the technology were comparable with  18th-century  Europe  .
The  बाद  city of Rome did not fill the space within its  प्राचीन  Aurelian walls until after 1870 .
Eighty percent of the population under the  क्षेत्राधिकार  of  प्राचीन  Rome  जिया  in the  countryside  in  settlements   साथ  less  than  10 thousand inhabitants  .
Landlords generally resided in cities  और  their estates were left in the care of farm managers .
the   दुर्दशा  of rural slaves  थी  generally worse than their counterparts working in urban aristocratic households .
To stimulate a higher labor productivity most landlords freed  a  large  क्रमांक  of slaves and many received wages .
Some records indicate that `` as many as  42  people lived in one small farm hut  in  Egypt  ,  while six families owned a  सिंगल   ज़ैतून  tree . '' .
Such  a  rural  पर्यावरण   जारी  to induce migration of  जनसांख्यिकी   to  urban centers until the early 2nd century , when the urban population  रोका  growing and  प्रारंभ   to   मनाही   .
Starting  in  the middle of the  2nd  century BC ,  निजी  Greek culture  थी  increasingly in ascendancy , in spite  of  tirades against the `` softening  ''   प्रभाव  of Hellenized culture  इससे  the conservative moralists  .
By the time of Augustus , cultured  यूनानी  household slaves taught the Roman  यंग  ( sometimes even the girls ) ; chefs  ,  decorators  ,  secretaries , doctors ,  और  hairdressers—all came from the Greek  ईस्ट  .
Greek sculptures adorned Hellenistic landscape gardening on the  palatine   or  in the villas ,  or  were imitated in Roman sculpture  गज  by Greek slaves  .
The Roman cuisine  preserved  in the cookery  किताबे  ascribed to Apicius is essentially  यूनानी  .
Roman writers disdained Latin  लिये   a  cultured Greek style .
Only in law and governance was the  तिरछा   प्रकृति  of  रोम  's accretive culture supreme .
Against this human background , both the urban and rural  सेटिंग  , one of history 's most  influential   सभ्यताओं   took   आकार  , leaving  पीछे  a cultural legacy  कि  survives in part today .
James Joseph `` Duffy ''  waldorf   ,  Jr. ( born August 20 , 1962 ) is an American professional golfer .
