Glass production involves two main methods – the float glass process , which produces sheet glass  ,  and glassblowing which produces bottles and other containers .
A season is a subdivision of the  साल  , marked by changes in weather , ecology , and hours of daylight  .
Seasons result from the yearly revolution of the Earth around the Sun and the tilt of the Earth 's axis relative to the plane of  क्रान्ति  .
In temperate and polar regions , the  सीज़न   हैं   चिह्नित   by  changes  in  the intensity of sunlight  कि  reaches the Earth 's surface , variations of which may cause animals to go into hibernation or to migrate ,  और  plants to be dormant .
दौरान   may  , June and July , the northern  गोलार्ध  is exposed to more  सीधा  sunlight because  the  hemisphere faces the sun .
The same is  सच्चा  of the southern  गोलार्ध   in  November  ,  December and January  .
it  is  the   झुकाव  of  the  Earth that  कल्याणकारी  the Sun to  be   उच्चतर  in the sky during  the  summer  महीने  which increases the solar flux .
However  ,  due to seasonal lag , June , July and August  हैं  the  hottest   महीने  in the northern hemisphere and December  ,  January and  फ़रवरी  are the hottest  महीने  in the southern hemisphere .
In temperate  और   subpolar  regions ,  generally   चार  calendar -based seasons  (  with their adjectives ) are recognized : spring ( vernal ) , summer ( estival  )  ,  पतझड़  ( autumnal ) and winter  (   hibernal  ) .
However , ecologists mostly  उपयोग  a six season model for temperate climate regions that  शामिल   pre-spring   (  prevernal ) and late summer ( serotinal ) as  पृथक  seasons along with the traditional four  .
Hot regions have two  or   तीन  seasons ; the rainy ( or wet , or monsoon ) season and  the  dry season , and in some tropical  क्षेत्रों  ,  a  cool  or  mild season .
in   कुछ  parts of the world ,  खास  `` seasons ''  हैं   loosely  defined  आधारित  on important events  ऐसे  as  a   hurricane  season , tornado season or a wildfire season .
The six ecological seasons
the  four calendar seasons  ,  depicted in an ancient Roman mosaic from Tunisia
The  बैटल   of  Fort Sumter (  अप्रैल  12–14 ,  1861   )  was the bombardment and surrender of  फोर्ट  Sumter , near Charleston , South Carolina , that started the American Civil War  .
following   घोषणाओं  of secession by seven Southern states , South  कैरोलिना  demanded  कि   the  U.S.  फौज  abandon its  सुविधाएं  in Charleston Harbor .
On  दिसम्बर  26 ,  1860  ,  u.S.   प्रमुख  Robert  एंडरसन  surreptitiously moved  उसके  small command  इससे  the indefensible Fort Moultrie on Sullivan 's Island  to  Fort Sumter ,  a   substantial  fortress controlling the entrance of Charleston Harbor  .
An attempt by  u.S.  President James  बुकानन  to reinforce  और  resupply Anderson , using  the  unarmed merchant ship Star  of   the  West , failed when it was  fired  upon by shore  बैटरी  on  जनवरी  9 ,  1861  .
South  कैरोलिना  authorities then seized all  संघीय  property in the Charleston area , except  लिये  Fort Sumter .
During the early months of  1861   ,  the situation around Fort Sumter increasingly began  to  resemble a siege .
In March , Brig  .  Gen.  P.  G. T. Beauregard  ,   the  first general  अधिकारी   of  the  newly  formed  confederate   राज्य  of America , was placed in command of Confederate forces in  चार्ल्सटन   .
Beauregard energetically directed  the   strengthening   of  batteries around Charleston harbor aimed at Fort Sumter .
शर्तें  in the fort grew  dire  as the Union soldiers  rushed  to complete the installation of additional guns  .
एंडरसन   थी  short of men  ,   खाना   ,   और  supplies .
the  resupply  of   फोर्ट  Sumter became  the  first crisis of the administration of President  अब्राहम  Lincoln .
He  notified  the Governor  of   दक्षिण   कैरोलिना  , Francis W. Pickens , that he was sending supply  जहाजों  , which resulted in an ultimatum from the  confederate  government : evacuate Fort Sumter immediately .
Major Anderson refused to surrender .
Beginning at 4:30 a.m. on April 12  ,   the   confederates  bombarded the fort from  तोपखाने  batteries surrounding the  हार्बर   .
Although the Union garrison returned fire ,  वे  were  significantly  outgunned  और  , after 34 hours , Major Anderson  सहमत   to  evacuate .
There was no loss of life on either side as a direct result  of  this engagement , although a gun explosion during the surrender ceremonies on  अप्रैल   14  caused two Union deaths .
Following  the   बैटल   ,  there was  फैली  support from both North  और  South for further military action .
Lincoln 's immediate call for  75,000  volunteers to  दबाने   the  rebellion resulted in an additional four southern slave states also declaring their secession and joining the Confederacy .
The Civil War had  begun  .
3g   ,  short  लिये  third Generation  ,  is the third generation of  मोबाईल  telecommunications technology .
3G telecommunication networks support services that provide an information transfer rate of at least 200 kbit/s  .
However , many services advertised as 3G provide higher  गति  than the minimum technical requirements  लिये  a  3g  service .
Recent 3G releases , often denoted 3.5G and 3.75G , also  provide  mobile  ब्रॉडबैंड   अभिगम  of several  mbit/s  to smartphones and mobile  modems   in  laptop computers  .
3G finds application  in   बेतार  voice telephony , mobile  अंतरजाल  access ,  फिक्स्ड  wireless Internet  अभिगम  , video calls and mobile TV .
`` Mazel Tov ! '' written on a wine glass tag
Traditionally ,  बाद  the  दूल्हे  breaks the glass ,  the  guests  चिल्लाओ  `` Mazel  tov  ! ``  .
A birthday cake , iced with the words `` מזל טוב '' ( mazal tov )  ,  as is  प्रायः  done in Israel  .
यहाँ  the phrase is written in Hebrew  कर्सिव  .
``  Mazel tov '' or `` mazal tov '' ( Hebrew / Yiddish  :  ``  מזל  טוב '' ,  यहूदी  : `` mazal  tov  '' ;  यहूदी  : `` mazel tov '' ; lit .
`` good  लक  '' ) is a phrase  प्रयुक्त  to express congratulations  लिये  a happy and significant occasion or event .
Hepatitis  c   is   an  infectious  बीमारी  affecting primarily the liver , caused by the hepatitis  c  virus ( HCV ) .
The infection  is   प्रायः   asymptomatic  , but chronic  संक्रमण  can lead to scarring of the liver and ultimately to cirrhosis  ,  which is generally apparent  बाद  many years .
In some cases  ,  those with cirrhosis  होगा   go  on  to  develop liver failure , liver cancer or  life-threatening  esophageal and gastric varices .
HCV is spread  primarily  by blood-to-blood contact  संबद्ध   साथ   intravenous  drug use  ,  poorly sterilized  चिकित्सा  equipment and transfusions .
An estimated 130–200  लाख  people worldwide are infected with .
the  existence of ( originally  ``  non-  a  non- B hepatitis  ''   )   थी  postulated  in  the 1970s and proven in 1989 .
only infects humans and  chimpanzees  .
The virus  persists  in the liver in about 85  %  of those infected .
इस  persistent infection can be treated with medication : the  मानक  therapy  is  a combination of peginterferon and ribavirin  ,  with either boceprevir or telaprevir added in some cases  .
overall  , 50–80 % of  लोगों  treated are cured .
Those who develop cirrhosis or liver  कर्कट  may require a liver transplant  .
is the  अग्रणी  cause of liver  प्रत्यारोपण  , though the virus usually recurs after  प्रत्यारोपण  .
No vaccine against is available .
A flexible spending account  (  FSA ) , also known as a flexible spending arrangement , is one of a number of  tax-advantaged  financial accounts that can be set  up  through a cafeteria plan of an employer in the United States  .
An FSA allows an  कर्मचारी  to set aside a  portion  of earnings to pay for  योग्य  expenses as established in  the  cafeteria plan ,  सबसे   commonly  for  चिकित्सा  expenses but often for dependent care  or  other expenses .
Money deducted  इससे  an employee  's  pay into  an   fsa  is not subject to payroll taxes , resulting  in  substantial payroll  कर  savings  .
One  significant  disadvantage to using  an  FSA is that funds not used by  the  end  of  the plan year are lost to the employee , known as the ``  उपयोग  it or lose it '' rule .
The most common  प्रकार  of  लचीली   बिता  account ,  the  medical expense FSA ( also medical FSA or health FSA ) , is similar  to  a health savings account  (  HSA ) or a health reimbursement account  (  HRA ) .
However  ,  while HSAs and HRAs are  लगभग   exclusively  used as components of a consumer driven health care plan , medical FSAs are commonly  offered   साथ  more traditional health plans as well  .
In  जोड  , funds in  a  health savings  खाता  are  नहीं  lost when the plan year is  over  , unlike funds in an FSA .
Paper forms or an FSA debit card , also known as  a  Flexcard , may be  प्रयुक्त   to  access the  खाता  funds  .
Tennessee ( )  (  )  is  a U.S.  राज्य  located in the Southeastern United States .
Tennessee is the  36th  most extensive and the 17th most  populous  of the  50  United States  .
Tennessee is  bordered  by  केंटकी  and Virginia to the north ,  उत्तर  Carolina to  the  east ,  जॉर्जिया   ,  Alabama , and Mississippi to the  दक्षिण  , and Arkansas and  मिसौरी  to the west .
The Appalachian Mountains  dominate  the  पूर्वी   भाग  of the state  ,  and the  मिसिसिपी  River forms the  राज्य  's western border .
Tennessee 's capital  और  second largest city is Nashville  ,  which has a  जनसांख्यिकी   of  609,644 .
Memphis  is  the state 's largest  नगर  ,  साथ   a  population of 652,050 .
the  state of Tennessee  is  rooted  in  the Watauga Association , a 1772 frontier pact generally regarded as the first constitutional government west of the  appalachians   .
What  is  now Tennessee  थी  initially part  of  North Carolina  ,  and later part  of  the Southwest Territory .
Tennessee was admitted to the Union as the 16th state on June 1 , 1796 .
टेनेसी  was the last state to leave the  संघ  and  जुड़ें   the  Confederacy at the outbreak of the U.S. Civil War  in  1861 , and the first  राज्य   to  be  readmitted  to the Union at the  समाप्त  of  the  war  .
Tennessee furnished more soldiers for the Confederate Army than any other state ,  और   अधिक  soldiers for  the   संघ  Army than any other Southern  राज्य  .
In the 20th century , Tennessee transitioned from  an  agrarian economy to  a  more diversified economy  ,  aided at  टाइम्स  by federal  entities  such as the Tennessee Valley Authority  .
in  the  जल्दी   1940s   ,  the city of Oak Ridge was established to house the Manhattan Project 's uranium enrichment  सुविधाएं  , helping  to  build the world 's first  परमाणु  bomb .
Tennessee has played a critical role in the development of many forms  of  American popular music ,  सहित  rock and roll , blues , country  ,  and rockabilly .
beale   गली  in Memphis is considered by many to be  the   जन्मस्थान  of the  ब्लूज़  , with musicians such  as  W.C . Handy performing  in  its clubs as early as 1909 .
Memphis was also home to Sun Records , where musicians such as Elvis Presley , Isaac Hayes , Johnny Cash , Carl Perkins , Jerry Lee Lewis  ,   रॉय  Orbison , and Charlie Rich began their recording careers , and where rock and roll  took  shape in the 1950s .
The 1927 Victor  रिकॉर्डिंग  sessions in Bristol generally mark the beginning of the country music genre and the  वृद्धि  of the Grand  ओले  Opry in the 1930s helped  मेक   नैशविले  the center of the country music recording  उद्योग  .
Three bricks and mortar museums recognize Tennessee 's  भूमिका   in  nurturing various forms of popular music : the Memphis  चट्टान   n  '  आत्मा  Museum , the Country Music Hall  of  Fame  और  Museum in Nashville , and the International  rock-a-billy   संग्रहालय  in Jackson .
In addition ,  the  Rockabilly  हॉल  of Fame  ,  an online site recognizing  the  development of rockabilly in which Tennessee played a crucial  भूमिका  , is based  in  Nashville .
Tennessee 's major industries include agriculture  ,   निर्माण  , and tourism .
Poultry  ,   soybeans  ,  और  cattle are  the  state 's primary agricultural products , and major manufacturing exports include chemicals , transportation equipment , and electrical equipment .
the  Great Smoky Mountains National  पार्क  , the nation 's most visited national park , is headquartered in the eastern  भाग   of  the state , and a section of the Appalachian Trail roughly  फ़ॉलो  the Tennessee-North Carolina border .
Other major tourist attractions include the  टेनेसी   एक्वेरियम  in Chattanooga  ,  the  sunsphere  in Knoxville , Dollywood in Pigeon Forge  ,  the Parthenon , the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum  ,   और  Ryman Auditorium  in   नैशविले  , and Elvis Presley 's Graceland residence and tomb in Memphis .
One  डिज़ाइन   रूपांतर  of  a  cock ring .
A cock ring  is   a  ring that can be  लगाई  around a man 's  शिश्न  ,  प्रायः   at  the base , primarily to slow the flow of blood from  the  erect penile tissue ,  यूँ   maintaining  an erection for  a  much  longer  period  of   समय  .
मुर्गा  rings can be worn  around   बस  the penis  or  both the penis and scrotum , or just the scrotum alone ,  हालांकि  this is usually called a testicle  कफ   .
Rings  can  be  बना   of  a variety of different  सामग्री  , most commonly  चमड़े  , rubber , or silicone , though nylon and  मेटल  are  भी   प्रयुक्त  either as the main component or part of the closure .
The term cock ring is sometimes used as a synonym for a  प्रिंस  Albert piercing , a piercing of the  शिश्न  that is  प्रायः  ,  हालांकि  not always  ,   a   मेटल  ring .
When  प्रयुक्त  in  मामले  of erectile  dysfunction  they are known  by  various names such  as   ``  erection  रिंग  '' and ``  टेंशन  ring '' .
The headquarters of  प्रमुख  League Baseball at  245  Park Avenue , Midtown Manhattan  ,  New York City , USA .
Major  लीग   बेसबॉल   (  MLB  )   is  a professional  बेसबॉल   लीग  , consisting of teams that play  in  the National League and  the  American  लीग  .
Dating to 1876 and 1901 respectively , the  दो  leagues merged in  2000  into a single organization led by the Commissioner of Baseball  ,  after  100   सालो  as separate legal entities  .
MLB constitutes one  of  the  प्रमुख  professional sports  लीग  of the United  राज्य  and Canada  .
It  is  composed of  30   टीमों  — 29 in  the  United States and  एक   in   कनाडा  .
Teams in MLB play 162 games each season over six  महीने  ( April  through  September ) .
Five teams in each league  अग्रिम  to  a  four-round postseason tournament that culminates in the World Series  ,  a best-of-seven-games championship series  between  the  दो   लीग  champions  जिससे  dates to  1903   .
The organization oversees  अनेक  minor-league  बेसबॉल  leagues which operate about 240 teams affiliated with the major-league clubs .
With  the   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Baseball  संघ  , the league also manages  the   अंतरराष्ट्रीय   संसार  Baseball Classic tournament .
MLB  रै  the  उच्चतम  season attendance of  कोई  sports league  in  the  संसार  with  nearly  75 million spectators  in   2012  .
Delaware ( ) is a U.S. state located on the Atlantic  coast  in  the  Mid-Atlantic  प्रदेश  of the United States .
It is bordered to the south and  वेस्ट  by Maryland , to the  पूर्वोत्तर   by  New Jersey , and to the north  by  Pennsylvania .
The state takes its  नाम  from Thomas West ,  3rd  Baron De La Warr , an English nobleman and Virginia 's first colonial governor , after whom what is now called Cape Henlopen was originally named  .
डेलावेयर  is located in the  northeastern  portion of the Delmarva Peninsula and is the second  smallest  , the sixth  तनिक   populous  , but the sixth most densely populated of the fifty United States .
Delaware is divided into  तीन  counties  .
From  उत्तर  to  दक्षिण  ,  ये  three counties are New Castle , Kent ,  और  Sussex  .
जबकि  the southern two counties have historically been  predominantly   agricultural  ,  नई  Castle County has been  अधिक  industrialized .
Before its coastline  थी  explored by  europeans  in  the  16th century , Delaware was inhabited by several groups  of  Native Americans  ,  including the Lenape in the north and  nanticoke  in the south .
It  थी   initially  colonized by  डच  traders at Zwaanendael , located near  the   उपस्थित  town of Lewes  ,  in 1631 .
Delaware was  एक  of  the  13 colonies participating in  the  American  क्रान्ति  and on December 7  ,  1787 , became the  पहला  state to ratify  the  Constitution of the  संयुक्त  States , thereby becoming known as The  पहला  State .
उर्जा   परिवर्तन   in  Energy Systems Language
Energy transformation or energy conversion is the  प्रक्रम   of  changing one  रूप   of   उर्जा  to another  .
In physics ,  the   पद   उर्जा  describes the capacity to produce certain changes within a system , without regard to limitations  in   परिवर्तन  imposed by Entropy .
Changes in total energy of systems can only be accomplished by adding  or  subtracting energy from them , as energy is  a  quantity which is conserved , according to  the  first law  of  thermodynamics .
According  to  special relativity ,  परिवर्तन  in the energy of systems will  भी  coincide with changes  in  the system  's  mass , and  the  total amount of mass of a system is a  माप  of  इसके  energy .
Energy in  a  system  may  be transformed  so  that it  resides  in a different state , or a different type of  उर्जा  .
Energy in many states  may  be used  to  do many varieties  of  physical work  .
Energy may be used  in  natural processes or  मशीने  , or else to  provide  some service to society ( such as heat , light , or motion )  .
लिये  example  ,  an internal combustion engine converts the potential chemical  उर्जा  in gasoline and oxygen into  ऊष्मा   ,   जिससे  is  तब   रूपांतरित  into the propulsive energy ( kinetic energy that moves a  गाडी  ) .
A solar cell converts solar radiation  into  electrical  उर्जा  that can  तब  be  प्रयुक्त   to  light a bulb  or  power a computer .
The generic name for a device which converts energy  इससे  one form to another , is a transducer .
In general , most types of energy  ,   सहेजें  for  थर्मल   उर्जा  , may be  परिवर्तित  efficiently  to  any  अन्य  kind  of  energy .
Sometimes  इस  occurs with an efficiency of essentially 100 % , such  as  when potential energy is converted to kinetic energy as an object falls in vacuum ,  or   जब  it orbits  nearer   or  farther from another object  ,   in  space  .
Conversion of  अन्य  types of energies to heat may also occurs with nearly perfect efficiency  (   अनेक  types of friction do this )  .
अपवाद  for perfect conversion efficiency ( even for  पृथक   प्रणालियों   )   occur  when energy has already  महरूम  partly  वितरित  among many  उपलब्धियाँ   क्वांटम  states for  a  collection  of  particles ,  जिससे  are  freely  allowed to explore  कोई  state  of  momentum  और  position ( phase space ) .
in  such circumstances , a measure called Entropy , or evening-out of  उर्जा  distribution in such states , dictates that  भविष्य   राज्य  of the system  जरूर  be of at least equal evenness  in  energy  वितरण  .
(  वहीँ   is   no   रास्ता  , taking  the  universe as a whole , to collect energy into fewer states  ,  once it  रै  spread to them ) .
a  consequence  of  this  आवश्यकता  is that  वहीँ   हैं  limitations  to  the  दक्षता  with which thermal energy can be converted  to   अन्य  kinds  of   उर्जा  , since thermal  उर्जा  in  संतुलन  at  a   दिए   तापमान  already represents the maximal  evening-out  of energy  between  all possible states .
Such energy is  sometimes  considered `` degraded  उर्जा  , ''  क्युकी  it is not entirely  usable  .
The second  विधि  of thermodynamics is a  रास्ता  of stating that , for this reason  ,  thermal energy in a system may be converted to other kinds of energy with  efficiencies  approaching 100  %   ,  only  if  the entropy  (  even-ness  or  disorder  )  of the universe is increased by other  अर्थात्  , to compensate for  the   घटी   in  entropy associated with  the  disappearance of  the  thermal energy and its entropy content .
वरना  , only a part of  थर्मल   उर्जा  may  be  converted to other kinds  of  energy ( and thus , useful work ) , since the remainder of the heat must be  सुरक्षित  to  be  transferred to a  थर्मल  reservoir at a lower temperature , in such  a  way that the increase in Entropy for this process  अधिक   than  compensates  लिये  the entropy decrease associated with  परिवर्तन  of the rest of the heat into other types of  उर्जा  .
The  नेशनल   हॉकी  League ( NHL ; ) is an ``  unincorporated   not-for-profit  association '' which operates a major professional ice hockey league of 30  franchised  member clubs , of which seven are currently located in Canada  और   23  in the United States .
Headquartered in  नई  York City , the NHL is  widely   माना  to be the premier professional  बर्फ  hockey  लीग   in  the world , and one of  the  major professional sports leagues in the United  राज्य   और   कनाडा   .
The Stanley Cup , the oldest professional sports trophy  in  North  अमेरिका  , is awarded annually to the league playoff champion at the end  of  each season .
The league was  व्यवस्थित  on November 26  ,  1917 , in  मॉन्ट्रियल  , Quebec , Canada , after the suspension of operations of its predecessor organization , the National Hockey Association ( NHA  )  , which had been founded in  1909  .
It started with four teams  और  , through a series  of  expansions  ,  contractions ,  और  relocations  ,   the  league is  अभी  composed of 30 active franchises .
the   स्वदेश  to which the  नाम  of the league  originally  referred was  कनाडा  , although the league has  अभी  been binational since 1924  जब  it  विस्तारित  into the United States .
After a labour dispute that led to the cancellation  of  the  संपूर्ण  2004–05 season , the league resumed play under a  नई  collective bargaining agreement that included a  सैलरी  cap .
In 2009 , the NHL enjoyed record highs in terms  of  sponsorships , attendance , and television  ऑडियंस  .
The NHL draws many highly skilled players from all over the world and currently has players from about  20  different countries .
Although Canadians have  historically   गठित   the  majority of the players in the NHL , over the past  चार  plus decades  the  percentages of US and European players have increased both because  of   the  NHL 's  जारी  expansion from  छह  to thirty clubs since  1967   ,  and the increased availability  of   अत्यधिक   skilled  European  खिलाड़ी  .
This is  the   पूरा  list of the ratified and unratified amendments  to   the  United States  संविधान  which  प्राप्त  the approval of the United States Congress  .
Twenty-seven amendments have been ratified  चूंकि  the  असली  signing of  the  Constitution  ,  the first  टेन  of which are known  collectively   as  the Bill of  अधिकारों  .
The procedure  लिये  amending the United States Constitution is governed by Article V of the original text .
There have been many other proposals for  amendments  to the United States Constitution  introduced  in Congress , but not submitted  to   the  states  .
Before an amendment can  लो  effect ,  it  must  be  proposed to  the   राज्य  by a two-thirds vote  of   दोनो   घरों  of Congress or by a convention  (  known  as  an Article V convention  )   पुकारा  by two-thirds of the  राज्य  , and ratified by three-fourths of the states or by three-fourths of conventions thereof  ,  the method of ratification being determined by  कॉंग्रेस  at the time  of  proposal .
To date , no convention for proposing amendments has been called by  the  states , and  तभी  once—in  1933  for the ratification of the twenty-first  amendment  —has the convention method of ratification been employed  .
fmr  LLC ( Fidelity Management and Research )  or   वफ़ादारी  Investments  is  an  अमरीकी  multinational financial services corporation .
It  is  one of the  largest  mutual fund and financial services groups in the  संसार  .
It was founded in  1946   और  serves North American investors  .
Fidelity Ventures is its venture capital  भुजा  .
Fidelity International Limited ( FIL ) , was  an  international affiliate founded in 1969 , serving  सबसे  countries in the rest of the world .
In September  2011  , FIL  थी  rebranded  as  'Fidelity Worldwide Investment ' .
Fidelity  निवेश   manages  a large family of mutual funds , provides fund  वितरण  and investment advice services , as well  as  providing discount  brokerage   सेवाएं  , retirement  सेवाएं  , wealth management , securities execution and  क्लीयरेंस  , life insurance and a number of  अन्य  services .

Sociology is the  वैज्ञानिक  study  of  human society and its  origins  , development  ,  organizations , and institutions .
It is a social science which uses various methods of  अनुभवजन्य   छानबीन  and critical analysis to develop a body of knowledge about human social activity , structures , and functions .
A goal for many  sociologists  is to  conduct  research which may be  लागू  directly to social policy and  welfare  , while others focus  primarily   on  refining the theoretical  समझना  of social  प्रक्रियाओं  .
विषय  matter  सीमाएँ   इससे  the micro level  of  individual agency and interaction to the macro level of  प्रणालियों  and the social structure .
The traditional focuses  of  sociology  शामिल  social stratification  ,  social class , culture , race and ethnicity  ,  gender and  कामुकता  , social mobility ,  धर्म  , secularization , law , and  deviance  .
As all  spheres  of  इंसान  activity are affected  by   the  interplay between social  ढांचा  and individual  एजेंसी  , sociology  रै  gradually expanded its focus to further subjects , such as health ,  चिकित्सा   ,  military and  penal  institutions , the Internet , environmental sociology , political economy and the role  of   सोशल  activity in the development of scientific knowledge .
the  range of social scientific methods has also expanded .
Social  शोधकर्ताओं  draw upon a variety of qualitative  और  quantitative techniques .
The linguistic  और  cultural turns of the mid-twentieth century led  to  increasingly interpretative  ,  hermeneutic ,  और   philosophic  approaches  to  the  विश्लेषण  of society .
Conversely , recent decades have  देखी  the rise of new analytically , mathematically and computationally rigorous techniques ,  ऐसे  as  agent-based  modelling and social network analysis .
Sociology should  नहीं   be  confused with  विभिन्न  general  सोशल  studies courses which bear  छोटी  relation to sociological theory or social science research methodology  .
Thunder is  the  sound caused by lightning .
Depending on the nature of the lightning and  अलहदा  of the  श्रोता  ,  थंडर  can range from a sharp , loud crack to  a  long , low rumble  (   brontide  )  .
The sudden increase in pressure and temperature from lightning produces  रैपिड  expansion of  the  air surrounding and  भीतर  a  bolt  of lightning .
In turn ,  इस  expansion of air creates a sonic shock wave ,  समान  to a sonic boom , which produces the sound of thunder , often referred to as a  clap  , crack ,  or  peal of thunder .
The  अलहदा   of  the lightning can be calculated  by  the listener based on the time interval from when the lightning  is  seen to when the sound is heard .
Palma ( , ,  )  , in full Palma de Mallorca , is the major  नगर  and port on  the  island of Majorca ( Mallorca ) and capital city  of  the autonomous  जातियाँ   of  the Balearic  आइलैंड्स  in Spain  .
The names Ciutat de  mallorca  ( City of Majorca ) and  ciutat  ( City )  यहूद  used before the War of the Spanish Succession and are still used by people in Majorca .
however  , the  आधिकारिक  name was  mallorca  , the  वही  as the island .
It is situated on  the   दक्षिण   coast  of  the  island on  the  Bay of Palma  .
as  of  the  2009 census , the population of the city of Palma proper  थी   401,270   ,  and  the  population of the entire urban area was 517,285 , ranking  as   the   बारहवीं  largest  शहरी  area of  स्पेन   .
Almost half of the total population  of  Majorca live in Palma .
The  cabrera  Archipelago , though widely separated from  पालमा  proper , is administratively considered part of the municipality .
Its airport , Son Sant Joan , serves over 22  लाख  passengers each year .
The Marivent Palace was offered by the city to the then Prince Juan Carlos I of Spain .
The  रॉयल्स  have since spent their summer holidays in Palma .

Alexander Joseph ``  लेक्स  '' Luthor is  a  fictional character , a supervillain appearing in comic  किताबे  published by DC  कॉमिक्स  .
Luthor is the archenemy of Superman ,  और   as  a high-status supervillain , has also come  into  conflict with Batman and other superheroes in the DC  ब्रह्मांड  .
Created by Jerry Siegel and Joe  shuster   ,  the character first appeared in  कार्रवाई  Comics #  23  ( April  1940  ) .
Luthor  is  described as  ``  a power-mad , evil  वैज्ञानिक  '' of high intelligence and incredible technological prowess .
Luthor 's goals typically center on killing Superman , the foremost obstacle  to  achieving the villain 's megalomaniacal goals .
despite   periodically  wearing  a  powered exoskeleton , Luthor has  traditionally  lacked superpowers  or  a dual  पहचान   .
The character was originally depicted as a  mad  scientist who , in the vein of pulp novels , wreaks havoc  on  the  संसार  with his  अत्याधुनिक  weaponry  .
In his  earliest   दिखावे   ,  Luthor is  दिखाया  with a  पूरा  head of red hair .
Despite this  ,   the  character later became hairless as  the  result of an artist 's mistake  .
A 1960  स्टोरी  by  जेरी  Siegel expanded upon Luthor 's  उत्पत्ति  and  motivations   ,   revealing  him to  be   a  childhood  dost  of Superman 's  जो  lost his hair when a  आग  destroyed his  प्रयोगशाला  ;  luthor  vowed revenge .
Following  the  1985 limited series Crisis  on  Infinite Earths , the character was re-imagined  as  a Machiavellian industrialist and  white-collar   दण्ड  ,  भी  briefly  सेवारत  as President of the  संयुक्त  States .
In recent years ,  विभिन्न  writers  have  revived Luthor 's mad scientist persona from the 1940s .
The character was  क्रमित   as   the  8th  महानतम  Villain by Wizard on its 100 Greatest Villains of All  समय  list .
ign  's list of the Top  100  Comic Book Villains of  सब  Time ranked Luthor as # 4 .
Luthor  is  also described as a `` megavillain '' by comic book critic Peter Sanderson , one of  a  few genre-crossing villains  जिनकी  adventures take  प्लेस  `` in  a  world in  जिससे  the ordinary laws of nature are slightly suspended '' ; characters such as  प्राध्यापक  Moriarty , Count Dracula  ,  Hannibal Lecter , Doctor Doom , and Darth Vader , also  अनुरूप  this description  .
Martin Luther King ,  jr.  Day  is  a United States federal holiday  अंकन  the birthday of Rev  .  Dr. Martin Luther King , Jr .
It is  observed  on the third Monday of January  प्रत्येक   साल  , which is around the time of King 's birthday , January  15  .
The floating holiday is similar  to  holidays set under  the  Uniform Monday  अवकाश  Act , though the  अधिनियम  predated  the   स्थापना   of  Martin Luther King , Jr. Day by  15  years  .
किंग  was the  मुख्य  spokesman  लिये  nonviolent activism in the civil rights movement , which  सफलतापूर्वक  protested racial discrimination  in  federal  और  state  विधि  .
The campaign for a federal holiday in King  's   सम्मान  began soon after  उसके   हत्या  in 1968 .
Ronald Reagan signed the holiday into law in 1983 , and it was  पहला  observed  on  January 20 ,  1986  .
At first , some states resisted observing the holiday as  ऐसे  , giving it alternative names or combining it  साथ  other holidays .
It was officially observed  in  all 50 states for the first  समय  in 2000 .
The camera phone solution allows instant sharing of pictures .
As it  's  automatic and instant , the user does not have  to  use a cable or  removable  media  to  connect  to  a personal computer .
A camera phone is a mobile phone  जिससे  is able to capture still photographs (  और  usually video ) .
Since early in the  21st   सदी  the majority  of  mobile phones in use are  कैमरा   फोन  .
Most camera phones are simpler than separate  डिजिटल  cameras .
Their usual fixed  फ़ोकस   lenses  and smaller sensors limit their performance in poor lighting .
Lacking  a   शारीरिक  shutter  ,  most have  a  long shutter lag .
Flash , where present , is usually weak .
Optical zoom  और  tripod screws are rare .
Some also lack a USB  कनेक्शन  , removable memory card ,  or  other way of transferring their pictures  अधिक  quickly  than  by the phone 's inherent communication feature .
Some of the more  महंगी   कैमरा   फोन  have only a few  of  these technical  disadvantages   ,  which  लागू  most acutely in low  लाइट   शर्तें  and in any case have not inhibited their widespread use .
सबसे  model  लाइनों  improve  in   ये  regards every year or two  .
कुछ  , such as the  droid  Incredible only have a menu choice to start an  अनुप्रयोग   कार्यक्रम  to activate  the  camera .
Others ,  ऐसे   as   the  BlackBerry Storm 2 , Droid X , Motorola V980 and Nokia 5800 also  have  a separate  कैमरा  button for quickness and  convenience   .
Windows Phones can  be  configured to operate as  a  camera even if the phone is  asleep  .
Some camera phones are designed  to  resemble separate  low-end  digital compact  कैमरे  in appearance and to some extent in features and picture quality  ,   और  are branded as both mobile phones and cameras , including certain  सोनी  phones .
The principal advantages of camera phones  हैं  cost and  compactness  ; indeed for  a  user who carries a mobile  फोन  anyway , the additional size  और   लागत  are negligible .
Smartphones that are camera phones may run mobile applications to add  सामर्थ्य  such as geotagging and  चित्र   stitching  .
A few high  समाप्त   फोन  can use  उनके  touch screen to direct their camera to  फ़ोकस  on a  particular  object in the field of view  ,  giving even an inexperienced  उपयोक्ता   a  degree of focus control  exceeded  only by seasoned photographers using manual focus  .
``  whatever  Happened to the Man  of  Tomorrow ?  ''  is a 1986 comic  किताब   स्टोरी   featuring  the  dc  Comics character  of  Superman .
लिखा  by Alan Moore with help from long-time , and soon to be retiring ,  सुपरमैन  editor , Julius Schwartz ,  the  story was published in two parts , beginning in  सुपरमैन  # 423 and ending in Action Comics  #  583 ,  दोनो  published in September 1986  .
the  story was drawn by long-time artist Curt Swan , in  उसके   फाइनल  major contribution  to  the  सुपरमैन  titles , and was inked by George Pérez in  the  issue of Superman and Kurt  schaffenberger  in  the  issue  of  Action Comics .
The story was an imaginary  टेल  which  बताई  the final story of  the  Silver  आयु   सुपरमैन  and his  long  history , which was being rebooted  following   the  events of Crisis  on  Infinite Earths ,  पहले  his modern introduction  in   the   जॉन  Byrne series , The Man of Steel .
Moore wanted his  प्लाट  to honor the long history of the  अक्षर  and  to  serve as a complete conclusion to his mythology .
the  story  is  a frame story set ten  सालो  after Superman was last seen  ,  where Lois Lane recounts the tale  of  the  समाप्त  of  सुपरमैन  's career to a reporter from the Daily Planet .
Her story includes numerous violent attacks against Superman by his  दुश्मनों  , the public  रहस्योद्घाटन  of his secret  पहचान  of Clark  केंट  and a number of deaths of  those  closest to him  .
the  story has been cited as one of the  बेहतरीन  stories of the character of Superman , and critics and audiences frequently  चुनें  it as one of the most  यादगार  comics ever published .
It is used as an example of how to close  the   long-time  continuity of a comic book character .
The  स्टोरी  's legacy has endured with similar stories written  as   श्रद्धांजलि   to  it .
The title is a reference to  एक  of  the  nicknames  of   सुपरमैन  as the Man of Tomorrow , and  थी  used  in   the  title of another Superman .
the  Bugatti Veyron  eb  16.4 is a mid-engined grand touring car , designed  और   विकसित  by the  volkswagen  Group and  manufactured  in Molsheim ,  फ़्रांस  by  bugatti  Automobiles S.A.S .
The Super Sport version  of  the Veyron is the fastest street-legal production car in the world , with a top speed of .
The original version has a top speed of .
It was  नामित  Car of the Decade  (  2000–2009 ) by the BBC television  कार्यक्रम  Top  गियर  .
The standard Veyron won Top Gears Best Car Driven  सब  Year  पुरस्कार  in 2005 .
On  6  April  2013  , Bugatti set the record for the fastest roadster in the  संसार  with  the  Veyron  ग्रैंड  Sport Vitesse , reaching on average a  शीर्ष  speed of .
the  Veyron 's chief  पंक्तियां   थी  Hartmut  warkuss  ,  और  the  exterior  was designed  by  Jozef Kabaň of Volkswagen , with much of the engineering  कार्य  being  conducted  under  the  guidance of engineering chief Wolfgang Schreiber  .
A number of special  विसंगतियाँ   have  been produced .
In  दिसम्बर  2010 , Bugatti began  offering  prospective  खरीदार  the ability to customize  exterior   और   इंटीरियर्स  colours by using the Veyron 16.4 Configurator application on the  marque  's  आधिकारिक   जालस्थल   .
the  institution of the Eucharist has been a key theme  in  the  depictions  of the Last  भोजन  in Christian art , as in this 16th-century Juan de Juanes  पेंटिंग  .
`` At the Last Supper ,  on  the night he was betrayed , our Savior instituted the Eucharistic  बलिदान  of his Body and Blood . ''
( Catechism of the  कैथोलिक  Church  1323   )
Eucharist in the Catholic Church refers  to  both the celebration of the Mass , that  is  , the  eucharist  liturgy  ,   और   the  bread and wine which after the consecration are transubstantiated  (  changed in  पदार्थ  ) into the body and blood of Jesus Christ , Lord  और   परमेश्वर  ,  a   घोषणा  formulated  by  the Council of Trent with an anathema against anyone who  अस्वीकृत  this .
Blessed Sacrament is a  devotional   पद  used in the Roman Catholic Church to refer to the Eucharistic  प्रजाति   (  the Body and Blood of Christ  )  .

A short story is  a  brief work of literature ,  प्रायः  written in narrative prose .
Emerging from earlier oral storytelling traditions in the 17th  सदी  , the  छोटी  story has grown to encompass a body of work  so  diverse as to defy easy characterization .
At its most prototypical  the  short story features a small cast  of  named  वर्ण   ,  and  focuses  on a self-contained incident with the  intent  of evoking a  ``  single effect  ''  or mood .
in  so  doing  , short stories make use of plot , resonance  ,  and other dynamic  components  to a far greater  उपाधि  than  is  typical of an anecdote  ,  yet to a  दूर  lesser  उपाधि  than a novel .
While the short story is largely  पृथक  from the novel ,  लेखक  of both generally  चित्रण  from a common  पूल  of literary  तकनीकों  .
छोटी   कहानियां   have  no set length .
In terms of  शब्द  count there is no  आधिकारिक  demarcation between an anecdote , a  छोटी   स्टोरी  , and  a  novel .
Rather , the form 's parameters are  दिए  by the rhetorical and practical context in which a given  स्टोरी  is  उत्पादित  and considered  ,  so that  कया  constitutes  a  short story may  differ  between  जाति  , countries ,  eras  , and commentators .
Like the  अनोखा   ,   the  short  स्टोरी  's predominant shape  reflects  the  मांगे  of the  उपलब्धियाँ  markets  लिये  publication , and the evolution  of  the form seems closely tied to  the  evolution of the  प्रकाशन  industry and the submission guidelines  of  its constituent  घरों  .
The short  स्टोरी  has been considered both an apprenticeship form preceding more lengthy works  ,  and a  crafted  form in its  अपना   सही   ,   एकत्रित  together  in  books  of  similar  लंबाई  , price , and distribution as novels  .
Short story writers  may   define   उनके   works  as part of  the  artistic and personal expression of the form  .
They may  भी  attempt to resist categorization by genre and fixed form .
Area codes  in  Michigan
Area code 810 is the  टेलीफोन   क्षेत्रफल  code serving  पूर्वी  Michigan  .
The raccoon ( , Procyon lotor )  ,  sometimes spelled racoon , also known  as  the common raccoon , North American raccoon , northern raccoon  और  colloquially as  कून  , is a  medium-sized  mammal native to North America  .
The raccoon is  the  largest of the procyonid family , having a body length of and a body  वज़न  of .
Its  grayish  coat mostly consists of dense underfur which  insulates  against  ठंडा   मौसम   .
Two of the raccoon 's most distinctive features  हैं  its extremely dexterous front paws  और  its facial mask  ,   जिससे   हैं  themes in the mythology of several  देशी  American tribes .
raccoons  are noted for their intelligence , with studies showing that they are  समर्थ  to remember  the   समाधान  to  कार्य  for up  to  three  सालो  .
The diet of the omnivorous  raccoon   ,  which is usually nocturnal  ,  consists of about 40 % invertebrates  ,  33  %  plant foods , and  27  %  vertebrates  .
The original habitats of the raccoon are deciduous and mixed forests  ,  but due to  उनके   adaptability  they have extended their range to mountainous  क्षेत्रों   ,  coastal marshes , and urban areas  ,  where some homeowners consider them  to  be pests .
As a result of escapes and deliberate introductions in the mid-20th century ,  raccoons  are now also  वितरित   आरपार  the  यूरोपीय  mainland , the Caucasus region and  जापानी  .
Though  previously  thought to  be  solitary , there is  अभी  evidence that  raccoons  engage in gender-specific social  बर्ताव  .
Related females often share a common area , while unrelated males live together in groups of up to  चार   पशु  to maintain their positions against foreign  males   दौरान  the mating  ऋतु  ,  और   अन्य  potential invaders .
घर   दायरा   आकार  vary anywhere from 3 hectares ( 7 acres ) for females  in  cities to 50 km2 ( 20  sq  mi )  लिये   males  in prairies .
After a gestation period of about  65  days , two to five  यंग   ,  known as `` kits ''  ,  are  born  in  वसन्त   .
The kits are subsequently  उठाया  by their  माँ  until  dispersion  in late fall .
Although captive  raccoons  have been known to live over  20  years , their average life expectancy  in  the  जंगली  is only 1.8 to  3.1  years .
In many areas , hunting and vehicular injury are the two most  आम  causes of death .
the  2010 Haiti earthquake  थी  a catastrophic magnitude 7.0 Mw  भूकंप  ,  साथ  an epicenter  निकट   the  town of Léogâne ( Ouest Department )  ,  approximately west  of   port-au-prince  , Haiti 's capital .
The earthquake occurred  at  16:53 local time  (  21:53 UTC ) on Tuesday  ,  12 January  2010  .
by  24 January , at least 52 aftershocks measuring 4.5 or greater had been recorded .
An  अनुमानित   तीन  million  लोगों   यहूद  affected by the quake .
The  उच्चतम  reliable death count was  अनुमानित  at 220,000 .
Haitian  सरकारी  estimates were  उच्चतर  .
The government of  हैती  estimated  कि  250,000 residences and 30,000  वाणिज्यिक   इमारतें  had collapsed or were severely  क्षतिग्रस्त  .
The earthquake caused major damage in Port-au-Prince , Jacmel and other settlements in the  प्रदेश   .
Many  notable  landmark buildings  यहूद   significantly  damaged or destroyed , including the Presidential Palace , the National  सभा   भवन   ,   the  Port-au-Prince  गिरजाघर  , and the main  कारावास  .
Among those killed were  archbishop  of  port-au-prince  Joseph Serge Miot , and opposition leader Micha Gaillard .
The headquarters of  the  United  राष्ट्र  Stabilization Mission  in   हैती  ( MINUSTAH ) ,  स्तिथ  in  the  capital , collapsed  ,  killing  अनेक  , including the Mission 's Chief , Hédi Annabi  .
Many countries responded  to  appeals for  humanitarian  aid ,  pledging   निधि  and dispatching  बचाव  and  चिकित्सा   टीमों  , engineers and support personnel .
Communication systems , air ,  जमीन  , and sea  हस्तांतरण   सुविधाएं  , hospitals , and electrical  संजाल   था  been damaged  by   the  earthquake , which  hampered  rescue  और  aid efforts ; confusion over who  थी  in  चार्ज  ,  एयर   ट्रैफ़िक  congestion ,  और  problems with prioritisation  of   फ़्लाइट  further complicated  जल्दी  relief work .
port-au-prince  's morgues were overwhelmed with tens of thousands of bodies .
ये  had to  be   दफ्न   in  mass graves .
as   छुटकारा  tailed off , supplies  ,   चिकित्सा  care and sanitation  became  priorities .
Delays in aid distribution led  to  angry appeals  इससे  aid  मजदूर  and survivors , and looting and  विरल  violence were observed .
On 22 January  the  United Nations noted that the emergency phase of the relief  आपरेशन  was drawing  to  a  बंद  , and on the following day the  haitian  government officially called off the  ढूंढें  for survivors .
Mister Ed is a fictional talking horse , originally appearing in short stories  by  Walter R. Brooks  ,  and later  in  an American  टेलीविज़न   हालात   कॉमेडी  produced by Filmways  कि  first aired in  अनुप्रयोग  from January 5  to  July 2 ,  1961  , and then on CBS from  अक्तूबर  1 ,  1961  to  फ़रवरी   6   ,   1966  .
The stars  of  the show were Mister Ed ,  a  palomino horse who could `` talk ''  ,   निभाई  by  gelding  Bamboo Harvester and  voiced  by former Western  स्टार  Allan Lane ( who went  uncredited   लिये  the entire length  of  the series )  ,  and  उसके  owner , an eccentric and enormously klutzy , yet friendly ,  वास्तु  named  wilbur  Post ( Alan  यंग  ) .
Much of the program 's  ह्यूमर  stemmed from the fact Mister  ed  would speak only to Wilbur , as well as Ed  's  notoriety as a troublemaker .
Other running jokes centered on Wilbur 's character being a  विशाल  klutz and inadvertently causing  नुक़सान   to  himself or others .
According to  the  show  's   निर्माता  , Arthur Lubin  ,  Young was  चुनी  as the lead  अक्षर   क्युकी  he `` just seemed like the  sort  of guy a horse would talk to '' .
Lubin , a friend of Mae  वेस्ट  , scored a coup by persuading the screen icon to guest star  in  one  एपीसोड   .
In the United States  ,  reruns  aired  on Nick at  नाइट  from March 3 , 1986  ,  to February 1 , 1993 .
Sister station TV Land  भी  reran the  दिखाएँ  from 1996–98 and again from 2003-06  .
The series  is  currently  ब्रॉडकास्ट  every morning on  इस  TV  ,  along with Highway Patrol , and  the  Patty Duke Show .
It is also currently broadcast on  hallmark   फिल्म  Channel .
As of January 1 ,  2011  , the  पहला   दो   सीज़न  of the  दिखाएँ   हैं   उपलब्धियाँ  on Hulu  .
the   rapture  is a term in Christian eschatology  जिससे  refers to  the   ``  being caught up ''  discussed  in 1 Thessalonians  4:17  , when the `` dead  in  Christ  ''  and `` we who  हैं  alive and remain '' will be  ``  caught up in the clouds '' to  मिलें  ``  the  Lord in  the  air '' .
The term `` Rapture '' is used in at least two  होश  .
In the pre-tribulation view ,  a  group of  लोगों  will be left  पीछे  on earth  बाद  another group literally  पत्ते  ``  to  meet the Lord in the air . ''
This  is  now the most common use  of  the  पद  ,  विशेषकर  among fundamentalist Christians and in the  संयुक्त  States .
The  अन्य  , older use of the  पद  `` Rapture  ''  is simply as a synonym  लिये   the  final resurrection generally ,  बगैर  a belief that a group of  लोगों   is  left behind on earth for an extended Tribulation period  बाद   the  events of 1 Thessalonians 4:17 .
This  भेद   is  important  as  some types of Christianity never refer to `` the Rapture '' in  धार्मिक   शिक्षा  ,  लकिन   might  use the older  और   अधिक  general  भाव   of  the word `` rapture '' in referring to what happens during  the  final  क़यामत  .
There  हैं   अनेक  views among Christians regarding the timing  of  Christ 's  वापसी  ( including whether it will  occur   in  one event or two ) ,  और  various views regarding the destination of the aerial gathering  वर्णित   in   1  Thessalonians  4  .
Denominations such as  रोमन  Catholics , Orthodox Christians , Lutheran  ईसाइयों  , and Reformed Christians believe in a  rapture  only in the sense of a general final resurrection , when Christ  रिटर्न  a single time .
They do not believe that  a  group of people is left behind on earth for an extended Tribulation period after the  कार्यक्रम  of 1 Thessalonians 4:17 .
Pre-tribulation  rapture  theology was  विकसित   in  the 1830s by John  नेल्सन  Darby and the Plymouth Brethren ,  और  popularized  in  the  संयुक्त  States in  the  early 20th century by the wide circulation of the Scofield Reference Bible .
Kris Nathan Humphries ( born February 6  ,  1985  )  is an  अमरीकी  professional basketball  खिलाड़ी  with the Brooklyn Nets  .
The Philistine cities of Gaza , Ashdod  ,  Ashkelon ,  ekron  , and Gath
The Philistines ( , , ,  or   ;  , Plištim  )  , Pleshet or Peleset  ,  were a  लोगों   जो   as  part of the Sea Peoples appeared in the southern coastal area of  canaan   at   the  beginning of the Iron  आयु  ( circa 1175 BC  )  ,  सबसे  probably from  the  Aegean region .
According to the Bible , they ruled the  पाँच  city-states  (  the  ``  Philistine Pentapolis '' ) of Gaza , Ashkelon , Ashdod  ,  Ekron and  gath  , from Wadi Gaza in the  दक्षिण  to the Yarqon River  in  the  उत्तर  , but with  no   फिक्स्ड   किनारा   to   the   ईस्ट  .
The Bible paints  उन्हें  as the Kingdom of Israel 's  सबसे   खतरनाक  enemy  .
Originating somewhere  in  the Aegean , their population was  around  25,000 in the 12th  सदी  BC , rising  to  a  शिखर  of 30,000 in the 11th century BC  ,   of  which  the  Aegean element was not more than half the total , and  शायद  much  कम  .
Nothing is  ज्ञात  for certain  परिचय  the original  भाषा  or languages  of  the Philistines , however they were not part of the Semitic Canaanite population  .
There is  कुछ  limited evidence in favour of the  assumption   कि  the Philistines were  indo-european-speakers  either from  यूनानियों  and/or Luwian speakers from the coast of Asia Minor .
Philistine-related words found in the  बाइबल  are not Semitic , and can in  कुछ  cases , with reservations , be traced back  to  Proto-Indo-European roots .
By the beginning  of  the 1st Millennium BCE they had adopted the general Canaanite  भाषा  of the region .
The  हथियारबंद  Services  वोकेशनल  Aptitude Battery  (   asvab  ) is a  अनेक  choice test ,  administered  by the United  राज्य  Military Entrance Processing  कमांड  ,  प्रयुक्त  to determine qualification for enlistment in the United States armed forces .
it   is  often  offered  to  अमरीकी  high school students  जब  they are in  the  10th , 11th and 12th grade  ,  though  anyone  eligible  लिये  enlistment  may  take it .
हालांकि  the test  is  administered by  the  military , it  is   नहीं  ( and never  रै  been )  a  requirement  कि   a  test-taker with  a   qualifying  score enlist in  the  armed forces .
In financial accounting , a  संतुलन  sheet or statement of financial position is a summary of the financial balances of a sole  बंदोबस्त  , a  कारोबार  partnership , a corporation or other business organization , such as  an  LLC or  an  LLP .
Assets  ,  liabilities and ownership equity are  सूचीबद्ध  as of a specific date  ,  such as  the  end of  इसके  financial year .
A balance sheet is often described as a ``  स्नैपशॉट  of a company 's financial condition ''  .
Of  the  four basic financial  कथन  ,  the  balance sheet is the only statement which applies to a single point in time of  a  business ' calendar year .
A standard company  संतुलन   चादर  has three parts : assets , liabilities and ownership equity .
The main categories of assets are usually  सूचीबद्ध  first ,  और  typically in order of liquidity  .
Assets  हैं  followed by the liabilities .
The difference between the assets and the liabilities is known as  इक्विटी  or the net  एसेट  or the  जाल  worth or capital of  the  company and  according  to the accounting equation , net worth must equal assets minus liabilities  .
Another way  to  look  at  the same equation is that assets equals liabilities plus owner 's  इक्विटी  .
Looking at the equation in  इस   रास्ता   shows  how assets were  financed  : either  by  borrowing money  (   देयता  ) or by using the owner 's money  (   मालिक   's  equity )  .
Balance sheets  हैं  usually presented with  एसेट  in one section and  देनदारी  and net  लायक  in the other section with the two sections `` balancing  .  ''
A business operating  entirely  in  नकदी  can  माप   इसके  profits by withdrawing the entire bank balance at  the   समाप्त   of   the  period , plus  कोई   नकदी  in hand  .
However , many businesses are not paid immediately ; they  निर्माण  up  inventories  of  goods  and they acquire buildings and equipment .
in  other words  :  businesses have assets and so they can not ,  भी   if  they want to  ,   तत्काल  turn  ये  into cash  at  the  समाप्त  of  प्रत्येक  period .
Often , these businesses owe money  to   आपूर्तिकर्ता   और  to  कर  authorities , and  the  proprietors do not withdraw all their original capital and profits at  the  end  of  each period .
In other words businesses  भी  have  देनदारी  .
.17 Hornady Magnum Rimfire , commonly known  as  the .17 HMR , is a  rimfire   राइफल  cartridge developed by the  ammunition  company Hornady in  2002  .
it  descended from  the  .22 Magnum  by   necking  down  the  .22 Magnum case to take a .17 caliber ( 4.5  mm   )  bullet , and it is more costly to shoot than  परंपरागत  .22 caliber  rimfire  cartridges .
commonly  loaded with a 17 grain ( 1.1 g ) bullet , it can  उद्धार   muzzle  velocities in excess of 2550  ft/s  ( 775  m/s  ) .
the  Schaumburg Flyers were a professional  बेसबॉल  team based in Schaumburg  ,  Illinois , in the United States .
The Flyers were to be a  चार्टर  member of the North American League , which is not  संबद्ध   साथ  Major  लीग  Baseball ,  however   ,  the team folded  in  March 2011 , before they began  खेल  in the  nal  .
From the 1999  ऋतु  to the 2010  ऋतु  , the Flyers played  उनके  home games at Alexian  फ़ील्ड  ,  निकट  the Elgin O'Hare Expressway .
The team  formerly  played in Thunder  खाड़ी  , Ontario  ,   जहाँ   वे  were known as the Thunder Bay Whiskey Jacks .
The team was originally a member  of  the Northern League from 1993 to 2010 .
On  जुलाई  27 , 2009 ,  the  Flyers played host to  बैटल  of the  लिंगों  II , which pitted the Flyers  विरूद्ध  the National Pro  fastpitch  Softball Champions , the Chicago Bandits .
Played  by   आधिकारिक  softball rules , the game  थी   देखी  by an  अतिप्रवाह  record  भीड  of 8,918 ,  और   थी  won by the Bandits  4-2  .
In  1999  , the  flyers  hired their first manager ,  रॉन   kittle   .
Kittle  is   बेहतरीन  known for his playing  दिनों  with the Chicago White Sox ,  और  former Chicago Cubs  और  White Sox player Greg Hibbard was the  pitching  coach  .
During  the  early years of the franchise , Kittle did  a  series of TV commercials to  प्रचार   the  team , using  the   gimmick   ``  Ma Kittle . ''  जहाँ  he played both himself and his `` Ma . ''
the  ads were successful  at  sparking some initial interest in the team as the Flyers hoped to steal away  प्रशंसक   इससे  the nearby Kane County Cougars  .
The ad mimicked the highly  कामयाब  Converse ads where Larry Johnson  स्ट्रक्चर  as both himself and `` Gramama .  ''
At  the  end  of  the 2001 season , however  ,  Kittle resigned from his  managerial  position , and Jim Boynewicz was hired to  बदलें   उसे   .
In 2004 ,  the  Flyers made it  to   the  Northern League Championship Series against the St. Paul Saints .
despite  leading the five-game series 2-1  ,  Schaumburg eventually lost the  श्रेणी  .
In Game 5 , Flyers relief pitcher Lyle Prempas allowed  a  game winning grand slam by St. Paul infielder Marc Mirizzi in the ninth inning .
The Flyers appeared in the Northern League Playoffs four times ( 1999 , 2003 , 2004  ,  2006 ) but never  जीती   the   चैंपियनशिप  .
Some famous players who played for the Flyers were former Oakland A  's  outfielder Ozzie Canseco and former Chicago Cubs outfielder  ड्वाइट  Smith .
Rachel Hannah Weisz ( / vice /  ;  born 7 March  1970  ) is an English film  और   थिएटर  actress and former  फ़ैशन  model .
वाइज़   began   उसके  acting career at  ट्रिनिटी  Hall , Cambridge in  the  early 1990s , then started working  in  television  ,  appearing in Inspector Morse  ,  the  अंग्रेजों  mini-series Scarlet and Black , and the  टेलीविज़न  film  अधिवक्ताओं   ii  .
She  बना  her  फिल्मी  début in the film Death Machine ( 1994 ) ,  लकिन  her breakthrough role came  in  the film Chain Reaction ( 1996 ) , leading to a high-profile role as  एवलिन  Carnahan-O'Connell in the films The  मम्मी   (  1999 ) and The Mummy Returns ( 2001 ) .
Other  notable  films featuring Weisz are  दुश्मन  at  the  Gates , About  a  Boy ,  constantine   ,   the  Fountain and The Constant  माली   ,   लिये  which she received an Academy Award ,  a  Golden  ग्लोब  and a Screen Actors  '  Guild award for  उसके  supporting  भूमिका  as Tessa Quayle .
She has been labelled an `` English rose '' since her minor role in Stealing Beauty  (  1996 ) .
Weisz also works in theatre  .
उसके  stage breakthrough was the 1994 revival of Noël Coward 's play Design for Living  ,   जिससे  earned her the London Critics Circle Award for the most promising newcomer .
Weisz 's performances also include the  1999  Donmar Warehouse production of  टेनेसी  Williams ' Suddenly  ,  Last Summer , and their 2009 revival of A Streetcar Named Desire .
उसके   portrayal   of   blanche  DuBois in the latter play earned her the Critics '  वृत्त   थिएटर  Award  लिये  Best Actress .
She has recently played Evanora in Oz the Great and Powerful .
The American  सिविल  War  (  ACW )  ,  also  ज्ञात  as the War  between  the States or simply the Civil War (  देखिए   नामकरण  )  ,   थी  a civil war fought  इससे  1861  to  1865 between  the   संयुक्त  States  (   the  `` Union  ''  or the  ``   उत्तर   ''   )  and several Southern  स्लेव  states that declared their secession and formed the Confederate States of America ( the `` Confederacy '' or  the  `` South '' ) .
the  war had its  उत्पत्ति  in the issue of slavery , especially the extension of slavery  into  the western  territories  .
Foreign powers did not intervene .
After four years of bloody combat  कि  left over 600,000 soldiers dead and destroyed much  of   the  South 's infrastructure , the Confederacy collapsed  ,  slavery was abolished , and  the  difficult  पुनर्निर्माण  process of restoring national unity  और  guaranteeing rights to  the  freed slaves began  .
In the 1860  अध्यक्षीय  election ,  republicans  , led by  अब्राहम  Lincoln ,  opposed  expanding slavery into  संयुक्त  States  '  territories  .
Lincoln won , but before  उसके  inauguration on  कूच  4 ,  1861  , seven cotton-based  स्लेव  states  formed  the  confederacy  .
Outgoing Democratic  अध्यक्ष   जेम्स  Buchanan and the incoming  republicans  rejected secession as illegal .
lincoln  's  inaugural  address declared his administration would not initiate civil war  .
आठ  remaining slave states continued to reject calls for secession .
Confederate  शक्तियां  seized numerous federal  दुर्गों  within territory  claimed  by the  confederacy  .
A Peace  सम्मेलन  failed to  ढूँढें  a compromise , and both sides  prepared  for war .
The Confederates  assumed  that European countries  यहूद  so dependent on  ``  King Cotton `` that  वे   होता  intervene ; none  किया   और  none recognized the  नई   confederate  States of America .
Hostilities began on April 12 , 1861  ,  when Confederate forces fired upon Fort Sumter , a key fort held by Union troops  in  South  कैरोलिना  .
Lincoln  पुकारा  for each state to provide  सैनिकों  to retake the fort ; consequently , four more slave states joined the  confederacy   ,  bringing their total to eleven  .
The Union soon controlled the  किनारा  states and established a naval blockade that crippled the southern economy .
The Eastern Theater was inconclusive in  1861–62  .
The autumn 1862  confederate  campaign into Maryland  (  a Union  राज्य   )   ended  with  confederate  retreat  at  the Battle of Antietam , dissuading British  हस्तक्षेप  .
Lincoln issued the Emancipation Proclamation , which made  समाप्ति  slavery  a  war goal .
To the west  ,  by summer 1862 the Union destroyed the  confederate  river  नेवी   ,   तब  much  of  their western armies , and the Union at Vicksburg split  the  Confederacy in two at the  मिसिसिपी  River  .
In 1863 , Robert  E.  Lee 's Confederate incursion north ended at the Battle of Gettysburg .
Western successes led to Ulysses  S.  Grant command of all Union armies in 1864  .
In the Western Theater , William T. Sherman drove  ईस्ट   to  capture  अटलांटा  and marched to the sea  ,   destroying  Confederate infrastructure along the way .
The Union marshaled the  संसाधन   और   जनशक्ति  to attack the Confederacy from all directions , and could afford  to  fight battles  of  attrition through the Overland Campaign towards Richmond , the Confederate capital .
The defending Confederate army failed , leading to Lee 's surrender to Grant  at  Appomattox  अदालत  House  on  April 9 , 1865  .
The American Civil War was one  of  the earliest true industrial  युद्धों  .
Railroads , the telegraph , steamships , and mass-produced  हथियार  were employed extensively .
The mobilization of  civilian   कारखानों  , mines , shipyards ,  बैंको  , transportation and food supplies all foreshadowed World  युद्ध   i  .
It remains the deadliest war in  अमरीकी  history ,  resulting  in the deaths  of  an estimated 750,000 soldiers  और  an undetermined number of civilian casualties .
Historian John  huddleston   estimates  the  मौत  toll at ten percent  of  all Northern males 20–45 years old , and 30 percent  of  all Southern white males aged 18–40 .
Potato bread is a form of bread in which  आलू  replaces  a  portion of the  नियमित  wheat flour .
It is cooked in a variety  of  methods , including by baking it  on  a  hot  griddle or pan  ,  or in an oven .
It  may  be leavened or  unleavened  , and may  have  a variety of other ingredients baked into it .
The ratio of potato to  गेहूं  flour varies significantly from recipe  to  recipe , with some recipes having a majority of potato , and  अन्य  having a  बहुमत  of  गेहूं  flour .
Some recipes call for mashed potatoes , with  अन्य  calling for  निर्जलित  potato flakes .
It is available as a commercial product in many countries , with similar  विसंगतियाँ  in ingredients  ,   कुकिंग  method ,  और   अन्य  variables .
The Pacific Time Zone observes standard time by  subtracting  eight hours from Coordinated  सार्वभौमिक  Time (  )  .
The clock time in  इस  zone is based on the mean solar time  of   the  120th  मध्याह्न  west of  the  Greenwich Observatory .
During daylight saving  समय  , its time offset is .
In  the   संयुक्त   राज्य  and  कनाडा  ,  इस  time  मण्डल   is  generically called  प्रशांत  Time ( PT  )   .
specifically   ,  it  is  Pacific Standard  समय  (  pst  ) when observing standard time  (  winter ) , and Pacific Daylight Time  (  PDT ) when observing daylight saving time ( summer ) .
Most of Canada uses daylight saving time  .
In Mexico  the  UTC−8 time  मण्डल  is known as the Northwest Zone , which is synchronized with the U.S. PDT daylight saving schedule .
The largest city in the Pacific Time Zone is  लॉस  Angeles in California from  यूएसए   ;  the city 's metropolitan  क्षेत्रफल  is the largest in the zone .
the  zone  is   एक  hour ahead of the Alaska Time Zone , one hour behind the Mountain Time Zone and three  घंटों  behind the Eastern Time  मण्डल  .
Stereo 8  ,  commonly known  as  the eight-track cartridge ,  eight-track  tape , or simply eight-track , is a magnetic tape sound recording technology .
It  थी  popular in  the  United States from the mid-1960s through to the  जल्दी  1980s  ,  but was relatively unknown in many European countries .
It  थी  , however  ,  very popular in the United Kingdom during  इस  period .
स्टीरियो  8 was created  in  1964 by  a  consortium led by Bill Lear of  lear  Jet Corporation , along with Ampex , Ford Motor Company , General  मोटर्स  , Motorola ,  और  RCA Victor Records ( RCA ) .
it  was  a  further development  of  the  समान  Stereo-Pak four-track cartridge created  by   अर्ल  `` Madman '' Muntz .
a  later quadraphonic version of the format was announced by RCA in April 1970 and first known  as  Quad-8  ,  then later  बदला  to just Q8  .
रामेसेस  II ( 1303 BC – July or August 1213 BC ; Egyptian : ,  alternatively   transcribed   as  Rameses and Ramses or ) , referred to as Ramesses the  ग्रेट  , was the third Egyptian pharaoh  (  reigned 1279 BC  –   1213  BC  )  of the Nineteenth dynasty .
he  is often regarded as the greatest  ,  most celebrated , and most powerful pharaoh of  the  Egyptian Empire .
His successors and later  उन्होंने  called him the `` Great Ancestor .  ''
Ramesses II led several military expeditions into the Levant ,  re-asserting  Egyptian  कंट्रोल   over  Canaan .
He also led expeditions to the  दक्षिण  , into Nubia , commemorated in  inscriptions  at Beit el-Wali  और  Gerf  hussein  .
At  आयु  fourteen  ,  Ramesses was appointed Prince Regent  by  his father Seti I .
he  is believed to have taken the throne in his late teens  और   is  known to have  शासित  Egypt from 1279 BC  to  1213  bc  for 66 years and  2  months , according  to  both Manetho and  मिश्र   's  contemporary historical records .
he  was  एकबार   कहा  to have lived to be 99 years old ,  लकिन  it is more likely that  he  died in his  90th  or 91st year  .
If he became  pharaoh  in  1279  BC as most Egyptologists  आज  believe , he would have  assumed   the  throne on May 31 ,  1279  BC , based on his known accession date of III Shemu day 27  .
Ramesses II celebrated an  unprecedented  14 sed festivals ( the first held  बाद  thirty years of a pharaoh 's reign , and  तब  every three years ) during  उसके  reign—more  than   कोई  other pharaoh .
On  उसके   मौत  , he was buried in a tomb in the Valley of the Kings  ;  his body was later moved to a royal cache  जहाँ  it  थी  discovered in 1881 , and is now  on  display in the Cairo Museum .
The early part of  उसके  reign was focused on building cities , temples and monuments .
He  स्थापित  the city of Pi-Ramesses in the Nile Delta as his new capital and main base for his campaigns in Syria .
This city was built on the remains of the city of Avaris , the capital of  the   हिक्सोस  when they took over  ,  and was the location of the  प्रमुख  Temple  of  Set  .
He is also  ज्ञात   as  Ozymandias in the Greek sources , from a  लिप्यन्तरण  into Greek  of   a  part of  रामेसेस  's throne name  ,  , `` Ra 's mighty truth ,  चुनी  of Ra '' .
the  Texas Rangers are  a   पेशेवर  baseball team  स्तिथ  in the Dallas-Fort Worth Metroplex , based in Arlington , Texas .
The Rangers  मताधिकार  is currently a member of the Western  प्रभाग  of Major League Baseball  's  American League .
Since , the Rangers have played in Rangers Ballpark  in   आर्लिंगटन  in Arlington , Texas  .
The team 's name is borrowed  इससे  the  प्रसिद्ध  law enforcement agency  of  the  वही  name .
The franchise  थी  established  in  1961 by the name of the Washington  सीनेटरों  , an expansion team awarded to Washington , D.C. , after the city 's  पहला  ballclub , the  असली  Washington  सीनेटरों   ,  moved to Minnesota and became  the  Twins .
बाद   the   ऋतु  , the  नई  Senators moved to Arlington  ,  Texas , and debuted as the Rangers  the   following  spring .
the  Texas  रेंजरों  Baseball Club has made six appearances in the  एमएलबी  postseason , all following division championships ,  in  1996  ,  1998  ,  1999 , 2010  ,  2011  और  2012 .
In 2010  ,  the Rangers advanced past the Division  श्रेणी  for the first time , defeating the Tampa Bay  किरणें  .
टेक्सास  then  brought   घर   उनके  first American  लीग  Pennant after beating the New York  यांकीज़  in six games .
In the 2010 World Series  ,  the franchise 's first , the Rangers fell to  the  San  फ्रांसिस्को  Giants in five games .
Their lone victory made them the first Texas team to  जीत  a World Series game , the Houston Astros having been swept in their  2005  World Series appearance .
They repeated as  अमरीकी  League  champions  the following year ,  तब  lost the  2011  World Series  to   the   st.  Louis Cardinals in seven  खेल  .
Gaius Julius Caesar ( , July 100 BC – 15 March 44 BC ) was  a  Roman general , statesman ,  कौंसुल  and notable author of Latin  गद्य  .
He played a critical role in the events that led to  the  demise of the Roman  गणतंत्र  and the rise of the Roman Empire .
In 60 BC , Caesar , Crassus and Pompey formed a political alliance that  थी  to dominate Roman  राजनीती   लिये  several years .
Their attempts  to  amass power through populist  tactics  were opposed by the conservative elite within  the  Roman Senate ,  among  them  केटो  the Younger with the frequent support of Cicero .
Caesar 's conquest of Gaul  ,  completed by 51 BC , extended Rome 's  territory   to   the  English  चैनल  and the Rhine .
सीज़र  became the first Roman general to cross  दोनो  when he built a bridge across the  राइन  and  conducted  the first invasion of Britain .
These achievements granted him  बेमेल  military power and threatened to eclipse the standing of Pompey , who had  realigned   खुद  with the  सीनेट   बाद  the death of Crassus  in  53 BC  .
With  the  Gallic Wars concluded , the Senate  ordered  Caesar to lay down  उसके   सैन्य  command and return to  रोम  .
Caesar  refused  , and marked his  defiance  in 49 BC by crossing  the  Rubicon with  a  legion , leaving his province and  illegally  entering Roman territory  अंतर्गत  arms  .
Civil war  resulted   ,   इससे  which he emerged  as  the  unrivaled  leader of Rome  .
After assuming control of government  ,   सीज़र   began  a program  of  social  और  governmental reforms , including the  सृष्टि  of the Julian  पंचांग  .
he  centralised the bureaucracy of the Republic and was eventually proclaimed `` dictator in perpetuity '' .
But  the  underlying  राजनैतिक  conflicts  था  not been resolved ,  और  on the Ides of March (  15  March ) 44 BC , Caesar was assassinated by  a   समूह  of senators led by Marcus Junius Brutus .
A new  श्रेणी  of civil wars  broke   आउट  , and the constitutional government of the Republic was never restored .
सीज़र  's  अपनाया  heir Octavian  ,  later  ज्ञात  as Augustus  ,   रोज़  to sole power , and the  era  of the Roman Empire began .
Much of Caesar 's life is known  इससे  his own accounts of his  सैन्य  campaigns , and  इससे   अन्य   समकालीन  sources , mainly the letters  और  speeches of  सिसरो  and the historical writings of Sallust .
The later biographies of Caesar by Suetonius and Plutarch are also  प्रमुख   स्त्रोत  .
सीज़र  is deemed to be one of  the  greatest military commanders  of  history  .
भाषाई   मैप   of  Nigeria  ,   कैमरून  , and Benin .
Sign in English  ,  outside the University of Lagos
There are hundreds of languages  बोला  in Nigeria  .
The major  भाषाएं  are Yoruba , Hausa , Igbo , Edo , Fulfulde , Kanuri , and  ibb   .
The official language of Nigeria ,  अंग्रेज़ी  , the former colonial language ,  थी  chosen to facilitate the cultural and linguistic unity of  the  country .
English , however  ,  remains an exclusive preserve  of  the  देश   's  urban  elite  , and is  नहीं   widely  spoken in rural  क्षेत्रों  ,  जिससे   comprise  three quarters of the  देशों  population .
Nigeria  's   भाषाई  diversity is a microcosm of Africa as a whole , encompassing three major African  भाषाएं  families  :   afroasiatic  , Nilo-Saharan  ,  and  niger–congo   .
सीरियल  also has several as-yet unclassified languages , such as Cen  tuum  ,  जिससे  may represent a relic of an even  वृहद   विविधता  prior to the  स्प्रेड  of  the  current language families  .
Daucus carota ( common names  शामिल  wild carrot ,  (  UK ) bird 's nest , bishop 's  फीता  ,  और  Queen Anne 's  फीता  ( North America ) ) is a  flowering   संयंत्र  in the family Apiaceae ,  देशी  to temperate  regions  of Europe ,  दक्षिणपश्चिम  Asia and naturalised to North America and Australia .
Domesticated  गाजर  are cultivars of  a  subspecies , Daucus carota  subsp  . sativus .
In the United States  ,  the title of  संघीय  judge usually  अर्थात्  a judge appointed by the President of the  संयुक्त   राज्य   और  confirmed by the  संयुक्त  States  सीनेट  pursuant to the Appointments Clause in Article II of the  संयुक्त   राज्य  Constitution .
In addition to  the  Supreme Court  of  the United States  ,   जिनकी   अस्तित्व  and some aspects of whose jurisdiction  हैं  beyond  the  constitutional power of  कॉंग्रेस  to alter  ,   अधिनियमों  of Congress have established 13 courts of appeals ( also  पुकारा  `` circuit courts '' ) with appellate  क्षेत्राधिकार   over  different regions  of  the United States , and 94 United States district courts .
Every judge appointed to such a  अदालत  may be categorized as a federal judge ; such  स्थितियाँ   शामिल   the  Chief Justice and  संबद्ध  Justices of the  परम्  Court , Circuit Judges  of  the courts of appeals , and district judges  of  the United States district courts .
All of these judges described thus  दूर   हैं  referred to sometimes as `` Article III judges '' because they exercise the judicial  शक्ति  vested in  the  judicial branch of the federal government by Article  iii  of the U.S. Constitution .
in  addition , judges of the  अदालत  of International Trade exercise judicial power pursuant to Article  iii  .
Other judges serving in the federal courts  ,  including magistrate judges and bankruptcy judges , are also sometimes  referred   to  as `` federal  न्यायाधीशों  '' ; however  ,   वे   हैं   neither   नियुक्त  by  the  President nor  पुष्टि  by the Senate , and  उनके  power derives from Article I instead .
देखिए   आलेख  I and  आलेख   iii  tribunals .
Nelly Kim Furtado ( born December 2 , 1978 ) is a Canadian singer , songwriter and actress  .
वो  has sold 20  लाख   एल्बम  worldwide and more 20 million singles , bringing her total sales to over 40 million records around the world .
Furtado first gained fame with  उसके  debut album , Whoa , Nelly !
, which spawned two successful singles , `` I  'm  Like a Bird `` and ``  फेरे   बंद   the  Light ``  .  ``
I 'm  जैसे  A Bird '' won a 2001  juno  Award for Single of the Year  और  a 2002  ग्रैमी  Award  लिये  Best Female Pop Vocal Performance .
in  2003 , Furtado released Folklore , which produced three international singles— ``  powerless   (  Say What You Want ) `` , `` Try `` and ``  força  ``  .
Three years  बाद  she released Loose , a worldwide  वाणिज्यिक  success .
The album spawned four number-one hits : `` Promiscuous  ``  , `` Maneater `` , `` Say It Right  ``  and  ``  All  शुभ  Things ( Come to an End  )  `` .
After a three-year break  ,  she released her first full-length Spanish album , Mi  योजना  , and  फ़र्टाडो  received a Latin Grammy for Best Female Pop Vocal Album  .
In 2012 , Furtado 's fourth English-language studio  एल्बम   ,  The  स्पिरिट  Indestructible was released .
Furtado  's  work has  अर्जित  her numerous awards and accolades , including 2  ग्रैमी  Awards , 10 Juno  पुरस्कार   ,  3 MuchMusic Video  पुरस्कार  and a  स्टार  on Canada 's Walk of Fame .
जीव   of  the Night  is  the tenth studio album by Kiss .
It is the band 's last album for Casablanca Records ,  the  only label  the  group had  कभी  recorded for at that point .
The  एल्बम  was dedicated to the memory of Casablanca  संस्थापक  and  जल्दी  Kiss supporter Neil Bogart  ,  who had died of cancer  दौरान   the  recording sessions .
It is also the band 's last  एल्बम  recorded  साथ  Ace Frehley  credited   as  an official  सदस्य  ( until 1998 's Psycho Circus ) , and its first album  साथ  Vinnie Vincent as the initially  uncredited  lead guitarist  (  Vincent would later  be  credited , but  नहीं  featured pictorially  on  the cover ,  of  1985 's  reissue  of the album )  .
Touch is  a  crucial means of  receiving  information  .
This photo  shows   tactile  markings identifying stairs  लिये  visually  impaired  people .
The somatosensory system is a  विविध  sensory  प्रणाली  comprising the receptors  और  processing centres to produce the sensory modalities such as touch ,  तापमान  , proprioception (  देह  position ) , and nociception ( pain )  .
the   संवेदी  receptors cover  the   स्किन  and epithelia , skeletal muscles , bones and  joints  , internal organs  ,  and the cardiovascular system .
While touch is considered one of the five traditional senses ,  the  impression of touch  is  formed from several modalities .
In medicine  ,  the colloquial term `` touch  ''  is usually replaced  साथ  `` somatic senses ''  to  better  प्रतिबिंबित  the variety  of  mechanisms involved .
Somatic senses are sometimes referred to as  somesthetic  senses , with the  समझना  that somesthesis includes touch , proprioception and ( depending on  उपयोग  ) also haptic  बोध  .
The  प्रणाली  reacts to diverse stimuli using different  receptors  :  thermoreceptors  ,  nociceptors   ,  mechanoreceptors and  chemoreceptors  .
हस्तांतरण  of information from the receptors passes via sensory  nerves  through tracts in  the  spinal cord and into the brain .
Processing primarily occurs in the primary  somatosensory  area  in  the parietal lobe of the cerebral cortex  .
the  cortical homunculus was devised by Wilder Penfield .
At  इसके  simplest , the system works when activity in a sensory neuron  is  triggered  by  a  विशिष्ट   stimulus  such as heat  ;  this signal  आखिरकार  passes to an area in the brain  uniquely  attributed to that area on the body—this allows the processed  stimulus  to be felt at the correct location .
The point-to-point mapping  of  the body surfaces in  the  brain is called a homunculus and is essential  in   the  creation of a body image .
This  brain-surface   (  `` cortical ''  )   मैप   is  not  अपरिवर्तनीय  , however .
Dramatic shifts can occur  in  response to stroke or  चोट  .
Magnolia is  a  large genus of about 210 flowering plant species in  the  subfamily Magnolioideae of  the  family Magnoliaceae .
It is named after French  वनस्पतिशास्त्री  Pierre Magnol .
Magnolia is an ancient genus .
Appearing before bees did , the flowers evolved to encourage  परागण  by  भृंग  .
To avoid damage from pollinating beetles  ,  the carpels of  magnolia  flowers are extremely tough .
Fossilised specimens of  magnolia  acuminata  have   महरूम  found  डेटिंग  to 20 million years  पहले  , and of plants  identifiably  belonging to the  magnoliaceae   डेटिंग  to 95 million years ago .
Another aspect of Magnolias that  is  considered  to  represent an ancestral state is that the flower  कली   is  enclosed in a bract rather than in sepals ; the perianth parts are  undifferentiated  and called tepals rather than  पृथक  sepals  और  petals  .
Magnolia shares the  tepal  characteristic with several  अन्य   flowering  plants near the  आधार   of  the flowering  संयंत्र  lineage such as Amborella and Nymphaea ( as  खूब  as with many more recently derived plants  ऐसे  as  लिलि   )   .
the  natural range  of  Magnolia  प्रजाति   is  a disjunct distribution , with a main centre in east and southeast Asia and a secondary centre in eastern North America , Central America ,  the  West Indies , and some species in South America  .
