``  श्वेत  Christmas '' is  an  Irving Berlin  सोंग  reminiscing about an old-fashioned Christmas setting .
According to  the  Guinness Book of  संसार  Records , the version sung by  bing  Crosby is  the  best-selling single of all time , with estimated sales in  excess  of 50 million  नक़ल  worldwide .
Accounts vary as  to  when and  जहाँ   बर्लिन  wrote the song .
One story is that he wrote  it  in 1940 , in warm La Quinta ,  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  ,  जबकि  staying  at  the La  quinta   होटल  , a frequent  हॉलीवुड   रिट्रीट  also favored by writer-producer  फ़्रैंक  Capra , although  the   एरिज़ोना  Biltmore  भी  claims the song was written  वहीँ   .
he  often  ठहरे  up  सब  night writing — he  बताई   उसके  secretary  ,  `` Grab your pen  और  take down this song .
i  just wrote  the  best song  i  've ever written  —   हेक   ,  I just  लिखा   the  best  सोंग  that anybody  's  ever written !  ''
cross-country  skiing (  or  XC skiing  )  is  a  form  of  ski touring in which participants propel themselves  आरपार  snow-covered terrain using  skis  and poles .
The activity is popular in many places with large snowfields , primarily Northern Europe , Canada , and Alaska .
cross-country  skiing  is  part of  the  Nordic  स्कीइंग  sport family , which includes  स्की  jumping , Nordic combined ( cross-country skiing and ski jumping ) , Biathlon (  स्कीइंग  and rifle  marksmanship  ) and ski-orienteering (  जिससे  includes  मैप  navigation along snow trails  और  tracks ) .
Cross-country skiing is the modern style of  स्कीइंग   कि   सबसे  resembles prehistoric skiing , particularly when  किया  in  the  backcountry .
It is also related to Telemark skiing .
A  उपयोग  tax  in  United  राज्य  is complementary to sales tax which  अर्थात्  , if you buy a  taxable  product/services without paying any Sales  कर  to vendor  ,  you owe use tax  .
You must self assess use  कर  and pay it directly  to  the state where the products were consumed or services  यहूद   rendered  .
Use  कर  typically is a  कर  on consumption but if you buy an item  (  without paying sales tax  )  and store  it   in  your warehouse  initially  , use tax  applies  to that location where goods were  भंडारित  .
Later  on  when the final consumption takes place at some other location , you are required to pay the differential  of  tax  रेट  to the jurisdiction  of  ultimate place of  खपत  .
This really means that you do n't have to pay  दोनो  Sales Tax as well as Use Tax on one transaction .
It is only  एक  or the  अन्य  that you  हैं  required to pay on purchase of  taxable  products/services  .
If  विक्रेता  does n't charge  कोई  Sales tax  on  its invoice then it is the  दायित्व  of the  खरीदार  to self assess  उपयोग   कर  and pay  it  to the appropriate  jurisdication   .
Use Tax is generally charged at  the  same  कर  rate of Sales Tax but in  कुछ  states the tax rate  is  different .
Use tax is also termed  as  `` Consumption Tax '' or  ``  Consumer Use  कर  '' .
A use tax is a type of excise tax  levied  in the United  राज्य  by numerous state governments .
It is  assessed  upon tangible personal property purchased  by  a resident of  the   assessing  state for use , storage , or consumption in  कि   राज्य  ( not for resale  )  , regardless of where the purchase took place .
if  a  निवासी   of  a state makes a  खरीदें  within his home state , full  बिक्री  tax is paid at the time of  the  transaction .
The  उपयोग  tax applies when a resident of the assessing state purchases  an  item that is  नहीं  subject to his home state  's  sales tax .
Usually , this is  due  to out-of-state purchases  ,  as well as ordering items through the mail , by  फोन  , or over the Internet from  अन्य  states  .
The use tax  is  typically assessed at the same rate as the sales tax that would have  महरूम   owed  ( if any )  था  the same  goods   महरूम  purchased in  the  state  of  residence .
For example , a resident of Massachusetts  ,  with a 6.25  %  ``  बिक्री   और  use tax '' on certain goods and services ,  purchases   non-exempt   goods  or services in New Hampshire for use , storage or  अन्य  consumption in Massachusetts .
अंतर्गत  New Hampshire  विधि   ,   the  New Hampshire vendor collects no  बिक्री  taxes on the goods , but  the  Massachusetts purchaser/user must still pay 6.25  %  of  the  sales price directly to the Department of Revenue  in  Massachusetts as  a  use tax .
If the same goods  हैं  purchased  in   a  US state  कि  does collect sales tax for such goods at time  of  purchase , whatever taxes were  सशुल्क  by the purchaser  to  that  राज्य  can be  deducted   (   as  a tax  क्रेडिट  ) from the 6.25 % owed for  subsequent  use  ,   भंडार  or consumption in Massachusetts .
With  few  exceptions , no state 's  विक्रेता   होगा  charge  the   देशी  state 's sales  कर  on goods shipped out of state  ,  meaning  सब  goods ordered from out-of-state are essentially  फ़्री  of sales  कर  .
The purchaser  is   इसलिए  required  to   घोषित  and pay the use tax to his home state  on  these  ordered  goods .
the  assessing jurisdiction may make the use tax payable  annually  , but some states require  a  monthly payment  .
For example , where a Vermont  निवासी  has  नहीं  paid at  तनिक  6 % sales  कर   on  property brought in for use  in  the  राज्य  , Vermont law  requires  filing a  कर   वापसी   (  Form SU-452 and payment ) by the 20th day  of  the month following non-exempt purchases to avoid a $ 50 late  शुल्क  ,  a  5 % penalty per month , to  a  maximum  of  25 % ,  प्लस   statutory  interest on the unpaid tax and penalties .
ठेठ  exemptions include purchases by charitable non-profit organizations or  सरकारी  agencies , purchases  लिये  resale in  कॉमर्स   ,  and purchases via `` casual sales  ''  by individuals not in the ordinary course  of  business .
Also note that there are thousands  of  tax jurisdictions in the U.S. and many have ever-changing lists  of  specific types  of  goods and services  कि  are not taxable .
as   an  illustration of the  complexities  :  a  2006 Massachusetts law requires payment  of  tax  on  `` pre-written '' ( not custom ) software purchased and downloaded over the  अंतरजाल  for installation and use  in  Massachusetts ,  regardless  of where it originates .
However , the  वास्तविक  use of the  वही  software  डाउनलोड   by  a Massachusetts resident to a server in another  राज्य  remains a non-taxed `` service '' .
in  contrast , Arkansas generally does not tax anything delivered over  the  Internet ( such  as  downloaded software or music ) , except VoIP which is specifically defined as taxable `` telecommunications services ''  .
Software (  pre-written  or custom )  ``  delivered thru a  ठोस   मीडियम  '' ( i.e. , on disk ) in Arkansas is taxable even if ordered online ,  मगर  `` custom  तन्त्र   लिये  a particular customer  ''  which is non-taxable `` programming services '' even if delivered on  a  disk .
In most  मामले  , this complexity  is  part  of  the  underlying  sales tax  कानून  ;  लकिन  while a brick-and-mortar store has to deal with only  the  sales  कर   कानून  of  इसके  own location ,  रिमोट  sellers have  to  deal with the use tax laws  of  many jurisdictions—up to every US state and  मोहल्ले  that assesses them , if the company has  a  presence  or  `` nexus ''  in  every state  (  as  विशाल  `` brick-and-mortar  ''  sellers like  wal-mart  and Best Buy  do  ) .
In medicine  ,  pulmonary hypertension  (  PH ) is an increase of blood pressure in the pulmonary artery , pulmonary vein  ,  or pulmonary capillaries , together known as the  फेफड़ों  vasculature , leading to shortness  of  breath , dizziness , fainting ,  और  other symptoms , all of which are exacerbated  by  exertion .
pulmonary  hypertension can be a severe disease  साथ  a markedly decreased exercise tolerance and  दिल  failure .
It was first identified by  dr.   अर्नस्ट   वोन  Romberg  in   1891  .
According to the most recent classification , it can be one  of  five different types : arterial , venous , hypoxic , thromboembolic or miscellaneous .

Sanuk , a division of Deckers Outdoor Corporation , is  a  footwear brand  आधारित   in   दक्षिणी   कैलिफ़ोर्निया   .
Sanuk , the  थाई  word for fun , was founded by Southern California native  जेफ़  Kelley when he started  बनाना  sandals out of indoor-outdoor carpet .
The first product created  थी  green  carpeted  and entitled the ``  फर   रियल   ''  after one  दूकान  owner asked  if   the  novelty sandal was `` For Real . ''
The Fur Real first  became  a  runaway  hit through boutique stores and not the  intended  surf shops .
The novelty act was followed up  by  a sandal wrapped  in  wire mesh , a leopard print version  ,  and styles made out of a poncho material in a variety of  रंगों  .
sanuk  has  grown  to include  स्टाइल  options for men  ,  women and youth  और  is distributed across the United States and in over 50  देशों  throughout Europe , Asia ,  दक्षिण  America and  ऑस्ट्रेलिया  .
Sanuk  centers  itself around a positive lifestyle  वकालत   the  slogan  ,  ``  मुस्कान  , Pass it  on  ! `` .
In  कंप्यूटर  science ,  सरणी  programming languages ( also known  as  vector or multidimensional  भाषाएं  ) generalize operations  on   scalars   to   लागू   transparently  to vectors , matrices , and  उच्चतर  dimensional arrays .
सरणी  programming primitives concisely express  व्यापक  ideas about data manipulation .
The  स्तर  of conciseness  can  be  नाटकीय  in certain cases  :  it is  नहीं   uncommon  to  ढूँढें  array programming language one-liners that  आवश्यकता  more than  a  couple of  पृष्ठों  of Java code .
APL , designed by Ken Iverson  ,  was the first  प्रोग्रामिंग  language to  provide  array programming capabilities  .
The mnemonic APL refers to the title  of  his seminal book  ``   a  Programming Language  ''  and not to arrays per  se  . Iverson 's contribution to rigor and  स्पष्टता  was probably more  महत्वपूर्ण  than the  सरल  extension of dimensions to functions  .
In  the  United States  an  annuity contract is created when an  insured  party , usually an individual , pays a life insurance company a single premium that  होगा  later  be  distributed back to the insured party  over  time .
Annuity contracts traditionally provide  a  guaranteed  वितरण  of income over time  ,  such  as  via  फिक्स्ड  payments , until the  मौत  of the  व्यक्ति  or persons named in the contract or until a final date  ,   whichever   आता  first  .
However , the majority of modern annuity customers use  annuities  only to accumulate funds free of income and capital gains taxes and  to  later take lump-sum withdrawals without using the guaranteed-income-for-life feature .
President Barack Obama .
Barack  ओबामा  with his first Supreme Court  nominee  , Sonia Sotomayor .
following  is a  सूची  of all United  राज्य  federal judges appointed by President Barack  ओबामा  during his presidency .
As of April 30 , 2013 , 187 Obama nominees  to   आलेख  III  judgeships  have  महरूम   पुष्टि   by  the United  राज्य  Senate ,  namely   दो   justices  to the Supreme Court of the United States , 35 judges to the United States courts of  appeals   और  150 judges to the United States district  न्यायालयों  .
25 further  nominations  are currently awaiting Senate action .
There are currently  16  vacancies  on   the  United  राज्य  Courts  of  Appeals , 67 vacancies on the United States district courts and  22   अतिरिक्त  federal  न्यायपालिका  vacancies that are anticipated to occur  पहले  the  समाप्त  of  ओबामा  's second  पद  .
Obama  रै  not  बना   कोई   recess  appointments to the federal courts .
Obama has made two nominations to the United  राज्य  Court of International Trade  ,  an  आलेख  III tribunal .
Obama also designated sitting  न्यायधीश   एमिली  C. Hewitt of the United States Court of Federal Claims , an Article I court ,  to  be  मुख्य   न्यायधीश   of  that  अदालत  .
इस  is a list of airports in Mexico , sorted by  स्थान   .

Agency  कर्ज़  also  ज्ञात  as an Agency bond is  a   सुरक्षा  , usually a bond  ,  issued by a U.S. government-sponsored agency  .
The  offerings   of  these agencies are backed but  नहीं   गारंटी  by  the   us  government since the  एजेंसियों  are private entities .
Some prominent  issuers   of  these securities are Student  ऋण  Marketing Association ( Sallie Mae ) , Federal National Mortgage Association  (  Fannie Mae ) and  संघीय  Home Loan Mortgage Corporation  (   फ्रेडी  Mac  )  .
Agency securities are usually exempt from state  और  local taxes ,  लकिन  not federal  कर  .
Agency  कर्ज़   is  also called  an   एजेंसी  security .
The Susquehanna Steam Electric Station , a boiling  जल  reactor .
the  reactors are  स्तिथ  inside the rectangular containment buildings towards the front of  the  cooling towers .
Three nuclear-powered American warships , (  शीर्ष  to bottom  )  nuclear  cruisers   uss  Bainbridge and USS Long Beach with USS Enterprise the  पहला  nuclear-powered aircraft carrier in 1964 .
Crew  सदस्यों   हैं   स्पेलिंग   आउट  Einstein  's  mass-energy  equivalence  formula E  =   mc2  on  the   उड़ान  deck .
The  रूसी   nuclear-powered  icebreaker NS Yamal  on  a  1994  joint expedition with the NSF  .
Nuclear power  is  the use of sustained nuclear fission to  generate  heat and electricity .
नाभिकीय  power plants provided about  5.7   %  of the world 's  उर्जा  and 13  %  of the  संसार  's electricity , in 2012  .
In 2013 ,  the   iaea  report  कि  there are 437 operational nuclear power reactors ( although not  सब  are producing  विद्युत   )  , in 31 countries .
in  addition  ,  there are approximately 140 naval vessels using  नाभिकीय  propulsion in operation , powered by some 180  रिएक्टरों  .
There is an ongoing debate  परिचय  the use of nuclear energy .
Proponents , such as  the  World Nuclear Association , the  iaea  and Environmentalists for Nuclear  उर्जा  contend that  नाभिकीय  power is a sustainable energy source that reduces carbon emissions .
Opponents  ,   ऐसे  as  ग्रीनपीस  International and  nirs  , believe that nuclear power poses many threats to people  और  the environment .
Nuclear  शक्ति  plant  दुर्घटनाओं   शामिल  the  chernobyl  disaster ( 1986  )  , Fukushima  daiichi  nuclear disaster ( 2011 ) ,  और  the  तीन  Mile Island accident ( 1979 ) .
There have also been  कुछ  nuclear-powered submarine mishaps .
Research into safety improvements is continuing and nuclear fusion , believed  to  be safer , may be used in the future .
As of 2012 , according  to  the  iaea  ,  विश्वव्यापी  there were 68  सिविल  nuclear power reactors under  निर्माण  in 15 countries .
in  the US the licenses of almost half its reactors have been extended  to  60 years , and plans to build another dozen are under  गंभीर   विचार  .
However , Japan 's 2011 Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster prompted a  पुनर्विचार  of  नाभिकीय  energy  नीति  in many countries .
Germany decided to close all its  रिएक्टरों   by  2022 , and Italy has banned nuclear power .
Following Fukushima  ,  the International Energy Agency halved its estimate of additional  नाभिकीय  generating capacity  to  be built  by  2035  .
Photograph of  the  Berlin Wall taken  इससे  the West side .
The  वॉल  was built in  1961  to prevent  ईस्ट   germans  from fleeing from Communism .
It was  an  iconic  प्रतीक   of  the Cold War and  इसके  fall  in  1989 marked the end of the War .
The Cold War , often  दिनाँक  from 1947 to 1991 , was a  sustained  state of  राजनैतिक  and military tension  between   शक्तियां  in  the  Western Bloc ,  वर्चस्व  by the United States with NATO among its allies ,  और  powers  in  the Eastern Bloc  ,  dominated by the Soviet Union along with  the   वॉरसॉ  Pact .
This began  बाद  the success of  उनके  temporary wartime alliance against Nazi Germany ,  leaving  the USSR  और  the US as  दो  superpowers with profound economic and political differences  .
A  न्यूट्रल  faction  arose  with the Non-Aligned Movement founded  by   मिश्र  , India  ,  and Yugoslavia ;  इस  faction rejected association with either the US-led West or the Soviet-led  ईस्ट   .
the  Cold War was so named because the two  प्रमुख   powers—each  possessing nuclear weapons and thereby threatened  साथ  mutual  assured  destruction —never met in direct military combat .
Instead ,  in  their struggle for global  influence  they engaged in ongoing psychological warfare and in  नियमित  indirect  confrontations  through proxy wars .
Cycles of relative  शांत   होता   be  followed by  ऊँची   टेंशन  , which could  have   led  to world war .
The tensest  टाइम्स  were  दौरान  the Berlin Blockade ( 1948–1949 ) , the Korean War ( 1950–1953 ) ,  the   स्वेज  Crisis  (  1956 )  ,  the Berlin Crisis of 1961 , the Cuban missile crisis ( 1962 ) ,  the  Vietnam War ( 1959–1975  )   ,  the Yom Kippur War (  1973  ) , the  सोवियत  war in Afghanistan ( 1979–1989 )  ,  the  सोवियत  downing of Korean  एयर  Lines Flight 007 ( 1983 ) , and the `` Able Archer  ''   नाटो  military exercises (  1983  ) .
The  विरोध   थी   expressed  through military  coalitions  , strategic conventional force  deployments  , extensive  सहायता  to client states , espionage , massive propaganda campaigns , conventional and nuclear arms races  ,  appeals to neutral nations , rivalry  at  sports events ( in particular the  ओलंपिक  ) ,  और  technological competitions such as the Space  रेस  .
The US  और  USSR became involved in  राजनैतिक  and military conflicts in the Third  संसार  countries of Latin  अमेरिका  , Africa , the Middle  ईस्ट  , and Southeast Asia .
To alleviate the risk of  a  potential nuclear war , both sides sought relief of political tensions  through  détente in the  1970s   .
In the 1980s , the United  राज्य  increased diplomatic , military ,  और  economic pressures on the Soviet Union ,  at  a time when  the  communist state was already suffering from economic stagnation .
In the mid-1980s  ,  the new  सोवियत  President Mikhail Gorbachev introduced  the  liberalizing  reforms  of perestroika ( `` reorganization ''  ,  1987 ) and glasnost ( `` openness '' ,  ca  . 1985 ) .
Pressures for national independence grew stronger in Eastern Europe  ,  especially Poland  .
They reached  a  breaking point when  गोर्बाचेव  refused to use Soviet troops  to  support the faltering government of East  जर्मनी  in late 1989 .
Within weeks all the  उपग्रह  states broke  फ़्री  from Moscow in a peaceful wave of  revolutions  ( there was some violence in  रोमानिया  ) .
The  pressures  escalated inside the Soviet Union ,  जहाँ  Communism fell  और  the USSR  थी  formally dissolved in late 1991 .
The United States remained as  the   संसार  's only superpower .
The Cold War and its events  have   बाएँ  a significant legacy , and it is often  referred  to in popular culture , especially in media featuring themes of  espionage   और  the threat  of  nuclear warfare .
Pikes  शिखर  State Park  is  a state park of Iowa , USA , featuring  a  bluff overlooking  the  Upper Mississippi River opposite  the  confluence of the Wisconsin River .
the  park is operated by the Iowa Department of Natural  संसाधन   .
It is  nearly  a  हजार  acres ( 4 km2 ) in extent .
The  निकटतम  city is McGregor , Iowa .
Iowa Highway 76 approximately defines its northern  boundary  .
It gets its name from the Iowa incarnation of Pikes Peak , a particularly high point overlooking the gorge of the Upper  मिसिसिपी  , and like Pikes Peak  in  Colorado , is named for Zebulon Pike .
There  हैं  hiking trails , campgrounds and RV facilities .
Mountain bikes are  permitted   in  certain portions of  the  park .
Aside  इससे  recreational development , the land in the  पार्क  was never cleared and to a large extent remains as it was before the advent of white  उपनिवेश   .
It is part of a larger complex of parks , reserves and  refuges  which include Effigy Mounds National Monument ,  the  various components of the  पीला  River State Forest , the enormous Upper Mississippi  नदी  National Wildlife and Fish Refuge and much smaller , much less well known Driftless Area  नेशनल  Wildlife Refuge .
the  Northeast Iowa Legacy Trail System is  undergoing   विकास   ,  and will connect elements of these sites .
Zac  भूरा  Band  is   an  American country/folk band based in Atlanta , Georgia  .
the   लाइनअप   consists  of Zac Brown  (  lead vocals , guitar  )  , Jimmy  de  Martini ( fiddle  ,  vocals ) , John  driskell  Hopkins ( bass guitar  ,   vocals  ) ,  coy  Bowles ( guitar  ,  keyboards ) , Chris Fryar  (   ड्रम  )  ,  Clay Cook ( guitar ,  keyboards  , mandolin  ,  steel guitar , vocals ) , and Daniel de  लॉस  Reyes ( percussion ) .
The band  रै   toured  throughout the United States  ,  including a slot  on  the 2009 and 2010 Bonnaroo  म्यूज़िक  Festival .
वे  have also recorded five studio albums  ,  and charted nine Number One  singles  on the Billboard country  चार्ट  : ``  मुर्गा   fried  `` , `` Toes `` , `` Highway 20 Ride  ``   ,  `` Free `` , `` As She 's Walking Away ``  ,  `` Colder Weather `` , `` Knee Deep `` ,  ``  Keep Me  in   दिमाग  `` , and ``  अलविदा   in  Her Eyes `` in addition  to  the  singles  `` Whatever It Is `` and `` No  hurry  `` , which peaked at number 2 on the  वही  chart .
बात   रेडियो  is  a  radio format containing discussion about  topical  issues .
Most shows are regularly hosted by a single individual , and  प्रायः  feature interviews with a number of different  अतिथि  .
Talk radio typically includes an element of listener participation , usually by broadcasting live conversations between  the   मेजबान  and listeners who `` call in '' ( usually via telephone ) to the show .
Listener contributions are  प्रायः  screened  by  a show 's producer ( s ) in  अनुक्रम  to maximize audience interest and , in the case of commercial talk radio , attract advertisers .
generally  , the shows are organized  into   खण्ड  , each separated by a pause for advertisements  ;  however ,  in  public or non-commercial radio  ,  music is sometimes  निभाई  in  प्लेस  of  commercials  to separate the program segments .
Variations  of  talk radio include  रूढ़िवादी  talk , hot talk , liberal talk and sports talk .
While  बात  radio  रै  historically  महरूम  associated with AM/FM , starting around 2005 the technology  लिये   internet-based  talk-radio shows became cost effective in the  रूप  of podcasts .
Now ,  it  is  संभावित  for an individual to use a  किस्में  of services to host an Internet-based talk-radio  दिखाएँ  without carriage by a traditional radio station .
In addition  tv  programming from talk and  न्यूज   आउटलेट  such as BBC , CNN , Bloomberg and  फॉक्स  are now often available expanding the  संसार   of  talk radio further .
Talk radio listening is  अभी  enjoyed not only on radios  ,  but a wide variety  of   अन्य  devices and services including  pcs  using iTunes  ,  station directories such as  tunein  , show  निर्देशिका  smartphones with apps such as Stitcher .
Hippa  is  a genus  of   decapod  crustaceans in  the  family Hippidae  ,  containing the following species:
hippa  adactyla Fabricius , 1787
Hippa admirabilis ( Thallwitz  ,  1892 )

Hippa granulatus (  borradaile  , 1904 )
Hippa hirtipes  (  Dana , 1852 )
Hippa indica  haig  , Murugan & Balakrishnan  नायर  , 1986
Hippa marmorata ( Hombron & Jacquinot  ,   1846  )
Hippa  ovalis  ( A.  milne-edwards  , 1862 )
hippa  picta ( Heller  ,  1861 )
Hippa strigillata ( Stimpson  ,  1860 )
Hippa  testudinaria  ( Herbst , 1791 )
Hippa truncatifrons  (  Miers  ,  1878 )
It  is   closely  related to  the  genus  emerita   ,  and  प्रजाति   have  often been  transferred  between the two  genera  .
जकार्ता  ( )  ,  officially known  as  the Special Capital Region of  जकार्ता  ( ) , is the capital and largest city  of  Indonesia .
Located on the northwest coast of Java ,  जकार्ता  is the country  's   आर्थिक  ,  सांस्कृतिक  and  राजनैतिक  centre , and with a population of 10,187,595 as of November  2011  , it  is  the most populous city in Indonesia  और  in Southeast Asia ,  और  is the thirteenth most populated city  in  the world .
The  आधिकारिक  metropolitan area , known as Jabodetabek  (  a name formed by combining the initial syllables of Jakarta  ,   bogor  , Depok  ,  Tangerang and  bekasi  ) , is the second  largest   in   the  world , yet the metropolis 's suburbs  स्टिल  continue beyond  it   .
Jakarta is  सूचीबद्ध   as   a  global city in the  2008   वैश्वीकरण  and World Cities Study Group and Network (  gawc   )  research  .
and has an area of .
This area has population of well over 28 million  ,  making it  एक  of the  संसार  's  largest  conurbations  in  terms of number  of   निवासियों  .
in  2011 ,  जकार्ता  ranked  17th  among  the  world 's 200 largest cities ,  a  jump from its 2007 ranking of 171 .
Jakarta has  grown  more rapidly than Kuala Lumpur , Beijing and Bangkok .
Established in the fourth  सदी   ,  the city became an important trading port for  the  Kingdom  of   sunda  .
It was  the  de facto capital of the Dutch East Indies ( when it was known  as  Batavia )  और  has  जारी  as the capital of Indonesia since  the  country 's independence was declared  in  1945 .
The city is the seat  of  the  आसियान  Secretariat .
Jakarta  is  served  by  the Soekarno–Hatta International Airport  ,  Halim Perdanakusuma International Airport , and Tanjung Priok Harbour ; it is connected by several intercity and commuter railways , and served by several  बस  lines running on reserved busways  .
A typical home air conditioning  खिड़की  unit  .
एयर  conditioning is  the  process of  altering   the  properties of air  (  primarily temperature  और   आर्द्रता  ) to more favourable conditions .
More generally , air  कंडीशनिंग  can refer to any form of technological cooling , heating , ventilation , or  कीटाणुशोधन  that modifies the condition of air .
An air  कंडीशनर   (   प्रायः  referred  to   as  air  कॉन  , AC or  a/c  ,  और  not  to  be confused with the abbreviation  लिये  alternating current ) is a major or  घर  appliance , system , or  यांत्रिकी  designed  to   बदलें  the  एयर  temperature and  आर्द्रता   भीतर  an  क्षेत्रफल  ( used for cooling and sometimes  हीटिंग  depending on  the  air properties at a  दिए  time ) .
The cooling is  typically  done using a simple refrigeration cycle , but sometimes evaporation is used  ,  commonly for  सुकून  cooling  in   इमारतें  and motor  वाहनों  .
in  construction , a complete system of heating  ,   वेंटिलेशन  and air conditioning is referred to as `` HVAC `` .
`` 6 Foot 7 Foot '' ( also styled as `` 6'7 ''  )  is a  सोंग   by  American rapper  लील  Wayne featuring label mate  ,  Cory Gunz .
It is taken from his ninth studio album  ,  Tha Carter IV ( 2011 )  .
It was officially released on  itunes   on  December 16 , 2010 .
It was produced by ``  a  Milli `` producer Bangladesh .
the  song samples ``  day-o  ( The Banana  नाव  Song  )  `` by Harry Belafonte  .
dc  Talk (  styled  as  dc  Talk ) ,  is  a Grammy -winning Christian rap trio .
The group  थी  formed  in  Lynchburg , Virginia in  1987   by  Toby McKeehan , Michael  tait   ,  and  केविन  Max Smith .
They  have   released  five major studio albums  साथ  : DC Talk ( 1989 ) , Nu Thang  (   1990   )  , Free at Last  (  1992 ) ,  यीशु   freak  ( 1995 ) ,  और  Supernatural  (  1998 ) .
In 2002 , the  ज्ञानकोष  of  समकालीन  Christian Music called DC Talk `` the most popular overtly Christian act  of  all time . ''
In 2000  ,  the group released an EP  titled  Solo which  contained  two solo  गीतों  from  प्रत्येक  member  .
चूंकि  that time  ,   dc  Talk has been on an indefinite hiatus  ,   और  the three band members have each led solo careers  .
They  have  performed  और  recorded  व्यक्तिगत  songs together  अनेक  times during the  2000s  , although the group  never  officially reunited or disbanded .
The group 's musical style evolved  significantly  throughout their  करियर  .
उनके   पहला  two releases , DC Talk and Nu Thang , were of the hip hop genre .
DC Talk 's third album , Free at Last , also mainly took influence from  the   हिप  hop style ,  हालांकि  their music began taking on a  चट्टान  sound .
The trio 's last two albums , Jesus Freak and Supernatural  ,  were predominantly pop rock  .
The Bible  is  a compilation of many shorter  किताबे  written at different times and later assembled into the biblical canon .
All but the shortest of these  किताबे  have  महरूम   विभाजित  into chapters  ,  generally a page or so in length  ,  since  the  early  13th   सदी  .
Since the mid-16th century , each chapter has been  further  divided into `` verses '' of a few short lines or sentences  .
sometimes  a  वाक्य  spans more than  एक  verse , as in the case of ,  और  sometimes there is more than  एक  sentence  in  a single verse ,  as  in the case of .
As the chapter and verse divisions  यहूद  not part  of   the  original texts , they form  भाग  of the paratext of the  बाइबल   .
The Jewish divisions of the Hebrew text differ at various points from those used by Christians .
लिये  instance ,  in   यहूदी  tradition ,  the  ascriptions to many Psalms are  regarded  as independent verses , making 116 more verses , whereas  the  established Christian practice is to count and number each Psalm ascription together with the first verse  following  it .
Some chapter divisions also occur  in  different places , e.g . in Hebrew Bibles is numbered as in Christian translations  .
An  अनुक्रमणिका  ( plural : indexes ) is a list of words or phrases ( 'headings '  )   और  associated pointers ( 'locators '  )   to   जहाँ   उपयोगी  material relating to that heading can be found  in  a document .
in  a traditional back-of-the-book index the headings  होगा   शामिल  names  of  people , places and events , and concepts selected by a  व्यक्ति  as being relevant and of interest to  a  possible reader of the book .
the  pointers  हैं  typically page numbers , paragraph  संख्याएँ  or  खण्ड   संख्याएँ   .
in  a library catalog the  शब्द  are authors ,  शीर्षक  , subject  headings   ,  etc. , and the pointers are  कॉल  numbers  .
Internet  ढूंढें  engines , such as  google  , and full  टेक्स्ट  searching help provide access to information but are not as selective as an index  ,   as  they provide non-relevant links , and may miss relevant information if it is not phrased in  exactly   the  way they expect .
In  संयुक्त  States financial regulation , a suspicious activity report ( or SAR  )  is a  रपट  made by a financial institution to the Financial Crimes  प्रवर्तन  Network ( FinCEN ) , an agency  of  the United States  विभाग  of the  राजकोष  ,  regarding  suspicious or potentially suspicious activity .
Facebook on the Ad-tech 2010
Facebook is  an  online  सोशल  networking  सेवा  , whose name stems from the colloquial name  लिये  the book given  to   विद्यार्थी   at  the start of  the   अकादमिक   साल  by  कुछ   विश्वविद्यालयों   administrations  in the United  राज्य   to  help students get to  जान  each other  .
It was founded in February 2004 by  चिह्नित  Zuckerberg with his college roommates and fellow Harvard University students Eduardo Saverin , Andrew McCollum , Dustin Moskovitz and Chris Hughes .
The website 's membership  थी  initially limited by the founders to Harvard students  ,  but was expanded to other  कॉलेजों   in  the Boston  क्षेत्रफल  , the Ivy League  ,  and Stanford University .
It gradually added support for  विद्यार्थी  at various  अन्य  universities before  खोलने  to high  स्कूल  students , and eventually to anyone aged  13   और  over .
फेसबुक  now allows any users who declare  themselves  to be at least  13  years old to become registered  उपयोक्ता   of   the  site .
उपयोक्ता  must register before using the site , after which they may  बनाएँ  a personal profile , add other users as friends , and exchange messages , including automatic  सूचनाएं  when  वे  update  उनके  profile .
Additionally ,  उपयोक्ता   may  join  common-interest  user groups , organized by workplace , school or college ,  or   अन्य  characteristics ,  और   categorize  their  मित्रों  into lists such as `` People From Work '' or `` Close Friends '' .
as  of September 2012  ,  Facebook has over one  अरब  active users  .
According to a  may  2011 Consumer Reports survey , there  हैं  7.5  लाख   children  under 13 with accounts and  5  million under  10  , violating the  साईट  's terms  of  service .
In  may   2005   ,  Accel partners invested $ 12.7  लाख  in Facebook , and Jim  breyer  added $ 1  लाख   of  his own money to the pot  .
A January 2009 Compete.com study ranked  फेसबुक   as  the most used social networking service by worldwide monthly active users .
Entertainment  साप्ताहिक  included the site on its end-of-the-decade `` best-of '' list , saying ,  ``  How on earth  किया  we stalk  हमारी   exes  , remember our co-workers  '   जन्मदिन  , bug our friends  ,   और   खेल  a rousing game of Scrabulous before  फेसबुक  ? ''
Critics , such  as  Facebook Detox  ,  state that Facebook has turned into a national obsession in the  संयुक्त  States , resulting in  विशाल  amounts of time lost and encouraging  आत्ममोह  .
Quantcast estimates Facebook has 138.9 million monthly unique U.S. visitors  in  May 2011 .
According to Social Media Today ,  in  April 2010 an  अनुमानित  41.6 %  (  129.5  लाख  ) of  the  U.S. population had a Facebook account .
Nevertheless , Facebook 's market  विकास  started  to  stall in some regions ,  साथ  the  साईट  losing 7 million active users in the United  राज्य  and Canada  in  May 2011 .
Facebook eventually filed for an initial public offering on  फ़रवरी  1  ,  2012 , and was headquartered in  मेनलो   पार्क  ,  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  .
Facebook Inc. began selling stock  to  the  पब्लिक  and trading on the NASDAQ on May  18   ,   2012  .
Sulfonamide functional group
Hydrochlorothiazide is a sulfonamide and a  thiazide  .
Furosemide is a sulfonamide , but not  a  thiazide .
सल्फोनेमाइड  or sulphonamide is the basis of several groups of  दवाएँ  .
The original antibacterial sulfonamides  (  sometimes called  sulfa   दवाएँ   or  sulpha drugs  )  are synthetic  रोगाणुरोधी  agents that contain the sulfonamide group .
Some  sulfonamides   हैं  also  विहीन  of antibacterial  कार्यकलाप   ,  e.g. , the anticonvulsant sultiame .
The sulfonylureas and thiazide diuretics are newer drug groups  आधारित  on the antibacterial sulfonamides  .
Sulfa  allergies  are common ,  hence  medications containing sulfonamides are  विहित  carefully .
it  is important  to   मेक   a  distinction between sulfa  दवाएँ   और   अन्य  sulfur-containing drugs and additives , such as  sulfates  and sulfites  ,  which  हैं  chemically unrelated to the sulfonamide  समूह   ,  and do not  कारण  the same hypersensitivity reactions seen in  the   sulfonamides  .

Domestic geese ( Anser anser domesticus or Anser cygnoides ) are domesticated grey geese ( either Greylag Geese or Swan Geese  )  kept as poultry for their meat  ,   अंडे  , and  bas  feathers since  प्राचीन  times .
30 Seconds  to  Mars is an American rock band from Los Angeles , formed in 1998 .
Since 2007 , the band has consisted of actor Jared Leto  (  lead vocals , rhythm guitar , songwriter ) ,  शैनन  Leto ( drums , percussion ) and Tomo Miličević ( lead guitar , keyboards ) .
following  the departure of Matt Wachter (  अभी  of Angels & Airwaves ) in  2007   ,  Tim Kelleher became the bassist for  the  group , performing  सजीव  only with both Jared  और  Miličević recording bass for studio  रिकार्डिंग  , while Braxton Olita (  keyboards  ) was added  to   the  touring lineup in 2009 .
previously   ,  the group also featured  guitarists  Solon Bixler ( now of Great  उत्तरी  ) and Kevin Drake ( now of Polaroid Kiss  )   .
To date , 30 Seconds  to  Mars have released three studio albums – 30 Seconds to Mars (  2002  ) , A  खूबसूरत  Lie  (  2005  )  , This Is War ( 2009  )   और  three extended plays – AOL  सत्र   अंडरकवर  ( 2007  )   ,  To the Edge  of  the Earth ( 2008 ) , and MTV Unplugged : 30 Seconds to Mars ( 2011 ) .
30   सेकेंड  to Mars ' music has been associated mostly with  neo-prog  , progressive  मेटल  and post-grunge  ,  but they have also included emo , screamo , space rock  और  synthrock  into  their  म्यूज़िक  .
They have been compared to  गुलाबी  Floyd (  जो  were  an  influence on  उनके  work ) and Tool because of their use  of  philosophical and spiritual lyrics , concept albums  और  their use of  प्रायोगिक  music .
A Christmas Story is  a  1983 American Christmas  कॉमेडी  film  आधारित   on   the  short stories and semi-fictional anecdotes of author and  raconteur   जां  Shepherd , based  on  his book In God We  विश्वास  , All Others  अदा  Cash , with some  तत्व  derived  इससे  Wanda Hickey 's Night of Golden Memories .
it  was directed  by  Bob Clark .
The film has since become a holiday classic and is  दिखाया  numerous times on television during the  क्रिसमस  season on  the  network TBS , often  in  a 24-hour marathon  .
In 2012 , the film was selected  लिये  preservation in the  नेशनल  Film Registry by the Library of  कॉंग्रेस  for being  ``  culturally , historically , or aesthetically significant '' .

The  भवन  was initially a rowing club and  थी  later  परिवर्तित  into the restaurant  .

Founded  in  Houston , Texas ,  the  restaurant now operates  स्थितियाँ   सब  across the United States  of  America .
It serves seafood and American cuisine .
The restaurants  भी   have  a gift shop that  बिकता  facetious  t-shirts  featuring phrases advertising Joe 's seafood  चुनाव  .
It is based in Houston  ,  Texas .
New York  नगर   क्रूज  Liner  टर्मिनल  in Hell 's  रसोईघर  at  52nd  Street .
the  New York Passenger  जलयान  Terminal ( also known as the Luxury Liner  पंक्ति  or Manhattan Cruise Terminal or New  यॉर्क  Cruise  टर्मिनल  ) is a terminal for ocean-going  यात्री  ships on Manhattan 's west side  .
The terminal consists of North River Piers  88  , 90 , 92 and 94 on the  हडसन  River between West 46th  और  West 54th Street  .
( As a general rule , pier numbers in Manhattan can be  संकल्पित  by adding  40  to the  सम्बन्धित  cross-street . )
जहाजों  now dock at  पियर  88 , 90 and 92 .
बांध  94  on  the north  पक्ष  is now used for exhibition space .
Pier 86  ,  once used by United States Lines , is now home to the USS Intrepid .
in  2003 , the terminal handled  900,000   यात्री  .
The city is forecasting  कि  1.5 million will use  the  terminal by 2017 .
The piers are long and apart .
They  यहूद  first completed in  1935  to replace the Chelsea Piers as the city 's luxury liner terminal .
The new terminal was built to handle  बडे  ships that had outgrown the Chelsea Piers .
The piers  यहूद  renovated  in  1970 and are currently undergoing another $ 150  लाख  renovation .
The  संवर  plans call for it to handle three large ships at a time .
in  doing renovations , the city is also  considering  decommissioning  बांध  92 .
Logo of the  नई  York  क्रूज   terminal.for
decades the terminal was the only ocean-going passenger terminal in New York harbor .
साथ  an upsurge in cruise ship traffic and the  टर्मिनल   's  ability to handle  comfortably  only three large ships at a time , two new terminals have  खोली  in the harbor — the Cape Liberty Cruise Port opened  in   2004   in  Bayonne  ,   नई  Jersey ( used by Royal  caribbean  Cruise  लकीर  , Celebrity Cruises and Azamara Cruises ) , and the  ब्रुकलीन  Cruise Terminal ( used  by  the Queen Mary 2  और  other  जहाजों   of  the Carnival Corporation cruise brands  )  opened in 2006 in Brooklyn , New York .
The  वेस्ट   पक्ष  Highway takes a small jog east from the piers  to  below West 42nd Street because  जब  the terminal  थी  built land had to be taken away  इससे  Manhattan to  allow   लिये  longer  पियर  .
The US Army  corps  of Engineers , who control the waterfront dimension , would not extend the pierhead  लकीर  farther into the  नदी  , so the city extended  the  pier  by  cutting  दूर  at  the  land .
The city  पहले  did this for the Chelsea  पियर   ;   however  in Chelsea only  लैंडफिल  was taken away .
At  the   यात्री  Terminal actual Manhattan schist was taken away .
From downstream in the river
अनेक  major  यात्री  ships have docked  वहीँ  , including the RMS Queen Mary 2  और  Freedom of the Seas  ,  before  the  Brooklyn and Bayonne terminals opened  .
The SS Normandie caught fire and subsequently capsized at  इसके  Pier 88 berth during World  युद्ध  II  .
The  normandie   ,  renamed USS  lafayette  , lies capsized  in  the frozen mud at Pier 88 in the  शीत   of  1942
Norwegian Cruise Line 's soon  to  be newest ship the Norwegian Breakaway will sail year-round out of the New York Passenger Ship  टर्मिनल  .
The city will  खर्च  $ 4 million to renovate  और   उन्नयन   the  cruise  टर्मिनल  to accommodate the ship .

Christian right is a term used  in  the United States to describe right-wing Christian political groups that are characterized by their strong  support  of socially  रूढ़िवादी  policies .
ईसाई  conservatives principally seek to apply  उनके  understanding of the teachings of Christianity to politics  और  public policy  by  proclaiming the value of those teachings and/or by seeking to  उपयोग  those teachings to  influence  law and public policy .
In the U.S.  ,  the  ईसाई  right  is  an  अनौपचारिक  coalition formed around  a  core  of  evangelical Protestants that draws `` support from politically conservative  catholics  , Jews  ,  Mormons , and occasionally secularists  ''  who share their goals .
the  movement has its roots  in  American politics going back as far the 1940s and  रै  been  विशेषकर  influential since the 1970s .
Their influence draws ,  in  part  ,  from grassroots activism as well as their  फ़ोकस  on social  मुद्दे  and ability to motivate the electorate around those issues .
The Christian right is  notable  today for advancing  socially  conservative positions  on  issues  सहित  school prayer , stem cell research , homosexuality , contraception  ,  abortion  ,  and pornography .
Although  the  Christian right  is  usually associated with  the  U.S. , the  गति  has been  a  key factor in the politics of Canada ,  the   नीदरलैंड्स  , Northern  आयरलैंड  and Australia ,  among  others .
दूर  East Movement ( stylized as Far★East Movement or abbreviated FM ) is  an  American hip  हॉप  band  quartet  based in Los Angeles .
the  group formed in 2003 and consists of Kev Nish ( Kevin  nishimura  ) , Prohgress ( James Roh ) , J-Splif ( Jae Choung ) , and  dj  Virman ( Virman  coquia  )  .
Far East Movement 's  पहला  claim  to  fame was their  सोंग   ``  Round Round  ''  featured in the Hollywood movie , The Fast  और  the Furious : Tokyo Drift , and its  subsequent   साउंडट्रैक  , video game and DVD  .
चूंकि  ``  गोलाकार  Round ''  ,   the   समूह  has been featured on various network shows including , , Entourage , Gossip  लड़की  ,  और  Finishing the Game ( a featured  फिल्मी  at Sundance 2007  )  .
Their single `` Like a G6  ``  hit number one on the Billboard Hot 100 Chart and  on  iTunes as well  in  late October 2010 .
दूर   ईस्ट  Movement also  रै   the  distinction  of  being the  पहला  Asian-American group  to  earn a # 1 hit on the Billboard  hot  100 in the  संयुक्त  States  .
LR44  is   the  IEC designation  लिये  an alkaline  1.5  volt button cell , commonly used in small LED flashlights  ,  digital thermometers ,  calculators  , calipers , watches , clocks ,  खिलौने  and laser  संकेतक  .
LR44  क्षारीय  cell
The battery  नामकरण  is defined by the International Electrotechnical Commission ( IEC ) in its 60086-3 standard ( Primary batteries , part 3 Watch batteries ) .
The letter L indicates the  electrochemical  system used ; a zinc negative electrode  ,  manganese dioxide depolarizer and positive electrode , and an alkaline electrolyte .
R44 indicates a round cell 11.4±0.2 mm diameter and 5.2±0.2  mm  height as defined by the  आईईसी  standard 60086  .
निर्माताओं  have their  अपना  part numbers for IEC  प्रकार  LR44 batteries  including:
LR44 , LR44G ,  lr44gd  , LR44H
LR1154 , L1154 , L1154C , L1154F ,  l1154g  ,  l1154h

ag13  , A613 , AG14 ,  ag-14  , G13A  ,  G13-A
157  , 303 , 357
A76 , GDA76 ,  gp76a   ,  GPA7 , GPA75  ,  GPA76 , GPS76A,
1128mp  ,  208-904  , A-76 , CA18  ,  CA19 , CR44 ,  d76a   ,  KA , KA76 , MS76H , PX76A , PX675A , RPX675 , RW82 ,  sb-f9  , V13GA
4.5-volt  ,   d  , C , AA ,  aaa  ,  aaaa  , A23 , 9-volt , CR2032 and LR44  बैटरी
अन्य  types of batteries are or  यहूद  made  in  the R44 size  .
formerly  , mercury  बैटरी  were made as button cells ( types MR44 and NR44  )  .
Zinc-air batteries type  pr44  require  एयर   to   कार्य  .
Silver-oxide batteries  प्रकार  SR44 may provide extra capacity compared to  lr44  types but have slightly different voltage characteristics .
Performance of a device meant to use a silver-oxide battery may be degraded with substitution of LR44 types  .

Hurricane Katrina  थी  the  deadliest  and most  destructive   अटलांटिक  hurricane of the 2005  अटलांटिक  hurricane  ऋतु  .
It was  the  costliest natural disaster , as  खूब  as one of the five deadliest hurricanes  ,  in the history of the United  राज्य  .
Among recorded  अटलांटिक  hurricanes , it  थी  the  छठे  strongest  overall  .
At least 1,833 people died in  the  hurricane and subsequent floods  ,  making it the  deadliest  U.S. hurricane since the 1928  okeechobee  hurricane ;  कुल  property damage  थी  estimated at  $  81 billion ( 2005 USD )  ,  nearly triple the  क्षति   brought  by  hurricane  Andrew in 1992 .
Hurricane Katrina  formed   over   the  Bahamas on August 23  ,  2005 and crossed  दक्षिणी  Florida as a  मॉडरेट   श्रेणी  1 hurricane , causing some deaths and flooding  वहीँ   पहले  strengthening rapidly in  the  Gulf of Mexico  .
The hurricane strengthened to a Category 5  hurricane  over the warm Gulf water , but weakened  पहले  making its second  landfall  as a Category 3 hurricane  on  the morning  of  Monday , August 29  in   southeast  Louisiana .
It caused severe destruction along the Gulf coast from  सेंट्रल  Florida to Texas , much of it due to the storm surge .
the   सबसे  significant number of deaths  occurred  in New Orleans , Louisiana  ,  which flooded as the  तटबन्ध   प्रणाली   catastrophically  failed , in  अनेक  cases  घंटों  after the storm had moved inland .
Eventually 80  %   of  the  नगर   और  large tracts of neighboring parishes  became  flooded , and the floodwaters lingered for weeks  .
However , the worst property damage occurred in coastal areas  ,  such as all Mississippi beachfront towns , which were  flooded  over 90 %  in  hours ,  as  boats and casino barges rammed  इमारतें   ,  pushing cars and  घरों  inland , with waters reaching 6–12 miles ( 10–19 km ) from  the   बीच  .
the  hurricane  surge  protection failures in New Orleans are considered the worst civil engineering disaster  in  U.S. history and prompted a lawsuit against the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers  (  USACE )  ,   the  designers  और  builders of the levee system as mandated by the Flood Control Act of 1965 .
Responsibility for the  असफलताओं  and flooding  थी   रखी  squarely  on   the  Army  corps  in January 2008  by  Judge Stanwood Duval , U.S. District Court ,  लकिन  the federal agency could not be held financially liable due to sovereign immunity in  the   बाढ़  Control Act of  1928  .
There was also an investigation of the responses from federal , state and  लोकल  governments , resulting in the resignation of  संघीय  Emergency Management Agency ( FEMA  )  director Michael  D.  Brown ,  और  of New  ऑरलियन्स  Police Department ( NOPD )  अधीक्षक  Eddie Compass .
Several agencies including the  संयुक्त  States Coast Guard ( USCG )  ,  National  hurricane  Center  (  NHC ) , and National  मौसम   सेवा  ( NWS ) were commended for their actions .
They  provided  accurate  hurricane  weather tracking  forecasts  with  sufficient  lead time .
Even  the  most insistent appeals from national , state and local public officials to  निवासियों  to  evacuate   पहले  the storm did  नहीं   warn  that the  levees  could  उल्लंघन  and fail  .
U.S. debt from 1940  to  2011  .
Red  लाइनों  indicate the `` debt held by the  पब्लिक  ''  और  black lines indicate the total national debt or gross public debt .
The difference is the `` intragovernmental debt , '' which includes obligations to government programs  ऐसे  as Social Security .
stated   as  a formula ,  नेशनल  Debt = Debt held  by  the Public + Intragovernmental Debt .
The second panel shows the two debt  आंकड़े  as a percentage of U.S. GDP ( dollar  मान  of U.S. economic production for  कि  year ) .
the  top panel is deflated so every year is in 2010 dollars .
The United States public  कर्ज़  is the money borrowed  by  the federal government of the United States through the issuing of securities by  the  Treasury  और  other federal  सरकारी  agencies  .
US public debt consists of two  घटकs:
Debt held  by  the  पब्लिक   शामिल   राजकोष  securities held by investors  बाहर  the federal  सरकारी  , including that  आयोजित  by individuals ,  corporations   ,  the Federal Reserve System and foreign , state and local governments .
Debt held  by  government accounts or intragovernmental debt includes non-marketable  राजकोष   प्रतिभूति  held in  खाते   administered  by  the   संघीय  government  कि  are owed to  कार्यक्रम  beneficiaries , such as  the  Social Security Trust Fund .
Debt  आयोजित  by government accounts represents  the   संचयी  surpluses , including interest  आय  , of these accounts that have been invested  in  Treasury  प्रतिभूति   .
Public debt increases or  decreases  as a result of the annual  एकीकृत  budget deficit  or   surplus  .
the  federal government budget deficit or surplus is the difference between government receipts and  बिता  , ignoring intra-governmental transfers  .
However , some spending that is excluded from the deficit ( supplemental appropriations ) also adds  to   the  debt .
Historically ,  the  US public debt as  a   share   of  GDP  increased  during wars  और  recessions , and subsequently declined .
For example ,  कर्ज़  held  by   the  public as a share of GDP peaked just after World  युद्ध  II ( 113 % of GDP  in  1945 )  ,  but then fell over  the  following 30 years .
In recent decades , however , large  बजट  deficits  और  the  resulting   increases   in  debt  have  led to concern about the long-term sustainability of the federal government 's fiscal  नीतियों  .
on  2 April 2013 , debt held  by  the public was approximately $ 11.959 trillion or  परिचय  75 % of GDP .
intragovernmental  holdings stood at $ 4.846  खरब  , giving a combined total  पब्लिक  debt of  $  16.805 trillion .
as  of  जनवरी  2013 , $ 5.6 trillion or approximately 47  %  of the debt held by the  पब्लिक  was owned by foreign  निवेशकों   ,   the   largest  of which were the  लोगों   's   गणतंत्र  of China and Japan at  बस  over $ 1.1 trillion each  .
In basketball , an assist is attributed to  a  player who  गुजरता   the  ball to a  teammate  in a way  कि  leads to a  स्कोर  by field  लक्ष्य  , meaning that  he  or she was ``  assisting  ''  in  the basket .
There is some judgment involved in deciding whether  a  passer  चाहिए  be credited  साथ  an assist .
An assist  can  be  scored  for the passer even if the player who receives the pass  makes  a basket after dribbling the ball  .
However , the original definition of  an  assist did not include  ऐसे  situations , so the  तुलना  of assist statistics across  eras  is a complex matter .
तभी   the  pass directly before the score may be counted as an assist , so no more than one assist can be recorded per field  लक्ष्य  (  नापसंद  in  अन्य  sports , such as ice  हॉकी   )   .
A  pass   कि  leads to a shooting  बेईमानी  and  स्कोरिंग  by free throws does  नहीं  count as  an  assist in  the  NBA  ,  but does in FIBA  खेल  ( only one assist is awarded per set of  फ़्री  throws in  जिससे  at least  एक  free throw is  बना  ) .
पाइंट  guards tend  to  get  the  most assists per game  (  apg )  ,  as their role is  primarily   कि  of a passer and ballhandler .
Centers tend to  मिलेंगी   कम  assists , but centers with  शुभ  floor presence and  अदालत  vision  can   dominate   a   टोली  by assisting .
Being inside the key ,  the   बीच  often has the best angles and the  बेहतरीन  position for  ``  dishes '' and  अन्य  short passes in  the  scoring area .
बीच  Wilt Chamberlain led the  एनबीए   in   assists  in 1968 .
A  दमदार  center with inside-scoring prowess , such as former NBA center Hakeem  olajuwon  , can also be  an  effective assistor because  the  defense 's double-teaming tends to  खोलें  up  ठोकर  in the form of shooters .
The NBA single-game  assist  record is  30  ,  आयोजित  by Scott Skiles of the  ऑरलैंडो  Magic against the Denver Nuggets , on  दिसम्बर   30  , 1990  .
The NBA record for  सबसे  career assists is held by John Stockton  साथ   15,806  .
The mill or  mille  ( )  (  sometimes  mil  in the  uk  , when discussing property taxes in the United  राज्य  ,  or  previously in Cyprus and Malta ) is a  now-abstract  unit of currency  प्रयुक्त  sometimes in accounting .
In the United States , it is a notional unit equivalent to of a United  राज्य   डालर  ( a tenth of  a  cent  )  .
In  the  United Kingdom  it  was proposed  दौरान  the decades  of  discussion on the decimalization of the  पाउंड   as  a division of the pound sterling .
अनेक   अन्य  currencies used the mill , such as the Maltese lira .
The term comes from the Latin  ``  millesimum '' , meaning  ``  thousandth part '' .
The Greco-Persian Wars  (  also often  पुकारा  the Persian Wars ) were a series of  विरोध  between the Achaemenid Empire of Persia and city-states of the Hellenic world that started in  499  BC  और  lasted until 449 BC .
The collision between the fractious political  संसार  of the Greeks and the enormous  साम्राज्य  of the Persians  began  when Cyrus the Great  conquered  Ionia  in  547 BC .
Struggling to  नियम  the independent-minded cities of  ionia  , the  फारसियों  appointed tyrants to  नियम  each  of  them .
इस  would prove to be the  सोर्स  of much trouble for the  यूनानियों  and Persians alike  .
In 499 BC  ,  the then tyrant  of  Miletus , Aristagoras , embarked on an expedition to conquer the island of Naxos ,  साथ   पारसी   support  ;  however  ,  the  expedition was a  क़हर  and , pre-empting his dismissal , Aristagoras incited  सब  of Hellenic  एशिया   नाबालिग  into rebellion  विरूद्ध  the Persians .
This  थी  the beginning of the Ionian  विद्रोह  , which would  पिछला   जबतक  493  bc  , progressively  आरेखण  more regions of Asia Minor  into   the  conflict .
aristagoras   secured   सैन्य  support from Athens  और  Eretria , and in 498 BC these forces helped  to  capture and burn the Persian  क्षेत्रीय  capital of Sardis .
The Persian king Darius the Great vowed to  have   बदला  on Athens and  eretria  for this act .
The revolt continued ,  साथ  the two sides effectively stalemated  throughout  497–495 BC .
In  494  BC  ,  the Persians  regrouped   ,  and attacked the epicentre of the revolt in Miletus .
At the Battle of Lade ,  the  Ionians suffered a decisive defeat  ,  and the rebellion collapsed ,  साथ  the  फाइनल  members being stamped out the  following  year .
Seeking to secure his empire from further revolts and from the interference of the  मेनलैंड  Greeks ,  दारा   embarked  on a scheme to conquer Greece and to punish  एथेंस   और  Eretria for burning Sardis .
The first Persian invasion  of  Greece began in 492  bc  , with the Persian general Mardonius conquering Thrace  और   macedon   पहले  several mishaps forced an early end to the  अभियान  .
In 490  bc  a second force was sent to  यूनानियों   ,  this time  आरपार  the Aegean Sea  ,  under the command of Datis and Artaphernes .
This expedition  subjugated  the Cyclades , before besieging , capturing and razing Eretria .
however  , while en  रूट  to attack Athens , the Persian force was decisively  पराजित  by the Athenians at the Battle of Marathon , ending  पारसी  efforts  लिये  the time being .
दारा  then  began   to  plan to complete the conquest of  यूनानियों  , but died in 486  bc  and  जिम्मेदारी  for the  conquest  passed  to  his son Xerxes I  .
In 480 BC , Xerxes  personally  led the  दूसरी   पारसी  invasion  of  Greece with one of the largest ancient armies ever  समवेत  .
Victory over the  'allied  '  यूनानी  states  (  led by Sparta  और  Athens ) at the Battle of Thermopylae  अनुमत  the  फारसियों  to torch Athens  और  overrun most of  यूनानियों  .
However ,  जबकि  seeking  to  destroy the  संयुक्त   यूनानी  fleet , the Persians suffered a severe defeat at the Battle of Salamis .
The following year , the confederated  यूनानियों  went on the offensive , defeating the Persian army  at   the  Battle of Plataea , and ending the invasion of  यूनानियों  .
The allied Greeks followed up their success  by  destroying the  बाकी  of  the  Persian fleet at the  बैटल  of Mycale , before expelling Persian  garrisons  from Sestos ( 479 BC ) and  byzantium  ( 478 BC ) .
The  क्रियाएँ   of  the general  pausanias  at the siege of Byzantium  alienated  many of the  यूनानी  states from the Spartans ,  और  the anti-Persian  गठबंधन   थी  therefore reconstituted around Athenian leadership , as the so-called Delian League  .
The Delian League continued to campaign against  फारस  for the next three decades ,  शुरूआत  with the expulsion of the remaining Persian garrisons from Europe .
At the Battle of the Eurymedon in  466   bc  , the  लीग   जीती  a double victory that  आखिरकार  secured  स्वतंत्रता  for the  शहरों  of  ionia   .
however  ,  the  League 's involvement  in  an Egyptian revolt ( from 460–454 BC ) resulted  in  a  विनाशकारी  defeat , and further campaigning was suspended .
A fleet  थी  sent to Cyprus in  451  BC , but achieved little ,  और  when it withdrew the Greco-Persian Wars drew to a  शांत  end .
Some historical sources suggest  the  end of  hostilities  was marked by a peace  सन्धि  between Athens and  फारस  , the  so-called   सलाम  of Callias .
Hooverville near Portland , Oregon
a  `` Hooverville '' is  the   लोकप्रिय   नाम  for shanty towns built by  बेघर  people during the Great  अवसाद  .
They were named after Herbert Hoover , who  थी  President of the United States during the onset of the  अवसाद  and  widely   blamed  for  it  .
The  पद  was  coined   by   चार्ल्स  Michelson , publicity chief of the Democratic  नेशनल   कमेटी  .
Matthew Michael Hasselbeck  (  born September 25 , 1975  )  is an American football quarterback for  the  Indianapolis Colts of  the  National Football  लीग  (  एनएफएल  ) .
He was drafted in the sixth round of the  1998  NFL Draft by the  ग्रीन   खाड़ी  Packers  .
After a season  on   the  practice squad and  दो  seasons backing  up  Brett Favre ,  he  was traded to  the   सिएटल  Seahawks in 2001 .
Hasselbeck  gained  the starting  भूमिका  in 2003 , and led  सिएटल  to six playoff appearances and a Super Bowl appearance ; he was selected to  तीन  Pro Bowls and  an  All-Pro  चयन  .
Following  टेन   सीज़न  with the Seahawks ,  hasselbeck  joined the Tennessee  टाइटन्स  in 2011  .
Hasselbeck then  हस्ताक्षरित  a  अनुबंध   साथ  the Indianapolis Colts in 2013 less than 24 hours after being released by the Tennessee Titans  .
ICT is  inevitably  related  to   the  computer  संजाल  .
Information  और  Communications Technology or  (  ICT ) ,  is  often used  as  an extended synonym for information  प्रौद्योगिकी   (  IT ) ,  लकिन  is a  अधिक  specific  पद  that stresses the  भूमिका   of  unified communications  और  the integration of  दूरसंचार  ( telephone lines and wireless  सिग्नल  ) , computers as well as necessary enterprise  तन्त्र  , middleware , storage , and audio-visual  प्रणालियों  , which enable users to access  ,  store , transmit , and  हेरफेर  information .
The  phrase  ICT had been used by academic researchers since the 1980s , but it became popular after  it  was used in  a   रपट  to the UK government  by  Dennis Stevenson  in  1997 and in the revised National Curriculum  लिये  England , Wales and  उत्तरी  Ireland in 2000  .
the  term ICT is  अभी   भी  used to  refer   to  the convergence  of  audio-visual and telephone networks with computer networks through a single cabling or  कड़ी   प्रणाली   .
There are large economic incentives ( huge cost savings due to elimination of the telephone  संजाल  )  to  merge the audio-visual , building management and telephone network with the computer network  प्रणाली  using a  सिंगल  unified system of cabling  ,  signal distribution and management  .
The term Infocommunications is used in  कुछ  cases as a shorter form of information and communication ( s ) technology .
In fact Infocommunications is the expansion of telecommunications  साथ  information processing and content handling  कृत्यों  on a common digital technology base .
For  a   तुलना  of these and other terms ,  देखिए  .
For ICT Development Index around the world , see .
