A schematic presentation of  the  plum pudding model  of  the atom ; in Thomson 's  गणितीय  model the `` corpuscles '' ( or modern electrons ) were arranged  non-randomly  , in rotating  बजती
The current model of the sub-atomic structure involves a dense nucleus surrounded  by  a probabilistic `` cloud ''  of  electrons
The plum pudding  मॉडल  of  the  atom by J. J. Thomson ,  जो  discovered  the  electron  in  1897  ,   थी   प्रस्तावित  in 1904  पहले  the discovery of the atomic nucleus in order to add  the  electron  to  the atomic  मॉडल  .
in  this model ,  the  atom is  रचित  of electrons (  जिससे  Thomson still called `` corpuscles '' ,  हालांकि  G. J. Stoney  था  proposed  कि  atoms  of  electricity be called electrons in 1894  )  surrounded by a soup of positive charge to balance the electrons ' negative charges , like negatively charged `` plums `` surrounded  by  positively  चार्ज  `` pudding `` .
The  electrons   (  as we know  उन्हें  today  )  were thought to be positioned throughout  the  atom  ,   लकिन  with many structures  संभावित  for positioning multiple electrons ,  विशेषकर  rotating  बजती  of electrons ( see  नीचे  ) .
Instead of  a  soup , the atom was  भी  sometimes said  to  have had a ``  बादल  '' of  धनात्मक  charge .
With this model ,  thomson  abandoned his earlier `` nebular atom  ''  hypothesis in which the atom was composed of immaterial  vortices  .
Now  ,   at   तनिक  part  of  the atom was to be composed of  thomson   's  particulate  ऋणात्मक   corpuscles  , although the rest  of   the  positively charged part of the atom remained somewhat nebulous and  ill-defined   .
The  1904  Thomson model was disproved by  the   1909  gold foil experiment  of   hans  Geiger  और   अर्नेस्ट  Marsden  .
This was interpreted  by   अर्नेस्ट  Rutherford in 1911
to imply a very small nucleus  of  the  अणु   containing  a  बहुत  high positive charge  (  in the case of gold , enough  to  balance about 100 electrons )  ,  thus leading to the Rutherford model of  the  atom .
Although gold has an  परमाणु   क्रमांक  of 79 , immediately  बाद   रदरफोर्ड   's   पेपर  appeared in  1911  Antonius Van den Broek made the intuitive suggestion that atomic number is nuclear charge  .
The matter required experiment to decide .
हेनरी  Moseley 's work  दिखाया  experimentally in 1913 ( see Moseley  's  law ) that the effective nuclear charge  थी   बहुत  close to the atomic number ( Moseley found only one unit difference  )   ,  and Moseley referenced only  the  papers of  वैन   डेन  Broek and Rutherford  .
इस  work culminated in  the  solar-system-like ( but quantum-limited ) Bohr model of  the  atom  in  the same year , in which a  केंद्रक  containing an  परमाणु  number  of  positive charge is surrounded by an  बराबर  number of electrons  in  orbital shells .
Bohr had also  प्रेरित  Moseley 's work .
Thomson 's model was compared ( though  नहीं  by Thomson )  to  a British dessert called plum  खीर  , hence the name .
Thomson 's paper was  प्रकाशित  in the March 1904 edition of the Philosophical Magazine ,  the  leading  अंग्रेजों  science journal of the  दिन  .
In Thomson 's  दृश्य   :  ...  the  atoms of  the  elements  consist  of  a  number of negatively  electrified  corpuscles enclosed in a sphere of  वर्दी  positive electrification , ...
in  this model , the electrons were free  to   घूर्णन   भीतर  the  blob  or cloud of positive  पदार्थ   .
These orbits were stabilized  in  the model by the fact that when  an  electron moved farther from  the  center of the  धनात्मक  cloud ,  it  felt  a  larger net positive inward force , because there was  अधिक  material  of  opposite charge , inside its  कक्षा  ( see Gauss 's  विधि   )   .
In Thomson 's model , electrons were free to rotate in  बजती   जिससे   यहूद  further  stabilized  by interactions between the  electrons  ,  और  spectra were to be accounted for by energy  मतभेद  of different  रिंग  orbits .
Thomson attempted to  मेक   उसके  model account  लिये  some of the major spectral lines known for some elements ,  लकिन  was not notably successful  at  this .
Still , Thomson 's model ( along with a similar  saturnian   रिंग  model  लिये   परमाणु   electrons   ,  also put  आगे  in 1904 by  nagaoka  after James Clerk Maxwell 's model of Saturn 's  बजती  )  ,  were earlier  harbingers   of  the later and more  कामयाब  solar-system-like  bohr  model of the  अणु  .
Typical strip of  बेकन  .
Bacon  is  a cured meat prepared from a  सुअर  .
It is first cured using  विशाल  quantities of salt , either in a brine or in  a  dry  पैकिंग  ; the result  is  fresh bacon ( also  ज्ञात   as  green bacon ) .
Fresh bacon  may   तब  be further dried for weeks or months in cold air , or it may be boiled or  स्मोक्ड  .
भैस  and dried bacon is typically  पकाया  before  खाने   .
boiled  bacon  is   तैयार   to  eat , as is some smoked  बेकन  ,  लकिन   may  be cooked further before eating .
Bacon is prepared from  अनेक  different cuts of meat .
it  is usually made from  पक्ष  and back cuts of  पोर्क  , except in the United States , where  it  is almost always prepared from pork belly (  typically  referred to as `` streaky  ''  , `` fatty  ''  ,  or  ``  अमरीकी  style '' outside of the US and Canada )  .
The side cut  रै  more meat and less fat  than  the belly .
Bacon may  be  prepared from either  of   दो  distinct  वापस  cuts : fatback ,  जिससे  is  लगभग   pure  fat , and  पोर्क   loin  , which  is  very lean .
bacon-cured  pork loin is known as  वापस  bacon  .
Uncooked pork belly bacon strips .
Bacon may be eaten smoked ,  boiled  , fried ,  baked  , or grilled , or used as a minor ingredient to  स्वाद  dishes .
बेकन  is also used for barding and larding roasts , especially game , e.g  .  venison ,  pheasant  .
The word is derived from the Old High German bacho , meaning `` buttock '' ,  ``  ham  ''  or `` side of bacon '' , and cognate  साथ  the Old  फ्रेंच  bacon .
In  महाद्वीपीय  Europe  ,  this part of the pig  is  usually  नहीं  smoked like bacon  is  in the United States ; it is used primarily  in  cubes ( lardons ) as  a  cooking ingredient , valued both  as  a source of fat and for its  स्वाद  .
In Italy , this  is  called pancetta and is usually cooked in small  घन   or  served uncooked and thinly  sliced  as  भाग  of an  antipasto  .
Meat from other animals  ,  such as beef , lamb  ,  chicken , goat  ,   or   तुर्कों   ,  may also be  काटें  , cured , or otherwise  prepared  to  resemble  bacon  ,  and  may  even be  referred  to  as  ``  बेकन  ''  .
Such use is common in areas with significant Jewish and  मुस्लिम   populations   .
the  USDA defines  बेकन  as `` the  cured  belly of a swine carcass '' ; other cuts  और  characteristics  जरूर   be  separately  योग्य  ( e.g. , `` smoked pork loin  बेकन  '' ) .
लिये   सुरक्षा   ,  bacon must  be  treated  to  prevent trichinosis ,  caused  by  trichinella  , a  parasitic  roundworm which can be destroyed by  हीटिंग  , freezing , drying  ,  or smoking  .
Bacon is distinguished from salt pork and ham by differences  in  the  brine  ( or dry  पैकिंग  ) .
Bacon brine  रै  added curing ingredients ,  सबसे  notably  सोडियम  nitrite , and occasionally sodium nitrate or potassium nitrate ( saltpeter ) ; sodium ascorbate or  erythorbate  are added to accelerate curing and  stabilize  color .
Flavorings such as  भूरा  sugar or maple are used for  कुछ  products .
If  प्रयुक्त  , sodium  polyphosphates  are added to improve  sliceability  and reduce  spattering  when the  बेकन  is pan fried .
Today  ,  a brine for ham ,  लकिन  not  बेकन  , includes  a  large amount of sugar .
Historically ,  ``  ham ''  और   ``  bacon '' referred to different cuts of meat  कि  were brined or packed identically , often together in the same barrel .
The Employee Retirement Income Security  अधिनियम  of 1974 ( ERISA ) ( , codified in part at ) is a federal law which establishes  न्यूनतम  standards for pension plans  in  private industry and provides for extensive rules  on  the federal  आय  tax effects  of  transactions associated with employee benefit plans .
erisa  was  enacted  to protect the interests  of  employee benefit plan  भागीदार  and their beneficiaries by:
Requiring the disclosure of financial and  अन्य   सूचना   concerning   the  plan to beneficiaries  ;
Establishing standards of conduct for plan fiduciaries ;
providing  for appropriate  remedies  and access to  the  federal courts .
ERISA is sometimes used to refer to the  पूरा  body of laws regulating employee  लाभ  plans , which are found mainly  in   the  Internal Revenue Code and ERISA itself .
Responsibility for the interpretation and enforcement of ERISA is  विभाजित   among  the Department  of  Labor  ,  the Department of the  राजकोष  ( particularly the Internal Revenue Service ) , and the Pension Benefit  guaranty   निगम  .
Illegal immigration  to  the  संयुक्त  States  is  the act of  विदेशी  nationals entering the United  राज्य  , without government  अनुमति  and in  उल्लंघन  of United States  राष्ट्रीयता  law , or staying beyond the termination date of  a  visa , also  in  violation of the law  .
A warning  चिह्न   at  the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय   boundary   between   the  United States and Canada in Point Roberts , Washington .
A much different approach at the U.S.-Mexico border  निकट   el  Paso , Texas
the  undocumented immigrant population of  the  United States  in  2008 was estimated by the Center for Immigration Studies to be about 11 million people  ,  down from 12.5 million people  in   2007  .
Other estimates  दायरा  from 7 to 20 million .
According to a 2005  pew  Hispanic  बीच   रपट   ,  56 % of undocumented immigrants were from Mexico ; 22 % were from  अन्य  Latin American  देशों  ; 13 %  यहूद   इससे  Asia ; 6 % were  इससे  Europe and Canada ; and 3 % were  इससे  Africa and  the   बाकी  of the world .
एल्विन   स्वतंत्र  School District  is  a school  ज़िला  based in Alvin , Texas ( USA  )  .
एल्विन  ISD is a large suburban school district south of Houston in the communities of Alvin , Manvel , Pearland ,  hillcrest  , Rosharon , Iowa  उपनिवेश   ,  Liverpool ,  और  Amsterdam .
AISD serves  pearland  city 's rapidly  growing  western portion of  the  city including the new large master-planned  समुदायों  of Shadow Creek Ranch , South Fork , and  दक्षिणी   trails  .
Alvin ISD covers  of  land .
In human anatomy , the ulnar nerve is a  तंत्रिका  which  रनों  near the ulna bone .
The ulnar collateral  स्नायु  of elbow joint is  in  relation with the ulnar  तंत्रिका  .
The  तंत्रिका  is the largest unprotected nerve in  the  human body ( meaning  unprotected  by muscle or bone ) , so  चोट  is common .
इस   तंत्रिका   is  directly  कनेक्ट  to the little finger , and the adjacent half of the ring finger , supplying  the  palmar side of these fingers , including  दोनो  front and back of the tips  ,  perhaps  as  far  वापस  as  the   fingernail  beds .
One method of  injuring  the nerve is  to   स्ट्राइक  the medial epicondyle of the  humerus   इससे  posteriorly , or  inferiorly  with  the   कोहनी   flexed  .
the  ulnar nerve is trapped between the  अस्थि  and  the  overlying skin at  इस  point .
This  is  commonly referred to as  bumping  one 's  ``  funny bone ''  .
This name is thought  to  be a  pun  ,  आधारित   on   the  sound resemblance between the  नाम   of   the   अस्थि   of  the upper  भुजा  , the `` humerus  ``  and the  शब्द   ``  humorous `` .
Alternatively , according  to   the  Oxford  अंग्रेज़ी   शब्दकोष  it may refer to `` the peculiar sensation  अनुभवी  when  it  is  struck  '' .
Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and  wizardry  , shortened Hogwarts , is a fictional British  स्कूल  of  जादू  for students aged eleven  to  eighteen , and is the primary  सेटिंग   लिये  the first six books  in  J.K.  रोलिंग  's Harry Potter series .
Rowling has  सुझाया  that she may have inadvertently taken the name from the hogwort  संयंत्र   (  Croton capitatus ) , which she had seen  at   kew  Gardens some  समय  before  लिखने  the series  ,  although  the  names `` The Hogwarts '' and ``  hoggwart  '' appear  in  the 1954 Nigel Molesworth book How To Be Topp  by  Geoffrey Willans .
Hogwarts school was  voted  as the 36th best Scottish  शैक्षणिक  establishment in  a  2008 online  रैंकिंग  ,  outranking  Edinburgh 's Loretto School  .
According to a director of the Independent Schools Network Rankings  ,  it  थी  added to the schools  लिस्टिंग  ``  लिये  fun  ''   और  was then voted on  .
The U.S.  subprime  mortgage  संकट  was a set of events and  शर्तें  that led  to  a financial  संकट   और  subsequent  मंदी   कि  began in 2008 .
It was characterized by a rise in subprime  बंधक  delinquencies and foreclosures , and the resulting  मनाही  of securities backed by said mortgages .
Several major financial institutions collapsed in September  2008  , with significant disruption  in  the flow of credit to businesses and  उपभोक्ता  and the onset of a severe global recession .
There were  अनेक  causes of the  संकट  ,  साथ  commentators  assigning  different  स्तर  of blame to financial  संस्थानों  ,  regulators   ,  credit agencies  ,   सरकारी  housing policies  ,  and consumers  ,  among others .
A proximate cause was the  वृद्धि  in subprime lending .
The percentage of lower-quality subprime mortgages originated  दौरान  a  दिए   साल  rose from  the  historical 8 % or lower  दायरा   to  approximately  20  %  इससे  2004 to 2006 , with much  उच्चतर   ratios  in some parts of the U.S .
A high percentage of these  subprime  mortgages ,  over  90 % in 2006 for example , were adjustable-rate  mortgages  .
These two changes  यहूद  part of  a  broader trend of lowered lending  मानकों  and higher-risk mortgage  उत्पाद  .
Further , U.S. households had  become  increasingly indebted , with  the  ratio of debt to disposable personal income rising from 77 %  in   1990   to  127 % at the end of 2007 , much of this increase  mortgage-related  .
जब  U.S. home prices declined steeply  बाद  peaking in mid-2006 ,  borrowers  '  क्षमता  to  पुनर्वित्त  their loans  became  more  मुश्किल   .
As adjustable-rate mortgages  began   to  reset  at  higher interest rates  (  causing higher  मासिक  payments ) ,  बंधक  delinquencies soared .
Securities backed with mortgages , including subprime mortgages , widely  आयोजित  by financial firms globally  ,   खोया   सबसे   of  their  मान   .
Global  निवेशकों   भी  drastically reduced purchases of mortgage-backed debt  और  other securities as part of a decline  in  the capacity  और  willingness of the private  वित्तीय  system  to  support lending  .
Concerns about the soundness  of  U.S. credit and financial  बाज़ार  led to  tightening  credit around  the  world  और   slowing  economic growth in the U.S. and Europe .
The crisis had severe  ,  long-lasting consequences for the U.S. and  यूरोपीय   economies  .
the  U.S. entered a  गहन  recession , with  nearly  9 million jobs  खोया  during 2008  और   2009  , roughly  6  % of the workforce .
U.S. housing  कीमतें  fell nearly  30  % on  औसत  and the  u.S.   भण्डार  market fell approximately 50 % by early 2009 .
as   of   जल्दी   2013   ,  the U.S.  भण्डार  market had recovered to its pre-crisis peak but  आवास  prices remained near  उनके  low point and unemployment  remained  elevated  .
Economic growth remained below  pre-crisis   स्तर  .
Europe also continued to struggle  साथ  its own economic crisis  .
Carl Jung in  1910  .
Myers  और   briggs  extrapolated  उनके   mbti  theory from Jung 's writings  in  his book Psychological  प्रकार  .
The Myers-Briggs Type  indicator   (  MBTI  )  assessment is a  psychometric  questionnaire designed to  माप  psychological preferences in  कैसा  people perceive the world and make decisions  .
These preferences were extrapolated from  the  typological theories proposed  by  Carl Gustav Jung and first published in  उसके   1921  book  मनोवैज्ञानिक  Types (  अंग्रेज़ी  edition , 1923 )  .
Jung theorized that there are four principal psychological functions  by  which we experience the world : sensation , intuition , feeling , and thinking .
एक   of  these four functions  is  dominant most of the  समय  .
the   असली  developers of the  व्यक्तित्व   inventory  were Katharine Cook Briggs and her daughter ,  इसाबेल  Briggs Myers ; these  दो  , having studied extensively  the   कार्य  of Jung , turned their interest of human behavior into  a  devotion of turning the theory of psychological types to  व्यावहारिक  use  .
They  began  creating the indicator during  संसार  War II , believing that a knowledge of personality preferences would  सहायता   महिलाओं  who were entering the  औद्योगिक  workforce for the first time to identify the sort of war-time jobs that would  be   ``  most comfortable  और  effective '' .
The initial  प्रश्नावली  grew into the Myers-Briggs Type Indicator ,  जिससे  was first published in 1962 .
The MBTI focuses on normal populations  और  emphasizes the value of naturally occurring differences .
रॉबर्ट  Kaplan and Dennis Saccuzzo believe `` the underlying assumption of the MBTI is that we all have specific preferences  in  the way we construe  हमारी  experiences , and  ये  preferences  underlie  our interests  ,  needs , values , and motivation '' ( p. 499  )  .
`` Judas '' is a song by  अमरीकी  recording artist Lady Gaga  ,  from  उसके   दूसरी  studio album Born This Way ( 2011 ) .
It was released by Interscope  रिकॉर्ड  on April  15  , 2011  ,  four days  ahead  of its scheduled release .
Written and produced by Lady Gaga and  redone  , `` Judas ''  is  a dance and electro house song about a  स्त्री  in love with a man who  गद्दारी  her  .
it  embodies the incidents  कि  have  haunted  Gaga  in   the  past ,  और  its core meaning refers to the negative parts of  उसके  life that she ca n't  एस्केप   .
Gaga has further explained that the song was  भी  about  honoring  one  's   भीतरी  darkness  in  order to  लाओ  oneself into  the  light .
the   कलाकृति  for the single was designed by Gaga  in  Microsoft Word .
In spite of a  polarizing  impact on several  धार्मिक  groups ,  the  song was generally well received by critics ,  जो  likened  the  song  to  `` Bad Romance ``  साथ   कुछ  noting it should have been  the  album 's lead single .
The  सोंग  has a similar sound to Gaga 's  पिछला  RedOne-produced tracks , including `` Poker  फेस  `` , `` LoveGame ``  ,  ``  ख़राब  Romance '' , and  ``   alejandro   ``  .
It contains three distinct hooks and a house -influenced  ब्रेक   bas  .
Gaga explained that the lines spoken during the breakdown talk about her as beyond redemption , regarding the traditional views of  कया  a woman should be .
``  यहूदा  ''  initially  had  a  strong  बिक्री  opening  ,  but was less successful commercially  in  comparison to Gaga 's previous singles  .
The song reached the top  टेन  of the charts  in  most major music markets ,  और  also  पहुँचे  the  शीर्ष  of the  चार्ट  in  दक्षिण  Korea .
A music video for the song was  फिल्माया  in April 2011  ,   co-directed  by Gaga and Laurieann Gibson  और  co-starring Norman Reedus .
it   रै  a Biblical  कथानक  where Reedus played Judas Iscariot and Gaga played Mary Magdalene .
The video portrays them as modern day missionaries going to  जेरूसलम  .
It included the Biblical story of Judas betraying Jesus ,  और   ended  with Gaga as Magdalene getting stoned to death .
Before its release , the Catholic League condemned Gaga for the alleged  उपयोग  of  धार्मिक  imagery and her role in the  वीडियो  .
However  ,  critics generally praised the video , not  ढूंढना  any offensive content .
The video was  मनोनीत  for two awards at  the  2011 MTV Video Music Awards .
Gaga has performed ``  यहूदा  '' on  a  number of television shows  ,   सहित  The Graham Norton Show , Saturday Night  सजीव  , Good Morning Americas `` Summer Concert Series '' , the French X Factor  as  well as on The Ellen DeGeneres Show .
Marvin Gaye  (   अप्रैल  2 , 1939April 1 , 1984 )  ,  born Marvin Pentz Gay , Jr. , was an American singer-songwriter and musician .
Gaye  helped  to  आकार  the sound of  motown  Records in the  1960s  with a string of hits including `` How Sweet It Is (  to  Be Loved By You ) `` and  ``   i  Heard It Through the Grapevine ``  और  duet recordings with Mary Wells and  tammi  Terrell , later  कमाई  the titles  ``  Prince  of  Motown '' and `` Prince  of  Soul ''  .
दौरान  the 1970s , Gaye recorded  the   अवधारणा   एल्बम  What 's Going On and Let  's   मिलेंगी  It On and became among the first artists in Motown to  ब्रेक  away from  the  reins of its  उत्पादन   कम्पनी   .
Gaye 's later  रिकार्डिंग  influenced  अनेक  R &  b  subgenres such as quiet storm and neo-soul .
Following a  काल  in Europe under a  कर  exile in the  जल्दी  1980s  ,  Gaye released the 1982  ग्रैमी   award-winning  hit `` Sexual  healing   ``  and  the  Midnight Love album  .
Since his death in 1984 , Gaye  रै  been posthumously honored by many  संस्थानों  , including the Grammy  आजीवन  Achievement Award and  the  Rock and Roll Hall of Fame .
the  Academy Award for Best Picture is  एक  of the Academy Awards  of   मेरिट  presented annually by the Academy of  गति  Picture Arts  और  Sciences  (  AMPAS  )  to producers  working  in the  गति  picture industry and is  the  only category  in  which every member is eligible to  मनोनीत  for  .
Best Picture is considered  the  most important  of  the Academy Awards , as it represents all the directing , acting  ,   म्यूज़िक  composing , writing ,  संपादन   और   अन्य  efforts  put  forth into a film .
Consequently ,  बेहतरीन  Picture is the final award and the  निष्कर्ष  of the annual Academy Awards ceremony  .
The Grand  staircase   कालम  at the Dolby Theatre in Los  एंजिल्स   ,   जहाँ   the   अकादमी  Awards ceremonies have been held since  2002  , showcase every film  कि  has won the Best Picture title since the award 's  inception  85 years ago .
Heavy Rain is an interactive drama action-adventure video game created by  फ्रेंच  developer Quantic Dream exclusively for  the  PlayStation 3  .
The  खेल  is written and  निर्देशित  by  quantic  Dream 's founder  और  CEO  दाउद  Cage .
भारी  Rains  स्टोरी   is  a dramatic thriller modelled after  फिल्मी   noir  , featuring four  protagonists  involved with the mystery of the Origami Killer , a serial killer who uses  विस्तारित  periods of rainfall to  डुबो  his victims .
ethan   मंगल  is trying  to  save  उसके  son  इससे  being the next victim , while investigative journalist Madison Paige , FBI  profiler  Norman Jayden  ,  and  निजी   जासूस  Scott Shelby are each  trying  to track down clues to the Origami Killer  's  identity .
The player interacts  साथ  the game by performing actions  highlighted  on screen related to  motions  on the controller  ,  and in some cases , performing a series of quick  समय  events during fast-paced action sequences  .
the   खिलाड़ी  's decisions and actions during the game will affect  the  narrative .
the  main characters can be  मारे  , and  निश्चित  actions may lead  to   अलग  scenes and endings .
A playable  डेमो  was  released  on 11 February 2010 .
The demo was  released  prior  to  this  तिथि  for people who took part in  a  Four  दिन  Challenge on 5 February 2010 .
A patch to allow use  of  the PlayStation Move controller  to   खेल  the game was released  in  September 2010 .
Heavy Rain was critically  acclaimed  and has sold over two million copies .
It won  2010  's Game of the  साल  from CNN and Gaming Union ,  और   बेहतरीन   ps3  Game of 2010  by   gamespy  and IGN  .
A modified version of  the  game was released titled  भारी  Rain Edition Modifiée exclusively in France  ,  aimed towards a younger audience  .
In 2010 , the game was included in the book 1001 Video Games You Must Play Before You Die .
Total superannuation industry liabilities  :  members funds and reserves ( A $ millions ) since 1988 .
Annual total superannuation  उद्योग  asset growth 1996-2005 .
Superannuation in Australia  refers  to  the  arrangements which  लोगों  make in Australia to  have  funds available for them in retirement  .
In Australia  ,  superannuation arrangements are government-supported and encouraged  ,   और  minimum provisions are  अनिवार्य   लिये  employees .
For example  ,  employers are  जरूरी   to   अदा  a proportion of an  कर्मचारी  's salaries and wages (  फिलहाल  9 % ) into a superannuation fund , but people  हैं  encouraged to put aside  अतिरिक्त  funds  into  superannuation .
the  minimum obligation required  by  employers is set to increase  to  12 % gradually stepping  annually  from 2013 to 2020  .
An  व्यक्तिगत  can  withdraw  funds  आउट  of a  superannuation  fund when the person  meets  one of  the   शर्तें   of   रिलीज  contained  in  Schedule 1 of the Superannuation Industry ( Supervision  )   regulations  1994  .

Electoral College map showing the results  of  the 2012 U.S. presidential election .
President Barack Obama ( D - IL )  जीती  the  लोकप्रिय   vote  in 26 states and  the   ज़िला  of Columbia ( denoted in blue ) to capture 332 electoral votes  .
पूर्व  Governor Mitt Romney  (  R - MA ) won  the  popular  vote  in 24 states (  denoted  in red )  to  capture 206 electoral votes  .
cartogram  representation of the  चुनावी  College vote  लिये  the 2012 election , with each square representing one electoral vote .
The United States Electoral College is the institution that officially elects the President and Vice  अध्यक्ष   of  the United  राज्य   प्रत्येक   चार   सालो  .
the  President and Vice President are not elected directly  by  the  मतदाता  .
Instead ,  वे  are elected by ``  निर्वाचक  '' who are chosen by  लोकप्रिय  vote on a  state-by-state  basis  .
Electors are  apportioned  to each state and the District of Columbia , but not to  territorial   possessions   of  the  संयुक्त  States , such as Puerto  रीको  and Guam .
the  number of electors in each state is equal  to  the number of  सदस्यों  of Congress to which  the  state is entitled .
The Twenty-third Amendment has always resulted in the  ज़िला  of Columbia  having  three  निर्वाचक   .
There are 538 electors ,  आधारित  on there being 435  प्रतिनिधि  and 100  सीनेटरों  , plus the three electors from the District of Columbia .
Electors are  pledged  to particular presidential and  वाइस  presidential candidates , though  unpledged   निर्वाचक  are  संभावित   .
in  all states ,  मगर  Maine and Nebraska , electors are elected  on   a  `` winner-take-all '' basis .
That is , all electors pledged to the presidential candidate  जो  wins the most votes in  a  state become electors for that  राज्य  .
maine  and Nebraska use  the   ``   congressional  district method '' , selecting one elector within each  congressional  district by popular vote and  selecting  the  बाकी  two  निर्वाचक  by a statewide popular  vote  .
Although no elector is required by  संघीय  law to honor  a   प्रतिज्ञा  , there have only  महरूम  very few occasions when an  elector  voted contrary to a pledge .
The Twelfth Amendment specifies how a President and Vice President are elected and  requires  each elector to cast one vote for President and  another  vote for Vice  अध्यक्ष  .
Critics argue that the Electoral College  is  inherently undemocratic and gives swing states disproportionate influence in electing the President  और  Vice  अध्यक्ष   .
The Electoral College gives a numeric advantage  in  the election of  the  president to the smaller  राज्य  , as the minimum  क्रमांक  of  निर्वाचक   लिये  the  छोटी  states  is  three compared to one  लिये   the  election  of   प्रतिनिधि  .
On the  अन्य  hand  ,  the winner-take-all method of  मतदान   favors  the larger states .
A number of constitutional amendments  have  been proposed seeking  to  alter the  चुनावी   कॉलेज   or   बदलें  it with a direct popular  vote  .
Barack Hussein  ओबामा  II ( ; born August 4  ,  1961 )  is   the  44th and current President of the  संयुक्त  States , the  पहला  African American to hold the office .
Born in Honolulu  ,  Hawaii , Obama is a graduate  of  Columbia University and Harvard Law School , where he was  अध्यक्ष  of  the   हार्वर्ड  Law  पुनर्विलोकन  .
He was a community  आयोजक  in Chicago before earning his law degree  .
He worked  as  a civil rights  attorney  in  शिकागो  and taught  संवैधानिक  law  at  the University of Chicago Law School from  1992   to  2004 .
he   परोसा  three terms representing the 13th District in the Illinois Senate  इससे  1997 to  2004  ,  कार्यशील   unsuccessfully  for the  संयुक्त   राज्य  House of  प्रतिनिधि  in 2000 .
in   2004  , Obama received national attention during his campaign to represent  इलिनोइस  in the United States Senate with his victory  in   the  March Democratic  पार्टी   प्राथमिक   ,  his keynote address at the  लोकतांत्रिक   नेशनल  Convention in July ,  और   उसके  election to the Senate in November .
He began  उसके  presidential campaign in 2007 ,  और  in 2008  ,  after  a   बंद  primary campaign against Hillary Rodham Clinton  ,  he won sufficient delegates in the Democratic Party primaries to receive the presidential  नामांकन  .
he  then defeated Republican  nominee  John McCain in the  सामान्य  election  ,  and was inaugurated  as   अध्यक्ष  on January 20 , 2009 .
नौ  months later  ,   ओबामा   थी  named  the  2009 Nobel  सलाम   पुरस्कार  laureate .
he  was re-elected president in November  2012  , defeating Republican nominee Mitt Romney , and  थी  sworn in for a second  पद  on January 20 , 2013 .
Early in his first term in  दफ्तर  ,  ओबामा  signed into law economic stimulus legislation in response  to  the Great Recession in the form  of  the  अमरीकी  Recovery and Reinvestment Act  of  2009 and  the  Tax Relief , Unemployment Insurance Reauthorization ,  और  Job Creation  अधिनियम  of 2010 .
Other major domestic  पहलों  in his presidency include the Patient  सुरक्षा  and Affordable Care  अधिनियम   ,  often referred to as `` Obamacare  ''   ;   the  Dodd–Frank Wall  गली  Reform and Consumer Protection Act ;  the  Do n't Ask , Do n't Tell Repeal Act of 2010 ; the Budget Control Act  of  2011 ;  और  the American Taxpayer  राहत   अधिनियम  of  2012   .
In May 2012 , he became the first sitting U.S. president  to  publicly  support   same-sex  marriage and in 2013 his  प्रशासन  filed  briefs  which urged the Supreme Court to rule in favor of same-sex couples in two high-profile  मामले  .
In foreign policy , Obama ended U.S. military involvement in  the  Iraq War , increased troop levels in  अफगानिस्तान  , signed the New START arms control treaty with Russia , ordered  u.S.   सैन्य   भागीदारी  in  लीबिया  ,  और  ordered  the   सैन्य  operation that  resulted  in  the  death of Osama bin Laden  .
the   होंडा  CBR1100XX  सुपर  Blackbird was  a  Honda motorcycle made from 1996 to 2007 .
The bike was developed to challenge the Kawasaki Ninja ZX-11 as the world 's  तीव्रतम  production motorcycle ,  और  Honda succeeded with a top  गति  of .
Two  सालो  later the title passed to the Suzuki Hayabusa , which reached  .
The Blackbird is  नामित  after  the  Lockheed  sr-71  , also a speed record holder  .
नमूना   दृश्य  of  an   इलेक्ट्रॉनिक  health record based on images
Sample view of an electronic health record
An electronic health  रिकार्ड  ( EHR  )   is  an evolving  अवधारणा  defined as a systematic collection of electronic health information about individual patients or populations .
It is  a  record  in  digital format that is theoretically capable of  होने  shared across  अलग  health care settings .
In some cases this sharing can occur by way  of  network-connected  enterprise-wide   सूचना  systems and other information networks or  exchanges  .
EHRs may include a range  of  data  ,  including demographics , medical history  ,  medication  और  allergies  ,  immunization  औकात  , laboratory test results  ,  radiology images , vital signs , personal stats  जैसे  age  और  weight , and billing information .

the  Rime of the Ancient  मेरिनर  (  originally  The Rime of the Ancyent  marinere  ) is the longest major  कविता  by the English poet  सैमुएल  Taylor  कॉलरिज  , written  in  1797–98 and published in 1798  in  the first edition  of   गीतात्मक  Ballads  .
Modern editions use  a  later revised version  मुद्रित  in 1817  कि  featured a gloss .
Along  साथ  other poems in Lyrical Ballads  ,  it was a signal  शिफ़्ट   to  modern poetry and the beginning of British  रोमांटिक  literature .
a  proxy auto-config ( PAC  )  file defines how web browsers and other user agents can  automatically  choose the appropriate proxy  सर्वर   (  access method )  लिये   fetching  a  दिए  URL  .
A PAC file  contains  a  जावास्क्रिप्ट  function “FindProxyForURL ( url  ,  host ) ” .
इस  function returns a string  साथ  one or more access method specifications  .
These specifications cause the user agent  to   उपयोग  a particular proxy  सर्वर  or to  कनेक्ट  directly .
अनेक  specifications  provide  a fall-back when a proxy  fails   to   respond   .
The browser fetches  इस  PAC file before requesting other URLs .
the  URL of the PAC file is  either  configured manually  or  determined automatically by the Web  प्रॉक्सी  Autodiscovery Protocol .
Zendaya Coleman ( born September 1 , 1996  )  , known mononymously as  zendaya  , is an American actress , singer  और   नर्तकी   .
she stars on  the  Disney Channel sitcom Shake  it  Up as  रॉकी  Blue .
She has starred in two  films  and played one of the lead roles in the film Frenemies  as  Halley  ब्रैंडन  .
She voiced Fern in the  pixie  Hollow  खेल  .
She  appeared  in Good Luck Charlie as Rocky Blue  और  in a Good Luck Charlie and Shake It Up  क्रॉसओवर   शीर्षक  Charlie Shake It Up .
She appeared on PrankStars as herself in the  एपीसोड  `` Walk The Prank  ''  and on A.N.T . Farm  as  Sequoia Jones  in  the  एपीसोड  `` Creative ConsultANT  .   ''
Zendaya is also a musician .
She  हस्ताक्षरित   a   सौदे  with Hollywood Records on August 8 , 2012 and started recording songs for her debut album on August  12   ,  2012 .
She released a  सिंगल   इससे   an  independent  लेबल  called `` Swag  it  Out `` and  another  single with Bella  thorne   पुकारा  `` Watch Me , '' which is featured on the Break It Down album .
On March 20 , 2012 ,  zendaya   और  Bella Thorne  released  an album together called Shake It Up : Live  2  Dance ,  प्रत्येक  have their own song on it , along with a mash-up of both songs together  as  one .

This  is  a list of airports in Pennsylvania ( a  u.S.  state  )  ,  grouped  by type and sorted by location .
It  contains  all public-use and  सैन्य  airports in the state .

iOS  (  previously iPhone  os  ) is a  मोबाईल  operating system  विकसित  and distributed  by  Apple  inc  .  originally  released  in  2007 for the iPhone and iPod  टच  platforms , it has  महरूम   विस्तारित   to  support  अन्य   ठहराना  devices such as the  ipad  and  ठहराना  TV  .
Unlike  microsoft  's Windows  फोन  and Google 's Android ,  ठहराना  does not license  आईओएस   लिये  installation on  non-apple  hardware .
, Apple 's App Store  contained  more than  700,000  iOS applications , which have collectively been downloaded more than 30 billion times .
It had a 21 % share  of  the smartphone  मोबाईल  operating  प्रणाली  units shipped in the fourth quarter of 2012 , behind only  google  's Android .
In June 2012 , it accounted for 65  %  of mobile web  आंकड़ा  consumption ( including use  on  both the iPod Touch and the iPad ) .
at  the half of 2012 , there were 410 million devices activated .
According to the special media  इवेंट  held  by  Apple on September 12 , 2012 , 400 million  डिवाइस  have been  बेची   through  June 2012 .
the  user  इंटरफ़ेस  of iOS is based on the concept  of  direct manipulation  ,  using multi-touch gestures .
इंटरफ़ेस   कंट्रोल  elements consist of  sliders  , switches ,  और  buttons .
Interaction with the  os  includes gestures  ऐसे  as swipe , tap ,  पिंच  , and reverse pinch , all of which have  विशिष्ट  definitions  भीतर  the context of the iOS operating system and its  multi-touch  interface  .
Internal  accelerometers  are  प्रयुक्त  by some applications to  respond  to shaking the device  (  one common result is the undo command ) or rotating it in three dimensions ( one common result is switching from portrait  to  landscape mode  )   .
iOS is  निकला  from OS X , with which it shares  the  Darwin foundation .
iOS is Apple 's mobile version of the OS X operating system used on  ठहराना   कंप्यूटर  .
in  iOS , there  हैं  four  abstraction  layers : the Core  os   परत  , the Core Services layer ,  the   मीडिया  layer  ,  and the  cocoa  Touch layer .
The  वर्तमान   संस्करण  of the operating system  (  iOS 6.1.3 ) dedicates 1-1.5 GB of the device 's flash memory  लिये   the  system partition , using roughly 800 MB of that  विभाजन  ( varying  by   मॉडल  ) for iOS itself .
iOS  फिलहाल   रनों  on  iphone  , iPad , iPod touch and Apple TV .

a  spoiler is  an  automotive aerodynamic device  जिनकी  intended  डिज़ाइन  function is  to  'spoil ' unfavorable  एयर   गति  across a  देह   of  a  गाडी   in  motion , usually  वर्णित  as turbulence or drag  .
विघ्न  on the front  of  a  गाडी  are often called air dams ,  क्युकी  in addition to  directing   एयर  flow they  भी   reduce   the  amount of air flowing underneath the  गाडी   जिससे  generally reduces aerodynamic lift and drag .
Spoilers are often fitted  to  race and high-performance sports cars , although they have  become  common  on  passenger vehicles as well .
Some spoilers are added to cars primarily  लिये  styling purposes and  have  either little  aerodynamic   लाभ  or even make the aerodynamics worse .
Spoilers for cars are often incorrectly confused with , or the term used  interchangeably  with , wings  .
Automotive wings are devices whose intended design is to generate  downforce  as  एयर  passes around  उन्हें  , not simply disrupt existing airflow patterns .
मारियो  , who serves  as   निन्टेंडो  's mascot  ,  is a fictional  अक्षर  created  by  game designer Shigeru  miyamoto  and voiced by Charles Martinet .
This  is  a list of video games where  the  character  मारियो  plays a  भाग   ,  either as the protagonist  ,  antagonist , supporting character  ,  as part of an ensemble cast ,  as  a  कैमियो  ,  or  in a game within a game .
it  does not include  सरल   सन्दर्भ  to the  अक्षर  , such  as  the portraits of Mario found in The Legend of Zelda : A  कड़ी  to the Past .
the   साल   indicated  is the year the game was first released  ,  most commonly in Japan ; games were sometimes  released  years later in other regions of the  संसार  .
The list includes ports , remakes and compilations .
It does n't include any  आभासी  Console re-releases .
``  Man  of  Constant Sorrow ''  (  also  ज्ञात  as `` I Am A Man of Constant  विषाद  ''  )   is  a traditional American folk song first  अंकित  by Dick  burnett  , a partially blind fiddler from Kentucky  .
The song was  originally  recorded by Burnett as `` Farewell  सोंग  '' printed  in  a Richard Burnett songbook , circa 1913 .
An early version was recorded by Emry Arthur in 1928 ( Vocalion  vo  5208  )  .
Public interest in the  सोंग  was renewed after the release of the 2000 film O Brother  ,   जहाँ  Art Thou ?
, as it plays  a  central role in the film 's plot .
The song  थी  also  शामिल  in  the   फिल्मी   's  highly successful  ,  multiple-platinum selling soundtrack  .
Josephson  जंक्शन  array chip developed by the National  ब्यूरो  of Standards as a  मानक  volt
The volt ( symbol  :   v  ) is the  si   निकला  unit for  इलेक्ट्रिक  potential (  वोल्टेज  ) , electric  संभावित  difference ,  और  electromotive force .
the  volt is named in honor of the Italian physicist Alessandro Volta ( 1745–1827  )  , who invented  the  voltaic pile  ,  possibly the first chemical battery .
A  प्लैक  commemorating the location of the Sarajevo assassination and steps  of  Gavrilo Princip ( image  लिया  in 1987 , before steps were removed in 1992 and plaque changed from Cyrillic to Latin script )
a  plaque commemorating the  स्थान  of the Sarajevo assassination ( image taken in 2009 )
on  28 June 1914 , Archduke Franz  फर्डिनेंड  of Austria , heir presumptive to the Austro-Hungarian throne  ,  and his  बीवी   ,  Sophie , Duchess of Hohenberg  ,  were shot dead in Sarajevo , by Gavrilo Princip , one of a  समूह  of six Bosnian  serb   हत्यारे  coordinated by Danilo Ilić .
the  political objective of the assassination was  to  break off  austria-hungary  's south-Slav  प्रांतों  so they could  be  combined into a Greater Serbia or a Yugoslavia .
The assassins  '   motives   यहूद  consistent with the movement that later became known as  यंग  Bosnia  .
सर्बियाई  military officers stood behind  the  attack .
At the top of these Serbian military conspirators was Chief of Serbian Military  प्रज्ञा  Dragutin Dimitrijević , his righthand man  प्रमुख  Vojislav Tankosić , and Masterspy Rade Malobabić .
Major Tankosić armed the  हत्यारे  with bombs and pistols and trained  उन्हें  .
the  assassins were given access to the same  clandestine  tunnel  of  safe-houses and agents that Rade Malobabić used for the infiltration of  हथियार  and operatives into Austria-Hungary .
The assassins , the key members of  the  clandestine tunnel ,  और  the key  सर्बियाई  military conspirators who were  स्टिल   जिंदा  were  गिरफ्तार   ,  tried , convicted and punished .
Those who were arrested  in   बोस्निया  were tried in Sarajevo  in   अक्तूबर  1914 .
The other conspirators  यहूद  arrested and tried before a Serbian kangaroo court on the  french-controlled   salonika  Front in 1916–1917 on unrelated false charges ; Serbia executed three  of  the top  सैन्य  conspirators .
Much of what is known about the  assassinations  comes from these two trials and related records .
Assignment of responsibility for the bombing and murders of 28  जून  is highly controversial because the  आक्रमण   led   to  the  outbreak  of  संसार  War I  एक  month later .
मिशन   सैन  Juan Capistrano was a  स्पेनी  mission in Southern California , located in present-day San Juan Capistrano  .
It was  संस्थापित  on All  संतो  ' Day November 1 , 1776 ,  by  Spanish Catholics  of   the  Franciscan Order .
Named  लिये  Giovanni  da   capistrano  , a  15th  century theologian and ``  योद्धा  priest '' who resided in  the  Abruzzo region of Italy , San  जुआन  Capistrano has the distinction of being home  to  the oldest building in California  स्टिल  in use , a chapel built in 1782 .
Known alternately as  ``  Serra 's  चैपल  ''  और   ``  Father Serra 's  गिरिजाघर  , ''  it  is the only extant structure  जहाँ  it has been  प्रलेखित   कि  the padre Junipero Serra celebrated mass .
One  of  the best known of the  alta   कैलिफ़ोर्निया  missions ( and  एक  of  the   few  missions to have actually been founded twice—others being Mission San Gabriel Arcángel  और  Mission La Purísima Concepción  )  .
The site was originally  consecrated   on  October 30 , 1775  ,  by Father  fermín  Lasuén ,  लकिन  was quickly abandoned due to  अशांति  among the  स्वदेशी  population in San  डिएगो  .
the  success of  the  settlement is evident  in  its historical records  .
Prior to the arrival  of  the missionaries , some 550 natives were scattered throughout the  लोकल  area  .
By 1790 ,  the  number of  परिवर्तित  Christians had  grown  to  700  , and  बस   छह  years later nearly 1,000 ``  neophytes  `` ( recent  converts   )  lived in or around the Mission compound  .
1,649 baptisms were conducted that year alone  ,  out of  the  total 4,639  souls  converted between  1776  and  1847  .
अधिक  than 2,000 former inhabitants  (  mostly Juaneño Indians ) are buried in unmarked  क़ब्रों   in  the Mission 's cemetery  (   campo  santo ) .
The remains of Father ( later  monsignor  ) St.  जॉन  O'Sullivan , who recognized the property 's historic value and working tirelessly to conserve and rebuild its  structures  , are buried at the entrance to the cemetery on the west side of the property , and a statue raised in his  सम्मान  stands at  the  head of the crypt .
The surviving chapel also serves  as   the   फाइनल   resting  place of three padres who passed on  जबकि  serving at the Mission : Fathers José  barona  , Vicente  fustér  , and Vicente  पास्कुआल   oliva   हैं  all entombed beneath the sanctuary floor .
the   criolla  or `` Mission grape , '' was first planted at  सैन  Juan Capistrano in 1779 ; in  1783   ,  the  पहला  wine produced in Alta California emerged from the Mission 's winery  .
The  मिशन  entered a long period of  क्रमिक  decline after secularization in 1833 .
Numerous efforts  यहूद  made over the years to restore the Mission to its former  महिमा  , but none  मिले  with great success  जबतक  the arrival of  पिता  O'Sullivan in 1910 .
Restoration efforts  continue   ,  and  ``  Serra 's Chapel '' is still used for religious services .
About half-a-million  विज़िटर  , including 80,000 school  children  , come  to  the Mission each  साल  .
और  while the ruins of `` The Great Stone  गिरिजाघर   ''  ( which was all but leveled by an 1812 earthquake ) are  a  renowned architectural wonder  ,  the  मिशन  is perhaps best known for the  सालाना  `` Return of the  दात  '' which is traditionally  observed  every March  19  (  संत   जोसेफ  's Day ) .
Mission San Juan Capistrano has served as a  पसंदीदा   विषय   लिये  many notable artists , and has been immortalized  in  literature and on film numerous times , perhaps more than any other mission .
In 1984 , a modern church complex was  constructed  just north and west of the Mission compound and is now known as Mission Basilica San Juan Capistrano  .
Today , the mission compound  serves  as a museum , with  the  Serra Chapel within the compound serving as  a   चैपल   लिये   the   मिशन  parish .
बेहतर   बंद   मुर्दे   is  a 1985  अमरीकी  teen romantic comedy  फिल्मी  starring John Cusack and written and directed by Savage Steve Holland .
It tells the story of high  स्कूल   छात्र  Lane Myer  जो  is suicidal  बाद  his girlfriend  ब्रेक  up with  उसे  .
Mercedes-Benz  superdome   (  originally Louisiana Superdome  और  commonly The Superdome )  is   a  sports and exhibition stadium , located  in   the  Central Business District of New Orleans ,  louisiana  , USA .
योजनाएँ  were drawn up  in  1967 ,  by  the New Orleans modernist architectural firm of Curtis and Davis .
Its steel  फ़्रेम  covers a expanse .
इसके   गुम्बद  is made of  a  Lamella multi-ringed  फ़्रेम   और   रै  a diameter of , making it the  largest  fixed domed structure in the world .
It is home to the NFL  's  New Orleans Saints , the NCAA  's  Division I-A  tulane   ग्रीन  Wave football team ( the largest football stadium in Conference USA )  ,   the  State  फार्म  Bayou Classic , the R+L Carriers New Orleans  कटोरी  ,  the  Allstate Sugar Bowl and , every  चौथी  year ,  the  BCS National Championship  खेल  .
Because of  the  size and location in one of the  प्रमुख  tourist destinations  in  the United States , the Superdome routinely makes the `` short list '' of  उम्मीदवार  being considered for  प्रमुख  sporting events  ,  such as  the  Super Bowl  और  the Final Four .
in  2005 , the Superdome  gained  international  ध्यान  of a different type  जब  it  housed  thousands of people  seeking  shelter from Hurricane  कैटरीना  .
The building suffered extensive damage as a result of the storm  ,   और  was closed  लिये  many  महीने  afterward  .
On  अक्तूबर  3 , 2011  ,   it  was announced  कि  German automaker Mercedes-Benz purchased  नामकरण  rights to  the  stadium .
the  new name took effect on October  23   ,  2011 .
It is the third stadium that has  नामकरण  rights from  mercedes-benz  ( and first  in  the  संयुक्त  States )  ,  after the Mercedes-Benz Arena ,  the  stadium of  bundesliga  club VfB Stuttgart  ,  in Stuttgart ,  जर्मनी  and the Mercedes-Benz Arena in  शंघाई  ,  चीन  .
