Disney 's  एनिमल  Kingdom Lodge  is  an  african-themed   डीलक्स   रिज़ॉर्ट  at the Walt Disney World Resort .
It opened on  अप्रैल  16 , 2001  .
The resort is  स्वामित्व  and  संचालित  by Walt Disney  पार्क  and Resorts .
Disney 's Animal Kingdom Lodge is located in  the   एनिमल  Kingdom Resort  क्षेत्रफल  , adjacent to Disney 's Animal Kingdom .
It gives guests the  अवसर  to view grazing wildlife outside their rooms and public areas  in  the resort within proximity of the animals , conveying the  अहसास  of being in an African savanna .
The People 's  पार्टी  , also known as the `` Populists '' ,  थी  a short-lived political party in  the   संयुक्त  States established in 1891 during the Populist movement ( United  राज्य  , 19th  सदी  ) .
It was most important in 1892-96 , and then rapidly faded away .
Based among poor , white cotton farmers in the South ( especially North Carolina , Alabama , and Texas ) and  hard-pressed  wheat farmers in the  मैदान  states ( especially Kansas and Nebraska ) , it represented a radical crusading  रूप  of agrarianism and hostility to banks , railroads , and  elites  generally .
it   sometimes  formed coalitions with  मजदूर  unions ,  और  in 1896 the Democrats endorsed their presidential nominee , William Jennings Bryan .
The terms `` populist '' and `` populism ``  हैं  commonly used for anti-elitist appeals in opposition to established interests and mainstream parties .
Linguistic map of Nigeria , Cameroon , and Benin .
Sign in  अंग्रेज़ी  ,  बाहर   the  University of Lagos
वहीँ  are hundreds of languages spoken in Nigeria .
the   प्रमुख  languages are Yoruba  ,  Hausa , Igbo , Edo ,  fulfulde  ,  कनूरी   ,  and Ibibio .
The official language of Nigeria , English , the former colonial language  ,  was chosen to facilitate the cultural and linguistic  एकता  of the country  .
English  ,  however  ,  remains an exclusive  बचाना  of the  देश  's urban elite , and  is  not widely spoken in rural areas , which comprise three quarters of the countries population .
Nigeria 's  भाषाई  diversity is a microcosm  of  Africa as a whole , encompassing  तीन  major African languages  परिवारों  : Afroasiatic , Nilo-Saharan , and Niger–Congo .
सीरियल  also has several as-yet unclassified languages , such as Cen Tuum  ,   जिससे  may represent a  relic  of an even greater  विविधता  prior to the spread of the  वर्तमान  language families .
A series of  कार्यक्रम  led  to  the  आक्रमण  on Pearl Harbor  .
युद्ध  between Japan and the United States had been a  सम्भावना  that  प्रत्येक  nation  's  military forces planned for since the  1920s  , though real tension did not begin  जबतक  the 1931 invasion  of  Manchuria  by   जापानी   .
Over the  अगला  decade , Japan expanded  धीरे  into China , leading to  सब  out war  between  the two in 1937  .
In 1940 Japan invaded  फ्रेंच  Indochina in an effort to embargo all imports into China  ,  including war supplies purchased from  the  U.S .
This  मूव  prompted  the   संयुक्त  States  to  embargo  सब   आयल  exports , leading the Imperial  जापानी  Navy  to   अनुमान   कि  it had less than two years of bunker oil remaining and to support  the  existing plans to seize  आयल  resources in the  डच  East Indies  .
Planning had been  underway   लिये  some  समय  on an attack on the `` Southern Resource Area ''  to  add it to  the   वृहद  East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere that Japan  envisioned  in the  प्रशांत  .
The Philippine islands , at that time  an  American territory , were also a Japanese target .
The Japanese military concluded that an invasion of the Philippines  होता   provoke   an  American military response .
Rather  than  seize and fortify  the  islands , and wait for the inevitable US counterattack , Japan  's  military leaders instead  decided  on the pre-emptive  पर्ल  Harbor attack , which they assumed  होता   negate   the  American forces needed for the liberation and reconquest of the islands .
नियोजन  for the attack had  begun  in very early  1941  , by  admiral  Isoroku Yamamoto .
He  आखिरकार  won  assent  from  the  Naval High Command by  ,  among other things , threatening  to  resign .
the  attack was  स्वीकृत   in  the  गर्मियाँ  at  an  Imperial Conference and again at a second  सम्मेलन   in  the fall .
simultaneously  over the year , pilots  यहूद  trained , and  जहाजों   prepared  for its execution  .
Authority for the  आक्रमण  was  granted  at the  दूसरी  Imperial Conference if a diplomatic result satisfactory to Japan was  नहीं   पहुँचे  .
After final approval by Emperor Hirohito the order to attack was issued at the beginning of December .
A common office stapler
a  common school  stapler
a  stapler is a mechanical  यंत्र   कि   joins   चादरें   of  paper or similar material by driving a thin metal staple through  the  sheets and folding the ends .
staplers  are widely used in government  ,  business , offices , homes and schools .
The word `` stapler '' can actually refer to  a  number of different devices of varying uses  .
In addition to joining paper sheets together , staplers can also be  प्रयुक्त  in a  सर्जिकल  setting to join tissue together with surgical staples to close a surgical wound  (   much  in the  वही   रास्ता  as stitches or sutures ) .
Typically , most  staplers  are  प्रयुक्त  to join multiple  चादरें  of paper .
Paper staplers come in two distinct types : manual and electric .
हस्तचालित  staplers  हैं   सामान्यतः  hand-held ,  हालांकि  models that are used while set on a desk or  अन्य   सतह  are not uncommon .
Electric staplers exist in a variety of different designs and  मॉडल   .
Their primary operating function is to join large numbers of paper sheets together in rapid succession  .
Some electric staplers can  जुड़ें  up to  20  sheets at  a  time  .
Swallowing  ,  known scientifically  as  deglutition  ,  is the process in the human or animal body that  makes  something pass from the  मुँह  ,  to  the pharynx , and into the esophagus , while  shutting   the   epiglottis  .
If this  fails  and the object goes  through   the  trachea ,  तब  choking or  pulmonary   aspiration  can  occur  .
In the human body it is controlled  by  the swallowing reflex .
thaddeus  Stevens ( April 4 , 1792  –   अगस्त  11  ,  1868 ) ,  of   पेन्सिलवेनिया  , was a leader of the Radical  रिपब्लिकन  faction of  the  Republican  पार्टी  and a  fierce  opponent  of  slavery  .
He was one of  the  most influential members in the history of  कॉंग्रेस   .
As  अध्यक्ष  of the powerful House Ways and Means Committee ,  स्टीवंस  , a  witty  ,  व्यंग्यात्मक  speaker and flamboyant party leader  ,  dominated the  हाउस   इससे  1861 until his  मौत  .
He wrote much of the financial  विधान  that  सशुल्क   लिये  the American Civil War .
Stevens and Senator Charles  sumner  were the prime leaders of the Radical Republicans during  the  war and Reconstruction  era  .
Scholarly  दृश्य  of Stevens  have   swung  sharply since his death  as  interpretations of Reconstruction have changed .
इतिहासकारों   of  the Dunning School  (  1890s–1940s )  आयोजित  Stevens responsible  लिये   demanding  harsh treatment of  the  white South and violating American traditions  of  republicanism , depicting Stevens as a villain for his  वकालत  of harsh measures  in  the South such as disfranchising all ex-Confederates .
इस  highly negative characterization held sway into the 1950s .
The rise  of  the  neo-abolitionist  school in  the  1950s led to  a  strong positive appreciation of Stevens ' work on civil rights for  freedmen   .
A recent biographer characterizes him  as  ,  ``  The Great  commoner   ,  savior of free public education in Pennsylvania , national Republican leader in  the  struggles  विरूद्ध  slavery in the  संयुक्त  States and intrepid mainstay of the attempt to secure racial justice for the Freedmen during Reconstruction , the only member of the House of Representatives ever to have  महरूम  known as the 'dictator ' of Congress . ''
Overview of the translation of eukaryotic messenger RNA
Diagram  प्रर्दशित  the translation of mRNA and the synthesis of proteins  by  a ribosome
In molecular biology  और  genetics ,  अनुवाद  is the process  through  which cellular ribosomes manufacture  प्रोटीन  .
It is part of the process of gene expression .
in  translation , messenger RNA ( mRNA  )   उत्पादित  by transcription is decoded by the ribosome to produce  a   विशिष्ट  amino  एसिड  chain  ,  or polypeptide  ,  that  होगा  later fold into an  क्रियाशील   प्रोटीन  .
In bacteria , translation occurs in the cell 's cytoplasm , where the large and  छोटी  subunits  of  the ribosome are located , and bind  to  the  mrna  .
In  eukaryotes  ,  अनुवाद  occurs across the membrane  of  the endoplasmic  reticulum   in   a  process called vectorial  संश्लेषण  .
The ribosome facilitates decoding by  inducing  the  बाइंडिंग   of  tRNAs with complementary anticodon sequences  to  that of the mRNA .
The tRNAs carry specific amino acids that are chained  साथ   into  a polypeptide as the mRNA passes  through  and is  ``  read '' by the ribosome  in  a fashion reminiscent to that of a stock ticker  और  ticker tape .
In many instances , the entire ribosome/mRNA complex binds to  the  outer membrane of  the  rough endoplasmic reticulum and  रिलीज  the nascent protein polypeptide inside for later  vesicle  transport and secretion outside  of  the cell .
Many types of transcribed RNA , such  as   ट्रांसफ़र  RNA , ribosomal RNA ,  और  small nuclear RNA , do  नहीं  undergo  अनुवाद  into  प्रोटीन  .
Translation proceeds in four phases : initiation , elongation , translocation and termination ( all describing the growth of the amino acid chain , or  polypeptide   कि  is the product of translation ) .
Amino acids are brought  to  ribosomes  और  assembled into proteins .
in  activation , the correct amino acid is covalently bonded to the correct transfer RNA ( tRNA ) .
The  अमीनो  acid is joined  by   इसके  carboxyl  समूह  to the  3  ' OH of the  trna  by an ester bond  .
जब  the  trna  has an amino acid linked to it , it  is  termed ``  चार्ज   ''  .
Initiation involves the  छोटी  subunit of  the   राइबोसोम  binding  to  the 5 ' end of  mrna  with the help of initiation factors (  if   )  .
Termination  of  the polypeptide happens when  the  A site of  the  ribosome faces  a  stop  codon  (  uaa   ,  UAG , or UGA ) .
no  tRNA can  recognize  or bind to this codon .
Instead  ,  the stop codon induces the  बाइंडिंग  of a release  फ़ैक्टर  protein  कि   prompts  the disassembly of the entire ribosome/mRNA  जटिल   .
A number of antibiotics act  by  inhibiting translation  ;  these include anisomycin ,  cycloheximide  , chloramphenicol , tetracycline , streptomycin  ,  erythromycin  ,  and puromycin , among  अन्य  .
Prokaryotic ribosomes  have  a different structure from  कि  of eukaryotic ribosomes  ,  and thus antibiotics can specifically target bacterial infections without  कोई   detriment   to  a eukaryotic host  's  cells .
a  multimedia message on a  मोबाईल  phone .
Multimedia Messaging Service ( MMS  )  is a standard way to send  संदेश  that include multimedia content  to  and from mobile phones .
It extends the core  sms  ( Short  संदेश  Service )  काबिलियत  that allowed exchange of  टेक्स्ट  messages only up to 160 characters  in  length .
the  most popular use is to  भेजें  photographs  इससे  camera-equipped  handsets  , although it  is  also popular as  a  method of delivering  न्यूज  and entertainment content including videos , pictures , text pages and ringtones .
The standard is developed by the Open  मोबाईल  Alliance (  ओमो  ) , although during development it was part of the 3GPP and WAP groups .
Smallpox  थी  an infectious disease unique to humans , caused by  either  of two virus variants , Variola  प्रमुख   और  Variola minor .
The disease  is  also known by the Latin names Variola or Variola vera  ,  derived from varius  (  ``  spotted  '' ) or varus ( ``  मुंहासे  '' ) .
The disease was originally known  in   अंग्रेज़ी  as the `` pox '' or  ``   रेड  plague  ''  ; the  पद  ``  smallpox  '' was first used in Britain  in  the 15th century to distinguish variola from the `` great pox  ''  ( syphilis ) .
The last naturally occurring case of smallpox ( Variola minor ) was diagnosed  on   26  October 1977 .
Smallpox localized  in   छोटी  blood vessels  of   the  skin and in the mouth and throat .
In the skin it resulted in a characteristic maculopapular rash and , later ,  उठाया  fluid-filled  फफोले  .
V. major  produces  a more serious  बीमारी  and  रै  an  overall  mortality rate of  30–35  %  .
V. minor causes a milder form  of  disease ( also  ज्ञात  as alastrim , cottonpox  ,   milkpox  , whitepox ,  और  Cuban itch  )  which kills  परिचय  1 % of its victims  .
Long-term complications  of   V.  major infection include characteristic  scars  , commonly  on  the  फेस  , which occur in 65–85 % of survivors .
Blindness resulting from corneal ulceration and scarring , and  limb  deformities due to arthritis  और   osteomyelitis  are less common  जटिलताओं  , seen in about 2–5 %  of  cases .
Smallpox  is   believed  to have emerged in human populations about  10,000  BC .
The earliest physical evidence of it is probably the pustular rash on the mummified body  of  Pharaoh Ramses V  of  Egypt .
the   बीमारी  killed an estimated  400,000  Europeans annually during  the  closing years of the 18th century ( including five reigning  monarchs  ) , and was responsible for  a  third  of  all  दृष्टिहीनता  .
Of  सब  those infected , 20–60 % —and over 80 %  of  infected children—died from  the  disease .
Smallpox was responsible for an estimated 300–500  लाख  deaths during the 20th century .
As recently as 1967 , the World Health  संगठन  ( WHO ) estimated that 15 million people contracted the disease and that two million died in that year .
After vaccination  अभियान  throughout the  19th  and 20th centuries  ,  the  जो   certified  the  eradication  of smallpox in 1979 .
Smallpox is  एक  of two  संक्रामक  diseases to  have  been eradicated , the other being rinderpest , which was declared eradicated in 2011  .
``  i  Want  to  Hold  अपना  Hand  ''  is  a  song by the English rock band the  बीटल्स  .
लिखा  by John Lennon and Paul McCartney , and recorded in October  1963  ,  it  was the first Beatles record to be made using four-track equipment  .
With advance orders exceeding one million  नक़ल  in  the  United Kingdom  ,  `` I Want to  थाम  Your  हाथ  '' would  साधारणतया  have gone straight  to  the top of the British record charts on its  दिन  of release ( 29 November 1963 ) had  it   नहीं  been  अवरोधित  by the group 's  पहला  million seller `` She Loves You `` ,  the  Beatles ' previous UK single , which was  having  a resurgent spell in the top position following  तीव्र  media coverage of the group  .
Taking two weeks  to   dislodge  its predecessor , ``  i  Want to Hold Your Hand ''  ठहरे  at number one  लिये  five  सप्ताह   और  remained in  the  UK top  पचास  for  twenty-one  weeks  in  total  .
It was also the group 's first American number one , entering the  बिलबोर्ड  Hot  100  chart on 18  जनवरी  1964  at  number forty-five and starting the British invasion of the American music industry .
By 1  फ़रवरी  it held the number one  स्पॉट  — for seven weeks  —  before being replaced  by  `` She Loves You '' , a  रिवर्स  scenario of what  था  occurred in  ब्रिटेन  , and remained in the US charts for a  कुल  of fifteen weeks .
`` I Want to Hold Your Hand '' became the Beatles ' best-selling single worldwide .
A  gasser  was a  प्रकार   of  hot rod  originating  on the dragstrips of the  संयुक्त  States in the late 1950s  और   जारी   जबतक  the early 1970s .
Gassers were based on  उत्पादन   मॉडल  from  the   1930s  to mid-1960s , which  have   महरूम  stripped of extraneous weight and jacked  up  using a truck beam axle  to  provide  बेहतर  weight distribution on acceleration ( Beam axles are also lighter than an  स्वतंत्र  front  बर्खास्तगी  ) , though a raised stock front suspension  is   आम   as   खूब  .
Common weight reduction techniques include fiberglass body panels ,  stripped  interiors and plexiglass  खिड़कियाँ  ( sometimes color tinted ) .
Because they were primarily built for racing , these  गाड़ियाँ  typically had the engine swapped to a  larger  or more  शक्तिशाली  one , the existing  भण्डार   इंजन   परिवर्धित  ( often heavily )  or  both .
It was very common to  अनुरूप  a Roots supercharger  और  mechanical fuel injection  ,   ऐसे  as  एक  from Algon , Hilborn ,  or  Crower .
With form  होने  dictated  by   फलन   ,  their appearance is often very top heavy and ungainly , largely due to front ends being raised higher than stock , to assist in the weight  ट्रांसफ़र  during  रैपिड  acceleration ( racing  )  .
Having  उनके  exhaust pipes exit through the front fender well is  a  common characteristic of gassers , as is having  लाशें   चित्रित  in flamboyant metalflakes ,  मोती  , and  कैंडी  finishes  complemented  by lettering in wild fonts  .
The name arose  क्युकी  they competed  in  a gasoline -fueled drag racing class , rather than one using methanol or  nitromethane  .
The  gasser  is the  पूर्ववर्ती   of   the  modern Funny  car   .
Twelve-lead EKG of a 26-year-old male
Electrocardiography (  ईसीजी  or EKG  इससे   )  is a transthoracic  (  across the thorax or chest ) interpretation of the electrical  कार्यकलाप   of   the  heart over a  काल  of time ,  as  detected by electrodes attached to the surface  of  the skin  और  recorded by a  यंत्र  external  to  the  देह  .
The  रिकॉर्डिंग  produced by  इस  noninvasive  कार्यविधि   is  termed an electrocardiogram ( also  ईसीजी  or  ईकेजी  ) .
An  ईसीजी  is used to measure the rate and regularity  of  heartbeats ,  as   खूब  as the size and position  of  the chambers , the presence of any damage to  the  heart , and the effects of drugs or devices used  to   विनियमित  the heart  ,  such  as  a pacemaker .
Most ECGs are  performed  for diagnostic or research purposes on  इंसान  hearts , but may also be performed on animals , usually  लिये  diagnosis of  दिल  abnormalities or research .
Donald John  ट्रम्प  ,  sr.  ( born June 14 , 1946 ) is an American  कारोबार  magnate , television personality and author .
He is the chairman and president of The Trump Organization and the founder of Trump Entertainment  रिसॉर्ट  .
Trump 's extravagant lifestyle , outspoken  manner  , and  भूमिका   on  the NBC reality show The  प्रशिक्षु  have  बना  him  a  well-known celebrity who was No . 14 on the 2012  फोर्ब्स  Celebrity 100 list .
Trump is the son  of  Fred Trump ,  a  wealthy New York  नगर   real-estate  developer .
He worked for his father 's firm , Elizabeth Trump & Son , while attending the Wharton School of the University  of  Pennsylvania  ,  and in 1968 officially joined the  कम्पनी  .
He was given control of the company in 1971  और  renamed it The Trump  संगठन  .
In 2010 , Trump  expressed  an interest in  बनने   a  candidate for  अध्यक्ष  of the United  राज्य  in the 2012 election , though in May 2011 , he announced he  होता  not be a candidate .
In December 2011 , Trump was suggested as a  संभावित  vice presidential selection by Michele Bachmann , if she were to win  the  Republican nomination .
`` A  बदलें   is  Gon na Come  ''  is a  1964  single by R & B singer-songwriter Sam Cooke , written  और  first  अंकित  in 1963 and released under the RCA Victor label shortly after his death in late 1964  .
Though only a  modest  hit for Cooke in comparison with his  पिछला  singles , the song  आए  to exemplify the 1960s '  सिविल  Rights  गति  .
the  song  रै  gained in popularity and critical acclaim in the  दशकों  since  इसके  release , and is # 12 on  रोलिंग   स्टोन  's  500  Greatest  गीतों  of All Time  .
Steam rising  इससे  the Nesjavellir Geothermal Power Station in Iceland  .
Geothermal energy is thermal energy generated  और   भंडारित   in  the  धरती  .
Thermal  उर्जा  is the  उर्जा  that determines  the  temperature of matter .
the   geothermal  energy of the Earth 's crust originates from  the  original formation of the planet ( 20  %  ) and from radioactive decay of minerals ( 80 % ) .
The geothermal  अनुपात  ,  जिससे  is  the   अंतर  in temperature between the core of  the   ग्रह  and  इसके  surface , drives a  निरन्तर  conduction of  थर्मल  energy in the form of heat  इससे  the core to  the  surface .
The adjective geothermal  originates  from the Greek roots γη ( ge  )  , meaning earth , and θερμος (  thermos   )  , meaning hot .
At the core of  the  Earth  ,  thermal energy is created by  रेडियोसक्रिय  decay and temperatures may reach over 5000 °C  (  9,000 °F )  .
Heat conducts  इससे  the core  to  surrounding cooler rock  .
The high temperature and pressure cause some rock to melt , creating  मैग्मा  convection upward since it is  हल्का  than the solid rock  .
The  मैग्मा  heats rock  और   जल   in  the crust , sometimes  up  to 370  °c  ( 700 °F  )  .
From hot springs ,  geothermal  energy has been used  लिये  bathing  चूंकि  Paleolithic times  और  for space heating since ancient Roman times ,  लकिन  it  is   अभी  better known for electricity generation .
Worldwide  ,  about 10,715 megawatts ( MW )  of  geothermal power  is  online in 24  देशों  .
An additional 28  gigawatts  of direct geothermal  हीटिंग  capacity  is  installed for district heating , space heating ,  स्पा  , industrial processes , desalination and agricultural applications .
Geothermal  शक्ति  is  लागत  effective  ,  reliable , sustainable ,  और  environmentally  दोस्ताना   ,   लकिन  has historically been limited to  क्षेत्रों  near tectonic plate boundaries  .
हाल  technological  अग्रिम   have  dramatically expanded the range  और   आकार  of viable resources  ,   विशेषकर  for applications such as  घर  heating , opening a  संभावित  for widespread exploitation  .
Geothermal wells release greenhouse gases trapped  गहन  within  the  earth , but these emissions are much lower per energy unit than  those  of fossil fuels .
as   a  result ,  geothermal  power has  the   संभावित   to  help mitigate global warming if widely deployed in place of fossil fuels .
The  धरती  's geothermal resources are theoretically  अधिक  than adequate to  सप्लाई   मानवता  's energy needs , but only a  बहुत  small fraction  may  be profitably exploited .
Drilling and  खोजी  for  गहन   संसाधन  is very expensive  .
Forecasts for  the  future of geothermal  शक्ति  depend  on  assumptions about technology  ,   उर्जा   कीमतें  ,  subsidies   ,   और   ब्याज   दरों  .
Pilot programs  जैसे  EWEB 's customer opt  in  Green Power Program show that  ग्राहक  would be  willing  to pay  a  little more for a renewable energy source like geothermal  .
But as a result of  सरकारी  assisted research and industry experience  ,  the cost of generating geothermal power  रै  decreased by 25 % over  the  past  दो  decades .
In 2001 , geothermal energy cost between two and ten cents per kwh  .
स्वामित्व   of  property may be  निजी   ,  collective  ,  or common and  the  property may  be   वस्तुएँ  ,  land/real   एस्टेट  , or  बौद्धिक  property .
Determining  स्वामित्व  in law involves  determining  who  रै  certain rights and duties over  the  property .
These rights and duties , sometimes called a 'bundle of rights ' , can  be  separated and held by  अलग  parties .
the  question of ownership  पहुँच   वापस  to the ancient philosophers  ,  Plato and Aristotle , who held different opinions  on  the subject .
प्लेटो   (  428/427 BC – 348/347 BC ) thought private  प्रॉपर्टी  created divisive inequalities , while Aristotle ( 384  bc  – 322  bc   )  thought private property  सक्रिय  people to receive the full  लाभ  of their labor  .
Private property  can  circumvent what is now referred to as the “ tragedy  of  the commons ” problem , where people  tend  to degrade common property more than they do private property .
दिए  a short-sighted owner , however , a private  प्रॉपर्टी   प्रणाली  can make these  tragedies  worse—for example , a  निजी  owner of a piece of oil-rich  प्रॉपर्टी  , depending on his worldview , might be more  दिलचस्पी  in short-term financial gain than incremental use with an  नजर  toward other  's  concerns ( e.g. ,  those  of future generations ,  the  disenfranchised , etc . ) .
While Aristotle justified  the   अस्तित्व  of private ownership  ,  he  बाएँ  open questions of ( 1 ) how to allocate property between  कया  is private and common and ( 2 ) how to allocate the private property within society .
Over the millennia , and across cultures what can be property and how it is regarded culturally have varied widely .
Ownership  is  the basis for  अनेक  other concepts that form the foundations of ancient and modern societies such as  धन  , trade , debt , bankruptcy ,  the   criminality  of theft  ,  and private vs. public property .
Ownership is the key  भवन  block in the development  of   the  capitalist socio-economic  प्रणाली  .
Adam  स्मिथ  stated  कि  one of the sacred laws of justice was  to  guard a person 's  प्रॉपर्टी  and possessions  .
The process and  यांत्रिकी  of ownership are fairly complex : one can gain ,  ट्रांसफ़र  and lose ownership  of  property in  a  number of ways .
To acquire property one can purchase  it  with money , trade it for other property , receive it as a gift ,  चोरी   it  , find  it  , make , it  or  homestead  it  .
One can transfer or lose ownership of property by selling it for  धन  , exchanging it for other property ,  giving   it  as a gift  ,   होने  robbed of  it  , it ,  or  having it  stripped  from one 's  स्वामित्व   through  legal means such as  eviction  , foreclosure , seizure , or taking  .
Ownership is self-propagating  in  that the owner of any property will also own the  आर्थिक  benefits of that  प्रॉपर्टी   .
`` What 's My Name ? '' is a song recorded by Barbadian recording artist Rihanna ,  लिये  her fifth  स्टुडियो  album Loud ( 2010  )  .
Featuring guest vocals from Canadian rapper Drake , the song  थी  released  as  the  दूसरी   सिंगल  from Loud on October 29 , 2010 through Def Jam Recordings  .
The R & B song  थी  produced by the Norwegian production duo StarGate , and was written by the duo along with Ester  डीन  , Traci Hale , and Drake .
Lyrically , it incorporates themes of sexual intercourse  और  romance .
Music  आलोचकों  gave the  सोंग  positive reviews ,  citing   it  some  of  Rihanna 's best vocal work to date ;  वहीँ  was a praise regarding  इसके  romantic nature , as well as its sexual tones .
`` What 's My Name ? ''  थी  a commercial success and  अव्वल   the  US Billboard Hot 100 chart ,  giving  Rihanna her third number-one single in 2010 , as  खूब  as her  आठवीं  overall on the chart .
The song also topped the charts  in   हंगेरियाई   और  the United  किंगडम  and reached the top five in Canada , Ireland , New Zealand , Norway and Slovakia .
The song received a nomination  at  the 54th Grammy Awards  लिये  Best Rap/Sung Collaboration .
An accompanying music video , directed by Philip Andelman , portrays  a   रोमांटिक  encounter  between  Rihanna and Drake in a  किराना  store along with romantic scenes between the  जोड़ी  and Rihanna  चलना  through Manhattan 's  निम्नतर  East Side .
``  कया  's My  नाम  ?  ''   थी   प्रचारित  with live  प्रदर्शन   आरपार  both  पहलू  of  the  Atlantic , including  शनिवार  Night Live in  अमेरिका  and the series  सात  finale  of  The X Factor  in   the   संयुक्त  Kingdom  .
The latter performance  resulted  in an investigation  इससे  the country 's  मीडिया  regulator , Ofcom ,  लिये   the  raunchy nature  of  Rihanna 's  पहनावा   .
a  mathematical constant is a special number , usually a real number , that is `` significantly interesting  in  some way ''  .
Constants arise  in  many different areas  of  mathematics  ,  with constants such  as  e ( mathematical constant )  |  and pi| occurring  in   ऐसे  diverse contexts as geometry , number  सिद्धान्त   और  calculus  .
कया  it means for a  निरंतर  to arise `` naturally '' , and what makes a constant `` interesting '' , is ultimately a matter of taste  ,  and some mathematical constants are notable more for  ऐतिहासिक   कारण  than for  उनके  intrinsic mathematical interest .
the   अधिक   लोकप्रिय  constants have been studied throughout the  आयु   और  computed to many decimal places .
All mathematical constants are definable  संख्याएँ   और   प्रायः  are also computable numbers ( Chaitin 's constant  होने  a significant exception  )   .
Elections to the  संयुक्त  States Senate were held on November 2 , 2010 , for 37 of the  संयुक्त  States Senate  's  100 seats .
( A  खास  election on January 19 , 2010 in  मैसाचुसेट्स  was held earlier in  the  year . )
thirty-four  of the seats  यहूद   लिये  six-year terms to the Senate 's `` class three  ''  , and three were  खास  elections for shorter terms  .
Of the 37 elections , 19 featured  लाज़िम  Democrats ( 7 of whom retired or were  पराजित  in the primary  )  and 18  प्रदर्शित   लाज़िम  Republicans (  आठ  of  जिसको  retired  or  were defeated  in  the primary ) .
After the previous elections ( in 2008 )  ,   the  United States Senate was composed  of  58 Democrats , 40 Republicans , and  2   independents  who caucus with the Democrats .
Republicans won four seats  आयोजित  by retiring Democrats  और   republicans  defeated two incumbent Democrats .
इस  was the largest number of Republicans gains since the 1994  चुनावों   और  also the  पहला  time since that election that Republicans successfully defended all of their own  सीटे  .
This  थी  the fourth consecutive election of `` class 3 '' senators where Democrats  have   विफल   to  gain  सीटे  and the third  लगातार  mid-term election held in a president 's first term where Republicans have picked-up  सीटे  .
Despite these Republican  विन्स  , however ,  the   डेमोक्रेट  retained a majority of the Senate with 51  सीटे  plus 2 independents who caucus with them , compared to the 47 Republicans  .
A solstice is an  खगोलीय  event that occurs twice each year as the Sun reaches its highest or lowest  excursion  relative to the  celestial  equator on the celestial sphere  .
As a result , on the day of the solstice , the  सूर्य  appears to have reached its highest or lowest annual altitude  in  the sky above the horizon at local solar noon  .
The word  संक्रांति  is derived from  the  Latin sol (  सूर्य  ) and sistere (  to  stand  स्टिल  ) , because at  the  solstices , the Sun stands still in declination ;  कि  is  ,   the  seasonal  गति  of  the  Sun  's  path ( as seen from  धरती   )  comes  to  a  रोकें  before  reversing  direction .
the  solstices , together with the equinoxes , are connected with the  सीज़न   .
In many cultures the solstices mark either the beginning or the midpoint of  शीत  and summer .
The term solstice  can  also  be  used in a  broader   भाव  , as the  तिथि  ( day ) when this  occurs  .
The  दिन  of the solstice is  either   the   longest  day of the year ( in summer ) or the shortest day  of  the year ( in winter ) for  कोई  place outside of  the  tropics .
जेरी   ली  Lewis ( born September 29 , 1935 ) is an American rock and roll and country music singer-songwriter  और  pianist .
He is known by  the  nickname `` The  कातिल  '' and  is  often  viewed  as “rock & roll 's first great wild man” .
an  early pioneer of rock  और  roll music , in 1956 Lewis made his first recordings  at  Sun Records .
``  Crazy Arms `` sold 300,000 copies in the  दक्षिण  , but it  थी  his 1957 hit `` Whole Lotta Shakin ' Going On ``  कि   शॉट  Lewis to  कीर्ति  worldwide .
Lewis followed this in  कि   वही   साल   जब  he recorded songs such  as   ``   ग्रेट  Balls of Fire `` , `` Breathless  ``   और   ``   ऊँची  School Confidential `` .
Lewis sold more records than Elvis  प्रेस्ली  at this time .
However , Lewis '  चट्टान  'n  '  roll career faltered in the wake of his marriage to his young cousin  .
He had little  कामयाबी  in the  चार्ट  following the scandal  और   उसके  popularity quickly faded .
His live performance  शुल्क  plummeted from $ 10,000 per  रात्रि  to  $  250 .
in  the meantime he was determined to gain back some of his popularity .
During the  जल्दी  60’s he  किया  n't have much  चार्ट  success with few exceptions such as `` What 'd I  कह  `` .
His live performances  at  this  समय  were increasingly  जंगली  and  ऊर्जावान  .
His album  सजीव  at the Star Club ,  हैम्बर्ग  from  1964  is often regarded by many music journalists and fans as one of the wildest and greatest rock and roll concert albums ever .
After recording songs such as `` I 'm on Fire '' for several years  साथ  little  कामयाबी  ,  in  1968 Lewis made a transition into country music and had  हिट्स  with  गीतों  such as `` Another  प्लेस  , Another  समय   ''  .
This  reignited  his career and  throughout  the late  '60s  and '70s he regularly topped the country-western charts  .
His # 1 country hits included `` To Make Love Sweeter For You  ``  , `` There  जरूर  Be More to Love Than This `` , ``  होता  You Take Another Chance on Me ``  और  `` Me  और  Bobby  mcgee  `` .
Lewis 's successes continued throughout the decade and  he  embraced his rock 'n  '  roll past with  गीतों   ऐसे  as  a   कवर   of  the Big Bopper  's  `` Chantilly Lace  ``  and `` Rockin ' My Life Away  ``  .
In  the  21st century Lewis continues  to   दौरे  to audiences  around  the  संसार  and still releases new albums  .
एक  such album , titled Last Man Standing ,  is  his  बेहतरीन   selling  to date  at  over a million  नक़ल  sold worldwide  .
This was followed by  औसत  Old Man which has received some of the best sales of Lewis’s career  .
Lewis has had  a  dozen gold records in both rock and country , won several Grammy awards ,  सहित  a Lifetime Achievement Award .
लुईस   थी   inducted   into  the Rock  और   फेंकें   हॉल  of Fame in  1986   ,  and his pioneering contribution to  the   विधा  has  महरूम  recognized by the Rockabilly Hall of Fame .
In 1989 , his  जीवन   थी  chronicled in the movie  ग्रेट  Balls of Fire , starring Dennis Quaid  .
In 2003 , Rolling Stone  पत्रिका  listed his box set All Killer  ,  No Filler : The Anthology number 242 on their list of `` 500 greatest  एल्बम  of all time `` .
in  2004 , they ranked him number 24 on their list of the 100 Greatest Artists of  सब  Time .
Lewis is the last surviving member of Sun Records '  लाख  Dollar Quartet and the Class of '55 album  ,   जिससे  also included Johnny Cash ,  कार्ल   perkins  , Roy Orbison and Elvis Presley .
Henry  लुई  Stephens , untitled watercolor ( 1863 ) of a man reading a newspaper  साथ  headline `` Presidential Proclamation / Slavery '' .
the  Emancipation Proclamation was an  अनुक्रम  issued to  सब  segments  of   the  Executive branch ( including the Army and Navy ) of the United States  by   अध्यक्ष  Abraham Lincoln on January 1 , 1863  ,  during the American Civil  युद्ध  .
It was based  on  the president 's  संवैधानिक   प्राधिकार  as commander in chief  of  the armed  शक्तियां  ; it was not a law passed by Congress  .
It proclaimed all those enslaved in  confederate   territory  to  be  forever free , and  ordered  the  फौज  ( and all  खण्ड  of the Executive branch ) to treat as  फ़्री  all those enslaved  in  ten states that were still in rebellion , thus  applying  to 3.1 million of  the  4 million slaves  in  the U.S .
The  उदघोषणा  could not be enforced in areas still under  विद्रोह  , but  as  the army took control of Confederate regions ,  the  slaves in those  regions  were emancipated rather than returned to their  मास्टर्स  .
From 20,000 to 50,000 former slaves in  regions  where rebellion had already been subdued were  तत्काल  emancipated , and over 3 million more were  emancipated   as  the Union army advanced  .
The Proclamation did not apply to  the  five slave  राज्य  that were not  in  rebellion ,  nor   to  most regions already controlled by  the  Union  फौज  ; emancipation there would come after  पृथक   राज्य  actions and/or the December 1865  अनुसमर्थन  of the Thirteenth Amendment , which made  गुलामी   illegal  everywhere in  the  U.S .
The Proclamation did not compensate the owners  ,   किया  not itself outlaw  गुलामी  , and did not make the  ex-slaves   (  called freedmen ) citizens .
It  बना   the  eradication  of  slavery an  सुस्पष्ट  war goal , in addition  to  the  लक्ष्य  of reuniting the Union .
On September 22 , 1862 ,  lincoln  had issued  a  preliminary proclamation that he would order the emancipation of all slaves in any state of the Confederate States  of  America that did not return to Union control by January 1  ,  1863 .
None returned , and the order  ,  signed  और  issued January  1   ,   1863  , took effect  मगर  in locations where the Union  था  already mostly regained control  .
The Proclamation outraged white Southerners  जो   envisioned  a race war , angered some Northern Democrats  ,  energized anti-slavery forces , and  weakened  forces in Europe  कि  wanted to intervene to help the Confederacy .
It also  lifted   the  spirits of African Americans  दोनो  in the  दक्षिणी  and Northern States ,  और  led  to  many slaves escaping their masters and running  पीछे   संघ  lines  in  order to have their  emancipation  enforced .
Sucker Punch  is  a  2011  American fantasy action film  निर्देशित  by Zack Snyder  और  co-written by  उसे  and Steve Shibuya .
It is Snyder 's  पहला   फिल्मी   आधारित  on an original script .
The film stars Emily Browning , Abbie Cornish ,  जेना   malone  ,  वैनेसा  Hudgens , Jamie Chung , and Carla Gugino .
The storyline follows the fantasies of a young  स्त्री  who is committed to a mental institution ,  as   वो  makes a plan to escape the hospital before suffering a lobotomy .
The film  थी  released in both  conventional  and  imax  theatres in the United States at  मध्यरात्रि  on March  25  ,  2011  .
It received generally negative reviews from critics , but was a moderate  बक्सा  office success .
सामने  and  वापस  of Canon  powershot  A95 , a typical  pocket-size  digital camera
haselblad   503cw  with Ixpress V96C digital back , an  उदाहरण  of  a  professional digital camera system
A digital  कैमरा   (  or digicam )  is  a camera that takes video or still photographs  by   रिकॉर्डिंग  images on  an  electronic image sensor .
Most  कैमरे  sold today are digital , and digital cameras are  incorporated  into many devices  ranging  from PDAs and mobile phones ( called  कैमरा  phones ) to vehicles .
Digital and film cameras share an optical system  ,  typically using a lens with a variable diaphragm to focus light onto an image pickup device .
The diaphragm and shutter admit the correct amount  of  light to the  imager  , just as with film but the image pickup device is electronic  बल्कि  than chemical .
however  ,  नापसंद  film cameras  ,  digital  कैमरे  can display images on a screen immediately after being recorded , and store and delete images from memory .
अनेक  digital  कैमरे  can  भी   रिकार्ड   चलती  video with sound  .
Some digital  कैमरे  can crop and stitch pictures and perform other  elementary   चित्र  editing .
The inside and  सामने  of a Dell PowerEdge web server , a computer designed  लिये  rack mounting
अनेक  web servers  may  be used for  a  high  ट्रैफ़िक  website ,  यहाँ  four  सूर्य  Fire X4200 servers are installed  साथ
Web server can refer to either the  हार्डवेयर   (  the  कंप्यूटर  )  or  the software  (  the computer application ) that  helps   to   उद्धार  web content that can be accessed through the  अंतरजाल   .
The  सबसे  common use of web servers is  to  host websites , but there  हैं  other  उपयोग  such as  गेमिंग  ,  आंकड़ा  storage or running enterprise applications .
The American  रेड  Cross ( ARC  )  ,  भी  known as  the  American National Red Cross , is a humanitarian organization  कि  provides  आपात  assistance ,  विपत्ति  relief and education inside the United States .
it   is  the  designated  U.S.  संबद्ध  of the International Federation of Red Cross and  रेड  Crescent Societies  .
आज  , in addition to domestic disaster relief ,  the  American Red Cross offers services in five other areas : community services that help the needy ; communications  सेवाएं  and comfort for  सैन्य  members and their family members ; the  संग्रहण  , processing and distribution of  रक्त  and blood products  ;  educational programs  on  preparedness , health , and safety ; and international  राहत   और  development programs .
Issued a corporate  चार्टर   by  the  संयुक्त  States Congress under Title  36  of the United  राज्य  Code ,  खण्ड  3001 , the American National Red Cross  is  governed by volunteers and supported  by   जातियाँ   दान  ,  आय  from  स्वास्थ्य  and safety training and products , and  आय  from  रक्त  products .
The  अमरीकी   रेड  Cross is headquartered in Washington , D.C .
the  Chairman of the Board of Governors , serving her second  three-year  term ,  is  Bonnie  mcelveen-hunter  .
The current President  और  Chief  कार्यपालिका  Officer  is  Gail J. McGovern  .

A rooster  ,   प्रर्दशित  wattles  ,  earlobes  और  comb

A rooster ( also  पुकारा  a cockerel  or  cock ) is a male gallinaceous bird .
it  usually refers to a male chicken ( Gallus  gallus   )   .
नादान  male chickens less  than  one year old are called cockerels .
The  पद   ``  rooster '' originates in the United States , and the term  is  widely used throughout  उत्तर  America , as  खूब  as Australia and New Zealand .
In the United Kingdom and Ireland the older term `` cockerel ''  is   अधिक  commonly used .
``  Cock  ''  is in  सामान्य  use as the name  लिये  a male of other species of bird , for example `` Cock sparrow '' .
`` Roosting '' is the action of perching  aloft  to sleep  at  night , and is done by both sexes .
The rooster is polygamous  ,  but  can  not guard several nests of  अंडे  at once .
He guards  the   सामान्य  area where his hens  हैं   nesting  , and will attack  अन्य  roosters  कि  enter his territory .
During the daytime ,  he  usually sits on a high perch  ,  usually  3–5  feet off the ground  to  serve as a  lookout   लिये  his flock .
He will sound a distinctive alarm  कॉल  if predators are nearby  .
the   पोकीमॉन  Trading Card  खेल  ( Pokémon TCG  )   is  a collectible card game based on the Pokémon video game series , first published in October 1996 by  मीडिया  Factory  in   जापानी  .
in  the US , it was initially published by Wizards of the Coast , the company that produces , in December  1998  .
Nintendo  took  over  प्रकाशन  in June  2003  .
It  is  one of Nintendo 's  पिछला   बाकी  strong links to its heritage  as  a playing card company .
Land Rover is a British car  निर्माता  with its headquarters in Gaydon , Warwickshire , United Kingdom  जिससे  specialises in four-wheel-drive vehicles .
It  is  part of the Jaguar Land Rover group , a  subsidiary  of Tata Motors of India .
It is the second  oldest  four-wheel-drive car brand in the world ( after Jeep ) .
The  जमीन  Rover name was originally used by the Rover Company for  एक  specific vehicle model , named simply the Land  रोवर  , launched by Rover  in   1948  .
Over the  following  years it developed into a  marque  encompassing  a  range of four-wheel-drive  मॉडल  , including the Defender  ,  Discovery , Freelander , Range Rover , Range Rover Sport and Range Rover  evoque  .
Land Rovers  हैं  currently assembled in the company 's Halewood  और   solihull  plants , with research  और   विकास  taking place at JLR  's  Gaydon and  whitley  engineering centres .
Land  रोवर   बेची  194,000 vehicles worldwide in  2009   .
Although the brand originates  इससे  the original 1948 model , Land Rover  as  a company has only  existed   चूंकि  1978  .
Prior to this , it  थी  a product line of the Rover Company  जिससे  was subsequently absorbed into the Rover-Triumph division of the British  leyland  Motor Corporation ( BL ) following Leyland Motor Corporation  ’s  takeover of  रोवर   in  1967 .
the   जारी   वाणिज्यिक  success of the original  जमीन  Rover series models , and latterly the Range Rover in the 1970s in the midst of BL’s well documented business  परेशानियों  prompted the establishment of  a  separate  जमीन   रोवर  company but still  अंतर्गत  the BL umbrella , remaining part of the subsequent  रोवर  Group  in  1988  ,   अंतर्गत  the ownership of British Aerospace after the remains of  अंग्रेजों  Leyland were  टूटा  up and privatised .
In 1994 Rover  समूह  plc was acquired by BMW .
In  2000  , Rover Group was broken-up  by  BMW and Land Rover  थी  sold to  घाट  Motor Company ,  बनने   भाग   of  its Premier Automotive Group  .
In 2006 Ford  खरीदा  the Rover brand from BMW for  around  £6 million .
This reunited  the  Rover and Land Rover  ब्रांड्स  for the first time  चूंकि  2000 when  the  Rover group was  टूटा  up  by   bmw  .
In June 2008 , Ford sold both  जमीन  Rover and Jaguar Cars  to  Tata Motors .
This sale also included the dormant Rover brand

The ninth season of the Bleach anime series is named .
the  series is based on Tite  kubo   's  manga with same name .
The episodes  हैं  directed by  noriyuki  Abe and produced  by  TV  टोकियो  , Dentsu , and  स्टुडियो  Pierrot  .
The episodes  '   प्लाट   focuses  on the introduction of  a  new Soul Reaper captain ,  shūsuke  Amagai , and the mystery surrounding the Kasumiōji  गोत्र  , one of the  परिवारों  that  constitute  the nobility of Soul  समाज  .
The season began airing on April  23  , 2008 in Japan on TV Tokyo and  ended  on October 7 , 2008 .
the  English  अनुकूलन   of  the Bleach anime  is  licensed by Viz  मीडिया  , and this  चाप  began airing on August  28   ,  2010 on Cartoon Network 's  वयस्क  Swim ,  और   समाप्त  on  जनवरी  29 , 2011 .
Five DVD compilations , each containing  चार  episodes of the season , have  महरूम  released  by  Aniplex ;  the  first DVD compilation  थी   released  on November 26 , 2008 and  the  fifth  on  March  25  , 2009 .
A DVD  बक्सा  will  be  published by Viz Media  on   दिसम्बर  13 , 2011 .
The  एपीसोड  use three pieces  of   थीम   म्यूज़िक  :  एक  opening theme and  दो  closing themes .
the   खोलने  theme is `` Chu-Bura `` by Kelun .
The first closing theme  is  `` Orange '' by Lil'B  ,  used for episodes 168  to  179 , and the second closing theme is `` Gallop '' by  pe'zmoku  , used  लिये  the remainder of the episodes .
The  विनियमन  of prostitution in the United States is  नहीं  among the  enumerated  powers of the federal government  ;  Under the  दसवाँ  Amendment to the United States Constitution , it is therefore  exclusively  the domain  of  the states to permit  ,  prohibit , or otherwise regulate commercial sex  ,   मगर  insofar as Congress may regulate it as part  of  interstate commerce with laws like the  मन  Act .
in  most states  ,  prostitution is  माना  a misdemeanor in the category  of  public order  अपराधों  , a crime that disrupts the order of a community  .
It was at  एक  time considered to be a vagrancy crime .
Currently  ,  Nevada is the only state to allow  वेश्यालय  prostitution , the terms of which are stipulated in the Nevada Revised Statutes  .
तभी  8 counties currently contain  क्रियाशील   brothels  .
All forms of prostitution are illegal in Clark County ( which contains  the  Las Vegas–Paradise metropolitan  क्षेत्रफल  ) , Washoe County ( which contains  रेनो   )  , Carson City , Douglas County , and Lincoln County  .
The other counties theoretically allow brothel prostitution , but some of these counties  फिलहाल  have  no  active brothels .
Street prostitution , `` pandering  ,  '' and living off of the  proceeds  of a prostitute remain illegal  अंतर्गत  Nevada law , as  elsewhere   in  the country .
As with  अन्य  countries , prostitution in the United  राज्य  can be  विभाजित  into three broad categories :  गली  prostitution  ,  brothel prostitution , and escort prostitution .
The East Coast of the United States , also known  as  the Eastern Seaboard  or  the Atlantic Seaboard and  commonly  shortened to East Coast , refers  to  the  easternmost  coast of the United States along  the  Atlantic Ocean .
The  राज्य  which have shoreline  on  the East Coast are , from north  to  south  ,   the  U.S. states of Maine ,  नई  Hampshire , Massachusetts , Rhode Island , Connecticut , New York , New Jersey  ,   डेलावेयर  , Maryland , Virginia ,  उत्तर  Carolina , South Carolina , Georgia , and Florida .
Richard Milhous Nixon  (  January 9 , 1913 – April 22 , 1994 ) was the  37th  President of the  संयुक्त  States ,  सेवारत   इससे  1969 to  1974  , when he became the only  अध्यक्ष  to resign the office .
Nixon had previously served as a Republican U.S.  प्रतिनिधि   और  senator from California and as the 36th Vice President of the United States from  1953  to 1961 .
Nixon  थी  born in  yorba  Linda , California .
He  ग्रैजुएट  from Whittier College in 1934 and  ड्यूक  University School of Law in 1937 ,  returning  to California to practice  विधि  .
He and his wife  ,  Pat Nixon , moved to Washington to work for the federal  सरकारी  in 1942 .
He subsequently  परोसा  in  the  United States Navy during World War II .
निक्सन  was elected in California to the House of  प्रतिनिधि   in  1946 and to  the  Senate  in  1950 .
उसके  pursuit of the Alger Hiss case  स्थापित   उसके  reputation as a leading  anti-communist  , and elevated him to national prominence .
he  was the running mate  of   ड्वाइट  D. Eisenhower , the Republican Party presidential  nominee  in the 1952  चुनाव  .
निक्सन  served for eight years as vice president .
He waged an unsuccessful presidential campaign in  1960  , narrowly losing to John F. Kennedy , and lost a race for Governor of California in 1962 .
In 1968 , he ran again for the presidency and  थी  elected .
Although Nixon initially  escalated  America 's involvement  in   the  Vietnam War , he subsequently  ended  U.S. involvement  in   1973  .
Nixon  's  visit to the People 's Republic of  चीन  in 1972 opened diplomatic  संबंध  between the two nations  ,   और  he  initiated   détente   और  the Anti-Ballistic Missile Treaty with  the  Soviet Union  the  same year .
Domestically , his administration  generally   embraced   नीतियों  that transferred  शक्ति  from  वॉशिंगटन  to the states .
Among  अन्य  things  ,  he  शुभारम्भ  initiatives to fight  कर्कट  and illegal  दवाएँ  , imposed  मजदूरी  and  दाम  controls , enforced desegregation  of   कुछ  Southern schools , and established the Environmental Protection Agency .
Though he presided over the lunar landings beginning  साथ  Apollo 11 , he scaled back manned space  खोजी  .
He was re-elected by a  भूस्खलन  in 1972 .
Nixon 's second term saw  an   अरब  oil embargo , the  इस्तीफा  of his  वाइस  president  ,   spiro  Agnew , and a continuing series of revelations  परिचय  the Watergate  कांड  and other misconduct by members of the  प्रशासन   .
The scandal escalated , costing Nixon much  of  his political support , and  on  August 9 , 1974 , he  resigned  in the face  of  almost certain  महाभियोग  and removal from  दफ्तर   .
After  उसके   इस्तीफा  , he controversially received  a  pardon issued  by   उसके  successor  ,  Gerald Ford .
In retirement ,  निक्सन   's   कार्य  as an elder statesman , authoring several books and undertaking many foreign trips , helped to  rehabilitate  his public image .
he   suffered  a debilitating stroke on April 18 ,  1994  ,  और   died  four  दिनों   बाद  at the age of 81 .
sertraline   hydrochloride  ( trade names Zoloft ,  lustral  )  is  an  antidepressant  of  the  selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor ( SSRI ) class  .
It was introduced to the market by Pfizer  in  1991  .
Sertraline is primarily prescribed for major depressive disorder in adult  outpatients  as well as obsessive–compulsive , panic , and social anxiety disorders in  दोनो  adults and children .
In 2011 , it  थी  the second-most prescribed antidepressant on  the  U.S. retail  मार्केट  , with 37,208,000 prescriptions .
The efficacy of sertraline for depression  is   समान  to  कि  of older tricyclic  antidepressants  , but its side effects are much less pronounced  .
Differences with newer  antidepressants  are  subtler  and also mostly confined to side effects .
Evidence  suggests  that sertraline may work  बेहतर   than  fluoxetine ( Prozac  )  for  कुछ  subtypes of depression .
उपचार  of panic  विकार  with  sertraline   परिणाम  in  a  significant decrease of the  क्रमांक  of panic attacks and in improved quality of life .
लिये   obsessive-compulsive  disorder , sertraline  is  not as effective  as  cognitive behavioral therapy ; the  बेहतरीन  results have  महरूम  achieved by combining these two  उपचार  .
Although approved for  सोशल  phobia and posttraumatic  तनाव   विकार  ,  sertraline  leads to only modest improvement in these conditions  .
Sertraline  भी  alleviates the symptoms of premenstrual dysphoric disorder and can be used  in  sub-therapeutic doses or intermittently for  इसके  treatment .
Sertraline shares the common side effects and contraindications of  अन्य   ssris  ,  साथ  high rates of nausea , diarrhea , insomnia , and sexual  पक्ष  effects  ;  however , it does  नहीं  cause  वज़न   लाभ  ,  और   इसके  effects on both  संज्ञान  and vigilance are relatively mild .
In pregnant women taking sertraline , the  ड्रग   थी  present in significant  एकाग्रता  in  fetal  blood  ,  and was also associated with a higher rate of various birth  दोषों   .
Similarly to other antidepressants , the use of sertraline for depression may be associated  साथ   a   उच्चतर  rate of suicidality  .
the  Five Heartbeats is a 1991 musical  नाटक  film directed by Robert Townsend , who co-wrote the script with Keenan Ivory  wayans  .
वितरित  by 20th Century Fox ,  the  film 's main cast includes Townsend  ,  Michael Wright , Leon  रॉबिन्सन  , Harry J. Lennix ,  tico  Wells  ,  Harold Nicholas of the Nicholas Brothers ,  और  Diahann Carroll .
The plot of the film ( which is loosely based  on  the  जीवनदान  of  अनेक   कलाकारों   :  The Dells  ,  The Temptations , Four Tops ,  विल्सन  Pickett  ,   जेम्स  Brown  ,  Frankie Lymon , Sam Cooke  और  others ) follows the  तीन  decade career of the R  &  B vocal  समूह  The Five Heartbeats  .
the  film depicts the rise and fall  of  a Motown inspired soul  अधिनियम  through the eyes  of  the film 's main protagonist , Donald ``  बतख  '' Matthews ( portrayed by Townsend ) ,  जो   serves  as a narrator  throughout  the  फिल्मी  .
However ,  a  majority of the cinema  is  presented in a consecutive  समय  line  as   opposed  to traditional  फ्लैश   backs   .
The film includes a significant amount  of  original music conceived by various artists for the film 's  साउंडट्रैक  , including singles such as `` A Heart Is a House  लिये  Love ``  ,  `` We Have n't Finished Yet '' , and `` Nothing  लकिन  Love ''  .
The film was released to most North American audiences March 29 , 1991 however it  थी   नहीं  made available to audiences in  अन्य   महाद्वीपों   जबतक  2002 when a DVD was released prior to another DVD release in 2006 for the  फिल्मी  's 15th anniversary .
The  फिल्म  received  मिश्रित  reviews from critics  .
Secretariat ( March 30 , 1970  –   अक्तूबर  4  ,  1989 ) was an American Thoroughbred racehorse that in 1973 became the first U.S .  ट्रिपल   क्राउन   चैंपियन   in   25   सालो  .
he  set race records in all three events in the Series — the Kentucky Derby  (  1:59.4 ) , the Preakness Stakes ( 1:53 ) , and the  belmont   stakes  ( 2:24 ) — records that still stand today .
He is considered to be  एक  of the greatest Thoroughbreds of  सब  time .
In 1999 , ESPN ranked Secretariat the  35th  best  खिलाड़ी   of  the 20th  सदी  , the highest ranking racehorse on  the  list URL_http .
He ranked second  पीछे  Man o ' War in The Blood-Horse 's List of the Top 100  u.S.  Racehorses of the 20th Century .
Secretariat was sired  by   बिंदास   शासक  out of Somethingroyal , by Princequillo .
He  थी   foaled  at The Meadow in Caroline County , Virginia .
Like his  प्रसिद्ध  predecessor Man o ' War  ,   सचिवालय  was a large chestnut colt and was given the  वही  nickname , ``  बिग  Red  .   ''
Secretariat 's grandsire ,  nasrullah  , is also the great-great-grandsire of 1977 Triple Crown winner Seattle Slew .
Owned by Penny  chenery  , he was  प्रशिक्षित  by Lucien  laurin   और   मुख्यतः  ridden  by  Canadian jockey Ron  turcotte  , along with apprentice jockey Paul Feliciano ( first two races )  ,  and veteran Eddie Maple ( last race )  .
he   raced   in   chenery  's Meadow Stable 's blue  और  white  checkered  colors and his  दूल्हे  was Eddie Sweat .
Secretariat stood approximately tall , and weighed , with  a  75-inch girth , in his racing prime  .
A typical 12  v  , 40 Ah Lead-acid  car   बैटरी
an   ऑटोमोटिव   बैटरी  is a  प्रकार  of rechargeable  बैटरी  that supplies electric energy to an automobile .
Usually this refers to  an  SLI battery ( starting , lighting  ,  ignition ) to power the starter  मोटर  , the lights ,  और   the  ignition system  of   a  vehicle’s engine .
Automotive SLI  बैटरी  are  प्रायः  lead-acid  प्रकार  , and are made of six galvanic cells in series to  provide  a 12 volt system  .
प्रत्येक  cell provides 2.1 volts  लिये  a total of 12.6  वोल्ट   at   पूरा  charge .
Heavy vehicles such  as  highway trucks or  tractors  , often equipped with  डीज़ल  engines ,  may   have   दो  batteries in  श्रेणी  for a  24  volt system , or  may  have parallel strings  of   बैटरी   .
Lead-acid batteries are made  up  of plates  of  lead and separate plates of  सीसे  dioxide , which are  submerged  into an electrolyte  समाधान  of  परिचय  38 % sulfuric acid and 62  %  water  .
This  कल्याणकारी  a chemical  प्रतिक्रिया  that releases electrons  ,  allowing them to flow through  conductors   to   उपज  electricity .
As the battery discharges , the acid of  the  electrolyte reacts with  the  materials of the  प्लेटों  , changing  उनके  surface to lead sulfate .
जब  the battery is  recharged  , the  रासायनिक  reaction  is  reversed : the lead  सल्फेट  reforms into lead dioxide  और  lead .
साथ  the plates restored to their original condition , the process may now be repeated .
Battery  रीसाइक्लिंग   of  automotive batteries reduces  the  need for  संसाधन  required for manufacture of new  बैटरी  , diverts toxic lead from  landfills   ,  and prevents risk  of  improper disposal  .
full-time  employment  is  employment in which a person works a minimum  क्रमांक  of hours  पारिभाषित  as such  by  his/her  नियोक्ता  .
full-time  employment often comes  साथ  benefits  कि   हैं  not  typically   offered  to part-time , temporary , or  लचीली   मजदूर  , such  as  annual leave  ,  sickleave  ,  and health insurance  .
Full-time  कार्य   हैं  often considered careers .
They generally  अदा  more than part-time jobs ,  और  usually carry more  घंटों  per week  .
The  मेला  Labor Standards Act ( FLSA ) does  नहीं  define full-time employment  or  part-time employment  .
इस   is  a matter  generally  to be determined by the  नियोक्ता  ( US Department of Labor )  .
The definition by employer can  vary  and is generally  प्रकाशित  in  a  company  's  Employee Handbook .
Companies commonly require  इससे   30–35  or 40  घंटों   प्रति  week to  be  defined as full-time  और   इसलिए  eligible  लिये   लाभ  .
Full-Time status varies  between  company  और   is  often based  on  the  शिफ़्ट  the employee  जरूर   कार्य   दौरान  each work week .
The `` standard ''  कार्य  week consists of five eight-hour days ,  commonly  served between  9:00am   to  5:00PM totaling 40 hours  .
While a four-day week generally consists of four ten-hour days ; it may also consist of  as  little as nine  घंटों  for a total of a 36 hour work week  .
twelve-hour   शिफ्ट  are often three days  प्रति  week , unless the  कम्पनी  has the intention of paying out the employee overtime .
Overtime is legally  सशुल्क  out anytime an  कर्मचारी  works more than 40  घंटों  per  सप्ताह  .
The  विधिक  minimum for overtime starts at Base  अदा  + One-Half .
The increased payout is considered  to  compensate slightly for  the  increased fatigue which a  व्यक्ति  experiences on such  long  shifts  .
Shifts can also be  बहुत  irregular , as  in  retail , but are  स्टिल  full-time if the required number of hours is  पहुँचे  .
There are  कुछ  situations where a person who needs full-time work is dropped  to  part-time , which  is  sometimes a form of  constructive   dismissal  to avoid paying unemployment benefits to a laid-off worker .
Seahorse is the title given to 54 species of marine fish in the genus  हिप्पोकैम्पस   .
`` Hippocampus '' comes  इससे  the Ancient Greek hippos  अर्थ   ``   घोड़ा   ''  and kampos meaning ``  समुद्र  monster ''  .
The  नियंत्रित  Substances Act ( CSA ) was enacted into law by the Congress  of   the  United States as  शीर्षक  II of the Comprehensive  ड्रग  Abuse Prevention and Control Act of 1970 .
The CSA is the  संघीय  U.S. drug policy under which  the  manufacture , importation , possession , use and distribution of certain substances is regulated .
The Act also served as  the  national implementing legislation for  the  Single  सम्मेलन   on  Narcotic Drugs .
The legislation created  पाँच  Schedules (  classifications  ) , with varying qualifications  लिये  a substance to be  शामिल  in each  .
Two federal agencies , the Drug Enforcement Administration and the Food and  ड्रग   प्रशासन   ,  determine  जिससे   substances  are added to or removed from the various schedules ,  हालांकि   the  statute passed  by  Congress created the initial listing  ,  and  कॉंग्रेस   रै  sometimes scheduled other substances through legislation  ऐसे  as the  hillory   J.  Farias and Samantha  reid  Date-Rape Prevention  अधिनियम   of   2000  , which placed  गामा  hydroxybutyrate in  अनुसूची   i  . Classification  निर्णय  are  जरूरी   to  be  बना  on criteria  सहित  potential for abuse (  an  undefined  पद  ) , currently accepted medical  उपयोग  in treatment in the  संयुक्त  States  ,  and  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  treaties .
माया   numerals
Maya numerals are  a  vigesimal ( base  -  twenty ) numeral system used by the  pre-columbian  Maya civilization .
The numerals are made up of three symbols ; zero ( shell  आकार  ) , one ( a dot ) and five ( a  बार  ) .
For example , thirteen is written as three dots in a horizontal  पंक्ति  above two horizontal lines stacked above each other .
Lyndon Baines Johnson  (  August 27  ,  1908 –  जनवरी  22  ,   1973   )  , often referred to as LBJ , was the  36th  President of the United States  (  1963–1969 ) , a  स्थिति  he assumed  बाद   उसके  service  as  the 37th Vice President of the  संयुक्त  States (  1961–1963   )  .
he  is one of only four  लोगों  who  परोसा  in  सब  four  निर्वाचित  federal offices  of  the United States : Representative , Senator  ,   वाइस   अध्यक्ष  , and President .
जॉनसन  , a Democrat from Texas , served as  a   संयुक्त  States Representative from  1937–1949  and as a  सीनेटर  from 1949–1961  ,  including six years as  संयुक्त  States Senate Majority Leader ,  दो  as Senate Minority Leader  और  two  as   सीनेट  Majority Whip .
After  campaigning  unsuccessfully  लिये  the Democratic nomination  in  1960 , Johnson was asked by John F. Kennedy to be his running mate for the 1960  अध्यक्षीय  election .
जॉनसन  succeeded to the presidency following  the  assassination  of  John F.  कैनेडी  on November 22 , 1963 , completed Kennedy 's  पद  and was elected President in his own right , winning by a large margin over Barry Goldwater in the 1964 election .
Johnson was greatly supported  by  the  लोकतांत्रिक   पार्टी   और   as  President , he was  जिम्मेदार  for designing the `` Great Society `` legislation that included laws that upheld civil rights , public broadcasting , Medicare , Medicaid  ,  environmental protection , aid to education ,  और  his `` War on Poverty . ''
Johnson was  प्रसिद्ध   लिये   उसके  domineering personality and the  ``  Johnson treatment , '' his coercion of powerful politicians in  अनुक्रम   to   अग्रिम  legislation  .
Meanwhile ,  जॉनसन  escalated American involvement  in  the Vietnam War , from 16,000 American  advisors/soldiers   in  1963 to 550,000 combat troops  in  early 1968  ,  as American casualties soared and the peace process bogged down .
The involvement stimulated a large angry antiwar movement based especially on  विश्वविद्यालयों  campuses in the U.S.  और  abroad .
Summer riots broke out in most major cities after 1965 , and crime rates soared , as his opponents  उठाया  demands for `` law and order ''  नीतियों   .
The Democratic Party  विभाजित   in   अनेक  feuding factions , and after Johnson did  poorly  in  the  1968 New Hampshire  प्राथमिक  , he ended his bid for reelection .
Republican Richard Nixon was  निर्वाचित  to succeed him .
Historians argue  कि  Johnson 's presidency marked the peak of modern liberalism  in  the United States after the New Deal  era   .
Johnson  is  ranked favorably by some historians  क्युकी  of his  घरेलू   नीतियों   .
प्रोजेस्टेरोन  also known as P4 ( pregn-4-ene-3,20-dione ) is a  c-21  steroid hormone involved  in   the  female menstrual cycle  ,  pregnancy  (  supports gestation ) and embryogenesis of  इंसानो  and other species .
Progesterone belongs to a class of hormones called progestogens ,  और  is the  प्रमुख  naturally occurring human progestogen .
बिग  Bird is a  समर्थक   of  the children 's television show Sesame Street  .
Officially performed by  caroll  Spinney since 1969 , he  is  an eight-foot two-inch (  249  cm )  लम्बा  bright primrose-yellow bird .
he  can  रोलर  skate , ice skate  ,  dance , sing  ,  write poetry , draw and even ride  a  unicycle  .
But despite this  चौड़ी  array of talents , he is prone to frequent misunderstandings , on  एक  occasion even  गायन  the alphabet  as  one big  long  word ( from  the  song called `` ABC-DEF-GHI , '' pronounced `` ab-keddef-gajihkel-monop-quristuv-wixyz '' ) , pondering what  it  could  कभी  mean .
He  जीवनदान  in  a   विशाल  nest behind the  123  Sesame Street brownstone and  रै  a  टेडी  bear named Radar  .
webtrends  is a  निजी  company headquartered in Portland , Oregon , United States .
It provides web , social  ,  and mobile analytics and other software solutions related to  विपणन  intelligence .
The company was founded in 1993  और   अभी  serves  अधिक  than 10,000 large and small firms. < ref name='Intelligent Enterprise 2007-05-21 ' >
The  दूसरी  Crusade ( 1145–1149 ) was  the   दूसरी  major crusade  शुभारम्भ   इससे  Europe .
The  दूसरी  Crusade was  प्रारंभ  in  जवाब  to the fall of the County  of  Edessa the previous year to the forces of Zengi .
The county  था   महरूम   संस्थापित  during the First Crusade  (  1096–1099 ) by Baldwin of Boulogne in 1098  .
While  it  was the  पहला  Crusader state to be  संस्थापित  ,  it  was also the first to fall .
The Second Crusade was  घोषित  by Pope Eugene III  ,  and was  the   पहला  of the crusades to be led by European kings  ,  namely  लुई  VII of  फ़्रांस  and Conrad III of Germany , with help  इससे  a number of other European nobles .
The armies of the two  किंग्स  marched separately across  यूरोपीय  .
After crossing Byzantine territory into  आनातोलिया  , both  सेना   यहूद  separately defeated  by  the  seljuq  Turks .
The main Western  ईसाई  source  ,  Odo of Deuil , and  syriac  Christian  स्त्रोत  claim that  the  Byzantine emperor  मैनुएल   i  Comnenus secretly hindered the crusaders ' progress ,  विशेषकर   in  Anatolia where he is alleged  to  have deliberately ordered Turks to attack them .
लुई  and Conrad and  the  remnants  of  their armies reached Jerusalem and , in 1148  ,  participated in an ill-advised attack  on  Damascus .
The crusade  in  the east was a failure for the crusaders and a great victory for the Muslims .
It would ultimately  have   a  key  influence  on  the  fall  of   जेरूसलम  and  दे  rise to the Third Crusade at the end of the 12th  सदी  .
The only  कामयाबी   of   the  Second Crusade came to a combined force  of  13,000 Flemish , Frisian , Norman , English , Scottish  ,   और  German crusaders in 1147  .
यात्राएं  from England  ,  by ship , to the Holy  जमीन  , the army stopped and  helped  the smaller (  7,000  ) Portuguese  फौज  in the capture of Lisbon , expelling its Moorish  occupants  .
Wal-Mart Stores , Inc. ( )  ,  branded as Walmart , is an American multinational retail corporation that runs chains of large  छूट  department stores and warehouse stores .
the  company is the  संसार  's  तीसरा  largest public corporation , according to  the   सौभाग्य   वैश्विक  500 list in 2012 , the biggest private employer in the  संसार   साथ  over  दो   लाख  employees  ,   और   is  the largest retailer in the world .
Walmart remains a family-owned business , as  the  company is controlled by the Walton  परिवार  , who own a 48 percent stake in Walmart .
it  is  भी  one  of  the world 's most valuable  कंपनियाँ  .
The company  थी  founded  by  Sam  वाल्टन   in  1962 , incorporated on October 31 , 1969 ,  और  publicly traded on the New York Stock Exchange in 1972 .
It is headquartered in Bentonville ,  अरकंसास   .
Walmart is also the largest grocery retailer in the United States .
In 2009  ,  it generated 51 percent of  इसके  US  $  258 billion sales in  the  U.S. from  किराना  business .
It also owns  और  operates the Sam 's Club retail warehouses in North  अमेरिका   .
By 1988 ,  wal-mart   थी  the  सबसे  profitable  रिटेलर  in  the  US , and by November 1990  ,   it  outsold K-mart .
By 1991  it  outsold Sears in  खुदरा  , making  it  America 's largest  रिटेलर  , a distinction it  स्टिल  holds  .
walmart  has 8,500 stores in  15   देशों  ,  अंतर्गत  55 different names .
The company  operates  under the Walmart name in  the  United  राज्य  ,  सहित  the 50 states and Puerto Rico .
It operates in  मैक्सिको  as  walmex  ,  in  the United Kingdom as Asda , in Japan as Seiyu , and in India as Best Price  .
It has wholly  स्वामित्व  operations in Argentina , Brazil , and  कनाडा  .
walmart   's  investments  बाहर  North America have had  मिश्रित  results  :  its operations in the United  किंगडम  ,  दक्षिण  America ,  और   चीन  are highly successful , whereas ventures in Germany and South Korea were unsuccessful .
Robert William  गेरी  Moore ( 4 April  1952   –  6 February 2011 ) , was a Northern Irish  संगीतकार   ,   सबसे  widely recognised  as  a singer and guitarist .
In a career dating  वापस  to  the   1960s  , Moore played  साथ  artists including Phil  lynott   और  Brian  downey  during his teens , leading  उसे  to memberships with the Irish  bands  Skid Row and Thin Lizzy on three separate occasions .
Moore shared the  स्टेज   साथ  such blues and rock luminaries as B.B .  किंग  , Albert King ,  कोलोसियम   ii   ,  George Harrison and Greg Lake , as well  as  having a successful solo career .
He guested on  a  number of albums recorded  by  high profile musicians , including a cameo appearance playing the lead guitar solo  on  `` She 's My Baby ``  इससे  Traveling Wilburys Vol . 3 .
An example of  रैक  mounted servers
a  web hosting  सेवा  is a type of Internet hosting service  कि  allows individuals and  संगठन  to make their  जालस्थल  accessible via the World  चौड़ी  Web  .
Web hosts are  कंपनियाँ  that provide  स्पेस  on a  सर्वर  owned or  leased  for use by clients , as well as providing Internet connectivity , typically in a data center .
Web hosts can also provide data center space and connectivity to the Internet for other servers located in their  आंकड़ा  center , called  colocation  , also  ज्ञात  as Housing in Latin America or France  .
The scope of web hosting services  varies  greatly .
the  most  मौलिक  is web page  और   small-scale   संचिका  hosting  ,  where files can be uploaded via File Transfer Protocol  (  FTP  )  or a  वेब  interface .
The files  हैं  usually  वितरित  to the Web  ``  as is '' or with minimal processing .
Many Internet service providers ( ISPs ) offer  इस  service free to subscribers .
Individuals and organizations  may  also obtain Web page hosting from alternative service providers  .
Personal web site hosting is typically free , advertisement-sponsored , or inexpensive  .
कारोबार  web site hosting often has a higher  व्यय   depending  upon the size and type of the website .
Single page hosting is generally sufficient for personal  वेब  pages .
A complex site calls for a more  व्यापक   पैकेज  that provides database support and  अनुप्रयोग  development platforms  (  e.g  .  PHP , Java , Ruby on Rails , ColdFusion  ,   or  ASP.NET ) .
ये   सुविधाएं   allow  customers to write or install  स्क्रिप्ट  for applications like  forums  and content management  .
Also , Secure Sockets Layer ( SSL ) is typically used for e-commerce .
the   मेजबान  may also provide an interface or  कंट्रोल  panel for managing the Web server and installing scripts ,  as   खूब  as other modules and service applications like  e-mail   .
Some hosts specialize in certain  तन्त्र  or services ( e.g . e-commerce  )  , which are commonly used by larger companies that  outsource  network infrastructure .
Obstetrics  (  from the Latin obstare  ,  `` to stand  by  '' ) is the medical specialty dealing with the care of all women 's reproductive tracts and their children during pregnancy ( prenatal  काल  ) , childbirth and the postnatal period  .
Many obstetricians are also gynecologists , meaning they perform in both specialties .
in   the  United  राज्य  , these physicians are commonly referred to as OB/GYNs  .
The Wright brothers , Orville (  अगस्त  19 , 1871 –  जनवरी  30 , 1948 ) and Wilbur ( April 16 , 1867 – May 30 , 1912  )  ,  यहूद  two American brothers  ,  inventors , and aviation pioneers  जो   यहूद   credited  with inventing and building the world 's first successful airplane and  बनाना  the first controlled , powered and sustained heavier-than-air human flight  ,  on December 17 ,  1903  .
From 1905 to 1907 , the brothers developed their flying machine into the first practical fixed-wing aircraft .
Although not  the  first to build  और   मक्खी  experimental aircraft , the Wright  भाइयो  were the first  to  invent aircraft controls that  बना  fixed-wing  संचालित   उड़ान  possible  .
The brothers ' fundamental breakthrough was their  आविष्कार  of three-axis control , which enabled  the  pilot to  steer  the aircraft effectively and to maintain its equilibrium  .
This method  became   मानक  and remains standard on fixed-wing aircraft of all kinds  .
From the beginning  of  their aeronautical work  ,  the Wright brothers focused on  विकासशील  a reliable method of pilot  कंट्रोल   as   the  key  to  solving `` the flying problem '' .
This approach differed significantly from  अन्य  experimenters of  the  time who  put  more emphasis  on  developing powerful engines  .
Using a  छोटी   homebuilt  wind tunnel , the Wrights also collected more accurate data than any  पहले  , enabling  उन्हें   to   डिज़ाइन  and build  विंग्स  and propellers that were more efficient than any before .
Their first  u.S.  patent , 821,393 , did not  अर्जी  invention  of   a  flying  यंत्र  , but rather , the invention  of  a system of aerodynamic control that manipulated  a  flying  यंत्र  's surfaces .
They gained the mechanical skills  अनिवार्य  for their success by working for years in their  दूकान  with printing  दबाता  , bicycles , motors , and other  मशीनरी  .
Their work  साथ   साइकिल  in particular influenced their belief that an unstable vehicle  जैसे  a flying machine could be controlled and balanced with practice  .
इससे  1900 until  उनके  first powered flights in  लेट  1903  ,   वे   conducted  extensive glider tests that also developed  उनके   कौशल  as pilots .
Their bicycle shop employee Charlie Taylor became  an  important  भाग  of the team , building their first aircraft  इंजन  in close collaboration with the  भाइयो  .
The  राइट  brothers ' status as inventors of the airplane has been subject to counter-claims by various parties .
much  controversy persists over the many competing claims  of  early aviators .
America 's Next Top Model  ,  Cycle 12 is the twelfth cycle of  अमेरिका  's  अगला  Top Model  और  the sixth season to air  on   the  CW network .
It premiered on March 4 , 2009 .
The cycle 's catch phrase is `` Get  in  The Fold . ''
The cycle 's promotional song is Lady Gaga 's ``  the  Fame ''  .
The prizes for  इस  cycle are:
A modeling  अनुबंध  with Elite Model Management .
A fashion spread  और  cover  in  Seventeen .
A  100,000  contract with CoverGirl cosmetics .
The first half of the cycle took place in  नई  York  नगर  , moving the show  वापस  from Los  एंजिल्स  last season .
The  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  destination for this cycle is São Paulo  ,  Brazil , the series first visit to South America  .
The number of girls was  घटाया  to 13  ,  the  पहला  time since Cycle 9 , after being maintained at 14 in the  पिछला   दो   चक्र  .
This was the last time Paulina Porizkova participated as judge .
The winner was 20-year-old Teyona Anderson from Woodstown , New Jersey .
This season averaged 4.35 million  दर्शक  per episode  .
Exxon Mobil Corporation , or ExxonMobil , is an American multinational oil and gas corporation headquartered  in  Irving ,  टेक्सास   ,  United States .
It  is  a direct descendant of John D. Rockefeller 's Standard Oil company , and was formed  on  November 30  ,  1999 ,  by  the merger of Exxon  और  Mobil .
It is affiliated with Imperial Oil which operates in Canada .
ExxonMobil is  the  world 's largest  कम्पनी  by revenue and in 2013  ,  became the largest publicly traded company by market  capitalization  in the world .
the  company is  क्रमित  # 5 globally  in  Forbes Global 2000 list in 2013 .
Exxon Mobil  's  reserves were 72 billion oil-equivalent  barrels  at the end of 2007 and , at  तब  ( 2007 )  दरों  of production  ,  are expected to last  over   14   सालो  .
With  37  oil refineries in 21 countries constituting a combined daily refining  क्षमता   of  , Exxon Mobil  is  the largest refiner in the  संसार  , a title  कि  was also  संबद्ध   साथ   मानक  Oil  चूंकि  its incorporation in 1870  .
exxonmobil  is the largest of the world 's supermajors with daily production of 3.921  लाख   boe   (  barrels of  आयल   समतुल्य  ) .
In 2008  ,  this  थी  approximately 3 %  of  world production  ,  which is less  than  several of  the  largest state-owned petroleum companies .
जब  ranked by  आयल  and gas reserves it  is  14th in the world with less than 1 %  of  the total .
A 2012 article  in  The Daily  टेलीग्राफ  says that ExxonMobil has `` grown into  एक   of  the  planet’s  most hated corporations ,  समर्थ  to determine American foreign  नीति  and the fate of entire nations '' .
In  शर्तें   of  its environmental record ,  exxonmobil   increasingly  drills  in   terrains  leased to them by dictatorships , such as those in Chad and Equatorial Guinea .
Lee Raymond , the corporation’s  मुख्य  executive until 2005  ,  was `` notoriously sceptical about climate change and disliked government interference  at  any level '' .
the  company was widely  criticized   लिये  its slow response  to  cleaning its 1989  valdez  oil spill  in  Alaska  .
This  आलेख  is about the Globe Theatre of Shakespeare .
For the modern reconstruction in London , see Shakespeare 's Globe .
For other uses , see Globe Theatre ( disambiguation ) .
The Globe Theatre was a theatre  in   लंदन  associated with William Shakespeare .
It  थी  built in 1599  by  Shakespeare 's playing company , the  रब  Chamberlain 's Men , on  जमीन   स्वामित्व  by Thomas Brend and  inherited   by  his son , Nicholas Brend and grandson  सर  Matthew  brend   ,  and was  नष्ट  by  आग  on 29 June 1613 .
A  दूसरी  Globe Theatre was built on the same site  by  June  1614  and closed in 1642  .
A  आधुनिक  reconstruction of the Globe , named `` Shakespeare 's  ग्लोब  `` ,  खोली  in 1997  लगभग   इससे  the site of the original theatre .
It 's a Wonderful Life is a 1946 American Christmas drama film produced and directed by Frank Capra , based on the  छोटी  story `` The Greatest Gift `` , which Philip Van Doren  stern  wrote in 1939 and privately published in 1945 .
