the  film is considered one  of  the most loved films in American cinema  और   रै  become traditional viewing during the Christmas  ऋतु  , alongside  लोकप्रिय  classics such as Charles Dickens ' A Christmas Carol .
The  फिल्मी   सितारों  James Stewart as George Bailey , a man who has given up his dreams in order  to   सहायता  others and  जिनकी  imminent suicide on Christmas Eve brings about the  हस्तक्षेप  of his guardian  देवदूत  ,  क्लेरेंस  Odbody (  हेनरी  Travers ) .
क्लेरेंस  shows George all the lives he has touched and how different life in his community  of   bedford  Falls would be had he never been born .
Despite initially performing poorly at the box office due to high production  लागत  and stiff competition at the time of its release , the film has come to be  regarded  as  a  classic and is a staple of Christmas television  around  the world  .
Theatrically  ,  the film  's  break-even point was actually  $  6.3  लाख  , approximately twice the production cost  ,   a  figure it never came close to achieving  in  its  आरंभिक  release .
An  appraisal   in  2006 reported : ``  हालांकि  it  थी  not  the   पूरा  box office  विफलता  that today everyone believes ... it was initially a major disappointment  और  confirmed , at  तनिक   to  the studios , that Capra was  no  longer capable  of  turning out the populist features that made his films the must-see ,  money-making  events  वे  once were . ''
the  film was nominated for  पाँच  Oscars and has been recognized by the American Film Institute as one of the 100  बेहतरीन  American films ever made , placing number 11  on  its  आरंभिक  1998 greatest  फिल्म   सूची  , and  होता   भी  place number one on its list of  the  most  प्रेरणादायक  American films of all time .
Data Warehouse Overview
In computing , a  आंकड़ा  warehouse  or  enterprise data warehouse ( DW , DWH , or EDW  )   is  a database used for reporting and data analysis .
It is a central repository of data which is created by  integrating  data  इससे  one  or  more disparate sources .
Data warehouses store current as well as historical data and are used for creating  चर्चित  reports  लिये   वरिष्ठ  management reporting such as annual and quarterly comparisons .
The data stored in the  गोदाम   हैं  uploaded from  the  operational systems  (  such as marketing , sales etc. , shown in  the  figure to the right ) .
The data may pass through an operational  आंकड़ा  store for additional  परिचालन  before  वे   हैं  used in the DW for reporting  .
the  typical ETL -based  आंकड़ा  warehouse  उपयोग  staging  ,  data integration , and access layers  to  house its key functions  .
The  स्टेजिंग  layer or staging database stores raw data  निकाली  from each of the disparate source data systems .
The integration layer  integrates  the disparate  आंकड़ा  sets by transforming the data from  the  staging layer often storing this transformed data in an operational  आंकड़ा  store ( ODS ) database  .
The  एकीकृत  data are then moved to yet another  डेटाबेस  , often called the data warehouse database ,  जहाँ  the data is  arranged  into hierarchical groups often called  आयाम  and into facts and aggregate facts .
the  combination of facts and  आयाम  is sometimes called  a   स्टार   स्कीमा  .
The  अभिगम  layer helps users retrieve data .
A  आंकड़ा  warehouse  constructed  from an integrated data source systems does not require ETL  ,  staging databases  ,  or operational data store  databases  .
The integrated data source systems may be  माना   to   be  a part of a distributed operational data store layer .
आंकड़ा   संघ  methods  or  data virtualization  विधि  may  be  used to access the distributed integrated  सोर्स   आंकड़ा  systems to consolidate  और  aggregate data directly into the data warehouse database tables .
Unlike  the   etl-based  data warehouse , the integrated source data systems and  the  data  गोदाम   हैं  all integrated since there is  no  transformation  of  dimensional or  सन्दर्भ   आंकड़ा  .
This integrated data warehouse architecture supports  the  drill down from the  कुल  data of the  आंकड़ा  warehouse to the transactional data of the  एकीकृत  source data systems .
Data warehouses can  be  subdivided into data marts  .
Data marts store subsets of  आंकड़ा  from a warehouse .
This definition of  the   आंकड़ा  warehouse  focuses  on data storage  .
The main source of the data is cleaned  ,  transformed  ,  cataloged and  बना  available  लिये  use by managers  और  other business professionals  लिये   आंकड़ा  mining , online analytical processing , market research and decision support ( Marakas & O'Brien 2009 ) .
However , the means to retrieve  और   analyze  data ,  to  extract  ,  transform and  लोड  data  ,  and  to  manage the data dictionary  हैं  also considered essential components  of  a  आंकड़ा   warehousing  system .
Many references to data warehousing use this broader context .
Thus , an expanded definition for data warehousing includes business intelligence tools , tools to extract , transform  और  load data  into  the  repository  ,  और  tools  to  manage  और   retrieve  metadata .
Portland stone quarry  on   the  Isle  of  Portland , England
An abandoned construction  कुल  quarry near Adelaide , South Australia
A quarry is a type  of  open-pit mine from which rock or minerals  हैं  extracted .
Quarries are generally used for extracting  भवन  materials , such as dimension stone , construction aggregate , riprap , sand , and gravel .
They are  प्रायः  collocated with concrete  और  asphalt plants  due  to the requirement for large amounts of  कुल  in those materials  .
Open mines that produce minerals are typically referred to as open pit mines .
The word quarry can  शामिल  underground  quarrying  for  स्टोन   ,  such as Bath stone .
Mormons ( ) are a religious and cultural group  सम्बन्धित  to Mormonism , the principal branch  of  the Latter Day  संत  movement of Restorationist Christianity , which began with the  visions  of  जोसेफ  Smith  in  upstate New  यॉर्क   दौरान  the 1820s  .
बाद  Smith 's  मौत  in 1844 the  mormons  followed Brigham Young to what  होता   become  the Utah Territory  .
Today Mormons are  समझा  to be members of The Church of Jesus  मसीह  of  latter-day  Saints ( LDS Church ) .
Some Mormons are also either  स्वतंत्र   or  non-practicing .
the  center of  mormon  cultural influence is in Utah , and  उत्तर  America has more Mormons than any other continent , though the majority  of  Mormons live outside the United  राज्य  .
Mormons  have  developed  a  strong sense of communality that  तना   इससे   उनके  doctrine and  इतिहास  .
During the 19th  सदी   mormon   converts  tended to gather to a central geographic  स्थान  , and between 1852 and 1890  a  minority  of  Mormons openly practiced  बहुवचन   विवाह  ,  a   रूप  of religious polygamy .
Mormons dedicate large amounts  of   समय  and  संसाधन  to serving in their  गिरिजाघर  , and many  यंग   mormons  choose to serve a full-time proselytizing mission .
Mormons  have  a health code that eschews alcoholic beverages ,  तम्बाकू  , coffee , tea ,  और  other  addictive  substances .
They tend to be very family-oriented , and have strong connections across  पीढियां  and  साथ  extended family , reflective of their belief that families can be  sealed  together beyond death and throughout  शाश्वत  .
Mormons also have a strict  विधि  of chastity , requiring  abstention  from  यौन  relations outside of marriage and strict fidelity within marriage .
mormons  self-identify as Christian , though some of their beliefs differ  इससे  mainstream Christianity .
Mormons believe in  the  Bible , as well as other books of scripture , such as  the  Book of Mormon .
वे  have a unique view of cosmology ,  और   मानना   कि  all people are  spirit-children  of God .
Mormons believe that returning to God requires following the  उदाहरण  of Jesus Christ , and accepting his atonement  through  ordinances such as baptism .
वे  believe that Christ 's church was  लौटी  through Joseph  स्मिथ  , and is  हिदायत  by living prophets  और  apostles .
सेंट्रल  to  mormon  faith  is  the  विश्वास  that God speaks to his children  और  answers  उनके  prayers .
in  financial accounting , assets  हैं  economic resources .
Anything tangible  or  intangible that is capable of being owned or controlled to produce value and that is  आयोजित  to have positive  आर्थिक  value  is   माना  an asset .
Simply stated  ,  assets represent value  of  ownership that can  be  converted into cash  (   हालांकि  cash itself is also considered an asset  )  .
The balance  चादर  of a firm  रिकॉर्ड  the  monetaryj  .
G. Siegel , N. Dauber & J. K.  shim  , `` The  बनियान  Pocket CPA '' , Wiley , 2005.There are different methods of assessing  the  monetary value of the assets recorded on the Balance Sheet .
In some cases  ,  the Historical  लागत  is used ; such that  the  value of the asset when it was bought in the past is used as the  मौद्रिक  value .
in  other instances , the  उपस्थित  fair  मार्केट  value  of  the asset is used to determine the value shown on the balance sheet .
value of the  एसेट   स्वामित्व  by the firm .
It  is   धन  and  अन्य  valuables belonging  to  an individual  or  business .
Two major  एसेट  classes are tangible  एसेट  and intangible assets .
ठोस  assets contain various subclasses , including current  एसेट  and fixed  assets.j  .
Downes , J.E . Goodman ,  ``   शब्दकोष  of Finance & Investment Terms ''  ,  Baron 's Financial Guides , 2003 Current assets include inventory , while fixed assets include such  वस्तुएं  as buildings and equipment .J  .  Downes , J.E . Goodman , `` Dictionary of Finance & Investment  शर्तें   ''  , Baron  's  Financial Guides , 2003 ; and J. G. Siegel  ,  N. Dauber & J. K. Shim ,  ``  The Vest  जेब  CPA  ''  , Wiley  ,  2005 .
Intangible assets are nonphysical resources  और   अधिकारों  that have a value to the firm because  वे  give the firm some  दयालु  of advantage in the market place  .
Examples of intangible assets are goodwill , copyrights , trademarks , patents and  कंप्यूटर  programs , and financial  एसेट  , including  ऐसे  items as accounts receivable , bonds and stocks .
A neuron  (  or ;  भी  known as a neurone  or  nerve cell  )  is an electrically excitable cell that processes and transmits information through electrical  और  chemical signals  .
A chemical  सिग्नल   occurs   via  a synapse , a  specialized  connection with other cells .
Neurons  कनेक्ट  to each other  to  form neural networks .
Neurons are  the   कोर  components of the nervous system , which includes the brain , spinal cord ,  और  peripheral ganglia .
A number  of   specialized  types of neurons exist : sensory neurons respond  to  touch , sound , light and numerous  अन्य  stimuli affecting cells of the sensory organs  कि   तब  send  सिग्नल  to the spinal cord and brain  .
Motor neurons receive  सिग्नल  from the  दिमाग  and spinal cord , cause muscle  contractions  , and affect glands .
Interneurons connect  न्यूरॉन्स  to other neurons within the same region of the brain or spinal cord .
A typical neuron  possesses  a cell body ( often  पुकारा  the soma ) , dendrites , and an  axon  .
Dendrites  हैं   पतला   structures  that arise from the cell  देह  , often  extending  for hundreds of micrometres and branching multiple times ,  giving  rise to a complex `` dendritic tree  ''   .
an  axon is a special cellular  एक्सटेंशन  that arises from the cell body at  a  site called the axon hillock and travels  लिये  a distance , as far  as  1  मीटर  in humans or even more in other species .
The cell body of a neuron frequently gives rise to multiple dendrites , but never  to  more than one axon  ,  although the axon may branch hundreds of times before it terminates .
At  the  majority of synapses , signals are sent  इससे  the axon of one neuron to a  dendrite  of another .
वहीँ   हैं  , however , many  अपवाद  to these rules :  न्यूरॉन्स  that lack dendrites , neurons that have no axon , synapses that connect an axon to another axon or a dendrite to  another   dendrite   ,  etc .
All  न्यूरॉन्स  are electrically  excitable  , maintaining  वोल्टेज  gradients  आरपार   उनके   झिल्लियों  by means of metabolically driven ion pumps , which combine  साथ  ion channels embedded in the membrane to generate intracellular-versus-extracellular concentration differences of ions such as sodium , potassium ,  chloride   ,  and calcium .
Changes in  the  cross-membrane voltage can alter the function of voltage-dependent ion  चैनल्स   .
If the  वोल्टेज  changes by a large  पर्याप्त  amount , an all-or-none electrochemical pulse  पुकारा  an action potential is generated , which travels rapidly along the cell 's axon , and activates synaptic  कनेक्शन्स  with  अन्य  cells when it arrives .
Neurons  do  not undergo  कोशिका  division .
In most cases ,  न्यूरॉन्स  are generated by special  प्रकार  of stem  कोशिकाएं   .
Astrocytes ,  a  type of glial cell  ,   have   भी  been  observed   to  turn into neurons by  पुण्य  of the stem  कोशिका   characteristic  pluripotency .
in  humans , neurogenesis largely ceases during adulthood—but in two brain areas , the hippocampus and olfactory bulb , there is strong evidence for generation of substantial numbers of  नई  neurons .
Super Bowl XLIII was an American  फ़ुटबॉल  game between  the  American  फ़ुटबॉल  Conference ( AFC )  चैंपियन   पिट्सबर्ग  Steelers and  the   नेशनल  Football  सम्मेलन  ( NFC ) champion Arizona Cardinals to decide  the   नेशनल  Football League ( NFL ) champion for the 2008 season .
The  स्टीलर्स  defeated the Cardinals by the score of 27–23 .
The game  थी  played on February 1  ,  2009 , at  रेमंड   जेम्स  Stadium  in  Tampa ,  फ्लोरिडा  .
With this  जीत  , the  स्टीलर्स  became the first team  to  win  छह   सुपर  Bowls .
पिट्सबर्ग  ,  जो   समाप्त  the regular season with a 12–4  रिकार्ड  , also won their  दूसरी  Super  कटोरी  in four years after winning Super  कटोरी  XL at the end of the 2005 season .
the   कार्डिनल्स  entered  the   खेल  seeking  उनके  first NFL title since 1947 , the  longest  championship drought  in  the league .
The club became an unexpected winner during the regular season  ,  compiling a  9–7  record , and the playoffs  साथ  the aid of head coach Ken Whisenhunt ,  जो  was  the  Steelers '  अप्रिय   समन्वयक  in  सुपर  Bowl XL  ,  and the re-emergence  of  quarterback  कर्ट  Warner ,  जो   थी   the   सुपर  Bowl  mvp   in  Super  कटोरी  XXXIV with his former team , St. Louis Rams  .
Pittsburgh  कूद  to a 17–7  मध्यांतर  lead , aided by linebacker James Harrison 's  सुपर   कटोरी  record 100-yard  interception  return for a touchdown .
trailing  20–7 at the start of the fourth quarter , Arizona scored 16 unanswered points , including wide receiver Larry Fitzgerald  's   64-yard  touchdown reception , to take the lead with  2:37  remaining in the game .
But the Steelers  marched  78  गज  to score on wide  receiver  Santonio Holmes ' 6-yard game-winning touchdown catch with 35 seconds left .
Holmes , who caught nine passes for 131 yards  और  a touchdown ,  सहित   चार  receptions for 73 yards on that final game-winning  ड्राइव  , was named Super Bowl MVP  .
He became the  छठे  wide  receiver  to win the award , and also was the third Pittsburgh receiver to win the award , following Lynn Swann and Hines  वार्ड  .
despite  the  वैश्विक  financial crisis and limited amount of ancillary festivities that  हैं  normally  आयोजित  before the game  ,  the NBC television network broadcast attracted an average U.S. audience of 98.7 million viewers ,  बनाना  it the most watched Super Bowl  in  history to that point .
A diagram of  the   इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक   वर्णक्रम  , showing  विभिन्न   गुण   आरपार  the range  of  frequencies and  wavelengths
The  इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक  spectrum is the range of all possible frequencies of electromagnetic  विकिरण  .
The ``  इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक  spectrum '' of an  ऑब्जेक्ट  has a different  अर्थ  ,  और   is  instead the  characteristic   वितरण  of electromagnetic radiation emitted or absorbed by  कि   particular  object .
The electromagnetic  वर्णक्रम  extends from below  the   कम   बारंबारता  used for  आधुनिक   रेडियो  communication to gamma radiation at the short- wavelength ( high-frequency ) end ,  thereby  covering wavelengths from  हज़ारों   of  kilometers down to a fraction of the size of an  अणु  .
The  सीमा  for long wavelengths is the  आकार  of the universe itself , while it  is  thought that  the  short wavelength limit is in  the  vicinity  of  the Planck length , although in principle the spectrum is infinite and continuous .
Most parts of the electromagnetic spectrum  हैं  used in science for spectroscopic and other probing interactions ,  as   तरीके  to study and characterize matter .
In addition , radiation from various parts of the  वर्णक्रम   रै   मिला  many other uses for  संचार  and  निर्माण   (  see  इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक  radiation for more applications  )  .
Legend
marchantia  , a liverwort
Bryophyte is a  परंपरागत  name used to refer to all  embryophytes  ( land plants  )  that do not have true  vascular  tissue and are therefore  पुकारा  ' non-vascular plants  '  .
Some bryophytes do have specialized tissues for the transport of  जल   ;  however since these do not contain lignin ,  वे   हैं  not considered  to   be  true vascular tissue .
Currently bryophytes  हैं  thought not to be a natural or monophyletic  समूह  ; however the name is convenient and remains in  उपयोग  as  a   सामूहिक  term  लिये  mosses , hornworts , and liverworts .
bryophytes  produce  enclosed  reproductive structures ( gametangia and sporangia ) , but they  उपज  neither flowers nor seeds , reproducing via spores .
The term bryophyte comes from Greek βρύον ,  bryon  ,  ``   tree-moss  ,  oyster-green  ''  +  φυτόν - phyton ``  संयंत्र  '' .
A bank is a financial institution and a financial intermediary that accepts deposits and channels those  जमा   into  lending activities , either directly by  loaning  or indirectly through  पूंजी  markets .
A bank is the connection between  ग्राहक  that have capital deficits  और  customers with capital  surpluses   .
Due to  उनके  influence within a financial system  और   an  economy ,  बैंको  are generally highly  regulated  in  सबसे  countries .
Most banks  operate  under a system known as fractional reserve banking where they hold  तभी   a  small reserve  of  the  निधि  deposited and lend out the rest  लिये  profit .
They are generally subject to minimum  पूंजी   आवश्यकताएँ  which are based on an international set of capital standards , known as the Basel  accords  .
The oldest bank still in  अस्तित्व  is Monte  देई  Paschi di  सियेना  ,  headquartered  in Siena  ,  Italy ,  जिससे  has been operating continuously since 1472 .
It is followed by Berenberg Bank  of  Hamburg  (  1590 ) and Sveriges  riksbank  of Sweden  (  1668 ) .
Banking in its modern  भाव  evolved  in   समृद्ध  cities of Renaissance Italy , such  as  Florence ,  वेनिस   और  Genoa .
in  the history  of  banking , a number of banking dynasties —among them notably Medici , Fugger ,  welser  , Berenberg  ,  Baring and  रोथ्सचाइल्ड  —have played a  सेंट्रल  role  over  many centuries .
The Xbox  is  a video game console manufactured by  microsoft  .
It was released on November 15 , 2001  in  North America ,  फ़रवरी  22 , 2002 in Japan ,  और  March 14 , 2002 in Australia and Europe .
It was Microsoft 's first foray into the gaming console market .
As part  of  the sixth-generation of gaming , the Xbox competed with Sony 's PlayStation 2 , Sega 's  dreamcast  ( which  रोका  American sales before  the  Xbox went on sale ) , and Nintendo 's GameCube  .
The  एक्सबॉक्स  was the first console offered by an American company  बाद  the Atari Jaguar stopped  बिक्री   in  1996 .
The  एकीकृत  Xbox Live service launched in November 2002 allowed players  to  play games online with  a  broadband  कनेक्शन  .
It first competed  साथ  Dreamcast 's online service  लकिन  later  primarily  competed with  प्लेस्टेशन  2 's online  सेवा   .
Although  ये   दो   हैं  free while  एक्सबॉक्स   सजीव  required a subscription , as well as broadband-only connection which was not completely  अपनाया  yet , Xbox Live  थी  a  कामयाबी  due to better servers , features such as a buddy list , and milestone titles like Halo 2 released in  नवम्बर   2004   ,   जिससे  is the best-selling  एक्सबॉक्स   वीडियो   खेल  and  थी  by far  the  most popular online game for  सालो   .
एक्सबॉक्स   's  successor , the Xbox 360 ,  थी  launched in November  2005  .
the  Xbox was discontinued in  लेट  2005 in Japan where sales were poor .
It was discontinued in  लेट  2006 in Europe and early 2007  in  North  अमेरिका  .
The last  एक्सबॉक्स  game  in  Europe was Tony  हॉक  's Project 8 released in November 2006  ,  and the last game  in  North America was Madden NFL  09  released  in   अगस्त  2008  .
Support  लिये  out-of-warranty Xbox consoles  थी  discontinued on March  2   ,  2009 , stating that any  in-warranty  repair now needed will  नहीं  be undertaken  .
Xbox access to Xbox Live was stopped on  अप्रैल  15 , 2010 .
The Gospel According to John ( Greek τὸ  κατὰ  Ἰωάννην  εὐαγγέλιον   )  , commonly referred to  as  the Gospel of John or simply John and often referred to in New Testament scholarship as  the   चौथी  Gospel , is an account of  the   पब्लिक  ministry of Jesus .
It begins with the witness and affirmation by John the  बैपटिस्ट  and concludes with the death  ,   दफ़न   ,  resurrection , and post-resurrection appearances  of  Jesus .
इस   खाता  is fourth of the canonical gospels  ,   बाद  the synoptics Matthew , Mark and  ल्यूक  .
states that the book derives  इससे  the testimony of the ' disciple  जिसको  Jesus  loved  .  '
Along with Peter , the unnamed disciple is  विशेषकर   बंद   to  Jesus ,  और  early-church  परंपरा  identified  उसे  as John the  apostle  , one  of  Jesus '  बारह  Apostles .
The gospel is closely  सम्बन्धित  in style and content  to  the three surviving  epistles  of John such that commentators treat the  चार  books  साथ  , yet , according to  सबसे   आधुनिक  scholars , John was not the author  of  any  of   ये  books .
Recent Christian Scripture scholarship more and more  रै  placed John within a first-century Jewish context .
Raymond E. Brown did pioneering work  to  trace  the  development  of  the  परंपरा  from which the gospel arose .
The  प्रवचन  seem to  be  concerned with the actual issues of the church-and-synagogue debate at the time when the Gospel was written  .
It is notable that ,  in  the gospel ,  the   जातियाँ   स्टिल  appears to define itself primarily against Judaism , rather than as part  of  a wider Christian church .
Though  christianity  started as a  गति  within Judaism , gradually Christians and Jews  became  bitterly opposed .
John presents a  ``  higher '' Christology than the synoptics , meaning that it describes  यीशु  as the incarnation of the divine Logos through whom  सब  things were made , as the  ऑब्जेक्ट  of veneration ,  और   अधिक   explicitly  as God  incarnate  .
तभी  in John does Jesus talk  at  length about himself and his divine role , often shared with the disciples only .
Against the synoptics , John  focuses  largely  on  different miracles ( including resurrecting  lazarus   )   ,  given as  लक्षण  meant to engender faith .
Synoptic elements such as parables  और  exorcisms are not found in John .
It presents a  एहसास  eschatology in which  मोक्ष  is already  उपस्थित  for the believer .
The Plagues of Egypt ( ) , also called the Ten Plagues ( ) or the Biblical  plagues  ,  यहूद   टेन  calamities that  ,   according   to  the biblical Book of  exodus  , Israel  's   परमेश्वर  , Yahweh , inflicted upon  मिश्र   to  persuade Pharaoh  to   रिलीज  the ill-treated Israelites from slavery .
pharaoh  capitulated after the tenth plague , triggering the Exodus of the Jewish  लोगों  .
the  plagues were designed to contrast  the  power  of  Yahweh  साथ  the  नपुंसकता  of Egypt 's various gods  .
Some  टीकाकारों  have  संबद्ध  several of the plagues with judgment on specific gods associated with the  nile  ,  प्रजनन  and  प्राकृतिक  phenomena .
The plagues of Egypt  हैं  also mentioned in the Quran ( 7,133–136 ) .
According to the Book of Exodus , God proclaims that  सब  the gods of  मिश्र  will be judged through the tenth and final plague:
John Martin 's painting of the plague of hail and fire ( 1823 ) .
A role-playing game (  आरपीजी   और  sometimes roleplaying game ) is a game in which players assume the roles of characters in a fictional setting .
Players take responsibility  लिये  acting out these roles within a narrative  ,  either through literal acting or  through  a  प्रक्रम  of structured decision-making  or  character development  .
Actions taken within many games succeed or fail according  to  a formal system of  नियम  and guidelines .
There are several forms of RPG .
The original form , sometimes called the tabletop RPG , is  conducted   through  discussion ,  whereas  in live action role-playing games  (  LARP ) players physically perform their  वर्ण  ' actions .
In both of these forms ,  an  arranger called a game master (  gm  ) usually decides on the  नियम  and setting to be  प्रयुक्त  and acts as referee , while  प्रत्येक  of the other players plays the  भूमिका  of a single character  .
Several varieties  of   आरपीजी  also  मौजूद   in  electronic media , such as  multi-player  text-based MUDs and their graphics-based  successors  , massively multiplayer online role-playing games ( MMORPGs  )  .
Role-playing  खेल  also include single-player  ऑफ़लाइन  role-playing video games in which players control a character or team who undertake quests , and may include capabilities that advance using statistical mechanics .
These games often share  जमावट  and rules  साथ  tabletop RPGs ,  लकिन  emphasize  अक्षर   उन्नति  more than collaborative storytelling  .
Despite this variety of forms , some game forms such as trading  कार्ड  games and wargames that  हैं   सम्बन्धित  to role-playing games  may  not  be  included .
role-playing   कार्यकलाप  may sometimes  be  present in such games , but it is not the primary  फ़ोकस  .
the  term  is  also sometimes used to describe roleplay simulation games and exercises used in teaching ,  प्रशिक्षण  , and academic research  .
The  अमरीकी  Civil War ( ACW  )  , also known  as   the   युद्ध  between  the  States  or  simply the Civil War ( see naming )  ,  was a civil war fought from 1861 to 1865 between the United  राज्य  ( the `` Union '' or the `` North '' )  और   अनेक  Southern slave states that declared their secession and formed the  confederate  States  of   अमेरिका  ( the `` Confederacy '' or the  ``  South '' ) .
the  war had  इसके  origin in the issue of slavery , especially the extension of slavery into the western territories .
Foreign powers did not intervene .
After four  सालो   of  bloody combat that  बाएँ  over 600,000 soldiers dead  और  destroyed  much   of  the South  's  infrastructure , the  confederacy  collapsed , slavery was abolished , and the difficult Reconstruction process of restoring national  एकता  and guaranteeing rights  to  the freed slaves began .
In the  1860  presidential election  ,  Republicans , led  by  Abraham  lincoln   ,  opposed  expanding  slavery into United States ' territories .
Lincoln won  ,   लकिन  before his  उद्घाटन  on March 4 , 1861 , seven cotton-based  स्लेव  states  formed  the Confederacy .
Outgoing  लोकतांत्रिक   अध्यक्ष  James Buchanan and the incoming Republicans rejected secession as illegal .
Lincoln 's inaugural address declared his administration would not initiate civil war .
Eight remaining slave states  जारी   to  reject  काल्स  for secession .
Confederate forces seized numerous federal forts  भीतर  territory claimed  by  the Confederacy .
A Peace Conference failed to find a compromise ,  और   दोनो  sides prepared for war .
The Confederates assumed that European countries were so dependent on  ``  King Cotton `` that  वे  would intervene ; none  किया  and none recognized the new Confederate States of America .
Hostilities began  on  April 12 , 1861 ,  जब  Confederate  शक्तियां  fired upon Fort Sumter , a key fort held by Union troops  in  South Carolina .
lincoln  called for each  राज्य  to provide  सैनिकों  to retake the  फोर्ट  ; consequently ,  चार  more slave states joined the Confederacy , bringing their  कुल  to eleven .
The  संघ  soon controlled the border states  और   स्थापित  a naval blockade that  अबोध  the southern economy .
The Eastern Theater  थी  inconclusive in 1861–62 .
The autumn 1862 Confederate campaign into Maryland (  a  Union  राज्य  ) ended with  confederate  retreat  at  the  बैटल  of  antietam   ,  dissuading  अंग्रेजों  intervention  .
Lincoln issued the Emancipation Proclamation , which  बना  ending slavery a war goal .
To the west , by summer 1862  the  Union destroyed the Confederate  नदी  navy  ,  then much of their  पश्चिमी  armies  ,  and the Union at Vicksburg  विभाजित  the Confederacy in  दो  at the Mississippi River .
in  1863 ,  रॉबर्ट  E. Lee 's Confederate incursion north ended at the Battle of Gettysburg .
Western successes led to  ulysses  S. Grant command of all Union armies  in  1864 .
In the Western Theater  ,  William T. Sherman drove east to  कैप्चर  Atlanta and  marched  to the sea  ,  destroying Confederate infrastructure  साथ  the way .
The Union marshaled the resources and manpower  to  attack the Confederacy from all directions , and  could  afford to fight  लड़ाइयों  of attrition  through   the   overland  Campaign  towards  Richmond , the Confederate capital  .
The defending Confederate army failed , leading  to  Lee 's surrender to Grant  at   appomattox  Court House on April 9 , 1865 .
The American  सिविल  War was one of the  earliest  true industrial wars .
Railroads , the telegraph , steamships , and  mass-produced  weapons were employed extensively .
The mobilization of civilian factories ,  खानों  , shipyards , banks ,  परिवहन   और  food supplies all  foreshadowed  World War I .
It remains the deadliest war  in  American history , resulting in  the  deaths of an estimated 750,000  सैनिको  and an undetermined number of civilian casualties .
Historian John Huddleston  estimates  the death toll at ten percent of all Northern males 20–45  सालो  old , and 30 percent of  सब  Southern white  males  aged 18–40  .
The definition of  the   संसार  's busiest airport  रै  been specified by the Airports Council International in  जेनेवा  , Switzerland  .
The ACI defines and  उपायों  the  following  three types  of  airport  traffic:
Passenger traffic  :  total passengers emplaned and deplaned  ,  passengers in transit counted once
कार्गो  traffic : loaded  और  unloaded freight  और  mail in metric tonnes
Traffic movements : landings and take-offs  of   वायुयान
संसार  War I ( WWI )  थी  a global  युद्ध  centred in Europe that began on 28 July  1914  and lasted until 11 November 1918  .
It was predominantly called the World War or the Great War from its  occurrence  until the start of  संसार  War II in 1939 , and the  पहला  World War  or  World War I thereafter .
it  involved  सब  the world  's  great powers , which  यहूद   समवेत  in two opposing alliances : the Allies ( based  on  the  ट्रिपल  Entente of  the  United Kingdom , France and  रूस  ) and  the  Central Powers (  originally  the Triple Alliance of Germany  ,  Austria-Hungary and  इटली   ;  but , as Austria–Hungary had taken the offensive against the  अनुबंध  ,  इटली  did  नहीं  enter into the war ) .
ये  alliances were both reorganised and expanded as more nations entered the war : Italy , Japan and the United States joined  the  Allies ,  और  the Ottoman Empire and  बुल्गारिया   the   सेंट्रल  Powers .
Ultimately , more than  70   लाख  military personnel , including 60 million Europeans , were mobilised  in  one  of  the largest wars in history .
More than 9 million combatants were killed , largely because of technological advancements  कि  led to enormous  increases   in  the lethality of weapons without corresponding improvements in protection or mobility  .
It was the fifth- deadliest conflict in world history  ,  subsequently paving the way  लिये   विभिन्न   राजनैतिक  changes ,  ऐसे  as  revolutions  in  अनेक  of the nations  शामिल  .
One of the long-term  कल्याणकारी  of the war was the  पुनरुत्थान  of imperialism in  the  foreign  नीतियों  of the  ग्रेट   शक्तियां  of Europe .
More immediately  ,   the  assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand of Austria , the heir to the throne  of   austria-hungary  , on 28 June  1914  by  यूगोस्लाव   राष्ट्रवादी  Gavrilo Princip in  साराजेवो  triggered  a  diplomatic  संकट  when Austria-Hungary subsequently delivered an ultimatum to  the  Kingdom of Serbia .
Several alliances formed  over  the previous  दशकों   यहूद  invoked .
भीतर  weeks , the major powers were at war and , via their colonies  ,  the conflict soon spread  around   the   संसार  .
on  28 July , the Austro-Hungarians fired the  पहला  shots of the war as  तैयारी  for the invasion of Serbia .
While the Russians mobilised ,  the  Germans invaded  न्यूट्रल  Belgium and  ध्वज   on   the  way to France , providing a  casus  belli for Britain  's  declaration of war against Germany .
After the German  कूच  on Paris was brought to a halt—the so-called Miracle of the Marne —the Western Front settled into a static  बैटल  of attrition with a trench line that  बदला  little until  1917  .
On the  पूर्वी  Front , the Russian army  थी  successful against  the  Austro-Hungarians , but was  रोका  in its  आक्रमण  of East Prussia by the Germans .
In November the Ottoman Empire joined the war , opening up fronts in the Caucasus , Mesopotamia and the Sinai .
Italy  और  Bulgaria went  to   युद्ध  in  1915  and Romania in 1916  .
In Russia , the tsar 's government collapsed  in  March 1917 and a subsequent revolution in  नवम्बर  brought  the   russians   to  terms with  the  Central Powers .
After a  1918  German offensive along the western front ,  the  Allies drove back the Germans in  a  series of successful offensives and  अमरीकी  forces  began  entering  the   trenches  .
Germany , which  था  its own  ट्रबल  with revolutionaries , agreed to  an  armistice on 11 November  1918   .
The war ended in  विजय  for  the   allies  .
Events on  the  home fronts were as tumultuous  as  on the battle fronts ,  as  the participants  आजमाया  to mobilize their  जनशक्ति  and economic  संसाधन  to fight a total war .
by  the end of the war , four major imperial  powers—the   जर्मनी  , Russian  ,  Austro-Hungarian and Ottoman empires—ceased to  मौजूद  .
The successor  राज्य  of the  पूर्व  two lost a great  राशि  of  territory  ,  जबकि  the latter two  यहूद  dismantled entirely  .
The map of central Europe was  redrawn  into several smaller states .
The  लीग  of Nations  थी  formed in the  आशा  of preventing another such conflict .
The European nationalism spawned by the war  और  the breakup  of  empires , the repercussions of Germany 's defeat and problems  साथ   the  Treaty of Versailles  हैं   सहमत   to  be factors contributing to  संसार  War II  .
The Deepwater Horizon  आयल   spill  ( also referred  to  as the BP oil spill ,  the  BP oil  विपत्ति  , the Gulf of Mexico  आयल  spill ,  और  the Macondo  blowout  ) was  an  oil  spill  in the Gulf of Mexico on the BP -operated Macondo Prospect , considered the largest accidental marine  आयल  spill in  the  history of  the  petroleum  उद्योग  ,  अनुमानित   to  be  between  8 % and 31 % larger in volume  than  the earlier Ixtoc I oil  spill  .
Following the explosion  और  sinking  of  the  deepwater  Horizon oil  रिग   ,  which  claimed  11 lives , a sea-floor oil gusher flowed  unabated  for 87 days , until it was capped on 15 July 2010  .
The  कुल  discharge is estimated at .
A massive response  ensued   to   protect  beaches , wetlands and estuaries from  the   spreading  oil utilizing skimmer ships  ,  floating  booms  , controlled burns  और  of Corexit oil dispersant .
After several failed efforts to  contain  the flow ,  the  well was declared sealed on 19 September 2010 .
Some reports indicate the well site continues to leak .
Due  to  the months-long spill , along with  प्रतिकूल  effects from the  जवाब  and  क्लीनअप  activities  ,  extensive damage to marine  और   वन्यजीव  habitats , fishing  और  tourism  उद्योग  ,  और  human health problems have continued through 2013.Three years after the spill , tar balls could still be found on the Mississippi coast  .
Numerous investigations explored the causes  of  the explosion and record-setting spill .
Notably  ,  the U.S. government 's September 2011 report  pointed  to defective cement on the well  ,  faulting mostly BP , but also well operator Transocean  और  contractor Halliburton .
पहले  in 2011 , a White House commission likewise blamed  bp  and  इसके  partners for a  श्रेणी   of  cost-cutting  निर्णय  and an insufficient  सुरक्षा  system ,  लकिन  also  concluded  that the spill resulted  इससे   ``  systemic  ''  root causes and `` absent significant  सुधार  in  दोनो  industry practices  और  government policies  ,  might well recur ''  .
In November 2012 , BP and the United States  विभाग  of Justice settled federal  दण्ड  charges with BP pleading guilty to 11  रिश्तो  of manslaughter , two misdemeanors , and a felony  गिनती  of lying to Congress .
bp  also agreed to four years of government monitoring of its  सुरक्षा   practices  and ethics , and  the  Environmental Protection Agency announced that BP would be temporarily banned  इससे  new contracts with the US  सरकारी  .
BP and the Department of Justice agreed to a record-setting $  4.525  billion in  जुर्माना  and other payments but further legal proceedings not expected to conclude  जबतक  2014 are ongoing to determine payouts and fines  अंतर्गत   the  Clean Water Act and the Natural  संसाधन  Damage Assessment  .
As of February 2013 ,  दण्ड  and  सिविल   settlements  and payments to a trust fund had cost the  कम्पनी  $ 42.2  अरब  .
`` Where  the  Streets Have  no  Name '' is a song by rock  बैंड  U2 .
It is the  खोलने  track from  उनके  1987 album The Joshua Tree and was released as  the  album 's third single in August 1987 .
the  song 's hook is a repeating  गिटार  arpeggio using a delay effect  ,  played  दौरान  the  सोंग   's  introduction and again  at   the   समाप्त  .
सीसे  vocalist  बोनो  wrote the lyrics in response to the  ख़्याल  that it is possible to  पहचानो  a person  's  religion and income based on the street on which they  जिया   ,  particularly in Belfast .
During the band 's difficulties recording the  सोंग  ,  निर्माता   ब्रायन  Eno considered erasing the  सोंग  's tapes to have them start from  खरोंच  .
`` Where the Streets Have No Name ''  थी   praised   by  critics and became a commercial success , peaking  at  number  तेरह  in  the  US ,  क्रमांक  fourteen in Canada  ,  number ten in the Netherlands , and number  चार  in the United  किंगडम   .
The song has  become  one  of  the band  's  most popular songs and has remained a staple of their live act since the song debuted in 1987 on The Joshua Tree  दौरे   .
The  सोंग  was  notably  performed on a Los Angeles rooftop  लिये  the filming  of   इसके  music video , which won a Grammy Award for Best Performance Music Video .Recently  the  song  रै   महरूम  used by the NFL 's  बाल्टीमोर  Ravens  as  their entrance song in Super Bowl XLVII
Thomas Jeffrey `` Tom  ''  Hanks ( born July 9 , 1956 ) is an  अमरीकी   कर्ता  , producer , writer ,  और   निदेशक  .
Hanks is known for his roles in Apollo  13  , Big , That  बात  You Do !
, The Green Mile , You 've Got Mail , Sleepless in Seattle , Charlie Wilson 's War , Catch Me If You Can  ,  Forrest Gump , Cast Away , A League  of   उनके  Own  ,  The Da  विंची  Code  ,  Angels & Demons ,  as  well as  एनिमेटेड  films  जैसे  the Toy Story film  श्रेणी  , The Polar Express , and The  सिम्पसन्स  Movie .
He  रै  earned  और  been  मनोनीत  for  numerous  awards  दौरान  his career ,  सहित  winning a Golden Globe for Best Actor and an Academy  पुरस्कार  for  बेहतरीन   कर्ता   लिये  his role  in  Philadelphia and a Golden Globe , an  अकादमी  Award , a Screen Actors  गिल्ड  Award ,  और  a People 's Choice Award  लिये  Best Actor  लिये  his role in Forrest Gump ,  और  earning  the   स्टेनली  Kubrick Britannia Award for Excellence  in  Film from the BAFTAs  in  2004 .
Hanks is  भी  known for his collaboration with film director Steven Spielberg on Saving Private Ryan and the mini-series Band of  भाइयो  , which launched  हैंक्स  also  as  a successful  निदेशक  , producer and  लेखक  .
As of 2012  ,  Hanks ' films have grossed over  $  4.2 billion at  the  United States box office  अलोन   ,   और  over  $  8.5  अरब  worldwide making him the highest all-time  बक्सा  office  स्टार  .
The Cape is an  अमरीकी  superhero drama series .
it  premiered on NBC during  the   2010–2011  television season  as  a  mid-season  replacement  शुरूआत  with a two-hour pilot  एपीसोड  on Sunday , January 9 ,  2011  at  9  pm Eastern and  प्रशांत   समय  .
An encore played on Monday , January 10 ,  साथ   follow-up  episodes continuing on Monday evenings  in  the 9 pm timeslot beginning on January 17 .
NBC subsequently  काटें  the  कुल  number  of  episodes to be  aired  from 13 to  10  as a result of low ratings .
On March  2   ,  2011 , NBC announced  कि  the series finale would only be aired on the network 's  जालस्थल  .
हैली  's Comet or Comet Halley ( or  )  , officially designated 1P/Halley , is the best-known of the short-period comets  और  is visible from Earth every 75–76 years  .
Halley  is   the  only short-period  धूमकेतु   कि   is   clearly  visible to the naked eye from Earth ,  और  thus the  तभी  naked-eye comet that might appear  twice   in  a human lifetime .
Other  naked-eye  comets may be brighter  और  more spectacular  ,   लकिन   होगा  appear only  एकबार  in thousands of years .
Halley 's returns to the inner Solar System have been observed and recorded by astronomers  चूंकि  at least 240  bce  .
साफ  records  of  the comet 's appearances were made by Chinese  ,  Babylonian ,  और  medieval European chroniclers  ,  but were  नहीं  recognized  as   reappearances   of   the   वही  object at the time .
The comet  's  periodicity was  पहला  determined in 1705 by  अंग्रेज़ी   astronomer  Edmond Halley  ,  after  जिसको  it is now named .
Halley 's Comet last  appeared  in the inner Solar  प्रणाली  in 1986 and will next appear in mid-2061 .
During its  1986   apparition  , Halley became the first comet to be observed  in  detail by spacecraft  ,  providing the first  observational  data  on  the structure  of  a comet nucleus and the mechanism of coma and tail  गठन   .
ये  observations supported a number of longstanding hypotheses about  धूमकेतु  construction , particularly Fred  whipple   's  `` dirty snowball '' model ,  जिससे  correctly predicted that Halley would be  रचित  of a  मिश्रण  of volatile  ices   –   ऐसे  as water , carbon dioxide and ammonia – and dust .
The missions  भी   provided  data  जिससे  substantially  reformed   और  reconfigured these  विचार   ;   लिये  instance  it  is  अभी   समझा  that Halley 's surface is largely composed of dusty , non-volatile materials , and  कि  only a small  portion  of it is icy .
The following is a list of the  सबसे  populous incorporated places of the United States of  अमेरिका  .
As defined  by  the United States  जनसांख्यिकी  Bureau  ,  an `` incorporated place `` includes a variety of designations , including  नगर  ,  कस्बा  , village  ,  borough , and  नगरपालिका   .
A few  असाधारण  Census Designated Places (  cdps  )  हैं  also included in the Census  ब्यूरो  's listing of incorporated places .
संचित   city-counties   represent  a distinct type  of   सरकारी  that includes the  संपूर्ण  population  of  a  काउंटी  , or county equivalent .
Some consolidated city-counties ,  however  , include multiple  incorporated  places .
This list presents only  कि  portion ( or `` balance  ''  ) of such consolidated city-counties that are not a part of another incorporated place .
Note that this list refers only to the  जनसांख्यिकी  of individual municipalities within their defined limits , which does not include other municipalities or unincorporated suburban  क्षेत्रों  within urban agglomerations  .
a  different ranking is evident  जब   considering  U.S. metropolitan area populations  .
the   mayflower  was the  जलयान  that  in  1620  transported   102   अंग्रेज़ी  Pilgrims , including  a  core group of Separatists , to New England .
Their story is one of travail  और  survival in a harsh New  संसार  environment .
A New  जीलैंड  forward ( in white  )   takes   a  shot on  लक्ष्य  against Cameroon in  the  2011 FIFA U-20 World  कप  .
Forwards , also known as strikers ,  हैं  the players  on   a  team in  संघ  football who play nearest to the opposing team 's goal , and are therefore principally  जिम्मेदार  for scoring goals .
This very advanced position and  इसके  limited defensive responsibilities mean forwards normally score more  लक्ष्य   than  other players .
This  स्थिति   requires  intelligence  ,   गति  , and power , both of  निष्पादन  and of thought , to perform the role well .
Modern team  formations  usually include one to  तीन  forwards ; two is the  सबसे  common .
Coaches typically field one striker who  plays  in an advanced position  (  the centre forward  )  , and another attacking forward who plays somewhat deeper and assists  in  making goals as well as  स्कोरिंग   (  the second  स्ट्राइकर  ) .
It  चाहिए  be noted  कि  inside forwards develop from attacking midfield positions and hence are naturally midfielders .
बार्सिलोना  FC star Lionel Messi  is   a  typical Attacking Midfielder seen as  a  forward due  to  his shot accuracy .
A  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  domestic  साझेदारी  is a legal relationship  उपलब्धियाँ  to  same-sex  couples , and to certain  opposite-sex  couples  in  which at least one  पार्टी  is  at  least 18 years  of   आयु  .
It affords the couple `` the same rights , protections  ,   और  benefits , and  ...  the same responsibilities , obligations , and duties under law ... '' as married spouses .
Enacted in  1999   ,  the domestic partnership registry was the  पहला  of its kind in the United States  निर्मित   by  a legislature  बगैर  court intervention .
Initially  ,  domestic partnerships enjoyed very few privileges—principally  बस  hospital-visitation rights and the right to be  claimed  as a next of kin of  the   एस्टेट   of   a  deceased partner .
The legislature has since expanded the scope of California domestic partnerships to include  सब   of   the  rights and responsibilities common  to  marriage .
As  ऐसे  , California domestic partnerships are functionally  समतुल्य  to civil unions offered in several  अन्य  states .
Although  the  program enjoys  व्यापक  support  in  California ,  it  has  महरूम  the source of some controversy .
Groups opposed to  the   मान्यता  of same-sex families have challenged  the  expansion of domestic  partnerships  in  अदालत   .
Conversely ,  अधिवक्ताओं  of  same-sex   विवाह   contend   कि  anything less  than   पूरा  marriage rights  विस्तारित  to  same-sex  partners is analogous to the  ``  separate but equal '' racial laws of the Jim Crow era .
Mark  A.   जैक्सन  ( born April 1  ,   1965  ) is an  अमरीकी  basketball coach  ,  and former player  जो  is the current head coach of the Golden State Warriors of  the   एनबीए  .
a  point  गार्ड  from St. John 's University  ,  he  निभाई  for the New York Knicks , Indiana Pacers , Los Angeles Clippers  ,  Denver Nuggets , Toronto Raptors , Utah Jazz and  ह्यूस्टन  Rockets in the NBA in a career spanning from 1987 to 2004 .
जैक्सन  has also worked as  a  commentator for ESPN  और  ABC alongside his former coach  जेफ़  Van Gundy and play-by-play man Mike Breen .
He was previously an  एनबीए  analyst for  the   यस  Network 's New Jersey Nets games .
South  अफ़्रीकी  has eleven official languages  :  Afrikaans , English  ,   ndebele   ,  Northern Sotho , Sotho , Swazi , Tswana  ,   सोंगा  , Venda , Xhosa and Zulu  .
Fewer than two percent of South  africans  speak a first language other than an official  एक  .
सबसे   दक्षिण  Africans can  बोलो  more  than  one  भाषा  .
Dutch and English were the first  आधिकारिक  languages of South Africa from 1910 to  1925  .
Afrikaans was  added  as a part of Dutch in 1925 .
Dutch was replaced by Afrikaans  जब   दक्षिण   अफ़्रीकी  became a  गणतंत्र   in  1961 ,  और  Dutch was  dropped  in 1983  ,  so between 1983 and 1994 , South Africa had two  आधिकारिक  languages : English and Afrikaans .
the  English  संस्करण  of the South African constitution refers to the  भाषाएं  by the names in those languages : isiZulu , isiXhosa , Afrikaans , Sepedi ( referring  to  Northern Sotho  )  , Setswana ,  अंग्रेज़ी  , Sesotho (  referring  to Southern Sotho ) , Xitsonga , Siswati  ,   tshivenda  and isiNdebele ( referring to Southern Ndebele ) .
In South Africa , Southern  ndebele   is   ज्ञात  simply  as  Ndebele , as most  अध्यक्षों  of Northern Ndebele live  in  Zimbabwe .
The 1993 version of the Constitution  referred  to Northern Sotho as Sesotho sa Leboa , but the 1996 version  referred  to the language as Sepedi .
Different government departments and  आधिकारिक  bodies use different terms to denote Northern  sotho  .
The main language of government  is   अंग्रेज़ी  even if  दक्षिण  Africans often  लो  pride in using indigenous languages for any purpose .
अफ्रीकी  also features prominently in commerce  साथ   साथ   अंग्रेज़ी  as  the  languages with the highest number  of  fluent speakers are  अफ्रीकी  and English .
in  terms of linguistic  वर्गीकरण   ,  the  आधिकारिक  languages include two West-Germanic languages ( English and Afrikaans ) and  नौ  Bantu languages .
Four of these are Nguni languages (  ज़ुलू  , Xhosa  ,  Swati and Ndebele  )   और  three are Sotho–Tswana languages ( Northern  sotho  , Southern Sotho and Tswana ) .
Tsonga is a  tswa–ronga  language .
दक्षिण  African Sign  भाषा  is a distinct though incompletely emerged national  मानक  language which also subsumes a cluster of  semi-standardised   dialects   .
Aluminium nitrate is a  नमक  of aluminium and  नाइट्रिक  acid , existing  सामान्यतः  as a  crystalline  hydrate , most commonly  as  aluminium nitrate nonahydrate  ,   al  ( NO3  )  3·9H2O .
The New  यॉर्क   jets  are a professional football team headquartered in Florham Park ,  नई  Jersey , representing the New York  महानगर  area .
The team is a member of  the   पूर्वी  Division of  the  American Football Conference ( AFC  )  in the National Football League ( NFL )  .
In a unique arrangement for the league , the Jets share MetLife  स्टेडियम  in  ईस्ट   रदरफोर्ड  , New Jersey with the New York Giants .
The franchise is legally and corporately registered  as  New York  jets  , LLC  .
The team was  संस्थापित  in 1959 as the  टाइटन्स  of  नई  York ,  an  original member of the American Football  लीग  ; later , the franchise joined the NFL in the AFL–NFL  विलय  .
the  team began to play  in   1960  at  the  Polo Grounds .
Under  नई  ownership , the current name  थी  adopted  in  1963 and the franchise was relocated  to   shea  Stadium  in  1964 and then to the Meadowlands Sports  जटिल  in 1984 .
The Jets advanced to the playoffs for the first  समय  in 1968  और  went on to compete in Super Bowl III  जहाँ  they defeated the Baltimore  कोल्टस  , becoming the first AFL  टोली  to  शिकस्त  an  एनएफएल  club  in  an AFL-NFL World Championship  खेल  .
Since 1968  ,  the  jets   have  appeared in the playoffs thirteen times , and in the  afc  Championship  खेल  four times  ,  most recently losing to the Pittsburgh Steelers in 2010 .
However , the Jets have never returned  to  the Super Bowl  ,   बनाना  them  एक  of three  एनएफएल  teams  to  win their lone Super  कटोरी  appearance ,  साथ   साथ  the New  ऑरलियन्स  Saints and Tampa Bay Buccaneers .
The  टोली  's  प्रशिक्षण  facility ,  अटलांटिक  Health Jets  प्रशिक्षण   बीच  , which opened in  2008  , is located in Florham Park .
The team  फिलहाल  holds their  सालाना  training camp sessions on  the  campus of the State University of New York at Cortland  in  Cortland ,  नई   यॉर्क  while holding occasional sessions  at  the Florham Park  जटिल  .
Psilocybe semilanceata
Psilocybin mushrooms ,  भी  known as psychedelic mushrooms , are  fungi   कि   contain  psychoactive indole  alkaloids  .
There  हैं   अनेक  colloquial terms for psilocybin  मशरूम   ,  the most common being shrooms  और  magic mushrooms .
biological  genera containing psilocybin  मशरूम  include  agrocybe   ,  Conocybe , Copelandia ,  galerina  , Gerronema , Gymnopilus , Hypholoma ,  inocybe  , Mycena , Panaeolus , Pluteus ,  और  Psilocybe .
There are  लगभग   190  species  of  psilocybin  मशरूम  and most of them fall in the genus Psilocybe .
Psilocybin  मशरूम   have  likely  महरूम  used since  प्रागैतिहासिक   टाइम्स  and  may  have been depicted in rock art  .
अनेक  cultures have  प्रयुक्त  these mushrooms  in  religious rites .
In modern Western society  वे  are used recreationally for their  साइकेडेलिक  effects .
हाल   अध्ययन   किया  at Imperial College  लंदन   और  Johns Hopkins School of Medicine conclude that when used properly , psilocybin acts  as  an anti-depressant as suggested  by   fmri  brain scans .
Alaska ( ) is a state  in  the United  राज्य  ,  situated  in the northwest extremity  of  the North American continent ,  साथ  the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  boundary with  कनाडा  to the east , the Arctic Ocean to the north , and  the  Pacific Ocean to the west and south , with Russia further west  आरपार  the Bering Strait .
Alaska is the  largest  state in  the  United States  by  area , the 4th least populous and the least densely  आबादी  of  the  50 United States  .
Approximately half  of  Alaska 's 731,449 residents  सजीव  within the Anchorage metropolitan area .
अलास्का  's economy is dominated by the oil , natural gas , and fishing industries ; it has  ये  resources  in  abundance .
अलास्का  was purchased from Russia on  कूच  30 , 1867 ,  लिये   $  7.2 million  (  $ adjusted for inflation ) at approximately  दो  cents per acre  (   $  4.74/km2 ) .
The land went through several  प्रशासनिक  changes before becoming an  व्यवस्थित  ( or incorporated  )  territory on May 11 , 1912 , and the 49th state of  the  U.S. on January 3 ,  1959   .
The  नाम  `` Alaska  ''  ( Аляска ) was already introduced in  the   रूसी  colonial period , when it was  प्रयुक्त  only  लिये  the peninsula and  is  derived  इससे  the Aleut alaxsxaq , meaning `` the mainland '' or , more literally , `` the object towards which the action of  the  sea  is  directed '' .
it  is also known  as  Alyeska , the `` great land ''  ,   an  Aleut word derived from  the  same root  .
The  101   फ्रेंच  departments are  विभाजित   into  342 arrondissements , which may be translated into English as  जिले  .
The capital of an arrondissement/district is called a subprefecture .
When an arrondissement contains the prefecture ( capital ) of the department , that prefecture is the capital of the arrondissement  ,  acting  दोनो  as a prefecture  और  as a subprefecture .
Arrondissements are further divided into cantons and communes .
The vagina  (  from Latin vāgīna , literally `` sheath '' or  ``  scabbard `` ) is a tubular  ट्रैक्ट   जिससे   is  a sex organ and has two main functions ; sexual intercourse and childbirth .
in   इंसानो  , this passage leads from the  खोलने   of  the  भग  to the uterus ( womb ) ,  लकिन  the vaginal tract ends at the cervix .
Unlike men , who have  तभी  one genital  orifice  ,  महिलाओं   have   दो  , the urethra and the vagina .
The  vaginal  opening is  much   larger   than  the urethral opening  ,   और  both openings are protected by  the  labia .
The inner  सांचे  of the vagina has a foldy texture which can create friction for  the  penis during intercourse .
During arousal ,  the  vagina gets moist to facilitate the entrance of the penis .
The Latinate  बहुवचन  `` vaginae  ''  is  rarely  used in  अंग्रेज़ी  .
Colloquially  ,  the word vagina is often  प्रयुक्त  to refer to the vulva or to the female genitals in general .
However  ,  by its  शब्दकोष  and anatomical definitions ,  योनि  refers exclusively to the specific internal structure .
The  सिनसिनाटी   लाल  are a Major  लीग   बेसबॉल  team based in Cincinnati  ,   ओहियो  .
They  हैं   सदस्यों   of  the National League Central Division .
स्थापित  in 1881 as  an  independent club , the team became  a  charter member of the American  संघ  in 1882 , and joined the  नेशनल  League in 1890 .
The club traditionally traces its origin  to  baseball 's first openly  पेशेवर   टोली   in  1869 .
The Reds have won five World Series titles , one American Association pennant , nine National League pennants and ten division titles .
the  Reds played  in   the  National League West between 1969 and  1993   और  have  महरूम  in the  नेशनल  League Central since 1994 .
चूंकि  2003 , the Reds  have  played  at  Great American Ball Park , built next  to  their home  इससे  1970 to 2002  ,  Riverfront Stadium  .
Bob Castellini has owned the Cincinnati Reds since 2006 .
A prank  बदबू  bomb .
a  stink bomb is a device designed to create an unpleasant smell .
They range  in  effectiveness from simple pranks to military grade malodorants or riot control chemical agents .
The Guinness Book of  रिकॉर्ड  lists two smelliest  substances  .
One is  ``   us  Government Standard  बाथरूम  Malodor '' ; a mixture of eight chemicals with a stench resembling human feces  ,  only much stronger , designed to test  the  efficacy of deodorizers and  एयर  fresheners .
Another one , `` Who me ?  ``  , is a mixture of  पाँच  sulfur-containing chemicals  और   खुश्बू  like rotting food  और   carcasses  .
The adage  ``  A picture is worth a thousand words '' refers to the notion that a complex  विचार  can be conveyed with  बस  a single still image .
It also aptly characterizes one of the main goals of visualization , namely  बनाना  it possible to  अवशोषित   विशाल   amounts  of data quickly .
The expression  ``  Use a picture .
It  's  worth a  हजार  words  .  '' appears in a 1911 newspaper article quoting newspaper editor Arthur Brisbane discussing  पत्रकारिता  and publicity .
1913 newspaper advertisement
A similar phrase , ``  एक  Look Is Worth A Thousand  शब्द  ''  ,  appears in  a  1913 newspaper advertisement for the Piqua Auto Supply House of  piqua  ,  ओहियो  .
An  जल्दी  use of the  सटीक  phrase appears  in  an 1918  समाचारपत्र  advertisement for the San Antonio Light  जिससे   says  : One of the Nation 's Greatest Editors  says  : One  चित्र   is   लायक   a  Thousand Words The  सैन  Antonio  लाइट   's  Pictorial Magazine of the War Exemplifies the  सच्चाई  of the above statement --  judging  from the warm reception it has received at the hands of the Sunday Light  पाठक  .
it  is  believed  by  कुछ  that the modern use of the phrase stems from  an   आलेख  by Fred R. Barnard in the advertising trade journal Printers  '  Ink ,  promoting  the use  of  images  in   विज्ञापन  that appeared on the sides  of  streetcars .
The  दिसम्बर   8   ,  1921 issue carries  an  ad  हकदार  , `` One Look is  लायक  A Thousand Words . ''
Another ad by Barnard  appears   in  the March 10 , 1927 issue with  the  phrase `` One  चित्र  Worth Ten  हजार  Words  ,  '' where it is labeled a  चाइनीज  proverb ( 一圖勝萬言 ) .
the  Home Book of Proverbs  ,  Maxims , and Familiar  वाक्यांश  quotes Barnard as saying he called it ``  a  Chinese proverb ,  so  that people would  लो   it  seriously .  ''
Soon after  ,  the proverb would  become  popularly attributed to  कन्फ्यूशियस   .
the  discussion of  ``  One Picture Worth Thousand Words '' versus `` One Picture Worth Ten Thousand Words ''  wan  yen I hua and 10.000 miles  लायक  10.000 books is cited  in  Information graphics  जहाँ  the concept of many in different disciplines  और  cultures .
A  चित्र  is worth a  हजार   शब्द
Despite  इस  modern  उत्पत्ति  of the popular phrase  ,  the sentiment has been expressed by earlier writers .
For example the Russian  लेखक  Ivan Turgenev  लिखा  (  in  Fathers and Sons in 1862 )  ,  `` A  चित्र  shows me at  a  glance what it takes dozens of pages of a  किताब  to expound  .  ''
Computer  प्रोग्रामर  and author Fred Brooks  makes  an opposite statement  regarding  programming in The Mythical Man-Month : `` Show me your flowcharts and conceal your tables ,  और  I  shall  continue to be  mystified  .
Show me  अपना   टेबल  , and I won’t usually need your flowcharts ;  they’ll   be  obvious .  ''
The phrase has also been spoofed by John McCarthy ,  the   प्रसिद्ध  computer scientist , to make the  विपरीत  point  :  `` As the  चाइनीज  say , 1001 words  is  worth  अधिक  than a  चित्र   .  ''
A season is a subdivision of the  साल  , marked  by  changes in weather  ,   पारिस्थितिकी  , and  घंटों  of daylight .
Seasons result from the yearly revolution of the Earth around the Sun and the  झुकाव   of  the Earth 's  अक्ष   सापेक्ष  to  the  plane of revolution  .
In temperate and polar  regions  ,  the   सीज़न   हैं  marked by changes in the intensity  of  sunlight that reaches the Earth 's surface , variations of which  may  cause animals to go into  शीतनिष्क्रियता   or  to migrate , and plants to be  dormant  .
During May ,  जून   और  July , the northern hemisphere is  उजागर  to more  सीधा  sunlight because the hemisphere faces the sun .
the  same is true of the southern hemisphere  in  November , December  और  January .
It is  the  tilt of the Earth  कि  causes the Sun to be higher in the  आसमान   दौरान  the summer months  जिससे  increases the solar flux .
However , due to seasonal  lag  , June , July and August  हैं  the hottest months in the  उत्तरी  hemisphere and December  ,  January  और  February are the hottest months  in  the southern hemisphere  .
In  शीतोष्ण  and  subpolar  regions ,  generally  four calendar  -आधारd  seasons (  साथ  their adjectives ) are  पहचाना  :  वसन्त  ( vernal ) , summer (  estival   )  , autumn  (  autumnal ) and winter ( hibernal ) .
However ,  ecologists   ज़्यादातर   उपयोग  a six season model  लिये  temperate climate regions that includes pre-spring ( prevernal ) and late summer ( serotinal ) as distinct seasons along with  the  traditional four .
Hot regions have two or three  सीज़न  ; the rainy ( or wet , or monsoon ) season and the dry season , and in some  तीव्र  areas , a cool or mild  ऋतु  .
In some  भाग  of the  संसार   ,  special `` seasons ''  हैं  loosely defined based on important  कार्यक्रम   ऐसे  as a hurricane season , tornado season or a  दावानल  season  .
The six ecological  सीज़न
The four calendar seasons ,  चित्रित  in an ancient Roman mosaic from Tunisia

At  the   समय   of  writing the Netherlands is the 17th largest economy  of  the world .
( see :  सूची  of countries  by  GDP ( nominal )  )
GDP per capita is roughly  $  42,000 which  puts  it in the top 10 of  richest  nations in the world (  देखिए   :  List of countries by GDP ( PPP  )  per capita ) .
Between  1996  and 2000  सालाना   आर्थिक  growth ( GDP ) averaged over 4 % , well  ऊपर  the European average .
Growth  slowed  considerably in 2001-05 as part of the global economic slowdown .
2006  और  2007 however  दिखाया   आर्थिक  growth  of  3.4 % and 3.9  %  .
the  Dutch economy was hit considerably by the  जारी  global financial crisis and the ensuing European debt crisis .
Several banks went bankrupt , and a number of others had to receive governmental aid .
In 2009 the economy declined with 3.5  %  , followed by two years of mild growth  .
The  डच   अर्थव्यवस्था   is  currently in a recession again , with an economic decline of 0.5 % in 2012 .
Inflation is at 3.2 % in  फ़रवरी   2013  .
बेरोजगारी  has been  अपेक्षाकृत   कम  compared to other EU nations for decades but after mid-2012 it has seen a fast increase and in February  2013  it  रै  hit 7.7 % .
The Netherlands managed to maintain its AAA rating at  तनिक  until March 2013 according to  the  three major  क्रेडिट   दरजा  agencies .
Historically  ,   the  Dutch introduced and invented the  भण्डार  market by the merchandise trading  through   डच  West  इण्डिया  Company .
The Netherlands is  a  founding member of the European Union , the OECD and the World Trade Organization .

It contains  remixes  of  previously  unreleased music recorded by Shakur before his death  in   1996   .

the  original panel of  the  View ; Meredith Vieira , Star  जोन्स  , Debbie Matenopoulos and Barbara Walters in 1997 .
The View is  an   अमरीकी  talk show  ब्रॉडकास्ट  on ABC that debuted in 1997  as   भाग  of the network 's daytime  प्रोग्रामिंग  block .
निर्मित   by  Barbara Walters and  विधेयक  Geddie , who both also  serve  as the show 's executive producers , the program features a panel of women  as   co-hosts  .
Along with Walters , the  वर्तमान  panel  शामिल  Whoopi Goldberg , who  serves  as the  मॉडरेटर  , Joy Behar  ,  Elisabeth Hasselbeck , and  sherri  Shepherd .
International versions of the  कार्यक्रम  are aired in several countries .
as  of the 2012–13  ऋतु  , its 16th , The View is  the  fourth-longest  कार्यशील  national daytime talk show  in  history ,  पीछे  The Phil  donahue  Show ( 29 )  ,  the  variously-named  Live !
programs ( 25  )  ,  और  The Oprah Winfrey Show ( 25  )  .
Prunus virginiana , commonly called bitter-berry , chokecherry , Virginia bird  चेरी  and western chokecherry ( also black  chokecherry  for P.  virginiana  var . demissa  )  , is  a   प्रजाति  of bird cherry  (  Prunus  subgenus  Padus ) native to  उत्तर   अमेरिका   ;  the natural  ऐतिहासिक  range of P. virginiana includes  सबसे   of  the continent  ,   मगर  for the far north and far south .
Los Angeles International Airport is the primary  विमानक्षेत्र  serving the Greater Los Angeles Area , the second-most populated metropolitan area in  the  United  राज्य  .
it  is most often  referred   to  by its IATA airport code LAX , with the letters  सुनाया   individually  .
LAX  is   स्तिथ   in  southwestern  लॉस  Angeles along the Pacific coast in the neighborhood  of  Westchester , from the  शहर  core and is the primary  विमानक्षेत्र  of Los  एंजिल्स   संसार  Airports  (  LAWA ) ,  an   एजेंसी  of the Los  एंजिल्स  city government  formerly  known as  the  Department of Airports .
In 2011 ,  lax   थी  the sixth busiest  विमानक्षेत्र   in  the world  बाद   hartsfield-jackson   अटलांटा  International Airport , Beijing Capital  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Airport , London Heathrow Airport , Chicago O'Hare International Airport  ,  and Tokyo Haneda  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Airport with 61,862,052 passengers .
The  विमानक्षेत्र  holds  the  claim for ``  the   संसार  's busiest origin and destination ( O  &  D ) airport '' in 2011 that  involves  non-connecting  यात्री  traffic .
It is also  the  only  विमानक्षेत्र   to  rank among the  शीर्ष  five U.S. airports for both passenger  और   कार्गो  traffic .
LAX is the busiest  विमानक्षेत्र   in  the Greater Los Angeles  क्षेत्रफल  , but other  एयरपोर्ट  including  bob   आशा   विमानक्षेत्र  , John  वेन  Airport , Long Beach  विमानक्षेत्र   ,  LA/Ontario International Airport ,  और   ताड़  Springs International  विमानक्षेत्र  also serve the region .
LAX is  भी  the  व्यस्ततम  airport in California  और  the West  coast  of the United  राज्य  in terms of flight operations ,  यात्री  traffic  और  air cargo  कार्यकलाप  , leading  it   to  be referred to as the `` Gateway  to  the Pacific Rim  ``  .
Peyton Williams Manning (  born  March 24 , 1976  )  is an American football quarterback for the Denver Broncos of the  नेशनल   फ़ुटबॉल  League ( NFL ) .
He played for the Indianapolis Colts  लिये   14  seasons from 1998 to 2011 .
He is the son of former NFL quarterback Archie Manning and an elder brother of New York Giants quarterback Eli  मैनिंग  .
Manning played college football for  the  University of Tennessee , leading  the  Volunteers to the 1997 SEC Championship in  उसके  senior season .
However ,  no  . 3  टेनेसी  lost to the No .  2  Nebraska Cornhuskers 42-17 in the  नारंगी  Bowl giving Nebraska and Tom Osborne  उनके   3rd  national championship  in  4 years .
he  was chosen by the Indianapolis  कोल्टस  with the  पहला  overall pick in the 1998 NFL Draft .
From 1998 to 2010 , he led the Colts  to  eight ( seven AFC South and one AFC East )  प्रभाग  championships  ,  two AFC championships ,  और  to  a   सुपर  Bowl championship  (  Super Bowl XLI ) .
He has  जीती   a  record  चार  league most  मूल्यवान  player awards  ,  was the most valuable player of  सुपर  Bowl  xli  , has been named to twelve Pro  प्याले  , has twelve 4,000-yard passing seasons , and is the  इंडियानापोलिस   कोल्टस  ' all-time leader in passing yards ( 54,828  )  and  touchdown  passes ( 399 ) .
in  2009 , he was named the best  खिलाड़ी  in  the  NFL and Fox Sports along with  खेल   illustrated  named him  the   एनएफएल   खिलाड़ी   of  the  दशक   of   the  2000s  .
in  May 2011 , he  underwent  neck surgery to  alleviate  neck pain and arm weakness he dealt with during the previous few seasons before signing a  five-year  ,  $  90  लाख  contract extension with  the  Colts in July 2011  .
Manning  था  hoped to  खेल  in the 2011 season , but  in  September 2011 , he  underwent  a much  अधिक  serious second surgery  :  a level one cervical fusion  कार्यविधि  .
Manning had never  छूटी  an NFL game in his career ,  लकिन  was  मजबूर  to  मिस  the entire 2011 season .
He was  released  by  the  Colts  on  March 7 , 2012 , and after an almost two-week  काल   जहाँ  he visited with and worked out for several  एनएफएल  teams , he  हस्ताक्षरित  with the Denver Broncos on March 20 , 2012 .
Manning 's pre-snap routine  रै  earned him  the  nickname ,  ``  The Sheriff '' and is one of the most recognizable  और  parodied in the NFL .
The  इंडियानापोलिस  Colts '  लगभग  exclusive use of the hurry-up  ठोकर  led  to  Manning  using  an array of gestures and verbal commands to  कॉल  the play at  the  line  of  scrimmage rather than in the  huddle  .
The America  मीनार  of the American  सामान्य  Center , the headquarters  of  Baker Hughes
Baker Hughes  is  one of  the  world 's largest  oilfield  services companies  .
It operates in  over  90 countries , providing the oil  और  gas industry with products and services  लिये  drilling , formation evaluation , completion , production and reservoir consulting .
बेकर  Hughes has its headquarters in the America Tower in the American  सामान्य  Center  in  Neartown , Houston .
Baker Hughes Incorporated was formed when Baker International and Hughes Tool  कम्पनी  merged  in  1987 .
Baker Hughes operates worldwide  साथ  major  कार्यालयों  in Liverpool ,  संयुक्त  Kingdom ; Singapore ; Dubai ; a research and maintenance facility in Celle , Germany ; Lafayette  ,  Louisiana  ;  Houston  ,  Texas ; Pescara , Italy ; and Kuala Lumpur , Malaysia  .
The company is administered broadly in two  बांटती  : the eastern hemisphere with five regions ( Europe , Africa , the  मध्य  East , Asia  प्रशांत  and  russia/caspian  )  और   the  western hemisphere with four  regions  ( Canada , US Land  ,  US  गल्फ  , and Latin America ) .
प्रत्येक   of  these  regions  is subdivided into  बाज़ार  .
The United  राज्य  one-  cent   सिक्का  ,  commonly  known as a penny , is a unit  of  currency  equaling  one one-hundredth of a United States  डालर  .
The cent 's  प्रतीक  is  ¢  .
Its obverse has featured the profile of President Abraham Lincoln since 1909 , the centennial of his birth  .
From 1959 ( the sesquicentennial of  lincoln  's birth ) to  2008   ,  the reverse featured the Lincoln  मेमोरियल  .
Four different reverse designs in  2009  honored Lincoln 's  200th   जन्मदिवस   और  a new  ,  permanent  रिवर्स  – the Union Shield –  थी  introduced in 2010 .
The coin is 0.75 inches ( 19.05 mm ) in  व्यास  and  0.061  inches  (  1.55  mm  )  in   मोटाई  .
The U.S.  मिंट   's  official name for a penny is `` ''  और  the U.S. Treasury 's official name is  ``  one cent piece ''  .
The  colloquial  term penny derives from the British  सिक्का  of the same  नाम   ,  the pre-decimal version of which had a similar value .
In American English ,  कौड़ी  is the  बहुवचन   रूप  ,  अन्य  plural forms pence and  पेशाब  ( standard use in British English ) are not used  .
as  of 2012 ,  it  costs the U.S.  मिंट  2.00  सेंट  to make  a  cent because of the  लागत  of  सामग्री  and  उत्पादन   .
This  फिगर  includes the Mint’s fixed components for distribution  और  fabrication  ,  estimated at $ 13 million  in  FY 2011  .
It also  शामिल  Mint overhead allocated to the  पैनी  , which was $ 17.7 million for 2011 .
फिक्स्ड  costs  और  overhead  होता  have to be absorbed  by  other circulating coins without  the  penny .
The loss in profitability due to producing the one cent coin  in  the United States for the year of 2012 was  $  58,000,000 .
This was a slight  घटी  from 2011 , the  साल   पहले   ,  which had a production  घाटा  of $ 60,200,000  .
or  अधिक  specifically , are ornamental varieties of domesticated  आम   कार्प  ( Cyprinus carpio  )  that  हैं  kept for decorative  उद्देश्य  in outdoor koi ponds  or   जल  gardens .
Koi varieties  हैं  distinguished  by  coloration  ,  patterning , and scalation .
Some of  the  major colors are white , black  ,  red , yellow , blue  ,  and  मलाई   .
The most popular category of koi  is  the Gosanke , which  is  made up of the Kohaku , Taisho  sanshoku  , and Showa Sanshoku varieties .
The American Federation of Government Employees ( AFGE ) is an American labor union representing  over  650,000 employees of  the  federal government , about 5,000 employees of the District of Columbia ,  और  a few  सौ  private sector employees  ,  mostly in  और   around  federal facilities .
AFGE is  the  largest  संघ  for  civilian  , non- postal federal employees and the largest union for District of Columbia employees who report directly  to  the mayor ( i.e. , outside of  d.C.  public schools ) .
It  is  affiliated with the AFL-CIO .
