The  एवोल्यूशन   of  plants has  resulted  in increasing levels of  जटिलता  , from the earliest  algal  mats  ,  through bryophytes , lycopods , ferns to the complex gymnosperms  और   angiosperms  of today  .
While many of the groups which  appeared  earlier continue to thrive , especially in the environments in which they evolved , for a time each  नई   ग्रेड  of organisation became more ``  कामयाब  '' than its predecessors .
In the  ordovician  period , around , the first land plants appeared .
These began to diversify in  the   लेट   सिल्यूरियन  Period , around , and the results of their  diversification  are displayed in remarkable detail in an early  devonian  fossil assemblage from the Rhynie chert .
This chert  preserved  early  पौधे  in  सेल्यूलर  detail , petrified in volcanic springs .
By the middle of the Devonian Period , most of the  सुविधाएँ  recognised in  पौधे  today are present , including roots , leaves  और  secondary  लकडी  ;  और  , by late Devonian times  ,  seeds  था  evolved .
Late Devonian plants  था  thereby  पहुँचे  a degree of sophistication that allowed them to form forests of tall trees .
विकासवादी  innovation continued into the Carboniferous period and is still  जारी  today .
सबसे  plant groups were relatively unscathed by the  permo-triassic  extinction event , although the structures of  समुदायों  changed  .
इस  may have set the  झाँकी  for the appearance of the flowering plants  in  the Triassic  (   ~  ) ,  और  their later diversification in the Cretaceous and Paleogene  .
the  latest  प्रमुख  group of plants  to  evolve were the grasses , which  became  important in the mid-Paleogene , from around  .
The grasses , as well as many  अन्य  groups ,  विकसित  new mechanisms of metabolism to survive the low  और  warm , dry conditions  of   the   ऊष्णकटिबन्ध  over the last .
The winning Super Bowl team receives the Vince Lombardi Trophy .
The Super Bowl is an  सालाना  American football game that determines the champion of  the  National  फ़ुटबॉल  League ( NFL ) .
The contest  is  held in an American city that is chosen three  to  four years beforehand , usually  in  warm-weather or domed sites  .
Since 1971 , the winner of the American Football Conference ( AFC )  चैंपियनशिप  Game has faced  the  winner of the National  फ़ुटबॉल  Conference ( NFC ) Championship  खेल   in  the culmination of the NFL  playoffs  .
Before  the  1970 merger between the American Football League ( AFL )  और  the National Football League ( NFL ) ,  the   दो  leagues met  in  four such contests  .
the  first  दो  were known as the `` AFL-NFL World Championship Game .  ''
सुपर  Bowl III in 1969 was the  पहला  such game that carried the  ``  Super Bowl  ''   moniker   ,  the names `` Super Bowl I `` and `` Super Bowl II  ``  were retroactively applied to the  पहला  two games .
The NFC /NFL leads  in  Super Bowl  विन्स  with 25 , while the AFC /AFL has won 22 .
Eighteen different franchises , including teams that  relocated  to another city ,  have  won the Super  कटोरी  .
The Pittsburgh Steelers  have  won the most Super Bowls with  छह  championships ( record 6–2 ) , while  दोनो  the Dallas  cowboys  and San Francisco 49ers  have  five  विन्स  each ( Cowboys 5–3 ; 49ers 5–1  )  .
डलास   और   पिट्सबर्ग  have  the  most Super Bowl appearances with  आठ  , while the  भैंस  Bills have the most consecutive  दिखावे  with  चार  losses in a row from 1990 to 1993 .
The New England Patriots , Denver Broncos and  मिनेसोटा  Vikings have also  खोया  a record  चार   सुपर  Bowls .
Buffalo  और  Minnesota are both 0–4 ,  डेनवर  is 2–4  और  New England is 3–4 .
The record  लिये  consecutive wins is  दो  and  is   साझा  by seven franchises : the 1966-67 Green Bay  पैकर्स   ,  the 1972-73 Miami Dolphins , the  1974-75  and 1978-79  पिट्सबर्ग  Steelers (  the  only team to accomplish this feat twice  )   ,  the  1988-89  San Francisco 49ers , the 1992-93 Dallas Cowboys , the 1997-98 Denver Broncos , and the  2003-04  New England Patriots .
The only  टोली  with multiple  सुपर  Bowl appearances and no losses is the  बाल्टीमोर   ravens  , who in winning Super Bowl XLVII  unseated  and replaced  the  49ers in  कि  position .
Four current NFL teams have never  appeared  in a Super  कटोरी  , including franchise relocations and renaming : the Cleveland Browns , Detroit Lions , Jacksonville Jaguars , and Houston Texans , though both the Browns and Lions  था  won NFL  चैंपियनशिप  games prior to the creation of the Super  कटोरी  .
Martin County is a  काउंटी  located in the U.S. state of Texas .
As of the  2010  census  ,  its population  थी   4,799  .
Its  सीट  is Stanton .
The county is  नामित  for Wylie Martin , an early settler .
Martin County is one of 30 prohibition , or entirely  शुष्क   ,  counties in the state of Texas .
Alkaline phosphatase ( ALP ,  alkp  )  (   )  is a hydrolase enzyme responsible for  निकालना   फास्फेट  groups  इससे  many types  of  molecules , including nucleotides , proteins , and  alkaloids  .
The process  of  removing the phosphate group is  पुकारा  dephosphorylation .
As the name suggests ,  क्षारीय  phosphatases  हैं  most effective in  an  alkaline environment .
it  is sometimes  प्रयुक्त  synonymously  as  basic phosphatase .
Triticale ( × Triticosecale  )   ,  (  )  is a  संकर   of  wheat ( Triticum ) and rye  (   secale   )  first  करवाया   in  laboratories during  the  late 19th century  .
The grain was  originally  bred in Scotland and Sweden .
Commercially available triticale is almost always a second generation hybrid ,  i.e.  , a cross between two kinds of primary (  पहला   क्रॉस  ) triticales .
As a  नियम  , triticale combines the yield potential and grain quality  of  wheat with the disease  और   पर्यावरणीय  tolerance ( including  मृदा  conditions ) of rye  .
Only  recently  has it been  विकसित  into a  commercially  viable crop .
Depending on the cultivar ,  triticale  can  अधिक   or  less  resemble  either of  इसके  parents .
It is  grown  mostly for  forage  or  चारा  , although some triticale-based foods can be purchased at health food  स्टोर्स   or   हैं  to be  मिला  in some breakfast cereals .
When  क्रासिंग  wheat and rye , wheat is used as the female  जनक   और  rye  as  the male parent ( pollen  दाता  ) .
The resulting hybrid is  बंध्य  , and must be treated with colchicine to induce polyploidy and thus  the  ability to reproduce itself .
The primary  निर्माता  of triticale are Poland , Germany , France , Belarus and Australia .
In 2009 ,  according   to  the  खाना  and Agriculture Organization  (   fao  ) , 15.0  लाख  tons were harvested in 29 countries across the world  .
The triticale hybrids are all amphidiploid , which means the plant is diploid for two  genomes   निकला  from different  प्रजाति   .
In other words ,  triticale  is an allotetraploid .
In  पहले  years , most work was done  on  octoploid  triticale  .
अलग  ploidy levels have been created and evaluated over time .
The tetraploids showed little promise , but hexaploid triticale was successful enough to  ढूँढें  commercial application .
The  cimmyt  triticale improvement program  चाही  to improve  खाना  production  और  nutrition  in  developing countries  .
Triticale has  संभावित  in the production  of  bread  और  other food products , such as cookies , pasta  ,  pizza  आटा  and breakfast cereals  .
The protein content is higher  than  that  of  wheat , although the  glutenin  fraction is less .
The  अनाज  has also been stated  to  have higher levels of lysine  than   गेहूं  .
Assuming  increased   स्वीकृति  ,  the  milling industry will have to adapt to triticale , as  the  milling techniques employed for wheat  हैं  unsuited to triticale .
Sell  et  al . found triticale  could  be used as a  फीड  grain , and  बाद  research found  इसके  starch was particularly readily digested .
as  a feed grain ,  triticale  is already  खूब  established and of  ऊँची  economic importance .
it   रै  received attention as a potential energy crop , and  शोध  is currently  होने  conducted on  the  use of the crop 's biomass in bioethanol production .
``  कश  , the Magic Dragon '' is a  सोंग  written by Leonard Lipton  और   पीटर  Yarrow , and  बना  popular  by   yarrow   's   समूह  Peter , Paul and Mary  in  a 1963 recording .
The song achieved  ग्रेट  popularity .
a   कॉलेज   फ़ुटबॉल  national championship in the highest level of collegiate  खेल  in  the  United States  ,  currently the National Collegiate Athletic Association ( NCAA )  प्रभाग  I Football Bowl  subdivision  ( FBS )  ,  is a designation awarded annually by various third-party organizations to their selection ( s ) of the best  कॉलेज  football team ( s ) .
Division I FBS ( formerly Division I-A  )  football  is  the only NCAA sport in which a  वार्षिक  champion is not determined by  an  NCAA sanctioned championship event .
Because the championship team is not determined  by  a NCAA  चैंपियनशिप  or tournament  इवेंट  ,  it  is sometimes unofficially referred to as a  ``  mythical national championship `` .
Since the NCAA  ,  the sport 's governing  देह  , does not determine or declare a national champion in this field , determination of such  रै   प्रायः  engendered controversy  .
A championship  टोली  is independently declared by various individuals and organizations , often referred to as `` selectors '' .
These choices  हैं  sometimes at odds  साथ  each other .
While the NCAA has never  officially  endorsed an annual championship team  ,  it  रै   प्रलेखित   the  choices  of  several selectors in the official  ncaa  Football Bowl Subdivision Records .
In addition ,  विभिन्न   तीसरा  party analysts have independently published their  अपना  lists of what they  have  determined to be the  सबसे  legitimate selections for each  ऋतु  .
These  हैं  also often  at  odds with each  अन्य  as well as individual school 's  दावा  on  नेशनल   championships  ,  जिससे  ,  लिये  any particular season ,  may  or may not  correlate  to the selections published elsewhere  .
Currently  ,  two widely recognized national champions selectors are the Associated Press ,  जिससे  conducts a  पोल  of football  sportswriters   ,  and  the  USA Today  कोच  ' Poll ,  a  poll of American Football Coaches Association active coaches that is contractually obligated to  नाम  the winner  of  the Bowl Championship Series  चैंपियनशिप  game as its national champion .
The Milwaukee Brewers are a professional baseball team based in Milwaukee , Wisconsin .
the  team  is  a member of the Central Division of Major  लीग  Baseball 's  नेशनल  League and plays its home  खेल  at Miller Park .
the  team is so named because  of  the city  's  association  साथ  the brewing industry .
The Washington Nationals are  a  professional  बेसबॉल  team based in Washington ,  d.c  .
The Nationals are a  सदस्य  of the East Division of the  नेशनल  League of Major League Baseball ( MLB )  .
The team  's  home ballpark is Nationals Park , located  on  South  कैपिटल  Street in Southeast D.C. , near the Anacostia River .
The park opened in  2008  , replacing RFK Stadium , the team 's home from 2005 to 2007 .
The Nationals ' name derives from  the  former Washington baseball team that had the same name (  प्रयुक्त  interchangeably with Senators  )   .
Their nickname  is  `` the Nats '' —a shortened version  कि   थी  also  प्रयुक्त  by  the  old D.C. teams .
An  विस्तार  franchise  ,  the club was founded in as the Montreal Expos ,  the  first major league  टोली  in Canada .
वे  were based in Montreal , Quebec , and played their home  खेल  at Jarry Park Stadium and  बाद  in Olympic  स्टेडियम   .
in  ,  the   expos   जीती  a division championship , won their first-ever  playoff  series by defeating  the  Philadelphia Phillies , 3–2  ,  and advanced to the National League  चैंपियनशिप   श्रेणी  , where  वे  would  go  on to lose to the Los  एंजिल्स  Dodgers , 3–2 , in their only  postseason  appearance during the strike-shortened season .
The Expos had their  उच्चतम  winning percentage in the strike-shortened season of , when the team had the best record  in   बेसबॉल  .
The  टोली  's subsequent shedding of players caused fan interest to  बूँद  off  .
After the 2001 season ,  एमएलबी  considered  revoking  the team 's franchise  ,  along with either the Minnesota Twins or  the  Tampa Bay Devil  किरणें  .
After  होने  purchased  by  MLB in  2002  , the team was moved before  the  season to  वॉशिंगटन  and renamed the Nationals  ,  the  पहला  relocation since the second Washington Senators moved to Arlington ,  टेक्सास  , and  became  the Texas Rangers in .
the  Nationals  हैं  one of  दो  MLB franchises ,  और  the only one  in   the  National League , that has never played  in  a World Series (  the  Seattle  मैरीनेर्स  are the  अन्य  ) .
A contingent fee ( in the United  राज्य   )  or conditional fee (  in   इंग्लैण्ड  and  वेल्स  )  is  any fee for  सेवाएं  provided where the fee is payable only if there is a  favourable  result .
in  the law , it is defined  as  a ``  शुल्क  charged for a lawyer 's  सेवाएं  only  if  the  मुकदमा  is successful or is favorably settled out  of  court  ...   .
Contingent fees are usually calculated as a percentage of the client 's  जाल  recovery . ''
In the English  विधिक   प्रणाली  , it is  generally   referred  to as no win no  शुल्क   .
a  conditional fee  अनुबंध  between  a  law firm and a client .
The usual form of this agreement is that the  solicitor  will take a law  मामला  on the understanding that if lost , no payment is  बना  .
However , if the case is won , the lawyer will be entitled  to  the normal fee  आधारित  on  hourly  billing , plus a success  शुल्क  .
The success fee in England must be as a percentage no greater than 100 % of the normal fee .
This contrasts  साथ  the contingency  शुल्क  in the US , which gives  the  successful  attorney  a percentage  of  the damages awarded in  एहसान   of  his client .
This makes it easier for the poor to pursue  उनके  civil rights  चूंकि  otherwise  ,  to  मुकदमा   किसी  for a tort , one must first be  धनवान  enough to pursue  ऐसे  litigation in  the   पहला  place .
However  ,  because of the  ऊँची   रिस्क   ,  few attorneys will  लो   मामले   on  a contingency basis unless they feel  the  case has good merit  .
According to  a  2004 book  by  law professor Herbert Kritzer , contingent fees  यहूद   अनुमत  as of that year in the following countries : Australia , Brazil , Canada  ,  the Dominican Republic , France ,  यूनानियों  , Ireland , Japan  ,  New Zealand  ,  the United  किंगडम  and the United States .
They  हैं  also allowed in  निजी   चोट  actions  in  Lithuania .
Recently , they have  महरूम  allowed in Belgium as  खूब   .
a  Convocation ( Latin 'calling together ' , translating the Greek  ecclesia  )  is  a group of people formally assembled for a special purpose .
Sons of  अराजकता  is a television drama  श्रेणी  created by Kurt  sutter  about the  जीवनदान  of a close-knit outlaw motorcycle  क्लबों   ऑपरेटिंग   in   आकर्षक  , a fictional town in California 's Central Valley .
The show centers on protagonist  जैक्सन   ``  Jax '' Teller ( Charlie  hunnam  ) , the  then-vice  president of the  क्लबों  , who begins questioning  the  club and himself .
Sons of  अराजकता   premiered  on September  3  , 2008 , on cable network FX  .
The third season of  the  series attracted an  औसत   of  4.9  लाख   दर्शक  per week , making it FX 's  उच्चतम  rated series ever , surpassing FX 's other hits The Shield  ,  Nip/Tuck , and Rescue Me .
On  फ़रवरी  3 , 2012 , Sons of Anarchy was renewed for two additional seasons  ,  a fifth  और   a   छठे   .
Those involved in the  उत्पादन   of  the series imply that  a  seventh and final season is creator  कर्ट  Sutter  's  plan .
The  grímsvötn  sub-glacial lakes ( ; vötn = `` waters '' ,  एकवचन  :  )  and the volcano of the same name  हैं  in South-East Iceland  .
They  हैं  in the highlands of Iceland  at  the northwestern side of  the  Vatnajökull  ice-cap  .
The lakes  हैं  at , at an elevation of .
Beneath the  झीलों  is the magma chamber of the Grímsvötn volcano .
Grímsvötn is  a   basaltic  volcano  जिससे  has the  उच्चतम  eruption  आवृत्ति  of all the volcanoes  in  Iceland and  रै  a southwest-northeast-trending fissure system  .
The massive  climate-impacting  Laki fissure eruption of 1783–1784 was a part of the same fissure  प्रणाली  .
Grímsvötn was erupting at the same time  as   laki  during 1783 , but continued to  erupt   जबतक  1785 .
Because  सबसे  of  the  volcano lies underneath Vatnajökull , most  of   इसके  eruptions have been subglacial and  the  interaction of magma  और   meltwater  from the ice causes phreatomagmatic explosive activity .
On  21  May 2011 at 19:25 UTC , an eruption  began   ,  with  ऊँची   plumes  accompanied  by  multiple earthquakes ,  resulting  in cancellation of 900 flights in Iceland ,  और  in the United  किंगडम   ,   ग्रीनलैंड  ,  जर्मनी  ,  आयरलैंड  and Norway on 22–25 May .
Until 25 May the eruption scale had been larger  than  that of the  2010   फटना  of Eyjafjallajökull .
The eruption  रोका  at 02:40 UTC  on  25 May 2011 , although there was  कुछ  explosive activity  इससे  the tephra  vents  affecting only the area around  the  crater .
Vetting is the process of  performing  a background check on  किसी  before  offering  them employment , conferring an award , etc .
a  prospective person or project may be vetted before making a hiring decision .
In  जोड  , in intelligence gathering , assets are vetted to determine their usefulness .

Caesars Entertainment Corporation (  formerly  Harrah 's  entertainment  from 1995  to   2010  ) is an American public gaming corporation that owns and operates  over  50  कसीनो  , hotels , and seven golf courses under several brands .
The company ,  आधारित  in  स्वर्ग   ,  Nevada , is the largest gaming company in  the   संसार  , with annual  revenues  of $ 8.9 billion (  2010  )  .
Caesars is a public  कम्पनी  ,  साथ  a  संयुक्त  venture of Apollo Global Management and Texas Pacific  समूह  ownig a large portion of the stack  और   blackstone  Group also holding a significant stake .
The  नाम  change from `` Harrah 's Entertainment Inc. '' to `` Caesars Entertainment Corporation  ''   थी  made  आधिकारिक  on November 23 ,  2010  .
Harrah 's remains  a  key brand in the company  .
On November 5  ,   2010  , Harrah 's announced an initial  पब्लिक  offering of 31,250,000 shares  लकिन  retracted  इस   offering  on November  19  .
A Permanent Resident in Canada is a person who is not a  कनाडाई  citizen but  जो  has been granted permission to live and work in Canada without any time limit on his  or  her stay .
a  permanent  निवासी  must live  in  Canada for  दो  years out of  प्रत्येक   पाँच   or  risk losing that status .
A Permanent Resident  holds  many of the same rights and responsibilities as a Canadian citizen , among others the right to  कार्य  for  कोई  enterprise as well  as  for the federal or  प्रांतीय  government ( under restriction of access rights to certain  regulated  professions ) .
The main differences  हैं   कि  residents can not :
vote in elections in Canada ;
run for elected office  ;
hold Canadian passports ;
In  जोड   ,   वे  may be allowed  to  join Canada 's  हथियारबंद  forces if the national interest would not be prejudiced  .
Permanent residents also risk deportation for  गंभीर  crimes  वचनबद्ध  while resident in  कनाडा  .
Permanent residents may  लागू  for Canadian citizenship  बाद  three years in Canada ;  however  this  is  not mandatory .
Erica Kane is a fictional character from the American ABC Daytime soap  ओपेरा   सब  My Children .
The character was portrayed  by  actress Susan Lucci from her  डेब्यू  on  जनवरी   16  , 1970 until the last broadcast television  एपीसोड  aired on September 23 , 2011 .
On  फ़रवरी  11  ,  2013 , it was announced that  lucci  will guest-star  on  the Prospect Park 's continuation of All My Children .
In the  u.S.  , Erica is considered to be  the  most  लोकप्रिय  character in soap opera history .
Regarding the North-American market , TV Guide  काल्स  her `` unequivocally the most  प्रसिद्ध   साबुन   ओपेरा  character in the history of daytime TV '' ,  और  included her  in  their  2013  list of  the  60  nastiest  Villains of All  समय  .
A graph of the US CPI from 1913 to 2006 ( in blue )  ,  and its percent annual change ( in red )
A consumer price index ( CPI ) measures changes in  the  price  स्तर  of a market basket of  उपभोक्ता  goods and services purchased by households .
The CPI  in  the  संयुक्त  States is  पारिभाषित  by the Bureau of  मजदूर  Statistics as `` a measure of the average change over time in the prices paid by urban consumers for a market  बास्केट  of consumer goods  और  services  .   ''
The CPI is a statistical estimate  constructed  using the  कीमतें  of  a  sample of representative  वस्तुएं  whose prices are  एकत्रित   periodically  .
Sub-indexes and sub-sub-indexes  हैं  computed for different categories and sub-categories of goods and services  ,  being  संयुक्त  to  उपज  the overall index with  weights  reflecting their shares in the total of the consumer expenditures covered  by   the   अनुक्रमणिका  .
It is one of several price indices calculated by  सबसे  national statistical  एजेंसियों   .
the  annual percentage change  in   a  CPI is used as a measure  of  inflation .
A CPI can be used  to  index ( i.e. ,  समायोजन  for the  प्रभाव  of inflation ) the real value of wages , salaries , pensions ,  लिये  regulating prices and for deflating monetary magnitudes to show  परिवर्तन  in real values .
In most countries , the CPI is  ,   साथ  with  the  population census and the USA National  आय  and Product Accounts , one of the  सबसे  closely watched  नेशनल  economic  आंकडे  .
Knocking on wood , or to touch wood , refers to the apotropaic tradition in western folklore of literally  touching/knocking  on wood  ,  or merely stating that you  हैं   doing   or   intend  same ,  in  order to  avoid   ``  tempting fate `` after making a favourable observation  ,   a  boast , or declaration  concerning  one 's own death .
Rocker arm
Generally  referred   to  within the context  of   the  internal  दहन   इंजन   of  automotive , marine  ,  motorcycle and reciprocating aviation engines  ,  the rocker arm  is   an   oscillating  lever that conveys radial movement from the cam lobe into linear movement at the poppet valve to open it .
One end is raised and lowered by a  घूर्णन  lobe  of  the camshaft (  either  directly or via a tappet (  lifter  ) and pushrod ) while the  अन्य  end acts on the valve stem .
When  the  camshaft lobe raises the outside  of   the  arm , the  अंदर  presses down on  the  valve stem , opening the  वाल्व  .
When the outside of the  भुजा  is permitted to return  due  to the  camshafts  rotation , the inside rises , allowing the valve spring  to  close  the  valve .
The drive cam is  चलित  by the  camshaft  .
This pushes the rocker  भुजा  up and down about the  trunnion  pin or rocker  शाफ्ट  .
घर्षण  may be reduced at the point of contact with the valve stem by a roller cam  अनुसरणकर्ता  .
A similar arrangement  हस्तांतरण  the motion via another  रोलर  cam follower  to   a   दूसरी  rocker arm .
This rotates about the  रॉकर  shaft , and transfers the motion via  a  tappet to the poppet valve .
In this case  इस  opens  the   सेवन  valve to the cylinder  सिर  .
The effective leverage of the arm ( and thus  the  force  it  can  exert   on  the valve stem ) is  संकल्पित  by the rocker  भुजा  ratio , the  अनुपात  of  the  distance from  the  rocker arm  's   बीच  of rotation  to  the  टिप   विभाजित  by the distance from  the  center of rotation to the  पाइंट   acted  on by  the  camshaft or pushrod .
Current automotive  डिज़ाइन   favors  rocker arm ratios of about 1.5:1 to  1.8:1  .
however   ,   in  the past smaller positive ratios  (   the  valve lift  is  greater than the cam lift  )  and even negative ratios (  वाल्व  lift  छोटी  than  the   कैम  lift ) have been used  .
अनेक  pre-WW2 engines use  1:1  ( neutral  )  ratios .
लिये  car engines the rocker arms are generally steel  stampings  , providing  a  reasonable balance of strength , weight  और   किफायती   लागत   .
Because the rocker arms  हैं  , in part  ,  reciprocating weight , excessive mass especially at the lever ends limits the engine  's  ability to reach  ऊँची  operating speeds  .
`` The Night the Lights Went Out in Georgia ''  is  a  दक्षिणी   गोथिक  song written by songwriter Bobby Russell and performed in 1972  by  his  then-wife  Vicki Lawrence  .
Reba McEntire later covered it in 1991 .
अंकित  in late October 1972 in  united/western  Studios on  सूर्यास्त  in Hollywood and released  कम  than two weeks later  in   नवम्बर  1972 , the song centers around  the  older brother of  the  narrator , falsely convicted  of   और   चलाया  for a murder , which the narrator herself has committed  .
In postal mail ,  a  return address is an explicit inclusion of the address of the person sending the message .
It provides the recipient ( and sometimes authorized intermediaries ) with a means to determine how to respond  to  the  प्रेषक  of the message if needed  .
The  वापसी  address need not include a sender 's  नाम  , but should include address or P.O  .  box details in the same  रास्ता  as  the  delivery address should .
In some countries , the  वापसी   पता  is conventionally located in the upper left  हाथ  corner of the envelope , card ,  or   लेबल  .
In the United Kingdom , the return address  is   प्रायः  placed on the  रिवर्स  of the  लिफाफा  , near the top .
व्यवसायों  often use envelopes preprinted with a  वापसी  address .
Many individuals have sheets of adhesive  लेबल्स   preprinted  with  उनके  home  पता  to  affix  to their correspondence .
Charities sometimes include  ऐसे  sheets in mailshots .
रोल्स  of Return  पता  Labels can be purchased from companies that sell personalized labels to provide individuals an easy way  to   छिलके  and stick return  पता   लेबल्स  to their envelopes .
The return address is not required on postal mail  .
however  ,  कमी  of a return address  रोकता  the postal service  इससे  being able to return  the  item if it  proves  undeliverable ; such as from damage , postage due , or  अमान्य  destination .
Such  मेल  may thus become dead letter mail .
चाहिए  the return address  be  of  a  different state or  देश   ,   the  mail may be routed through that location  लिये  ease  of  return .
A nerve guidance conduit  (   भी  referred  to  as  an  artificial nerve  conduit  or artificial nerve  graft   ,  as  opposed  to  an  autograft )  is  an artificial means  of  guiding axonal regrowth to facilitate nerve regeneration and is one of several clinical treatments for nerve injuries .
When direct suturing  of  the two stumps  of  a severed nerve  can  not  be   संपन्नता   बगैर  tension , the  मानक  clinical  उपचार  for peripheral nerve  चोटों   is  autologous nerve grafting .
Due to  the   सीमित  availability of donor tissue and functional recovery in autologous  तंत्रिका  grafting , neural tissue engineering research has focused on the  विकास  of  bioartificial  nerve guidance conduits as an  वैकल्पिक  treatment ,  विशेषकर   लिये  large defects .
समान  techniques are also being explored for nerve repair in the spinal cord but nerve  regeneration  in the central nervous  प्रणाली  poses a greater challenge because  इसके  axons do not regenerate appreciably  in  their native  पर्यावरण  .
The creation of artificial conduits  is  also  ज्ञात  as entubulation  क्युकी   the  nerve ends and intervening  गैप   हैं  enclosed within a tube composed of biological  or  synthetic materials .
Whether the conduit  is  in the form of a biologic tube , synthetic  ट्यूब  or tissue-engineered  conduit  , it  चाहिए  facilitate neurotropic  और   neurotrophic   संचार   between  the  proximal  and distal  ends  of the nerve gap ,  ब्लाक  external inhibitory factors , and provide a physical guidance for axonal regrowth .
The most basic objective of  a  nerve guidance conduit is to combine physical , chemical , and biological cues under conditions that will foster tissue formation .
Materials that have been used to make biologic  tubes  include blood vessels and skeletal  मांसपेशियां  , while nonabsorbable and bioabsorbable synthetic tubes have been made from  silicone   और  polyglycolide  क्रमशः  .
Tissue-engineered nerve guidance conduits are a  संयोजन  of many  तत्व   :  scaffold structure , scaffold material , cellular  therapies  , neurotrophic factors  और  biomimetic materials .
The choice of  जिससे  physical  ,  chemical and biological  cues  to use is based on  the  properties of  the  nerve  पर्यावरण  ,  जिससे  is critical in creating the most desirable environment  लिये  axon  regeneration  .
the  factors that control  सामग्री  selection include biocompatibility , biodegradability , mechanical integrity ,  controllability  during  तंत्रिका  growth , implantation and sterilization .
Hardcore Pawn is an American reality television series  उत्पादित   by  RDF USA ( later Zodiak  यूएसए  )  और  Richard  dominick  Productions for truTV about  the  day-to-day operations of American Jewelry  और  Loan  ,   a  family-owned pawn shop located at 20450 Greenfield Road , between 8 Mile Road and the  जॉन  C. Lodge Freeway in Detroit  ,   मिशिगन  .
The series premiered on  अगस्त  16  ,  2010 , delivering two million  दर्शक  ,  सेटिंग  a record as truTV 's most-watched series premiere ever .
Amoxicillin  bp
amoxicillin  ( INN  )  , formerly amoxycillin ( BAN ) , and abbreviated  amox  , is a moderate-spectrum , bacteriolytic , β-lactam antibiotic  प्रयुक्त   to   दावत  bacterial infections caused by  susceptible   microorganisms  .
It is  प्रायः  the drug of choice within the  क्लास   क्युकी   it  is better  अवशोषित  , following oral  प्रशासन   ,  than other β-lactam antibiotics .
Amoxicillin is one of the  सबसे  common  एंटीबायोटिक  prescribed for children .
The drug became available  in  1972 .
Amoxicillin is susceptible  to  degradation by β-lactamase -producing  जीवाणु  , which  हैं   resistant   to  a broad spectrum of β-lactam antibiotics  ,  such as penicillin .
For  इस   कारण  , it is often  संयुक्त  with clavulanic acid , a β-lactamase  inhibitor  .
This increases effectiveness by  reducing   इसके  susceptibility to  β-lactamase  resistance .
Lyndon  baines   जॉनसन   (   अगस्त  27 , 1908 – January  22  , 1973  )  , often referred to as LBJ , was the 36th President  of   the  United States ( 1963–1969 ) , a position he assumed after  उसके  service as the 37th Vice President of the United States ( 1961–1963 ) .
He  is  one of only four people  जो   परोसा   in  all four  निर्वाचित  federal offices of the United  राज्य  :  प्रतिनिधि  , Senator , Vice President , and  अध्यक्ष  .
Johnson  ,  a Democrat from Texas , served  as  a United States Representative from  1937–1949  and as a Senator from 1949–1961 , including six years as United States Senate Majority  नेता  , two as  सीनेट  Minority Leader and two as Senate Majority Whip .
बाद  campaigning unsuccessfully for the Democratic  नामांकन  in  1960  , Johnson was  पूछा  by John F.  कैनेडी  to be his  कार्यशील   mate  for the 1960 presidential election .
Johnson succeeded to  the  presidency following the  हत्या  of John F.  कैनेडी  on  नवम्बर  22 , 1963 , completed Kennedy 's term  और  was elected  अध्यक्ष  in  उसके  own right , winning  by   a  large margin over Barry Goldwater in the 1964  चुनाव  .
Johnson  थी  greatly supported by the  लोकतांत्रिक  Party and as  अध्यक्ष  , he was responsible for  डिजाइनिंग  the  ``  Great Society `` legislation that included  कानून  that upheld civil rights , public broadcasting ,  medicare  ,  medicaid  , environmental  सुरक्षा  , aid to  शिक्षा   ,  and his `` War on Poverty . ''
Johnson was renowned for his domineering personality and the `` Johnson treatment , '' his  coercion  of powerful politicians in order  to  advance  विधान  .
Meanwhile , Johnson escalated American  भागीदारी  in the  वियतनाम  War  ,  from 16,000 American  advisors/soldiers   in  1963 to 550,000 combat troops  in  early 1968 , as American casualties soared  और  the  सलाम  process bogged down .
the  involvement stimulated  a  large angry antiwar movement  आधारित  especially  on  university campuses  in  the U.S. and  विदेश  .
Summer riots broke out in most major cities after 1965 , and crime rates  soared  , as his opponents raised  मांगे  for ``  विधि   और  order '' policies .
The Democratic Party split  in  multiple feuding factions , and after Johnson  किया  poorly in the 1968  नई  Hampshire primary , he  ended   उसके   बोली   लिये  reelection .
रिपब्लिकन  Richard Nixon was elected to succeed him .
इतिहासकारों  argue that  जॉनसन  's presidency marked the peak of modern  उदारतावाद  in  the  United States  बाद  the New Deal era  .
Johnson  is  ranked favorably by  कुछ  historians because of  उसके  domestic policies .
The Big Bang Theory  डाल  at  कॉमिक  Con 2009 ,  इससे  left  :  Kunal Nayyar , Simon  helberg  , Kaley Cuoco  ,  Jim Parsons , and Johnny  galecki
the  American sitcom The Big Bang Theory , created and executive  उत्पादित  by Chuck Lorre and  विधेयक  Prady , premiered on CBS on September 24 , 2007 .
The  दिखाएँ  centers on five  वर्ण   :   roommates  Sheldon  कूपर   और  Leonard Hofstadter , two Caltech physicists ;  पैनी   ,  a waitress and aspiring actress who  जीवनदान   आरपार  the hall ;  और  Leonard  और   शेल्डन  's friends and  co-workers  aerospace engineer Howard Wolowitz  ,   और   astrophysicist  Rajesh Koothrappali  .
Over time  ,  several  supporting  characters have been promoted to starring roles : Leslie Winkle  (  season  1  recurring ; season 2 regular ; season 3  अतिथि  ) ,  a  physicist  सहयोगी  , and  ,  at different times ,  a  lover of both  लियोनार्ड  and  हावर्ड  ; Bernadette Rostenkowski-Wolowitz ( season 3 recurring ; season 4-present regular ) , a  microbiologist   ,  Howard 's fiancée and subsequent  बीवी  ,  और  former  part-time  waitress alongside Penny ; neuroscientist Amy Farrah Fowler ( season 3 guest ; season 4 recurring ; season  4-present  regular )  ,  who  joins  the  समूह  after being matched to Sheldon  on  a dating website ; and comic book store-owner , Stuart Bloom ( seasons 2–5 recurring ; season 6-present regular )  ,  who replaces Howard as Raj 's best friend when Howard is in space .
The  दिखाएँ  also features  numerous  supporting characters , each  of  whom plays a  prominent   भूमिका  in  a  small group  of  episodes .
the  American Civil War ( ACW ) ,  भी  known as  the   युद्ध  between the States or simply the Civil War ( see naming ) , was a civil war fought  इससे  1861 to 1865 between the United States (  the  `` Union '' or the  ``  North '' ) and several Southern  स्लेव  states that declared their secession and  formed  the Confederate  राज्य  of America  (  the `` Confederacy '' or the  ``  South '' ) .
The war had its origin in the issue of slavery , especially the extension of slavery  into  the western territories .
विदेशी   शक्तियां  did not  intervene  .
बाद  four years of bloody combat  कि   बाएँ  over 600,000 soldiers dead  और  destroyed much of the South 's infrastructure , the Confederacy collapsed , slavery was abolished , and the  मुश्किल   पुनर्निर्माण  process of  restoring  national  एकता  and  guaranteeing   अधिकारों  to the freed slaves began  .
In the  1860   अध्यक्षीय  election , Republicans  ,  led by Abraham  lincoln   ,  opposed expanding slavery into United  राज्य  ' territories .
lincoln   जीती  , but before his inauguration  on  March 4 , 1861 , seven cotton-based slave states formed the Confederacy .
outgoing   लोकतांत्रिक  President James Buchanan and the incoming Republicans rejected secession as illegal .
lincoln   's   inaugural  address declared his  प्रशासन  would not initiate civil  युद्ध   .
आठ  remaining slave states  जारी  to  अस्वीकृत  calls for secession .
Confederate forces seized numerous federal forts  भीतर  territory claimed  by  the Confederacy .
A Peace Conference failed to find a  सुलह   ,   और  both sides  prepared  for war  .
the  Confederates assumed that European countries were  so  dependent  on  `` King Cotton `` that they would intervene ; none did and none  पहचाना  the new  confederate  States of America  .
Hostilities began on April  12  , 1861 ,  जब   confederate  forces fired upon  फोर्ट   sumter  , a key  फोर्ट  held by  संघ  troops in South Carolina .
Lincoln  पुकारा  for  प्रत्येक  state to provide troops  to  retake the  फोर्ट  ; consequently , four more  स्लेव  states  joined  the Confederacy , bringing  उनके  total to eleven .
The Union soon controlled  the  border states and established  a  naval blockade that crippled  the  southern economy .
The Eastern Theater was inconclusive in 1861–62 .
The autumn  1862  Confederate campaign into Maryland (  a  Union state ) ended  साथ  Confederate retreat at  the  Battle  of  Antietam , dissuading British intervention .
Lincoln issued  the  Emancipation Proclamation , which  बना  ending  गुलामी  a  युद्ध  goal .
To the west , by summer 1862 the Union destroyed the Confederate river navy  ,  then much  of   उनके  western armies  ,   और  the Union at Vicksburg split  the   confederacy  in  दो   at  the Mississippi River .
In  1863  , Robert E. Lee 's Confederate incursion north ended at  the  Battle of Gettysburg .
Western successes led to Ulysses S. Grant command of all Union armies in 1864 .
in  the Western Theater , William T. Sherman drove east to capture  अटलांटा   और  marched to the sea , destroying Confederate  अवसंरचना  along  the  way .
The Union marshaled the resources and manpower to  आक्रमण   the   confederacy  from all directions , and could afford to fight battles of  अपघर्षण  through  the  Overland Campaign towards  रिचमंड  , the Confederate capital .
The  defending   confederate  army failed , leading  to  Lee  's  surrender to Grant at Appomattox Court House  on  April 9 , 1865 .
The American Civil War was one of the earliest true  औद्योगिक  wars .
Railroads  ,  the telegraph , steamships , and mass-produced  हथियार  were employed  extensively  .
the   mobilization   of  civilian factories  ,  mines , shipyards , banks , transportation and food supplies all foreshadowed  संसार  War I .
It  remains  the deadliest war in American history , resulting in the deaths of  an   अनुमानित   750,000  soldiers and  an   undetermined  number of civilian  हताहत  .
इतिहासकार  John Huddleston estimates  the   मौत   टोल  at ten percent of  सब  Northern  males  20–45 years  बूढ़ा  , and  30   प्रतिशत  of all  दक्षिणी  white males aged 18–40 .
इंसान   एवोल्यूशन  refers to the evolutionary process leading  up   to  the  रूप  of modern humans .
While  it  began with the last  आम  ancestor  of  all  जीवन  , the topic usually covers only  the  evolutionary history  of   primates  , in  particular  the genus Homo  ,  and the emergence of Homo sapiens as a distinct  प्रजाति  of hominids ( or `` great apes '' ) .
The  पढ़ाई  of human  एवोल्यूशन  involves  अनेक  scientific disciplines , including physical anthropology , primatology , archaeology  ,  linguistics , evolutionary psychology  ,   भ्रूणविज्ञान   और  genetics .
according   to  genetic studies ,  primates   diverged  from other mammals about in the Late Cretaceous period , and the earliest fossils appear  in   the  Paleocene , around .
The family Hominidae diverged from the Hylobatidae (  गिबन  ) family 15-20 million  सालो  ago , and around  ,  the Ponginae  (   orangutans  )  ,   diverged  from the  मानवनुमा  family .
Bipedalism  is  the basic adaption  of   the  Hominin line , and the earliest  bipedal  Hominin  is   माना  to  be   either  Sahelanthropus or Orrorin , with Ardipithecus ,  a   पूरा   bipedal  ,  coming   somewhat  later .
The  गोरिल्ला  and  चिंपैंजी  diverged around the same time , about 4-6 million  सालो  ago , and either Sahelanthropus or Orrorin may be our  पिछला  shared  पूर्वज   साथ   उन्हें  .
the   जल्दी   bipedals  eventually evolved into  the  australopithecines and later the genus  होमो  .
The earliest documented  सदस्यों  of the genus Homo  हैं   होमो   habilis  which evolved around ;  the  earliest  प्रजाति  for which  वहीँ  is positive  प्रमाण   of  use of stone tools .
The brains of these early hominins were  परिचय  the same size as that of a chimpanzee .
During the next million years a  प्रक्रम  of encephalization began , and  साथ  the arrival of Homo erectus in the fossil record  ,  cranial capacity had doubled to 850 cm3  .
होमो   इरेक्टस  and Homo ergaster  यहूद  the first of  the  hominina  to  leave Africa , and these species spread through Africa , Asia , and  यूरोपीय  between .
It is believed  कि  these species were the first to use fire and complex tools .
According to the Recent African Ancestry  सिद्धान्त  ,  आधुनिक  humans evolved in Africa  संभवतः  from Homo heidelbergensis ,  होमो  rhodesiensis or Homo antecessor and migrated  आउट  of the continent  कुछ  50,000 to 100,000 years  पहले  ,  replacing  local  populations  of Homo erectus  ,  Homo denisova , Homo floresiensis and Homo  neanderthalensis  .
Archaic Homo sapiens , the  forerunner  of anatomically  आधुनिक  humans ,  विकसित  between 400,000 and  250,000  years  पहले  .
हाल  DNA evidence suggests that  अनेक  haplotypes of Neanderthal origin are present among  सब  non-African  populations  , and  neanderthals  and other hominids , such as Denisova hominin may have contributed up to 6 %  of  their genome to present-day humans.  <   संदर्भ  name= ''  10.1126/science.1209202  '' > Anatomically modern humans  विकसित  from archaic Homo sapiens in the Middle Paleolithic  ,  about 200,000 years  पहले  .
The transition to behavioral modernity with the  विकास  of symbolic  संस्कृति  , language , and specialized lithic technology happened around 50,000 years ago according to many  विज्ञानियों  although  कुछ  suggest a gradual change in behavior over a longer time span .
Lisa Cuddy  ,  M.D  .  , is a fictional character on the Fox network medical drama House .
She is portrayed by Lisa Edelstein .
Cuddy was  the  Dean of  आयुर्विज्ञान  and hospital administrator of the fictional Princeton-Plainsboro Teaching Hospital in New  जर्सी  .
She also becomes House 's love  ब्याज  through the years to start a relationship with him in season seven .
Cuddy quit her job after the events of  ऋतु  seven  's  finale `` Moving On  ``  .
Track and field is  a  sport  comprising  various  प्रतिस्पर्धी  athletic contests based  on  running  ,  jumping ,  और  throwing .
The name  of  the sport derives from  the  competition venue : a  स्टेडियम   साथ  an oval running track around a grass field .
The throwing and jumping events generally take place  in  the central enclosed  क्षेत्रफल  .
track  and field falls under  the  umbrella sport of athletics , which  भी  includes road running , cross country running  ,  and race walking  .
The two most prestigious international track and field competitions are held  अंतर्गत  the banner of athletics : the athletics  प्रतियोगिता   at  the Olympic Games and the IAAF World Championships in Athletics .
The International Association of  एथलेटिक्स  Federations  is  the international governing body for track and field .
Track  और  field events are generally individual sports with  एथलीट  challenging each other to decide a single victor .
The racing  कार्यक्रम  are won by the athlete with the fastest time , while the  कूद   और  throwing  कार्यक्रम  are won  by  the athlete  जो   रै  achieved the greatest distance or height in the contest .
The running events are  categorised   as  sprints , middle and long-distance events ,  relays  , and  hurdling  .
Regular jumping events include long jump , triple jump ,  ऊँची  jump and pole  वॉल्ट  , while the  सबसे  common throwing  कार्यक्रम  are shot put , javelin , discus and  हथौड़ा  .
There are also `` combined  कार्यक्रम  '' ,  ऐसे  as  heptathlon  and  decathlon   ,  in which athletes  compete   in  a number of the above events .
Records are kept of the best performances  in   विशिष्ट  events  ,  at world and national levels , right down  to  a personal level .
however  , if athletes  हैं  deemed to have violated the  इवेंट  's  नियम   or  regulations  ,  they  हैं   disqualified  from the competition and their  marks  are erased .
In North America ,  the   पद  track  और  field  may  be used to refer  to  athletics in general ,  बल्कि  than specifically track and field events .
The Gulf  युद्ध  ( 2 August 1990  –  28 February 1991 ) , codenamed Operation Desert Storm ( 17 January  1991   –   28  February 1991  )  was a  युद्ध  waged by  a  U.N.-authorized Coalition  फ़ोर्स  from 34 nations led by the United States , against Iraq in response to Iraq 's invasion and annexation  of  Kuwait .
The war  is  also known under  अन्य  names , such as the Persian Gulf War  ,  First Gulf War , Gulf War  i   ,  or  the  First Iraq War , before the term `` Iraq War '' became identified  बजाय  with  the  2003  इराकी  War (  भी  referred to in the U.S. as ``  आपरेशन   इराकी  Freedom '' ) .
Kuwait 's invasion by Iraqi troops that began 2 August 1990 was  मिले  with international  condemnation  , and  brought  immediate economic sanctions against Iraq by members  of  the U.N. Security  परिषद  .
U.S. President George H. W. Bush deployed  u.S.  forces into  सऊदी  Arabia ,  और  urged other countries to send their own forces  to  the scene .
An array of nations  joined  the  गठबन्धन  .
The great  बहुमत  of the Coalition 's  सैन्य  forces  यहूद  from the U.S. , with Saudi Arabia , the  संयुक्त  Kingdom and Egypt as leading contributors , in that order .
Saudi Arabia paid around US $ 36  अरब  of the US $  60  billion  लागत  .
the  war was  चिह्नित  by the  शुरूआत  of live news on the front lines of the fight , with the primacy  of  the U.S.  संजाल  CNN .
the  war  रै   भी   अर्जित  the nickname Video Game War after the  रोज़  broadcast images on board the U.S. bombers  दौरान  Operation Desert  तूफ़ान  .
The initial conflict to expel Iraqi  सैनिकों   इससे  Kuwait  began  with an aerial  बमबारी   on  17 January 1991 .
इस  was followed by a ground assault on 24 February  .
इस   थी  a decisive victory  लिये  the Coalition forces  ,  who liberated  कुवैत  and advanced into Iraqi territory .
The Coalition ceased their advance  ,  and declared a cease-fire  100   घंटों  after the ground campaign  प्रारंभ  .
aerial   और  ground combat was confined to Iraq , Kuwait , and areas on  सऊदी  Arabia 's border .
Iraq launched Scud missiles against Coalition military targets in Saudi Arabia and  विरूद्ध   इसराईल  .
The nickel ,  in  American usage , is a  five-  cent  सिक्का  issued by  the   संयुक्त   राज्य   मिंट   .
Composed of 75 %  तांबे  and  25  % nickel , the piece has been struck since 1866 .
The  चांदी  half dime , equal to five  सेंट  , had been issued since  the  1790s .
The American Civil  युद्ध  caused  आर्थिक  hardship , driving  सुनहरा  and silver from circulation ; in response ,  in  place of low-value  सिक्के  , the  सरकारी  at first  जारी  paper currency  .
In 1865 ,  कॉंग्रेस   abolished  the five-cent  fractional  currency note after Spencer  M.  Clark , head of the Currency Bureau  (  today  the  Bureau of Engraving and Printing ) , placed his  अपना   पोर्ट्रेट   on  the denomination .
After  कामयाब  introduction of two-cent and three-cent pieces , without precious metal  ,  Congress also  प्राधिकृत  a five-cent piece consisting of  आधार  metal ; the Mint began  striking  this version in 1866 .
The initial design of  the  Shield nickel was struck until 1883  ,  then  replaced  by the  स्वतंत्रता  Head nickel .
The  भैंस  nickel  थी   introduced   in  1913 as part  of  a drive to increase the  सौंदर्य  of American coinage ; in  1938  , the Jefferson nickel followed .
In 2004  और  2005  ,  special designs in honor of the bicentennial of the Lewis and  क्लार्क  Expedition were issued .
In 2006 , the Mint reverted  to  using Jefferson nickel designer Felix Schlag 's original reverse ( or `` tails '' side  )  , although a new  obverse  , by Jamie Franki , was substituted .
As  of   2013  , it costs  अधिक   than  eleven cents to produce a nickel ; the Mint is exploring  the  possibility of reducing cost by using less expensive metals .
A poster with flowers  or   क्लस्टर  of flowers  उत्पादित   by  twelve species of flowering plants from different families
A flower , sometimes known as  a  bloom  or  blossom , is the reproductive structure found in flowering plants ( plants of the division  magnoliophyta  , also called angiosperms ) .
The  biological  function of a  पुष्प  is to effect  जनन  , usually by  providing  a mechanism for the union of  शुक्राणु  with eggs .
Flowers  may  facilitate outcrossing ( fusion of sperm and eggs from  अलग  individuals  in   a  population ) or allow selfing  (  fusion of  शुक्राणु  and egg from the same  पुष्प   )   .
Some flowers produce diaspores without fertilization ( parthenocarpy ) .
Flowers contain  sporangia  and are the site  जहाँ   gametophytes  develop .
Flowers give  वृद्धि  to fruit and seeds .
Many flowers have  विकसित  to  be  attractive to animals ,  so  as to cause them to be vectors for the transfer of pollen .
In addition to  facilitating  the reproduction of flowering plants , flowers have long been  admired  and used by humans  to  beautify their environment  ,  and  भी  as objects of romance  ,  ritual , religion  ,  medicine and as a source of food .
The McDonnell Douglas ( now Boeing ) F-15 Eagle is a  twin-engine  ,  all-weather   रणनीतिक   सेनानी  designed by  mcdonnell  Douglas  to  gain and  maintain  air superiority in  aerial  combat .
It is considered among  the  most successful modern fighters , with over 100 aerial combat victories with no losses in dogfights .
Following reviews  of  proposals , the  संयुक्त  States Air Force  चयनित  McDonnell Douglas  '  design in  1967  to  मिलें  the service 's  need  for a dedicated  एयर  superiority  सेनानी  .
The Eagle first flew  in   जुलाई  1972 , and entered service in 1976  .
चूंकि   the   1970s   ,   the  Eagle has been exported to  इसराईल  ,  जापानी  , Saudi  अरब   ,  and other  राष्ट्र  .
the  F-15 was originally envisioned  as  a pure  एयर  superiority aircraft .
इसके  design  शामिल   a  secondary ground-attack capability that was largely  अप्रयुक्त  .
The design  proved  flexible enough that an all-weather strike derivative , the F-15E  स्ट्राइक  Eagle , was later  विकसित   ,  and entered service in 1989 .
The F-15 Eagle is  अपेक्षित  to be  in   सेवा  with the  u.S.   एयर  Force  पास्ट   2025  .
Mimio is a brand  नाम  of a line of technology products aimed at the  शिक्षा  market .
The primary products  हैं  focused around computer whiteboard interactive teaching devices .
MimioCapture devices also allow  उपयोक्ता  to capture all of  the  ink  स्ट्रोक्स   कि  are written on the whiteboard .
जब  used in  संयोजन  with a video  प्रोजेक्टर   it  turns the ordinary whiteboard surface into a fully interactive whiteboard .
the  product line was originally designed  by  Virtual Ink  .
On October 4 , 2006 Newell Rubbermaid acquired the Mimio interactive  whiteboard  ( iWB ) product line .
Rahab of Jericho
Rahab , ( ; ;  )  was  ,  according to the  किताब  of Joshua ,  a   स्त्री  who lived  in  Jericho in the  promised  Land and assisted the  israelites  in capturing the  नगर  .
nearly   सब  English translations  of  Joshua describe her  as   a  harlot or prostitute .
The Organization of  अमरीकी  States ( Spanish : Organización de los Estados Americanos , Portuguese : Organização  डॉस  Estados Americanos  ,  French : Organisation des États américains ) , or the OAS , is  a  regional international organization .
The  oas  was  संस्थापित  on 30 April 1948 , and has its  मुख्यालय  in Washington , D.C. , United States .
Its members are the 35 independent  राज्य   of  the  americas  .
Since 26 May 2005 , the Secretary General of  oas  has been José Miguel Insulza .
Christopher Columbus (  इतालवी  : Cristoforo Colombo ; Spanish : Cristóbal Colón ; Portuguese : Cristóvão Colombo ; before  31  October  145120   may  1506  )   थी   an  Italian explorer , navigator , and  colonizer   ,   born   in  the Republic of Genoa , in what  is  today northwestern  इटली  .
Under the auspices of the Catholic Monarchs of Spain  ,  he completed  चार  voyages  आरपार   the  Atlantic Ocean that  led   to  general European awareness  of   the  American continents .
those  voyages , and his efforts to establish permanent settlements on  the  island of  हिस्पानिओला   ,   initiated  the Spanish colonization of  the   नई   संसार  .
In the context of emerging western imperialism and economic competition between European kingdoms seeking wealth  through  the  स्थापना  of trade routes and colonies , Columbus 's speculative proposal ,  to  reach the East Indies by sailing westward , eventually received the support of  the  Spanish crown ,  जिससे  saw  in   it  a promise , however  रिमोट  , of  gaining  the upper hand over  प्रतिद्वंद्वी  powers in the contest  लिये  the lucrative spice trade  साथ  Asia .
During his  पहला  voyage  in  1492 , instead of  reaching  Japan  as  he had  intended  ,  कोलंबस   उतरा  in the Bahamas archipelago , at a locale he named San Salvador .
Over  the  course of three more voyages , Columbus visited the Greater and Lesser  antilles  ,  as  well as  the  Caribbean coast of  वेनेजुएला   और   सेंट्रल  America ,  claiming   उन्हें  for the Spanish Empire  .
Though Columbus was not the first European explorer to  पहुँचें  the  americas  (  having  been preceded by the Norse expedition led by Leif Ericson in the 11th century )  ,   कोलंबस   's  voyages  led  to the  पहला  lasting  यूरोपीय  contact with the Americas ,  inaugurating  a period of European exploration , conquest , and colonization  कि  lasted for several centuries .
वे  had , therefore , an  विशाल   प्रभाव   in  the historical development of the modern Western world .
कोलंबस  himself saw  उसके   accomplishments  primarily in the light of the spreading of the Christian religion .
Never admitting that he had reached a  महाद्वीप  previously unknown to Europeans , rather than the East Indies he had set out  लिये   ,   कोलंबस  called the inhabitants of  the  lands he visited indios ( Spanish for ``  इंडियंस  `` ) .
Columbus 's strained  संबंध  with the Spanish crown  और   इसके  appointed colonial administrators in America led to his  गिरफ़्तार   और  dismissal as governor of the settlements on  the  island of Hispaniola in  1500  , and later to protracted litigation over  the   लाभ   जिससे  Columbus and his  वारिस  claimed were owed to  उन्हें   by  the crown .
Bred in Germany , the Boxer is a breed  of  stocky , medium-sized , short-haired dogs .
The coat  is  smooth and  tight-fitting  ; colors  हैं  fawn or brindled ,  साथ  or without white markings , which may cover  the  entire  देह  .
Boxers are brachycephalic ( they  have  broad , short skulls )  ,  and have a square  muzzle  ,  mandibular   prognathism  ( an underbite  )  , very strong jaws  ,  and  a  powerful  काटना  ideal for hanging on  to  large  शिकार  .
The Boxer was bred from the Old  अंग्रेज़ी  Bulldog and the now  विलुप्त  Bullenbeisser , and is  भाग  of the Molosser group .
Boxers  यहूद  first exhibited in  a  dog show for St. Bernards in Munich in 1895 , the first Boxer  क्लबों  being founded the next year  .
Based on 2012 American Kennel Club statistics ,  मुक्केबाज  held  स्थिर  as the seventh most  लोकप्रिय  breed of dog in the United  राज्य  for the third consecutive year .
सीरियल  ATA ( SATA ) is a computer bus interface that connects host  बस  adapters to mass storage devices such  as  hard disk  ड्राइव  and optical drives  .
Serial ATA  replaces  the older AT Attachment standard ( ATA ;  बाद  referred to as Parallel  ata  or PATA ) , offering several  लाभ   over   the  older interface : reduced cable size and cost ( seven conductors instead of 40 ) , native hot swapping  ,  faster data transfer through higher signalling rates , and  अधिक  efficient transfer through an ( optional ) I/O  queuing  protocol .
SATA host adapters and  डिवाइस  communicate via a high-speed serial cable over  दो  pairs of conductors .
in  contrast  ,  parallel ATA  (  the  redesignation  for the legacy ATA specifications ) used a 16-bit wide data bus with many additional support  और  control signals , all  ऑपरेटिंग  at much lower frequency .
To  ensure   पिछड़ा  compatibility with  विरासत   ata  software and applications , SATA uses the same basic ATA and ATAPI command-set  as  legacy ATA devices .
SATA has replaced parallel ATA in  उपभोक्ता  desktop and laptop computers , and has largely replaced PATA in new embedded applications .
SATA  's   मार्केट   share  in the desktop PC market  थी  99 % in 2008 .
pata  remains widely used in industrial and embedded applications that  उपयोग  CompactFlash storage , even though the  नई  CFast standard  is   आधारित  on SATA .
Serial ATA industry compatibility  विशेषताएँ  originate from The Serial  ata  International Organization ( aka .
SATA-IO ,  serialata.org  )  .
The SATA-IO  समूह  collaboratively creates , reviews ,  ratifies  , and  publishes  the interoperability specifications , the test cases  ,  and plug-fests .
as   साथ  many  अन्य   उद्योग  compatibility standards  ,  the SATA content ownership is transferred  to  other industry bodies : primarily  the   incits  T13 subcommittee ATA  ,  the INCITS T10 subcommittee ( SCSI ) ; a subgroup of  t10  responsible for  सीरियल   संलग्न  SCSI (  sas  ) .
The  पूरा  specification from SATA-IO .
The remainder of this  आलेख  will try to use the terminology and specifications of  sata-io  .
The history of  the  Internet began  साथ  the  विकास   of  electronic computers in  the  1950s .
the   पब्लिक  was  पहला  introduced  to   the  concepts that would lead to  the   अंतरजाल  when a message was sent over  the  ARPANet from computer science  प्राध्यापक  Leonard Kleinrock 's laboratory at University of California ,  लॉस  Angeles ( UCLA ) ,  बाद   the   दूसरी  piece of network equipment was installed at Stanford  शोध  Institute ( SRI ) .
पैकेट  switched networks such as ARPANET , Mark I at  npl   in  the UK , CYCLADES ,  मेरिट   संजाल  , Tymnet , and  telenet  , were developed in the late 1960s and early 1970s using  a  variety of protocols .
The  arpanet  in particular  led   to  the development of protocols for internetworking ,  in  which multiple separate networks could  be  joined together into a network of networks .
In 1982 , the Internet protocol suite  (   tcp/ip  )  थी  standardized , and consequently , the concept of a world-wide network of interconnected  tcp/ip  networks ,  पुकारा   the  Internet , was introduced .
अभिगम  to the ARPANET was  विस्तारित  in  1981  when the National Science  न्यास  ( NSF )  विकसित  the Computer Science Network ( CSNET  )   और  again in 1986 when NSFNET provided access to supercomputer sites in the United States  इससे   शोध  and education organizations .
Commercial Internet service providers ( ISPs )  began  to emerge in the late 1980s and early 1990s .
the  ARPANET was decommissioned  in  1990  .
the  Internet was commercialized in 1995  जब   nsfnet   थी   decommissioned  , removing the last  प्रतिबंध  on the use of  the  Internet  to  carry commercial traffic  .
Since  the  mid-1990s , the Internet  रै  had a revolutionary impact on culture  और  commerce , including the rise  of  near-instant communication  by  electronic mail , instant messaging , Voice over Internet Protocol  (   voip  ) `` phone calls ''  ,  two-way interactive video calls , and the World Wide Web with  इसके  discussion  forums  ,  ब्लॉग  ,  सोशल  networking ,  और  online shopping sites .
The  शोध  and education community continues to  develop  and use  उन्नत  networks such  as  NSF  's  very high speed  रीढ़  Network Service ( vBNS ) , Internet2 , and National LambdaRail .
Increasing  amounts  of data  हैं  transmitted at higher and higher speeds  over  fiber optic networks operating at  1-gbit/s  , 10-Gbit/s  ,  or more .
the  Internet  's  takeover over the global communication landscape was  लगभग  instant in historical terms  :  it only communicated 1  %  of the information flowing through two-way telecommunications networks in the  साल  1993 , already 51 % by 2000 , and more than 97 % of the telecommunicated information by 2007  .
Today  the   अंतरजाल  continues to grow , driven by  कभी  greater amounts of  ऑनलाइन  information , commerce , entertainment  ,  and  सोशल   नेटवर्किंग  .

Boyle  hinted  that the album  रै  a  1960s  feel `` because that was [ her  ]  era  ''  .
on   30  November 2011  ,  the album received a  नामांकन  in 54th Grammy Awards  लिये  Best Traditional Pop  गायन  Album .
`` This Is Just To Say '' ( 1934 ) is  a  famous imagist poem  by  William Carlos Williams .
Professor  ऐल्बस  Percival Wulfric  ब्रायन  Dumbledore is a major character and protagonist of J. K.  रोलिंग   's  Harry Potter series .
लिये  most of  the  series , he is the headmaster of  the   wizarding  school Hogwarts .
as   भाग  of his backstory , it is  नाज़िल  that he  is  the founder and leader of the Order of  the  Phoenix ,  an  organisation  समर्पित   to  fighting the main  विपक्षी  of the series  ,   रब  Voldemort .
डम्बल्डोर  is portrayed by Richard Harris in the film adaptions of Harry Potter and the Philosopher  's  Stone and Harry Potter  और  the Chamber of Secrets  .
बाद   हैरिस  ' death  ,  Michael Gambon portrayed Dumbledore for all of the remaining films .
Rowling  stated  she chose the name Dumbledore , which is  an   जल्दी  Modern English word for  ``  bumblebee `` , because  of  Dumbledore 's love of music : she imagined him walking around `` humming to himself a lot  ''  .
Calcitonin ( also known as  thyrocalcitonin  ) is a 32-amino acid  रैखिक  polypeptide hormone that is produced in humans primarily by  the  parafollicular cells ( also known as C-cells )  of  the thyroid , and in many other animals in the ultimobranchial body .
it  acts to reduce  रक्त  calcium ( Ca2+ ) , opposing the effects of  parathyroid  hormone ( PTH ) .
calcitonin  has been found in fish , reptiles  ,  birds  ,  and mammals .
Its importance in  इंसानो  has not been as well established as its importance in other animals , as its  फलन  is usually not significant in the regulation  of   सामान्य  calcium homeostasis .
It belongs to calcitonin-like protein family .
A mousepad with a padded wrist rest .
A mousepad ( US ) or mouse mat ( UK ) is a surface for placing and  चलती   a  computer  चूहा  .
A  mousepad  enhances the usability of the mouse compared to using  a  mouse directly  on  a table by  providing  a surface to allow the tracking LED or ball ( in former models  )  to measure movement accurately and  बगैर  jitter .
Some mousepads increase ergonomics  by  providing a padded wrist rest .

Riverfront Stadium ( 1970–1995 ) ,  बाद  known as Cinergy Field (  1996–2002  ) ,  थी   the  home of the Cincinnati Reds National League baseball team and the Cincinnati  bengals   नेशनल  Football League team  .
Located on the  ओहियो  River in downtown Cincinnati ,  the  stadium was best  ज्ञात  as the home of `` The Big  रेड   यंत्र  `` , as  the  Reds were often called  in  the 1970s .
निर्माण  began  on  February 1 , 1968 ,  और  was completed at  a  cost of less than $ 50  लाख   .
On June 30  ,  1970 , the  लाल   hosted   the   अटलांटा  Braves in  उनके  grand opening , with Hank Aaron hitting  the  first  कभी   घर  run at Riverfront  .
दो  weeks later on July  14   ,  1970 ,  riverfront  hosted the 1970  प्रमुख   लीग  Baseball All-Star  खेल  .
This game is  बेहतरीन   remembered  for the often-replayed collision  at  home plate between Reds  स्टार  Pete Rose  और  catcher Ray Fosse of the  क्लीवलैंड  Indians .
In September 1996 , Riverfront Stadium was  renamed  `` Cinergy Field '' in a  प्रायोजन  deal with Greater Cincinnati 's  उर्जा  company , Cinergy Corporation .
In 2001  ,  to make  रूम   लिये  Great American Ball  पार्क   ,  the seating capacity at Cinergy Field was reduced to 39,000 .
There was  a   विशाल  wall in Center Field visible after the renovations , to serve  as  the batter 's  नजर  .
the  stadium was demolished by  implosion  on  दिसम्बर  29 ,  2002  .
Nexen Tire is  a   टायर  manufacturer , headquartered  in  Yangsan ,  दक्षिण  Gyeongsang Province , and Seoul , both in  दक्षिण  Korea .
Its major  घरेलू  competitors are  hankook  Tire and Kumho  टायर  .

The silent  बहुमत  is an unspecified  विशाल  majority of  लोगों   in   a  country  or   समूह  who do not express their opinions  सरेआम  .
the  term was popularized ( though not first  प्रयुक्त  ) by  u.S.   अध्यक्ष  Richard Nixon in  a   नवम्बर  3 , 1969 , speech  in  which he said , ``  और  so  tonight—to  you  ,   the   ग्रेट   मूक   बहुमत  of my fellow Americans—I ask for your  support  . ''
in  this usage it  referred  to those Americans who did not join in  the   विशाल  demonstrations against the Vietnam War at  the  time  ,  who did not join in  the  counterculture , and who did not participate in public discourse .
Nixon  साथ   साथ  many  अन्य   देखी   इस  group of Middle Americans as being overshadowed in the media by the more vocal minority .
the  phrase was  प्रयुक्त  in the  19th  century  as  a euphemism referring  to  all the people  जो  have died  ,  and others have used  it  before  और  after Nixon to refer to groups of voters in various nations of the  संसार  .
Sam ,  a  rhesus  मंकी  , flew to an altitude  of   88   km  in 1959 .
( NASA )
Before humans went into  स्पेस  , several animals were  शुभारम्भ  into space ,  सहित  numerous monkeys ,  so  that scientists could investigate  the  biological  प्रभाव  of space travel  .
The United States launched flights containing primate cargo primarily between  1948-1961  with  एक  flight  in  1969  और  one in 1985 .
France launched two monkey-carrying  फ़्लाइट  in 1967 .
the   सोवियत  Union and Russia launched  बंदरों  between 1983 and 1996 .
Most monkeys  यहूद  anesthetized before lift-off .
Overall thirty-two monkeys flew in the space program ;  none  flew more  than  once .
Numerous  back-up  monkeys also went through the  कार्यक्रम  but never flew .
Monkeys from  अनेक  species  यहूद  used  ,  including rhesus monkeys , cynomolgus monkeys ,  गिलहरी  monkeys  ,  and  pig-tailed  macaques .
Some chimpanzees ( which are apes rather than  बंदरों   )  were also used  .
RAID ( redundant array of independent  डिस्क  , originally  अनावश्यक  array of inexpensive  डिस्क  ) is a storage  प्रौद्योगिकी   कि  combines multiple disk drive components into a logical unit .
Data is  वितरित  across the drives in  एक  of several ways called ``  रेड  levels  ''  , depending on the  स्तर   of  redundancy and performance required  .
the  term  ``  RAID '' was first defined by David  पैटरसन  , Garth A. Gibson , and Randy Katz  at  the University of California ,  बर्कली  in 1987 .
Marketers representing  उद्योग  RAID manufacturers later attempted to reinvent  the  term to describe  a  redundant array  of  independent disks as  a  means of disassociating  a  low-cost  अपेक्षा  from RAID technology .
रेड  is now used  as  an  छतरियाँ  term for computer data storage  योजनाएं  that can  divide  and replicate data among multiple physical drives : RAID is an example of storage virtualization and the array can  be  accessed by  the  operating system as one single  ड्राइव  .
The different schemes or  architectures  are named by the  शब्द  RAID followed by a  क्रमांक  ( e.g . RAID 0  ,  RAID  1  ) .
प्रत्येक   योजना  provides a different  संतुलन  between the key goals : reliability and  उपलब्धता  , performance and capacity .
RAID  स्तर  greater than  रेड  0 provide protection against unrecoverable ( sector ) read errors ,  as  well as whole disk failure .
A  lymphocyte  is a type  of  white blood cell in the vertebrate immune system .
Under the microscope  ,   lymphocytes  can be  विभाजित  into large lymphocytes  और  small lymphocytes  .
Large granular lymphocytes include natural killer cells ( NK cells  )  .
छोटी  lymphocytes consist of T cells and B cells .
The Big Lebowski is a 1998 dark comedy  फिल्मी  written and directed by Joel  और  Ethan  कोएन  .
Jeff Bridges stars as Jeff Lebowski ,  an  unemployed Los Angeles slacker and avid bowler , nicknamed `` The Dude  .   ''
After a case of mistaken identity  ,  The Dude is introduced to a millionaire  भी  named Jeffrey Lebowski .
When the millionaire Lebowski  's   ट्रॉफी   बीवी   is   बाद  kidnapped , he  आयोग  The Dude to deliver the ransom to secure her  रिलीज   .
The  योजना  goes awry  जब  The Dude 's friend Walter Sobchak ( John Goodman ) schemes to keep the  पूरा  ransom .
Steve Buscemi ,  फिलिप  Seymour Hoffman , David Huddleston  ,  Julianne Moore  ,   tara   reid  , and John Turturro  भी  star in  the   फिल्मी   ,   जिससे   is  narrated by a cowboy known only  as  `` The  अजनबी  '' , played  by  Sam Elliott  .
The  फिल्मी  is loosely inspired by the work of Raymond  चांडलर   .
Joel Coen stated : `` We wanted to do a  चांडलर  kind of story – how  it  moves episodically ,  और  deals with the characters trying to  सुलझाना   a  mystery ,  as   खूब   as  having a hopelessly complex  प्लाट  that 's ultimately unimportant  .  ''
The original score  थी  composed by Carter Burwell , a  longtime  collaborator of the Coen Brothers .
the  Big  lebowski  was  a  disappointment at the U.S. box  दफ्तर   और  received  मिश्रित  reviews at the time of  इसके  release  .
समीक्षाएँ  have trended towards  the   धनात्मक   over  time , and  the   फिल्मी  has  become  a  cult   पसंदीदा  , noted for its idiosyncratic characters , dream sequences ,  unconventional  dialogue ,  और  eclectic soundtrack .
Severus Snape is a fictional character in the Harry Potter book series  लिखा   by  J.K. Rowling  .
In  the   पहला  novel of  the  series  ,  he is hostile toward Harry  और  is built  up  to  be  the  प्राथमिक  antagonist until the final  अध्याय  .
As  the  series progresses , Snape 's  अक्षर  becomes more  परतदार   और  complex .
Rowling does not fully  खुलासा   the  details of his true loyalties until the end of the  फाइनल  book , Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows .
Over the course of  the  series  ,  Snape 's portrayal evolves  इससे  that of  a  malicious and  दलगत  teacher to that of a  pivotal  character of considerable  जटिलता  and moral ambiguity .
snape  primarily teaches Potions at Hogwarts , though in  the   छठे  novel  he  teaches Defence Against the Dark Arts  ,  a  स्थिति   जिससे  he was known to have desired throughout the series .
He  ultimately  becomes Headmaster  of  Hogwarts in the final novel .
Rowling  रै   वर्णित  him as ``  a  gift of  a  character  ''  .
Grits  refers  to  a  ground-corn  खाना   of  Native American origin , that is  आम  in the Southern United  राज्य   और   मुख्यतः  eaten at breakfast  .
Modern grits  हैं  commonly made of alkali-treated corn known as hominy .
grits  are similar to other thick  maize-based  porridges from around the world such  as  polenta or the thinner  farina  .
`` Instant grits ''  have  been processed to speed cooking  .
The word  ``  grits ''  गर्भाशयी  from the  बूढ़ा   अंग्रेज़ी   शब्द  `` grytt ,  ''  meaning coarse meal .
This word originally referred to wheat and  अन्य  porridges now known as  groats  in parts of  the   u.K..
Maize , unknown in Europe in  the  Middle Ages ,  is  a food derived from corn ( a New  संसार   संयंत्र   )  and ``  मकई  '' had been used to describe wheat products  in  many  यूरोपीय  regions  .
`` Grits  ''  may be either singular  or   बहुवचन  ; historically ,  in  the American South the  शब्द  was invariably singular notwithstanding its plural form ( cf  .   ऐसे  food  names  as `` spaghetti '' or `` linguine '' , likewise plural in form ,  लकिन  singular in use  )  .
sometimes  ,  grits  are  पुकारा  sofkee or sofkey ( from a  देशी  American Muskogee word  )  .
In molecular biology , human chorionic gonadotropin ( hCG ) is a hormone produced by the fertilized egg after conception .
Later during  गर्भावस्था  it is made by the developing placenta , and later by the placental component syncytiotrophoblast .
Some  cancerous  tumors  उपज  this hormone ;  इसलिए   ,  elevated levels measured when the patient is not pregnant  can  lead to a cancer diagnosis .
However  ,  it  is  not known whether this  उत्पादन   is  a  contributing  cause or  an  effect of tumorigenesis .
The  pituitary  analogue of hCG , known as luteinizing hormone ( LH ) , is produced in the pituitary gland of males and females of  सब  ages .
, the  एफडीए  has prohibited the  बिक्री  of  ``  homeopathic ''  और  over the counter hCG  आहार  products and declared them  बेईमान  and illegal .

Coca-Cola is a carbonated soft drink sold in stores , restaurants , and vending machines in every country except Cuba and  उत्तर   कोरियाई  .
it  is produced by The Coca-Cola Company of  अटलांटा  , Georgia , and is often referred to simply as  कोक  ( a registered trademark  of  The Coca-Cola Company in  the  United States since March 27 ,  1944   )  .
Originally intended as a patent medicine  जब   it  was invented in the  लेट   19th  century by John Pemberton ,  coca-cola  was  खरीदा  out by businessman  asa  Griggs Candler , whose marketing tactics led Coke to its dominance  of  the  संसार  soft-drink  मार्केट  throughout  the  20th century .
The company produces concentrate , which is then  बेची  to  licensed   coca-cola  bottlers throughout the  संसार  .
The bottlers , who hold territorially exclusive contracts with the company  ,   उपज  finished product  in   डिब्बे  and bottles from the concentrate in combination with filtered water and sweeteners .
The  bottlers   तब  sell  ,   वितरित  and merchandise Coca-Cola to  खुदरा   स्टोर्स  and vending  मशीने  .
Such bottlers include  coca-cola  Enterprises , which is the largest  सिंगल  Coca-Cola bottler in North America and  पश्चिमी  Europe .
the  Coca-Cola Company also  बिकता  concentrate for soda fountains to major restaurants and  खाना  service distributors .
The  coca-cola  Company  रै  , on occasion ,  introduced  other cola drinks under  the  Coke brand name  .
The most common  of  these is Diet Coke  ,  with others including Caffeine-Free Coca-Cola , Diet Coke Caffeine-Free  ,   coca-cola  Cherry , Coca-Cola Zero , Coca-Cola  वैनिला  , and special  संस्करण  with lemon , lime or coffee .
Based on Interbrand 's best global  ब्रांड   2011  ,  coca-cola   थी  the  संसार   's   सबसे  valuable brand  .
An ombudsman is an official , usually appointed by the  सरकारी  or by  पार्लियामेंट   लकिन  with a significant degree  of  independence , who  is  charged with representing the interests  of  the public by investigating and addressing complaints of  maladministration  or violation of rights .
In some countries an Inspector General ,  नागरिक   एडवोकेट  or other official may  have  duties similar to those  of  a national ombudsman  ,  and may  भी  be appointed by the legislature .
नीचे   the  national level an ombudsman may be appointed by  a  state , local or municipal government , and unofficial ombudsmen may be appointed  by  , or even work for , a corporation  ऐसे  as a utility supplier or a newspaper , for an NGO  ,  or  लिये   a   पेशेवर  regulatory  देह   .
whether   नियुक्त  by the legislature ,  the  executive , or an organization ( or , less frequently , elected by the  constituency  that he or she  serves  )  ,  the typical duties of an ombudsman  हैं  to investigate complaints and attempt to  निराकरण  them ,  प्रायः  through recommendations ( binding  or  not ) or  मध्यस्थता  .
Ombudsmen sometimes also aim to identify systemic issues leading to poor service  or  breaches of  लोगों  's rights .
At  the  national  स्तर   ,  most ombudsmen have a wide mandate to deal with the entire public sector  ,  and sometimes also elements of the private sector ( for example , contracted service providers ) .
In  कुछ  cases ,  वहीँ  is a  अधिक  restricted mandate , for example  साथ  particular sectors of  समाज  .
More  हाल  developments have  शामिल  the  सृष्टि  of specialised Children 's Ombudsman and  सूचना  Commissioner  एजेंसियों  .
In some jurisdictions an ombudsman charged with the handling of concerns  परिचय  national government  is  more formally  referred  to as  the  `` Parliamentary Commissioner '' ( e.g . the United  किंगडम  Parliamentary  कमिश्नर  for  प्रशासन  , and the Western Australian state Ombudsman ) .
In many countries where the ombudsman 's remit extends beyond dealing with  कथित  maladministration to  promoting  and  protecting  human  अधिकारों   ,   the  ombudsman is recognised  as   the  national human  अधिकारों  institution .
the  post of  ombudsman   था  by the end of  the  20th century been instituted by most  सरकारें  and by some intergovernmental organizations such as the European  संघ  .
Making a complaint  to  an ombudsman is usually free  of  charge  .
