New England  is  a region in  the  northeastern  कोने  of the United States consisting  of  the six states of Maine  ,  New Hampshire , Vermont , Massachusetts ,  rhode   द्वीप  , and Connecticut .
New England is bordered by New York state to the southwest , Quebec  to  the northwest , and New Brunswick and the Atlantic Ocean to the  ईस्ट  .
In one of the earliest English settlements in North America , Pilgrims from England first settled in New  इंग्लैण्ड   in  1620 , to form Plymouth Colony  .
Ten years later , the Puritans  settled  north  of  Plymouth Colony in Boston , thus forming Massachusetts Bay Colony .
Over the  अगला  130 years , New England fought  in  four French and Indian Wars , until the  अंग्रेजों  defeated the French and their native allies  in  North America .
in  the late 18th century , the New England Colonies initiated the resistance to the  अंग्रेजों  Parliament 's efforts to impose new taxes without the consent of the colonists .
The Boston Tea Party was a protest to which Great  ब्रिटेन   responded   साथ  a series of punitive laws stripping Massachusetts of self-government , which were termed the `` Intolerable Acts `` by the colonists  .
the  confrontation led  to  open  warfare  in 1775  ,  the expulsion of  the  British authorities from New England in spring 1776 , and  the  Declaration of  स्वतंत्रता   in  July 1776 .
कुछ  of  the  first movements  of   अमरीकी  literature  ,  philosophy , and education originated in New England  .
The region played  a  prominent role in the movement to abolish slavery ,  और  was the  पहला  region  of  the United States to be transformed by the Industrial Revolution .
Today  ,  New England is  a  major world center of education ,  ऊँची  technology ,  बीमे  ,  और  medicine .
बोस्टन   is  its cultural ,  वित्तीय  , educational ,  चिकित्सा  and transportation center .
Each state is principally subdivided into small incorporated municipalities known  as  New England towns  ,  which are  प्रायः  governed by town  बैठक  .
the   तभी  unincorporated territory in New England exists in the  sparse  , northern regions of Vermont , New Hampshire  ,  and Maine .
Since 1970 , voters have  अधिक  often  समर्थित  liberal candidates at  the  state and federal level than  those  of any other region in the  संयुक्त  States .
New  इंग्लैण्ड  is the  तभी  one  of   the  United States Census Bureau 's nine regional  विभाजन   जिनकी  name  करता  not derive from  इसके  geography , and it is the only multi-state region with clear ,  सतत  boundaries .
It maintains a strong sense of cultural  पहचान  set  अलावा  from the rest of the country  ,  although the terms of this identity are often  लडे  , combining Puritanism  साथ   उदारतावाद  , agrarian life  साथ   उद्योग  , and  अलगाव  with immigration .
Emergency !
is  an American television series that combines  the  medical drama  और  action-adventure  जाति  .
It was produced by  चिह्नित  VII Limited and distributed  by  Universal Studios .
It debuted as a  midseason  replacement on  जनवरी  15 ,  1972  ,  on  NBC  ,  replacing the  दो  short-lived series  the  Partners  और  The Good Life ,  और  ran until September  3  , 1977  ,  with  छह  additional two-hour  टेलीविज़न   films  during the following two  सालो   .
Emergency !
थी  created and produced by Jack Webb  और  Robert A. Cinader , both of whom were also  जिम्मेदार  for the police  dramas  Adam-12 and Dragnet .
The  पूर्वी  Time  मण्डल  ( ET ) encompasses 17 U.S. states in the eastern part of  the   संलग्न  United States , parts of Canada and three countries in South America .
Places that use  पूर्वी  Standard Time ( EST )  जब   observing  standard  समय  ( autumn/winter ) are 5 hours  पीछे  Coordinated Universal Time ( ) .
Eastern  daylight   समय  ( EDT ) , when observing daylight  छायांकन  time ( spring/summer ) is 4 hours behind  समन्वित  Universal Time ( ) .
In the  उत्तरी  parts of the time zone , during  the   दूसरी  Sunday in  कूच  , at 2:00 a.m.  est  , clocks are advanced to 3:00 a.m. EDT leaving a one hour `` gap .  ''
During the first Sunday in  नवम्बर  , at  2:00  a.m. EDT , clocks are moved back  to  1:00 a.m. EST , thus `` duplicating '' one hour .
Southern parts  of  the zone ( Panama and  the  Caribbean ) do not observe daylight saving .
Standard form of the periodic table  .
the  colors  represent  different categories of elements explained below .
The periodic table is a tabular display of  the  chemical elements , organized on  the  basis  of  their atomic numbers , electron configurations , and recurring chemical properties  .
Elements are presented in  अनुक्रम  of increasing atomic number ( number of  protons  ) .
The standard form of table comprises an 18 × 7 grid or  प्रमुख  body of elements , positioned above a smaller double row  of  elements .
The table can also be deconstructed  into  four rectangular blocks : the  s-block  to the left  ,  the p-block to the right ,  the  d-block in the middle , and  the  f-block below that  .
The rows  of  the table are called periods ;  the   कालम  of  the  s- ,  d-  , and p-blocks  हैं  called groups , with some of these  having  names such  as  the halogens or  the   प्रतिष्ठित   गैसों  .
Since , by definition , a periodic table incorporates recurring trends , any such table can be used to derive relationships  between  the  गुण   of  the elements and predict the properties of new , yet to be discovered or synthesized , elements .
As a result  ,  a periodic table—whether  in  the standard form or some other variant—provides a useful  फ्रेमवर्क  for analyzing  रासायनिक  behavior , and  ऐसे  tables are widely used in chemistry and  अन्य  sciences .
Although precursors exist ,  dmitri  Mendeleev is generally credited with the publication , in 1869 ,  of  the first  widely   पहचाना  periodic  तालिका  .
he  developed his table to illustrate periodic trends  in  the properties  of  the then-known elements  .
mendeleev  also predicted  कुछ  properties of then-unknown elements that  होता  be  अपेक्षित  to  भरण   गैप  in this table .
Most of his predictions  यहूद  proved correct  जब  the  तत्व   in  question were subsequently discovered .
Mendeleev 's periodic table has since been expanded and refined with the discovery  or  synthesis of further new elements and the development of  नई  theoretical models to explain chemical  बर्ताव  .
सब  elements from  परमाणु  numbers 1 (  हाइड्रोजन  )  to   118  ( ununoctium ) have been discovered or  synthesized  .
the  elements from  1   to  98  (  californium ) have been found to exist naturally ,  हालांकि  some are found only in trace amounts  और  were initially discovered by synthesis in laboratories  .
The  तत्व  after 98 have  तभी  been  synthesized   in  laboratories .
Production of elements  परे  ununoctium is  होने  pursued ,  साथ   the  question of how the periodic  तालिका  may need  to  be modified to accommodate any such additions being a matter of ongoing  बहस   .
numerous  synthetic radionuclides  of  naturally occurring elements have also been produced in laboratories .
Minecraft is a sandbox  इंडी  game originally created by Swedish programmer  markus   ``   पायदान  ''  persson  and later developed and published  by  Mojang  .
it   थी  publicly released  लिये  the  pc  on  may   17  , 2009  ,  as a  developmental  alpha version and  ,  after gradual updates , was published as a full release version  on  November 18 , 2011 .
A  संस्करण  for  एंड्रॉइड  was released a  माह  earlier on  अक्तूबर   7  , and an iOS version was released on November 17 ,  2011  .
On May 9 , 2012 ,  the   खेल  was released  on  Xbox 360 as an Xbox Live Arcade game , co-developed by 4J Studios .
All versions of  minecraft  receive periodic updates .
The  रचनात्मक  and building aspects of Minecraft  allow  players to  निर्माण  constructions out of textured cubes in  a   3d  procedurally generated  संसार   .
Other  क्रियाएँ  in the  खेल  include  खोजी  , gathering resources  ,  crafting and combat .
Gameplay  in  its commercial release has two principal modes  :  survival ,  जिससे   requires  players to acquire resources and maintain their health and hunger ;  और  creative , where players have an unlimited supply of resources , the ability to fly  ,  and no  स्वास्थ्य  or hunger .
A third gameplay mode named hardcore is the same as survival , differing only in  परेशानी  ;  it  is set to hardest setting and  respawning  is disabled ,  forcing  players to delete their  संसार   upon  death .
minecraft  received five awards  इससे  the 2011 Game Developers Conference : it was awarded  the  Innovation  पुरस्कार  ,  बेहतरीन  Downloadable  खेल  Award  ,  and the Best Debut Game Award from the Game  डेवलपर  Choice Awards ; and the Audience Award , as well as the Seumas McNally Grand  पुरस्कार  , from the Independent Games Festival in 2011  .
In 2012 , Minecraft was awarded a Golden Joystick Award in  the  category Best Downloadable Game .
As of April 8  ,  2013 , the game has sold over 10 million copies  on  PC  और  as of  जनवरी  22 , 2013  ,  over 20 million copies across all platforms .
The  अंधेरा  Knight is a 2008 British-American superhero film directed  ,  produced , and  co-written  by Christopher Nolan .
आधारित   on  the DC Comics character Batman , the film is the second part of Nolan 's Batman film  श्रेणी  and a  sequel  to 2005 's  बैटमैन  Begins .
Christian Bale reprises the lead role of  ब्रूस  Wayne/Batman , with a returning  डाल  of Michael Caine as Alfred Pennyworth , Gary Oldman as  जेम्स  Gordon and Morgan Freeman as Lucius Fox .
The film  introduces  the character of Harvey  डेंट  ( Aaron  eckhart  ) ,  गोथम  's newly  निर्वाचित  District  attorney  and  the  consort of  ब्रूस  Wayne 's childhood friend Rachel Dawes ( Maggie Gyllenhaal ) , who joins Batman and the police  in  combating  the  new rising threat of a criminal mastermind  कॉलिंग  himself ``  the  Joker ``  (  Heath Ledger ) .
Nolan 's inspiration  लिये  the  फिल्मी  was  the  Joker 's comic book  डेब्यू   in  1940 , the 1988 graphic novel , and the 1996  श्रेणी  , which retold Two-Face  's   उत्पत्ति  .
The nickname `` the  अंधेरा  Knight '' was first applied to Batman in Batman No  .  1 ( 1940 ) , in a story written by Bill Finger .
The Dark  नाईट  was  फिल्माया  primarily in Chicago , as  खूब  as in several other locations in the United States , the United  किंगडम   ,   और  Hong Kong .
Nolan used an IMAX camera to  फिल्मी  some sequences , including the Joker 's  पहला  appearance  in   the   फिल्मी  .
On January  22  , 2008  ,   कुछ  months after he had completed  फिल्मांकन  on The Dark Knight and  छह  months before the film 's release  ,  Heath  लेजर  died from a toxic combination of prescription drugs , leading to  तीव्र  attention from the press  और  movie-going  पब्लिक  .
Warner Bros. had initially created a viral  विपणन  campaign for  the   अंधेरा   नाईट  ,  विकासशील  promotional websites and trailers highlighting screen shots of Ledger  as  the Joker , but  बाद   लेजर  's death  ,  the studio refocused its promotional campaign .
The Dark  नाईट   थी   released  on July 16 , 2008 in Australia , on July 18 , 2008 in North America , and on July  24  , 2008 in the United Kingdom .
Considered one of the best films of the 2000s and one of the  बेहतरीन  superhero  films  ever made , the film  प्राप्त   अत्यधिक   धनात्मक   समीक्षाएँ  and set numerous records during its theatrical run .
With over $ 1 billion in revenue worldwide , it is the 14th-highest-grossing film  of  all time , unadjusted  लिये  inflation .
The film received  आठ  Academy Award nominations  ;  it won the award for Best Sound Editing and Ledger  थी  posthumously awarded Best  supporting  Actor .
The Dark Knight Rises , the final part of the trilogy , was released on July 20 , 2012  .
The timeline of radio  सूचियाँ  within  the  history of radio  ,   the  technology and events that produced instruments that use radio  लहरें  and activities that  लोगों  undertook .
बाद  , the history is dominated by  प्रोग्रामिंग  and contents , which is  करीब  to general  इतिहास  .
The Sydney  ओपेरा  House is a multi-venue performing arts centre in New South Wales , Australia  .
It  थी  conceived and  largely   निर्मित   by  Danish  वास्तु   jørn  Utzon , opening in 1973  बाद   a  long gestation that began with his competition-winning  डिज़ाइन   in   1957  .
Joseph Cahill 's  नई  South Wales Government gave the go-ahead for  कार्य  to  शुरू   in  1958  .
The government 's bold decision to select Utzon 's design is often overshadowed  by   the  scandal that followed .
It is on Bennelong  पाइंट  in Sydney Harbour , close to the Sydney Harbour Bridge  .
It  sits  at the northeastern tip of the Sydney central business district  (   the   सीबीडी  ) , surrounded on three sides by the  harbour   (   सिडनी  Cove and  फार्म  Cove )  और  inland by the Royal Botanic  gardens  .
Contrary  to   इसके  name , it houses  अनेक   प्रदर्शन  venues  .
it   is  among the busiest performing arts centres in the world , hosting over 1,500 performances  प्रत्येक  year attended by some 1.2 million  लोगों  .
it  provides a  स्थान  for  अनेक   performing-arts  companies , including the four key resident companies Opera Australia , The Australian Ballet , the Sydney  थिएटर  Company and the Sydney Symphony Orchestra , and presents a wide  दायरा   of   प्रोडक्शन्स   on  its own account .
It  is  also  एक  of the most popular visitor attractions in Australia , with more than seven million people  visiting  each year  ,  300,000 of  जिसको  take a guided tour .
It is administered by the Sydney Opera House Trust ,  अंतर्गत  the New South  वेल्स   मंत्रालय  of the Arts .
on  28 June 2007 , it was made  a  UNESCO World Heritage Site  .
It is one of  the  20th century 's most distinctive buildings  और  one of the most famous performing arts centres in the world .
A graph of body mass index as a function  of  body mass and body height is shown above .
The dashed lines represent  subdivisions  within a  प्रमुख  class .
लिये  instance the `` Underweight '' classification is further divided into `` severe '' , ``  मॉडरेट   ''  ,  और   ``  mild '' subclasses .
The body mass index  (  BMI  )  , or Quetelet index , is  a  measure  लिये   इंसान  body shape based on an individual 's weight and  ऊँचाई  .
It was devised  between  1830  और  1850  by  the  belgian  polymath  adolphe  Quetelet during the course of developing `` social physics '' .
देह  mass index is  पारिभाषित   as  the individual 's  देह  mass divided by the square of  उनके  height .
The  formulae  universally used in medicine produce a unit of measure  of  kg/m2  .
बीएमआई   can  also be determined using a BMI chart , which displays BMI as a function  of   वज़न  ( horizontal axis )  और  height  (  vertical axis ) using contour lines  लिये  different values  of  BMI or  रंगों  for different BMI categories .
† The factor for UK/US units  is  more precisely 703.06957964 , but that level of precision is not  सार्थक  for  इस  calculation .
To work from stone and pounds first multiply  the  stone  by  14 then add the pounds to give the whole mass in pounds ; to work  इससे  feet  और  inches first multiply the feet by 12 then add the inches to give  the   पूरे  height in inches .
Thomas Paine ( January  29  ,  1737  ( NS February 9 ,  1737  ) –  जून  8 ,  1809  )  थी   an  English-American political  activist  , author , political  theorist  and revolutionary  .
As the author  of  two highly influential pamphlets at the start of the American  क्रान्ति  , he inspired the  देशप्रेमी  in 1776 to declare independence from Britain .
उसके  ideas reflected Enlightenment  era  rhetoric  of  transnational human rights .
he  has been called `` a  corsetmaker  by trade  ,  a journalist by profession , and a propagandist by inclination .  ''
Born  in  Thetford , England , in the county  of  Norfolk  ,   paine  emigrated  to  the British American colonies in 1774 with  the  help of  बेंजामिन  Franklin and he arrived in  समय  to participate in the American Revolution .
His principal contributions were the powerful , widely read pamphlet Common Sense ( 1776 ) ,  the  all-time best-selling American book that advocated colonial America 's  स्वतंत्रता  from the Kingdom of Great Britain ,  और  The American Crisis ( 1776–83 ) ,  a  pro-revolutionary pamphlet series .
Common Sense was so influential  कि  John  एडम्स  said , `` Without the pen of  the  author of Common  भाव  ,  the  sword of Washington  होता   have  been raised in vain.”
Paine lived in France  लिये   सबसे  of the 1790s  ,  becoming deeply  शामिल  in  the  French  क्रान्ति  .
He wrote the Rights of Man ( 1791 )  ,   in   भाग   a  defence of  the  French  क्रान्ति   विरूद्ध  its critics .
His attacks on British  लेखक   एडमंड   बुर्के   led   to   a  trial and conviction in absentia in  1792  for the crime of seditious libel .
in  1792 , despite not being able to  बोलो  French ,  he  was elected to the French National Convention .
the  Girondists regarded him as an  ally   .
नतीजतन  ,  the  Montagnards  ,   विशेषकर  Robespierre , regarded  उसे  as an enemy .
In December 1793 , he was arrested and imprisoned in Paris , then  released  in 1794 .
He became notorious  क्युकी  of  the  Age of Reason ( 1793–94 ) , his  किताब  that advocates deism  ,  promotes  कारण  and freethinking , and  argues  against institutionalized religion in general and Christian doctrine in  particular  .
He also wrote the pamphlet Agrarian Justice  (  1795 ) , discussing the origins of property  ,  and introduced  the   अवधारणा   of  a guaranteed minimum income .
in  1802  ,   he  returned to America where he died on June 8 , 1809 .
Only  छह  people attended  उसके  funeral as he had been ostracized for his ridicule of Christianity .
Clinical trials are sets of tests in medical research  और  drug  विकास  that  generate  safety and efficacy data  (  or more specifically  ,  information about adverse  ड्रग  reactions and adverse effects of other treatments )  लिये   स्वास्थ्य  interventions ( e.g. ,  दवाएँ   ,  diagnostics , devices , therapy protocols ) .
वे   हैं  conducted only after satisfactory  सूचना  has been gathered  on   the  quality of the non clinical safety , and health authority/ethics committee approval is granted in the country where  स्वीकृति   of  the drug  or  device is sought .
Previously , many  उभरते  countries did not require local trials for  उत्पाद   approvals   .
Now , though emerging countries still accept data from U.S./Europe , they  भी  require some local  ट्रायल  .
Depending on the  प्रकार  of product and the stage of its development , investigators initially enroll volunteers and/or patients into small pilot studies , and subsequently  conduct   larger   स्केल  studies in patients that often compare the new product with others already approved for the affliction of  ब्याज   .
As positive safety  और  efficacy data are gathered , the number  of  patients  is  typically  increased  .
Clinical trials can vary in size ,  और  can involve  a  single research entity in one country or many such entities in multiple  देशों  .
A full series  of  trials may incur sizable costs , and  the   बोझ   of  paying for all  the  necessary people and services is  प्रायः   borne  by the sponsor , which may be  a  governmental organization or  a   फार्मास्युटिकल  , biotechnology or medical device  कम्पनी  .
When the  विविधता  of required support roles  exceeds   the   संसाधन  of the sponsor , a clinical trial is managed  by  an outsourced partner  ,  such as  a   अनुबंध  research organization  or  a clinical trials  ईकाई  in  the  academic sector .
The Green Bay Packers are an American football team based in Green  खाड़ी  , Wisconsin  .
They are members of the North Division of the National Football Conference (  nfc  )  in  the  नेशनल  Football League ( NFL )  .
Green  खाड़ी  is the third-oldest  मताधिकार  in the NFL , having been organized and playing in 1919 .
The Packers are the only  non-profit  ,  community-owned  major  लीग  professional  खेल  team in  the  United States  .
The Packers are the last vestige of  ``  small  कस्बा   टीमों   ''  that were once  आम   in  the NFL  दौरान  the  1920s   और  1930s .
Founded in 1919  by  Earl  ``  Curly '' Lambeau ( hence the name Lambeau Field on which the  टोली  plays ) and George Whitney Calhoun ,  the  Green  खाड़ी  Packers  can  trace their  lineage   to   अन्य  semi-professional teams in  ग्रीन  Bay dating back to 1896 .
In 1919 and 1920  the  Packers  competed  as a semi-professional football team against clubs  इससे  around Wisconsin and  the  Midwest .
They joined the American Professional Football Association ( APFA ) in 1921 , the forerunner to what  is  known today as  the  National Football League ( NFL ) .
Although Green  खाड़ी   is  the last NFL  ``  small town  ''  team  ,  its local fan base  और  media extends into nearby Milwaukee  ;   the  team also  निभाई  selected home games there between 1933 and 1994 .
The Green  खाड़ी  Packers have won 13 league championships ( more than any  अन्य  team in the NFL ) , including nine NFL championships prior  to  the Super Bowl  era  and four Super Bowl victories —in  1967  ( Super Bowl I  )  , 1968 ( Super  कटोरी   ii  )  ,  1997 ( Super Bowl  xxxi  ) and  2011   (   सुपर  Bowl XLV  )   .
The Packers  have   long-standing  , bitter rivalries with their NFC North ( formerly the NFC Central ) opponents  ,  the Chicago Bears ,  मिनेसोटा  Vikings  और  the Detroit Lions  .
The Bears-Packers rivalry is  एक  of the oldest rivalries in NFL history , dating back to 1921  .
Ethanol fuel is ethanol ( ethyl alcohol  )  , the  वही   प्रकार  of alcohol found in alcoholic beverages .
It is most often used  as  a motor  ईंधन   ,  mainly as a  biofuel  additive for  गैसोलीन  .
World ethanol production for transport fuel tripled between 2000 and 2007  इससे   17  billion to more  than  52 billion liters .
From 2007  to  2008 , the share of ethanol in  वैश्विक  gasoline type fuel use increased  इससे  3.7 %  to  5.4 % .
In 2011 worldwide ethanol fuel production reached 22.36 billion  u.S.   द्रव  gallons ( bg ) ( 84.6 billion  liters  ) , with the United  राज्य  as the top producer with 13.9 bg ( 52.6 billion liters ) , accounting  लिये  62.2 %  of  global production , followed by Brazil  साथ  5.6 bg ( 21.1 billion liters ) .
इथेनॉल  fuel has  a  ``  गैसोलीन   गैलन  equivalency ``  (  GGE ) value of , which means 1.5  गैलन  of ethanol  उपज  the energy of one gallon of  गैसोलीन   .
Ethanol fuel is widely used in Brazil and in the United States , and together both countries were responsible for 87.1 % of the world 's ethanol fuel  उत्पादन  in  2011  .
Most cars on the road  आज  in  the   u.S.  can  चलाएं  on blends  of   up  to  10  % ethanol  ,  and ethanol represented 10 % of  the  U.S. gasoline  ईंधन  supply derived from  घरेलू  sources in 2011 .
Since  1976  the Brazilian government has made it mandatory to blend ethanol with gasoline , and since 2007 the legal blend is around 25 %  इथेनॉल  and  75  % gasoline ( E25  )   .
By December 2011 Brazil had a  बेड़े   of  14.8 million flex-fuel  ऑटोमोबाइल  and light trucks and 1.5 million flex-fuel motorcycles that regularly use neat ethanol fuel ( known  as  E100 ) .
Bioethanol is a form of renewable energy that can be produced from agricultural feedstocks .
It can be made from  बहुत  common  फसलों  such  as  sugar  cane   ,  potato , manioc and  मकई   .
वहीँ   रै  been considerable debate  परिचय   कैसा  useful bioethanol will be in replacing gasoline .
Concerns about  इसके  production and use  सुनाना  to increased food prices due to the large amount  of  arable land  जरूरी   लिये  crops  ,   as  well as the energy and pollution balance of the whole cycle of  इथेनॉल  production  ,  especially  इससे  corn .
हाल  developments with cellulosic ethanol production and commercialization may  allay  some of these concerns  .
cellulosic  ethanol offers promise because cellulose fibers , a major and  सार्वभौमिक  component in  संयंत्र  cells  दीवारें  , can  be  used to  उपज   इथेनॉल   .
According to the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Energy Agency , cellulosic ethanol could allow ethanol fuels to play a much bigger role  in  the future than previously thought .
साब  9-3 SportCombi BioPower  .
the  second E85 flexifuel  मॉडल  introduced  by   साब  in  the  Swedish market  .
A plaque commemorating  the  location of the Sarajevo assassination and steps  of  Gavrilo Princip ( image taken in 1987 ,  पहले  steps were removed in 1992  और  plaque changed from Cyrillic to Latin script )
A plaque  commemorating   the  location of  the  Sarajevo assassination  (  image  लिया  in 2009 )
On  28  June 1914 , Archduke Franz Ferdinand of Austria ,  वारिस  presumptive to  the  Austro-Hungarian throne , and his wife , Sophie , Duchess of Hohenberg , were shot dead in Sarajevo , by Gavrilo Princip , one  of  a  समूह  of six  बोस्नियाई  Serb assassins  समन्वित  by Danilo Ilić .
The political objective of the assassination was to break off Austria-Hungary 's south-Slav provinces so they could be  संयुक्त   into  a Greater Serbia  or  a Yugoslavia .
The  हत्यारे  ' motives were consistent with the movement that later became known as Young Bosnia .
Serbian military officers stood behind the  आक्रमण  .
at  the top of these Serbian military conspirators was Chief of Serbian Military Intelligence Dragutin Dimitrijević , his  righthand  man  प्रमुख  Vojislav Tankosić  ,  and Masterspy Rade Malobabić .
प्रमुख  Tankosić  हथियारबंद  the assassins  साथ  bombs and  pistols  and trained them  .
The assassins were given access to the  वही  clandestine tunnel of safe-houses  और  agents that Rade Malobabić  प्रयुक्त  for the infiltration of weapons and operatives  into  Austria-Hungary .
The assassins , the key members of  the  clandestine tunnel  ,  and the key Serbian military conspirators who were still alive  यहूद  arrested , tried , convicted and punished .
Those who were arrested  in   बोस्निया  were tried in Sarajevo in October 1914 .
The  अन्य  conspirators were arrested and tried  पहले  a Serbian kangaroo court on the French-controlled  salonika  Front in 1916–1917 on unrelated  गलत  charges ; Serbia  चलाया  three of the top  सैन्य  conspirators  .
Much of what is known  परिचय  the assassinations comes from these two trials and related  रिकॉर्ड  .
Assignment of  जिम्मेदारी  for the bombing and  हत्याएं   of   28  June is highly controversial because the attack led to the  outbreak  of World War  i  one month later  .
Renée  कैथलीन  Zellweger (  born   अप्रैल  25 , 1969 ) is  an  American actress and producer .
Zellweger first gained widespread attention for her role in the  फिल्मी  Jerry  मैग्वायर  ( 1996 ) , and subsequently received two nominations for the Academy  पुरस्कार   लिये   बेहतरीन  Actress  लिये  her  भूमिकाएँ  as  ब्रिजेट   जोन्स  in the  कॉमेडी  Bridget Jones 's Diary  (  2001 ) , and as Roxie  हार्ट  in the  musical   शिकागो   (  2002 ) .
वो  won the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress for her performance in  the  drama  ठंडा  Mountain (  2003  ) .
She has won an Academy Award , three Golden Globe Awards ,  तीन  Screen  अभिनेताओं  Guild  पुरस्कार  , and a BAFTA Award ; was named Hasty Pudding 's Woman of the  साल  in 2009 ; and established herself as  एक  of the highest-paid Hollywood actresses as  of  2007  .
The  ossicles  ( also called auditory ossicles )  हैं  the three smallest bones in  the  human body , the malleus , the incus  और  the stapes .
They are contained within  the  middle ear space and serve to transmit sounds from the air to the  fluid-filled  labyrinth ( cochlea )  .
The absence of the auditory ossicles would  constitute  a  moderate-to-severe  hearing loss .
The term `` ossicles '' literally  अर्थात्  ``  छोटा  bones '' and  commonly  refers to the  auditory  ossicles  ,  though the term may refer to any  छोटी  bone throughout the body .
the  New  वचन   (   यहूदी  •  •  — Greek •  •  diatheke kaine ) is a  biblical  interpretation originally  निकला   इससे  a phrase in  the  Book  of   यिर्मयाह   ,  in the  यहूदी  Scriptures  .
It is often thought of as  an  eschatological Messianic Age or world to come  और  is related to  the  biblical concept of the Kingdom of God  .
generally  , Christians  मानना  that the New Covenant  थी   instituted   at  the Last Supper as part of the  eucharist  , which in the Gospel of John includes the New Commandment .
There are several  ईसाई   eschatologies  that further define the New Covenant , as an example an  उदघाटन  eschatology defines and describes the New Covenant as an ongoing relationship between Christian believers and God that  होगा  be in  पूरा  fruition after  the  Second Coming of Christ ; that is ,  it  will not only  be  in full fruition in believing hearts , but in the future external world as well  .
The  कनेक्शन  between the Blood of  मसीह  and the New Covenant  is  seen in  सबसे  modern  अंग्रेज़ी  translations of the New  वसीयत  with the saying  :   ``  this cup that  is  poured  आउट  for you is the new covenant in my blood  ''  .
ईसाइयों  believe that Jesus  is  the  मध्यस्थ   of   the  New  वचन  , and that  the  Blood of Christ shed at his crucifixion is the required blood of  the  covenant  .
as  with all covenants between God and man described in  the  Bible , the New Covenant is considered `` a  बंध   in   रक्त  sovereignly administered  by  God . ''
It has been  theorized  that the  नई  Covenant is the Law of Christ as spoken  दौरान   उसके  Sermon on  the  Mount .
the  following List of people pardoned or granted clemency by the  अध्यक्ष  of the United  राज्य  documents  the  most prominent cases  of  each presidency .
As granted by  the  Constitution  (  Article II , Section 2 , Clause 1 ) ,  राष्ट्रपतियों  have the power to grant clemency in one  or   अधिक  of the  following   तरीके   :  the ability to grant a full  pardon  , to commute a sentence , or to  तोड़ना  a fine .
u.S.  Presidents have no power  to  grant  दया  for  अपराधों  prosecuted under state law .
As to the  अंतर  between a pardon and a  commutation:
A pardon is an  कार्यपालिका  order vacating a conviction .
A commutation is the mitigation of the sentence  of  someone currently  सेवारत  a sentence  लिये  a crime  pursuant  to a conviction ,  बगैर  vacating  the  conviction  itself  .
लगभग  20,000 pardons  और  clemencies were issued by U.S. presidents in the 20th  सदी  alone  .
The  रिकॉर्ड  of acts of clemency were public until 1934  .
in  1981 the Office of the  pardon  Attorney was created and records from President H. W. Bush forward are  अभी  listed  .
This list includes pardons and commutations .
Tampa ( )  is   a  city in the U.S.  राज्य  of Florida .
it  serves as  the  county seat  लिये   hillsborough   काउंटी   और  is  स्तिथ  on the west  coast  of Florida  ,  on Tampa Bay near the Gulf  of  Mexico .
The population of Tampa in 2011 was 346,037 .
the  current location  of  Tampa was once  inhabited  by  स्वदेशी  peoples of  the   सुरक्षा   हार्बर   संस्कृति  , most notably the Tocobaga and the Pohoy  ,  who lived along  the  shores of  tampa  Bay .
It was briefly explored by Spanish  explorers  in  the  early 16th century , but there were no permanent American or European  settlements  within today  's  city limits  जबतक  after the United States had acquired  फ्लोरिडा  from  स्पेन  in 1819 .
In  1824   ,  the United  राज्य  Army established  a  frontier  चौकी  called Fort  ब्रुक  at the mouth  of  the Hillsborough River , near  the  site of today 's  tampa  Convention Center .
the  first  civilian  residents were pioneers  जो  settled near  the  fort for  सुरक्षा  from the nearby Seminole population .
The  कस्बा   grew  slowly until the 1880s  ,   जब   रेलरोड  links , the discovery of phosphate , and the arrival of the cigar industry jump-started Tampa 's development and helped it to grow into an important city by the early 1900s .
Today  ,   tampa  is  a  part  of  the metropolitan area most  commonly  referred to as the  tampa  Bay  क्षेत्रफल  .
For U.S.  जनसांख्यिकी  purposes , Tampa is part  of  the Tampa-St.  petersburg-clearwater   ,  Florida Metropolitan Statistical Area .
the  four-county area is composed of  roughly  2.7 million residents ,  बनाना  it the  दूसरी  largest metropolitan statistical area  (  MSA ) in the state , and the fourth largest in the Southeastern  संयुक्त  States  ,  behind Miami , Washington , D.C.  ,  and Atlanta .
The  वृहद   tampa  Bay area has just  over  4 million residents and generally includes  the   tampa   और   sarasota  metro areas  .
The Tampa Bay  साझेदारी  and U.S. Census  आंकड़ा  showed  an   औसत  annual growth of 2.47 percent , or a gain of approximately 97,000 residents per year .
Between  2000  and 2006 , the Greater  tampa  Bay Market experienced a combined growth rate of 14.8 percent , growing from 3.4 million to 3.9  लाख  and hitting the 4 million people mark on April 1 , 2007 .
A 2012 estimate shows the Tampa Bay area  जनसांख्यिकी  to have 4,310,524 people and a 2017  प्रक्षेप  of 4,536,854 people .
Tampa has a number of sports teams , such as the Tampa Bay Buccaneers of the  नेशनल   फ़ुटबॉल  League  ,  the Tampa  खाड़ी  Lightning of the National  हॉकी   लीग  , and the  tampa  Bay Storm of the Arena Football League  .
The  tampa   खाड़ी  Rays  in  Major League Baseball and  the   tampa  Bay Rowdies  of  the North  अमरीकी  Soccer League  खेल  their home games in  neighboring  St. Petersburg , Florida .
In 2008 , Tampa was  क्रमित  as  the  5th best outdoor city by  फोर्ब्स  .
A 2004 survey  by  the NYU newspaper  वॉशिंगटन  Square News  क्रमित  Tampa as  a  top city  लिये  `` twenty-somethings . ''
Tampa is now ranked as a `` Gamma '' world city by Loughborough  विश्वविद्यालयों  .
According  to  Loughborough , Tampa ranks alongside other  संसार  cities  ऐसे  as Phoenix , Santo Domingo , and Osaka .
In recent years Tampa  रै   देखी  a notable upsurge  in  high-market demand from consumers , signaling more wealth concentrated in the area .
tampa  hosted the 2012 Republican National  सम्मेलन  .
The Chevrolet Cavalier was a compact automobile produced from 1982 to 2005 by General Motors .
Built on the company 's J platform  ,  the Cavalier produced  the  highest sales in  1984  .
AT & T Mobility LLC branded and  referred  to  as  AT &  t  ( formerly  cingular   बेतार   llc  ) , is a wholly owned subsidiary of AT & T Inc.  कि  provides wireless services to  107  million  सदस्य   in   the  United States , including Puerto Rico and the U.S. Virgin Islands .
at  & T Mobility is the second largest wireless telecommunications provider  in  the United States and Puerto Rico , behind Verizon Wireless ,  जिससे   serves   115.78  million  ग्राहक   as  of the fourth  क्वार्टर  of  2012  .
AT & T  गतिशीलता  is headquartered in the Lenox  पार्क  area of DeKalb Co. Georgia , just  बाहर  Atlanta .
Originally Cingular Wireless LLC from 2000  to  2007 , a joint venture  between  SBC Communications and BellSouth , the company acquired the old  at  & T Wireless in 2004  ;  SBC  बाद  acquired  the  original  at  & T and re-branded  as  `` AT &  t   ''  .
Cingular became  wholly  owned by AT &  t   in  December 2006 as  a   परिणाम  of AT & T 's acquisition of  bellsouth  .
In January 2007 , Cingular confirmed it would  re-brand  itself under the AT  &  T name .
Although  the   विधिक  corporate name change occurred immediately , for both  नियामक  and brand-awareness  कारण  both  ब्रांड्स  were used in  the   कम्पनी  's signage and  विज्ञापन  during a transition period .
The transition concluded  in  late June , just  prior   to  the rollout  of  the  ठहराना  iPhone .
On March 20 ,  2011  ,  at   &  T Mobility announced its  इरादे  to acquire T-Mobile  यूएसए   इससे  Deutsche Telekom for  $  39 billion .
If it had received government and regulatory approval , AT & T would have had  अधिक  than 130 million subscribers .
However , the  u.S.  Department  of  Justice , the Federal Communications Commission , and AT & T Mobility 's competitors ( such  as  Sprint Nextel )  opposed  the move on the grounds  कि  it would reduce  प्रतियोगिता   in  the cellular communications market  .
In  दिसम्बर   2011  , in the face of both governmental and widespread consumer opposition ,  at   &  T withdrew  उनके  offer  to  complete the merger  .
Martin  लूथर  King  ,   jr.  ( January 15  ,  1929  –   अप्रैल  4 ,  1968  ) was an American clergyman , activist , and leader in the  african-american  Civil Rights Movement .
He is best  ज्ञात  for  उसके  role in the advancement of civil rights  using  nonviolent civil disobedience .
King has become a national icon in the history of American  प्रगतिवाद   .
A Baptist minister , King became a civil rights activist early in  उसके  career .
he  led the  1955  Montgomery  बस  Boycott and helped found the Southern Christian  नेतृत्व   सम्मेलन  ( SCLC ) in 1957 ,  सेवारत  as its first president  .
With the SCLC , King  led  an unsuccessful struggle against segregation in  albany  ,  जॉर्जिया   ,  in 1962 ,  और  organized nonviolent protests in  बर्मिंघम  , Alabama , that attracted national  ध्यान  following  टेलीविज़न  news  कवरेज   of  the brutal police response .
King also helped  to   व्यवस्थित   the  1963  कूच  on Washington , where he  वितरित  his `` I Have  a  Dream `` speech  .
वहीँ  , he established his reputation as  एक  of the greatest orators in American  इतिहास  .
He also established his reputation as  a  radical  ,  and became an object  of  the Federal Bureau of  छानबीन  's COINTELPRO for the  बाकी  of his life .
FBI  एजेंटों  investigated him for possible  कम्युनिस्ट  ties ,  अंकित  his extramarital liaisons and reported  on   उन्हें  to  सरकारी  officials ,  और  on  एक  occasion  ,   mailed  King a threatening anonymous  अक्षर  that he interpreted  as  an  attempt  to make him commit suicide  .
On  अक्तूबर  14 , 1964 , King  प्राप्त  the Nobel Peace  पुरस्कार  for  combating  racial inequality  through  nonviolence .
In  1965  , he and the  sclc  helped to organize  the  Selma  to  Montgomery marches  और  the following year , he took the movement  उत्तर  to  शिकागो  .
In the final years of  उसके   जीवन  , King  विस्तारित  his focus to  शामिल  poverty and the Vietnam  युद्ध   ,  alienating  अनेक  of his liberal allies with  a  1967 speech  titled  `` Beyond Vietnam  ''  .
King was planning a national occupation of Washington , D.C. , called the  ग़रीब  People 's Campaign .
King was assassinated on April 4 ,  1968  , in Memphis , Tennessee .
His death  थी  followed by riots in many U.S.  शहरों  .
Allegations that James Earl Ray , the man convicted of killing King , had been framed or acted in concert with  सरकारी   एजेंटों  persisted for decades after the shooting , and the jury of a 1999 civil trial found Loyd Jowers to be complicit in  a  conspiracy against  किंग  .
King was awarded the Presidential Medal  of  Freedom and  the  Congressional Gold Medal  मरणोपरांत  .
Martin Luther King , Jr. Day was  स्थापित   as  a U.S. federal holiday in 1986 .
Hundreds of streets in the  u.S.  have  महरूम  renamed  in   उसके  honor  .
A memorial statue  on  the National Mall was opened to  the  public  in  2011 .
The tiger ( Panthera  tigris   )  is the largest cat species ,  reaching  a total body length of  up  to  और  weighing up  to  .
It is the third largest  जमीन  carnivore ( behind  तभी  the  ध्रुवीय  bear and  the  brown  भालू  )  .
Its  सबसे  recognizable  विशेषता  is a pattern of  अंधेरा  vertical  धारियाँ   on   reddish-orange   फर  with a lighter  underside  .
It has exceptionally  stout  teeth  ,  and the canines are the longest among living felids  साथ  a crown height of as much as or even .
In  zoos   ,  tigers have  जिया   लिये   20  to 26  सालो   ,  which also seems  to  be their longevity in the  जंगली  .
They are territorial and generally solitary  लकिन  social animals , often requiring  विशाल  contiguous areas  of  habitat that support their  शिकार  requirements .
This , coupled with the fact that they are indigenous to some of the more densely populated places on Earth ,  रै  caused  significant   विरोध  with humans .
Tigers once  ranged  widely across  एशिया  ,  इससे  Turkey in  the  west to  the   पूर्वी  coast of Russia  .
Over the  पास्ट  100 years  ,  they have lost 93 % of their historic range , and have been extirpated  इससे  southwest  और  central  एशिया  , from the  आइलैंड्स  of Java  और   bali   ,  and from large areas of Southeast  और  Eastern  एशिया  .
Today , they range from  the  Siberian taiga to open grasslands and tropical  mangrove  swamps .
The  बाकी  six  बाघ  subspecies have been classified  as  endangered  by  IUCN .
The global  जनसांख्यिकी  in the wild  is  estimated  to   क्रमांक  between 3,062 and  3,948  individuals ,  bas  from around 100,000 at the  प्रारंभ   of  the 20th century , with most remaining populations  occurring  in  छोटी  pockets isolated from  प्रत्येक  other .
Major reasons for population decline include habitat  विनाश  , habitat fragmentation and poaching .
The  extent  of area  occupied  by tigers is estimated  at  less than  ,  a 41 % decline  इससे  the area estimated in  the   mid-1990s  .
Tigers  हैं  among the  सबसे   recognisable  and popular of the world  's  charismatic megafauna .
वे  have featured  prominently  in ancient mythology and folklore ,  और  continue  to  be depicted in modern films and literature .
Tigers appear on  अनेक   ध्वज  ,  coats  of arms , and as mascots for sporting teams .
The Bengal tiger is the national animal of both India  और  Bangladesh  .
The simplified  आतंरिक  structure  of   a  chloroplast
Overview of  the  Calvin cycle and  कार्बन  fixation
The light-independent reactions of  photosynthesis  are  रासायनिक  reactions  कि  convert carbon dioxide  और  other compounds into glucose .
These reactions  occur   in  the stroma  ,   the  fluid-filled area of a chloroplast outside of  the  thylakoid membranes  .
These reactions take the light-dependent reactions  और  perform further chemical processes on them .
There  हैं  three phases to the  light-independent  reactions , collectively called the Calvin cycle : carbon fixation , reduction  प्रतिक्रियाएँ  , and ribulose 1,5-bisphosphate  (  RuBP ) regeneration .
despite   इसके  name ,  इस  process occurs only when  लाइट  is available  .
पौधे  do not carry out  the   calvin  cycle by night .
वे  , instead ,  रिलीज  sucrose  into  the phloem from their starch reserves  .
This process happens  जब  light is available independent of the kind of photosynthesis ( C3 carbon fixation ,  c4   कार्बन  fixation , and Crassulacean  एसिड   चयापचय  ) ; CAM plants store malic acid in their  vacuoles  every night and release it by day in order to make this process work .
a  linen handkerchief with pulled thread embroidery around the  किनारे
Linen  cloth  recovered from Qumran Cave 1 near the  मुर्दे  Sea .
Linen ( ) is a  वस्त्र  made from the fibers  of  the flax plant  ,  Linum usitatissimum .
लिनेन  is labor-intensive to manufacture  ,  but  जब  it is  बना  into garments  ,   it  is valued  लिये  its exceptional  शीतलता  and freshness in hot weather  .
The word ``  लिनेन  ''  is  of West Germanic origin and cognates with the Latin name for the flax plant linum , and the earlier Greek  λινόν  ( linon )  .
इस  word history has given rise to a number of other terms  in  English  ,  the most notable of  जिससे  is the English word line , derived from the  उपयोग  of a linen (  flax  )  लड़ी  to determine  a  straight line .
Textiles  in  a linen  बुनते   बनावट  , even when  बना  of cotton , hemp and other non-flax  मछली  are also loosely referred  to  as  ``  linen '' .
Such fabrics generally have their own  विशिष्ट  names other than linen  ;   लिये  example , fine  कपास  yarn  in   a   linen-style  weave is called Madapolam .
the  collective term `` linens `` is still often  प्रयुक्त  generically  to  describe a class of woven and even knitted bed , bath , table and kitchen textiles .
The name  linens  is retained because traditionally , linen was used  लिये  many of  ये  items .
in  the past , the word `` linens '' was  भी  used to mean lightweight undergarments  ऐसे   as   शर्ट  , chemises , waistshirts  ,  lingerie  (  a word also cognate  साथ   लिनेन   )  ,  और  detachable shirt collars and cuffs , which  यहूद  historically made almost exclusively out of  लिनेन  .
The inside cloth layer  of   ठीक  composite clothing garments ( as  लिये  example jackets ) was traditionally made of linen , and  इस  is the origin of the word  अस्तर  .
Linen  वस्त्र  appear to be some of  the  oldest in the  संसार  : their history goes back many thousands of years .
Fragments of straw ,  बीज   ,  fibers  ,  yarns ,  और  various types of  fabrics  which  तिथि  back to about 8000 BC have been  मिला   in   स्विस  lake  dwellings  .
dyed  flax  मछली  found in a  प्रागैतिहासिक  cave in Georgia  सुझाएँ  the use of woven linen fabrics  इससे   जंगली  flax  may  date back  भी  earlier to 36,000 BP .
Linen  थी  sometimes  प्रयुक्त  as currency in ancient Egypt  .
Egyptian mummies  यहूद   लपेटा  in linen because it was seen as a  प्रतीक   of  light and purity , and as a display of wealth  .
Some of these  fabrics   ,  woven from hand spun yarns , were very fine  लिये  their day , but  हैं  coarse compared to modern linen .
Today , linen  is  usually an expensive textile , and is produced in relatively small quantities .
It has  a  long `` staple '' (  व्यक्तिगत  fiber length ) relative to cotton and  अन्य  natural fibers .
Many products  हैं  made of linen : aprons , bags , towels  (  swimmers , bath , beach  ,  body and wash towels ) , napkins  ,  bed linens , linen tablecloths , runners , chair covers , and men 's & women 's wear .
The FIFA World Cup , often simply the  संसार  Cup , is  an  international association football competition contested  by  the senior men 's national teams  of  the members of Fédération  internationale  de Football Association ( FIFA ) , the sport 's  वैश्विक   शासी  body .
the   चैंपियनशिप  has been awarded every four years since the  inaugural  tournament in 1930 ,  मगर  in  1942  and 1946 when it  थी  not held because of the Second World War  .
The current champions are Spain , who  जीती  the  2010  tournament  .
The current format of the tournament involves 32 teams competing for the title at venues  भीतर  the host nation ( s ) over a period of  परिचय  a  माह  ;  इस  phase  is  often called the World Cup Finals  .
A qualification phase ,  जिससे  currently takes place over the preceding  तीन  years , is used to determine which teams qualify for  the  tournament together with the  मेजबान  nation  (   s  ) .
The  19  World Cup  tournaments  have been won by eight different national teams .
ब्राज़ील  have won five times , and they  हैं   the   तभी  team  to  have played  in  every  टूर्नामेंट  .
The other World Cup  विजेता  are Italy , with  चार  titles ;  जर्मनी  , with three titles ;  अर्जेंटीना   और   inaugural  winners Uruguay , with two titles each ; and England  ,  France , and Spain , with one title each .
The World Cup is the world 's  सबसे  widely viewed sporting event ; an estimated 715.1 million people watched the final match of the 2006 FIFA World Cup  आयोजित  in Germany .
The next three World Cups will be hosted by Brazil in 2014 , Russia in 2018 , and Qatar in 2022  .
The is an expansion device for the  वी   रिमोट  video game controller for the Wii that allows it to more accurately capture complex motion  .
According to Nintendo , the sensor  in  the  यंत्र  supplements the accelerometer and Sensor Bar  सामर्थ्य  of the  वी  Remote to enable  क्रियाएँ  to  be  rendered identically  on  the screen in real time .
The Wii 's  successor  console  ,  the Wii U ,  supports  the Wii MotionPlus and its peripherals in  खेल  where  उपयोग  of its touchscreen-built-in primary controller is  नहीं  necessary .
Majulah Singapura ( Onward  सिंगापुर  ) is the national  गान  of  सिंगापुर  .
Composed by Zubir  कहा  in  1958  as a theme song for official functions of the City Council of Singapore , the song  थी   चयनित   in  1959 as the island  's   गान  when it  attained  self-government  .
Upon  पूरा   स्वतंत्रता  in 1965 , Majulah Singapura was  formally  adopted  as  Singapore 's national anthem  .
By law the  गान  may only be sung  साथ  its original Malay lyrics , although there exist authorized translations of  the   गीत  of the anthem in Singapore 's three other official  भाषाएं  : English , Mandarin  और  Tamil .
Originally composed in the  कुंजी  of G  प्रमुख  , in 2001 the national anthem was officially relaunched  in  the lower key  of  F  प्रमुख   as  this was said to allow for a `` grander and more inspiring arrangement  ''   .
The national anthem is regularly performed or sung in schools and armed forces camps at ceremonies held at the beginning and/or the  समाप्त  of each day , during which the national flag is also raised and lowered and the national pledge is taken .
singaporeans  are especially encouraged to sing the national anthem on occasions of national celebration or national significance such as at the National Day  परेड  ,  at   नेशनल   दिन  observance ceremonies conducted  by   शैक्षणिक  institutions and government  विभाग  , and at  sporting  events at which Singapore  टीमों  are participating .
An  expedition   's  shipwrights building  a  brigantine , 1541 .
Shipbuilding is the construction of ships and floating vessels .
it  normally takes place in  a  specialized facility known as a  डॉकयार्ड  .
shipbuilders  , also  पुकारा  shipwrights , follow a specialized occupation that traces its roots to before  अंकित  history  .
shipbuilding   और  ship repairs , both commercial  और  military , are referred to as `` naval engineering '' .
The construction  of  boats is a similar activity called boat building  .
The dismantling  of  ships is  पुकारा  ship  तोड़कर  .

The population  थी  321 at the  2010  census .
The following is a list of the  सबसे  populous incorporated places of  the  United States  of  America .
As defined by the United States Census Bureau  ,  an `` incorporated place `` includes a variety  of  designations , including city , town  ,   गाँव  , borough  ,   और  municipality  .
A few exceptional  जनसांख्यिकी  Designated  स्थान  ( CDPs  )   हैं   भी   शामिल  in the Census  ब्यूरो  's listing of  incorporated   स्थान  .
Consolidated city-counties  represent  a  पृथक  type of government that includes the entire population  of  a county  ,  or county  समतुल्य   .
कुछ  consolidated city-counties , however  ,  include multiple incorporated  स्थान  .
This list presents only that portion ( or `` balance '' )  of   ऐसे  consolidated city-counties  कि  are not a part of another  incorporated  place .
Note  कि  this list refers only to  the  population of individual municipalities within their defined limits , which does not include other municipalities  or  unincorporated suburban areas within urban agglomerations  .
A different ranking is evident when considering U.S.  महानगर  area  populations  .

Nintendo DS storage devices are devices  प्रयुक्त  to  स्टोर  a licensed developer  's   work-in-progress  images  ,  homebrew  वीडियो  games  और  downloaded commercial games  (  since the Nintendo DS is not sold with a rewritable storage medium ) .
licensed  developers , however  ,  can use a blue  बुद्धिमान  Systems Nitro Emulator box to flash cards .
These devices  हैं   भी  known as ``  flashcarts  '' or `` flashcards ''  .
There are  दो  main classes  of  flashcarts :  पुरानी  devices which fit in Slot-2 ( the Game Boy  अग्रिम  Game  पाक  slot ) and newer devices that fit in Slot-1 ( the DS Game  कार्ड  slot )  .
slot-2  ( or first-generation ) devices  have  been historically cheaper due to economies of scale  (  inherited from their use with Game Boy Advance  )  , but require a  booting  tool in Slot-1  in  order to use the touch screen and other DS features .
Second-generation devices (  those  which only use Slot-1 ) do not work with GBA homebrew , but became less expensive and easier to  उपयोग  , rivaling many  slot-2  devices in price .
First-generation  डिवाइस  include GBA  फ्लैश  cartridges , GBAMP CF , SuperCard , and  m3  .
Second-generation devices include  r4  Revolution  ,  CycloDS , G6  रियल  and DS-X .
The storage device  either  contains flash  मेमोरी  or a slot for  a  memory card to store homebrew  .
Storage devices with  a  memory-card slot usually  have  more  भंडार  capacity than flash-memory devices .
Although flash-memory capacity  is  usually measured in megabits (  mb   )   ,  memory-card capacity is usually measured  in  megabytes ( MB ) (  जहाँ   8  Mb is 1 MB ) .
Storage-device brands differ in their support for homebrew ; DS and Game Boy Advance ROMs ; special features ( such as ability to play media files  )   ;  physical size and  लागत  .
Strictly speaking , a storage device is not necessary  लिये  DS  साथ  FlashMe installed  क्युकी  homebrew  can  be sent to the DS using WMB  .
However , this is  नहीं  an  easily-portable  method because the DS needs to be within range of a suitable Wi-Fi  कार्ड  .
हैं  American people of Japanese heritage .
Japanese Americans have historically been among the three largest Asian  अमरीकी  communities  ,  but in  हाल   दशकों   ,   it  has become the sixth largest group at roughly  1,304,286  , including those of mixed-race or mixed-ethnicity .
In the 2010 census , the largest Japanese American communities were  मिला   in  California with 272,528 ,  हवाई  with 185,502 , New York with 37,780 , Washington with  35,008  , and Illinois  साथ  17,542 .
दक्षिणी  California has the largest Japanese-American population in North America .

इस   is   a   व्यापक  listing which highlights significant achievements and milestones  आधारित  upon Billboard  पत्रिका  's singles charts , most notably the Billboard Hot 100 .
This list  spans  from the issue dated January 1 ,  1955  to  उपस्थित  .
The Billboard Hot 100 began with the  समस्या  dated August 4 , 1958 , and is  फिलहाल   the  standard popular music chart in  the  United States .
Prior to the creation of the Hot 100 , Billboard published four  singles   चार्ट  : `` Best Sellers in Stores '' , ``  सबसे   निभाई   by  Jockeys '' , ``  सबसे  Played in Jukeboxes '' and `` The Top 100 ''  .
These charts ,  जिससे  ranged from 20 to 100 slots  ,  were phased out at different times between 1957  और  1958 .
Though technically not part of the Hot 100 chart history , their data is included for computational  उद्देश्य  , and to  avoid  unenlightening or  भ्रामक  characterizations  .
All  वस्तुएं  listed below are from the  hot   100   era  , unless otherwise noted ( pre-Hot 100  चार्ट   )  .
V  is  an American science fiction television series that  भागा  for two seasons on ABC , from November 3  ,  2009 to March 15 , 2011 .
A remake of the 1983 miniseries created by Kenneth Johnson ,  the  new  श्रेणी  chronicles the  आगमन  on Earth of a technologically advanced alien species which ostensibly comes in  सलाम  ,  लकिन   दरअसल  has sinister motives .
V stars  मुरैना  Baccarin , Lourdes Benedicto , Morris Chestnut , Joel Gretsch , Logan Huffman  ,  Charles  mesure  ,  एलिज़ाबेथ  Mitchell , Laura Vandervoort and Scott Wolf , and was executive produced by  स्कॉट  Rosenbaum ,  यवेस  Simoneau , Scott Peters , and Jace Hall .
the  series was produced  by  The  स्कॉट  Peters Company , HDFilms and Warner  भाईs.   टेलीविज़न  .
Geocaching is an outdoor recreational activity , in which the participants use  a  Global Positioning System ( GPS )  receiver  or  मोबाईल  device and other navigational  तकनीकों  to  छुपा  and seek  containers  , called ``  geocaches   ''   or  `` caches '' , anywhere in the world .
A typical cache is  a  small waterproof container containing a  logbook  where  the  geocacher enters the date they found it and signs  it  with their established code  नाम   .
After signing into the  log  , the cache  जरूर  be placed back  exactly  where the person found it .
Larger containers  ऐसे   as  plastic storage containers (  tupperware  or similar ) or  ammunition  boxes can  भी  contain items for trading  ,  usually toys  or  trinkets of little  मान  .
Geocaching shares many aspects with benchmarking , trigpointing ,  orienteering  , treasure-hunting , letterboxing  ,  and waymarking .
Boogie Down Productions was a hip hop  समूह  that was originally composed of KRS-One  ,  D-Nice ,  और  DJ Scott La  चट्टान  .
DJ  स्कॉट  La Rock was murdered  on   अगस्त   27  ,  1987  , months after the release of BDP 's debut album ,  दण्ड  Minded .
The name of the group , Boogie Down ,  गर्भाशयी  from  a   उपनाम  for the South Bronx section  of   the  Bronx , one of the five boroughs  of  New York  नगर  .
The group pioneered the fusion  of  dancehall reggae and hip hop music and  उनके  debut LP Criminal Minded contained frank descriptions of life  in  the South Bronx of the late 1980s thus setting  the  stage for what would eventually become gangsta rap .
a  municipal bond is a bond  जारी  by a  लोकल  government , or their agencies .
संभावित   issuers   of  municipal bonds include states , cities  ,  counties  ,   redevelopment  agencies , special-purpose districts , school  जिले  , public utility districts , publicly owned airports and seaports  ,  and any  अन्य  governmental entity ( or group of governments ) at or below  the  state level  .
Municipal bonds may be general  दायित्वों  of  the  issuer or secured  by   निर्दिष्ट  revenues  .
In the United States  ,  interest income received by holders of municipal bonds is often exempt from the federal income tax and from the income tax  of  the state in  जिससे  they are issued , although municipal bonds issued for certain purposes may not be tax  exempt  .
Unlike new issue stocks that are brought  to  market  साथ  price  प्रतिबंध  until  the  deal is sold , municipal bonds are free to trade at any time  एकबार  they are purchased by the investor  .
Professional  व्यापारियों  regularly  व्यापार   और   retrade  the  वही  bonds several times a week .
``  Gim me  कुछ  Lovin ' '' is a song written by Steve  winwood   ,  Spencer Davis  और  Muff Winwood , and originally performed by The Spencer Davis  समूह  .
the  basic riff  of  the song was borrowed from the Homer  बैंको  song ``  (   ai  n't That  )   a   लॉट  of Love '' , written  by  Banks and Willie Dean ``  deanie  ''  पार्कर  .
``  Gim me Some  lovin  ' '' was a  uk   #   2  in  the  Autumn  of  1966 and a US # 7 .
The  सोंग  is ranked #  247   on  the Rolling Stone magazine 's list of The 500 Greatest Songs of All Time .
The version  जारी  in  the   uk  ( and probably most  of   यूरोपीय  ) is different from that issued in the US  on   the  United Artists label , being slower ,  और  lacking the backing vocals and `` live sounding ''  प्रदर्शन  found on the US single .
( The US  संस्करण  has more often been used on reissue CDs ,  भी  those coming  इससे  Europe .  )
The single features the sound of the Hammond B-3 organ .
The Internet Movie Database ( IMDb )  is   an  online database of information related  to  films  ,  television  कार्यक्रम  , and video games  .
This includes actors , production crew personnel , and fictional characters featured in these three visual entertainment media  .
It  is  one of the most popular online entertainment  गंतव्यों  ,  साथ  over 100 million unique users each  माह  and  a  solid and rapidly growing  मोबाईल  presence .
IMDb was  शुभारम्भ  on  अक्तूबर  17 , 1990 , and in 1998  थी  acquired by Amazon.com .
As of April  27  , 2013  ,  IMDb had 2,503,783 titles (  शामिल  episodes ) and 5,192,493 personalities in its database  ,  as well as 43 million  पंजीकृत   उपयोक्ता  .
The website  रै  an Alexa rank of 48  .
Fibre Channel Host Bus Adapter  (  64-bit PCI-X card )
SCSI Host Bus Adapter  (  16-bit ISA card )
in  computer hardware ,  a  host controller  ,  host  एडाप्टर  , or host  बस  adapter ( HBA ) connects a host system  (   the  computer  )  to other network and storage devices .
The terms are primarily used to  refer  to devices for connecting SCSI  ,  Fibre  चैनल  and eSATA devices .
however  , devices  लिये  connecting to IDE ,  ईथरनेट   ,  FireWire , USB and other systems may also  be  called  मेजबान  adapters .
Recently , the advent of iSCSI and  fibre  Channel over Ethernet has  brought  about Ethernet  hbas  , which are different from  ईथरनेट  NICs in  कि  they include  टीसीपी  Offload Engines .
There are also  converged  HBAs that support both Ethernet and  fibre  Channel called Converged Network Adapters ( CNAs ) .
Cashmere Scarves
Modern men 's cashmere sweaters for sale .
Cashmere wool , usually simply known  as  cashmere  ,   is  a fiber obtained  इससे   cashmere  goats and other types of  बकरी  .
The word cashmere  गर्भाशयी   इससे  an old spelling of Kashmir .
Cashmere is fine  in   बनावट  , strong  ,  light , and soft .
Garments  बना  from it provide excellent insulation .
In  the  United States , under  the  U.S  .  Wool Products Labeling Act of 1939 , as amended , ( 15 Uction 68b  (  a )  (   6  ) ) ,  राज्य  that a  ऊन  or textile product may  नहीं   be  labeled as containing cashmere unless:
such  ऊन   उत्पाद  is the fine ( dehaired ) undercoat  मछली  produced by  a  cashmere goat (  capra  hircus laniger  )   ;
the average diameter  of  the fiber of such wool product  करता  not exceed 19 microns ; and
such wool product does not contain more  than  3  प्रतिशत  ( by weight ) of cashmere fibers with average  diameters  that  exceed  30 microns .
the  average fiber diameter  may  be subject  to   a   गुणांक  of  विभिन्नता  around the mean that shall not exceed 24 percent .
Jennifer Convertibles Inc. is the owner  और   licensor  of sofabed and leather specialty retail stores  in  the  संयुक्त  States , with stores located throughout the Eastern seaboard ,  in   the  Midwest ,  on  the West Coast and in the Southwest .
The  कम्पनी  was founded in 1975 and is based in Woodbury , New York .
On  जुलाई  19 , 2010 , the  कम्पनी  announced that  it  had  दायर  for  दिवालियापन  as a  consequence  of  ``   substantial   नुकसान  '' .
According to Furniture Today  the  company was number 48 among furniture retailers  साथ   us  $ 114  लाख  in sales for  the  year ending August 29 , 2009 .
It subsequently  उभरा  from  अध्याय  11 under the control of its  प्रमुख   प्रदायक   ,   the  Haining  mengnu  Group .
Egg roll is a term used for  अनेक  different  भोजन  around the world .
2__egg_roll  __  किस्में  of egg rolls  हैं  found in mainland China , many Chinese-speaking regions of  एशिया   ,  and Chinese  अप्रवासी  communities around the world .
Egg rolls as referred to in China .
In Guangdong and Hong Kong , egg roll usually refers to biscuit roll .
इस  is  a  type  of  biscuit .
The ingredient included egg , flour and sugar .
Egg roll also  is  a dish  in  Canton and Hong Kong , this  is  usually made with vegetable .
Within China egg rolls are  खाया   predominantly   in  the  southeast  and  हैं  not as commonly consumed in the north and western  भाग  of  चीन  .
In  अमरीकी  Chinese cuisine , an egg roll is a savory dish typically served as an appetizer .
It is usually  भरवां  with chicken  ,   पोर्क  or shrimp ,  गोभी   ,  carrots , tomatoes , bean sprouts  और  other vegetables , and then deep  fried   .
This  किस्में   of  the egg roll is very common and popular  ,   आरपार  even  क्षेत्रीय  varieties of  अमरीकी  Chinese food  ,  and is  प्रायः  included  as  part of a ``  संयोजन  platter  ''  .
In Montreal , Canada , open-ended eggrolls are a Jewish-Chinese fusion dish  .
They can be  either  kosher certified or merely  कोषेर  style .
Pain and  कष्ट  is the legal term for  the  physical and emotional stress caused  इससे  an injury  (  see also pain and suffering ) .
Some damages that might be under  इस  category  होता  be :  aches  , temporary and permanent  सीमाएं  on activity  ,  potential shortening of life  ,  depression or scarring  .
When filing a lawsuit as a result of an injury , it is common for someone to seek money both in compensation  लिये  actual money that  is   खोया  and for the pain and stress associated with virtually  कोई  injury .
In a suit  ,  pain and  कष्ट  is part of the ``  सामान्य  damages '' section of the claimant 's claim , or , alternatively , it  is  an element of  ``  compensatory '' non-economic  क्षतिपूर्ति   कि  allows  रिकवरी  for the mental anguish and/or physical pain endured by the  claimant  as a result of injury for which the plaintiff seeks redress .
Apart from  धन  damages awarded in trial , money damages  हैं  also  दिए  informally outside the judicial system in mediations , arbitration (  दोनो  of which may be  अदालत  annexed  or  non litigated  दावा  ) as well  as  in  दिनचर्या  insurance settlements .
व्यक्तिगत  claimants or those represented by lawyers often present demands to insurers to  settle  for money .
ये   माँग  for bodily injury compensation monies  प्रायः  set out damages that are similarly used  in  the court litigated  pleadings  .
Demands are  प्रायः  written summaries of a claimant 's medical  परवाह  and the facts which  resulted  in the  चोट  .
Sample of a Medallion signature guarantee  stampin
the  United States and Canada  ,  a medallion signature guarantee  is  a  खास  signature guarantee for the  ट्रांसफ़र  of securities .
It is a  गारंटी   by   the  transferring financial institution  कि  the signature is genuine and the financial  संस्था   स्वीकृत   देयता  for any  जालसाजी   .
Signature guarantees  protect  shareholders by preventing  अनधिकृत   हस्तांतरण  and possible investor losses .
They also limit the liability of the transfer agent who accepts  the  certificates .
Different institutions have  अलग   नीतियों  as to what type  of  identification they require to  provide  the guarantee and whether they  चार्ज  a  शुल्क   लिये  such  सेवा  ( usually nominal  if   कोई  ) .
Most  संस्थानों  will not guarantee a signature of someone  जो  has not  already  been  उनके   ग्राहक  .
A medallion signature guarantee is not the same as an acknowledgment by a notary public , in the  भाव  that a `` signature  गारंटी  '' is a  प्रमाणन  by the  संस्था  that  the  signature  is   प्रामाणिक  , and an acknowledgment is a certification by a notary public attesting that  the  signer signed a document voluntarily .
Some banks may no longer provide this service , however , many still do as well as other financial institutions  ऐसे  as a Savings and Loans and  क्रेडिट  Unions .
At their sole discretion , these  संस्थानों  may still  मनाही  to provide the Medallion Signature  guarantees  .
When US  नागरिकों  are  विदेश   ,  some financial institutions may accept United States Embassy Seals , in  प्लेस  of  the   medallion  Signature Guarantee  स्टैम्प   .
Pacific Electric Railway streetcars stacked at a junkyard on Terminal Island , Los Angeles County  ,  California , March 1956
The General Motors streetcar conspiracy ( also  ज्ञात  as the Great  अमरीकी  streetcar scandal ) refers to allegations  और   convictions   in  relation to a  कार्यक्रम   by   सामान्य   मोटर्स  ( GM ) and other companies who purchased and then dismantled streetcar and electric train systems in many  अमरीकी  cities .
Between 1936 and 1950 , National City  लाइनों  and Pacific City Lines  —with  investment from GM  ,   firestone  Tire ,  मानक  Oil of  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  , Phillips  पेट्रोलियम   ,  Mack Trucks , and  the   संघीय  Engineering Corporation—bought over 100 electric surface-traction  प्रणालियों  in 45 cities  सहित   बाल्टीमोर   ,  Newark , Los Angeles , New  यॉर्क  City , Oakland and San Diego and converted  उन्हें  into bus  आपरेशन   .
अनेक  of the  कंपनियाँ  involved were convicted in 1949  of  conspiracy to monopolize interstate commerce but  यहूद  acquitted of conspiring to monopolize the ownership of these companies .
Some suggest  कि  this  कार्यक्रम  played a key role in the decline of public transit in  शहरों  across  the  United States  ;  notably  एडविन  J. Quinby ,  जो   पहला  drew attention to  the  program in 1946 , and then  ब्रैडफोर्ड  C. Snell ,  an  anti-trust attorney  लिये  the United  राज्य  Senate  जिनकी  controversial 1974 testimony to a  सीनेट  inquiry brought the issue to national  जागरूकता   .
Both Quinby and  snell  argued that the  deliberate   विनाश  of streetcars was part of  a   larger  strategy to push  the  United States into  ऑटोमोबाइल  dependency .
Others  कह  that independent economic factors brought  परिचय  changes in the  पारगमन   प्रणाली  , including the Great  अवसाद  , the  पब्लिक  Utility Holding Company Act of  1935   ,  labor unrest ,  मार्केट  forces ,  rapidly  increasing traffic congestion , urban sprawl  ,  taxation policies that favored private  गाडी  ownership , and general enthusiasm for the  ऑटोमोबाइल   .
One writer on the subject has suggested that Snell and others fell into simplistic  षड्यंत्र  theory thinking , bordering on paranoid delusions saying `` Clearly , GM  waged  a  युद्ध  on electric traction .
It was indeed an all out  उत्पीड़न  , but by no means the  सिंगल  reason for the failure  of   रैपिड  transit .
Also ,  it   is   बस   as  clear that actions and inactions by government contributed  significantly  to  the  elimination  of  electric traction .  ''
Only a small handful of U.S. cities have  surviving  effective rail-based  शहरी  transport systems based on  streetcars  or trams , including  न्यूर्क  , Philadelphia , San Francisco  ,  Pittsburgh , and  बोस्टन  ; others  हैं  re-introducing  उन्हें  .
The  स्टोरी  has  महरूम  explored several  टाइम्स  in print , film and other  मीडिया   ,  notably in Who Framed Roger Rabbit , Taken for a  सवारी  and The End  of  Suburbia .
Corwin House ,  सलेम   ,  Massachusetts  ,  built ca . 1660  ,  First Period English
अमरीकी  colonial architecture includes several building design  शैलियाँ  associated with the  औपनिवेशिक  period of the  संयुक्त  States , including First Period  अंग्रेज़ी  ( late-medieval ) , French Colonial , Spanish Colonial ,  डच  Colonial and Georgian .
These  शैलियाँ  are associated with the houses  ,  churches and government buildings of the period from about  1600  through  the  19th century  .
`` In the Mood '' is a big band era # 1  hit  recorded  by  American bandleader  ग्लेन  Miller  .
It topped the charts in 1940 in  the  U.S. and  एक   साल  later was featured  in  the  फिल्म  Sun Valley Serenade .
In 1999 , National Public Radio ( NPR ) included the 1939  ग्लेन  Miller recording on RCA Bluebird  on  the NPR  100  , the list of ``  the  100 most important  अमरीकी   musical  works  of   the   20th  century '' .
NEPTUNE logo
The NEPTUNE  कनाडा   प्रोजेक्ट  is the  world’s  first regional-scale underwater ocean observatory that plugs  सीधे  into the Internet .
Since December 2009  ,  it has  अनुमत   लोगों  to ``  लहरे   ''  the  seafloor  while ocean scientists  चलाएं   deep-water  experiments  इससे  labs and  विश्वविद्यालयों  around the world  .
साथ  with  इसके  sister project  ,  VENUS  ,   वरुण  offers a unique  दृष्टिकोण  to  समंदर  science .
Traditionally , ocean  वैज्ञानिकों  have relied on infrequent ship cruises or  space-based  satellites to carry out their  शोध  ,  जबकि  the NEPTUNE project uses  a  remotely operated crawler .
A gramophone record  ,   commonly  known as  a  phonograph record ( in American  अंग्रेज़ी   )  ,  विनाइल  record  (  in  सन्दर्भ  to vinyl  ,  the material  सबसे  commonly used after  परिचय  1950  )  , or colloquially , `` a record '' ,  is   an   एनालॉग  sound storage medium consisting of a  चपटा  disc with  an  inscribed , modulated spiral groove .
The groove usually starts near  the  periphery  और  ends near the center of  the  disc .
फोनोग्राफ  records are generally described by their diameter in inches  (  12-inch , 10-inch , 7-inch , etc . )  ,  the rotational  गति  at  जिससे   वे  are  निभाई  ( `` 33  आरपीएम  `` , ``  78  '' , ``  45  '' , etc . )  ,  their  समय  capacity ( `` long playing  ''  ) , their reproductive accuracy , or `` fidelity `` ( `` high  वफ़ादारी  '' ,  ``  Orthophonic ''  ,  `` full-range ''  ,  etc  .  ) ,  और  the number of channels of audio provided (  ``  mono `` , ``  स्टीरियो  `` ,  ``  quadraphonic `` , etc . ) .
फोनोग्राफ  records were the  प्राथमिक  medium used for  म्यूज़िक  reproduction for most of the 20th century ,  replacing  the phonograph cylinder , with  जिससे  it  था   co-existed  , by  the  1920s .
By the late 1980s , digital  मीडिया  had gained a  larger  market  share  , and  the  vinyl record left the mainstream in 1991 .
They continue  to  be manufactured and sold in the  21st  century .
in  2008  ,  nearly 2.9 million units shipped , the  सबसे  in any year since 1998  और  the format has continued to slowly  regain  popularity  .
They are especially used by  djs  and audiophiles for many types of music .
As of 2013  ,  vinyl records continue to be used for distribution .
