Grasslands are areas where the vegetation is dominated  by  grasses ( Poaceae ) , however sedge  (  Cyperaceae  )  and rush ( Juncaceae ) families can also be found .
Grasslands occur naturally on  सब  continents except Antarctica .
In temperate  latitudes  , such as northwestern Europe  और  the  ग्रेट  Plains  और   कैलिफ़ोर्निया  in North  अमेरिका  , native grasslands are dominated by perennial  गुच्छा  grass species  ,   whereas  in warmer  climates   सालाना  species form a greater component  of  the vegetation .
Grasslands  हैं  found in most ecoregions of the Earth .
For example there  हैं  five terrestrial ecoregion classifications ( subdivisions ) of the  शीतोष्ण  grasslands , savannas , and shrublands biome  (  ' ecosystem ' ) ,  जिससे  is one of eight terrestrial ecozones of the Earth  's   सतह  .
हिना  ( Lawsonia  inermis   ,   भी  called henna  पेड़  ) or  हिना   is   a   flowering  plant , the sole species in the genus Lawsonia in the family Lythraceae .
The English name `` henna  ''  comes from the Arabic ( ALA-LC  :  ḥinnāʾ  /  pronounced ) or  colloquially  , loosely pronounced .
The name is also  प्रयुक्त  for dye preparations derived  इससे  the plant  ,  and  लिये  the art  of  temporary tattooing based on those dyes  .
हिना  has been used since antiquity to dye skin , hair  ,   और  fingernails , as well as  fabrics  including Silk , wool and  चमड़े  .
Additionally  ,  the name is misused for other  स्किन  and hair dyes , such as  ब्लैक  henna or neutral henna ,  जिससे   हैं  not derived from the plant .
A thin film is  a   परत  of material ranging from fractions of a  nanometer   (  monolayer  )  to  अनेक  micrometers in thickness .
Electronic semiconductor devices and optical coatings  हैं  the main applications benefiting from thin-film construction .
a   परिचित  application of thin  films  is  the  household mirror  ,  which typically  रै  a thin metal coating on the back of a sheet of glass to  रूप  a reflective interface .
the  process  of  silvering was once commonly used to produce mirrors .
A very-thin-film coating ( less than a nanometer thick ) is used to produce two-way mirrors  .
The performance of optical coatings ( e.g . antireflective , or AR  ,  coatings ) are  typically  enhanced when the thin-film coating consists of multiple layers having  varying  thicknesses and refractive indices  .
similarly  , a periodic structure of alternating thin films of different materials  may  collectively form a so-called superlattice which exploits the phenomenon of  क्वांटम  confinement  by  restricting electronic phenomena  to  two-dimensions .
Work is being done with ferromagnetic and ferroelectric thin films for use as computer  मेमोरी  .
It is also being  लागू  to  दवाएँ  , via  thin-film  drug delivery .
Thin-films  हैं  used  to  produce thin-film batteries  .
Thin  films   हैं  also used in dye-sensitized solar cells  .
Ceramic thin films are in wide use .
the  relatively high hardness and inertness of ceramic materials make this type of thin coating of  ब्याज  for protection of substrate materials against  संक्षारण  ,  ऑक्सीकरण  and  पहनें  .
In  particular  ,  the   उपयोग  of such coatings on cutting tools can  extend  the  जीवन  of  ये  items by  अनेक  orders of magnitude .
Research is being  किया  on a new class of thin-film inorganic oxide materials , called amorphous heavy-metal cation multicomponent  आक्साइड  , which could be used to make  पारदर्शी  transistors that are inexpensive  ,  stable , and environmentally benign .
Gears of War is a military  विज्ञान   fiction  third-person shooter video game developed by  एपिक  Games and published by Microsoft Game Studios .
it   थी   initially  released as an exclusive title for the Xbox  360  in November 2005 in North America , Australia , and most of Europe and included a `` Limited Collector  's  Edition '' with added content and an art  किताब  titled Destroyed Beauty that detailed much of the game 's back-story .
Despite the initial  कथन  of Xbox 360 exclusivity , a Microsoft  खिड़कियाँ  version of the  खेल  was developed in conjunction with People  can   मक्खी   और   released  a year later ,  featuring  new content  सहित  additional campaign levels , a new multiplayer  खेल  mode ,  और  Games for Windows Live functionality  .
The  खेल  focuses on  the  troops of Delta Squad as they wield a desperate , last-ditch attempt to save the remaining  इंसान   निवासियों   of  the fictional planet Sera from  a  relentless and seemingly unstoppable subterranean enemy known as the  टिड्डी  Horde .
The player assumes the role of Marcus Fenix (  लकिन  can  भी  play as  डोमिनिक   सैंटियागो  ) , a  पूर्व  prisoner and war-hardened soldier .
The game is based on the use of  कवर  and  रणनीतिक   आग   लिये   the  player  to   अग्रिम  through the scenarios ; a second player can play cooperatively through the main  अभियान  to assist .
The game also features several online multiplayer game modes for up to eight players .
Gears  of  War sold  over   तीन  million copies in just ten weeks and was  the  fastest-selling video  खेल  of 2005 as well as the second-most played game  over  Xbox Live during .
It currently stands as the 5th best selling Xbox 360 game of  सब  time .
the  game has since sold over five million copies by September 2008 .
The game was  खूब  received  by  critics , who  praised   इसके  gameplay  और  detailed visuals , and  it  won several ``  खेल  of the Year '' awards  in  2006 .
The success of the game has led  to  the  विकास  of the Gears of  युद्ध  franchise , including  the  2008  sequel  Gears of  युद्ध  2 and its follow-up ,  गियर्स   of  War 3 ,  जिससे  was released on  सितंबर   20  , 2011  ,  after having initially been set to have been  released  on  अप्रैल  5 , 2011 ,  the   तिथि  upon  जिससे  Epic Games ' Cliff Bleszinski  थी   a  guest on Late  रात्रि  with Jimmy Fallon  .
adaptations  to  किताबे  , comics , as well as a feature  फिल्मी   हैं  to be expected .
A Tree Grows in Brooklyn is  a  1943  अनोखा  written by Betty Smith .
The story  focuses   on   an  Irish-American family in Williamsburg , Brooklyn , New York City .
The  अनोखा  is  नियत   in  the first and second decades of the  20th  century .
The book was  an  immense success .
The  प्रमुख  metaphor of  the  book is  the  hardy  पेड़  of  स्वर्ग  , native to China and Taiwan , now  माना  invasive , and  आम  in the vacant lots of New York  नगर  .
World  मैप  with the  intertropical  zone highlighted in red .
Tropical  जलवायु  zones of the  धरती  where  सब  twelve months have mean temperatures above 18 °C ( 64  °f  )  .
The tropics is a region of the  धरती  surrounding  the  Equator .
It is limited in latitude by the Tropic of Cancer  in  the northern hemisphere  at  approximately N and the Tropic of  मकर  in the  दक्षिणी  hemisphere at S  ;   ये  latitudes  correspond  to  the  axial tilt of the Earth .
the  tropics are  भी  referred  to   as   the  tropical  मण्डल  and the torrid zone ( see geographical zone ) .
The tropics include all  the  areas on the Earth where the Sun  पहुँच   a  point directly overhead at  तनिक  once during the solar year  .
The  ऊष्णकटिबन्ध  are distinguished from  the  other climatic and  biomatic   regions   of   धरती  , the middle latitudes and the polar regions  on   either  side of the equatorial zone .
For the INXS song  ,  see What You Need (  सोंग  ) .
``  कया  You Need '' is an episode  of  the American  टेलीविज़न  anthology  श्रेणी   the  Twilight Zone .
It is based on the short story of the same name by Lewis Padgett ( Henry Kuttner and C. L. Moore  )  .
PlayhouseSquare ,  in  the Cleveland Theater District in downtown Cleveland , Ohio , is the second-largest  थिएटर  complex in the United States , second only  to  New  यॉर्क  City 's Lincoln  बीच  ) .
Constructed  in  a span of 19  महीने   in  the  जल्दी  1920s , the theaters were subsequently  बंद  down ,  लकिन   यहूद   revived  through a grassroots effort .
Their renovation and reopening  helped   usher  in a new era of downtown revitalization  in   क्लीवलैंड  , and  थी  called ``  एक  of the  शीर्ष  ten  सफलताओं  in Cleveland  इतिहास  . ''
The  ड्राइवर   और  passenger  सामने  airbags , after having been deployed , in a British Peugeot 306 car  .
An airbag  is  a vehicle safety device  .
It is an occupant restraint system consisting  of  a flexible fabric envelope or cushion  designed  to inflate  rapidly  during an  ऑटोमोबाइल   टक्कर  .
Its purpose is to  cushion  occupants during a crash and provide  सुरक्षा  to their bodies  जब   वे   स्ट्राइक  interior  वस्तुएँ  such as  the  steering  व्हील  or a window .
Modern  वाहनों  may contain multiple airbag modules in  विभिन्न   पक्ष  and frontal locations of  the  passenger seating positions , and  सेंसर  may deploy one or more airbags in an impact  मण्डल  at variable rates  आधारित  on the type , angle and severity of impact ;  the   एयरबैग  is designed to  तभी  inflate in moderate to severe frontal crashes  .
Airbags are normally designed with the intention of supplementing  the  protection of an occupant who is  correctly  restrained with a seatbelt  .
सबसे  designs are inflated through  pyrotechnic  means and can only be operated once .
Newer side-impact airbag modules  consist  of  संपीडित   एयर  cylinders  कि   हैं  triggered  in  the event of a side impact vehicle  प्रभाव  .
The first commercial  डिजाइन  were introduced in passenger automobiles  दौरान  the 1970s with limited success  .
व्यापक  commercial adoption of airbags  occurred   in  many markets during the late 1980s and early 1990s with a driver airbag , and  a  front passenger airbag as well on some  गाड़ियाँ  ; and many modern vehicles now include four or more units .
IRS tax forms are used  लिये  taxpayers  और   tax-exempt  organizations to report  वित्तीय  information to the  आतंरिक  Revenue Service ( IRS ) of the  संयुक्त  States .
They  हैं  used to  रपट  income , calculate taxes to be paid to the federal government  of  the United States , and  ज़ाहिर  other information  as   जरूरी  by the  आतंरिक   आय  Code ( IRC )  .
वहीँ  are over 800 various forms and schedules .
The best-known of these is Form 1040 used by individuals .
in   the  United States ,  ड्राइवर  's licenses  हैं  issued by  प्रत्येक  individual state  (   सहित  Washington , D.C. and territories ) , rather than the federal government because of the political concept of federalism .
Drivers are normally required to obtain  a  license from their state  of  residence and all states  recognize  each other 's licenses for temporary visitors  विषय  to  सामान्य   आयु  requirements .
a  state may also suspend an  व्यक्तिगत  's driving privilege within its borders for traffic violations .
Many states share a common  प्रणाली  of license classes  ,  with some exceptions  ,   और  commercial license classes are standardized by federal  विनियमन   at   49  CFR part 383 .
China has  महरूम  the source of  अनेक  inventions , including  the  Four Great Inventions : papermaking  ,  the  कम्पास   ,   बारूद  , and printing (  दोनो   woodblock  and movable type ) .
the  list  नीचे  contains  ये  and  अन्य  inventions .
The Chinese invented technologies involving  यांत्रिकी   ,   hydraulics  ,  और  mathematics applied to horology ,  metallurgy  , astronomy  ,  agriculture  ,  engineering , music theory , craftsmanship  ,   nautics  , and warfare .
By the Warring States Period (  403–221  BC ) , they  था  advanced metallurgic technology , including the  धमाका   भट्टी  and cupola furnace , while the finery forge and  puddling  process  यहूद  known by the Han Dynasty (  202  BC  –  AD 220 ) .
A sophisticated economic system in  चीन  gave birth to inventions such  as  paper money during the Song  राजवंश  ( 960–1279  )  .
The invention of gunpowder by  the   10th  century led  to   an  array of inventions such as the fire lance , land mine  ,  naval mine , hand cannon , exploding  गोलों  , multistage rocket ,  और  rocket bombs with aerodynamic wings and  विस्फोटक   payloads  .
साथ   the  navigational  सहायता   of   the  11th-century compass and ability to steer  at  high sea with the  1st-century  sternpost rudder  ,  premodern  चाइनीज  sailors sailed as far as East Africa and Egypt  .
In  water-powered   clockworks  , the  premodern  Chinese had used the escapement mechanism since the 8th century and  the  endless power-transmitting chain drive in the 11th century  .
They also made large  mechanical   कठपुतली  theaters driven by waterwheels and carriage wheels and wine-serving  automatons  driven by paddle wheel boats .
The contemporaneous Peiligang and Pengtoushan  संस्कृतियों   represent  the oldest Neolithic cultures of  चीन   और  were formed around 7000 BC .
Some  of  the first inventions  of  Neolithic , prehistoric  चीन  include semilunar and rectangular stone knives , stone  hoes  and spades , the cultivation  of  millet , rice and the soybean , the refinement of sericulture , the building of rammed earth  structures  with lime  -plastered   हाउस  floors ,  the  creation  of  the potter 's wheel , the creation of pottery with  cord-mat-basket  designs  ,   the  creation of pottery tripods and  pottery  steamers , and the development of ceremonial vessels and  scapulimancy  for  उद्देश्य   of  divination .
Francesca Bray argues that  the   domestication  of  the  ox and  भैंस  during the Longshan  संस्कृति  ( c. 3000–c . 2000 BC ) period , the absence of Longshan-era irrigation or high-yield crops ,  पूरा  evidence of Longshan cultivation of dry-land cereal crops  जिससे   दिया  high yields `` only when the soil was carefully cultivated ,  ''  suggest that the plow was known at least by the Longshan culture period  और  explains the high agricultural production yields which  अनुमत  the  वृद्धि  of Chinese civilization during the Shang  राजवंश  ( c.  1600–c  . 1050  bc  )  .
With later  आविष्कारों  such as the multiple-tube seed drill and heavy moldboard  आयरन   हल  ,  चीन   's  agricultural output  could   sustain  a much  larger   जनसांख्यिकी   .
लिये  the  उद्देश्य  of this list  ,  inventions  हैं  regarded as technological firsts developed in China ,  और  as such  करता  not include foreign technologies which the Chinese  acquired  through contact ,  ऐसे  as the windmill from the Middle East or the telescope from Early modern Europe .
It also does not include technologies developed elsewhere and later invented separately by the Chinese ,  ऐसे  as the odometer and  कड़ी  pump .
Scientific ,  mathematic   or  natural  discoveries   ,  changes  in  minor concepts of design  or  style  और  artistic  नवप्रवर्तनों  can not be regarded as inventions and  do  not appear on the list .
सकल  domestic  उत्पाद   in   2011  US dollars  प्रति  capita  ,  adjusted for inflation and purchasing power parity (  log   स्केल  )  इससे  1860 to 2011 ,  साथ  population (  डिस्क   क्षेत्रफल  ) for the US  (  yellow ) , UK  (  orange )  ,  Japan ( red ) , China ( red ) , and India ( blue ) .
Globalization  (  or globalisation—see spelling  मतभेद  )  is   the  process of international integration arising from the interchange of world views  ,  products ,  विचार  , and  अन्य  aspects of culture .
Put  in   सरल  terms , globalization  refers  to processes that promote  world-wide  exchanges  of  national and  सांस्कृतिक   संसाधन  .
Advances  in  transportation  और  telecommunications infrastructure ,  सहित   the  rise of the Internet ,  हैं   प्रमुख  factors in globalization , generating further interdependence  of   आर्थिक   और  cultural activities  .
Though several scholars  प्लेस  the  origins  of globalization in modern times ,  अन्य  trace its history long before  the  European age of discovery and voyages to the New World .
Some even trace the origins to the third millennium BCE .
Since the beginning  of   the   20th  century , the pace  of   वैश्वीकरण  has intensified at a rapid rate  ,  especially during the Post Cold War  era  .
The term globalization has been in increasing use since the mid-1980s and especially since  the  mid-1990s .
In 2000 ,  the  International Monetary Fund ( IMF  )  identified four basic aspects of globalization : trade and transactions , capital and  निवेश  movements , migration  और  movement of  लोगों  and  the  dissemination of knowledge .
Further , environmental challenges such as climate change , cross-boundary  जल  and air pollution ,  और   over-fishing  of the  समंदर  are linked  साथ   वैश्वीकरण  .
Globalizing processes affect and are affected by business and work organization , economics , socio-cultural  संसाधन  , and the natural environment .
the  Replacements is a 2000 American sports comedy film  निर्देशित   by  Howard  deutch  .
it  stars Keanu Reeves , Gene Hackman  ,  and Brooke Langton .
An American Airlines aircraft takes off from Dallas/Fort Worth International Airport .
This airport is the  एयरलाइन  's  largest  hub .
अमरीकी  Airlines flies to 79  घरेलू  destinations and 78 international destinations in 48 countries .
(  as  of December  2012  )
The list includes the city ,  देश  , the codes of the International Air  हस्तांतरण  Association  (   iata  airport code ) and the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Civil Aviation Organization  (  ICAO airport code ) , and the airport 's name  ,   साथ   the  airline 's hubs , focus cities and seasonal destinations marked .
The list also  contains   गंतव्यों  no  longer   परोसा  by the airline , which are  चिह्नित   as  terminated destinations .
it   करता  not include destinations served for American Airlines by  इसके   क्षेत्रीय  affiliates  अमरीकी  Eagle Airlines ,  कार्यपालिका  Airlines  ,  and AmericanConnection  .
`` Day-O ( The Banana Boat  सोंग  ) '' is  a  traditional  jamaican  mento folk song , the best-known  संस्करण   of   जिससे  was sung  by   हैरी  Belafonte  और  an alternate version interspersed with another Jamaican folksong , Hill and Gully  सवार  , by Dame Shirley Bassey  .
Despite the song 's mento influences , `` Day-O ( The Banana  नाव  Song ) '' is widely known as an example of calypso music .
it  is a work song , from the point of view  of  dock workers working the night shift loading bananas onto ships .
Daylight has  आइये  ,  the  shift is over and they want  उनके  work to be counted  up  so  कि  they can go home .
World War  i   (  WWI ) was a  वैश्विक  war centred in Europe  कि   began  on 28 July 1914 and lasted  जबतक  11 November 1918 .
It was predominantly  पुकारा  the World  युद्ध   or  the Great  युद्ध  from its occurrence until the start of  संसार  War II  in  1939 , and the  पहला  World  युद्ध   or  World War I thereafter  .
It involved all the world 's  ग्रेट  powers , which were assembled  in  two opposing alliances : the  allies  (  आधारित  on the Triple Entente of the United Kingdom , France and Russia ) and the Central Powers  (   originally  the Triple Alliance of Germany , Austria-Hungary and  इटली  ; but  ,  as Austria–Hungary had taken the offensive against  the  agreement , Italy did not  डालें   into  the  युद्ध  )  .
These  alliances   यहूद  both reorganised  और  expanded as  अधिक   राष्ट्र  entered  the  war : Italy , Japan and the United States joined  the  Allies , and the Ottoman Empire  और   बुल्गारिया  the Central  शक्तियां  .
Ultimately  ,  more than  70  million military personnel  ,   सहित  60 million  europeans  , were mobilised in one of the largest wars in history .
More  than   9  million combatants were killed , largely because of technological advancements that led to enormous increases in the lethality of weapons without corresponding improvements in protection  or  mobility .
It  थी   the   fifth-  deadliest conflict  in  world history , subsequently paving the way for various political changes , such as revolutions  in  many of the nations involved .
One of the long-term causes of the war  थी  the resurgence of imperialism  in  the  विदेशी  policies of the great powers of Europe .
अधिक  immediately , the assassination  of  Archduke Franz Ferdinand of  ऑस्ट्रिया  , the heir to  the  throne of Austria-Hungary , on 28 June 1914  by  Yugoslav nationalist  gavrilo  Princip in Sarajevo  triggered  a  राजनयिक  crisis when Austria-Hungary subsequently delivered  an  ultimatum  to  the Kingdom of Serbia .
Several  alliances  formed over the previous  दशकों  were invoked .
Within weeks  ,  the major powers were at war and ,  via  their  colonies  , the conflict soon spread around  the  world .
On 28 July ,  the  Austro-Hungarians fired the first  गोलियाँ  of the war as  तैयारी  for the  आक्रमण  of Serbia .
While the Russians mobilised , the Germans invaded neutral Belgium and Luxembourg on the way to France , providing a casus belli for Britain  's  declaration of  युद्ध  against  जर्मनी   .
After the German march on Paris was brought to a  halt—the  so-called  चमत्कार  of the  marne  —the  पश्चिमी  Front settled  into  a static battle of attrition  साथ  a trench  लकीर  that changed little until  1917  .
on  the  पूर्वी  Front , the Russian army was successful against the  austro-hungarians  , but  थी  stopped in its invasion of East Prussia by  the  Germans  .
In November the Ottoman  साम्राज्य  joined  the  war ,  खोलने  up fronts in the  काकेशस  , Mesopotamia and  the   sinai  .
Italy and  बुल्गारिया   गई  to  युद्ध  in 1915 and Romania in 1916 .
in  Russia ,  the  tsar 's government collapsed in March  1917  and a subsequent revolution  in  November brought the  russians  to  शर्तें  with  the   सेंट्रल  Powers .
बाद  a  1918  German offensive along  the  western front , the Allies drove back the Germans in a series of successful offensives and American forces began entering  the   trenches  .
Germany , which had  इसके  own  ट्रबल   साथ  revolutionaries  ,  agreed to an  armistice  on  11  November  1918   .
The  युद्ध  ended in victory  लिये  the Allies .
कार्यक्रम  on the  घर  fronts  यहूद  as  उग्र  as on the battle fronts , as  the  participants  आजमाया   to  mobilize their manpower  और  economic resources to fight a total war .
by  the end of the  युद्ध  , four major imperial powers—the German , Russian , Austro-Hungarian  और   उस्मानी  empires—ceased to exist  .
The  successor   राज्य  of the  पूर्व   दो  lost a  ग्रेट  amount of territory , while the  latter  two were  dismantled  entirely  .
The map  of   सेंट्रल  Europe  थी   redrawn   into  several smaller states .
The League  of  Nations was formed in the hope of preventing another such conflict  .
The European nationalism  शाखित  by the war and the  ब्रेकअप   of   empires  , the repercussions of Germany 's defeat  और  problems with the Treaty of  versailles  are agreed to be factors contributing to World War  ii  .
नर्स  Jackie is an American series  कि  premiered on June 8 , 2009 ,  on  Showtime , Movie Central and The  फिल्म  Network  .
The series stars Edie  falco  as the  शीर्षक  character Jackie Peyton ,  an  emergency department nurse at All Saints  '   हॉस्पिटल   in   नई   यॉर्क  City .
For Jackie , `` Every  दिन  is a high  तार   अधिनियम  of juggling patients , doctors , fellow nurses and her own  indiscretions   .   ''
Keeping  up  with  the  Kardashians ( often referred to simply  as  The  kardashians  ) is an American reality  टेलीविज़न  series that premiered on October 14 , 2007 , on E ! .
It follows  the  lives  of  the Kardashian/Jenner  परिवार  , including  बहनों  Kourtney , Kim ,  और  Khloé Kardashian .
The series  '  success has led to the  spin-offs  Kourtney and Kim Take New York , Khloé & Lamar ,  कोर्टनी  and Khloé Take Miami , and Kourtney and Kim Take  मियामी  .
Afghanistan ( ; ;  )  ,  officially  the  इस्लामी  Republic of Afghanistan , is a landlocked sovereign state forming part of South Asia ,  सेंट्रल   एशिया  ,  और  to  कुछ  extent Western  एशिया  .
it  has a population of around 30 million inhabiting an area of approximately , making it  the  42nd  सबसे  populous and 41st largest nation in the world .
It  is   bordered   by  Pakistan in the south and the east , Iran in  the  west , Turkmenistan , Uzbekistan and Tajikistan in the north , and China in the far northeast  .
Afghanistan has  महरूम   an  ancient focal point of  the  Silk Road  और  human migration .
Archaeologists have found evidence of human  habitation  from as far back as the  मध्य   paleolithic  .
Urban  सभ्यता  may have begun in  the   क्षेत्रफल   as   जल्दी  as 3,000 to 2,000 BCE .
बैठे  at an important geostrategic location that connects the Middle  ईस्ट  culture with  सेंट्रल   एशिया   और  the Indian subcontinent  ,  the land has  महरूम  home  to  various  peoples  through the ages  और  witnessed many military campaigns , notably  by  Alexander the Great , Genghis Khan , and in modern  era  Western  शक्तियां  .
the  land also served as a source from  जिससे  the Greco-Bactrians , Kushans , Hephthalites , Saffarids ,  ghaznavids  , Ghorids , Khiljis ,  timurids  , Mughals ,  durranis  , and others have risen to  रूप   प्रमुख  empires  .
the  political  इतिहास  of the modern state of  अफगानिस्तान  begins in 1709  ,  when the Hotaki dynasty was established in Kandahar  followed  by  अहमद  Shah  दुर्रानी  's  वृद्धि  to power in 1747 .
In  the  late 19th century ,  अफगानिस्तान  became a buffer state in the `` Great Game `` between the British and Russian empires .
following  the 1919  anglo-afghan  War  ,   किंग  Amanullah began a  यूरोपीय   स्टाइल  modernization of the country but was stopped by the  ultra-conservatives  .
During the Cold War  ,  after the  वापसी  of the  अंग्रेजों  from neighboring  इण्डिया  in  1947  , the United States and the  सोवियत  Union began spreading influences in Afghanistan  ,  which led to a bloody  युद्ध   between  the  us-backed  mujahideen  शक्तियां  and the Soviet-backed Afghan government in which over a million Afghans lost their lives .
This was followed by the 1990s civil war , the rise  और  fall of the extremist Taliban government and  the   2001–present  war .
In  दिसम्बर  2001 , the  संयुक्त  Nations Security Council authorized the creation of the International  सुरक्षा  Assistance Force ( ISAF  )  to help  maintain  security in  अफगानिस्तान  and assist  the  Karzai administration .
Three decades of  युद्ध  made Afghanistan one of the  संसार  's most  खतरनाक   देशों  , including the largest producer of refugees and asylum seekers .
While the international community  is  rebuilding war-torn Afghanistan , terrorist groups such as the Haqqani Network and Hezbi Islami are actively involved in a  देशभर  Taliban -led insurgency , which  शामिल  hundreds of assassinations and suicide  हमले  .
according   to  the United Nations ,  the   insurgents  were responsible for  80  % of civilian casualties in 2011  और  2012 .
The American Civil War (  acw  ) ,  भी  known as the War between  the  States or simply the Civil  युद्ध  ( see naming ) ,  थी  a civil  युद्ध  fought from  1861  to 1865  between  the United States ( the `` Union '' or the `` North '' ) and several Southern slave states that declared their secession and formed the Confederate  राज्य  of America ( the  ``  Confederacy  ''  or the `` South  ''  )  .
the   युद्ध  had  इसके  origin in the issue of slavery , especially the extension of  गुलामी  into the western territories  .
Foreign powers did  नहीं  intervene .
After four years  of  bloody combat that left over 600,000 soldiers dead and destroyed much of the South 's infrastructure ,  the  Confederacy  collapsed   ,  slavery was abolished , and  the   मुश्किल  Reconstruction process  of  restoring national unity and guaranteeing rights  to   the  freed  स्लेव   began  .
In  the  1860 presidential election , Republicans ,  led   by   अब्राहम   lincoln  , opposed expanding slavery into United  राज्य  ' territories .
Lincoln  जीती  , but before his inauguration on March 4 , 1861  ,  seven cotton-based slave states formed the Confederacy .
Outgoing  लोकतांत्रिक  President James Buchanan and the incoming Republicans  अस्वीकृत  secession  as  illegal .
Lincoln 's inaugural address declared his administration would not initiate civil war  .
Eight remaining slave  राज्य  continued to  अस्वीकृत  calls for  secession  .
Confederate forces seized numerous federal forts  भीतर  territory  claimed  by the  confederacy  .
A  सलाम   सम्मेलन  failed  to   ढूँढें  a compromise  ,  and both sides prepared  लिये   युद्ध  .
the   confederates  assumed that European countries were so  निर्भर  on  ``  King Cotton  ``  that  वे  would  intervene  ; none  किया  and none recognized the new Confederate States of America .
Hostilities began on April 12 , 1861 ,  जब  Confederate forces  fired  upon Fort Sumter , a key fort held by Union  सैनिकों  in South Carolina .
lincoln   पुकारा  for each state to  provide  troops to retake the fort ; consequently , four more  स्लेव   राज्य  joined  the  Confederacy , bringing their total to eleven  .
The Union soon  नियंत्रित  the border states and established a  नवल   नाकेबंदी   कि   अबोध  the southern economy .
The Eastern  थिएटर  was inconclusive in 1861–62 .
The autumn 1862 Confederate campaign into Maryland  (  a Union state )  ended  with  confederate  retreat at the Battle of Antietam , dissuading British  हस्तक्षेप  .
lincoln  issued the Emancipation Proclamation ,  जिससे  made ending slavery a war goal .
To  the  west , by  गर्मियाँ   1862  the Union destroyed the Confederate river  नेवी  , then  much  of  उनके   पश्चिमी  armies , and the Union at Vicksburg split  the  Confederacy in two at the Mississippi River .
In 1863 , Robert E. Lee  's   confederate  incursion north ended at the Battle of  gettysburg  .
Western successes led to  ulysses   S.   ग्रान्ट   कमांड  of  सब  Union armies in  1864  .
in  the Western Theater , William  T.  Sherman drove  ईस्ट  to capture Atlanta and marched  to  the sea ,  destroying  Confederate infrastructure  साथ  the  रास्ता   .
The Union marshaled the  संसाधन  and manpower to attack the Confederacy  इससे  all directions  ,  and  could  afford to fight battles of  अपघर्षण  through the Overland Campaign towards Richmond  ,  the  confederate  capital .
The  defending  Confederate army failed ,  अग्रणी  to Lee 's surrender to Grant at Appomattox Court  हाउस  on April  9  , 1865 .
The American Civil War  थी  one of the earliest true industrial  युद्धों  .
railroads  , the telegraph , steamships , and mass-produced weapons  यहूद  employed  extensively  .
The mobilization of civilian factories , mines  ,   shipyards  , banks , transportation and  खाना   आपूर्तियाँ  all foreshadowed  संसार   युद्ध  I  .
It  remains  the deadliest war in American history , resulting in the deaths  of  an estimated 750,000 soldiers  और  an undetermined number  of   civilian   हताहत  .
Historian John Huddleston  estimates  the death  टोल   at  ten percent of all Northern males 20–45 years  बूढ़ा  , and  30  percent of  सब  Southern white  males  aged 18–40 .
Cost of goods sold  (  COGS  )  refer to the inventory costs  of  those goods a business has  बेची  during a  particular  period .
Costs are associated with  particular  goods using one of  अनेक  formulas , including specific  पहचान  , first-in first-out ( FIFO ) , or average cost  .
Costs include all costs of purchase , costs of  परिवर्तन   और   अन्य  costs incurred  in   bringing  the inventories to their present location  और  condition .
Costs of goods made by the business  शामिल  material , labor , and allocated overhead .
the  costs of those goods not yet sold are deferred as costs of inventory until the inventory is sold  or  written down  in  value .

A confectionery  स्टोर  (  अधिक   commonly  referred to as a sweet  दूकान   in  the United Kingdom , a candy store in the North  अमेरिका  , or a  lolly  shop in Australia ) sells confectionery  और  is usually targeted to  children  .
Most confectionery  स्टोर्स  are filled with an  assortment  of  मिठाई   दूर   larger  than a grocer or convenience  स्टोर  could accommodate .
They often offer a  चयन   of   बूढ़ा  fashioned  ट्रीट  , and sweets from different countries .
बहुत  often unchanged in layout since their inception , confectioneries are known for their warming  और  nostalgic feel .
The village of  pateley  Bridge claims to have the oldest confectionery store  in  England .

Oklahoma ( ) ( Pawnee : Uukuhuúwa , Cayuga : Gahnawiyoˀgeh  )   is  a  राज्य  located in West South  सेंट्रल   संयुक्त  States .
ओक्लाहोमा  is the 20th most extensive  और  the 28th most populous  of  the  50  United States .
The  राज्य  's name  is  derived from the Choctaw words okla and  humma  ,  अर्थ  `` red people ''  ,  and it is known informally by its nickname , The Sooner State .
Formed by the  संयोजन   of   ओक्लाहोमा  Territory and  भारतीय  Territory  on  November 16 , 1907 ,  ओक्लाहोमा  was the 46th state  to  enter the union .
Its residents are known  as  Oklahomans or , informally `` Okies  ''  , and its capital and largest city is Oklahoma City .
A  प्रमुख  producer  of  natural gas , oil ,  और  agriculture  ,   ओक्लाहोमा  relies  on  an economic base of aviation ,  उर्जा  ,  दूरसंचार  , and  जैवप्रौद्योगिकी  .
it  has one of  the  fastest growing economies  in   the  nation , ranking among the  शीर्ष  states in  प्रति  capita  आय   विकास  and gross domestic product growth .
Oklahoma City and Tulsa serve as Oklahoma  's  primary economic anchors , with nearly two thirds of Oklahomans living within  उनके   महानगर  statistical  क्षेत्रों  .
With small mountain ranges ,  प्रेयरी  , mesas , and  पूर्वी  forests , most of Oklahoma lies in the  ग्रेट   मैदान  and the  u.s  .  आंतरिक  Highlands —a region  विशेषकर   prone  to severe  मौसम  .
in  addition to having  a  prevalence of English , German ,  स्कॉटिश  , Irish and Native American ancestry , more  than  25 Native American languages are spoken in Oklahoma , second only to California .
Oklahoma is located on a confluence of three major American cultural regions and historically served as a route for cattle drives , a destination for southern settlers , and a government-sanctioned territory for Native Americans  .

A tire (  or  tyre ) is a ring-shaped  covering  that fits around a  व्हील  's rim to  protect  it and enable better vehicle performance .
Most tires , such as those for automobiles and  साइकिल   ,   provide   कर्षण  between the vehicle and  the   सड़क  while providing  a   लचीली  cushion that  absorbs  shock .
The materials of modern pneumatic  टायर  are synthetic rubber , natural  रबर   ,  fabric and wire , along  साथ  carbon black and other  रासायनिक   यौगिकों  .
वे  consist of a tread and  a  body .
the  tread provides  कर्षण  while  the  body provides containment for a quantity of compressed air .
Before rubber  थी  developed , the  पहला  versions of tires were  बस  bands  of   मेटल   कि  fitted around wooden  पहियों  to prevent  पहनें  and tear .
Early rubber  टायर  were solid ( not pneumatic ) .
Today , the  बहुमत  of tires are pneumatic inflatable structures , comprising  a  doughnut-shaped body of cords  और  wires encased  in  rubber and generally filled with  संपीडित  air  to  form an  inflatable   cushion  .
Pneumatic tires are  प्रयुक्त  on many types of  वाहनों  , including cars , bicycles , motorcycles , trucks , earthmovers  ,  and  वायुयान  .
Metal tires are still used on locomotives and railcars  ,  and solid rubber ( or other polymer )  टायर   हैं  still used in  विभिन्न  non-automotive applications , such as some  casters   ,  carts , lawnmowers , and wheelbarrows .
Dr. Joseph  वारेन  (  जून   11  , 1741 – June 17 , 1775  )  was an American  डॉक्टर  who played  a  leading role in American Patriot organizations in Boston in early days of the American Revolution , eventually serving  as  president of the revolutionary Massachusetts Provincial Congress .
Warren enlisted Paul Revere and William Dawes on  अप्रैल  18 , 1775  ,   to  leave Boston and spread  the  alarm that  the   अंग्रेजों   गैरीसन   in  Boston was setting out  to  raid  the  town of Concord and arrest rebel  नेताओ  John Hancock and  सैमुएल  Adams .
वारेन  participated in the  अगला  day 's Battles of Lexington and Concord , which are commonly considered to be  the  opening engagements of the American  क्रांतिकारी   युद्ध  .
Warren had been commissioned a Major General  in  the colony 's militia shortly before the June 17 ,  1775  Battle of Bunker Hill .
बल्कि  than exercising his  रैंक   ,  Warren served  in  the battle  as  a private soldier ,  और  was killed  in  combat when British troops stormed the redoubt  atop  Breed 's Hill .
उसके  death , immortalized in John  trumbull   's  painting , The Death of  सामान्य  Warren at the Battle  of  Bunker 's Hill , June 17 ,  1775  , galvanized the rebel forces , and he has been memorialized in  अनेक  place  names  in the  संयुक्त   राज्य  .
stm  image of self-assembled supramolecular  जंजीरों  of the organic semiconductor  quinacridone   on  Graphite .
An organic semiconductor is an organic  सामग्री   साथ   सेमीकंडक्टर  properties  ,  that  is  , with  an  electrical conductivity between that  of  insulators and that of metals .
Single  अणुओं  , short chain  (  oligomers ) and organic polymers can be  semiconductive  .
Semiconducting small molecules ( aromatic hydrocarbons ) include the  polycyclic  aromatic compounds pentacene  ,  anthracene  ,  and rubrene  .
Polymeric organic  semiconductors   शामिल  poly ( 3-hexylthiophene ) , poly  (  p-phenylene vinylene ) ,  as   खूब  as polyacetylene and its derivatives .
There are two major overlapping  वर्ग  of organic semiconductors .
These are organic charge-transfer complexes  और   विभिन्न  linear-backbone conductive polymers derived from polyacetylene .
Linear  रीढ़  organic semiconductors include polyacetylene itself and  इसके   डेरिवेटिव  polypyrrole , and polyaniline .
At least locally , charge-transfer complexes often  प्रदर्शनी   समान  conduction mechanisms to inorganic semiconductors .
Such mechanisms arise from the presence of hole and electron conduction layers separated by a  बैंड  gap  .
While such classic mechanisms are  महत्वपूर्ण  locally , as  साथ  inorganic amorphous semiconductors , tunnelling , localized states , mobility  गैप  ,  और  phonon -assisted  hopping  also significantly contribute to conduction , particularly in polyacetylenes .
जैसे  inorganic semiconductors , organic semiconductors can be  doped  .
सशुल्क  semiconductors susceptible to doping such as polyaniline ( Ormecon ) and  हैं  also known as  सशुल्क  metals .
Typical current carriers in organic semiconductors are holes and electrons in  π-bonds   .
Almost all organic solids are insulators .
But when their constituent molecules have π-conjugate systems , electrons  can  move via π-electron cloud  overlaps  , especially by  hopping   ,   tunnelling  and  सम्बन्धित   mechanisms  .
Polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbons and phthalocyanine salt crystals  हैं  examples of this type of organic semiconductor .
Mainly due to low mobility  ,  even  unpaired  electrons  may   be  stable in  charge-transfer  complexes .
Such unpaired  electrons  can function as current carriers .
This type of semiconductor  is  also  प्राप्त  by pairing an  इलेक्ट्रॉन  donor molecule with an electron  acceptor  molecule .
Female ejaculation  is  the expulsion  of  fluid by human females from the paraurethral ducts through and around  the   मादा  urethra  दौरान  or before  an  orgasm .
It  is  also known colloquially as gushing or squirting , although these are  माना  to  be   अलग   phenomena  in some research publications .
The exact source and nature of the fluid continue to  be  a topic  of  debate  among   चिकित्सा  professionals ,  जिससे  is also related  to  doubts over the existence of the  g-spot   .
The FIFA Women 's  संसार   कप  is an international  संघ  football  प्रतियोगिता  contested by the senior women 's national teams of  the  members of Fédération Internationale de Football Association ( FIFA ) ,  the  sport 's global governing body .
The championship has been  awarded  every four years since the inaugural  टूर्नामेंट  in 1991 .
Japan won the 2011 tournament in a  दंड  shootout .
The current format of the tournament involves 16 teams competing for the  शीर्षक  at venues  भीतर  the host  स्वदेश  ( s ) over  a   काल  of about  तीन  weeks  ;  – this phase is often called the  संसार  Cup  फाइनल  .
a   योग्यता  phase  ,   जिससे  currently takes  प्लेस  over the preceding  तीन  years  ,  is used to determine which teams  qualify  for the  टूर्नामेंट  together with  the  host nation ( s ) .
The FIFA Women 's World Cup is recognized as the most important International competition in women 's football and  is  played amongst women  's  national football teams of  the  member states  of  FIFA  ,  the sport 's  वैश्विक  governing body .
The first Women 's World  कप  tournament ,  नामित   the  Women 's World Championship , was held in  1991   ,  sixty-one years after  the  men 's  पहला   फीफा   संसार  Cup tournament in 1930 .
The  छह  World  कप  tournaments have been won by four different national teams .
the  next World  कप  will be hosted by Canada in 2015 .
Scorpions is a young adult novel written  by  Walter Dean Myers , first  प्रकाशित  in the United States  by  Harper & Row on  जून  20  ,  1988 .
Front page of a 17th century Hebrew Bible by Joseph Athias  ,  now at Beth Hatefutsoth  ,  Israel
'Son of man '  is  the translation of various  यहूदी   और  Greek phrases  प्रयुक्त  in both  the  Hebrew Bible  और  the New Testament .
It  रै  diverse meanings , ranging from a  सामान्य  human being to a prophesied  अनन्त  , divine  शासक  .
The Hebrew expression `` son of man '' ( בן–אדם i.e . ben-'adam ) appears one  सौ  and seven  टाइम्स  in the Hebrew Bible .
This is  the  most common  यहूदी   निर्माण  for the singular  लकिन  is used mostly  in  Ezekiel ( 93 times ) and  14  times elsewhere .
In  तीस   दो  cases  the  phrase appears  in  intermediate plural form `` sons of men  ''   ,  i.e . human beings  .
as  generally interpreted by Jews , it denotes humankind  generally  .
In the Koine Greek of the New Testament , `` the son of man '' is invariably used as  ``  ὁ υἱὸς τοὺ ἀνθρώπου '' with a definite article .
The use of the  definite  article in ``  the  son of man '' in the Christian gospels is  अनोखा  ,  और  before its  उपयोग   वहीँ  ,  no  records  of  its use in  कोई   of  the surviving Greek documents of antiquity exist .
geza  Vermes has  stated  that `` the Son  of  man '' in  the  Christian gospels is unrelated to  यहूदी  Bible  usages  .
In Christian usage , unlike  the   बेटे  of God title ,  जिससे   रै  been an essential element of  ईसाई  creeds since the Apostolic age  ,  the  उदघोषणा   of  ``  यीशु   as  the Son of man '' has never been an article of faith in Christianity  .
The  निर्वचन  of  the  use of `` the Son  of  man '' in the New Testament has  remained  challenging and after 150 years  of   बहस  no consensus on the issue has emerged  among  scholars .
Master of  foxhounds   लीड  the field  इससे   powderham  Castle  in  Devon , England  ,   साथ   the  hounds in front .
फॉक्स  hunting is an activity involving the tracking , chase , and sometimes killing of a fox , traditionally  a  red fox , by trained  foxhounds  or other scent  hounds  , and a  समूह  of unarmed followers led by  a  master of  foxhounds  , who follow the  hounds  on foot or on horseback .
Fox hunting originated in  the  form practised  जबतक   recently   in  the United Kingdom in the 16th  सदी  ,  लकिन  is practised all over the  संसार  ,  सहित  in Australia ,  कनाडा  , France  ,  Ireland ,  इटली  and the United  राज्य  .
In Australia , the term also refers  to  the hunting  of  foxes with firearms  समान   to  spotlighting or deer hunting .
In much of the  संसार  hunting in general is understood to relate to any game animals or weapons ( e.g. , deer hunting with bow and arrow  )   ;  in Britain and Ireland , `` hunting ''  बगैर  qualification implies fox hunting  (  or other  फ़ॉर्म  of hunting  साथ  hounds-  beagling  , stag  शिकार  , mink hunting ,  खीचें   शिकार  or hunting the clean boot  )  as  वर्णित  here .
The sport is controversial  ,  particularly in the UK , where it was  बैन  in  स्कॉटलैंड  in 2002 , and in England  और  Wales in  नवम्बर   2004  ( law enforced from February 2005  )  , though shooting  foxes  as vermin remained  विधिक  .
proponents  of fox hunting view it as an  महत्वपूर्ण  part  of  rural culture and useful for reasons of conservation  और  pest control , while opponents argue that it is cruel and unnecessary .
Tobacco advertising is the  विज्ञापन   of  tobacco products or use  (   typically   सिगरेट  smoking ) by the  तम्बाकू  industry  through  a variety of  मीडिया  including sponsorship , particularly of sporting events .
It is now one of the most highly  regulated   फ़ॉर्म   of  marketing .
Some or all forms of  तम्बाकू  advertising are banned  in  many countries  .
Bally  technologies  ,  inc.  is a manufacturer of slot machines and  अन्य   गेमिंग  technology  आधारित  in Las Vegas , Nevada .
The company was founded in 1968 as Advanced Patent Technology  .
it  eventually  बदला  its  नाम   to  Alliance Gaming and acquired  ,  in  1996  , Bally Gaming  अंतरराष्ट्रीय   ,  a  पूर्व  division of Bally Manufacturing .
In 2006 , the entire company adopted  the  Bally name  ,  a trademark that originated  in  1932 by  the  Bally  निर्माण  Corporation .
gustave   doré  's engravings illustrated  the  Divine  कॉमेडी  ( 1861–1868 )  ;  here ,  दांते   is  lost in Canto 1 of  the  Inferno .
Inferno ( Italian  लिये   ``   नरक  `` )  is  the first part of Dante  एलीगियरी  's 14th-century  एपिक  poem  दैवी  Comedy .
It is  followed  by Purgatorio and Paradiso  .
It  is  an allegory telling of  the  journey of Dante through  नरक   ,   हिदायत  by the Roman poet Virgil  .
In the poem , Hell is depicted  as  nine  वृत्त  of suffering located within the  धरती  .
Allegorically  ,  the Divine Comedy represents the journey of the  आत्मा  towards God , with the Inferno describing the recognition and  अस्वीकृति  of  सिन  .
Smirnoff is a brand of vodka owned and  उत्पादित  by the British  कम्पनी   diageo   .
The Smirnoff brand began with  a   वोदका  distillery  संस्थापित  in Moscow by Pyotr Arsenievich Smirnov ( 1831–1898  )  .
It is  अभी  distributed in 130 countries .
It is produced in  अनेक  countries including India  ,  Ireland  ,   इटली  , the United Kingdom  और   the   संयुक्त  States .
Smirnoff products include vodka , flavoured vodka , and malt beverages .
In March  2006   ,  Diageo  उत्तर  America claimed that Smirnoff vodka was the best-selling distilled spirit brand in the world .
Big Brown ( foaled April 10 , 2005 in Kentucky ) is a  रिटायर्ड  champion American Thoroughbred racehorse and  विजेता   of  the 2008 Kentucky Derby and 2008 Preakness Stakes .
Bred by Dr. Gary B. Knapp 's Monticule Farms in Lexington , Kentucky , he won his first five race starts  .
He was sired by  ग्रेड   iii  winner Boundary , a son of North  अमरीकी  Champion sire Danzig , a son of Northern  नर्तकी   .

the  Serenity Prayer is  the  common name for an originally untitled prayer by the American  theologian  Reinhold  niebuhr  ( 1892–1971 ) .
It has been adopted by Alcoholics Anonymous and  अन्य  twelve-step programs .
The best-known form is : God , grant me the serenity to accept  the   बाते  I can not change,
the  courage to change  the  things I  can,
And wisdom to know the difference .
the  Declaration and Resolves of the  पहला   महाद्वीपीय  Congress ( also known as the Declaration of Colonial Rights ,  or  the Declaration of Rights ) , was a  बयान  adopted by the First  महाद्वीपीय   कॉंग्रेस  on October 14 , 1774 , in response to the Intolerable  अधिनियमों  passed by the British Parliament .
The Declaration outlined colonial objections to the Intolerable  अधिनियमों   ,  listed  a  colonial bill of rights , and provided a  विस्तृत  list of grievances .
It was similar to the Declaration  of  Rights  और  Grievances  ,  passed by the  स्टैम्प  Act Congress  a  decade earlier .
The Declaration  concluded  with an outline of Congress  's   योजनाएँ   :   to  enter into  a  boycott of British trade ( the  महाद्वीपीय  Association ) until  उनके  grievances were redressed  ,  to publish addresses  to   the  people  of   ग्रेट  Britain  और   अंग्रेजों  America , and  to  send a petition to the King .
Pulse pressure is the pressure that  is  felt  जब  feeling the pulse .
Measured in millimeters of  पारा  ( mmHg ) , the pressure difference between the systolic  और  diastolic pressures is  the  pressure change to create the pulse , which is the pulse pressure .
if   resting  blood pressure is ( systolic/diastolic ) 120/80 millimeters of  पारा  (  mmhg   )  , pulse pressure is 40  .
The  पहाड़ियाँ  is  a  reality television series which  originally  aired  on  MTV from May  31   ,  2006 until  जुलाई   13  ,  2010  .
The show  उपयोग  a reality television format , following the personal lives of several young adults living in  लॉस  Angeles , California  ,  but  tends  towards a narrative format more commonly found in scripted genres  ऐसे  as soap operas .
The  श्रेणी  originally followed the personal life of former  लगुना  Beach  स्टार  Lauren Conrad and her friends '  नई   जीवनदान  in Los Angeles .
After five seasons , Conrad  बाएँ  the  श्रेणी  and was replaced by another former Laguna  बीच  star , Kristin Cavallari , beginning in the  दूसरी  half of the fifth season  .
The series concluded at the end of the  छठे  season .
Entertainment Weekly ranked The Hills 82nd on their list of `` The 100 Best  shows  of  the  Last 25 Years , '' stating that the series was  a  `` New Classic .  ''
एओएल  TV called it TV 's Biggest Guilty Pleasure .
The series premiered in syndication in the  पतन  of  2009  alongside Laguna  बीच  :  the  Real Orange County .
In poker  ,   ख़राब  beat is a subjective term for  a  hand in  जिससे   a  player with what appear to be  दमदार   ताश  nevertheless loses .
It most often occurs where one  खिलाड़ी  bets the clearly stronger hand and their  प्रतिद्वन्दी  makes a  ग़रीब   कॉल  that eventually `` hits '' and wins .
There is no consensus among poker  खिलाड़ी  as to what exactly  constitutes  a bad beat and  प्रायः  players will disagree  परिचय   whether  a particular  हाथ  was  a  bad beat .
The goldfish ( Carassius auratus auratus ) is  a  freshwater fish in the family  cyprinidae  of order Cypriniformes  .
it  was one of the earliest fish to be domesticated , and is one of the most commonly kept  एक्वेरियम  fish .
A relatively  छोटी  member of  the  carp  परिवार  ( which also  शामिल  the koi carp  और  the crucian carp ) ,  the  goldfish is a  domesticated  version of  a   less-colorful  carp ( Carassius auratus )  देशी  to  ईस्ट   एशिया  .
It  थी   पहला  domesticated in China  अधिक  than a thousand years ago , and several distinct breeds have  चूंकि  been developed .
Goldfish breeds vary greatly in size , body shape  ,  fin configuration and coloration ( various combinations of  श्वेत   ,   पीला  ,  नारंगी  , red , brown , and  ब्लैक  are known  )  .
Uncooked  rouladen
Rouladen ( or Rinderroulade , singular :  roulade  ) is a German  मांस  roulade usually consisting of bacon ,  प्याज  , mustard and  अचार  wrapped in thinly  sliced   बीफ  which is then cooked .
In some countries , the  roulade  is also  ज्ञात  as  ``  beef  ज़ैतून   ''  .
Beef or veal is used as meat though  कुछ   खाना   विद्वानों   tend  to  मानना  that the original version was probably venison  or  pork , and pork is still popular in some areas  .
The  बीफ  rouladen as we know them  आज  have become popular over the last century  .
The cut is usually topside  बीफ  or silverside  चूंकि  this is the cheaper cut  .
the  more expensive version would  be  the round  स्टीक  , also known as rump steak .
The  मांस  is  काटें  into large , thin  स्लाइस  .
The filling is a  मिश्रण  of  स्मोक्ड  and cooked pork belly , chopped onions  और  chopped pickles  (  gurken ) which is at times varied by adding minced meat , sausage  मांस  , pine nuts and mustard  .
The mixture varies from region to region .
Rouladen are traditionally served for dinner .
रेड  wine is often served with this dish .
Typical eukaryotic cell .
Cellular respiration is the set of the metabolic  प्रतिक्रियाएँ  and  प्रक्रियाओं  that  लो  place in the cells of organisms to convert biochemical energy from nutrients into adenosine triphosphate ( ATP ) , and then release waste products .
the  reactions involved in respiration are catabolic reactions  ,   जिससे   ब्रेक   विशाल  molecules into smaller ones , releasing  उर्जा  in the  प्रक्रम   as  weak  so-called  `` high-energy  ''   bonds  are replaced by stronger  bonds  in the products .
Respiration is one of  the  key ways a cell  gains  useful energy to fuel  सेल्यूलर  activity .
Cellular respiration is considered an  ऊष्माक्षेपी  redox  प्रतिक्रिया  .
The overall reaction is broken  into  many smaller  ones  when  it  occurs in the  देह  , most of which are redox reactions themselves .
Although technically  ,  cellular respiration is a combustion reaction , it  clearly  does not resemble  एक  when  it  occurs in a living cell .
This difference is because it occurs in many  पृथक  steps .
जबकि  the overall  प्रतिक्रिया  is a combustion  प्रतिक्रिया  , no single reaction that comprises it is a combustion reaction .
nutrients   कि  are  commonly   प्रयुक्त  by animal  और  plant cells  in  respiration include sugar , amino acids and fatty acids ,  और  a  आम   oxidizing  agent ( electron acceptor ) is molecular  ऑक्सीजन  ( O2 ) .
The energy stored in ATP ( its  तीसरा   फास्फेट   समूह  is weakly bonded to the rest  of  the molecule and is cheaply broken  allowing  stronger bonds to form  ,  thereby transferring energy for use by the cell  )  can then be  प्रयुक्त  to drive processes requiring energy , including biosynthesis , locomotion or transportation  of  molecules across  कोशिका  membranes .
Countries by 2011 GDP ( nominal ) according to the CIA World  factbook  .
This article includes a list of countries in the  संसार  sorted by  उनके  gross domestic  उत्पाद  ( GDP )  ,  the  मार्केट   मान   of   सब  final goods and services from  a  nation  in   a  given  साल  .
The  जीडीपी  dollar estimates presented here  हैं   गणना  at market or government official  एक्सचेंज   दरों  .
Several economies which are not considered  to  be countries (  संसार  , the EU  ,  and some dependent territories ) are included in the lists because they appear in the  स्त्रोत  .
These economies are not  क्रमित  in  the  charts  यहाँ  , but are  सूचीबद्ध   जहाँ  applicable .
The figures  प्रस्तुत  here  do   नहीं  take into account differences in the  लागत  of living in different countries , and the results can vary  greatly  from one year to another  आधारित  on fluctuations in the exchange rates of the country 's currency .
Such fluctuations may change a country 's ranking  इससे  one  साल  to the next , even though they often make little or no difference to the standard of living of its population .
Therefore these figures should  be  used  साथ  caution .
Some countries/regions may have citizens which  हैं  on average wealthy .
These countries/regions  could   appear  in this list as having a  छोटी  GDP .
This would  be   क्युकी   the   country/region   सूचीबद्ध  has a small population  ,  and therefore small  कुल   अर्थव्यवस्था   ;  the  जीडीपी  is calculated  as   the  population times the  माल  per capita .
comparisons  of national wealth  हैं  also  अक्सर   बना  on the basis of purchasing power parity (  ppp   )  ,  to  adjust for differences in the cost of living  in  different countries .
( See List of countries by GDP (  ppp  ) )
PPP largely  removes  the exchange  रेट  problem , but has its own drawbacks ; it does not reflect the value of economic output in international  व्यापार  , and it also requires more estimation than nominal GDP .
On the whole  ,   ppp  per  capita   आंकड़े   हैं  more narrowly spread than nominal GDP per capita  आंकड़े  .
The first list  शामिल  data  compiled   by  the United Nations  आंकडे  Division for 2011 .
The second list largely includes data ( estimate ) compiled by the International Monetary Fund for 2012  .
The third list  shows  the World Bank 's mostly  2011  estimates , and the fourth list includes mostly 2012 estimates from the CIA World Factbook  .
Lapping  is  a  machining  process  ,  in  जिससे   दो  surfaces  हैं  rubbed together with  an   अक्खड़  between them ,  by  hand  गति  or by way of a machine .
This can take two forms .
The first type of lapping ( traditionally called grinding )  ,  typically involves  रगड़  a  भंगुर   सामग्री   ऐसे  as glass against  a   सतह  such as iron  or  glass itself ( also known as the `` lap  ''  or grinding  औजार  ) with an abrasive such as aluminum oxide , jeweller 's rouge , optician 's  रूज  , emery , silicon carbide , diamond ,  etc.  , in between them .
This produces microscopic conchoidal fractures as  the  abrasive rolls about between the two  सतहों  and  removes  material from both  .
The other  रूप  of lapping involves a softer material such as  पिच  or a ceramic for the  गोद  , which is ``  चार्ज  ''  साथ   the   अक्खड़  .
the  lap is  तब  used to cut  a  harder material—the  workpiece  .
The abrasive embeds within the  softer   सामग्री   जिससे  holds it and permits it to  स्कोर  across and cut the harder material .
Taken  to  a  महीन  limit , this will  उपज   a   polished  surface such as with a polishing cloth on an  ऑटोमोबाइल  , or a polishing  cloth  or polishing pitch upon glass  or  steel .
Taken  to   the   परम  limit , with  the  aid of accurate interferometry and specialized  पॉलिशिंग   मशीने  or skilled hand polishing , lensmakers can  उपज  surfaces  कि  are flat to better than 30 nanometers .
This is one  बीसवीं   of  the wavelength  of  light from the commonly used 632.8 nm helium neon laser light  सोर्स  .
सतहों  this flat can be molecularly bonded (  optically  contacted ) by bringing them together  अंतर्गत  the right conditions .
(  इस  is not the same  as  the wringing effect of Johansson  ब्लॉक  ,  हालांकि  it is similar ) .
The  पद  `` America  's  Team  ''  is a popular nickname in the United States that refers to the Dallas Cowboys in  the   नेशनल  Football League  .
The nickname originated with the team 's 1978 highlight film , where the  narrator  opens  साथ  the following introduction : The term is recognized and often used  by  media outlets  ,  including ESPN ,  याहू  ! , HBO Sports , and Sports Illustrated .
My Babysitter 's a Vampire ( French : Ma gardienne est  un  vampire ) is  a  2011  कनाडाई  television series  ,   आधारित  on the  टेलीविज़न  film  of  the same  नाम   .
In Canada  ,  the series premiered in French on Télétoon on February 28 , 2011 , in English on Teletoon on March 14 , 2011 , and on  डिज़्नी  Channel in the  संयुक्त  States  on  June 27 , 2011  .

The show follows Ethan Morgan ( Matthew Knight ) , who  ,  in  the  television film  ,  learns  कि   उसके  babysitter Sarah  (  Vanessa Morgan ) is a vampire .
in  the film , he learns he  is  able to have visions  और   उसके   बेहतरीन  friend  बेनी   वीयर  (  atticus  Mitchell  )  is a spellmaster .
the   श्रेणी  follows  the  three as they take  on  supernatural forces and  have  adventures , with occasional help from fellow vampires Rory  (   cameron   कैनेडी  ) and Erica ( Kate Todd  )   ,  while  dealing  with the troubles of  नियमित  high school  जीवन   .
a  second season was confirmed to start production in September 2011 and  it  first premiered on  डिज़्नी   चैनल  on June 29  ,   2012   ,  it premiered on Teletoon September 6 , 2012 .
