Dodge B Series utility circa  1950  , driven by Albert Namatjira
A pickup truck  or   pick-up  , often simply referred to  as   a  pickup , is a light motor  गाडी  with an open-top , rear cargo area ( bed )  .
In North America , the term  पिकअप  is used for  लाइट  trucks with a lighter duty chassis and factory  निर्मित  , integrated  bed  ,  as  well as  लिये  coupé utility vehicles  ,  often based  on  a personal car chassis , but also often on  a  special dedicated chassi for  ऐसे  use .
Some countries have their own terms similar to pickup , such as ute in  ऑस्ट्रेलिया  and New Zealand , or  bakkie  in  दक्षिण   अफ़्रीकी  .
विशाल   पिकअप   ट्रक  are somewhat rare in  यूरोपीय  ,  जहाँ  vans and light lorries are commonly  प्रयुक्त  for similar roles .
The President of the  संयुक्त  States of America  (  POTUS )  is  the  सिर  of state and head of government of the United States .
The president leads the executive branch of the federal government  और  is the  commander-in-chief  of the United  राज्य  Armed Forces  .
Article II of the U.S. Constitution vests the executive  शक्ति  of the United States in  the  president and charges him with the execution of federal  विधि  , alongside the responsibility of appointing federal executive , diplomatic , regulatory , and judicial officers , and concluding treaties with foreign powers , with the advice and consent  of  the Senate .
The president  is  further  सशक्त  to grant federal pardons  और  reprieves , and to convene and  adjourn  either  or  both houses of Congress under extraordinary circumstances .
Since the founding of the United States  ,  the power of the president  और  the federal government  have  grown  substantially  and each modern president , despite possessing no  औपचारिक  legislative powers beyond signing or  vetoing  congressionally passed bills ,  is  largely  जिम्मेदार  for dictating the  विधान   कार्यसूची  of his  पार्टी  and the foreign and domestic policy of the United States  .
The  अध्यक्ष  is frequently  वर्णित  as  the  most powerful person in the world .
the  president is indirectly elected by the people through the Electoral College  to  a four-year term , and is  एक  of only two nationally elected federal officers , the  अन्य   होने  the Vice President of the United  राज्य  .
the  Twenty-second Amendment , adopted in 1951 , prohibits anyone  इससे  ever being elected to the  प्रेसिडेंसी  for a third full term .
It  भी   prohibits  a person from being elected to the  प्रेसिडेंसी   अधिक   than  once if that person previously  था  served as president  ,  or acting president , for more  than  two years  of   another  person  's  term as president  .
In all , 43 individuals have  परोसा  55 four-year terms .
On January 20  ,  2009 ,  बराक  Obama became the 44th and current president .
On November 6  ,   2012  ,  he  was re-elected and is scheduled to serve until January 20 , 2017 .
बोतलबंद  mineral water
Bottled  जल  is drinking water ( e.g. ,  खूब  water , distilled water ,  खनिज  water  ,  or  वसन्त  water  )   packaged   in   प्लास्टिक  or glass water bottles .
Bottled water  may  be carbonated  or  not .
Sizes range from small single  सेवारत  bottles to large carboys for water  coolers  .
मैप  of the major rivers , lakes , and reservoirs in India
मैप  showing rivers and flood prone areas in India
Rivers of India play an important role in the lives of  the  Indian people .
The river systems provide irrigation , potable water  ,   सस्ती  transportation , electricity  ,  and  the  livelihoods for a  विशाल  number of  लोगों  all  over  the country and to rural areas .
इस  easily explains why  nearly  all the  प्रमुख  cities of India are located by the banks of  नदियाँ  .
The rivers also  have  an important role  in  Hindu mythology and are considered holy by all Hindus in the country  .
Seven major rivers along with  उनके  numerous tributaries make up  the  river system of India .
Most of  the  rivers pour their  waters  into the  खाड़ी  of Bengal  ;  however  ,  some of the rivers whose courses take them through the western part of the country and towards the east  of   the  state of Himachal Pradesh empty into the Arabian  समुद्र  .
Parts of Ladakh  ,  northern  भाग  of the Aravlli range and  the  arid parts of the Thar Desert  have   अंतर्देशीय  drainage .
Dr.Francis Buchanan surveyed the courses  of  the rivers of India  साथ  with their tributaries and branches in  1810-11   ad  and presented a  मिनट   खाता  of  it   .
The shifting of the courses and bed over the centuries is very  उल्लेखनीय   .
Many of the channels mentioned  in  that survey have now  become  dead , dried or even extinct .
All major  नदियाँ  of India originate  इससे  one of the three main  watersheds   :
The  हिमालय  and the Karakoram  सीमाएँ
Vindhya  और   satpura  ranges and Chotanagpur plateau in central India
Sahyadri or Western  ghats  in western India
The  bretton   वुड्स  system of monetary management established the rules for  वाणिज्यिक  and financial relations among the world  's  major industrial  राज्य   in  the mid-20th century .
The  bretton  Woods system was the first example of  a  fully negotiated monetary  अनुक्रम  intended to  govern  monetary  संबंध  among independent nation-states .
Preparing to rebuild the international economic system as World  युद्ध  II was still raging , 730  delegates   इससे  all 44  अलाइड   राष्ट्र   gathered  at the Mount Washington  होटल   in  Bretton Woods , New Hampshire , United States  ,  for the  संयुक्त  Nations Monetary and Financial Conference .
The delegates deliberated during 1–22 July 1944 , and signed the Agreement on its final  दिन  .
Setting up a system of rules , institutions  ,  and procedures to regulate the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  monetary system , the  planners   at  Bretton Woods established the International Monetary Fund (  imf  ) and the International  बैंको  for  पुनर्निर्माण   और  Development (  ibrd  ) , which today is  भाग   of  the World Bank Group  .
These organizations became operational in 1945  बाद  a sufficient number of countries had ratified the agreement .
The chief features  of  the Bretton Woods system were an obligation  लिये  each country to  अपनाना  a monetary policy that maintained the exchange  रेट  by tying its currency to the  u.S.  dollar and the ability of the IMF to bridge temporary imbalances of payments  .
On 15 August 1971 ,  the  United States unilaterally terminated convertibility  of   the  US $ to  सुनहरा  .
This brought the  bretton   वुड्स  system to an end and saw the dollar become fiat currency .
This action , referred to  as   the  Nixon  शॉक  , created the  हालात  in  जिससे  the United States  डालर  became a reserve currency  प्रयुक्त  by many states  .
at   the  same time  ,  many fixed currencies ( such as GBP , for  उदाहरण  )  ,  also  became  free  फ्लोटिंग  .
Ducati Motor Holding S.p.A. is an Italian company  कि  designs and  manufactures  motorcycles .
Headquartered in Bologna  ,   इटली  , Ducati is owned by Audi through its Italian  subsidiary  Lamborghini .
A credit score is a numerical expression based on a statistical analysis of a person  's  credit files , to represent the creditworthiness  of  that  व्यक्ति  .
A credit score is primarily based on credit report  सूचना  typically sourced from credit  bureaus  .
Lenders , such as banks and credit card companies , use credit scores to evaluate  the  potential risk  posed  by lending money to consumers  और  to mitigate  नुकसान  due to bad debt .
lenders  use credit scores  to  determine  जो  qualifies for a loan ,  at  what interest rate , and what credit limits  .
Lenders also use credit  स्कोर   to  determine  जिससे  customers are likely to bring in the most  आय  .
The use of  क्रेडिट   or  identity scoring prior to authorizing access  or  granting credit is an implementation of a trusted system .
Credit scoring is  नहीं  limited to  बैंको  .
Other organizations , such as mobile phone companies  ,  insurance companies , landlords  ,  and government departments employ the same techniques .
Credit scoring also has a lot of  ओवरलैप  with  आंकड़ा   खनन  ,  जिससे  uses many similar techniques  .
These techniques combine thousands of  कारकों  but  वे   हैं  more or less similar  or  the same  .
The seven SI base units and  the  interdependency of their definitions : for example , to  निकालें  the definition  of  the metre from the  गति  of light  ,  the definition of the second must be  ज्ञात   जबकि  the ampere and candela are both dependent on  the   परिभाषा  of energy which in turn is  पारिभाषित  in terms of  लंबाई  , mass and time .
the  International System of  इकाई  ( SI ) defines seven units of  माप  as a basic set from which all other  si  units are derived .
ये  SI base units and  उनके   शारीरिक  quantities are:
metre for length ( US  अंग्रेज़ी   :  meter )
kilogram  लिये  mass ( note : not the gram  )
second for time
ampere  for electric  वर्तमान
kelvin for temperature
candela for luminous intensity
mole  लिये   the  amount  of  substance  .
The SI base quantities form a set of mutually independent dimensions as required  by  dimensional analysis  commonly  employed in science and technology .
However , in a given realization of these units they  may   खूब  be interdependent , i.e . defined  in  terms  of  each other .
the   names  of SI units  हैं   लिखा  in lowercase characters  (  the 'degree Celsius ' meets this  नियम  ,  as  'degree ' is  the  unit  ,   और  'Celsius ' is a  modifier  )  .
The symbols of units  हैं  written  in  lowercase (  e.g   .  metre has the symbol m ) , except that symbols for units named after persons are written with an initial capital letter (  e.g.   ,  the hertz has the uppercase symbol Hz  )  .
Many other units , such  as   the  litre  (  US English : liter  )   ,  are formally  नहीं  part of the SI , but are accepted for  उपयोग  with SI .
Monument Canyon
Colorado National Monument  (  locally  referred  to as The Monument )  is  a part of the National  पार्क  Service near the city of  ग्रैंड  Junction ,  कोलोराडो  .
Spectacular  canyons  cut deep into  sandstone  and  भी   granite–gneiss–schist  rock formations  ,  in some areas .
इस   is  an area of  मरुस्थल  land high  on  the  कोलोराडो   पठार   ,   साथ  pinion and juniper forests  on  the plateau .
the  park hosts a wide range of wildlife , including red-tailed hawks and golden eagles  ,  ravens , jays ,  मरुस्थल  bighorn sheep , and coyotes  .
Activities include hiking , horseback riding , road bicycling , and scenic drives ; a visitor  बीच  on the  वेस्ट   पक्ष  contains a  प्राकृतिक  history museum  और  gift shop .
There are magnificent views from trails and  the   रिम   चट्टान  Drive , which winds along the plateau  .
Nearby are the Book Cliffs , and the  largest  flat-topped mountain in the world , the  ग्रैंड  Mesa  .
इसके  feature attraction is Monument  canyon  , which runs  the  width of  the   पार्क  , and  शामिल  rock  formations  such as Independence Monument , the Kissing Couple  ,   और  Coke Ovens .
The monument includes 20,500 acres ( 32 square miles ) , much  of  which has been  अनुशंसित   to   कॉंग्रेस  for designation  as  wilderness .
बाएँ  to right : Utility Uniform , Blue Dress  वर्दी   ,   सेवा  Uniform , and Evening  पोशाक  uniforms
The Uniforms  of  the United States Marine Corps serve  to  distinguish Marines  इससे   सदस्यों  of  अन्य  services .
Among current uniforms  in   the  United States Armed Forces  ,   the  Marines ' uniforms  have  been in service the longest .
the  Marine Dress Blue uniform has  ,  with few changes  ,  been worn in essentially its current form since the 19th century .
North American telephone area  कोड  419 and 567 serve the northwest quadrant of the U.S. state  of  Ohio  .
The largest city served by these  क्षेत्रफल   कोड  is Toledo ( and its suburbs of Holland , Maumee , Northwood , Oregon , Ottawa  पहाड़ियाँ  ,  perrysburg   ,  Rossford ,  sylvania  , Swanton ,  waterville  , and  whitehouse   )   .
Other cities served by these area codes include Ada , Ashland , Bellevue  ,   bluffton  , Bowling Green , Bryan ,  bucyrus  , Celina , Clyde ,  crestline  ,  defiance  , Delphos , Edison , Erastus , Findlay , Fostoria ,  fremont  , Galion , Kenton , Lima  ,  Mansfield , Mount Gilead , Napoleon ,  नॉरवॉक  , Oak Harbor , Port Clinton , Sandusky , Shelby  ,   st.   marys  ,  tiffin  ,  अपर  Sandusky , Van Wert ,  wapakoneta  ,  wauseon  ,  willard  .
Other areas served include the  झील   erie  Islands north of  बंदरगाहों  Clinton and west of Sandusky .
The main area code ,  419  , was created as  एक   of  the original  क्षेत्रफल  codes in October 1947 ; the  ओवरले  area  कोड  567  थी  created on January  1   ,   2002  .
Despite the presence  of  Toledo  ,   the  state 's fourth-largest city  ,  419 was the last of Ohio  's   असली  four area codes to have been  विभाजित  or overlaid  .
Mickey  लेरॉय  Gilley  (  born  कूच  9  ,  1936 ) is  an  American country music singer  और   संगीतकार   .
Although he started out singing straight-up  देश   और   पश्चिमी  material in  the  1970s ,  he  moved towards  a  more  पॉप  -friendly  ध्वनि   in  the  1980s   ,  bringing him further  कामयाबी  on not just  the  country charts , but the pop charts as  खूब  .
Among his biggest  हिट्स  are `` Room  पूरा  of Roses , '' `` Do n't the  लड़कियों  All  मिलेंगी  Prettier at Closing Time , '' and the remake of the Soul hit `` Stand by Me ``  .
He is also the cousin of Jerry Lee Lewis , Carl McVoy ,  जिम  Gilley and  jimmy  Swaggart .
According to the Federal Aviation  प्रशासन  , Gilley is a licensed pilot  ,  who holds an instrument  दरजा   साथ   वाणिज्यिक  pilot  privileges  for multi-engine airplanes , as  खूब  as private pilot  privileges  for  सिंगल  engine aircraft .
The September 11 attacks ( also  referred  to as  सितंबर  11 , September 11th , or 9/11 ) were a series of four coordinated terrorist attacks launched  by   the  Islamic terrorist group al-Qaeda upon the United  राज्य   in  New York  नगर  and the  वॉशिंगटन   ,  D.C.  क्षेत्रफल  on September 11 , 2001 .
Four passenger airliners were hijacked  by  19 al-Qaeda terrorists so  वे  could be flown into  इमारतें  in suicide attacks .
Two of those  planes  , American  एयरलाइंस  Flight 11 and United Airlines Flight 175 , were crashed  into  the North and South towers , respectively ,  of  the World Trade Center complex  in  New York City .
भीतर  two hours  ,  both towers collapsed with debris and  the  resulting fires  causing  partial  or  complete collapse of all other  इमारतें  in the WTC complex  ,   as  well as major damage to ten other  विशाल  surrounding structures .
A third plane , American  एयरलाइंस  Flight 77 ,  थी  crashed into the Pentagon ( the headquarters of the  संयुक्त  States Department of  रक्षा  ) ,  अग्रणी   to  a  आंशिक  collapse in its  पश्चिमी  side .
the   चौथी  plane  ,  United Airlines Flight 93 ,  थी   targeted  at  the  United States Capitol in  वॉशिंगटन  , D.C. , but crashed into a  फ़ील्ड  near Shanksville , Pennsylvania , after its passengers tried to overcome the hijackers .
In total , almost 3,000  लोगों   died  in  the  attacks , including the 227 civilians and 19 hijackers aboard the four planes .
Suspicion quickly fell on al-Qaeda .
Although the group 's leader , Osama bin Laden , initially denied any involvement , in  2004  he claimed  जिम्मेदारी  for the  हमले  .
Al-Qaeda and bin  लादेन  cited  u.S.  support of Israel ,  the  presence of U.S.  सैनिकों  in  सऊदी   अरब  , and  प्रतिबंधों  against Iraq as motives for the attacks .
The United States responded  to   the  attacks  by  launching the War on Terror and invading Afghanistan  to   depose  the Taliban , which had  harbored  al-Qaeda .
अनेक  countries strengthened their anti-terrorism legislation and expanded law  प्रवर्तन  powers .
Having  evaded  capture  लिये   सालो  , bin Laden  थी  located and  मारे  by U.S. forces in May 2011 .
The destruction of  the  Twin  मीनारें  and other  गुण  caused  गंभीर  damage to  the  economy of  निम्नतर  Manhattan and had  a  significant effect on  वैश्विक  markets .
Cleanup of the World Trade Center site was completed in  may  2002 ,  और  the  प्रस्तुतीकरण   थी  repaired within a year .
Numerous memorials have been constructed , including the National September 11 Memorial &  संग्रहालय   in  New York , the Pentagon Memorial , and  the  Flight 93 National Memorial  in  Pennsylvania .
After a  lengthy   विलंब  , the One World  व्यापार  Center is expected to be completed at Ground Zero  in  New  यॉर्क   नगर  in 2013  .
Finding Nemo  is  a 2003  अमरीकी   computer-animated   comedy-drama  adventure film written  और   निर्देशित  by Andrew Stanton ,  released   by  Walt Disney Pictures ,  और  the fifth  फिल्मी  produced by Pixar Animation Studios .
It  tells  the story of the over-protective clownfish named Marlin ( Albert Brooks ) who , along with a regal  तंग   नामित  Dory  (  Ellen DeGeneres  )  , searches  लिये  his abducted  बेटे  Nemo  (   सिकंदर  Gould  )  all the way to Sydney Harbour  .
Along the way  ,  Marlin learns to take risks and let Nemo take care of himself .
it  is Pixar 's first film to be released in  cinemas  in the  उत्तरी  hemisphere summer .
The  फिल्मी  was re-released for the first time in 3D on  सितंबर  14  ,  2012 , and it was  released  on Blu-ray on December 4 , 2012 .
A sequel , Finding Dory  ,  is currently in development , set  to  be  released  on November 25  ,  2015  .
The film received  सार्वभौमिक  critical acclaim and won the Academy Award for Best Animated Feature , and was nominated in three more categories including  बेहतरीन  Original Screenplay .
It  थी  the second highest-grossing film of 2003 , earning  a  total of $ 921 million  विश्वव्यापी   .
Finding  nemo  is  भी  the best-selling DVD of all time , with over 40 million copies sold as of 2006 ,  और   थी  the highest-grossing G-rated film of all time before Pixar 's  अपना  Toy Story  3   overtook  it .
It  is  also the 23rd highest-grossing film of all time , as well  as  the 3rd highest-grossing animated film .
In 2008 , the  अमरीकी  Film Institute named it the tenth greatest  एनिमेटेड  film ever  बना  during  उनके  Top 10 .
The sixth season of  अमेरिका  's Best  नृत्य  Crew  ,  also  ज्ञात  as America 's  बेहतरीन  Dance  क्रू   :  Season of the  सुपरस्टार  , premiered on April  7  , 2011 and concluded on June 5 , 2011 .
Auditions were  आयोजित   in  four cities  इससे   जनवरी  21 through February 5 : Chicago , Houston , New  यॉर्क  , and Los Angeles .
This season takes a different  रूट  from past seasons .
The crews must perform to the music of one  विशिष्ट  artist  प्रत्येक  week , including Rihanna , Lil Wayne , and other popular stars .
This season also features special guest appearances by various music  हस्तियाँ  including Justin Bieber , The  ब्लैक  Eyed Peas , Katy Perry , Kesha  ,  Nicki Minaj , and Kanye West .
डोमिनिक   ``   d-trix  '' Sandoval , a former  सदस्य  of Quest  क्रू  , the winner  of  the  तीसरा  season  of   अमेरिका  's Best  नृत्य  Crew  ,  joins  returning  judges Lil  मामा  and JC Chasez as  the  newest judge .
In the season finale , I aM mE  थी  declared the winner of Season  6  and received the  $  100,000 (  usd  ) prize  .
In the United States , Social Security refers to the  old-age   ,  Survivors , and Disability  बीमे  ( OASDI )  संघीय  program .
The original Social Security  अधिनियम  (  1935  ) and the  वर्तमान  version of the Act , as amended , encompass  अनेक  social  welfare   और  social insurance programs  .
Social Security is primarily  वित्तपोषित  through dedicated  payroll  taxes called Federal  बीमे  Contributions Act  कर  ( FICA ) .
कर   जमा  are formally entrusted to the  संघीय  Old-Age and Survivors Insurance Trust Fund , the Federal  विकलांगता   बीमे  Trust Fund  ,  the Federal Hospital Insurance Trust Fund  ,   or   the   संघीय   अनुपूरक  Medical Insurance Trust Fund which comprise the  सोशल  Security Trust Fund .
Upward redistribution of income  is  responsible for about  43  % of the projected Social  सुरक्षा  shortfall over  the  next 75 years  .
According  to  economist Martin Feldstein , the combined spending for all social insurance programs in 2003 constituted 37 % of  सरकारी  expenditure and 7 %  of   the   सकल  domestic product .
Social Security  is  currently  अनुमानित  to keep roughly 40 percent of all  अमेरिकी  age 65 or older out of poverty .
the   सोशल  Security Administration  is  headquartered  in  Woodlawn , Maryland  ,  just west of Baltimore .
The alcohol by  आवाज़  shown on a bottle of absinthe .
Alcohol by volume ( abbreviated  as  ABV  ,  abv  ,  or alc/vol )  is  a standard  माप   of   कैसा   much  alcohol ( ethanol ) is contained in an  alcoholic  beverage ( expressed as a percentage of total volume ) .
The  abv  standard is used worldwide .
in  some  देशों  , alcohol by volume is referred to as degrees Gay-Lussac ( after the French chemist Joseph Louis Gay-Lussac ) .
Laurel  खोखला  is  a  village  in  the Town  of  Oyster Bay  in  Nassau  काउंटी  , New  यॉर्क  in the United States .
the  population was 1,952 at  the   2010  census  .
Charles  जॉन  Huffam Dickens ( ; 7 February 1812  –  9 June 1870 ) was an  अंग्रेज़ी  writer and social critic .
He created some of  the   संसार  's most  यादगार   fictional  characters  और  is generally regarded as the greatest novelist  of  the Victorian  काल  .
During  उसके  life , his works enjoyed unprecedented fame  ,  and by the twentieth century his  साहित्यिक  genius  थी  broadly acknowledged by critics and scholars .
His novels  और  short stories  continue  to be widely popular  .
Born in Portsmouth  ,  England , Dickens left school to work  in  a factory after his father  थी   thrown  into debtors ' prison .
Although he had little formal education ,  उसके  early impoverishment drove  उसे  to succeed  .
Over  उसके  career he edited a weekly journal  लिये  20 years ,  लिखा  15  novels  , 5 novellas  और  hundreds of  छोटी  stories and  non-fiction   आलेख  , lectured and performed extensively ,  थी  an indefatigable  अक्षर  writer , and  campaigned  vigorously for children 's rights , education  ,   और  other social reforms  .
Dickens sprang to fame with  the  1836 serial publication of The Pickwick Papers .
Within a few years  he   था  become an international literary celebrity , famous for his humour , satire , and  keen   अवलोकन   of  character and society .
His novels , most published in monthly or weekly instalments , pioneered the serial publication of narrative fiction , which became the dominant Victorian  विधि  for novel publication  .
the   किस्त  format allowed Dickens  to  evaluate his audience 's reaction , and he often  परिवर्धित  his plot and character  विकास  based on  ऐसे  feedback .
For example , when  उसके   बीवी  's chiropodist expressed distress at  the  way Miss Mowcher in David Copperfield seemed  to   प्रतिबिंबित   उसके  disabilities  ,  Dickens  गई  on to  improve  the  अक्षर  with  धनात्मक  lineaments .
Fagin in Oliver Twist apparently mirrors  the  famous fence Ikey Solomon  ;  His caricature of Leigh Hunt in the figure  of  Mr Skimpole in Bleak House was likewise toned  bas  on  सलाह  from some of his friends , as they read  एपीसोड  .
In the same  अनोखा  , both  लॉरेंस  Boythorne  और   मूनी  the beadle are drawn from real life – Boythorne from Walter  जंगली  Landor and Mooney  इससे  'Looney ' , a beadle at  salisbury  Square .
His plots were carefully constructed  ,  and Dickens often wove in elements from topical events into his narratives .
Masses of the illiterate  ग़रीब  chipped in ha'pennies to  have  each  नई  monthly episode read to  उन्हें  , opening up and inspiring a new  क्लास  of readers  .
डिकेंस   थी  regarded as the literary colossus of  उसके  age .
His  1843   novella  , A Christmas Carol , is  एक  of  the  most influential works  कभी  written , and it remains  लोकप्रिय   और   continues  to inspire adaptations in every artistic genre .
उसके   रचनात्मक  genius has been praised by fellow writers—from Leo Tolstoy to G. K. Chesterton and George Orwell  —for  its realism , comedy ,  गद्य   स्टाइल   ,  unique  characterisations  , and social criticism .
On  the  other hand Oscar Wilde ,  हेनरी  James and Virginia Woolf complained  of  a lack of psychological depth  ,   ढीला  writing ,  और  a  रग  of saccharine sentimentalism  .
मार्टिन  Luther King  और  other civil rights leaders in  सामने  of the statue  of  Abraham Lincoln , August 28 , 1963
The civil rights movement was  a   श्रेणी  of worldwide political  आंदोलनों  for equality before the law that  peaked   in  the  1960s  .
In many situations it took the form  of  campaigns of  सिविल  resistance aimed at  achieving  change by nonviolent forms  of  resistance .
In some situations it was accompanied  ,  or followed , by civil unrest and armed rebellion  .
the  process was long and  tenuous  in many countries  ,  and  अनेक  of these movements did not fully achieve their goals  हालांकि  ,  the  efforts of these movements did  सीसे   to  improvements in the legal  अधिकारों  of previously oppressed groups  of  people .
The main aim of  the  civil rights movement included ,  और  include , ensuring  कि   the  rights of all people are equally  सुरक्षित  by  the  law , including the rights of minorities .
Civil rights movements ranging from the global  lgbt  rights  गति  to the global Women  's  rights movement  to   विभिन्न  racial minority rights movements around the world continue .
The 2010 FIFA World Cup was the 19th FIFA World Cup , the world championship  लिये  men 's national  संघ  football teams .
It took  प्लेस  in South  अफ़्रीकी  from 11 June to 11 July  2010  .
The  bidding   प्रक्रम  for  होस्टिंग  the tournament finals was open only to  अफ़्रीकी   राष्ट्र  ; in 2004  ,   the  international football federation , FIFA  ,  selected South Africa over Egypt  और  Morocco to become the  पहला  African  स्वदेश  to host the finals .
The matches were  निभाई  in ten stadiums in nine host cities  around  the country  ,  with  the   फाइनल  played at  the  Soccer  नगर  stadium  in  South Africa 's largest city , Johannesburg .
Thirty-two teams were selected  लिये  participation via  a   विश्वव्यापी  qualification tournament that began  in  August 2007 .
In  the  first round of the  टूर्नामेंट  finals , the teams competed in round-robin groups of four teams for points , with the top two teams in each group proceeding .
ये  sixteen teams  उन्नत  to the  नॉकआउट  stage , where three rounds  of  play decided which teams would participate  in  the  फाइनल  .
in   the  final ,  स्पेन  ,  the  European champions  ,  defeated third-time  finalists  the Netherlands 1–0 after extra time , with Andrés Iniesta 's goal in the 116th minute giving Spain  उनके  first world title , becoming  the   आठवीं  nation  to  win the tournament , and the first European nation to win  the  tournament outside its  घर  continent .
Host  स्वदेश  South Africa , 2006 world champions Italy and  2006  runners-up France  यहूद  all eliminated in the first round of  the  tournament .
It  थी   the   पहला   समय  that the hosts were eliminated in  the  first round .
नई   जीलैंड   साथ  their three draws  यहूद  the only undefeated  टोली   in  the tournament , but  यहूद   भी  eliminated in the  पहला  round .
The McMuffin is a  परिवार   of  breakfast  सैंडविच  in  विभिन्न  sizes and configurations , sold  by  the  fast-food  restaurant chain McDonald 's .
The Egg McMuffin is the signature breakfast  सैंडविच  ; it was invented by the late McDonald 's franchisee Herb Peterson in  the  late  1960s   और  was introduced  देशभर  in 1972 .
जॉन  Lennon  थी  an English  संगीतकार   जो  gained worldwide fame as one of the founders of  the  Beatles  ,  for his subsequent solo career ,  और  for  उसके  political  सक्रियता  and pacifism .
He was shot  by  Mark  दाउद  Chapman at the entrance of the building where  he   जिया   ,  The Dakota , in New  यॉर्क  City on 8  दिसम्बर   1980  .
Lennon had just returned from Record Plant  स्टुडियो   साथ  his wife , Yoko  ओनो  .
Lennon was pronounced dead on  आगमन  at St. Luke's-Roosevelt Hospital  बीच  , where it was stated  कि  nobody could have  जिया  for more than a few minutes after sustaining such injuries .
Shortly after local news  स्टेशन  reported Lennon 's death , crowds gathered at Roosevelt Hospital and in front of the Dakota  .
लेनन  was cremated on 10 December  1980  at  the  Ferncliff  कब्रिस्तान  in Hartsdale , New  यॉर्क  ; the ashes were given  to   ओनो  , who chose  नहीं  to hold a  अंत्येष्टि  for him .
the  first report of  लेनन  's death  to  a U.S. national audience was announced  by  Howard Cosell , on ABC 's Monday Night  फ़ुटबॉल  .
New Orleans  (  or ,  locally  or ; )  is  a major United States port  और  the largest city and metropolitan area  in  the  राज्य  of Louisiana .
The population of the city was 343,829 as of  the  2010 U.S. Census .
The New Orleans metropolitan area (  नई   orleans–metairie–kenner  Metropolitan Statistical Area ) had a population of 1,167,764 in 2010 and was  the  46th largest in the United States .
the  New Orleans–Metairie–Bogalusa Combined Statistical  क्षेत्रफल  , a  larger  trading area  ,   था  a 2010 population  of  1,214,932 .
The city  is  named  बाद  Orléans , a city located on the Loire River in Centre  ,   फ़्रांस  ,  और   is  well known for its distinct French Creole architecture , as  खूब   as  its cross-cultural and  बहुभाषी  heritage .
New Orleans is  भी  famous  लिये  its cuisine , music ( particularly as the birthplace of jazz )  ,   और   इसके  annual celebrations and festivals  ,  most notably Mardi Gras  .
The city is  प्रायः   referred  to as the `` most unique '' in America  .
New Orleans is located in southeastern Louisiana , straddling the Mississippi River  .
the   नगर  and Orleans Parish ( ) are .
The  नगर  and parish are bounded by the parishes of St. Tammany to the north , St. Bernard to  the   ईस्ट   ,  Plaquemines to the south and  जेफरसन  to the south and west  .
Lake  pontchartrain   ,  part of which is included in  the  city limits , lies  to  the north and Lake Borgne lies to the  ईस्ट  .
The  संयुक्त  States presidential  चुनाव   of  1968  थी  the 46th quadrennial presidential election , held on Tuesday , November  5  , 1968 .
The Republican nominee ,  पूर्व  Vice-President Richard  निक्सन  , won the  चुनाव  over the Democratic nominee , incumbent  vice-president   ह्यूबर्ट   humphrey  .
Nixon ran  on  a campaign  कि  promised to  restore  law  और  order  to   the  nation 's  शहरों  , torn by riots and crime .
Analysts have  argued   the   चुनाव  of 1968 is  a  realigning  चुनाव  as it permanently disrupted the New Deal Coalition that had dominated presidential politics for 36 years .
Coming four  सालो  after  डेमोक्रेट  Lyndon B. Johnson won in  a  historic landslide , the election saw the incumbent  अध्यक्ष  forced out  of  the race and a Republican elected for the first time  in  twelve  सालो   .
it  was a  विदारक  national  अनुभव   ,  conducted during a  साल  of violence that included the assassination of civil  अधिकारों  leader Martin  लूथर  King , Jr. , and subsequent  रेस  riots across the nation , the assasination of Democratic presidential  प्रत्याशी  Robert  F.  Kennedy , widespread opposition to  the  Vietnam War  आरपार   विश्वविद्यालयों  campuses , and violent confrontations between police and anti-war protesters at  the  1968  लोकतांत्रिक   नेशनल  Convention as the Democratic  पार्टी  split again and again  .
the   चुनाव  featured the strongest third party effort since 1912 by former  अलबामा  Governor George  वालेस   ,  a Democrat  .
क्युकी   वालेस  's campaign opposed federal intervention in the South to end school segregation , he carried the Deep South and ran well in ethnic  औद्योगिक  districts in  the  North .
This was the last  चुनाव  in which  नई  York  था  the most votes in the electoral  कॉलेज  ( 43 votes  )   .
After the  1970  census ,  कैलिफ़ोर्निया   gained  the  सबसे  electoral votes and has  remained  the most populous state since then .
This is the  नवीनतम  election where a presidential  टिकट  won without carrying the  वाइस  presidential candidate 's home state .
Karak ( ;  भी  known as Garak , Garrak ,  और   gorg  ) is a  गाँव  in Gamasiyab  ग्रामीण  District , in the Central District of Nahavand County ,  हमादान  Province ,  इरान   .
At the  2006  census , its population was  294  , in 65 families .

Kurt Donald Cobain  (   फ़रवरी  20  ,  1967  –  April 5 , 1994 )  थी  an American musician and artist , best  ज्ञात  as the lead singer ,  guitarist  and primary songwriter of the  grunge  band  निर्वाण  .
Cobain  formed  Nirvana with Krist Novoselic in Aberdeen , Washington in 1985  और  established it  as   भाग  of  the  Seattle music scene ,  having  its debut  एल्बम  Bleach released on  the  independent record label Sub  पॉप  in  1989  .
After  हस्ताक्षर  with  प्रमुख  label DGC Records , the  बैंड  found breakthrough success with ``  खुश्बू  Like Teen Spirit `` from its second album Nevermind ( 1991 ) .
following  the success of Nevermind , Nirvana  थी  labeled  ``  the flagship band ''  of  Generation X , and  कोबेन   hailed  as `` the spokesman of  a  generation  ''  .
Cobain  ,  however ,  थी  often uncomfortable and frustrated  ,  believing his message and artistic  दृष्टि  to have been misinterpreted  by  the public ,  साथ  his  निजी  issues  प्रायः  subject to media attention .
He challenged  निर्वाण  's audience with its final studio album  in   utero   (  1993  )  .
During the last  सालो  of his  जीवन  , Cobain struggled with heroin  व्यसन   ,  illness and  अवसाद  .
he  also had difficulty  coping  with his fame and public image , and the professional and  lifelong  personal pressures surrounding  खुद  and  उसके   बीवी   ,   संगीतकार  Courtney Love  .
On April 8  ,  1994 , Cobain was  मिला  dead at  उसके  home in Seattle ,  the  victim of what was officially ruled a suicide by a self-inflicted shotgun wound to the head  .
the  circumstances of his death at age 27 have become a topic of public fascination and debate .
Since their debut , Nirvana , with Cobain as a  songwriter  ,  रै  sold over 25  लाख  albums in the U.S. , and over 50 million worldwide .
A millwright is a craftsman  or  tradesman  सगाई  with  the  construction  और   मेंटेनेंस  of machinery .
अधिक  generally in the English  बोलना  world ,  जल्दी   millwrights  were specialist carpenters who  erected  machines used in agriculture  ,  food processing and processing lumber  और  paper .
In the early part  of  the Industrial Revolution , their skills were pressed into service building  the  earliest powered textile mills .
Modern  millwrights  work with steel and other  सामग्री  in  जोड  to  लकडी  and must often combine the skills of several skilled trades  in  order to successfully fabricate industrial machinery or  to  assemble  मशीने   इससे   pre-fabricated  parts .
The modern millwright must  भी  be able to read  blueprints  and other schematics to aid him in the construction of complex  प्रणालियों  .
Millwrights  हैं  frequently unionized , with around  45  %  unionized   in  the  us  , although experienced millwrights often set themselves up as independent  ठेकेदारों  .
The Adjustment Bureau is a  2011  American  रोमांटिक  action  थ्रिलर  film loosely based on  the  Philip K. Dick short story , `` Adjustment  टोली  `` .
the  film was written and directed by George Nolfi and stars Matt Damon  और  Emily Blunt .
the  cast also  शामिल  Anthony  mackie  , John  slattery  ,  माइकल  Kelly , and Terence Stamp .
The  स्कोर  was composed  by   थामस  Newman , with  दो  songs by Richard  ashcroft  ( `` Future 's Bright '' for  the  opening sequence ;  ``  Are You Ready ? '' for the closing credits ) .
सोडियम  azide is the inorganic compound with the formula NaN3  .
This  colorless  salt is the gas-forming  घटक  in many car  एयरबैग  systems  .
It is  प्रयुक्त  for the  तैयारी  of other azide compounds .
It is an ionic substance , is highly soluble in water , and  is  very acutely toxic  .
Double rainbow  और  supernumerary rainbows  on  the inside of the primary arc  .
The shadow of  the  photographer 's head on the  नीचे   marks  the centre of the rainbow circle ( antisolar point ) .
A rainbow  is  an optical  और  meteorological phenomenon that  is   caused  by reflection of light in water droplets in the  धरती  's atmosphere , resulting in a spectrum  of  light appearing in  the  sky .
It takes  the  form of a multicoloured arc  .
Rainbows caused by sunlight always appear in the  खण्ड   of  sky directly opposite the sun .
in  a `` primary rainbow ''  ,  the arc shows red  on   the  outer part and  बैंगनी  on the inner side .
This rainbow  is  caused by  लाइट  being refracted while entering a droplet of water , then  reflected  inside on the back of  the  droplet and  refracted  again when leaving it .
In  a  double rainbow , a second  चाप  is seen outside the primary arc , and has the  अनुक्रम  of its  रंग  reversed  ,  red  facing  toward the other one , in both rainbows  .
This second rainbow is caused by light reflecting twice inside water droplets .
the  Conservative  पार्टी  , officially the Conservative and Unionist Party  और   colloquially   referred  to as the Tory Party  or  the Tories , is a centre-right political  पार्टी  in the United Kingdom that espouses the philosophies  of  conservatism and British unionism  .
it is  the  largest  राजनैतिक  party in the United Kingdom , being the  largest  single party in  the  House of  कॉमन्स  with 303 MPs , the largest party in local government  साथ   9,391  councillors  ,  and the largest British  पार्टी  in  the  European Parliament  साथ   25  MEPs .
It governs in coalition with  the  Liberal Democrats ,  साथ   पार्टी  leader David Cameron  as  Prime Minister .
The  रूढ़िवादी   पार्टी  was founded in 1834 ,  और  was one of two dominant parties in  the  19th century ,  साथ  with  the  Liberal Party .
It changed its  नाम  to  the  Conservative and  यूनियनिस्ट  Party in 1912 after merging with the Liberal Unionist Party ,  हालांकि   कि  name is rarely used and it  is  generally  referred  to  as  simply the Conservative Party  .
In  the   1920s  , the  उदार  vote greatly diminished  और  the  श्रमिक  Party  became  the Conservatives '  प्रमुख  rivals .
Conservative Prime Ministers led  सरकारें  for 57 years of  the  20th century ,  सहित  Winston Churchill ( 1940–45 , 1951–55  )  and Margaret  थैचर   (   1979–90  ) .
Thatcher  's  tenure led to wide-ranging economic  उदारीकरण  and saw the Conservatives become the most eurosceptic of the  तीन  major parties .
The party was  लौटे  to government in coalition , having failed to win  a  majority , in 2010 under the  अधिक  `` liberal '' leadership of David Cameron .
In the European Parliament ,  the  Conservatives are the  largest  British party with  25  MEPs  ,  who sit with the soft eurosceptic European Conservatives and  reformists  (  ecr  ) parliamentary group , while the  पार्टी  itself is a member of  the  Alliance of European Conservatives  और  Reformists ( AECR  )  Europarty .
They  हैं  the third-largest party  in  the Scottish Parliament and second-largest in the Welsh Assembly .
They were formally allied to the Ulster  यूनियनिस्ट  Party ( UUP ) as  भाग  of the  ulster  Conservatives and Unionists arrangement , with the UUP currently participating in the five-party  उत्तरी  Ireland  कार्यपालिका  .
Destiny 's Child was an American R & B girl group whose final , and  शायद   सबसे   recognizable   ,  line-up comprised Beyoncé Knowles , Kelly Rowland and Michelle Williams  .
Formed in 1990 in Houston , Texas ,  नियति  's Child members began their musical  endeavors   as  Girl  's  Tyme comprising  ,  among others , Knowles , Rowland , LaTavia Roberson and LeToya Luckett .
After years of  सीमित  success , they  यहूद  signed to  कोलंबिया  Records as Destiny 's  चाइल्ड   .
Destiny 's Child  थी   शुभारम्भ  into mainstream  मान्यता  following the release  of  their  best-selling  second  एल्बम  , The Writing 's on  the  Wall , which contained  the  number-one singles `` Bills ,  बिल्स  ,  बिल्स  `` and `` Say  my  Name `` .
despite  critical and commercial success  ,   the  group was plagued by internal conflict and legal turmoil  ,  as Roberson and Luckett attempted to split from  the  group 's  मैनेजर  Mathew Knowles , citing favoritism of Knowles and Rowland ,  उसके   बेटी  and niece ,  क्रमशः  .
Both Roberson  और  Luckett  यहूद  soon replaced  साथ  Williams and Farrah Franklin  ;  however ,  in  2000 ,  फ्रैंकलिन  was  बर्खास्त  , leaving  उन्हें  as a trio .
Their  तीसरा  album , Survivor , which contains themes the public interpreted as a channel  to  the group 's experience , contains the worldwide hits `` Independent Women `` ,  ``  Survivor `` and  ``  Bootylicious `` .
In 2002 , they announced a hiatus  और   re-united  two years later for the release of their fourth studio album , Destiny  fulfilled  ( 2004 ) .
Destiny 's Child has sold  अधिक  than 50 million records worldwide to date .
Billboard magazine ranks  the  group  as  one  of  the greatest musical  trios   of  all time , the ninth  सबसे  successful artist/band of the 2000s , and  लगाई  the group 68th in its All-Time Hot 100 Artists  सूची  in 2008 .
The Centers for Disease Control  और   रोकथाम  ( CDC ) is a  संयुक्त   राज्य  federal agency under the Department of  स्वास्थ्य   और  Human Services headquartered  in  Druid Hills , unincorporated  dekalb  County , Georgia , in Greater  अटलांटा  .
It works  to  protect public health  और   सुरक्षा  by providing information to enhance health decisions  ,  and it promotes health through partnerships  साथ  state health departments and other organizations  .
The CDC focus  नेशनल  attention  on  developing and applying disease prevention and control (  विशेषकर  infectious diseases and  foodborne  pathogens and other microbial infections  )  , environmental  स्वास्थ्य  , occupational safety and health , health promotion , injury prevention and education activities designed  to  improve the health of  the  people of the United States .
The CDC  is   the  United States '  नेशनल  public health institute and is a founding member of the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Association of National Public Health Institutes  .
Earthquake prediction  ``  is usually defined as the specification of the time , location , and  परिमाण  of a future earthquake within stated  हद  '' , and particularly of `` the next strong earthquake to occur in  a  region . ''
इस   can  be distinguished  इससे  earthquake forecasting , which  is   the  probabilistic assessment of general earthquake hazard  ,  including the frequency and magnitude of damaging earthquakes , in a given area over periods  of  years or decades .
This  can  be further distinguished from real-time  भूकंप  warning systems , which  ,  upon  डिटेक्शन  of a severe  भूकंप  , can  provide  neighboring regions  a   few  seconds  चेतावनी   of  potentially significant shaking  .
to  be useful ,  an  earthquake  भविष्यवाणी  must  be  precise enough to warrant  the  cost of increased precautions , including  disruption  of ordinary activities and commerce , and timely  पर्याप्त  that preparation can  be  made .
पूर्वानुमान  must also be reliable ,  as  false alarms and cancelled  सचेतक   हैं   नहीं  only economically costly , but seriously undermine  विश्वास  in , and thereby the effectiveness of , any kind of warning .
With over 7,000 earthquakes  around   the  world each year with a magnitude of  4.0   or   वृहद  , trivial success in earthquake  भविष्यवाणी  is easily obtained using sufficiently broad parameters of time ,  स्थान  , or magnitude  .
However , such trivial  ``  successful predictions '' are not useful  .
Major earthquakes are often followed by  रिपोर्ट्स   कि  they  यहूद  predicted , or at  तनिक   anticipated  , but no claim of a successful prediction of  a  major earthquake has survived close  पूछताछ  .
In the 1970s there  थी  intense  आशावाद  amongst scientists  कि  some  विधि  of predicting earthquakes  might  be  मिला  , but by the 1990s  continuing  failure led many scientists to question whether  it  was even  संभावित   .
While many scientists still  थाम   कि  , given enough resources , prediction might be possible , many others maintain that earthquake prediction is inherently impossible .
Deborah  ऐन   ``  Debby '' Ryan ( born  may  13  ,  1993 )  is   an  American  अभिनेत्री  , singer , musician ,  songwriter  and record producer .
Ryan is  बेहतरीन  known for starring as Bailey Pickett in the  डिज़्नी  Channel Original Series  the  Suite  जीवन  on Deck  .
In 2008 , The Suite Life on  डेक   क्रमित  as TV 's  शीर्ष   श्रेणी  among kids 6-11  और  the No . 2 scripted series among tweens  9-14  .
Ryan started acting in  पेशेवर   थिएटर  at the  आयु   of  seven ;  in  2007  वो  appeared  in  the  बार्नी  & Friends straight-to-DVD film Barney : Let 's Go to the  फायरहाउस  and then  थी   खोजा  in a nationwide  ढूंढें  by  डिज़्नी   .
She is also known for appearing  in   the  2008 feature film  the  Longshots  as  Edith .
In 2009 , she guest starred in an episode of Wizards of  waverly  Place in Wizards on Deck with Hannah Montana as Bailey Pickett along  साथ  her other cast  mates  from The Suite Life on Deck .
तब  , in 2010 , she starred in the film 16 Wishes , which  थी   the   सबसे  watched cable  कार्यक्रम  on  the  day  of  its premiere on  the  Disney Channel .
16 Wishes introduced Ryan to new audiences ;  the  movie received high viewership  in  the  वयस्कों  demographic  (  18-34 ) .
Soon after that , Ryan starred in  the  independent theatrical  फिल्मी  , What If ... ,  जिससे   premiered   on  August 20 , 2010 .
रयान  also starred in the new Disney Channel Original movie  ,   रेडियो  Rebel , where she portrays the role of  tara  Adams , a shy 17-year-old girl  जो  adopts the  रेडियो  personality , Radio Rebel .
Released February  17  ,  2012  .
Ryan stars in the titular role in  the  Disney Channel Original Series , Jessie .
Stührling Tourbillon Movement  (  ) .
in   horology   ,  a tourbillon ( ; ``  whirlwind  '' ) is an addition to the mechanics of a watch escapement .
Developed around 1795 by the French-Swiss watchmaker Abraham-Louis  breguet  from an earlier idea by the  अंग्रेज़ी  chronometer maker John Arnold  ,  a  tourbillon   aims  to counter the effects of gravity by  mounting  the escapement  और  balance wheel in a rotating  पिंजरा  , to negate the effect of gravity when the timepiece (  यूँ   the  escapement ) is stuck  in   a  certain position  .
Originally an attempt to improve accuracy  ,  tourbillons are still  शामिल  in some expensive  आधुनिक  watches  as  a novelty  और  demonstration of watchmaking virtuosity .
the  mechanism is usually exposed on the watch 's face to show it  बंद  .
The Windows Installer (  previously   ज्ञात  as Microsoft  installer  ) is a software component  प्रयुक्त  for the installation , maintenance  ,  and  हटाना  of  तन्त्र  on  आधुनिक  Microsoft  खिड़कियाँ  systems .
The installation information  ,  and often the files themselves , are packaged  in   संस्थापना  packages , loosely relational databases  संरचित  as  com  Structured Storages  और  commonly known as `` MSI  फाइलें  '' , from  उनके  default  संचिका  extension .
Windows Installer contains significant changes from  इसके  predecessor ,  सेटअप  API .
New features include  a  GUI framework and automatic generation of the uninstallation sequence .
Windows Installer is  positioned  as an alternative to stand-alone executable  installer  frameworks such  as   पुरानी  versions  of  InstallShield and NSIS .
microsoft  encourages third  पार्टियों  to  उपयोग  Windows  installer  as the basis for installation frameworks  ,  so that  वे  synchronize correctly  साथ  other installers and keep the internal database of  संस्थापित  products  सतत  .
Important features such as rollback and versioning depend on a consistent internal database for reliable operation .
Furthermore , Windows  installer   facilitates  the principle of least  विशेषाधिकार  by performing software  संस्थापना  by proxy for  unprivileged  users .
चार   लोको  is a line  of  alcoholic  पेय  , originally marketed as energy drinks ,  बेची  by Phusion Projects of Chicago , Illinois .
Phusion operates  as   पेय  Four Brewing Company  .
चार  Loko , the company  's  most popular beverage , debuted in  the  United States market in 2005 .
It is now sold in 48  राज्य  , and in Canada ,  the  Bahamas , Bolivia , Honduras  ,  and Europe .
the  name ``  चार  '' is derived from the original  उर्जा  drink 's four main  संघटक  :  दारू  , caffeine , taurine  ,  and guarana .
Four branded  उत्पाद  have been the  ऑब्जेक्ट   of  legal , ethical , and  स्वास्थ्य  concerns related to  the  company allegedly marketing them to the  underaged  and  the  purported danger  of  combining  दारू   और  caffeine .
After the beverage was banned in several  राज्य   ,  a product  reintroduction  in  दिसम्बर  2010 removed caffeine  ,   taurine  , and guarana as  संघटक  , and the malt  पेय   is  no longer marketed as an energy  पेय  .
The neck of a guitar showing  the  nut ( in the  पृष्ठभूमि   ,  coloured white ) and first four metal frets .
a  fret is a raised element on the neck of  a   stringed  instrument .
Frets  प्रायः  extend  आरपार  the full width of  the  neck .
On  सबसे  modern western  fretted  instruments , frets are metal  स्ट्रिप्स  inserted into  the  fingerboard .
on  some historical instruments  और  non-European  यंत्र  , frets are  बना   of  pieces of string tied around the  गर्दन  .
Frets  divide  the  गर्दन  into  फिक्स्ड  segments at intervals related to a musical framework .
On instruments such as guitars , each fret represents  एक   semitone  in the standard western  प्रणाली  where one octave  is  divided  into  twelve semitones  .
Fret is often used as a verb , meaning simply  ``  to press down the  स्ट्रिंग  behind a fret . ''
Fretting  प्रायः  refers to  the  frets and/or their system of placement .
There was consumption of alcohol both during and after prohibition .
The  18th  Amendment prohibited  the  production  ,   वितरण  and sale of  alcoholic  beverages in the United States and was widely supported by the  अमरीकी  public when it went into effect in  1920  .
The  temperance   गति  had  popularized  the belief that alcohol was  the  major cause of  सबसे  personal  और   सोशल  problems and prohibition was seen as the  समाधान   to  the nation 's poverty , crime ,  हिंसा  , and other ills .
Upon  अनुसमर्थन  of the amendment , the famous evangelist Billy Sunday said  कि   ``   the  slums  होगा   जल्द  be only a memory .
We will turn our  जेलों   into  factories  और  our jails  into  storehouses and corncribs . ''
(   compare   christianity  and alcohol . )
चूंकि  alcohol was to be banned and since  it  was  देखी  as  the  cause of most  ,   if  not  सब  ,  अपराधों  , some communities sold their jails .
The nation  थी  highly optimistic and the leading prohibitionist in the United States  कॉंग्रेस   confidently  asserted that `` There is as much chance of repealing the  eighteenth  Amendment as there is for a hummingbird  to  fly to the planet Mars with  the   वॉशिंगटन  Monument tied to its tail.”
The metre (  मीटर   in  American English )  ,  ( SI unit symbol : m ; SI  आयाम  symbol : L ) ,  is  the fundamental unit of length in the International System of  इकाई  (  si  ) .
Originally  intended  to be one  ten-millionth  of the distance from the Earth 's equator  to  the North Pole  (  at sea level ) , its  परिभाषा  has  महरूम  periodically  परिष्कृत  to reflect growing knowledge  of  metrology .
चूंकि   1983  , it has  महरूम  defined as `` the length of the path  travelled  by light in vacuum  दौरान  a time  अंतराल  of  1/299,792,458  of a second . ''
geologists  exploring Jurassic sedimentary  रॉक्स  in Makhtesh  gadol  ,  negev   मरुस्थल   ,  Israel
Geologists explaining the  महत्व  of  volcanic  ash layers  to  students on field in Iceland
a  geologist is a scientist  जो  studies the solid and  द्रव   पदार्थ  that constitutes  the  Earth as well as the processes and history that has shaped it  .
Geologists usually engage in  अध्ययन   भूविज्ञान  .
Geologists , studying more of an  लागू  science than  a  theoretical one ,  जरूर  approach Geology using physics , chemistry  और  biology as well as  अन्य  sciences .
Geologists  ,   compared  to scientists engaged in other fields , are generally more exposed to the outdoors than staying in laboratories ; although some geologists  prefer  to perform  सबसे  of their studies in the lab .
Geologists are engaged in  खोजी  for mining companies in search of metals  ,   oils  , and other  धरती   संसाधन  .
They are also  in  the forefront of  प्राकृतिक  hazards and  आपदाओं  warning and  शमन  , studying earthquakes ,  volcanic  activity ,  tsunamis  , weather storms , and the  जैसे  ;  उनके  studies are used to warn the general  पब्लिक  of the occurrence of these events  .
Currently ,  geologists  are also engaged in the discussion of climate change  ,  as they study the  इतिहास  and evidence for this  धरती  process .

आधुनिक  vacuum tubes , mostly  miniature  style
in  electronics ,  a   वैक्यूम  tube , electron tube  (   in   उत्तर  America  )  , thermionic valve , tube ,  or  valve is  a  device controlling  इलेक्ट्रिक  current through a vacuum in a sealed  संग्राहक  .
The container is often  पतला  transparent glass in a roughly  बेलनाकार  shape .
The simplest vacuum  ट्यूब   ,  the  डायोड  , is  essentially  an incandescent light bulb with an added  एलेक्ट्रोड   अंदर   .
जब   the  bulb  's  filament is heated white-hot , electrons  हैं  `` boiled  ''  off its surface and into the vacuum inside  the  bulb  .
If the electrode --  पुकारा  a `` plate '' or `` anode  ''   --  is made more positive than the hot  फिलामेंट  ,  a  direct current flows through the vacuum to the electrode  (  a demonstration of  the  Edison effect ) .
As  the   वर्तमान  only flows in one  दिशा  , it makes it  संभावित   to  convert an alternating current applied to  the  filament to direct  वर्तमान  .
The introduction of a third electrode ,  a  grid between the  फिलामेंट  and the plate , yields another function  .
A  वोल्टेज  applied to the  ग्रिड  controls  the  current flowing from the filament to the  थाली  .
यूँ  , it  allows  the device to be used as an electronic  प्रवर्धक  .
Vacuum tubes are  यूँ  used  लिये  rectification , amplification , switching , or similar processing or creation  of  electrical signals  .
the   विशाल  majority of modern day tubes consist of a sealed container  साथ   a  vacuum inside  ,   और  essentially rely  on  thermionic emission  of   electrons  from a hot  फिलामेंट  or a  कैथोड  heated by the filament .
Some exceptions to this are dealt with  in  the section about gas-filled tubes below .
वैक्यूम   tubes  were critical to the  विकास   of  electronic technology ,  जिससे  drove the expansion and commercialization of radio broadcasting , television , radar , sound  reinforcement   ,  sound recording and  जनन  , large telephone networks , analog and digital computers , and  औद्योगिक   प्रक्रम  control .
Although  कुछ   अनुप्रयोग   था  counterparts  using   पहले  technologies  ऐसे  as the spark gap transmitter or mechanical computers  ,  it  थी   the  invention  of  the  वैक्यूम  tube with three  electrodes  ( called a triode ) and its  काबिलियत  of electronic  प्रवर्धन   कि  made these technologies widespread and practical  .
In most applications , solid-state devices  ऐसे  as transistors and  अन्य  semiconductor devices have  replaced  tubes .
Solid-state devices last longer  और  are smaller , more  कुशल  , more reliable ,  और  cheaper than tubes  .
tubes  can be fragile , sometimes generate significant unwanted heat , and can take many  seconds—many  minutes in critical  applications—after  powering  on  to  गरम   to   a  temperature where they perform within operational  सहिष्णुता   .
However , tubes still  ढूँढें  uses where solid-state  डिवाइस  have  नहीं  been  विकसित  , are impractical , or  जहाँ  a  ट्यूब  has superior  प्रदर्शन   ,  as with  कुछ  devices in professional audio and high-power radio transmitters .
tubes  are still produced for such applications .
tubes   हैं  less likely  than  semiconductor  डिवाइस  to be destroyed by  the   इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक  pulse  उत्पादित   by  nuclear explosions and  geomagnetic  storms  उत्पादित  by giant  सौर  flares .
skittles  is a brand of  fruit-flavoured  sweets , currently produced and marketed by the  wm  .  wrigley   jr.   कम्पनी  , a  प्रभाग  of Mars , Inc .
They have hard sugar shells which carry the letter S .
The inside  is  mainly  शुगर  , corn syrup , and hydrogenated  ताड़  kernel oil  साथ  with fruit juice , citric acid , and  प्राकृतिक  and  कृत्रिम  flavours .
the  confectionery has been sold in  a  variety  of  flavour collections , such  as   तीव्र  and Wild Berry .
Sir Winston  लियोनार्ड  Spencer-Churchill ,  (  30 November 1874 –  24  January 1965 )  थी  a British politician who was the Prime Minister of  the  United  किंगडम  from  1940  to 1945 and  again   इससे  1951 to 1955 .
Widely regarded as one of the greatest wartime leaders  of  the 20th century ,  चर्चिल  was also an officer  in  the British Army , a historian ,  a  writer , and an artist .
He is the only British Prime Minister  in  history  to  have received the Nobel  पुरस्कार  in Literature , and was also the first  व्यक्ति  to  be  made an Honorary Citizen  of  the United States  .
चर्चिल  was born into  an  aristocratic family as  the  grandson of the 7th Duke of  marlborough  .
His  पिता  ,  रब  Randolph Churchill ,  थी  a charismatic  राजनेता   जो   परोसा  as  चांसलर  of  the  Exchequer ; his mother ,  jennie  Jerome  ,  was an American  socialite  .
As a  यंग  army  अधिकारी  ,  he  saw action in British India , The Sudan , and the Second Boer  युद्ध   .
He gained fame as  a  war correspondent and wrote  किताबे  about his campaigns  .
At the  forefront  of politics for fifty years ,  he  held many political and cabinet positions  .
Before  the  First World  युद्ध  , he served as President of the Board of Trade ,  घर  Secretary , and  पहला  Lord of the Admiralty as part of the Asquith Liberal government .
During the war , he continued as  पहला  Lord of the Admiralty until the disastrous Gallipoli Campaign caused his  प्रस्थान   इससे  government .
He  तब  briefly resumed active  फौज  service on the Western Front as commander of  the   6th  Battalion of the Royal  स्कॉट्स  Fusiliers .
He  लौटे   to  government as Minister of Munitions , Secretary of State for War , and Secretary of State for Air .
After the War , Churchill served as Chancellor of the Exchequer in the Conservative ( Baldwin ) government of 1924–29 , controversially  returning  the  पाउंड  sterling  in  1925 to the gold standard at  इसके  pre-war  पैरिटी   ,  a move widely seen as creating  deflationary  pressure on  the  UK economy .
Also controversial was  उसके   विपक्ष  to increased home rule  लिये  India and his resistance to the 1936 abdication of Edward VIII .
Out of office and politically `` in the  wilderness  '' during the 1930s , Churchill took the  सीसे   in  warning  परिचय  Nazi Germany and  in   campaigning   लिये  rearmament .
On the outbreak  of   the  Second World War  ,   he  was again appointed First  रब  of the Admiralty  .
Following  the   इस्तीफा  of Neville Chamberlain  on  10 May 1940 ,  चर्चिल  became Prime Minister  .
उसके  steadfast refusal to consider  शिकस्त  , surrender  ,  or a compromise  सलाम  helped  inspire  British resistance ,  विशेषकर   दौरान  the  मुश्किल  early days of the War  जब  Britain stood  अलोन   among  European countries in its active opposition to  एडोल्फ   हिटलर  .
Churchill was  विशेषकर  noted  लिये  his speeches and  रेडियो  broadcasts , which helped inspire the British people .
he  led Britain as Prime Minister until victory  over  Nazi Germany had been secured  .
After the Conservative  पार्टी  lost the 1945 election , he became Leader of the Opposition to  the  Labour ( Attlee ) government  .
बाद  winning  the  1951  चुनाव  , he again became Prime Minister  ,  before  retiring   in  1955 .
Upon his death ,  एलिज़ाबेथ  II granted him the honour of  a  state  अंत्येष्टि  ,  जिससे  saw one  of   the   largest  assemblies of  संसार  statesmen in history .
Named the Greatest  briton  of all time in  a  2002 poll , Churchill is widely regarded  as  being among the most influential  लोगों  in British history .
Ruby  gloom   is   an  animated  टेलीविज़न  show based  on   an   वस्त्र  franchise .
The show is produced  by  Nelvana and began airing  on   अक्तूबर  13 , 2006 in Canada  on  the  संजाल  YTV .

The Ford  फ़ोकस   is   a  compact car  (  C-segment in Europe  )  manufactured  by  the Ford Motor Company since 1998 .
Ford  began  sales of the Focus to Europe in July 1998 and  in  North America during 1999 for the 2000 model year .
In Europe  ,  South America , North  अमेरिका  and South Africa  ,   the  Focus  replaced  the various versions of the Ford Escort  बेची  in  those  markets .
in   एशिया   और  Australasia ,  it   replaced  the Ford Laser .
As of  the  first half of 2012 , the Focus surpassed the Toyota  कोरोला  to  become  the world 's best  selling   ऑटोमोबाइल  nameplate .
the  Focus has been  माना  one  of  the  50   महानतम  cars of  the  past fifty years by British magazine CAR .
An agar plate --  an   उदाहरण  of a bacterial growth  मीडियम  .
Specifically ,  it  is a streak plate ;  the  orange lines and dots are formed by bacterial colonies .
A growth medium or  संस्कृति  medium is a liquid or  gel  designed  to  support the growth of microorganisms  or  cells  ,  or  छोटी  plants like the moss Physcomitrella patens .
वहीँ  are different types of media for growing  अलग  types of cells .
There are two major  प्रकार  of growth  मीडिया  : those  प्रयुक्त  for cell culture , which use specific cell types derived from plants or animals  ,   और  microbiological  संस्कृति   ,   जिससे  are  प्रयुक्त  for growing  microorganisms  , such as bacteria or  खमीर   .
The most common growth media for  microorganisms  are nutrient broths and agar  प्लेटों  ; specialized media are sometimes required for microorganism and cell culture growth .
कुछ  organisms , termed fastidious organisms ,  आवश्यकता  specialized environments due to  जटिल  nutritional requirements .
Viruses , for example , are obligate intracellular parasites and require a growth medium containing living cells .
A talent  एजेंट  , or booking agent , is  a  person who finds jobs for  अभिनेताओं  , authors  ,  film directors , musicians , models , producers , professional athletes , writers and other people in  विभिन्न  entertainment businesses  .
An agent also  defends   ,  supports and promotes the  ब्याज  of his/her clients .
Agents can not produce their own shows  due  to conflict of interest .
A talent agent  जरूर  be  परिचित   साथ  their clients .
An agent has  to   जान  what kind  of  work the client  can  and  can  not do in  अनुक्रम  to match  उन्हें  with various  कार्य   .
Having an agent is  नहीं  required , but does help the artist in getting jobs  .
In  अनेक   मामले  casting directors , or other businesses  ,  go to talent agencies  to   ढूँढें  artists they  हैं  looking for .
The agent is paid a  प्रतिशत  of  the   स्टार  's earnings ( typically  10  % ) .
Agents sometimes  होगा  be referred  to  as `` 10 percenters . ''
There are different regulations that govern different  प्रकार  of agents  कि  are  स्थापित  by artist 's unions  और   the   विधिक  jurisdiction in which  the  agent operates .
There  हैं  also professional organizations that license talent  एजेंसियों  .
Since the decline in viewership  in  theaters , from  the  1950s to 1960s , this caused  a  monumental shift in how studios  होता  produce films and  यूँ  reducing the cost of exclusive  और  expensive actors .
Actors and actresses were working  लिये   the  studios  लकिन  were not owned by  एक  major  स्टुडियो  entity and  so  were able  to  work on within their time and  साथ  other studios .
Because  of  this  ,  agents were  अभी  seen as a necessity  बजाय  of an option .
एजेंटों  now became  तीसरा  parties that negotiated between studios and clients  ,  this making their  सेवाएं   imperative  between each  पार्टी  .
चूंकि  talent agencies are working  साथ  lucrative  अनुबंध  , all talent agencies must be licensed under special sections of the California Labor Code , which calls  an  agent a `` person or corporation who engages in the occupation of  procuring  ,  offering  ,  होनहार  , or attempting to procure employment for artist or artists . ''
Mars has two known moons , Phobos  और  Deimos , which are thought to be captured asteroids  .
दोनो   satellites  were discovered in 1877 by Asaph  हॉल  and are named after the  वर्ण   phobos  ( panic/fear )  और  Deimos ( terror/dread )  जो  , in  यूनानी  mythology , accompanied  उनके   पिता  Ares ,  परमेश्वर  of war , into battle .
Ares  थी  known as Mars to the Romans .
it  is possible that Mars may have moons  छोटी   than  50  -  100 meters  और  a dust  रिंग  between  phobos  and Deimos  may  be present but none have  महरूम  discovered .
In law enforcement parlance , the term murder  किताब  refers to the case file  of  a murder investigation .
Typically ,  हत्या  books include crime scene photographs and  sketches  ,  पोस्टमार्टम  and forensic reports , transcripts  of  investigators ' notes  और  witness interviews .
The murder book encapsulates the  पूरा  paper trail  of   a  murder investigation , from the time  the   हत्या  is first reported through  the  arrest of a suspect .
विधि  enforcement agencies  typically  guard  हत्या  books carefully  ,  and it is unusual for civilians to  be   दिए  unfettered access to these kinds of records , especially  लिये  unsolved cases  .
A melon baller
Melon  गेंदें  are balls of  melon  made using a melon baller  कि  varies  इससे  around 1 centimeter to 3  सेंटीमीटर   (  about 3/8 inch to 1 inch ) .
They are generally used in  फल  salad .
A KSA , or Knowledge ,  कौशल  ,  और  Abilities , is a series  of  narrative statements that are required when applying to  संयुक्त   राज्य  Federal government job openings .
KSAs are  प्रयुक्त  to  determine  ,  साथ  with  resumes  , who the best  आवेदकों  are  जब  several candidates  qualify  for a  जॉब  .
The knowledge , skills and abilities ( KSAs ) necessary for  the  successful performance of a position are contained on each  जॉब  vacancy announcement  .
In 2009 the Office of  निजी   प्रबन्धन  asked federal agencies  to   रोकें  requiring job applicants to fill  आउट  the questionnaires , to  be   phased  out  भीतर  a year .
ksas  are brief  और  focused essays about one 's career and educational  पृष्ठभूमि  that presumably qualify one to perform  the  duties of the position  होने  applied for .
A knowledge ,  कौशल  , and abilities ( KSA ) is a concise essay  परिचय  one  's  talent and expertise  और   सम्बन्धित  experiences ( work , education  ,  volunteer ) and accomplishments .
A series of KSA statements are usually required when applying for most federal government and  कुछ  state and  नगर  government jobs .
ksas  are used as a yardstick to assess the capabilities  of  a prospective applicant in terms of likely ability  to   perform  the duties of the job .
Most government hiring officials look for a short , crisp and  साफ  KSA  कि  emphasizes results  or  accomplishments  प्राप्त  in previous  कार्य  .
KSA statements are also known as  मूल्यांकन  Factors .
Other agencies sometimes call them `` Rating Factors '' , `` Quality Ranking  कारकों  '' , `` Knowledge  ,  Abilities ,  कौशल  and Other Characteristics  ''  , or `` Job Elements '' .
The name  can  be just  a  name but often it influences content  और  length of the essay .
Every agency has its own regulations  लकिन  most of the time the each KSA factor should be 1/2 to  11⁄2  pages long .
The below definitions are defined by  the  U.S. Office of Personnel Management  :
Knowledge , Skills , and Abilities ( KSAs ) -  the   गुण  required to  perform   a  job and are generally demonstrated through qualifying service , education , or training .
ज्ञान  - Is a body of information applied directly to the  प्रदर्शन  of  a  function .
Skill - Is an observable competence to perform a learned psychomotor act .
Ability -  is  competence to perform  an  observable behavior or  a   बर्ताव  that results in an observable product  .
The scoring of KSA essays is based on a scale of from one to 100 .
Job applicants must  स्कोर  above 70 to be considered  लिये   the  position .
High scores are derived through answering the KSA question as specifically as possible ,  providing  examples from previous employment or training that clearly demonstrate you meet  the  qualifications  .
When applying to  संघीय   सरकारी  positions ,  a  Federal  पुनरारंभ  is usually required in addition to  ksa  statements  .

प्रेम  Always is the  डेब्यू  album  of  American  r  &  b   duo   k-ci  & JoJo  ,  released on June  17  , 1997 , by MCA Records .
it  was recorded  at   विभिन्न  studios in New  यॉर्क  and the Los Angeles area in 1996 and 1997 .
It was produced by JoJo and  अनेक  others  ,  including DeVante Swing  ,  James Mtume , and Jeff  redd  .
The  duo   यहूद  originally a part  of  Jodeci  पहले  this album  .
The album peaked at sixth on  the  US Billboard 200  और  also appeared on international  चार्ट   .
The single ``  सब  My Life `` charted number one in multiple  देशों  , and  सब  four  of  the  एल्बम  's singles  peaked  above the top  25  in  the  US Hot R & B/Hip-Hop Songs and the New Zealand Top 40  singles  .
Love Always was received favorably by critics , who praised  the   भाइयो  ' singing ability and the production  .
The album  रै  been certified three times platinum by the  रिकॉर्डिंग  Industry Association of America ( RIAA ) and  सुनहरा   by  Music Canada  और  IFPI Sweden .
As of June 1999 it had sold 2.9 million copies in the United States .
A variable-rate  बंधक  , adjustable-rate mortgage ( ARM  )  ,  or  tracker mortgage is  a  mortgage loan with the interest  रेट  on the note periodically  समायोजित  based on an index  जिससे  reflects the cost  to  the lender of borrowing on the credit markets .
the   ऋण  may be offered at the lender 's standard variable rate/ base rate .
वहीँ  may  be  a direct and legally-defined link  to  the underlying  अनुक्रमणिका  , but  जहाँ  the lender offers  no   विशिष्ट  link to the underlying market or index the  रेट  can be changed at  the  lender 's discretion .
The term `` variable-rate mortgage '' is most common outside the United States , whilst in the United States  ,  `` adjustable-rate mortgage '' is  सबसे  common , and implies  a  mortgage regulated by  the  Federal government , with caps on charges .
In many countries , adjustable rate mortgages are the norm  ,  and in such places  ,  may simply  be  referred to  as  mortgages .
Among the most common indices  हैं  the rates on 1-year constant-maturity  राजकोष   (  CMT ) securities , the Cost of  निधि  Index  (  COFI ) ,  और  the  लंदन  Interbank  offered  Rate ( LIBOR ) .
a  few lenders use their own cost  of  funds  as   an  index , rather than using other indices .
This is done  to  ensure  a  steady margin for the  lender  , whose  अपना  cost  of   funding  will  प्रायः   be  related to  the  index  .
Consequently , payments  बना  by the borrower may change over time with the changing  ब्याज   रेट  ( alternatively , the term of the loan may change ) .
This is distinct  इससे  the graduated payment mortgage , which offers changing payment  amounts   लकिन  a fixed  ब्याज  rate .
Other forms of mortgage loan include the  ब्याज  only mortgage , the fixed rate mortgage  ,  the negative  amortization  mortgage , and  the  balloon payment mortgage  .
Adjustable rates transfer  भाग  of the interest rate  रिस्क  from the  lender  to the borrower .
They can be used where unpredictable interest rates make fixed  रेट  loans difficult to obtain .
The borrower benefits  if  the interest rate falls but loses if  the  interest  रेट  increases .
The borrower benefits from reduced margins to the underlying cost of borrowing compared to fixed or capped  रेट  mortgages .
The assassination of Robert Francis `` Bobby '' Kennedy  ,  a United States Senator and brother of assassinated  अध्यक्ष  John Fitzgerald `` Jack ''  कैनेडी  , took place  shortly  after midnight on June 5 , 1968 , in  लॉस  Angeles  ,   कैलिफ़ोर्निया  , during the campaign season for  the   संयुक्त  States Presidential election  ,   1968  .
After winning the California and South Dakota primary elections for  the  Democratic nomination for President of the United  राज्य  , Kennedy was  शॉट  as he walked  through  the kitchen of the Ambassador Hotel and  died  in the Good Samaritan Hospital twenty-six hours  बाद   .
Sirhan Sirhan  ,  a 24-year-old Palestinian / Jordanian immigrant , was convicted of Kennedy 's murder and  is  serving a  जीवन   वाक्य  for  the  crime .
Sirhan 's lawyers have released statements claiming  प्रमाण  that he was  framed  .
The shooting was recorded on audio  टेप  by a freelance  समाचारपत्र  reporter , and  the  aftermath  थी  captured on film .
Kennedy  's  body lay in repose at St.  पैट्रिक  's Cathedral in New York for two days before  a  funeral mass was  आयोजित   on  June 8 .
उसके  body was interred  निकट   उसके  brother John at Arlington National Cemetery .
उसके  death prompted the protection of presidential candidates by the  संयुक्त  States Secret  सेवा  .
Hubert  humphrey  went on to win the Democratic nomination for the presidency ,  लकिन  ultimately narrowly lost  the  election to  रिचर्ड  Nixon .
As with his brother Jack 's death , Bobby 's  हत्या  and the circumstances surrounding  it  have spawned  a   किस्में   of  conspiracy theories .
As of 2013 Kennedy remains one  of  only two sitting United  राज्य   सीनेटरों  to  be   assassinated  ( the other being Huey Long  )  .
The Modern Age of Comic Books is an informal name for the period in the history of mainstream American comic books generally considered to last  इससे  the mid-1980s until present day .
In this period , comic book characters  generally  became  गहरा  and more psychologically complex ,  creators  became better-known and active  in  changing the industry , independent comics flourished , and larger publishing houses became more commercialized .
an   वैकल्पिक   नाम  for this period is the Dark  आयु  of Comic Books  ,  due to  the   लोकप्रियता  and artistic influence of grim titles ,  ऐसे  as and Watchmen .
When Harry Met Sally  ...   is  a 1989 American romantic comedy film written by Nora  ephron   और  directed by  रोब  Reiner .
It stars Billy Crystal as Harry and  मेग  Ryan as Sally .
The story follows the title characters  इससे   the  time  वे  meet just before sharing a cross-country drive ,  through  twelve  सालो  or so of  मौका  encounters in New York  नगर  .
The  फिल्मी   उठाता  the question `` Can men and  महिलाओं  ever just be friends ?  ''  and advances many ideas about relationships that  became  household concepts , such  as  those of the `` '' girlfriend  और  the ``  transitional   व्यक्ति  '' .
The origins of the film came from Reiner  's  return to single life after a divorce .
An  इंटरव्यू  Ephron conducted with Reiner provided  the   आधार  for Harry .
Sally was based on Ephron and some of  उसके  friends .
Crystal came on board and made his own contributions to the screenplay , making Harry funnier .
Ephron supplied  the  structure of the film with much of the dialogue  आधारित  on  the  real-life friendship between Reiner  और  Crystal .
The soundtrack  consists  of standards  performed  by Harry Connick , Jr. , with a big  बैंड  and orchestra  arranged  by Marc Shaiman .
connick   जीती   उसके  first Grammy  पुरस्कार  for Best Jazz Male Vocal Performance  .
कोलंबिया  Pictures released the  फिल्मी   using  the `` platform  ''  technique , which involved opening it in  a  few select cities , letting positive word  of  mouth generate interest  ,  and then gradually expanding distribution over  subsequent  weeks  .
When Harry Met Sally ... grossed a total of US $  92  .8 million in North  अमेरिका  .
Ephron received a British Academy Film Award , an Oscar nomination  ,  and  a  Writers Guild of  अमेरिका  Award nomination for her screenplay  .
The film is ranked 23rd on AFI 's 100 Years ...  100  Laughs list of the top  कॉमेडी  films in American cinema and number 60 on  ब्रावो  's  ``  100 Funniest  फिल्मों  '' .
In early  2004   ,  the film  थी  adapted for the stage in a production starring Luke Perry and Alyson  हनिंगन  .

Hamburger Helper is a line of packaged  खाना   उत्पाद  primarily consisting of boxed pasta bundled with a packet  or  packets of  powdered  sauce or seasonings  .
The contents of each  बक्सा  are combined with browned  मैदान  beef , water and milk to create a complete dish .
The product line also features products  साथ  other starches such as  राइस  or potatoes instead  of   पास्ता   .
It is made by General Mills  .
Although the classic boxed Hamburger Helper products only supply the starch item and the sauce packets ,  कुछ  varieties of the product include ground beef .
These include a frozen food line , which features  कुछ  of the  ब्रांड  's classic varieties in a complete  भोजन  kit form , with frozen  मैदान  beef and  frozen  sauce packaged separately from the noodles in  the  same bag .
There is  भी  an ``  तत्काल  '' version of  हैमबर्गर  Helper  containing  dehydrated  मांस  ,  नूडल्स  and seasonings  in  a small pouch , requiring only water to be added .
The Hamburger Helper  शुभंकर  is the `` Helping Hand '' , an anthropomorphic animated , four fingered left-hand glove , which appears in the product 's television commercials  और   on  the packages .
