A dwarf planet is a planetary-mass object  कि  is neither a planet nor a satellite .
More explicitly , the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Astronomical Union  (  IAU ) defines a dwarf planet as a celestial body in direct  कक्षा  of the Sun  कि   is  massive enough for its shape  to  be controlled by gravitation , but that  नापसंद  a planet has not cleared its orbital region  of  other objects .
the  term dwarf planet was adopted in 2006 as part of  a  three-way categorization of bodies  orbiting   the  Sun , brought about by an increase in discoveries of trans-Neptunian objects that  rivaled  Pluto in size ,  और  finally precipitated by the discovery of an even  अधिक   विशाल  object , Eris .
This  वर्गीकरण  states that bodies large  पर्याप्त  to have cleared  the  neighbourhood of their orbit are defined  as  planets , while those  कि  are not massive enough to be  rounded  by their own gravity  हैं  defined as small Solar  प्रणाली  bodies .
बौना  planets  आइये   in  between .
The exclusion  of  dwarf planets from the roster of planets  by  the IAU  रै  been both praised  और  criticized  ;  it was  कहा  to be  the  `` right decision  ''   by  Mike Brown , who discovered and other new dwarf planets , but has been rejected by  एलन  Stern , who had coined the term  बौना  planet in 1990  .
the  IAU currently recognizes  पाँच  dwarf planets in the Solar System : , Pluto , , , and .
however  ,  तभी  two of  ये   लाशें  ,  ceres  and Pluto  ,  have  महरूम  observed in enough detail  to  demonstrate  कि  they  अनुरूप   the  definition .
Eris has  महरूम  accepted  as  a dwarf planet because it is more massive than Pluto .
The IAU subsequently decided that unnamed  trans-neptunian  objects with an absolute  परिमाण  brighter  than  +1 ( and hence a diameter of  ≥838  km  assuming  a geometric albedo of ≤1  )  are to be named under the assumption that  वे  are dwarf planets .
The only two such objects known at the  समय  , Makemake and Haumea , went through  इस  naming  कार्यविधि   और  were  घोषित  to  be  dwarf planets .
It is suspected  कि  another hundred or so known  वस्तुएँ  in the Solar System are dwarf planets .
Estimates are that  up  to 200 dwarf planets may  be   मिला   जब   the  entire region known as the Kuiper belt is  छान  , and that the  क्रमांक  may exceed 10,000 when  वस्तुएँ  scattered outside the Kuiper belt are considered  .
Individual astronomers recognize several of these , and in August  2011   माइक  Brown published a list of 390 candidate objects , ranging from `` nearly certain  ''  to `` possible '' dwarf planets .  '
Brown identifies nine known objects – the  पाँच  accepted by the IAU plus ,  ,   ,  and – as ``  वस्तुतः   निश्चित  '' , with  another  two dozen highly likely  ,  and there  हैं  probably a  सौ   or   so  such objects in total .
the  classification of bodies  in  other planetary systems with the  विशेषताएँ  of dwarf planets has not been addressed .
A  डेबिट  card ( also known as a bank  कार्ड  or  जाँच  card ) is a plastic payment  कार्ड  that provides the cardholder  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक  access  to  his or her bank account  (   s  ) at a financial institution .
Some  ताश  have a stored value with which a payment is made  ,  while most  रिले  a message to the  cardholder   's  bank to withdraw funds from  a  payee 's designated bank account .
The card , where accepted , can be used instead  of  cash when making purchases .
In some cases  ,  the primary account number is assigned exclusively  लिये  use on  the  Internet and  वहीँ  is  no  physical  कार्ड  .
In many countries , the use  of  debit cards  रै  become  so  widespread that their volume has  overtaken  or  entirely  replaced  cheques  and , in some instances ,  नकदी  transactions .
the  development  of   डेबिट  cards , unlike credit cards and  चार्ज  cards ,  रै  generally been country specific resulting in a number of different systems around the world , which were often incompatible .
Since the mid-2000s  ,  a number of initiatives have allowed debit cards  जारी  in  एक  country to be used  in  other countries and allowed their use  लिये  internet  और  phone purchases .
Unlike credit and charge cards , payments using a debit card  हैं  immediately transferred from the cardholder 's designated  बैंको  account , instead of them paying the money back at a later  तिथि  .
Debit  ताश  usually also allow for instant withdrawal of cash , acting  as   the  ATM card for withdrawing cash  .
Merchants may also offer cashback facilities to customers , where a customer can withdraw cash along with their purchase .
francois   henri  ``  जोकर  ''  lalanne  ( September 26 ,  1914   -  January  23  ,  2011  ) was an American fitness  ,   कसरत  , and nutritional expert and motivational  स्पीकर  who is sometimes called ``  the  godfather of  फ़िटनेस  '' and  the   ``  first fitness superhero . ''
He described himself as being a  ``  sugarholic '' and a  ``   जंक   खाना  junkie '' until he was  15  .
He also  था  behavioral problems , but `` turned his  जीवन  around ''  बाद  listening to  a  public lecture by Paul  ब्रैग  , a well-known nutrition speaker .
During his  करियर   ,  he came to believe that  the   देश  's overall health depended on the health of  इसके   जनसांख्यिकी   ,  writing that  ``  physical  संस्कृति  and  पोषण  — is  the  salvation of America . ''
Decades before health and fitness began being promoted by  हस्तियाँ  like Jane Fonda and Richard  सीमन्स  , LaLanne was already widely recognized for publicly preaching the health  लाभ  of regular exercise and a  शुभ  diet .
He published numerous books  on  fitness  और  hosted a fitness television show between  1953  and 1985 .
As early  as   1936  , at age 21  ,  he opened one of the nation 's first fitness gyms in Oakland , California , which became a prototype  लिये  dozens of similar gyms  using  his name .
One of  उसके  1950s television exercise  कार्यक्रम  was aimed toward women , whom he also  प्रोत्साहित   to  join his health clubs  .
he  invented a number of exercise machines , including  leg-extension   और  pulley devices .
besides  producing his own series  of  videos ,  he  coached  the  elderly and disabled not  to  forgo exercise , believing it would enable them to enhance their strength .
LaLanne also gained recognition for  उसके  success  as  a bodybuilder , as well as  लिये  his prodigious feats of strength .
अर्नाल्ड  Schwarzenegger  एकबार  stated  ,  `` That Jack LaLanne 's an  एनिमल  ! , '' after LaLanne , at 54 , beat a 21-year-old Schwarzenegger ``  badly  '' in an informal contest .
On  the  occasion of LaLanne  's  death  ,  Schwarzenegger credited LaLanne for being  ``  an apostle for  फ़िटनेस  '' by inspiring `` billions  सब   over  the world to live healthier lives , '' and ,  as  governor of California  ,   था  earlier placed him on  उसके  Governor 's Council  on  Physical Fitness .
Steve  रीव्स  credited LaLanne as his inspiration to build his muscular physique while  keeping  a slim waist .
he  was  inducted  to the California Hall of  कीर्ति  and has a star  on  the Hollywood Walk of  कीर्ति  .
Air forces of most of the  देशों  use system similar to Armies .
However , the RAF  और  the air forces of many Commonwealth countries , or those  formerly  under  a   अंग्रेजों   influence  ,  उपयोग  a different set of ranks loosely based on  नवल  equivalents ; Lieutenant , Commander , Captain and Commodore  हैं  prefixed for air force use with Flight , Wing  ,  Group and Air , respectively  (  the first three being the  इकाई   कि  they  प्रयुक्त  to command ) .
Penélope Cruz Sánchez ( ; born April  28  , 1974 )  is  a  स्पेनी  actress .
Signed by an agent at  आयु  15 , she made her  एक्टिंग  debut at 16  on   टेलीविज़न  and her feature  फिल्मी   डेब्यू  the following year in  jamón  , jamón ( 1992  )  ,  to  critical acclaim .
Her subsequent roles in the 1990s and 2000s included Open Your Eyes ( 1997 )  ,  The Hi-Lo Country (  1999  )  ,  The Girl of Your Dreams ( 2000 ) and Woman on  शीर्ष  ( 2000 ) .
Cruz achieved recognition for her lead  भूमिकाएँ  in the  2001  films  वैनिला  Sky and Blow  .
वो  has since built a successful career , appearing in films from  a  wide range of genres , including  the  comedy Waking Up  in  Reno ( 2002 ) , the thriller Gothika ( 2003 ) , the Christmas movie Noel (  2004  )  ,  and the action adventure  सहारा  ( 2005 ) .
She has received critical  acclaim  for  उसके  roles in Volver  (  2006  )  and Nine (  2009  ) receiving Golden Globe and Academy Award nominations for each .
She won the Academy Award for Best  supporting   अभिनेत्री  in 2008 for Vicky  क्रिस्टीना  Barcelona .
वो  was the first Spanish actress  in   इतिहास   to  receive an  अकादमी   पुरस्कार  and the first Spanish  अभिनेत्री  to receive a star at the Hollywood Walk of Fame  .
Cruz has modeled for companies such as Mango  ,  Ralph Lauren and L'Oréal .
Penélope and  उसके   younger   सिस्टर  Mónica Cruz have designed items for Mango .
She  रै  donated both  उसके   समय  and money to charities  .
Cruz has volunteered in Uganda and India  ,   जहाँ  she  खर्च  one week working  लिये  Mother Teresa ; she donated her salary from  '  to help fund  the  late nun 's mission .
A wax sculpture of  क्रूज़  will be placed  in  a premier spot  in  the Grevin Wax Museum in Paris  .
File Explorer  ,  previously  ज्ञात  as  खिड़कियाँ  Explorer  ,  is a  संचिका  manager application and  भी  a navigation tool that is included  साथ   रिलीज   of  the Microsoft  खिड़कियाँ   ऑपरेटिंग   प्रणाली  from Windows 95 onwards .
It provides a  आलेखीय   उपयोक्ता  interface for accessing the file systems .
it   is  also the  घटक   of  the operating system that presents many user interface items  on  the monitor  ऐसे   as  the  taskbar  and desktop .
Controlling the computer  is   संभावित  without Windows Explorer running  (  for example , the File  |  Run command  in   कार्य  Manager on NT-derived versions of Windows will function without it ,  as  will  कमांड  typed  in  a command prompt window ) .
Located in  the  C : \Windows directory  ,   it  is sometimes referred to as the Windows shell  ,  explorer.exe  ,  or simply  “explorer”  .
The Care Bears are characters created by  अमरीकी  Greetings  in  1981 for use on greeting cards .
The original artwork for the cards was painted  by  artist Elena Kucharik .
in  1983  ,  Kenner turned the Care Bears  into  plush teddy bears .
The Care Bears  appeared  in their own TV specials called The Care Bears  in   the  Land Without Feelings ( 1983 ) and  the  Care  bears  Battle  the  Freeze Machine ( 1984  )   .
They also  था   उनके  own television series  इससे   1985  to  1988   ,  in addition to three feature films  :  The  परवाह   bears   फिल्म  ( 1985 )  ,  Care Bears Movie II : A New Generation ( 1986 ) , and The  परवाह  Bears  एडवेंचर  in  वंडरलैंड  ( 1987 ) .
प्रत्येक   परवाह   भालू  comes in a different color and has a specialized  तमगा   on  its belly that represents its duty and personality .
This insignia  थी  known  as  their `` tummy symbol . ''
however  , the movie Care Bears :  oopsy  Does  it  ! renamed  उन्हें  `` belly badges  ''  .
Adding to the Care  भालू   परिवार   हैं  the `` Care Bear  cousins  ''  ,  which feature a  शेर  , rabbit , penguin , raccoon , and other such animals created in the  वही  style as  the  teddy bears .
In 2002 ,  the   bears  were reintroduced with new toys .
Made by Play-Along Toys  ,  the new toys offered features such as illuminated bellies upon touch ,  एरोबिक  bears ,  और   glow-in-the-dark   bears   .
As  भाग  of this comeback  ,  the Bears have appeared in two computer-animated movies : Care Bears :  यात्रा  to Joke-a-lot ( 2004 ) and The Care Bears '  बिग   काश  Movie ( 2005 ) .
In 2007 ,  the  franchise celebrated its 25th anniversary  ;   another   relaunch  took place ,  as  well as  the  release of Care Bears : Oopsy Does It ! .
In mid-2011 , AG announced a revival TV  एनिमेटेड   श्रेणी   titled  ``  परवाह   bears  : Welcome to Care-a-Lot `` .
The premiere of  the  series  utilizes  `` 30 years of caring  ''  .
it  premiered on The Hub on June 2  ,  2012 .
as  of 2013  ,  Care Bears merchandise  is  still being marketed .
During 2008 and 2009  ,  Canada 's Cookie  जार  Group and  फ़्रांस  's MoonScoop Group attempted to  acquire  the franchise from  agc  , with no apparent success  .
Interstate 70 ( I-70 ) is an Interstate Highway in the United States that runs from Interstate 15 near Cove Fort , Utah , to a Park and  सवारी  near  बाल्टीमोर  , Maryland .
It was the first  अंतरराज्यीय  Highway project in the United  राज्य  .
I-70  लगभग  traces the path of U.S.  रूट  40 ( and also the old National Road  )   ईस्ट  of  the   रॉकी  Mountains  .
West of  the   rockies  , the route of I-70  थी   निकला  from multiple sources .
I-70  is  the fifth longest Interstate  राजमार्ग  , after I-90  ,  I-80 , I-40 , and I-10  .
the  construction of I-70 in Colorado and Utah  is   माना  an engineering marvel  as  the route passes through the Eisenhower Tunnel  ,  Glenwood Canyon , and  the  San Rafael  swell  .
the  Eisenhower Tunnel is the highest  पाइंट  along the Interstate  राजमार्ग  system with an elevation of .
The sections of the interstate in Missouri  और  Kansas have  रखी   अर्जी  to be the first interstate  in  the United States  .
हालांकि   विवादित  , the Federal Highway Administration has claimed the  खण्ड  of I-70  through  Glenwood Canyon  ,  completed in 1992 , was  the   पिछला  piece of the Interstate Highway  प्रणाली  ,  as  originally planned , to open to traffic .
Photo of 1999 total eclipse
As seen  इससे  the Earth  ,   a  solar eclipse occurs when the Moon passes between  the  Sun and Earth , and the Moon fully  or  partially blocks ( ``  occults  `` )  the   सूर्य  .
This can happen only at new moon  ,  when the  सूर्य  and the Moon are in conjunction as seen  इससे  Earth in an alignment referred to as syzygy .
In a total eclipse  ,  the  डिस्क   of  the Sun is fully  obscured  by the Moon .
In  आंशिक   और  annular eclipses only part  of   the  Sun  is  obscured .
if  the  चंद्रमा  were in a perfectly circular orbit , a  छोटी   करीब  to  the  Earth , and in the same  कक्षीय  plane , there  होता  be total solar eclipses every single month  .
However , the Moon 's orbit is inclined ( tilted ) at  अधिक  than 5 degrees to Earth 's orbit  around  the Sun ( see ecliptic )  so   इसके  shadow at new moon usually misses Earth  .
Earth 's orbit is called the ecliptic  प्लेन  as  the  Moon  's  orbit must cross  इस  plane in order for an  ग्रहण  ( both  सौर  as well as lunar ) to occur .
In addition , the Moon 's actual orbit is  अंडाकार   ,  often taking  it   दूर  enough away from Earth that its apparent size  is  not large enough to block the Sun totally .
The orbital  planes   क्रॉस  each year  at  a  लकीर   of   नोड  resulting in  at  least two , and up to  पाँच  , solar eclipses occurring each year ; no more than two of which can be total eclipses .
However , total  सौर  eclipses  हैं  rare at any particular  स्थान  because totality exists only along a narrow path on Earth 's surface  traced  by the Moon  's  shadow or umbra .
An eclipse is a  प्राकृतिक   घटना  .
Nevertheless , in  कुछ  ancient and modern cultures , solar eclipses  have   महरूम  attributed to supernatural causes or regarded as bad omens .
A total solar  ग्रहण   can  be frightening to people who are unaware of its astronomical explanation , as  the  Sun seems to disappear during  the  day and the sky darkens  in  a matter of  मिनट्स  .
Because it  is   खतरनाक  to look directly  at  the Sun  ,  observers should  उपयोग  special eye protection or indirect viewing techniques when viewing a  आंशिक   ग्रहण  , or the partial phases of  a   कुल  eclipse .
It is  सुरक्षित   to   दृश्य  the total phase of  a   कुल  solar eclipse with the unaided eye and without  सुरक्षा  , however .
People referred to as eclipse chasers  or  umbraphiles will travel to remote locations to  observe  or witness predicted central solar eclipses .
A political party ( from , Genitive partis , `` part '' ,  ``  portion ''  )  is  a  political organization that typically seeks to influence  ,  or entirely control  ,  government policy ,  प्रायः  by nominating candidates with aligned political views  और  trying to  सीट   उन्हें   in  political office .
Parties participate in electoral campaigns and educational outreach  or  protest  क्रियाएँ  .
पार्टियों  often espouse  an  ideology or vision ,  expressed  in  a  party program  ,  bolstered by a written platform with  विशिष्ट  goals , forming a coalition  among  disparate interests  .
The mango is a fleshy stone fruit belonging to the  genus   mangifera  , consisting of numerous tropical fruiting trees in the flowering plant family Anacardiaceae .
The mango  is  native to South Asia , from where it has been distributed worldwide  to  become one of  the  most cultivated fruits  in  the tropics .
While other Mangifera species ( e.g .  घोड़ा  mango , M. foetida )  हैं  also  grown   on  a  अधिक  localized basis  ,  Mangifera indica  –  the 'common mango '  or  'Indian mango ' – is  the  only mango tree commonly cultivated in many tropical and subtropical regions .
It is the national fruit of India ,  पाकिस्तानी  and Philippines .
in  several cultures , its fruit  और   पत्ते   हैं   ritually  used as floral decorations  at  weddings , public celebrations and religious  ceremonies   .
Gill Arnette Byrd , < ref name > http : //www.pro-football-reference.com/players/B/ByrdGi00.htm  (  born February 20 , 1961 in  सैन  Francisco , California ) is a former professional American football  खिलाड़ी  .
He was a two  समय  Pro Bowl cornerback in  1991  and  1992  for the San Diego Chargers  बाद  graduating from  सैन  Jose State University .
Byrd was inducted into the Chargers Hall of Fame in 1998 .
He was an All-City running back  और   रक्षात्मक  back  at  Lowell High School ( San Francisco )  ,  helping to lead  the  Cardinals to  the   नगर  championship in  उसके   वरिष्ठ  season of 1978 .
World map showing  the  Tropic  of   कर्कट
the  Tropic of  कर्कट  ,  भी  referred to as the Northern tropic ,  is  the circle of latitude on the Earth that marks  the  most northerly  स्थिति   at  which the  सूर्य  may  appear  directly  ओवरहेड  at its zenith  .
This  इवेंट  occurs once per year , at the time of the June solstice  ,  when the Northern Hemisphere is  tilted  toward the Sun to its maximum  extent   .
It currently (  साल  2013 )  झूठ  at 23° 26′ 15.143′′ north  of  the Equator .
Its Southern Hemisphere  बंटवारा  , marking the  सबसे  southerly position  at  which  the  Sun  may  appear  सीधे  overhead , is the Tropic of Capricorn .
These tropics are  दो  of  the  five major  उपाधि  measures or major circles of  अक्षांश   कि  mark maps of  the   धरती  , besides  the  Arctic and Antarctic Circles  और  the Equator  .
The positions of  ये  circles of latitude  (  other than  the  Equator ) are dictated by the tilt of the Earth 's  अक्ष  of  रोटेशन   सापेक्ष  to the plane of its orbit .
DVD-Video is a  उपभोक्ता  video format used to store digital video on DVD discs , and is  फिलहाल  the dominant  उपभोक्ता   वीडियो  format in  एशिया  ,  उत्तर  America , Europe , and Australia  .
Discs using  the  DVD-Video specification  आवश्यकता  a DVD drive and an H.262/MPEG-2 Part 2 decoder ( e.g. , a DVD player , or a computer DVD drive with a software DVD player ) .
Commercial DVD movies are encoded using a combination of H.262/MPEG-2 Part 2 compressed video and audio  of  varying  स्वरुप  ( often  multi-channel  formats as described below  )  .
Typically , the data rate for DVD  फिल्मों  ranges from 3 Mbit/s  to  9.5 Mbit/s , and the bit rate is usually adaptive  .
It was first available for retail  around  1997 .
The  dvd-video  specification was created  by   dvd  Forum and  can   be  obtained from DVD  format/logo  Licensing  निगम  for a fee of $ 5,000 .
The specification  is   नहीं  publicly  उपलब्धियाँ  , because every subscriber must sign a non-disclosure  अनुबंध  .
Certain information in the DVD Book  is  proprietary and confidential .
in   कम्प्यूटिंग  and specifically Internet , a leech  is  one who benefits , usually deliberately  ,  from others ' information or effort but  करता  not  प्रस्ताव  anything in return ,  or  makes only token offerings in  an  attempt to  avoid  being called a leech .
in  economics  ,  this  प्रकार  of behavior is called  ``   फ़्री  riding '' and is associated with the free rider problem .
Depending on  कॉन्टेक्स्ट  ,  leeching   करता  not necessarily refer to illegal  उपयोग   of  computer  संसाधन  , but often instead to greedy use  according  to etiquette : to wit , using too much of what is freely given without contributing a  उचित  amount  वापस  to  the  community that provides it .
The name derives from the leech ,  an  animal that sucks blood and then tries to leave unnoticed  .
Other terms are used , such as ``  freeloader   ''  , but leech is the most common .
The full eagle logo , used in various  संस्करण  from 1970  to  1993 .
The United States Postal  सेवा  (  usps  ) ,  भी  known as  the  Post Office and U.S. Mail  ,  is  an  independent agency of the United States federal  सरकारी  responsible  लिये  providing postal service in the  संयुक्त  States  .
It is  एक   of  the few  सरकारी  agencies  explicitly  authorized by the United States Constitution .
The USPS traces its roots to 1775 during the Second Continental Congress , where Benjamin  फ्रैंकलिन  was appointed  the   पहला  postmaster general .
the   cabinet-level  Post  दफ्तर  Department was created in 1792  इससे  Franklin 's operation and transformed into its current form in 1971  अंतर्गत   the   डाक  Reorganization  अधिनियम   .
the  USPS employs over 574,000 workers and operates over  260,000  vehicles .
The USPS  is   the   ऑपरेटर  of the largest  गाडी  fleet in the world  .
The USPS is  legally  obligated to  serve  all Americans ,  regardless  of geography  ,  at uniform  दाम  and quality .
The USPS has exclusive access to  अक्षर  boxes marked ``  u.S.  Mail '' and personal letterboxes in the United States , but still competes against private package delivery services , such as  यूपीएस  and FedEx .
The  usps  has not  सीधे  received taxpayer-dollars since the early  1980s  with the  नाबालिग  exception of subsidies for costs  संबद्ध   साथ   the  disabled and overseas voters .
चूंकि  the 2006 all-time peak mail  आवाज़  ,  बाद  which  कॉंग्रेस  passed the  डाक  Accountability and Enhancement Act ``  ,   (  which  mandated  $ 5.5  अरब  per year to be paid into an account  to  pre-fund  retiree  health-care  ,  75  सालो  into the  भविष्य   ,  a requirement unique among  संगठन  and businesses in the U.S.  )   ,   आय  dropped sharply due  to   recession-influenced  declining mail volume , prompting the postal service to look to other  स्त्रोत  of  आय   जबकि   कटिंग  costs  to  reduce its  बजट  deficit .
Washington , D.C. has been the capital of the United States since 1800 .
Eight  अन्य  cities have served as  the  meeting place  लिये  Congress and  हैं  therefore considered to have once been  the  capital of the United States  .
In addition , each  of  the 50 U.S. states and  the  five principal territories of the  संयुक्त  States maintains its own capital .
Princess cut diamond set in a ring
The Princess cut is the  दूसरी  most popular cut shape for diamonds , next to  a  round  शानदार  .
the  face-up  आकार   of  the princess cut is square or rectangular and the profile or side-on shape is similar to  कि  of  an   उलट  pyramid  साथ   चार  beveled  पहलू  .
The  राजकुमारी   काटें   is  a relatively new diamond  काटें  , having been created in the 1960s .
it  has  gained  in popularity in recent years as a more distinctive alternative to the more popular round  शानदार   काटें  ,  in  which the top of diamond , called  the  crown , is cut with a  गोलाकार  face-up shape and the bottom , called the pavilion , is shaped  समान  to  a  cone  .
a  princess  काटें  with  the  same width as the diameter of a round  शानदार  will weigh more as  it  has  चार   किनारे  which would otherwise have been cut off and  rounded   to   रूप   a  round brilliant .
the   राजकुमारी  cut  is  sometimes referred to as a  वर्गाकार   परिवर्धित   शानदार  .
However , while displaying the same high degree of brilliance , its faceting  स्टाइल  is  अद्वितीय  and completely different from that of a round  शानदार  .
The Princess cut had its origins in the early `` French '' cut , having a step-modified `` Double-French ''  or  `` Cross '' cut crown  और   a  series of unique , chevron-shaped facets in the pavilion which combine to give  a  distinct cross-shaped reflection when  the  stone is  viewed  directly through the table .
Effectively  ,   the  Princess cut combines the high degree of light return of a  गोलाकार  brilliant cut with a distinctive square or  आयताकार  shape .
The square  राजकुमारी   काटें  diamond is usually  थोड़ा  cheaper than round brilliant cut diamonds of  the   वही  carat weight because it retains about 80 % of  the   अशिष्ट  diamond  ,  as opposed to the round brilliant which retains only about 50 % of the rough .
The ability  to  retain more crystal weight  makes  this shape  लोकप्रिय  amongst diamond cutters .
Accredited Gem Appraisers ( AGA  )  and  अमरीकी  Gem Society Laboratory  (   agsl  ) and European Gem Laboratories-USA ( EGL-USA ) are currently the only labs that grade the Princess cut for cut .
There is no universal definition of what measurements  मेक  an ideal princess cut diamond and many diamond  निर्माताओं  market ideal diamonds with differing facet patterns and angles as  ``   आदर्श  cut '' .
In  कंट्रास्ट   to  the AGSL , AGA , and EGL-USA the Gemological Institute of America ( GIA ) has stated that there is not enough  उद्योग  consensus or empirical  आंकड़ा  to specify  काटें   ग्रेडिंग  standards  लिये   राजकुमारी   काटें  diamonds and  to  do so is  at  the risk of consumers  जो  may be deceived by diamonds accompanied  by  unqualified  आदर्श  or Excellent cut grades .
The name  ``  Princess Cut  ''  was originally  प्रयुक्त  in connection with another  डायमंड  cut , otherwise  ज्ञात  as the  ``  Profile '' cut , designed by Arpad Nagy , a London cutter , in 1961 .
The same  नाम  was later  प्रयुक्त  and made  लोकप्रिय   by  Ygal Perlman  ,   betzalel   ambar   ,  and Israel Itzkowitz in Israel  in   1979   .
A similar cut with only 49  facets  , as opposed to the original 58 facets of the princess cut , was later branded the `` Quadrillion '' and initially distributed  by  Ambar Diamonds in Los Angeles .
Three  सालो  of optical research yielded a  वर्गाकार   स्टोन  with  faceting  similar to that of a round  शानदार   काटें  diamond .
A Comparison
The number of chevrons can  affect   the   overall   आउटलुक  of  a  princess cut diamond .
This  can  usually  be  determined  by  the wire diagram that is plotted in diamond grading reports .
By adding more chevrons on the pavilion side of the diamond ,  the   व्यक्तिगत   facets  of the diamond will now be broken  bas  into smaller facets .
As a result , it can give  a  princess cut diamond a `` crushed  बर्फ  '' look .
Vice versa , when a princess cut diamond has lesser chevrons , it tends  to  give the  डायमंड  a chunky outlook due  to  broader facets .
The domestic dog (  canis  lupus familiaris ) is  a  subspecies of the gray wolf  (  Canis lupus  )  , a member of  the  Canidae family of  the   mammalian  order Carnivora .
The term  ``  domestic dog  ''  is  generally   प्रयुक्त   लिये  both domesticated and feral varieties .
The dog  रै   महरूम   the  first animal  to   be  domesticated and has been  the  most widely kept working  ,  hunting ,  और  pet animal in human history .
the  word `` dog '' may also mean the  पुरूष   of   a  canine species  ,  as opposed to the  शब्द  `` bitch '' for the female of  the  species .
MtDNA evidence shows an evolutionary split between the modern dog 's lineage and the modern  भेड़िया   's  lineage around 100,000 years  पहले  but , , the oldest fossil specimens genetically  linked  to the modern dog 's lineage date to approximately 33,000-36,000  सालो  ago  .
कुत्तो  ' value to early  इंसान  hunter-gatherers led to them quickly becoming  सर्वव्यापी  across world  संस्कृतियों  .
Dogs perform many  भूमिकाएँ  for people  ,  such as  शिकार  , herding , pulling loads , protection , assisting police and military ,  companionship  , and , more recently , aiding handicapped individuals  .
This  प्रभाव  on human society has  दिए  them  the   उपनाम   ``  Man 's Best Friend  ''  in the Western world .
in  some cultures , dogs  हैं  also a source of meat .
In 2001 , there were estimated to  be  400 million  कुत्तो  in  the  world .
Most breeds of dogs  हैं   at  most a  few  hundred years old , having been artificially selected for particular morphologies and behaviors  by   लोगों  for specific functional roles .
through  this selective  प्रजनन  , the dog has  विकसित  into hundreds  of   varied  breeds , and shows more behavioral and morphological variation than any  अन्य   जमीन  mammal .
For  उदाहरण  ,  ऊँचाई  measured  to  the withers ranges from in the Chihuahua to about in the  आयरिश   wolfhound  ; color varies from white through grays ( usually  पुकारा  `` blue ''  )  to black , and browns  इससे   लाइट  ( tan ) to dark ( `` red ''  or  ``  चॉकलेट  '' ) in a wide  विभिन्नता  of patterns ; coats can be short or long ,  coarse-haired  to  wool-like  , straight , curly , or  चिकना  .
It is common for most  breeds  to shed this coat .
Diagram of a transmission electron microscope
A 1973 Siemens  इलेक्ट्रॉन  microscope , Musée des Arts et Métiers , Paris
An  इलेक्ट्रॉन  microscope ( EM )  is  a type of microscope that uses an electron beam to illuminate a specimen and  उपज  a magnified image  .
An EM has greater  resolving  power than a  लाइट  microscope and can reveal  the  structure  of  smaller objects because  electrons  have wavelengths about 100,000 times shorter than visible light  photons   .
They  can   achieve  better than 50 pm resolution and magnifications of up to about 10,000,000x whereas ordinary , non-confocal light microscopes  हैं   सीमित  by  विवर्तन  to about  200  nm resolution and  उपयोगी   magnifications  below 2000x .
The  इलेक्ट्रॉन  microscope uses electrostatic and  इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक  lenses to control the electron beam and focus it to form an  चित्र  .
ये  electron optical lenses are  analogous  to the glass lenses of a light optical microscope .
Electron microscopes are used  to  investigate the  ultrastructure   of  a wide range of biological and inorganic  नमूनों  including microorganisms , cells , large molecules  ,   biopsy  samples ,  धातुओं  , and crystals  .
Industrially , the electron microscope is  प्रायः  used for quality  कंट्रोल  and failure analysis .
Modern electron microscopes  उपज  electron micrographs , using specialized digital cameras or frame grabbers to capture the image .
Popeyes Louisiana Kitchen is a  कड़ी  of fried chicken fast food restaurants  संस्थापित  in 1972 in New  ऑरलियन्स  , Louisiana  .
Often referred to as Popeyes  और  sometimes as Popeyes Chicken & Biscuits or  popeyes  Chicken  &  Seafood  ,  It was acquired  by   sandy   स्रोतों  , Georgia  -आधारd   afc   उद्यमों  , originally America 's Favorite Chicken Company , in 1993 .
According to  a  company press release dated June 29 , 2007 , Popeyes is  the  second-largest  ``  quick-service chicken restaurant group , measured by number  of  units  ''   ,  with more than 1,800 restaurants in more than 40 states  और  the District of Columbia , and over 22  देशों  worldwide including Turkey  ,  Northern Cyprus ,  बहरीन  ,  चीन  , Hong Kong  ,   इराकी  , Indonesia , Jordan , Kuwait ,  संयुक्त  Arab Emirates  ,  Japan ,  मलेशिया  , Saudi Arabia , South Korea  ,  Singapore , Canada , Jamaica , Guyana  ,  Suriname , Mexico , Trinidad  ,  Puerto Rico , Honduras , Vietnam ,  पनामा  , Peru , and Costa Rica .
About thirty locations are company-owned , the rest franchised .
The leg press is  a   वज़न  training  कसरत  in which the individual pushes a weight  or   प्रतिरोध   दूर  from them using their legs .
the  term leg press also refers to  the  apparatus used  to  perform this  कसरत  .
The leg press can be used  to  evaluate  an  athlete 's overall lower body  शक्ति  ( from  घुटना  joint  to  hip ) .
Using the diagonal sled-type leg press machine .
There are two main types of leg press:
The diagonal or vertical 'sled ' type leg press  .
Weight disks  (  plates ) are attached directly to the sled , which  is   आरोहित   on  rails  .
The user  sits  below the sled and pushes  it  upward with their feet .
ये   मशीने  normally include adjustable safety brackets that prevent  the  user from being trapped  अंतर्गत  the weight .
the  'cable ' type  लेग  press  ,  or 'seated leg press '  ,  commonly found on multigyms .
The user sits upright and pushes forward  साथ  their  फीट  onto a plate that is  संलग्न  to the weight stack by means  of  a long steel cable .
Wendy Williams Hunter ( born Wendy Joan Williams ; July 18 , 1964 ) is  an  American media personality  ,   अभिनेत्री  and author .
She hosts a  syndicated   टेलीविज़न   बात  show , The Wendy Williams  दिखाएँ  .
Prior to television  ,  Williams was a `` shock jockette  ``  on several radio  shows  .
Williams has gained  सुर्खी  for her on-air spats with  हस्तियाँ  .
She was the subject of the 2006 VH1 reality TV series called The Wendy  विलियम्स  Experience which broadcast events surrounding her radio show .
She has written  an  autobiography and several other books  ,  and has created a product  लकीर  called  adorn  by Wendy Williams .
Patrick Henry  ``   देशद्रोह  '' speech before  the  House of Burgesses in an 1851  पेंटिंग  by  पीटर  F. Rothermel
`` Give me liberty , or  दे   me  death ! '' is  a  quotation  attributed   to   पैट्रिक  Henry from a speech he made to the Virginia  सम्मेलन  .
On  कि  day , at  st.  John 's Church in Richmond ,  वर्जिनिया  , and  is   credited  with having swung the balance in  convincing  the  वर्जिनिया  House of Burgesses to pass a resolution delivering the Virginia troops to the  क्रांतिकारी  War .
Among the delegates to the convention were future US Presidents  थामस  Jefferson  और  George Washington .
Newfoundland and Labrador ( , locally ) is the easternmost province of Canada .
Situated in  the  country 's Atlantic region , it incorporates the island of  न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड  and  मेनलैंड  Labrador  to  the northwest  ,   साथ   a   संयुक्त  area of .
In 2011 ,  the  province 's population was 514,536  .
लगभग  92  प्रतिशत  of the province 's population lives on the Island of Newfoundland  (   सहित  its associated  छोटी  islands  )  , of which more than half live on the Avalon Peninsula .
The province  is  Canada 's  सबसे  linguistically homogenous ,  साथ  97.6 %  of  residents reporting English (  न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड  English  )   as  their mother tongue in the 2006 census ; .
Historically , Newfoundland was also home to unique varieties  of  French , and Irish ,  as  well as the now-extinct Beothuk language .
In Labrador , local dialects of Innu-aimun and Inuktitut are also spoken  .
Newfoundland  और  Labrador 's capital and largest city , St. John 's  ,   is  Canada 's 20th-largest Census Metropolitan Area , and is home  to  almost 40 percent  of  the province 's population .
St. John  's  is the seat  of   सरकारी  ,  घर  to  the  House of  सभा  of  न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड   और  Labrador and the  उच्चतम  court in the jurisdiction , the Newfoundland and Labrador Court of Appeal .
A  पूर्व  colony and dominion of the  संयुक्त  Kingdom ,  न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड  and Labrador became the tenth province to enter the Canadian Confederation on March 31  ,  1949 , as  न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड  .
On  दिसम्बर  6 , 2001 ,  an  amendment was made to the  संविधान  of Canada to change the province  's  official  नाम  to Newfoundland and Labrador .
In day-to-day conversation , however ,  canadians  generally still refer  to  the province itself as  न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड  and  to  the  प्रदेश  on  the   कनाडाई  mainland as Labrador .
Theodore `` T.R . ''
Roosevelt  ,  Jr. ( ; October 27 , 1858—January 6  ,  1919 ) was the 26th President  of  the United States (  1901–1909   )   .
He is noted for  उसके  exuberant personality , range of interests  और   उपलब्धियाँ  , and his leadership of  the  Progressive Movement , as well as his `` cowboy `` persona and robust masculinity .
He was  a  leader of the Republican  पार्टी  and founder of the first  अवतार  of  the  short-lived Progressive  (   ``   सांड  Moose '' ) Party of 1912  .
पहले  becoming President ,  he   आयोजित  offices  at  the city , state , and federal  स्तर  .
Roosevelt 's achievements as a  naturalist  , explorer ,  शिकारी  , author  ,   और  soldier  हैं  as much a part  of  his fame as any office  he  held as a politician .
रूज़वेल्ट  was 42  सालो  old when sworn in as President of the United States in 1901 , making him the youngest president ever  ;  he beat out the youngest elected president , John F. Kennedy , by only one  साल  .
Roosevelt was also the  पहला   of  only  तीन  sitting  राष्ट्रपतियों  to have won the Nobel Peace Prize .
The Teddy bear is named after him , despite his contempt for being  पुकारा  `` Teddy ''  .
Born  into   a  wealthy family  in  New York City , Roosevelt was a sickly  चाइल्ड  who suffered from asthma and stayed at home studying natural  इतिहास  .
To overcome his physical weakness  ,  he  embraced  a strenuous  जीवन   .
Home-schooled , he  became  an eager  छात्र  of nature .
he  attended Harvard University , where he  पढ़ाई  biology , boxed and developed an interest in naval affairs .
In  1881  , one year out of  हार्वर्ड  , he was elected to the New York State  सभा  , where he became a leader of the reform faction of his Republican Party ( the `` GOP '' ) .
His  the   नवल  War of 1812 ( 1882 ) established  उसके  professional  प्रतिष्ठा  as a serious historian ;  he  wrote  numerous   किताबे  on hunting  ,  the outdoors ,  और  current  राजनैतिक  issues ,  as  well as frontier  इतिहास  .
In 1884  ,  his first wife and his mother died on the same day .
He  temporarily   बाएँ   राजनीती  and went to the frontier , becoming a rancher  in  the `` Badlands '' in the Dakotas .
returning   to  New  यॉर्क  City  ,  he  भागा  for mayor  in  1886 , finishing third with  60,000   मत  .
He later gained fame by taking vigorous charge of the  नगर   पुलिस   .
At  the  national level , he was a leader  in  civil service reform .
the  Spanish–American War broke out  in  1898 while  रूज़वेल्ट  was , effectively , running the Department of the Navy .
He promptly resigned and formed the Rough Riders  –  a  स्वयंसेवी  cavalry regiment that fought in Cuba .
The war hero was elected governor in 1898 and in 1900 was nominated for vice president .
He successfully  सक्रिय   the  GOP base as  a   अत्यधिक  visible campaigner to  reelect  President William McKinley on  a  platform of high tariffs  ,  the gold standard  ,   साम्राज्यवाद   ,  prosperity at home  और  victory  विदेश  .
In 1901 , President William  mckinley   थी   assassinated  and Roosevelt  became   अध्यक्ष  .
he  attempted to move the  रिपब्लिकन  Party ( GOP )  toward  Progressivism , including trust busting  और  increased regulation  of  businesses .
Roosevelt became  the  first person elected to a term in his own right  in  1904 after having ascended to  the  Presidency ( from the Vice-Presidency ) upon the death of his predecessor ,  जीतना  the largest percentage of the  लोकप्रिय  vote since  the  uncontested election of 1820 .
रूज़वेल्ट   coined   the  phrase `` Square Deal `` to describe his domestic agenda , emphasizing that the average citizen would get a fair share under his policies .
As an  outdoorsman  and naturalist , he promoted the conservation movement .
On the world stage , Roosevelt 's policies  यहूद  characterized by his slogan ,  ``  Speak softly and carry a big stick `` .
A cousin is a relative  साथ  whom a person  साझा  one or more  आम  ancestor  (  s ) ( other than a  जनक  , child/descendant , sibling ,  child/descendant  of a sibling , or sibling of a parent/ancestor ) .
However in common parlance , `` cousin  ''  normally specifically means `` first cousin '' .
Systems  of  ``  डिग्री  '' and ``  removals   ''  are used  in  the English-speaking  संसार  to  describe  the exact relationship between  दो  cousins ( in the broad sense ) and the  पूर्वज   वे  have in common .
Various governmental entities have established systems for legal  उपयोग  that can more precisely  बताएँ   kinships  with common  पूर्वजो  existing any  क्रमांक  of generations in  the  past , though common  उपयोग  often  eliminates   the  degrees and removals and refers to people with common ancestry  as   बस  `` distant cousins '' or  ``  relatives '' .
वेबस्टर  is an American situation comedy that aired  on  ABC  इससे  September 16 , 1983 until May 8  ,  1987  ,  and in  first-run   अनुप्रयोग  from September 21  ,  1987 until  कूच  10 , 1989 .
The series was created by  stu   चांदी  .
The  दिखाएँ  stars Emmanuel Lewis  in  the title role  as  a young boy  जो   ,  after losing his parents  ,  is adopted by his  एनएफएल   -pro  godfather ,  portrayed  by  एलेक्स  Karras , and  उसके   नई  socialite wife , played by  सुसान  Clark .
the   फ़ोकस  was largely  on  how this impulsively married  युगल  had to adjust to their new  जीवनदान  and  अचानक  parenthood ,  लकिन  it was the congenial Webster himself who drove much of the plot .
The  श्रेणी   थी  produced  by  Georgian Bay  ltd.  , Emmanuel Lewis  entertainment  Enterprises , Inc. (  1986-1989  ) and Paramount Television  .
Like  एनबीसी  's earlier hit Diff'rent Strokes  ,  Webster  प्रदर्शित  a young African-American boy adopted by a white  परिवार  .
Three types of cell division
Cell division is the process by which a parent cell  divides  into  दो  or more daughter cells  .
Cell division usually occurs  as  part of a larger cell cycle .
In eukaryotes , there are two distinct type  of  cell  प्रभाग  : a vegetative  प्रभाग  , whereby each daughter  कोशिका  is genetically identical to the parent  कोशिका  ( mitosis ) , and a reductive cell division  ,  whereby  the  number of chromosomes  in  the daughter  कोशिकाएं   is  reduced by  हाफ  , to produce haploid gametes ( meiosis  )  .
दोनो   of  these cell division cycles are required in sexually  reproducing  organisms at some point in  उनके  life cycle  ,  and both are  believed  to be present  in  the last eukaryotic common ancestor Prokaryotes also undergo  a  vegetative  कोशिका   प्रभाग  known  as   शब्दकोष  fission , where their genetic material is segregated equally into two daughter cells .
All cell divisions , regardless of  सजीव  ,  हैं  preceded  by  a  सिंगल  round of DNA replication .
For simple unicellular organisms such  as  the amoeba , one cell division is equivalent to reproduction – an entire new organism is created .
On a larger scale , mitotic  कोशिका  division can create progeny from multicellular organisms , such as plants  कि  grow  इससे  cuttings .
Cell division also enables sexually reproducing organisms to develop  इससे   the  one-celled zygote ,  जिससे  itself was produced by  कोशिका  division from gametes .
और  after growth ,  कोशिका  division allows for continual construction and repair of the organism .
A human  होने   's  body experiences about 10,000 trillion  कोशिका  divisions  in  a lifetime  .
Cell division  रै  been modeled  by  finite  subdivision  rules .
The primary concern of cell division is  the  maintenance of the  असली  cell 's genome .
पहले  division can occur  ,  the genomic information that is  भंडारित   in  chromosomes must be replicated ,  और  the duplicated genome must be separated cleanly between cells .
a  great  सौदे   of  cellular infrastructure is involved  in   keeping  genomic information consistent between `` generations '' .
Mountain ranges of Massachusetts ,  संयुक्त  States  .
Howard Jones ( born John  हावर्ड  Jones  ,  23 February 1955 , Southampton , Hampshire , England ) is  a  British musician ,  सिंगर   और  songwriter .
according  to the Guinness Book of British Hit  singles  & Albums , ``  जोन्स  is an accomplished singer-songwriter who was a regular chart visitor in the mid-1980s with his  ब्रांड  of synthpop .
Jones  ,  who was equally popular in the U.S. , appeared at Live Aid ``  .
allmusic  journalist ,  स्टीफन  Thomas Erlewine  adds  , `` Jones was one of the defining figures of  mid-1980s  synthpop .
His music merged the technology  intensive   ध्वनि  of New  वेव  with the cheery optimism of hippies and  लेट  1960s  पॉप   .
Jones  racked  up a  स्ट्रिंग  of  हिट्स  in the mid and late 1980s , before  he  retreated into  होने   a   cult  figure in the 1990s '' .
The International Isle of Man TT (  पर्यटक  Trophy ) Race is a  मोटरसाइकिल   रेसिंग   इवेंट  held  on  the Isle  of   man   और   थी  for many years the most prestigious motorcycle race in the world .
The event was part of the FIM Motorcycle Grand Prix  संसार  Championship during  the   काल  1949–1976 before being  transferred   to  the  संयुक्त  Kingdom after safety concerns and run by the  fim   as  the British Grand Prix for the 1977 season .
the   आइल  of  man  TT Races became part of the TT  सूत्र  1  चैंपियनशिप  from 1977 to 1990  to  preserve the event 's racing  औकात   .
From 1989  the   रेसिंग  has been developed by the  आइल  of Man  विभाग  of Tourism as the  आइल  of Man TT Festival .
The race is run in  a  time-trial format on public roads closed for racing by the provisions of an Act of Tynwald ( the parliament  of   the  Isle of Man ) .
The first race was  आयोजित  on Tuesday 28 May  1907  and  थी  called the International Auto-Cycle Tourist  ट्रॉफी   .
The event was  संगठित  by the Auto-Cycle  क्लबों   over   10  laps  of  the St  जॉन  's Short Course of 15 miles 1,470 yards  लिये   road-legal  touring motorcycles  साथ  exhaust silencers , saddles , pedals and mud-guards .
the  winner of the  single-cylinder  class , and  overall  winner of the first event in 1907 , was Charlie  collier  riding a Matchless motorcycle in a time of 4 hours , 8 minutes and 8 seconds  at  an average race  गति  of 38.21 mph .
the  winner of  the  twin-cylinder class was Rem Fowler riding  a  Peugeot engined Norton in a  समय  of 4 hours 21  मिनट्स  and  52  seconds at an average  रेस  speed of  36.21  mph .
The trophy presented to Charlie Collier as the winner of  the   1907  Isle of Man  tt  Race , was donated by the Marquis de Mouzilly St. Mars .
It featured a  stylised  version of  ओलम्पिक  God Hermes by Giovanni Da  बोलोग्ना  as a silver  figurine  astride a winged wheel .
the  trophy was similar  in  design to  the  18 carat gold Montague Trophy  प्रस्तुत   to   जॉन  Napier  (  Arrol-Johnston )  as   the   inaugural  winner of the Isle of Man  पर्यटक  Trophy car race in  1905  now known  as   the   rac  Tourist Trophy  .
the   बिल्ले  de  mouzilly   st.  Mars  ट्रॉफी  is now presented annually to the winner of the Isle  of  Man Senior TT  motor-cycle  Race .
The 2007  आइल  of Man TT  थी  the Centenary event  जिससे  ran  between   26  May  और  8 June  2007  and  प्रदर्शित   a  special Re-enactment  of   the   1907  Isle of  man  TT Race held on the village green next to  tynwald  Hill in  st  John  's  on Monday 28 May 2007 .
The  विंटेज  parade of 100  क्लासिक   मोटरसाइकिल  for the Centenary Re-enactment on the original St John 's Short Course was flagged away  by  former World  motor-cycle  Champion Geoff Duke .
the   पहला  of the participants  to  be  flagged   दूर  was  the  recently restored twin-cylinder Peugeot-Norton ridden by  rem  Fowler during the first Isle of Man TT Race  in  1907 .
Also participating in  the   2007  Re-enactment was TT race  प्रतिस्पर्धी  Guy Martin riding a 1938 Triumph Tiger 100 500  cc  and other  पूर्व   tt   प्रतिस्पर्धी  including Alan Cathcart ,  सैमी  Miller , Nick Jefferies and Mick  ग्रान्ट  also completed the  re-enactment  lap .
