Unemployment ( or joblessness  )  occurs when people are  बगैर  work and actively seeking  कार्य  .
The  बेरोजगारी  rate is a  माप  of the prevalence of unemployment and it is calculated as a percentage by  dividing  the number of  बेरोजगार  individuals by all individuals currently in the labor force .
During  अवधि  of recession  ,   an  economy  प्रायः  experiences a relatively high  बेरोजगारी  rate .
According to International Labour Organization  रपट   ,  more than 197  लाख  people globally are out of work  or   6  % of the world 's workforce  यहूद   बगैर  a job in  2012  .
There remains considerable theoretical debate regarding the causes , consequences and solutions for unemployment .
Classical economics , New classical economics , and the Austrian  स्कूल  of  अर्थशास्त्र  argue  कि  market  mechanisms  are reliable means of resolving unemployment  .
ये  theories argue  विरूद्ध   interventions  imposed on the labor market from  the  outside  ,  such as unionization ,  न्यूनतम  wage laws  ,  taxes , and  अन्य  regulations that they claim discourage the hiring of workers .
Keynesian  अर्थशास्त्र  emphasizes the cyclical  प्रकृति  of unemployment and recommends government  interventions  in the  अर्थव्यवस्था   कि  it claims will  reduce  unemployment  दौरान  recessions .
इस  theory focuses on  तूल  shocks  कि   एकाएक  reduce  कुल  demand for goods and services and thus reduce demand  लिये  workers .
keynesian  models recommend government interventions designed to increase demand  लिये  workers ; these can  शामिल   वित्तीय  stimuli , publicly funded job creation  ,  and expansionist monetary policies .
in   जोड  to these comprehensive theories  of   बेरोजगारी  , there  हैं  a few  categorizations  of unemployment that are used to more precisely model the effects of unemployment within the  आर्थिक  system  .
The main types  of   बेरोजगारी   शामिल  structural unemployment which focuses on structural problems  in  the economy and inefficiencies inherent in labour markets  ,   सहित  a mismatch  between   the  supply and  माँग  of  laborers  with necessary skill  सेट  .
Structural arguments emphasize  कल्याणकारी   और  solutions related to  विघटनकारी  technologies and globalization  .
चर्चाएँ  of  frictional  unemployment  फ़ोकस  on voluntary decisions  to  work based on each individuals ' valuation  of   उनके  own work  और  how that compares to current wage rates plus the time  और  effort required to find a job .
कल्याणकारी   और  solutions for frictional unemployment often address job  प्रविष्टि  threshold and wage rates .
Behavioral  अर्थशास्त्रियों  highlight individual  biases   in  decision making , and often involve problems and solutions concerning sticky wages and efficiency wages .
Collectivism is  कोई  philosophic , political , religious ,  आर्थिक  , or social  आउटलुक  that emphasizes the interdependence of every human being  in  a society  or   सभ्यता  .
Collectivism is a basic cultural element that exists as the reverse of individualism  in  human nature ( in the same  रास्ता  high  कॉन्टेक्स्ट  culture exists  as  the reverse  of   कम   कॉन्टेक्स्ट   संस्कृति  )  .
collectivist  orientations stress the importance of cohesion within  सोशल  groups  (  such as  an   ``  in-group  ''  , in what specific context it is defined ) and in some  मामले  , the priority of  समूह  goals over individual goals .
collectivists  often focus on community , society , nation or country  .
It has been  प्रयुक्त  as an element in many  अलग   और   विविध  types of government and political  ,  economic and educational  तत्त्वज्ञान  throughout history and most human  समाजों   in  practice contain elements  of  both individualism and collectivism .
Some examples of collectivist  संस्कृतियों  include India and Japan .
collectivism  can be  विभाजित  into horizontal collectivism and vertical collectivism .
Horizontal collectivism  तनावों  collective decision-making among  बराबर  individuals , and  is   यूँ  usually based on decentralization and egalitarianism .
Vertical collectivism is  आधारित   on  hierarchical structures of power and on  moral  and  सांस्कृतिक  conformity , and is  इसलिए  based  on  centralization  और  hierarchy .
A cooperative  एंटरप्राइज़   होता  be an example  of  horizontal collectivism , whereas a  सैन्य  hierarchy would be  an  example of vertical collectivism .
अधि  disseminated encephalomyelitis ( ADEM ) is an immune mediated disease of the  दिमाग  .
It usually occurs  following  a  वाइरल  infection but  may  appear  following   टीकाकरण  , bacterial or  parasitic  infection , or even  appear  spontaneously .
as  it involves autoimmune demyelination , it is similar to multiple sclerosis , and is considered part of the Multiple sclerosis borderline  रोगों  .
the  incidence rate is about 8 per 1,000,000 people per year  .
Although it occurs in all ages , most reported cases  हैं  in children and adolescents ,  साथ  the  औसत  age around 5 to 8 years  बूढ़ा  .
the  mortality rate  may  be  as  high as 5 % , full recovery is seen in 50 to 75 % of cases , while up  to  70  to  90 %  रिकवर   साथ  some minor residual disability .
The average time  to  recover is one to  छह  months  .
ADEM produces multiple inflammatory  lesions  in  the  brain and spinal cord , particularly  in  the white matter .
Usually these are  मिला  in the  subcortical  and central white matter and cortical gray-white junction  of  both cerebral hemispheres  ,   cerebellum  ,  brainstem   ,  and  स्पाइनल   cord   ,  but  periventricular  white matter and gray matter of the cortex , thalami and basal ganglia may also be involved  .
When the patient suffers more than one demyelinating episode ,  it  is called recurrent disseminated encephalomyelitis or multiphasic disseminated encephalomyelitis (  mdem  ) .
The  पेट  is a muscular  ,  hollow , dilated  भाग  of the  पाचन  system  जिससे  functions as an important organ of the digestive  ट्रैक्ट  in some  पशु   ,   सहित  vertebrates ,  echinoderms  , insects ( mid-gut ) ,  और  molluscs  .
It is  शामिल  in  the  second phase of digestion ,  following  mastication ( chewing ) .
The  पेट  is located between the esophagus and  the  small intestine  .
it  secretes protein-digesting enzymes called protease  और  strong acids to aid in food digestion , ( sent to it via  esophageal   peristalsis   )  through smooth muscular contortions ( called segmentation )  पहले  sending partially digested food ( chyme ) to the small intestines .
The word  पेट  is derived from the Latin stomachus which is derived from  the  Greek word stomachos ( στόμαχος  )   ,  ultimately from stoma ( ) , `` mouth  ''  .
The words  gastro-   और   gastric  ( meaning related to the stomach )  हैं  both derived from the Greek word gaster ( ) .
1940 Pontiac Special Series 25 Woodie
A woodie is  a  car body style , especially a  स्टेशन  wagon , where the rear bodywork  is  constructed of wood framework with infill panels of wood or painted metal .
After the  निधन  of actual wood construction , manufacturers used  अनुकरण  woodgrain sheet vinyl—sometimes augmented with three-dimensional , simulated  framework—to   recall  wood construction .
in  2008  ,  wood construction was evoked abstractly on the Ford Flex with a series of side and rear horizontal grooves .
A pearl is  a  hard  ऑब्जेक्ट  produced within the soft tissue ( specifically the mantle ) of a living shelled mollusc .
Just like the  शेल  of a clam  ,   a  pearl is made up  of   कैल्सियम  carbonate in minute crystalline form , which has been deposited  in   केंद्रिय  layers .
the  ideal pearl is  perfectly  round and smooth ,  लकिन  many  अन्य  shapes of pearls ( baroque pearls ) occur  .
The finest quality natural pearls have  महरूम  highly valued as gemstones and  वस्तुएँ  of beauty for many  सदियां  , and because of this , the word pearl has become a metaphor for something very rare , fine  ,   सराहनीय  , and valuable .
The most valuable pearls occur spontaneously in  the  wild , but they are extremely rare .
These wild pearls are referred to  as  natural pearls  .
Cultured or  farmed  pearls from  पर्ल  oysters and freshwater mussels make up  the  majority of those that are currently sold .
Imitation  मोती  are also widely sold in  inexpensive  jewelry , but the quality of their iridescence is usually very poor , and often , artificial  मोती  are easily distinguished from genuine  मोती  .
मोती   have  been harvested and  cultivated  primarily for  उपयोग   in  jewelry , but in  the   पास्ट  they were also  सिले  onto lavish clothing  .
Pearls  have  also been crushed and used  in  cosmetics  ,  medicines , and in paint formulations .
Whether wild or  संस्कारी  ,  gem  quality  मोती  are almost  सदा  nacreous and ,  as  is the interior of  the  shell that produces them .
However  ,  almost all  प्रजाति  of shelled molluscs are  सक्षम  of producing pearls  (  formally  referred  to as  ``  calcareous concretions  ''   by   कुछ  sources  )  of lesser shine  or  less spherical shape .
हालांकि  these may also be  legitimately  referred to  as  `` pearls  ''   by  gemological labs and also under U.S. Federal  व्यापार  Commission rules ,  और   हैं  formed in the same way , most of them have no value , except as curiosities .
Bing (  ज्ञात  previously as Live Search , Windows Live Search , and MSN  ढूंढें  ) is a web search engine  (  advertised as a  ``  decision engine  ``  )  इससे  Microsoft .
Bing was unveiled by Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer on May 28  ,  2009 at the  सब  Things  डिजिटल  conference in San  डिएगो  for  रिलीज  on  जून  1 .
Notable changes  शामिल  the listing of search suggestions while  प्रश्नों  are entered and  a  list of related searches ( called `` Explore pane '' ) based on  semantic  technology from Powerset which Microsoft purchased in 2008 .
on   जुलाई   29  , 2009 , Microsoft and Yahoo ! announced  a  deal in  जिससे  Bing  होता   शक्ति  Yahoo ! Search .
All  याहू  ! Search global  ग्राहक  and  साझेदार   हैं   अपेक्षित  to have  बना  the transition  by   जल्दी  2012 .
In October 2011 ,  bing   घोषित  it was working  on  new back-end search infrastructure ,  साथ  the goal of  delivering  faster and  थोड़ा  more relevant  ढूंढें  results for  उपयोक्ता   .
Known as  ``   बाघ  '' , the new index-serving  प्रौद्योगिकी  has  महरूम   incorporated  into Bing globally , since August  2011   .
In May  2012   ,  Bing  घोषित   another  redesign of its search  इंजन  that  शामिल  `` Sidebar  ''  ,  a  social  विशेषता  that searches  उपयोक्ता  '  सोशल  networks for information relevant  to   the  search query .
A diagram showing an I Formation on offense  और  a 4-3 Formation on defense
In American  फ़ुटबॉल  , each team has eleven players  on  the  फ़ील्ड   at  one  समय  .
The specific role that a  खिलाड़ी  takes  on  the field is called their position .
अंतर्गत  the modern rules of American  फ़ुटबॉल  , teams are allowed unlimited subsititutions , that is teams may  बदलें  any number of players after  कोई  play .
This has resulted  in  the development of three `` platoons  ''   of  players ,  the  offense ( the team with the ball , who is  trying  to score ) , the defense  (  the team trying  to  prevent the other team from  स्कोरिंग  , and to take the ball from them )  ,  and  the  special teams ( who  खेल  in kicking situations ) .
Within those platoons  ,   विभिन्न   विशिष्ट  positions  मौजूद  depending  on  what the player 's main job is .
The Irish people  (  or na hÉireannaigh  ;  Ulster-Scots :  airish  fowk ) are an ethnic group who originate in Ireland , an island in northwestern Europe .
Ireland has been populated for  around  9,000 years  (   according   to  archaeological studies , see Prehistoric Ireland ) .
The  आयरिश   लोगों  's earliest  पूर्वजो  are recorded  in  legends – they are claimed to be  descended   इससे   समूह  such as the Nemedians , Fomorians , Fir  bolg  ,  tuatha  Dé Danann  और  the Milesians  .
Lebor Gabála Érenn , a book of Irish  mythology   tells  that Milesians were Scythian descendants .
The main  समूह  that interacted with  the  Irish in  the  Middle Ages include the Picts , Scots , and the Vikings .
due  to this contact ,  icelanders  are  विख्यात   लिये  having some  आयरिश  descent .
the   anglo-norman  invasion of  the  High Middle Ages , the English plantations and the subsequent English rule of the country  introduced   the  Normans  और   फ्लेमिश  into  आयरलैंड  .
Welsh  ,   picts  , Bretons ,  और   छोटी  parties of Gauls and even Anglo-Saxons are known in Ireland from much earlier times  .
There have been many  notable   आयरिश  people throughout history .
The  6th  century Irish monk  और  missionary Columbanus is regarded as one of the `` fathers of Europe '' , followed by Kilian of Würzburg and Vergilius  of  Salzburg .
The scientist  रॉबर्ट  Boyle is considered  the  ``  पिता  of chemistry  ``  .
Famous  आयरिश  explorers include Brendan the Navigator , Robert McClure  ,   अर्नेस्ट  Shackleton and Tom Crean  .
By some accounts , the  पहला  European  चाइल्ड   born  in North America had  आयरिश  descent on  दोनो  sides  ;  and an Irishman was the first European to set foot on  अमरीकी  soil in Columbus ' expedition of 1492  .
There are descendants of Irish people living in  अनेक  western countries , particularly in English-speaking countries .
historically  , emigration has been caused by politics , famine and  आर्थिक  issues .
an  estimated 50 to 80 million people  हैं  descendants of Irish people , primarily in the United Kingdom , the United States , Australia , Canada and Iceland  ;  there  हैं   भी  smaller numbers in  अर्जेंटीना  , Chile , Mexico , Jamaica , Barbados , South Africa , New Zealand  ,   फ़्रांस  ,  जर्मनी  and  ब्राज़ील  .
The largest number of descendants of  आयरिश  people live in the United States .
The number of people  जीना   in  Australia  जो   हैं  of Irish descent is higher , as a percentage of total population ,  than  that of any other country .
Approximately forty percent of the settlement  जनसांख्यिकी  of Iceland came from Ireland or Scotland .
The very first inhabitants of Iceland were Irish .
The Hubble Space  दूरदर्शी  (  hst  ) is a  स्पेस  telescope  कि   थी   carried   into  orbit by a Space Shuttle in 1990 and remains in  आपरेशन  .
A aperture telescope  in  low Earth  कक्षा  , Hubble 's four main instruments observe in the near ultraviolet , visible  ,  and  निकट  infrared .
the  telescope is  नामित   बाद  the astronomer Edwin Hubble .
Hubble  's  orbit outside the  distortion   of  Earth  's  atmosphere allows it to  लो  extremely sharp images with almost no background light  .
हबल  's  गहन  Field have  महरूम   कुछ  of the most detailed visible-light images ever  ,  allowing a deep view  into  space and time .
अनेक  Hubble observations have  led  to breakthroughs in astrophysics , such as accurately determining the rate of expansion of the universe .
Although not the  पहला  space telescope ,  हबल  is one of the  largest  and most versatile , and is well known as both a vital research tool and a public  संबंध  boon for astronomy .
The HST  थी  built by  the  United  राज्य  space agency NASA , with contributions from the European  स्पेस  Agency ,  और   is  operated by the Space Telescope Science Institute .
the  HST is one of  नासा  's Great Observatories , along  साथ  the Compton  गामा  Ray Observatory , the Chandra  x-ray   वेधशाला  , and  the  Spitzer Space  दूरदर्शी  .
Space telescopes were proposed as early as  1923   .
Hubble was  वित्तपोषित  in the 1970s , with  a  proposed launch in  1983  , but the  प्रोजेक्ट   थी  beset by technical delays ,  बजट  problems , and  the  Challenger disaster .
When finally launched in 1990 , scientists  मिला  that the main mirror had been ground  incorrectly  ,  compromising  the  दूरदर्शी   's  capabilities .
The telescope was restored to its  intended  quality by a servicing mission in 1993 .
Hubble is the only telescope designed to be serviced in  स्पेस  by astronauts .
Between 1993 and 2002 , four missions repaired ,  upgraded  , and replaced systems  on   the  telescope  ;  a fifth mission was canceled on safety grounds following the Columbia disaster .
However , after spirited public  चर्चा  , NASA  व्यवस्थापक  Mike Griffin  स्वीकृत  one final  सर्विसिंग  mission , completed in 2009  by  Space Shuttle Atlantis .
The telescope is now expected to  फलन  until  at  least 2013 .
Its scientific successor  ,  the  जेम्स  Webb Space  दूरदर्शी  ( JWST ) , is to be launched in 2018 or possibly  बाद  .
Anti-inflammatory refers to the property of a substance  or  treatment that reduces inflammation .
Anti-inflammatory drugs  मेक  up about half of analgesics ,  remedying  pain by reducing inflammation as opposed to opioids , which affect  the  central nervous  प्रणाली  .
The Tonight Show is a US late-night talk  दिखाएँ   कि  has aired on  एनबीसी  since 1954 .
It is the longest  फिलहाल   कार्यशील   regularly  scheduled entertainment program in the US  और  the third longest-running show on NBC after Meet the Press and Today  .
The  tonight  Show  थी  hosted by Steve Allen ( 1954–1957 ) , Jack  paar   (   1957–1962  ) , Johnny Carson ( 1962–1992 ) , Jay  लीनो  ( 1992–2009 , 2010–present )  ,   और  Conan O'Brien ( 2009–2010 ) .
Several  अतिथि  hosts  भी  appeared ,  विशेषकर   दौरान   the  Paar and Carson eras .
The longest-serving host  to  date was Johnny Carson , who hosted The Tonight Show Starring Johnny Carson  लिये  30 seasons from the fall  of  1962 through the spring of 1992  .
The current host  of  the show is Jay Leno ,  जो  had previously hosted  the  show  इससे  1992 to  2009  and began  उसके   दूसरी   कार्यकाल   on   कूच   1   ,   2010  .
on  April 3 , 2013 , NBC announced  jimmy  Fallon would become the new host of The Tonight  दिखाएँ  .
The  tonight  Show with Jimmy  fallon  will premiere February 24 , 2014 , the  दिन  after the closing ceremonies  of   the   2014  Winter Olympics .
SS Andrea Doria  .
Pronounced was an ocean liner for the Italian Line ( Società di navigazione  इटालिया  )  घर  ported in  जेनोआ  , Italy ,  सबसे  famous for its sinking in 1956  ,  when 52 people died  (  51  इससे  immediate impact ) .
Named after the 16th-century Genoese  admiral  Andrea Doria , the  जलयान  had a gross  पंजीकरण  tonnage of 29,100 and a capacity of about 1,200  यात्री  and  500  crew .
लिये   a  country attempting  to   rebuild  its economy and reputation after World War II , Andrea Doria was an icon of Italian national pride  .
Of  सब   इटली   's  ships at  the   समय  , Andrea  डोरिया  was the  largest  , fastest  और  supposedly safest .
शुभारम्भ  on  16  June 1951 , the ship undertook its maiden voyage on 14 January 1953 .
On 25 July 1956 , while the Andrea Doria  थी   approaching  the coast of Nantucket , Massachusetts , bound  लिये  New York City  ,  the  eastbound  of the Swedish American Line collided with it  in  what became one of history 's most infamous maritime  आपदाओं  .
struck  in the side  ,  the top-heavy Andrea Doria  तत्काल  started  to  list severely to starboard , which left half of its lifeboats unusable  .
The  consequent  shortage of lifeboats might have resulted in  significant  loss of life , but the efficiency of the ship 's technical design allowed it to  रहो  afloat for over  11  hours after  the  ramming .
the  good behavior  of  the  क्रू  , improvements in communications and  the  rapid response of other  जहाजों   averted  a  विपत्ति  similar in  स्केल  to  कि  of the  in  1912 .
1,660 passengers and crew were rescued and survived , while 46 people  died   as  a consequence  of   the  collision .
the  evacuated luxury liner  capsized  and sank the following morning  .
This accident  remains  the  worst  maritime  विपत्ति  to occur in United States waters since the  डूब  of the  in   1915  .
The  घटना  and its aftermath were heavily  covered  by the news media .
जबकि  the rescue efforts were  दोनो  successful  और  commendable ,  the  cause of the collision with the Stockholm  और   the  loss of Andrea Doria  उत्पन्न   much   ब्याज  in  the  media  और  many lawsuits  .
Largely because of an  out-of-court  settlement agreement between  the   दो  shipping companies during hearings  तत्काल  after the disaster ,  no   determination  of the cause (  s   )  was ever formally published .
Although greater blame appeared initially to fall on the Italian liner  ,  more recent  discoveries  have indicated that a misreading  of  radar  on  the Swedish ship may have  initiated  the  टक्कर  course  ,   अग्रणी  to errors on both ships .
Andrea Doria was  the  last  प्रमुख   transatlantic   यात्री  vessel to sink before aircraft became the preferred method of  सफर   .
डायलिसिस   tubing
Dialysis tubing is a type of semi- or partially permeable  झिल्ली  tubing made  इससे  regenerated cellulose or cellophane .
It can be  प्रयुक्त  for diffusion with solutes or  परासरण  if used with water only  .
Osmosis is when water  गुजरता  through a semi-permeable layer  to  reach equilibrium .
Diffusion  ,  on  the  other  हाथ  , allows  the  movement  of  molecules from high concentration to  कम  concentration  .
It will only allow  अणुओं   to  pass  through  a semi-permeable membrane or  परत  if the  अणु  is small  पर्याप्त   to  fit through the membrane or a  झिल्ली   's  pore .
इस  usually results with the effects  of  diffusion through  a  membrane only  वाकई  affects small  अणुओं  , and almost never  larger  molecules .
Dialysis tubing is  प्रयुक्त   in  clinical circumstances  to  ensure a filtered  प्रवाह  of molecules , preventing  the  flow of larger solute molecules .
छोटी  molecules can be `` washed ''  आउट  of a solution which is pumped through the tubing into a  solvent   ,  usually water , which surrounds  it  and  in   जिससे  they can  be  flushed away .
In demonstrations  of  semi-permeable membranes , a solution containing several types of molecules ,  प्रायः   ग्लूकोज  and starch ,  is  placed into  a  semi-permeable  डायलिसिस  bag , such as a cellulose membrane  साथ  pores , and the bag is  sealed  with a knot or elastic  बैंड  .
The sealed dialysis bag is placed in a container of  a   अलग  solution , or water .
Molecules small  पर्याप्त  to pass through the tubing ( water , salts  ,  monosaccharides ,  और  other small molecules )  tend  to  मूव  into or out  of  the dialysis bag in the  दिशा  of decreasing concentration , therefore displaying diffusion  .
Larger molecules ( such as proteins , or polysaccharides ) that have dimensions  significantly  greater than the pore diameter  हैं  retained  अंदर  the  डायलिसिस  bag .
The  जल  and smaller  solutes  in a hypotonic solution ( a solution that  रै  a  lesser  solute concentration than the solution it is referenced to  )  will cross  a  semi-permeable membrane , like  डायलिसिस  tubing  ,  into a hypertonic solution ( a  समाधान   कि  has a higher solute concentration than the solution it  is  referenced to )  in  an  attempt  to reach equilibrium , where  the  solute concentration  of  each solution is  in  equilibrium .
पारा  laboratory thermometer
A thermometer ( from  the  Greek , thermos , meaning `` hot '' and μἐτρον ,  metron  , `` measure '' )  is  a device  कि  measures temperature or temperature  अनुपात  using a variety  of  different principles .
a  thermometer has two important elements : the temperature  सेंसर  ( e.g . the bulb on a mercury-in-glass  थर्मामीटर  ) in which some physical change occurs with temperature ,  प्लस  some means of converting this physical  बदलें  into  a  numerical value ( e.g . the visible scale that is marked on a  mercury-in-glass   थर्मामीटर  )  .
There are many types and many  उपयोग  for thermometers ,  as   विस्तृत   नीचे  in sections of this article .
Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs is a  1937  American  एनिमेटेड  musical fantasy film produced  by  Walt Disney and released by RKO Radio Pictures  .
Based on the German  परी  tale  by  the Brothers  grimm   ,  it is the first full-length  cel  animated feature film and the earliest in the Walt Disney Animated Classics series  .
The story  थी  adapted by storyboard artists Dorothy Ann Blank , Richard  creedon  , Merrill De Maris  ,  Otto Englander , Earl Hurd  ,  Dick  rickard  , Ted Sears and  webb  Smith .
David Hand was the supervising director , while William Cottrell , Wilfred Jackson , Larry Morey , Perce Pearce ,  और  Ben Sharpsteen directed the film 's individual sequences .
Snow White premiered at the Carthay Circle  थिएटर  on  दिसम्बर  21 , 1937 ,  followed  by a  देशभर  release  on   फ़रवरी  4  ,  1938  ,  and with  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  earnings of  $  8  लाख  during its  आरंभिक  release briefly assumed the record  of  highest  grossing  sound  फिल्मी  at  the  time  .
The popularity of the film has led to it being re-released  theatrically  many times , until its home video release in the 1990s .
Adjusted for inflation  ,  it is one of the top ten  performers  at the North American box office .
At  the  11th Academy Awards  ,   वॉल्ट  Disney was awarded an honorary  ऑस्कर   ,  and the film  थी  nominated for Best Musical Score  .
It  थी  added to the United  राज्य  National Film Registry in 1989 and is ranked in the American Film Institute 's list of  the  100 greatest American  films  , who also named the film as the greatest  अमरीकी  animated film  of  all time in 2008 .
डिज़्नी  's  लो   on   the  fairy tale has had  a  big cultural impact , resulting in  a  popular theme park attraction  ,  a video game , and a Broadway musical .
प्रसव  , labour , delivery ,  जनम  ,  partus  , or parturition  is   the  culmination of a pregnancy  काल   साथ   the  expulsion of  एक  or more newborn infants  इससे  a woman 's  गर्भाशय  .
The process of normal childbirth is categorized in three stages of  श्रमिक   :  the shortening and  dilation   of  the  ग्रीवा  , descent  और   जनम  of the infant , and birth of the placenta .
In many cases and with increasing frequency  ,  childbirth is achieved  through  induction of labor or caesarean section ,  जिससे  is the  हटाना   of  the neonate through  a  surgical incision in the abdomen  ,  rather than through vaginal birth  .
Childbirth  by  C-Sections increased 50 % in  the  U.S. from 1996  to  2006 , and comprise nearly 32  %   of   births  in  the  U.S.  और  Canada .
With  आदर  to induced labor ,  अधिक  than 22 % of women  undergo  induction of labour  in  the  संयुक्त  States .
Medical professional  नीति  makers find that induced births and elective cesarean can be  नुकसानदेह  to the fetus and neonate as well as harmful or  बगैर   लाभ   to  the mother  ,  and have established strict guidelines  लिये  non-medically indicated induced births  और  elective cesarean before 39 weeks  .
Viva La Bam was an  एमटीवी  & Viva show which followed  bam  Margera and his  क्रू  as they undertook challenges , performed stunts and traveled the world .
The show ran for 5 seasons between 2003 and 2005  .
Flushed Away is a 2006 British/American computer animated action /  एडवेंचर  comedy film directed by David Bowers and Sam  गिरी  .
It was made in the partnership between  aardman  Animations and DreamWorks Animation , and is Aardman 's first completely computer-animated feature as opposed to the  usual   stop-motion  .
The film  सितारों   the  voice talents of Hugh Jackman , Kate  विंसलेट  , Andy Serkis ,  विधेयक  Nighy  ,  Ian  mckellen  , Shane Richie  और  Jean Reno .
The story was by  sam   गिरी  , Peter Lord , Dick Clement , and Ian La Frenais , and the screenplay  थी  written by Dick Clement  ,  Ian La Frenais  ,  Christopher Lloyd , Joe Keenan , and William Davies .
The film was released  in   us  on 3 November 2006 , and in UK on December  1  2006 ,  और   थी   वितरित  by Paramount Pictures , except  लिये  Switzerland , Spain , and the  नीदरलैंड्स  , which were handled by Universal  तस्वीरें  .
the  Atlanta  braves   हैं  a  पेशेवर  baseball team based in Atlanta .
The Braves  हैं  a member of the Eastern  प्रभाग  of  प्रमुख  League Baseball 's National  लीग  .
The Braves have played in  टर्नर  Field since 1997 .
The  ``  Braves '' name  ,  which was first  प्रयुक्त  in 1912 , originates  इससे  a  पद   लिये   a  Native American  योद्धा  .
They are nicknamed  ``  the Bravos '' ,  और  often referred to as `` America 's Team `` in reference to the team 's games being  ब्रॉडकास्ट  on the nationally available  tbs  from the 1970s until 2007 , gaining a wide  fanbase  .
From 1991 to 2005 the Braves were one of the  सबसे  successful  franchises  in baseball , winning  प्रभाग  titles an unprecedented 14 consecutive  टाइम्स  in that period ( omitting the strike-shortened 1994 season in  जिससे  there were no official division champions ) .
The  braves   जीती  the NL West  1991–93  and  the  NL East 1995–2005 , and returned to the  playoffs  as the National League Wild Card in 2010  .
The Braves  उन्नत  to the World Series five times  in  the 1990s ,  जीतना  the title in 1995 .
Since their debut in the National League in  1876  ,  the  franchise has won  16   डिवीजनल  titles , 17 National League pennants  ,  as well as three World Series  championships—in  1914 as the Boston Braves ,  in  1957 as the Milwaukee Braves ,  और  in 1995 in  अटलांटा  .
The Braves are the only MLB franchise to have won the World Series in three different  घर  cities .
The club is one of  the  National League 's two remaining charter franchises (  the  other being the Chicago Cubs ) and was  संस्थापित   in  Boston  ,  Massachusetts ,  in   1871  as the Boston Red Stockings ( not to  be  confused with the American League 's Boston Red Sox ) .
They are considered `` the oldest continuously  playing  team  in  major North American sports . ''
There is an  तर्क  as to who  is  actually older because although the Cubs  हैं  a full season `` older ''  (  formed as the Chicago White Stockings in 1870 ) Chicago lost two  सीज़न   to  the Great Chicago Fire ,  यूँ  the Braves  have  played more consecutive seasons .
बाद  various name changes ( such as the Boston Beaneaters ) , the team operated as  the   बोस्टन  Braves for  सबसे   of  the first half of the 20th century .
In 1953 , the team  स्थानांतरित  to Milwaukee  ,   विस्कॉन्सिन  and became the Milwaukee Braves ,  followed  by the move  to  Atlanta in  1966  .
The team 's tenure  in  Atlanta is famous for Hank  आरोन   तोड़कर  Babe Ruth 's career home  चलाएं  record  in  1974  ,  though the majority of Aaron 's home runs were  hit  while the team was in Milwaukee .
His record  stood  until 2007 , when San Francisco left fielder Barry Bonds broke  the  record  .
The leaves of a  beech  tree
3D rendering  of   a  μCT scan  of  a leaf piece , resolution circa 40 μm/  voxel  .
A  पत्ता  is an organ of a  vascular   संयंत्र  , as defined  in  botanical terms , and  in  particular in plant  morphology  .
Foliage  is   a  mass  संज्ञा  that refers to leaves as a feature  of  plants .
typically  a  पत्ता  is a thin  ,  flattened organ  borne  above ground  और  specialized for photosynthesis  ,  but many types of leaves are adapted in ways almost  unrecognisable  in those  शर्तें  :  कुछ  are not flat  (  for example many  रसीले  leaves and  conifers  ) , some  हैं   नहीं   ऊपर  ground  (  such as bulb  तराजू  ) , and some are without major photosynthetic function ( consider for example cataphylls , spines , and cotyledons ) .
Conversely  ,  many  structures  of non-vascular  पौधे   ,  or  भी  of some lichens ,  जिससे  are not plants at all (  in  the  भाव  of being members of  the  kingdom Plantae ) , do look and function much like leaves .
Furthermore , several structures found in vascular plants  dekh  like leaves but are not actually leaves ; they differ from  पत्ते  in their  structures   और  origins .
Examples include  phyllodes   ,  cladodes ,  और  phylloclades .
Title  कार्ड  for the 1937 Our Gang comedy Rushin ' Ballet .
Our Gang ( also known as The Little Rascals  or  Hal Roach 's Rascals )  हैं  a series of American comedy short films about  a   समूह  of  ग़रीब  neighborhood children and their adventures .
Created by comedy producer Hal Roach ,  the  series is  विख्यात   लिये  showing children behaving in a relatively natural way  ,   as  Roach and  असली  director Robert F. McGowan  worked  to film the unaffected , raw nuances  apparent  in  नियमित   children  rather than have  उन्हें  imitate adult acting styles .
In addition , Our Gang notably  put  boys , girls , whites and blacks together in a  समूह  as equals , something that  ``  broke new  मैदान  , '' according to film  इतिहासकार   लियोनार्ड   maltin   .
Such a thing had never been done  पहले  in  सिनेमा  but has since  महरूम  repeated  बाद  the success of Our  गिरोह   .
The  पहला   उत्पादन  at the  रोच  studio in 1922  थी  a  श्रेणी  of silent short subjects .
When Roach changed distributors from Pathé to Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer ( MGM  )   in  1927 ,  और  converted the series to sound in 1929 , the series took off even further .
Production continued  at  the Roach studio until 1938 , when the series was sold to MGM , who then continued producing the  comedies  until 1944 .
The Our Gang series  शामिल  a total of 220  शॉर्ट्स   और   एक  feature film  ,  General Spanky , featuring over  forty-one  child  अभिनेताओं  .
As  mgm  retained the rights to the Our Gang trademark following their purchase of the  उत्पादन  rights  ,  the 80  roach-produced  `` talkies '' were  syndicated  for  टेलीविज़न   अंतर्गत  the title The Little Rascals beginning  in  1955 .
Both  रोच  's  the  Little Rascals package  (  now owned by CBS Television Distribution ) and MGM 's Our Gang package (  अभी   स्वामित्व  by  warner  Bros. Entertainment )  have  since remained in  अनुप्रयोग  , with periodic new productions based on the shorts surfacing over the years ,  सहित  a 1994 Little Rascals feature film released by Universal Pictures .
Zacharias Janssen ( also Zacharias  जानसन  or Sacharias Jansen ) (  b.1580-88  , d.pre-1632 to  1638   )  was a Dutch  spectacle-maker   इससे   middelburg   संबद्ध  with  the  invention of  the  first optical telescope .
Janssen is sometimes also credited  लिये  inventing  the  first truly compound microscope .
However  ,  the origin of the microscope , just like the  उत्पत्ति   of  the telescope  ,   is  a matter of debate  .
Lake Tahoe  (  ; Washo : dáʔaw ) is a large freshwater  झील  in the Sierra  नेवाडा  of  the  United States .
at  a surface  उन्नयन  of ,  it  is located along the border between California and Nevada , west of Carson City .
Lake Tahoe is the largest  अल्पाइन  lake in  उत्तर   अमेरिका   .
Its  गहराई   is  , making it the United  राज्य  's second-deepest ( the deepest is  crater  Lake in Oregon  ,  being  deeper  , at ) .
additionally   ,  Lake  tahoe  is listed  as  the 26th largest  झील  by  आवाज़   in  the  संसार  at  .
The lake was formed about 2 million years ago and is a part of the Lake  tahoe  Basin with the modern lake being shaped during the ice  आयु  .
It is known for the clarity of  इसके  water and the panorama of surrounding mountains on  सब  sides .
The area surrounding  the  lake is also referred to as  झील  Tahoe , or simply Tahoe .
Lake Tahoe is a major tourist attraction  in  both Nevada  और  California .
It is home to  a  number of ski resorts ,  गर्मियाँ  outdoor recreation , and tourist attractions  .
Snow and skiing are a significant  भाग  of  the   क्षेत्रफल   's  economy and  प्रतिष्ठा  .
पहाड़  and lake scenery are attractions  throughout  the year .
The  नेवाडा  side  भी  includes  विशाल  casinos  .
राजमार्गों  provide year-round access from Reno , Carson City , and  sacramento  .

The Twenty-seventh Amendment  (  Amendment XXVII ) prohibits any law that increases or decreases the salary of members of  the  Congress from taking effect  जबतक   the  start of the next set of terms of office for Representatives .
It is the most  हाल  amendment to  the  United States Constitution .
it  was  सुपुर्द  to the  राज्य  for ratification in 1789 and  थी  adopted in 1992 .
“First they  आए   ...  ” is  a  famous statement and provocative poem attributed to  पादरी  Martin Niemöller (  1892–1984   )   परिचय  the sloth of German intellectuals following the Nazis  '  rise to power and the subsequent purging of their chosen targets , group after group .
There is some disagreement over the exact wording of  the  quotation  और  when  it  was created ; the  सामग्री  of the quotation may  have  been presented differently by  niemöller  on different  अवसरों  .
