Four Thirds logo
The Four Thirds system  is  a standard created  by  Olympus and Kodak for  डिजिटल  single-lens reflex camera (  dslr  ) design and development. < ref name='DPReview.com 2001-02-13 ' >
The system provides a standard that , with digital  कैमरे  and lenses available from  अनेक  manufacturers , allows for the interchange of lenses and bodies from different  निर्माताओं  .
seems  to   कवर  the standard .
Proponents describe it as  an  open  मानक   ,   लकिन   कंपनियाँ  may only use it  अंतर्गत   a  non-disclosure agreement .
Unlike older SLR systems , Four Thirds has  महरूम  designed from the  मैदान  up to be entirely digital  .
Many lenses are  extensively  computerized , to the point that Olympus offers  फर्मवेयर  updates for many of them .
Lens design has been tailored to the requirements of digital sensors , most  notably  through telecentric designs .
The size  of  the sensor is significantly smaller than  लिये  most  dslrs  and  इस  implies that  lenses  ,  विशेषकर   telephoto  lenses , can be  छोटी  .
For example , a Four Thirds lens  साथ  a 300 mm focal length  होता  cover about the  वही  angle of view as a 600 mm focal length  लेंस  for the 35 mm film standard , and is correspondingly more  कॉम्पैक्ट  .
Thus , the  चार  Thirds System has crop factor ( focal length multiplier ) of  परिचय  2 ,  और   जबकि  this  enables  longer  फोकल  length for  वृहद  magnification , it  करता  n't aid the manufacture of  चौड़ी   कोण  lenses .
The image sensor format , generally intermediate between those of larger SLRs and  छोटी   कॉम्पैक्ट  cameras , generally gives levels of cost , performance and convenience intermediate between those two classes .
HVAC systems use ventilation air ducts installed throughout a building to  सप्लाई  conditioned air  to   a  room through outlet vents , called diffusers ; and ducts to remove  एयर  through return-air  grilles  .
hvac  ( heating ,  वेंटिलेशन  , and air conditioning  )  is the  प्रौद्योगिकी  of indoor and automotive  पर्यावरणीय  comfort .
HVAC  प्रणाली  design is  a  subdiscipline  of  mechanical engineering , based on the principles of thermodynamics , fluid mechanics , and heat transfer .
Refrigeration is sometimes added to the field 's abbreviation as HVAC & R or HVACR , or ventilating is dropped as  in  HACR ( such  as  the designation  of  HACR-rated  सर्किट  breakers )  .
HVAC is important in  the   डिज़ाइन  of  मीडियम  to large industrial and office buildings such as skyscrapers and in marine environments such as  एक्वैरियम   ,   जहाँ  safe and healthy building conditions  हैं  regulated with respect to temperature and humidity ,  using  fresh air  इससे  outdoors .
वेंटिलेशन  on  the  downdraught system , by  impulsion  , or the 'plenum '  principle  , applied to schoolrooms ( 1899 )
Heating  ,  ventilating , and air  कंडीशनिंग  is  आधारित  on inventions and discoveries  बना  by Nikolay  lvov  ,  माइकल  Faraday , Willis Carrier , Reuben Trane , James Joule , William  rankine  , Sadi Carnot ,  और   अनेक   अन्य  .
The invention of  the  components  of   hvac  systems went  hand-in-hand  with the industrial revolution , and new  विधि  of modernization , higher efficiency , and  प्रणाली  control are constantly introduced  by  companies and inventors worldwide .
The three central functions of  हीटिंग  ,  ventilating  , and air-conditioning are  interrelated  , especially with the need to provide  थर्मल  comfort and acceptable  अंदर  air quality within reasonable installation , operation  ,  and maintenance  लागत  .
HVAC systems  can  provide ventilation , reduce air  घुसपैठ  , and maintain pressure relationships between spaces .
The means of  एयर  delivery  और  removal from spaces is  ज्ञात  as room  एयर  distribution .
The starting point in  carrying  out an estimate both  लिये  cooling and heating depends on the exterior climate  और   आंतरिक  specified conditions .
however  before taking  up   the  heat load calculation , it is necessary to find  भैस  air  आवश्यकताएँ  for each area in detail , as  pressurization  is  an   महत्वपूर्ण  consideration .
In modern buildings the design , installation , and control systems of these  कृत्यों  are integrated  into   एक  or more HVAC systems .
For very small  इमारतें   ,  contractors normally capacity engineer and select  hvac  systems and equipment .
For larger buildings , building services designers and engineers , such as mechanical , architectural ,  or  building services engineers analyze , design , and specify the  hvac  systems , and specialty mechanical contractors fabricate and commission them .
Building  permits  and code-compliance inspections of the installations are normally required for  सब  sizes  of  buildings .
the  HVAC industry  is   a  worldwide enterprise , with roles  सहित  operation and maintenance ,  प्रणाली  design and construction , equipment manufacturing and sales , and  in  education and research  .
The HVAC  उद्योग   थी  historically regulated  by  the manufacturers of HVAC equipment , but regulating and standards organizations such  as  HARDI  ,  ASHRAE , SMACNA , ACCA , Uniform Mechanical Code  ,  International  mechanical  Code , and AMCA have been established to support the  उद्योग   और  encourage high standards  और  achievement .
Royal Navy Commander  जेम्स  Bond ,  cmg  , RNVR  ,  is a  fictional  character created  by  British journalist  और  novelist Ian  फ्लेमिंग   in  1953 .
He is the  समर्थक   of  the James Bond series of novels , films , comics  और   वीडियो   खेल  .
फ्लेमिंग  wrote twelve Bond novels and two short  स्टोरी  collections before his death , although  the   पिछला  two books— The Man with  the  Golden Gun and Octopussy and The Living  daylights   —were  published posthumously .
the   बंध  character is a Secret Service agent , code number 007 , residing in London  लकिन  active internationally .
बंध  was a composite character who was based on a number of commandos whom Fleming knew  दौरान  his  सेवा  in the Naval Intelligence Division during World  युद्ध  II , to  जिसको  Fleming added his own style and a  क्रमांक  of  उसके  own tastes ; Bond 's name was  appropriated  from  अमरीकी  ornithologist James Bond  .
बंध  has a number of  अक्षर  traits which run throughout the books  ,  including an enjoyment of cars ,  a  love of food and drink , and  an  average intake of sixty custom-made cigarettes a day .
चूंकि  Fleming 's death in 1964  ,  there have been other authorised writers of Bond material , including  जॉन   गार्डनर  ,  जो  wrote fourteen novels and two novelizations  और  Raymond Benson  ,  who wrote six novels  ,   तीन  novelizations and three short stories  .
There  have  also been three  लेखक  who wrote one book  प्रत्येक  , Kingsley Amis (  लिखने   as   रॉबर्ट  Markham ) , Sebastian Faulks  और  Jeffery Deaver  .
additionally   a  series  of  novels based  on  Bond 's youth— Young Bond —was written  by  Charlie  higson  .
As  spin-offs  from the literary works ,  वहीँ  was a television adaptation  of  the  पहला   अनोखा   ,  Casino  royale  ,  in   जिससे  Bond was played as an American agent  .
A  कॉमिक  strip series also ran  in  the Daily  एक्स्प्रेस  newspaper  .
There have also  महरूम  twenty-five Bond films ; seven actors have played Bond in these  films  .
`` Nature  लड़के  '' is a song  by   ईडन  Ahbez , published in 1947 .
The  सोंग  tells  a  fantasy of a  ``  strange enchanted boy ... who wandered very far  ''  only  to  learn that  ``  the greatest thing ...  थी  just  to  love and be loved in return '' .
Nat King Cole 's 1948 recording of the song was a  प्रमुख  hit and  ``  Nature Boy '' has  चूंकि  become a pop and jazz standard ,  साथ  dozens of major artists interpreting the  सोंग  .
Louisiana ( or ; , ;  louisiana  Creole : Léta de la  lwizyàn   )   is  a  राज्य  located in  the  southern region of the United States of America .
Louisiana  is  the  31st  most  extensive  and the 25th most populous of the 50 United States .
Its capital is Baton Rouge and largest  नगर  is New Orleans .
louisiana   is  the only state in the U.S. with political subdivisions  termed  parishes , which are local government 's equivalent  to   काउंटी  .
the  largest parish by population is  ईस्ट  Baton Rouge  मोहल्ला  ,  और  the  largest  by land area is  cameron   मोहल्ला  .
much   of  the state  's  lands  यहूद  formed from  sediment  washed down  the  Mississippi River , leaving enormous deltas and vast areas of coastal marsh and swamp .
These contain a rich southern biota ;  ठेठ  examples include  पक्षियों  such as  आइबिस  and egrets .
There are also  अनेक   प्रजाति  of tree  मेंढक  , and fish  ऐसे   as   sturgeon  and paddlefish .
in   अधिक  elevated  क्षेत्रों  , fire is a natural process in  the   लैंडस्केप   ,  and has  उत्पादित   extensive  areas of longleaf pine forest and  गीला  savannas .
These  support  an exceptionally large  क्रमांक  of plant species , including many species of orchids  और  carnivorous  पौधे  .
कुछ  Louisiana  शहरी   environments   have   a   multicultural  , multilingual heritage  ,  being so strongly influenced  by  an  जिसमें  of 18th-century French  ,  Spanish , Native American ( Indian ) and  अफ़्रीकी  cultures that  वे  are considered to be somewhat exceptional  in  the U.S .
Before  the  American purchase  of  the territory , the current Louisiana  राज्य  had  महरूम  both a Spanish and French colony .
In addition , the  पैटर्न  of development included importing  numerous  African  स्लेव  in the 18th  सदी  , with many from the same region of West Africa , thus concentrating their culture  .
in  the  post-civil  War environment  ,  Anglo-Americans increased  the   दबाव  for Anglicization , and  in  1915 ,  अंग्रेज़ी  was  बना  the only official language  of   the   राज्य  .
Women  's  rights are  the  rights and entitlements claimed  लिये  women and girls of many societies worldwide  .
In some places  ये   अधिकारों  are  institutionalized  or supported by law , local custom , and behaviour , whereas in others they may be ignored or suppressed .
They  differ  from broader notions of human rights through claims of an  अंतर्निहित  historical and traditional bias against the exercise of rights by women and  लड़कियों  in favour  of  men and  लड़कों  .
मुद्दे  commonly associated with  धारणाएं  of women 's rights include , though are not limited to ,  the  right  :  to bodily integrity and autonomy  ;  to vote ( suffrage  )  ;  to  hold public  दफ्तर  ; to work ; to fair wages or equal pay ; to own property ; to education ; to serve in the military or be conscripted ; to enter into legal contracts ; and to  have  marital , parental and religious rights .
The laws of science or scientific  कानून  are statements that describe , predict , and perhaps explain why  ,   a  range  of  phenomena  व्यवहार  as they appear to in nature .
The  पद   ``  law '' has diverse usage  in  many cases :  सन्निकट  , accurate , broad  or  narrow theories  ,   in  all  प्राकृतिक  scientific disciplines ( physics ,  रसायन  , biology  ,   भूविज्ञान  , astronomy etc . ) .
An analogous term for a scientific law is  a  principle .
Scientific laws:
summarize a large collection  of  facts determined by experiment into a single statement,
can  usually be formulated mathematically  as  one or several statements or equation , or at least stated in a single sentence , so that  it  can be used to predict  the   निष्कर्ष  of an experiment ,  दिए   the   आरंभिक  , boundary , and  अन्य  physical conditions of  the  processes which take place,
are  strongly   समर्थित  by  अनुभवजन्य  evidence  -   वे  are  वैज्ञानिक  knowledge that experiments  have   repeatedly  verified  (  and never  falsified  ) .
Their  सटीकता  does not change  जब  new theories are worked out , but rather  the  scope of application , since the equation (  if  any ) representing  the  law does  नहीं  change .
As  साथ  other scientific knowledge , they do not have absolute certainty  जैसे   गणितीय   theorems  or identities , and  it   is  always possible for  a  law to be overturned by  भविष्य  observations .
are  प्रायः   कोटेड  as a fundamental controlling influence rather than a description of observed facts  .
I.e . `` the laws of motion require  कि  ''
Laws differ from hypotheses and postulates , which are proposed during the scientific process before and during  validation   by  experiment  और   अवलोकन  .
ये  are  नहीं  laws since they have not been verified  to  the same degree  और  may not  be  sufficiently general , although they may lead to the formulation of laws .
A law is a more  solidified   और  formal statement ,  आसुत   इससे  repeated  प्रयोग  .
Although the  अवधारणाओं  of a law  or  principle in nature is borderline to philosophy  ,  and presents the depth to which  गणित   can   describe  nature , scientific laws are considered from a scientific perspective  और   follow  the  वैज्ञानिक   विधि  ;  वे  ``  serve  their  purpose  '' rather than `` questioning  वास्तविकता   ''  ( philosophical )  or   ``  statements of logical absolution '' ( mathematical )  .
For example  ,   whether   a  law `` refers to reality '' is a philosophical issue , rather  than  scientific .
Fundamentally , all scientific laws follow from  भौतिकी  , laws  जिससे  occur in other sciences ultimately follow from physical laws .
Often ,  इससे  mathematically fundamental viewpoints , universal  स्थिरांक  emerge from scientific laws .
The  लॉन्च   of  the PlayStation 3 into  the   जापानी  market on  10  November 2006 marked the second major seventh  पीढी  entertainment system to  be  released .
The system was released seven  दिनों  later  on  17 November in the United States .
परिचय  into other world markets was delayed by a shortage of diodes for  उपयोग  in the Blu-ray disc player ; the device  थी  launched in European and other world  बाज़ार  in  the  first half  of  2007 .
लॉरेन  Fenmore Baldwin ( formerly Williams  और  Grainger ) is a  fictional  character  इससे   the  CBS soap operas The Young and the Restless  और  The  बिंदास  and the Beautiful , portrayed  by  Tracey E. Bregman .
वो  made  उसके  debut during the episode airing on  जनवरी  21 , 1983 .
In 1992  ,   bregman  began  बनाना  sporadic  दिखावे  on  the  Bold  और   the   खूबसूरत  , later resulting in the  अक्षर   migrating  there fully  in  1995 .
Following a  अतिथि  appearance in 2000  ,  Bregman returned to The Young and the Restless on August  24  , 2001 , remaining  on  recurring status .
In 2013 , it  थी  announced  कि  Bregman  था  been  लगाई  on contract .
Much  of   लॉरेन  's history has  revolved  around her romances with Paul  विलियम्स  , Scott  grainger  , Sr. , and Michael Baldwin  among  many others causing a  fierce  rivalry with Traci Abbott Connolly .
Lauren is  भी  famous for her long , violent rivalry with Sheila Carter .
The 2010 NBA Finals was the National Basketball Association ( NBA )  चैंपियनशिप  series for the 2009–10 season  .
the  best-of-seven playoff  थी   लडे   between  the Los Angeles  लेकर्स  ,  champions   of  the Western Conference  और   defending   एनबीए   champions  , and the Boston Celtics , champions of  the  Eastern  सम्मेलन   .
The Lakers  पराजित  the Celtics , four games to three , to  जीत   the  franchise  's  16th NBA championship .
The 64th edition of the championship  श्रेणी   थी  played  between  June 3 and June  17  , was broadcast on  एबीसी  ,  और  was watched by an average of  18.1  million people .
The  सेल्टिक्स  earned  उनके  berth into the playoffs  by  winning  the  Atlantic Division .
The Lakers  जीती  the Pacific  प्रभाग  to earn their berth  .
The Celtics reached  the  NBA  फाइनल  by defeating the Miami  ऊष्मा  in the  best-of-seven  Eastern Conference First Round , the Cleveland Cavaliers in the best-of-seven Eastern Conference Semifinals , and defending  पूर्वी  conference champion Orlando Magic in the best-of-seven Eastern Conference Finals .
The Lakers reached the NBA Finals by defeating the Oklahoma City Thunder in  the  best-of-seven Western Conference  पहला  Round ,  the  Utah Jazz  in  the best-of-seven Western Conference  semifinals  , and the Phoenix Suns in the best-of-seven  पश्चिमी  Conference Finals .
The NBA Finals were scheduled in the  प्रमुख  League Baseball World Series  2–3–2  seven game format , with the Lakers possessing home-court advantage as  a  reward for finishing with better  नियमित  season record  than  the  सेल्टिक्स  .
Repeated  baskets  from starters Kobe Bryant , Pau  gasol   ,  and  रॉन  Artest brought the Lakers close to victory in Game 1 .
a  record breaking performance from Ray Allen  's  eight three-point baskets ensured the  सेल्टिक्स   a  Game 2  triumph  .
Derek Fisher ’s 11 points in the  चौथी  quarter helped the Lakers win  खेल  3 .
The Celtics won  खेल  4 ; it did n't hurt that they netted an excellent performance in baskets by the team’s reserves , while Paul Pierce led the team to a Game 5 win  साथ  27 points on 57 % shooting from the floor .
the   लेकर्स  avoided elimination by  जीतना  a decisive  खेल  6 with 24  अंक  contributed by their bench .
Although they  trailed  the Celtics by 13  अंक  early in the  तीसरा  quarter  ,  the Lakers rallied and won their  दूसरी  consecutive championship by taking over an  रोमांचक  Game 7 aided by late contributions on offense by  pau  Gasol and Artest and rebounding .
Bryant was named Most  मूल्यवान  Player of the Finals for  उसके  second  लगातार  trophy .
This  थी  the  पहला  NBA  फाइनल  to  go  the full seven games since  और  only  the   चौथी  since the NBA Finals returned to a 2–3–2 format in .
The Laker  मताधिकार   रै  16 NBA  championships  (  पाँच  in Minneapolis  ,   11  in Los Angeles ) trailing the Celtics ' seventeen championships .
The NBA  फाइनल  used the `` World Series '' Format in 1949 Minneapolis Lakers defeated the Washington Capitols 4 games to 2 ; in 1953  मिनियापोलिस  defeated the  नई   यॉर्क  Knicks 4 games to 1 ;  in  1954 Minneapolis  पराजित  the Syracuse Nationals 4 games  to  3 ;  और  in 1955 Syracuse Nationals defeated the Fort  वेन   पिस्टन्स  4 games  to  3 .
The NBA  होता   वापसी  to the 2–2–1–1–1 National Hockey League seven game series format until 1985 .
Black pepper ( Piper nigrum  )  is  a  flowering vine in the family Piperaceae ,  cultivated  for its  फल  , which is usually  सूखी   और  used as a spice  और  seasoning .
The fruit , known as a peppercorn when dried , is approximately in diameter ,  अंधेरा   रेड  when fully mature , and , like all drupes , contains a single seed  .
peppercorns   ,  and the  मैदान   pepper  derived from them  ,  may be described simply as pepper , or  अधिक   precisely  as black  pepper   (  cooked and dried unripe fruit )  ,  green pepper ( dried  unripe  fruit )  और  white pepper ( dried ripe seeds ) .
Black pepper is native to south India ,  और  is  extensively   cultivated  there  और   elsewhere  in  तीव्र  regions  .
Currently Vietnam is the world 's largest producer and exporter of  pepper   ,   producing  34 % of  the  world 's  पाइपर  nigrum  क्रॉप  as  of   2008  .
Dried ground pepper has been used since antiquity for both its flavour  और  as a medicine .
Black pepper is the world 's  सबसे  traded spice .
It is  एक  of the most common spices added to European cuisine and  इसके  descendants  .
the   spiciness  of black pepper is due to the chemical  piperine  , not to  be  confused with the capsaicin that  देता  fleshy peppers  theirs   .
It is  in  the  आधुनिक  world , often  युग्म  with  नमक  .
In cardiovascular physiology ,  ejection   भिन्न  (  ef  ) represents the  आयतनी   भिन्न   of  blood  उत्तेजित  out of the ventricle ( heart  )  with each heart beat or  हृदय  cycle .
it  can be applied  to  either the right ventricle which ejects via the  pulmonary  valve  into  the pulmonary circulation or  the  left  ventricle  which ejects via the aortic valve into the  प्रणालीगत  circulation .
Imaging of the physiology of the  mammalian  heart is the art that allows meaningful mathematical expression  धमक  EF .
Noninvasive cardiac imaging has become a  विश्वव्यापी  utility enabling study of cardiac performance  reproducibly  and  inexpensively  .
Simplified , Ejection fraction  is  a  गणितीय  product allowed by cardiac imaging .
As a  गणितीय  term , Ejection Fraction is an extension of the work  of  Adolph  फिक  in cardiac output .
Dedicated technology such as Echocardiography , Computed  टोमोग्राफी  , Magnetic Resonance Imaging  और  MUGA scanning have definitively  अनुमत   clinically  relevant mathematics regarding Ischemia , Congenital Heart Disease and Heart Failure .
The prosecutor is the  मुख्य   विधिक  representative of the prosecution in  देशों  with either the common law  adversarial  system  ,   or   the  civil  विधि   inquisitorial   प्रणाली  .
The prosecution is  the  legal  पार्टी   जिम्मेदार  for presenting the case in  a  criminal trial against an individual accused  of  breaking the law .
Strawberry shortcake most  commonly  means a dessert in the  shortcake  family  of  cakes .
Strawberry shortcake may  भी  refer  to:
स्ट्रॉबेरी  Shortcake , a  अक्षर  and  मताधिकार  created by American Greetings
The shortened  शीर्षक  of Strawberry on the Shortcake , a Japanese  रोमांस   फिल्म  .
Abū al-Qāsim  muḥammad  ibn ʿAbd Allāh ibn ʿAbd al-Muṭṭalib ibn  hāshim  ( ) (  circa|  570 – circa| 8  जून  632  )  , also transliterated as  मुहम्मद  (  )  ,  थी  a religious , political , and  सैन्य  leader from  मक्का  who unified Arabia into a single religious polity  अंतर्गत  Islam .
He is believed by Muslims and Bahá'ís to  be   a  messenger and prophet of God  .
Muhammad  is  almost universally considered  by  Muslims as  the  last  नबी   भेजा  by God for mankind .
Non-Muslims regard Muhammad  as  the  संस्थापक   of  Islam  .
Muslims  consider  him to be  the  restorer of  an  unaltered original  monotheistic  faith of Adam  ,  Noah , Abraham ,  मूसा  ,  यीशु  , and other prophets .
Born  in  about 570 CE  in  the Arabian city  of  Mecca , he was orphaned at an early age and  brought  up under  the  care  of   उसके  uncle Abu Talib  .
He later worked  ज़्यादातर  as a  व्यापारी  ,  as  well as a shepherd , and was first  शादीशुदा   by   आयु  25 .
Being in  the   आदत  of periodically retreating to a cave in the surrounding mountains for  अनेक  nights of seclusion and prayer ,  he  later reported that it was there , at age 40 , that he  प्राप्त   उसके  first revelation from God .
Three years after this  इवेंट  Muhammad started  उपदेश  these revelations  सरेआम   ,  proclaiming that `` God is One `` , that complete  ``   आत्मसमर्पण  ''  to  Him ( lit .
islām )  is  the only way ( dīn ) acceptable  to   परमेश्वर  , and that he himself was a  नबी  and messenger of God  ,  in the same  रग  as other Islamic  नबियों  .
Muhammad gained few followers early  on  , and was met with hostility from some Meccan  जनजातियों  ; he  और  his followers were  treated  harshly .
To escape  persecution  , Muhammad sent some of his  अनुसरणकर्ता   to  Abyssinia  पहले  he and his  अनुसरणकर्ता  in  मक्का  migrated to Medina ( then known as Yathrib )  in  the year 622 .
इस  event , the Hijra , marks the beginning of the Islamic  पंचांग   ,  which  is  also known as  the   hijri  Calendar .
In Medina ,  मुहम्मद  united  the  tribes under the  संविधान  of Medina .
After  आठ  years of fighting with the Meccan tribes , his  अनुसरणकर्ता  , who by then had grown to 10,000  ,  took control of Mecca  in  the largely  शांतिपूर्ण  Conquest of Mecca .
He destroyed the pagan idols in the city and then sent his followers out to destroy all of  the  remaining  pagan  temples  in  Eastern  अरब  .
In 632 , a few months after returning to Medina  इससे  The Farewell Pilgrimage , Muhammad  गिरी  ill and  died  .
By the time of his death , most  of  the  arabian  Peninsula had converted to Islam ,  और  he had united Arabia  into   a  single Muslim religious polity .
The revelations ( or Ayah , lit  .
`` Signs [  of  God ] ''  )  — which Muhammad reported receiving  जबतक  his death – form the verses  of  the Quran , regarded  by  Muslims  as  the `` Word of God '' and around  जिससे  the religion is based  .
Besides the Quran , Muhammad 's  जीवन  ( sira ) and traditions ( sunnah ) are also  upheld  by Muslims  as  the sources  of  sharia law .
They discuss Muhammad  और   अन्य  prophets of Islam with reverence , adding  the  phrase peace be  upon  him whenever their names are mentioned  .
While  conceptions  of Muhammad in medieval Christendom and premodern times were largely negative , appraisals in modern history have been far less  so  .
the  Great Books ( second  संस्करण  )
Great Books of the Western World is a series of books originally  प्रकाशित  in  the  United  राज्य  in 1952 by Encyclopædia Britannica Inc. to present the  ग्रेट  Books in a single package of 54 volumes .
The series is now  in  its second edition and contains  60  volumes .
The original editors  of   the   श्रेणी  chose three criteria  लिये  inclusion : a book  जरूर  be relevant to  समकालीन   मुद्दे  , and not only  महत्वपूर्ण  in its historical context ; it must reward rereading ; and  it  must be a part of `` the great conversation  परिचय  the great ideas , '' relevant to at least 25  of  the 102 great ideas identified by the editors .
Books were not chosen on the basis of ethnic or cultural inclusiveness , historical influence , or the editors ' agreement with the  दृश्य  expressed .
``  Cocaine '' is a song written and recorded  by  JJ Cale in  1976  , but also  ज्ञात  as  a  cover version recorded by Eric Clapton .
allmusic  calls the latter `` among [ Clapton 's ] most enduringly popular  हिट्स  '' and notes that `` even for an artist like Clapton with a huge body of high-quality work ,  'cocaine   '  ranks among  उसके  best  .   ''
Glyn Johns ,  जो  had previously worked  साथ   the  Who  ,  Led Zeppelin  और  The  रोलिंग  Stones  ,  produced the Clapton recording ,  जिससे   थी   released  on Clapton 's 1977 album Slowhand and as  a   सिंगल  in 1980 .
The live version of ``  कोका   ''  ,  इससे  the Just One Night album recorded in Tokyo , charted on the Billboard Hot  100   as  the B-side of  ``   तुलसा  Time ``  ,  which was a No  .  30 hit  in   1980.  ``
कोका  '' was  एक  of several of Cale 's  गीतों  recorded by Clapton  ,   सहित  ``  बाद  Midnight `` and ``  travelin  ' Light '' .
The attack on Pearl Harbor ( called Hawaii Operation or Operation AI by  the  Japanese  इम्पीरियल  General Headquarters (  आपरेशन  Z in  नियोजन  )  और  the Battle of Pearl Harbor )  थी   a  surprise  सैन्य   स्ट्राइक  conducted by  the  Imperial  जापानी  Navy against the  संयुक्त  States naval base at  पर्ल  Harbor , Hawaii , on the morning of December 7  ,  1941  (  December  8  in  जापानी   )  .
From the standpoint of the defenders  ,  the  आक्रमण  commenced at 7:48 a.m. Hawaiian  समय  .
The attack  थी  intended  as  a preventive  कार्रवाई  in order to keep the U.S. Pacific  बेड़े  from interfering with military actions the Empire  of   जापानी  was  नियोजन  in Southeast Asia against overseas territories of the United Kingdom , the  नीदरलैंड्स  , and the  संयुक्त  States .
The base  थी  attacked by 353 Japanese  सेनानी  , bombers and torpedo planes  in  two waves  ,  launched from six  वायुयान  carriers .
सब   आठ  U.S. Navy battleships were damaged  ,  with four being  sunk  .
Two of these  यहूद  later raised , and with the  बाकी  four  repaired  , six battleships returned  to  service later  in  the  युद्ध  .
The Japanese also sank  or  damaged  तीन   cruisers   ,  three destroyers , an anti-aircraft training ship , and one minelayer .
188 U.S. aircraft were destroyed ; 2,402 Americans were killed and  1,282  wounded  .
Important base installations such as the power station  ,  shipyard  ,  maintenance  ,  and  ईंधन   और  torpedo storage facilities  ,  as well as the submarine piers and headquarters  भवन   (  also home of the intelligence section  )  were not  attacked   .
जापानी   नुकसान  were light : 29 aircraft and five midget submarines lost ,  और   65   servicemen  killed or wounded .
One  जापानी  sailor was captured .
The attack came as  a  profound shock to the American people and  led  directly to the  अमरीकी   प्रविष्टि   into  World War II in both the Pacific and European theaters .
The  following  day ( December  8  ) , the United States declared  युद्ध  on Japan .
Domestic support for  non-interventionism  ,  जिससे   था  been strong  ,  disappeared  .
Clandestine  support  of Britain ( for example  the  Neutrality Patrol )  थी   replaced  by active alliance .
Subsequent operations by the  u.S.   prompted  Germany and Italy to declare  युद्ध  on  the  U.S. on December 11  ,  which was reciprocated by  the   u.S.  the same day .
There were numerous historical  precedents   लिये  unannounced military action by Japan  .
However  ,   the  lack  of  any  औपचारिक   चेतावनी   ,  particularly while  negotiations   यहूद  still apparently  जारी  , led President Franklin D. Roosevelt to proclaim December  7  , 1941 , `` a date which will  सजीव  in infamy `` .
Project Runway Season 2 was the second season of Bravo  's   कामयाब  Project Runway , a reality competition for fashion designers .
Season 2  began  airing on December 7 ,  2005  .
Following a  देशभर   ढूंढें  earlier in the year , sixteen designers were  चुनी  as semi-finalists and brought to New York City in June , 2005 .
After the  पहला  challenge  ,   पुकारा  `` Road To The Runway  ''  , fourteen went on to compete as finalists .
The winning designer , Chloe Dao , received $  100,000  in seed money to  सहायता  launch her  अपना   लकीर   ,   a  2007  शनि  Sky roadster , a spread in  elle  magazine , and  a   mentorship  with  the  Banana Republic  डिज़ाइन  Team .
Winning alongside Dao  थी  her model  ,  Grace Kelsey  ,  who received the ELLE  पत्रिका   स्प्रेड  .
Michael Kors and  नीना  Garcia returned as judges for the second season .
The fourth judging seat rotated each week , based on the challenge .
Tim Gunn , fashion  कुर्सी  at Parsons The New School for Design  ,  returned as a mentor for the  designers  .
कारा   janx  later appeared in Project Runway : All Stars in 2012  ,  where she finished 7th out of  13  .
Andrae Gonzalo  ,  in the same year  ,  competed  in   the  second season of  the  All Stars edition  रखकर   10th  out  of  13  .
an  example of a Heraclius mule
In numismatics , a mule  is   a  coin  or   पदक  minted with obverse and reverse designs not normally seen on the  वही  piece .
These can  be  intentional or produced by error .
This  प्रकार  of  गलती   is  highly  sought  after , and examples can fetch steep prices  इससे  collectors  .
The earliest mules  हैं  found  among   प्राचीन  Greek  और  Roman  सिक्के  .
राय  is  विभाजित  between those who think  कि  they are accidental  ,  the result of  an  incorrect combination  of  a  नई   die  with one that had officially been withdrawn from use , or the work of coiners working with dies  चुराया  from an official mint , perhaps  at  a time when one of them should  have  been destroyed .
The name derives from the mule , the hybrid offspring of a  घोड़ा  and a  गधा  , due to  ऐसे  a coin  having   दो  sides  intended  for different coins  ,   much  as a mule has parents of two  अलग   प्रजाति  .
This page documents the tornadoes  और  tornado outbreaks  of  2010 .
The majority of tornadoes form in the U.S. ,  लकिन  they can occur almost anywhere under the  सही  conditions .
A lesser number occur  बाहर  the U.S.  ,  most notably in parts of neighboring southern Canada during the Northern  गोलार्ध  's summer season ,  लकिन  are also known in  दक्षिण  America , Europe  ,   एशिया  ,  और  Australia .
There were 1,531  tornadoes  reported  in  the United States in 2010  (  of which at least 1,266 were confirmed ) , with 45 confirmed fatalities .
Elsewhere  in   the   संसार  , 11 people were killed in tornadoes ,  छह  in Argentina , three  in  the Bahamas , one in  बांग्लादेश  , and one in Germany .
The  साल  was near average for tornadoes despite an extremely quiet early spring period , however such changed after a huge  upswing  starting in late April and a busy late spring and  गर्मियाँ   काल  .
The autumn  महीने  were slightly above average  .
A lymphocyte  is  a type of white  रक्त  cell in the vertebrate immune  प्रणाली  .
Under the  सूक्ष्मदर्शी  , lymphocytes can be divided into  विशाल  lymphocytes  और  small lymphocytes .
Large granular lymphocytes include natural killer cells  (  NK cells  )  .
छोटी  lymphocytes consist  of  T cells and B cells  .
Windows PowerShell  is  Microsoft 's task automation framework , consisting of a command-line shell  और  associated  एनक्रिप्शन   भाषा   निर्मित  on .NET Framework .
PowerShell provides full access  to   com  and WMI ,  enabling   प्रशासकों  to perform  प्रशासनिक  tasks on  दोनो   लोकल  and remote Windows  प्रणालियों  .
In PowerShell ,  प्रशासनिक   कार्य   हैं  generally performed  by   cmdlets  ( pronounced command-lets ) , which  हैं  specialized .NET classes implementing a particular operation .
Sets of cmdlets may be combined  साथ  in  स्क्रिप्ट  , executables ( which are standalone applications  )  , or  by  instantiating regular .NET  वर्ग  ( or WMI/COM Objects ) .
These work by accessing data in different data  स्टोर्स  , like the filesystem  or   रजिस्ट्री  ,  जिससे  are made available to the PowerShell runtime via Windows PowerShell providers .
Windows PowerShell  भी  provides a hosting API with which the Windows PowerShell runtime can be embedded inside other applications .
These  अनुप्रयोग  can  तब  use Windows  powershell   कार्यक्षमता  to implement certain operations , including those exposed  via   the   आलेखीय  interface  .
This capability has been used by Microsoft Exchange Server 2007  to  expose  इसके  management functionality  as   powershell  cmdlets  और  providers  और  implement the graphical management tools as PowerShell  होस्ट  which invoke the necessary cmdlets .
Other Microsoft  अनुप्रयोग  including  microsoft  SQL Server 2008 also expose their  प्रबन्धन   इंटरफ़ेस  via PowerShell cmdlets .
With PowerShell , graphical  interface-based  management applications on Windows are layered  on  top of Windows PowerShell .
A PowerShell scripting interface for Windows products  is  mandated by the Common  अभियान्त्रिकी   मापदण्ड  .
Windows PowerShell  शामिल   इसके  own extensive , console-based help  ,  similar to man pages in Unix shells , via  the  Get-Help cmdlet  .
Mary Poppins  is  a 1964 musical film starring Julie  एंड्रयूज  ,  लंड  Van Dyke , David Tomlinson , and  glynis  Johns  ,  produced  by  Walt Disney , and  आधारित  on  the  Mary Poppins books  श्रेणी  by P. L. Travers  .
The  फिल्मी  was directed by Robert Stevenson and written by Bill Walsh  और  Don DaGradi , with songs  by   the  Sherman Brothers .
It was  शॉट  at Walt Disney Studios  in  Burbank  ,   कैलिफ़ोर्निया   .
Julie Andrews  जीती   the  Academy Award for Best Actress for her performance as Mary Poppins and the film also  जीती   ऑस्कर  for Best Film Editing , Original  म्यूज़िक   स्कोर  , Best Song for `` Chim Chim Cher-ee '' and Best Visual Effects  ,  and received  a   कुल  of 13 nominations .
A story arc is  an  extended  or  continuing storyline in episodic storytelling media such  as   टेलीविज़न  ,  कॉमिक  books  ,   कॉमिक   स्ट्रिप्स  , boardgames , video games  ,  and in some cases , films .
On a  टेलीविज़न  program , for example , the story would unfold  over   अनेक  episodes .
In television , the use of  the  story arc is much  अधिक  common in dramas than in  comedies  , especially in soap operas .
Webcomics are more likely to use story arcs than  समाचारपत्र  comics ,  as  most web comics have readable archives online that  a  newcomer to  the   स्ट्रिप  can  पढ़ा  in  अनुक्रम  to understand what is going on .
Although story arcs  have  existed for decades  ,  the term `` story  चाप  '' was coined in 1988 in relation  to  the television series Wiseguy , and was quickly adapted for  अन्य   उपयोग  .
Many  अमरीकी  comic book series are now written in four or six-issue arcs  ,  within a  continuing  series .
Short story arcs are easier  to  package as trade paperbacks for resale , and more accessible to the casual reader  than  the never-ending  निरंतरता  that once characterised comics .
ब्लैक  Friday  is  the day following Thanksgiving Day in the United States , often regarded as the beginning  of  the Christmas  खरीदारी  season .
In recent years , most major retailers have opened extremely early and offered promotional sales to kick  बंद  the holiday shopping  ऋतु  ,  समान  to Boxing Day sales in many Commonwealth Nations .
Black Friday is not  an  official public holiday as such , but many  non-retail  employees and schools have both  थैंक्सगिविंग  and the  दिन  after off , followed by a weekend , thereby increasing the  क्रमांक  of potential shoppers .
It has routinely been the  व्यस्ततम  shopping day of the  साल  since 2005  ,   हालांकि  news reports , which at that time were inaccurate  ,  have described it as the  व्यस्ततम  shopping day of the year for  a  much longer period of time .
the  day 's name  originated  in  फिलाडेल्फिया  ,  जहाँ  it originally was used to describe the heavy and disruptive pedestrian and vehicle traffic which would  occur   on  the day after  थैंक्सगिविंग   .
Use of the term started before 1961 and began to see broader use outside  फिलाडेल्फिया  around 1975  .
Later an alternative explanation began to be offered : that `` Black Friday  ''  indicates the point  at  which retailers begin  to  turn  a  profit , or are ``  ''   .
For  अनेक  years , it was common for retailers to open  at  6:00 a.m.  ,  but  in  the late 2000s  अनेक  had crept to  5:00  or  भी  4:00 .
इस  was  लिया  to  a   नई  extreme in 2011 , when several  रिटेलर  ( including Target ,  kohl  's , Macy  's   ,  Best Buy , and  bealls  ) opened  at  midnight  लिये  the first  समय  .
In  2012  , Walmart and several  अन्य   रिटेलर  announced  कि  they would open  सबसे  of their stores at 8:00 p.m. on Thanksgiving Day  (   मगर   in  states where  खोलने  on Thanksgiving is prohibited due to blue laws , such  as  Massachusetts where they still  खोली   around  midnight ) , prompting calls for a walkout among  कुछ   मजदूर  .
Black Friday shopping is  ज्ञात  for attracting aggressive crowds , with annual  रिपोर्ट्स  of assaults , shootings  ,   और   throngs   of  people trampling on other shoppers in an attempt  to  get the  बेहतरीन  deal  on  a product before supplies run out .
The Family That Preys is a 2008 American movie drama written , produced , and directed  by  Tyler  पेरी  .
The screenplay  focuses  on two families , one wealthy and  the  other working  क्लास   ,  whose  जीवनदान  are  intertwined  in both love and business  .
The movie is the second of four in  जिससे  Perry  's  signature character ,  madea  ,  करता  not make an appearance .
It is also the second Perry-directed film ( alongside Daddy  's  Little Girls ) that is not based on any of the filmmaker  's  stage plays .
Net 10 , Net  15  , Net 30 and Net 60 ( also Net 10 days , et  al  ) are forms of trade credit which specify that the  जाल  amount ( the total outstanding  on  the invoice )  is  expected to be paid in  पूरा  and received by the  विक्रेता  within 10  ,  15 , 30  or  60  दिनों   बाद   the  goods are dispatched or service is completed .
Net  30  or Net 60 terms  हैं  often coupled with a credit for early payment .
The word net  in  this sense means `` total after all  छूट   .   ''
It  originally  derives  इससे  the Latin nitere ( to shine ) and  nitidus  ( elegant  ,  trim ) , and more  recently  from the French net  (  sharp , neat , clean ) .
Roadtown , Tortola
The British West Indies were the islands in and  around  the  caribbean  that were part  of  the British Empire .
In 1912 , the British West Indies were divided into eight colonies :  the  Bahamas ,  बारबाडोस  , British Guiana ,  अंग्रेजों  Honduras , Jamaica  (  with its dependencies the  turks   और   caicos  Islands and the  केमन  Islands ) , Trinidad and Tobago , the Windward Islands and the  leeward  Islands  .
Between 1958 and  1962   ,  all  of  the  द्वीप  territories except  the  British  वर्जिन  Islands ,  the  Bahamas , British Honduras and British Guiana  यहूद   संगठित  into the West Indies Federation .
It  थी  hoped  कि  the Federation would become independent as a single nation , but it had  सीमित  powers , many practical problems , and a lack of popular support .
नतीजतन  , the West Indies Federation was dissolved .
Most of  the  territories  ,   सहित   सब  the larger ones , are now independent as separate countries ,  साथ  membership to many international forums such as the Organization of American States , the Association  of  Caribbean States , the  संसार   व्यापार  Organization , the United Nations , the Caribbean Community , the Commonwealth of Nations  और  the Caribbean Development  बैंको  among others .
the  remainder are British overseas territories  .
All the former nations of the British West  इंडीज  , except the Commonwealth of Dominica ,  गुयाना  and Trinidad and Tobago , are  राष्ट्रमंडल  Realms .
The term is still used for British Overseas Territories in  the  Caribbean , such as  the  Cayman Islands .
The remaining British  वेस्ट  Indies
`` What  a   अद्भुत   संसार  ''  is  a  सोंग  written by  bob  Thiele ( as `` George Douglas  ''   )  and George David Weiss .
It was first recorded by Louis Armstrong and released as a  सिंगल  in 1967 .
Thiele  और  Weiss were both  prominent  in the music world ( Thiele as a producer and Weiss as a  composer/performer  ) .
आर्मस्ट्रांग  's recording was inducted in the Grammy Hall of Fame in 1999 .
the  publishing for this song is controlled by Memory Lane Music Group , Carlin Music Corp. , and Bug Music  ,  Inc .
Inauguration Day 2009  on   the  west  कदम  of the  u.S.  Capitol .
President  जार्ज  W.  बुश  and First Lady Laura Bush lead the inaugural parade down Pennsylvania Avenue to  the  White House , 2005
The inauguration of the president  of  the United States is  a  ceremonial event  अंकन  the  शुरुआत  of a new four-year term of a  अध्यक्ष  of the  संयुक्त  States .
The day a presidential  उद्घाटन  occurs is known as  ``   उद्घाटन  Day  ''  and occurs on January 20 ( or 21st if the 20th is a Sunday ) .
( Prior to the Twentieth Amendment , the date  थी  March 4 , the day  of  the year on which the Constitution of the United States first  took   प्रभाव  in 1789 ;  the  last inauguration to take place on the older  तिथि  was  फ्रैंकलिन  D. Roosevelt 's first one on  कूच   4  ,  1933  . )
The most  हाल  public  अध्यक्षीय  inauguration ceremony ,  the  swearing  in  of President  बराक  Obama to begin  उसके  second four-year  पद   in  office , took  प्लेस  on Monday , January  21  ,  2013  .
The only inauguration element mandated by the United States Constitution is that  the  president make  an  oath or affirmation  पहले  that person can `` enter on the Execution  ''  of  the  office of  the  presidency .
however  ,  over  the years  ,  various traditions have arisen that have expanded the inauguration from a  सरल  oath-taking ceremony  to   a  day-long event  ,  including parades , speeches  ,  and balls .
From the presidency of Andrew  जैक्सन  through that  of  Jimmy Carter ,  the  primary Inauguration Day ceremony  took  place on the Capitol 's East Portico  .
चूंकि  the 1981 inauguration of Ronald Reagan , the ceremony has been held at the  कैपिटल  's West Front .
The inaugurations  of  William Howard Taft in 1909 and  reagan  in 1985  यहूद   स्थानांतरित  indoors  at  the Capitol due  to  cold weather .
The War  of  1812 and  संसार  War  ii  caused two inaugurations to be held at  अन्य  locations in Washington ,  d.c  .
When George Washington was inaugurated ,  the   शपथ  was administered  by  Robert Livingston , Chancellor of New York State , in 1789 , and by William Cushing , Associate Justice of the Supreme Court , in 1793 .
चूंकि   मुख्य   इंसाफ  Oliver Ellsworth swore in President John  एडम्स  , no chief justice has missed an Inauguration Day .
When Inauguration Day has  गिरे  on a Sunday , the  मुख्य  justice  रै  administered the oath to the president on the Sunday privately and then again the next day publicly .
When a new  अध्यक्ष  takes over mid-term due to the death or resignation of a president  ,  the  शपथ   of  office is administered but formal , public inauguration events have  नहीं  been held  .
Stefani Joanne Angelina Germanotta (  ;  born March 28 ,  1986  ) , known by  उसके  stage name Lady Gaga , is an American singer , songwriter , record producer , dancer , activist , businesswoman ,  फ़ैशन  designer , actress and  लोकसेवक  .
Born and raised in New York City  ,  she primarily studied at  the  Convent of  the  Sacred Heart  और  briefly attended New York University 's Tisch School of the Arts before withdrawing to focus on her musical  करियर  .
She soon began performing in  the  rock music scene of  मैनहटन  's Lower East  पक्ष  .
By  the  end of 2007  ,  record  कार्यपालिका   और  producer Vincent  हर्बर्ट  signed  उसके  to his  लेबल  Streamline Records , an  imprint  of Interscope  रिकॉर्ड  .
Initially working as a songwriter at Interscope Records , her vocal abilities captured the attention of recording artist Akon , who also signed her  to   kon  Live  वितरण  , his own label  अंतर्गत   interscope  .
Lady Gaga  आए   to  prominence as  a  recording artist following the release  of  her debut album , The Fame  (  2008 ) , which was a critical and commercial success that topped charts  around  the world and included the international number-one singles `` Just Dance `` and `` Poker Face `` .
After embarking on  the  The Fame  बॉल  Tour , she followed the album with  the  Fame Monster ( 2009 )  ,  which  शाखित  the worldwide hit singles `` Bad  रोमांस  `` , `` Telephone  ``   ,   और   ``  Alejandro `` .
The Fame Monsters success allowed  उसके  to  embark  on the  eighteen-month   long  Monster Ball  दौरे  ,  जिससे  later  became   एक   of  the  highest-grossing   कॉन्सर्ट  tours of all time .
Her most recent album  ,   born  This Way  (  2011 ) , topped  the  charts of most major  बाज़ार  and  उत्पन्न  more international chart-topping singles  ,   सहित  `` Born This Way `` ,  ``  Judas `` , and `` The Edge of  महिमा  `` .
Influenced  by  Britney Spears  ,   दाउद  Bowie ,  माइकल  Jackson ,  मैडोना  , and Queen ,  महिला   गागा   is  recognized for her flamboyant , diverse and outré contributions  to  the music industry through  उसके  fashion , performances  और  music videos .
as   of  October 2011 , she has sold an estimated  23  million albums and 64 million  singles  worldwide and her  singles   हैं  some  of   the  best-selling worldwide  .
उसके   उपलब्धियाँ  include five Grammy Awards and 13 MTV Video Music Awards .
Lady Gaga has consecutively appeared on Billboard magazine 's  कलाकारों  of the Year ( scoring  the  definitive title  in  2010 ) ,  क्रमित  fourth in VH1 's list of 100 Greatest Women in Music , is the sixth best selling digital singles artist in US according to RIAA , is  regularly  placed on  सूचियाँ  composed by Forbes magazine and was named one of the most influential  लोगों  in the world by Time magazine .
Besides her musical career  ,  she involves  herself  with  humanitarian  causes and LGBT activism  .
McKethan Stadium  घर  of Gator baseball
A  चित्र  of the 1924 Baseball team
The Florida Gators  बेसबॉल  team represents the  विश्वविद्यालयों  of Florida in the sport of  बेसबॉल   .
The Florida Gators compete in Division I of the National  कॉलेजिएट   एथलेटिक्स  Association ( NCAA )  ,  and the Eastern Division of  the   southeastern  Conference ( SEC ) .
They play their home games in Alfred A. McKethan Stadium  on  the university  's  Gainesville , Florida campus , and are currently  led  by head coach Kevin O'Sullivan  .
In  the   ninety-eight   ऋतु  history of  the  Gators baseball program  ,  the  टोली  has won twelve SEC championships and has appeared in  आठ  College World Series tournaments .

a  political  अभियान  is an organized effort  जिससे  seeks to influence the decision making process within a specific group .
In democracies , political campaigns often  refer  to  चुनावी  campaigns , wherein representatives  हैं  chosen or  referendums  are decided  .
In modern politics , the most high  प्रोफ़ाइल  political campaigns are focused on candidates for head of state or head of government , often a President or Prime Minister .
Elizabeth Cady  stanton  and  उसके  daughter , Harriot
Elizabeth Cady  stanton   (  November 12  ,  1815 – October 26  ,  1902 ) was  an  American social  activist  ,  abolitionist  , and leading figure of the early women 's rights movement  .
Her Declaration of Sentiments , presented at the first women 's rights  सम्मेलन  held in 1848 in  seneca  Falls , New York , is often  credited  with initiating the first organized  महिलाओं   's  rights and  महिलाओं  's suffrage movements in  the   संयुक्त   राज्य  .
Before Stanton narrowed her political focus almost exclusively to women 's rights , she was an  क्रियाशील  abolitionist  साथ  with  उसके  husband , Henry Brewster Stanton  और  cousin , Gerrit Smith .
Unlike many of those involved  in  the  महिलाओं   's  rights movement , Stanton  addressed  various issues  pertaining  to women beyond  मतदान  rights .
Her concerns included  महिलाओं  's parental and custody  अधिकारों  , property rights , employment and income rights  ,  divorce , the economic  स्वास्थ्य  of the family , and birth control .
She  थी  also an outspoken supporter of the 19th-century  temperance  movement .
After the American Civil War , Stanton  's  commitment  to  female suffrage caused a schism in the women 's  अधिकारों  movement when  वो  , together  साथ  Susan  B.  Anthony ,  अस्वीकृत  to support passage of  the  Fourteenth and  पंद्रहवीं  Amendments  to  the United States Constitution .
She opposed  giving  added legal protection and  मतदान  rights to African American men while women ,  ब्लैक   और  white , were denied those same rights .
Her position on  इस   समस्या  , together with her thoughts on organized Christianity and  महिलाओं   's   मुद्दे  beyond voting rights , led to  the  formation of two separate women 's rights organizations that  यहूद   आखिरकार  rejoined , with Stanton as  अध्यक्ष  of the  संयुक्त  organization ,  लगभग   बीस  years after her  ब्रेक  from the original women 's  suffrage  movement .
Stanton died in 1902 having authored both The Woman 's  बाइबल   और  her autobiography , along with many articles and pamphlets concerning female suffrage  और  women 's rights .
My  मेला  Lady is a musical based upon  जार्ज  Bernard Shaw 's Pygmalion and  साथ  book  और  lyrics by  एलन  Jay Lerner and  म्यूज़िक  by Frederick Loewe .
The story  चिंताएं  Eliza  doolittle  , a Cockney  पुष्प  girl who  takes  speech lessons from professor  हेनरी   हिगिंस  , a  phoneticist  ,  so  that she may  pass  as a well-born lady .
The  musical  's 1956  ब्रॉडवे   उत्पादन  was a hit  ,  setting what  थी  then the  रिकार्ड  for the longest  चलाएं  of any major musical theatre production in  इतिहास   .
It was followed by a hit London production , a popular film version , and numerous revivals  .
It has been called  ``  the perfect  musical   ''  .
Deregulation is the  अधिनियम   or  process of  निकालना   or  reducing state  regulations  .
It is therefore opposite of regulation , which refers to  the  process of the government  regulating  certain activities  .
The Boston  bruins  Radio Network is  a  25-station ( 17 A.M. , 8 F.M . plus 2 F.M . translators )  सीबीएस   रेडियो  network which  carries  live game broadcasts of  the  Boston  bruins   .
the   संजाल  's flagship  स्टेशन  is  wbz-fm   /98.5-   बोस्टन  , Massachusetts .

`` There Will Come Soft  rains  '' is a short story by science fiction author Ray  bradbury  which was first published  in   the  May 6  ,  1950 issue of Collier 's .
बाद   कि  same year the story was included in Bradbury 's The Martian Chronicles ( 1950 )  .
With over 1.2 billion people  ,  Han Chinese is  the  largest  जातीय  group  in  the world  .
Pashtun people of the Pashtunistan region , which sits in  an  area between south  of  the Hindu  कुश  in Afghanistan  और  the Indus  नदी   in  Pakistan .
They number  around  50 million .
The Korowai people of Papua numbered just around 3,000 people  ,  and were uncontacted until the  1970s  .
Ethnicity or ethnic group is  a   socially   पारिभाषित  category based on  आम  culture or nationality  .
Ethnicity  can  , but does not have to  ,   शामिल  common ancestry , appearance , cuisine , dressing style , heritage ,  इतिहास  , language or dialect , religion , symbols , traditions  ,   or  other cultural factor .
Ethnic identity is constantly reinforced through common characteristics which set  the  group apart from other groups .
the   19.9   mw  Gemasolar solar plant in Spain  सुविधाएँ  15 hours of storage and can supply power 24 hours a day .
Solar energy , radiant light and heat from the sun , has been  harnessed  by humans  चूंकि   प्राचीन  times  using   a   दायरा  of ever-evolving  technologies  .
Solar energy technologies include solar heating ,  सौर   photovoltaics  , solar thermal electricity  ,   सौर  architecture and artificial photosynthesis ,  जिससे  can make considerable contributions  to  solving  कुछ  of the most urgent energy problems the world now  चेहरों  .
Solar technologies  हैं   broadly  characterized as either passive solar or active  सौर   depending  on the way they  कैप्चर  , convert and distribute solar energy  .
Active solar  तकनीकों  include the use  of  photovoltaic panels and solar thermal collectors to  दोहन   the  energy  .
passive  solar techniques include orienting a  भवन  to the  सूर्य  , selecting  सामग्री   साथ  favorable thermal mass or light dispersing properties , and designing spaces that naturally circulate  एयर  .
In 2011 , the International Energy Agency said that `` the development of affordable ,  inexhaustible  and clean solar energy technologies will have huge  longer-term   लाभ  .
It will  बढ़ाएँ  countries’ energy security through reliance on an indigenous , inexhaustible and mostly import-independent  संसाधन  , enhance  स्थिरता  , reduce pollution , lower the  लागत  of  mitigating   जलवायु  change , and keep fossil fuel  कीमतें  lower than otherwise .
These advantages are global .
hence  the additional costs of  the  incentives for early  deployment  should be considered learning investments ;  वे  must be wisely spent and need to  be  widely shared '' .
The classical Latin alphabet or Roman  वर्णमाला  evolved from a western variety of  the  Greek alphabet called the  cumaean   वर्णमाला  , which  थी  adopted and  परिवर्धित  by  the  Etruscans  जो  ruled  जल्दी  Rome .
the   etruscan  alphabet was  in   फेरे  adopted and further  परिवर्धित  by the ancient Romans to  लिखें  the Latin  भाषा   .
During  the  Middle Ages , the Latin alphabet was  adapted   to  Romance languages , direct descendants of Latin ,  as  well as to Celtic , Germanic ,  बाल्टिक  , and some Slavic languages .
साथ   the   आयु   of  colonialism and Christian evangelism , the  लैटिन  script was spread overseas  ,  and applied to indigenous American , Australian  ,  Austronesian , Austroasiatic  ,  and African languages .
अधिक   recently  , linguists have  भी  tended to prefer the Latin  स्क्रिप्ट  or the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Phonetic  वर्णमाला  ( itself largely based on Latin script ) when transcribing or creating written standards for non-European languages , such as the African  सन्दर्भ  alphabet .
The term Latin alphabet may refer to  either  the alphabet used  to  write Latin ( as described in this article  )  , or  अन्य  alphabets  आधारित  on  the  Latin script , which  is  the  मौलिक  set of letters common to the various alphabets  descended  from the  शास्त्रीय  Latin one , such as the English alphabet .
These Latin-derived alphabets may discard  अक्षर  , like the  rotokas  alphabet , or  add   नई  letters , like the Danish and Norwegian alphabet  .
Letter shapes have  बदला  over the centuries , including the creation for Medieval  लैटिन   of  lower case forms which  किया  not exist in the Classical period .
The assassination of  संयुक्त  States President Abraham  lincoln  took  प्लेस  on Good Friday ,  अप्रैल  14 , 1865 , as the American Civil  युद्ध   थी  drawing to a close .
The assassination occurred five days after  the  commander  of  the Confederate Army  of   उत्तरी   वर्जिनिया  , General Robert E. Lee  ,  surrendered to  लेफ्टिनेंट  General  ulysses  S. Grant and the Union Army  of  the Potomac .
Lincoln was the first American president to be assassinated , though an unsuccessful  attempt   था   महरूम   बना  on Andrew Jackson 30  सालो   पहले  in 1835 .
The assassination was planned and  carried  out by the well-known stage actor John Wilkes Booth , as part of  a  larger conspiracy in a bid to  revive  the Confederate cause .
Booth 's co-conspirators were Lewis Powell and David  herold  , who were assigned to kill Secretary of State William H. Seward , and George Atzerodt  जो   थी  to kill Vice President Andrew Johnson .
By simultaneously eliminating the top  तीन   लोगों  in  the  administration , Booth and his co-conspirators hoped to sever the continuity  of  the United States government .
lincoln   थी   शॉट   जबकि  watching  the  play Our  अमरीकी  Cousin with  उसके  wife Mary Todd Lincoln at  घाट  's Theatre  in  Washington  ,  D.C.  on  the night  of  April 14  ,  1865 .
He died early the next morning .
The rest of the conspirators ' plot failed ; Powell only managed to  घाव  Seward , while Atzerodt ,  जॉनसन  's would-be assassin , lost  उसके  nerve  और  fled Washington  .
add-on  might mean:
Plug-in  (  computing  )  , a piece of software which enhances  another  software application  और  usually can  नहीं   be  run  independently
Browser extension , which  modifies   the  interface  and/or  behavior of web  browsers
Add-on (  मोज़िला  )  ,  a piece of software  कि   enhances  and  customizes  Mozilla-based applications
Add-ons  लिये  Firefox  (  addons.mozilla.org ) , the official Mozilla Foundation web  साईट  which serves as a repository of add-ons for Mozilla-based applications
परिधीय   ,   an  optional computer hardware component that significantly supplements or enhances the functionality of the original unit
वीडियो  game accessory , a piece of hardware  प्रयुक्त  in conjunction with  a  video game console for playing video games
Club level seating is a special section of seating in modern sports stadiums .
The Club  स्तर  is usually located  towards  the  मध्य   of  the  स्टेज   of  seating sections , above the lower deck but below  the  upper deck  .
They are usually right next  to  the  लक्ज़री  Boxes , either right above , right  नीचे  , or sandwiched between two  स्तर  of Luxury  बाक्स   .
Club Level seating is considered as higher class than sitting anywhere else in the arena  ,  but  निम्नतर  class compared to the Luxury Boxes  .
Unlike the  लक्ज़री  Boxes , most club  स्तर  do  नहीं  wrap entirely around  the  arena .
कुछ  club levels stop at a  निश्चित  point  ,   giving   रास्ता  to  an   विस्तार   of  the Mezzanine  ,  while others  दे   रास्ता  to lower class Luxury Boxes ( such as `` Party Suites '' ) .
A notable exception to this is Emirates Stadium in London , which has a complete tier of club seating .
Club Levels allow  प्रशंसक  multiple levels of entertainment  .
Club Level seating  is  open to the  तत्व  , as opposed to  the  entirely enclosed luxury boxes ,  जिससे   देता  more of an outdoors impression at roofless and open-roof stadiums and arenas .
Club Level seating is normally bought  on  a contract basis  to   allow  for maximum profit  on  the part of the stadium .
the   क्लबों  Level provides  प्रशंसक  with special access to an indoor part  of   the  arena exclusive to  प्रशंसक  with  खास   टिकटें  .
These  क्षेत्रों  are air conditioned and allow  अभिगम  to special restaurants , merchandise stands , and lounge areas of the stadium that  हैं  not otherwise available  .
Concession stands and vendors on the Club Level also often offer different menus  than  in other stands to give more of  a  special feel to the Club .
These areas are closed off to the rest of the stadium , and  वे  usually can only be  पहुँचा  through the exclusive  ,   निजी  club entrances .
Sophia  लोरेन  ( ; born Sofia Villani Scicolone ;  20  September  1934   )   is   an  Italian actress  .
Loren is widely  पहचाना  as Italy 's most renowned and honored  अभिनेत्री  .
She  थी   the  first  अभिनेत्री  of the talkie era to win an Academy Award for a non-English-speaking performance , for her portrayal of Cesira in Vittorio De Sica  's  Two Women .
Her  अन्य  awards include a  ग्रैमी  Award , five special Golden Globes , a BAFTA Award and a  लॉरेल  Award  .
In 1995 she  प्राप्त  the Cecil B. DeMille Award for lifetime  उपलब्धियाँ  , one of many such awards .
उसके  films include : Houseboat (  1958  ) ,  el   सीआईडी  ( 1961 ) ,  कल  ,  आज  and Tomorrow ( 1963 )  ,  Marriage Italian-Style  (  1964 )  ,  and A Special Day  (  1977  )  .
in   बाद  years she has appeared in American blockbusters such as Grumpier Old Men ( 1995 )  ,  and Nine ( 2009 ) .
In 1994 she  स्ट्रक्चर  in Robert Altman 's  prêt-à-porter  , which earned her a Golden  ग्लोब  nomination the same year .
She has also achieved critical and commercial success in TV movies such  as  Courage ( 1986 ) .
Deaths for  self-inflicted  injuries  प्रति  100,000 inhabitants in 2004  .
Incidence  of  suicide is underreported  due  to both religious and social pressures ,  और   संभवतः  completely unreported in some areas .
nevertheless  , from  reported   मामले  ,  निश्चित   रुझान   हैं  apparent .
Since the data  is  skewed , comparing  आत्महत्या  rates between nations is statistically unsound .
The trends themselves are not the  कारण  , but may  be   indicative  of  a  root cause .
The Oprah  विनफ्रे   नेतृत्व  Academy  लिये  Girls  -  South Africa is a female boarding school founded in  जनवरी   2007  and  स्तिथ  in Henley on Klip near Meyerton , south  of  Johannesburg , South Africa .
The  अकादमी  was founded by Oprah Winfrey  साथ   the  goal  of  providing educational and leadership opportunities for academically  gifted   लड़कियों  from impoverished backgrounds .

Digicel is a mobile phone network provider  ऑपरेटिंग  in  31  markets  आरपार  the Caribbean , Central America , and Oceania  regions  .
The company is owned by Irishman  डेनिस   o'brien   ,  is incorporated in Bermuda , and based in Jamaica .
It has about 13 million wireless users .
As  of  2012 , Digicel  's  markets comprise : Anguilla  ,  Antigua and  बारबूडा   ,   अरूबा   ,  Barbados ,  बरमूडा  , Bonaire ,  the  British Virgin  आइलैंड्स  , the Cayman Islands , Curacao , Dominica  ,  El Salvador , Fiji , French Guiana , Grenada , Guadeloupe , Guyana , Haiti , Jamaica , Martinique , Nauru ,  पनामा   ,  Papua New Guinea , Samoa , Saint Kitts and Nevis , Saint Lucia , Saint Vincent and the Grenadines , Suriname , Tonga  ,  Trinidad & Tobago ,  turks  and Caicos , and Vanuatu  .
