Hospital Emergency Codes are  प्रयुक्त  in  अस्पताल   विश्वव्यापी  to alert staff to  विभिन्न   emergencies  .
The use  of  codes is intended to convey  अनिवार्य  information quickly  और  with  minimal   गलतफहमी  to staff , while preventing stress and  दहशत  among visitors to the hospital  .
These codes may  be  posted on placards  throughout  the hospital , or printed on employee  पहचान  badges for ready  सन्दर्भ  .
Back  of  a hospital ID badge showing disaster codes  .
Hospital emergency codes may denote  अलग  events  at  different hospitals , including  आसपास  ones .
Because many physicians work at more  than   एक  facility , this may lead to confusion in emergencies , so uniform systems have been  प्रस्तावित   .
The route of the Eifel aqueduct , with its average slope  .
The Eifel  जलसेतु   थी  one of  the  longest aqueducts of the  रोमन   साम्राज्य  .
The aqueduct , constructed in AD 80 , carried water some from the hilly Eifel region  of  what is  अभी   जर्मनी  to  the   प्राचीन  city of Colonia Claudia Ara Agrippinensium  (   present-day   कोलोन   )  .
If  the  auxiliary spurs to additional springs  हैं   शामिल  , the length was .
the  construction was almost  entirely  below ground , and  the  flow  of  the water  थी  produced entirely by  गम्भीरता  .
a  few bridges , including one up to in length , were needed to pass  over  valleys .
Unlike some of  the  other  प्रसिद्ध  Roman aqueducts , the  eifel  aqueduct was specifically designed  to  minimize  the  above-ground portion to protect it from damage and freezing .
in  chemistry  ,  a disulfide bond ( Br.E .  disulphide  bond )  is  a covalent  बंध  , usually derived by the coupling of two thiol groups .
The linkage is also called an  ss-bond  or  disulfide   सेतु   .
The overall connectivity  is  therefore R-S-S-R .
The terminology is  widely  used in biochemistry .
in  formal  शर्तें  , the connection is  a  persulfide , in analogy to its congener  ,  peroxide ( R-O-O-R ) ,  लकिन   इस  terminology  is   अस्पष्ट   और  is no longer used ( except in  सन्दर्भ  to R-S-S-H or H-S-S-H compounds  )  .
Formal depiction of disulfide bond formation as an oxidation .
Westminster Abbey  is  used for the  राजतिलक  of  अंग्रेजों  monarchs
Religion in the United  किंगडम  and in the countries that preceded it , has been dominated , for over 1,400  सालो   ,   by  various forms of Christianity .
According to  कुछ   सर्वेक्षण  , a majority of  नागरिकों  still identify with Christianity , although  नियमित   गिरिजाघर  attendance has  गिरे  dramatically since the middle of the  20th  century , and immigration and demographic change have contributed to  the  growth of  अन्य   faiths   .
Religious affiliations of UK citizens are  अंकित  by regular  सर्वेक्षण  , the  चार   प्रमुख  ones being the UK Census , the Labour  फ़ोर्स  Survey , the British Social  attitudes  survey and  the  European  सोशल  Survey .
According to the 2001 UK census ,  christianity   is  the major  धर्म   ,  followed by Islam  ,  Hinduism , Sikhism , Judaism  और  Buddhism in terms of  क्रमांक  of adherents .
This  ,  and the relatively  विशाल  number of individuals with nominal or  no  religious affiliations has led commentators  to  variously  describe   the  United Kingdom  as  a multi-faith , secularised , or  post-christian  society .
the  United Kingdom was formed by the union of previously independent countries from 1707 , and consequently most of  the   largest  religious groups do not have UK-wide  organisational  structures .
While some groups have separate structures for the individual  देशों  of the United Kingdom , others may have a single structure covering England and Wales or Great Britain .
similarly  , due to the relatively recent  सृष्टि  of Northern Ireland in 1921 , most major  धार्मिक  groups  in  Northern Ireland are organised on an all-Ireland basis .
The 1967 Newark riots were a major civil disturbance that occurred in the city of Newark ,  नई   जर्सी  between  जुलाई  12 and July 17 , 1967 .
The six days of rioting , looting , and  विनाश  left 26 dead  और   सैंकड़ों  injured .
in  United  राज्य  college  एथलेटिक्स  , redshirt is a  विलंब  or suspension of  an  athlete 's participation in order to  lengthen   उसके  or her period  of  eligibility .
Typically , a student 's athletic eligibility in a given  खेल  is four seasons , a  क्रमांक  derived from the four  सालो  of academic classes that  हैं   सामान्यतः  required to  obtain  a  स्नातक   's  degree at  an  American college or university  .
However , a student  खिलाड़ी  may be offered the opportunity to redshirt for up to  दो  years , which allows the athlete to spread  those  four years of eligibility over five  ,  or sometimes six years .
In a redshirt year , a student  खिलाड़ी  may attend  वर्ग   at   the  college or  विश्वविद्यालयों   ,  practice with an athletic team , and  पोशाक  for  खेल  but he or  वो  may not compete  दौरान   the  game .
Using this mechanism , a  छात्र   खिलाड़ी  has up to five academic years to use the four years of eligibility ,  यूँ  becoming a fifth-year senior  .
The term is used as  a  verb ,  संज्ञा  ,  और  adjective .
For example , a  कोच  may choose to redshirt a  खिलाड़ी  who is then  referred  to  as  a redshirt freshman or simply  a  redshirt .
The opposite of this  is  a ``  सच्चा   freshman  . ''
World War  i  (  wwi  ) was a global war centred in Europe that began on 28 July 1914 and lasted  जबतक  11  नवम्बर  1918  .
It was predominantly called the World War or the Great War from  इसके  occurrence  जबतक  the start of World War II  in  1939 , and the First World War  or  World War I thereafter .
It involved all the world 's great powers , which  यहूद   समवेत  in  दो  opposing alliances :  the  Allies (  आधारित  on the Triple Entente of the United Kingdom  ,  France and Russia ) and the Central  शक्तियां  ( originally the Triple Alliance of  जर्मनी  ,  austria-hungary  and Italy ;  लकिन  , as  austria–hungary   था  taken the offensive against the agreement , Italy did  नहीं   डालें  into the war ) .
These alliances  यहूद  both reorganised and expanded  as  more nations entered the war : Italy , Japan and  the  United States joined the Allies , and the Ottoman Empire and  बुल्गारिया   the  Central  शक्तियां   .
Ultimately , more than 70 million  सैन्य  personnel  ,  including 60 million Europeans  ,  were mobilised in  एक  of the largest wars  in  history  .
अधिक  than 9 million combatants were killed , largely  क्युकी  of technological advancements that  led   to   विशाल  increases in the lethality of  हथियार  without corresponding improvements  in  protection  or  mobility .
It was the fifth-  deadliest  conflict in  संसार   इतिहास  ,  subsequently  paving the way for various  राजनैतिक  changes , such  as  revolutions in many of the nations involved .
One of the long-term causes of the war was the resurgence  of  imperialism in the  विदेशी  policies of the great powers of  यूरोपीय  .
More immediately , the  हत्या  of Archduke Franz Ferdinand of Austria , the heir to the throne of Austria-Hungary , on 28 June 1914  by  Yugoslav  राष्ट्रवादी  Gavrilo Princip in Sarajevo triggered a diplomatic crisis when Austria-Hungary subsequently  वितरित  an ultimatum to  the  Kingdom of Serbia  .
Several alliances formed over the previous decades were invoked .
भीतर  weeks  ,  the major powers were at war and , via their colonies , the conflict soon spread around the world  .
on   28  July , the  austro-hungarians   fired  the first shots  of  the war  as  preparation  लिये   the  invasion of  सर्बिया   .
While the Russians mobilised  ,  the Germans invaded  न्यूट्रल  Belgium and Luxembourg on the way to France , providing a casus belli for Britain 's  घोषणा  of war  विरूद्ध  Germany .
बाद  the  जर्मनी  march on Paris was brought to  a  halt—the  so-called  Miracle of the Marne —the Western  सामने  settled into a  स्थिर  battle of attrition with a trench line  कि  changed little  जबतक  1917 .
On the Eastern Front , the Russian army  थी   कामयाब  against the  austro-hungarians  , but was stopped  in  its invasion of East Prussia by the Germans .
In November the Ottoman Empire joined the war , opening up fronts in the  काकेशस  , Mesopotamia and the Sinai .
इटली  and Bulgaria  गई  to war in  1915  and Romania  in  1916 .
In Russia ,  the  tsar 's  सरकारी  collapsed  in  March 1917 and  a  subsequent revolution  in  November brought the Russians to terms with the  सेंट्रल  Powers  .
After a 1918 German offensive along the western front , the Allies drove back the Germans in a series of successful offensives  और  American  शक्तियां  began entering the trenches .
Germany , which had its own trouble with revolutionaries  ,  agreed to an armistice on 11 November 1918 .
the  war  ended  in  विजय  for the Allies  .
Events on the home  fronts  were as tumultuous as on the battle fronts , as the  भागीदार  tried  to  mobilize their  जनशक्ति  and economic resources to fight  a   कुल   युद्ध  .
By the  समाप्त   of  the war  ,  four  प्रमुख  imperial  powers—the  German , Russian , Austro-Hungarian and Ottoman empires—ceased to exist .
The successor states  of  the former  दो  lost a great amount of territory , while  the  latter two were dismantled entirely .
the  map of central  यूरोपीय   थी  redrawn into several  छोटी  states .
the   लीग  of  राष्ट्र  was formed in the hope  of  preventing another such  विरोध  .
The European nationalism spawned by the war and the breakup of empires ,  the   परखना  of Germany 's defeat  और   समस्याएं  with  the  Treaty of Versailles are agreed to be  कारकों   contributing  to  संसार   युद्ध  II .
मैप   of  countries that declared themselves to be socialist states  अंतर्गत  the  marxist–leninist  or Maoist  परिभाषा   -  that is to  कह  , `` Communist states  ''  - between 1979 and 1983 .
This period marked the greatest territorial extent of Communist states .
a  communist state is  a  state where the means of production are collectively owned by  the  society  .
It has a form  of  government characterized by  single-party  rule or dominant-party  नियम  of a communist party ( referred as Dictatorship of the Proletariat by  इसके  proponents ) and  a  professed allegiance to a Leninist or Marxist–Leninist ideology  as  the guiding  principle  of the state .
Technically  ,  ``  कम्युनिस्ट  state '' is a contradictio in terminis as  a  communist society as defined by both Marxists and anarcho-communists  is  in principle stateless  .
From this  परिप्रेक्ष्य  ,  the  term Marxist-Leninist state is more appropriate .
historically   ,  a `` communist state  ''  referred to a  प्रणाली  where public ownership of  सब   or  most means  of  production by the Communist party  -run  state is deemed necessary to further the  रूचि  of the working class ; today , a communist state can also , for instance , refer to contemporary China and Vietnam  ,  where a Communist Party-run state exists  alongside   a  mixed economy .
According to Marxist–Leninists , the  राज्य  is a tool  in  the  हैंड्स  of the ruling class , which  in  a socialist society is the working  क्लास  , so a socialist state is ,  according   to  Leninists ,  a  state of the working class .
In  अभ्यास  , communist states do not actually  refer  to themselves as  ऐसे  .
They do this not to disguise  the  fact that the ruling party is communist , but rather  क्युकी   वे  do  नहीं  consider  themselves  to  be  a communist society  at  present .
बजाय  ,  वे  constitutionally identify themselves as socialist states or workers  '  states .
The primary goal of these states , which also  explains  their official name , is to  मार्गदर्शिका  their respective countries in the process of  भवन  socialism ,  ultimately  leading to communism .
Communist  राज्य  may have several legal political parties ,  लकिन  the communist  पार्टी  is  प्रायः  granted a special or dominant role in government , often by statute or under the constitution .
Consequently , the  संस्थानों  of the state and of the communist party become intimately entwined  ,  such as in the  विकास  of  समानांतर  institutions .
in  the 20th century  ,   सबसे   कम्युनिस्ट  states adopted planned  economies  .
However , there were exceptions : The Soviet  संघ  during the 1920s and late 1980s and Yugoslavia after World  युद्ध  II allowed limited  बाज़ार   और  a  उपाधि  of  कार्यकर्ता  self-management , while China , Vietnam and Laos introduced far-reaching  मार्केट  reforms after the 1980s .
In the 21st century  ,   चीन  and Vietnam have allowed a mixed economy to develop .
the  fundamental concepts  of  communist states often diverge from the original socio-economic  विचारधाराओं  from which they  develop  .
as  a result , many adherents of  ये  ideologies often oppose  the  political systems commonly  संबद्ध  with  ये  states .
For  उदाहरण  , dissenting communists such  as   trotskyists  were often  opposed  to the communist states of the 20th century ,  claiming  either that  वे  had nothing to do with `` real '' communism or that the ideology of such states had reached a  पाइंट  of  अटल  corruption .
माइकल  Fred  फेल्प्स  II  (  born June 30 , 1985 ) is a retired American swimmer and the most decorated Olympian of all  समय  , with a total  of  22  medals   .
फेल्प्स  also holds the all-time records for Olympic gold medals ( 18 ,  दोगुना  the second  उच्चतम  record holders ) , Olympic gold  medals   in  individual events (  11  ) , and Olympic medals in individual events for  a  male  (  13 ) .
In  जीतना   आठ  gold medals  at   the   2008   बीजिंग  Games ,  फेल्प्स   took  the record for the  सबसे   first-place  finishes at any single Olympic Games  .
Five of  those   victories  were in  व्यक्तिगत  events , tying  the  single  खेल   रिकार्ड   .
In  the  2012  गर्मियाँ   ओलंपिक  in London  ,  Phelps won  चार  golds and two silver medals , making him the most  कामयाब   खिलाड़ी   of  the Games  लिये  the third Olympics in a row .
Phelps is the long course  संसार  recordholder in the  100-meter  butterfly , 200-meter butterfly and 400-meter  व्यक्तिगत  medley as well as  the  former long  कोर्स  world recordholder in the 200-meter freestyle and 200-meter individual medley .
he  has  जीती  a total of 71 medals in major international long-course competition ,  57   सुनहरा  , 11 silver , and  तीन  bronze spanning the Olympics , the World  ,   और  the Pan Pacific Championships .
Phelps 's  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  titles and record-breaking performances have  अर्जित  him the World  तैराक  of the  साल  Award seven times and American Swimmer of the Year Award nine times  as  well as the FINA Swimmer of  the  Year Award in 2012 .
उसके  unprecedented  ओलम्पिक  success in  2008  earned Phelps Sports Illustrated  पत्रिका  's  sportsman  of  the  Year award .
बाद  the  2008  Summer Olympics , Phelps  प्रारंभ  the Michael  फेल्प्स  Foundation , which focuses on growing  the  sport of swimming and  promoting   healthier   lifestyles  .
He expects to do  further   कार्य  with his foundation after  the  2012 Olympics , which he  रै  said will  be  his last  .
Lenovo  समूह  Limited  (  ) is a Chinese multinational computer hardware and electronics company with its headquarters in Beijing , China and Morrisville , North Carolina and its registered office in  हांग   काँग  , China .
Its products include personal computers , tablet computers , mobile  फोन  , workstations  ,   सर्वर  , electronic  भंडार   डिवाइस  , IT management software and smart  टेलीविज़न  .
लेनोवो  is the world 's  second-largest  PC vendor by 2012 unit  बिक्री   .
It markets  the  ThinkPad  लकीर  of notebook computers and the ThinkCentre line of desktops .
Lenovo  रै  operations in more  than  60 countries and sells its products in around  160  countries .
Lenovo was founded in  बीजिंग   in  1984  और  incorporated  in  Hong  काँग  in 1988 under its previous name , Legend .
लेनोवो  is listed  on  the Hong Kong Stock Exchange and is a constituent of the Hang Seng China-Affiliated Corporations Index .
Slug is  a   आम  name for an  जाहिर  shell-less  स्थलीय  gastropod mollusk .
the   शब्द  `` slug '' is also often used  as   भाग  of the common name of any gastropod mollusc that has  no  shell , has a very reduced shell  ,   or  has only  a  small internal shell .
( This is in contrast  to  the common name  ``   घोंघा  `` , which is  लागू   to   gastropods  that have a coiled shell  कि  is large  पर्याप्त   कि  the  नरम  parts of the animal can retract fully into it . )
Slugs exist on land  और  in  the   समुद्र   ,  and there is even one genus of freshwater  slugs  , Acochlidium .
The unadorned word `` slug '' is  however  applied primarily to land slugs , whereas slugs  इससे  the sea or from  freshwater  are usually  referred   to  as `` sea  slugs  `` and `` freshwater slugs  ''  .
Land  gastropods  with a shell that is not quite vestigial , but is too  छोटी  to retract into (  जैसे  many in the family Urocyclidae ) , are known as semislugs .
the   विभिन्न  taxonomic families of slugs form part of several  काफी  different evolutionary  lineages  which  भी  include snails .
Thus , for example , the various families of  जमीन  slugs are not  बहुत  closely related to one another , despite a superficial similarity in  the   overall   देह  form .
The shell-less condition  रै  arisen many times independently during the evolutionary past , and thus the  श्रेणी  `` slug '' is emphatically a polyphyletic one  .
Slugs , like all other gastropods ,  undergo  torsion ( a 180° twisting of the  आतंरिक  organs  )   दौरान  development .
Internally , slug anatomy clearly  shows  the effects of this  रोटेशन   ,  but externally  the  bodies of land  slugs  appear to  be  more or less symmetrical , except for the  positioning   of  the pneumostome  ,  which is on one side of the animal , normally the  सही  hand  पक्ष   .
The soft  ,  slimy bodies of slugs  हैं  prone to desiccation , so land-living slugs are confined  to  moist  environments  and must retreat to damp hiding places when the weather is  शुष्क  .
The subsequent information in this article applies to land slugs .
is a Latin word that means `` thus '' or ,  in  writing ,  ``   it  was  यूँ  in the source material  ''  .

Sic , Cluj  ,  a  कम्यून  in Romania

`` ( sic )  ''  , a song by American band Slipknot on the album Slipknot
SIC , the  आरंभिक  of Marco Simoncelli .

SiC , Silicon carbide , a  semiconducting  material ,  भी   प्रयुक्त  to make  धातुकर्म   टूल्स
sic  (  cyclecar  ) ( Società Italiana  cyclecars  )

second-in-command   in  the  फ़ील्ड  of aviation

समुद्र  Isle City  ,  New Jersey , a  तटीय  town in  the  United States
segmented  Integer  काउंटर   विधि  , a mode of operation in cryptography
sepang  International  सर्किट  , a high-end racetrack that hosts the Malaysian round of Formula 1
Shanghai International Circuit , a motor  रेसिंग  venue in  शंघाई   ,  China
Simplified instructional  कंप्यूटर  , a hypothetical computer used in systems programming
SIC ( Sons Idées Couleurs ) , an  जल्दी  twentieth-century art  पत्रिका  produced by French  लेखक  Pierre Albert-Birot
Southeastern Illinois College ,  a  two year Junior  कॉलेज  in Harrisburg , Illinois  ,  United States
Specific inductive capacity , abbreviated to SIC  ,   जिससे   is  more commonly known as the relative permittivity or  the  dielectric constant

Imperial Standard of Napoleon I
Napoleon  बोनापार्ट  ( , ; 15 August 1769 –  5  May 1821  )  was a French military and political leader who rose to prominence during the latter stages of the French Revolution and its associated wars in Europe .
As  नेपोलियन  I , he was Emperor of  the  French from 1804 to 1815 .
His legal  सुधार   ,  the Napoleonic Code ,  रै  been a major influence on many civil law jurisdictions worldwide  ,  but he  is  best remembered for his  भूमिका  in the wars  led  against France by a series of coalitions , the so-called  napoleonic  Wars .
He established  आधिपत्य  over most of continental Europe and sought to  स्प्रेड   the  ideals of the French Revolution  ,  while consolidating an imperial monarchy which restored aspects of the deposed Ancien  régime   .
Due to his success in these wars  ,  often against numerically superior enemies  ,  he is  generally  regarded as  एक  of  the   महानतम  military commanders of all time , and his campaigns are studied  at   सैन्य  academies worldwide .
Napoleon was born at Ajaccio in Corsica  in  a family of noble  इतालवी  ancestry which had settled Corsica in the 16th century .
He  प्रशिक्षित  as an  तोपखाने   अधिकारी  in mainland  फ़्रांस  .
He rose to prominence under the French First Republic and led successful  अभियान  against the First and Second Coalitions arrayed against France .
he  led  a  successful invasion of  the  Italian peninsula  .
In 1799  ,  he staged a coup d'état and installed  खुद  as First Consul ;  पाँच  years later the French Senate proclaimed him  सम्राट   ,  following a plebiscite in his favour .
in  the  पहला   दशक   of   the   19th  century , the French Empire  अंतर्गत  Napoleon engaged in  a  series of conflicts—the Napoleonic Wars —that involved  प्रत्येक  major European power .
After a streak  of  victories , France secured a dominant position in continental Europe , and Napoleon  कायम  the French sphere of influence through the formation  of  extensive  alliances  and the appointment of friends and  परिवार  members to rule other  यूरोपीय  countries as French client states .
The Peninsular War and 1812 French  आक्रमण   of  Russia marked turning points in Napoleon 's fortunes .
His  ग्रांडे  Armée  थी  badly damaged in the campaign  और  never fully  बरामद  .
In 1813 , the Sixth Coalition defeated his forces at Leipzig ; the  following  year the Coalition invaded France ,  मजबूर  Napoleon to abdicate and exiled him to the island of  एल्बा  .
Less than a year later , he escaped  एल्बा   और  returned to  शक्ति  , but was defeated at the Battle of  वाटरलू  in  जून   1815  .
Napoleon spent the  पिछला   छह  years of  उसके   जीवन  in  कारावास   by  the British  on  the island  of  Saint Helena .
An  पोस्टमार्टम  concluded he died  of  stomach cancer , but there has  महरूम  some debate about the cause of his death  ,   as  some scholars  have  speculated that he  थी  a victim of arsenic poisoning .
इस  is  a  chronological listing  of  the United States Senators from Pennsylvania  .
United States Senators  हैं  popularly elected  ,  for a six-year term , beginning January 3 .
Elections are held  the  first Tuesday after November 1  .
पहले  1914  ,  they were chosen by the Pennsylvania  सामान्य  Assembly  ,  and before 1935 , their terms began  कूच  4 .
The South Africa national rugby  संघ  team  (  known  as  the Springboks )  represents  South Africa in rugby  संघ   .
वे  compete in the annual  रग्बी  Championship ,  साथ  with southern-hemisphere counterparts Argentina , Australia  और  New Zealand  .
वे  have  जीती  this championship on three  अवसरों  in sixteen  सालो  .
वे  are currently ranked second in the world  by   the   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Rugby Board , and  यहूद  named 2008 World Team of the Year at the Laureus World Sports Awards  .
Although  दक्षिण  Africa was  इंस्ट्रूमेंटल   in  the  सृष्टि   of   the   रग्बी  World Cup competition , the Springboks did not compete in  the  first two World Cups  in  1987 and 1991 because of anti-apartheid sporting boycotts  of  South Africa  .
The team made its  संसार  Cup  डेब्यू  in 1995 , when the  newly  democratic South Africa hosted the tournament  .
The Springboks then  पराजित  the All Blacks 15–12 in  the  final  ,  which is now remembered as one of the greatest  पल  in South Africa 's  sporting  history , and a watershed moment in the post-Apartheid nation-building process .
South Africa regained  उनके  title as champions  12   सालो  later  ,  when they defeated England 15–6 in the 2007 final .
As  a  result of the  2007  World  कप  tournament the Springboks were promoted  to  first place in the IRB World  rankings  ,  a  position they held until July the following  साल  when New Zealand regained  the  top spot .
The Springboks play in green and gold jerseys  ,   और   उनके  emblems are the Springbok and the Protea .
The side has been playing international rugby since 1891 , when a British Isles side toured the nation , playing South Africa in their  पहला  Test on 30 July  .
South Africa was  coached  by Jake White , who led the Boks to the 2007 World Cup title  ,  announcing his resignation effectively from the end of  2007  .
His replacement  's  (  पीटर  de Villiers ) contract expired  in  2011 , following a 11–9 defeat to Australia in the Rugby World Cup quarter-final , who then  stated  he would not be signing a  नई   सौदे   .
The previous captain was John  smit  ,  जो  before he retired in  2011  played hooker for most of his career , although  he   रै  also been a prop , mainly  in  2008 and  2009   .
Due to Smit  होने  unavailable for the November 2010 Tests  बाद  surgery  ,  lock Victor Matfield took Smit  's  place as captain for that tour .
The current captain is Jean  de  Villiers  .
The Battle of Gettysburg ( , with an  ध्वनि  ) , was fought July 1–3  ,  1863  ,   in  and around  the   कस्बा  of Gettysburg ,  पेन्सिलवेनिया  .
it  was the battle with the  largest  number of casualties in the American Civil War and is often described as  the  war  's  turning point  .
संघ  Maj. Gen. George Gordon Meade 's  फौज  of the Potomac defeated  हमले  by  confederate  Gen. Robert E. Lee 's Army of Northern Virginia , ending Lee 's invasion of the North  .
After his success at Chancellorsville in Virginia in May 1863 , Lee led his army  through  the Shenandoah Valley to begin his second invasion of the North—the Gettysburg  अभियान  .
With  उसके  army in high spirits  ,  Lee intended to shift the  फ़ोकस  of  the   गर्मियाँ  campaign from war-ravaged northern Virginia and hoped to  influence  Northern politicians to  दे  up  उनके  prosecution  of  the war by penetrating as far  as  Harrisburg ,  पेन्सिलवेनिया   ,  or even  फिलाडेल्फिया  .
Prodded by President Abraham Lincoln , Maj. Gen.  जोसेफ  Hooker moved his army in  pursuit  , but was relieved just three days before  the  battle and replaced by Meade .
Elements  of  the two  सेना  initially collided at Gettysburg on July 1 , 1863  ,  as Lee urgently concentrated  उसके  forces there ,  उसके   उद्देश्य  being to engage the Union army  और  destroy it .
Low ridges to the  उत्तरपश्चिम  of town were defended initially by  a  Union cavalry  प्रभाग  under Brig  .   gen.   जॉन  Buford , and  जल्द  reinforced with two corps of Union infantry .
However , two large Confederate corps assaulted them from the northwest and north , collapsing the hastily developed Union lines , sending the defenders retreating through the streets of  कस्बा  to the  पहाड़ियाँ  just to the south .
on  the second  दिन  of battle , most of both armies  था  assembled .
The Union line was laid  आउट  in a defensive  गठन  resembling a fishhook  .
in  the late afternoon  of   जुलाई  2  ,  Lee launched a  भारी  assault on the  संघ  left flank , and fierce  लड़  raged  at  Little Round Top , the Wheatfield , Devil 's Den ,  और  the Peach Orchard  .
On the Union right  ,  demonstrations  escalated  into full-scale assaults on Culp 's Hill and Cemetery Hill  .
All across the battlefield  ,  despite significant losses , the Union defenders held their  लाइनों  .
On the third day of battle ,  जुलाई  3 , fighting  resumed  on Culp 's Hill , and cavalry  लड़ाइयों  raged to the east and south , but the main  इवेंट  was a dramatic infantry  उत्पीड़न  by 12,500 Confederates against the center of the Union line on Cemetery Ridge  ,   ज्ञात  as Pickett 's Charge .
The charge  थी  repulsed by Union rifle and artillery  आग   ,  at great losses to  the  Confederate army .
Lee led  उसके  army on  a  torturous retreat  वापस  to Virginia .
between   46,000   और  51,000 soldiers  इससे   दोनो  armies  यहूद  casualties in the three-day battle .
That November , President Lincoln  प्रयुक्त  the dedication ceremony for the Gettysburg National Cemetery  to  honor the fallen Union soldiers  और  redefine the purpose of  the  war in his historic Gettysburg Address  .
An academic discipline , or field of study , is a branch of knowledge that  is  taught and researched at the college or  विश्वविद्यालयों  level .
Disciplines are defined (  in  part ) , and recognized by the academic journals in which research is  प्रकाशित  , and the  सीखे  societies and academic departments or faculties to which  उनके  practitioners belong  .
However , there  exists  no formal criteria  लिये  when educational  कार्यक्रम  and scholarly journals form an academic discipline .
A huge difference  exists  between , on the  एक  hand , well  स्थापित  disciplines that exist in almost all  विश्वविद्यालयों  all over the world , have a  long  history , and have a well established  नियत  of journals and conferences , and ,  on   the  other hand , suggestions for new fields  समर्थित  only  by  few universities  और  publications .
Fields  of  study usually have several sub-disciplines or  शाखाओं  , and the distinguishing lines between these are often both arbitrary and ambiguous .
PHP  is  a server-side scripting  भाषा  designed for web development but also used as a general-purpose programming language .
PHP is now installed  on  more than 244 million websites and  2.1  million web  सर्वर  .
originally   निर्मित  by Rasmus Lerdorf  in  1995 , the  सन्दर्भ  implementation of PHP is  अभी  produced by  the  PHP Group .
While  पीएचपी  originally stood for  निजी   घर  Page , it  अभी  stands for PHP : Hypertext  preprocessor  , a recursive acronym .
PHP code  is  interpreted  by  a web server  साथ  a PHP processor module which generates the resulting  वेब  page : PHP commands can be embedded directly  into  an HTML source document rather than  कॉलिंग  an external file to process data .
It has  भी  evolved to include a command-line interface capability and can  be  used  in   स्टैंडअलोन  graphical applications .
पीएचपी  is free  तन्त्र  released under the PHP  अनुज्ञा  , which is  असंगत   साथ  the GNU General Public License ( GPL ) due to restrictions on the usage of the term  पीएचपी  .
पीएचपी  can be  तैनात  on  सबसे  web servers and also  as  a standalone shell on almost every operating system  और  platform , free of  चार्ज  .
John Fitzgerald `` Jack  ''   कैनेडी   (  May 29 , 1917 – November 22 , 1963 ) , often referred to by his initials JFK , was the 35th President of the  संयुक्त  States  ,  serving from  1961  until  उसके  death in 1963 .
After military service as commander  of  the  मोटर  Torpedo Boats PT-109 and  pt-59   दौरान  World  युद्ध  II in the South Pacific ,  कैनेडी  represented Massachusetts ' 11th congressional district in  the  U.S. House of Representatives from  1947  to 1953 as a Democrat .
Thereafter , he  परोसा  in the U.S. Senate from 1953 until 1960  .
कैनेडी  defeated Vice President  और  Republican candidate Richard Nixon in the 1960 U.S. presidential election  .
At 43 years  of  age , he  is   the   youngest   to   have  been elected  to  the  दफ्तर  , the second-youngest President  (  after Theodore Roosevelt  )  , and the first  व्यक्ति  born in the 20th century to serve as president .
A Catholic , Kennedy is the only non-  प्रोटोस्टेंट  president  ,  and is  the  only president to  have  won a Pulitzer Prize .
Events during his presidency  शामिल  the Bay of Pigs Invasion , the Cuban Missile Crisis , the  भवन  of  the  Berlin  वॉल   ,   the  Space Race  ,  the African-American Civil Rights Movement , and early stages of the Vietnam War .
therein   ,  Kennedy increased  the   क्रमांक   of   सैन्य  advisers ,  खास  operation forces , and helicopters in  an  effort to curb  the  spread  of  communism in South East Asia .
The Kennedy administration adopted the policy of the  रणनीतिक  Hamlet Program which was  implemented  by the South Vietnamese  सरकारी  .
It involved  निश्चित  forced relocation , village internment  ,  and segregation of rural South Vietnamese  इससे  the northern  और  southern communist  insurgents  .
Kennedy was assassinated on November  22  , 1963 in Dallas , Texas .
Lee Harvey Oswald was charged with  the  crime , but he  थी  shot and killed by  जोकर  Ruby two days later , before a trial could take place .
The  एफबीआई  and the Warren Commission officially concluded that Oswald was the lone assassin .
However  ,   the  United States House Select Committee on Assassinations ( HSCA ) concluded that  those  investigations were flawed and that  कैनेडी  was probably assassinated as  the  result  of   a  conspiracy .
However , ABC News in their investigation , The Kennedy Assassination : Beyond Conspiracy , confirmed the  निष्कर्षों  of  the  Warren Commission ; having concluded Oswald acted alone  .
Kennedy 's controversial Department of Defense TFX fighter  bomber  program led to a Congressional investigation that lasted from 1963 to 1970 .
Since  the  1960s information concerning Kennedy 's private life has come  to   लाइट  .
Details of  कैनेडी  's  स्वास्थ्य  problems in which  he   struggled  have  become   बेहतर  known , especially since the 1990s .
हालांकि  initially kept secret from  the  general public , reports  of  Kennedy 's philandering have garnered much press .
कैनेडी  ranks  अत्यधिक  in public  राय   दरजा  of  u.S.  presidents .
``  Stand by Me '' is a song originally performed  by  Ben E. King and written by King , Jerry Leiber , and Mike Stoller , inspired by the spiritual `` Lord Stand by Me , '' plus two lines  rooted   in  Psalms 46:2–3 .
There have  महरूम  over  400   अंकित  versions of the song .
A political cartoon from an 1894  पक   पत्रिका  by illustrator  s.d   .  Ehrhart , shows  a  farm woman  labeled  `` Democratic  पार्टी  ''  sheltering  from a tornado of political  बदलें   .
a   रूपक  is a figure of speech that describes a subject by asserting that it is ,  on  some point of  तुलना   ,   the  same as another otherwise  unrelated  object .
Metaphor is a  प्रकार  of analogy  और  is closely related to  अन्य   rhetorical  figures of speech that achieve their effects via association , comparison or resemblance  सहित  allegory  ,  hyperbole , and simile .
In simpler terms , a  रूपक  compares two objects or things  बगैर  using the words `` like  ''  or `` as '' .
One of the most prominent examples of a metaphor  in  English  साहित्य   is  the All the  संसार  's  a  stage monologue from As You Like  it  :
All  the  world 's a stage,
And  सब  the  मेन  and women merely players ;
They have their exits and their entrances ; — William Shakespeare ,  as   तुम  Like It , 2/7
This quote  is  a  रूपक   क्युकी  the world is not literally a stage .
By  figuratively  asserting that the  संसार   is   a  stage , Shakespeare  उपयोग   the  points  of  comparison between  the  world and a stage  to  convey an  समझना  about  the  mechanics of the world  और   the   जीवनदान  of the people within  it  .

Printmaking is the process of  बनाना   artworks   by   मुद्रण  , normally on  पेपर  .
printmaking   सामान्यतः  covers only the process of creating  prints   साथ   an  element of  मौलिकता  , rather  than  just  होने  a photographic reproduction of  a  painting .
Except in the case of monotyping , the process is capable of producing multiples  of  the same piece ,  जिससे  is called  a  print .
प्रत्येक  print  उत्पादित  is not considered a `` copy  ''  but rather is considered an `` original ''  .
This  is  because  typically  each print varies to an extent due to  परिवर्तनीय   मूलभूत  to  the  printmaking process  ,  and also because the  imagery  of a print is typically not simply  a  reproduction of another work but rather  is  often a unique image designed from the start to be expressed in a particular printmaking technique .
A print may be known as an  छाप  .
Printmaking ( other than monotyping  )   is  not chosen only  लिये  its  क्षमता   to  produce multiple impressions , but rather  लिये   the  unique qualities that each of the printmaking processes lends  itself  to  .
Prints  हैं  created  by   transferring  ink  इससे  a matrix or  through  a prepared screen to a  चादर  of paper  or  other  सामग्री  .
Common  प्रकार  of matrices include  :  metal plates , usually copper or zinc , or polymer plates for engraving  or  etching ; stone ,  एल्यूमिनियम  , or polymer for lithography ; blocks of wood for  woodcuts  and wood engravings ; and linoleum for linocuts .
Screens made  of  silk or synthetic fabrics are used for the screenprinting process  .
अन्य   प्रकार  of matrix substrates and related processes  हैं  discussed below  .
अनेक  impressions printed from the same  मेट्रिक्स  form an  संस्करण  .
Since  the  late 19th  सदी  , artists have  generally  signed individual impressions from an edition and often number  the  impressions to form  a  limited edition  .
Prints may also be printed in book  रूप  ,  ऐसे  as illustrated books or artist 's books .
Il Divo is an English multinational  operatic  pop vocal group  निर्मित  by music manager , executive , and reality TV star Simon Cowell .
Formed in the United Kingdom , they are also signed to Cowell 's record label  ,  Syco Music .
Il Divo is a group of four male singers : French  पॉप  singer  सेबेस्तियन  Izambard , Spanish baritone Carlos Marín , American tenor David Miller , and Swiss tenor  उर्स  Bühler .
To date ,  वे   have  sold  अधिक  than  26  million  एल्बम  worldwide .
su-15  , one of the principal  सोवियत  Air Defence interceptors  in   the  1970s and  1980s
An interceptor aircraft (  or  simply interceptor ) is a type of fighter aircraft  designed  specifically to prevent missions of enemy  वायुयान  , particularly  बमवर्षक   और  reconnaissance aircraft  ,  and destroy them ,  relying   प्रायः   on   ग्रेट   गति   और  powerful armament  .
Being used since the First World War , after the late 1960s ,  interceptors  became less important due to shifting  इससे   बमवर्षक  to  इंटरकांटिनेंटल   बैलिस्टिक  missiles  (   icbms  ) for nuclear warfare .
A  वियतनामी  American ( )  is  an American of  वियतनामी  descent .
वे  make up about half of all overseas Vietnamese ( Người Việt Hải  ngoại  ) and are  the  fourth-largest Asian American group .
Mass Vietnamese immigration to the United States started after 1975 , after the end of the Vietnam War .
Early immigrants  यहूद   शरणार्थी  boat  लोगों   fleeing   persecution  or poverty .
Forced to  भागो  from their  मातृभूमि  and often  thrust   into  poor  शहरी  neighborhoods , these newcomers have nevertheless managed to establish strong communities  in   a  short amount of time .
More  than  sixty  प्रतिशत  of Vietnamese  अमेरिकी  reside in the states of California , Texas  ,  Washington , Florida  ,  and Virginia  .

Adolf Hitler committed suicide by gunshot on 30 April 1945 in his Führerbunker in Berlin .
His wife Eva ( née  braun   )  committed suicide  साथ  him by  ingesting  cyanide .
कि  afternoon ,  in   accordance   साथ  Hitler 's prior instructions ,  उनके  remains  यहूद  carried up the stairs through  the  bunker  's   आपात  exit ,  doused  in  पेट्रोल  and  नियत  alight in the Reich Chancellery garden outside the bunker .
The Soviet archives  रिकार्ड  that their burnt  remains   यहूद  recovered and interred in successive locations  जबतक  1970 when they were  again  exhumed ,  cremated  and  the  ashes scattered .
Accounts  differ  as to the cause of death ; one that he died by poison only and another  कि  he died  by   a  self-inflicted gunshot , while biting down on a cyanide capsule .
समकालीन  historians  have  rejected  ये  accounts as being  either   सोवियत  propaganda or an attempted compromise in  अनुक्रम   to  reconcile the different  conclusions  .
एक  eye-witness recorded  कि  the body showed signs of having been shot through the mouth ,  लकिन  this has been  सिद्ध   असंभावित  .
There is also  विवाद  regarding the  authenticity  of skull and jaw fragments  जिससे  were  बरामद  .
in  2009 , DNA tests were  performed  on  a  skull Soviet officials had  long  believed to be Hitler  's  .
The tests  नाज़िल  that  the  skull  थी  actually that of a woman less  than  40 years old .
Location of Missouri
The alcohol laws of Missouri are  among  the least restrictive and most lax and  permissive  in the United  राज्य  .
Missouri is known throughout  the  Midwest for its  largely  laissez-faire approach to alcohol regulation , in sharp contrast to  the  very strict alcohol laws of some of  इसके  neighbors , like Kansas and Oklahoma  .
Necrotizing fasciitis ( or )  or   nf   ,  commonly known  as  flesh-eating  बीमारी  or flesh-eating bacteria syndrome ,  is  a rare infection of  the   deeper  layers of skin and subcutaneous tissues , easily spreading across the  fascial  plane within the subcutaneous tissue  .
Necrotizing  fasciitis  is quickly progressing  ,  having greater risk of developing in the immunocompromised due to conditions like diabetes ,  कर्कट  ,  इत्यादि  .
It is a severe disease of sudden  onset  and is usually treated  तत्काल  with high doses  of  intravenous  एंटीबायोटिक  .
Type I describes a  polymicrobial  infection , whereas Type  ii   describes   a   monomicrobial  infection .
Many types  of  bacteria  can  cause necrotizing fasciitis ( e.g. , Group A streptococcus ( Streptococcus  pyogenes  ) , Staphylococcus aureus ,  clostridium   perfringens  , Bacteroides  fragilis   ,  Aeromonas hydrophila ) .
Such infections  हैं  more  संभावित  to occur  in  people with compromised immune systems .
Historically , Group A streptococcus made up most  मामले  of Type II infections .
however   ,  since as early as 2001 , another serious form of monomicrobial necrotizing fasciitis  रै  been  observed   साथ  increasing  आवृत्ति  , caused  by   methicillin-resistant  Staphylococcus aureus ( MRSA ) .
Some published  मामला  reports have implied a possible link  between  use of non-steroidal  anti-inflammatory  drugs and NF , though the evidence of the link was said to be weak because of a small number of case patients  और  it was unclear whether the drugs just  नकाबपोश  the  लक्षण   of  a secondary infection or were a cause per se .
World War II ( WWII or WW2 ) ,  भी  known as the Second  संसार  War , was a global  युद्ध  that lasted from 1939  to  1945  .
It involved the vast majority of  the   संसार  's  राष्ट्र  —including all of  the  great powers  —eventually  forming  दो  opposing  सैन्य  alliances :  the  Allies and the  अक्ष  .
It  थी   the  most widespread  युद्ध  in history , with more than 100 million  लोगों  serving in military units from  over  30  अलग   देशों  .
In a state  of  `` total war  ``  , the major participants  लगाई  their entire economic , industrial  ,   और   वैज्ञानिक  capabilities at  the   सेवा  of the war effort ,  erasing  the distinction between civilian and military resources .
Marked by mass  मौतों  of civilians , including the  holocaust  and the only use  of  nuclear weapons  in  warfare , it resulted in 50 million to over 75  लाख  fatalities .
These deaths make World War II by far the deadliest conflict in human history .
The Empire of Japan aimed to dominate East Asia and was already at war with  the  Republic  of  China in  1937  , but the world war  is  generally  कहा  to have begun on 1 September 1939  साथ   the  invasion of Poland by Germany  और  subsequent declarations of war  on  Germany by France  और  Britain .
इससे  late 1939 to early 1941 , in a series  of  campaigns and treaties , Germany formed  the  Axis alliance with Italy , conquering  or  subduing much of continental Europe .
Following the Molotov–Ribbentrop Pact , Germany and  the  Soviet Union partitioned and annexed  territories  between  themselves  of  उनके  European neighbours ,  सहित  Poland .
the  United Kingdom  और  the other members  of  the  अंग्रेजों   राष्ट्रमंडल  were  the   तभी  major Allied forces continuing the fight against the Axis  ,  with battles taking place in North Africa as well  as  the long-running Battle of the Atlantic .
In June  1941  , the European Axis  शुभारम्भ  an invasion of the Soviet Union , giving a start to the  largest   जमीन  theatre of war in history ,  जिससे  tied down the major  भाग   of  the  अक्ष  ' military forces for the rest of the war .
in  December 1941 ,  जापानी   joined  the Axis ,  attacked  the United States and European territories in the Pacific Ocean , and quickly conquered much  of  the Western Pacific .
The Axis advance was stopped in 1942  ,  after  जापानी   खोया  a series of naval  लड़ाइयों   और  European  अक्ष  troops were defeated in North Africa and , decisively , at Stalingrad .
In 1943 , with a  श्रेणी  of German  defeats  in Eastern Europe , the Allied invasion of Italy , and American victories in the Pacific , the Axis lost the initiative and undertook strategic retreat on all  fronts  .
In 1944 , the Western Allies invaded France  ,  while the Soviet Union regained  सब  of its territorial  नुकसान  and invaded Germany and  इसके  allies  .
दौरान  1944 and 1945 the United States defeated the  जापानी  Navy and captured key  पश्चिमी  Pacific islands .
The war  in  Europe ended  साथ  the capture of Berlin by Soviet and Polish troops and the subsequent  जर्मनी  unconditional surrender on 8  may  1945 .
Following the  पॉट्सडैम  Declaration  by  the Allies  on  26 July 1945 , the United States dropped atomic bombs on the Japanese cities of Hiroshima on 6 August ,  और  Nagasaki on 9 August .
With an invasion of the Japanese archipelago imminent , and the  सोवियत   संघ  having  घोषित  war on Japan by invading Manchuria ,  जापानी  surrendered on 15 August 1945  ,   समाप्ति  the war in Asia and cementing the  कुल  victory  of   the  Allies over the Axis .
World  युद्ध   ii  altered  the  political alignment and social structure of the world .
The United Nations  (  UN ) was established  to   फोस्टर  international  सहयोग  and  prevent   भविष्य   विरोध  .
The great  शक्तियां   कि  were the victors of the war—the United States , the Soviet Union , China  ,  the  संयुक्त  Kingdom , and France—became  the  permanent members of  the   संयुक्त   राष्ट्र  Security Council .
The Soviet Union and the United States emerged as  प्रतिद्वंद्वी   superpowers  ,  सेटिंग  the stage  लिये  the Cold War , which lasted for the next 46  सालो  .
Meanwhile  ,  the influence  of  European great powers started to decline ,  जबकि   the  decolonisation of Asia  और  Africa began .
Most countries whose  उद्योग  had been  क्षतिग्रस्त  moved towards economic recovery .
Political integration , especially in  यूरोपीय   ,  emerged  as  an  प्रयत्न  to stabilise postwar  संबंध   और  fight more effectively  in  the Cold War .
a  limited liability company ( LLC ) is a flexible form  of  enterprise that blends elements of partnership  और  corporate  structures  .
Note than an LLC is not a corporation  ,  and calling an LLC a  निगम  is technically incorrect .
an   llc  is a legal form of company that provides limited liability  to   इसके  owners  in  the vast  बहुमत  of United States  jurisdictions  .
LLCs do not  need  to  be  organized for  लाभ  .
Five K-Cups
The  अंदर   of   a  used  k-cup  , with the top foil and the used  कॉफी  grounds  removed  .
This shows  the  filter  अंदर   the  K-Cup .
K-Cup portion packs are used with Keurig or other  सिंगल  cup brewing systems to brew a  कप  of coffee ,  चाय  , or hot chocolate .
Each K-Cup is a plastic container with a  कॉफी  filter inside .
Ground  कॉफी   सेम  are packed in the K-Cup and sealed  air-tight  with a combination plastic and  foil  lid .
When the K-Cup is placed in  a  Keurig brewer , the brewer punctures the foil lid and the bottom  of   the  K-Cup and forces hot  जल  under pressure through the  k-cup   और  into a mug .
Keurig licenses its  k-cup  technology  to  coffee  roasters  and tea  makers  such  as  Green Mountain Coffee Roasters ,  diedrich/  Gloria Jeans , Timothy 's World  कॉफी  , Van Houtte , Caribou  कॉफी   ,  Celestial Seasonings  ,  Bigelow Tea Company , Twinings ,  टली   's  , Coffee People and Newman 's Own .
Keurig 's patents on the original K-Cup design expired  in  September 2012 .
Keurig  holds   at  least one additional , still-active US patent and another patent application , detailing improvements that have subsequently been incorporated in their K-Cup  डिज़ाइन  .

A chronograph is a specific  प्रकार  of watch that is used as a  stopwatch  combined with a  प्रदर्शक  watch .
a   मौलिक  chronograph has  an  independent sweep second  हाथ  ;  it  can be started , stopped  ,  and  लौटे  to zero by successive  दबाव  on the stem .
लुई  Moinet  invented  the chronograph in  1816
Conventional PCI ( PCI is an initialism formed from Peripheral Component Interconnect ,  भाग  of the  पीसीआई   लोकल  Bus standard and often  shortened  to just PCI ) is a local computer  बस  for attaching hardware devices in a computer .
The PCI  बस  supports  the  functions found on a processor bus  ,   लकिन  in a  मानकीकृत   स्वरूप  that is independent of any particular processor .
Devices connected  to  the bus appear to the processor to be  कनेक्ट  directly to the processor bus , and  हैं  assigned addresses in the processor 's address  स्पेस  .
Attached  डिवाइस  can take  either   the  form  of  an integrated circuit fitted onto the motherboard  itself  ,  पुकारा  a planar  यंत्र  in the  पीसीआई  specification , or an expansion card that  fits  into  a  slot .
The PCI Local Bus was first implemented in  ibm   pc   compatibles  ,  जहाँ  it displaced the  संयोजन   of  ISA plus one VESA Local Bus as the bus configuration .
It has  subsequently  been adopted for other computer types .
PCI and PCI-X are being replaced  by  PCI  एक्स्प्रेस   ,  but , most motherboards are still made with one or more PCI slots , which are  sufficient   लिये  many uses  .
The PCI specification covers the  शारीरिक  size of the bus ( including the size  और  spacing of the circuit board  किनारे  electrical contacts )  ,  electrical  विशेषताएँ   ,  bus timing , and protocols .
The specification can be  खरीदा  from  the  PCI Special Interest  समूह  (  pci-sig  ) .
Typical PCI cards  प्रयुक्त  in PCs include : network cards , sound  ताश  ,  modems  , extra  पोर्ट  such  as  USB or  सीरियल   ,  TV  ट्यूनर  cards and disk controllers .
PCI video  ताश  replaced ISA and  vesa  cards , until growing bandwidth requirements outgrew the capabilities of PCI ; the preferred interface  लिये  video cards  became  AGP , and then  पीसीआई  Express .
PCI video cards remain  उपलब्धियाँ  for use with  बूढ़ा  PCs without AGP or PCI  एक्स्प्रेस  slots .
Many devices previously provided on PCI expansion cards are now commonly  एकीकृत  onto motherboards or available in universal serial bus and PCI Express versions .
माइकल  Whitaker Smith (  born   अक्तूबर  7 , 1957  )  is an American contemporary Christian musician , who has  charted  primarily in the contemporary Christian and occasionally in  the   मुख्यधारा  charts .
His biggest  कामयाबी  in mainstream music was in 1991  जब  `` Place in  इस   संसार  '' hit No . 6 on  the  Billboard Hot 100 .
Smith is a three-time Grammy Award winner , and has earned  40   dove  Awards .
Over the course of his career , he sold more than 13 million  एल्बम  and recorded 29 No  .  1 Hit songs , fourteen gold albums  ,  and five platinum albums  .
Smith is an American Music Award recipient ;  he  was  भी  named one  of  People magazine 's `` Most Beautiful  लोगों   ''  .
An  अमरीकी   पोस्टर  from the World War II  -era  that was used  to  inform people about  कया  they should do if  वे  suspect sabotage .
Sabotage is a deliberate action aimed at weakening another  एंटिटी   through  subversion , obstruction , disruption  ,   or  destruction .
In a workplace setting , sabotage is the conscious withdrawal of  दक्षता  generally directed at causing some change in workplace conditions .
एक  who engages in sabotage is a saboteur .
As a rule  ,   saboteurs  try to conceal their identities because of the consequences of their actions .
For example , whereas an environmental pressure group  might   be  happy to be  पहचाना  with an act of sabotage , it would not want the  व्यक्तिगत  identities  of  the perpetrators known  .
Patrick Henry  कॉलेज  (  phc   )  is a  निजी   ,   स्वतंत्र   कॉलेज  with an Evangelical Christian basis that focuses on teaching classical liberal  कला  and government ,  स्तिथ  in Purcellville , Virginia , United States .
Patrick Henry is known for its conservative  धर्मान्तरण  Christian focus  .
As of April 17 , 2007 ,  the  college was accredited  by  the Transnational Association of Christian Colleges and  स्कूलों  ,  a  national faith-related accrediting organization recognized by the Department  of   शिक्षा  and the Council for Higher  शिक्षा   प्रत्यायन  .
The school was  संस्थापित  with the help of the  घर  School Legal  रक्षा  Association  ,  and now serves as  the  headquarters for  the  organization  ,  with which it is still closely connected .
The history of television comprises the work of numerous engineers and inventors in several  देशों  over many decades .
the  earliest  प्रस्ताव  was in 1908 , in  a   पेपर  by A . A. Campbell-Swinton  और  postulated  the  use of cathode rays .
The first practical demonstrations of television , however ,  यहूद  developed using electromechanical methods to scan , transmit  ,   और  reproduce an image  .
As electronic  कैमरा   और   प्रदर्शक  tubes were perfected , electromechanical television gave  रास्ता  to all-electronic systems in nearly  सब  applications .

a   फिल्म  theater ( also called a cinema , movie house  ,  film house  ,  film theater  or  picture house ) is a venue  ,   प्रायः  a  भवन  , for viewing films .
Most  लकिन  not all movie theaters  हैं  commercial operations catering to the general public , who attend by purchasing a ticket  .
the  movie is projected with a movie projector onto a  विशाल   प्रक्षेप  screen at the front of the auditorium  .
Most movie theaters are now equipped  लिये  digital  सिनेमा  projection , removing the  need  to create and  हस्तांतरण  a physical film print .

Lyme disease  ,  Lyme borreliosis is an infectious  बीमारी  caused by at least  तीन  species  of  bacteria belonging to  the  genus Borrelia .
Borrelia burgdorferi sensu stricto  is  the main cause of Lyme disease in  उत्तर  America  ,  whereas Borrelia afzelii and Borrelia garinii cause most European  मामले  .
The disease is named after the towns of Lyme and Old Lyme , Connecticut , USA , where a number  of  cases  यहूद  identified in  1975  .
Although Allen Steere  एहसास  that Lyme disease was a tick-borne disease in 1978  ,   the  cause of the  बीमारी  remained  a  mystery  जबतक  1981 , when B.  burgdorferi  was identified by  विली  Burgdorfer  .
Lyme disease is the  सबसे   आम   tick-borne  disease in the Northern Hemisphere  .
Borrelia is transmitted to humans by the bite  of  infected ticks belonging to  a  few species of the genus Ixodes  (   ``  hard ticks ''  )  .
Early  लक्षण  may include  ज्वर  , headache , fatigue , depression , and a characteristic circular skin rash  पुकारा  erythema migrans ( EM ) .
Left untreated , later symptoms may involve the joints ,  दिल   ,  and central  बेचैन  system .
In most cases , the  संक्रमण   और   इसके  symptoms are eliminated by antibiotics , especially if the illness is treated early .
Delayed  or  inadequate treatment  can   सीसे  to more serious symptoms , which can  be  disabling and difficult to  दावत  .
Penises of minke whales  on  display at  the  Icelandic Phallological Museum
Penis  (  plural penises or penes ) is  a  general term for  the  organs  साथ  which male  और  hermaphrodite animals introduce sperm into receptive  महिलाओं  during copulation .
Such organs occur in  अनेक  animals , both vertebrate and invertebrate , but males do not bear a penis in every animal species , and in those species in which  the  male does bear a so-called penis , the penes in  the  various species are not necessarily homologous .
लिये  example , the penis of a mammal is at  सबसे   analogous  to the penis of a male insect or barnacle .
The  पद  penis applies to many reproductive intromittent organs , but not  to   सब  ; for example the intromittent organ  of  most cephalopoda is the hectocotylus , a  specialised  arm , and  पुरूष  spiders  उपयोग  their  pedipalps  .
In most species  of  animals  in  which there is an organ that might  reasonably  be described as a penis , it has no  प्रमुख  function other  than   intromission  , or at least conveying the sperm to the female  ,  but in the placental  स्तनधारियों  the  शिश्न  bears the  distal   भाग  of  the  urethra , which discharges both urine  दौरान  urination and semen during copulation as the  अवसर  requires .
Artists and repertoire  (  A & R ) is the division of  a  record  लेबल  or music publishing  कम्पनी  that is responsible for talent scouting  और  overseeing  the   कलाकारी  development of  रिकॉर्डिंग  artists and/or songwriters .
It also acts as a liaison  between  artists  और  the  रिकार्ड   लेबल  or publishing company ; every activity  involving  artists to the point of album release is generally considered under  the  purview of  ,  and responsibility of , A & R .
A furlong is a  माप  of distance  in  imperial units and  u.S.  customary  इकाई  equal to  one-eighth   of   a  mile ,  समतुल्य  to 220 yards , 660 feet , 40  छड़  ,  or  10 chains .
The exact  मान  of the furlong varies slightly among English-speaking  देशों  .
Five furlongs are approximately 1 kilometre ( 1.0058 km  is   a  closer  सन्निकटन   )  .
चूंकि  the  असली  definition of  the   मीटर  was  one-quarter  of one ten-millionth of  the  circumference of the Earth ( along the great  वृत्त  coincident  साथ  the  मध्याह्न  of longitude passing through Paris ) , the circumference of the Earth is  परिचय   40,000   km  or about  200,000  furlongs .
CR2032  लिथियम  button cell battery
Lithium  9  volt , AA  ,   &  AAA sizes
लिथियम  batteries are disposable (  प्राथमिक  ) batteries that have lithium metal or lithium compounds as an anode .
वे   स्टैंड  apart from other batteries in their high charge  घनत्व  ( long life ) and high cost per unit .
Depending on the design and  रासायनिक  compounds used  ,  lithium cells can produce voltages from  1.5  V (  comparable   to   a   zinc–carbon  or alkaline battery ) to about 3.7 V.  लिथियम  batteries are  widely  used in products such as portable consumer electronic devices .
