The Pittsburgh Steelers were founded in 1933 .
Over the course of the team  's  history  ,  the team has had several logos  जबकि   wearing  virtually  the   वही  uniforms over the years , with  हल्का  changes  बना  to  दे  the  वर्दी  an  अद्यतनीकृत   dekh   .
The team colors , uniforms , and logo are often ranked as being among  the  best in the NFL  .
Facebook on the Ad-tech  2010
Facebook is an online social  नेटवर्किंग  service , whose name  तना  from the colloquial name for the book  दिए   to  students at the start of  the  academic year  by  some university administrations in the United States to help students get to  जान  each other .
It was founded in February 2004 by Mark Zuckerberg with his college roommates and fellow  हार्वर्ड  University students Eduardo Saverin , Andrew McCollum  ,  Dustin  moskovitz   और  Chris  ह्यूजेस   .
The website 's membership was initially limited by the  संस्थापकों  to Harvard  विद्यार्थी  ,  लकिन  was  विस्तारित  to other colleges in the Boston area , the Ivy League  ,  and Stanford University .
It  धीरे  added  support  for students at various other universities  पहले   खोलने  to high school students , and eventually to anyone aged  13  and over  .
Facebook  अभी  allows any users who declare themselves to be  at  least 13 years old to  become   पंजीकृत  users of the site  .
Users  जरूर  register  पहले  using the site  ,  after which  वे   may  create a  निजी   प्रोफ़ाइल  , add other users as friends , and  एक्सचेंज  messages  ,  including automatic notifications when they  अद्यतन  their  प्रोफ़ाइल  .
Additionally , users may join  common-interest  user groups  ,   व्यवस्थित   by  workplace  ,  school or college  ,  or other characteristics  ,  and  categorize  their friends into  सूचियाँ  such  as  `` People  इससे  Work '' or  ``  Close Friends '' .
As of  सितंबर  2012 , Facebook has over one billion active users .
according  to  a   may  2011 Consumer Reports survey , there are 7.5 million children  अंतर्गत  13 with  खाते  and 5 million under  10  , violating the site 's terms  of   सेवा  .
In May 2005 ,  accel   साझेदार  invested  $  12.7 million  in  Facebook ,  और  Jim Breyer added  $  1 million of his  अपना   धन  to the pot .
a   जनवरी  2009  compete.com  study ranked Facebook as the most used  सोशल  networking service by worldwide monthly active users  .
entertainment  Weekly  शामिल  the  साईट  on  इसके  end-of-the-decade `` best-of '' list ,  saying  , `` How on earth did we stalk our exes , remember our  co-workers  ' birthdays ,  कीड़ा  our friends  ,  and play a rousing  खेल  of Scrabulous  पहले  Facebook ? ''
Critics ,  ऐसे  as Facebook Detox  ,  state  कि  Facebook has turned into a national  obsession  in the United States ,  resulting   in   विशाल  amounts  of   समय  lost and encouraging narcissism  .
quantcast  estimates Facebook has  138.9   लाख  monthly unique  u.S.  visitors in May 2011 .
According to  सोशल  Media Today , in April 2010 an  अनुमानित  41.6 % ( 129.5 million ) of the U.S. population  था   a   फेसबुक  account .
Nevertheless , Facebook 's market growth  प्रारंभ  to stall  in  some regions ,  साथ  the site losing 7 million  क्रियाशील  users in the  संयुक्त   राज्य  and Canada in  may   2011  .
फेसबुक  eventually filed for an initial public offering on February  1   ,  2012 , and was  headquartered  in Menlo Park , California  .
Facebook Inc. began selling stock to the public and trading on the NASDAQ on  may  18  ,   2012  .
Erwin Johannes Eugen Rommel ( 15  नवम्बर   1891   –  14 October  1944  ) , popularly known as The Desert  फॉक्स  ( Wüstenfuchs , ) , was a German Field Marshal of World War  ii  .
He earned  the  respect of both his  अपना  troops and the enemies  he  fought .
Rommel  थी  a  अत्यधिक  decorated officer in World  युद्ध  I and was awarded the Pour le Mérite for  उसके  exploits on the Italian front .
in  World  युद्ध   ii   ,   he  further distinguished himself as the commander of the 7th Panzer  प्रभाग  during the  1940   आक्रमण  of France .
उसके  leadership of German and  इतालवी  forces in  the  North African  अभियान  established him as one of the  सबसे   समर्थ  commanders of  the  war , and earned  उसे  the  appellation   of   the  Desert Fox .
he   is   regarded   as  one of the  सबसे  skilled  कमांडरों  of desert warfare in the conflict  .
he  later commanded the German forces opposing the Allied cross-channel invasion in Normandy .
उसके  assignments  never   took  him to  the  Eastern Front .
Rommel is regarded as having been a  दयालु  and professional officer .
His Afrika  कोर्प्स   थी  never accused of  युद्ध  crimes ,  और  soldiers captured during his Africa campaign were reported  to  have  महरूम  treated humanely  .
Orders  to  kill  यहूदी  soldiers , civilians and captured commandos  यहूद  ignored .
Late in the war , Rommel  थी  linked to  the  conspiracy to  assassinate  Adolf  हिटलर  .
Since Rommel was  a  national hero ,  हिटलर  desired to eliminate him quietly .
He forced Rommel to commit suicide with a cyanide pill ,  in  return for assurances that Rommel 's family  होता  not  be  persecuted following his death .
Stained  कांच  representation  of  the Holy  स्पिरिट  as a dove , c. 1660 .
The  सात  gifts of the Holy Spirit is  an  enumeration  of  seven  आध्यात्मिक  gifts originating with patristic authors , later elaborated by five intellectual virtues  और  four other groups of ethical characteristics .
They are  :  wisdom , understanding , wonder and awe ( fear of the  रब   )  , counsel ,  ज्ञान   ,  fortitude , and piety ( reverence ) .
the  Earth Day Flag , the latest proposal of John McConnell for  a  flag of Earth Day
Earth  दिन  is an annual event  ,  celebrated on  अप्रैल  22 , on which  कार्यक्रम  are held worldwide to  demonstrate  support for environmental protection  .
It was first celebrated in 1970 , and is now coordinated globally by the Earth Day  संजाल  , and  मनाये  in more  than  192 countries each  साल  .
In  1969  at a UNESCO Conference in San Francisco , the date proposed was  कूच   21  , 1970 , the first day of spring  in   the  northern  गोलार्ध  .
इस  day of nature  's  equipoise was later sanctioned in a Proclamation  हस्ताक्षरित   by  Secretary General U Thant at  the  United Nations .
A month  बाद  a separate  धरती   दिन  was founded by United States Senator  gaylord  Nelson as an  पर्यावरणीय  teach-in  पहला  held on April 22 , 1970  .
Nelson was later awarded the Presidential Medal  of  Freedom Award in recognition of his  कार्य  .
While  इस  April 22 Earth Day was focused  on  the United States ,  an  organization  शुभारम्भ  by Denis Hayes , who was the original national  समन्वयक   in  1970 , took  it  international in  1990  and organized events  in  141 nations .
Numerous communities celebrate Earth Week , an  संपूर्ण  week of  क्रियाएँ  focused on  पर्यावरणीय  issues .
Iodine is a chemical element with  प्रतीक   i   और   परमाणु  number 53 .
The name is  इससे  Greek ioeidēs , meaning violet  or   जामुनी  , due to the color of elemental iodine  वाष्प  .
आयोडीन  and its compounds are primarily used in nutrition , and industrially in the  उत्पादन   of   एसिटिक  acid and certain polymers .
आयोडीन  's relatively  ऊँची  atomic number , low  toxicity   ,  and ease of attachment to organic compounds  have  made it a part of many X-ray contrast materials  in  modern medicine  .
आयोडीन  has only  एक  stable isotope .
A number of  आयोडीन  radioisotopes are also used  in  medical applications .
Iodine  is  found on Earth mainly as the  अत्यधिक  water-soluble iodide ion ,  i−  , which concentrates it in oceans and  brine  pools  .
जैसे  the other halogens  ,   फ़्री  iodine occurs mainly as a  diatomic  molecule I2 , and then only momentarily after being oxidized from  आयोडाइड  by an oxidant like free  ऑक्सीजन  .
In  the  universe  और  on Earth , iodine 's high  परमाणु  number makes it a relatively rare element .
However , its presence  in  ocean water  रै  given it a  भूमिका  in biology .
It is the heaviest essential element utilized widely by life in biological functions ( only tungsten , employed in  एंजाइमों  by a few species of bacteria  ,  is heavier ) .
Iodine 's rarity  in  many soils ,  due  to initial low  प्रचुरता   as  a crust-element  ,  and also leaching  of  soluble iodide by  rainwater  , has led  to   अनेक  deficiency  समस्याएं  in land animals and inland human populations .
Iodine deficiency affects  परिचय  two billion people and  is  the  अग्रणी  preventable cause  of  intellectual disabilities .
Iodine is required by  उच्चतर  animals , which use it to synthesize thyroid hormones , which contain the  तत्व  .
Because of this  फलन   ,  radioisotopes of iodine are concentrated in the thyroid gland  साथ  with nonradioactive  आयोडीन  .
If inhaled , the radioisotope iodine-131 , which has a  ऊँची  fission product  उपज  ,  concentrates  in the thyroid , but is easily remedied with potassium iodide treatment  .
Lobbying (  भी   लॉबी  ) is the act of attempting  to  influence decisions made by  officials  in the government ,  सबसे  often legislators or members of  नियामक   एजेंसियों  .
lobbying  is done by  अनेक  different types of people and  व्यवस्थित   समूह  , including individuals in  the  private  सेक्टर  , corporations , fellow legislators or government officials  ,   or   वकालत  groups (  ब्याज  groups  )  .
Lobbyists may be among a  विधायक  's constituencies , meaning a voter or bloc of voters within his or her electoral district ,  or   नहीं  ; they  may  engage in lobbying as  a  business , or not .
Professional lobbyists  हैं   लोगों  whose business is trying to influence legislation on behalf of a  समूह  or individual who hires them .
Individuals and nonprofit organizations  can  also lobby as  an  act of volunteering or  as  a small part of their  सामान्य  job ( for  उदाहरण  , a CEO  बैठक  with a representative about  a  project important to his/her  कम्पनी  , or  an  activist  बैठक  with his/her legislator in an unpaid capacity  )  .
Governments often define and regulate  व्यवस्थित   समूह   lobbying  that  रै  become  influential  .
the  ethics and  नैतिकता   of  lobbying are .
Lobbying is often spoken of with contempt , when the implication is that people  साथ  inordinate socioeconomic power are corrupting the law ( twisting it  दूर  from fairness ) in order to serve  उनके   अपना  conflict of interest .
लकिन  another side of lobbying  is  making sure that others ' interests are duly defended against  अन्य  ' corruption , or even simply making  यकीनन  that  अल्पसंख्यक  interests are fairly defended against mere tyranny of the  बहुमत  .
For  उदाहरण   ,   a  medical association ,  or  a trade association of health insurance companies , may lobby a legislature in order to counteract the  influence  of tobacco companies , in which case the lobbying would be viewed by most people as justified ( duly  defending  against others  '  corruption ) .
the  difficulty in drawing objective lines between which lobbyists are `` good lobbyists '' and  जिससे  ones  हैं  `` bad ones '' is compounded by the  cleverness   साथ  which lobbyists or  उनके  clients can argue that their own lobbying is of the  ``  good  ''   दयालु   .
at  heart , the effort to influence legislation  is  a power struggle .
As in other forms of  शक्ति  struggle  ,  such as war or  विधि  enforcement , motives range from  to   self-defense  to fighting for justice , and  the  dividing  लकीर  between  predation  and justice is subject to rationalization .
Sunshine of your love guitar riff
Cream were a 1960s British rock supergroup consisting of bassist/vocalist  जोकर  Bruce  ,  guitarist/vocalist Eric Clapton , and drummer Ginger Baker  .
उनके  sound was characterised by a hybrid of blues rock , hard  चट्टान  and  साइकेडेलिक  rock , combining the psychedelia-themed  गीत  , Eric Clapton 's  ब्लूज़  guitar  playing  and vocals , Jack Bruce  's  voice  और  prominent bass playing and  अदरक   बेकर   's  jazz -influenced drumming  .
The group 's third album , Wheels of Fire  ,  was the world 's  पहला  platinum-selling double album  .
मलाई   हैं  widely regarded as being the world 's first successful supergroup .
In  उनके  career  ,  they sold over 15 million albums worldwide .
मलाई  's music included  गीतों  based on  परंपरागत  blues such as ``  क्रॉसरोड्स  `` and `` Spoonful `` , and modern blues such as `` Born  अंतर्गत  a  ख़राब  Sign  ``  , as well as more  eccentric  songs  ऐसे  as ``  अजीब  Brew  ``  , `` Tales of Brave Ulysses `` and  ``  Toad `` .
Cream 's  biggest   हिट्स   यहूद  ``  i  Feel Free `` ( UK , number 11 ) , ``  सनशाइन  of Your Love `` (  us  , number 5 ) , ``  श्वेत   रूम  `` ( US , number  6  )  ,  `` Crossroads ''  (  US , number 28 ) , and `` Badge  ``   (  UK , number 18 )  .
Cream made a significant impact on the popular  म्यूज़िक  of the time  ,   और  , along with Jimi Hendrix , and Terry Kath of Chicago  ,  popularised the use  of  the wah-wah pedal .
They provided a  भारी  yet technically proficient  musical  theme that foreshadowed and influenced the emergence of British bands such  as  The Jeff Beck Group in the  लेट  1960s .
The band 's  सजीव  performances influenced progressive rock acts  ऐसे  as  फटाफट  .
Cream were inducted into the Rock and Roll  हॉल  of Fame in 1993 .
They were  शामिल  in  दोनो  Rolling  स्टोन  and  vh1  's lists of the `` 100  महानतम  Artists of All Time '' .
वे  were also ranked  क्रमांक  16 on VH1 's `` 100 Greatest Artists of Hard Rock ''  .
Hairspray is a 1988 comedy film written and directed by John Waters ,  और  starring Ricki Lake  ,  Sonny Bono , Debbie Harry , Michael  st.  Gerard  ,   shawn   थॉम्पसन  , Colleen  fitzpatrick  , Jerry Stiller , and  in  his last film role ,  दैवी  .
Hairspray was a dramatic  प्रस्थान  from Waters ' earlier works , with a much broader intended audience .
In  फैक्ट  , Hairsprays PG is the mildest rating a Waters film has received ; most of  उसके  previous films were  रेटेड  X  by  the  mpaa  .
Set  in  1962  बाल्टीमोर   ,  Maryland , the film revolves around self-proclaimed `` pleasantly  plump  '' teenager  ट्रेसी   turnblad  as she pursues stardom  as  a  नर्तकी   on  a local TV show and rallies against racial  पृथक्करण  .
Hairspray was only a moderate success upon its initial theatrical release , earning a modest gross of $ 8 million .
However , it managed to attract a larger  दर्शक  on home video in  the  early 1990s and became a cult  क्लासिक  .
Most critics praised the film ,  हालांकि   कुछ  were displeased with  the  overall campiness .
in  2002 ,  the  film was adapted into a Broadway musical of the  वही   नाम  , which won eight Tony Awards , including Best Musical in 2003 .
A second film version of Hairspray , an adaptation of the  स्टेज  musical , was also released by New Line Cinema in 2007 , which included many  परिवर्तन  of  scripted  items from the original .
the  film  भी  ranks # 444 on Empire magazine 's 2008 list of the 500 greatest movies of all  समय  .
a   ईसाई  denomination is an identifiable  धार्मिक  body under a common  नाम  , structure , and  doctrine   भीतर  Christianity .
Some groups included do not consider themselves a denomination  (  e.g. , the Catholic Church considers itself the one  सच्चा  church  और   the  Apostolic See , and as pre-denominational ) .
Some groups viewed by non-adherents as denominational  actively  resist being called a denomination and do not have  कोई  formal denominational structure , authority  ,  or record-keeping beyond the local congregation  ;  several groups  भीतर  Restoration Movement fall into  इस  category  .
Some groups are large ( e.g .  catholics  , Lutherans , Anglicans or Baptists ) , while others  हैं  just a few small churches  ,   और   in   सबसे  cases the relative size is not evident in this  सूची  .
आधुनिक  movements such  as  Fundamentalist Christianity , Pietism  ,  Evangelicalism  ,   pentecostalism   और   the   पवित्रता  movement sometimes cross denominational lines ,  or  in some cases create new denominations out of two or more continuing groups ,  (  as  is  the case for many United and  uniting  churches , for example ) .
Such  subtleties  and complexities are not clearly  चित्रित  here .
Major  विभाजन  within Christianity .
Note : This  is  not a complete list ,  लकिन  aims  to  provide a  comprehensible  overview  of   the  diversity  among  denominations of  christianity  .
As there are reported to be  लगभग  41,000 Christian  denominations  , many of which can not  be  verified to be significant ,  तभी  those denominations with Wikipedia  आलेख  will be listed in order  to  ensure that  सब   प्रविष्टियां  on this  सूची  are notable and verifiable  .
Between denominations , theologians , and comparative religionists there  हैं  considerable disagreements about which  समूह  can be properly called Christian , disagreements arising primarily from doctrinal differences between groups .
For the purpose of simplicity , this  सूची  is intended to reflect the self-understanding of each denomination .
Explanations of different  राय  concerning their status as Christian denominations can be found at  उनके  respective articles  .
There is no official recognition in most parts of the world for religious bodies ,  और  there is  no  official  clearinghouse  which could determine the status or respectability of religious bodies .
प्रायः  there is  considerable  disagreement  between  various churches about whether other churches  चाहिए  be labeled  साथ  pejorative  शर्तें  such as `` cult  ''  , or about whether  इस  or that group enjoys some  माप   of   respectability  .
Such considerations  प्रायः  vary  इससे  place to place ,  जहाँ  one  धार्मिक   समूह  may enjoy  बहुमत   औकात  in  एक  region , but  be   widely   regarded  as a  ``  dangerous cult '' in another  भाग  of the world  .
Inclusion on this list does not indicate any judgment  परिचय  the size  ,   महत्व   ,  or character  of  a group or its members .
1804 map of `` Louisiana ``  ,   edged  on the west by the Rocky Mountains  .
The Louisiana  खरीदें  ( `` Sale  of  Louisiana  ''  ) was the acquisition by the United States of America  in  1803 of of France 's  अर्जी  to the territory of Louisiana .
The U.S. paid 50  लाख  francs (  $  11 ,250,000  )   प्लस  cancellation of debts worth 18  लाख  francs ( $ 3,750,000 )  ,  for a total sum of  15  million dollars (  कम   than   3  cents per acre  )  for the Louisiana territory (  $   लाख  in  डॉलर   ,  less than 42 cents per acre )  .
The Louisiana territory encompassed all or  भाग  of 15 present U.S. states and two  कनाडाई  provinces .
The land purchased contained all of  present-day  Arkansas  ,  Missouri , Iowa , Oklahoma ,  कान्सास  ,  और  Nebraska  ;   भाग  of Minnesota that were west of the Mississippi River ; most of North Dakota  ;  most of  दक्षिण   डकोटा   ;  northeastern New Mexico ; northern Texas  ;  the portions of Montana , Wyoming , and Colorado east of the  महाद्वीपीय   divide  ;  louisiana  west  of  the Mississippi River , including the city  of  New Orleans ; and small portions of land  कि  would eventually  become  part of  the   कनाडाई   प्रांतों  of Alberta and Saskatchewan .
France controlled this vast area from 1699 until 1762 , the  साल  it gave the territory to its  ally   स्पेन  .
Under Napoleon  बोनापार्ट   ,  France took back  the  territory in 1800 in the hope of  भवन  an empire in North America .
A  स्लेव  revolt in Haiti and an impending war  साथ  Britain  ,  however , led France to abandon these plans and sell the entire territory to the United  राज्य  , who  था   originally  intended  तभी  to seek the purchase  of   नई  Orleans and its adjacent lands  .
The purchase of the territory of Louisiana  took  place during the  प्रेसिडेंसी  of Thomas Jefferson .
At the time , the purchase faced domestic  विपक्ष  because it was thought to be  असंवैधानिक  .
हालांकि  he agreed that the U.S. Constitution did not contain  प्रावधानों  for acquiring territory , Jefferson decided to go ahead with the  खरीदें  anyway in order  to  remove  फ़्रांस  's presence  in   the  region and to protect both U.S. trade access to the port of New Orleans and free passage on the Mississippi River .
Ceremony at Place d'Armes , New Orleans marking  ट्रांसफ़र  of Louisiana  to  the United States , 10 March 1804 , as depicted  by  Thure de Thulstrup  .
``  कूल   झटका  '' is  a  popular song written by Donald Storball and originally performed by  the   capitols  .
Released in  1966   ,  it reached No  .  2 on the American R & B  चार्ट  and No . 7 on  the  pop chart .
The backing  track   लिये  this song was actually  अंकित  ( secretly ) by the Motown  हाउस  band  the  Funk Brothers  .
प्रति   एक  of the  दुर्गंध  Brothers , the  सोंग  was originally to  be  called ``  pimp  Jerk  .  ''
This was  लिया   इससे  watching neighborhood  pimps   ,  who would dance in the  क्लब  , but were too `` cool '' to do the jerk  जैसे   नियमित  folks .
Their version was subsequently named `` the Pimp Jerk . ''
The producer was  भयभीत  that a song with the word pimp in  the  title would be  बैन  or not  प्राप्त  much positive attention , and had the title changed  to   इसके   वर्तमान  form .
the   go-go  's , Todd Rundgren , Big Trouble , Human  यौन  Response  ,   the  La De Da 's , The Creation , and  the   coasters  have covered the song .
Todd  rundgren  did his version in an odd time signature ( 7/4 )  ,  giving an obviously  jerky  feel to the song .
the  Go-Go 's covered  the  song for their 1982 album Vacation and  बाद   re-recorded  it for their 1990 album  महानतम  .
In the  विशेषता  film Home Alone 2 :  खोया  in  नई  York , Uncle  फ़्रैंक  ( Gerry Bamman ) sings `` Cool  झटका  ''  in   the  shower .
A version  of  the song with different lyrics ( ``  do  the Cool Whip  ''  ) is  प्रयुक्त  in  कूल   चाबुक   commercials  .
A recording of `` Cool  झटका  ''  by  Ricardo Ray is featured  in  the feature film Donnie Brasco ( 1997 ) .
the  song  सुविधाएँ   in  the film Standing  in  the Shadows  of   motown   ,  performed by the Funk Brothers with lead vocals by Bootsy  कॉलिन्स  .
The song is heard  briefly  in the animated feature , Madagascar 3 : Europe  's  Most Wanted  .
Despite this reason , it is listed in some variations  of  the film 's soundtrack .
a  league is a unit of  लंबाई  ( or , rarely , area  )  .
it  was long common in Europe  और  Latin America  ,  but it is no longer an  आधिकारिक  unit  in  any  स्वदेश  .
the  league originally referred  to   the  distance a person could walk in an hour .
Since the  मध्य  Ages  ,  many values have been specified in several countries .
In  the  context  of  nautical distances , the 3 mile ( 4.8 km ) distance corresponds to how far an observer of  औसत  height  (  5'9  ''  or 1.78 m  )  can see when standing at sea level  .
Thus , a ship  traveling  one `` league '' has  पहुँचे  what was previously  the   farthest  visible distance on  the  horizon .
The lack of a historical  और  global  मानक  for the exact measure of a  ``   लीग  ''  can  be accounted  लिये  by the variable elevation  of  the  निरीक्षक   (  i.e. , sightings from a  जलयान  's deck vs. masthead ) .
The Irish state came into  होने  in 1922  as  the Irish Free State , a dominion of the British Commonwealth ,  having  seceded from the United Kingdom under the  anglo-irish  Treaty .
It comprises  26  of Ireland 's  32  counties .
Since 1949 it has existed  as  the Republic of Ireland .
From its foundation  ,  the Irish Free  राज्य  was embroiled in a civil war  between  nationalists supporting  the   सन्धि  and opponents  जो   समर्थित  a republic  .
The pro-Treaty side ,  संगठित   as  Cumann na nGaedheal emerged victorious from the  विरोध  and won subsequent elections .
They formed the  सरकारी   of  the state until 1932 , when they  शांतिपूर्वक  handed  over  power to the anti-Treaty faction in Fianna Fáil ,  जो  defeated them in an election .
the  Irish state , despite  इसके  violent beginnings ,  रै   remained  a liberal democracy throughout its existence  .
A new constitution  in   1937  removed  अनेक  of the  कड़ी  with Britain  स्थापित   अंतर्गत   the  Treaty and Ireland  's  neutrality in the  दूसरी  World War demonstrated  इसके  independence  in   विदेशी   नीति  matters from Britain .
In 1948 Ireland  formally  left the British Commonwealth  और  adopted the title  of   ``  Republic '' .
In the  आर्थिक  sphere  ,  the Irish state has had a mixed  प्रदर्शन  .
on  independence , it was one of the wealthier countries in Europe  प्रति  head of population .
However it also inherited from British rule  the  problems of unemployment , emigration  ,  uneven geographical development and lack of a native industrial base .
For much  of  its history  ,  the state struggled to  rectify  these problems .
Particular peaks of  करणों   यहूद  recorded during  the  late 1930s , 1950s and 1980s  ,  when the Irish economy recorded little growth .
In the 1930s  ,   fianna   fáil  governments  attempted  to create Irish domestic industries using subsidies  और  protective tarifs  .
In  the  late 1950s ,  ये  policies were dropped  in  favour of  फ़्री  trade with selected countries and encouraging of foreign investment with low taxes .
This was expanded when Ireland entered the  यूरोपीय  Economic  जातियाँ  in 1972 .
in  the 1990s and  2000s   ,  Ireland  अनुभवी  an economic boom known  as  the Celtic Tiger  ,  in which the country 's  जीडीपी   surpassed   अनेक  of its European neighbours .
Immigration also  surpassed  emigration , bringing the state 's population up  to  over 4  लाख  .
However , since 2008 , Ireland has experienced  a   कठोर   संकट   in   the  banking  सेक्टर  and with sovereign  कर्ज़   .
The resultant economic  slump  has deepened the effect of the world recession on Ireland  .
From 1937 to 1998 , the Irish  संविधान  included  a  claim on Northern Ireland as a  भाग  of the national territory .
However , the state also opposed and used its  सुरक्षा   शक्तियां  against those  हथियारबंद  groups - principally the Provisional Irish Republican Army  ,  who  आजमाया  to unite Ireland  by  force  .
This occurred in the  1950s   ,  throughout the  1970s  and  1980s  and has continued on a reduced scale .
Irish  सरकारें  meanwhile tried  to  broker  an  agreement to the conflict  ज्ञात  as  the  Troubles  भीतर   उत्तरी  Ireland from 1968 to the late  1990s  .
The  अंग्रेजों  government officially recognised the right of  the  Irish  सरकारी  to be a party to the Northern negotiations in the Anglo-Irish Agreement of 1985 .
In 1998 ,  as  part  of  the Good Friday Agreement  ,   the  Irish constitution was altered by referendum to remove the territorial claim  to  Northern Ireland  और  instead extend the right of Irish citizenship to all the people of  the  island should they wish  to  have it .
John Quincy Adams ( July 11  ,  1767February 23 , 1848 ) was the sixth President of  the  United States ( 1825–1829  )  .
He served as American diplomat  ,  Senator ,  और   congressional  representative .
He  थी  a member of  the   federalist   ,  Democratic-Republican ,  नेशनल  Republican , and  बाद   anti-masonic  and  whig  parties .
Adams was the son of former President John  एडम्स  and Abigail  एडम्स  .
As  a  diplomat ,  एडम्स  played an important role in negotiating  अनेक  international treaties  ,  most notably the  सन्धि   of  Ghent  ,  which  ended  the War of  1812  .
As Secretary of State , he negotiated with the United Kingdom over America 's northern border with  कनाडा  , negotiated  साथ  Spain the annexation of Florida , and authored  the  Monroe  doctrine  .
Historians agree  he  was one of the greatest  राजनयिकों   और  secretaries of state in American history .
As president ,  he  sought to  modernize  the American economy and  प्रचारित  education .
Adams enacted a  भाग   of  his agenda  और  paid off much  of  the national debt .
He was stymied by  a  Congress controlled by his enemies ,  और  his lack of patronage  संजाल  helped politicians eager  to   undercut  him  .
He lost his 1828 bid for re-election to Andrew Jackson .
In doing  so  , he became the first president since his father to  serve   a  single term .
Adams is best  ज्ञात   as   a  diplomat who shaped  अमेरिका  's foreign policy  in  line with his ardently nationalist commitment to America  's   रिपब्लिकन  values  .
More recently Howe ( 2007 ) portrayed Adams  as  the exemplar and moral leader in an era of modernization  .
दौरान  Adams ' lifetime  ,  technological  नवप्रवर्तनों  and new means of  संचार  spread messages of religious  पुनरुद्धार  , social reform , and party  राजनीती  .
Goods , money , and people  traveled  more rapidly and efficiently  than  ever before .
Adams was elected a U.S. Representative  इससे  Massachusetts after leaving  दफ्तर  , serving for the last 17 years of his life with far greater acclamation  than  he had achieved  as  president .
He is , so  दूर  , the only president later elected  to  the  संयुक्त  States House of Representatives ( though John Tyler was elected to the House of Representatives of  the  Confederate States just before his death in  1862  )  .
Animated by his  growing   revulsion  against slavery , Adams became a leading opponent of the  स्लेव  Power .
He predicted that if a civil war were to break  आउट   ,   the  president could abolish slavery  by  using  उसके   युद्ध  powers .
एडम्स  also predicted the Union 's dissolution  over   the  slavery issue , but said  कि  if the South became independent there would  be  a series of bloody slave  revolts  .
खिड़कियाँ   अंतरजाल  Explorer 9 ( IE9 )  is  a version  of  the  अंतरजाल  Explorer web browser from  microsoft   .
it  was released to  the  public  on  March 14 , 2011 .
Microsoft has  released  Internet Explorer 9 as a  प्रमुख  out-of-band version that is not tied to the release schedule of any particular version of  खिड़कियाँ  ,  नापसंद  previous versions  .
it  is the  पहला  version  चूंकि  Internet Explorer 2 to not be bundled  साथ  a  खिड़कियाँ  operating  प्रणाली   ,  although  कुछ  OEMs  have  installed it with  खिड़कियाँ  7 on  उनके  PCs , as well as  नई  Windows  7   लैपटॉप  .
The system requirements for Internet Explorer  9  are Windows 7 , Windows Server 2008  r2  , Windows  विस्टा   सेवा  Pack  2  or Windows Server 2008 SP2  साथ   the  Platform Update .
Windows XP and earlier are  नहीं  supported .
Internet  एक्सप्लोरर  9 is the  पिछला  version of Internet Explorer to be supported on Windows Vista .
दोनो   ia-32  and x64 builds are available  .
Internet  एक्सप्लोरर  9 supports several CSS  3  properties , embedded ICC v2 or  v4  color profiles support via Windows Color  प्रणाली   ,  and has improved JavaScript performance  .
It is the last of the  पाँच   प्रमुख  web browsers to implement support for Scalable Vector Graphics (  svg  ) .
It also features hardware-accelerated graphics rendering using  direct2d  , hardware-accelerated text rendering using DirectWrite , hardware-accelerated video  रेंडरिंग  using Media Foundation ,  इमेजिंग  support provided by  खिड़कियाँ  Imaging  घटक  , and  ऊँची   वफ़ादारी  printing  संचालित  by  the  XML Paper Specification ( XPS ) print  पाइपलाइन  .
Internet Explorer  9  also  supports  the HTML5 video and  ऑडियो   टैग  and  the  Web  खोलें  Font  स्वरूप  .
alka-seltzer  is an effervescent antacid and pain reliever first  marketed   by  the Dr .  मील  Medicine Company  .
it  was developed  by  Maurice Treener , head chemist at Miles  ,  in  elkhart   ,   इंडियाना  .
Alka-Seltzer is marketed for relief of minor aches  ,  pains  ,  inflammation  ,   ज्वर  , headache ,  heartburn   ,  sour stomach , indigestion , and hangovers , while neutralizing excess  पेट   एसिड  .
It was launched in 1931 .
A  spin-off  of Alka-Seltzer made to relieve colds and flu ,  alka-seltzer  Plus , was  बाद   introduced  .
A short-lived antacid non-aspirin variant ,  alka-mints  , was introduced  in  1994  और  discontinued  in  1997 .
alka-seltzer  is currently owned by Bayer Schering  फार्मा  AG , Germany .
The  नाम  `` Alka-Seltzer  ''  has been extended to  चरितार्थ  an entire line  of  medications sold over the  काउंटर  and taken by means  of  rapidly dissolving tablets  कि  form a  कार्बोनेटेड  solution in water .

A stalactite ( , ; from  the  Greek stalasso , ( σταλάσσω )  ,  `` to drip '' ,  और  meaning `` that which  drips  '' )  is  a type  of  speleothem  (   द्वितीयक   खनिज  ) that  hangs  from the ceiling of  चूना  caves .
It is a type of dripstone .
The corresponding  गठन  on the floor of the cave is known as a stalagmite .
Degree abbreviations are used as an alternative way to specify an academic degree  बजाय  of  स्पेलिंग  out the title  in  full , such as in reference  किताबे  like Who 's  जो  and on business cards .
Many degrees have  अधिक   than  one abbreviation .
In the UK , it is not  generally   the  custom to punctuate abbreviations for degrees with full stops ( e.g . ``  बीएससी  '' rather than  ``  B.Sc . `` .
Race is a classification system used to categorize humans into large and distinct populations  or  groups  by  anatomical , cultural  ,  ethnic  ,  genetic  ,   भौगोलिक  , historical , linguistic , religious , or social affiliation .
First used  to  denote  नेशनल   संबद्धों  , the term began  to  be used to relate to physical traits  in  the 17th  सदी   .
In the early 20th century the term  थी  often used ,  in  a taxonomic sense , to denote genetically differentiated human populations defined  by   phenotype  .
जबकि  biologists sometimes use the  अवधारणा  of  रेस  to make  भेद  among fuzzy sets of traits , others in the scientific community suggest that the idea of race  प्रायः  is used in  a   भोली  or  simplistic  way  ,  i.e . that  among  humans , race has no  taxonomic  significance : all living  इंसानो   belong  to the same species  ,  Homo sapiens and subspecies ,  होमो  sapiens sapiens .
Social conceptions and groupings of races vary  over  time , involving folk taxonomies
that define of individuals based on  आभास   traits  .
Scientists consider  biological  essentialism  obsolete  , and generally  discourage  racial  स्पष्टीकरण  for collective differentiation  in  both physical and behavioral traits .
Since the second half of the 20th century the associations of race with  the  ideologies and theories that grew out  of  the  कार्य  of  19th-century  anthropologists and physiologists has led to  the  use of the word race itself  बनने  problematic .
Although still used  in  general contexts  ,  it is now often replaced by other words which are less ambiguous  और  emotionally charged ,  ऐसे  as populations ,  लोगों  ( s  )  , ethnic  समूह  or  समुदायों  depending  on  context .
Lucy Stone  (  August 13  ,  1818 – October 19 ,  1893   )  was a prominent American abolitionist and suffragist ,  और  a vocal advocate and organizer promoting rights  लिये  women .
In 1847 , Stone  became  the first woman from Massachusetts to  earn  a college degree .
She spoke out for women 's  अधिकारों   और  against slavery at a time when women were discouraged and prevented from public speaking .
Stone was the  पहला  recorded American woman to  retain  her own last name after marriage .
Stone 's organizational activities for the cause of women 's  अधिकारों  yielded tangible  gains  in the difficult political  पर्यावरण  of the  19th  century .
Stone helped initiate the first National Women 's Rights  सम्मेलन  and she supported and sustained it annually along with a number of other local , state and regional activist conventions .
Stone spoke in front of a number of legislative bodies to  प्रचार  laws giving  अधिक  rights to women .
She  assisted  in establishing the Woman  's  National  वफ़ादार  League to help pass the Thirteenth Amendment and thereby abolish slavery , after which she helped form the largest group  of  like-minded women  's  rights reformers , the politically moderate American Woman Suffrage Association  ,  which worked  लिये  decades at the state  स्तर   in  favor of women  's  right to  vote   .
Stone wrote extensively about a wide  दायरा  of women  's  rights ,  प्रकाशन  and distributing  भाषणों  by herself and others , and convention  कार्यवाही   .
In the long-running and influential Woman 's  जर्नल  ,  a  weekly periodical that she established and promoted , Stone aired  दोनो   उसके  own and differing views about women 's rights  .
Called `` the orator '' and `` the morning star of the woman 's rights  गति  ''  ,  Stone delivered  a  speech which  sparked   सुसान  B. Anthony to  लो  up the cause of women 's  suffrage   .
Elizabeth Cady Stanton wrote that  ``  Lucy  स्टोन   थी  the first person by whom the heart of the American public was  deeply   stirred  on  the  woman question . ''
Together , Anthony , Stanton  ,   और  Stone have  महरूम   पुकारा  the 19th century `` triumvirate ``  of   महिलाओं   's   suffrage   और   नारीवाद  .
In  वित्त  , a bond is an instrument of indebtedness  of  the bond issuer to the holders .
it   is  a debt security , under  जिससे  the issuer  owes  the holders  a  debt and , depending on  the   शर्तें  of the bond , is obliged to pay them interest ( the coupon ) or to repay the principal at a later date , termed the maturity .
Interest  is   प्रायः  payable  at  fixed intervals ( semiannual , annual , sometimes monthly ) .
बहुत  often the bond is negotiable , i.e . the ownership of the instrument can be transferred in  the  secondary market .
Thus a  बंध  is a form of loan  or   iou  : the holder  of  the  बंध  is the lender  (  creditor  )  , the issuer of the  बंध  is the borrower ( debtor ) , and  the   कूपन  is the  ब्याज  .
Bonds provide  the   borrower  with external  निधि  to finance long-term investments , or , in the case of  सरकारी  bonds , to finance current expenditure .
प्रमाणपत्र   of  deposit ( CDs ) or short  पद  commercial  पेपर  are considered to be  धन  market instruments and not bonds : the main  अंतर   is  in the length of the term of  the  instrument .
bonds  and stocks  हैं  both securities  ,  but the major  अंतर  between the two is that  (  capital )  stockholders   have  an equity stake in the company (  i.e  . they are owners ) ,  whereas  bondholders have a creditor  हिस्सेदारी   in  the company  (  i.e .  वे  are lenders )  .
Another difference is that bonds usually have a defined term , or maturity , after which the bond is redeemed ,  whereas  stocks may be outstanding indefinitely .
An exception is an irredeemable bond , such  as  Consols ,  जिससे  is a perpetuity , i.e . a bond with no maturity .

A scale model is a physical model , a representation or copy  of  an object that is larger or smaller  than   the  actual size  of  the object ,  जिससे  seeks to maintain the  सापेक्ष   proportions  ( the scale factor ) of the physical size  of  the original object .
बहुत  often the scale  मॉडल  is used as a guide to making the object in full size .
Scale  मॉडल  are  निर्मित  or collected  लिये  many reasons .
The Zune HD was a  पोर्टेबल  media  खिलाड़ी  in the  zune   उत्पाद  family  released  on September 15 ,  2009  by Microsoft .
It was a direct  प्रतिस्पर्धी  with the Apple iPod and iPhone series of  मोबाईल   डिवाइस  .
It was initially released in  16   और  32 GB capacities  .
A 64  gb  version was released on April 9  ,  2010 .
It utilized  a  touchscreen  इंटरफ़ेस  for navigation  और  included Wi-Fi for synchronization , access to the  zune  Marketplace and Web browsing .
The Zune  hd  utilized the Nvidia Tegra APX 2600 chip , allowing it  to  play 720p video through  the   वैकल्पिक  HDMI Zune dock  on   a  high-definition television  .
Otherwise  ,  content would be scaled down  to   480x272  pixels on the player  's  OLED touchscreen .
Old Sparky , the electric chair used at Sing Sing prison
निष्पादन  by electrocution , usually  performed  using an electric chair , is an  निष्पादन  method originating in the  संयुक्त  States in  जिससे  the condemned person is strapped to a specially built wooden chair and electrocuted through electrodes placed on the  देह  .
इस  execution  विधि  was created  by  employees of Thomas Edison during  the  War  of  Currents  ,   और  has been  प्रयुक्त   तभी  in the United States  और   ,   लिये  a period of several decades , in the Philippines ( its first use there in 1924 under  अमरीकी  occupation , last  in  1976 ) .
Historically , once the condemned person was  संलग्न  to the chair , various cycles ( differing in voltage and  अवधि  ) of alternating current would be passed through the individual 's body , in order to cause fatal  क्षति  to  the  internal organs (  सहित   the  brain ) .
The first  धक्का  of  इलेक्ट्रिक  current was designed to cause immediate unconsciousness and brain death ;  the   दूसरी  one was  designed   to  cause  fatal  damage to the vital organs .
Death was frequently caused by  विद्युत  overstimulation of  the   दिल  .
Although in the United States  the   इलेक्ट्रिक  chair  रै  become a symbol of the death penalty ,  इसके   उपयोग  is  in  decline  due  to the rise of  lethal  injection , which  is   widely   believed   to  be a more humane method of execution .
Although  कुछ  states  स्टिल  maintain  electrocution   as  a method of execution , today it  is  only maintained as a secondary method that may  be  chosen over lethal injection at  the   निवेदन  of the prisoner .
As  of  2010 , electrocution is an optional form  of  execution in Alabama  ,  Florida , South Carolina and Virginia .
They allow the prisoner to choose lethal  इंजेक्शन  as an alternative method .
In the states of Kentucky and Tennessee , the electric chair has  महरूम  retired except for those whose capital crimes  यहूद   वचनबद्ध  prior to  legislated  dates in 1998  (  Kentucky : March  31  , 1998 ; Tennessee : December 31 ,  1998  ) and who chose electrocution .
In both states ,  inmates  who  do   नहीं   चुनें  electrocution or  inmates  who committed  उनके  crimes  बाद  the  designated  date are  मारे  by lethal  इंजेक्शन  .
The electric chair is  an  alternate form of execution  स्वीकृत  for potential use in Arkansas  और  Oklahoma if other forms of  निष्पादन  are found  असंवैधानिक  in the state at  the   समय  of execution  .
It is the sole method  of  execution in Vermont , where treason is the only capital crime .
On February 8 , 2008  ,  the Nebraska Supreme Court  संकल्पित  that execution by electric chair was a `` cruel and unusual punishment  ''  under the  राज्य   's  constitution .
This  brought  executions of this type to an end in Nebraska , the only remaining state to retain electrocution as its sole method  of  execution for murder .
The  मेरीलैंड  House of Delegates  is  the lower house  of  the General  सभा  , the  राज्य  legislature of the  अमरीकी  State of Maryland , and is composed of  141  Delegates elected from 47 districts .
the  House of Delegates Chamber is located  in  the  मेरीलैंड  State House ( state capitol )  on  State Circle in Annapolis , which is the state  पूंजी  .
The  राज्य  House  भी  houses the Maryland  राज्य   सीनेट  Chamber and the offices of the Governor  और  Lieutenant Governor of  the  State  of  Maryland .
Each  प्रतिनिधि   रै  offices in  annapolis  , in the nearby Casper R. Taylor , Jr. House Office Building .
the  Liberation of  पेरिस  ( also known as the Battle for Paris  )  took place during World War II  इससे  19 August  1944  until the  आत्मसमर्पण  of the occupying German garrison on 25 August .
The  मुक्ति  of Paris started with an uprising  by  the French  प्रतिरोध   विरूद्ध  the German garrison .
On 24  अगस्त  , the French  शक्तियां  of  the  Interior  (  Forces  françaises  de l'intérieur , FFI  )  received reinforcements from the Free French  फौज   of  Liberation and from  the   u.S.  Third Army under General Patton .
The  पूंजी  region of France had been governed by Nazi Germany  चूंकि  the signing of the Second  compiègne  Armistice in June 1940 , when the German  फौज  occupied northern  और  westernmost France , and  जब   the  puppet regime of Vichy France was established in the  कस्बा   of  Vichy in central France .
इस  battle marked the liberation  of  Paris and the exile of the Vichy government to Sigmaringen in Germany .
However , there was still much heavy fighting to be done before  फ़्रांस   थी  liberated  ,  including the campaign in southern France during  august-september  ( in Provence and  extending  into  the  southwestern region of the Vosges Mountains ) ,  साथ   the  German-held seaports of western France  (  such as at Brest and Dunkirk  )  ,  in   alsace   और  Lorraine in  पूर्वी  France ,  और  in northeastern France  ,  such  as   साथ  the Rhine and  moder  Rivers .
the   जर्मनी  Army and SS fought doggedly in these areas for the remainder of 1944  और  into 1945 .
``  Feelin ' Alright ? '' also known as ``  अहसास   alright   ''   is  a song written by  डेव  Mason of  the  English rock  बैंड  Traffic  इससे  their eponymous 1968 album , Traffic  .
The song was  भी  a hit single for several performers : Joe Cocker ( 1969 , # 69 , recharted in 1972 ,  us   #  33 ) ,  mongo  Santamaría ( 1969  ,   #  95 ) and Grand  दुर्गंध  Railroad ( 1971 , US # 54  )  .
It has  भी  been recorded by Three Dog  रात्रि  ( 1969 ) , The 5th Dimension ( 1970 ) , Lou  राल्स  , Freddie King , Paul  weller  , Lulu , Chairmen of the Board ( 1970 ) , Rare  धरती  , The  इलेक्ट्रिक  Concept  ऑर्केस्ट्रा  , Mother 's Finest (  1973  ) , The Ohio Players ( 1971 ) , Diana  रॉस  with  the  Jackson 5 ( 1971 )  ,  Maceo Parker  ,  Gladys  नाईट  & the Pips , Widespread Panic and  the  Black Crowes .
A Steel Drum version by Trinidad Oil  कम्पनी  was reissued on the dancefloor jazz compilation  ब्लू   रस   2  .
It was also  प्रदर्शित  in the 2000 film Duets  ,  sung  by  Huey Lewis .
Both the original and  the  Joe Cocker cover were  प्रदर्शित  in the movie Flight ,  अभिनीत  Denzel Washington .
Devon  werkheiser  ( born March 8,1991  )  is  an  American  कर्ता  , voice actor ,  सिंगर  , songwriter and musician  ,  best known for  उसके   अभिनीत  role as Ned Bigby  on   the  Nickelodeon sitcom  ned  's Declassified  स्कूल  Survival Guide and  लिये  his role in the 2007 TV Movie Shredderman Rules ,  as  the lead character Nolan Byrd .
Werkheiser also played Peter Parkes  in  the fourth  और  final season of  the  ABC Family show  यूनानी  .
नमूना  view of an electronic health record  आधारित  on images
Sample  दृश्य  of  an  electronic health  रिकार्ड
An electronic health  रिकार्ड  ( EHR ) is an evolving concept defined as a systematic  संग्रहण  of electronic  स्वास्थ्य  information about individual patients or populations  .
it  is a record in  डिजिटल  format that  is  theoretically capable  of  being shared across  अलग  health care settings .
In some cases this sharing can occur by way  of  network-connected  enterprise-wide  information systems and other information networks or exchanges .
EHRs may include  a  range of data , including demographics ,  चिकित्सा  history , medication  और  allergies  ,  immunization status , laboratory  परीक्षण   परिणाम  , radiology images , vital signs  ,  personal stats  जैसे  age and weight , and billing information  .
Loan origination is the process by  जिससे   a   borrower  applies for a new loan , and a lender processes that application .
Origination generally  शामिल   सब   the  steps from  लेने  a loan  अनुप्रयोग  up to disbursal of funds  (  or declining  the  application  )  .
ऋण   सर्विसिंग   कवर   सबकुछ   बाद   disbursing  the  निधि   जबतक   the   ऋण  is fully paid  बंद  .
Loan  origination  is  a  specialized  संस्करण  of new account opening for financial services organizations  .
Certain people and organizations specialize in loan  origination  .
Mortgage brokers and other mortgage originator  कंपनियाँ  serve  as  a  prominent  example .
There are many different types of loans .
For more  सूचना  on loan  प्रकार  , see the loan and consumer  lending  articles .
Steps involved in originating a  ऋण   vary  by loan type , various kinds of loan risk , regulator , lender policy , and other  कारकों  .
Top left :  the  Tennessee Valley Authority , part of the New Deal , being signed into  विधि  in  1933  .
Top  सही  : Franklin  delano  Roosevelt ,  जो  was  जिम्मेदार  for initiatives and programs  collectively  known as the New Deal  .
Bottom :  a  public mural from one of the artists employed  by  the New Deal  .
The New Deal was a  श्रेणी  of economic programs enacted in the  संयुक्त   राज्य  between 1933  और   1936  .
They involved presidential executive  आदेश  or laws passed by Congress during the  पहला  term of  अध्यक्ष  Franklin D. Roosevelt .
the  programs  यहूद  in  जवाब  to the Great Depression , and focused  on  what historians  कॉल  the  ``  3 Rs '' : Relief , Recovery  ,  and Reform .
कि   is  Relief for the unemployed and  ग़रीब  ; Recovery of the economy to normal levels ; and Reform of the financial system to  prevent  a  repeat  depression .
The New Deal produced  a  political  realignment  , making the Democratic  पार्टी   the  majority ( as well as the party that held the  श्वेत   हाउस   लिये  seven out  of  nine Presidential terms from 1933 to 1969 ) , with its base  in  liberal ideas ,  the  white South  ,  traditional  डेमोक्रेट  , big city machines , and  the   newly  empowered labor unions and ethnic minorities .
the  Republicans  यहूद  split , with conservatives  opposing  the entire New Deal as  an  enemy of business and growth , and liberals  accepting  some of  it  and promising to make it more efficient  .
The realignment  crystallized   into  the New Deal Coalition  कि  dominated most presidential elections  into   the  1960s , while the opposition Conservative Coalition  largely  controlled Congress from 1937 to 1963 .
By  1936  the term `` liberal '' typically was used for  समर्थक  of the New Deal , and `` conservative `` for its opponents .
From 1934 to 1938 ,  रूज़वेल्ट  was assisted in his  endeavours  by a “pro-spender”  बहुमत  in  कॉंग्रेस  ( drawn  इससे  two-party  ,  competitive , non-machine , Progressive  ,  and Left party districts ) .
as   विख्यात  by  सिकंदर  Hicks , “Roosevelt  ,  backed by rare , non-Southern Democrat majorities  —   270  non-Southern Democrat representatives  और  71 non-Southern Democrat senators —  spelled  Second New Deal reform.”
Many historians distinguish between  a  ``  पहला  New  सौदे  '' (  1933–34   )  and a ``  दूसरी  New  सौदे  '' ( 1935–38 )  ,  with  the  second one  अधिक  liberal  और  more controversial  .
The ``  पहला  New Deal '' ( 1933–34 )  dealt  with diverse groups  ,   इससे  banking  और  railroads to industry and farming , all of which  मांगे  help for economic  अस्तित्व  .
the  Federal Emergency  राहत  Administration , for instance , provided $ 500  लाख  for  राहत  operations by states and cities , while the short-lived  cwa  (  सिविल   works  Administration  )  gave localities money  to  operate make-work projects in  1933-34  .
The `` Second New  सौदे  `` in 1935–38  शामिल  the  वेगनर  Act to promote  मजदूर  unions , the Works Progress Administration ( WPA )  राहत   कार्यक्रम   (  which  बना  the federal  सरकारी   by  far the  largest   सिंगल  employer in the nation ) , the Social Security Act , and new  कार्यक्रम   to  aid  किरायेदार   किसानो  and migrant workers .
The final major items of New Deal legislation  यहूद  the creation of the United States Housing Authority and Farm  सुरक्षा   प्रशासन  , both in  1937  ,  और  the Fair Labor  मानकों  Act of 1938 ,  जिससे  set maximum hours and minimum wages  लिये   सबसे  categories of  मजदूर   .
The economic downturn  of  1937–38  ,   और  the bitter  विभाजित   between  the AFL and CIO labor unions led to major Republican  gains  in  कॉंग्रेस  in 1938 .
रूढ़िवादी  Republicans and Democrats in Congress joined  in  the informal  रूढ़िवादी   गठबन्धन  .
by  1942–43 they shut down relief  कार्यक्रम  such as  the   wpa  and CCC  और  blocked major liberal proposals .
रूज़वेल्ट  himself turned his attention to the war effort , and  जीती  reelection in 1940  और  1944 .
The  परम्  Court declared the National Recovery Administration ( NRA  )  and the first version of the Agricultural Adjustment Act ( AAA ) unconstitutional , however the AAA was rewritten and then upheld  .
As the first Republican president  निर्वाचित   बाद  FDR , Dwight D.  आइज़नहावर  ( 1953–61 ) left  the  New Deal  largely  intact ,  भी  expanding it in some  क्षेत्रों   .
in  the 1960s , Lyndon B. Johnson  's  Great Society  प्रयुक्त   the  New Deal as inspiration for a  नाटकीय   विस्तार  of liberal programs  ,  which Republican Richard M. Nixon generally retained .
After 1974 ,  however  ,  the   कॉल  for deregulation of the economy gained  bipartisan  support .
The New Deal  विनियमन  of banking ( Glass–Steagall Act  )  was suspended in the 1990s .
Many  नई  Deal  कार्यक्रम  remain active , with some still operating under the original names , including the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation ( FDIC ) , the Federal Crop Insurance Corporation ( FCIC ) , the Federal  आवास  Administration  (  FHA ) , and the Tennessee Valley Authority  (  TVA ) .
The largest programs still in existence today are the Social Security System and the Securities and Exchange  आयोग  ( SEC  )   .
A woman (  )  ,  pl   :  women ( ) is a female human  .
The term  स्त्री  is usually reserved for an adult  ,  with the term girl being the usual term for a female child or adolescent  .
However  ,  the term woman  is  also  sometimes   प्रयुक्त  to identify a female human , regardless of age , as in phrases such  as  `` Women  's   अधिकारों  `` .
महिलाओं   हैं  typically capable of giving birth , though older  महिलाओं  who have gone  through   रजोनिवृत्ति   और  some intersex women can not .
`` I  do  n't Want  to  Miss  a  Thing '' is a song  performed  by  अमरीकी  rock band Aerosmith for the  1998  film Armageddon .
लिखा  by Diane Warren , the song debuted at number one  on  the Billboard Hot 100 ( the first # 1 for the band after 28 years together ) .
The song stayed  at  number one for four weeks from September 5 to September 26 , 1998 .
the  song also stayed at number 1 for several weeks  in  several  अन्य  countries .
In the UK , the song peaked at number four  ,   बनने  Aerosmith 's highest charting song in the UK  ,  where it  थी  the  17th  best-selling single  of  1998 , and  रै   बेची   over  a  लाख  copies  .
Although not used  by   the  majority  of  the world 's countries , daylight saving  समय  is common  in   the  Western world .
Daylight saving time ( DST ) —also summer time  in   अंग्रेजों  English —  is  the practice of advancing  घड़ियाँ   दौरान  the lighter months so that evenings have  अधिक  daylight  और  mornings  have  less  .
typically  clocks are adjusted forward one hour near the start of  वसन्त   और  are adjusted backward in autumn .
The modern idea of daylight saving was first proposed in 1895 by  जार्ज  Vernon Hudson and  it   थी  first implemented during the First World War .
अनेक  countries  have  used it at various  टाइम्स  since then .
Much of the United States used  dst  in the 1950s and 1960s  ,  and  dst  use expanded following the 1970s  उर्जा   संकट  and has been widely used in North  अमेरिका  and Europe since then .
The practice  रै  been both praised and  criticized  .
adding  daylight to  evenings  benefits  retailing  , sports ,  और  other activities that exploit sunlight after working hours  ,   लकिन  can cause problems for evening entertainment and other occupations  tied  to the sun .
Although an early  लक्ष्य   of   dst   थी  to  reduce  evening  उपयोग  of incandescent lighting (  formerly   a  primary use of electricity ) ,  आधुनिक  heating and cooling usage patterns differ greatly , and research  परिचय  how DST currently affects energy use  is  limited or contradictory .
dst  clock shifts present  अन्य   चुनौतियां   .
वे  complicate timekeeping  ,  and can disrupt meetings  ,   सफर  , billing  ,  record keeping , medical devices  ,   भारी  equipment ,  और  sleep patterns .
Software can often adjust computer clocks  automatically  ,  लकिन  this can  be  limited and error-prone  ,  particularly  जब   dst  dates  हैं  changed  .
Floorplan of  the  Château de Montargis
Montargis is a commune in the Loiret department  in  north-central  फ़्रांस  on the  loing  river .
The town  is  located about south  of  Paris and east of  orléans  in the Gâtinais .
Montargis is the second largest city in the Loiret , after Orléans .
It is near a large forest ,  और  contains light industry  और  farming , including  केसरिया   .
Due to its numerous  नहरों  and bridges  ,  Montargis sometimes bills itself as the `` Venice  of  the Gâtinais . ''
Though quite modern , it retains a medieval  आकर्षण  in its downtown area .
In computer  भंडार   ,  a logical  ईकाई  number , or LUN , is a number  प्रयुक्त  to identify a logical unit , which is a device addressed by the SCSI protocol or protocols which encapsulate SCSI  ,   ऐसे   as  Fibre Channel  or  iSCSI .
a   lun  may be used with any  यंत्र  which supports read/write  परिचालन  , such as  a  tape drive  ,  but  is   सबसे   प्रायः  used to  refer  to a logical disk as created on a SAN .
Though not technically  सही  , the term  ``  LUN  ''  is  प्रायः  also used  to  refer  to  the logical  डिस्क   itself  .
The Gospel  according  to Mark ( ,  ,  to euangelion kata Markon ) ,  commonly  shortened  to  the Gospel of Mark or simply Mark , is  the  second book  of  the  नई  Testament  .
This canonical account  of  the life  of  Jesus of Nazareth is one of  the  three synoptic gospels .
It was thought to  be  an epitome ,  जिससे  accounts for its place as the second gospel in the  बाइबल  .
however  , most contemporary  विद्वानों  now regard it as  the   earliest  of the  canonical  gospels ( c 70  )   .
That Mark was used as a  सोर्स  for the other synoptic  gospels  Gospel  of  Matthew and Gospel of Luke is widely  आयोजित   by  many  ,  although not all , New Testament scholars .
the   इन्जील  of Mark narrates the  मंत्रालय  of Jesus from his  बपतिस्मा  by John  the  Baptist to his death and resurrection .
It focuses particularly on the last week of his life  (  chapters 11–16  )  in Jerusalem .
इसके  swift narrative portrays Jesus as a heroic man of action , an exorcist ,  healer  and  चमत्कार  worker .
An important  थीम   of   चिह्नित  is the Messianic Secret .
Jesus silences  the  demoniacs he heals  ,  tries unsuccessfully to keep his  मुक्तिदाता   पहचान  secret  ,  and conceals his message with parables .
Meanwhile , the disciples fail to  समझे   दोनो  the implication of  the  miracles of Jesus and  the  meaning of the things  he   predicts   परिचय  his  गिरफ़्तार  , death and  क़यामत  .
Most scholars believe that  the   असली  text of the gospel ends at Mark  16:8  with the discovery of Jesus  '  empty tomb and that the following account  of  his resurrection appearances is a later addition .
According to tradition and some early  गिरिजाघर  writers  ,  the author is Mark the  इंजीलवादी  , the  साथी   of  the apostle  पीटर  .
The gospel , however , appears to  rely  on several underlying sources , varying in form and in theology  ,  which tells  विरूद्ध  the tradition that  the  gospel was based on Peter 's preaching .
The text is a  संकलन  which may include  eye-witness  accounts as well as known apostolic preachings  ,  and pre-existing written records that do not  मौजूद   आज  but can be confirmed from 2nd-century commentators  .
Some of the  कहानियां   in  the gospel may have been  transmitted  orally  पहले  being written down .
Various elements within the gospel  सुझाएँ  that the author wrote in  सीरियाई   or  Palestine for a non-Jewish Christian community  .
The Lord of the  बजती   is  an  एपिक   ऊँची  fantasy novel  लिखा  by English  भाषाशास्त्री   और  University of  ऑक्सफोर्ड  professor J. R. R. Tolkien  .
The story began as a sequel to Tolkien 's 1937 children  's  fantasy novel The  होब्बिट  ,  लकिन  eventually developed into a much larger  कार्य  .
It was written in  चरण  between 1937  और  1949 , much of it  दौरान  World War II .
It is the second  best-selling  novel ever written , with  over  150 million copies sold .
The title of the  अनोखा  refers to the story 's main antagonist , the Dark Lord  sauron  , who had in  an  earlier age created the One  रिंग  to rule the other Rings of Power as the  परम  weapon in his  अभियान  to conquer and rule all of Middle-earth .
From  शांत  beginnings in the Shire , a Hobbit land not  नापसंद  the  अंग्रेज़ी  countryside  ,  the story ranges across north-west Middle-earth , following the course of the War of the Ring through the eyes of its characters ,  notably   the  hobbits  frodo   baggins  , Samwise `` Sam ''  gamgee  , Meriadoc `` Merry '' Brandybuck and Peregrin `` Pippin '' Took ,  लकिन  also the  hobbits  ' chief allies  और   यात्राएं  companions : Aragorn , a Human  रेंजर  ; Boromir , a  man   इससे  Gondor ; Gimli  ,  a Dwarf warrior ; Legolas , an Elven prince ; and Gandalf , a Wizard .
The  कार्य  was initially intended by Tolkien to be  एक  volume  of  a two-volume set ,  साथ  the  अन्य  being The Silmarillion , but this  विचार  was dismissed  by  his publisher .
It was  decided  for  आर्थिक  reasons  to  publish  the  Lord of the Rings as three volumes over  the  course  of  a year  इससे   29  July 1954 to 20 October 1955  ,  thus creating the now familiar Lord of the Rings trilogy .
The three volumes were entitled The Fellowship of the Ring , The Two Towers ,  और   the  Return of the King .
Structurally  ,  the novel  is  divided internally into six books , two per volume , with several appendices  of   पृष्ठभूमि  material included at the end  of  the third  आवाज़  .
The Lord of the  बजती  has since been reprinted  numerous   टाइम्स  and translated into many languages .
Tolkien 's  कार्य  has been the subject of extensive analysis of its  विषयवस्तु  and origins .
हालांकि  a major work in itself ,  the  story was  तभी  the last movement of a larger epic Tolkien had worked on since 1917 ,  in   a  process he described as  mythopoeia  .
प्रभाव  on this earlier work , and on the story of The Lord of the  बजती  ,  शामिल  philology ,  mythology   ,   धर्म  and  the  author 's distaste for the effects of industrialization , as well as  पहले  fantasy  works  and Tolkien 's  अनुभवों  in World War I  .
The Lord of the Rings in its turn  is   माना  to have had a great effect on modern fantasy ; the impact of  tolkien  's works  is  such  कि  the use of the words `` Tolkienian '' and  ``  Tolkienesque  ''  have been  अंकित  in the  ऑक्सफोर्ड  English Dictionary .
The enduring popularity of The Lord of the  बजती  has led to  numerous  references in popular culture , the  founding  of many societies by fans  of  Tolkien  's   works  , and the publication of many books about  tolkien  and  उसके  works .
The Lord of the Rings  रै  inspired , and continues to inspire , artwork ,  म्यूज़िक  , films  और  television  ,  video games , and subsequent literature .
Award-winning adaptations of The Lord of  the  Rings have been made for radio  ,   थिएटर  , and film .

The series debuted  on  January 11 , 2004 .
A TV film Merry Christmas , Drake & Josh was made  अलावा  from the regular series on December 5 ,  2008  .
There are a total of  60  episodes were produced spanning  चार  seasons .
