The San Francisco 49ers conduct training camp at the team 's  मुख्यालय  and practice  सुविधा  in Santa Clara  ,  California  in  August 2010 .
The offense is wearing red  jerseys  with the exception of quarterback Alex Smith , who is in a black jersey ; the defense  in  white  .
In the National Football League  ,  training camp  refers  to the time before the season commences .
During this time , teams will sometimes congregate at an  बाहर  location ,  प्रायः  a  विश्वविद्यालयों  , to conduct training camp for  at  least  the  first few weeks .
This  is  similar to baseball 's spring training  .
प्रशिक्षण  camp is used in  अनेक  different ways .
New players  और  coaches use it to acclimate themselves to new teammates and  प्रणालियों  .
For younger players  ,  it serves  as  a period of evaluation ; for veterans , it is  समय  to round  वापस  into form  .
प्रशिक्षण   शिविर  is  विभाजित   into   अनेक   अलग  components .
The  पहला  is scrimmages .
These are  pseudo-games  where teams run  nearly  full games ' worth of plays .
sometimes  , two practice sessions are held  on   the  same day .
This concept is  referred   to  as two-a-days .
Other parts  of   प्रशिक्षण  camp include drills ,  बैठक  with coaches and other  खिलाड़ी  at one  's  position , weight training , and pre-season  खेल  .
The latter half of training camp leads directly into the exhibition season  .
With NFL training camps starting in late-July ,  the  biggest concern has been dehydration  .
in   2001   ,  Minnesota Vikings player  korey  Stringer died of a medical condition based from dehydration and  heatstroke  .
the  death of Stringer  prompted  the NFL to  बदलें   उनके  training policies  .
At each practice , every  टोली   जरूर  have the team  डॉक्टर  and trainers on the field ; additionally , an ambulance must be present  दौरान  practices .
With NFL training camps beginning in  लेट  July ,  कठोर  weather can affect practice and exhibition games .
In  2002  , a Cleveland Browns exhibition game ended due to lightning near  क्लीवलैंड  Browns Stadium , and severe storms  have  been known to disrupt training camps .
Fans  हैं   प्रायः   समर्थ  to  विज़िट  their favorite team 's training camp to  कैच  an early look  at   the  players ;  प्रवेश  to practices is often free  or   substantially   कम   महंगी  than a game ticket , making training camp trips a popular option for fans  जो   can   नहीं  attend many games due  to  financial or other  कारण  .
NFL  टीमों  often sell souvenirs  और  concessions at camp sites along with offering  क्रियाएँ  and events to make training camp a more fan-friendly experience .
In computing  ,  a file system ( or filesystem ) is  a  type of data store  जिससे  can be used to store , retrieve and update a  नियत   of  files .
The term could refer to the  अमूर्त  data  structures   प्रयुक्त   to  define files , or to  the  actual software or firmware components that implement  the  abstract  विचार  .
Some file systems are  प्रयुक्त  on local data storage devices ; others  provide  file access via a  संजाल  protocol (  e.g  . NFS ,  smb  , or 9P clients ) .
Some file  प्रणालियों  are `` virtual '' , in  कि  the `` files ''  supplied   हैं   computed  on  निवेदन   (  e.g . procfs ) or are  merely  a mapping into  a   अलग  file system  प्रयुक्त  as a backing  स्टोर   .
The file system  manages  access  to  both the content of  फाइलें  and the metadata about those files .
It  is  responsible for  arranging  storage space ;  विश्वसनीयता  , efficiency , and tuning with regard to the physical storage medium are important design considerations .
William Howard  taft  ( September 15 , 1857  –  March 8 , 1930 ) was  the   27th   अध्यक्ष   of  the United States ( 1909–1913 ) and later the  दसवाँ  Chief Justice of the United States (  1921–1930  ) .
He is  the  only person  to  have served  in  both of these  कार्यालयों   .
Before becoming President , Taft , a Republican , was  चयनित  to serve on  the  Superior Court of Cincinnati in 1887 .
in  1890 , Taft  थी  appointed Solicitor  सामान्य  of  the   संयुक्त  States and in 1891 a  न्यायधीश  on the  संयुक्त  States  अदालत  of Appeals  लिये   the   छठे  Circuit .
in  1900 , President William  mckinley  appointed Taft Governor-General of  the   फिलीपीन   .
In  1904   ,   अध्यक्ष  Theodore Roosevelt appointed Taft  सचिव  of War  in  an effort to  दूल्हे  Taft , then his close political ally , into his handpicked presidential successor .
Taft assumed a  prominent  role in problem solving , assuming on some  अवसरों  the role of acting Secretary of State , while declining repeated offers from Roosevelt to serve  on  the Supreme Court  .
सवारी  a wave  of  popular support for fellow Republican Roosevelt , Taft won an easy victory in his 1908 bid for the  प्रेसिडेंसी   .
In his only term  ,   taft   's  domestic agenda emphasized trust-busting ,  सिविल  service reform ,  strengthening  the Interstate  कॉमर्स  Commission  ,  improving  the  performance of the  डाक  service , and passage of the  सोलहवीं  Amendment .
Abroad , Taft sought to further the economic development  of  nations in Latin America and Asia through `` Dollar Diplomacy ``  ,  and showed decisiveness and restraint in  जवाब  to revolution  in  Mexico .
The task-oriented Taft was oblivious to the political ramifications of his  निर्णय  , often alienated his own key constituencies , and was overwhelmingly defeated in his bid for a second term in the presidential election  of  1912 .
In surveys of presidential scholars , Taft is usually ranked near the middle of lists of  सब  American Presidents .
After leaving office , Taft spent his time in academia , arbitration  ,  and the search for world peace through  उसके  self-founded League to Enforce Peace .
In 1921 , after the First  संसार  War ,  अध्यक्ष   वारेन  G. Harding appointed Taft Chief  इंसाफ  of  the   संयुक्त  States .
taft   परोसा  in  इस   क्षमता  until  shortly  before his  मौत  in  1930  .
The  टेन   आयतें  is a  1956  epic film produced and directed by Cecil B.  demille  that  dramatized  the biblical story  of  the Exodus ,  in  which the Hebrew-born Moses , an adopted Egyptian prince  ,  becomes the  deliverer  of  the  Hebrew slaves .
It starred  चार्ल्टन  Heston in  the  lead  भूमिका  , Yul Brynner as  उसके  adoptive brother , Pharaoh Rameses II , Anne  बैक्सटर  as Nefretiri , Edward  G.  Robinson as Dathan , Yvonne De Carlo as Sephora , Debra Paget as Lilia , and  जॉन  Derek as Joshua .
The  supporting  cast includes Sir Cedric  hardwicke  as  pharaoh  Seti I , Nina Foch as  bithiah  , Martha Scott as Yoshebel  ,  Judith  एंडरसन  as Memnet  ,  Vincent Price  as  Baka , and  जॉन  Carradine as Aaron  .
The film was released  by   सर्वोपरि  Pictures  in  VistaVision on October 5  ,  1956 .
the   टेन  Commandments , which DeMille narrated , was the  पिछला  film  कि  he  निर्देशित  .
He was  नियत  to direct the 1958 remake of his 1938 film  the  Buccaneer , but his final illness forced him to relinquish the directing chores to his son-in-law , actor  एंथोनी  Quinn .
DeMille had  भी  planned  to   फिल्मी  the life of  रब  Baden Powell , the founder of the  स्काउट  movement , with  दाउद  Niven ; this project was  never  realized .
The Ten Commandments is a partial remake of DeMille  's  1923 silent film .
Some  of  the cast and crew  of   the  1956 version  worked  on  the  original .
It has since been remade as a television  miniseries  broadcast  in  April  2006  .
The  टेन  Commandments is one of the most financially successful  films  ever made  ,  grossing over $  65  million  at  the U.S. box  दफ्तर  .
Adjusting for  महंगाई  , this makes it the sixth  highest-grossing   फिल्मी  domestically , with an adjusted total  of  $ 1,025,730,000 in  2012  .
The box office website `` The Numbers  ''  lists  the   घरेलू  gross  at  $ 80 million  .
In 1999 , The Ten Commandments was selected for preservation in the United States National  फिल्मी  Registry by the Library  of  Congress as being `` culturally , historically ,  or   aesthetically  significant '' .
In June 2008 , the American Film Institute revealed its  ``  Ten Top Ten `` —the best ten films in ten American film genres—after polling over 1,500 people from the creative  जातियाँ  .
the  Ten Commandments was  सूचीबद्ध  as the tenth  बेहतरीन  film  in  the epic genre .
The film received seven  अकादमी  Award  nominations  including Best Picture , and won the Academy Award for Best Visual Effects .
चार्ल्टन  Heston was nominated for a Golden Globe Award  लिये   बेहतरीन   गति   चित्र  Actor in the  नाटक  category .
Yul Brynner won the National Board of Review Award for Best Actor for his role as Rameses , along  साथ  his  अन्य  roles in The King and I and Anastasia .
louisville  ( , or ) is a major city  और  the  largest  city in the U.S. state of Kentucky and the county seat of  जेफरसन   काउंटी  .
Since 2003  ,  the city  's  borders have been with those of the county because of  a  city-county merger  .
the  city  's  total consolidated population at  the  2010  जनसांख्यिकी  was 741,096 ( Louisville  's  balance total  ,   602,011   ,  excludes semi-autonomous  कस्बों  and is the population listed in most  स्त्रोत  and national rankings ) .
As of 2010 , the  louisville  metropolitan area ( MSA ) had a population of 1,307,647 ranking 42nd nationally .
the   मैट्रो  area includes Louisville-Jefferson County and 12 surrounding  काउंटी   ,  eight in  केंटकी  and four  in  Southern Indiana  (  see Geography  नीचे   )  .
The  louisville  Combined  सांख्यिकीय   क्षेत्रफल  , having a  जनसांख्यिकी  of 1,451,564 , includes the  एमएसए  , Hardin County  और  Larue  काउंटी  in Kentucky , and Scott County  ,  Indiana .
An  महत्वपूर्ण   आतंरिक  shipping port in the 19th century  ,  Louisville today is best  ज्ञात  as the location of the Kentucky Derby , the first of  तीन  annual  thoroughbred  horse races making up the  ट्रिपल  Crown .
A typical experimental setup for an  aldol   प्रतिक्रिया  .
Both flasks are  submerged   in  a dry ice/acetone  कूलिंग   नहाना  ( −78 °C )  the   तापमान  of which  is  being monitored by a thermocouple ( the wire  on   the  left )  .
A cooling bath  ,  in  प्रयोगशाला   रसायन  ( often  लकिन  not  सदा  organic chemistry ) practice , is a  द्रव  mixture which is used to maintain  कम   temperatures   ,  typically between 13 °C and −196 °C .
These low temperatures are used  to   collect  liquids after distillation , to remove  सॉल्वैंट्स  using a rotary evaporator , or to perform a chemical reaction  नीचे  room temperature  (  see : kinetic control ) .
Cooling baths are generally one of two types : (  a  )  a  cold fluid  (  particularly liquid nitrogen ,  जल  , or even air )  —  but most commonly the term refers to ( b ) a mixture  of  3 components : ( 1 ) a cooling agent  (   ऐसे   as  dry ice or water ice ) ; ( b ) a liquid 'carrier ' ( such as liquid water , ethylene glycol , acetone  ,  etc .  )  , which transfers heat  between  the bath and the vessel ; ; and ( c ) an additive  to  depress  the   melting-point  of the solid/liquid system .
(  A  परिचित   उदाहरण  of this  is  the use of  an  ice/rock-salt  मिश्रण   to  freeze ice cream .
The phase-change of  बर्फ   into  liquid water requires energy  ,  'pulling ' heat  इससे  the  प्रणाली  .
Adding salt lowers the temp at which this  happens   ,   अर्थ   अधिक  energy  रै   to  be absorbed from  the   पर्यावरण  in order to melt the ice .
This effectively makes the ice 'colder ' — it must 'pull ' more heat from its environment to become liquid . )
Eating disorders are conditions defined by abnormal eating habits that may involve either insufficient or excessive food  सेवन  to the detriment  of   an   व्यक्तिगत  's physical and mental health  .
Bulimia  नर्वोज़ा  and anorexia nervosa are the most common specific  फ़ॉर्म  in the United Kingdom  .
Other types of eating disorders include binge eating disorder  और  eating disorder not otherwise specified .
Bulimia nervosa  is  a disorder characterized by binge eating and purging .
Purging can include self-induce vomiting ,  over-exercising   ,  and the usage of diuretics ,  enemas   ,  and laxatives .
Anorexia nervosa is characterized by extreme  खाना  restriction  to   the  point of self-starvation and excessive weight  घाटा  .
Though  primarily  thought  of  as affecting  महिलाओं  ( an estimated 5–10 million being affected  in  the  u.K.  ) , eating disorders affect males as well .
An estimated 10 –  15  % of people with eating disorders are males ( Gorgan , 1999 )  .
( an estimated 1 million U.K. males being affected  )   .
हालांकि  eating disorders are increasing all over the world among both men and women , there  is  evidence to suggest that  it  is women in the Western world who  हैं  at  the  highest risk of developing them  और   the  degree of westernization  increases  the risk .
Nearly  हाफ  of all Americans personally know someone with an eating disorder  .
The skill  to   comprehend  the  सेंट्रल  processes of appetite  रै  increased tremendously since leptin was discovered , and  the  skill to observe the functions of the brain as well .
Interactions between  प्रेरक  , homeostatic  और  self-regulatory control processes are involved in eating behaviour , which is a key component in eating disorders .
The precise cause of eating  विकार  is  नहीं  entirely understood  ,  but there is evidence  कि   it  may be linked  to   अन्य  medical conditions and situations .
सांस्कृतिक   idealization  of thinness and youthfulness have contributed to eating disorders affecting  विविध   populations   .
One study  दिखाया  that girls with ADHD have a greater chance  of   getting  an eating disorder than those not affected  by  ADHD .
another  study suggested that women with  ptsd  , especially due to sexually  सम्बन्धित  trauma ,  हैं  more likely to develop  एनोरेक्सिया  nervosa .
One study showed that foster girls are more likely  to  develop bulimia nervosa .
Some think that peer pressure and idealized body-types seen  in  the media are  भी  a significant factor .
Some research show that  लिये   निश्चित  people there  हैं  genetic reasons  क्यों  they may be prone to  विकासशील  an eating  विकार  .
Recent studies have found evidence a correlation between patients with bulimia nervosa and  पदार्थ   उपयोग  disorders .
In addition  ,  anxiety  विकार  and personality disorders are  आम  occurrences with clients of eating disorders  .
While proper treatment can be highly effective for  अनेक  suffering  इससे  specific  प्रकार   of  eating  विकार   ,  the consequences of eating  विकार  can be severe , including death  (  whether from  सीधा  medical effects of disturbed eating habits or from comorbid conditions such as suicidal  सोच  ) .
Slavery in the United States existed from  the  early years of the colonial period ;  it  was firmly established by the time the United States sought independence from Great Britain  in  1776 .
However  ,  by 1804 ,  सब  states north  of  the  मेसन  and  डिक्सन  Line  था  either abolished slavery outright  or  passed laws  लिये  the gradual  abolition  of slavery .
in  1787 Congress prohibited slavery in the Northwest Territory .
But slavery gained new life in the  दक्षिण  with  the  cotton industry after 1800 , and expanded into the  दक्षिणपश्चिम   .
The nation was polarized into  स्लेव  and free states along the Mason-Dixon Line , which separated Pennsylvania and Maryland .
The  संयुक्त  States and Great Britain both prohibited  the  international  स्लेव  trade in 1808 , but the domestic trade , with sales to the Deep South ,  विस्तारित   dramatically   ,   और  many captives were shipped by  the  coastwise slave trade .
Before the  1840s  , the South  थी   vigorously  defending slavery and its expansion  into  the territories .
in  the North some abolitionists denounced it as sinful , and numerous anti-slavery  शक्तियां  rejected  it  as detrimental  to  the rights  of  free men .
बाद  failed compromises  और  Abraham Lincoln 's  चुनाव  ,  in  1861 eleven slave states broke away to form the Confederate  राज्य  of  अमेरिका  , leading to  the   अमरीकी  Civil  युद्ध   .
The federal government in 1862  बना  abolition of slavery a  युद्ध  goal .
In  जनवरी  1863 President Lincoln  freed  slaves in the Confederacy through the Emancipation Proclamation .
After the  युद्ध  , the  तेरहवीं  Amendment  ,   प्रभावी  December 1865 ,  abolished  slavery throughout the  संपूर्ण   संयुक्त  States , including the Border states  और  the Indian territories .
From the  16th  to the 19th  सदियां  ,  an  estimated  12  million Africans were shipped as slaves to  the  Americas  .
See Slavery  in   the  Americas  .
The great majority  गई  to the sugar  बागानों  of the West Indies  or   ब्राज़ील   ,  where mortality  थी   ऊँची   .
About 645,000 were brought to what is  अभी  the United  राज्य  .
By the 1860 United States Census , the slave population in  the  American South had grown  to  four  लाख  .
of  all  1,515,605  families in the  15   स्लेव  states , nearly 400,000  आयोजित   स्लेव  ( roughly one in  चार  ) , amounting  to  8 % of  सब   अमरीकी   परिवारों  .
While  कुछ  slaves worked as house servants and urban  शिल्पकार  , the  ग्रेट  majority worked on plantations  or  large farms , cultivating lucrative cash crops , such as rice ,  तम्बाकू  , sugar and , after  1800   ,  chiefly cotton .
By 1860 most  स्लेव   यहूद   आयोजित  in the Deep South  ,  where they served in work-gangs ;  two-thirds  worked  in  cotton .
In  छोटी  operations , they worked with  उनके  owners .
In large plantations they were  निर्देशित  by  श्वेत  paid overseers .
Under the system that became chattel  गुलामी  ( ownership of a human being , and of his/her descendants  )  ,  a  racial element  थी  fundamental : slaves were blacks of African  descent  and owned , almost universally , by whites of European descent  .
In the 17th century  ,  Virginia  ,  followed by  अन्य  southern  colonies  , enacted law that  children   of  slave mothers  यहूद  born into slavery .
स्लेव  could gain freedom only by  कार्यशील  away ( which was difficult and illegal to do ) , or  by  manumission  by  owners , which was regulated by  राज्य   ,  and became increasingly  मुश्किल  or prohibited .
in  the earliest era of chattel  गुलामी  , the colonies also organized  कार्य   by  a system of bonded labor known as indentured servitude  .
This typically lasted for several years for  दोनो  poor Europeans and Africans alike ,  to  pay  बंद  the costs of transport to the colonies  .
वे  contracted for  ऐसे   इंतजाम  because of poor economies  in   उनके   घर  countries .
Between 1680 and  1700  , as fewer Europeans migrated to the colonies , planters began to import  अधिक  Africans as slaves  .
Recognizing the importance of slavery , the House of Burgesses in Virginia enacted a new  स्लेव  code in 1705 ; it combined a variety of  विधान  and added new provisions enforcing white supremacy in the law .
Schematic cross  खण्ड  of  भाग  of leaf , xylem shown as red circles at  फिगर  8  .
जाइलम  is  एक  of the  दो  types of transport tissue in vascular  पौधे  ( phloem is  the  other ) .
The  शब्द  xylem is derived  इससे  the Greek word ξύλον ( xylon ) ,  अर्थ  `` wood '' ;  the   best-known  xylem tissue  is   लकडी  , though it is found throughout the  संयंत्र  .
Its basic function is  to  transport water , but it also transports some nutrients through the plant .
This clock representation shows some of the major units  of  geological time and definitive  कार्यक्रम  of Earth history .
The Hadean eon represents  the  time before  चट्टान  record of life on Earth ; its  अपर  boundary is now regarded as 4.0 Ga  (   अरब   सालो  ago ) .
Other subdivisions reflect the  एवोल्यूशन   of  life ;  the  Archean and  proterozoic  are both eons  ,   the  Palaeozoic , Mesozoic  और   cenozoic  are eras of the Phanerozoic  इओन  .
the  two million year Quaternary  काल  , the time of recognizable humans ,  is   too   छोटी  to be visible  at  this scale .
the  geologic time scale is a system of chronological measurement  कि  relates stratigraphy to time , and is used by geologists ,  paleontologists  , and other earth scientists to  describe   the   समय   और  relationships between events that have occurred throughout Earth  's  history  .
The table of geologic time spans presented here agrees with  the  dates  और  nomenclature  नियत  forth by the International Commission on Stratigraphy standard color codes  of  the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Commission on Stratigraphy .
प्रमाण  from radiometric dating  indicates  that the Earth is about 4.54 billion years old .
The geology or deep time of  धरती   's  past has  महरूम  organized  into  various units according to events which took place in  प्रत्येक  period .
Different spans  of   समय   on  the GTS are  प्रायः  delimited by changes in the composition of strata which correspond to  उन्हें  ,  indicating  major geological  or  paleontological  कार्यक्रम   ,   ऐसे  as mass  extinctions   .
For example  ,  the  boundary  between the Cretaceous period and the Paleogene period  is  defined by the Cretaceous–Paleogene extinction event , which marked the demise of  the  dinosaurs  और   अनेक  other groups of life  .
Older time spans which predate the reliable fossil record ( before the Proterozoic Eon ) are defined by absolute  आयु  .
The TI-82 is a graphing calculator made by  टेक्सास   यंत्र  .
The TI-82 was designed in 1993  as   a  stripped down  ,  more user friendly version of the TI-85 , and as a replacement for the TI-81 .
It was  the  direct predecessor of the  ti-83  .
It shares with the TI-85 a  6  MHz  zilog   z80   माइक्रोप्रोसेसर   .
Like the TI-81 , the TI-82 features a 96x64 pixel  प्रदर्शक  , and the core feature  नियत   of  the TI-81 with many new features  .
The cast of characters of The King of Fighters XI .
The King of Fighters fighting game series  ,  produced by SNK Playmore , includes a wide cast of characters , some of  जिससे  are taken from other SNK games .
The story takes place in a  fictional   ब्रह्मांड  in which an  सालाना  series of 3-on-3 or 4-on-4 fighting tournaments are held .
The first game  in  the series  introduces  the initial  प्रमुख   अक्षर  of the  श्रेणी  , Kyo Kusanagi , a young Japanese fighter  जो  is  the  heir  to  a powerful group  of  martial artists having pyrokinetic abilities .
Kyo fights against the Kusanagi clan  's   दुश्मनों  , his rival Iori Yagami , and  the  god  orochi  and its human  अनुसरणकर्ता   ,  among  अन्य  .
the  first four games in the series revolve about  ये  fights  ,  while The  किंग   of  Fighters  '99  introduces a new story arc  ,  revolving around  k  ' , a young  man  who seeks to  नष्ट  the mysterious NESTS organization because they  kidnapped  him at an early age  और  stripped him of his past memories  ,   so  that they could force  उसे  to be a fighter under their  कंट्रोल   .
in  The King of Fighters 2003 , a new character named Ash  crimson  enters the tournament ,  to  steal the powers  of  the clans who  sealed  the  orochi  in  the  past  लिये   an   अनजान  reason .
A new group of antagonists  ,   ज्ञात  as  those  From the Past ,  भी  appears in the series ; they want to obtain Orochi 's power for the purpose of giving it to their unknown master .
the   प्लाट  and the  वर्ण  came from the  yamata  no Orochi legend .
वहीँ  are also  अनेक   वर्ण  in  the  games that are parodies  or   homages   to  several popular  दुश्मनी  , manga , and  films  .
Merchandise based on the characters has also been released , including action figures and keychains  .
The characters have garnered  तारीफ़  from several video game  publications  for the quality of their designs and  movesets  .
टिप्पणी  focused on the lack of improvements in  कुछ  of the characters , but  added  that the  रोस्टर   is  greatly diverse .
व्हेल  Wars is a weekly American documentary-style  वास्तविकता   टेलीविज़न   श्रेणी  that premiered on November  7  , 2008 on  the   एनिमल  Planet cable channel  .
the  program follows  पॉल   वाटसन  , founder of the Sea Shepherd Conservation Society , as he and  the  crew aboard their various vessels  harass  Japanese  whalers  off  the   coast  of Antarctica .
on  January  5  , 2013 , Animal Planet  नवीनीकृत  the series for a sixth season .
The Harpy  त्रिभुज  ( Harpia harpyja ) is a Neotropical  प्रजाति   of  eagle  .
It is sometimes known as the American Harpy Eagle to  फर्क  it from  the  Papuan  त्रिभुज   जिससे   is   sometimes  known as the New Guinea Harpy Eagle or Papuan  harpy   त्रिभुज  .
It is  the  largest and most powerful raptor found in the  americas   ,  and among the largest extant species of eagles in the world .
It usually  inhabits  tropical lowland rainforests in the upper  (  emergent ) canopy layer  .
विनाश  of  इसके  natural habitat has seen it  vanish  from many  भाग  of its former  दायरा   ,  and it is nearly extirpated in Central  अमेरिका   .
Biological classification  ,  or scientific classification in biology ,  is  a method of scientific taxonomy  प्रयुक्त  to group and categorize organisms into groups such as  genus   or  species .
These  समूह  are known as taxa  (   एकवचन   :  taxon ) .
Modern biological classification has its root in the work  of   carolus  Linnaeus , who  grouped   प्रजाति  according to shared physical characteristics .
ये   groupings  have since been revised to  improve  consistency with the Darwinian principle  of  common descent  .
साथ  the introduction  of   the  cladistic method in the  लेट  20th  सदी   ,   phylogenetic  taxonomy in which  जीवों   हैं  grouped based purely on inferred evolutionary relatedness , ignoring morphological similarity  ,  has become common  in   कुछ   क्षेत्रों  of biology .
आणविक  phylogenetics  ,  which  उपयोग   डीएनए  sequences as data , has also driven many  हाल  revisions and is likely to  continue  doing so .
Biological classification belongs to the science of biological systematics  .
Lennon 's signature
जॉन  Winston Ono Lennon , ( born John Winston Lennon ; 9  अक्तूबर  1940 – 8  दिसम्बर  1980 ) was an English musician , singer and songwriter who rose to worldwide fame  as  a founder member of the Beatles , one  of   the   सबसे  commercially successful and critically acclaimed  अधिनियमों  in the history  of  popular music .
साथ  Paul McCartney , he  formed   एक  of the  सबसे  celebrated songwriting partnerships  of  the 20th century  .
Born and raised in Liverpool , as a teenager Lennon  became  involved  in  the skiffle craze  ;  his first band ,  the  Quarrymen , evolved into the Beatles  in  1960 .
As  the  group disintegrated towards  the  end of  the  decade , Lennon embarked on a solo career that produced the critically acclaimed  एल्बम  John Lennon/Plastic Ono Band and Imagine , and iconic songs such as `` Give  सलाम  a Chance `` and `` Imagine `` .
बाद  his marriage to  योको  Ono in  1969  , he changed his name to John Ono  लेनन  .
Lennon disengaged  खुद  from the music business in 1975 to devote time  to  raising his infant son Sean , but  re-emerged  with Ono in  1980   साथ  the new album Double Fantasy .
He  थी   murdered  three  सप्ताह  after its  रिलीज  .
Lennon  नाज़िल   a  rebellious nature and  acerbic  wit in his music , writing  ,  drawings , on film and  in  interviews .
Controversial  through  his political  और  peace activism , he moved to New York City in 1971 , where his criticism of the Vietnam War  resulted  in a  lengthy  attempt by Richard  निक्सन  's administration to deport  उसे  , while some of his  गीतों  were  अपनाया   as  anthems  by  the anti-war movement  .
As of 2012 , Lennon  's  solo album  बिक्री  in the United States exceed 14 million units , and  as  writer , co-writer or performer , he is responsible for 25 number-one singles on the  us   hot   100  chart .
In 2002 , a BBC poll on  the   100   महानतम  Britons voted him eighth  ,  and  in  2008 , Rolling  स्टोन  ranked  उसे  the fifth-greatest singer of all time .
He  थी   मरणोपरांत  inducted into the Songwriters Hall of Fame in 1987 and into the Rock and Roll Hall of  कीर्ति  in  1994  .
Statue  of  Rip van Winkle in Irvington ,  नई  York , not far from `` Sunnyside  ``   ,  the home of Washington Irving
``  rip   वैन   winkle   ''   is   a  short story by American  लेखक  Washington Irving published  in  1819 , as well as the name of the  स्टोरी   's  fictional  समर्थक  .
Written  जबकि  Irving  थी  living in Birmingham  ,  England , it was  भाग  of a collection entitled The Sketch Book of Geoffrey Crayon .
हालांकि  the story is  नियत   in  New York  's  Catskill Mountains , Irving later admitted  ,   ``   जब   i  wrote the story  ,  I had never been  on  the  catskills  . ''

This page only includes the  प्रतिस्पर्धी  awards won  by  various artists .
This does  नहीं  include the various special awards that are presented by the National Academy of Recording Arts and Sciences such as Lifetime Achievement Awards ,  trustees  Awards , Technical Awards or Legend Awards .
The  पेज  however does include other non-performance related  grammys  ( known as the Craft  &  Production Fields )  कि  may have been presented to the artist ( s  )  .
Pee-wee Herman is  a   कॉमिक  fictional  अक्षर  created and portrayed by American comedian  पॉल  Reubens .
he  is best known for  उसके   दो  television  श्रेणी  and film  श्रेणी  during the 1980s  .
The childlike Pee-wee  herman   अक्षर  developed as  a  stage act that quickly led  to  an  एचबीओ  special in  1981  .
As the stage performance gained further popularity , Reubens took the character to motion picture with Pee-wee 's Big Adventure in 1985 ,  toning  down the  वयस्क   innuendo   लिये   the  appeal  of  children .
इस  paved  the  way for Pee-wee 's Playhouse  ,  an Emmy  पुरस्कार  winning  children   's  series  कि  ran on CBS  इससे  1986-1991  .
Another film , Big Top Pee-wee , was  released  in 1988 .
due  to negative  मीडिया  attention following a  कांड  in 1991 , Reubens decided to shelve his alter ego during the 1990s , and then gradually resurrected it during the following decade .
It  थी  at that time that Reubens addressed plans to write  a  new Pee-wee  फिल्मी  , Pee-wee 's  playhouse  :  the  Movie .
In June 2007 , Reubens  appeared   as  Pee-wee Herman for the first  समय  since 1991  at  Spike TV 's Guys  '   चुनाव   पुरस्कार  .
That '70s Show is an American television period sitcom that centers  on   the  lives  of  a group  of   teenage  friends living in the fictional suburban town of Point Place  ,  Wisconsin , from May  17  , 1976 , to December 31 ,  1979  .
It debuted on the Fox television network , first airing on  अगस्त  23  ,  1998  ,  running for eight  लगातार  seasons ,  और  concluding with the 200th episode on May 18 , 2006 .
The main teenage cast members were Topher Grace , Mila Kunis , Ashton Kutcher , Danny Masterson , Laura Prepon  ,  and Wilmer Valderrama  .
The  प्रमुख  adult cast  सदस्यों  were Debra Jo Rupp , Kurtwood  स्मिथ  ,  डॉन  Stark and , during the first  तीन  seasons , Tanya Roberts .
Kansas  (  )  is  a U.S. state located  in  the Midwestern United States  .
It is named after the Kansas River which flows through it , which in turn was named  बाद  the  कंस   देशी   अमरीकी  tribe ,  जिससे  inhabited the area .
The tribe  's  name (  natively   kką  : ze  )  is often said to  औसत  `` people of the wind  ''  or `` people of  the   दक्षिण  wind , '' although this was  संभवतः  not the  पद  's original  अर्थ   .
Residents of Kansas are called  ``   kansans  . ''
For thousands  of  years  कया  is now Kansas was home to numerous and  विविध  Native American tribes .
Tribes in the Eastern part  of  the state generally lived in villages along the river valleys .
Tribes  in   the  Western  भाग  of the  राज्य  were semi- nomadic and hunted large herds of bison .
Kansas  थी  first settled by European  अमेरिकी   in  the  1830s  , but the pace of settlement accelerated in  the  1850s , in  the  midst of political wars over the slavery issue .
When officially opened to settlement by the U.S.  सरकारी  in 1854 , abolitionist Free-Staters from  नई  England  और  pro-slavery settlers from  neighboring  Missouri  rushed   to  the territory to determine if Kansas would become a free state or a  स्लेव   राज्य  .
Thus , the  क्षेत्रफल  was a hotbed of violence and chaos in  इसके  early  दिनों  as these forces collided , and was known as Bleeding Kansas .
The  abolitionists  eventually prevailed  और   on  January 29  ,  1861  ,  Kansas entered  the  Union as  a  free state  .
After the  सिविल  War ,  the  population of Kansas grew rapidly , when waves of immigrants turned  the  prairie  into  farmland .
Today , Kansas  is  one of the most productive  agricultural  states , producing high yields of wheat , sorghum and sunflowers  .
Kansas  is  the 15th most extensive and the 33rd most populous of  the   50   संयुक्त  States .
Psychology  is   an  academic and applied discipline  कि   involves   the  scientific study  of  mental  कृत्यों   और  behaviors .
Psychology has the  तात्कालिक  goal  of  understanding individuals and groups by both establishing general principles and researching specific  मामले  , and  by  many accounts  it  ultimately aims  to  benefit society .
In this  फ़ील्ड  , a professional or researcher  is   पुकारा   a  psychologist  और  can be classified as a social  ,  behavioral ,  or  cognitive scientist .
Psychologists attempt to understand the  भूमिका  of  दिमागी  functions in individual and social behavior , while also  exploring  the physiological and neurobiological processes that underlie certain  संज्ञानात्मक   कृत्यों  and behaviors .
Psychologists explore concepts such  as  perception , cognition , attention , emotion ,  phenomenology  ,  प्रेरणा  , brain functioning , personality , behavior  ,  and  interpersonal  relationships .
psychologists  of diverse  धारियाँ   भी  consider the  बेहोश  mind .
Psychologists  employ  empirical methods  to   infer  causal and correlational relationships  between   psychosocial  variables .
In addition , or  in  opposition , to employing empirical and deductive methods , some—especially clinical and counseling psychologists—at  टाइम्स  rely upon symbolic  निर्वचन  and other inductive techniques  .
Psychology has been described as  a   ``   हब   विज्ञान  ''  ,   साथ  psychological  निष्कर्षों  linking to  शोध  and perspectives  इससे  the  सोशल  sciences , natural sciences , medicine , and the  मानवता  ,  ऐसे   as  philosophy  .
While  मनोवैज्ञानिक  knowledge is  प्रायः  applied  to  the assessment and treatment of  दिमागी  health problems , it is also directed towards  समझना  and solving problems in  अनेक  different spheres of human activity  .
The majority  of  psychologists are involved in some  दयालु  of therapeutic role , practicing in  नैदानिक  , counseling , or school settings .
Many do  वैज्ञानिक  research on  a  wide range of topics related to mental processes and behavior ,  और  typically work in university psychology departments or teach in  अन्य  academic settings ( e.g. ,  चिकित्सा  schools , hospitals ) .
Some  हैं  employed in industrial and  organizational  settings  ,  or in other areas such  as   इंसान  development  और  aging , sports , health ,  और   the  media , as  खूब  as in forensic investigation and other aspects  of  law .
Thomas Jefferson  (  April 13 ,  1743  ( April 2 , 1743 O.S. )  –  July 4 ,  1826  ) was an American  founding  Father , the principal  लेखक  of  the  Declaration of  स्वतंत्रता   (  1776 ) and the third President  of  the United States ( 1801–1809 ) .
At the beginning of the American Revolution , he served in the  महाद्वीपीय  Congress , representing  वर्जिनिया  and then  परोसा  as a wartime Governor of Virginia ( 1779–1781 ) .
Just after the war  ended  , from mid-1784  जेफरसन  served as a diplomat , stationed  in  Paris .
In May 1785  ,  he  became  the United States Minister to France .
Jefferson  थी  the  पहला  United  राज्य  Secretary of State ( 1790–1793 ) serving  अंतर्गत  President George Washington .
With his close friend  जेम्स  Madison he organized the Democratic-Republican  पार्टी  ,  और  subsequently resigned from Washington 's cabinet .
Elected Vice President  in  1796 , when he came in second to John Adams of the Federalists , Jefferson  opposed  Adams and with  मैडिसन  secretly wrote the Kentucky and Virginia Resolutions , which attempted to nullify the Alien and  राजद्रोह  Acts  .
Elected president in what Jefferson called the  क्रान्ति  of 1800  ,  he oversaw the purchase of the vast  louisiana   territory  from France ( 1803 ) , and sent the Lewis and Clark Expedition ( 1804–1806 )  to  explore the new west .
उसके  second term  थी  beset with troubles at  घर  , such as the  विफल  treason trial of his former Vice President  आरोन  Burr .
साथ  escalating trouble  साथ  Britain who was challenging American neutrality and threatening shipping at sea , he tried economic warfare with his embargo laws which only  क्षतिग्रस्त  American trade  .
In 1803 , President Jefferson  initiated  a  प्रक्रम  of Indian tribal removal and relocation to the Louisiana  territory  west of  the  Mississippi River , in order  to  open lands for  eventual  American settlers  .
a  leader in the Enlightenment , Jefferson was a polymath who spoke five languages fluently  और   थी   deeply   दिलचस्पी  in  विज्ञान  , invention , architecture , religion and philosophy , interests that led him to the founding of the University of Virginia after his  प्रेसिडेंसी  .
He designed his  अपना  large mansion on a  5,000  acre  वृक्षारोपण   निकट   charlottesville  ,  वर्जिनिया  , which he named  monticello  .
जबकि  not a notable orator  ,  Jefferson was a skilled  लेखक  and corresponded with many influential people  in  America and Europe throughout his  वयस्क  life .
Though Jefferson owned many  स्लेव  , he opposed the institution all  उसके  life and consequently  treated  and took care of them very well and expected them to work  no  more than  फ़्री  farmers .
Since 1802 historians and others have been divided  over  the controversy of whether  जेफरसन  was the  पिता   of  one  or  more children belonging to Sally  hemings  , a slave at Monticello . ''
Historians are  भी  in disagreement with how much Jefferson was committed to the anti-slavery cause .
In 1807  ,  President Jefferson signed into law a  विधेयक  that banned the importation of slaves into the United States .
After Martha  जेफरसन  , his  बीवी  of eleven years , died  in  1782 , Jefferson remained a widower for the rest  of  his life  ;  their marriage produced six children  ,  of whom  दो  survived to adulthood .
हालांकि  Jefferson has been criticized by many  आधुनिक  day scholars over the issue of  गुलामी  , he  remains  rated as one of the greatest U.S. presidents  .
`` Sun City ''  is  a 1985 protest  सोंग  written by Steven Van Zandt , produced by  वैन  Zandt and Arthur Baker and recorded by  कलाकारों   संयुक्त   विरूद्ध  Apartheid  to  convey opposition to the  दक्षिण  African policy of apartheid  .
The primary means of  कि  opposition is to  घोषित  that all  the  artists involved would refuse any and all offers to perform  at  Sun City , a resort which was located  in  Bantustan of Bophuthatswana , one of a number of  internationally  unrecognized supposed `` independent '' states created by the  दक्षिण  African government to forcibly relocate its black population .

the  National Basketball  संघ   (  NBA  )  is a major professional  बास्केट   लीग   in  North America .
It was founded in 1946 as  the  Basketball Association  of  America ( BAA ) .
The  लीग   अपनाया   इसके  current name  at  the start of the when it merged with the  नेशनल  Basketball League ( NBL ) .
The NBA Finals is the championship  श्रेणी  for  the  NBA and  the   निष्कर्ष   of  the sport 's postseason .
the  winning team  of  the series receives the Larry O'Brien  चैंपियनशिप  Trophy .
Players  इससे  the winning  टोली  usually receive  चैंपियनशिप  rings from the team honoring their contribution .
however   ,  in some rare  अवसर  , the  टीमों  opted to gave other commemorative items ,  ऐसे  as  कलाई  watches ,  बजाय  of rings .
The number of  championships   जीती   by  NBA superstars  is  often used as a measurement of their greatness .
Boston Celtics center Bill Russell  holds  the record for the most NBA championships won with 11 titles during his 13-year playing  करियर  .
he  won his first championship with  the  Boston Celtics in his rookie  साल   .
Afterwards , he  गई   on   to  win 10 championships  in  the next 12 years  ,   सहित  eight consecutive championships from 1959 to  1966  .
He won the last two championships in 1968 and 1969 as player-coach .
Russell 's  teammate   ,  Sam  जोन्स   ,  won 10  championships   इससे  1959 to 1969  ,  the  दूसरी   सबसे   in  NBA history .
Four Celtics players , Tom Heinsohn , K. C. Jones  ,  Satch Sanders and John Havlicek , won eight championships  प्रत्येक   .
Two other Celtics ,  जिम  Loscutoff  और  Frank Ramsey , won seven championships each .
चार  players , Bob  cousy  , Kareem Abdul-Jabbar  ,   माइकल  Jordan  और  Scottie Pippen , won six championships each .
जॉर्डन  and Pippen are members of the Chicago Bulls team who won three  लगातार   championships   twice  in the  1990s  .
Robert Horry and John Salley are the only  खिलाड़ी   to  have won the championships with three different teams .
Horry won seven championships with  the   ह्यूस्टन  Rockets , the Los Angeles Lakers  और  the San Antonio  स्पर्स  , while Salley  जीती  four championships with  the  Detroit  पिस्टन्स  ,  the  Bulls and  the   लेकर्स  .
Frank Saul  और   स्टीव  Kerr  हैं  the only players to win  दो  championships with two different teams in consecutive seasons .
Saul won  लगातार  championships with the  रोचेस्टर  Royals and the  मिनियापोलिस  Lakers  in   the  1950s , while Kerr won consecutive championships with  the  Bulls  और   the  Spurs in the  1990s,
Accuracy indicates  निकटता  of measurement results to the true value , precision  to  the  repeatability   ,  or reproducibility of the  मापन
In the  फ़ील्ड  of science ,  अभियान्त्रिकी  , industry , and statistics , the accuracy of a measurement  प्रणाली  is the degree  of  closeness  of  measurements  of  a quantity to that quantity 's actual  (  true ) value  .
The precision of  a  measurement system ,  भी   पुकारा  reproducibility or repeatability  ,  is the  उपाधि  to which repeated  माप  under unchanged  शर्तें  show the  वही  results .
Although the two words  reproducibility  and  repeatability  can be synonymous in colloquial use , they are deliberately contrasted in  the   कॉन्टेक्स्ट  of the  वैज्ञानिक  method .
A measurement system  can  be accurate but not  precise  , precise but not accurate , neither  ,  or both .
For example  ,   if  an experiment contains  a   व्यवस्थित  error , then increasing the sample size generally increases precision but  करता  not improve  सटीकता  .
The result would be a  सतत   yet  inaccurate string of results from the flawed  प्रयोग  .
Eliminating the systematic error improves accuracy  लकिन   करता  not change  परिशुद्धता  .
a  measurement  प्रणाली  is designated valid if it is  दोनो  accurate and precise .
Related terms include bias (  non-  random or directed  प्रभाव  caused by a factor or factors unrelated  to  the independent variable  )  and  गलती   (   यादृच्छिक  variability )  .
The terminology  is  also  लागू   to  indirect measurements—that  is  , values obtained by a computational  कार्यविधि  from observed data .
In  जोड  to accuracy  और  precision , measurements may also have a measurement resolution ,  जिससे  is the smallest change in the underlying physical  मात्रा  that produces a  जवाब  in the measurement .
In the case of  पूरा  reproducibility , such  as  when rounding a number  to  a representable floating  पाइंट  number  ,  the word precision has  a  meaning not related to reproducibility .
लिये  example , in the IEEE 754-2008 standard  it   अर्थात्  the number of bits in  the  significand , so  it  is used as a measure for the  सापेक्ष  accuracy with  जिससे  an arbitrary number can be represented .
Fuck in its literal  अर्थ   refers  to the  अधिनियम  of  यौन  intercourse .
It is an English  शब्द  that  is  often used as a profanity ,  either   to   denote   तिरस्कार  or as an intensifier .
The  उत्पत्ति  of the word is obscure .
It is usually considered  to  be first attested to around  1475   ,  but it may be considerably older .
In  आधुनिक  usage  ,  fuck and its  डेरिवेटिव   (   ऐसे  as  कमीने  and fucking  )  can be used in the position  of  a noun , a verb , an adjective or an adverb .
There  हैं  many common phrases which make  उपयोग   of  the  शब्द  , as well as a  क्रमांक   of  compounds incorporating it ,  ऐसे  as motherfucker  .
Animated  ,  color-coded map showing the various continents and regions .
Depending on the convention and model , some continents may be consolidated  or  subdivided :  लिये   उदाहरण  , Eurasia is most often subdivided into  यूरोपीय   और  Asia ( red shades  )  , while North and South America are sometimes recognized as one  अमरीकी  continent ( green shades  )  .
A continent is one  of  several  बहुत  large  landmasses  on Earth .
They  हैं  generally identified by convention rather  than  any  सख्त  criteria , with up to seven regions commonly regarded as continents—they are ( from largest in size to smallest ) : Asia  ,  Africa , North America , South  अमेरिका  , Antarctica  ,  Europe , and Australia  .
In geology , continents  हैं  described by  अर्थात्  of  tectonic   प्लेटों  .
थाली  tectonics is the process and study of the movement , collision  और  division of continents  ,  earlier  ज्ञात  as continental drift .

it  also features Lisa Bonet  ,  Orlando Jones ,  बच्चा  Rock and Vanessa Bell Calloway .

Community  प्रॉपर्टी  is a marital property  शासन   कि   originated  in civil law jurisdictions and is  अभी  also found in some common  विधि  jurisdictions .
The states of the United States that recognize  जातियाँ  property are primarily in the  वेस्ट   ;   it  was inherited  इससे  Mexico 's ganancial community system , which itself was inherited from Spanish law  (  a Roman -derived civil law system ) and ultimately from  the  Visigoths .
While under Spanish rule Louisiana adopted the ganancial community  प्रणाली  of acquests  और  gains ,  जिससे  replaced the traditional  फ्रेंच  community  of  movables and  acquests   in   इसके   सिविल  law  प्रणाली  .
Map of the United States with community property states highlighted in red .
in  addition to the highlighted states ,  अलास्का   is  a separate property  राज्य  that  permits  couples to opt into  a   जातियाँ  property arrangement .
In a  जातियाँ   प्रॉपर्टी  jurisdiction , most property acquired  दौरान  the marriage  (  except  लिये   उपहार  or inheritances )  —the  community ,  or  communio bonorum—is owned jointly by both spouses and is divided  upon  divorce  ,   annulment  or  मौत  .
Joint ownership is automatically presumed by  विधि  in the absence of  विशिष्ट  evidence that would point to a  contrary   निष्कर्ष  for a  particular  piece of property .
Division of community property may take  प्लेस  by item , by splitting all  वस्तुएं  or by value .
in  some jurisdictions  ,   ऐसे  as  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  , a 50/50 division of  जातियाँ  property is strictly mandated by  statute   ,  meaning  कि  the focus then shifts to whether particular items are to be classified as  जातियाँ  or  पृथक  property .
In other  jurisdictions  , such as Texas , a divorce  अदालत  may decree an `` equitable distribution ``  of  community  प्रॉपर्टी  , which may  परिणाम  in  an  unequal division of such .
In non-community property states  प्रॉपर्टी  may be divided by equitable distribution .
Generally  बोलना  , the property that each partner brings into the marriage or receives by gift , bequest or devise during  विवाह  is  पुकारा  separate property ( i.e. ,  नहीं  community  प्रॉपर्टी   )   .
देखिए  division of property .
Division  of  community  debts  may not be  the  same as division of community property .
For example , in  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  , community  प्रॉपर्टी  is  जरूरी  to be  विभाजित  `` equally ''  जबकि  community debt is required to be  विभाजित  `` equitably '' .
Property that is owned by one spouse before  the  marriage is the separate property of  कि   जीवनसाथी  , unless the property is  ``  transmuted '' into community property .
The rules for this vary from jurisdiction to jurisdiction .
The Duke and Duchess of Cambridge waving to the crowd at The  मॉल  shortly after  the  wedding .
The wedding of Prince William ,  ड्यूक  of Cambridge , and Catherine Middleton took place on  29   अप्रैल  2011 at Westminster Abbey in London .
The groom , Prince William , Duke of  कैम्ब्रिज   ,  is  the  eldest  बेटे  of Charles  ,  Prince  of  Wales , and is second in the line of succession to the British Throne  और  the thrones of fifteen other Commonwealth realms  .
The bride , Catherine `` Kate '' Middleton is  the  eldest of  तीन  children  of  Michael and  carole   मिडलटन  of Bucklebury  ,  Berkshire .
The Dean of Westminster , John Hall , presided at the service  ;  the Archbishop of Canterbury , Rowan Williams , conducted the  विवाह  ; Richard  chartres  , the Bishop  of  London  ,  preached the sermon  ;  and a  पढना  was given by  the  bride  's  brother , James  .
William 's best  man   थी  his brother ,  प्रिंस   हैरी  , while the bride 's  सिस्टर   ,  Pippa  ,   थी  maid of honour .
The ceremony was attended by  the  bride 's and groom 's families , as  खूब  as many foreign royals , diplomats , and the couple  's   चुनी   निजी  guests .
After the ceremony  ,  the couple made the traditional  रूप  on  the  balcony of Buckingham Palace .
As Prince  विलियम  was not the heir apparent to the throne , the wedding was not a  पूरा   राज्य  occasion  और   अनेक  details were left to the couple to decide , such as  much  of the  अतिथि   सूची   of  about 1,900 .
प्रिंस  William and  केट  Middleton met  in  2001 .
उनके  engagement on 20 October 2010 was announced on 16 November 2010 .
The build-up to the wedding and the occasion itself attracted  much   मीडिया   ध्यान  , being compared in many ways with the 1981 marriage  of  William  's  parents .
The occasion was a public holiday  in  the United  किंगडम  and featured  अनेक  ceremonial aspects , including use of the state carriages and roles for the Foot Guards and  household  Cavalry .
Events were  आयोजित  around  the   राष्ट्रमंडल  to mark the wedding ; organisations and hotels held events across Canada , over  5,000   गली  parties were held  throughout  the United Kingdom , and one million people lined the route between Westminster Abbey and Buckingham Palace .
The  रस्म  was viewed  सजीव  by  tens  of millions more around the  संसार  , including 72 million on the YouTube Royal Channel  .
In the United Kingdom ,  टेलीविज़न  audiences peaked at 26.3  लाख  viewers ,  साथ  a total of 36.7  लाख  watching part of the coverage .

A hand ( med . / lat . : manus , pl  .  manūs ) is a prehensile  ,  multi- fingered extremity located at the end  of  an  भुजा   or  forelimb of primates and humans  ,  chimpanzees  ,  monkeys , and lemurs  .
A  few   अन्य  vertebrates  ऐसे  as  the  koala (  जिससे  has  दो  opposable  thumbs  on each `` hand '' and fingerprints remarkably  समान   to  human fingerprints ) are often described  as  having either  ``  hands  ''  or ``  पंजे  '' on their front limbs .
Hands are the  प्रमुख  structures  लिये  physically manipulating the  पर्यावरण  ,  प्रयुक्त  for both  सकल  motor skills ( such as grasping a large object  )  and fine motor  कौशल  ( such as picking up a small pebble  )   .
The fingertips  contain  some of the densest  क्षेत्रों  of nerve endings on the body , are the richest source of  tactile  feedback , and  have  the  महानतम  positioning capability of the body ; thus the sense of touch is intimately associated with hands .
Like other paired organs ( eyes , feet , legs  )  , each hand is dominantly controlled by the  opposing  brain hemisphere ,  so  that  handedness  , or  the  preferred hand choice  लिये  single-handed activities such as writing with a pencil , reflects individual brain  कामकाज  .
Some evolutionary anatomists use the term hand to refer to the appendage of  अंक  on the forelimb more generally — for  उदाहरण  , in  the   कॉन्टेक्स्ट   of  whether the three digits of the bird hand involved  the  same homologous  घाटा  of  दो  digits as in the dinosaur hand  .
The human hand has  27  bones , not  सहित   the  sesamoid  हड्डियों   जिससे  number varies  between  people .
14 of which are  the  phalanges  (  proximal ,  इंटरमीडिएट  and distal  )   of   the  fingers  .
The  metacarpals   हैं  the bones that connects the fingers and the wrist .
प्रत्येक  human hand has 5 metacarpals and 8 carpal bones .

The mark in  the  top-left  of   the  display indicates  कि  the time is 4:00pm ,  नहीं  4:00am  .
A 1969  रेडियो  alarm  क्लॉक  ( Sony Digimatic 8FC-59W ) with an early mechanical-digital display .
A digital clock is a type of  क्लॉक  that displays  the  time  डिजिटली  , i.e . in numerals or other symbols ,  as  opposed  to  an analog clock , where the time is  indicated   by  the  स्थितियाँ  of rotating hands .
Digital clocks are  प्रायः   संबद्ध  with electronic drives ,  लकिन  the ``  डिजिटल  '' description refers only to the display , not to the  ड्राइव  mechanism .
( Both  एनालॉग  and digital clocks can  be  driven either mechanically or  electronically   ,  but  ``  clockwork  ''   mechanisms  with digital displays are rare . )
The biggest digital clock is the Lichtzeitpegel ( ``  लाइट   समय  Level ''  )  on the television tower Rheinturm Düsseldorf ,  जर्मनी  .
Family Guy creator Seth MacFarlane also provides the voices of  पीटर  Griffin , Stewie Griffin , Brian Griffin , and Glenn Quagmire .
परिवार   guy  is an American animated sitcom that  सुविधाएँ  five  प्रमुख  voice actors  ,  and numerous regular cast and recurring guest stars  .
The principal  आवाज़   डाल  consists of show creator Seth MacFarlane  ,   एलेक्स   borstein  , Seth Green , Mila Kunis ( who replaced Lacey  chabert   बाद  the first season )  और  Mike Henry and now , the new actor Beau Osborne .
Recurring voice actors include Patrick Warburton , Adam  वेस्ट  , John G.  ब्रेनन   ,  Nicole Sullivan and Jennifer Tilly , and repeat guest stars include Phyllis Diller , Charles Durning , Rush Limbaugh , and  फिल  LaMarr .
Many  डाल   सदस्यों  provide voices for multiple characters .
The  आवाज़  actors  ,   in   portraying  the various character personalities on  the   दिखाएँ   ,  draw inspiration from celebrities  और  pop culture .
Family Guy characters have been  निभाई  by more than one actor , after members of the show left the series or had conflicting  दायित्वों  .
Kunis  थी  nominated  लिये  an Annie Award for  voicing   मेग   griffin  in the season 5 episode ``  मुश्किल  Legal  ``  and  macfarlane   रै  also won  an  Emmy  पुरस्कार  for Outstanding Voice-Over  प्रदर्शन   और  an Annie Award for  बेहतरीन  Voice  एक्टिंग  in an Animated  टेलीविज़न  Production ,  हालांकि  no other  डाल  member has won an  पुरस्कार  for  उनके  work on the series .
The  पाँच  sets of the  फलक  game  एकाधिकार  depicted here show the evolution of  the  game 's artwork and designs in the United  राज्य  from 1935–2005 .
The history  of  the board  खेल  Monopoly can  be  traced back  to  the early 20th  सदी  .
The  earliest   ज्ञात  design was by the American  ,  Elizabeth Magie ,  patented  in 1904 but existing as early as 1902 .
Magie  's  original intent  थी  to  प्रकाशित  a board game to illustrate  an  economic  principle   ,   namely  the Georgist concept of a  सिंगल  land  मान  tax  .
A series of board games were developed  इससे  1906 through the 1930s that involved  the  buying and selling of land  और  the development of that  जमीन  .
By 1934 , a board  खेल  had been created  much  like the  संस्करण  of  एकाधिकार  sold by Parker Brothers and its related companies through the rest of the 20th century ,  और  into the 21st .
अनेक   लोगों  ,  ज़्यादातर   in  the  midwestern   संयुक्त  States  और  near the East Coast , contributed to the game  's  design and  एवोल्यूशन   .
by  the 1970s , the idea that the game  था  been  निर्मित  solely by Charles  darrow  had become popular folklore ;  it  was printed in the  खेल  's instructions for  अनेक  years , in a 1974 book devoted  to  Monopoly  ,  and was cited  in  a  सामान्य  book  परिचय  toys  भी  as recently as 2007  .
Even a  मार्गदर्शिका   to   परिवार  games published for Reader 's  डाइजेस्ट  in 2003 only gave credit to Darrow  और  Elizabeth  magie   ,   erroneously  stating  कि  Magie 's original game  थी  created  in  the  1800s  ,  और  not acknowledging  कोई  of the game  's  development between  magie  's creation  of  the game ,  और  the  eventual  publication  by  Parker Brothers .
Also in the  1970s  , Professor Ralph Anspach , who  था  himself published  a  board game intended to illustrate  the  principles of both  monopolies  and  विश्वास   busting   ,  fought  पार्कर  Brothers and its  तब  parent company , General Mills , over the trademarks of  the   एकाधिकार  board game .
Through the research of Anspach and others , much of the early history  of  the game was `` rediscovered '' .
Anspach confronted Maxine Brady  ,   लेखक  of the 1974  किताब  The Monopoly Book :  रणनीति  and Tactics of  the  World 's Most Popular Game over  the   वास्तविक  history of  the  game on Barry Farber 's New  यॉर्क   नगर  talk show in 1975 .
Because of the lengthy court process  ,  including appeals , the legal status of Parker Brothers  '   trademarks  on  the  game was not settled  जबतक  1985  .
The game 's  नाम  remains a registered trademark of  पार्कर  Brothers , as do its  विशिष्ट  design elements .
At the conclusion of the court case , the game 's logo and graphic design elements  became  part of a larger Monopoly brand , licensed by Parker  भाइयो   '  parent companies  onto  a variety of items through the present day .
Despite the  ``  rediscovery '' of the  फलक  game  's   जल्दी   इतिहास  in the 1970s and 1980s , and several  किताबे  and journal articles  on   the  subject , Hasbro ( Parker  भाइयो   '   वर्तमान  parent company  )  did not acknowledge any of  the   खेल   's  history before Charles  darrow  on its official Monopoly website as recently as June 2012 .
Nor did Hasbro acknowledge  anyone   अन्य  than  darrow  in materials published or sponsored by them  ,  at least  as  recently as  2006  .
अंतरराष्ट्रीय  tournaments , first held in the early 1970s , continue  to  the present , with the  अगला  world championship likely scheduled for 2013 .
Starting in  1985  , a new generation of spin-off board games and card games appeared on both  पहलू  of the Atlantic Ocean .
In 1989 , the  पहला  of many video game and computer game  संस्करण  was  प्रकाशित  .
Since 1994  ,  many official variants of the game , based on locations other than  अटलांटिक   नगर  , New Jersey ( the official U.S. setting ) or London (  the  official Commonwealth  सेटिंग  , excepting Canada ) , have  महरूम  published by Hasbro  or  its licensees .
in   2008   ,  Hasbro  permanently  changed the color scheme  और  some of the  gameplay  of the  मानक  U.S . Edition of the game to  मैच  the UK Edition , although the U.S. standard edition maintains the Atlantic City property names .
Hasbro also modified the official logo to give the `` Mr . Monopoly  ''  character a 3-D computer-generated  dekh  , which has since been adopted by  licensees  USAopoly , Winning  चालें  and  जीतना  Solutions .
And Hasbro has also been including the  गति   die  , introduced  in  2006 's Monopoly : The Mega Edition by Winning  चालें   खेल  , in versions produced directly  by  Hasbro (  ऐसे  as the 2009 Championship Edition ) .
In baseball , a sacrifice fly is a  batted  ball  कि  satisfies  चार  criteria:
There are fewer than two outs  जब  the ball  is  hit .
The ball is  hit  to the outfield ( fair or foul ) , or to  infield  foul territory  .
The batter  is  put out because an outfielder ( or an infielder running in  the  outfield  ,  or foul territory ) catches  the  ball on the fly  (  alternatively if the  बैटर  would have been out if not for an error or  if  the outfielder drops the ball and another runner is put out  )  .
A runner who is already on base scores  on   the  play .
It is called a `` sacrifice  ''  fly because the batter  presumably   intends   to  cause a teammate to score a run , while sacrificing his own  क्षमता  to do so .
मिनेसोटा  ( ) is a U.S.  राज्य  located in the Midwestern  संयुक्त   राज्य   .
Minnesota was carved out of  the  eastern  हाफ  of the Minnesota  territory  and  admitted   to  the Union as the 32nd  राज्य  on May 11 , 1858 .
Known as the `` Land of 10,000 Lakes '' ,  the  state 's name comes from a Dakota  शब्द  for `` sky-tinted water ''  .
Those waters , together with forests , parks , and wilderness areas , offer residents  और   पर्यटकों  a variety of outdoor recreational opportunities .
मिनेसोटा  is the 12th most extensive  और  the 21st most populous  of  the U.S. states .
nearly  60 % of its residents  सजीव  in the Minneapolis–Saint Paul metropolitan area ( known as  the   ``  Twin Cities  ''  ) , the center  of  transportation  ,  business ,  उद्योग  , education  ,  government and home to an  internationally   ज्ञात  arts community .
The  शेष  of the state  consists  of western  prairies  now given over to intensive agriculture ;  पतझड़ी  forests  in  the southeast , now cleared , farmed and settled ; and the less populated North Woods  ,  used for mining  ,  forestry  ,  and  मनोरंजन  .
Minnesota is known for  इसके  relatively mixed social and  राजनैतिक  orientations ,  और  has a high rate of civic participation and  वोटर  turnout  .
Minnesota ranks among  the   healthiest  states , and has a highly  साक्षर  population .
The  विशाल   बहुमत  of residents are of  scandinavian  and  जर्मनी  descent .
The state is known as  a  center  of  Scandinavian  अमरीकी  culture .
जातीय  diversity has increased in  हाल  decades .
Substantial influxes of  एशियाई  , African , and Latin American immigrants have joined  the  descendants of  यूरोपीय  settlers and the original Native American  निवासियों   .
Grants are non-repayable funds by one party ( grant makers  )  , often a government department , corporation , foundation or trust  ,  to a ,  प्रायः   (   लकिन   नहीं  always ) a nonprofit entity ,  शैक्षणिक  institution , business or an individual .
In order to receive  a  grant  ,  some form of `` Grant Writing ''  प्रायः  referred to as either  a  proposal or an application is usually required .
Most grants are made to fund  a  specific  प्रोजेक्ट   और  require some level of compliance  और  reporting .
The grant  लिखने  process involves an applicant submitting a proposal (  or  submission ) to  a  potential funder ,  either   on  the applicant 's  अपना  initiative or  in  response to  a  Request for  प्रस्ताव  from the funder  .
Other  अनुदान  can be given to individuals ,  ऐसे  as victims  of   प्राकृतिक   आपदाओं  or individuals who seek  to  open a small business  .
Sometimes grant makers require grant seekers to have  कुछ  form of  tax-exempt  status  ,   be  a registered nonprofit  संगठन  or a local government .
For  उदाहरण  ,  tiered   funding  for a  फ्रीवे  are very large grants negotiated  at  government policy level .
However  छोटी  grants may be provided by a government agency (  e.g  . municipal government ) .
Project-related funding involving governments , business ,  समुदायों   ,  and individuals  is  often arranged by  अनुप्रयोग  either in writing  or  online  .
Naturally  occurring  cobalt (  co  ) is composed  of   1  stable isotope , 59Co . 28  radioisotopes  have been characterized  साथ  the most  stable  being 60Co  साथ  a  half-life  of  5.2714   सालो  , 57Co  साथ  a half-life of 271.79 days , 56Co with a  half-life  of 77.27 days , and 58Co with a  half-life  of 70.86 days .
All of the remaining  रेडियोसक्रिय  isotopes  have  half-lives that are less  than  18 hours and the majority of these  have  half-lives that are  कम   than  1  दूसरी  .
This  तत्व  also has 11 meta  राज्य  , all  of  which have half-lives less  than  15  मिनट्स  .
The isotopes  of  cobalt  दायरा  in  परमाणु  weight from 47Co to 75Co .
The primary decay mode for isotopes with atomic  द्रव्यमान   ईकाई  values less than  कि  of the most abundant stable isotope , 59Co , is electron capture  और   the   प्राथमिक  mode of decay for  those   of  greater than  59   परमाणु  mass units is beta  क्षय  .
The primary decay  उत्पाद  before 59Co are iron isotopes and  the  primary products after are nickel isotopes .
Standard  परमाणु  mass : 58.933195 ( 5 ) u
जो  Moved My Cheese  ?
an   अद्भुत  Way to Deal with Change in Your  कार्य  and in Your Life ,  प्रकाशित  in 1998 ,  is  a motivational  किताब  by Spencer  जॉनसन  written in the style  of  a parable or business fable .
It describes  बदलें  in one 's work and life , and  चार  typical reactions to said change by two mice and two `` littlepeople '' , during their  हंट  for cheese .
A  नई  York Times business bestseller since  रिलीज  , Who Moved My Cheese ?
remained  on  the list  लिये  almost five years and spent  over  200  सप्ताह   on   प्रकाशक  Weekly 's  सजिल्द  nonfiction  सूची  .
It has sold more  than   26  million copies worldwide in 37 languages and  remains  to be one  of  the best-selling business books  .
Nikita Sergeyevich Khrushchev ( –  सितंबर  11 ,  1971  )  led  the  सोवियत  Union during part  of  the  ठंडा  War  .
He  परोसा   as   पहला  Secretary of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union from 1953 to 1964 , and as Chairman of the Council of Ministers , or Premier ,  इससे   1958  to  1964  .
Khrushchev was responsible for the partial de-Stalinization of the Soviet  संघ  , for backing the  प्रगति  of the early Soviet space program , and for several relatively liberal reforms in areas  of  domestic policy .
Khrushchev 's party colleagues removed him  इससे  power in 1964 ,  replacing  him with Leonid  brezhnev   as  First Secretary and Alexei Kosygin as Premier .
Khrushchev was born in  the  Russian village of Kalinovka in 1894 , close to the present-day border between Russia and Ukraine  .
He was employed as a metalworker in his youth  ,  and during  the  Russian Civil War was  a  political commissar .
With the help of  lazar   kaganovich  , he worked  उसके   रास्ता  up the Soviet  पदानुक्रम   .
He supported  जोसेफ  Stalin 's  purges   ,  and  स्वीकृत  thousands of arrests .
In 1939 , Stalin sent him to govern  युक्त  , and  he   जारी   the  purges there .
During what  थी  known in the  सोवियत   संघ  as the Great  patriotic  War  (  Eastern Front of World War II ) ,  khrushchev  was again a commissar , serving as an intermediary between Stalin and  उसके  generals .
Khrushchev was present at the  खूनी   रक्षा  of  stalingrad  , a  फैक्ट  he took great pride in throughout his life .
After the war , he returned to Ukraine before being recalled to Moscow as one of Stalin 's close advisers .
in  the power struggle triggered by Stalin 's death in 1953 , Khrushchev , after several years  ,  emerged  विजयी  .
On February 25 , 1956 , at the 20th  पार्टी  Congress , he delivered  the  `` Secret Speech ,  ''  denouncing Stalin 's purges  और  ushering  in  a  कम  repressive  era  in the Soviet Union .
His  घरेलू  policies , aimed at bettering the lives of ordinary  नागरिकों  , were often ineffective , especially in the area  of   कृषि  .
उम्मीद  eventually to rely  on  missiles for national defense , Khrushchev ordered major cuts in conventional forces .
Despite the cuts ,  khrushchev  's rule  देखी  the tensest years of  the  Cold War , culminating in  the  Cuban Missile Crisis  .
Some of Khrushchev 's policies were  देखी  as erratic , particularly by his emerging rivals ,  जो  quietly rose  in  strength and deposed him in  अक्तूबर   1964  .
he   किया  not suffer the deadly fate of some previous  losers  of Soviet power struggles , but was pensioned off with an apartment in Moscow  और   a  dacha in  the  countryside .
His  lengthy  memoirs were smuggled  to   the  West and published in part in 1970 .
khrushchev  died  in   1971  of heart disease .
Upper gastrointestinal ( GI ) bleeding refers to  hemorrhage  in the  अपर  gastrointestinal tract .
The anatomic cut-off for  अपर  GI bleeding is the ligament of Treitz ,  जिससे  connects  the  fourth portion  of   the  duodenum to the  diaphragm  near  the  splenic flexure of the colon .
Upper GI bleeds are considered medical emergencies , and  आवश्यकता   प्रवेश  to hospital for urgent diagnosis and management .
Due to  अग्रिम   in  medications and endoscopy , upper GI  hemorrhage   is  now usually treated  बगैर   सर्जरी  .
World population estimates from  1800  to 2100 , based on UN 2010  projections  (  रेड  , orange , green ) and US  जनसांख्यिकी  Bureau historical estimates ( black ) .
Actual recorded  जनसांख्यिकी  figures  हैं  in blue .
According to the highest estimate , the world population may rise to 16 billion by 2100 ; according to the lowest estimate  ,  it may decline to 6 billion .
The  संसार  population is the total number of living humans on Earth .
As of today , it is estimated to number billion  by  the  संयुक्त  States Census Bureau  (  USCB ) .
The USCB estimates that the  संसार  population exceeded  7  billion on March 12 ,  2012  .
According to a separate estimate by the  संयुक्त  Nations Population Fund  ,  it reached this milestone on October 31  ,  2011 .
The world population has experienced  निरन्तर  growth  चूंकि   the   समाप्त  of the Great Famine and  the  Black Death  in  1350 ,  जब  it stood at around 370 million .
The highest  दरों  of growth – global population  increases  above 1.8 %  प्रति  year – were  देखी   briefly  during the 1950s , and for a longer period during the 1960s and  1970s  .
the  growth rate peaked at 2.2 %  in  1963 , and  था  declined to 1.1 %  by   2011  .
Total annual births were highest in the late 1980s  at  about 138  लाख  , and are now expected  to   remain  essentially constant at their 2011 level of 134 million , while deaths number  56  million per year , and are expected to increase  to  80 million per year  by  2040 .
वर्तमान  projections  दिखाएँ   a  continued increase in population in  the  near  भविष्य  ( but  a  steady decline in the population growth rate ) , with the global  जनसांख्यिकी  expected to  पहुँचें  between 7.5 and 10.5 billion by 2050 .
Various longer-term  estimates  predict further growth , stagnation  ,  or even overall decline in the global population by  2150  .
Some analysts  have   questioned  the  स्थिरता  of further world  जनसांख्यिकी   विकास  ,  citing  the growing pressures  on  the  पर्यावरण  , global  खाना   आपूर्तियाँ  , and energy resources  .
Philips  lumileds  Lighting Company is the manufacturer of  a   चौड़ी  range of high-power/high-efficiency light-emitting diodes ( LEDs ) .
It is a now a fully owned division of Philips Lighting .
Knuckle mnemonic for the number  of  days in each month of the Gregorian Calendar .
Each projecting knuckle represents  a  31-day month .
A  mnemonic   (  , with a silent `` m  ''   )   ,  or mnemonic  यंत्र  , is any learning technique that  एड्स  information retention .
Mnemonics aim  to  translate information into a form  कि  the  इंसान  brain can retain better than its  असली  form  .
Even the process of applying this conversion might  already   सहायता  the transfer  of  information to long-term memory  .
Commonly encountered mnemonics are often for lists and in auditory  रूप   ,  such  as   छोटी  poems  ,  acronyms , or memorable phrases , but mnemonics can  भी   be  for  अन्य  types of information and in visual or kinesthetic forms .
Their use  is   आधारित  on  the   अवलोकन  that the human mind more easily remembers spatial , personal , surprising , physical , sexual , humorous ,  or  otherwise 'relatable  '  information , rather than more abstract or impersonal forms of information .
The word mnemonic is derived from the Ancient Greek word μνημονικός ( mnēmonikos )  ,  meaning ``  of  memory  ''  and is  सम्बन्धित  to  mnemosyne   (  `` remembrance  ''   )  , the name of the goddess of memory  in  Greek  mythology  .
Both of these words are derived from μνήμη ( mnēmē ) , `` remembrance , memory '' .
Mnemonics in antiquity were most often considered in  the  context  of   कया  is today known as the Art of memory .
प्राचीन  Greeks  और  Romans  विशिष्ट  between two types of memory :  the  'natural '  मेमोरी  and the 'artificial ' memory .
The  पूर्व   is   inborn  ,  और  is  the  one that everyone uses automatically  और  without thinking .
The artificial memory in contrast has to be trained  और  developed through the learning and practicing  of  a variety of mnemonic  तकनीकों  .
Mnemonic systems are  खास  techniques or strategies  consciously  used to improve memory , it helps  employ  information already stored in  long-term  memory to make  memorization  an easier task  .
President  बुश  signing  the  No Child Left  पीछे  Act at Hamilton H.S . in Hamilton , Ohio .
The No Child Left Behind  अधिनियम  of 2001 ( NCLB )  is  a  संयुक्त  States Act of Congress that is a reauthorization of the  elementary   और  Secondary Education Act  ,  which included Title I , the  सरकारी  's  फ्लैगशिप   सहायता  program for disadvantaged  विद्यार्थी  .
NCLB  supports  standards-based education  सुधार  based on the premise that setting high standards and establishing measurable goals can improve individual  outcomes  in  शिक्षा   .
The Act requires states  to   develop  assessments in basic  कौशल  .
States  जरूर  give these assessments to all students at select grade levels in order to receive federal school funding .
The Act does not assert a national  उपलब्धि  standard ;  मानकों   हैं   नियत  by each  व्यक्तिगत   राज्य  .
NCLB expanded the federal role in public  शिक्षा  through annual testing , annual academic  प्रगति  , report cards , teacher qualifications ,  और  funding changes .
The bill  passed  in  the  U.S. Congress with bipartisan  support   .

A pickup truck or pick-up , often simply referred to  as  a pickup , is a light  मोटर  vehicle with an open-top , rear  कार्गो  area ( bed ) .
in  North America  ,  the term pickup is used  लिये  light trucks with a lighter duty chassis and  फैक्टरी   निर्मित  , integrated bed , as well as for  coupé  utility vehicles , often based on a personal car chassis , but  भी  often on a special dedicated chassi for such use .
Some countries have their  अपना  terms similar to pickup , such  as  ute in Australia  और  New Zealand , or bakkie in  दक्षिण  Africa  .
Large pickup trucks  हैं   somewhat   विरल   in  Europe ,  जहाँ  vans and light lorries are commonly used for  समान   भूमिकाएँ  .
इस  15th-century depiction of  शारलेमेन  and Pope Adrian I shows a well-bred medieval horse with arched neck , refined head and elegant gait .
Horses  in  the Middle Ages  differed  in size , build and breed from the modern horse , and  यहूद  ,  on  average , smaller .
They were also more central to society than their modern counterparts , being essential for war , agriculture ,  और  transport .
नतीजतन  , specific types of horse developed , many of  जिससे   have   no  modern equivalent .
While an understanding  of  modern horse  breeds  and equestrianism  is  vital for  कोई   विश्लेषण  of  the   मध्यकालीन  horse , researchers also  need  to consider  वृत्तचित्र  (  दोनो  written and pictorial )  और  archaeological evidence .
घोड़े  in the Middle Ages were rarely differentiated by  नस्ल  , but rather by use .
This led them to be described  ,  for  उदाहरण  , as `` chargers `` (  युद्ध  horses ) , `` palfreys `` ( riding horses  )  ,  कार्ट  horses or packhorses .
Reference is also given to their place  of  origin  ,  such as ``  स्पेनी  horses , '' but whether this referred to one breed or  अनेक  is unknown .
Another difficulty arising  दौरान  any study of medieval documents or literature is the  लचीलापन  of the medieval  भाषाएं  , where several words can be used for one thing ( or , conversely  ,  several objects  हैं  referred to by one word ) .
Words such as ' courser ' and  'चार्जr   '   हैं  used  interchangeably  (  भी  within one document  )  , and where  एक  epic may speak disparagingly of  a  rouncey  ,   another  praises its skill and swiftness .
Significant technological  अग्रिम   in  equestrian equipment , often  introduced  from other cultures , allowed for significant changes in both  warfare  and agriculture  .
In particular , improved  डिजाइन  for the solid-treed saddle  as   खूब  as  the  arrival of the stirrup , horseshoe and horse collar were significant advances in  मध्यकालीन  society .
Consequently , the assumptions and theories developed by historians are not definitive , and debate still rages on many issues  ,  such as the breeding or size  of   the  horse , and  a  number of sources  जरूर  be  consulted  in order to understand the breadth of the subject .
The Music  man   is  a musical with book ,  म्यूज़िक  , and lyrics  by   मेरेडिथ  Willson , based  on  a story by  willson  and Franklin Lacey .
The plot concerns  कॉन  man Harold Hill , who poses as a boys ' band organizer and  नेता  and sells  बैंड  instruments and  वर्दी  to naive townsfolk before skipping town with the cash .
In  नदी  City , Iowa , prim librarian and piano  टीचर  Marian  paroo  sees through him  ,  but  जब  Hill  helps  her younger  bhai  overcome his fear of social interactions due to his lisp ,  marian  begins to  पतन  in love with Harold .
हेरोल्ड  , in turn  गिरना  for Marian  ,   risks  being caught to  जीत  her .
In 1957  ,  the show became a  hit  on Broadway , winning five Tony  पुरस्कार   ,  including Best Musical  ,  and running for 1,375 performances .
The cast  एल्बम  won the first Grammy Award for `` Best Original Cast  एल्बम  '' and was  क्रमांक  one on the Billboard charts for 245 weeks .
The show 's  कामयाबी  led to revivals and a popular 1962 film  अनुकूलन  and  a  2003  टेलीविज़न  remake .
it  frequently is produced by both  पेशेवर   और  amateur  थिएटर  companies .
Surveyor 's wheel
a  surveyor 's wheel , also  पुकारा  a clickwheel ,  hodometer  ,  waywiser  , trundle wheel , measuring wheel , or perambulator is a device for measuring distance  .
Largest  non-polar  deserts
Sand  टीले  in the Rub ' al Khali  (   ``   खाली  quarter '' ) of Saudi Arabia .
