A desert is a landscape or region of land that  is   बहुत  dry because of low rainfall amounts ( precipitation ) , often has little coverage by plants , and in which streams dry up  जबतक   वे   हैं  supplied by water from outside areas .
Deserts can also be described as areas where more  जल  is lost by evapotranspiration than falls as precipitation .
मरुस्थल  plants must  have   खास  adaptations to survive with this little water  .
Deserts generally receive  कम  than 25 cm  of  rain ( precipitation  )  each year .
Semideserts or steppes  हैं  regions which  प्राप्त  between and .
In the Köppen climate  वर्गीकरण  system , deserts are classed as BWh (  hot  desert ) or BWk ( temperate desert  )  .
In  the  Thornthwaite climate classification system , deserts would be classified as arid megathermal climates .
World War I ( WWI ) was a  वैश्विक  war centred  in  Europe that began on  28  July 1914 and lasted until 11  नवम्बर  1918 .
It  थी   predominantly   पुकारा  the World War or the Great War from its occurrence  जबतक   the  start of World War II in 1939 ,  और  the First World  युद्ध   or  World  युद्ध   i  thereafter .
It  शामिल  all the world 's  ग्रेट  powers , which were assembled in two opposing alliances :  the   allies  ( based  on  the Triple Entente of the United Kingdom ,  फ़्रांस  and  रूस  ) and the Central  शक्तियां   (   originally   the  Triple Alliance of Germany ,  austria-hungary  and  इटली  ; but , as Austria–Hungary  था   लिया  the offensive against the agreement ,  इटली  did not enter into the war ) .
These alliances were both reorganised and  विस्तारित  as more nations entered  the   युद्ध  : Italy , Japan and the  संयुक्त  States  joined  the Allies , and the Ottoman  साम्राज्य  and Bulgaria the Central Powers .
Ultimately , more  than  70 million military personnel  ,  including  60  million  europeans  , were mobilised in one of the largest wars  in  history .
More than 9 million combatants were killed , largely because of technological advancements  कि   led  to enormous increases in the lethality of weapons  बगैर   सम्बन्धित   सुधार  in protection or mobility .
It  थी  the fifth- deadliest  विरोध  in  संसार   इतिहास  , subsequently  paving   the  way for various political changes  ,  such as revolutions in  अनेक   of   the   राष्ट्र  involved .
One of the  long-term  causes of the war was the resurgence of  साम्राज्यवाद  in  the   विदेशी  policies of the  ग्रेट   शक्तियां  of Europe  .
More  तत्काल  , the assassination of  archduke   फ्रांज  Ferdinand of Austria , the heir to  the  throne of Austria-Hungary , on 28  जून  1914 by Yugoslav nationalist Gavrilo Princip in  साराजेवो  triggered a diplomatic crisis when Austria-Hungary  subsequently  delivered an  ultimatum  to  the  Kingdom of Serbia .
Several alliances formed over the previous decades were invoked .
Within weeks , the major powers  यहूद  at war and  ,  via their colonies , the  विरोध   जल्द  spread around the world .
On 28 July , the  austro-hungarians   fired  the first shots of  the  war  as   तैयारी  for the invasion of Serbia .
While the  russians  mobilised  ,  the Germans invaded  न्यूट्रल  Belgium and Luxembourg on the  रास्ता  to France , providing a casus belli for Britain 's  घोषणा  of war against Germany .
बाद  the German  कूच   on  Paris was brought to a halt—the so-called Miracle of the  marne  —the Western Front settled into a static battle of attrition with a  गर्त   लकीर   कि  changed little until 1917  .
On the Eastern Front ,  the  Russian army was successful against the Austro-Hungarians , but was stopped in its  आक्रमण  of  ईस्ट  Prussia by the Germans .
In November  the  Ottoman Empire joined the war , opening up  fronts  in the Caucasus ,  मेसोपोटामिया  and the Sinai .
इटली  and Bulgaria went to war  in  1915 and Romania in 1916  .
in  Russia , the tsar 's government collapsed in  कूच  1917 and a  subsequent  revolution in November brought the Russians to  शर्तें  with the Central Powers .
बाद  a  1918  German offensive  साथ  the western  सामने  , the  allies  drove back the Germans in a series of successful offensives  और  American forces began entering  the  trenches .
Germany , which  था  its  अपना  trouble with revolutionaries , agreed to  an  armistice  on  11 November 1918  .
the  war ended in victory for the Allies .
Events on the home fronts were  as  tumultuous as  on  the  बैटल   fronts  , as the  भागीदार  tried to mobilize their manpower and economic resources  to   लड़ो  a total war .
by   the   समाप्त   of   the  war ,  चार  major imperial powers—the German ,  रूसी   ,  Austro-Hungarian and Ottoman empires—ceased to exist .
The successor states of the  पूर्व  two lost a great amount  of  territory ,  जबकि  the latter two were dismantled entirely .
The map of  सेंट्रल  Europe was  redrawn  into  अनेक  smaller states .
the  League of Nations was  formed   in  the  आशा  of  preventing  another such conflict  .
The European nationalism  शाखित  by the  युद्ध  and the breakup of  empires  , the repercussions  of  Germany 's defeat and problems with the  सन्धि  of Versailles  हैं  agreed to be  कारकों  contributing to World War II .
`` Girls  बस  Want  to  Have Fun  ''   is   a  1979 song originally written by Robert Hazard  और  made famous by singer Cyndi  lauper  .
It was the first major single released  by  Lauper as a  सोलो   कलाकार   और   the  lead-off single from her debut album She 's So Unusual .
Lauper’s  संस्करण  gained recognition as a feminist anthem and promoted by an award-winning  वीडियो  .
It has been covered on  either   an  album  or   in  live concert by  over  30 other artists .
the   सिंगल  was Lauper 's breakthrough hit , reaching #  2   on   the   बिलबोर्ड   hot   100  and becoming a worldwide hit throughout  लेट  1983 and early 1984 .
It  remains  one of Lauper 's signature songs  और   थी  a  widely  popular  सोंग  during the era of its release  ,  the 1980s  .
The `` Rolling Stone & MTV :  '100   महानतम  Pop  गीतों  ' :  1-50   ''  , `` Rolling Stone : `` The 100 Top Music Videos '' ''  और  the `` VH1 : 100  महानतम   वीडियो  '' lists ranked the song at # 22  ,  # 39 and # 45 ,  क्रमशः  .
the  song  प्राप्त  a Grammy Award  नामांकन  for Record  of  the Year and Best Female Pop Vocal Performance .
View of defibrillator electrode position and placement .
Defibrillation  is   a  common treatment for life-threatening cardiac dysrhythmias , ventricular fibrillation , and pulseless ventricular tachycardia .
Defibrillation consists of delivering a therapeutic dose of electrical energy to the affected  दिल  with a device called a defibrillator .
इस  depolarizes a critical mass of the heart muscle , terminates the  dysrhythmia  ,  और   allows  normal sinus rhythm to be reestablished by the body 's natural pacemaker , in the sinoatrial  नोड  of the  दिल   .
Defibrillators can be external  ,  transvenous , or implanted , depending on the type of device used  or  needed  .
कुछ  external units , known as automated external defibrillators  (  AEDs ) , automate the  निदान   of  treatable  लय  , meaning that lay responders or  bystanders  are  समर्थ  to use them successfully with little , or in  कुछ   मामले  no training at all  .
the  Cato Institute is  an  American libertarian think tank headquartered in Washington , D.C .
It was founded as the Charles Koch Foundation in 1974 by Murray Rothbard  ,   ed  Crane and Charles Koch , chairman of  the  board and chief executive officer of the conglomerate  koch  Industries ,  inc.  .
In  जुलाई  1976 ,  the  name was changed  to  the Cato  संस्थान  .
According to the 2011 Global Go To  सोचो  Tank Index , Cato is the 6th  सबसे  influential US based  सोचो  tank , ranking 3rd in Economic Policy and 2nd  in  Social Policy .
the  Institute 's stated mission is ``  to   बढ़ाएँ  the understanding of public policies based  on   the  principles of limited government  ,  free  बाज़ार  , individual liberty ,  और  peace .
The Institute will use the most  प्रभावी  means to originate , advocate , promote , and disseminate applicable policy proposals that create free  ,  open , and civil societies in the  संयुक्त  States and throughout the world .  ''
Cato scholars were critical of George  W.  Bush 's Republican administration ( 2001–2009 ) on several  मुद्दे  , including the Iraq  युद्ध   ,  civil liberties , education ,  कृषि   ,  energy  नीति  , and excessive  सरकारी  spending .
on  other issues , they  समर्थित  Bush  प्रशासन  initiatives , most notably health care  ,  Social Security , global warming , tax policy ,  और  immigration  .
During the 2008  u.S.  presidential election  ,  Cato scholars criticized both major-party  उम्मीदवार   ,  John McCain and Barack  ओबामा  .
केटो  has criticized President Obama 's stances on  नीति   मुद्दे  since his inauguration  ,  such  as   फिस्कल  stimulus  ,   healthcare  reform  ,  foreign policy , and the War on Drugs ,  जबकि  supporting his stance on the repeal of Do n't Ask , Do n't  बताना  and liberal immigration policy .
ड्रैकुला  is  an  1897  गोथिक   हॉरर   अनोखा  by Irish author Bram Stoker  .
Famous for introducing the  अक्षर  of the vampire Count  ड्रैकुला  , the novel tells the story of Dracula 's  attempt  to  relocate  from Transylvania to  इंग्लैण्ड  , and the battle between Dracula and a small  समूह  of men  और  women led by Professor Abraham Van Helsing  .
Dracula has been assigned  to  many literary genres including vampire literature , horror fiction , the  गोथिक  novel and invasion  साहित्य   .
the  novel  छू  on themes  ऐसे  as  the  role of women in Victorian culture ,  यौन  conventions , immigration  ,   उपनिवेशवाद  , and  post-colonialism  .
Although Stoker did not invent the  पिशाच  , he defined its modern form ,  और  the novel has spawned numerous theatrical , film and television interpretations .
Quidditch is a  प्रतिस्पर्धी  sport in the wizarding  संसार  of the Harry Potter universe , and is  इससे  the  श्रेणी   of  children 's novels and movies .
It is an extremely rough but very popular semi-contact sport , played  by   wizards  and witches .
Matches are played between two teams of seven players  सवारी  flying broomsticks , using four balls  और  six elevated ring-shaped  लक्ष्य  , three on each side of the Quidditch pitch ( field ) .
In the Harry  कुम्हार  universe  ,  Quidditch holds  a  fervent following similar to the  स्थिति  that association football holds as a globally popular sport .
The sport is monumental throughout  the  wizarding world .
Harry plays an important position for his house team at Hogwarts :  he  is  the  seeker  और  becomes  the  captain in  उसके  sixth year there .
Regional and international competitions are mentioned throughout the  श्रेणी  .
in  Goblet of  आग  , Quidditch at Hogwarts  is  cancelled for the Tri-Wizard Tournament ,  लकिन  Harry and  the   weasleys  attend the Quidditch World Cup .
In  जोड   ,  Harry uses his Quidditch skills to capture a golden egg from a dragon called the Hungarian  horntail   (  in the first task  of  the Tri-Wizard Tournament ) , to capture a flying key in Philosopher 's  स्टोन   ,  and on two key occasions  in  Deathly Hallows — getting hold of Ravenclaw  's  Diadem , and  दौरान  the final  लड़ो  with Voldemort — the ``  unerring   कौशल  of the Seeker ''  is  useful to him in snatching the Elder  wand  out of the air  .
Harry Potter  रै   स्वामित्व   दो  broomsticks , the Nimbus 2000 and the Firebolt , both of which are destroyed  by  the series ' end .
The game has  महरूम  adopted  in   the  real world in the form of Muggle  quidditch   .
The United States  कॉंग्रेस  is the bicameral  विधानमंडल  of the  संघीय  government of the  संयुक्त  States consisting of two houses : the lower house known as the  हाउस   of  Representatives and the  अपर  house  ज्ञात  as the Senate  .
Congress meets in the Capitol in Washington , D.C .
दोनो   प्रतिनिधि  and  सीनेटरों  are chosen  through  direct election .
कॉंग्रेस   रै  a total  of  535 voting members  :  435 members  in  the House of  प्रतिनिधि  and  100   सदस्यों  in the Senate .
Members of the House of Representatives  serve  two-year  शर्तें  representing the people  of  a district .
congressional   जिले  are  apportioned  to states by  जनसांख्यिकी  using the United States  जनसांख्यिकी  results ,  प्रत्येक   राज्य   in  the union having  at   तनिक  one representative  in   the   हाउस  of Representatives  .
Regardless of population , each of the 50 states has two senators ; the 100 senators each  serve  a six-year term .
The  शर्तें  are  लड़खड़ाते   so  every two  सालो  approximately  one-third  of the  सीनेट  is up for election .
Each  लड़खड़ाते  group of one-third of the  सीनेटरों   हैं  called 'classes ' .
No state  of   the  United States  रै  two senators from the same class .
Most incumbents seek re-election , and their  ऐतिहासिक  likelihood  of   जीतना  subsequent  चुनावों  exceeds 90 percent  .
in   अगस्त   2012   ,  a Gallup poll  reported  that Congress’s approval rating amongst  अमेरिकी  was at 10 % ,  मिलान   a  38-year  कम  reached  in  November 2011 .
``  A Little More Country Than  कि   ''  is the title of a song  लिखा   by  Joey  +  Rory  's   रोरी   ली  Feek , Wynn Varble ,  और  Don  poythress  ,  और  recorded by American country artist Easton Corbin .
It was released in  अगस्त  2009 as Corbin 's debut single and is included on his self-titled debut  एल्बम  .
In April 2010  ,  the  सोंग  reached Number  एक  on the country music charts , making Corbin  the  first male solo artist in  सात  years to send a  डेब्यू  single to Number One .
It has been certified Gold by the RIAA .
The  ब्लैकबेरी   is   a  line of wireless handheld  डिवाइस  and services designed and  marketed  by Research In Motion Limited ( RIM )  ऑपरेटिंग  as  ब्लैकबेरी  .
The  पहला  BlackBerry device , an email pager , was  released  in 1999 ; the most recent BlackBerry devices , the Z10 and Q10 ,  यहूद  announced  on  January 30  ,  2013 .
the  user interface varies  by  model ;  सबसे   विशेषता   a  physical QWERTY  कुंजीपटल  ,  जबकि  newer  पीढियां  have relied on a multi-touch screen and virtual keyboard  .
A BlackBerry can shoot video , take photos  ,   खेल  music , and perform online functions such as web-browsing and emailing .
They can  भी  send and receive push email and instant messages while maintaining a high level of security  through  on-device  संदेश  encryption , and are  designed  to function as personal digital assistants .
BlackBerry devices support a large variety of instant messaging features  ,  with  the  most popular being the proprietary BlackBerry Messenger service  .
the  BlackBerry PlayBook is a tablet computer  offered  by the company .
The  100   millionth  BlackBerry smartphone  थी  shipped in June quarter  of  2010 and the 200 millionth  स्मार्टफोन   थी  shipped in  सितंबर  quarter of 2012 .
BlackBerry  खाते  for  3  % of mobile device  बिक्री  worldwide in 2011  ,   बनाना  its manufacturer the sixth  सबसे  popular device  मेकर  ( 25 % of mobile device  बिक्री  are smartphones ) .
The  उपभोक्ता  BlackBerry  अंतरजाल  Service is available in 91  देशों  worldwide on over 500 mobile  सेवा  operators using various mobile technologies .
As of September 2012  ,  there were  अस्सी  million subscribers  विश्वव्यापी  to BlackBerry .
In 2011 the  caribbean  and Latin America had the highest penetrations  of   ब्लैकबेरी   स्मार्टफ़ोन  worldwide , with up to about 45 per cent in the region having a RIM device  .
BlackBerry , iPhone , Android , and Windows  फोन   हैं  considered the four major  स्मार्टफोन  brands  .
BlackBerry is  widely  referred to as  ``  CrackBerry '' in the United States ,  जिससे  alludes to its  excessive  use by its owners  और  is a reference to the  addictiveness  of  क्रैक  cocaine  .
Use of  the   पद  CrackBerry  became  so widespread that  in  November 2006  वेबस्टर  's New  संसार  College Dictionary named `` crackberry '' the `` New  शब्द  of the Year  .   ''
an  example of a demand  वक्र  shifting .
The shift from D1 To D2 means an increase in demand with  consequences  for the other variables
in  economics ,  the  demand curve is  the  graph depicting the relationship between the price of a certain commodity and  the  amount of it that consumers are willing and  समर्थ  to purchase at that given price .
It is a graphic representation  of   a  demand  अनुसूची   .
The demand  वक्र  for all consumers  साथ   फ़ॉलो  from the demand  वक्र  of every individual consumer : the individual demands at  प्रत्येक  price are added together .
Demand curves  हैं  used  to   अनुमान  behaviors in competitive markets , and  हैं  often combined with supply curves to estimate  the   संतुलन  price ( the  दाम   at  which  विक्रेता   साथ  are willing to sell the same amount as buyers together are willing to buy , also known as market clearing price ) and the equilibrium  मात्रा  (  the  amount of that good or service  कि  will be produced  और   खरीदा  without surplus/excess supply or shortage/excess demand ) of that market .
In a monopolistic market  ,   the  demand curve facing the monopolist is  बस   the   मार्केट  demand curve .
historia
by  Nikolaos Gysis ( 1892 )
History (  इससे  Greek - historia , meaning `` inquiry , knowledge acquired  by   छानबीन  '' ) is an umbrella term  कि  relates to  पास्ट  events as well as  the  discovery , collection , organization  ,  and presentation of information about these events .
The term includes cosmic  ,  geologic , and organic history , but  is  often generically implied to mean human  इतिहास  .
विद्वानों  who write about  इतिहास   हैं  called historians .
इतिहास  can also refer to the academic discipline which uses a narrative  to  examine and analyse a sequence of past events ,  और  objectively determine  the   पैटर्न  of cause and  प्रभाव  that  determine  them  .
Historians sometimes debate the nature of  इतिहास   और  its usefulness by discussing the study of  the  discipline as  an  end in itself and as a  रास्ता  of providing  ``   परिप्रेक्ष्य  ''  on  the problems of  the  present .
Stories common to  a  particular culture  ,  but not supported by external sources  (   ऐसे  as the  किस्से  surrounding King Arthur )  हैं   प्रायः  classified  as  cultural heritage  or  legends , because they do not support  the  `` disinterested  छानबीन  '' required  of  the discipline of  इतिहास  .
Events occurring prior to written record are  माना  prehistory .
हिरोडोटस  , a 5th century B.C  .  Greek historian  is  considered within the Western tradition to be the  ``  father of history '' ,  और  , along with  उसके  contemporary Thucydides , helped  रूप  the foundations for the modern study of  इंसान  history .
Their  कार्य  continues to be read today and the divide  between  the culture-focused Herodotus  और  the  military-focused  Thucydides remains a point of contention or approach in modern historical  लिखने  .
in  the  पूर्वी  tradition , a state chronicle  the  Spring  और  Autumn Annals was known to be compiled from  as  early as 722 BCE although only 2nd century BCE  ग्रन्थ  survived .
Ancient influences have helped spawn variant  interpretations  of  the  nature of history which  have  evolved over the centuries and continue to change today .
The modern study of history is wide-ranging  ,  and includes the  पढ़ाई  of specific regions and  the  study of certain topical  or  thematical elements of historical investigation .
Often history is taught as part of primary and secondary education ,  और  the academic study of history is a major discipline in University studies .
Malcolm X ( ; May 19 ,  1925february  21 , 1965 )  ,  born  मैल्कम  Little  और  also known as El-Hajj Malik  el-shabazz  (  )  , was an African-American Muslim minister and human rights  activist   .
To his  admirers  , he  थी  a courageous advocate for the rights of blacks , a  man   जो  indicted white America in  the  harshest terms for its crimes against black Americans .
detractors  accused him of preaching racism , black supremacy ,  और  violence  .
He has  महरूम  called one of the  महानतम  and most influential African Americans in history .
Malcolm X  's  father  died—killed  by  श्वेत  supremacists , it was rumored—when he was young , and at least  एक  of his uncles was  lynched  .
When he was 13 , his  माँ  was placed in a mental hospital ,  और  he was placed in a series  of  foster homes .
In 1946  ,  at age 20 , he  गई  to prison for breaking and  प्रवेश   .
in  prison ,  मैल्कम  X became a  सदस्य  of the  स्वदेश  of Islam ; after his  पैरोल  in  1952  , he  जल्दी  rose to become one of its leaders .
For a  दर्जन  years , Malcolm X was the public face of  the  controversial group , but disillusionment with Nation of Islam head Elijah Muhammad led him  to  leave the Nation in March  1964   .
After a  काल  of  सफर  in Africa and the Middle East , he returned  to   the  United States , where  he   संस्थापित  Muslim Mosque  ,  Inc. and the Organization of Afro-American  एकता  .
In February 1965  ,  less than a year after  leaving  the Nation of Islam , he  थी  assassinated by three  सदस्यों  of the group .
Malcolm X 's expressed beliefs changed substantially over  समय  .
As a spokesman  लिये  the  स्वदेश  of Islam he  सिखाया  black supremacy  और  advocated separation of black and white Americans —in contrast to the civil rights movement 's emphasis on integration .
After  तोड़कर   साथ  the Nation of Islam in 1964—saying of his association with  it  , `` I did many things as a [ Black ] Muslim that I 'm sorry for now  .
I was a zombie then  ...  pointed  in  a certain direction  और   बताई  to march '' —and becoming a Sunni Muslim , he disavowed  जातिवाद  and expressed  willingness  to work  साथ  civil rights leaders , he  जारी  to emphasize Pan-Africanism , black self-determination ,  और  self-defense .
Henry  merritt  ``  हांक  ''  paulson  , Jr. ( born March 28 , 1946 ) is an American banker who served as the 74th  संयुक्त  States Secretary of the Treasury .
he  had served as the Chairman and  मुख्य  Executive Officer of Goldman Sachs  ,  and  is  now chairman of the Paulson Institute , which he founded  in  2011 to promote sustainable economic  विकास   और  a cleaner environment around  the  world , with an initial focus on the United States and  चीन  .
A virtual machine ( VM ) is  a  software implemented  abstraction   of  the underlying hardware , which  is  presented to the application layer of the  प्रणाली  .
Virtual  मशीने   may  be based on specifications  of  a  काल्पनिक   कंप्यूटर   or  emulate  the  computer architecture and functions  of  a real world computer .
Spiders ( order Araneae  )  are  air-breathing   arthropods  that have  आठ  legs and chelicerae with fangs that  इंजेक्ट  venom .
They are the  largest   अनुक्रम   of   arachnids  and rank seventh  in   कुल  species diversity among  सब  other  समूह  of organisms  .
Spiders are found worldwide  on   प्रत्येक  continent except for Antarctica  ,  and  have  become  स्थापित  in nearly every habitat with the exception of air and sea colonization .
As of 2008 , at least  43,678  spider  प्रजाति   ,  and 109 families have been  अंकित  by taxonomists ; however , there has been confusion within the  वैज्ञानिक  community as to how all these  परिवारों  should be classified  ,  as evidenced by the over 20 different classifications that have been  प्रस्तावित  since 1900 .
Anatomically , spiders differ from other arthropods  in  that the usual body segments  हैं  fused into two  tagmata  , the cephalothorax and abdomen ,  और  joined  by  a  छोटी  , cylindrical  pedicel  .
Unlike insects , spiders do not have antennae .
in  all except the most  आदिम   समूह  , the Mesothelae ,  मकड़ियों  have the most centralized nervous systems  of  all arthropods , as all their ganglia are  fused  into one mass in the cephalothorax .
Unlike most arthropods , spiders  have  no extensor muscles in their limbs and instead  extend  them by hydraulic  दबाव  .
उनके  abdomens bear appendages that have been  परिवर्धित   into   spinnerets   कि  extrude silk  इससे  up to six types of  रेशा   ग्रंथियों   भीतर  their abdomen .
Spider  webs   vary   widely  in size , shape and the amount  of  sticky thread used .
It now  appears  that the spiral orb web  may  be one  of   the   earliest  forms , and  मकड़ियों  that produce tangled cobwebs are more  abundant  and diverse  than   orb-web  spiders .
Spider-like  arachnids  with silk-producing spigots appeared in the Devonian period about , but  ये  animals apparently lacked spinnerets  .
True  मकड़ियों  have been  मिला  in  carboniferous  rocks  इससे  , and are  बहुत   समान  to the most primitive  surviving  order , the Mesothelae  .
The main groups  of  modern  मकड़ियों  , Mygalomorphae and Araneomorphae , first appeared in the Triassic  काल  , before .
a  herbivorous species , Bagheera kiplingi ,  थी   वर्णित  in 2008 , but  सब  other  ज्ञात   प्रजाति  are  परभक्षी   ,  mostly  preying   on  insects and on other spiders , although a few large species also  लो  birds and lizards .
Spiders use a wide range of strategies  to  capture prey  :   trapping  it in  स्टिकी  webs , lassoing  it  with sticky bolas  ,  mimicking the prey to avoid detection  ,  or running it  bas  .
Most detect prey mainly by sensing vibrations , but the active hunters have acute  दृष्टि  , and hunters  of  the  genus  Portia  दिखाएँ  signs of intelligence in their choice  of  tactics and  क्षमता   to  develop  नई  ones .
Spiders  '  guts  हैं   too  narrow to take  solids   ,  and they liquidize their food  by  flooding it with digestive enzymes  और   पीस  it with  the  bases of their pedipalps , as  वे   do  not  have   सच्चा   जबड़े  .
Male spiders identify  themselves  by a variety of complex courtship  संस्कार  to avoid being eaten by  the  females  .
Males  of  most species survive a few matings , limited  मुख्यतः  by their short  जीवन  spans .
महिलाओं  weave silk egg-cases  ,   प्रत्येक   of  which  may  contain hundreds of  अंडे  .
Females of many species care for their young , for example by carrying them around or by sharing food with  उन्हें  .
A  अल्पसंख्यक  of species are social  ,  building  सांप्रदायिक  webs that  may  house  anywhere  from a few  to  50,000  individuals  .
Social behavior  सीमाएँ  from precarious toleration , as in  the  widow spiders ,  to  co-operative hunting and food-sharing .
Although  सबसे  spiders live for at most two years  ,  tarantulas and  अन्य  mygalomorph spiders  can  live up to  25  years in  captivity  .
While the  venom  of a few species is dangerous to humans , scientists are now  researching  the use of spider venom in medicine and as non-polluting pesticides .
Spider silk provides a combination of lightness , strength and  लोच   कि  is superior to that of  सिंथेटिक  materials  ,   और   मकड़ी  silk genes have been inserted into  स्तनधारियों  and plants  to   देखिए   if   ये  can be  प्रयुक्त  as silk factories  .
As a result of their wide range of  व्यवहार  , spiders have become common symbols in art and mythology symbolizing various combinations of  सब्र  , cruelty and creative powers  .
Donna Marie Pinciotti  (  Born February 13 , 1960 )  is  a fictional character and one  of   the  two female leads in the Fox sitcom That '70s Show ,  appearing  in all eight seasons .
portrayed   by  Laura Prepon , Donna is the love  ब्याज  to  eric  Forman .

Median US  household  income , 2001-2011
Household income  is  a  माप   commonly  used by the United States government and private institutions .
Each household is measured by  the  income of every  निवासी  over the age  of  15  .
Income includes wages and salaries , unemployment insurance , disability  भुगतान  , child support payments received  ,  regular rental receipts , as well  as  any personal  कारोबार  , investment , or other kinds  of  income  प्राप्त  routinely .
जबकि  inflation-adjusted ( `` real '' )  household  income had  महरूम  increasing almost every year  इससे  1945 to  1999  ,  it   रै  since been  चपटा  and even decreased recently .
U.S. median household income fell from $ 51,144 in 2010 to $ 50,502  in   2011  .
Extreme poverty in the United States  ,   अर्थ  households  जीना  on less than $  2  per day before government benefits  ,  doubled  इससे  1996 to 1.5  लाख  households in 2011 , including 2.8 million children  .
The residents of the household do not have to be related  to  the  सिर  of the household for their earnings to  be  considered part of the household 's income .
As households tend to  share  a similar  आर्थिक  context , the use of household income remains  among  the most  widely  accepted measures of income .
That  the  size  of  a household is not commonly taken  into  account in such  उपायों  may distort any analysis of fluctuations within or among the household income categories , and may  रेंडर   सीधा  comparisons between  quintiles  difficult or even  नामुमकिन  .
A registered agent , also known as a resident  एजेंट  or statutory agent , in United States business law , is a business or individual designated to receive service of process ( SOP )  जब  a business entity is  a  party in a legal action such as  a  lawsuit or summons  .
The registered agent 's address may also be where the  राज्य  will send the paperwork for the yearly  नवीकरण   of  the business  एंटिटी  's charter .
The  पंजीकृत  agent  लिये  a  कारोबार  entity may be an individual member of the  कम्पनी  ,  or  ( more often  )  a third party , such as the organization 's  वकील  or  a  service company  .
Failure to  properly  maintain a registered agent can  affect  a company negatively .

`` Life , Liberty , and the pursuit of Happiness '' is a  well-known  phrase in the United States Declaration of Independence  .
The phrase is meant  to  exemplify the `` unalienable rights '' with which all human beings are endowed by their creator for their protection of  जिससे  they  संस्थान  governments .
तलवारबाजी   ,  is  typically   विभाजित  into Olympic fencing ,  शास्त्रीय  fencing and historical  तलवारबाजी  , .
The  खेल  of  तलवारबाजी  ( commonly called  ओलम्पिक  fencing or competitive fencing ) is divided into three weapon categories : foil , sabre and épée  .
Classical fencing  उपयोग  the same three weapons , but  approaches  fencing as a martial art .
प्रतिस्पर्धी  Fencing is one  of  five  खेल  which has  महरूम  featured at every one of the modern  ओलम्पिक  Games , the other four being Athletics , Cycling , Swimming  ,  and Gymnastics .
The quadriceps femoris ( Latin for `` four-headed muscle of the femur ``  )  , also called  बस  the quadriceps ,  quadriceps  extensor , quads , is a large  मांसपेशी  group that includes the four  प्रचलित  muscles on the front of the thigh .
It is  the  great extensor muscle of the knee , forming a large  मांसल  mass which covers the front and sides of the femur .
The proper Latin plural form of the adjective quadriceps would be quadricipites .
In modern English usage  ,  quadriceps is used  in  both singular and plural .
The singular form quadricep , produced by hypercorrection , is frequently used .
RMS  टाइटैनिक   थी  a British passenger liner that sank  in  the North Atlantic Ocean on 15 April  1912  after  colliding  with  an   हिमशैल   दौरान  her maiden voyage from Southampton  ,  UK to  नई  York City , US .
The sinking of Titanic caused the deaths of  1,502  people in one of the deadliest peacetime maritime disasters in modern history .
The RMS Titanic was the largest ship afloat at the time of her maiden voyage  .
वो   थी  the  दूसरी  of three Olympic  क्लास  ocean liners operated by the White Star Line , and she  थी  built by the Harland and Wolff  डॉकयार्ड   in  Belfast with Thomas Andrews , who perished with the ship , as her naval architect .
On her  maiden  voyage , she carried  2,224  passengers and crew .
अंतर्गत  the command of  एडवर्ड   स्मिथ  ,  उसके  passengers included some of the wealthiest people in the  संसार  ,  as  well as hundreds of emigrants from Great Britain  और  Ireland , Scandinavia and elsewhere throughout Europe seeking a new life in North America .
The ship was designed  to  be the last word in comfort and luxury , with an on-board gymnasium ,  तैराकी  pool , libraries , high-class restaurants and opulent cabins .
She also  था   a  powerful  बेतार  telegraph  provided  for the convenience of  यात्री  as  खूब  as for operational  उपयोग  .
Though she had advanced safety features such as watertight compartments and remotely  activated  watertight doors , she lacked enough lifeboats to accommodate all of those aboard .
Because of outdated  मेरीटाइम  safety regulations , she carried only  पर्याप्त  lifeboats for 1,178 people—slightly more than half of  the   क्रमांक  travelling on the maiden voyage , and one-third her total  यात्री  and crew  क्षमता  .
After leaving Southampton on  10   अप्रैल  1912 , Titanic called at Cherbourg in France and Queenstown ( now Cobh ) in  आयरलैंड   पहले  heading westwards towards New  यॉर्क  .
On 14 April  1912   ,  four  दिनों  into the crossing and about 375 miles (  600  km )  दक्षिण  of Newfoundland ,  वो  hit an iceberg at 11:40 pm ship 's  समय  .
The glancing collision caused  titanics  hull plates to buckle inwards  साथ  her starboard side  और  opened five of her  सोलह  watertight compartments to the sea ; the ship gradually filled with water .
meanwhile  , passengers and some crew members were evacuated  in  lifeboats ,  अनेक  of which were launched only partly loaded .
a  disproportionate number of men  यहूद  left aboard because of a `` women and children first  ``  protocol followed by some of the officers  लदान  the lifeboats  .
By 2:20 AM , she broke apart and foundered , with well over  एक  thousand people still  सवार  .
बस  under two hours after the Titanic foundered ,  the  Cunard liner RMS Carpathia arrived on the  झाँकी  of the sinking  ,  where she brought aboard an estimated 705 survivors  .
the  disaster  थी   greeted  with  विश्वव्यापी  shock  और  outrage at the huge loss  of  life  और  the regulatory  और  operational failures that had led to it .
Public inquiries in Britain and the United  राज्य  led to major improvements  in  maritime safety  .
One of their most  महत्वपूर्ण  legacies was the establishment in 1914  of  the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Convention for the Safety of Life at Sea  (  SOLAS )  ,  which still  governs  maritime safety  आज  .
Additionally , several new wireless  regulations  were passed around the world in an effort to learn  इससे  the  अनेक   missteps  in wireless  संचार  --  -which  could  have  saved many more passengers .
Many of the  survivors   खोया  all of their money and possessions and  यहूद  left destitute  ;  many families ,  विशेषकर  those  of  crew members from  southampton   ,  lost their primary bread-winners  .
They were helped by an outpouring of public sympathy  और  charitable donations  .
Some of the male survivors were accused of cowardice for leaving the ship while people were  स्टिल  on  फलक  ; the White Star Line 's chairman , J. Bruce Ismay , faced social ostracism for the rest of his  जीवन  .
The wreck of the  टाइटैनिक  remains  on  the  समुद्रतल  , split in two and gradually disintegrating at a depth of  .
Since its discovery in 1985 ,  हज़ारों  of artefacts have  महरूम  recovered and  put  on  प्रदर्शक  at museums  around   the  world .
Titanic  रै   become  one of the  सबसे  famous ships in history  ,   उसके  memory kept alive by numerous  किताबे  ,  लोक  songs , films , exhibits , and  memorials  .
The  इंसान  leg is the  संपूर्ण  lower extremity or limb of the human body , including the  पैर  , thigh and even the hip or  gluteal  region ;  however  ,  the  precise definition in  इंसान  anatomy refers only to the section  of   the  lower limb extending  इससे  the  घुटना  to  the   टखने   .
Legs are used for  खड़ा  ,  चलना  , jumping  ,  running ,  kicking  , and similar  क्रियाएँ  , and constitute a significant  portion  of a person  's  mass .
This article is about the demographic features of  the  population of  तुर्कों  , including population density , ethnicity , education level , health of the populace ,  आर्थिक  status , religious affiliations  और   अन्य  aspects of the population  .
As of 2010 , the population of Turkey is  अनुमानित  to  be  73.7 million  साथ  a growth rate of 1.21 %  प्रति  annum ( 2009 figure ) .
the  population is relatively young with  26.6  % falling in the  0-14  age bracket .
According to the OECD/World Bank population statistics in  तुर्कों  the population  विकास  from 1990 to 2008 was 16 million or 29  %  .

A full-size car  is  a  विपणन   पद  used in North America for an automobile larger  than  a mid-size car .
in  the United States ,  the   epa  uses the term `` large car  ''   to   denote   full-size  cars .
Joel Grey ( born April  11  , 1932 ) is an American stage and  स्क्रीन  actor ,  सिंगर  , and dancer , known for  उसके  role  as  the  निपुण  of Ceremonies in both  the  stage and film adaptation of  the  Kander & Ebb musical Cabaret  .
He has won the  अकादमी  Award ,  टोनी  Award and Golden Globe  पुरस्कार  .

in 1973 , the Wizard in the  musical  Wicked .

James Madison , Jr. ( March  16  , 1751 ( O.S  .  March 5 ) – June 28  ,   1836  ) was  an  American statesman and political theorist , the fourth President of  the  United States (  1809–1817  ) .
He is hailed as the “Father  of  the Constitution” for being  इंस्ट्रूमेंटल  in  the  drafting  of  the  संयुक्त   राज्य  Constitution and  as  the key  चैंपियन   और  author of the United States Bill  of  Rights .
He served as a politician much of his adult life .
After  the   संविधान  had  महरूम  drafted  ,   मैडिसन  became one of the leaders in the movement to ratify it .
His collaboration with Alexander Hamilton and  जॉन   jay  produced the  federalist  Papers (  1788   )  .
Circulated  तभी  in New York at the time , they would later be considered  among  the  सबसे  important  polemics   in   support  of the Constitution .
He was also a delegate  to  the Virginia  संवैधानिक  ratifying convention  ,  and  थी  instrumental to the successful ratification effort  in  Virginia .
Like most of his contemporaries , Madison  बदला  his political views during  उसके   जीवन   .
During the drafting and ratification  of  the constitution , he favored a strong national government , though later he  grew   to   एहसान  stronger state  सरकारें  ,  पहले  settling between the  दो   extremes  late in his life .
In 1789 , Madison became a leader in the new House of Representatives ,  drafting  many  मौलिक  laws  .
He is notable for  drafting  the first ten  amendments  to the Constitution , and thus is known as the `` Father of  the  Bill of  अधिकारों  `` .
मैडिसन  worked closely with President George Washington to organize  the  new federal government .
तोड़कर  with Hamilton and what became the Federalist Party in  1791   ,   मैडिसन   और  Thomas Jefferson  व्यवस्थित   कया  they called the Republican Party ( later called by historians the Democratic-Republican  पार्टी  )
As Jefferson’s Secretary of State ( 1801–1809 ) , Madison supervised the Louisiana Purchase , which doubled  the  nation’s size .
After his election to  the  presidency ,  he   presided  over renewed prosperity for  अनेक  years .
As president  (  1809–17 ) , after the failure of diplomatic protests and a trade embargo against  ग्रेट  Britain , he  led   the  nation into the  युद्ध  of 1812 .
He was responding to British encroachments on American honor  और   अधिकारों  ;  in  addition , he wanted to end the influence of the British among their Indian allies , whose  प्रतिरोध   अवरोधित   संयुक्त   राज्य  settlement in the Midwest around  the  Great Lakes .
Madison found the war  to  be an administrative  दुःस्वप्न  ,  as  the United States  था  neither a strong army nor financial system ; as a result , he  afterward  supported a stronger national government and a  दमदार  military , as well as the national bank , which he had long  opposed  .
Like other Virginia  कूटनीतिज्ञों  in the slave society , he was  a   slaveholder  who inherited his  वृक्षारोपण  known as  montpelier  , and owned hundreds of  स्लेव  during his lifetime to cultivate tobacco and other  फसलों   .
Madison supported the  three-fifths  compromise that allowed three-fifths of the  enumerated  population of slaves  to  be counted  लिये  representation  .
`` Roman 's Revenge  ''  is a song performed by  अमरीकी   rapper  Nicki Minaj from her debut  स्टुडियो  album Pink Friday .
It was written  by  Minaj and rapper Eminem , who is also featured  in  the song , and was produced by Swizz Beatz .
It  थी  released exclusively on  अक्तूबर   30  , 2010 through  the  US iTunes  स्टोर   ,  as a promotional release  preceding   the  album 's  रिलीज  .
The song initiated a  feud  between Lil ' Kim and Minaj ,  जहाँ  many people felt  the   सोंग   थी  directed  at   लील  ' Kim and regarded around her feelings  towards  Minaj 's rise to  कीर्ति   .
The  सोंग  references Minaj 's alter-ego  ,  Roman Zolanski , and Eminem 's alter-ego ,  पतला  Shady  .
The song garnered very positive reviews from critics  ,  most of which  praised  the  सोंग  as a  stand-out  track on the album .
An official remix featuring  minaj   's  mentor ,  लील  Wayne ,  थी  released to the US iTunes Store on January 19  ,  2011 .
The instrumental was  प्रयुक्त   in  the  सोंग  'Firing  स्क्वाड  ' by Horseshoe G.A.N.G .
हाइड्रोलिक  fluid being poured  .
Hydraulic fluids , also called hydraulic liquids  ,  are the medium by  जिससे  power is transferred in hydraulic machinery .
Common hydraulic  fluids  are based on mineral  आयल  or water .
Examples  of  equipment  कि  might use hydraulic fluids include excavators and backhoes ,  हाइड्रोलिक  brakes , power  परिचालन  systems , transmissions , garbage  ट्रक  , aircraft flight control systems , lifts  ,  and industrial machinery .
Hydraulic systems like the ones mentioned above  होगा  work most  efficiently   if   the  hydraulic fluid  प्रयुक्त  has no compressibility
Mahindra Tractor
Mahindra Tractors , the farm equipment division  of  Mahindra  &   महिंद्रा  , builds and sources tractors  कि   हैं  sold  विश्वव्यापी  across six continents .
Mahindra is also  among  the top three tractor manufacturers in the  संसार  .
Mahindra has a  विशाल  consumer base in India , China and America and  a  growing base  in   ऑस्ट्रेलिया  .
The  कम्पनी   builds  more tractors in India  than  any other manufacturer , and has the capacity to build  150,000  tractors  a  year  .
In  1963  , M & M formed a joint venture with International Harvester to manufacture  tractors  carrying the Mahindra  nameplate  for the Indian market .
हथियारबंद  with  अभियान्त्रिकी   ,  tooling and manufacturing know-how gained from this  संबंध   ,   m  &  m  developed its  पहला  tractor , the B-275 .
Mahindra Tractors with  बिक्री  of nearly 85,000 units annually is one of the largest  ट्रैक्टर   कंपनियाँ  in  the   संसार  , and is number one in sales in India  -   the  largest tractor  मार्केट  in the world .
To expand into the growing tractor market in China  ,  Mahindra acquired  बहुमत  stake in Jiangling .
To raise awareness about Mahindra  in  the US  ,  Mahindra  यूएसए  announced its new sponsorship in the NASCAR Nationwide Series with  r3  Motorsports , which is participating  साथ  a # 23 Mahindra Tractors Chevrolet .
The  car  will  be  driven by Robert Richardson , Jr. Mahindra USA , Inc. announced a 17-race primary and 18-race associate sponsorship  लिये  the  2009  NASCAR  देशभर   श्रेणी  .
With this sponsorship ,  महिंद्रा  was  the  first Indian  कम्पनी  to sponsor  a  car  in  NASCAR .
in  2008  ,  Mahindra was a sponsor of the  मैकडोनाल्ड  Motorsports team which  भागा  the # 81  car  in the NASCAR  देशभर  Series .
The POWER6  is  a microprocessor developed by  ibm  that  implemented  the Power ISA  v.2.03  .
जब  it  became   उपलब्धियाँ  in systems in  2007  ,  it   succeeded   the  POWER5+ as IBM 's flagship  शक्ति   माइक्रोप्रोसेसर  .
It  is  part  of  the eCLipz project ,  कहा   to  have a goal of  converging  IBM 's server hardware where  व्यावहारिक  (  hence  ``  ipz  '' in the  एक्रोनिम  : iSeries , pSeries  ,  and  zseries   )   .
the  American middle class is a social class in  the  United States .
While the concept is typically ambiguous  in  popular  राय   और  common language use , contemporary social scientists have put forward several , more or less congruent , theories on  the  American  मध्य   क्लास  .
Depending on class model  प्रयुक्त  ,  the  middle class may constitute anywhere from 25 %  to   66  % of households .
One of the  पहला   प्रमुख  studies of the middle class in America was  श्वेत  Collar  :  The American Middle Classes , published in 1951 by sociologist C. Wright Wright_Mills Mills Wright_Mills .
Later  sociologists  such as Dennis Gilbert  of  Hamilton  कॉलेज  commonly  divide  the middle class into two sub-groups .
Constituting roughly 15 % to 20  %  of  households  is the upper  or  professional  मध्य   क्लास  consisting  of  highly educated ,  वेतनभोगी  professionals  और  managers .
Constituting  roughly   एक  third of households  is  the lower middle  क्लास  consisting mostly of semi-professionals , skilled craftsmen  और   lower-level  management .
middle-class   व्यक्तियों  commonly have a comfortable standard  of  living  ,   significant  economic security ,  considerable  work autonomy and  rely  on their expertise to sustain themselves .
Members of the middle  क्लास  belong to diverse groups which overlap with each other .
Overall , middle-class persons  ,  especially upper-middle-class individuals , are characterized by conceptualizing , creating and consulting  .
Thus , college education  is   एक  of the main indicators of middle-class status .
largely  attributed to the nature of middle-class occupations ,  मध्य  class values tend to emphasize independence , adherence to intrinsic standards , valuing innovation  और  respecting  non-conformity   .
Politically more  क्रियाशील  than  अन्य  demographics , college  शिक्षित  middle class professionals are split  between  the two  प्रमुख  parties .
आय   varies   considerably  from near the national median to well in excess of $ 100,000 .
Household income figures , however , do not always  प्रतिबिंबित  class  औकात   और  standard of living  ,  as they are  largely  influenced  by  the number of income  earners   और  fail to recognize household size .
It is therefore  संभावित  for  a  large  ,  dual-earner  ,   निम्नतर   मध्य   क्लास  household to out-earn a small  ,  one-earner , upper middle class household .
the  middle  वर्ग  are very influential , as they  encompass  the majority of voters , writers , teachers  ,  journalists , and  सम्पादक  .
Most  societal  trends in  the   us  originate within the middle classes .
The following is a list of Saturday  रात्रि   सजीव  cast members , past and present  .
The cast members of Saturday Night  सजीव  were  originally   referred  to as the  ``  Not Ready For Prime Time Players ''  .
The  असली  cast  (  l to r  )  : Laraine Newman , John  belushi  , Jane Curtin , Gilda  radner  , Dan  aykroyd  , Garrett Morris  ,  and Chevy Chase
Ruins  इससे   the   1906  San  फ्रांसिस्को  earthquake  ,   remembered  as one of  the  worst natural disasters in United  राज्य  history
a  disaster is a  प्राकृतिक  or man-made ( or technological ) hazard resulting in an  इवेंट  of substantial extent causing significant physical damage or destruction ,  घाटा  of life , or drastic change  to  the environment .
A disaster can  be  ostensively defined as any  tragic   इवेंट  stemming from events such as earthquakes ,  floods  , catastrophic accidents ,  फ़ायर  ,  or  explosions .
It is a phenomenon that can cause damage to  जीवन   और  property  और   नष्ट   the  economic , social and cultural life of people .
In contemporary academia , disasters are seen as the consequence  of  inappropriately managed  रिस्क  .
ये  risks  हैं   the  product of a combination of both hazard/s and vulnerability .
जोखिमों  that strike in areas with low vulnerability will never become disasters , as is the case in uninhabited regions .
विकासशील  countries suffer the greatest costs when a disaster hits – more than 95 percent of all  मौतों  caused by disasters occur  in   विकासशील  countries  ,   और   नुकसान  due to natural disasters are  20   टाइम्स  greater  (  as a  प्रतिशत  of GDP )  in  developing  देशों   than  in industrialized countries .
In computing , booting (  भी  known as booting  up  ) is the initial set of operations that a  कंप्यूटर  system  performs  when electrical power to the CPU is switched on .
the  process begins when a  कंप्यूटर  is  turned   on  for the first  समय   or   is  re-energized after being turned off , and ends  जब   the  computer  is   तैयार  to perform its normal operations .
On  आधुनिक  general purpose  कंप्यूटर   ,   इस  can take  tens  of  सेकेंड  and typically involves performing a power-on self-test , locating and initializing peripheral devices , and  तब   ढूंढना  ,  लदान   और  starting an operating system  .
Many computer systems also allow these operations to  be  initiated by a software command without cycling  शक्ति  , in  कया   is  known  as  a  नरम  reboot ,  हालांकि   कुछ  of  the   आरंभिक  operations might be  छोड़ा  on a soft reboot .
A boot loader  is  a computer program  कि  loads the main operating system or  runtime   पर्यावरण  for the computer after  पूर्णता   of  the  self-tests  .
The computer term boot is short  लिये  bootstrap or  बूटस्ट्रैप  load and derives from the  phrase  to pull oneself up by  एक  's bootstraps  .
The  उपयोग  calls attention to  the  requirement that , if most software is loaded onto a computer by other  तन्त्र  already running on the computer ,  कुछ  mechanism  जरूर  exist to load initial software onto the computer  .
Early  कंप्यूटर  used a variety of  ad-hoc  methods to get a small program into memory to solve this problem .
The invention of  एकीकृत  circuit  read-only  memory ( ROM ) of various types solved this paradox by  allowing  computers to be shipped with a start  up  program  कि  could not  be   erased  .
Growth in the capacity of ROM  रै  allowed  कभी  more elaborate  प्रारंभ  up procedures to be implemented .
On  सामान्य  purpose  कंप्यूटर   ,  the boot process begins  साथ  the execution of  an  initial program stored in  बूट  ROMs  or   पढ़ा  in another  फ़ैशन  .
In some older  कंप्यूटर  , the initial program might have been the application to  चलाएं  , if no  ऑपरेटिंग  system was used , or the  ऑपरेटिंग  system .
In other computers , the initial program is a boot  लोडर  that may then load into random-access memory ( RAM ) , from nonvolatile secondary storage ( such as a hard disk drive ) or , in some older computers , from a  मीडियम  such as punched cards , punched tape , or magnetic  टेप  in older computers , the binary code of an operating  प्रणाली  or runtime  पर्यावरण  and then execute it .
if  the boot loader is limited  in  its size and capabilities  ,  it may , instead , load a larger and more capable secondary  बूट  loader , which would  तब  load the operating system  or   runtime  environment .
Some embedded  प्रणालियों   do  not require  a  noticeable boot sequence to begin functioning and when  turned  on  may  simply run  operational  programs that are stored in ROM .
Firebird is an open source SQL relational database management system that runs on Linux , Windows , and a variety of Unix .
The database forked from Borland 's open  सोर्स  edition of InterBase in 2000 , but since Firebird 1.5 the  कोड   रै  been largely rewritten .
Outsourcing is the contracting out of an internal business process to a third-party  संगठन  .
The practice of contracting a business process out to  a  third party rather than  स्टॉफ  it internally is common in the modern economy .
The term `` outsourcing '' became popular in the  संयुक्त   राज्य  near the turn of the 21st century .
Outsourcing  sometimes  involves transferring employees and assets  इससे   एक  firm to another , but not always .
the  definition of outsourcing includes  दोनो  foreign and domestic contracting , and  sometimes   शामिल  offshoring  ,  which means  relocating  a  कारोबार  function to another  देश   .
वित्तीय  savings from lower international labor  दरों  is a big motivation for outsourcing/offshoring .
The opposite of outsourcing is called insourcing , which  entails  bringing processes handled by third-party  firms  in-house , and is sometimes accomplished  via   लंबवत  integration .
However , a business can provide a  अनुबंध  service  to  another business  बगैर   necessarily  insourcing that business process .
इंसान   immunodeficiency   वायरस  (  hiv  ) is a lentivirus (  धीरे  replicating retrovirus ) that causes  acquired  immunodeficiency syndrome ( AIDS  )  , a  कंडीशन  in humans in which progressive failure  of   the   प्रतिरक्षा  system allows life-threatening opportunistic  infections  and cancers to thrive .
संक्रमण  with HIV occurs by  the  transfer of  रक्त  , semen , vaginal  द्रव  , pre-ejaculate , or breast milk .
Within these bodily fluids , HIV is present as both free virus particles and virus  भीतर   संक्रमित  immune cells .
HIV  infects   vital  cells in the  इंसान  immune system such as helper  t  cells ( specifically CD4 + T  कोशिकाएं   )  , macrophages , and dendritic  कोशिकाएं  .
HIV infection  लीड  to low levels of CD4+ T cells through a number of mechanisms including  :  apoptosis of uninfected bystander cells  ,  direct viral killing of infected cells , and  हत्या  of  संक्रमित  CD4+ T  कोशिकाएं  by CD8 cytotoxic lymphocytes that  recognize  infected  कोशिकाएं  .
When CD4+ T cell numbers decline below a  नाजुक  level , cell-mediated immunity is lost ,  और   the  body becomes progressively more susceptible to opportunistic  infections  .
The firepole in a fire station in Toronto
A fireman 's pole  (  also  पुकारा  a sliding  ध्रुव  or firepole ) is a wooden pole or a metal tube or pipe installed between  floors   in  fire stations , allowing firefighters responding to  an  alarm to  जल्दी  descend  to  the ground  मंजिल   तेज़  than by using a  मानक  staircase .
The device was invented in the  1870s  by David Kenyon  ,  in Chicago , Illinois , although  it  is often incorrectly  credited   to  the Boston Fire Department .
Mary Poppins is the title character  of  a series of children  's  books written  by   P.  L. Travers .
Throughout the Mary  poppins  series , which lasted  इससे  1934 to 1988  ,  Mary  shepard  was the  इलस्ट्रेटर  and  acted  as a second author  .
The books centre  on  a magical English nanny , Mary Poppins .
She is blown by the  ईस्ट  wind to  क्रमांक  Seventeen  चेरी  Tree Lane , London , and into the Banks ' household to care for their children  .
Encounters with  चिमनी  sweeps , shopkeepers and various  adventures  follow until  मरियम  Poppins abruptly leaves , i.e. , `` pops-out '' .
The adventures take place over a total of eight books .
however  , only  the  first three books feature  मरियम  Poppins  arriving  and leaving .
The later five books recount previously  unrecorded   adventures  from her original three  विज़िट   .
As P.  L.  Travers explains  in  her introduction  to   मरियम   poppins   in  the Park , `` She can not forever arrive  और  depart .  ''
the  books were adapted  in  1964  into   a  musical  डिज़्नी   फिल्मी  starring Julie Andrews and Dick Van Dyke .
In 2004 , Disney Theatrical produced a stage musical adaptation in the West End theatre .
the  stage musical was transferred to Broadway  in  2006 where it  भागा  until its closing on March 3 , 2013 .
It has been highly successful , as was the 1964 film  .
The Last Song is a  2010  American coming of age teen romantic drama film developed alongside  निकोलस  Sparks  '  novel  by  the same name  .
The film was directed  by  Julie Anne  रॉबिन्सन  in her  विशेषता  film directorial  डेब्यू   और  co-written  by   स्पार्क्स   और  Jeff Van  wie  .
the  Last Song  सितारों   miley  Cyrus , Liam Hemsworth ,  और   ग्रेग  Kinnear  और  follows  a  troubled teenager as she reconnects  साथ  her estranged  पिता  and falls in love during a summer in a quiet Southern United States beach town .
The film is distributed  by  Touchstone Pictures .
स्पार्क्स  was  approached  to write both  the  film 's screenplay  और   the  novel .
Sparks completed the  पटकथा  in January 2009 , prior to the completion of the novel ,  बनाना  The Last  सोंग  his  पहला  script  to  be optioned for film .
The setting , originally in North  कैरोलिना  like the novel , moved to Georgia  बाद  the states had campaigned for months to host production .
Upon  शुरूआत  production  in   tybee  Island , Georgia and nearby Savannah  ,  The Last Song  became  the  पहला  movie to be  दोनो  shot and  नियत  in Tybee Island .
Filming  lasted  from June 15 to  अगस्त  18 , 2009 with  much  of it occurring  on  the island 's beach and pier .
The Last Song was originally  अनुसूचित  for  चौड़ी  release on  जनवरी  8 , 2010 , but  थी  postponed to  कूच  31  ,  2010 .
Written  simlish
Simlish  is  a fictional language featured in EA Games ' Sim series of games .
it  debuted in  simcopter  ,  और  has  महरूम  especially prominent in The Sims , The  सीम  2 and The Sims  3   .
the   सीम  development team created  the  unique Simlish language by  experimenting  with fractured Ukrainian , French , Latin , Finnish ,  अंग्रेज़ी  , Fijian , Cebuano , and Tagalog .
Simlish can also be  सुना  in SimCity 4  ,   simcity  Societies and SimCity 2013 , but far less frequently .
Civilized Creatures in Spore  can  also  be  taught to  बोलो   simlish  .
It is also featured to an extent in Firaxis Games  '  Sid Meier  's  SimGolf .
Designer Will Wright was conscious of the need for dialogue in the game , but thought  कि  using a real  भाषा  would  मेक  it sound  too   दोहराए  and would also be too costly  to  hire translators for world languages .
Initially , inspired by the Native  अमरीकी  code talkers of World War II , Sims creator Will  राइट  and language expert Marc Gimbel  सुझाया  experimenting with the Navajo language to create Simlish .
However ,  वे  ultimately  decided  that Simlish worked  बेहतरीन  as a ``  भाषा  '' made  up  of gibberish words  कि  could  n't   be  translated , so that its meaning  होता  be  बाएँ   खोलें  to the imagination  of  the player .
Wright later commented that  using   ``  nonsense language '' turned out to  be  the  सही  development choice , as people were capable of imagining it more realistically than a computer could simulate a real one  .
The actual sound of Simlish was created improvisationally by voice actors Stephen Kearin and Gerri  lawlor  .
An example of Ultrasonic  परीक्षण  ( UT )  on  blade roots of a V2500 IAE aircraft engine .
Step 1 :  the   ut  probe is placed on the  रूट  of  the  blades  to  be inspected with  the  help of  a  special borescope  औजार  ( video probe  )  .
Step 2 : Instrument settings are input .
Step 3 : The probe is scanned over the  ब्लेड   रूट  .
in   इस   मामला  , an indication  (  peak  in   the  data  )  through the  रेड  line ( or gate ) indicates  a  good blade ; an  indication  to the left of that range indicates a crack .
Principle of  अल्ट्रासोनिक  testing .
बाएँ   :   a  probe sends a sound wave  into  a test material .
There are two  indications  , one from the  आरंभिक  pulse  of  the  जांच   ,   और  the second  due  to the back wall echo .
RIGHT :  a   defect  creates a  तीसरा  indication and simultaneously reduces the amplitude of the back wall indication  .
The depth of the defect is determined by the ratio D/E
In  अल्ट्रासोनिक  testing ( UT ) , very short ultrasonic pulse-waves with  बीच  frequencies  ranging  from 0.1-15 MHz and occasionally  up  to  50  MHz are launched  into   सामग्री  to detect internal flaws  or  to characterize materials .
a  common example is ultrasonic  मोटाई   मापन  , which tests the thickness of the test object , for  उदाहरण  , to monitor pipework corrosion  .
Ultrasonic testing is often performed on steel and other metals  और   alloys  , though it can also  be  used on concrete  ,  wood and composites , albeit with less resolution .
It is a form of non-destructive testing used in  अनेक  industries including  aerospace  , automotive and other transportation sectors .
The  vas  deferens ( plural : vasa deferentia ) , also called ductus deferens ( Latin : `` carrying-away vessel '' ;  बहुवचन   :  ductus deferentes  )  , is part  of   the   पुरूष  anatomy  of  many vertebrates ; they  हस्तांतरण  sperm from the epididymis in anticipation  of  ejaculation .
Vascular ischemia of the toes with characteristic cyanosis .
in   आयुर्विज्ञान  ,  ischemia  , also spelled as ischaemia or ischæmia ,  (  ; from Greek language ισχαιμία , ischaimía ;  isch-  root denoting a restriction or  thinning  or to make or grow thin/lean  ,  haema blood  )  is  a  restriction in blood supply to tissues , causing a shortage of oxygen and glucose needed for cellular metabolism (  to  keep tissue  जिंदा   )  .
Ischemia is generally caused by problems with blood vessels  ,  with resultant damage to or dysfunction  of  tissue .
It  भी   अर्थात्  local anemia in  a  given part of a  देह  sometimes resulting from congestion ( such  as  vasoconstriction , thrombosis or embolism  )  .
Down syndrome ( DS ) or Down 's syndrome ,  भी  known as trisomy  21  , is a genetic disorder  caused   by  the presence of  सब  or part  of   a  third copy of  chromosome   21  .
Down syndrome  is  the most common chromosome abnormality  in   इंसानो  .
It is typically associated with  a   विलंब  in cognitive ability ( mental retardation , or  mr  ) and  शारीरिक  growth , and a particular  नियत  of  फेशियल   विशेषताएँ  .
the  average IQ of young  वयस्कों  with Down  सिंड्रोम  is around 50 , whereas young adults  बगैर  the condition typically have an IQ of 100 .
( MR has historically  महरूम   पारिभाषित  as  an   iq  below 70 . )
A large  proportion  of  individuals  with Down syndrome have a severe degree of intellectual disability .
Down syndrome  is  named after John Langdon Down , the British physician  जो  described the syndrome in  1866  .
The condition was clinically  वर्णित  earlier  by  Jean  etienne  Dominique Esquirol  in  1838 and Edouard Seguin in 1844 .
Down syndrome was identified as a chromosome 21 trisomy  by  Dr. Jérôme Lejeune in 1959 .
Down syndrome can be identified in  a  baby at  जनम  or before  जनम  by prenatal screening .
Pregnancies  साथ  this diagnosis are  प्रायः   terminated  .
The CDC estimates that  परिचय  one  of   प्रत्येक  691 babies born in the United States each  साल  is born with  bas   सिंड्रोम  .
Many children with Down syndrome are educated in regular  स्कूल   वर्ग   जबकि  others require specialised educational facilities .
Some children graduate from high  स्कूल  , and ,  in  the US , there  हैं  increasing opportunities for participating in post-secondary  शिक्षा  .
शिक्षा  and proper  परवाह   रै  been  दिखाया  to improve quality  of  life significantly .
Many adults with Down Syndrome are able to work  at  paid employment in the community  ,  while others require a more sheltered work environment  .
Hot flashes ( also  ज्ञात  as hot  flushes   ,  or night sweats if they happen at night ) are a symptom  जिससे  may have several  अन्य  causes , but  जिससे   is  often caused by the changing hormone levels  कि   हैं  characteristic  of   रजोनिवृत्ति  .
The Servicemen 's Readjustment Act of 1944 (  p.l  .  78-346  , 58  स्टेट   .  284m ) , known informally  as  the G.I .  विधेयक  , was a law that provided a range of  लाभ  for returning  संसार   युद्ध  II veterans ( commonly referred  to  as G.I.s ) .
लाभ  included low-cost mortgages , low-interest loans to  प्रारंभ  a business or farm , cash  भुगतान  of tuition and  जीना  expenses  to  attend college , high school or vocational education , as  खूब   as   एक  year of  बेरोजगारी  compensation  .
It was  उपलब्धियाँ  to every veteran who had been on active duty  दौरान  the war years for at least ninety days and had not been dishonorably discharged ;  कॉम्बैट  was not required .
By the end  of  the program in 1956  ,  roughly 2.2 million veterans had used the G.I . Bill education  लाभ  in order to  attend  colleges or universities , and an additional 6.6  लाख  used these benefits for some kind of training  कार्यक्रम  .
Since  the  original 1944 law  ,  the term has  आइये  to include other  दिग्गज  benefit  कार्यक्रम  created to assist veterans of subsequent wars as well  as  peacetime service  .
Historians and economists  consider  the G.I . Bill  a  major  राजनैतिक  success—especially in  कंट्रास्ट  to the treatments of World  युद्ध  I veterans—and a major  योगदान   to  America 's stock  of   इंसान   पूंजी  that sped  long-term  economic growth .
The Watergate  कांड  was a political scandal that occurred in the United States in the  1970s  as a result of the June 17 , 1972 break-in at the Democratic National Committee  मुख्यालय  at  the  Watergate  दफ्तर  complex  in  Washington ,  d.C.  , and the Nixon administration 's attempted  cover-up  of its involvement .
The scandal  आखिरकार  led to the  इस्तीफा   of  Richard Nixon ,  the  President of  the  United States ,  on  August  9  , 1974 — the only resignation  of  a U.S. President .
The scandal  भी   resulted   in  the indictment , trial , conviction  ,  and incarceration of forty-three persons  ,  dozens of whom were Nixon 's top  प्रशासन  officials .
The affair  began  with the arrest of five men for breaking and entering into the Democratic National Committee  (  DNC ) headquarters at  the   वाटरगेट  complex on June 17 , 1972  .
The Federal Bureau of Investigation ( FBI ) connected cash  मिला  on the burglars to a slush fund used by  the  Committee for the Re-Election of the President , the official organization of Nixon 's campaign  .
In  जुलाई   1973  , as evidence mounted against the president 's  स्टाफ  , including  गवाही  provided  by   पूर्व  staff members in an investigation conducted  by  the Senate Watergate Committee ,  it  was revealed that President Nixon  था  a tape-recording system in his offices  और  he had recorded many conversations .
Recordings  इससे  these  टेपों  implicated the president  ,   revealing  he had  attempted   to   कवर  up  the  questionable ( and  illegal  ) goings-on that had taken  प्लेस  during his administration , both before and after the  break-in  .
बाद  a  protracted  series of bitter  अदालत  battles ,  the  U.S. Supreme Court unanimously ruled that the president had  to   हाथ  over the tapes to government investigators ; he ultimately  complied  .
Facing near-certain impeachment in the House of Representatives and a strong possibility of  a  conviction in the Senate  ,  Nixon  resigned  the presidency on August 9 , 1974  .
His successor , Gerald Ford , then issued a  pardon   to   उसे  .
Elizabeth Imogene Webber  (  formerly  lansing  and  स्पेंसर  ) is a fictional character on the ABC  दिन  soap  ओपेरा  General  हॉस्पिटल  .
Elizabeth is the  पोती  of Dr. Steve Hardy ( John Beradino  )  , one of the originating core  वर्ण  of the series .
Rebecca  herbst  originated the character on August  1  , 1997 and has been  the  only contract actress to play the  भूमिका  .
Elizabeth is  भाग  of  दो  supercouple pairings , Lucky  स्पेंसर  and Elizabeth Webber  और  Jason Morgan and  एलिज़ाबेथ  Webber .
The  संयुक्त  States presidency of  रोनाल्ड  Reagan , also  ज्ञात  as the Reagan administration ,  थी   a   रिपब्लिकन  administration headed by  रोनाल्ड   reagan  from January  20  ,  1981  ,  to  January  20  , 1989 .
Domestically  ,  the administration favored reducing government programs and introduced the largest across-the-board tax cuts in  अमरीकी  history .
The economic  नीतियों  enacted in 1981 ,  ज्ञात  as `` Reaganomics  ``  , were an example of supply-side economics .
reagan  aimed to encourage entrepreneurship and limit the  विकास  of  सोशल   बिता   ,  as well as the reduction of  विनियमन  and inflation .
Economic growth saw a strong recovery  in  the 1980s  ,  helping Reagan  to  win a  भूस्खलन  re-election .
The national  कर्ज़  increased significantly , however .
Regarding foreign policy ,  the  administration was steadfastly anti-communist , calling the  सोवियत  Union  an  `` evil  साम्राज्य  `` and ending 1970s détente .
reagan  accelerated the  विशाल  buildup of the military started by  उसके  predecessor ,  सहित  an  आक्रमण  of  हरा  , the  पहला  major overseas action by  u.S.  troops since the  समाप्त  of the Vietnam War .
The `` Reagan  doctrine  `` controversially granted aid  to  paramilitary forces seeking to overthrow communist governments , particularly in war-torn Central America and Afghanistan .
Reagan also promoted new technologies such as missile  रक्षा  systems in order  to  confront the Soviets and  उनके   allies  .
In diplomacy ,  reagan   forged   a  strong alliance  साथ  UK  प्रधान  Minister Margaret Thatcher ,  और  he met  साथ  Soviet General Secretary Mikhail Gorbachev four times  ,  aiming to shrink the superpowers  '  nuclear arsenals .
Reagan 's presidency has been termed the `` Reagan Revolution ''  ,   or  the Age  of  Reagan  in  recognition of the political realignment  दोनो  within and beyond the U.S.  in  favor of his  ब्रांड  of conservatism and his faith in free  बाज़ार  .
The Reagan administration worked toward the collapse of Soviet  साम्यवादी   ,  and it did collapse just  as  he  बाएँ  office .
Victory in the  ठंडा  War led to a  unipolar  world with the U.S.  as  the world  's  sole superpower  .
While  the  damaging Iran-Contra affair engulfed  अनेक   reagan   aides  during  उसके  second term  ,  Reagan himself  बाएँ   दफ्तर  with a 63 percent approval  दरजा  , one  of  the higher approval ratings  of  departing presidents .
After years of unstinting praise  इससे  the right , and unrelenting criticism from  the  left , historian  दाउद  Henry finds that by  2009  a consensus had  उभरा  among scholars that  reagan  revived conservatism and turned the nation to the  सही   by  demonstrating  a  `` pragmatic conservatism ''  कि  promoted  विचारधारा  within the constraints imposed  by  the divided  राजनैतिक  system .
Furthermore , says  हेनरी  , the consensus  viewpoint  agrees that he revived faith  in  the presidency  और  American self-confidence , and  contributed   critically  to ending the Cold War  .
Crude death  रेट  by country ( 2006 ) .
Mortality rate is a measure of the  क्रमांक  of deaths (  in  general , or due to a specific cause ) in a population  .
scaled  to the size of that population , per unit of time .
Mortality  रेट  is  typically  expressed  in  units of deaths per 1000 individuals per  साल  ; thus , a mortality rate of 9.5 ( out of 1000 ) in a population of 1,000 would mean  9.5   मौतों  per year in that entire  जनसांख्यिकी  , or 0.95 % out of the  कुल  .
It is distinct from morbidity rate , which refers  to  the  क्रमांक  of individuals in poor health during a given time period ( the prevalence rate ) or the  क्रमांक  of  newly  appearing cases of the disease per unit  of  time ( incidence  रेट  ) .
the  term `` mortality  ``  is also sometimes inappropriately  प्रयुक्त  to  refer  to the  क्रमांक   of  deaths  among   a  set of diagnosed hospital cases for a disease or  चोट  , rather than for the general  जनसांख्यिकी  of a  देश  or ethnic  समूह  .
This  बीमारी  mortality statistic is more precisely referred to as `` case fatality rate `` ( CFR ) .
One  distinguishes:
The  crude  death  रेट  , the total number of deaths per year per 1000 people .
the  crude death rate for the whole world  is  about  8.37  per  1000  per year according to the current CIA  संसार  Factbook .
The perinatal mortality rate , the sum  of   neonatal   मौतों  and fetal deaths ( stillbirths ) per 1000 births  .
The maternal  मृत्यु  ratio , the number of  मातृ  deaths per 100,000 live births  in  same  समय  period  .
The maternal mortality rate , the number of  मातृ  deaths  प्रति  1,000 women of reproductive age in the  जनसांख्यिकी   (  generally defined as 15–44 years of age ) .
the  infant mortality rate  ,  the number of deaths of  children  less than 1 year old per  1000  live  births   .
The child mortality rate , the number of  मौतों  of children less than  5  years old per 1000  सजीव  births .
the  standardised mortality ratio ( SMR )  -  This represents a proportional comparison to the numbers of deaths that would have  महरूम  expected if the  जनसांख्यिकी  had been of a standard composition in  शर्तें   of  age , gender , etc .
The age-specific  मृत्यु  rate (  asmr  ) - This refers to the  कुल  number  of  deaths per year per 1000 people of a  दिए  age ( e.g  .  age 62  पिछला  birthday ) .
In  लिहाज़  to the or failure of medical treatment  or  procedures , one would also  distinguish:
the  early mortality rate , the total number of  मौतों  in the early stages of an ongoing treatment , or in the period  तत्काल  following an treatment .
The late mortality rate , the total number of  मौतों  in the late stages  of  an ongoing treatment  ,  or  a   significant  length of time after an acute treatment .
Note that the crude death rate as defined above and  लागू  to a whole population can give  a  misleading  छाप  .
The  crude  death  रेट  depends  on  the age  (  and  लिंग  ) specific  मृत्यु  rates and the age ( and gender ) distribution of the  जनसांख्यिकी  .
The number of deaths per 1000 people can be higher  लिये  developed nations  than  in less-developed countries , despite  जीवन  expectancy being higher in developed countries due to standards of  स्वास्थ्य  being better .
This happens because developed countries typically have a completely different population age distribution , with a  much  higher proportion  of  older people , due to both  निम्नतर  recent birth rates and lower mortality rates .
a  more complete picture of mortality is given  by  a  जीवन  table which shows the mortality rate separately for each age .
A life table is necessary to give a good estimate of life expectancy  .
an  otoacoustic emission  (  OAE ) is a sound which is generated  इससे  within the inner ear .
Having been predicted by Thomas Gold in 1948 , its existence was first demonstrated experimentally by  दाउद  Kemp in 1978  और  otoacoustic emissions have since been shown to arise by a number of different cellular mechanisms within the inner  कान  .
Studies have shown that OAEs disappear after the  भीतरी  ear has been damaged  ,   so  OAEs  हैं   प्रायः  used in the laboratory and the clinic as a  माप  of inner ear  स्वास्थ्य   .
Broadly speaking , there  हैं  two types of otoacoustic  emissions  : spontaneous otoacoustic emissions ( SOAEs ) , which can occur without external stimulation , and evoked otoacoustic emissions  (  EOAEs ) , which require an evoking  stimulus  .
Hurricane Tomas was  the   उन्नीसवीं  named storm and twelfth hurricane of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season .
Tomas developed from a tropical  वेव  east  of   the  Windward Islands on October 29 .
Quickly intensifying into  a  hurricane  ,  it moved through the Windward Islands and passed very near Saint Lucia  .
After reaching Category  2  status on the Saffir-Simpson scale ,  टॉमस  quickly weakened to a tropical  तूफ़ान   in  the central  caribbean  Sea ,  due   to  strong wind shear and dry  एयर  .
Tomas later regained hurricane  औकात  as it reorganized near the Windward  ड्योढ़ी  .
Throughout the hurricane 's  पाथ   ,  71 people are known to have been killed ,  14   of  whom were in Saint Lucia .
Monetary  नुकसान  throughout the  windward  Islands were estimated at US  $  588 million , mainly in  संत  Lucia .
In the wake of the storm  in  Haiti , flooding  intensified  an  जारी  cholera  outbreak   indirectly  causing more fatalities .
According to a  रपट  released in December 2010 , 55 people were  मारे  in Cuba  और  Hispanola ,  हालांकि   the  distribution of these fatalities are unknown  .
overall  damage from  the  storm was at least  $  741 million .
Victoria  जैक्सन  ( born August 2  ,  1959 ) is  an  American comedian ,  अभिनेत्री  , satirist , singer and internet blogger best known as  a  cast member of the NBC  टेलीविज़न  sketch  कॉमेडी  series Saturday Night  सजीव  ( SNL )  इससे  1986 to 1992 .
She has  प्राप्त  attention as  a  vocal critic of President  बराक  Obama  ,   और  is an  क्रियाशील   भागीदार  in  the  Tea  पार्टी  movement .
Postmodern  साहित्य  is  साहित्य   characterized  by heavy reliance on techniques like fragmentation , paradox , and questionable narrators ,  और   is  often ( though  नहीं  exclusively ) defined as a style  or  trend which emerged in  the   post–world  War II era .
Postmodern works are seen  as  a reaction against Enlightenment thinking and  modernist  approaches  to  literature .
Postmodern literature ,  जैसे  postmodernism as a whole  ,  tends to resist definition or classification as a `` movement '' .
Indeed , the convergence of postmodern literature with various modes of critical  सिद्धान्त  ,  विशेषकर  reader-response  और  deconstructionist approaches , and the subversions of the implicit contract between author , text and  रीडर  by which its works are  प्रायः  characterised  ,  have led  to   pre-modern  fictions  ऐसे  as Cervantes ' Don Quixote ( 1605,1615 ) and Laurence  sterne  's eighteenth-century satire  tristram  Shandy being retrospectively  inducted  into the fold .
While there is little  सर्वसम्मति  on  the  precise characteristics , scope , and  महत्व  of  postmodern  literature ,  as  is often the case with artistic movements  ,  postmodern literature is commonly defined in  संबंध   to  a precursor .
For example ,  a  postmodern  साहित्यिक  work tends not to  conclude  with the neatly tied-up  समाप्ति  as is often found in modernist  साहित्य  , but often  parodies   it  .
Postmodern authors tend to  celebrate  chance over craft , and further employ metafiction to undermine the writer  's  authority .
Another characteristic of  postmodern  literature is the  questioning  of distinctions  between  high and low culture through  the  use of  pastiche  ,  the  combination of subjects and genres not previously deemed fit for literature .
Enigma  is  an electronic musical project founded  in  Germany  by   माइकल  Cretu , David  fairstein   और  Frank Peterson  in  1990 .
The Romanian-born Cretu  conceived  the  पहेली  project while working in Germany , but based  उसके  recording studio A.R.T . Studios in Ibiza  ,   स्पेन  ,  इससे  the early  1990s   जबतक  May 2009  ,   जहाँ  he  रै  recorded all of Enigma 's studio  रिलीज  to date  .
Cretu is  दोनो  the composer and the producer of the project  .
उसके  former wife , pop singer  सैंड्रा   ,  often provided vocals on Enigma tracks  .
Jens Gad co-arranged and played guitar  on  three of the Enigma albums  .
Peter Cornelius  भी  contributed  to  Enigma during the 1990s .
Seven studio albums have been produced  अंतर्गत  the name of the project .
scooby-doo  is  an   अमरीकी   एनिमेटेड   कार्टून  franchise ,  comprising   अनेक  animated  टेलीविज़न   श्रेणी   उत्पादित  from 1969 to the present day .
The original series , Scooby-Doo , Where  हैं  You !
,  was created  लिये  Hanna-Barbera Productions by  लेखक  Joe  माणिक्य  and Ken Spears in 1969 .
This Saturday morning cartoon series featured four teenagers— Fred Jones , Daphne Blake ,  velma  Dinkley , and Norville `` Shaggy  ''   रोजर्स  — and their talking brown Great Dane dog named  scooby-doo  , who solve mysteries involving supposedly  अलौकिक  creatures through a  श्रेणी  of  हरकतों  and missteps .
following  the  कामयाबी  of  the  original  श्रेणी   ,  Hanna-Barbera and its successor Warner  ब्रदर्स  . Animation have produced  numerous  follow-up and  spin-off  animated  श्रेणी  and several related works  ,  including television specials and telefilms , a line of direct-to-video films ,  और  two  warner  Bros. –produced theatrical feature films .
