Some versions of  scooby-doo  feature different variations on the show 's supernatural theme , and include characters such  as   स्कूबी  's cousin  scooby-dum   और  nephew Scrappy-Doo in addition to or instead of some of the original characters  .
Scooby-Doo was  originally  broadcast on CBS from  1969  to 1976  ,  when it moved to ABC .
ABC  aired  the show until  canceling   it  in 1986  ,  and presented a  spin-off  featuring the characters as children , A Pup Named Scooby-Doo , from 1988  जबतक   1991  .
दो   नई  Scooby-Doo series , What 's New ,  scooby-doo  ?
और  Shaggy and Scooby-Doo  मिलेंगी  a a  सुराग  ! ] ] ,  aired   as  part of Kids WB  on  The  wb  network and its  successor  , The CW network ,  इससे   2002   जबतक  2008 .
The most recent Scooby-Doo series , Scooby-Doo !
Mystery Incorporated  ,  aired on Cartoon Network  इससे  2010 to 2013 .
Repeats  of  the  विभिन्न  Scooby-Doo  श्रेणी  are  ब्रॉडकास्ट  frequently on Cartoon Network and  boomerang  in the United  राज्य  and other  देशों  .
Call of Duty is  a  first-person and third-person shooter computer/ video game franchise .
The series began on the PC , and later expanded  to  consoles and  handhelds  .
Several  spin-off   खेल  have also  महरूम  released .
The earlier games  in  the series are set primarily  in   संसार  War  ii  , this includes : Call of Duty , Call of Duty 2  ,   और   कॉल  of Duty 3  .
शुरूआत  with  आधुनिक  Warfare  ,  which is set in  आधुनिक  times  ,  the series has shifted focus away from World War  ii  .
Call of  ड्यूटी   4  : Modern Warfare ( released November 2007 )  थी   followed  by Call of Duty :  संसार   at  War and Call of Duty : Modern  warfare  2 .
Black Ops ( released November 2010 ) takes place in the Cold War , while  आधुनिक  Warfare 3 ( released November 2011 ) takes  प्लेस  in  the  near-future setting .
Black Ops 2  (  Released  नवम्बर  13 , 2012 ) takes place in  the  year 2025 .
The Call of Duty games are published and owned  by  Activision with Aspyr Media publishing it for Apple OS X .
जबकि  the studio Infinity  वार्ड  primarily still develops them , Treyarch has  भी  developed several of the titles with the release of  the   studios  ' games  interlaced  with each  अन्य  .
Some games have been developed by  धूसर  Matter Interactive , Spark  असीमित  , Amaze Entertainment , n-Space ,  विद्रोह  Developments , Ideaworks  खेल  Studio , Sledgehammer Games and nStigate Games .
The games use a variety of engines , including the id Tech  3  , the  treyarch  NGL , and the IW 5.0 .
अन्य  products in the franchise include a  लकीर   of  action figures designed by Plan-B Toys  ,   a   कार्ड  game created by Upper Deck  ,  and a comic book mini-series  प्रकाशित  by  wildstorm  .
As of November  11  , 2011  ,  the Call Of  ड्यूटी  series  have  sold over 100 million copies .
As  of  March 31 , 2012  वहीँ  are  40  million  मासिक  active players  आरपार  all of the Call of Duty  शीर्षक   ,  with 10  लाख  Call of Duty : Elite users and 2 million  paying  annual members .
Over 1.6  अरब  hours of online gameplay  have   महरूम  logged  आधुनिक  Warfare 3 since its 2011  रिलीज   .
The estate  कर  in  the  United States  is  a tax imposed on  the  transfer of the `` taxable  एस्टेट   ``   of  a deceased  व्यक्ति   ,  whether such property is transferred  via  a will , according to the state laws of intestacy or otherwise made as an incident of the death of the owner , such  as  a transfer of property from an intestate estate or trust ,  or   the   भुगतान  of certain life insurance benefits or financial account sums to beneficiaries  .
The estate tax is  एक  part of  the  Unified Gift and Estate Tax system in the  संयुक्त  States .
The other part of the system ,  the  gift tax , imposes a tax on  हस्तांतरण  of property  दौरान  a person 's life ; the  तोहफा  tax prevents avoidance of the  एस्टेट  tax should a person want to give away his/her estate .
In addition to the federal  सरकारी  , many states also  थोपने   an  estate tax ,  साथ   the   राज्य  version called either  an  estate  कर  or an  उत्तराधिकार  tax .
प्रतिद्वंद्वियों  of the estate tax call it  the  ``  मौत  tax '' .
If  an  asset is left to a spouse or a Federally recognized charity , the tax usually does  नहीं  apply .
In addition ,  up  to $ 5,250,000 can  be  given by an individual , before  and/or  upon their death , without incurring  संघीय  gift or estate  कर  .
Gavin McGregor Rossdale ( born  30  October 1967 ) is an English actor and  संगीतकार  , known as the lead singer  और  rhythm  guitarist   of  the rock band Bush  .
following  Bush 's  विरह  in 2002 , which  lasted  for eight years , he was the  सीसे  singer  और  guitarist for  संस्थान  , and later began a  सोलो  career .
जब  performing solo , Gavin  plays  songs from his extensive musical libraries .
Rossdale has been ranked in the Top 100 Heavy Metal Vocalists by Hit Parader ( # 75 ) .
Raffaello Sanzio  da   urbino  ( April 6 or March  28  , 1483  –  April 6 ,  1520  ) , better known simply as Raphael , was an Italian painter  और   वास्तु  of the High Renaissance .
His  कार्य  is  admired   लिये   इसके  clarity of form and  आसानी  of  संयोजन  and for its visual achievement  of  the Neoplatonic ideal of human  वैभव  .
Together with  michelangelo  and  लियोनार्डो  da Vinci  ,  he forms the traditional trinity of great masters  of  that period .
Raphael was enormously productive , running  an  unusually large workshop  ,  and despite his death  at  37  ,  a large body of his work remains .
अनेक   of  his works are  मिला  in the Vatican Palace  ,  where  the  frescoed  राफेल   कक्ष  were the central , and the largest  ,  work of his career .
The best known work is The School of Athens in the  वेटिकन  Stanza della Segnatura  .
After his early years in Rome  much  of his work was self-designed , but for the most part executed by the workshop  इससे  his  drawings  , with considerable loss of quality .
He was extremely influential  in  his lifetime , though outside  रोम  his work was mostly known from  उसके  collaborative  printmaking  .
After  उसके   मौत  ,  the  influence  of  his  ग्रेट   प्रतिद्वंद्वी  Michelangelo was  अधिक   फैली  until the 18th and  19th  centuries , when Raphael  's  more serene and harmonious qualities were again regarded as the highest models .
His career falls naturally into three  phases  and three  शैलियाँ  ,  पहला  described by Giorgio Vasari : his  जल्दी  years in Umbria , then a period  of  about four years ( from 1504–1508  )   absorbing  the artistic traditions of Florence , followed by his last hectic and triumphant  बारह  years in  रोम   ,  working for two Popes and their close associates  .
Julia Fiona Roberts ( born October 28  ,  1967  )  is an  अमरीकी  actress  .
She became a Hollywood star  बाद  headlining the romantic comedy  pretty  Woman ( 1990 ) , which grossed $ 464  लाख  worldwide .
After receiving Golden  ग्लोब  Awards and  अकादमी   पुरस्कार  nominations for Steel Magnolias ( 1989 ) and Pretty Woman  ,   वो  won the Academy Award for Best  अभिनेत्री  for her  प्रदर्शन  in Erin Brockovich ( 2000 ) .
Her films The  pelican  Brief  (  1993  )  , My Best Friend 's  विवाह  ( 1997 ) , Mystic Pizza ( 1988  )   ,   नॉटिंग  Hill ( 1999 ) , Runaway Bride ( 1999  )  , Ocean 's Eleven ( 2001 ) , Ocean 's Twelve ( 2004 ) , Charlie Wilson 's War ( 2007 ) ,  वेलेंटाइन  's Day ( 2010 ) , Eat Pray Love ( 2010 ) , and Mirror  दर्पण  ( 2012 ) have collectively brought box office receipts of over $  2.6   अरब  , making her one of the most  कामयाब   अभिनेत्रियों   in  terms  of  box office receipts .
रॉबर्ट्स  had  become  one of  the  highest-paid actresses  in  the world , topping  the  Hollywood Reporters  सालाना  `` power list '' of top-earning female stars from 2005 to 2006  .
उसके  fee for 1990 's Pretty Woman  थी   $  300,000  ;  in 2003  ,  she  थी  paid an unprecedented $  25  million for her  भूमिका  in Mona Lisa Smile ( 2003 )  .
As of  2010  , Roberts 's net worth was  अनुमानित  to be $ 140 million .
रॉबर्ट्स   रै  been named  एक  of People magazine 's  ``  50 Most  खूबसूरत  People in the World '' eleven times , tied  साथ  Halle Berry .
In 2011 , she was named  एक  of the  ``  100 Hottest Women of All-Time  ''  by Men  's   स्वास्थ्य  .
In 2001 , Ladies Home Journal ranked her as the 11th  सबसे  powerful  स्त्री  in  the  United States .
Mark  इलियट  Zuckerberg ( born May 14 , 1984  )  is an American computer programmer and Internet entrepreneur .
He is  बेहतरीन  known as one of five co-founders of the  सोशल  networking  जालस्थल  Facebook .
as  of  अप्रैल  2013 ,  zuckerberg  is the  अध्यक्ष  and chief executive of Facebook , Inc. and in 2013  उसके  personal wealth was  अनुमानित   to  be US $  13  .3  अरब  .
साथ   साथ  his college roommates and fellow Harvard University students  एडुआर्डो  Saverin , Andrew McCollum , Dustin Moskovitz and Chris Hughes , Zuckerberg launched Facebook from Harvard  's  dormitory rooms .
the  group then introduced  फेसबुक  onto  अन्य   campuses  nationwide  और  moved to  पालो  Alto , California  ,  United States  (  U.S.  )  shortly afterwards .
in  2007 , at the  आयु   of  twenty-three  सालो  , Zuckerberg  became  a  अरबपति  as a result of Facebook  और  the number of Facebook users worldwide  पहुँचे  a total of one  अरब  in 2012 .
Zuckerberg was  शामिल  in various  विधिक  disputes that were initiated  by  others in the group , who claimed  a  share of the company based upon their involvement during the development phase of Facebook .
चूंकि  2010 ,  zuckerberg  has  महरूम  named among the  100  wealthiest and most influential people  in  the  संसार  by Time magazine as a part of  इसके  Person  of  the  साल   accolade   .
Zuckerberg was played by actor Jesse Eisenberg in  the  2010 Hollywood film The  सोशल  Network in which the rise of  फेसबुक   is   portrayed  .
The Mayflower  थी  the ship that  in  1620 transported  102  English Pilgrims , including a core  समूह  of Separatists , to  नई  England .
Their story is one of travail and survival in a harsh New  संसार  environment .
framedThe
कमेटी  of Ways  और  Means  is  the chief tax -writing committee  of  the United States  हाउस   of  Representatives .
Members  of  the Ways and Means Committee are not allowed to serve on any other House Committees  जबतक  they  लागू   लिये  a waiver from their party 's congressional leadership .
The Committee has jurisdiction over  सब   कराधान  , tariffs  और  other revenue-raising  उपायों  , as well as a number of other programs including:
Social Security
बेरोजगारी  benefits
medicare
Enforcement  of   चाइल्ड  support laws
Temporary Assistance for Needy  परिवारों   ,  a federal welfare  कार्यक्रम
Foster care and adoption programs
The U.S. Constitution  requires  that all bills regarding taxation must originate in the House of  प्रतिनिधि  .
Since House procedure is that all bills regarding taxation must go through this committee ,  the  committee  is   बहुत  influential ,  as  is  इसके  Senate  बंटवारा   ,   the  U.S.  सीनेट  Committee  on  Finance .
The Ways  और  Means Committee in the 111th Congress  थी  chaired  by   चार्ली   rangel   ,   जो  had taken a leave  of  absence as chairman  जबतक  House ethics violations were resolved .
however  , his leave of absence as chairman was ruled to be a resignation  .
Pete Stark  resigned  as acting chairman , so Sander Levin held  कि  position  जबतक  the start  of  the 112th Congress .
Dave Camp became the committee chair  लिये   the  112th Congress , after the Republicans won control of  the  House in  the  2010 election .
The blue whale ( Balaenoptera musculus ) is  a   समुद्री  mammal  belonging   to  the  suborder   of  baleen whales ( called Mysticeti ) .
at  in length and  or  more in weight , it is the largest  ज्ञात  animal to have ever existed .
Long and slender , the blue  व्हेल  's body can be various  शेड्स  of bluish-grey dorsally and somewhat lighter underneath .
वहीँ   हैं   at  least three distinct subspecies  :  B.  m.  musculus of the  उत्तर  Atlantic and North Pacific  ,  B. m. intermedia  of  the Southern Ocean and B.  m.   brevicauda  ( also known  as   the  pygmy blue whale ) found in the Indian  समंदर  and South Pacific Ocean .
B. m. indica , found  in  the Indian Ocean , may  be  another subspecies .
As with other baleen whales , its diet consists almost exclusively of small crustaceans known as krill .
Blue whales  यहूद  abundant  in  nearly all  the  oceans on Earth until the beginning of  the  twentieth century .
लिये  over a century , they were hunted almost to extinction by whalers until protected by the international community in 1966  .
A 2002 report estimated there were 5,000 to 12,000 blue  whales  worldwide  ,  located  in   at  least five  समूह   .
More recent research into the Pygmy subspecies  suggests  this may be an underestimate .
Before whaling , the largest population was  in  the  अंटार्कटिक  , numbering approximately 239,000 ( range 202,000 to  311,000  ) .
There  remain   तभी  much smaller ( around 2,000 ) concentrations  in  each  of  the eastern North Pacific ,  अंटार्कटिक  , and Indian Ocean groups .
There are two  अधिक  groups in  the  North Atlantic , and at least two in  the   दक्षिणी  Hemisphere .
The  ग्लोब   artichoke  ( Cynara cardunculus  var  . scolymus ) is a  किस्में  of a species  of   thistle  cultivated as a  खाना  .
The edible matter is buds that form within the  पुष्प  heads before the flowers come into  खिलते  .
The buds go away or change to a  coarse  , barely edible form when the flower blooms .
the  uncultivated  or  wild  किस्में  of the species is  पुकारा  a cardoon .
It is a perennial  संयंत्र  native to  the  Mediterranean region  .
The  संयुक्त   राज्य   एक  hundred-dollar  विधेयक  ( $ 100 )  is  a denomination of United States currency  .
U.S.  statesman  , inventor , and diplomat  बेंजामिन   फ्रैंकलिन  is currently featured on the obverse of the bill .
on  the reverse of the  banknote  is an image of  स्वतंत्रता  Hall  .
the  $  100  bill is the largest denomination that has been printed since July 13 , 1969 , when the  denominations  of $ 500  ,  $ 1,000 , $ 5,000 , and $ 10,000 were retired .
The Bureau  of  Engraving and Printing says the average life  of  a  $   100  bill in circulation is 90 months  (  7.5  सालो  ) before  it  is  replaced  due to  पहनें  and tear .
The bills are also  commonly  referred  to  as ``  benjamins  '' , in reference to  the  use  of  Benjamin Franklin 's portrait on  the  denomination , or `` C-Notes '' , based on the Roman numeral for 100  .
The  विधेयक   is  one of two denominations printed today  कि  does not feature  a  President of the United States ; the  अन्य  is the $  10  bill  ,  featuring Alexander Hamilton .
The  समय  on  the  clock of Independence Hall on the  रिवर्स   ,   according  to the U.S. Bureau of Engraving and Printing  ,  shows  लगभग  4:10 .
One hundred hundred-dollar bills  हैं  delivered by Federal Reserve Banks in  mustard-colored  straps ( $ 10,000 ) .
The Series  2009   $   100  bill redesign was unveiled  on  April 21 , 2010 , and was to be issued to the public on February 11 , 2011 ,  लकिन  production  थी  shut down in December 2010 because  as  many  as  30 % were  अनुपयोगी  due to  a  manufacturing flaw .
A  लंबवत   क्रीज  in the paper reveals a  रिक्त  space on the  विधेयक  when pulled  आउट  .
In  उनके  replacement , and continuing  the  high demand of this denomination , the  श्रेणी  2006A  थी  launched retaining  the  previous  डिज़ाइन   (  1996-generation ) .
On April  24  , 2013 ,  the  Federal Reserve announced the  नई  $ 100 bill would enter circulation on  अक्तूबर  8  ,  2013 .
King David  in  robes of a Byzantine emperor .
miniature  from the Paris Psalter .
David  (   ;  ISO 259-3 Dawid ;  '   ;  Strong 's : Daveed )  according  to the  यहूदी  Bible , was the  दूसरी   किंग   of  the United Kingdom of Israel , and according to the  नई  Testament Gospels of Matthew and Luke , an ancestor  of  Jesus .
His life is conventionally dated to c. 1040–970 BCE , his reign over Judah c. 1010–1002 BCE  ,  and his reign over the United Kingdom of Israel  c.  1002–970 BCE .
The Books of  सैमुएल  ,  1  Kings  ,   और  1 Chronicles are the  तभी  sources of information on David , although  the  Tel Dan stele ( dated c. 850–835 BCE  )  contains the phrase ( bytdwd ) ,  पढ़ा  as  ``  House of David '' ,  जिससे  most scholars take  as  confirmation of  the  existence in the  mid-9th   सदी  BCE of a Judean  royal  dynasty called the House of David  .
He is  चित्रित  as  a  righteous  किंग   ,  although not without faults , as well as an acclaimed warrior , musician , and poet  ,  traditionally credited for composing many  of  the psalms contained in  the  Book of  ज़बूर   .
दाउद   is   सेंट्रल  to Jewish , Christian  ,  and Islamic doctrine  और  culture .
biblical  tradition  maintains  that a  सीधा  descendant  of  David will be the Messiah .
In  islam  he is considered to be a prophet and the king of a nation .
काठमांडू   (   ;  ) is the capital and largest urban agglomerate  of  Nepal  .
The agglomerate consists of Kathmandu  महानगर   नगर  at its core ,  और   इसके  sister cities Patan , Kirtipur , Thimi  ,  and Bhaktapur .
It also includes the recently recognized  शहरी  areas of Shankhapur , Karyabinayak , and Champapur .
Banepa , Dhulikhel , and Panauti are  उपग्रह  urban areas of Kathmandu located just outside the Kathmandu valley .
Kathmandu is also known informally as `` KTM  ''  or the  ``  tri-city ''  .
according  to a  जनसांख्यिकी  conducted in 2011  ,  Kathmandu metropolis alone has 975,453 inhabitants ; and the agglomerate has a population of more than  2.5  million inhabitants .
The metropolitan  नगर  area is and has a population  घनत्व  of  19,250  per km2  .
The  नगर  stands at an elevation of  लगभग  in  the   bowl-shaped  Kathmandu Valley  of  central Nepal  .
it  is surrounded by four major mountains  :   shivapuri  ,  phulchoki  ,  nagarjun   ,  and Chandragiri .
Kathmandu Valley is  भाग  of three districts (  काठमांडू   ,  Lalitpur ,  और  Bhaktapur ) , has the highest population density in  the  country , and is  घर   to  about a twelfth of  नेपाल   's   जनसांख्यिकी  .
During Rana  और  Shah eras , the name ``  नेपाल  '' referred  तभी  to the Kathmandu Valley ; it was what people who lived outside the valley called it  .
During this period , British historians called the valley itself `` Nepal Proper ''  .
Today , Kathmandu is not only the  पूंजी   of  the Federal Democratic Republic of Nepal , but also the headquarters of  the  Central Development Region of Nepal .
The Central Region comprises three zones : Bagmati , Narayani ,  और   जनकपुर   .
काठमांडू  is located in the Bagmati Zone  .
Kathmandu is the gateway to tourism in Nepal .
It is also the nerve center of the country 's economy .
It  रै  the  सबसे   उन्नत  infrastructure of any urban area in Nepal , and its economy is focused on  पर्यटन   ,  which accounted for 3.8 % of  नेपाल  's GDP in 1995–96  .
(  पर्यटन  in  काठमांडू   अस्वीकृत  thereafter  दौरान  a period of political unrest , but since then has improved  .  )
The city has a rich history , spanning nearly 2000 years , as inferred from inscriptions  मिला   in  the  घाटी  .
Religious and  सांस्कृतिक  festivities  रूप   a  major part of the  जीवनदान  of people residing in Kathmandu .
सबसे  of Kathmandu 's people follow Hinduism and many  अन्य  follow Buddhism .
There are people of  अन्य  religious beliefs as well ,  giving  Kathmandu  a  cosmopolitan culture .
नेपाली  is  the   सबसे   commonly  spoken language  in   the  city .
Nepal Bhasa is the indigenous language spoken by  the  Newar people .
Hindi is widely understood and English is understood  by  Kathmandu 's educated residents .
The city 's literacy rate is 98 % .
Kathmandu 's sister cities ( Lalitpur Patan ) and Bhaktapur are integral to Kathmandu  's  cultural heritage , tourism industry ,  और  economy ; therefore UNESCO  's  World Heritage Site lists all three cities  '   स्मारक   और  attractions  साथ  under one heading ,  ``  Kathmandu  valley-  UNESCO World Heritage Site `` .
Field hockey , usually referred  to  simply  as  hockey , is  a  team sport  of  the hockey  परिवार   जिससे  is played between  दो  teams of eleven players with  हॉकी   sticks  and a hard , solid plastic ball .
At the turn of the 21st century ,  the   खेल  is  निभाई  globally , with particular popularity throughout Europe , Asia , Oceania  ,  and South America  –  in addition to being  the   नेशनल  sport of Pakistan  और  India .
The term `` field hockey  ''   is   प्रयुक्त  primarily in Canada  ,  the United States , and other regions of the world where the sport of ice hockey is more  लोकप्रिय  .
During play , goal keepers are the only players  जो  are  अनुमत  to  टच   the  ball with  कोई  part of their body ( with the exception of a  खिलाड़ी  's hand  माना  'part of  the  stick ' ) , with this  तभी   applying  within the shooting circle ( also known as  the  D  ,  or  शूटिंग  arc , or just the circle ) ,  जबकि   फ़ील्ड  players play the ball with the flat side of their stick .
The team that scores the most goals by the end of the match wins  .
If the score is  tied   at  the end  of  the game , either a draw is declared or the game goes into extra time and/or a penalty shootout ,  depending  on  the  competition  's  format .
The governing body  of  hockey is  the  International Hockey Federation ( FIH ) ,  साथ  men and women being  represented  internationally in competitions including  the  Olympic  खेल  , Commonwealth games , Hockey World Cup , Champions  ट्रॉफी  and Junior Hockey World Cup , with many countries  कार्यशील  extensive junior , senior  ,   और  masters  '  club competitions .
The FIH is also responsible for organising  the  Hockey Rules Board and developing the rules for the  खेल  .
a  popular variant of field hockey is  अंदर  hockey , which differs in a number of respects while embodying the primary  सिद्धान्त  of  हॉकी  .
Indoor hockey is a 6-a-side variant , with a field which is reduced  to  approximately 40m × 20m .
With many  of  the rules  बाकी  the same  ,  including obstruction and  फीट  , there are  अनेक  key  विसंगतियाँ  - Players may  नहीं  raise the ball  जबतक  shooting on goal ,  खिलाड़ी  may  नहीं   hit  the ball ( instead  utilising  pushes to  ट्रांसफ़र  the ball )  ,  and the sidelines are replaced with solid  बाधाओं  which the  बॉल  will rebound off .
ethan  ``  cane  ''  ashby  ( né Atkinson  )  is  a  fictional character from the  अमरीकी   सीबीएस  soap opera The Young and  the  Restless .
He is portrayed  by  Australian actor Daniel Goddard , who originally auditioned  लिये  Brad Snyder on As the World  turns  but was  अनुशंसित  for a role on The Young and the Restless  बजाय  .
The role was  to  be portrayed as an American  ,   लकिन  Goddard  's  Australian  descent   बहकावे  the character 's background .
Former head  लेखक  Lynn Marie Latham introduced him during the  एपीसोड  airing  on  January 12  ,  2007 as an  ऑस्ट्रेलियाई  bartender in search  of  his family , a debut that received a mixed response .
Latham  निर्मित  Cane as the son of Phillip Chancellor II ( Donnelly Rhodes ) and  jill   फोस्टर  Abbott  (  Jess  वाल्टन  ) but  the  character  's  background was rewritten by Maria Arena Bell in 2009 , reestablishing him as the son of Colin and Genevieve Atkinson ( Tristan Rogers and Genie  फ्रांसिस  )  .
Though characterized as  ``  mysterious  ''  , Cane is `` loyal and dedicated '' ,  जबकि  Goddard described  the  character as  a   ``  typical Australian  ,  working-class kind of guy '' .
He was  the  first member of the  एटकिन्सन  family to appear on the series ,  followed  by his parents and identical twin brother  .
Soon after his debut , he became  a  leading character , a  निर्णय  praised  by  viewers and critics .
The character has been involved  साथ  Amber Moore ( Adrienne Frantz ) ,  क्लो   मिशेल  (  एलिज़ाबेथ  Hendrickson ) and most  notably  Lily Winters (  christel  Khalil ) ,  a  romance that garnered significant fan attention  .
in  2009 , Cane and Lily were married ; Global BC would later  कॉल   लिली  the love of Cane  's  life .
The pair  था  two children  ,  Charlie  और  Mattie Ashby .
In 2011 ,  the  actor was fired  ,   और  Cane was shot to death onscreen  .
However , Goddard was  rehired  soon after viewers  campaigned  for  उसके  return , revealing  कि  Cane 's  एकसमान  twin brother was  in  fact the  man  who died .
This sacrificed his marriage to  लिली  , but the couple were remarried on Valentine 's Day in 2012 .
Goddard  रै  been  widely   acclaimed  for his portrayal ; Canyon News said that he portrays the character  honestly  , and is  ``  always dependable , on fire and exciting '' .
John Christopher  ``  Johnny '' Depp II (  born  June 9 , 1963 ) is an  अमरीकी   कर्ता  , film producer , and  संगीतकार  .
he  has won  the  Golden Globe Award  और  Screen Actors Guild  पुरस्कार   लिये   बेहतरीन  Actor .
Depp rose to prominence  on  the 1980s television series 21 Jump Street , becoming a teen  आइडल  .
Dissatisfied with that status , Depp  turned  to film for more challenging roles  ;  he played  the  title  अक्षर  of the acclaimed Edward  scissorhands  ( 1990 ) and later found  बक्सा   दफ्तर  success in films  ऐसे  as Sleepy Hollow ( 1999 ) , Charlie and the Chocolate Factory (  2005  ) ,  ऐलिस  in Wonderland ( 2010 )  ,  Rango ( 2011 ) and the Pirates  of  the Caribbean film  श्रेणी  ( 2003–present ) .
He has collaborated with director  और  friend  टिम  Burton in eight films ; the most recent being Dark Shadows ( 2012 ) .
Depp has gained  acclaim  for his portrayals of such people as Ed Wood in Ed Wood , Joseph D. Pistone in Donnie Brasco , Hunter  S.  Thompson in Fear  और  Loathing in Las Vegas ,  जार्ज  Jung in Blow , and  the  bank  डाकू  John Dillinger in Michael Mann  's  Public Enemies .
Films featuring Depp have grossed  over  $ 3.1 billion  at  the United  राज्य   बक्सा   दफ्तर  and  over  $ 7.6 billion worldwide  .
He has been nominated for top  पुरस्कार   अनेक  times  ,  winning  the  Best Actor Awards  इससे  the Golden –_Motion_Picture_Musical_or_Comedy Globes –_Motion_Picture_Musical_or_Comedy for  स्वीनी  Todd  :  The Demon Barber of Fleet Street and  इससे   the  Screen Actors Guild  लिये   pirates   of  the Caribbean : The Curse of the Black  पर्ल   .
he   भी  has garnered a sex symbol status in American cinema ,  होने  twice  नामित  as  the  ``  sexiest   man  Alive ``  by  People magazine in 2003  और  2009  .
He has  महरूम  listed  in  the 2012 Guinness Book of  संसार  Records as the  उच्चतम  paid actor , with $ 75  लाख   .
The World Wide Web ( abbreviated as WWW or W3 , commonly known as the  वेब  )  ,  is a system of  interlinked  hypertext documents  पहुँचा  via  the   अंतरजाल  .
With a  वेब   ब्राउजर  ,  एक  can view  वेब  pages that may contain  टेक्स्ट   ,  images  ,   वीडियो  , and other multimedia , and  navigate  between  उन्हें  via  hyperlinks   .
Using concepts from his earlier hypertext systems  जैसे  ENQUIRE ,  अंग्रेजों   इंजीनियर  , computer  वैज्ञानिक  and  at  that time employee of the  cern  ,  सर  Tim Berners-Lee  ,   अभी   निदेशक  of the  संसार  Wide  वेब  Consortium ( W3C ) ,  लिखा  a proposal in March 1989 for what would eventually  become   the  World  चौड़ी  Web .
at   cern  , a European research organisation near  जेनेवा  straddling the  किनारा  between France and Switzerland , Berners-Lee  और  Belgian  कंप्यूटर   वैज्ञानिक  Robert Cailliau proposed in 1990 to  उपयोग  hypertext  ``  to link and  अभिगम  information of various kinds as a web of nodes in which the user  can  browse  at  will ''  ,  and they publicly introduced the  प्रोजेक्ट  in December of  the  same year  .
Mark Travis John Sanchez ( born November 11 , 1986 ) is an American football quarterback for the New York Jets  of  the National Football League ( NFL ) .
He  थी  drafted in the  पहला  round  of   the  2009 NFL  ड्राफ्ट  as  the   पांचवां  overall  चयन  by  the   jets  and  the  second quarterback taken  overall  .
he   निभाई  college football at  the  University of  दक्षिणी  California ( USC ) .
Sanchez  grew   up  in a  well-disciplined  and athletic family .
In the eighth grade ,  he  began to play  फ़ुटबॉल   और  learn  the   intricacies  of the quarterback position ,  प्रशिक्षण  with his father ,  उपनाम   .
A well-regarded prospect ,  सांचेज़  committed to Southern  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  following his successful  ऊँची  school career in which he led his team to a championship title during his final season .
At  यूएससी  , Sanchez was relegated  as  the backup quarterback during his first  तीन  years though he rose to prominence due to his brief appearances on  the  field in 2007 due  to  injuries suffered  by  starting quarterback John  दाउद  Booty .
सांचेज़  also became popular within the community due to his Mexican-American heritage .
Named the starter  in  2008 ,  सांचेज़  led USC to a 12–1 record and won the Rose Bowl  विरूद्ध  Penn State for which Sanchez was  awarded   the  Most Valuable Player award for his performance on offense .
Although many  माना  him  too   अनुभवहीन  , Sanchez announced his intention to enter the 2009 NFL Draft .
He was  चयनित  by the Jets after they traded up with the  क्लीवलैंड  Browns , and was named the starting quarterback prior to the start of the season .
Despite  a   subpar  performance , Sanchez led the Jets to  the  AFC  चैंपियनशिप  Game  ,  a losing effort to the Indianapolis  कोल्टस  , becoming the fourth rookie  क्वार्टरबैक   in  NFL  इतिहास  to  जीत  his first  playoff  game and the second to win two playoff  खेल  .
In  उसके  second  ऋतु  , Sanchez continued to  develop   और  led  the  Jets to the  playoffs  and  the  team 's second consecutive AFC  चैंपियनशिप   खेल   जहाँ  they narrowly lost  to  the Pittsburgh Steelers , 24–19 .
With  the  win over  the  New England Patriots the week prior ,  सांचेज़   tied   चार  other quarterbacks for the  दूसरी  most post-season  सड़क  victories by a quarterback in NFL history .
in  leading the  jets  to two consecutive conference championships , Sanchez joined  क्वार्टरबैक  Ben  roethlisberger  as the only two  quarterbacks  in NFL history to reach  the  conference championship in their first two seasons in the league  .
The next  दो  seasons would be  a  regression  लिये  both the team and Sanchez as they failed to reach the playoffs .
Fans and media critics called for  a  struggling Sanchez to  be  benched .
he   आखिरकार  was  replaced   towards  the end of  the  2012 season with Greg  mcelroy   .
Paul Avery ( April 2 , 1934December 10 ,  2000  ) was an American police reporter , best  ज्ञात  for  उसके  stories on  the  infamous serial killer known as the Zodiac  ,  and later for  उसके   कार्य  on the Patricia Hearst kidnapping .
A small submersible AC sump  पंप  with a garden hose  कनेक्टर
a  sump  पंप  is  a   पंप  used  to   हटाएँ  water  कि  has accumulated  in   a  water collecting sump basin ,  commonly  found in the basement  of  homes .
The water may enter via the perimeter drains of  a  basement waterproofing system  ,   funneling  into the basin or because of rain or  प्राकृतिक  ground water , if the basement is below  the   जल  table level .
Sump pumps are used where basement flooding happens regularly and  to  remedy  dampness  where the water  तालिका  is above the foundation  of   a  home .
Sump pumps send water away  इससे  a house to any place where it is  no   longer  problematic , such as  a  municipal storm  नाली  or a dry well .
Pumps may discharge to the sanitary  सीवर  in older installations .
एकबार  considered acceptable , this practice may  अभी  violate the plumbing code or  नगरपालिका   bylaws  , because it can overwhelm the municipal sewage treatment  प्रणाली  .
Municipalities urge  homeowners  to disconnect and reroute sump pump  निर्वहन  away from sanitary  sewers  .
Fines may be imposed for noncompliance .
Many homeowners have inherited their  sump   पंप  configurations and do  नहीं  realize that the pump discharges to the sewer .
if   the  discharge is  खिलाया  to  a  laundry sink in the basement , it  's  likely going  to  the  सीवर  .
Usually hardwired  into  a home 's electrical system ,  sump  pumps may have a  बैटरी  backup  .
The  घर   's  pressurized water supply  शक्तियां  some pumps , eliminating  the  need for electricity at the expense of using potable water  ,  potentially making them more expensive to operate than electrical pumps and creating  an  additional water  निपटान  problem .
चूंकि  a  sump   जलाशय  may overflow  if  not  constantly  pumped , a backup  प्रणाली  is important for cases when the main  शक्ति  is out  लिये  prolonged periods of time , as during a severe storm  .
There are generally two types of sump pumps —  pedestal   और  submersible .
The pedestal pump 's motor is  आरोहित  above the sump , where it is  अधिक   easily  serviced , but is also  अधिक  conspicuous .
The  पंप  impeller is driven by a long , vertical extension shaft  और  the  impeller  is in a scroll  आवास  in the base of the pump .
The  submersible  pump is entirely mounted inside the sump , and is specially sealed to  prevent  electrical  छोटी  circuits .
Sump pump systems are also utilized in industrial and commercial  अनुप्रयोग  to control water table  -सुनानाd   समस्याएं  in surface  मृदा  .
An artesian aquifer or  आवधिक  high water  तालिका  situation can cause the ground to become unstable due to water saturation .
As long as the pump  कृत्यों   ,   the  surface soil will remain stable .
These sumps are typically ten feet in  गहराई   or  more ; lined  साथ  corrugated  मेटल  pipe that contains perforations or  नाली   छेद  throughout .
They may  शामिल  electronic control systems with visual and audible alarms and are  प्रायः  covered to  prevent  debris and animals from falling in .
Bleeding Kansas , Bloody Kansas  or  the Border War ,  थी  a series of violent political confrontations involving anti-slavery Free-Staters and  pro-slavery  `` Border Ruffian `` elements , that took place  in  the Kansas Territory  और  the  neighboring  towns  of  Missouri between 1854 and 1861 .
At the  दिल  of the conflict was the question of  whether  Kansas would enter the Union as a free state or slave state .
As  ऐसे  , Bleeding Kansas was  a  proxy war between Northerners and Southerners over the issue of  गुलामी  in  the  United States .
The term `` Bleeding Kansas  ''  was coined by Horace Greeley of the New York  ट्रिब्यून  ; the events  it   encompasses  directly  presaged   the  American Civil  युद्ध  .
Congress had long struggled to balance the interests of pro-slavery forces and anti-slavery forces .
The events  बाद  known  as   bleeding  Kansas were set into motion by the Kansas–Nebraska Act of  1854  , which nullified  the  Missouri Compromise  और  instead implemented the  अवधारणा  of popular sovereignty .
an  ostensibly  लोकतांत्रिक   विचार  , popular sovereignty  stated   कि  the  निवासियों   of  each territory or state should  decide   whether  it  होता  be a free  or  slave state ; however  ,  this resulted in immigration en masse  to  Kansas by activists from both sides .
At one point  ,  Kansas  था  two separate  सरकारें  , each with its  अपना  constitution , although only one  थी  federally  पहचाना  .
On January 29 , 1861 , Kansas  थी  admitted to the Union  as  a free state , less than  तीन  months before  the  Battle of Fort Sumter which began the Civil War  .
Benzene is an organic chemical compound with the molecular  सूत्र  C6 H|Hydrogen|H6 .
Its molecule is  रचित  of 6 carbon atoms joined in a ring  ,  with 1 hydrogen atom attached to each carbon  अणु  .
Because  इसके  molecules  contain  only  कार्बन  and hydrogen  अणु  , benzene is classed as a hydrocarbon .
Benzene is a natural constituent of  crude  oil , and is one of the most basic petrochemicals  .
Benzene  is   an   खुशबूदार  hydrocarbon and  the  second [  n  ]  -  annulene ( [ 6 ] -annulene ) , a  चक्रीय  hydrocarbon with a continuous pi bond .
It  is  sometimes abbreviated Ph –H . Benzene is a colorless and highly flammable liquid with  a  sweet smell  .
It is mainly used as a  precursor   to  heavy chemicals , such as ethylbenzene and cumene , which are produced  on  a billion kilogram scale .
क्युकी  it has a  ऊँची  octane number , it is an important component of gasoline , composing a few percent of its mass .
Most non-industrial applications have  महरूम  limited by  बेंजीन  's carcinogenicity .
Giovanni Virginio  स्क्यापारेल्ली   (  ; 14 March 1835 – 4  जुलाई  1910 ) was an Italian astronomer and  विज्ञान  historian  .
Wii homebrew refers to the reuse of Nintendo  's  Wii game console to run software that has not been authorized by Nintendo .
It achieves this  by   defeating  the Wii 's copy  सुरक्षा   और  code signing  उपायों  .
In more  सामान्य  terms  ,   वी  Homebrew refers to the use of  the  Wii 's hardware , accessories  और  software for purposes outside those  intended   by  the manufacturer .
Original efforts focused on using the  वी  Remote as a pointing device on other  ऑपरेटिंग  systems  ,  or running web-based games in the built-in web browser .
Subsequent developments in games exploits , such as the  ``  Twilight  हैक   ``   ,   ``  Bannerbomb '' and its  बाद  incarnation `` LetterBomb ''  ,  `` Smash Stack ''  ,  `` Indiana Pwns  ''  , `` Yu-Gi-OWNED ''  ,  `` bathaxx ''  ,  and  ``  Return of  the   jodi  ''  ,  made  installing  the ``  homebrew  Channel `` possible .
Hadley (  सही  )  discussing  the 2006 Israel-Lebanon crisis with Bush and Rice  .
Stephen John Hadley ( born February 13 , 1947 ) was the 21st  u.S.   सहायक  to the President  लिये   नेशनल  Security Affairs ( commonly referred  as  National  सुरक्षा  Advisor )  ,  serving under President  जार्ज  W. Bush  .
Take  एकसमान   growing  plants and give fertilizer to  हाफ  of them  .
If  वहीँ  are differences between  the  fertilized plant  समूह  and the unfertilized  ``  control ''  समूह  , these differences may  be  due to the fertilizer  .
a  scientific control is  an   प्रयोग  or  अवलोकन  designed to minimize the  प्रभाव  of  परिवर्तनीय   अन्य  than the single independent variable .
This increases the reliability  of   the  results ,  प्रायः  through a comparison  between  control measurements and the other measurements .
Scientific controls are a part of the scientific  विधि   .
लिये   उदाहरण  , during drug testing , scientists will try  to  control two groups  to   रखना   उन्हें  as identical as possible , then  allow  one  समूह   to   कोशिश  the drug  .
Another example might be testing plant fertilizer by  giving  it to  तभी  half the plants in a garden  :  the plants that  प्राप्त  no fertilizer are the  कंट्रोल  group , because they establish the baseline level of growth that the  fertilizer-treated  plants will be  compared  against  .
Without  a  control group , the experiment can  नहीं  determine whether  the  fertilizer-treated  पौधे   grow  more than they would have if untreated .
Ideally  ,   सब  variables in an experiment will be controlled (  accounted  for by the control measurements ) and none  होगा  be uncontrolled .
In such an experiment ,  if  all  the  controls  कार्य  as expected , it is possible to conclude that the experiment is working as intended and  कि  the results of the experiment  हैं   due  to the effect  of  the  परिवर्तनीय  being tested .
That is , scientific controls  allow   an  investigator  to  make a claim like `` Two  परिस्थितियों  were  एकसमान  until  फ़ैक्टर  X  occurred   .
Since factor  x  is  the  only difference  between  the two  परिस्थितियों   ,  the new outcome was caused by factor X .  ''

John Adams ( October  30  ,  1735  ( O.S . October 19 ,  1735  ) – July 4 , 1826 )  थी  the second president of  the  United  राज्य  ( 1797–1801 ) , having  पहले  served  as   the   पहला   वाइस  president of the United States .
An American Founding  पिता   ,  he was a statesman , diplomat , and  a   अग्रणी   एडवोकेट  of American independence from Great Britain  .
Well educated  ,  he was an Enlightenment political theorist who promoted republicanism and wrote prolifically about his often seminal ideas , both  in  published works and  in  letters  to  his wife and key adviser  अबीगैल  as well as  to  other Founding Fathers .
Adams came to prominence in the early stages  of  the American  क्रान्ति  .
A  वकील  and public figure in Boston , as a delegate from Massachusetts  to  the Continental Congress  ,  he played a leading role in  persuading   कॉंग्रेस  to declare  स्वतंत्रता  .
He assisted Thomas Jefferson in drafting the Declaration of Independence in  1776  ,  और   थी  its primary  एडवोकेट  in the Congress .
Later , as  a  diplomat in Europe , he helped negotiate the eventual peace treaty with  ग्रेट  Britain  ,  and  थी  responsible for obtaining vital governmental loans from Amsterdam bankers .
a  political theorist and historian , Adams largely  लिखा  the Massachusetts Constitution in  1780  , which together with his earlier Thoughts on Government ,  बहकावे  American political thought .
एक  of his greatest roles was as a judge  of  character  :  in 1775 ,  he  nominated  जार्ज  Washington to be  commander-in-chief  , and  25  years later nominated  जॉन  Marshall  to   be  Chief  इंसाफ  of the United States .
Adams ' revolutionary credentials secured him two terms as George Washington 's  वाइस   अध्यक्ष  and his own election in 1796 as the  दूसरी  president .
दौरान  his one term  ,  he encountered ferocious  हमले  by the Jeffersonian Republicans , as  खूब  as the dominant faction in  उसके  own Federalist  पार्टी  led by his bitter enemy Alexander Hamilton .
Adams  हस्ताक्षरित  the controversial Alien  और  Sedition Acts , and built up the army and navy especially in the face of an undeclared naval war ( called the `` Quasi-War `` )  साथ   फ़्रांस   ,  1798–1800 .
The major accomplishment of his  प्रेसिडेंसी  was  उसके   शांतिपूर्ण   रेज़ोल्यूशन  of the  विरोध  in the face of Hamilton 's opposition .
In 1800  ,  Adams was defeated for  re-election  by Thomas Jefferson and retired  to  Massachusetts  .
He later resumed his  दोस्ती  with  जेफरसन  .
he  and  उसके  wife , Abigail  एडम्स  , founded  an  accomplished family line  of  politicians , diplomats , and historians now referred  to  as  the   एडम्स  political  परिवार  .
Adams was  the  father of  जॉन  Quincy Adams  ,  the sixth President of the United States .
उसके  achievements have  प्राप्त  greater recognition  in   आधुनिक  times ,  हालांकि   उसके   योगदान  were not initially  as  celebrated as those of other Founders .
Adams was the first U.S.  अध्यक्ष  to reside  in  the building that eventually became known as the White House  .
A Watt steam engine .
The steam  इंजन  , fuelled primarily  by  coal , propelled the  औद्योगिक  Revolution  in  Great Britain and the world .
The  औद्योगिक  Revolution was  the  transition to  नई  manufacturing processes that occurred in  the  period from  परिचय   1760  to  कुछ  time between 1820  और  1840 .
इस  transition included going  इससे   हाथ  production methods to machines , new chemical manufacturing and  आयरन  production processes , improved efficiency  of  water power , the increasing use  of  steam power and development of  यंत्र   टूल्स   .
The  परिवर्तन   भी  included  the  change from wood  और  other bio-fuels to coal .
The Industrial revolution began in Britain and within a few  दशकों   स्प्रेड  to Western Europe and the United States .
The  औद्योगिक  Revolution marks a major turning point in history  ;  almost every aspect  of  daily life was influenced in some  रास्ता  .
Most notably , average income and  जनसांख्यिकी  began to exhibit unprecedented sustained growth  .
in  the words of Nobel Prize winner Robert E.  लुकास  , Jr. , `` For the  पहला   समय   in  history  ,   the  living standards of the masses of ordinary people have  begun  to  undergo  sustained growth  ...  Nothing remotely like this economic behavior is mentioned  by  the  शास्त्रीय  economists , even as a theoretical possibility .  ''
William  घंटी  Scott Iron and Coal ,  1855-60
The period of time  covered  by the Industrial Revolution varies with different historians .
Eric  hobsbawm  held  कि   it  'broke out ' in Britain in  the   1780s   और  was not fully felt until the  1830s  or 1840s  ,  while T. S. Ashton held that  it  occurred  roughly  between  1760  and 1830 .
Some 20th-century  इतिहासकारों  such as John Clapham and Nicholas  crafts  have argued that the  प्रक्रम  of economic and social change took place gradually and the term revolution  is  a misnomer .
This  is  still a subject  of  debate among historians .
जीडीपी  per capita was broadly stable before the Industrial Revolution and the emergence of the modern  पूंजीवादी  economy .
the  Industrial  क्रान्ति  began an era of per-capita economic growth in capitalist  economies  .
Economic  इतिहासकारों  are in agreement that the onset of the Industrial Revolution is the most important event in the history of humanity  चूंकि  the domestication of animals and plants .
The First Industrial Revolution evolved  into  the Second Industrial  क्रान्ति   in   the  transition years between 1840 and 1870  ,   जब  technological  और  economic progress gained momentum with the  increasing   अपनाना   of  steam-powered boats  ,  ships and railways , the  विशाल  scale manufacture of machine tools and the  increasing   उपयोग   of  steam  संचालित  factories .
जूलियट  AnnMarie Huddy (  born  September 27 ,  1969  )  ,  is an American television news reporter ,  फिलहाल  appearing on Fox News  चैनल  .
This  सूची  ranks U.S. cities  by  land area ( not including bodies of water ) .
Total  क्षेत्रों  ( including water ) are also given , but note that , when ranked by total area , a number  of  coastal  शहरों  appear disproportionately `` larger ''  .
San Francisco is an extreme example  ;   जल  makes up nearly 80 % of its total area of  232  square miles  (  601 km2 ) .
नोट  also that in many cases a city may be geographically  विशाल  primarily because its  नगरपालिका   सरकारी   रै  merged with the government of the surrounding  काउंटी  .
In some cases the county  no  longer exists , while in others the  व्यवस्था  has formed a  संचित   city–county  ( or  city-  borough in Alaska  ,  or city- parish in Louisiana ) .
These  हैं  shown in bold in the list  नीचे   (  but  नहीं   सब  examples may be indicated ) .
** These are  स्वतंत्र  cities ,  अर्थ  they  हैं  not a part of any county  .
the  large  आंत   (  or bowel  ,  colon ) is the  पिछला  part of the digestive system in vertebrate animals .
Its function is to absorb water from the remaining indigestible food matter  ,  and then to pass useless waste material from the body .
This article is primarily about the human  आंत  ,  हालांकि  the information about its  प्रक्रियाओं   हैं  directly applicable to most mammals  .
the   विशाल  intestine consists of the cecum  ,  rectum and anal canal .
It starts in the  सही  iliac region of  the  pelvis , just  at  or below the right waist , where  it  is joined to the bottom end  of  the small intestine .
From here  it  continues up the abdomen , then across the width of  the   abdominal  cavity , and  तब  it turns  bas  , continuing to its endpoint  at   the   गुदा  .
The large intestine is  परिचय  long  ,  which is about one-fifth of the whole length of the intestinal canal .
In Terminologia Anatomica the large intestine  शामिल  the cecum , colon , rectum ,  और   गुदा  canal .
However ,  कुछ  sources exclude  the   गुदा  canal .
The Green Bay  पैकर्स  are an  अमरीकी  football team based in Green Bay , Wisconsin  .
They are members of the  उत्तर  Division  of  the National Football Conference (  nfc  ) in the  नेशनल  Football League ( NFL  )   .
Green Bay is the  third-oldest  franchise in  the  NFL , having  महरूम   व्यवस्थित  and  playing  in 1919 .
the  Packers  हैं  the  तभी  non-profit , community-owned  प्रमुख   लीग  professional sports team in the United States .
The  पैकर्स  are the  पिछला   vestige  of  ``  small town teams  ''  that were once common in the NFL during  the  1920s and 1930s .
Founded in  1919  by Earl `` Curly ''  lambeau   (  hence the name Lambeau Field on which the team  plays  ) and George  व्हिटनी  Calhoun , the Green Bay Packers can trace  उनके  lineage  to  other  semi-professional  teams in Green  खाड़ी   डेटिंग  back to 1896 .
In  1919   और   1920  the  पैकर्स  competed as a semi-professional football team against clubs from around Wisconsin and the  मिडवेस्ट   .
They joined the American Professional Football Association ( APFA ) in  1921  , the forerunner to what is known today  as  the  नेशनल  Football League ( NFL ) .
Although Green Bay is the last NFL ``  छोटी  town '' team  ,  its local fan base and  मीडिया  extends  into  nearby  मिल्वौकी  ; the team also  निभाई  selected home games there between 1933 and 1994 .
The Green  खाड़ी  Packers have won 13 league  championships  ( more  than  any other team in the NFL ) , including nine NFL championships  prior   to  the Super Bowl era and four Super Bowl victories —in 1967 ( Super Bowl I  )  ,  1968  ( Super Bowl II  )  , 1997 ( Super Bowl XXXI ) and 2011  (  Super Bowl XLV ) .
the  Packers have long-standing , bitter rivalries with their  nfc  North (  formerly  the NFC Central  )   प्रतिद्वंद्वियों  , the Chicago Bears ,  मिनेसोटा  Vikings  और  the Detroit Lions  .
the  Bears-Packers rivalry is  एक  of the oldest rivalries in NFL  इतिहास  , dating  वापस   to  1921 .
The San Fernando Valley ( locally known as `` The Valley  ''  ) is  an  urbanized  घाटी  located in the Los Angeles metropolitan area of southern California , United States , defined by the mountains of the Transverse Ranges circling it .
Home to  1.76   लाख   लोगों   ,  it lies north of the larger  और  more  populous  Los Angeles Basin  .
Nearly two thirds  of  the  घाटी   's  land  क्षेत्रफल  is part of the City of Los Angeles .
The other  incorporated   शहरों  in the valley are  ग्लेनडेल  , Burbank , San Fernando , Hidden Hills and  calabasas   .

The World of Coca-Cola , is a permanent exhibition featuring the history of The Coca-Cola Company .
Its well-known advertising as well as a host  of  entertainment  क्षेत्रों  and  आकर्षण   ,  and is located  in  Atlanta  ,  Georgia ( where the  कम्पनी  's headquarters are located  )  at  pemberton  Place ( named in  सम्मान  of John Pemberton  ,  the inventor of  coca-cola  ) .
as part of Georgia 's  संग्रहालय  .

Pretties is a 2005 science  fiction  novel and the second  किताब  of the Uglies Trilogy written by Scott Westerfeld .
It  is   नियत  in  a  future  dystopian  world  in  which everyone is turned `` Pretty '' by  चरम   कॉस्मेटिक  surgery  upon  reaching age 16 .
it  tells the story of teenager Tally Youngblood who  विद्रोहियों   विरूद्ध  society 's enforced conformity  .
Susan Leigh Vaughan Smith  (   born  September 26 , 1971 ) is an  अमरीकी   स्त्री  sentenced to life in prison for murdering her children .
Born in  संघ   ,  South  कैरोलिना  , and  a   पूर्व  student  of  the University  of   दक्षिण  Carolina Union , she was convicted on July 22 , 1995 for  murdering  her two sons , 3-year-old Michael Daniel Smith , born October 10 , 1991 ,  और  14-month-old Alexander Tyler Smith , born August 5 , 1993 .
the   मामला  gained worldwide attention shortly after it developed  ,   due   to  her claiming that  a  black man stole her car and kidnapped her sons .
वो   बाद  claimed that she suffered from  दिमागी  health  मुद्दे   कि  impaired her judgment .
According to  the  South Carolina Department of Corrections , Smith will  be  eligible for parole on November 4  ,   2024  , after serving a minimum of thirty years .
वो  is incarcerated at  दक्षिण   कैरोलिना  's Leath Correctional Institution ,  निकट  Greenwood .
माउंट  McKinley  (  also known  as  Denali taken from the Inuit  koyukon  Athabaskan language meaning `` The Great One '' ) is the highest mountain peak  in  the United  राज्य  and in North America with a  समिट   उन्नयन   of  above sea level .
At some  ,   the   आधार  to peak rise is considered the  largest  of any mountain situated entirely above sea level .
Measured by topographic prominence , it  is  the third most prominent peak after Mount Everest and  अकोंकागुआ  .
Located in the  अलास्का  Range in the interior of US state of Alaska , it is the centerpiece of  denali  National Park  और  Preserve  .
The first European to document sighting the mountain was George Vancouver in 1794 .
In 1903 , James Wickersham  अंकित  the first attempt  at  climbing  mckinley   जिससे  was unsuccessful .
In  1906  , Frederick Cook claimed the first ascent which  थी  later proven  to  be false .
The  पहला  verifiable ascent to  mckinley  's summit  थी  achieved on June  7  , 1913 by climbers Hudson Stuck , Harry Karstens ,  वाल्टर  Harper  ,  and  रॉबर्ट  Tatum .
In 1951  ,  Bradford Washburn pioneered  the  West Buttress route considered to be the safest  और  easiest route  और  therefore the  सबसे  popular currently in  उपयोग  .
the  Honda S600 is an automobile manufactured by Honda .
it  was launched in March 1964  .
Available  as  a roadster – bearing strong  प्रतिरूप  to  the   होंडा  S500 –  और  as a fastback coupé – introduced  in  March  1965  – the S600 was the  पहला  Honda available in two trim levels .
During  इसके  production run up to 1966 , the  मॉडल  styling would remain pretty much the same  ,  with the most notable  परिवर्तन  coming to  the  front grille , bumper , and headlights .
Powered  by  a DOHC , water-cooled , four-cylinder inline engine  साथ  four carburetors , the engine capacity was increased  to  606 cc from the S500 's 531 cc .
The engine produced at  8,500  rpm  और  had a top speed of .
साथ  the convertible weighing  in  at mere , the extra sheet metal of the coupe  तभी  added to the overall  वज़न  .
Suspension  थी  independent with sealed roller  कड़ी   ड्राइव  to each rear wheel .
The S600 was the first mass marketed  होंडा  car .
First offered only in right-hand  ड्राइव  , it soon  became  available in left-hand drive to appeal to export markets  .
There were a  few  pre-production S500s manufactured in left  हाथ   ड्राइव   ,   दो  or three  भी   होने  shown  in  some early sales brochures .
दोनो  the S600  roadster  and  coupé  were available in standard trim and  a  special  ,  upgraded package called the SM600  जिससे  included ,  among  other  वस्तुएं   ,  special  पेंट  colors ,  विशेष  badging , a standard radio and speaker , a special antenna in the  यात्री  side  सूर्य  visor , standard reversing lights  ,   a  standard  सिगरेट  lighter , a standard heater , better cushioned seats , and a  detachable  seat track for quick removal of the passenger seat .
होंडा  built  3,912  roadsters in 1964 ,  साथ  production climbing to  7,261  convertibles and 1,519 coupes in 1965  .
Production dropped off  in  1966 ( as  वे  were shifting to the S800 ) with  तभी  111  roadsters  and  281  coupes  ,  giving tallies of  11,284   convertibles   और  1,800  coupes  for  the  3 year span .
Everybody Hates  क्रिस   is  an American television  काल  sitcom that depicts the teenage experiences of comedian Chris Rock ( who  is  also the narrator ) while growing up in the Bedford-Stuyvesant neighborhood of Brooklyn ,  नई   यॉर्क  .
the  show is set between  1983  and  1987   ;  however , Rock himself  थी  a teenager between 1978 and 1983  .
Rock  grew  up  साथ  a boy  नामित  Kenny Montero  ,  whom  he  has often  referred  to as the inspiration for a lot of  the  episodes .
In  अनेक  interviews , Rock has described Kenny as the  कारण  he got into  कॉमेडी  in the first  प्लेस  .
The  दिखाएँ  's title parodies the  सीबीएस  sitcom  everybody  Loves Raymond .
Rock stated : `` Everybody  loves  Raymond but Everybody Hates Chris  !  `` .
The show 's lead actors are Tyler James Williams , Terry Crews ,  tichina  Arnold , Tequan Richmond  ,  Imani Hakim ,  और  Vincent Martella .
In Fall 2008 , the  the  CW  स्थानांतरित  Everybody Hates Chris  और   the   खेल  to the Friday night  मौत  slot .
The fourth season  of  the series premiered  शुक्रवार  ,  अक्तूबर  3 , 2008 , at  8:00pm  Eastern/7:00PM Central  .
On May 21 , 2009 , The CW announced that  it  had  रद्द  Everybody Hates Chris .

Pleural  उत्सर्ग  is  excess  fluid that  accumulates  between the two  pleural  layers , the fluid-filled space that surrounds the lungs .
Excessive amounts of such fluid can impair breathing by limiting the expansion of the lungs  दौरान   वेंटिलेशन   .
Beowulf (  ;   in  Old English or ) is the conventional title of  an  Old  अंग्रेज़ी  heroic epic poem consisting  of  3182 alliterative long lines , set in  scandinavia   ,  commonly cited  as  one  of   the  most  महत्वपूर्ण   works   of  Anglo-Saxon literature .
It survives in  a  single manuscript known as the Nowell Codex  .
इसके   संयोजन  by an anonymous Anglo-Saxon poet is dated between  the  8th and  the  early 11th century .
In 1731  ,  the  पाण्डुलिपि   थी  badly  क्षतिग्रस्त  by a fire that swept through  a  building housing a  संग्रहण  of  मध्यकालीन  manuscripts  समवेत  by Sir Robert Bruce Cotton .
the  poem  गिरी  into obscurity for  दशकों  , and its  अस्तित्व   किया   नहीं  become widely known again until it  थी   मुद्रित  in 1815 in an edition prepared by  the  Icelandic-Danish scholar Grímur Jónsson Thorkelin .
In the poem , Beowulf ,  a  hero of the Geats in Scandinavia , comes to the help of  hroðgar  , the king of the Danes , whose mead hall ( in Heorot )  रै  been under attack by a monster known as Grendel .
After Beowulf slays  उसे  , Grendel 's  माँ   हमले  the  हॉल   और  is  तब   भी  defeated .
Victorious , Beowulf  goes  home to Geatland in Sweden  और  later becomes king  of  the Geats .
After a period of fifty years  रै   passed   ,  Beowulf defeats  a  dragon , but  is  fatally wounded in the battle .
After  उसके  death ,  उसके  attendants bury  उसे  in a tumulus  ,   a   दफ़न  mound , in Geatland .
shem  Ham and Japheth by James Tissot  1904   .
Shem  (  ; Sēm  ;  Arabic : Sām ; Ge'ez : ሴም , Sēm ; `` renown  ;  prosperity ;  नाम   ''  ) was one of the sons of  नूह  in the Hebrew  बाइबल   as  well as in Islamic  साहित्य  .
He is most popularly  regarded  as  the  eldest son  ,  though some traditions regard him as  the  second son  .
Genesis 10:21 refers to relative ages of Shem  और  his brother Japheth , but with sufficient  ambiguity  to  have  yielded different translations .
The verse is translated in  the  KJV  as   ``  Unto Shem also , the  पिता  of all the children  of  Eber , the brother  of  Japheth the elder , even to  उसे   यहूद  children born . `` .
However ,  the   नई  American Standard Bible gives , `` Also  to  Shem , the father of  सब   the  children of Eber , and  the  older  bhai   of  Japheth , children were born .  ''
Genesis 11:10  रिकॉर्ड  that Shem was  स्टिल  100 years old at the birth of Arphaxad  ,  ( but  nearly  101  -  see  कालक्रम  note , ) two years after the flood , making him barely  99  at the time the  बाढ़  began ; and that he  जिया  for another 500 years  बाद  this , making his  आयु  at death 600 years .
The children  of  Shem were Elam ,  asshur  , Arphaxad  ,  Lud , and Aram , in addition  to  daughters  .
Abraham , the patriarch of the Hebrews and  arabs  ,  थी  one of  the  descendants of Arphaxad .
इस्लामी   साहित्य  describes Shem  as  one  of  the  believing  sons of Noah .
कुछ   स्त्रोत  even  पहचानो  Shem as a  नबी  in his own  सही   और  that he was  the   अगला   नबी   बाद  his  पिता  .
In one Muslim legend ,  shem  was  एक  of  the   लोगों  that God  बना  Jesus  उठाएगा  as a sign to the  children  of Israel .
The 1st century  इतिहासकार  Flavius Josephus  ,  among many others , recounted the  परंपरा  that these five sons were the progenitors of the  राष्ट्र  of Elam , Assyria , Chaldea , Lydia , and Syria , respectively .
Semitic  is  still  a  commonly used term for  the  Semitic languages , as  a  subset of the Afro-Asiatic languages , denoting the common  भाषाई  heritage of Arabic ,  aramaic   ,  Akkadian , Ethiopic , Hebrew and  फ़ोनीशियाई  languages .
according  to  कुछ  Jewish traditions (  e.g.  , B.  talmud  Nedarim 32b  ;   उत्पत्ति  Rabbah  46:7  ;  उत्पत्ति  Rabbah 56:10 ; Leviticus  rabbah  25:6  ;  Numbers  rabbah  4:8 . ) , Shem is believed to have been Melchizedek ,  किंग  of Salem whom Abraham is recorded to have met after  the  battle of the  चार  kings  .
In a few of the  अनेक   extra-biblical  sources that describe him , Shem is also  credited  with killing Nimrod ,  बेटे   of  Cush  .
shem  is  उल्लेखित   in  Genesis  5:32  , 6:10 ; 7:13 ; 9:18,23,26-27 ;  10  ; 11:10 ; also in 1  क्रॉनिकल्स  1:4 .

go   पापा   or  Go Daddy Group Inc.  is   a  privately held company that  is  primarily an  अंतरजाल   डोमेन  registrar and web hosting company .
Go Daddy Group Inc. filed  लिये   an  IPO  in  2006  ,  but later canceled it , due to `` market  uncertainties  '' .
In addition to domain registration and hosting  go  Daddy also sells e-business related  तन्त्र  and services .
On June 24 , 2011  ,  The  वॉल  Street  जर्नल  reported  कि  private-equity firms KKR and Silver Lake Partners , along with a  तीसरा  investor , were nearing a deal to buy  the   कम्पनी   लिये  between  $  2–2.5  अरब  .
on  July 1 ,  2011  Go Daddy  पुष्टि  that KKR , Silver Lake Partners and  प्रौद्योगिकी   क्रॉसओवर   ventures  had closed the deal .
Although the purchase  दाम   थी  not officially announced it was reported to be $ 2.25  अरब  , for 65 % of the company .
, Bob Parsons  था  ceded  the  CEO  भूमिका  of Go Daddy to Warren Adelman  ,  who  था   महरूम  with  the  company for  परिचय  10  सालो  .

Andorra (  ;  , ) , officially the Principality of Andorra ( )  ,  also called  the   principality  of the Valleys of Andorra ,  (  )  ,  is  a   landlocked  microstate in Southwestern Europe , located in  the  eastern Pyrenees mountains and bordered by Spain and France .
It is the sixth smallest nation in  यूरोपीय  , having an area of  और  an  अनुमानित  population of  85,000   in  2012 .
Its capital , Andorra la Vella , is the  उच्चतम  capital city  in  Europe ,  at  an elevation of above  समुद्र  level  .
the  official language is  कैटलन  , although Spanish , Portuguese , and  फ्रेंच  are also commonly spoken .
Created under a charter in 988 , the present Principality was formed in  1278  .
It is known as  a  principality  as  it is a monarchy headed by two co-princes – the Bishop of Urgell and the President of France  .
Andorra  is  a prosperous  देश  mainly because of its tourism industry , which services an estimated  10.2  million visitors annually , and also because of  इसके  status  as  a tax  हेवन  .
it  is not  a  member of  the  European Union  ,  but the euro is the de facto currency .
The people of Andorra have the 4th highest human life expectancy in  the  world — 82  सालो  at birth .
The George Washington University ( GW , GWU , or George Washington ) is a comprehensive private , coeducational research university located in Washington  ,   d.C.  .
It awards certificates ,  स्नातक  degrees  ,  Masters  डिग्री  , and PhDs  आरपार  several dozen disciplines  .
The university was chartered by an Act of Congress on February 9 , 1821 as The Columbian College in the District  of  Columbia .
Kimberly Noel `` Kim '' Kardashian ( born October 21 , 1980  )  is an  अमरीकी  socialite , television  व्यक्तित्व  and  occasional  actress .
In 2007 , she gained notoriety as  the   विषय  of a  sex  tape that subsequently resulted in a court  awarding  her $  5  million ; later in that  वही  year , she and her family  रोज़  to  prominence  with their E !
reality  टेलीविज़न  series Keeping Up with the Kardashians  ,  and its subsequent spin-offs , including Kourtney and  किम  Take New York and Kourtney  और  Kim Take Miami .
In 2010  ,  Kardashian was the highest-earning reality star ,  साथ  estimated  आय  of  $  6  लाख  .
With sisters Kourtney and Khloé  ,  Kardashian  co-owns  the fashion boutique chain D-A-S-H .
वो   रै  been involved in the production  of  several  लाइनों  of clothing and fragrances .
in  August 2011  ,  Kardashian  शादीशुदा  basketball player Kris Humphries in a  widely  publicized  रस्म   .
That  अक्तूबर  , Kardashian filed for divorce following 72 days of marriage .
The move  garnered  significant backlash  इससे   the  media , who  labeled  it a `` publicity stunt '' .
