oahu  (  )  or  oahu   ,  known as `` The Gathering Place '' , is the  तीसरा  largest of the Hawaiian Islands and  the  most populous of the islands  in  the U.S. state of  हवाई  .
The  राज्य  capital , Honolulu , is  on  Oahu 's southeast coast .
सहित  small close-in offshore islands such  as  Ford Island and the islands in Kaneohe Bay and off the eastern ( windward ) coast , it has a  कुल   जमीन  area of , making it the 20th largest island in the United States .
In the greatest dimension , this volcanic island is long  और  across  .
The length of the shoreline is .
The island is the result of  दो   पृथक  shield volcanoes : Waianae and Koolau , with  a  broad `` valley '' or  काठी  ( the  सेंट्रल  Oahu  मैदान  ) between  उन्हें  .
The highest point  is  Mt . Ka'ala in the Waianae  दायरा  , rising to  ऊपर  sea level  .
The base currency  of  the United States  is  the U.S.  डालर  , and is printed on bills in denominations of $ 1 , $  2   ,  $ 5 , $ 10 , $ 20 ,  $   50   ,  and $ 100 .
At  एक  time , however , U.S. currency included five  larger  denominations .
Notes  in   the  denominations  of  $ 500 , $ 1,000 , $ 5,000 , and $ 10,000 were printed for general  उपयोग  ,  और  a $ 100,000 note was printed for certain internal transactions .
British Honduras was  a  British colony  in  Central America .
in  1981 , the colony gained full  स्वतंत्रता  , and is now  the  independent nation of Belize .
First colonised  by  Spaniards in the  17th  century , the territory  on  the east coast of Central  अमेरिका  , south of  मैक्सिको  , became a British crown colony in 1862 .
In  1964  , it became a self-governing colony .
Belize became fully independent from the United  किंगडम  in 1981 .
बेलीज़  was the last continental possession of the  संयुक्त  Kingdom in the Americas .
Spelt , also known as dinkel wheat  ,  or hulled  गेहूं  ,  is   an   प्राचीन  species of  गेहूं  from  the   पांचवां  millennium BC .
Spelt  थी  an  महत्वपूर्ण  staple  in  parts  of   यूरोपीय   इससे  the Bronze  आयु  to medieval times ; it now survives as a relict crop in Central Europe and northern Spain and has found a new market as a health  खाना  .
Spelt is  sometimes   माना   a   subspecies  of the closely  सम्बन्धित  species common  गेहूं  ( T. aestivum ) , in which case  इसके   वनस्पति   नाम  is considered to be Triticum  aestivum   subsp  . spelta .
it  is a hexaploid  गेहूं  , which  अर्थात्   it  has six sets of chromosomes  .
Sherlock Holmes ( or  )  is a  fictional  detective  निर्मित   by  author and  चिकित्सक  Sir  आर्थर   कोनन  Doyle .
A London-based `` consulting  जासूस   ''  whose abilities border on the fantastic  ,  Holmes is famous  लिये  his astute  लॉजिकल  reasoning , his ability to adopt almost any disguise , and his use of  forensic  science  कौशल  to solve  मुश्किल  cases .
holmes  , who first appeared in publication in 1887 , was  प्रदर्शित   in  four  novels  and 56 short stories .
The first novel , A Study in Scarlet , appeared in Beeton 's Christmas Annual  in   1887  and the second , The Sign of the Four ,  in  Lippincott 's Monthly  पत्रिका  in  1890  .
The  अक्षर  grew tremendously  in  popularity with the first series of short stories in The Strand Magazine , beginning with A Scandal in Bohemia  in  1891  ;  further  श्रेणी   of  short stories  और  two novels published in  सीरियल  form appeared between then and  1927  .
The stories cover a period from around 1880  up  to 1914 .
All but four stories are narrated  by   holmes  's friend and biographer , Dr. John H.  वाटसन  ; two are narrated by  holmes  himself ( ``  the  Blanched Soldier `` and `` The Lion  's   माने  `` )  और  two others are written  in  the third  व्यक्ति  ( `` The  mazarin  Stone ``  और  `` His Last Bow `` ) .
in  two stories ( `` The Musgrave Ritual `` and  ``  The  ग्लोरिया  Scott `` )  ,  Holmes tells Watson the main story from his memories , while Watson becomes the narrator  of  the frame  स्टोरी  .
the  first and fourth novels , A  पढ़ाई  in Scarlet and  the  Valley of Fear , each include a long interval of omniscient  narration  recounting  कार्यक्रम  unknown to either Holmes or Watson  .
The  संयुक्त  States  हाउस  of Representatives is one of the two houses of the  संयुक्त   राज्य   कॉंग्रेस  (  a  bicameral  विधानमंडल   )   .
It is frequently  referred  to as the  हाउस  .
The other house is  the  Senate .
the   संयोजन  and powers of the  हाउस  are established  in  Article One of the United States Constitution .
The major  शक्ति  of  the  House  is  to  pass  federal legislation that affects  the  entire  देश   हालांकि   इसके  bills must  भी  be passed by the  सीनेट  and further agreed to  by   the  U.S.  अध्यक्ष  before becoming  विधि  ( unless both the House and  सीनेट  re-pass  the  legislation with  a  two-thirds majority in each chamber ) .
the  House has several exclusive powers :  the  power  to  initiate  आय  bills , to  impeach  officials , and to elect the U.S. President in case there is no majority in the Electoral College  .
Each U.S.  राज्य   is  represented in the House  in  proportion to its  जनसांख्यिकी  but is entitled to at least one representative .
the   सबसे  populous state , California  ,  currently  रै  53  प्रतिनिधि  .
The total number of voting  प्रतिनिधि  is fixed by law at 435 .
Each representative serves for a two-year term .
The Speaker of the United States  हाउस  of Representatives  ,  who presides over the  कक्ष  ,  is  elected by the members  of  the House ,  और  is therefore traditionally the leader of the House  लोकतांत्रिक  Caucus or the  हाउस  Republican Conference , whichever  पार्टी  has more voting members .
The House meets  in   the  south  wing  of the United States Capitol .
Jell-O is a brand name belonging  to  U.S.-based Kraft Foods for a  क्रमांक  of  जिलेटिन   desserts  ,  सहित  fruit gels  ,   puddings  and no-bake  मलाई  pies .
The brand 's popularity has led to it  होने  used  as  a generic term for  जिलेटिन   मिठाई   आरपार  the U.S.  और  Canada .
Kennywood is an amusement park located in West  mifflin  , Pennsylvania , a suburb of Pittsburgh .
the  park  पहला  opened in 1898  as  a  ``  trolley park  ''  attraction  at  the end  of  the Mellon family 's  monongahela  Street Railway .
the  park was purchased in  1906   by  F. W.  henninger   और  Andrew McSwigan and thus began the Kennywood Entertainment company  कि   रै  remained a closely held family business  लिये  over 100 years .
इस  traditional amusement park still  रै  structures and rides dating  वापस  to  इसके  opening and  the   जल्दी   1900s  .
Along with Rye Playland Park , it is one  of  only  दो  amusement parks listed  in  the National Register of Historic Places .
Kennywood is owned by Kennywood Entertainment Company ,  जिससे   जबतक  December 2007 was a closely  आयोजित  family  कारोबार  owned by the Henninger and  mcswigan  families .
Kennywood Entertainment is now operated by California-based  राजमहल  Entertainment , a subsidiary  of  Parques Reunidos  ,  an international amusement park company based  in  Madrid  ,  Spain  .
Parque Reunidos is in turn a subsidiary of Candover Investments  ,  an investment fund based  in  the UK .
a  Social Security card issued by the Railroad Retirement  फलक   in  1943 to a now deceased person .
In the United States , a  सोशल  Security number ( SSN ) is a nine-digit number  जारी  to U.S.  नागरिकों  , permanent residents  ,  and temporary ( working  )  residents under  खण्ड  205 ( c ) ( 2  )  of the Social Security Act  ,   संहिताबद्ध   as  .
The  क्रमांक   is  issued to an individual  by  the Social Security  प्रशासन  , an independent  एजेंसी  of  the  United  राज्य  government  .
Its  प्राथमिक   purpose   is  to  track  individuals for Social Security  उद्देश्य   .
A Social Security  क्रमांक  may be  प्राप्त   by  applying  on  Form SS-5 , ``  अनुप्रयोग  for A  सोशल  Security Number Card '' .
Minimalism describes movements in various forms of  आर्ट   और  design ,  विशेषकर  visual  आर्ट  and music , where the work is set out to expose  the  essence or identity of a subject through eliminating all non-essential forms , features or concepts .
Minimalism is  कोई  design  or  style in  जिससे  the simplest and fewest elements are  प्रयुक्त  to create the maximum effect .
As a specific movement in  the  arts  it  is  पहचाना  with  developments   in  post–World War II Western Art , most strongly with American visual arts in the 1960s and  जल्दी  1970s .
Prominent artists associated with this movement  शामिल  Donald Judd  ,   जॉन   mccracken  , Agnes  मार्टिन  , Dan Flavin ,  रॉबर्ट  Morris , Anne Truitt  ,  and  फ़्रैंक  Stella .
It is rooted  in  the reductive aspects of  modernism   ,  and is often interpreted  as  a reaction  विरूद्ध  Abstract  अभिव्यंजनावाद  and a bridge to Postminimal  आर्ट   practices  .
The terms  have  expanded to encompass a movement in music which  सुविधाएँ  repetition and iteration , as in the compositions of La  मोंटे  Young  ,   टेरी  Riley ,  स्टीव  Reich , Philip  कांच  , and John Adams .
Minimalist compositions are sometimes known  as   प्रणालियों  music .
The term `` minimalist '' is  प्रायः  applied colloquially to designate anything that is  अतिरिक्त   or  stripped  to  its  अनिवार्य  .
It has  भी   महरूम  used to describe the plays and novels of Samuel Beckett ,  the  films  of  Robert Bresson , the stories of Raymond Carver , and even the automobile designs of  कोलिन  Chapman .
The word was first used in English in  the  early 20th  सदी  to describe the Mensheviks  .
In chemistry and physics ,  डाल्टन  's law  (  also called Dalton 's  विधि   of  partial pressures ) states  कि  the total pressure  exerted  by  the   मिश्रण  of non-reactive gases is equal  to  the sum of the partial pressures  of  individual gases .
This empirical law was observed  by  John Dalton in 1801 and is related to the ideal gas  कानून  .
Mathematically ,  the  pressure of a mixture of gases can be  पारिभाषित  as the summation
or
जहाँ  represent the partial  दबाव  of each  घटक   .
It is assumed that  the   गैसों   do   नहीं  react with each other
where is the mole fraction of the  i-th  component in the total mixture of n  components  .
The  संबंध   नीचे   provides  a way to determine the volume based  विशेषज्ञता  of any individual gaseous component
where  is   the  concentration of the i-th component expressed  in  ppm  .
डाल्टन  's law  is   नहीं  exactly followed by real gases .
Those deviations are  considerably  large at high pressures .
in  such conditions , the volume  occupied  by the molecules  can  become  significant  compared to the free space between them .
In particular  ,  the short  औसत  distances between  अणुओं  raises the  तीव्रता  of intermolecular forces between gas molecules enough to substantially  बदलें  the pressure exerted by  उन्हें  .
Neither of those effects are considered  by  the ideal gas  मॉडल   .
This is a list of the largest  संयुक्त   राज्य  colleges and universities  by  enrollment  लिये  colleges and universities in the  संयुक्त  States .
What this list includes:
Colleges  और  universities within the United  राज्य
University systems if the system is  चलाएं   अंतर्गत  a single administration
Enrollment is the sum of the headcount of undergraduate and  ग्रैजुएट  students
Enrollment is  गिने  by the Integrated  post-secondary  Education System within the U.S. Department of Education .
नामांकन  is the 12-month  unduplicated   headcount  , indicating  the  number of unique students  जो   attended   the   विश्वविद्यालयों   दौरान   the  year .
What  इस  list  करता  not include:
Any indication of how many of the enrolled students  हैं  full or part time ( e.g. , some universities may  have   a  high enrollment , but have most students enrolled in  तभी  a single class )
For other  सूचियाँ   कि  measure university enrollment , see the  देखिए  Also section below .
`` Right Round '' is  a  song performed by American rapper  flo   rida  , released as  the  lead single  इससे  his  दूसरी  studio album  ,  R.O.O.T.S . ( 2009 ) .
The song features guest vocals  इससे  Kesha  .
it  was released to radio on 27 January  2009  and  थी  digitally released on 10 February by Poe Boy Entertainment and Atlantic  रिकॉर्ड  .
The  सोंग  lyrically speaks  of  Flo  rida  's  जाल  ball referee enthusiasm , while adapting  the  chorus of the 1984 Dead or Alive  सोंग  `` You Spin Me Round  (  Like a  रिकार्ड   )  `` in  इसके  hook .
According  to  one of the song  's  writers  ,  the chorus refers to oral sex .
Kesha  contributed  guest vocals to  the   सोंग  , but in the  संयुक्त   राज्य  ,  दौरान  the run atop  the  chart  ,  Kesha was uncredited .
The song received mostly negative reviews from critics , who claimed it was kitsch and misogynistic .
However  ,  it was a commercial success , reaching  the  top  टेन  of the charts in nineteen  देशों  worldwide .
In the United States , it became  flo  Rida 's second number-one single and broke the record for first-week sales when  it   थी  released to digital retailers .
The  सिंगल  's  accompanying  music video was directed by Malcolm Jones and nominated for  an   एमटीवी  Video Music Award .
the   सोंग  has been used in several movies , such as The  hangover   ,  The Ugly Truth and  the   तेलुगु  movie Pilla  zamindar   .
In the movie Pitch Perfect , the song is performed by the a cappella group the Treblemakers .
The Chief Justice  of  the United  राज्य  is the head of the United States federal court system ( the  न्यायिक  branch  of  the federal government of the United States ) and the  मुख्य  judge of the  परम्  Court of the United States .
The Chief Justice  is   एक  of  नौ  Supreme  अदालत  justices ; the  अन्य  eight  हैं  the Associate Justices of the Supreme Court of  the  United States .
From  1789  until 1866 , the office was known as the Chief Justice of the Supreme Court .
The Chief Justice is  the  highest judicial officer in the country ,  और  acts as a  मुख्य  administrative officer for the federal courts and as head of  the  Judicial  सम्मेलन  of the United States  appoints  the director of the  प्रशासनिक  Office of  the   संयुक्त  States Courts  .
The Chief Justice  भी   serves  as a  प्रवक्ता  for the judicial branch .
The Chief  इंसाफ  leads  the  business of  the   परम्  Court .
He presides over oral arguments before the court .
When the court  renders  an opinion , the Chief Justice—when  in  the majority—decides who writes the court  's  opinion .
The  मुख्य   इंसाफ   भी  has significant agenda-setting power over the court 's meetings .
In the case of an impeachment of a President  of  the  संयुक्त  States ,  जिससे   रै  occurred twice , the Chief  इंसाफ  presides over the  विचारण  in the Senate .
In modern tradition , the Chief Justice has the ceremonial  ड्यूटी  of administering the oath of office of the President of the United States .
The first Chief  इंसाफ  was  जॉन   jay  .
The  17th  and current Chief  इंसाफ   is  John  G.  Roberts , Jr .
हिरण  near Prudhoe Bay , 1973
Prudhoe Bay Oil Field is a large oil field  on   अलास्का  's North  ढलान  .
it  is the largest  आयल   फ़ील्ड  in both the United  राज्य   और   in  North America  ,   covering  and originally containing approximately of oil  .
The amount  of  recoverable oil in  the  field is  अधिक  than double that of the next largest field  in  the United States , the East Texas oil field .
The field is  संचालित  by BP  ;   साझेदार  are ExxonMobil and ConocoPhillips Alaska .
Labor unions are  legally  recognized as representatives of workers in many  उद्योग  in  the   संयुक्त  States  .
Their activity today centers on  सामूहिक  bargaining over wages , benefits  ,  and working conditions for their membership  ,  and on representing their  सदस्यों  in disputes with management over  उल्लंघनों  of contract provisions .
Larger unions also  typically  engage in  lobbying  activities and electioneering at the state and federal  स्तर  .
Most unions in America are aligned with one  of  two larger umbrella organizations : the AFL-CIO created in 1955 , and the Change to Win Federation which split  इससे  the AFL-CIO in 2005 .
Both advocate policies and  विधान  on behalf of  मजदूर  in the United  राज्य  and  कनाडा  , and  लो   an  active role  in  politics .
the  AFL-CIO is  विशेषकर  concerned with global trade issues .
In 2010 , the percentage of workers belonging to a union in the United States (  or  total labor union ``  घनत्व   ''  )  थी   11.4  % , compared to 18.4 % in Germany , 27.5 % in Canada  ,  and 70 % in Finland .
Union membership in the  निजी  sector has fallen  अंतर्गत  7 % — levels  नहीं  seen since 1932 .
संघ  allege that employer-incited opposition has  contributed  to this decline  in  membership .
the  most prominent unions  हैं  among public sector employees  ऐसे  as  शिक्षक  and police .
Members of  संघ  are disproportionately older  ,  male and  निवासियों  of the Northeast , the Midwest , and California .
Union workers  औसत  10-30  %  higher pay than non-union in  अमेरिका  after  controlling  for individual , job ,  और  labor market characteristics .
Although much smaller compared to  उनके  peak membership  in  the 1950s , American  संघ  remain a prominent political  फ़ैक्टर   ,   दोनो  through mobilization  of  their own memberships and through coalitions  साथ  like-minded activist  संगठन   around  issues such  as  immigrant rights , trade policy , health care , and living wage campaigns .
To fight  कथित  employer anti-union programs  ,  unions are currently advocating  नई   ``  card check `` federal  विधान  that would require employers to  सौदेबाजी  with a union if more than  50   %  of workers signed  फ़ॉर्म  , or `` cards ,  ''   stating  they  काश  to be  represented  by that union .
The current procedure involves waiting 45 to 90  दिनों  for a federally supervised secret-ballot employee  referendum  on the subject .
The  अर्थशास्त्री   जोसेफ  Stiglitz has  asserted  that ,  ``   दमदार   संघ  have  helped  to reduce inequality  ,   whereas  weaker  संघ   have  made it easier for CEOs , sometimes working  साथ  market forces  कि   वे   have  helped  आकार  , to increase it .  ''
The decline in unionization since WWII in  the  United  राज्य  has been associated with  a  pronounced rise in  आय   और  wealth inequality  .
A Christian Lacroix fashion boutique
A boutique  is  a small shopping outlet , especially one that specializes in elite and  फैशनेबल  items such as clothing and jewelry .
The word is French  लिये   ``  shop '' , via Latin from Greek ἀποθήκη ( apothēkē ) , `` storehouse '' .
the  term entered into  रोज  English use in the late 1960s when , for  a  brief period , London  थी  the centre of the fashion trade .
carnaby   गली  and  the  Kings Road were the focus of much media attention as home to  the  most  फैशनेबल  boutiques of the  era  .
अभी  the East of London has  महरूम  regenerated and  अधिक  Boutiques pop  up   in  fashionable areas , such  as  Tower Bridge Road .
It can also refer to a specialised  कड़  such  as  a  बुटीक  investment bank  or  boutique law firm .
The word is often  प्रयुक्त  to describe a property in the independent section  of  the  होटल   मार्केट  ( such as The Rockwell in London  )   in   अनुक्रम  to distinguish  themselves  from larger chains ( such as Hilton Hotels ) .
In such  मामले  the  establishments  aim to convey the idea that the operation is  elite  and highly specialised .
in  the  strictest  sense  of  the word , boutiques would be one-of-a-kind but more  generally   बोलना  , some  जंजीरों  can  be  referred to as boutiques  if  they specialize in particular styles .
Recently , the term ``  बुटीक  '' has started  होने  applied to normally-mass-market items that are either niche or produced in  intentionally  small numbers at very high prices .
इस   may  be referred to  as  boutique  निर्माण  .
For example  ,  before the release of the  वी  , a Time Magazine  आलेख  suggested that Nintendo could become a ``  बुटीक  video-game company '' , producing games  लिये  niche  ऑडियंस  , rather than  trying  to compete directly with Microsoft and  सोनी  .
In the traditional  luxury-  watch industry Scalfaro International  is   माना  as the precursor  in  manufacturing and sale of  bespoke   घड़ियाँ   .
The  स्विस  company uses a  अत्यधिक  flexible boutique manufacturing site , which allows producing  छोटी  series or even unique timepieces  .
Although some  boutiques  specialise in  hand-made   वस्तुएं  and other truly one-of-a-kind items , others  बस  produce t-shirts , stickers , and other fashion accessories in artificially small runs and sell them at  unusually  high prices .
In  the   जल्दी  1990s Selena started manufacturing her own line of women 's clothing .
Opening two boutiques labeled as  ``  Selena Etc  .  Boutique &  सैलून  '' One  स्तिथ  in Corpus Christi and one located  in  San Antonio , Texas .
One was due to open in Monterrey  ,  Mexico ,  in  1995 but due  to   उसके  death it was not opened .
Around 1999  the  San Antonio location  बंद  and the Corpus Christi location was  बंद  in 2009  .
in  late 1990s some European retail traders developed the idea of tailoring a shop towards a lifestyle theme ,  in  the form of  ``  concept  स्टोर्स  '' , which specialised in cross-selling without using separate departments .
One of the first concept stores  थी   10  Corso Como in Milan , Italy followed by Colette in Paris and Quartier 206 in Berlin .
Several well-known American chains such as Urban  outfitters  , D-A-S-H , and  the  Gap , Australian chain Billabong and , though  कम   आम  , Lord & Taylor adapted to the concept store trend after 2000  .
Navy Federal Credit Union  (  or Navy Federal ) is  a  credit union headquartered in Vienna  ,  Virginia ,  चार्टर्ड  and regulated under the authority of  the  National Credit Union Administration  (  NCUA ) of the U.S.  संघीय   सरकारी  .
Navy Federal is the largest natural member ( or  खुदरा  ) credit union in the world ,  दोनो  in asset size and in membership .
As  of  September 2012 , Navy Federal had over $ 50 billion USD in assets ,  और  over 4 million members  .
Stevland Hardaway Morris ( born  may  13 , 1950  as  Stevland Hardaway  judkins  ) , known by his stage  नाम  Stevie Wonder , is an American singer ,  songwriter   ,  and multi-instrumentalist ,  a  child  prodigy   जो  developed into one of  the  most creative musical figures of the late 20th century  .
Blind since shortly after  जनम  ,  अचरज  signed  साथ   motown  's Tamla label at the  आयु   of   ग्यारह  , and continues  to  perform and  रिकार्ड  for  motown  to this day .
among  Wonder 's best  ज्ञात   works   हैं  singles such as `` Superstition `` , `` Sir Duke `` , `` You Are the Sunshine of My Life ``  और  `` I Just Called to Say  i  Love You  ``  .
Well known albums also include Talking Book , Innervisions and Songs in the Key of Life  .
He has recorded  अधिक  than thirty U.S. top ten  हिट्स  and received  twenty-two   ग्रैमी  Awards  ,  the most ever  awarded   to  a male solo artist .
Wonder is also noted for his work as an activist for political causes , including his 1980 campaign to make Martin Luther  किंग  , Jr. 's birthday a holiday  in  the United States .
in  2009 ,  अचरज   थी  named  a  United Nations Messenger of Peace .
In 2008  ,  Billboard magazine released a list of the  hot  100 All-Time Top Artists to celebrate the  us  singles chart 's fiftieth anniversary  ,  with Wonder at number  पाँच  .
By popular vote , Stevie was inducted  into  The SoulMusic Hall of  कीर्ति   at  SoulMusic.com  in  December 2012  .
मनस्ताप  ( from the Greek ψυχή  ``   psyche  '' , for mind/soul , and -ωσις `` -osis '' , for  असामान्य  condition or  derangement  ) refers to an abnormal condition of the mind , and is a generic psychiatric term for  a   दिमागी  state often described as involving a  ``  loss of contact with reality `` .
People suffering from psychosis are described as psychotic .
Psychosis  is  given to the  अधिक   कठोर  forms  of  psychiatric disorder , during which hallucinations  और  delusions , gross excitement or stupor and  impaired  insight may occur .
the  term  ``  psychosis '' is very broad and can mean anything  इससे  relatively normal aberrant experiences through to the complex and catatonic expressions of schizophrenia  और  bipolar type  1  disorder .
moreover  a wide variety of central nervous system diseases , from both external substances and internal  physiologic   बीमारी  , can produce symptoms of psychosis .
This  led  many professionals to say  कि  psychosis is  नहीं   विशिष्ट  enough as a diagnostic term .
Despite  इस  , `` psychosis  ''   is  generally given  to  noticeable deficits in normal behavior (  ऋणात्मक  signs  )  and more commonly to diverse types of hallucinations or delusional beliefs  (   e.g  . grandiosity , delusions  of  persecution ) .
Someone exhibiting very obvious signs may be described  as  ``  frankly   psychotic  '' , whereas one exhibiting very subtle signs could be  वर्गीकृत  in the category of an `` attenuated psychotic risk syndrome ''  .
An  excess  in dopaminergic signalling is traditionally linked  to  the positive  लक्षण  of psychosis  ,  especially those  of  schizophrenia  .
This is thought  to   occur  through  a  mechanism of aberrant salience of environmental  stimuli   .
Many  antipsychotic  drugs accordingly target the dopamine system ; meta-analyses of placebo-controlled  ट्रायल  of  ये  drugs , however  ,  show either no  significant  difference between drug  और  placebo , or a very small effect size ,  suggesting  that the pathophysiology  of  psychosis is much more complex than an overactive dopamine system .
People experiencing psychosis may exhibit some personality changes and thought disorder .
Depending on its severity , this may  be  accompanied by unusual or bizarre behavior ,  as  well as difficulty with social interaction and impairment in carrying  आउट  daily  जीवन  activities  .
सामान्य  Grievous is a  fictional  character in the Star  युद्धों  universe .
A recurring antagonist  ,  he is the Supreme Commander of the Confederacy of Independent Systems , a political faction  of  planetary systems  waging  war on the Galactic  गणतंत्र  .
Trained in all  सात  forms of lightsaber combat  by  Count Dooku ,  he   is  a ruthless  और  powerful warrior devoted to  जेडी  's destruction during the Clone  युद्धों  .
His  अधिनियमों  of  wanton  aggression and high Jedi body count  होता  prompt  the  galaxy to give him the nickname the Knightslayer .
हालांकि  the notorious Jedi  slayer   थी  the being in  the  galaxy during the  क्लोन  Wars  जो  had killed the  सबसे  Jedi  in  single combat , he did not  संकोच   to  flee from battles  he  knew he would lose .
Statistics play an important role in  summarizing  baseball performance and evaluating players  in  the sport .
Since the flow of a baseball game  रै  natural breaks to it , and normally players act individually rather than performing in clusters , the sport lends itself  to  easy record-keeping and statistics .
Statistics have  महरूम  kept for professional baseball since the creation of the  नेशनल  League and American League  ,   अभी  part of Major League Baseball .
Many statistics are also available from outside of Major League Baseball , from leagues  ऐसे  as the National Association of Professional Base  बॉल   खिलाड़ी  and the Negro Leagues .
dorothea  Lange 's Migrant  माँ  depicts destitute pea pickers  in  California , centering on Florence Owens Thompson , age  32  , a mother of seven children , in Nipomo , California ,  कूच  1936 .
यूएसए  annual  रियल  GDP from  1910–60  , with the years of the Great Depression (  1929–1939  ) highlighted .
The unemployment rate in  the  US 1910–1960 ,  साथ  the  सालो  of the Great Depression ( 1929–1939 ) highlighted .
The Great Depression was a severe worldwide economic depression in the decade preceding World War  ii   .
The  समय  of the  ग्रेट  Depression varied across nations , but in most countries it started in 1930  और  lasted until the  लेट  1930s or middle 1940s  .
it  was the  longest  , most widespread  ,  and deepest depression of the 20th century .
In the  21st   सदी  , the  ग्रेट   अवसाद   is  commonly used as an example of how far the world 's economy can decline .
the  depression originated in the U.S.  ,  after  the  fall in stock prices that  began  around September 4 , 1929 , and became  विश्वव्यापी  news with the  भण्डार   मार्केट  crash of  अक्तूबर   29  ,  1929  ( known as Black  मंगलवार  ) .
the  Great Depression had devastating  प्रभाव  in countries rich  और  poor .
Personal  आय  , tax  आय  ,  profits  and prices dropped , while international  व्यापार  plunged by more than 50  %  .
Unemployment in the U.S. rose to 25 % , and in some countries rose as high as  33  % .
Cities  सब  around the world were  hit  hard , especially those dependent  on  heavy industry .
Construction  थी  virtually halted in many countries .
Farming and rural areas suffered as crop prices fell by approximately 60  %  .
Facing plummeting  माँग  with few  वैकल्पिक   स्त्रोत  of  कार्य  , areas  निर्भर  on primary sector industries such as cash cropping  ,   खनन  and logging suffered  the  most .
Some economies started to recover by  the   mid-1930s  .
In many countries , the negative effects of the Great Depression  lasted  until  the  end of  संसार  War  ii  .
a  premature  ventricular  contraction  (  PVC ) , also known as  a  premature ventricular complex , ventricular premature contraction ( or  जटिल  or complexes  )  (  vpc  ) , ventricular  असामयिक  beat  (  VPB )  ,  or ventricular extrasystole  (  VES  )  , is a relatively common event where the heartbeat is initiated by Purkinje  मछली  in the  ventricles  rather than by the sinoatrial  नोड   ,  the normal heartbeat  initiator   .
The electrical events  of  the heart detected by the electrocardiogram allow a PVC to be  easily  distinguished from a normal heart beat .
a   पीवीसी   may  be  आभास  as a `` skipped beat `` or felt as palpitations in the chest .
in  a  सामान्य  heartbeat , the ventricles contract after the atria have helped  to  fill them by contracting ; in this way  the  ventricles can pump a maximized amount of blood both  to  the lungs and to  the  rest of the  देह  .
In a  पीवीसी  , the ventricles contract first  और  before the atria have optimally  भर  the  ventricles  with  रक्त  ,  जिससे   अर्थात्  that circulation is inefficient .
However , single beat PVC  arrhythmias  do not usually pose a danger and  can  be asymptomatic in healthy individuals .
William  गेरी   busey   (  born June 29 , 1944  )  , better known as Gary Busey , is an American  फिल्मी  and stage  कर्ता   ,  and artist  .
He has appeared in  a  variety of films , including Lethal Weapon ,  पाइंट  Break , and Under Siege , as  खूब  as guest appearances on Gunsmoke , Walker ,  टेक्सास  Ranger , Law & Order ,  और  Entourage  .
He was nominated for an  अकादमी  Award for Best  कर्ता  in 1978 for his  भूमिका  in The  दोस्त  Holly  स्टोरी   .
The Anti-Counterfeiting Trade Agreement ( ACTA ) ,  is  a multinational treaty for the purpose of  establishing  international standards for intellectual property  अधिकारों   प्रवर्तन  .
The agreement aims to establish  an   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  legal framework for targeting counterfeit goods , generic  दवाइयाँ  and copyright infringement on the Internet , and would create  a  new  शासी  body outside existing forums , such as the  संसार   व्यापार  Organization ,  the  World Intellectual Property Organization  ,  or  the  United  राष्ट्र  .
The  अनुबंध   थी  signed  in  October 2011  by   ऑस्ट्रेलिया  , Canada , Japan , Morocco , New Zealand ,  सिंगापुर  , South  कोरियाई  , and the United States .
In 2012 , Mexico , the European Union and 22 countries  जिससे  are member states of the European Union  हस्ताक्षरित  as well .
One signatory  (  Japan ) has ratified ( formally approved )  the  agreement  ,  which would come  into   फ़ोर्स   in  countries that ratified  it  after ratification by six countries .
Supporters  have  described the agreement as a response to ``  the  increase  in  global trade of counterfeit goods  और  pirated copyright protected works  ''  .
ट्रेड  Unions representing workers in the music , film and TV industries and large intellectual property-based  संगठन  such as the Motion Picture Association of America and Pharmaceutical Research and Manufacturers of America were active  in  the treaty 's development .
Opponents  कह  the  सम्मेलन   adversely  affects fundamental rights including freedom of expression and  गोपनीयता  .
ACTA has also been criticised by Doctors Without Borders for endangering  अभिगम  to medicines in  विकासशील  countries .
the  secret  प्रकृति  of negotiations has excluded civil society  समूह   ,  developing countries and the general public from the agreement  's  negotiation process and it has  महरूम  described as policy laundering by  आलोचकों  including the Electronic Frontier Foundation and the Entertainment Consumers Association .
The signature of the  eu  and  अनेक   of  its  सदस्य  states resulted in  the  resignation in  विरोध  of the European  पार्लियामेंट  's appointed chief investigator , rapporteur Kader Arif , as well as widespread  विरोध  across  यूरोपीय  .
in  2012 the newly-appointed rapporteur , British  mep  David Martin , recommended against  the  treaty , stating : ``  the  intended benefits  of  this international agreement  हैं  far  outweighed  by the  संभावित  threats  to  civil liberties  ''  .
on  4 July 2012  ,  the European Parliament rejected the agreement in  plenary  session , with 478 voting against  the  treaty , 39 in favour and 165 MEPs abstaining .
faw  semi-trailer truck in China
Tractor with side dump  ट्रेलर   semi-trailer
A tractor with  an  auto-transport semi-trailer .
Semi-trailer truck with sleeper behind  the  cab  .
A semi-trailer truck is  an   articulated  vehicle that consists  of  a  towing  engine , known as a tractor in the  संयुक्त  States and truck in many other places , attached to one or more semi-trailers to carry freight .
it  is  भी  known as  a   हस्तांतरण  in Canada , prime  प्रस्तावक   in  Australia , semi , tractor-trailer ,  ट्रक  and trailer , transfer truck , 18-wheeler , mack truck , big rig in the United  राज्य  , or  artic  , short for articulated lorry , in Britain and  आयरलैंड  .
A semi-trailer  करता   नहीं   ट्रेल  completely behind the towing vehicle , but is attached at a point that is just forward of the rear-most axle of  the  towing unit .
This is done so that a fraction  of  the weight of the trailer is carried  by  the prime  प्रस्तावक  .
This arrangement means that both tractor and semi-trailer will  have  a distinctly different design than a rigid truck and trailer .
The Pittsburgh Steelers  हैं  a professional  फ़ुटबॉल  team based  in  Pittsburgh , Pennsylvania .
The team currently belongs to the North  प्रभाग  of the American Football Conference ( AFC  )  in  the  National  फ़ुटबॉल  League  (  NFL ) .
Founded in , the Steelers are  the  oldest  मताधिकार  in  the   afc  .
Pittsburgh has won more Super  कटोरी  titles  (   छह  ) , won more AFC  चैंपियनशिप  Games ( eight ) and played in ( fifteen ) and hosted  अधिक  ( eleven  )  conference championship games than  कोई   अन्य  AFC or NFC  टोली  .
The Steelers  share  the record for  सबसे   सुपर  Bowl appearances with the Dallas  cowboys  ( eight  )  .
The Steelers won  उनके  most recent championship , Super Bowl XLIII , on February 1 , 2009 .
The Steelers were founded as the Pittsburgh Pirates on  जुलाई  8 , 1933 , by Art Rooney , taking its original name from  the  baseball team of the same  नाम  , as  थी  common practice for NFL teams to do  at  the  समय   .
The  स्वामित्व   of  the Steelers has remained  भीतर  the Rooney family since its  founding   .
The  वर्तमान   मालिक  is Art 's son ,  डान  Rooney , who  रै   दिए  much control of the franchise  to  his son Art Rooney II  .
Long one of the NFL 's  फ्लैगशिप  teams  ,  the  स्टीलर्स  enjoy a  विशाल   ,  widespread  fanbase  nicknamed Steeler  स्वदेश  .
The Steelers currently play their  घर  games at Heinz Field on Pittsburgh 's  उत्तर  Side in the North Shore neighborhood , which also hosts the University of Pittsburgh Panthers .
Built in 2001 , the  स्टेडियम  replaced Three Rivers Stadium  जिससे  hosted the  स्टीलर्स  for 31 seasons .
Prior to Three Rivers ,  the  Steelers had  निभाई  their games in Pitt Stadium and Forbes Field .
Three different  kinds  of wheat and rye flour
आटा  is a powder which is made by grinding cereal  दाने  ,  or  other  बीज  or roots (  जैसे  Cassava ) .
It is the  प्रमुख  ingredient  of  bread , which is a staple food for  अनेक  cultures , making  the  availability  of  adequate supplies of flour  a  major economic and political issue at various times throughout history  .
Wheat flour is one of the most important foods in European ,  उत्तर  American , Middle Eastern  ,  Indian and North  अफ़्रीकी  cultures  ,  and  is   the  defining  संघटक   in   सबसे   of   उनके   शैलियाँ  of breads and pastries .
While wheat  is  the most  आम  base for flour , corn flour  रै  been important  in   mesoamerican  cuisine since ancient times , and remains  a  staple throughout the Americas .
rye   आटा  is an important constituent  of  bread in much  of  central Europe  ,  and rice can also be  प्रयुक्त  in flour , though this is relatively uncommon .
Heart rate is the number  of   heartbeats  per unit of time , typically expressed as beats per  मिनट  (  bpm   )  .
Heart rate  can  vary as  the   देह  's need to absorb oxygen and excrete carbon dioxide changes , such as during  शारीरिक   कसरत   ,  sleep  ,  illness , or as a result of ingesting drugs :
Central nervous system stimulants such  as  amphetamines  बढ़ाएँ  heart  रेट  .
Central nervous system depressants  or   sedatives  decreases the heart  रेट  ( apart from  कुछ   विशेषकर   अजीब   ones  with  बराबर  strange effects  ,  such as  केटामाइन   जिससे  can cause - amongst many other things - stimulant-like effects such as tachycardia  )  .
There are many ways in which the heart rate speeds up or slows  bas  .
Most  involve  stimulant-like endorphins and hormones being released in the  दिमाग  ,  अनेक  of which are  those  that  हैं  'forced'/'enticed ' out by the  ingestion  and processing of drugs .
Due to individuals having a constant blood volume , one of the physiological  तरीके   to  deliver  अधिक   ऑक्सीजन  to an organ is to increase heart rate  to   परमिट  blood to pass  by  the  अंग  more often .
Normal resting heart  दरों  range from 60-100 bpm  .
Bradycardia is  पारिभाषित  as a resting heart rate below 60 bpm .
However ,  दिल  rates from 50 to 60 bpm are common among healthy people and do not  necessarily   आवश्यकता  special  ध्यान  .
Tachycardia is defined as a resting heart rate  ऊपर   100  bpm ,  हालांकि   persistent  rest  दरों   between  80-100 bpm , mainly if  वे   हैं  present  दौरान  sleep  ,  may be signs of hyperthyroidism  or   रक्ताल्पता  ( see below  )   .

A carriage  is  a  wheeled  vehicle for people , usually  horse-drawn  ; litters  (  palanquins ) and sedan chairs are excluded  ,  since  वे   हैं  wheelless vehicles .
The carriage is especially designed for private passenger use and  लिये  comfort or  लालित्य  , though some are also used to transport goods  .
It  may  be light  ,   smart  and fast or heavy , large and comfortable .
Carriages  सामान्यतः  have suspension using  पत्ता  springs , elliptical springs ( in the 19th  सदी   )  or leather strapping .
A public passenger vehicle  होता  not usually be called a carriage – terms  लिये  such include stagecoach , charabanc  और   omnibus  .
Working vehicles such as the ( four-wheeled  )   वैगन  and ( two-wheeled )  कार्ट   share  important parts of the history of the  carriage   ,  as  is  the fast ( two-wheeled  )  chariot .
The 2004 Indian Ocean earthquake was an undersea megathrust earthquake  कि  occurred at 00:58:53 UTC on Sunday  ,  26 December 2004 ,  साथ  an epicentre off the west coast of Sumatra , Indonesia .
The quake itself is known by  the   वैज्ञानिक  community as the Sumatra–Andaman earthquake  .
The  resulting   सुनामी  was given various names , including  the  2004  भारतीय   समंदर  tsunami , South Asian tsunami , Indonesian  सुनामी   ,  and the Boxing  दिन  tsunami .
the  earthquake was caused by subduction  और   triggered  a series  of  devastating tsunamis along the coasts of most landmasses bordering the Indian Ocean , killing over 230,000 people  in  fourteen countries , and  inundating   तटीय  communities with waves up to high .
It was one of the deadliest natural disasters in recorded history .
इंडोनेशिया   थी  the  hardest-hit  country  ,  followed by Sri  लंका   ,  India  ,  and Thailand .
With a magnitude  of  Mw 9.1–9.3  ,  it is the  तीसरा  largest earthquake ever recorded on a seismograph  .
the  earthquake had the longest duration of faulting ever observed , between 8.3 and  10  minutes .
It caused the  संपूर्ण   ग्रह  to vibrate as much as and triggered other earthquakes as far  दूर  as  अलास्का  .
इसके  epicentre was between Simeulue  और  mainland Indonesia .
The plight of the affected people and countries prompted  a  worldwide humanitarian response .
in  all ,  the   विश्वव्यापी   जातियाँ   दान  more than $ 14 billion ( 2004  us  $ )  in  humanitarian  सहायता  .
भाप  rising from the Nesjavellir Geothermal  शक्ति  Station  in  Iceland .
Geothermal energy is thermal energy  उत्पन्न   और  stored in the Earth .
Thermal  उर्जा  is the energy  कि  determines  the  temperature  of  matter .
The  geothermal  energy  of  the Earth 's crust originates from the original formation of the planet ( 20 %  )  and from radioactive  क्षय  of minerals  (  80 % )  .
the   geothermal  gradient , which is the  अंतर  in temperature between the core of the planet and its surface , drives a continuous conduction of thermal energy in the  रूप  of  ऊष्मा  from the core to the surface .
The adjective geothermal  originates  from the Greek roots γη  (  ge ) ,  अर्थ   धरती  , and θερμος  (  thermos )  ,  meaning hot .
At the core of the  धरती  ,  थर्मल  energy is created by radioactive decay  और  temperatures may reach  over  5000 °C ( 9,000 °F  )  .
Heat conducts from the core to surrounding cooler rock .
The  ऊँची   तापमान  and  दबाव   कारण  some rock to melt ,  बनाना   मैग्मा  convection upward since it  is   हल्का  than the solid rock .
the  magma heats rock and water in the  क्रस्ट  , sometimes up to 370 °C (  700   °f  ) .
From hot springs , geothermal energy has been used for bathing since Paleolithic  टाइम्स  and for space heating  चूंकि  ancient Roman times , but it  is  now better  ज्ञात  for  विद्युत  generation .
Worldwide , about 10,715 megawatts ( MW ) of  geothermal  power is  ऑनलाइन   in  24 countries  .
An additional 28  gigawatts  of direct geothermal heating capacity is installed for district heating , space heating ,  स्पा  , industrial  प्रक्रियाओं  , desalination and  agricultural  applications .
Geothermal power is cost effective , reliable  ,  sustainable , and environmentally friendly ,  लकिन  has historically been limited to areas near tectonic plate boundaries .
हाल   technological  advances have dramatically expanded the  दायरा  and  आकार  of viable resources , especially  लिये  applications such as home heating  ,  opening a potential for widespread exploitation  .
geothermal  wells release greenhouse gases trapped deep within the earth ,  लकिन  these  emissions  are  much   निम्नतर  per energy unit than those of fossil fuels .
As a result  ,  geothermal power has the potential to  सहायता  mitigate global  वार्मिंग  if widely deployed in place of fossil fuels .
The Earth  's  geothermal resources are theoretically  अधिक   than  adequate to supply  मानवता  's  उर्जा  needs , but only  a  very  छोटी  fraction  may  be profitably  शोषित  .
Drilling and  खोजी  for deep resources is very expensive .
Forecasts for the  भविष्य   of  geothermal power depend on assumptions about technology , energy prices , subsidies , and interest rates .
पायलट  programs like EWEB 's customer opt  in  Green Power  कार्यक्रम   दिखाएँ  that customers would be willing  to  pay a little more for a  बेदर्दी  energy  सोर्स  like geothermal .
लकिन  as a result of government  assisted   शोध  and industry experience , the cost of generating geothermal power has decreased by 25 % over  the  past  दो   दशकों   .
In 2001 , geothermal energy cost between two and ten  सेंट  per kwh .
The term  घन  foot is an Imperial and US  प्रथागत   (  non- metric ) unit of volume , used in the United States and  the   संयुक्त  Kingdom  .
It  is   पारिभाषित  as the volume  of  a cube with sides of one foot (  0.3048   m   )  in  लंबाई  .
to  calculate cubic feet multiply length X  चौडाई  X height .
Hồ Chí Minh ( Northern Vietnamese pronunciation : , Southern Vietnamese  उच्चारण  : ) ; 19  may   1890  – 2 September 1969 ) , born Nguyễn Sinh Cung  और  also known as Nguyễn Tất  thành  and Nguyễn Ái  quốc  , was  a  Vietnamese communist  क्रांतिकारी  leader who  थी  prime minister ( 1945–1955 ) and president ( 1945–1969  )  of the  लोकतांत्रिक  Republic  of   वियतनाम   (  North Vietnam  )  .
He was a key figure in the foundation of the Democratic Republic of  वियतनाम  in 1945 , as well as the People’s Army of Vietnam ( PAVN )  और  the Việt Cộng ( NLF or VC ) during the Vietnam War .
He led the Việt Minh independence  गति   इससे  1941 onward , establishing the  कम्युनिस्ट  -ruled Democratic  गणतंत्र   of  Vietnam  in  1945  और  defeating the  फ्रेंच  Union in  1954  at  the  battle of Điện Biên Phủ .
He officially  stepped   bas   इससे   शक्ति  in 1955  due   to   स्वास्थ्य  problems , but remained a highly visible figurehead and  प्रेरणा  for those Vietnamese fighting  लिये  his cause—a united ,  कम्युनिस्ट  Vietnam—until his death .
After the war , Saigon , capital of the  गणतंत्र  of Vietnam  ,   थी   renamed  Hồ  chí  Minh City  .
सब  Roads Lead Home is a  विशेषता  film released on  सितंबर  26 , 2008 .
निर्देशित  by Dennis Fallon , it stars Peter Boyle ,  patton  Oswalt  ,  Jason London  ,  Vivien  cardone   ,  Vanessa Branch , Peter Coyote , Stephen Milton , and Allan Kayser  .
The movie  थी  filmed in and  around   कान्सास  City , Missouri .
the  movie made its World Premiere January 27  at  the Santa Barbara International Film  पर्व  .
The film has  भी  recently been in several  फिल्मी  festivals , and has  प्राप्त  bad reviews  .
पीटर   बॉयल  died before the movie 's release  .
it  was the last movie he appeared in .
Sales taxes  in  the United States are taxes  लगाई   on  the sale or lease of goods and services in the  संयुक्त  States  .
While no national general sales tax exists ,  the   संघीय   सरकारी  levies several national selective sales  कर   on   the   बिक्री   or  lease  of  particular goods and services .
furthermore  ,  forty-five  states , the District of Columbia , and Guam impose general sales taxes  कि  apply  to  the sale or lease of most goods  और  some services , and states also  may  levy selective sales taxes on the sale or lease of particular goods or services .
States may also delegate to local governments the authority to impose  अतिरिक्त  general or selective sales  कर   .
Sales  कर  is  गणना  by multiplying the purchase price by  the   लागू  tax rate .
Tax rates vary widely by jurisdiction and range from less  than   1  % to over 10 % .
Sales tax is collected  by  the seller at the time of sale .
Use  कर  is  स्वः  assessed by  a   खरीदार  who has not  सशुल्क  sales tax  on  a taxable purchase .
Unlike the value added tax , a sales tax is  imposed   तभी  once , at the retail level .
However , in cases  जहाँ  items  हैं  sold at retail more than once ,  ऐसे   as   प्रयुक्त  cars  ,   the  sales tax can be charged on the same item  indefinitely  .
The definition of retail sales  और  what goods and services are taxable vary among the states  .
Nearly all jurisdictions provide numerous  श्रेणी  of goods and services that  हैं   exempt  from sales tax , or taxed at reduced  दरों  .
The purchase of goods for further manufacture or for resale  is  uniformly exempt  इससे  sales tax .
Most jurisdictions  exempt   खाना  sold in grocery  स्टोर्स  , prescription medications , and many agricultural supplies .
Sales taxes , including those  imposed  by local governments , are generally administered at  the  state level .
States imposing  बिक्री  tax require retail sellers to collect tax from customers ,  संचिका  returns , and remit the tax to the state  .
Procedural rules vary widely  .
Sellers generally  जरूर  collect tax from in-state purchasers unless  the  purchaser provides an exemption certificate .
Most  राज्य  allow  or  require  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक   remittance  .
A central processing unit ( CPU  )  , also referred to as a central  प्रोसेसर  unit , is the hardware within a computer  कि   carries  out  the   निर्देश  of a computer program  by  performing the basic  अंकगणितीय  , logical ,  और  input/output operations of the system .
The term has been in use  in  the computer industry at  तनिक   चूंकि   the  early 1960s .
the  form ,  डिज़ाइन  , and implementation of CPUs  have  changed over  the  course of their history , but their fundamental  आपरेशन  remains much the same  .
A computer can have more than one CPU ; this is called multiprocessing .
कुछ   एकीकृत   circuits  ( ICs )  can  contain multiple CPUs on  a  single chip ; those ICs are called multi-core processors .
Two typical  components   of  a CPU are the arithmetic logic unit  (   alu   )  , which performs  गणित  and logical  परिचालन  , and the control unit  (  CU ) , which extracts instructions from memory and decodes and executes  उन्हें   ,   कॉलिंग  on the ALU when necessary .
Not  सब  computational systems rely on  a  central processing unit .
An array processor or vector processor has  अनेक  parallel computing  तत्व  , with  no  one unit considered the `` center ''  .
In  the  distributed computing model , problems are solved  by  a distributed interconnected set of processors .
rfid  chip next to  a  grain of rice .
This  चिप  contains  a  radio-frequency electromagnetic field  कुंडली  that modulates an external magnetic field to  ट्रांसफ़र  a  coded   पहचान  number when queried  by  a reader device .
This small type  is  incorporated in consumer products , and implanted  in  pets , for  पहचान  purposes .
Radio-frequency identification ( RFID )  is  the wireless non-contact use of radio-frequency electromagnetic fields to  ट्रांसफ़र  data , for the purposes of automatically identifying and tracking  टैग   संलग्न  to  वस्तुएँ  .
the  tags  contain   electronically   भंडारित  information  .
Some tags are powered and read  at  short ranges  (   a   few  meters ) via magnetic fields ( electromagnetic induction ) .
Others use  a  local  शक्ति  source  ऐसे  as a battery , or else have no battery but collect energy from the interrogating EM field  ,  and then act as  a  passive transponder to emit microwaves or UHF radio  लहरें  ( i.e. ,  इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक   विकिरण   at  high  बारंबारता  ) .
Battery powered tags may operate at hundreds of meters .
नापसंद  a bar code , the tag  करता  not necessarily  need  to  be  within  लकीर  of sight of the reader , and may be embedded in the tracked object .
rfid  tags are used in  अनेक   उद्योग  .
An RFID tag  संलग्न   to   an  automobile during production can be  प्रयुक्त  to track its progress through the assembly line .
दवाएँ  can be tracked through  warehouses  .
पशुधन  and pets may have tags  injected   ,  allowing  धनात्मक   पहचान   of   the  animal .
Since RFID tags can be attached to clothing ,  possessions  , or even implanted within people , the possibility of  पढना   personally-linked  information  बगैर  consent has raised privacy concerns  .
Overtime is the amount  of   समय   किसी  works  परे  normal working hours  .
Normal  घंटों   may  be determined in several  रास्ताs:
by custom ( what is considered healthy  or  reasonable by society ) ,
by practices of a given trade or profession,
by legislation,
by agreement between employers and workers  or  their  प्रतिनिधि  .
Most nations  have   ओवरटाइम  labor laws designed  to  dissuade or prevent employers from forcing their employees  to  work excessively long hours .
ये  laws may take into account other  considerations  than the humanitarian , such as preserving the health of workers so that they may continue to be productive , or increasing the overall level of employment in the economy .
एक   आम   दृष्टिकोण   to  regulating overtime is to  आवश्यकता  employers to pay workers  at  a  उच्चतर   hourly  rate for overtime work .
Companies may  चुनें  to pay workers higher overtime pay even if not obliged  to   do  so by  विधि   ,  particularly if they  मानना  that they face a backward bending supply curve of  श्रमिक  .
Overtime  अदा  rates can cause  मजदूर   to  work longer hours than they would at a  चपटा  hourly rate .
Overtime laws  ,  attitudes toward  ओवरटाइम   और  hours of work vary  greatly  from country  to  country and between  अलग  economic sectors .
Visualization of links between  पृष्ठों  on a wiki using a force-directed layout .
force-directed   आलेख  drawing algorithms  हैं  a class of  algorithms  for  आरेखण   रेखाचित्र   in  an  aesthetically  pleasing way .
Their purpose is  to  position the nodes of a  आलेख  in two-dimensional or  three-dimensional   स्पेस   so  that all the edges  हैं   of  more or  कम  equal length and there are  as  few crossing edges as possible  ,  by  assigning  forces  among  the set of edges and the  नियत   of   नोड   ,  based on their relative  स्थितियाँ  , and then using these  शक्तियां  either to simulate the motion of the edges  और  nodes or to minimize  उनके  energy .
While graph drawing  can  be a difficult problem , force-directed algorithms , being physical simulations , usually require no special knowledge  परिचय  graph  सिद्धान्त   ऐसे  as  planarity  .
Purchasing  शक्ति   (  sometimes retroactively called adjusted for inflation ) is the amount of goods or services that can be purchased with a unit of currency  .
For example , if  तुम   था  taken one dollar  to  a  स्टोर  in the 1950s , you would have been able  to  buy a greater number of items than you  होता  today , indicating that you would have had  a  greater purchasing power in the 1950s  .
करेंसी  can be either a commodity  धन   ,  like  सुनहरा   or  silver , or fiat currency , or  free-floating  market-valued currency  जैसे  US  डॉलर  .
as  Adam  स्मिथ  noted , having money  देता  one the  क्षमता  to `` command ''  अन्य  ' labor , so purchasing power to some extent is power over other people , to the extent  कि  they are  willing  to trade their labor or  goods   लिये  money or currency .
If one 's monetary income stays  the   वही  , but the price level increases  ,  the purchasing power of that  आय  falls .
Inflation does not  सदा  imply falling purchasing power  of  one  's  money income since  it   may  rise faster than the  दाम  level .
A higher  रियल  income means a higher  खरीदना  power since real income refers to the income adjusted for inflation .
For a  दाम   अनुक्रमणिका   ,  its value in the base  साल  is  प्रायः   सामान्यीकृत  to  a  value  of   100   .
The purchasing  शक्ति  of a  ईकाई  of  करेंसी  ,  कह  a dollar , in a  दिए  year  ,  expressed in dollars  of   the  base year , is 100/P  ,  where  p  is the price index in that year .
So  ,  by definition  the  purchasing power  of  a dollar  decreases  as the price level rises .
The purchasing power in today  's   धन   of   an  amount C of money , t years into the future , can be computed with  the  formula for the present value :
where in this case i is an assumed future  सालाना  inflation rate .
Education in South Korea is viewed as being crucial for  कामयाबी  and competition is consequently very heated and fierce .
A  सेंट्रल  administration oversees the process for the education of children from kindergarten to the third and final year of high school .
Mathematics  ,   विज्ञान  , Korean , English , and social studies are generally  माना   to  be the most  महत्वपूर्ण  subjects .
Normally physical education is not considered important as it is not recognised  ,  by the  generally  academic elitist  दक्षिण  Korean  populace  ,  as  education and therefore many schools lack high-quality gymnasiums and  varsity  athletics .
South Korea was the  पहला  country in the  संसार  to provide high-speed internet access to all primary ,  जूनियर  , and high schools .
Although South  कोरियाई  students  प्रायः  rank  अत्यधिक  on  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  comparative assessments when compared  to  students of most Western education systems  ,  the  दक्षिण   कोरियाई  education system is  criticised  for emphasising too  much  upon passive learning  और  memorisation .
The South  कोरियाई  education  प्रणाली  is rather  notably  strict and  overly  structured as compared to its counterparts in  सबसे  Western societies .
भी  , the prevalence of non-school  for-profit   निजी   संस्थान  such as academies or cram-schools ( Hagwon [ 학원 ]  )  ,  जिससे  too emphasise on passive memorisation , as opposed to conceptual understanding ,  in  students are criticised  as  a  प्रमुख   सोशल   प्रॉब्लम   .
The My Lai Massacre ( ,  ;  , ,  or  ) was the Vietnam War mass murder of between  347  and 504 unarmed civilians  in   दक्षिण   वियतनाम   on  March 16 , 1968 , by United States Army soldiers of  ``  Charlie ''  कम्पनी  of 1st Battalion  ,  20th  infantry  Regiment , 11th Brigade of  the   americal   प्रभाग  .
Victims included  महिलाओं  , men ,  children  , and  infants  .
Some of the women were gang-raped and their bodies  यहूद  later found to  be  mutilated  और  many  महिलाओं  were  allegedly  raped  prior  to the killings .
जबकि  26  u.S.  soldiers were initially charged with criminal offenses for their actions at  mỹ  Lai ,  तभी  Second  लेफ्टिनेंट   विलियम  Calley , a platoon  नेता  in Charlie Company , was convicted .
मिला  guilty of killing  22  villagers ,  he  was originally given a life  वाक्य  , but only served three and a half years under house arrest  .
The  नरसंहार  took  प्लेस  in the hamlets  of  My Lai and My  khe   of   बेटे  My  गाँव  .
the   इवेंट  is also  ज्ञात   as  the Son My Massacre ,  विशेषकर  in  the  Vietnamese  राज्य  media  .
The U.S. military codeword for the `` Viet Cong stronghold  ''   थी  `` Pinkville '' .
The incident prompted global outrage when it became public knowledge in 1969 .
The massacre also increased domestic opposition to  the  U.S. involvement in the Vietnam War .
तीन   u.S.  servicemen who had tried to halt the  नरसंहार  and protect  the   wounded  were  initially  denounced by several  u.s   .  Congressmen as traitors .
They received  नफ़रत   मेल  and death threats and found  mutilated  animals  on  their doorsteps .
The three were later widely praised and decorated by the  फौज  for their heroic actions .
the  hijackers in the  सितंबर   11  attacks were 19 men affiliated with al-Qaeda , and 15 of the 19  यहूद  citizens of  सऊदी  Arabia  .
Others were from Egypt , Lebanon  ,  and the UAE .
The  hijackers  were organized  into  four teams , each led  by  a pilot-trained hijacker with four `` muscle hijackers '' who were trained  to   सहायता  subdue the pilots , passengers , and crew .
The first hijackers to arrive in  the  United States were Khalid al-Mihdhar and  nawaf  al-Hazmi , who  settled  in the San Diego area  in   जनवरी   2000  .
वे  were  followed   by  three  hijacker-pilots  , Mohamed Atta  ,  Marwan al-Shehhi , and  ziad  Jarrah  जल्दी  in  the  summer of 2000 to undertake flight training in south Florida  .
The fourth hijacker-pilot , Hani  hanjour  , arrived  in  San Diego in December  2000  .
The rest  of  the `` muscle hijackers '' arrived in the spring  और  early  गर्मियाँ  of 2001 , just  महीने  before the September 11 attacks  .
Abū al-Qāsim Muḥammad ibn ʿAbd Allāh ibn ʿAbd al-Muṭṭalib ibn Hāshim ( )  (  circa| 570 – circa| 8 June 632 ) , also transliterated  as  Muhammad ( ) , was  a  religious ,  राजनैतिक  ,  और   सैन्य  leader from Mecca who unified Arabia into  a   सिंगल  religious polity under Islam .
He is believed by  मुसलमान  and  bahá'ís   to  be a  मेसेंजर  and prophet of God .
Muhammad is almost universally considered by Muslims as the last prophet  भेजा  by  परमेश्वर  for mankind  .
Non-Muslims regard Muhammad as the founder of Islam .
Muslims consider him to be the restorer of an unaltered original monotheistic  आस्था  of Adam , Noah , Abraham , Moses , Jesus  ,   और  other prophets .
Born in about 570  ce  in the  arabian  city of Mecca , he was  अनाथ   at   an  early age and brought  up  under  the  care of  उसके  uncle Abu Talib .
He later worked mostly as a  व्यापारी   ,   as  well as a shepherd , and was first married by age 25  .
Being in the habit of periodically retreating to a cave in the surrounding  kyu  for several nights of seclusion and prayer  ,  he later reported that it was there , at  आयु  40 ,  कि  he received his  पहला   रहस्योद्घाटन  from God .
Three years after this event Muhammad started preaching these revelations publicly , proclaiming that `` God is One `` , that complete `` surrender '' to Him ( lit .
islām  )  is the only  रास्ता  ( dīn  )  acceptable  to   परमेश्वर  , and  कि  he himself was a  नबी  and  मेसेंजर  of God , in the same vein as other Islamic  नबियों  .
मुहम्मद   gained  few followers early on , and was met with hostility from some Meccan tribes ; he and his  अनुसरणकर्ता  were treated harshly .
to  escape persecution , Muhammad sent some of his followers to Abyssinia before he and his followers in  मक्का  migrated to Medina ( then known as Yathrib ) in the year 622 .
This event , the Hijra  ,  marks the  शुरूआत  of the Islamic calendar ,  जिससे   is  also known as the  hijri  Calendar .
In Medina ,  मुहम्मद   संयुक्त  the tribes under the Constitution of  मदीना  .
After eight years  of  fighting with the Meccan tribes , his followers  ,  who  by  then had  grown  to  10,000  , took control of Mecca in the largely peaceful  conquest   of  Mecca .
He destroyed  the  pagan  मूर्तियों  in the city and  तब  sent his followers out to destroy all of the remaining  pagan  temples  in  Eastern Arabia .
In 632  ,   a  few months  बाद  returning to Medina from The Farewell  यात्राएं  , Muhammad fell ill and died .
By  the  time of his  मौत  , most of  the  Arabian  प्रायद्वीप  had converted to Islam ,  और  he had united Arabia into  a   सिंगल  Muslim religious polity .
The revelations ( or Ayah , lit  .
``  Signs [ of God ] '' ) —  जिससे  Muhammad reported  receiving  until  उसके  death –  रूप  the verses of the Quran , regarded by  मुसलमान  as the  ``  Word of God '' and around which the religion is based .
Besides the Quran  ,  Muhammad 's life ( sira ) and traditions ( sunnah ) are  भी  upheld by Muslims as the  स्त्रोत  of sharia law .
They discuss Muhammad and other prophets of Islam with  reverence  ,  adding  the phrase peace  be   upon  him whenever their names are mentioned .
While  conceptions  of Muhammad in medieval Christendom and premodern times were largely negative , appraisals in modern history have been far less so .
This is a  सूची  of tables  of  the verified  oldest  people in the world in ordinal rank  ,  such as oldest person  or  oldest  man  .
In these tables , a supercentenarian is  माना  'verified ' if his or her  अर्जी  has been validated by an  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  body that specifically deals in longevity research ,  ऐसे  as the Gerontology Research Group ( GRG ) or Guinness World Records .
The longest unambiguously documented human lifespan is that of Jeanne Calment  of   फ़्रांस  ( 1875–1997 ) ,  जो   died  at age 122 years ,  164  days  .
She  मिले  Vincent van Gogh  जब  she  थी  12 or  13  .
This led to news  मीडिया  attention in 1985 , after Calment turned 110 .
subsequent   छानबीन  found documentation  लिये  Calment 's  आयु   ,  beyond any reasonable question , in the records of her native city  ,  Arles , France  .
More evidence of  calment  's lifespan has been produced than for any other supercentenarian  ;   उसके  case serves as  an  archetype in the methodology for verifying the ages  of  the world 's  oldest  people .
The longest undisputed lifespan  लिये   पुरूष   supercentenarians  is that of  jiroemon  Kimura , who currently lives in  जापानी  and is age as of .
Since the death of 115-year old Dina  manfredini  of the United  राज्य  , on 17 December 2012 ,  किमुरा  , born 19  अप्रैल  1897 , is the  oldest  living person in the world whose age can  be  documented  .
He has  भी  been the oldest living man since the death of 114-year old Walter  breuning  on 14 April  2011  .
Since the death of 115-year  बूढ़ा  Koto Okubo  of   जापानी  on  12  January 2013 ,  the  oldest living woman has been  -year-old  Misao Okawa , also from Japan , born  on  5 March  1898  .
This is a timeline of the African-American Civil  अधिकारों  Movement .
The Civil Rights movement was a  स्वतंत्रता  struggle by African Americans in  the   1950s  and  1960s   to  gain equality .
The  लक्ष्य  of the  गति  were freedom from discrimination , equal opportunity in  नियुक्ति  , education and  आवास  , the right to vote and equal access to  पब्लिक   सुविधाएं   .
Heavy metal  (  often referred to as metal ) is a genre of rock music that developed in the late 1960s  और  early 1970s , largely in  the   संयुक्त  Kingdom and in the United States .
With roots in blues rock  और  psychedelic rock , the bands  कि  created heavy metal developed a thick , massive  ध्वनि  , characterized  by  highly amplified  distortion  , extended guitar  solos  , emphatic  बीट्स  ,  और  overall loudness .
Heavy  मेटल  lyrics and performance styles are generally associated with masculinity  और  machismo  .
the   पहला  heavy metal  bands  such as Led  zeppelin   ,  Deep Purple and  ब्लैक   sabbath  attracted large audiences , though  वे  were often  derided  by critics , a  औकात   आम  throughout the  इतिहास  of the genre .
in  the mid-1970s Judas Priest helped spur  the  genre 's evolution by discarding much of its  ब्लूज़  influence ; Motörhead introduced a punk rock sensibility and  an  increasing emphasis on speed .
bands  in the New Wave of  अंग्रेजों  Heavy  मेटल  such as  आयरन  Maiden followed in a similar vein  .
पहले  the end of the decade , heavy  मेटल  fans  became  known  as  ``  metalheads  `` or `` headbangers ``  .
During the 1980s , glam metal became a commercial force with groups like  mötley   crüe  and  ज़हर  .
Underground scenes produced an array of  अधिक  extreme ,  आक्रामक   शैलियाँ  :  thrash   मेटल   broke  into the mainstream with bands such as Metallica , Megadeth , Slayer , and Anthrax ,  जबकि  other styles  of  the most extreme subgenres of  मेटल   जैसे  death metal and black metal remain  subcultural  phenomena .
Since the mid-1990s  ,  popular styles such as nu metal  ,  which often incorporates elements of  grunge  and hip  हॉप  ; and metalcore , which blends extreme metal with hardcore punk  ,  have further expanded the definition of the  विधा   .
The far-right ( also known  as  the extreme right  )  refers to  the  highest  उपाधि  of rightism in right-wing politics .
दूर  right politics  involves   support   of  strong or complete social hierarchy in society  ,  and supports supremacy of certain  individuals  or groups deemed to be innately superior or preferable who are to  be  more valued than those deemed to be  innately   अवर  or undesirable .
The far  सही  's  वकालत   of  supremacism is based on what its adherents perceive as innate characteristics of people  कि  can not be changed  .
This stands as a  पाइंट   of  difference  साथ  the centre-right  's  attribution of behaviours , such as laziness or decadence  ,  as the primary sources  of  social  inequalities  .
The centre right—unlike the  दूर  right—claims that people can end their behavioural inferiority  through   बदलना  their habits and choices  .
the   असली  far right ,  जिससे  emerged in  फ़्रांस   बाद  the French Revolution , refused to accept the French Republic and supported a  counter-revolution  to restore the  फ्रेंच   साम्राज्य  and aristocracy .
The far right  is   commonly  associated with persons or groups who hold extreme nationalist ,  xenophobic  , racist ,  धार्मिक   fundamentalist  or  प्रतिक्रियावादी  views .
The most extreme-right movements have pursued oppression and genocide against groups of people on the basis of their alleged  हीनता   .
थामस  Hobbes of Malmesbury  (   5  April 1588 –  4  December 1679 ) , in some  पुरानी  texts  थामस  Hobbs of Malmsbury , was an English philosopher  ,   बेहतरीन  known today for his  कार्य  on political philosophy .
उसके  1651 book Leviathan established the foundation for  सबसे  of Western political philosophy from the perspective of social contract  सिद्धान्त  .
Hobbes  थी  a champion of absolutism  लिये  the  sovereign  , but he also developed some of  the  fundamentals of European liberal thought : the right of the individual ; the  प्राकृतिक  equality  of  all men ; the  कृत्रिम  character  of  the political order ( which led to the later distinction  between  civil society  और  the  राज्य  ) ; the view that all legitimate  राजनैतिक  power must be `` representative '' and based on the  सहमति  of the people  ;  and a liberal interpretation of law which leaves people free  to  do whatever the law does not explicitly  forbid   .
He was  एक  of the founders  of  modern political philosophy .
उसके  understanding  of  humans as  होने  matter and motion ,  obeying  the same physical laws as other matter and motion  ,   remains  influential ;  और  his account of  इंसान   प्रकृति  as self-interested cooperation , and of political  समुदायों  as being based  upon   a  `` social contract  ``  remains one  of  the major topics of political philosophy .
In addition to political philosophy , Hobbes also contributed to  a   विविध  array of other fields ,  सहित  history , geometry , the physics of gases  ,  theology , ethics  ,  and general philosophy  .
Emotional intelligence ( EI ) is the ability to identify  ,  assess ,  और  control the emotions of oneself , of others , and of groups .
it  can be divided into ability EI  और   trait  EI .
क्षमता  EI is usually measured using maximum  प्रदर्शन   परीक्षण  and has  stronger  relationships with traditional intelligence , whereas  trait  EI is usually measured using self-report questionnaires and has stronger relationships with personality  .
Criticisms have centered  on  whether EI is  a  real intelligence  और  whether it has incremental validity over  iq  and the Big  पाँच  personality  traits  .
Heredity is the passing of traits to offspring from  इसके  parents  or  ancestor .
इस   is  the process by which an offspring cell or organism  acquires  or becomes predisposed to the characteristics  of   इसके   जनक  cell  or   सजीव  .
Through heredity , variations exhibited  by  individuals can accumulate and cause  कुछ  species to evolve .
the  study of heredity  in   जीवविज्ञान  is called genetics , which  शामिल  the field of epigenetics .
For United States individual income tax , adjusted  सकल  income ( AGI  )   is  total gross income minus specific reductions .
Taxable income  is  adjusted gross income minus  भत्तों   लिये  personal exemptions and itemized deductions .
For  सबसे  individual  कर  purposes , AGI is more relevant than  सकल  income .
Gross income  is  sales price of  goods  or property , minus cost  of   the  property  बेची  , plus other  आय   .
It  शामिल  wages , interest ,  dividends   ,  business income ,  rental   आय  , and  सब  other types  of  income .
समायोजित   सकल  income is  सकल  income less  deductions  from a business or  rental  activity and 21 other specific items .
Several deductions  (  e.g . medical expenses  और  miscellaneous itemized deductions ) are limited based on a percentage of  agi  .
निश्चित  phase outs , including those of lower tax rates and itemized deductions , are based on  स्तर   of  AGI .
अनेक  states base  राज्य  income tax on AGI with certain deductions .
`` Lazy Eye '' is  the   तीसरा  single from  silversun  Pickups '  डेब्यू  album Carnavas .
the  band performed the song  on  the Late  दिखाएँ  with  दाउद  Letterman , The Tonight Show with Jay Leno  ,  Later With Jools Holland , and  पिछला  Call with Carson Daly .
The song is  a  playable track  on  Rock Band 2  और  Guitar Hero :  संसार  Tour .
an  alternate  संस्करण  of  the  song , with a length of 7:27 , was  निभाई  on XMU before  the   shorter  version was played on FM and other XM channels .

A telephone prefix is the first set  of  digits  of  a telephone number ; in the North American  क्रमांकन  Plan countries  (  country code 1 ) , it  is  the first  तीन  digits of a seven-digit phone number .
In other countries  दोनो  the prefix and the number may  have  different lengths .
it  shows which exchange  the  remaining numbers refer to .
a  full telephone  क्रमांक  is usually made up of  देश  code  (  required for international calls only  )  ,  क्षेत्रफल  code ( required  लिये  calls between telephone areas )  ,  prefix , and  सदस्य  number .
Some places  सीमित  certain prefixes to  फैक्स   संख्याएँ  or cell phones only ; in  अन्य  places such dedicated prefixes  हैं   नहीं  used  .
as  telephone  प्रौद्योगिकी  advanced  ,  the precise significance of the prefix became blurred in many places ; 485 in London , UK , was once the GULliver exchange , but now 44207485xxxx  is  just considered one of  अनेक  number blocks  परोसा  by the CLKEN Kentish Town exchange  ;  4420770703xx is another .
Metformin ( BP  ,  pronounced  ,   ;   originally  sold as Glucophage )  is  an oral antidiabetic drug in the biguanide  क्लास  .
It  is  the first-line  ड्रग   of  choice for the treatment of type 2 diabetes  ,  in  particular  , in overweight and obese  लोगों   और   those  with normal kidney function .
Its use in gestational diabetes has been limited by safety  चिंताएं   .
it  is  भी  used in the treatment of polycystic  ovary  syndrome ,  और   रै  been  investigated  for other diseases where  इंसुलिन  resistance may be an important factor .
Metformin works by  suppressing  glucose  उत्पादन  by the liver .
Metformin is the only antidiabetic  ड्रग  that  रै   महरूम   conclusively   दिखाया  to  prevent  the  cardiovascular  complications of diabetes .
It helps  reduce   ldl   कोलेस्ट्रॉल  and triglyceride levels ,  और  is not associated with  वज़न  gain  .
, metformin is one of only two oral  antidiabetics  in the World Health Organization Model  सूची  of Essential Medicines ( the  अन्य  being glibenclamide ) .
When prescribed appropriately , metformin causes few adverse effects  (  the  सबसे  common  is  gastrointestinal upset ) and is associated with a  कम  risk of hypoglycemia .
Lactic acidosis ( a  buildup   of  lactate in the blood ) can be a  गंभीर  concern in overdose and when it is prescribed to people  साथ  contraindications , but otherwise , there  is   no  significant risk .
First synthesized  और  found to reduce blood sugar in the 1920s , metformin  थी   forgotten  for the next two decades as research shifted to insulin and other antidiabetic drugs .
ब्याज  in  metformin  was rekindled  in  the late 1940s after several  रिपोर्ट्स   कि   it  could  reduce   रक्त  sugar levels in people , and  in  1957 , French physician Jean Sterne  प्रकाशित  the first clinical  विचारण   of  metformin as a  उपचार  for  मधुमेह  .
It was introduced to the United Kingdom in  1958  , Canada in 1972  ,  and the United States in 1995 .
Metformin is now believed to be  the  most widely prescribed antidiabetic drug in  the  world  ;   in  the United States alone  ,  more than 48 million prescriptions were filled in 2010  लिये  its  जेनेरिक   formulations  .
The Mount Rushmore National  मेमोरियल  is a sculpture  carved  into  the  granite face of Mount  rushmore  near Keystone , South Dakota , in the United States .
sculpted   by  Danish-American Gutzon  borglum  and his son , Lincoln Borglum  ,  Mount Rushmore features sculptures of the heads of four United  राज्य  presidents  :  George Washington , Thomas Jefferson , Theodore Roosevelt and Abraham Lincoln .
The entire memorial covers and is above sea  स्तर  .
The tallest mountain in the region is Harney Peak  (   )  .
South Dakota  इतिहासकार   दोने  Robinson is credited with conceiving  the  idea of  नक्काशी   the  likenesses of famous people  into  the Black Hills region of South Dakota in order to promote tourism in the  प्रदेश  .
Robinson 's initial idea was  to  sculpt the Needles  ;  however ,  gutzon  Borglum rejected the Needles site because of the poor quality of the granite and strong opposition from environmentalists and Native American groups .
They settled on the Mount Rushmore  स्थान  ,  जिससे   भी  has the advantage of facing  southeast  for maximum sun exposure .
रॉबिन्सन  wanted  it   to   विशेषता   पश्चिमी  heroes like Lewis  और   क्लार्क  , Red Cloud and Buffalo Bill Cody but Borglum decided the sculpture should  have   a  more  नेशनल  focus , and chose the  चार  presidents  जिनकी   likenesses  would  be   carved  into the mountain .
After securing  संघीय   funding   ,  construction on the memorial began  in  1927 , and  the  presidents ' faces were completed between 1934  और  1939 .
upon   gutzon  Borglum 's  मौत   in  March 1941 , his son  lincoln  Borglum took over  निर्माण  .
Although the initial concept called  लिये  each  अध्यक्ष  to be depicted from  सिर  to  कमर  , lack  of  funding forced construction to  समाप्त  in late October  1941  .
The U.S. National Park  सेवा  took control of the memorial in 1933 ,  जबकि  it was still  अंतर्गत  construction ,  और  has  प्रबंधित  the memorial to the present day  .
It  attracts   nearly  three  लाख  people annually .
Charvet dress  कमीज़  from the 1930s , Norsk Folkemuseum , Oslo .
A  कमीज़  , dress shirt , button-front , button-front  कमीज़  , or button-up shirt  is  a garment with a  कॉलर   ,  a full-length opening at  the  front  इससे  the collar to the hem , and sleeves with cuffs .
Shirts are predominantly used by men , since  महिलाओं  usually wear blouses .
The  सामने  opening is fastened  using  buttons  or   studs   ,  and the cuffs close with buttons  or  cuff links .
Shirts are normally  बना  from  woven  cloth , and are  प्रायः  accompanied by a  जैकेट  and tie , for example with  a  suit or formalwear , but shirts  हैं  also worn more casually  .
in  British English , dress shirt  अर्थात्   specifically  the more formal evening garment worn with black- or white- tie , also discussed  नीचे  .
Some of these formal  शर्ट   have  stiff  fronts  and detachable collars attached with  कॉलर  studs .
the  term `` button-down '' ( which refers a type of  कमीज़  which has a  कॉलर  fastened down by  बटन  ) is sometimes  प्रयुक्त   in  error to apply to all shirts (  साथ  or without buttoned down collars )  ,  being  प्रयुक्त  as a synonym for  ``  button-up '' or ``  button-front  ''  .
प्रशासनिक   पेशेवर  Day ( also known  as  Secretaries Day or Admin Day ) is an unofficial secular holiday observed in several countries to recognize the work of secretaries , administrative assistants , receptionists , and  अन्य   प्रशासनिक  support  पेशेवर  .
In North America ,  it   is   मनाये  on the Wednesday  of  the last full week of  अप्रैल  ( April 24 in  2013  ) .
In France  it   is  celebrated on the third Thursday in  अप्रैल  ( April 18 in 2013 )  .
In Australia it is  मनाये  on the  पहला   शुक्रवार  in May
