Nicolas Poussin ( ; 15 June 1594 –  19  November 1665 ) was the leading painter of the classical French Baroque  स्टाइल  ,  हालांकि  he spent most of his working life  in  Rome .
His work is characterized by  स्पष्टता  , logic , and  अनुक्रम  ,  और  favors line over color .
जबतक   the   20th  century he remained a major inspiration for such  classically   उन्मुख  artists  as  Jacques-Louis David  ,  Jean-Auguste-Dominique Ingres and Paul Cézanne .
He  worked  in Rome  लिये  a circle of  अग्रणी  collectors there and  elsewhere  , except for a  छोटी   काल  when  कार्डिनल  Richelieu ordered him back to  फ़्रांस  to serve as First Painter to  the   किंग  .
सबसे  of his works are history paintings of religious or  पौराणिक   विषय  that very  प्रायः  have a large  लैंडस्केप  element .
Jackie  कैथ   whitley   (   जुलाई  1 , 1954Stambler  ,  Irwin , and  grelun  Landon ( 2000 ) . - Country Music : The Encyclopedia . - New York  :  St.  मार्टिन  's Press  .  - p.533 .  -   isbn  978-0-312-26487-1.—Carlin , Richard ( 2003 ) .  -  Country Music :  a  Biographical Dictionary . - New York  :  Routledge - p.427 . - ISBN  978-0-415-93802-0.—larkin   ,   कोलिन  ( 1995 )  .  - The  गिनीज   ज्ञानकोष  of  लोकप्रिय  Music .  -  New  यॉर्क  :  स्टॉकटन  Press - P.4462 . - ISBN 978-0-85112-662-3.—Stanton ,  स्कॉट   (   2003  ) . - The Tombstone Tourist : Musicians . - New  यॉर्क  : Pocket Books  .  - p.395 . - ISBN  978-0-7434-6330-0.—hicks   ,  Jack . - `` Singer Keith  whitley  's Memory Alive Through  गीतों  , Love in Home  कस्बा  '' . - The Kentucky Post . -  सितंबर  25 , 1991.— '' Country Music Star  कैथ  Whitley  मुर्दे  at 33 '' . - Lexington Herald-Leader . -  may  10 , 1989.——Hurst , Jack  .  - `` Whitley 's Last Days '' . - Chicago Tribune  .  - May 14  ,  1989.— ''  दारू  Kills Country Singer Keith Whitley '' . - United Press  अंतरराष्ट्रीय   .  - ( c/o The San Francisco Chronicle )  .  - May 10 , 1989 . — May 9  ,  1989 ) , known professionally as Keith Whitley  ,  was an  अमरीकी   देश  music singer .
Whitley 's brief career in mainstream country music  lasted   इससे  1984  जबतक  his death in 1989 , but he continues to influence an entire generation of  गायकों  and songwriters .
he  charted 19  singles  on the Billboard  देश  charts  ,  including five consecutive Number  ones  : `` Do n't  बंद  Your Eyes `` , `` When  तुम   कह  Nothing at All  ``  , `` I 'm No  अजनबी  to  the  Rain  ``  , `` I  अचरज  Do  तुम  Think of Me  ``  and `` It Ai n't Nothin ' `` ( the last two  मरणोपरांत  ) .
Statute of Grand Duchy of Lithuania  ,  written  in   पॉलिश
A statute is a formal written enactment of  a  legislative authority that governs a  राज्य   ,  city , or county .
Typically ,  statutes  command or prohibit something , or declare policy  .
The word is often used to distinguish law made by legislative bodies from  मामला   विधि  , decided by courts , and regulations issued by government agencies .
Statutes are sometimes  referred  to as legislation or `` black letter  विधि  . ''
As a source of law , statutes are  माना  primary authority ( as opposed  to  secondary authority )  .
Ideally all statutes must be in harmony with the  आधारभूत  law of the  जमीन  ( constitutional ) .
This word is  प्रयुक्त   in  contradistinction to the  आम  law .
Statutes acquire their  फ़ोर्स   इससे  the  समय  of their passage  ,  however unless otherwise provided .
Statutes are of  अनेक   kinds  ; namely , Public or private .
Declaratory or remedial  .
Temporary or perpetual .
A temporary  statute  is one  जिससे  is limited in its duration at the time of its enactment  .
it  continues in force until the time of its limitation has  समाप्त   ,  unless sooner repealed .
A  perpetual  statute  is  one for the continuance of which  वहीँ   is   no  limited  समय  , although it  may  not be expressly declared to be so  .
If , however , a statute which did  नहीं   itself   contain  any limitation is to be governed by  another  which  is  temporary only ,  the  former will  भी   be  temporary and dependent upon the existence of the latter .
पहले  a statute becomes law in some countries , it must be  सहमत  upon  by  the highest executive  in  the government , and finally published  as  part of a code .
In many countries , statutes  हैं  organized in topical arrangements ( or  ``  codified  ''  )  भीतर  publications called codes ,  ऐसे  as the United States Code .
In many nations statutory law is distinguished from  और  subordinate to constitutional law .
The external  iliac  arteries are two major arteries which  bifurcate  off  the   आम  iliac  धमनियों  anterior to the sacroiliac joint of the pelvis .
They proceed  अग्रवर्ती  and inferior along the medial  किनारा  of the psoas major muscles .
वे  exit the pelvic girdle posterior  और  inferior  to  the inguinal  स्नायु   परिचय  one third laterally from the insertion point of the inguinal  स्नायु  on the pubic tubercle at which point  वे  are referred to as the femoral arteries .
The external  iliac  artery is  प्रायः  the  धमनी  used to attach  the  renal  धमनी   to   the  recipient of a  गुर्दा  transplant .
Steam is a digital distribution , digital rights  प्रबन्धन   ,  multiplayer  और  communications platform developed by Valve  निगम  .
It is used to distribute games and related media online ,  इससे   छोटी  independent developers  to  larger software houses ;  in  October 2012 , Valve expanded the service to include non-gaming  तन्त्र  .
Steam  provides  the  उपयोक्ता  with installation and automatic management of software across multiple  कंप्यूटर  , community features  ऐसे  as friends lists and groups , cloud  छायांकन  ,  और  in-game  आवाज़  and chat functionality .
the  software provides a freely available  अनुप्रयोग  programming interface , Steamworks  ,   कि  developers can  लो  advantage of  to   integrate  many of Steam 's functions within their software  उत्पाद  , including  नक़ल  protection , networking and matchmaking , in-game achievements  और   micro-transactions  , and  support  for user-created  सामग्री  through Steam Workshop  .
Though initially developed  लिये  use on  microsoft  Windows , the client  रै   विस्तारित  to include OS  x  and Linux versions ,  और   क्लाइंट  with  सीमित   कार्यक्षमता  on the PlayStation  3  console and for both  आईओएस  and Android mobile  डिवाइस  .
In  जोड  to  होने  a central  हब  for gaming  तन्त्र   ,  Valve has  निर्मित   a  version  of  Steam  साथ  altered  कार्यक्षमता  to  be  used in schools for educational software ,  सहित   a  modified version of Portal 2 for teaching science and critical thinking lessons .
,  वहीँ  are nearly 2000 games available through  भाप  , and 54 million active  उपयोक्ता  accounts .
As of January 2013 , Steam has seen over 6.6 million concurrent  खिलाड़ी  .
Steam has an  अनुमानित  50–70 % share of the digital distribution market for video games .
the   भाप   लोगो  is a stylised  left-side  fly-crank and rod from the Walschaerts valve gear of  a  steam  लोकोमोटिव  .
Jerry Lewis (  born  March  16  , 1926 ) is  an   अमरीकी   हास्य  , actor , singer , film  निर्माता  , screenwriter  और  film director .
He is known  लिये   उसके  slapstick humor in film , television  ,  stage and  रेडियो  .
He  थी  originally paired up with Dean Martin in 1946 , forming the  famed  comedy team of  मार्टिन  and Lewis  .
in  addition to the duo  's  popular nightclub work , they starred in a successful series of comedy films  लिये  Paramount Pictures .
लुईस  is also  ज्ञात  for his charity fund-raising  telethons  and position  as   नेशनल  chairman for the Muscular Dystrophy  संघ  ( MDA ) .
Lewis has won  अनेक  awards for lifetime achievements from The American Comedy Awards  ,   लॉस  Angeles Film Critics Association , and Venice Film Festival  ,  and he has two stars on  the  Hollywood Walk of Fame .
In 2005  ,  he  प्राप्त  the  राज्यपालों  Award of the Academy of  टेलीविज़न  Arts & Sciences Board of Governors , which is the highest Emmy Award presented .
on   फ़रवरी  22 , 2009 , the  अकादमी  of  गति  Picture Arts and  sciences  awarded Lewis the Jean Hersholt  humanitarian  Award  .
the  Rhine ( ; ;  )   is  a European river that runs from the Swiss canton  of   grisons  in the southeastern Swiss Alps through Germany and eventually flows into the North  समुद्र  coast in  the  Netherlands and is the  बारहवीं  longest river  in  Europe , at about , with an  औसत  discharge of more than .
The  राइन   और  the Danube formed most of the northern inland  frontier  of  the  Roman Empire and ,  चूंकि  those days ,  the  Rhine has been a vital  और  navigable waterway carrying trade and goods deep inland .
it  has also  परोसा  as a defensive feature and has  महरूम  the basis for  क्षेत्रीय  and international  सीमायें  .
The  अनेक  castles and prehistoric  fortifications  along the Rhine  गवाही  to its importance as a  जलमार्ग  .
River traffic could be stopped  at   ये  locations ,  प्रायः  for the purpose of collecting tolls  ,  by the state that controlled that  portion   of   the  river .
Sri ( Sinhala )
Sri (  देवनागरी  : श्री , IAST ; Śrī  )   ,  also transliterated as Sree  or  Shri or Shree is a word of Sanskrit origin , used in the Indian subcontinent as polite form of  पता  equivalent to  the  English `` Mr. '' in written and spoken language ,  or  as a title of veneration  लिये  deities ( usually translated as `` Holy '' ) .
Design of complex structures like  the   अंतरराष्ट्रीय   स्पेस   स्टेशन  needs in-depth understanding  of  Structural Analysis .
सिविल  engineering is a professional engineering discipline that deals  साथ  the design , construction , and maintenance  of  the physical and naturally built environment , including works like roads , bridges , canals  ,  dams , and  इमारतें  .
Civil engineering is the  oldest  engineering discipline after  सैन्य  engineering , and  it  was defined  to  distinguish non-military engineering from military engineering  .
It  is  traditionally broken  into   अनेक   sub-disciplines  including environmental engineering  ,  geotechnical engineering , geophysics , geodesy , control engineering  ,  structural engineering  ,  biomechanics  ,  nanotechnology  ,  transportation engineering ,  धरती  science , atmospheric sciences , forensic engineering , municipal or urban  अभियान्त्रिकी  , water resources engineering , materials  अभियान्त्रिकी  , coastal engineering , surveying ,  और  construction engineering  .
Civil engineering takes place  on  all levels  :  in the public sector from  नगरपालिका  through to national governments , and in  the  private sector from individual homeowners through to international  कंपनियाँ  .

Katherine Dunham ( June 22  ,  1909 – May 21 , 2006 ) was  an   अमरीकी  dancer ,  कोरियोग्राफर  , author , educator , and  सोशल  activist .
dunham  had  एक   of  the most successful dance careers in American and European  थिएटर  of the 20th century , and directed her own dance company for many years  .
She has been  पुकारा   the  `` matriarch  और  queen  माँ  of black  नृत्य  '' .
During her  heyday  in  the  1940s and 1950s , Dunham was renowned  throughout  Europe and Latin  अमेरिका  and was widely popular  in  the United States , where the Washington Post called her ``  नर्तकी  Katherine the Great ''  .
लिये  almost thirty  सालो  she maintained the Katherine Dunham Dance Company ,  the   तभी  self-supported  अमरीकी  black dance troupe at that time  ,  and over her long career she choreographed  अधिक  than ninety individual  dances  .
Dunham was  an  innovator in  african-american  modern  नृत्य  as well  as  a leader in the field  of   नृत्य  anthropology , or ethnochoreology .
sphagnum  is a  genus  of  between  1510  और  3500 species  of   mosses  ,  commonly   पुकारा  peat moss due  to  its  व्यापकता  in  गीला  habitats where  it  contributes to the  गठन  of peat  bogs   और  mires .
sphagnum   accumulations  can  स्टोर   जल  , since both  जीना   और  dead plants can  थाम   विशाल   quantities  of water inside their cells ;  पौधे  may hold from  16-26  times as much water as their dry weight depending on the  प्रजाति  .
the  empty cells  सहायता  retain water in drier conditions  .
Hence , as sphagnum moss grows  ,  it can slowly spread into drier conditions , forming larger peatlands , both raised bogs and blanket  bogs  .
These peat accumulations then provide habitat for a wide array of peatland plants , including sedges and ericaceous  shrubs   ,   as  well as orchids and  मांसाहारी   पौधे  .
Sphagnum and the peat formed from it do not decay  readily  because of the phenolic compounds  अंतःस्थापित   in  the moss 's cell walls .
In addition , bogs ,  जैसे  all  वेटलैंड्स  , develop anaerobic soil conditions , which produces slower anaerobic decay rather than  एरोबिक  microbial action  .
Peat moss can also  acidify   इसके  surroundings by  लेने   up  cations , such as calcium and magnesium , and releasing hydrogen ions .
Under the right conditions ,  peat  can accumulate to a depth of many meters .
Different species  of  Sphagnum  have   अलग  tolerance  हद  for  बाढ़   और  pH , so  कोई   एक  peatland  may   have  a number of different  sphagnum  species  .
व्यक्तिगत  peat moss plants consist  of  a main stem  ,  with tightly arranged clusters of branch fascicles usually consisting of two or  तीन  spreading branches and two to four hanging branches  .
The top  of  the plant , or  capitulum  , has compact clusters of young branches .
Along the stem are scattered leaves of various shapes , named  स्टेम  leaves ; the shape varies according  to   प्रजाति  .
The leaves consist of two kinds of cells ; small , green ,  जीना   कोशिकाएं  (  chlorophyllose  cells ) ,  और  large , clear  ,   संरचनात्मक  , dead cells ( hyaline cells  )  .
The latter have the large water-holding capacity .
the   earliest  version of the Network Card  ,  issued manually rather than  through   an  APTIS  यंत्र   .
The first APTIS version of  the  Network Card .
इस  was used from the start of the APTIS era in 1986/1987 until well into  the  1990s , as stocks had  to  be  प्रयुक्त  up despite the introduction  of  the new-look orange-banded  संस्करण  in 1991 .
The  परिचय  of the weekday minimum  किराया   कंडीशन  in 2002  resulted  in  a  minor change : the red  ``  R '' shows  कि  this  is  the ``  संशोधित  '' version  of  the railcard  .
This  संस्करण  is  स्टिल  in use as of 2007  .
The Network Railcard is a discount card introduced in 1986 by British Rail  ,  upon the creation of their Network  southeast  area around London ,  इंग्लैण्ड  .
The card is intended to encourage leisure travel by rail by offering  छूट  for adults  और   accompanying  children on a wide range of off-peak fares  .
The range  of  discounts available , and the  दाम  of the card , have varied since that  समय  , but the card has  सदा   महरूम  valid  लिये  a year  's   असीमित   उपयोग   .
It  can  be purchased by any  व्यक्ति  aged  16  or over from any  staffed  National  रेल  station or Rail Appointed Travel Agent , by completing an application form -  no   फ़ोटोग्राफ़िक  identification or other documentation is  needed  to  ख़रीदे  or use the  कार्ड  .
It is  एक  of a  क्रमांक  of concessionary fare schemes available on the British railway system .
The United  राष्ट्र   (  UN ; French  :  Organisation des Nations  unies  , ONU ) is the world 's largest , foremost ,  और  most prominent  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  organization .
The stated  aims  of  the  United Nations include promoting  और  facilitating cooperation in international  विधि  , international  सुरक्षा  , economic  विकास  , social progress , human rights  ,  civil  अधिकारों  ,  सिविल   लिबर्टीज  ,  राजनैतिक  freedoms , democracy , and the achievement  of  lasting world peace .
The UN was founded in 1945 after World War II to replace the League  of  Nations ,  to  stop wars between countries , and to provide a platform for dialogue .
it  contains  अनेक  subsidiary organizations to  carry  out its missions .
At its founding , the UN had 51 member  राज्य  ; as of  2011   ,  there are 193 .
From its offices  around  the  संसार  , the UN and  इसके   specialized  agencies  decide  on substantive and administrative  मुद्दे  in regular meetings held throughout the year .
the  organization has six  प्रिंसिपल   अंगों  : the General Assembly  (   the  main deliberative  सभा  )  ;  the Security Council  (  for  deciding  certain resolutions  लिये  peace and  सुरक्षा  ) ; the Economic and Social Council ( for assisting in  promoting   अंतरराष्ट्रीय   आर्थिक  and  सोशल  cooperation and development ) ; the Secretariat ( for providing studies , information ,  और  facilities  needed  by  the   un  ) ; the International  अदालत   of  Justice ( the primary  न्यायिक   अंग  ) ; and the United  राष्ट्र  Trusteeship  परिषद  ( which  is  currently inactive )  .
Other prominent UN System  एजेंसियों   शामिल   the  World Health  संगठन   (  WHO ) , the World Food Programme ( WFP )  और  United Nations Children  's  Fund  (   यूनिसेफ  )  .
The  un  's most prominent position is that of  the  office of Secretary-General which has been held by Ban Ki-moon  of   दक्षिण  Korea since 2007 .
the  United Nations Headquarters  resides   in   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  territory in New York City , with  further  main offices  at  Geneva , Nairobi ,  और  Vienna  .
The organization is financed from  assessed  and voluntary contributions from its  सदस्य  states  ,  and has six  आधिकारिक  languages : Arabic ,  चाइनीज  , English , French , Russian , and Spanish .
South Beach , also nicknamed  sobe  , is a neighborhood in the city of Miami Beach , Florida , United  राज्य  ,  स्तिथ  due east  of  Miami city proper between Biscayne Bay and the Atlantic Ocean .
The  क्षेत्रफल  encompasses all  of  the barrier  आइलैंड्स   of   मियामी  Beach  दक्षिण  of  भारतीय  Creek .
This area was the first section  of  Miami Beach to be developed , starting in the 1910s , thanks to  the  development efforts of Carl G. Fisher  ,  the Lummus  भाइयो  ,  और  John S. Collins , the latter whose construction of the Collins Bridge provided the  पहला  vital  जमीन   कड़ी  between mainland Miami  और   the  beaches .
The area  रै  gone through numerous artificial and natural changes  over   the  years , including a  booming  regional economy , increased tourism , and the 1926 hurricane ,  जिससे   नष्ट  much  of  the area .
As of 2010 ,  परिचय  39,186 residents live  in  South Beach .
The United States presidential election  of  1960 was the 44th quadrennial presidential election , held on Tuesday , November  8  , 1960  .
The  रिपब्लिकन   पार्टी  nominated incumbent Vice-President Richard Nixon ,  जबकि  the Democratic Party  मनोनीत   जॉन  F. Kennedy , Senator  इससे  Massachusetts  .
The incumbent President , Republican Dwight D.  आइज़नहावर  , was  नहीं  eligible for re-election after serving the maximum two terms allowed  by  the Twenty-second Amendment .
Kennedy  थी  elected with a  सीसे  of 112,827 votes , or 0.17  %  of the popular  vote  , giving him a victory of 303 to  219  in the  चुनावी  College ,  the  closest since 1916 .
This was the first election in which all fifty of  the  current United States participated .
A  क्रमांक  of  कारकों  explain why the election was  so   बंद  .
Kennedy gained since there was an economic  मंदी  which hurt the incumbent Republican ,  और  he  था  the  लाभ  of  17  million more  पंजीकृत  Democrats than Republicans .
furthermore  , the new votes that Kennedy  gained   among  Catholics almost neutralized  the  new votes Nixon gained  among   protestants  .
Kennedy 's campaigning skills decisively outmatched Nixon 's  .
In the  समाप्त  , Nixon 's emphasis on his  अनुभव  carried little weight , and he wasted energy by campaigning in all 50 states  बजाय  of concentrating on the swing states .
Kennedy used his large ,  well-funded  campaign organization to  जीत  the nomination ,  सुरक्षित  endorsements ,  और  , with the aid of the last of the big-city  bosses  , to  मिलेंगी  out the  vote  in the big cities .
He relied on running mate Lyndon  B.  Johnson to hold  the   दक्षिण   और  used television effectively .
This election  is  notable as  होने  the first time in U.S. history that two  बैठे  U.S . Senators ( Kennedy and Johnson  )  were elected as president and vice-president  ,  a phenomenon that has been repeated once , by Barack Obama and  जो  Biden in  2008  ( in both cases  ,  the president  थी   the  younger , more junior senator  )  .
A poster for a c. 1884  अमरीकी  production of Macbeth , starring Thomas  W.  Keene .
चित्रित   ,  counter clockwise  इससे   top-left  , are :  मैकबेथ  and  banquo  meet the  witches  ; just after  the  murder of Duncan ; Banquo 's  भुत  ; Macbeth duels Macduff ; and Macbeth  .
Macbeth is a play written by William Shakespeare  .
It is considered one of his darkest and most powerful  tragedies  .
Set in  स्कॉटलैंड  , the play dramatizes the corroding psychological and political  प्रभाव  produced when its protagonist , the Scottish lord  मैकबेथ  , chooses evil  as  the way to  fulfill  his ambition  लिये  power .
he  commits regicide to become  किंग   और  then furthers his moral descent with  a  reign of murderous terror  to  stay in  शक्ति   ,  eventually plunging  the  country into civil war .
In the end  ,  he loses  सबकुछ  that gives  अर्थ  and purpose to his  जीवन  before losing his  जीवन  itself .
The play is believed to have been  लिखा   between   1603  and 1607 , and is most  commonly  dated 1606 .
The earliest  खाता  of a performance  of  what was  संभवतः  Shakespeare 's play is April 1611 , when Simon  forman   अंकित   देखकर  such a  खेल  at the Globe  थिएटर  .
It was  पहला  published  in  the Folio of 1623 ,  संभवतः  from a prompt  किताब  .
It was  सबसे   संभावित  written  दौरान  the reign of James  i  , who  था   महरूम  James VI of  स्कॉटलैंड   पहले  he succeeded to the English throne  in  1603  .
James was a patron of Shakespeare’s acting company , and  of  all the plays Shakespeare  लिखा  during James’s reign , Macbeth most  clearly  reflects the playwright’s  संबंध  with the sovereign .
Macbeth is Shakespeare’s shortest tragedy , and tells the story of a brave Scottish general named  मैकबेथ  who receives a prophecy from a trio of witches that  एक  day  he  will  become  King of Scotland .
Consumed  by  ambition and  spurred  to action  by  his wife , Macbeth murders King Duncan and  takes  the throne  लिये  himself  .
His reign  is  racked with guilt and paranoia , and he soon  becomes  a tyrannical ruler as he  is  forced to commit more and more murders to protect himself from enmity and suspicion .
The bloodbath swiftly  takes  Macbeth and Lady  मैकबेथ  into realms of arrogance , madness , and  मौत   .
Shakespeare 's  सोर्स   लिये   the  tragedy  is  the account of King Macbeth of Scotland ,  macduff  , and  डंकन  in Holinshed  's  Chronicles ( 1587 ) , a history of England , Scotland and Ireland familiar to  शेक्सपियर  and his contemporaries , although the events in the play differ  extensively  from  the  history of the  रियल   मैकबेथ  .
In the backstage world of theatre , some believe that the play is cursed , and will  नहीं  mention its title  aloud  , referring to  it  instead as ``  the  Scottish  खेल  `` .
Over the course of many centuries , the  खेल  has attracted some of  the   सबसे  renowned  अभिनेताओं  to the roles of Macbeth  और   महिला  Macbeth  .
It has been adapted to  फिल्मी  , television ,  ओपेरा   ,  novels , comic books  ,  and other media  .
The Milton Hershey School is a private philanthropic ( pre-K through  12  ) boarding  स्कूल  in Hershey , Pennsylvania .
Originally  नामित  the Hershey Industrial School , the institution  थी  founded and funded by chocolate industrialist Milton Snavely Hershey  और  his wife , Catherine Sweeney Hershey .
The school was originally established for impoverished ,  स्वस्थ   ,  Caucasian ,  पुरूष  orphans , while today  it   serves  students  of  various backgrounds .
The Milton Hershey  स्कूल  Trust  ,  which funds the school , owns controlling interest in The Hershey Company and owns the Hershey Entertainment and Resorts  कम्पनी  (  herco  )  जिससे   oversees  many of the area  होटल  along  साथ  a  थीम  park called  hersheypark  .
With over six billion dollars in assets ,  the   मिल्टन  Hershey School  is  one of the  wealthiest  schools in the world .
The school is overseen by a Board of Managers .
The school currently serves  1,818  students , and plans to grow to 2,100 students by 2013 .
A  सदस्य   of   कोर  : Coalition for  आवासीय   शिक्षा   ,  it is  the  largest residential  शिक्षा   कार्यक्रम  in the US  .

epub  , a free and  खोलें  e-book  मानक
Electronic  आलेख   ,  articles in  scholarly  journals or magazines that can be  पहुँचा  via electronic transmission
The Controlled Substances Act (  सीएसए   )  was enacted  into  law by the Congress of  the  United States as Title II  of   the  Comprehensive Drug Abuse Prevention and Control Act of 1970 .
The CSA is the  संघीय   u.S.  drug policy under which the  manufacture  ,  importation  , possession , use and distribution  of   निश्चित  substances is regulated .
The Act also served as  the  national implementing legislation for the Single Convention  on  Narcotic Drugs  .
the   विधान  created five Schedules (  classifications  ) , with varying qualifications for  a  substance  to  be  शामिल   in   प्रत्येक  .
Two federal agencies  ,  the Drug Enforcement Administration and the Food and  ड्रग  Administration , determine which substances are added to or removed from  the  various schedules , though  the   statute   passed  by  कॉंग्रेस   निर्मित   the   आरंभिक  listing  ,  and Congress has sometimes scheduled other substances through  विधान  such  as  the Hillory J. Farias  और  Samantha Reid Date-Rape  रोकथाम  Act  of  2000  ,   जिससे   लगाई  gamma hydroxybutyrate in Schedule I . Classification  निर्णय  are required to be made on criteria including potential for abuse ( an undefined term ) , currently accepted medical use  in  treatment in the United States , and international treaties .
Second-language acquisition or second-language learning is the process  by   जिससे   लोगों  learn a second language .
second-language   अधिग्रहण  ( often  abbreviated  to SLA )  भी  refers to  the  scientific discipline  devoted  to studying that  प्रक्रम  .
Second  भाषा  refers to any  भाषा  learned in  जोड  to a person 's  पहला   भाषा  ; although the  अवधारणा  is named  second-language  acquisition ,  it   can  also  चरितार्थ  the learning of  तीसरा   ,   चौथी  , or subsequent languages  .
Second-language acquisition refers to what learners do ; it does not refer  to   practices  in language teaching .
The  अकादमिक  discipline of second-language acquisition is a subdiscipline  of  applied linguistics .
It is  broad-based   और  relatively new .
As well as the various branches  of  linguistics , second-language  अधिग्रहण  is also closely related  to   मनोविज्ञान  , cognitive psychology , and education .
To separate the academic discipline from  the  learning  प्रक्रम   itself  , the terms second-language acquisition research , second-language  अध्ययन  ,  और  second-language acquisition studies are also used .
SLA research began as an interdisciplinary  फ़ील्ड  , and  क्युकी  of this it is difficult to identify  a   precise  starting date .
However  ,   it  does  appear  to have developed a great deal since  the  mid-1960s .
The term acquisition was originally used to emphasize  the  subconscious nature of the learning process , but in recent years learning and acquisition have become largely  synonymous  .
Second-language acquisition can  चरितार्थ   विरासत  language learning , but it does not usually  चरितार्थ  bilingualism .
Most SLA researchers see bilingualism as being the end result of learning a language , not  the  process itself , and see the term as referring to native-like fluency .
Writers in fields such as  शिक्षा  and psychology  ,  however , often use  bilingualism  loosely to refer  to  all forms of multilingualism .
Second-language acquisition is also  नहीं   to   be  contrasted with the acquisition of a foreign  भाषा  ; rather , the learning  of   दूसरी  languages and  the  learning of foreign languages involve  the   वही   आधारभूत  processes in  अलग  situations..
There has been much  बहस  about exactly how language is learned ,  और  many  मुद्दे  are still  अनसुलझे  .
वहीँ  are many theories of second-language acquisition  ,  but none are accepted  as  a complete explanation  by  all SLA  शोधकर्ताओं  .
Due to the  interdisciplinary   प्रकृति  of the field of second-language acquisition  ,  this is not expected  to   happen  in the foreseeable  भविष्य  .
Forbes list  of  billionaires is an  सालाना  ranking of the world  's  wealthiest people , compiled and published by Forbes , an American national business magazine .
The  कुल  net worth  of   प्रत्येक  individual on the list is estimated , in United States dollars , based on their assets and  हिसाब  for  कर्ज़  .
The  सूची  only represents each person  's  valuation on a single day ,  due  to  रोज़  fluctuations among exchange rates and stock valuations  .
The  संयुक्त  States Secret Service is a U.S. federal law enforcement agency that is part of the United States  विभाग  of  मातृभूमि  Security  .
The sworn members are divided  among  the Special Agents and the Uniformed  प्रभाग  .
Until March 1 , 2003  ,  the Service was part  of  the United States Department of the Treasury .
The U.S. Secret Service has two  पृथक   क्षेत्रों  of responsibility:
Financial Crimes , covering  मिशन  such as prevention and investigation of  counterfeiting  of U.S. currency and U.S. treasury securities , and investigation of  प्रमुख   धोखाधड़ी  .
Protection , which  entails   ensuring  the safety of current and former national leaders and their families ,  ऐसे  as the President , past presidents , vice  राष्ट्रपतियों  ,  अध्यक्षीय  candidates , visiting  heads  of state  ,  and foreign embassies ( per an  अनुबंध  with the U.S. State Department 's Bureau  of  Diplomatic  सुरक्षा  ( DS  )  Office  of  Foreign Missions (  ofm  )  ,   इत्यादि  . )
The  रहस्य  Service 's initial responsibility was  to  investigate  counterfeiting   of  U.S. currency , which  थी   अनियंत्रित  following  the  U.S. Civil War  .
The  एजेंसी   तब  evolved  into  the United  राज्य   '   पहला  domestic intelligence and counterintelligence agency .
Many of the agency  's   मिशन  were later  लिया   over  by  subsequent   एजेंसियों   ऐसे  as the Federal Bureau of  छानबीन  ( FBI ) , Bureau of Alcohol , Tobacco ,  firearms   और  Explosives ( ATF ) , Immigration and Customs Enforcement ( ICE  )   ,  and  आतंरिक  Revenue Service ( IRS ) .
`` Me and Bobby McGee ''  is   a  song written by Kris Kristofferson and Fred  फोस्टर   ,  originally performed by Roger Miller .
अन्य   performed  the song later , including  kristofferson  himself , and Janis  joplin  who topped the  u.S.   singles  chart with the  सोंग   in  1971  बाद   उसके  death , making the song  the  second posthumous number-one single  in  U.S.  चार्ट  history after `` ( Sittin ' On  )  The Dock of the Bay  ``  by Otis  redding  .
Franklin  delano  Roosevelt ( or ; January 30 , 1882 – April 12  ,  1945 ) , also  ज्ञात  by his initials , FDR , was the 32nd President of the  संयुक्त  States ( 1933–1945 ) and a central figure in world events during the mid-20th century ,  अग्रणी  the United States during a time of worldwide economic  अवसाद  and total  युद्ध  .
A dominant leader of the Democratic  पार्टी   और   the   तभी  American president elected  to  more than two terms ,  he  built  a   नई  Deal Coalition that realigned  अमरीकी  politics after 1932 , as his domestic policies  पारिभाषित  American liberalism for the middle  तीसरा  of the  20th  century .
With the bouncy popular song `` Happy Days Are  यहाँ  Again `` as his campaign theme , FDR defeated incumbent Republican Herbert Hoover in November 1932 , at the depth of the  ग्रेट  Depression .
Energized by his personal victory over polio , FDR  's  unfailing optimism  और  activism contributed to  a   नवीकरण  of the  नेशनल  spirit .
He worked closely with British Prime Minister  विंस्टन   चर्चिल  and Soviet General Secretary Joseph Stalin in leading  the   allies  against Germany and Japan in World  युद्ध  II , and restoring prosperity to the nation 's economy .
in  his first hundred days  in  office  ,  which began March 4  ,  1933  ,  Roosevelt  पथप्रदर्शन  major  विधान   और  issued  a  profusion of  कार्यपालिका  orders that  instituted  the New Deal —a variety  of  programs designed to produce relief (  सरकारी  jobs  लिये   the   बेरोजगार  ) , recovery ( economic growth ) , and reform  (  through regulation of Wall Street , banks and transportation ) .
the   अर्थव्यवस्था  improved rapidly from 1933 to 1937 ,  लकिन  then  relapsed  into a deep  मंदी   .
The bipartisan  रूढ़िवादी   गठबन्धन  that  formed   in   1937  prevented his packing the Supreme Court or passing any considerable legislation  ;  it abolished many of the relief  कार्यक्रम  when unemployment diminished during World  युद्ध  II .
Most of the regulations on business were ended about 1975–85 , except for the regulation  of  Wall Street by the Securities and  एक्सचेंज  Commission ,  जिससे   स्टिल  exists .
Along with  अनेक   छोटी  programs  ,   प्रमुख  surviving programs include  the  Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation  ,   जिससे  was  निर्मित   in  1933 ,  और  Social Security  ,  which Congress passed in  1935   .
as  World  युद्ध  II loomed after 1938 , with the Japanese invasion of China and the aggression of Nazi Germany  ,  FDR gave strong diplomatic and financial support to  चीन  and Great Britain , while remaining officially  न्यूट्रल  .
His  लक्ष्य  was to make America the  ``   आर्सेनल  of Democracy `` which would supply munitions to the Allies .
In  कूच   1941  , Roosevelt , with Congressional approval , provided  lend-lease  aid to the  देशों  fighting against Nazi Germany with  ब्रिटेन  .
With very strong national  support  , he made war on Japan and Germany after the  जापानी  attack on Pearl Harbor  on  December 7 , 1941 ,  कॉलिंग  it a `` date  जिससे   होगा  live in infamy ``  .
He supervised the mobilization of the U.S.  अर्थव्यवस्था  to  support  the Allied war effort .
As an active military leader  ,  Roosevelt  implemented  an overall  युद्ध   रणनीति  on two fronts that  ended  in  the  defeat of the Axis Powers and the development of the world 's first atom  बमबारी  .
In 1942 Roosevelt ordered the  internment  of 100,000  जापानी  American civilians .
Unemployment dropped to 2 %  ,  relief programs largely ended , and the industrial economy grew  rapidly  to new heights as millions of people moved to new jobs in  युद्ध   centers   ,  and 16 million  मेन  and  300,000   महिलाओं  were  drafted  or  volunteered  for military service .
Roosevelt dominated the  अमरीकी  political scene  नहीं   तभी  during the twelve years of his presidency  ,  but also for  दशकों  afterward .
He orchestrated the realignment of voters that created the Fifth Party System .
fdr  's New Deal Coalition united labor unions , big city machines ,  श्वेत  ethnics , African Americans and rural white Southerners .
he  also influenced  the  later creation of the United Nations and Bretton Woods .
Roosevelt is consistently rated by scholars as one of the  शीर्ष  three U.S. Presidents , along with Abraham Lincoln and George Washington .
a  liberal Democrat , Roosevelt defined his ideological  स्थिति   as  `` a little left of center .  ''
मारा   salvatrucha  ( commonly  abbreviated  as MS ,  मारा  , and MS-13 ) is  a  transnational  दण्ड  gang that  originated  in Los Angeles and has spread  to  other parts  of  the  संयुक्त  States , Canada  ,  Mexico  ,  and Central America .
the  majority of the  गिरोह  is  ethnically  composed  of  Central Americans and active in urban and suburban areas .
In the U.S. , the MS-13  रै  an especially heavy presence in Los Angeles County and the San  फ्रांसिस्को  Bay Area in Northern California ; the Washington , D.C. metropolitan areas of Fairfax County , Virginia  ,  Montgomery County , Maryland , and Prince George 's County  ,  Maryland  ;   long  Island ,  नई  York ;  the  Boston , Massachusetts area ;  शेर्लोट  , North Carolina ; and Houston  ,  Texas .
There is also a presence of MS-13 in Toronto , Ontario  ,   कनाडा  .
Members of MS distinguish  themselves  by tattoos covering the body and  भी  often the face , as  खूब   as  the use of their  अपना   चिह्न   भाषा   .
They are  बदनाम   लिये  their use of violence and  a  subcultural moral code  कि  predominantly  consists  of merciless revenge  और  cruel  retributions  .
This  क्रूरता  of  the  distinguished  सदस्यों  of the `` Maras  ''  or `` Mareros  ''  earned them a path to be recruited by the Sinaloa Cartel battling  विरूद्ध   लॉस   zetas   in  an ongoing drug  युद्ध  south of  the  United States border  .
Their wide-ranging activities have drawn the attention  of   the  FBI and Immigration and  कस्टम  Enforcement , who have initiated wide-scale  छापे  against  ज्ञात   और  suspected gang members –  netting  hundreds of arrests across the country .
हड्डियों   is  an American crime comedy-drama television series that premiered on  the  Fox network in the  संयुक्त  States on September 13  ,  2005 .
The show is based  on  forensic anthropology and  forensic  archaeology , with each episode focusing on  an  FBI  मामला  file concerning  the  mystery  पीछे  human remains brought by FBI Special  एजेंट  Seeley Booth ( David Boreanaz  )  to  the  forensic  anthropologist  Dr. Temperance ``  हड्डियों  ''  ब्रेनन   (  Emily  deschanel  ) .
The rest of  the  main cast includes Michaela Conlin , T. J. Thyne , Eric Millegan , Tamara Taylor , Jonathan Adams  ,  and John Francis Daley .
Created by Hart  hanson   ,  the series  is  very loosely  आधारित   on  the life  और  writings of  उपन्यासकार   और  forensic anthropologist  कैथी  Reichs , who  भी   produces  the show .
इसके   शीर्षक  character , Temperance  ब्रेनन   ,   is  named  बाद  the protagonist of Reichs '  अपराधों  novel series .
Conversely  ,   dr.  Brennan writes successful mystery novels based  around  a fictional (  in  the Bones universe ) forensic anthropologist named Kathy Reichs .
Bones is a  संयुक्त   उत्पादन   by  Josephson Entertainment , Far Field  प्रोडक्शन्स   और   20th  Century Fox Television .
The series  रै  completed airing its eighth  ऋतु  and has been  नवीनीकृत  for a ninth season .
Super Bowl  xxv  was an American football game  between  the American Football Conference ( AFC ) champion Buffalo Bills  और  the National Football Conference (  nfc  ) champion New York Giants  to  decide the National Football League ( NFL ) champion for the  1990  season .
the  Giants defeated the Bills by the score of  20–19  ,  जीतना  their second ever Super Bowl  .
It  is  the only  सुपर  Bowl decided by  एक  point .
The game was  आयोजित  at Tampa Stadium in  tampa  , Florida , on  जनवरी  27  ,  1991 ,  दौरान   the   ऊँचाई  of the Gulf War .
it  was thus played under  much  patriotic fervor .
the  proceedings included  a  rousing rendition of ``  the   star-spangled  Banner `` by Whitney Houston during the pregame ceremonies .
The Bills and their explosive no-huddle offense were making their first Super  कटोरी  appearance after finishing the regular season with a 13-3 record  ,  and leading  the  league  in  total  अंक   scored  with 428 .
In  advancing   to  their second Super  कटोरी  ,  the  Giants also  posted   a  13-3 regular season record , but  साथ  a ball-control offense and a defense  कि  allowed a league low 211 points  .
The  खेल  is best remembered for Bills placekicker  स्कॉट  Norwood 's last-second field goal attempt which went wide right of  the  uprights , leading to a Giants victory , and starting a four-game losing streak in  the  Super Bowl  लिये   the  Bills  .
The  दिग्गज  set a Super Bowl record holding possession  of  the  बॉल  for 40  मिनट्स  and 33  सेकेंड  .
New  यॉर्क  also overcame a 12-3 second-quarter  deficit  , and made a 75-yard  touchdown  drive that consumed a Super Bowl record  9:29  off  the  clock  .
Giants  कार्यशील  back Ottis Anderson ,  जो  carried  the   बॉल  21  टाइम्स  for 102 yards and one  touchdown  , was named Super  कटोरी   mvp  .
He was  the   पहला   awardee   to  receive the newly named  ``  Pete Rozelle Trophy '' ( named  लिये  the  पूर्व  commissioner ) .
Anderson  भी  recorded one reception for seven  गज  .
Malcolm X ( ; May 19  ,  1925February 21 , 1965 ) , born Malcolm Little and also  ज्ञात   as  El-Hajj  malik  El-Shabazz ( ) , was  an   african-american  Muslim minister and  इंसान  rights activist .
To his  admirers  , he  थी  a courageous  एडवोकेट   लिये  the  अधिकारों  of blacks , a man who indicted white  अमेरिका  in the  harshest   शर्तें  for  इसके   अपराधों  against black Americans .
Detractors accused  उसे  of preaching racism , black supremacy  ,  and violence .
He  रै  been called one  of  the greatest  और   सबसे  influential African Americans in history .
मैल्कम  X  's  father died—killed by white supremacists , it was rumored—when he was young , and at least one of his  uncles  was lynched  .
When he was  13  ,  उसके  mother was placed in a mental  हॉस्पिटल  , and he was  लगाई  in a  श्रेणी  of foster homes .
in  1946 , at age  20  , he  गई  to prison for  तोड़कर   और  entering .
in  prison , Malcolm X  became  a member of  the  Nation of  islam  ; after his parole in  1952  , he quickly rose to become one of  इसके  leaders  .
For a dozen years , Malcolm X was the public face of the controversial group , but disillusionment  साथ   स्वदेश  of Islam  सिर   इलियास  Muhammad led  उसे  to leave  the  Nation in March  1964  .
After a period  of   सफर   in  Africa  और  the Middle East , he returned to the United  राज्य  , where  he  founded Muslim  मस्जिदे  ,  inc.  and  the  Organization of Afro-American  एकता  .
In February 1965 , less than a year  बाद  leaving the Nation of Islam , he was assassinated by three  सदस्यों  of the group .
Malcolm X 's expressed beliefs changed substantially over time .
As a spokesman for  the  Nation of Islam he taught black supremacy and advocated separation of black and white  अमेरिकी  —in contrast  to   the  civil  अधिकारों  movement 's emphasis on integration  .
After breaking  साथ  the Nation of Islam in 1964—saying of his association with  it  , `` I did many  बाते  as a [  ब्लैक  ] Muslim that I 'm sorry for now  .
I was a  प्रेत  then ... pointed in a certain  दिशा  and told to march '' —and becoming a Sunni Muslim , he disavowed racism and expressed willingness  to   कार्य  with civil  अधिकारों   नेताओ  ,  he  continued to emphasize  pan-africanism  , black self-determination , and  self-defense  .

the  CW officially renewed the show for a third season  on  February  16  , 2010 .

It premiered on September 13 , 2010 and was met with generally positive reviews from critics .

it  follows Adrianna 's  वृद्धि  to fame , a new  संबंध  between Silver  और  Navid and a confused Teddy who decides to reveal to his family and friends he  is   gay   .

Elizabeth II ( Elizabeth Alexandra Mary ; born 21 April  1926   )  is the  संवैधानिक   monarch  of 16 sovereign states  ,   ज्ञात  as  the  Commonwealth  realms  ,  और  their territories and dependencies  ,  and  सिर  of the 54-member Commonwealth of Nations .
She is  परम्  Governor of the  गिरिजाघर  of  इंग्लैण्ड  and , in  कुछ   of  her realms  ,  carries the title  of  Defender of the  आस्था  as part  of  her full title .
on  her  accession  on 6 February 1952 , Elizabeth became Head of the Commonwealth  और  queen regnant of seven  स्वतंत्र  Commonwealth countries : the  संयुक्त   किंगडम   ,  Canada  ,  Australia ,  नई  Zealand  ,   दक्षिण  Africa , Pakistan and  ceylon  .
From 1956 to 1992  ,  the  क्रमांक  of her realms varied  as   territories  gained  स्वतंत्रता   और   कुछ  realms became republics .
at  present ,  in  addition to the first four  aforementioned  countries  ,  Elizabeth is Queen of Jamaica ,  बारबाडोस  ,  the  Bahamas , Grenada , Papua New Guinea ,  the  Solomon  आइलैंड्स   ,   तुवालू  , Saint Lucia  ,  Saint Vincent and the  grenadines  , Belize ,  अण्टीगुआ  and Barbuda and Saint Kitts and Nevis .
Her reign  of  years is currently the second longest  लिये  a  अंग्रेजों  monarch ; only Queen Victoria  रै  reigned longer at over 63 years .
Elizabeth  थी   born  in  लंदन  and educated privately  at   घर   .
Her father  acceded  to the  सिंहासन  as  जार्ज  VI in 1936 on the  abdication   of  his  bhai  Edward VIII ,  इससे  which time she was the  वारिस  presumptive .
She  began  to undertake public duties during the  दूसरी  World War , in which  वो   परोसा  in  the  Auxiliary Territorial Service .
In 1947  ,  she married Prince Philip , Duke of Edinburgh  ,  with whom she has four children : Charles , Anne  ,  Andrew , and Edward  .
उसके  coronation service  took  place  in  1953 and was the first to  be  televised  .
the  Queen 's many historic visits  और  meetings include a  राज्य  visit to the Republic of Ireland and reciprocal visits to and  इससे  the Pope .
The Queen has seen major constitutional changes  in  her realms , such as devolution  in  the United Kingdom and the patriation  of  the Canadian  संविधान   .
Times  of  personal significance have included  the  births and marriages of her  children   ,  the births of  उसके   grandchildren  ,  the  investiture of the Prince of  वेल्स   ,   और   the   जश्न  of milestones such as  उसके  Silver , Golden , and Diamond  jubilees  in  1977  , 2002  ,  and  2012  , respectively .
Major events in the  महारानी   's  reign have  शामिल   the  Troubles  in  Northern Ireland , the  falklands  War , wars with Iraq  और  the War in  अफगानिस्तान  .
There have  महरूम  times of personal sorrow for her which include the death of  उसके  father at 56 , the  हत्या  of Prince  फिलिप  's  ताऊ  , Lord Mountbatten  ,  the  विश्लेषण  of her  children   's  marriages in 1992  (   a  year deemed her  annus   horribilis  ) ,  the   मौत  in 1997 of  उसके  former  daughter-in-law  , Diana , Princess of Wales , and the deaths  of  her mother and sister in 2002 .
The Queen  रै  occasionally  faced  severe press criticism of the royal family and republican  sentiments  , but support for the monarchy  और  her personal  लोकप्रियता  remain high .
the   2010  United States Senate  चुनाव  in Florida took  प्लेस  on  नवम्बर  2 , 2010 along with other  चुनावों  to  the  United  राज्य   सीनेट  in other states as well as all elections to the United States House of Representatives and various state and local elections .
Republican Marco Rubio , former Speaker  of  the Florida House  of  Representatives , defeated independent  चार्ली  Crist and Democrat  kendrick  Meek in  a  three-way  रेस  .

Martinez  घोषित  on December 2 , 2008  कि  he would not seek re-election  to  the Senate , and would  इस्तीफा  prior  to  the end of his  पद   .
in  August 2009 , Governor Charlie  crist  announced  कि   he   होता  appoint  उसके  former Chief of  स्टाफ   ,  George LeMieux , a Republican  ,  to the Senate seat being  vacated  by Martinez .
राज्यपाल  Crist  सरेआम  announced he  थी  running for the  सीट  in mid-2009 .
at  the time he received many Republican endorsements ,  ऐसे  as the National  रिपब्लिकन  Senatorial  कमेटी   ,  Martinez ,  और   the  2008 Republican presidential nominee John McCain .

In April 2010 Crist announced he would  बूँद  out  of  the Republican primary and run as  an   स्वतंत्र   .
