दोहा  ( , ' or '  ,  literally : `` the big  पेड़  '' )  is   the   पूंजी  city of the state of Qatar .
Located on  the   coast  of  the   पारसी  Gulf ,
it had a population of  998,651  in 2008 , and  is  also one of the municipalities of Qatar .
Doha is  क़तर  's largest  नगर  , with over 60  %   of  the  स्वदेश  's population residing in Doha or its surrounding  उपनगरों  , and is also the economic centre of the  देश  .
Doha also serves as the  सीट   of   सरकारी  of Qatar , which is ruled by  शेख़  Hamad bin Khalifa Al Thani .
Doha is home to the Education  नगर  , an  क्षेत्रफल  devoted to  शोध   और  education .
दोहा   थी  the site of the first ministerial-level  बैठक  of  the   दोहा  Development Round of World Trade Organization negotiations .
the  city of  दोहा  held the 2006 Asian Games , which was the largest Asian Games ever held .
दोहा  also hosted  the   2011  Pan Arab Games and most of the  खेल  at the  2011  AFC  एशियाई  Cup  .
Doha  hosted  the UNFCCC  जलवायु   negotiations  ( COP 18  )  December 2012 and will host a  विशाल   क्रमांक  of the venues for  the  2022  फीफा   संसार  Cup  .
The World Petroleum Council  आयोजित  the  20th   संसार  Petroleum Conference in Doha in  दिसम्बर  2011 .
Paranasal  साइनस  are  a   समूह  of  चार  paired air-filled spaces that surround the  nasal  cavity ( maxillary  साइनस  ) , above the eyes ( frontal sinuses ) , between the eyes  (  ethmoid sinuses )  ,  and behind the  ethmoids  ( sphenoid sinuses ) .
The sinuses are named for  the  facial bones  in  which they  हैं   स्तिथ  .
Lean  निर्माण  , lean enterprise , or  झुकना  production ,  प्रायः  simply  ,   ``  Lean ,  ''  is a production practice that  considers  the expenditure of resources for any  लक्ष्य   अन्य  than the creation of value for the end customer to be  अपव्यय   ,  and  यूँ  a target for elimination .
Working from the perspective of the  ग्राहक  who consumes  a  product or service , `` value '' is  पारिभाषित  as any action  or  process  कि  a  ग्राहक   होता   be  willing to pay for .
essentially  , lean  is  centered on preserving value with less work .
Lean  निर्माण   is  a management philosophy derived mostly  इससे   the  Toyota Production System (  tps  ) ( hence the term Toyotism is also prevalent )  और  identified as `` Lean '' only in  the   1990s  .
TPS is  प्रसिद्ध  for its focus  on  reduction of the original Toyota seven wastes to  improve  overall customer value , but  वहीँ  are varying perspectives on  कैसा  this is best  हासिल  .
The  स्थिर  growth  of   टोयोटा  , from a  छोटी  company to  the   संसार  's largest automaker , has focused attention on how it has  हासिल  this  कामयाबी  .
icarly  logo
icarly   is  an American sitcom that airs on Nickelodeon ,  जिससे  premiered on September 8 , 2007 .
Nickelodeon promoted  अनेक  episodes so  दूर  such as `` iDo '' ,  ``   ihire  an Idiot '' , `` iPity the Nevel '' ,  ``  iDate  sam  & Freddie '' , etc . as specials  ,  despite  उनके  being regular episodes .
प्रत्येक  episode title begins  साथ   a  lower  मामला  i which represents the internet , as in  ``  iCarly  ''  .
The show was nominated for an Emmy award for Outstanding Children 's Program  in  2009  .
The series starring Miranda  cosgrove  as  कार्ली  Shay , a 13-year-old who becomes an Internet star  .
The series ended  on  November 23 , 2012  साथ  the one-hour special episode  ``  iGoodbye '' .
A total of 7 seasons and 109  एपीसोड  were broadcast .
The largest audience of the  श्रेणी   थी  11.2 million viewers , with  the  special episode ``  isaved  Your Life '' premiered in January 2010  .
When Carly (  मिरांडा  Cosgrove  )  and  उसके  sassy best friend Sam (  jennette  McCurdy ) act  मजेदार  at  a   स्कूल  talent show audition , tech-savvy Freddie  (  Nathan Kress ) tapes it and posts it online without  telling  them  .
After seeing the girls ' strong chemistry and banter , the online audience clamors  लिये  more and the iCarly webcast is  born  .
While grappling with typical issues of adolescence , Carly  ,   sam  , and  फ्रेडी   ढूँढें  out that they have also  become   ऑनलाइन  celebrities as their  दिखाएँ   –  which features talent contests ,  व्यंजनों  , problem-solving  ,  and random dancing – garners international accolades .
कार्ली  lives in Seattle , Washington  साथ  her 26-year-old brother and  संरक्षक  Spencer ( Jerry Trainor ) and produces the show in a makeshift third-floor studio  मचान  in their apartment .
Their mother has never been seen or mentioned  ,   लकिन  their  पिता   ,  Steven Shay (  दाउद  Chisum ) , is  a  U.S.  एयर   फ़ोर्स  officer temporarily stationed  on   a  submarine , and  is  often mentioned  लकिन  is only seen  in  person during the series finale episode , `` iGoodbye ''  .
Westlife  यहूद  an Irish boy band which formed in 1998  और  disbanded in 2012 .
Originally signed by Simon Cowell and managed by Louis Walsh  ,  the group 's final line-up  consisted  of Nicky Byrne , Kian Egan , Mark Feehily  और  Shane Filan .
Brian  mcfadden  was a member from 1998 until  उसके  departure  in   2004  .
Westlife sold over 50  लाख  records worldwide , a total that included studio  एल्बम  ,  singles  , video  रिलीज  , and compilation  एल्बम  .
The group accumulated 14 number-one singles in  the   संयुक्त  Kingdom ( the third-highest  in  UK history ) , tying with  चट्टान  Richard  और   रैंकिंग  just behind The Beatles and Elvis Presley .
They  हासिल  a total of 26 top  टेन  singles over their 14-year  करियर  .
By 2010 ,  westlife  was listed in the Guinness World Records  ,  as the UK 's top-selling album  समूह  of the 21st century  .
They also won The Record of the  साल  (  the  only music award based on public votes  in  the  uk  )  a  record-breaking four times and in  2012  , the Official Charts Company listed  westlife  34th amongst the biggest-selling singles  कलाकारों  in British  म्यूज़िक  history .
Despite  उनके  European and Asian success  ,  Westlife never  प्रबंधित  to break into the  u.S.  market , achieving  तभी   एक  hit single in 2000 :  ``  Swear  it   again  `` .
In October 2011  ,  Westlife announced their intention to split in 2012  ,  following their Greatest Hits Tour and the  रिलीज  of  उनके  Greatest  हिट्स  album .
The boyband 's final concerts were held  on  22 and 23 June 2012 at Croke Park Stadium in Dublin  .
The first farewell  कॉन्सर्ट   ,  offering 85,000 tickets  ,  sold  आउट  in a record-breaking  5  minutes  और  the latter screened  सजीव  in  cinemas  worldwide .
विटामिन  A is  a  group  of  nutritionally unsaturated hydrocarbons , which include  रेटिनॉल   ,  retinal , retinoic  एसिड   और  several provitamin A carotenoids  among  which beta-carotene is the most important .
Vitamin A has  अनेक  functions , it is important  लिये   विकास  and development , for the maintenance of the immune system and good vision .
Vitamin  a  is needed by the retina of the eye in  the  form of retinal , which combines with protein opsin to form rhodopsin the light-absorbing molecule , that is necessary  लिये  both low-light ( scotopic vision ) and color vision .
Vitamin A also functions in a very different role as  an  irreversibly oxidized form of retinol known as retinoic acid , which is an important  hormone-like  growth  फ़ैक्टर   लिये  epithelial and  अन्य  cells .
in  foods of animal origin , the major form of  विटामिन  A  is  an ester  ,   primarily   retinyl  palmitate ,  जिससे  is converted to retinol ( chemically an  दारू  ) in the  छोटी  intestine .
the  retinol form functions as  a   भंडार  form  of   the  vitamin  ,  and  can  be converted to and  इससे   इसके  visually active  सुव्युद   रूप  , retinal  .
The associated  एसिड   (  retinoic acid ) ,  a   metabolite  that  can  be  irreversibly  synthesized  इससे  vitamin A ,  रै  only partial vitamin A  कार्यकलाप   ,  and does not function in the retina for the  विज़ुअल  cycle .
retinoic   एसिड  is used  लिये  growth and cellular differentiation .
All forms of vitamin A have a beta-ionone ring to which an isoprenoid chain is attached  ,  called a retinyl group .
Both structural  सुविधाएँ  are essential for vitamin  कार्यकलाप  .
The orange  रंजक  of carrots –  beta-carotene   –   can  be represented  as   दो  connected retinyl groups , which are used in the body  to   योगदान  to vitamin A levels .
Alpha-carotene and gamma-carotene also  have  a single  retinyl  group  ,   जिससे   दे  them some vitamin activity .
None of the other carotenes have  विटामिन   कार्यकलाप  .
The carotenoid  शर्तa-  cryptoxanthin possesses an ionone group and has vitamin activity in humans  .
Vitamin  a  can be found in two principal forms in foods  :
Retinol , the  रूप  of vitamin A absorbed when  खाने   एनिमल  food sources  ,  is a  पीला  , fat-soluble  पदार्थ  .
Since the pure alcohol form is unstable , the vitamin  is  found in tissues  in  a  रूप  of retinyl  ester   .
It  is  also commercially produced and administered  as   esters   ऐसे  as retinyl acetate or palmitate  .
The carotenes  alpha-carotene   ,  beta-carotene ,  gamma-carotene  ; and  the  xanthophyll beta-cryptoxanthin ( all  of  which contain beta-ionone rings ) , but no other carotenoids  ,  function as provitamin A in herbivores and  सर्वाहारी   पशु  , which possess the enzyme  (   15-15'-dioxygenase  ) which cleaves beta-carotene in the intestinal mucosa and converts it retinol .
In general  ,  carnivores are poor converters of ionine-containing carotenoids  ,  and pure  carnivores  such as  बिल्लियों   और  ferrets lack 15-15'-dioxygenase and  can  not convert any  carotenoids  to retinal ( resulting in none of the  carotenoids   होने  forms of  विटामिन  A for these species ) .
Selena  मारी  Gomez ( born July 22 , 1992 ) is an American singer and actress .
वो   बना  her debut as a child actress in Barney & Friends .
In 2007 , Gomez came to prominence  as   a  starring cast  सदस्य  in the television series Wizards of  waverly  Place .
She signed  to  Hollywood  रिकॉर्ड  the following  साल  ,  और  became the  संस्थापक   और   सीसे  singer of the pop band Selena Gomez & the Scene .
Their  स्टुडियो  albums Kiss & Tell ( 2009 ) , A Year Without  बरसात  ( 2010 ) , and  जब  the Sun  goes  Down ( 2011 ) were  certified  Gold  by  the Recording Industry Association of America ( RIAA  )  and have spawned Platinum-certified  singles  `` Naturally ``  ,  `` Who Says  ``   ,  and `` Love You like a Love  सोंग   ``  .
After the release of  टेलीविज़न  films and their accompanying soundtracks , Gomez made her theatrical film debut  in  Ramona and Beezus in 2010 and  स्ट्रक्चर  in  मोंटे  Carlo in 2011  .
Upon the  निष्कर्ष   of   wizards   of  Waverly Place and  the  hiatus of Selena Gomez  &  the Scene in  2012  , she focused on her film career  ,  serving  as  a voice actress in Hotel Transylvania and starring in Spring Breakers the following year .
Her debut solo  एल्बम   is  tentatively scheduled to be released in summer 2013 , and is preceded by its lead single `` Come & Get It `` .
Outside of  उसके  work in the entertainment industry ,  गोमेज़  is involved  in  philanthropic activities through charity work and various social and environmental causes .
Tracie  monique  Spencer ( born July 12 , 1976 ) is an American R & B and pop singer-songwriter , actress , and model .
Sacramento is the capital city of the U.S. state of  कैलिफ़ोर्निया   और  the seat of government  of  Sacramento  काउंटी  .
It  is  located at the confluence of the Sacramento River  और  the American River in the  उत्तरी  portion of California 's expansive  सेंट्रल  Valley  .
With an estimated 2011 population  of  477,891  ,  it is  the  sixth-largest city in California and  the  35th  largest   नगर  in the United States .
Sacramento is the core cultural and economic center of the Sacramento metropolitan  क्षेत्रफल   जिससे  includes seven counties with an estimated 2009  जनसांख्यिकी  of 2,527,123  .
Its metropolitan area is the fourth largest  in   कैलिफ़ोर्निया  after  the  Greater Los Angeles Area , San Francisco  खाड़ी  Area , and the San Diego metropolitan  क्षेत्रफल  ,  as   खूब   as  the 25th largest  in  the United  राज्य  .
Sacramento was cited by Time magazine as America  's   सबसे  ethnically and racially integrated city in 2002 .
Sacramento became a city  through  the efforts of the Swiss immigrant John Sutter  ,  Sr.  ,   उसके  son John Sutter , Jr.  ,   और  James W. Marshall  .
sacramento  grew quickly thanks to the  सुरक्षा   of  Sutter 's Fort , which  थी  established by Sutter in 1839 .
During the  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  Gold Rush , Sacramento was a major distribution point , a commercial and agricultural center , and a terminus for wagon  रेल  ,  stagecoaches  , riverboats , the  टेलीग्राफ  ,  the  Pony  एक्स्प्रेस  ,  और  the  पहला  Transcontinental Railroad  .
California  राज्य  University , Sacramento , more commonly  ज्ञात  as Sacramento State or  सैक  State , is the  largest  local university .
It is one of the twenty-three campuses of the California  राज्य  University system  .
drexel  University Sacramento  is   स्तिथ  in  शहर  , Sacramento  .
University  of  the Pacific 's  mcgeorge  School of  विधि  is located in the Oak Park neighborhood .
In addition , the University of California , Davis is  स्तिथ  in nearby Davis , west of the capital .
The  uc   डेविस  Medical Center ,  a  world-renowned  शोध   हॉस्पिटल  ,  is  located in the city  of  Sacramento .
Memorial Day is a United States federal  अवकाश  which occurs every year on the final Monday of May .
मेमोरियल  Day  is  a day of  remembering   the  men and women who died  जबकि  serving in the United States Armed Forces .
Formerly known as Decoration Day  ,  it originated  बाद  the American Civil War to  commemorate  the Union and Confederate  सैनिको  who died in the  सिविल  War .
by  the 20th  सदी   मेमोरियल  Day  था   महरूम  extended to honor all Americans who have died  in   सब  wars .
It typically  marks  the start of the summer vacation season , while Labor Day marks its end .
अनेक  people visit  कब्रिस्तान   और  memorials , particularly to honor those who have died  in  military service .
अनेक  volunteers place an  अमरीकी  flag on each  संगीन  in national  कब्रिस्तान   .
By the early  20th  century ,  मेमोरियल  Day  थी  an occasion for more general  expressions  of memory  ,  as people visited the graves of their  मृतक   रिश्तेदारों   in  church  कब्रिस्तान  , whether they  था  served  in  the military or not .
It also became a long weekend increasingly devoted to shopping , family gatherings , fireworks ,  यात्राएँ  to the beach  ,  and national  मीडिया   कार्यक्रम  .
Annual Decoration Days for particular cemeteries  हैं  held  on  a Sunday  in  late  वसन्त  or early summer in some  ग्रामीण  areas of the American South , notably in the mountains .
In cases involving a  परिवार   graveyard  where remote ancestors  as  well as those who were deceased more  recently   हैं  buried , this may take  on  the  अक्षर  of an  विस्तारित  family reunion  to  which  कुछ  people travel hundreds of miles  .
People  एकत्रित  on the  designated  day and put flowers  on   क़ब्रों  and  नवीनीकृत   सम्पर्क  with kinfolk and others .
There often is  a  religious service and a `` dinner  on  the ground , '' the  परंपरागत   पद  for a potluck meal in which people used to spread the dishes  आउट   on  sheets  or  tablecloths  on   the  grass .
It  is  believed that  इस   अभ्यास  began before the American Civil War and thus  may  reflect the real origin of the  ``  memorial  दिन  '' idea  .
Memorial  दिन  is not to  be  confused with Veterans Day ; Memorial Day is  a  day  of  remembering the men and  महिलाओं  who died while  सेवारत  ,  जबकि  Veterans Day celebrates  the  service  of  all U.S. military veterans , living or dead  .
Mt . Zion Church state history marker near Philadelphia  ,  Mississippi .
स्वतंत्रता  Summer ( also  ज्ञात  as  the  Mississippi Summer Project  )  was  a  campaign  in  the United States launched  in  June 1964 to  attempt  to  पंजीकरण  as many African  अमरीकी   मतदाता   as  possible in Mississippi ,  जिससे  had historically excluded most blacks from voting .
the  project also set up  दर्जनों  of  स्वतंत्रता   स्कूलों  , Freedom Houses ,  और  community centers  in  small towns throughout  मिसिसिपी  to  सहायता  the local  ब्लैक   जनसांख्यिकी  .
The  प्रोजेक्ट  was  व्यवस्थित  by the Council of Federated  संगठन  ( COFO  )  , a coalition of the Mississippi branches of  the   चार   प्रमुख  civil rights organizations ( SNCC  ,  CORE , NAACP  और  SCLC )  .
Most of the impetus , leadership , and financing for the Summer Project came from the SNCC .
रॉबर्ट  Parris  मूसा  , SNCC field secretary and co-director of COFO ,  निर्देशित  the summer project .
Blues  is  the  नाम  given to both  a  musical form and  a  music genre  कि  originated in communities of primarily the `` Deep South ``  of   the  United States  around  the end of the 19th century from  spirituals  , work songs  ,  field  hollers  ,  shouts   और  chants  ,   और  rhymed simple narrative ballads .
The blues  रूप   ,  ubiquitous  in  jazz  ,   लय  and blues , and rock and roll is characterized by specific  कॉर्ड  progressions , of which the twelve-bar blues chord progression is the most  आम  .
The blue notes that , for expressive  उद्देश्य  are  सुंग  or played flattened or  धीरे  bent ( minor 3rd to major 3rd ) in  संबंध  to the  पिच  of the major scale  ,  are also an important  भाग  of the sound .
The blues genre is based on the blues  रूप  but  possesses  other characteristics such  as  specific  गीत   ,  bass lines , and instruments .
Blues can be  subdivided  into several subgenres  ranging  from country to urban blues that were  अधिक  or less popular during different periods of the 20th century  .
बेहतरीन  known are  the  Delta  ,  Piedmont  ,   जम्प  , and  शिकागो  blues styles .
World War II marked the transition from acoustic  to  electric blues and the  प्रगतिशील  opening of  ब्लूज़  music to a  wider   दर्शक  , especially  श्वेत  listeners .
In  the  1960s and  1970s  , a hybrid form called blues-rock evolved .
The term `` the blues '' refers to the `` blue devils '' , meaning melancholy and sadness ; an early use  of  the term in this sense  is   मिला  in George Colman 's  one-act   तमाशा  Blue Devils ( 1798 ) .
Though  the   उपयोग  of the phrase in African-American music  may  be older , it has been attested to  चूंकि  1912 , when Hart  wand   's  `` Dallas  ब्लूज़   ``   became  the first copyrighted blues  संयोजन  .
In lyrics the phrase is often used to  describe  a depressed mood .
A quarter dollar  ,   commonly  shortened to quarter , is a coin worth 1⁄4  of  a United States dollar  or  25 cents .
The quarter has been produced  चूंकि  1796 .
The choice  of  25¢ as a denomination  ,  as opposed  to  20¢ which is more common in other parts of the  संसार  , originated with the practice of dividing Spanish Milled Dollars  into  eight wedge  तराशा  segments  (  cf. `` pieces of eight `` ) .
at  one time `` two bits `` ,  i.e  .  दो   wedges  , each  कील  an eighth , thus a quarter  of  the Spanish  रियल  ,  थी  a common nickname for  a  quarter .
दिन  of the Dead ( ) is a Mexican  अवकाश  celebrated throughout Mexico  और   around   the   संसार  in  अन्य  cultures .
the   अवकाश  focuses on gatherings  of   परिवार  and friends  to  pray for and remember friends and  परिवार   सदस्यों  who  have   died  .
It is particularly celebrated in Mexico ,  जहाँ  it  is  a national holiday , and all  बैंको  are closed .
the  celebration takes place  on  November 1 and 2 , in connection with  the  Catholic  छुट्टियाँ  of All Saints ' Day and  सब  Souls '  दिन  .
Traditions  कनेक्ट  with the  अवकाश  include building private  altars  honoring the deceased  using  sugar skulls , marigolds  ,  and the favorite foods and beverages  of  the departed  और  visiting graves  साथ   ये  as gifts .
They  भी  leave possessions of  the  deceased .
Scholars trace the origins of the modern Mexican  अवकाश  to  स्वदेशी  observances dating back hundreds of years  और  to an Aztec festival dedicated to the goddess Mictecacihuatl .
The holiday has spread throughout the world : In Brazil , Dia de Finados is  a  public holiday that many Brazilians celebrate by  visiting  cemeteries and churches  .
In Spain , there are festivals and parades , and  ,  at the end of the day  ,  people gather at cemeteries and pray for  उनके  dead loved  ones  .
Similar observances  occur  elsewhere in Europe , and  similarly  themed  जश्न  appear  in  many Asian and African cultures .
अनीता  Mk VIII .
the  ANITA Mark VII and ANITA Mark VIII calculators were launched simultaneously  in  late 1961 as the world 's first all- electronic desktop calculators .
Designed and  निर्मित   by  the  घंटी  Punch  co   .
in Britain , and  marketed  through its Sumlock  comptometer   प्रभाग  ,  वे  used vacuum tubes and cold-cathode switching  tubes  in their logic circuits and nixie tubes for  उनके  numerical displays .
They were the first  of   a   श्रेणी  of desktop and hand-held electronic calculators that the company was to develop and sell under the ANITA name into the mid-1970s .
George  वॉशिंगटन  ( –  ,  1799 ) was the first President of the United States ( 1789–1797 ) , the commander-in-chief of the Continental Army during the American Revolutionary War  ,  and one of  the  Founding  fathers  of the United States .
He presided over  the  convention that  drafted  the Constitution  ,  which  replaced  the  आलेख  of Confederation and  स्थापित  the position of President .
वॉशिंगटन  was elected President as  the  unanimous choice of the  69  electors in 1788 ,  और  he served two terms in office  .
He oversaw  the   सृष्टि  of a strong , well-financed national government that maintained  neutrality  in the wars raging  in  Europe , suppressed rebellion  ,  and won acceptance  among  Americans of all types .
His leadership style established many forms and rituals  of  government  कि  have  महरूम   प्रयुक्त  since ,  ऐसे   as  using a cabinet system and delivering an inaugural address .
further  ,  the  peaceful transition  इससे  his presidency  to  the  प्रेसिडेंसी  of John Adams established a tradition that  continues  into  the   21st   सदी  .
Washington  थी  hailed as `` father  of   उसके  country `` even  दौरान  his lifetime .
Washington was born into the provincial gentry of  औपनिवेशिक   वर्जिनिया  ; his wealthy planter family owned tobacco plantations and  स्लेव  .
After both his father and older brother died  जब  he was young , Washington became personally and professionally attached  to  the powerful William Fairfax , who promoted his  करियर  as a surveyor and  सिपाही  .
Washington quickly  became  a senior officer in  the  colonial forces  दौरान  the  पहला  stages of the French and Indian War .
Chosen by the  दूसरी  Continental  कॉंग्रेस   in  1775 to be commander-in-chief of  the   महाद्वीपीय  Army in the American Revolution , Washington managed to force the British out of Boston in 1776 ,  लकिन  was defeated and almost captured later that year when  he   खोया   नई  York City .
After crossing  the   डेलावेयर  River in the dead of winter  ,  he defeated the British in  दो  battles , retook New  जर्सी  and  लौटी  momentum to the Patriot cause .
क्युकी  of his strategy  ,  Revolutionary  शक्तियां  captured two  प्रमुख  British armies  at  Saratoga  in  1777 and Yorktown in  1781  .
Historians  laud  Washington for his selection and supervision of  उसके  generals , encouragement of morale and ability  to  hold together the  फौज  , coordination with  the  state governors and state militia units , relations  साथ  Congress and  ध्यान  to supplies , logistics  ,   और  training .
In  बैटल  , however , Washington was  repeatedly  outmaneuvered by British  सेनापतियों  with  larger   सेना  .
After  विजय   था   महरूम  finalized in 1783 , Washington resigned as Commander-in-chief rather than seize power , proving his opposition to dictatorship and  उसके  commitment to American republicanism .
असंतुष्ट   साथ   the   कमजोरियों  of the Articles of Confederation  ,  in 1787 Washington presided over  the  Constitutional Convention that drafted the United States Constitution .
Elected unanimously  as  the first President of  the  United States in 1789 , he attempted to bring rival factions together to unify the nation .
He supported Alexander Hamilton  's   कार्यक्रम  to  अदा  off all state and national debt , to implement  an  effective tax system  और  to create a  नेशनल  bank ( despite opposition from Thomas Jefferson ) .
Washington proclaimed  the  United States neutral in the wars raging in Europe after 1793 .
He avoided war with Great  ब्रिटेन  and guaranteed a decade of peace and profitable  व्यापार  by securing the Jay  सन्धि   in  1795 , despite intense  विपक्ष  from the Jeffersonians  .
हालांकि  never  officially   joining  the Federalist Party ,  he  supported its programs .
वॉशिंगटन  's Farewell  पता  was an influential primer on republican virtue  और  a warning against partisanship ,  sectionalism   ,   और   भागीदारी   in   विदेशी  wars .
He retired from the presidency in 1797 and  लौटे  to  उसके  home , Mount  vernon  , and  उसके  domestic  जीवन   जहाँ  he managed a  किस्में  of enterprises  .
he  freed all his slaves by his final will .
Washington had a vision of a great and powerful nation that would be built on republican lines using federal power .
He sought to use the national government to preserve  स्वतंत्रता  , improve  अवसंरचना  , open  the  western lands , promote commerce , found  a  permanent capital  ,   reduce   क्षेत्रीय  tensions and promote a spirit of American nationalism .
At his death , Washington was eulogized  as  `` first in war , first in peace , and first  in  the  दिल  of his  देशवासियों  '' by Henry Lee .
The Federalists  बना  him  the  symbol of their party but for  अनेक  years ,  the  Jeffersonians continued to distrust his influence and delayed building the Washington  स्मारक  .
As the leader of the  पहला  successful revolution against a  औपनिवेशिक   साम्राज्य  in world history , Washington became  an  international icon for  मुक्ति  and  राष्ट्रवाद  , especially  in   फ़्रांस  and  लैटिन  America .
Fiscal Year  2012  U.S. Federal Spending – Cash  or  Budget  आधार  .
फिस्कल  Year  2012   u.S.   संघीय  Receipts .
The Budget of the United States  सरकारी  often begins as the President 's proposal to  the  U.S. Congress which recommends  funding   स्तर  for the next fiscal year , beginning October 1 .
however   ,  Congress is the  देह  required by  विधि  to pass a budget annually and to  submit  the budget passed  by  both houses to the  अध्यक्ष  for signature  .
congressional  decisions are governed by rules and legislation regarding the federal  बजट  process .
Budget committees set spending limits for the  हाउस  and Senate committees  और  for  appropriations  subcommittees , which then approve individual  appropriations   बिल्स  to  allocate  funding to  विभिन्न   संघीय  programs .
If Congress fails  to  pass an annual  बजट  ( as has  महरूम  the case since 2009 ) ,  a  series  of  Appropriations bills must be passed as `` stop gap ''  उपायों  .
बाद  Congress approves an appropriations bill ,  it  is sent to the President  ,  who may sign it into law , or  may   वीटो  it ( as  he   होता  a budget when passed  by  the Congress ) .
A vetoed bill is sent back  to   कॉंग्रेस  ,  जिससे  can  pass   it  into  विधि   साथ   a  two-thirds majority  in  each chamber .
Congress may also combine all or some appropriations bills  into  an omnibus  reconciliation  bill .
In  जोड  , the  अध्यक्ष  may request and the  कॉंग्रेस  may  pass  supplemental appropriations  बिल्स  or emergency supplemental appropriations  बिल्स  .
Several government agencies  provide  budget data and analysis .
These include the Government Accountability Office ( GAO ) , Congressional Budget  दफ्तर  , the Office  of  Management  और  Budget ( OMB ) and the U.S.  राजकोष  Department .
ये  agencies  have  reported  कि  the federal government is facing a series of important financing  चुनौतियां  .
in  the  short-run  , tax revenues have declined  significantly   due  to a severe recession and tax policy choices , while expenditures  have   विस्तारित  for wars , unemployment insurance and  अन्य  safety net  बिता  .
In  the   long-run  , expenditures related  to  healthcare programs such as Medicare and Medicaid are projected  to  grow faster than the  अर्थव्यवस्था  overall as the population matures .
नई  Guinea ( also , Tok Pisin : Niugini , Dutch : Nieuw Guinea ,  और  ; historically  :  Papua ) is the world  's  second largest island , after Greenland ,  covering   a  land area  of  786,000 km2 .
Located  in  the  दक्षिणपश्चिम   प्रशांत  Ocean , it lies geographically to the east  of   the  Malay Archipelago ,  साथ  which it is sometimes included as part of a greater Indo-Australian Archipelago  .
Geologically it is  a   भाग   of  the same tectonic  थाली  as Australia .
When world sea  स्तर  were low , the two shared shorelines ( which now  झूठ  100 to 140  मीटर  below  समुद्र  level ) , combining with lands  अभी  inundated into the tectonic continent of Sahul , also  ज्ञात  as Greater Australia .
The two landmasses became separated when the  क्षेत्रफल   अभी  known  as  the Torres  जलसन्धि  flooded after the end  of  the last glacial  काल  .
Anthropologically ,  नई  Guinea is considered part of Melanesia .
Politically , the western half of  the   द्वीप  comprises two Indonesian provinces : Papua and West Papua  .
The  पूर्वी   हाफ  forms the mainland of  the  country of Papua New Guinea .
The  द्वीप   रै   a   जनसांख्यिकी  of about 7.5 million  ,  with a very low population density of only 8 inh/km2 .
New  गिनी  is differentiated from its drier  ,   खुशामद  , and less fertile southern counterpart , Australia ,  by   इसके  much higher rainfall  और  its active volcanic geology  ,  with its  उच्चतम   पाइंट  ,  puncak  Jaya ,  reaching  an elevation of 4,884  m   (  16,023  ft   )  .
Yet the two  जमीन  masses share a  समान  animal fauna , with marsupials  ,  including wallabies and possums , and the egg-laying  monotreme  , the  spiny  anteater  ,  or echidna .
Other than bats and some two dozen indigenous rodent  genera  , there are no  pre-human  indigenous placental mammals .
Pigs , several additional species of rats ,  और   the  ancestor  of  the New Guinea Singing  श्वान  were introduced with  इंसान  colonization .
The human presence  on  the island  तिथियाँ  back at least 40,000 years to the oldest human migrations out  of   अफ़्रीकी  .
शोध  indicates that the highlands were an early  और  independent  बीच  of agriculture , with  प्रमाण  of irrigation going back at least 10,000 years .
क्युकी  of the time depth of its inhabitation and its highly fractured landscape ,  an  unusually high number of languages are spoken on the island  ,  with some 1,000 languages ( a figure higher than that  of  most  महाद्वीपों  ) having been catalogued  आउट  of an estimated world-wide pre-Columbian  कुल  of 6,000 human  dialects   .
Most are classified  as  Papuan languages , a generally accepted  भौगोलिक  term which a minority of  लेखक  hold  to  be a genetic one .
A number  of  Austronesian  भाषाएं  are  बोला  on the coast  और   on  offshore islands  .
in  the 16th century Spanish  explorers  discovered the island and  पुकारा   it   नुएवा   गिनी  .
In  हाल   इतिहास  western New Guinea was  शामिल  in the Dutch East Indies colony .
the  Germans  annexed  the  उत्तरी  coast of the eastern half of the island as German New Guinea in their  pre–world   युद्ध  I effort to  स्थापित  themselves as  a  colonial power  ,  whilst the south eastern portion was reluctantly claimed by Britain  .
Following the Treaty of Versailles  ,  the German portion was  awarded   to  Australia ( which was  already  governing the British  अर्जी  , named the Territory of Papua  )  as a  लीग  of Nations mandate  .
The eastern half  of   the  island was granted independence from  ऑस्ट्रेलिया  as Papua New Guinea in  1975  .
The western half gained independence from the Dutch in 1961 ,  लकिन  became part of Indonesia soon afterwards in controversial circumstances .
`` The  वैन  Buren Boys '' is the 148th episode of the sitcom Seinfeld , and name of a  fictional  New York  गली   गिरोह   .
Their sign is crossing the  हैंड्स  ,  साथ  one hand  साथ  all the fingers 'up ' and  स्प्रेड  out .
The other hand  रै   सब  but the  अंगूठा  and pointer finger  up  , for a total of eight (  8  ) .
The gang is named  लिये  the 8th President of  the   संयुक्त   राज्य  ,  मार्टिन   वैन   buren   (  who  थी  the first president from New York )  .
इस  was the 14th episode for the 8th  ऋतु  .
it  aired  on  February 6  ,   1997  .
bevo  sign
Bevo was a non-alcoholic malt beverage ,  or  near beer , brewed in the  संयुक्त  States by  the  Anheuser-Busch company beginning in the early 20th century  .
Bevo enjoyed its greatest success during the time of  निषेध  , when beer ,  वाइन   और  distilled  liquors  , were made  illegal  for thirteen  सालो  .
The Anheuser-Busch company started brewing Bevo when alcoholic beverages were  निषिद्ध  in 1916 by the United  राज्य  armed forces .
Production rose greatly with national prohibition in  1919  , and Bevo was  by  far the  सबसे  popular of  the   अनेक  ``  खाद्यान्न  beverages  ''  or  ``  near beers '' of the time .
At the peak of its popularity  in  the early 1920s , more than five  लाख  cases  of  Bevo were sold annually .
Renard with  a   मग  of Bevo ,  चित्रित  in terra cotta on  the  interior walls  of  the Bevo building  ,  St. Louis
Labels on the bottles billed  it  as `` Bevo  the  Beverage  ''  .
The  नाम   ``   bevo  ''  थी  coined  इससे  the word `` beverage '' and the Slavic language word for beer  ``  pivo '' , and was pronounced `` Bee-vo '' .
Some  bevo  advertising  प्रदर्शित  the  अक्षर  `` Renard the Fox `` ( based on the protagonist of a  मध्यकालीन  French folk-tale  )  ,  और   promotional  mugs with this character were  manufactured  .
In 1930  anheuser-busch  built a series  of  boat-bodied  गाड़ियाँ  in its St. Louis shops called the `` Bevo Boats '' which were used for  प्रमोशन  .
Seven are believed to have been built  on  Pierce-Arrow  8-cylinder  chassis while one surviving example was based upon 1930 Cadillac 353  v8  .
Billboard advertising Bevo in Trenton , New Jersey , 1917
A contemporary  विज्ञापन   पढ़ा  `` Cooling and invigorating  ,  Bevo the Beverage .
Order by  the  case from  अपना  grocer  ,  druggist , or dealer  .  ''
The paper label on the back of the bottle read `` The All-Year-Round Soft Drink  .
Appetizing - Healthful - Nutritious  -  Refreshing .
Milk or  जल  may contain bacteria .
BEVO never does . ''
bevo  became part of the popular culture of the time , and  is  mentioned in various popular songs and Vaudeville skits of the era .
इस  led  to  secondary slang uses of the word ; for example , in American  सैन्य   कठबोली  a young and  अनुभवहीन  officer  थी  called  a  `` Bevo  ''   .
the  University of Texas named its mascot `` Bevo '' , a name which has stuck to this day .
Irving Berlin included a paean to the drink , ``  तुम  Ca n't Stay Up on Bevo '' , in  उसके   1917  army revue  ,   यिप   यिप  Yaphank .
In the late 1920s  smuggled  bootleg beer and liquor as well as  ``  homebrew  ``  , cut into  bevo  's marketshare .
With sales flattening  to  100,000 cases by 1929 ,  anheuser-busch  stopped production  .
The Bevo Mill , St. Louis , in 2008
The Bevo building , with the  renard  character  prominently  displayed at the corners , still operates as a  bottling   सुविधा  at their main brewery in St. Louis  ,  Missouri .
The landmark Bevo Mill  ,  constructed by August Anheuser Busch  ,   sr.  in 1917 .
It was closed  in  2009 , but  it  reopened in October 2009  अंतर्गत  new  स्वामी  .
Bevo is also mentioned in the short story `` The Killers `` by Ernest Hemingway ; as well as in Babbitt by Sinclair Lewis .
Mylanta  is  an over the counter medication used  लिये  the  उपचार  of acid reflux , heartburn  ,   और   gastroesophageal  reflux disease ( also  ज्ञात  as GERD ) .

Milk is a white liquid produced by  the   mammary   ग्रंथियों  of mammals .
It  is  the primary source of nutrition for young mammals  पहले  they are  समर्थ  to digest other types of food  .
Early- lactation milk contains colostrum , which carries the mother  's  antibodies  to  the baby  और  can reduce  the  risk of many diseases in the baby .
It also  contains  many other nutrients  .
As an agricultural product , milk is extracted from mammals and used as food  लिये   इंसानो   .
Worldwide , dairy farms  उत्पादित  about 730 million tonnes of milk in  2011  .
India is  the   संसार  's largest producer and consumer  of  milk , yet neither exports nor  imports   मिल्क  .
New Zealand ,  the  European Union 's 27 member states , Australia , and the United States are the world 's largest exporters of milk and milk products  .
चीन  and Russia are the  संसार  's largest  importers   of  milk  और  milk products .
Throughout the world , there  हैं   अधिक  than 6  अरब  consumers of milk and milk  उत्पाद  .
Over 750 million people  सजीव  within dairy farming households .
Milk is  a  key contributor to improving nutrition and food security particularly in developing  देशों   .
सुधार  in livestock and  दुग्ध  technology offer significant  वादा   in   reducing  poverty and malnutrition in the  संसार  .
Motorcycle speedway , usually referred to as speedway , is a motorcycle sport involving four and sometimes up to six riders competing over four anti-clockwise laps  of  an oval circuit .
Speedway motorcycles use  तभी  one gear and  have  no  brakes  and  रेसिंग  takes place on a flat  ओवल   track  usually consisting of dirt  or   loosely  packed shale .
Competitors use this surface to slide their machines sideways ,  powersliding  or broadsiding into the bends  .
On the straight  भाग   of  the track the motorcycles reach speeds of  up  .
The exact origins of  the  sport are  अनजान  but there is  प्रमाण   of  a type of  स्पीडवे  racing  होने  practised in the USA before the First World War and in Australia  in   the   लेट   1910s   और  early 1920s .
There are now both domestic and  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  competitions in a number  of   देशों   सहित  the  स्पीडवे   संसार  Cup whilst the highest overall scoring individual in the  स्पीडवे  Grand Prix events is pronounced the world champion  .
स्पीडवे  is  लोकप्रिय   in  central and northern Europe and to a lesser  extent  in Australia  और  North America .
a  variant  of   track  racing , speedway is administered internationally by  the  Fédération Internationale  de   motocyclisme   (  FIM ) .
Domestic speedway events are regulated  by   fim  affiliated national motor sport  federations  .
Vitamin D is a group  of  fat-soluble secosteroids responsible  लिये  intestinal absorption of calcium and phosphate .
In  इंसानो   ,   the   सबसे  important related compounds of  विटामिन  D  हैं  vitamin D2  और  vitamin D3 .
Cholecalciferol ( vitamin D3 ) and ergocalciferol ( vitamin D2 )  हैं   अद्वितीय  as they constitute  कया  we  जान  as vitamin D and can be ingested from the  आहार  and/or supplements .
The body can also  synthesize  vitamin D  (   इससे  cholesterol ) when sun  एक्सपोज़र   is  adequate ( hence its  उपनाम  , the `` sunshine vitamin  ''  ) .
Although vitamin D is  commonly  called a vitamin  ,  it is not actually an essential dietary  विटामिन  in  the  strict sense  ,  as it can be synthesized in adequate amounts  by   सबसे   स्तनधारियों  exposed to sunlight  .
( Cats  और  dogs can not synthesize  विटामिन  D efficiently and must receive  it   in  their diet . )
an  organic  रासायनिक  compound  (   or  related set of  यौगिकों  ) is only  scientifically  called a vitamin when it can  नहीं  be synthesized in sufficient quantities by  an  organism , and must be obtained from  उनके  diet .
However , as with other  यौगिकों  commonly called vitamins , vitamin D was discovered  in  an effort to find the dietary substance that was lacking in a disease , namely , rickets  ,  the childhood form of osteomalacia .
Additionally ,  जैसे  other compounds  पुकारा   विटामिन  , in the  विकसित  world  विटामिन  D is added to staple foods  ,  such as milk  ,  to avoid  बीमारी  due  to  deficiency  .
Measures of serum  स्तर  reflect endogenous  संश्लेषण  from exposure to sunlight as well as intake from the diet ,  और  it is believed that synthesis may contribute generally to  the  maintenance of adequate serum concentrations .
the  evidence indicates that the synthesis of vitamin D from sun exposure works  in  a feedback loop  कि  prevents toxicity but  ,   क्युकी  of uncertainty about  the  cancer  रिस्क  from sunlight , no recommendations  हैं  issued  by  the Institute of Medicine  ,  USA , for the amount of sun  एक्सपोज़र  required to meet vitamin  d  requirements .
Accordingly , the Dietary  सन्दर्भ   intakes  for vitamin  d  assume that no synthesis occurs and that all of a  व्यक्ति  's vitamin D is from their diet , although that  होगा  rarely occur in practice .
In  the  liver  विटामिन  D is converted to  calcidiol  , which is also  ज्ञात  as calcifediol ( INN )  ,  25-hydroxycholecalciferol , or 25-hydroxyvitamin D—abbreviated 25 ( OH ) D  ;  and which is the specific  विटामिन  D metabolite that is measured in serum to determine a person  's  vitamin D status .
Part of  the  calcidiol  is  converted  by   the   गुर्दे  to calcitriol ,  the  biologically active form of  विटामिन  D.  calcitriol  circulates as a hormone in the blood ,  regulating   the  concentration of calcium  और  phosphate in the bloodstream and promoting the  स्वस्थ  growth  और  remodeling of bone .
Calcidiol  is  also converted to  calcitriol  outside of the  गुर्दे  for other purposes ,  ऐसे  as the proliferation , differentiation  और  apoptosis of cells  ;  calcitriol also affects neuromuscular  फलन   और   सूजन  .
परे   इसके  use  to  prevent osteomalacia or  rickets   ,   the  evidence for other health effects of vitamin  d   supplementation   in  the general population is inconsistent .
The  बेहतरीन   प्रमाण  of  लाभ  is for bone health and a decrease in  मृत्यु  in elderly women .
The Duramax  is  a General Motors diesel engine family for  light-  and medium  ड्यूटी  trucks , designed by  isuzu   .
The  6.6-liter  Duramax  is  produced by DMAX ,  a  joint venture between GM and Isuzu in Moraine  ,  Ohio .
This engine was  initially  installed  in   2001  model year Chevy and  जीएमसी   ट्रक  and  रै  been an option  चूंकि  then in pickups  ,   वैन   ,  and medium-duty trucks .
in   2006   ,   उत्पादन  at Moraine  थी  reportedly limited to approximately  200,000  engines  प्रति  year .
On May 9 ,  2007  ,  dmax  announced the production  of   the  1,000,000th Duramax V-8  डीज़ल  at its Moraine facility .

is  also a traditional written abbreviation  लिये  Baltimore , Maryland .

Balto ( 1919 –  कूच   14   ,  1933 ) was a Siberian  हस्की   sled   श्वान  who led  उसके  team on the final leg  of  the 1925 serum run to  nome  , in  जिससे   डिप्थीरिया   antitoxin  was transported from Anchorage  ,   अलास्का  , to Nenana  ,  Alaska , by train and then to Nome by dog sled to combat an outbreak of the disease .
the  run is commemorated by  the  annual Iditarod Trail Sled Dog Race  .
Balto  थी  named  बाद  the  सामी  explorer Samuel Balto .
balto  died at the  आयु  of  14   .

The Nissan Maxima is a mid-size / entry-level  लक्ज़री   car  manufactured by Nissan , marketed as  the  `` four-door  खेल  car ''  .
The origins of the Maxima began  in  July 1976 as the Datsun 810 , an upscale six-cylinder  संस्करण   of  the Bluebird , and was spun  into  its own line in 1981 , having been made continuously since then .
the  ``  उच्चिष्ट  '' name was applied gradually , beginning in  1981   .
Most pre-2004 Maximas were built in  oppama  , Japan , until the current North American Maximas started  होने  assembled in Smyrna , Tennessee .
The ``  उच्चिष्ट  '' has also  महरूम  applied to Cefiros and  चलेगा  in various markets .
propolis  as hive  sealing
propolis  is a  resinous  mixture that honey bees collect from tree buds , sap flows , or other botanical  स्त्रोत  .
it  is used as a sealant for unwanted open spaces in  the  hive  .
Propolis is used for small gaps ( approximately or less  )  ,  जबकि  larger spaces are usually  भर  with beeswax  .
Its color varies  depending  on its botanical source , the  सबसे  common being dark brown .
propolis  is sticky  at  and above room temperature , .
At lower temperatures , it becomes hard  और  very brittle .
Steven Tyler ( born Steven Victor  tallarico   ;  March 26 , 1948 ) is an American singer , songwriter , and  multi-instrumentalist  , best known as the frontman and lead singer of the Boston -based rock  बैंड   एरोस्मिथ  , in which he  भी  plays the  हार्मोनिका  , and occasional piano  और   percussion  .
he  is known as  the  `` Demon of Screamin ' '' due  to  his high  चिल्लाती  and his  चौड़ी   गायन  range .
He is also known for his on-stage acrobatics  .
दौरान  his high-energy  प्रदर्शन  ,  he  usually dresses in bright , colorful  outfits  with  उसके  trademark scarves  फांसी  from his  माइक्रोफोन  stand  .
In the 1970s , Tyler rose  to  prominence as the frontman of Aerosmith , which released such milestone hard rock  एल्बम  as  खिलौने  in the  अटारी  and Rocks .
In the late 1970s and early 1980s  ,   टायलर  had a heavy  ड्रग   और  alcohol addiction ,  और  the band 's popularity  waned  .
he  completed drug rehabilitation in 1986 and subsequently  कायम  sobriety  लिये  over 20 years  ,  but had a relapse  साथ   नुस्खा  painkillers in the late 2000s , for which he  सफलतापूर्वक   प्राप्त  treatment in  2009  .
After Aerosmith launched a remarkable comeback in the late  1980s   और  early 1990s with the  एल्बम  Permanent Vacation , Pump , and Get a Grip , Tyler became a household name and has remained a relevant rock  प्रतीक  .
as  a result , he has since  embarked   on  several solo  endeavors  including  अतिथि  appearances  on   अन्य   कलाकारों  ' music , film  और  TV roles (  सहित  as a judge on American Idol ) , authoring a bestselling book ,  और  solo work (  सहित  a Top 40 hit  सिंगल  in 2011 ) .
However , he has continued to record music and perform with Aerosmith , after more than 43 years in the  बैंड  .
the  band 's latest album , Music from Another Dimension !
, was  released  on November  6   ,  2012 .
Tyler  is  included among Rolling Stones 100 Greatest  गायकों  .
He was also ranked 3rd on Hit Parader 's Top 100 Metal Vocalists  of  All  समय  .
In 2001 he was inducted into the Rock and  फेंकें  Hall of  कीर्ति  with Aerosmith , and he was the presenter  जब   ac/dc  was inducted into the Hall of  कीर्ति   in  2003  .
In 2013  ,  Tyler and his songwriting partner Joe Perry will be recipients of the ASCAP Founders Award  और  will also be inducted into the Songwriters Hall of Fame .
The liver produces urea  in  the urea cycle as a waste product of the digestion  of   प्रोटीन  .
Normal human adult blood should  contain  between 7 to 21  mg  of  यूरिया   नाइट्रोजन  per 100 ml  (  7–21 mg/ dL ) of blood .
Individual laboratories may have different reference ranges ,  और   इस  is because the procedure may vary  .
Wayne Fontes ( born February  2  , 1940 ) is a  पूर्व  American football coach  और  college and  पेशेवर  football  खिलाड़ी  who  थी  the head coach of the NFL 's Detroit Lions from 1988 to 1996 .
His  67  wins and  71  losses are  प्रत्येक  the  सबसे  for a head coach in team history  .
The Jews  (  ISO 259-3 Israeli pronunciation )  ,  also known as the Jewish people ,  हैं   a  nation and an ethnoreligious group , originating in the Israelites  or  Hebrews of the Ancient Near East  .
The Jewish ethnicity , nationality , and religion are strongly interrelated  ,  as Judaism is  the   परंपरागत  faith of the  यहूदी  nation .
Converts to Judaism , whose status as Jews within the  यहूदी   ethnos  is equal to those  born   into  it , have been absorbed  into   the  Jewish people  throughout  the  सहस्राब्दियों  .
In Jewish tradition  ,  Jewish  ancestry  is traced to  the  Biblical patriarchs  अब्राहम  , Isaac and Jacob in  the   दूसरी  millennium BCE  .
the   आधुनिक  State  of  Israel was  स्थापित  as a Jewish nation-state , and defines itself as such  in  its Basic Laws .
Its Law  of  Return grants the  सही  of citizenship  to  any Jew who requests it .
इसराईल   is  the only country where Jews are a majority  of  the population .
Jews  भी  enjoyed political autonomy twice  पहले   in   प्राचीन  history .
The first of these  अवधि   lasted  from 1350 to  586  BCE  ,  and encompassed the  अवधि  of the Judges , the United Monarchy  ,  and the  विभाजित  Monarchy  of   the  Kingdoms of Israel and Judah , ending with the destruction  of  the First Temple  .
The second was the  काल  of the Hasmonean Kingdom  spanning  from 140  to  37 BCE .
Since the  विनाश  of the First Temple , most  यहूदियों  have  जिया  in diaspora .
A  अल्पसंख्यक  in  प्रत्येक  country in which they live  (  except Israel ) , they  have  frequently experienced  persecution  throughout history  ,  resulting in a population that has fluctuated both in numbers and distribution over the centuries  .
The world Jewish population  पहुँचे  a peak of 15 million prior  to  the Second World War , but six  लाख  Jews  यहूद  killed  in  the Holocaust  .
Since  तब  the population has risen again and , was estimated at 13.4 million by  the   उत्तर  American Jewish Data Bank , or less than 0.2 % of the total world population ( roughly  एक  in every 514 people  )  .
According to this report ,  परिचय   42.5   %  of all Jews reside  in  Israel (  5.7   लाख  ) , and 39.3  %  in  the  United States ( 5.3 million ) , with most  of  the  शेष  living  in  Europe  (   1.5  million ) and Canada (  0.4   लाख   )  .
These numbers include  सब  those  जो  consider themselves Jews  ,  whether or not they are affiliated with a  यहूदी  organization .
the   कुल   संसार  Jewish population , however  ,  is difficult to measure .
In addition to issues with census methodology ,  वहीँ  are  halakhic   विवादों  regarding who is a Jew and secular  ,  political , and ancestral identification factors that may affect the figure considerably .
