The Feast of Corpus Christi ( Latin for  देह  of  मसीह  ) , also known as Corpus Domini , is  a  Latin Rite  liturgical  solemnity  celebrating  the tradition  और   विश्वास  in the body and  रक्त   of   यीशु   मसीह   और  his Real Presence in the Eucharist .
It  emphasizes  the joy of the institution of the Eucharist ,  जिससे  was observed  on   पावन  Thursday in  the  somber atmosphere of the nearness  of  Good Friday .
in  the  उपस्थित  Roman  missal  , the feast  is  designated the  solemnity  of The  सबसे  Holy Body and Blood of Christ .
It  is  also  मनाये  in some Anglican ,  लूथरन  , and Old Catholic Churches that  थाम  similar beliefs regarding the Real Presence .
The feast is liturgically celebrated on the  गुरुवार   बाद   ट्रिनिटी   संडे  or , `` where the Solemnity of the Most Holy Body and Blood of Christ is  नहीं  a  पावन  Day  of  Obligation , it is  आबंटित  to the Sunday after  the  Most Holy Trinity as its  उचित  day ''  .
At the  समाप्त  of Holy Mass , there is often a procession of the Blessed Sacrament , generally displayed  in  a monstrance .
the  procession is followed by  सुनाकर  of the  धन्य   sacrament  .
A notable Eucharistic procession is  कि   presided  over by the Pope each  साल  in  रोम  , where  it  begins at the Archbasilica of  st.  John Lateran and makes  इसके  way to the Basilica  of  Saint Mary Major , where  it  concludes with Benediction .
C-reactive protein ( CRP ) is a protein found in the  रक्त  ,  the  levels of  जिससे  rise in  जवाब   to  inflammation ( i.e  .  C-reactive protein is  an  acute-phase protein ) .
Its physiological role  is  to bind to  phosphocholine  expressed  on  the  सतह  of  मुर्दे  or dying cells  (  and  कुछ  types of bacteria  )  in order  to  activate the complement system via  the  C1Q complex  .
CRP  is  synthesized  by   the  liver in  जवाब   to  factors released  by   macrophages   और  fat cells ( adipocytes ) .
It is  a   सदस्य  of the pentraxin family of proteins .
It is not related  to  C-peptide or protein C .
C-reactive protein  थी  the  पहला   पैटर्न   मान्यता  receptor (  prr  ) to be identified .
The start  of  the systematic European  colonization  of the  americas  is  typically  dated  to  1492  ,  when a  स्पेनी  expedition  headed   by   क्रिस्टोफर  Columbus  sailed  for India to open trade but inadvertently discovered the Americas .
यूरोपीय  conquest , large-scale exploration and  colonization  soon followed .
Seeing  कि  Europe was preoccupied with many  आतंरिक  wars  और   थी  slowly recovering from the many deaths that the bubonic plague caused ,  the  rapid  विस्तार  at which it grew in wealth and power  थी  unforeseeable  in   the  early 1400s .
The first expeditions occurred  साथ  the Caribbean coasts on the islands of  हिस्पानिओला   ,  Puerto Rico  और  Cuba , and after 1500 extended into the interiors of both North and South America .
In  1497  ,  sailing  from  the  north on behalf of  इंग्लैण्ड  ,  जॉन  Cabot landed on the North American coast  ,  and a year  बाद  , Columbus 's  तीसरा  voyage  पहुँचे  the South  अमरीकी  coast .
France founded colonies in much  of  eastern North  अमेरिका  , on  a  number of Caribbean islands ,  और  in South America .
Portugal colonized  ब्राज़ील  .
Eventually , the entire Western Hemisphere came under  the  control of  यूरोपीय  governments , leading to profound changes  to  its  लैंडस्केप  , population ,  और  plant and animal life .
In the 19th century alone over 50 million people left Europe for the Americas .
the  post-1492  era  is known as the period of the Columbian Exchange .
Keith Richards  (  born 18 December  1943  ) is an English musician , singer-songwriter and founder member of  the  English rock band the Rolling Stones .
Rolling Stone magazine said Richards  था  created ``  चट्टान  's greatest  सिंगल   देह   of  riffs ''  ,  ranking him 4th on its list  of   100  best guitarists .
Fourteen songs Richards wrote with the Rolling Stones ' lead vocalist Mick Jagger  हैं  listed among Rolling  स्टोन  magazine  's  ``  500  Greatest Songs of  सब  Time `` .
Richards ' notoriety for illicit drug use stems in part  इससे   अनेक  drug busts during the late  1960s  and 1970s and  उसके  candour regarding his addiction to and eventual abstinence from  हेरोइन  .
टेस्टोस्टेरोन  is a steroid hormone from  the  androgen group and  is  found  in  mammals , reptiles , birds ,  और  other vertebrates .
In mammals , testosterone  is   primarily   स्रावित  in the testicles of males  और  the ovaries  of  females  ,  although  छोटी  amounts are  भी  secreted by the adrenal glands .
It is the principal male sex hormone  और  an anabolic steroid .
In men , testosterone  plays  a  कुंजी  role in the  विकास   of  male reproductive tissues such as the testis and prostate  as  well as promoting secondary sexual characteristics such  as   increased   मांसपेशी  ,  अस्थि  mass , and the  विकास  of body hair .
In addition ,  टेस्टोस्टेरोन  is essential for health  और   well-being  as well as the prevention of  ऑस्टियोपोरोसिस  .
On average , in adult  इंसान  males ,  the   प्लाज्मा  concentration of  टेस्टोस्टेरोन  is about 7–8 times  as  great as the  विशेषज्ञता  in  वयस्क  human females ' plasma , but as the metabolic consumption of testosterone in  males  is greater , the daily production  is  about  20  times greater  in  men  .
Females also are more sensitive to  the  hormone .
Testosterone is observed in  सबसे  vertebrates  .
Fish make a slightly different form called 11-ketotestosterone .
Its  बंटवारा  in insects is ecdysone .
ये   सर्वव्यापी  steroids suggest that sex hormones have  an  ancient evolutionary history  .
Cluster sampling  is  a  sampling   तकनीक  used when  ``  natural '' but relatively homogeneous groupings are evident  in  a  सांख्यिकीय  population  .
It  is  often used in marketing research .
in  this  तकनीक  , the total population is divided into  ये   समूह  ( or clusters ) and a simple  यादृच्छिक  sample  of  the groups  is  selected .
Then the required information  is  collected  इससे  a simple random sample  of  the elements within each selected group .
This may be  किया   लिये  every element in these groups or a subsample of elements may be  चयनित  within each of these  समूह  .
A common motivation for cluster sampling is  to  reduce the total number of interviews  और  costs given  the  desired accuracy  .
Assuming a fixed  नमूना  size , the  तकनीक   देता  more accurate results when most of the variation in the population is  भीतर  the groups  ,  not  between  them .
Jamestown is a town in Guilford County ,  उत्तर  Carolina ,  संयुक्त  States , and is a suburb of the nearby cities of Greensboro and High Point  .
The population was  3,382   at  the 2010  जनसांख्यिकी  .
Natalie Portman ( born Natalie  hershlag   ;  ; June 9 ,  1981  ) is  an  actress and model with dual American  और  Israeli citizenship .
Her  पहला  role  थी   as  an orphan taken in by  a  hitman in the 1994  कार्रवाई  film  ,  but  मुख्यधारा  success came when she was cast as Padmé Amidala in the  स्टार  Wars prequel trilogy (  released  in 1999 ,  2002  and 2005 ) .
in  1999 , she enrolled  at   हार्वर्ड   विश्वविद्यालयों  to study psychology while  स्टिल  working as  an  actress .
She completed  उसके  bachelor 's degree in 2003 .
In 2001 , Portman opened  in   नई  York  नगर  's Public Theater production of  एंटोन  Chekhov 's The Seagull .
in  2005  ,  Portman received a  नामांकन  for the Academy Award for  बेहतरीन  Supporting  अभिनेत्री  and won the Golden Globe Award for Best  supporting  Actress - Motion Picture  लिये  the drama Closer  .
She won a  नक्षत्र  Award for Best Female Performance and a Saturn Award for Best Actress for  उसके  starring role  in  V  लिये   वेंडेट्टा  ( 2006 )  .
She played leading roles in  the  historical  dramas  Goya 's Ghosts  (  2006 ) and The Other Boleyn  लड़की  (  2008  ) .
In May 2008 ,  वो  served as  the  youngest member  of  the 61st  सालाना  Cannes Film Festival jury  .
Portman 's directorial debut , Eve ,  खोली  the 65th Venice International Film Festival  's  shorts competition  in   2008   .
Portman directed a  खण्ड  of the collective film New  यॉर्क  , I Love You .
In 2011 , Portman  जीती  the Academy Award , the Golden Globe Award ,  the  BAFTA Award , the Screen Actors Guild Award  ,  and the Independent Spirit Award for her lead performance as Nina Sayers in Black Swan .
Copper is a chemical element with the symbol Cu ( from ) and atomic number  29  .
It is a ductile metal  साथ  very high  थर्मल   और  electrical conductivity  .
Pure copper  is   नरम  and malleable ; a  freshly  exposed surface  रै  a reddish-orange color .
It is used as a conductor of heat and electricity , a building  सामग्री  , and  a  constituent  of  various metal alloys  .
The metal and its alloys have been used for  हज़ारों  of years .
In  the  Roman era  ,  copper was  प्रधानतया  mined on  साइप्रस   ,  hence the origin of the name of  the  metal  as  сyprium (  मेटल  of Cyprus )  ,  later  shortened   to  сuprum .
इसके   यौगिकों  are commonly encountered as copper ( II ) salts ,  जिससे  often impart blue or green  रंगों   to   खनिज  such as  azurite  and  फ़िरोज़ा  and have been widely used  historically  as pigments .
Architectural structures built with copper corrode  to  give green verdigris ( or patina  )   .
Decorative  आर्ट  prominently  सुविधाएँ   तांबे  , both by itself and  as  part  of  pigments .
Copper is  अनिवार्य  to all  जीना   जीवों   as  a trace  dietary  mineral because  it   is  a key constituent of the respiratory enzyme complex cytochrome c oxidase  .
in  molluscs and  crustacea  copper is  a  constituent of the blood pigment hemocyanin  ,  which is replaced by the iron-complexed hemoglobin  in  fish and other vertebrates .
the  main areas where copper is found in vertebrates  हैं  liver , muscle and bone .
In sufficient concentration ,  तांबे   यौगिकों  are poisonous to higher organisms and  हैं  used as bacteriostatic substances , fungicides , and wood preservatives .
the  major professional  खेल  leagues  ,  or simply major leagues , in the United States and  कनाडा  are the highest professional competitions of team sports in  the  two countries .
Although individual sports such as golf , tennis , and auto racing are also  बहुत  popular , the  पद  is  प्रायः  limited  to  team sports .
The  पद  `` major  लीग  '' was first used in 1921 in reference to Major  लीग  Baseball ( MLB ) , the top level of  पेशेवर  American baseball .
आज   ,   the   प्रमुख  northern  उत्तर  America professional  टोली  sports  लीग   हैं  Major League Baseball ( MLB ) , the National Basketball Association ( NBA  )  , the National Football League  (  NFL  )   ,   और  the  नेशनल  Hockey League ( NHL )  .
Other notable  लीग  include  प्रमुख   लीग  Soccer ( MLS ) ,  the  Canadian  फ़ुटबॉल  League (  cfl  ) , the Arena Football  लीग  , Major League  lacrosse  , the  नेशनल  Lacrosse League and the Women  's   नेशनल  Basketball Association .
The NFL , MLB  ,   एनबीए  , and NHL are commonly referred to as  the  Big  चार  .
Each of these is the richest professional club competition in  इसके  sport worldwide .
The best players can become cultural  प्रतीक   in  both countries and elsewhere in the world , because the leagues enjoy a significant place in  लोकप्रिय  culture in the US and  कनाडा  .
The NFL has  32  teams , and  the  others  have  30 each .
The vast majority of major league  टीमों   हैं  concentrated  in   the  most populous metropolitan areas of the United States  .
Baseball , football , hockey  ,  and soccer have had professional leagues for over  100  years  ;  early leagues such  as  the National Association  ,  Ohio League  ,  and  नेशनल  Hockey Association formed the basis  of  the modern MLB ,  एनएफएल   और   एनएचएल  respectively .
Soccer was first  professionalized  in 1894  ,  but leagues suffered  greatly  from lack of sustainability and seldom lasted  अधिक  than a decade  .
Soccer 's greatest successes were in the form of the American Soccer League ( 1921-1933 ) , the original  उत्तर  American Soccer League ( 1968-1984 )  ,  the National Professional Soccer League (  1984-2001  ) and , currently , Major  लीग  Soccer  (   1996-present  ) .
Basketball is a relatively new development ; the NBA  विकसित  from the National Basketball League and its splinter  समूह  the Basketball Association of America , taking  on  its current form in 1949 .
Every major league averages 15,000 fans in  उपस्थिति  per game or higher as of  2011  .
Meridian Altitude is an astronomical navigation  विधि  of  calculating  an observer 's latitude .
Earned value management ( EVM  )  , or Earned value project/performance management ( EVPM ) is  a  project management technique for measuring project  प्रदर्शन  and progress in  an  objective  manner   .
Because EVM has the ability to combine measurements of :
scope
schedule
और   cost,
in a single integrated system  ,  Earned  मान  Management is able to provide  सटीक  forecasts of project performance problems  ,  which is an important  योगदान  for project  प्रबन्धन  .
Early EVM research  दिखाया   कि   the   क्षेत्रों  of planning and control are significantly impacted by its use  ;  and  similarly  , using  the  methodology  improves  both scope definition as well as the analysis of overall  प्रोजेक्ट  performance  .
More recent research studies have shown that the principles of EVM are positive predictors  of  project success  .
Popularity of EVM has grown significantly in recent years beyond government contracting ,  in  which sector its importance continues to  वृद्धि  ( e.g. , recent new DFAR rules  )   ,  in part because EVM can also surface in and help  substantiate  contract disputes .
Colorful spring garden flowers
Spring is one of  the  four conventional temperate seasons , following winter and preceding summer .
There  हैं  various technical  परिभाषाएं  of spring  ,  but local usage of the term varies  according  to local climate ,  संस्कृतियों   और  customs  .
When it is  वसन्त  in the northern hemisphere  ,  it will be autumn in  the  southern hemisphere .
At  the  spring equinox  ,  days are close  to   12   घंटों  long with day length increasing as the season progresses .
वसन्त  and `` springtime '' refer to the season , and  भी  to ideas of rebirth ,  कायाकल्प  ,  नवीकरण  , resurrection , and regrowth , with festivals such as Carnival  ,  Easter and Holi being  मनाये  at  इस   समय  .
Jamestown  थी   a   उपनिवेश  in the Colony of Virginia , the first permanent English  उपनिवेश  in the Americas .
स्थापित  by the Virginia Company of London as `` James Fort ''  on  May 14 ,  1607  ( O.S . , May  24  ,  1607   n.s  . ) , it followed several earlier failed attempts , including  the  Lost Colony of Roanoke .
Jamestown served as  the  capital of the colony for 83 years , from 1616 until 1699 .
the   उपनिवेश   थी  located within the territory of a political entity known as Tsenacommacah , the state  of  the Powhatan  confederacy  , with around  14,000  native inhabitants , and  specifically   थी  in part of  the  subdivision known as the  paspahegh  tribe  .
The  natives  initially  सत्कार  the colonists with dancing , feasting  और   तम्बाकू  ceremonies , and they provided crucial  प्रावधानों  and support for the survival of the  colonists  , who were  नहीं  agriculturally inclined ,  हालांकि   संबंध  with the newcomers also soured fairly  जल्दी  on  ,  leading to the total annihilation of the  paspahegh  in warfare within 3 years .
Within a year of Jamestown 's founding , the Virginia Company brought Polish  और  Dutch colonists  to  help improve the settlement .
In 1619 , the  पहला  documented Africans  यहूद  brought to  jamestown  , though the  आधुनिक  conception  of   गुलामी  in  the  future United States did  नहीं  begin  in  Virginia until  1660  .
जब  the colony  थी  subdivided into the  असली   आठ  shires of Virginia in 1634 ,  the  town became located in the eponymous James City Shire .
The  लंदन  Company 's  दूसरी  settlement  ,  Bermuda ,  दावा  to be the site of the oldest  कस्बा   in   the  English New World , as St. George  's   ,  Bermuda was officially established (  as  New London ) in  1612   ,  whereas James Fort , in Virginia , was not to be converted into James towne until 1619 ,  और  further did  नहीं  survive into the present day .
In  1699  , the capital was relocated from Jamestown to what is  आज  Williamsburg , after  जिससे  Jamestown ceased  to   मौजूद   as  a  उपनिवेश  ,  मौजूदा  today only  as  an  पुरातत्व  site .
Today , Jamestown  is  one of three locations comprising the Historic  त्रिभुज  of  औपनिवेशिक  Virginia  ,  along with Williamsburg and Yorktown , with two primary heritage sites .
Historic Jamestowne , the archaeological site  on   jamestown  Island ,  is   a   सहकारी  effort  by  Jamestown National  ऐतिहासिक  Site (  भाग  of Colonial National Historical Park )  ,  and Preservation Virginia .
The Jamestown Settlement  ,   a  living history interpretive site , is operated  by  the Jamestown Yorktown Foundation in  संयोजन  with the Commonwealth of Virginia .
James Christopher Frey (  born  September  12  , 1969  )  is an American writer .
His books A Million Little Pieces  (  2003  )  and  my   dost  Leonard ( 2005 ) , as well as Bright Shiny  morning   (  2008  )  , were bestsellers  .
he  was the subject of  a  scandal when investigators discovered that prison time and the extent  of  certain injuries were exaggerated in A Million  छोटी   टुकड़े  , a purportedly autobiographical  खाता   of  the author 's struggle with addiction .
deere  & Company ,  सबसे  commonly known  by  its name John Deere  ,  is an  अमरीकी   निगम  based in  moline  , Illinois  ,  and one of the largest manufacturers of agricultural machinery in the world .
In 2012 ,  it  was  सूचीबद्ध  as 97th in the Fortune  500  America 's ranking and  190th  in the Fortune  500   वैश्विक  ranking .
Deere and Company agricultural  उत्पाद  , sold under the John Deere  नाम   ,  include tractors  ,  combine harvesters ,  कपास  harvesters , balers , planters / seeders , sprayers  ,   और  UTVs  .
The company is also a  निर्माता  of  निर्माण   उपकरण  and forestry equipment ,  as  well  as  a supplier  of  diesel engines  और   drivetrains  (  axles  , transmissions  ,   gearboxes   )   प्रयुक्त   in  heavy equipment .
Additionally , John Deere  manufactures  equipment used in lawn ,  grounds   ,   और  turf  परवाह  ,  ऐसे  as walk-behind lawn mowers , zero-turn lawn mowers  ,  lawn tractors , and snowthrowers .
To  support  the core businesses , John Deere also provides  वित्तीय  services  और  other  सम्बन्धित  activities  .
the   कम्पनी  's slogan is ``  nothing  Runs Like a  deere  '' and  रै  a picture of a leaping deer as a logo , a word play pun on `` nothing  रनों  like  a   हिरण  '' .
Carl Westby coined the phrase  ``  Nothing Runs Like a Deere ''  लिये  a marketing campaign to  बेचें  snowmobiles .
the   कम्पनी  's products are also identifiable  by  its  distinctive  shade of green paint , usually augmented by yellow  trim  .
The  संयुक्त   राज्य  ten-dollar bill (  $  10 ) is a denomination of  संयुक्त  States currency .
The first U.S. Secretary of the Treasury  (  1789–95 )  ,  Alexander Hamilton , is currently featured on the obverse  of  the bill , while  the  U.S.  राजकोष  Building is featured on the reverse .
( Hamilton is  एक  of  दो  non-presidents featured on currently issued U.S. bills .
The other is Benjamin Franklin  ,  on  the  $ 100 bill .
Hamilton is one of only four people featured on U.S. paper currency ( 1861 to the present ) who was not born in the continental United States , as he was from the  वेस्ट  Indies .
The others  हैं  :  अल्बर्ट   gallatin  ,  स्विट्ज़रलैंड  ( $ 500 1862/63 Legal Tender ) ;  जार्ज   meade  , Spain ( $  1,000  1890/91 Treasury Note ) ; and Robert Morris ,  इंग्लैण्ड  ( $ 1,000 1862/63 Legal Tender  ;  $ 10 1878/80 Silver Certificate ) .
In  जोड  , Kamehameha I ,  appears  on the  2008   हवाई  state  क्वार्टर  . )
All $ 10 bills issued today  हैं  Federal Reserve Notes  .
The Bureau  of  Engraving and Printing says the average  जीवन  of a $ 10 bill in circulation is  18  months before  it   is  replaced due to  पहनें  .
Approximately 6 % of all US  banknotes  printed in 2009 were $ 10  बिल्स  .
Ten  डालर   बिल्स  are delivered by Federal Reserve Banks  in  yellow straps .
The source of the face on the $ 10 bill is John Trumbull ’s 1805 portrait  of  Hamilton that belongs to the portrait collection of  नई  York City Hall .
The $  10  bill is the only U.S.  पेपर  currency in circulation in which the portrait faces to the left ( the $ 100,000 bill  प्रदर्शित  a portrait of Woodrow Wilson facing  to   the  left  ,  but was used only for intra-government transactions  )   .
Andy  सैमुएल  Griffith  (  June 1 , 1926 –  जुलाई   3   ,   2012  )  थी  an American  कर्ता  , television  निर्माता  , Grammy  पुरस्कार  -winning Southern-gospel  सिंगर  , and writer .
He was a  टोनी  Award nominee for two roles , and gained  prominence  in the  अभिनीत  role in director Elia Kazan 's  फिल्मी  A Face in the Crowd (  1957  ) before  he  became better  ज्ञात  for his television roles  ,   playing   the  lead characters  in  the 1960–1968 situation comedy The Andy Griffith Show and in the 1986–1995 legal drama  matlock   .
Theresa Penelope `` Terri '' Irwin , ( née Raines ; born July 20 , 1964 ) is an Australian  -आधारd  ,  अमरीकी   -born  naturalist , author ,  the  widow of Australian  naturalist  Steve Irwin and owner  of  Australia Zoo at Beerwah ,  क्वींसलैंड  ,  ऑस्ट्रेलिया  .
She co-starred with her  husband  on The Crocodile Hunter , their  unconventional  television nature documentary series along with  इसके  spin-off series ,  क्रोक   फाइलें   और  The Crocodile Hunter Diaries .
She  रै  lived in Australia since 1992 ,  जब  she married Steve Irwin .
Andreas Cellarius 's illustration of the Copernican system , from the Harmonia Macrocosmica  (  1660 ) .
Heliocentrism , or heliocentricism  ,  is the astronomical model  in  which  the  Earth and planets  revolve  around a relatively stationary Sun at the center of  the  Solar System .
The  शब्द  comes from the Greek ( helios  ``   सूर्य  '' and kentron  ``  center '' )  .
Historically ,  heliocentrism  was opposed to geocentrism  ,  which placed the Earth at the center  .
The  ख़्याल  that  the  Earth  घूमती  around the  सूर्य  had been proposed  as   जल्दी  as the  3rd   सदी   bc  by  aristarchus  of Samos , but  aristarchus   's  heliocentrism attracted little  ध्यान  until Copernicus  revived   और  elaborated it .
Lucio Russo  ,  however ,  argues  that this is  a   भ्रामक  impression resulting from the loss of scientific works of the Hellenistic  era  .
Using indirect evidence he  argues  that a heliocentric view was expounded  in  Hipparchus 's work on gravity .
It was not  जबतक  the 16th century that a fully predictive mathematical model  of  a  heliocentric  system was  प्रस्तुत  , by the Renaissance mathematician , astronomer , and Catholic  मौलवी  Nicolaus Copernicus of Poland , leading to the Copernican Revolution .
In the  following  century  ,  Johannes Kepler elaborated upon and expanded this model to include elliptical orbits , and supporting observations made using a  दूरदर्शी   यहूद   प्रस्तुत  by Galileo Galilei .
साथ  the observations of William Herschel , Friedrich Bessel , and others , astronomers realized that the sun was not the center of the universe and by the  1920s   एडविन  Hubble had  दिखाया   कि  it  थी  part of a galaxy  (   the   मिल्की  Way ) that was only one of many billions .
Norah Jones ( born Geetali  नोराह  Jones  शंकर  ; March 30 , 1979 ) is an  अमरीकी  singer-songwriter  ,  pianist ,  और  actress  .
She is the daughter of Indian sitar player Ravi Shankar and Sue Jones .
She is also Anoushka Shankar 's half-sister .
In 2002 ,  वो   शुभारम्भ   उसके  solo music career with the release  of  the commercially successful and  critically  acclaimed  एल्बम  Come  दूर  with Me , a fusion of country music  और  pop with  तत्व   of  jazz which was certified diamond album ,  selling  over 26 million copies .
The record earned Jones five Grammy  पुरस्कार  ,  सहित  the Album of the Year , Record of the Year , and  बेहतरीन  New Artist  .
Her  subsequent  studio albums , Feels Like  घर  , released  in   2004   ,  Not  too  Late , released in 2007 , the same year  वो  made her film debut in My Blueberry Nights , and her 2009 release The Fall all gained Platinum status ,  selling  over a million copies and were generally  खूब  received  by  critics .
Jones  '  fifth studio album , Little Broken  दिल  , was released on April 27 ,  2012  .
Jones has won nine Grammy Awards and was 60th  on  Billboard magazine 's artists of the 2000–2009  दशक   चार्ट  .
throughout  her career , Jones has won  numerous  awards and has  बेची  more than  50   लाख  albums worldwide .
Billboard  नामित   उसके  the top jazz artist of the 2000–2009 decade .
Not to be confused with  आयाम  of a physical quantity .
For other uses , see  आयाम  ( disambiguation ) .
From left  to   सही  , the  वर्गाकार  , the cube , and the  tesseract  .
The square is bounded by 1-dimensional  लाइनों  , the cube by 2-dimensional areas ,  और  the tesseract  by  3-dimensional  आयतन  .
a  projection of the cube is given since it is viewed  on  a two-dimensional screen .
The  वही  applies to the  tesseract  , which additionally can only be shown as  a   प्रक्षेप   भी  in three-dimensional  स्पेस  .
A diagram showing the  पहला  four spatial dimensions .
In physics  और  mathematics , the dimension of a space  or  object is informally defined as the minimum number of coordinates needed to specify any point within  it  .
Thus a  लकीर  has a dimension of one because only  एक   निर्देशांक   is  needed  to  specify a point on  it  ( for example ,  the  point at 5 on a number line ) .
A  सतह  such as  a   प्लेन  or  the  surface  of   a   बेलन   or  sphere has a dimension of  दो  because  दो  coordinates are needed  to  specify a point  on  it ( for example , to locate a point  on  the surface of a sphere you need both its latitude and  इसके  longitude  )  .
The  अंदर  of a cube , a cylinder or a sphere is three-dimensional  क्युकी  three coordinates  हैं  needed to locate a  पाइंट  within these  स्पेसेस   .
In physical terms ,  आयाम  refers  to   the  constituent structure of all  स्पेस  ( volume ) and its position  in  time ( perceived as a  अदिश  dimension along the t-axis ) , as  खूब   as   the   स्थानिक  constitution of objects within—structures that correlate with both particle and field conceptions ,  interact  according  to  relative properties of mass —and are fundamentally mathematical in description .
These , or other axes ,  may   be  referenced to uniquely identify a point or  ढांचा   in  its  रवैया  and relationship to other objects and occurrences .
Physical theories that incorporate time ,  ऐसे  as  सामान्य   आपेक्षिकता   ,   हैं  said to work in  4-dimensional  `` spacetime `` ,  (  defined as a Minkowski  स्पेस   )  .
आधुनिक  theories tend to be  ``  higher-dimensional '' including quantum field and string theories  .
The state-space  of  quantum  यांत्रिकी  is an  infinite-dimensional  function space .
The concept of dimension is  नहीं  restricted to  शारीरिक  objects .
High-dimensional spaces occur in  गणित  and the  sciences  for many reasons , frequently  as  configuration  स्पेसेस  such as in Lagrangian or Hamiltonian  यांत्रिकी  ; these are abstract spaces , independent of the physical space we live  in  .
Fontana ( ) is  a  city of  200,762  residents in San Bernardino County , California .
Founded  in   1913  , it remained essentially rural until World War  ii  , when entrepreneur Henry  J.   कैसर   निर्मित  a large steel mill in the area  .
It  is   अभी  a regional  हब   of  the trucking industry , with  अंतरराज्यीय  10  और   राज्य  Route 210 transecting  the   नगर  from east  to   वेस्ट  ,  और  Interstate  15   गुजर  diagonally through its northwestern quadrant .
it   is  home to the largest  of   the  San Bernardino  काउंटी   प्रणाली  libraries , a renovated historic theater , a municipal park , and the Auto  क्लबों  Speedway on the site of the Kaiser Steel Mill .
Fontana also hosts the Fontana Days Half Marathon and 5K run  .
This race is the fastest half-marathon  कोर्स  in  the  world .
The U.S. 2012 Census reported that Fontana  's  population was 200,762 in 2012 , making it the second most populous city in San Bernardino county county and 14th in the state  .
Cowboys  स्टेडियम  is a  स्टेडियम   साथ   a   retractable  roof in Arlington ,  टेक्सास  .
It serves as the home of the National Football  लीग  's Dallas Cowboys .
It replaced the partially covered Texas Stadium , which opened  in  1971  ,  and  परोसा  as the Cowboys ' home  through   the  2008 season  .
It was completed on  may  27  ,  2009  .
The stadium seats 85,000 ,  बनाना  it the third  largest  stadium  in  the  एनएफएल  by seating capacity .
The maximum capacity of  the  stadium , including  खड़ा  room ,  is  105,000  .
The Party Pass ( open areas ) sections are behind seats in each end zone and on a  श्रेणी  of six  elevated  platforms  कनेक्ट  by stairways .
It has the  संसार  's largest column-free interior and the fourth largest  ऊँची  definition  वीडियो   स्क्रीन  , which hangs from 20 yard line  to  20 yard line  .
The facility can also  be  used for  a   किस्में  of other activities outside of its main purpose (  पेशेवर  football )  ऐसे  as concerts , basketball games , boxing matches  ,  college football and high  स्कूल  football contests , soccer matches , and  motocross   दौड़  .
Canadian  इतिहासकारों  until the 1980s tended to focus on economic history ,  सहित  labour history .
In part this is  क्युकी  Canada has had  दूर  fewer  राजनैतिक  or  सैन्य  conflicts than other  समाजों  .
इस   थी   विशेषकर  true in  the   पहला   हाफ  of the  बीसवीं  century  जब  economic history  थी  overwhelmingly  प्रबल  .
Many of the most  prominent  English Canadian historians from this  काल  were economic historians  ,  such as Harold Innis , Donald Creighton and Arthur R. M.  निम्नतर
Scholars of Canadian history were heirs to the traditions that developed in  यूरोपीय   और  the  संयुक्त  States , but frameworks  कि  worked well  elsewhere  often failed in Canada .
The heavily  मार्क्सवादी  influenced economic history that dominates  यूरोपीय  has little relevance to most of Canadian history .
A focus on class  ,  urban areas , and  उद्योग  fails  to  address Canada 's  ग्रामीण  and  संसाधन  based economy .
Similarly , the monetarist school that is dominant in the  संयुक्त  States  भी  has been  मुश्किल   to  transfer north of the border .
The study of economic  इतिहास  in Canada became highly focused on  आर्थिक  geography , and  लिये  many  सालो   the  dominant school of  विचार   रै  been the staples  लेख  .
इस  school of thought bases the  पढ़ाई  of  the  Canadian  अर्थव्यवस्था  on the study of natural resources .
This approach has since also become used  बाहर  of Canada  in  Australia and in many developing nations .
पहले  the arrival of Europeans , the First  राष्ट्र  of what would become Canada had a large  और  vibrant trade network .
Furs , tools ,  सजावटी   वस्तुएं  , and other goods were often transported thousands  of   किलोमीटर  , mostly by canoe throughout the many  नदियाँ  and  झीलों  of  the  region  .
The early European history  of  the Canadian economy is usually studied through the  स्टेपल्स  thesis which argues the Canadian  अर्थव्यवस्था  developed through the  शोषण  of a series of staples that would be exported to Europe .
carbon-14  , 14C  ,  or radiocarbon , is a radioactive  समस्थानिक  of carbon with a nucleus containing 6 protons  और  8  neutrons  .
इसके  presence  in  organic materials is the  आधार  of the radiocarbon dating  विधि  pioneered by  willard   लिब्बी  and colleagues ( 1949 )  to   तिथि  archaeological , geological and hydrogeological samples .
Carbon-14  थी   खोजा   on   27  February 1940 ,  by  Martin Kamen and Sam Ruben at the University of California Radiation Laboratory  in  Berkeley , although its  अस्तित्व  had  महरूम   सुझाया  by Franz Kurie in 1934 .
There are three  naturally  occurring isotopes of carbon on  धरती  : 99 % of the carbon is carbon-12 , 1  %  is carbon-13 ,  और  carbon-14 occurs in trace amounts , i.e.  ,  making up about  1  part per trillion ( 0.0000000001 % ) of  the  carbon in  the  atmosphere  .
The half-life of carbon-14 is 5,730±40 years .
carbon-14  decays  into  nitrogen-14 through beta decay .
The primary  प्राकृतिक   सोर्स  of carbon-14 on Earth is cosmic ray  कार्रवाई  upon nitrogen  in  the atmosphere  ,   और  it  is  therefore a cosmogenic nuclide .
However , open-air nuclear testing between 1955–1980 contributed to  इस  pool  .
The different isotopes of carbon do not differ  appreciably  in their chemical properties .
This is used in  रासायनिक  and  biological  research , in a technique called  कार्बन  labeling : carbon-14  अणु   can  be used to  बदलें  nonradioactive  कार्बन  ,  in   अनुक्रम  to  ट्रेस  chemical and  biochemical  reactions involving  कार्बन  atoms from any given organic compound .
Lightning is a highly visible form of energy transfer
Lightning strikes are electrical discharges on a  विशाल  scale between the  माहौल  and an  earth-bound  object  .
They  ज़्यादातर  originate in thunderclouds  और   terminate  on  the  ground , called  बादल  to Ground ( CG ) lightning .
however  , they  may  also be  initiated  from a very tall  grounded  object and reach into the clouds .
Although  ``   a  lightning strike ''  is  commonly used  to   describe   सब  lightning , it is  बल्कि  erroneous and a misnomer , as  तभी  about 25  %   of  all  बिजली  events  विश्वव्यापी  are  cg  , the large  बल्क  of  बिजली  events are Intracloud ( IC )  or  Cloud to  बादल  ( CC )  ,  where discharge only occurs high in  the  atmosphere .
the  scientific name for the complete process of  a  single  बिजली  event is a  और   it  is a  बहुत  complex ,  अनेक   stepped  interaction , which is not completely understood .
Most CG flashes only `` strike  ''  one physical location ,  referred  to as  a  termination  .
The primary conducting channel , the  उज्जवल  coursing light you may see and  कॉल   a   ``   स्ट्राइक  '' ,  is  only about 1 inch in diameter  ,  although to our eyes it looks much larger  .
वे  are miles long , upwards of tens of miles  .
And the entire  फ्लैश   ,  lasts only a  few  fractions  of   a  second , most of which is not visible to human eyes .
थंडर  is always produced by  बिजली  .
Just like lightning , that deceives our eyes  ,  usually looking larger or closer than it  वाकई  is , the earth  's  atmosphere  और  our brain 's perception of the outside world , ultimately  determines  whether it is ``  सुना  '' or not .
बिजली  can not happen in  a   वैक्यूम  devoid  of  ions , nor can  थंडर   occur  without molecules  to  vibrate .
Thunder is a physical absolute for  प्रत्येक   सिंगल  flash of lightning .
Contrary  to  popular belief , a lightning strike itself is usually  नहीं  responsible for multiple deaths or  चोटों  from a single  इवेंट  .
It would be  नामुमकिन  given the natural  tendencies  of a  फ्लैश  , unless people or animals were stacked on top  of  each  अन्य  ,  or  they  यहूद   somehow  arranged vertically and part of  the  flash channel .
When lightning ignites an available  ईंधन  source  और  an  विस्फोट  occurs , it  is  the  शॉक  wave or fire causing the injuries , not the strike  itself  .
Ground Currents , also  पुकारा  step potential  ,  of an earth  termination  is what truly causes most injuries or  मौत  to humans and animals  .
The  निकट  instantaneous rush  of  surface charges ,  induced  by the overhead  thundercloud  itself , race to the strike point from hundreds  to  thousands of feet away during discharge  .
This current  ,   caused   दौरान  each stroke , takes the  पाथ  of least resistance  ,  which may be  आयन  rich human or animal legs , over poorly conducting earth .
This is why it is best to crouch , with feet close together  ,  if ever caught in the  खोलें  during a thunderstorm .
दुर्भाग्यवश   ,   सबसे  reports  do  not draw a distinction  between  the real  कारण  of injury or death , be  it  the  स्ट्राइक  itself , a resulting explosion or fire , or usually responsible  कदम  potential .
पीटर  F. Kilmartin  (  born 1962 ) is the current Attorney General  of  Rhode Island .
Kilmartin is also a retired  पुलिस  captain and a former member of  the  Rhode Island House  of  Representatives .

Sealing is an ordinance ( ritual ) performed in Latter Day Saints temples  by  a person  पकड़कर  the sealing authority  .
the  purpose  of  this ordinance  is  to  मुहर  familiar  संबंध  , making possible the existence of family  संबंध  throughout eternity .
LDS teachings place  ग्रेट  importance on the specific authority  जरूरी  to perform  ये  sealings  .
गिरिजाघर  doctrine teaches that this  प्राधिकार  , called the  priesthood   ,  corresponds to that given to Saint Peter in .
Sealings are typically  performed  as marriages or as sealing of children to  अभिभावक  .
वे  were performed prior to the  मौत  of Joseph Smith , Jr. ( the main founder of the Latter Day Saint movement ) , and are currently  performed  in The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints .
हालांकि  some other  denominations  , such as the Community of Christ , view sealing as  an  artifact of Smith 's practice of plural  विवाह  ,  कुछ  do still perform them .
the   2000s   ,  pronounced `` two thousands '' ,  थी  a decade  कि  began on January 1 , 2000 , and ended on  दिसम्बर  31  ,  2009 .
Globalization , which had  त्वरित  after the  जल्दी  1990s fall  of  communism ,  जारी  to  be   a  force in the 2000s .
The growth of the  अंतरजाल  was one  of  the prime contributors to  वैश्वीकरण   दौरान  the  दशक  ,  बनाना  it possible for people to interact with  अन्य   लोगों  , express ideas ,  introduce  others to different cultures and  पृष्ठभूमि  , use goods and services , sell and buy  ऑनलाइन  , research and learn about things  ,  along with experiencing the world  बगैर  having  to  leave home .
the   संस्थानों  , linkages and technologies that emerged or were redefined earlier  होता   subsequently  in this  दशक  benefit many countries , in particular China and India .
However ,  in  other parts of the world such progress failed to address ongoing struggles with modernity , most  notably   characterized  by the rise  of  al-Qaeda  और  other Islamist groups .
The September 11 attacks in 2001 led  to  the United States , United  किंगडम  , Spain , Canada and other nations invading  अफगानिस्तान  , as well as implementing  विभिन्न   anti-terrorist  measures at home  और  abroad in  कया   थी  known as the War  on  Terror .
the  European Union saw further integration and expansion  throughout  much of Europe .
The economic growth of the 2000s had considerable  पर्यावरणीय  consequences , raised demand for diminishing energy  संसाधन   ,   और  was still  दिखाया  to be vulnerable as demonstrated during the Global Financial Crisis  of  the late  2000s  .
The Gunfight at the O.K . Corral was a gunfight that took place at about 3:00 p.m. on  बुधवार  , October  26   ,  1881 , in Tombstone ,  एरिज़ोना  Territory ,  और  is generally regarded  as  the most  प्रसिद्ध  gunfight in the history of the American  बूढ़ा  West .
The gunfight , believed to have lasted  तभी   परिचय  thirty seconds ,  थी  fought between the outlaw Cowboys  बिली  Claiborne , Ike and Billy  clanton  , and Tom and Frank McLaury  ,  and the opposing town Marshal Virgil Earp and his brothers Assistant Town Marshal Morgan  और  temporary lawman Wyatt ,  aided  by Doc  हॉलिडे  designated as a temporary marshal  by  Virgil .
Ike Clanton  और  Billy  claiborne  ran from the fight unharmed , but  आइक  's brother  बिली   clanton  was killed , along with both  mclaurys  .
Lawmen Virgil and Morgan Earp and Doc Holliday were wounded .
तभी  Wyatt  earp  came  through  the fight unharmed  .
The  लड़ो  has  आइये  to represent  a  time in American history when the frontier was  खोलें  range for outlaws opposed  by  law enforcement that was  स्प्रेड  thin  over  vast  territories  ,  leaving   कुछ  areas unprotected  .
The gunfight was not well  ज्ञात  to the American public until 1931 when author Stuart Lake published what has since been determined to  be   a  largely fictionalized biography , Wyatt Earp  :  Frontier  मार्शल  , two years after Earp 's death .
Lake retold his  स्टोरी  in a  1946  book  कि  director John Ford developed  into   the  movie  my  Darling Clementine  .
After the movie Gunfight  at   the  O.K . Corral was released in 1957 , the shootout came to  be  known  by  that  नाम  .
Since then  ,  the conflict has been portrayed with varying degrees of accuracy in numerous Western  films   और  books .
despite  its name , the  gunfight  actually occurred in a  सीमित  lot six doors west  of  the rear entrance to the O.K  .  Corral on Fremont Street ,  और   भी  in  the  street .
The two opposing parties were  initially   तभी  about apart .
परिचय  thirty shots were fired in thirty seconds .
आइक  Clanton filed murder charges against the Earps and Doc Holliday but they were eventually  exonerated  by  a  local  न्यायधीश  after a 30-day preliminary hearing  और  then again by a local grand jury .
on   दिसम्बर  28 ,  1881  , Virgil Earp was maimed in  an  assassination attempt  by  the outlaw Cowboys , and on March  18  , 1882 , they  assassinated  Morgan Earp .
The suspects furnished solid alibis  ,  and newly appointed Deputy U.S .  मार्शल  Wyatt  earp   took  matters  into   उसके   अपना  hands during the Earp Vendetta  सवारी   ,  ironically pursued by  काउंटी  Sheriff Johnny Behan with  वारंट  for the Earp  's  arrest .
HDMI  (  High-Definition  मल्टीमीडिया  Interface )  is  a  कॉम्पैक्ट  audio/video interface for  transferring  uncompressed video  आंकड़ा   और  compressed/uncompressed  डिजिटल  audio data  इससे  a HDMI-compliant device  (  `` the source device ''  )  to a compatible computer monitor , video projector , digital television  ,  or digital audio device  .
HDMI is a digital  बदलना  for existing analog  वीडियो  standards .
वहीँ  are  a  number of  hdmi-standard   केबल  connectors available , each of which can be used for  कोई  uncompressed TV or  pc   वीडियो  format , including standard ,  उन्नत  , high  परिभाषा  , and  3d  video signals  ;  up to 8 channels of compressed or uncompressed digital audio ; a  cec  (  उपभोक्ता  Electronics Control ) connection ; and an  ईथरनेट   आंकड़ा  connection .
HDMI implements the EIA/CEA-861 standards , which define video formats  और  waveforms  ,   हस्तांतरण  of compressed , uncompressed  ,  and LPCM  ऑडियो  , auxiliary  आंकड़ा  ,  और  implementations of the VESA EDID .
The CEC  allows  HDMI  डिवाइस   to  control each other when necessary and allows the user to operate multiple devices with one remote control handset .
Because HDMI  is  electrically  संगत   साथ  the CEA-861 signals used by  डिजिटल  visual interface (  dvi   )  ,  no  signal  परिवर्तन  is necessary  ,   nor  is there a loss  of  video quality when a DVI-to-HDMI adapter is used .
as  an uncompressed CEA-861  कनेक्शन  , HDMI is independent  of  the  विभिन्न  digital television standards  प्रयुक्त   by  individual devices ,  ऐसे  as ATSC  और  DVB ,  as   ये  are  encapsulations  of compressed MPEG  वीडियो  streams ( which can be decoded and output as an uncompressed video stream  on   hdmi  ) .
Production of  उपभोक्ता   hdmi  products started in late  2003  .
In Europe either  dvi-hdcp  or HDMI is included in  the  HD  तैयार  in-store  labeling  specification for TV sets for HDTV , formulated  by  EICTA with SES  अस्त्र  in  2005  .
HDMI began  to  appear on consumer HDTV camcorders  और  digital still  कैमरे  in 2006 .
As of January 8 ,  2013   ,   जिससे   is  ten  सालो  after the  रिलीज  of the first HDMI specification , over  3  billion HDMI devices have shipped since the launch  of  the HDMI standard .
ब्री  Van de Kamp ( née Mason  ;  also  ज्ञात   in   the  series as Bree Hodge and Bree Weston  )   is  a fictional character and one of the four  protagonists  on  the  ABC television  श्रेणी  Desperate  housewives   .
She  is  played by  अभिनेत्री  Marcia  क्रॉस  ,  जो   रै  received  अनेक  awards  और   nominations  for  उसके   portrayal  , including an Emmy Award  नामांकन  , three Golden Globe Award nominations , and two Screen Actors  गिल्ड  Awards .
Cross 's  portrayal  of Bree has  महरूम   widely  praised by critics and fans .
Cross originally auditioned for the  भूमिका  of Mary  ऐलिस  Young , but  श्रेणी  creator Marc Cherry  विचार  she  थी  better suited for the  भूमिका  of Bree .
दाना  Delany  ,   जो   आखिरकार  was  डाल  as  कैथरीन  Mayfair , was originally  चुनी   लिये  the role  लकिन   turned  it  bas  , saying it was too similar to  उसके  role in Pasadena .
Bree 's main  संघर्ष  throughout the series has been her attempts  to   maintain  a perfect life despite various obstacles such as widowhood , divorce ,  और   alcoholism   hindering   उसके  .
वो  has been married three times ; to Rex Van de Kamp (  स्टीवन  Culp  )  , Orson Hodge ( Kyle MacLachlan ) and  ट्रिप   वेस्टन  ( Scott Bakula ) .

the  Hangover Part II is  a  2011 American comedy film produced by Legendary Pictures and  वितरित  by Warner  भाईs.  Pictures .
It  is  the sequel to 2009 's The  hangover  and the second film in The Hangover franchise  .
Todd Phillips  निर्देशित   the   फिल्मी  in addition to  co-authoring  the script  साथ  Craig Mazin , and Scot  आर्मस्ट्रांग  .
The film stars Bradley  कूपर  , Ed Helms  ,  Zach Galifianakis  ,  Ken Jeong , Jeffrey  tambor  , Justin  bartha  and Paul  giamatti   .
The Hangover Part II tells  the  story of Phil , Stu , Alan , and  डग  as  वे  travel to Thailand for  stu  's wedding .
After the bachelor party  in  Las Vegas , Stu takes no chances and opts  लिये  a safe ,  subdued   pre-wedding  brunch .
However ,  बाते  do  नहीं   go  as planned , resulting in another bad hangover with no memories  of  the previous night .
विकास   of  The Hangover Part II began in April  2009   ,   दो   महीने  before The Hangover was released .
The  प्रिंसिपल  actors were cast in March 2010 to reprise their roles from the first film .
Production  began  in October 2010 , in  ओंटारियो  , California  ,  before moving on location in Thailand .
The  फिल्मी  was released on  may   26  ,  2011  and , despite receiving mostly negative reviews from critics , it became the highest-grossing R-rated comedy during its  नाट्य  run .
a  third film is set for on May  24  , 2013 .

The English  पुनर्जागरण  was a cultural and artistic  गति  in England dating  इससे  the late 15th and early 16th  सदियां  to  the  early  17th  century  .
It is associated  साथ  the pan-European  पुनर्जागरण  that is usually regarded as beginning in Italy in the late 14th  सदी  .
Like most of  उत्तरी  Europe , England saw little of these  developments  until more than  a  century  बाद   .
The beginning of  the   अंग्रेज़ी  Renaissance is  प्रायः  taken , as a convenience , to  be  1485 , when the  बैटल  of Bosworth Field ended  the  Wars of the Roses and inaugurated  the  Tudor Dynasty .
पुनर्जागरण  style and ideas  ,  however  ,  were slow  in  penetrating England  ,  and the Elizabethan era in the second half  of   the   16th  century is usually regarded as the height of  the   अंग्रेज़ी  Renaissance .
Elizabeth Ann Bloomer  वारेन   ``   बेट्टी  ''  घाट  ( April 8 , 1918 – July 8 , 2011 ) , was First Lady of  the  United States from 1974 to 1977 during  the  presidency of her husband Gerald Ford .
As First Lady , she was active in social policy and  निर्मित  precedents as  a  politically active presidential wife .
Throughout her husband 's  पद  in office  ,  she  कायम   ऊँची  approval ratings  despite  opposition  इससे  some conservative Republicans who objected to her more moderate and liberal positions on social issues .
Ford was noted for raising breast cancer awareness following her 1974 mastectomy and was a passionate supporter  of  , and  activist  for , the Equal Rights Amendment ( ERA )  .
Pro-choice on  गर्भपात   और  a  नेता  in the Women 's  गति   ,   वो   gained  fame as one  of   the  most  निष्कपट  first ladies in history ,  commenting   on  every  hot-button  issue of the time , including feminism ,  बराबर  pay ,  the  ERA , sex ,  दवाएँ  , abortion ,  और  gun  कंट्रोल  .
वो  also raised awareness of  व्यसन  when she announced her long-running battle  साथ  alcoholism in the 1970s .
following   उसके  White House years , she continued to lobby for the ERA and  remained   क्रियाशील  in  the  feminist  गति   .
She was  the  founder , and  परोसा  as  the  first chair of the  फलक  of  निर्देशकों  ,  of  the Betty Ford Center for  पदार्थ  abuse and addiction and is a recipient of the Congressional Gold  पदक  ( co-presentation with her husband , Gerald R. Ford ,  अक्तूबर   21  , 1998  )  and the Presidential  पदक  of Freedom ( alone  ,  presented 1991  ,  by George  H.  W. Bush  )  .
Platelet  endothelial  cell adhesion molecule ( PECAM-1 )  भी  known as  क्लस्टर   of   differentiation   31  ( CD31  )   is  a  प्रोटीन  that in human is encoded by the  pecam1  gene  मिला  on chromosome 17 .
PECAM-1 plays a  कुंजी  role in  निकालना  aged neutrophils from the  देह   .

The Miss Florida  यूएसए  competition is the  pageant  that selects  the  representative for  the  state Florida in the Miss USA  pageant   .
While Florida  रै  been successful in terms of  runners-up  , finalists and semi-finalists , the  राज्य  has never  जीती  the Miss USA pageant , although  चेरिल  Patton became Miss USA after  सिल्विया  Hitchcock won Miss  ब्रह्मांड  .

the   वर्तमान  titleholder is Michelle  aguirre  of Hialeah .
Anglo-Saxon  इंग्लैण्ड  refers to the period of the history of the part of Britain that became known as England , lasting from the end of Roman occupation  और   स्थापना  of Anglo-Saxon kingdoms  in  the 5th century until the Norman conquest of England in  1066  by  विलियम  the Conqueror .
Anglo-Saxon is a general  पद  referring  to  the  germanic   peoples  who came to Britain  दौरान  the 5th and 6th centuries  ,  including Angles ,  saxons   ,  Frisii , and Jutes .
the  term also refers to the language  बोला  at the time  in  England  ,  which is now called Old English , and to the culture of the era , which has long  आकर्षित  popular  और  scholarly  ध्यान  .
Until  the  9th  सदी  Anglo-Saxon England was dominated by the Heptarchy  ,  the kingdoms of Northumbria , Mercia , East Anglia , Essex , Kent ,  ससेक्स  ,  और  Wessex .
In terms of religion  the  kingdoms followed Anglo-Saxon paganism during the early period , but converted to Christianity during the  7th   सदी  .
Paganism had a final stronghold  in  a  काल  of Mercian hegemony  दौरान  the 640s , ending with the death  of  Penda of Mercia in 655 .
Facing the threat of Viking invasions , the House  of  Wessex  became  dominant during the 9th century , under the  नियम  of Alfred the  ग्रेट  .
During the 10th century ,  the   व्यक्तिगत  kingdoms  एकीकृत   अंतर्गत  the rule of Wessex into the Kingdom of England , which  stood   opposed  to  the  Danelaw , the Viking kingdoms established  इससे  the  9th  century  in  the north and  ईस्ट  of England .
The Kingdom of England fell in the Viking invasion  इससे  Denmark in 1013 and was ruled by the House of  डेनमार्क  until 1042 , when the Anglo-Saxon House of Wessex was restored .
The last Anglo-Saxon king , Harold  godwinson  , was killed in  1066   at  the  बैटल  of Hastings .

Smoked salmon is a  तैयारी  of  सामन  , typically a fillet  कि  has been cured and hot or cold smoked .
Due to its moderately high price , smoked salmon is considered a delicacy .
Although the term lox is  sometimes  applied to smoked salmon , they are  अलग  products .
View of defibrillator  एलेक्ट्रोड  position  और  placement .
defibrillation  is a  आम  treatment for life-threatening cardiac dysrhythmias , ventricular fibrillation ,  और  pulseless ventricular tachycardia .
Defibrillation consists of  delivering  a therapeutic dose of electrical energy to the affected heart with a  यंत्र  called  a  defibrillator .
इस  depolarizes a critical mass of the heart  मांसपेशी  , terminates the dysrhythmia ,  और  allows normal sinus rhythm to  be  reestablished by the body 's natural pacemaker , in  the  sinoatrial node of the heart .
Defibrillators can be external , transvenous  ,  or implanted  ,  depending on the type of device used or needed .
Some external units ,  ज्ञात  as  स्वचालित  external defibrillators  (  AEDs ) , automate the diagnosis of  treatable  rhythms ,  अर्थ   कि   lay   responders  or  bystanders   हैं  able to  उपयोग  them successfully with little , or in some cases no training at all .
Gabrielle `` Coco '' Bonheur Chanel ( August 19 ,  1883  – January 10 ,  1971  ) was  a   फ्रेंच   फ़ैशन  designer and founder of the Chanel brand  .
She was the only fashion designer to appear on Time  पत्रिका   's  list of the 100  सबसे  influential people of the 20th century  .
Along with Paul Poiret  ,   चैनल   थी  credited with liberating women  इससे  the constraints of the `` corseted  silhouette   ''  and popularizing the acceptance of  a  sportive , casual chic as  the  feminine standard  in   the  post- World  युद्ध  I era .
A prolific fashion creator , Chanel 's influence extended beyond couture clothing  .
Her design aesthetic was realized  in  jewelry , handbags  ,  and fragrance .
Her  हस्ताक्षर  scent , Chanel No . 5 , has  become   an  iconic product .
Chanel was known  लिये   उसके  lifelong determination , ambition and energy which she applied to her professional and social life .
She achieved both success as a businesswoman and social prominence thanks to  the   कनेक्शन्स  she  बना   through  her work .
These included many artists and craftspeople to whom she became  a   संरक्षक  .
however  , Chanel 's highly competitive , opportunistic personality led  उसके  to make questionable life choices which have generated controversy  around  her reputation  ,  particularly her  आचरण   दौरान   the  German occupation  of  France in World War II  .
Allied  मिलों  flour mill on the banks of the  मैनचेस्टर  Ship Canal
a  gristmill ( also : grist  मिल  , corn  मिल  or flour mill  )  grinds  अनाज  into flour  .
the   पद  can refer to both the grinding mechanism and the building  कि   holds   it  .
Romania (  ;  dated spellings Roumania and Rumania ; )  is  a country located  at  the intersection of Central and Southeastern Europe , bordering on  the   ब्लैक  Sea  .
Romania shares a  किनारा   साथ  Hungary and Serbia to the west ,  युक्त   और  Moldova to the  पूर्वोत्तर  and east , and Bulgaria to the south .
At ,  रोमानिया  is the eighth largest country of the European Union  by  area ,  और   रै   the   सातवाँ   largest  population of the European Union with more than 19  लाख  people .
Its capital  और  biggest city is Bucharest ,  the   11th   largest  city in the EU .
The United Principalities  उभरा  when the territories of Moldavia and Wallachia were united under Prince  सिकंदर   ioan  Cuza in  1859  .
In 1866 Prince Karl of Hohenzollern-Sigmaringen was called  to   the  throne as the Ruling Prince  of  the Romanian Principate and  in  1881  he  was finally  पहनाया  as King Carol  i  the first  monarch  of the Kingdom  of  Romania .
स्वतंत्रता  from the Ottoman Empire was  घोषित  on  9  May 1877 , and was internationally recognized  the  following year .
At the end  of  World War  i  , Transylvania , Bukovina  और  Bessarabia united with the Kingdom of  रोमानिया  .
World  युद्ध  II gave cause to  the  rise of  a   सैन्य  dictatorship in Romania under fascist General Ion Antonescu  ,  who chose to  लड़ो  on the  पक्ष  of  the   अक्ष   शक्तियां   इससे  1941  to   1944  .
After  उसके   हटाना  , Romania switched sides in 1944 and joined the Allies .
By  the   समाप्त   of  the  युद्ध  , some formerly  रोमानियाई  northeastern territories were  occupied   by  the Soviet Union , with Red Army units stationed on Romanian soil  .
In 1947 Romania forcibly  became   a   लोगों   's  Republic ( 1947-1965 ) and a member of  the  Warsaw  अनुबंध   .
In 1965 Nicolae Ceauşescu  became  General Secretary  of  the Romanian Communist  पार्टी   ,  and the harsh austerity measures , political repression , and cult of personality  he  implemented led to the Socialist Republic of Romania  (  1965-1989 ) becoming the most Stalinist police state in  the  Eastern bloc .
आखिरकार  his  सत्तावादी  government was toppled  in  December 1989  दौरान  the Romanian Revolution of 1989 .
With the  पतन   of   the  Iron Curtain , Romania began its transition towards  लोकतंत्र  and  a  capitalist market economy  .
After  a  decade  of   post-revolution  economic problems  और  living-standards decline  ,   extensive   reforms  fostered economic recovery .
As of  2010   ,  Romania is an upper-middle-income country with a  ऊँची  human development  अनुक्रमणिका  .
रोमानिया  joined NATO on 29 March 2004 , and  the   यूरोपीय  Union  on  1  जनवरी   2007  .
It is  भी  a member of the : Latin Union , Francophonie , OSCE , WTO , BSEC , United Nations  ,  etc .
Today , Romania  is  a unitary semi-presidential republic , in which  the  executive branch consists of the  अध्यक्ष   और   the   सरकारी  .
`` Ancient '' redirects here  .
For other  उपयोग  , see Antiquity  (  disambiguation )  .
the  times before writing  belong  either  to  protohistory or to  प्रागितिहास  .
Khafre 's Pyramid  (  4th dynasty  )  and Great Sphinx of Giza  (  c.  2500  BC or  शायद  earlier )
Ancient  इतिहास  is the study of the  लिखा  past from  the  beginning of  अंकित  human history  to  the  जल्दी  Middle  आयु  .
The span  of  recorded history is roughly 5,000  सालो  , with Cuneiform  स्क्रिप्ट  , the  oldest   खोजा  form of  सुसंगत   लिखने   ,  from the  protoliterate  period around the 30th century BC  .
इस  is the beginning of history  ,  as opposed to  प्रागितिहास  , according to the definition used by most historians  .
The  पद  classical antiquity is often  प्रयुक्त   to  refer to history  in  the  बूढ़ा  World from  the   शुरूआत  of  अंकित  Greek history in 776 BC ( First Olympiad ) .
This roughly coincides  साथ  the traditional  तिथि   of  the founding of Rome in 753  bc   ,  the beginning of the history of ancient Rome  ,  and the beginning of the Archaic period in Ancient Greece .
Although the ending date of  प्राचीन  history  is  disputed , some  पश्चिमी  scholars use the  पतन  of  the  Western Roman Empire in  476  AD , the closure of the Platonic Academy  in  529  ad  , the death  of  the emperor  जुस्तिनियन   i   ,  the coming of Islam or  the   वृद्धि  of Charlemagne as the end of ancient and Classical European history .
In India , the period  शामिल  the  जल्दी  period of the Middle  kingdoms  , and ,  in  China , the time up  to  the Qin Dynasty is  शामिल  .
Methylcobalamin ( shown ) is a form of vitamin B12 .
Physically  it  resembles  the   अन्य  forms of vitamin B12 , occurring as  अंधेरा  red crystals that  freely  form  cherry-colored   पारदर्शी  solutions in water .
Vitamin B12 , vitamin B12 or  विटामिन  B-12  ,  also called cobalamin , is  a  water-soluble  विटामिन  with a key role in the normal functioning of the brain and nervous system , and for the formation  of   रक्त  .
it  is one of the eight  b  vitamins .
It is normally involved in the metabolism  of  every cell of the human  देह   ,  especially  affecting  DNA synthesis  और  regulation ,  लकिन  also fatty acid synthesis and  उर्जा  production .
neither  fungi , plants ,  nor  animals  हैं  capable  of  producing  विटामिन  B12 .
Only  जीवाणु  and archaea have the enzymes required for  इसके  synthesis ,  हालांकि  many foods are  a  natural source of B12 because  of   बैक्टीरियल  symbiosis .
The  विटामिन  is the largest and most structurally  जटिल  vitamin and can  be  produced industrially only through bacterial fermentation-synthesis  .
विटामिन  B12  consists  of a class  of  chemically  सम्बन्धित  compounds ( vitamers )  ,  all of which have  विटामिन  activity  .
It  contains  the biochemically rare  तत्व   कोबाल्ट  .
Biosynthesis of the basic structure  of  the vitamin is accomplished only by bacteria ( which usually produce hydroxocobalamin )  ,  but conversion between  अलग  forms of the vitamin  can  be accomplished in  the   इंसान   देह   .
A common semi-synthetic form  of  the vitamin , cyanocobalamin ,  करता   नहीं  occur in nature , but is produced from bacterial hydroxocobalamin and then used in many pharmaceuticals and  पूरक  ,  और  as a food additive , because of  इसके   स्थिरता   और   निम्नतर   उत्पादन  cost .
in  the body it is  परिवर्तित   to  the human physiological forms methylcobalamin and adenosylcobalamin , leaving behind the cyanide , albeit in minimal  विशेषज्ञता   .
More recently , hydroxocobalamin ,  methylcobalamin   ,  and  adenosylcobalamin  can be  मिला  in more expensive pharmacological products and  खाना  supplements  .
the   अतिरिक्त  utility of these is  फिलहाल   debated  .
Vitamin B12 was  खोजा  from  इसके   संबंध   to  the disease pernicious anemia ,  जिससे  is an autoimmune disease in which parietal cells of the  पेट  responsible  लिये  secreting intrinsic factor are  नष्ट  .
मूलभूत   फ़ैक्टर   is  crucial for the  सामान्य  absorption of B12  ,   so  a lack of intrinsic factor , as seen in pernicious  रक्ताल्पता  , causes a  विटामिन   b12  deficiency .
अनेक  other  subtler  kinds of  विटामिन  B12 deficiency and their biochemical effects have  चूंकि  been elucidated  .
The Roman Empire ( )  थी  the  post-  Republican period  of  the ancient  रोमन  civilization , characterised by an autocratic form of  सरकारी  and large  territorial  holdings around  the  Mediterranean  in  Europe ,  अफ़्रीकी  ,  और  Asia .
The 500-year-old Roman  गणतंत्र   ,  which preceded it , had been destabilized through a series  of  civil wars .
Several events marked the  परिवर्तन  from Republic  to  Empire , including Julius Caesar 's appointment as perpetual dictator (  44   bc  ) ; the Battle of Actium (  31  BC ) ; and the granting  of  the honorific Augustus to Octavian by  the  Roman Senate ( 27 BC ) .
The first two centuries of the Empire  यहूद  a period of  unprecedented  stability  और  prosperity known  as  the Pax Romana ( ``  रोमन  Peace '' ) .
It  पहुँचे  its greatest expanse during the  शासनकाल  of  त्राजान  ( 98–117 AD )  .
in  the  3rd  century , the  साम्राज्य  underwent a crisis that threatened its existence , but was reunified and stabilized under the emperors Aurelian and  diocletian  .
Christians rose to power in the 4th century  ,  during which time a system of  डुअल  rule was developed  in  the  लैटिन  West and Greek East .
After the collapse of central government in the West in the 5th century , the  पूर्वी  half continued as  कया  would later be known as the Byzantine Empire  .
Because of  the  Empire 's vast extent  और  long endurance , the  संस्थानों  and culture of Rome  था  a profound and lasting  influence  on the development  of  language , religion ,  वास्तुकला  , philosophy  ,  law , and forms of government  in  the territory it  governed  ,  विशेषकर  Europe , and by means of European  expansionism  throughout the modern world .
Total  देह  surface  क्षेत्रफल   (   tbsa  )  is  an  मूल्यांकन  measure of  burns   of  the skin .
In adults , the ``  नियम   of   nines   ''  is used  to  determine  the  total percentage of area burned  लिये  each major section of  the  body .
In some cases , the burns  may  cover  अधिक   than   एक  body part , or may not fully cover such  a  part  ;   in  these cases , burns are measured  by  using the casualty 's palm as a reference point for  1  % of the body .
लिये  children and infants , the Lund-Browder chart is used to  assess  the burned body surface area .
Different percentages are used because the ratio of the  संयुक्त  surface area  of  the head and neck to the  सतह   क्षेत्रफल  of the  limbs   is  typically larger in  children  than that of an adult  .
Typical values for common  समूह   of  humans follow .
( Due to rounding , values may  नहीं  add to  100   %  . )
