यूनुस  Kirsten Sorrentino  (  born June  26  , 1975 ) , better  ज्ञात   by  his  स्टेज  name  kj-52  ,  is   a  Christian  rapper  from Tampa ,  फ्लोरिडा   .
The `` KJ  ''  part of his name refers to his  बूढ़ा  rap alias  ,  `` King  J.   मैक  , '' a name which he later described in  एक   of  his podcasts as `` horribly  घटिया  .  ''
`` 52 '' , which  is  pronounced  ``   पाँच  two '' , not ``  fifty-two  '' , is  a  reference to the Biblical story of Jesus feeding the multitude with five loaves and two fish , which  is  also sung about in his song `` Push Up '' from The Yearbook and in the  ``  KJ Five Two '' on It 's Pronounced 'Five Two  .
He was awarded the  rap/hip  Hop Recorded  सोंग   of  the Year for ``  never  Look Away ''  और  Rap/Hip Hop  एल्बम  of the Year at the  जीएमए  Dove Awards of 2007 .
on  July 28 ,  2009  , KJ-52 released `` End  of  My Rope '' ,  जिससे  is the first single for his album  five-two  Television .
His song ``  डिअर   पतला  '' is based on Eminem 's song `` Stan `` and is a sort of personal message from KJ-52 to Eminem .
The  उपाधि   प्रतीक  ( ° ) is a typographical symbol that is used , among other things , to represent degrees of  चाप  ( e.g  .  in  भौगोलिक  coordinate systems ) , hours ( in  the   चिकित्सा   फ़ील्ड   )  , or  डिग्री  of temperature  .
The symbol consists of a small raised circle ,  historically  a  शून्य  glyph  .
In Unicode it is encoded at  .
This is  a  list of roots , suffixes , and prefixes used  in  medical terminology  ,  their meanings , and their etymology  .
There are a few  नियम  when using medical roots .
firstly   ,  prefixes  और  suffixes , primarily  in  Greek , but also in Latin , have a droppable  -o-  .
As  a  general rule ,  इस  -o- almost always acts  as  a joint-stem to connect  दो  consonantal roots ,  e.g  . arthr-  +  -o- + logy  =  arthrology .
But generally , the -o- is dropped when  connecting   to  a vowel-stem  ;  e.g  .  arthr- + itis = arthritis , instead of arthr-o-itis .
Secondly ,  चिकित्सा  roots generally go together  according  to  भाषा  : Greek prefixes go with Greek suffixes and  लैटिन  prefixes with Latin suffixes .
हालांकि  international scientific  शब्दावली  is not  कठोर  about segregating combining forms  of   अलग   भाषाएं  , it  is   advisable  when coining new words not to  मिक्सर  different  lingual   जड़ें  .
Stomach cancer  ,   or   gastric  cancer , refers  to  cancer arising from any  भाग  of the stomach .
Stomach  कर्कट  causes about  800,000  deaths worldwide per year .
Prognosis is poor  (  5-year survival < 5 to 15 %  )   क्युकी  most patients  उपस्थित   साथ   उन्नत  disease .
Sara  lynn  Evans ( born February 5 , 1971  )  is  an  American country singer and songwriter .
लिये  her entire career ,  वो  has been signed to  आरसीए   रिकॉर्ड  Nashville .
Evans ' debut , Three  मदारी  and the Truth  ,  did  नहीं  produce a  शीर्ष  40 hit on the Hot Country Songs charts .
She followed this up with No Place That Far ( 1998 ) , Born to Fly ( 2000 ) , Restless ( 2003 ) and Real  ठीक  Place (  2005  ) .
No Place That Far received a gold certification from the  रिकॉर्डिंग  Industry Association of America (  riaa  ) , while  the  other three albums all  यहूद  certified platinum  .
These discs include the number 1 singles `` No Place  कि  Far `` , `` Born  to  Fly `` , ``  suds   in  the Bucket ``  और  ``  a   रियल  Fine Place to Start `` , plus the top 10 hits `` I Could Not Ask  लिये  More ``  (  a cover of the Edwin McCain song ) , ``  i  Keep Looking `` , `` Perfect `` and  ``  Cheatin ' `` .
उसके   2007  Greatest Hits included the top 15 hits ``  तुम   'll  Always Be My Baby `` and `` As If `` .
stronger   (  2011 ) included her fifth  क्रमांक  1 hit  ,   ``  A Little Bit Stronger  ``  , which was co-written by Hillary Scott of Lady Antebellum .
Evans has also  जीती  one award each  इससे  Billboard , the Academy of Country Music , Country  म्यूज़िक  Association  ,  Broadcast Music Incorporated  (  BMI ) and a  dove   पुरस्कार  .
The world  's  principal  धर्मों  and spiritual traditions  may   be  classified  into  a small number of major  समूह   ,  although this is by no means a uniform practice .
This theory  began  in  the  18th century with the goal of recognizing the relative  स्तर   of  civility  in  societies .
Berliners watching a C-54 land  at  Tempelhof  विमानक्षेत्र  ( 1948 )
the   बर्लिन  blockade ( 24  जून  1948 – 12 May 1949 ) was one  of  the first  प्रमुख  international  crises  of the Cold War .
During  the  multinational  occupation  of post–World  युद्ध   ii  Germany , the  सोवियत  Union blocked the Western Allies '  रेल   ,  road , and  कनाल  access to  the  sectors of  बर्लिन  under Allied  कंट्रोल  .
Their aim was to force the western powers to allow the Soviet zone to start supplying Berlin with  खाना   और  fuel , thereby giving the Soviets practical control over  the  entire city  .
In  जवाब   ,  the  पश्चिमी  Allies organized the Berlin  एयरलिफ्ट  to carry supplies to the people in West  बर्लिन  .
Aircrews from the United  राज्य  Air Force , the  अंग्रेजों  Royal Air Force ,  the  Royal Australian Air Force , the Royal Canadian Air Force , the Royal New Zealand Air Force , and the  दक्षिण  African Air Force flew over 200,000 flights in one  साल  ,  providing  up to 4700 tons of daily necessities such as  ईंधन   और  food to the Berliners .
By the spring  of  1949 , the  प्रयत्न  was clearly  succeeding  and , by April  ,  the airlift  थी  delivering more  कार्गो   than  had  previously  been  transported  into the  नगर  by rail .
The success of  the  Berlin Airlift brought embarrassment  to  the  soviets  who  था   refused  to believe it  could  make  a  difference .
The blockade was lifted in May 1949 and resulted  in  the creation of two separate German states .
the  Federal Republic of Germany ( West Germany ) and the German Democratic Republic ( East Germany  )   विभाजित  up Berlin  .
In remembrance of the airlift  ,  three airports in the  पूर्व  western zones of the city served  as  the primary  gateways  to Germany for another fifty years  .
The  यूरोपियन  sign ;  logotype  and handwritten .
The  यूरोपियन   चिह्न  is  the   करेंसी  sign used  लिये  the euro , the  आधिकारिक  currency of the Eurozone in the  यूरोपीय   संघ  ( EU ) .
The design was presented to the public by the  यूरोपीय  Commission on 12 December  1996  .
The international  three-letter  code (  according  to ISO standard ISO 4217 ) for  the  euro is EUR .
In Unicode it is encoded at .
In English ,  the  sign precedes the value .
In some styleguides , but not others , the euro sign is unspaced .
Mate (  ,  ;  sometimes  also spelled  maté  )  ,   भी   ज्ञात  as chimarrão ( ) or cimarrón ( )  ,  is  a   परंपरागत   दक्षिण  American infused drink ,  विशेषकर  in  अर्जेंटीना  , Uruguay , Paraguay and the southern  राज्य  of  ब्राज़ील  and  to  a  lesser  degree in south of Chile  ,  the Bolivian  chaco  ,  सीरियाई  and Lebanon .
It is prepared from steeping dried leaves of yerba mate ( llex  paraguariensis  ,  ज्ञात  in Portuguese as erva-mate ) in hot water .
Mate  is   परोसा  with  a  metal straw from  a  shared hollow calabash  करेले  .
The straw  is  called a bombilla  in  some Latin American countries , a bomba in Portuguese , and a bombija or , more  generally  , a masassa (  प्रकार   of   स्ट्रॉ   )  in Arabic .
The straw is traditionally made of silver .
Modern , commercially available straws are typically  बना   of  nickel  चांदी  , called  alpaca  ; stainless  स्टील  , or hollow-stemmed cane .
The gourd is  ज्ञात  as a mate or  a  guampa ; while in Brazil  ,   it  has the specific  नाम   of  cuia , or also  cabaça  ( the name for Indigenous-influenced  calabash  gourds in  अन्य  regions of Brazil  ,   स्टिल  used  लिये  general  खाना  and  पेय  in remote regions  )  .
Even if  the   जल   is   supplied  from a modern thermos , the infusion is traditionally  नशे  from mates or  cuias  .
As with other brewed herbs , yerba mate leaves  हैं  dried ,  कटा  , and ground  into  a  powdery   मिश्रण  called yerba .
The bombilla acts  as  both a straw and  a  sieve .
The submerged end is flared  ,   साथ   छोटी  holes or slots that allow the brewed liquid in , but block the chunky matter that makes up much of the mixture .
A modern bombilla design uses a straight tube with holes  ,  or spring sleeve  to  act as a sieve .
``  tea-bag  '' type infusions of mate ( mate cocido )  have  been on the market  in  Argentina , Paraguay and  उरुग्वे  for many years  अंतर्गत  such trade names as  ``  Taragüí Vitality '' in Argentina , `` Pajarito '' and ``  kurupí   ''  in Paraguay , and in Brazil under the  नाम   ``  Mate Leão '' .
This  is  considered a  completely  different drink  .
it  is never  नशे  from cuias or called chimarrão , nor  is   it  associated with the gaucho/gaúcho culture .
The automotive industry is  a  term that covers a wide range  of  companies and organisations involved  in  the design  ,  development , manufacture  ,  marketing  ,  and selling of motor  वाहनों  , towed vehicles ,  मोटरसाइकिल  and  mopeds  .
it   is  one  of  the world  's   सबसे  important economic sectors  by  revenue .
The term  ऑटोमोटिव   उद्योग  usually does not include industries dedicated to the maintenance of automobiles following delivery  to   the   end-user  , such as repair shops and  मोटर  fuel filling stations .
The term automotive was  निर्मित  from Greek autos ( self ) , and  लैटिन  motivus ( of  गति  ) to represent any form of  self-powered  vehicle .
This term was proposed  by   sae  member Elmer Sperry .
David Michael ``  डेव   ''  Bautista , Jr. ( born January 18 , 1969  )  , is  an  American mixed  martial  artist , bodybuilder , actor  ,   और   पूर्व  professional wrestler  बेहतरीन  known  लिये   उसके  time in World Wrestling Entertainment  स्पर्धा  under the  रिंग  name Batista .
In  डब्ल्यूडब्ल्यूई  , he became a six-time world champion , winning the World Heavyweight Championship four  टाइम्स   ,  and the WWE Championship two times  .
he   is  the longest-reigning World Heavyweight Champion in  डब्ल्यूडब्ल्यूई  history .
In addition  to   ये  championships  ,   बतिस्ता  has  जीती  the World Tag Team Championship three times ( twice with  ric  Flair and  एकबार  with John Cena ) and the WWE Tag Team Championship  एकबार  (  साथ  Rey Mysterio ) .
Batista  थी   भी  the winner of the  2005  Royal Rumble match  और  went  on  to headline WrestleMania 21 , one of the top five highest-grossing pay-per-view events  in  pro  कुश्ती  history .
After  trying  out at World Championship Wrestling 's  शक्ति  Plant , Batista signed a contract  साथ  the WWF in 2000  और   थी   भेजा   to   इसके  developmental  territory  , Ohio Valley Wrestling ( OVW  )  ,  जहाँ  he won the OVW Heavyweight Championship .
In August  2012  , Bautista signed a  अनुबंध   साथ  Classic Entertainment & Sports to fight in mixed martial arts .
He won his  mma  debut  on  October  6  , 2012 , defeating Vince Lucero via TKO in the first  गोलाकार  .
Henry T. Thomas Sampson  ,  Jr. ( born in  जैक्सन   ,  Mississippi in  1934  ) is  an   african-american  inventor  .
He graduated from  ऊँची  school  in   1951  from Lanier  ऊँची  School in Jackson ,  मिसिसिपी   .
He then attended Morehouse College for a couple of years  पहले  transferring to  purdue  University where  he  became a member of the Omega Psi Phi fraternity .
he  received a Bachelor 's degree  in  science from Purdue University in 1956 .
He  ग्रैजुएट  with  an  MS degree in engineering from the University of  कैलिफ़ोर्निया   ,  Los Angeles  in  1961 .
Sampson  भी  received  उसके  MS  in  Nuclear Engineering from the University of Illinois  urbana-champaign  in  1965   ,  and  उसके  PhD in  1967  .
He is the first African American to earn  a  Ph.D.in Nuclear Engineering in  the  United States  .
Some of his  accomplishments  include being a member of the United  राज्य  Navy between the years 1962 and  1964  and earning an Atomic Energy Commission honor between 1964 and  1967   .
Later he was awarded the  ब्लैक  Image Award from  aerospace  Corporation in  1982  .
He  थी  awarded the Blacks in Engineering , Applied Science  पुरस्कार  , and prize for  शिक्षा  , by the Los Angeles Council of Black Professional Engineers  in   1983   .
In June 2007 , Sampson was married to Laura Howzell Young in  st.  Thomas ,  u.S.  Virgin Islands .
Young-Sampson is a professor in the  कॉलेज  of Education  at  California State University San Bernardino  .
Robert Lane Gibbs  (  born March 29 , 1971 ) is a senior campaign adviser for US President  बराक  Obama .
previously  , he was the 28th White House Press Secretary .
गिब्स  was the communications  निदेशक  for then- U.S . Senator Obama and his 2008 presidential campaign .
गिब्स  , who has worked  साथ  Obama since 2004 , was press secretary  of  John  केरी  's  2004  presidential campaign and  रै  previously specialized in  सीनेट  campaigns , having served as  संचार  director for the Democratic Senatorial Campaign  कमेटी  and for four individual Senate campaigns , including those of Obama in 2004 and Fritz Hollings in 1998 .
Gibbs was also the press secretary of  प्रतिनिधि  Bob Etheridge .
On November 22  ,   2008  , Gibbs was announced as the press secretary of the  ओबामा  administration  .
He  assumed  the  भूमिका  of  दबायें  secretary  on  January 20 , 2009 , and gave his first official  drug  on January 22  .
On January 5 , 2011 ,  गिब्स  announced that he  होता  leave the  श्वेत  House to become  an  outside adviser to the administration .
He left on February 11 ,  2011  .
On February 12 ,  2013  , it  थी  announced that Gibbs had been hired as a  योगदानकर्ता   लिये  cable-news channel MSNBC .
His  पहला  appearance was on the same night prior to  the  2013 State Of The  संघ  Address .
Armando Pérez ( born January 15  ,  1981 ) , better known by his stage name Pitbull  ,  is an American rapper ,  songwriter   ,  and record producer .
His first  अंकित  performance  थी  from the Lil Jon album Kings of Crunk in  2002   .
in  2004 , he released his debut  एल्बम  titled  m.i.a.m.i  . (  छोटी  for Money Is A Major Issue ) under TVT Records .
Since then ,  he  has released three other albums under the label : El  mariel   in  2006 , The  boatlift  in  2007  , and Planet Pit in 2011 .
he  released Rebelution in 2009  ,  which included singles `` I Know You Want Me ( Calle Ocho ) `` and `` Krazy ``  .
The latter peaked  at   no  . 30 on the Hot 100 and No . 11 on the Hot Rap  ट्रैक्स  charts while `` I Know You Want Me '' peaked at No  .  2  on   the   hot  100 and peaked within  the   शीर्ष  ten spots  of  charts in the UK , Canada  ,  Italy , and  the  Netherlands .
The song  पहुँचे  No . 1 in France and  the   यूरोपीय  Hot 100 on  the  week ending August 29 , 2009  according   to  Billboard magazine .
he  later signed  साथ  Polo Grounds  म्यूज़िक   through   सोनी  Music and created his own label Mr. 305  inc  .
another  single from  rebelution  was  ``  Hotel Room  सेवा  `` , which peaked  at   no  . 8 on  the  Hot 100 .
Rebelution went  on  to sell over  7.5   लाख  worldwide digital singles  और  albums combined .
Nevertheless , he dropped a smash called `` Give  me  Everything '' which reached # 1 worldwide  ,  and featured artists Ne-yo ,  nayer  ,  और  Afrojack .
He has also performed  as  a featured artist in the remixes of many other hit  गीतों  , like Tik Tok , Scream & Shout , Lo Hecho Esta  hecho  , Bad , Papi  ,   ईंट  , How Low ,  tonight  ( I 'm Lovin ' You ) , Video  फोन  ,  over  To You Now and Bumpy Ride .
Pérez is also the  मेजबान  of his own Spanish-language  कार्यक्रम  on  the  cable channel Mun2 titled La Esquina ( Spanish for The Corner ) .
in  2005 Pérez and rapper Sean 'Diddy ' Combs co-founded Bad Boy  लातीनी   ,   a  subsidiary of  combs  ' Bad Boy Records  लेबल  .
It  primarily  focuses on Latin hip hop , Latin soul , Latin pop and  अन्य  Tropical music , and has  कार्यालयों  in New York and Miami , Florida .
साथ  with co-founding  it  , Pérez currently heads the A & R division of the label .
Pérez has  become  a product endorser , representing alongside Drake , Rihanna , and  trey  Songz the “So Kodak” campaign for the Kodak brand  और  embarking on a partnership with the soft drink  दानव  Dr  pepper   as  part  of  the  अभियान  “ Vida  23  ” for  जिससे  he recorded the song specifically featured on his album Armando .
pitbull  also announced  he  has become the spokesperson for  voli  Vodka , in which he holds  a  majority  इक्विटी  stake , and Budweiser has chosen Pitbull to promote its Bud  लाइट  line of beer .
The commercials currently highlight Pitbull dancing  और  gyrating on  स्टेज  holding up a bottle of Bud Light .
Pitbull has also  खरीदा  an equity stake in Miami Subs Pizza and Grill  .
हैलोवीन  or Hallowe'en (  a   संकुचन  of `` All Hallows  '  Evening ``  )  ,  भी  known as All Hallows ' Eve , is a yearly  जश्न  observed in a number  of  countries on October  31  , the  संध्या  of  the  Western Christian feast of  सब  Hallows ( or All Saints ) and  the  day initiating the triduum of  hallowmas  .
According to many scholars ,  सब  Hallows ' Eve is a Christianised feast  originally   बहकावे  by western European harvest festivals , and  त्यौहार   of   the  dead  साथ  possible  pagan   जड़ें  , particularly  the  Celtic Samhain .
Other scholars maintain that  it  originated independently of Samhain and has solely Christian roots .
Typical festive Halloween activities  शामिल  trick-or-treating ( also known as  ``  guising `` ) , attending costume parties  ,  carving pumpkins into jack-o'-lanterns , lighting  bonfires  , apple bobbing , visiting haunted  आकर्षण  , playing pranks , telling scary  कहानियां  ,  और  watching horror films .
स्वतंत्रता  of speech  is  the political right to  communicate  one 's opinions and ideas  using  one 's body and property to anyone who is willing to receive  उन्हें  .
The term freedom of expression is sometimes used synonymously  ,  but  शामिल   कोई  act of seeking , receiving and imparting information  or  ideas  ,  regardless  of  the  मीडियम  used .
In practice , the  सही  to freedom of speech is not absolute in any country and  the  right is commonly subject to limitations , as  साथ  libel ,  बदनामी  , obscenity ,  राजद्रोह   (  including ,  लिये   उदाहरण  inciting  जातीय  hatred ) , copyright  उल्लंघन  , revelation of information that is classified or otherwise .
The right to freedom of expression is recognized as a human right  अंतर्गत   आलेख  19  of  the Universal Declaration of Human  अधिकारों  and recognized in international  इंसान  rights law in the International Covenant on Civil and Political  अधिकारों  (  iccpr  ) .
Article 19 of the ICCPR states that `` [ e ] veryone shall have the  सही  to hold opinions without interference '' and `` everyone shall  have  the  सही  to freedom  of   अभिव्यक्ति  ; this right shall include freedom to seek  ,  receive and impart  सूचना  and ideas of  सब  kinds , regardless of  frontiers   ,  either orally , in writing  or  in print ,  in  the form of art , or through any other media of his choice '' .
Article 19  goes  on  to  say that the  कसरत  of these rights carries `` special duties  और   जिम्मेदारियों   ``   और  may ``  इसलिए   be  subject to certain restrictions '' when necessary  ``  [ f  ]  or  आदर  of the rights or reputation of others '' or `` [ f ] or  the  protection  of  national security or of public order ( order public ) , or of public health or morals '' .
Freedom of  वाक   may  be  legally  curtailed in  कुछ   धार्मिक  legal systems and in secular jurisdictions where  it  is found  to  cause religious offense , such as the British Racial and Religious Hatred  अधिनियम  2006 .
Sydney  harbour  from the  एयर  , showing the Opera House  ,  the CBD  ,  Circular Quay , the Bridge  ,  the Parramatta River , North Sydney and Kirribilli  in  the foreground
the   सिडनी   harbour  Bridge is a steel through arch bridge  आरपार   सिडनी  Harbour that carries rail  ,  vehicular ,  सायकिल  and pedestrian traffic between the Sydney central business district ( CBD ) and the North Shore .
the  dramatic view of  the  bridge  ,  the harbour , and the nearby  सिडनी  Opera House is an  iconic  image  of  Sydney , New South Wales  ,  and Australia .
The bridge is nicknamed `` The Coathanger '' because of its arch-based design .
Under the directions of  dr  J.J.C .  bradfield   of  the NSW  विभाग  of Public Works , the bridge  थी  designed and built by British firm Dorman Long  और  Co Ltd of Middlesbrough and opened in 1932 .
the  bridge 's  डिज़ाइन  was  बहकावे  by the  नरक  Gate Bridge in New York .
It was  the  world 's widest long-span  सेतु   ,  at 48.8 meters ( 160 feet )  चौड़ी   ,   जबतक  construction of the new  बंदरगाहों  Mann Bridge  in  Vancouver .
It is  भी  the fifth longest  spanning-arch   सेतु   in  the  संसार  ,  और   it   is  the tallest steel arch bridge , measuring from top to water level .
Until 1967 the Harbour Bridge was Sydney 's tallest  ढांचा  .
The Hawaii hotspot is a volcanic hotspot located near the namesake Hawaiian Islands , in  the   उत्तरी  Pacific Ocean .
एक   of   the   सबसे  well-known and heavily studied hotspots in the world ,  the  Hawaii plume is responsible for the creation of the Hawaiian  –  Emperor seamount  कड़ी  , an over 5,800 kilometres ( 3,600 mi  )  long chain  of  volcanoes , four of  जिससे  are active  ,  two of which are dormant , and more than  123  of which are extinct , many  having  since been ground  beneath  the waves by erosion as seamounts  और  atolls .
the  chain extends  इससे   दक्षिण  of the island of Hawaii to the edge of the Aleutian Trench  ,  near the eastern edge of Russia .
जबकि  most volcanoes are  निर्मित  by geological  कार्यकलाप   at   tectonic  plate boundaries , the Hawaii hotspot is  स्तिथ   दूर  from  आसपास  plate boundaries ; the classic hotspot theory  ,  first  प्रस्तावित  in 1963 by John  tuzo  Wilson , proposes that a  सिंगल  ,  फिक्स्ड  mantle plume builds volcanoes that then , cut off  इससे  their source by the movement of the Pacific Plate ,  become  increasingly inactive and eventually erode  नीचे   समुद्र  level over millions of  सालो  .
According to this  सिद्धान्त   ,  the nearly 60° bend separating the  सम्राट  and Hawaiian  खण्ड  of the chain  थी  caused by a sudden shift  in  the movement of the Pacific  थाली  .
In 2003 , fresh  investigations  of this irregularity led to the proposal of  a  mobile hotspot theory , suggesting  कि  hotspots are mobile , not fixed ,  और  that the  47  million year  बूढ़ा  bend was  caused  by  a  shift  in   the  hotspot 's  गति  rather than the plate 's .
Ancient Hawaiians were  the  first to recognize the  increasing   आयु  and weathered state of the  ज्वालामुखी  to the north as they progressed  on  fishing expeditions along the islands .
The  volatile  state of the Hawaiian volcanoes and  उनके  constant battle with the sea  थी   a  major  तत्व  in Hawaiian mythology ,  समाविष्ट  in Pele , the deity of  ज्वालामुखी  .
After the arrival of Europeans on the island , in  1880-1881  James Dwight Dana  निर्देशित  the  पहला  formal geological study of the hotspot 's  volcanics   ,  confirming  the   संबंध  long observed  by  the natives .
1912 marked the  founding  of the Hawaiian Volcano Observatory by volcanologist  थामस  Jaggar  ,   initiating  continuous scientific  अवलोकन  of the islands .
In the 1970s , a mapping project was initiated to  लाभ  more information about the complex geology of Hawaii 's seafloor .
The hotspot has  चूंकि  been tomographically imaged  ,  showing it to  be   चौड़ी  and up to deep , and olivine and garnet -based studies have shown its magma  कक्ष  is approximately .
In its  at  least  85  million years of activity  the  hotspot has produced an estimated of rock  .
The chain 's rate of drift  रै  slowly increased over time  ,   causing  the amount of  समय  each individual volcano is active to decrease ,  इससे  18 million years for the 76 million year old Detroit Seamount , to just under  900,000  for  the   एक  million  year-old  Kohala ;  on  the other hand  ,   eruptive  volume has  increased  from per year to about .
Overall , this has caused  a  trend towards more  क्रियाशील  but quickly-silenced ,  closely  spaced  volcanoes—whereas  volcanoes on  the  near  पक्ष  of  the  hotspot overlap each other ( forming  ऐसे  superstructures  as   हवाई   द्वीप  and the  प्राचीन  Maui Nui ) , the oldest  of  the Emperor seamounts are  spaced  as far as apart .

Petitions are being signed to bring the show for  a   पांचवां   ऋतु  .

it  was marketed  साथ  the tagline `` Rebel .

Osteonecrosis of the jaw  (  ONJ ) is a severe bone disease that affects the maxilla and  the  mandible .
विभिन्न  forms of ONJ  have  been described  over   the  last 160 years  ,  and a  क्रमांक  of causes have been suggested in the literature .
Osteonecrosis of the jaws  संबद्ध   साथ  bisphosphonate  चिकित्सा   ,  required  by  some cancer treatment regimens  ,  has been identified and defined  as  a pathological entity since 2003 .
The possible risk from lower oral  doses  of bisphosphonates , taken by patients to  prevent  or treat osteoporosis ,  remains  uncertain .
Various treatment  विकल्प  have been explored , however severe cases of ONJ still require surgical removal of the  प्रभावित  bone  .
a  thorough history and  assessement  of pre-existing systemic problems and  संभावित  sites  of  dental infection are required  to   सहायता   prevent  the condition , especially  if  bisphosphonate therapy  is   माना  .
the  Boston Red Sox are  a  professional  बेसबॉल  team based in  बोस्टन   ,   मैसाचुसेट्स  ,  और  a  सदस्य  of Major League Baseball 's American League Eastern Division .
Founded in as one of the American League 's  आठ  charter franchises , the Red Sox 's  घर  ballpark has been Fenway Park since .
the  `` Red Sox  ''  name  थी  chosen  by  the team owner , John I.  टेलर  , around , following previous Boston teams that had been known as the ``  रेड  Stockings  ``  .
वे  have played in 11 World  श्रेणी  , winning 7  .
Boston was a  प्रबल  team in the new league , defeating  the  Pittsburgh Pirates  in  the first World Series in  और  winning four more  championships  by .
However , they then went into one of the longest  चैंपियनशिप  droughts in baseball history , called  by   कुछ  the  ``  Curse of  the   bambino   ``  after its alleged  शुरूआत   साथ  the Red Sox 's  बिक्री  of Babe Ruth  to  the rival Yankees  दो  years after their world  चैंपियनशिप  in 1918 , an 86-year wait before the team 's sixth World Championship  in  .
However , the team  's  history during that period was hardly one of futility , but was  बल्कि  punctuated  साथ  some of the most memorable moments  in  World Series history , including Enos Slaughter  's  `` mad  डैश   ``   in  , the `` Impossible Dream `` of  ,   कार्लटन  Fisk  's  home  चलाएं  in , and Bill Buckner 's error  in  .
Red  sox  history has also been marked by the team 's intense  फंसने   साथ  the New York Yankees , arguably  the  fiercest and most historic in North American professional  खेल  .
the  Boston Red  sox  are owned by Fenway  खेल  Group  ,  who also  अपना  Liverpool Football  क्लबों  of the Premier  लीग  in England .
The Red  sox  are consistently one of the top MLB teams in average  सड़क   उपस्थिति  ,  जबकि  the  छोटी  capacity of Fenway Park prevents them from leading  in   overall  attendance .
इससे  May 15 ,  2003  to April 10  ,   2013  , the  रेड   sox  sold out every home game-a total of  820  games ( 794 regular season  )  for  a  major  पेशेवर   खेल  record that  lasted  almost  a   दशक  .
mince  pie  भर  with mincemeat
Mincemeat  is   a   मिश्रण  of chopped dried fruit ,  आसुत  spirits and spices  ,  and sometimes beef  suet  , beef , or venison .
Originally  ,  mincemeat always contained meat .
अनेक  modern recipes contain beef  suet  , though vegetable shortening is sometimes used  in  its place .
Variants of mincemeat are  मिला   in  Australia , Brittany ,  कनाडा  , northern  यूरोपीय  , Ireland , South Africa , the  संयुक्त  Kingdom and  the   संयुक्त  States .
in  some countries the term mincemeat refers to minced  or  ground meat .
Diana , Princess of Wales ( Diana Frances ; née Spencer ; 1 July 1961  –  31 August 1997 ) was the  पहला  wife of Charles , Prince of Wales , the eldest  बेटे   और  heir apparent of Queen Elizabeth II .
She was well known for her fund-raising work for international charities and as an eminent celebrity of  the  late 20th century .
Her wedding to the Prince of Wales on 29 July 1981 was  आयोजित  at  st  Paul 's Cathedral  और  seen  by  a global  टेलीविज़न  audience of over 750  लाख   .
While  शादीशुदा  she bore the  शीर्षक  Princess of Wales ,  duchess  of Cornwall , Duchess of Rothesay , Countess of Chester  और  Baroness of Renfrew .
The marriage produced  दो   बेटे  , the princes William and Harry , who became second and third in line to the  अंग्रेजों  throne .
Diana was born into an aristocratic English family with royal ancestry .
She was the  चौथी   चाइल्ड   of  John  स्पेंसर   ,   8th  Earl Spencer and his  बीवी  Frances , daughter of Maurice Roche , 4th Baron Fermoy  .
She  became  a public figure with  the  announcement of her engagement .
वो  also  प्राप्त  recognition for her charity work and for her  support  of the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Campaign to Ban  landmines  .
इससे  1989 , she was the president  of  the Great Ormond Street Hospital for children , in addition to dozens of other charities .
Diana  remained   the  object of worldwide media scrutiny  दौरान  and after  उसके   विवाह  , which ended in divorce  on  28 August 1996 .
Media  ध्यान   और  public  शोक  were considerable  following  her death in a car crash in  पेरिस   on  31 August 1997 .
Argentina , officially the Argentine  गणतंत्र  (  )   ,  is the second largest country in both South America  और  the Latin America region .
The country is a  संघ  of  23  provinces and the autonomous  नगर   of  Buenos Aires , its capital and  largest  city .
it  is  the  eighth -largest country in the world  by  land  क्षेत्रफल   और  the  largest  among Spanish-speaking nations by geographical  क्षेत्रफल  of 2,780,400 km2 and is the fourth  by  population , with over 41 million  लोगों  .
Argentina is a founding member of the United Nations , Mercosur  ,  the Union of South American  राष्ट्र  , the Organization of Ibero-American  राज्य  , the World Bank  समूह  and the World  व्यापार  Organization , and  is  one of the G-15  और  G-20 major  economies   .
Argentina is located in South America ,  bordered  by Chile to the west and  दक्षिण  ,  बोलीविया  and Paraguay to  the  north and  ब्राज़ील   और  Uruguay to  the  northeast .
Argentina claims sovereignty over part of Antarctica ,  the  Falkland Islands ( ) and South Georgia and the South Sandwich  आइलैंड्स  .
Argentina is the successor state of the  viceroyalty  of the  río  de la Plata , an overseas colony of the Spanish Empire .
अर्जेंटीना  declared independence during the Argentine War of Independence , which was followed by the Argentine  सिविल  Wars during  सबसे  of the  19th  century .
The country faced several military coups  और  political instability during the  20th   सदी  , along with periodic economic crisis that continue  to  this day .
A  पहचाना  Southern Cone power , and middle power , Argentina  is  Latin America 's third-largest economy , with a `` very high '' rating  on  the Human development index .
भीतर  Latin America , Argentina  रै   the   पांचवां   उच्चतम  nominal  जीडीपी   प्रति   capita   और   the  highest in purchasing  शक्ति  terms .
the  Legatum Institute have argued  कि   the  country has a  ``  foundation for future growth due to  इसके   मार्केट  size , levels of foreign direct investment  ,  and percentage of high-tech  निर्यात   as  share of total manufactured goods '' , and it is classed  by   निवेशकों  as middle  उभरते  economy .
Argentina is the Latin American country with the most Nobel  पुरस्कार   ,  for a total of five , all  प्राप्त  during the second half of the twentieth century .
The country has  तीन  Nobel prizes  in  science and two  of  peace .
The most important aspects of science and technology in Argentina are concerned with medicine , nuclear  भौतिकी  ,  जैवप्रौद्योगिकी  , nanotechnology , space and  प्रक्षेपास्त्र  technology  और  several  फ़ील्ड  related to the country 's  प्रमुख  Economic Activities .
The  देश  also has the mega exhibition  बीच  of science , technology  ,   उद्योग  and art that are Latin America 's largest .
Hickory  is  a city in  catawba   काउंटी  , with parts also in Burke County  और  Caldwell County .
The city  's  2010 estimated population is 40,010 .
Hickory is the principal city in the Hickory-Lenoir-Morganton  एमएसए  , in which the population at the 2010 Census was 365,497 .
polyethylene  terephthalate ( sometimes  लिखा  poly ( ethylene terephthalate ) ) , commonly abbreviated  पालतु   ,  PETE , or the obsolete PETP or PET-P ,  is  a  thermoplastic  polymer resin of the polyester family  और  is used  in   सिंथेटिक  fibers ; beverage , food and other liquid containers ; thermoforming applications  ;  and engineering resins often in combination with  कांच  fiber .
The term polyethylene terephthalate is a  सोर्स   of   भ्रम   क्युकी   इस  substance , PET , does not contain polyethylene .
यूँ   ,  the alternate form , poly (  एथिलीन  terephthalate )  ,   is  often  प्रयुक्त  in scholarly journals for the sake of accuracy and  स्पष्टता  .
depending  on its processing  और  thermal history , polyethylene terephthalate  may  exist both as an amorphous ( transparent ) and as a  semi-crystalline  polymer .
The  semicrystalline  material might appear transparent ( particle size <  500  nm )  or  opaque and white (  कण  size up  to  a few microns ) depending on its crystal structure and  कण  size  .
Its monomer  (  bis-β-hydroxyterephthalate ) can be  synthesized   by  the esterification reaction between terephthalic acid and ethylene glycol with water as a byproduct , or by transesterification reaction  between   एथिलीन  glycol and dimethyl terephthalate  साथ  methanol  as  a byproduct .
बहुलकीकरण  is through a polycondensation  प्रतिक्रिया  of  the  monomers  (  done  तत्काल  after esterification/transesterification ) with  जल   as  the byproduct .
The majority of the world 's PET production  is  for synthetic  मछली  ( in excess of 60 % )  ,  with bottle  उत्पादन  accounting for around  30  % of  वैश्विक  demand .
In the context  of  textile  अनुप्रयोग   ,  PET is  referred  to by  इसके  common name , `` polyester , ''  whereas  the acronym ``  पालतु   ''   is  generally used in relation  to  packaging .
Polyester makes  up  about 18  %  of world  पॉलिमर  production  और  is  the   third-most-produced  polymer ; polyethylene (  pe  ) and polypropylene ( PP ) are  पहला  and  दूसरी  , respectively .
PET  consists  of  polymerized  units of the monomer ethylene terephthalate , with repeating  c10h8o4  units .
PET is commonly recycled ,  और  has the number `` 1 '' as its recycling symbol .
Louisiana was admitted to the Union on April 30 , 1812  ,   और   elects  senators to Classes  2   और  Class 3 .
Its  वर्तमान   सीनेटरों  are Democrat  मरियम  Landrieu and Republican David Vitter .
Black  खीर  , blood pudding or  रक्त  sausage  is   a  type of sausage made by cooking blood or dried blood with  a  filler  जबतक  it  is  thick enough to congeal when cooled .
The dish exists in various cultures from Asia to Europe and the Americas .
Pig  ,  cattle , sheep ,  बतख  ,  और  goat blood can  be  used depending on different countries .
in   यूरोपीय  and the Americas , typical fillers include meat ,  मोटे   ,   suet   ,  bread  ,  cornmeal , sweet potato ,  प्याज  ,  chestnuts  , barley , and oatmeal .
In Spain ,  पुर्तगाल  and Asia , potato is often replaced by rice .
Stakeholder may refer to:
Stakeholder  (  corporate ) , a person , group , organization , member  or  system who affects  or  can be affected by  an  organization 's actions
Stakeholder , an  एंटिटी  that can be affected by the results  of  that in which they are said  to  be stakeholders , i.e. , that in which they have a stake .
प्रोजेक्ट  stakeholder  ,  a  व्यक्ति  , group  or  organization with an interest in a project
Stakeholder  सिद्धान्त  , a  सिद्धान्त  that identifies and models the groups which  हैं  stakeholders of a corporation or project
शेयरधारक  analysis , the process of identifying those affected by a project or event
Stakeholder ( law )  ,  a third  पार्टी   जो  temporarily holds  धन   or  property  जबकि   इसके  owner is still being determined
Jack Smight  (   कूच  9 , 1925  -  September 1 , 2003  )  was an American theatre and film director  .
Smight was born in Minneapolis  ,   मिनेसोटा  and went to school with future actor Peter Graves .
His film credits include The Traveling Executioner  ,  Rabbit , Run , Loving  युगल  , Midway , Harper , Airport  1975  , Damnation  alley   और  the Emmy Award -winning  एडी  , as well  as  many episodes of television  श्रेणी  such as The Twilight  मण्डल  and The Alfred Hitchcock Hour .
He also directed the 1960 Broadway play The 49th  cousin  and composed the music  लिये  the film adaption of Roll  of  Thunder  सुन  My Cry .
Smight  died  from cancer  in  Los Angeles , California .
Dmitri Ivanovich Mendeleev ( ; 8 February  1834  – 2 February 1907 O.S . 27  जनवरी  1834 – 20 January  1907  ) was  a  Russian chemist and inventor .
He formulated the Periodic Law , created  उसके  own version of  the  periodic table  of  elements , and used it to correct the properties of  कुछ   already   खोजा  elements and also  to  predict the properties of elements yet to be  खोजा  !
Modesto  (   स्पेनी   लिये  `` modest '' ) , officially the City  of  Modesto , is  the  county seat and largest city  of  Stanislaus County ,  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  , United  राज्य  .
साथ   a  population of  लगभग  201,165  at  the 2010 census ,  modesto  ranks as the 18th  largest  city in the state of  कैलिफ़ोर्निया   .
The Modesto Census County Division , which includes  the   शहरों  of Ceres and Riverbank , has a population of 312,842 as  of  2010 .
Modesto is located  in   the   सेंट्रल  valley area of Northern  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  , 90  मील  north of Fresno , 92 miles  ईस्ट  of  सैन  Francisco , 68 miles south of  the  state  पूंजी  of Sacramento , 66  मील  west  of  Yosemite National Park , and  24  miles south of Stockton .
modesto  , a 29-time Tree City  यूएसए  honoree , is surrounded  by  rich  farmland  , lending to a ranking for the county  as   6th  among all California counties in farm  उत्पादन  .
led  by milk , almonds ,  मुर्गियों  , walnuts , and corn silage , the county grossed nearly $  3.1  billion in agricultural production  in  2011 .
modesto   थी  immortalized in the 1973 George Lucas film American  graffiti  .
The award winning  फिल्मी   captured  the spirit  of  `` cruising  ''   और  friendship  on  10th and 11th Streets in 1962 and  led   to  the revival of 1950 's  nostalgia  that included the  tv  show  प्रसन्न  Days and the other  spin-offs  .
Ron Howard , Harrison Ford and Richard  dreyfuss  starred in  the  film .
The soundtrack was a huge success .
निदेशक  George Lucas is a native of Modesto , graduating from Downey High  स्कूल  in  1962  .
The Gallup-Healthways Well-Being Index  लिये  2011 ,  जिससे  interviews 1,000  भागीदार   रोज़  and asks individuals to assess their jobs , finances  ,  physical health , emotional  राज्य  of mind and communities  ,  ranked Modesto  126  out of the 190  शहरों  surveyed  .
In  दिसम्बर  2009 , Forbes ranked Modesto 48th  आउट  of  100   among  ``  बेहतरीन  Bang-for-the-Buck Cities '' .
In this ranking  ,  Modesto ranked 8th in housing affordability and travel time  लकिन   भी  ranked 86th in job  भविष्यवाणी  growth  और  99th in foreclosures .
Independence Day , commonly known as the Fourth of July , is  a  federal  अवकाश   in   the   संयुक्त   राज्य  commemorating the adoption of the  घोषणा  of Independence on July  4  , 1776  ,  declaring independence  इससे  the  किंगडम  of  ग्रेट   ब्रिटेन   .
Independence Day is commonly  संबद्ध  with  आतिशबाजी  , parades , barbecues , carnivals , fairs  ,  picnics , concerts , baseball games , family reunions , and political speeches and ceremonies  ,   in  addition to various other public and  निजी  events  celebrating  the history  ,  government ,  और  traditions of the United States .
Independence Day is the national day of the  संयुक्त   राज्य   .
A gender symbol denotes the sex of an organism or characterizes an agent  by   लिंग  .
The two standard gender symbols denoting male ♂ and female ♀  हैं  derived from astrological symbols ,  denoting  the classical planets  मंगल  and Venus , respectively .
These symbols have been in use  चूंकि  the Renaissance also denoting elements in alchemy , specifically the metals  आयरन   और  copper .
वे   यहूद  first used to denote the effective gender of plants (  i.e   .  sex of individual in a given crossbreed , since most plants are  hermaphroditic  ) by Carolus  लीनियस   in  1751  .
a   leasehold  estate is an ownership of a temporary right to hold land or property in which  a   lessee  or  a  tenant holds  अधिकारों  of real property by some  रूप  of title from a lessor or landlord .
Although a tenant does hold rights to  रियल  property , a leasehold estate is typically considered personal property .
Leasehold is a form  of  land  कार्यकाल   or  property  कार्यकाल  where  एक  party buys  the  right to  occupy  land or a building  लिये  a given length of  समय  .
As lease is a legal estate , leasehold estate can be  खरीदा   और  sold on  the   खोलें  market .
A leasehold thus differs  इससे  a freehold or fee  सरल   जहाँ  the ownership of a property  is  purchased outright and  thereafter  held  लिये  an indeterminate  लंबाई  of time , and  भी  differs  इससे  a tenancy where  a  property  is  let ( rented ) on a  आवधिक   आधार  such as weekly or  मासिक  .
Until the end of the  पट्टे  period ( often measured in  दशकों  or centuries ; a  99   साल  lease is quite common ) the  leaseholder  has the right to remain in occupation as an  assured   किरायेदार   paying  an agreed rent to  the  owner  .
Terms of the agreement are contained  in  a  पट्टे  , which  रै   तत्व  of contract and property law intertwined .
the   पद   एस्टेट  for years may occasionally be used .
This refers to a leasehold estate for  कोई  specific  काल  of time ( the word `` years ''  is  misleading ) .
An estate for  सालो  is  नहीं  automatically  नवीनीकृत  .
colloquially  , `` lease '' and `` leasing ``  हैं  often a formalization of a longer ,  विशिष्ट   काल  as  compared  with a ``  rental  '' that created a tenancy at will , terminable or renewable at the  समाप्त  of  a  short period .
ओलिविया   (  also  ज्ञात   as  Welcome  to   the  World  of  the Pig  ओलिविया   )  is a British-American children 's animated television  श्रेणी  produced by media company Chorion and based on Ian Falconer 's books  .
it  is seen  on   उपनाम  Jr. in  the  US , Milkshake !
, Nick Jr. in the UK and Ireland , and Disney Junior in Latin America and Brazil ,  treehouse   tv  in Canada .
The show has won a  चांदी  Parents ' Choice Award for its positive story  लाइनों   और  characters .
Location of Panama between  प्रशांत  (  नीचे  )  और  Caribbean ( top )  ,  with canal at top center
The Panama Canal (  )  is a  जलयान  canal in Panama  कि  connects the Atlantic Ocean ( via the  caribbean  Sea )  to  the Pacific Ocean .
the  canal  कटौती  across the  isthmus  of Panama and is a key  conduit  for international maritime trade .
There are  ताले  at each end to  लिफ्ट  ships  up   to  Gatun Lake (  ऊपर  sea-level ) .
gatun  Lake was created to reduce the amount of work required for the canal .
The current  ताले  are wide .
A third , wider lane of locks is being built .
France began work  on   the   कनाल  in  1881  , but had to stop because  of   अभियान्त्रिकी  problems and  ऊँची  mortality due to disease .
the  United States  (  US  )  later took over the project and  took  a decade to complete the  कनाल  in  1914  ,  enabling  ships to  avoid  the lengthy Cape Horn route around the southernmost tip  of  South America ( via the Drake Passage  )  or to navigate the Strait  of   magellan  .
One of the  largest  and  सबसे  difficult engineering  प्रोजेक्ट   कभी   undertaken  , the Panama Canal shortcut made  it  possible for ships to travel between  the   अटलांटिक  and Pacific Oceans in half the time previously required  .
The  shorter  , faster , safer  रूट  to the US West Coast and to nations in  और  along  the   प्रशांत  Ocean allowed those  स्थान  to become more integrated with the  संसार   अर्थव्यवस्था  .
During this time  ,  ownership of the territory  कि   is   अभी  the Panama Canal was first Colombian , then French ,  और  then  अमरीकी  ; the United States completed  the  construction  .
The canal was taken over in  1999   by  the Panamanian government ,  as  long planned  .
Annual traffic  रै  risen from about  1,000  ships when the canal opened  in   1914  , to 14,702 vessels  in  2008 , the  latter  measuring a total  of  309.6 million Panama Canal/Universal Measurement System ( PC/UMS ) tons .
By  2008  , more than 815,000  बरतन  had passed  through  the canal , many of them much larger than the original  planners  could have  envisioned  ; the  largest  ships that can transit  the  canal  आज  are called Panamax .
The American Society of Civil  इंजीनियर्स  has  नामित   the   पनामा  Canal one of the seven  चमत्कार  of the modern world .
Benjamin  फ्रैंकलिन  ( April 17 , 1790 ) was one of the Founding  fathers  of the  संयुक्त   राज्य  .
A noted  बहुश्रुत   ,  Franklin  थी  a leading  लेखक  , printer , political theorist , politician , postmaster ,  वैज्ञानिक  , musician , inventor ,  satirist  , civic activist  ,   statesman  , and diplomat  .
As a scientist ,  he  was a major figure in the American Enlightenment and the history  of  physics for his discoveries and theories regarding electricity  .
he   invented  the lightning rod , bifocals , the Franklin stove , a carriage  ओडोमीटर  , and the glass 'armonica ' .
He facilitated many civic organizations , including a fire  विभाग  and a university .
Franklin earned the title of  ``   the  First  अमरीकी  '' for  उसके  early and  indefatigable  campaigning for  औपनिवेशिक  unity ;  as  an  लेखक  and  प्रवक्ता   in  London for several colonies , then as  the  first  संयुक्त  States Ambassador to France , he exemplified the emerging American nation .
फ्रैंकलिन  was foundational in defining the American  ethos   as  a marriage of the practical values of thrift  ,   मुश्किल  work  ,  education , community spirit ,  self-governing  institutions , and opposition to authoritarianism both  राजनैतिक  and  धार्मिक  , with the  वैज्ञानिक  and  सहिष्णु  values of  the  Enlightenment .
in  the words of historian  हेनरी  Steele Commager , `` In  a  Franklin could be merged the virtues of Puritanism without its  दोषों  , the illumination of  the  Enlightenment without  इसके  heat . ''
To Walter Isaacson  ,   इस   makes  Franklin  ``  the most accomplished American of his age and  the  most influential in inventing the  प्रकार   of  society America would become . ''
Franklin , always proud of his working  क्लास  roots , became a successful newspaper editor and printer in Philadelphia , the leading city  in  the colonies  .
he  was also partners with  विलियम  Goddard and  जोसेफ   गैलोवे  the  तीन  of whom published  the  Pennsylvania Chronicle , a newspaper that was known  लिये  its revolutionary sentiments and  आलोचनाओं  of the British monarchy  in  the American  colonies  .
He became wealthy publishing Poor Richard  's  Almanack and The Pennsylvania  गजट  .
Franklin gained international renown as a scientist for  उसके  famous experiments in electricity and for his many  आविष्कारों   ,  especially the  बिजली  rod .
He played  a  major role in establishing the University of Pennsylvania and was elected  the  first president of the American  philosophical  Society  .
Franklin became a national hero  in  America when  he  spearheaded the effort to have Parliament repeal the  unpopular   स्टैम्प   अधिनियम  .
An accomplished diplomat , he was widely  admired   among  the French as American minister to Paris  और  was a major figure in the development of positive Franco-American relations .
For many years he was the  अंग्रेजों   postmaster  for the  colonies  , which  सक्रिय  him to  नियत  up the first national communications network  .
He was  क्रियाशील  in community  अफेयर्स  , colonial  और  state politics , as well as national and international affairs .
From  1785  to 1788 , he served as governor of Pennsylvania .
Toward  the  end of his  जीवन  , he freed his slaves and became one of  the  most prominent abolitionists .
His  रंगीन   जीवन  and legacy of  वैज्ञानिक   और   राजनैतिक  achievement , and status  as  one of America 's  सबसे  influential Founding Fathers  ,   have  seen  फ्रैंकलिन  honored on coinage and money ; warships ; the names  of  many towns , counties ,  शैक्षणिक  institutions  ,  namesakes , and companies ; and more than two centuries after his death , countless cultural references .
Criminal Minds is an  अमरीकी  police procedural television program that premiered  सितंबर  22 , 2005 , on CBS .
the  series follows  a  team  of  profilers from the FBI 's  behavioral  Analysis  ईकाई  ( BAU ) based in  क्वांटिको  ,  वर्जिनिया  .
The BAU is part of the FBI National  बीच  for the Analysis of Violent Crime .
The show differs from many procedural dramas  by   focusing  on profiling the criminal , rather  than   the  crime itself .
The  दिखाएँ   is  produced by  the  Mark Gordon  कम्पनी  in association with CBS Television Studios  (  originally  सर्वोपरि  Network Television  तब   सीबीएस   सर्वोपरि  Network  टेलीविज़न  ) and ABC  studios  (  originally   touchstone  Television ) .
CBS announced in October 2009 that Legacy Interactive would  develop  a video game based on the show .
the  game  होता   आवश्यकता  players to examine crime scenes for clues  to   सहायता   solve  murder mysteries .
The interactive puzzle game  थी  released in  2012  , but did not feature  कोई   of  the voices of the show 's cast  ,  nor was the cast  शामिल  with  the  project .
On March 14 , 2012 , CBS  नवीनीकृत  Criminal  minds  for an eighth season , which premiered on September 26 , 2012 .
`` Heart-Shaped Box '' is a song by the American grunge band Nirvana , written by vocalist and guitarist  कर्ट  Cobain .
The song was  released   as  the  पहला  single from the group 's  तीसरा  and final  स्टुडियो  album , In Utero , in 1993  .
It was one  of  two songs  इससे   the  album mixed by Scott Litt in order to  augment  the original production by producer Steve Albini  .
जबकि  Nirvana 's label DGC Records  किया  not release a physical single for sale in  the  United States , `` Heart-Shaped Box '' received  much  American radio airplay  ,  reaching number one on the Billboard  आधुनिक  Rock Tracks  चार्ट  .
The international release of the single reached number five  on  the UK Singles Chart .
The song  's  music video , directed by Anton Corbijn ,  garnered   नाजुक   plaudits  .
The orbital speed of a body  ,  generally a planet , a natural satellite , an artificial satellite , or a multiple star , is the speed at which it orbits around  the  barycenter of a system  ,  usually  around  a more massive  देह  .
It can be used to refer to either the mean orbital speed , the average speed as it  completes  an orbit , or instantaneous orbital speed , the speed at  a   particular  point in its orbit .
the  orbital  गति   at  any position in the  कक्षा  can be computed from the  अलहदा   to  the central  देह  at that position , and the specific orbital energy , which is independent of position  :  the kinetic energy is the total energy minus  the  potential energy  .
Brown  राजमहल  Interior and Atrium
Brown Palace Hotel is the second-oldest operating hotel  in  Denver  ,  Colorado and is one of  the  first atrium-style  होटल  ever  निर्मित  .
It is  अभी  operated by  कोरम  Hotels and  रिसॉर्ट  .
It was  निर्मित   in  1892 , one year later than the Oxford Hotel .
It was  नामित  for its original owner , Henry C. Brown  ,  and was  designed  with its odd triangular shape  by  architect Frank Edbrooke .
The hotel is located at 321 17th St  ,  Denver , CO between 17th  गली  ,  ब्रॉडवे  and Tremont Street/Pl in downtown Denver behind the  गणतंत्र  Plaza .
The  प्रमुख   प्रवेश  door  is  on Tremont Street .
dvd-video  is a  उपभोक्ता   वीडियो   स्वरूप  used  to  store digital video  on  DVD discs , and  is  currently the  प्रबल   उपभोक्ता  video format in Asia , North  अमेरिका  , Europe , and Australia .
Discs using the DVD-Video specification require a DVD drive  और   an  H.262/MPEG-2 Part 2 decoder ( e.g.  ,  a DVD player , or a computer DVD drive with a software DVD  खिलाड़ी   )   .
Commercial DVD movies are  एनकोडेड  using  a  combination of H.262/MPEG-2 Part 2 compressed video  और  audio  of  varying formats ( often multi-channel formats as described below ) .
Typically ,  the  data rate for DVD movies ranges from  3  Mbit/s to 9.5  mbit/s   ,   और  the bit rate is usually  अनुकूली   .
It was first available for  खुदरा  around 1997 .
the  DVD-Video specification was created  by   dvd  Forum and can be  प्राप्त  from DVD Format/Logo  लाइसेंसिंग  Corporation for a fee of $  5,000  .
The specification is not publicly available , because every subscriber must sign  a  non-disclosure  अनुबंध  .
Certain information in the DVD Book is proprietary and confidential .
The nautical mile  (  symbol M , NM  or  nmi )  is  a unit of length that is  परिचय   एक  minute  of  arc of latitude measured along any  मध्याह्न  , or about one minute of arc of longitude at the equator .
by   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  agreement  it  has been set at 1,852 metres exactly ( about 6,076 feet ) .
It  is   a  non- SI  ईकाई  ( although accepted for  उपयोग  in the International  प्रणाली  of Units by the BIPM  )  used especially by navigators in  the  shipping and aviation industries , and also in polar exploration .
It is  commonly  used in international law and  treaties  , especially  regarding   the   हद  of  territorial  waters .
It developed from the sea mile and  the  related geographical  मील  .
The nautical mile remains in use by sea and  एयर   navigators  worldwide because of its convenience when working with charts .
Most nautical  चार्ट  use the Mercator projection whose scale varies by about  a  factor  of  six from  the   equator  to 80°  अक्षांश  , so charts covering  विशाल   क्षेत्रों  can  नहीं  use a single linear scale  .
The nautical mile is nearly equal to  a  minute  of  latitude on a chart , so  a  distance  measured  with  a  chart  divider  can be roughly converted to nautical miles using  the  chart 's  अक्षांश  scale  .
Shippensburg is a  बरो  in Cumberland  और  Franklin counties in  the  U.S. state of Pennsylvania  .
settled  in 1730 , Shippensburg lies in the Cumberland Valley ,  41  miles ( 66  km  ) west-southwest of Harrisburg , and is part of  the  Harrisburg– Carlisle Metropolitan Statistical Area .
In  1900  , 3,228 people lived there ; in 1910 , 3,457 ; and in 1940 , 5,244 people lived there .
The population was  5,492  at the  2010  census .
Shippensburg was incorporated as a borough on January  21  , 1819 .
in   the  past , there were  फर्नीचर   कारखानों  , engine and pump works , and  अन्य  industrial  works  located within the town  .
Shippensburg is also the home of The  beistle  Company , the oldest and largest  निर्माता  of decorations  और   पार्टी  goods  ,  which  बिकता  its  distinctive  honeycomb  पेपर  decorations  विश्वव्यापी   .
it  is also the location of  pague  and  fegan  ,  the   oldest  continuously operated hardware store in  पेन्सिलवेनिया  .
In May 2012 , Volvo Construction Equipment began a $  100  million expansion project to bring its  अमरीकी  headquarters to  shippensburg  .
Shippensburg is  भी  home to Shippensburg University of Pennsylvania  ,  one  of  14  विश्वविद्यालयों  of  the   पेन्सिलवेनिया  State System of Higher Education .
Yearly the last full week of  जुलाई   ,  the Shippensburg Community Fair  is  held  .
Begun in  1958  , the fair bills itself as  पेन्सिलवेनिया  's  largest  bi-county  मेला  .
The fair includes  agricultural   दर्शाती  , a  शिल्प  show , food vendors ,  और  carnival  यात्राएँ  amongst other things .
Every summer on the last Saturday  of  August , Shippensburg  holds  the Corn Festival ,  an  event  कि  brings regional artisans  और  vendors to operate stands downtown .
The downtown  is  closed  to   ट्रैफ़िक  for at least 5  ब्लॉक  for  सबसे   of  the day .
Average attendance at the festival is  अनुमानित   at   60,000  - 70,000  प्रत्येक  year .
ब्लैक  hairy tongue ( BHT , also termed  lingua  villosa nigra ) refers  to  a condition of the  जीभ   जहाँ  the filiform papillae elongate with  ब्लैक  or brown discoloration , giving a black and hairy  रूप  .
The appearance may be alarming ,  लकिन  it is  a  harmless condition .
Predisposing factors include smoking , xerostomia  (  dry mouth ) , soft diet , poor oral  hygiene  and certain  medications  .
Management is by  improving  oral  hygiene  ,  विशेषकर  scraping or  brushing  the tongue .
the  IEEE 1394  इंटरफ़ेस   is  a serial bus interface standard for high-speed communications and  isochronous  real-time data  ट्रांसफ़र  .
It was developed in the late 1980s and  जल्दी  1990s by  ठहराना  , who called it FireWire .
The 1394 interface is comparable  to  USB , and often those two technologies are  माना  together , though USB has more market share .
Apple first included  firewire  in some of  इसके  1999 models , and most Apple computers since the year  2000   have  included FireWire  पोर्ट   ,  though , as of  2013  , nothing beyond the  800  version ( IEEE-1394b  )  .
The interface is also known by the brand i.LINK  (   सोनी  ) , and  लिंक्स  ( Texas Instruments ) .
IEEE 1394 replaced parallel  scsi  in many applications  ,   क्युकी  of  निम्नतर   क्रियान्वयन  costs and a  सरलीकृत   ,  more adaptable cabling system .
The 1394 standard also defines a backplane  इंटरफ़ेस  , though  इस   is  not  as  widely used .
IEEE 1394 is the High-Definition Audio-Video  संजाल   गठबंधन  (  हाना  ) standard connection  इंटरफ़ेस  for A/V  (  audio/visual )  घटक   संचार   और  control .
FireWire is also available in wireless , fiber  ऑप्टिक  ,  और  coaxial versions using the isochronous  प्रोटोकॉल  .
Stephen `` Stevie '' Ray Vaughan ( October 3  ,  1954 – August 27 , 1990 )  थी  an American guitarist , singer-songwriter ,  और   रिकार्ड  producer  .
Often referred  to  by  उसके   आद्याक्षर   srv  , Vaughan is best known as a founding  सदस्य  and  नेता  of Double  ट्रबल  .
Together with drummer Chris Layton and bassist  टॉमी  Shannon , they ignited the blues revival of  the  1980s  .
With a  करियर   spanning   सात  years , Vaughan  और  Double Trouble consistently sold out concerts while their albums frequently went gold  .
He was born and raised in Dallas , Texas , and for a short period of  समय  lived in  ग्राहम  ,  टेक्सास  .
As the younger brother of Jimmie  vaughan  , Vaughan started playing the guitar  at  age seven and formed several bands that occasionally performed in local nightclubs  .
At age  17   ,   he  dropped out of high school and moved to  ऑस्टिन  to  further   pursue  his musical career , joining groups such as Krackerjack , the Nightcrawlers ,  और  the Cobras .
In 1977 ,  he   formed  Triple Threat Revue , a  बैंड  that  आखिरकार  evolved into Double  ट्रबल  and regularly performed  around  Austin .
In  1982  , Vaughan  और  Double  ट्रबल   performed  at the  montreux  Jazz Festival in Switzerland , catching the attention of musicians David Bowie and Jackson Browne .
बोवी   पूछा  Vaughan to play on his upcoming  स्टुडियो  album Let 's Dance ,  जबकि  Browne  offered  the band free use  of  his personal studio in Los Angeles  to  record an  एल्बम  .
In March 1983  ,  Vaughan and Double Trouble were signed to Epic Records by  दिग्गज   रिकार्ड  producer  जॉन  Hammond Sr. and released their debut  एल्बम   ,   टेक्सास  Flood in June of that year  .
After  कामयाब  touring , the  समूह  released the albums , Could n't  स्टैंड  the Weather ( 1984 )  और  Soul to Soul ( 1985 ) ,  the  latter  of   जिससे  featured  नई  keyboardist  रीज़  Wynans .
Although  उसके  career had progressed successfully ,  vaughan  checked  into  a  पुनर्वास  hospital in Atlanta  ,   जॉर्जिया  to give up  a  cocaine and alcohol habit and returned to touring with  the   बैंड   .
In June 1989 ,  in  Step  थी  released and  अर्जित   उन्हें  a Grammy  पुरस्कार  for Best  समकालीन  Blues Performance  .
On August 27  ,  1990 , Vaughan was  मारे  in a helicopter crash following a  प्रदर्शन  in  ईस्ट  Troy ,  विस्कॉन्सिन  .
vaughan  's  uniquely  eclectic  yet  intense style was derived  इससे  a variety  of  musical genres .
He was influenced by  ब्लूज़  musicians including Albert  किंग  , Freddie King , Otis  फटाफट  , and Muddy Waters , and  चट्टान  guitarists such as Jimi Hendrix and Lonnie Mack  .
His guitar playing reflected  the  classic  ब्लूज़  and pentatonic scales .
He has received wide critical recognition for his guitar playing ,  रैंकिंग  at  #  6 on Rolling  पत्थरों   सूची   of  ``  100  Greatest Guitarists '' in 2011 .
He was posthumously inducted into the  ब्लूज़   हॉल   of  Fame in 2000  और  a memorial statue  थी  erected in  ऑस्टिन   's  Auditorium Shores  पार्क  .
Stevie Ray  vaughan   is  widely  माना  to  be  one of the greatest  संगीतकारों  to come from the state of Texas  .

In computer networking , gigabit  ईथरनेट  ( GbE or 1 GigE ) is a  पद   describing   विभिन्न  technologies for transmitting Ethernet frames at a rate  of   a  gigabit per second ( 1,000,000,000 bits per second ) , as defined  by  the IEEE 802.3-2008  मानक  .
It came into use beginning in  1999   ,  gradually supplanting  तेज़  Ethernet in wired local networks ,  जहाँ  it performed considerably faster .
the  cables and equipment  हैं   बहुत  similar to  पिछला  standards and were very  आम  and economical by 2010  .
Half-duplex gigabit links connected  through  hubs are allowed  by  the specification , but full-duplex usage  साथ   switches   is  much  अधिक  common  .

the   प्रमुख   components  of  a  stamp:
1 . Image
2 . Perforations
3  . Denomination
4  .  Country name
A postage  स्टैम्प  is a  छोटी   टुकड़ा   of  paper that is purchased and  प्रदर्शित  on  an  item  of  mail  as  evidence of payment of postage  .
Typically , stamps are made from special paper , with a national designation  और  denomination ( price ) on  the   फेस  ,  और  a gum adhesive  on  the reverse side .
Postage  stamps   हैं  purchased from a postal administration or other authorized vendor and are used  to  pay for  the  costs involved in moving mail as  खूब  as other business necessities such as insurance and registration .
The stamp’s shape is usually  कि  of a small  आयताकार   of  varying proportions  ,  though triangles or other shapes are  occasionally  used .
the   स्टैम्प  is  affixed  to an envelope  or  other postal cover ( i.e. , packet , box  ,   mailing  cylinder  )  that  the  customer wishes to send  .
The item is then processed by the postal  प्रणाली  , where a  postmark   ,  sometimes  ज्ञात   as   a  cancellation mark , is usually applied over  the   स्टैम्प  and  कवर   ;  this  कार्यविधि  marks the stamp  as  used  ,  which  रोकता   इसके  reuse .
the  postmark indicates  the  date and point of origin of the mailing  .
the  mailed item is then delivered  to  the address that  the  customer has applied to the envelope or cover .
Postage stamps have facilitated  the   डिलीवरी  of mail since  the  1840s .
Before this time  ,  ink  और  hand-stamps ( hence  the  word 'stamp '  )  , usually made from wood or cork , were often used to frank the mail and confirm  the  payment  of  postage  .
The first adhesive postage stamp  ,  commonly referred to  as  the Penny Black , was issued  in  the  संयुक्त  Kingdom in  1840  .
the  invention of the  स्टैम्प  was  a  part of the  attempt   to   सुधार  and improve the postal system in  the  United Kingdom  of  Great Britain and Ireland ,  जिससे  in the early 19th century was in disarray  और  rife  साथ  corruption  .
There are varying accounts  of  the  आविष्कारक   or  inventors of the stamp  .
Before the introduction  of   postage  stamps , mail in the  uk  was paid for by the recipient  ,  a  प्रणाली   कि  was associated  साथ   an  irresolvable problem : the costs of delivering mail were not recoverable by the postal service when  प्राप्तकर्ता  were unable or unwilling  to  pay for delivered items , and senders  था  no incentive to  सीमित  the  क्रमांक  , size , or  वज़न  of  वस्तुएं  sent , whether or  नहीं  they would ultimately be paid for .
The  postage   स्टैम्प  resolved this  समस्या  in a simple and elegant  manner  , with the  अतिरिक्त  benefit of room for an element of  सौंदर्य  to be introduced .
Later related inventions include postal stationery such  as  prepaid-postage  लिफाफे  , post  ताश  , lettercards , aerogrammes and  wrappers   ,   postage  meters , and , more recently , specialty boxes  और  envelopes provided free to the customer by the U.S. postal service for  प्रधानता  or express mailing .
the  postage stamp  afforded  convenience  लिये  both the mailer  और  postal officials , more  efficiently  recovered costs for the postal service , and ultimately resulted in a better ,  तेज़  postal  प्रणाली  .
With the conveniences stamps offered , their use  resulted   in  greatly increased mailings during the 19th and  20th  centuries .
Postage  stamps  during this era were the most popular  रास्ता  of paying for mail , but by the end of the 20th century  यहूद  rapidly being eclipsed by the use  of  metered postage and bulk mailing by businesses . )
the  same  परिणाम  with respect  to  communications by private parties occurred over  the  last decade  of   the   20th   सदी  and the first decade  of  the 21st due to declining cost of long  अलहदा  telephone communications and the development  और  explosive spread  of  electronic mailing  (  ``  e-mail   ''  via  the  Internet ) and bill paying systems had  .
As postage stamps with their engraved imagery began to appear  on   a  widespread basis  ,  historians and collectors began  to  take  सूचना  .
The study of postage stamps and  उनके  use is referred to as philately .
Stamp collecting can be  दोनो  a  शौक   और  a form of historical  पढ़ाई   और  reference , as  government-issued  postage stamps and their mailing systems have always  महरूम  involved with  the  history of nations .
The University of Alabama at Birmingham ( UAB ) is a public  विश्वविद्यालयों   in   बर्मिंघम  in the U.S. state of Alabama .
Developing  इससे  an extension center established in 1936 , the  संस्था  became an autonomous institution in 1969 and is today  एक  of three institutions in the University of Alabama System  .
UAB offers over 140 programs  of  study in 12 academic  विभाजन  leading to bachelor  's   ,  master  's   ,  doctoral , and  पेशेवर  degrees in the social  और   behavioral  sciences , the  उदार   कला  , business ,  शिक्षा   ,  engineering  ,   और   health-related   फ़ील्ड  such as  आयुर्विज्ञान  , dentistry  ,  optometry , nursing  ,  and public health .
The school is highly  प्रसिद्ध  for its medical research  और  natural sciences programs .
the  UAB Health System , one of the largest  अकादमिक  medical centers in the United  राज्य  , is  संबद्ध  with the university .
UAB  हॉस्पिटल  sponsors residency programs in  विभिन्न  medical specialties , including  आतंरिक  medicine  ,  neurology ,  सर्जरी  , radiology , and anesthesiology  .
UAB Hospital is the only ACS verified Level I trauma  बीच  in Alabama ,  as   रेटेड  by the American College of Surgeons Trauma Program .
UAB is the state 's largest employer , with more than 18,000 faculty and staff and over 53,000 jobs at the university and  in  the health system .
an  estimated  10  percent of the  कार्य   in   the  Birmingham-Hoover Metropolitan Area and  1  in  33   कार्य  in the  राज्य  of Alabama are directly or indirectly related to UAB .
The university 's  overall  annual economic impact was  अनुमानित  to be  $  4.6 billion in  2010  .
In the fall of 2012 , the University of Alabama at Birmingham enrolled 17,999 students  इससे   अधिक   than  110 countries  ,  including 1,605 freshmen .
There  हैं  plans to commence with an `` aggressive  ''  growth in enrollment  at  UAB .
The current UAB President is Dr. Ray L.  watts  .
टोफू   ,  also called  सेम  curd ,  is  a food made by  coagulating  soy juice and then pressing the resulting curds  into  soft  श्वेत  blocks .
It is  a  component in  अनेक  East  एशियाई  and Southeast Asian cuisines .
वहीँ  are many different  किस्में  of  टोफू  , including  भैस  tofu and tofu that has been processed in some way .
Tofu has a subtle flavor and can be used in savory and sweet dishes .
It is often seasoned or marinated to suit the dish .
Tofu originated in  प्राचीन  China some 2,000 years ago .
Chinese  लेजेंड  ascribes its invention  to  prince  लियू  An ( Chinese  :  劉安 Liú Ān  ,  179–122 BC ) .
Tofu and its production technique were introduced into  कोरियाई  and then Japan  दौरान  the Nara  काल  .
It spread  into   अन्य  parts of East  एशिया  as  खूब  .
This  स्प्रेड   संभावित  coincided with the spread of Buddhism because  it  is an important source of  प्रोटीन   in  the vegetarian diet  of  East Asian Buddhism .
Li Shizhen in the Ming Dynasty described a method of making  टोफू  in Bencao Gangmu .
Tofu  रै  a low  कैलोरी  count ,  अपेक्षाकृत   विशाल  amounts of protein , and little fat .
It  is   ऊँची  in iron and depending on  the  coagulant used in manufacturing  ,  may  भी  be high in calcium and/or magnesium .
Bubbles (  born  1983  )  is  a   आम  chimpanzee  ,  known for being the one-time pet  of  American recording artist Michael  जैक्सन  , who  खरीदा   the  primate from a Texas research  सुविधा  in the early  1980s  .
The animal was a frequent travel  साथी   to  the singer , whose attachment to the animal led to media mockery  और   ,   among  other factors , to  a  public perception of  जैक्सन   as  an  eccentric  .
During the  ख़राब  World Tour ,  लिये  example ,  जैक्सन  brought Bubbles with him to Japan , where they both drank tea with  the  mayor  of   ओसाका  .
Bubbles was  initially  kept at the Jackson family 's home in  encino  ,  लॉस  Angeles , but was  स्थानांतरित  to Neverland Ranch in 1988 .
There , he slept  in  a crib in Jackson 's  बेडरूम   ,  used  the  singer 's toilet , and ate candy in the Neverland movie theater .
In 2003  the   पब्लिक  learned  कि   ,  like all captive chimpanzees , Bubbles had matured into a large and aggressive adult  chimp  unsuitable as a companion animal .
He was sent to a California animal trainer , where he was reported to have attempted  आत्महत्या   .
When the trainer  shut  down his  आपरेशन   in  2004 , Bubbles was moved  to  the Center  लिये  Great Apes , a  अभयारण्य   in   wauchula  , Florida ,  जहाँ   he   रै  lived since 2005 .
Muse are an English  चट्टान   बैंड  from Teignmouth , Devon , which  formed  in 1994 .
The  बैंड  consists of school friends Matthew  bellamy  ( lead vocals , lead guitar  ,  piano  ,  keyboards  ,  keytar ) , Christopher Wolstenholme (  बास  , vocals , keyboards ,  लय  guitar , harmonica )  और  Dominic Howard ( drums , percussion , synthesisers  ,  sampling )  .
Since the  रिलीज  of their 2006 album Black  छेद  and  खुलासे  , keyboardist and  percussionist  Morgan Nicholls has  performed   सजीव  with the band  .
Muse are known for their  ऊर्जावान  and extravagant live performances and their fusion of many music genres , including space rock , progressive rock , alternative rock , heavy  मेटल  ,  शास्त्रीय  music  और  electronica .
Muse  have  released six  स्टुडियो   एल्बम  : Showbiz ( 1999 ) , Origin of  सममिति  ( 2001 )  ,  Absolution  (  2003 ) , Black Holes and Revelations  (   2006  )  ,  The Resistance (  2009  ) and The 2nd  विधि  ( 2012 )  .
They  have  also issued three live albums , Hullabaloo Soundtrack ( 2002 ) ,  जिससे  is  भी  a compilation of B-sides , Absolution Tour (  2005  )  ,   और  HAARP ( 2008 )  ,  which  दस्तावेज़  the  बैंड  's performances at Wembley Stadium in 2007 .
Black Holes  और   खुलासे  earned the  बैंड  a  पारा  Prize nomination and a third place finish in the NME Albums of the  साल   सूची  for 2006 .
चिंतन  have also won a collection  of  music  पुरस्कार   throughout  their history , including five MTV Europe Music  पुरस्कार  , six Q Awards , eight NME Awards , two Brit  पुरस्कार  —winning `` Best British Live  अधिनियम  ''  twice  , an MTV  वीडियो  Music  पुरस्कार  , four Kerrang !
Awards and an American Music  पुरस्कार   .
They were also nominated for five  ग्रैमी   पुरस्कार  , of which they won  बेहतरीन  Rock Album ,  लिये   उनके   पांचवां   स्टुडियो  album The Resistance ( 2009  )  .
Muse have sold over 15  लाख  albums worldwide .
Bloemfontein  (  ,  ;   डच  for ``  फव्वारा  of flowers  ''  ) is the capital city of the  फ़्री  State  प्रांत  of  दक्षिण  Africa ; and , as the judicial capital of  the  nation , one of South Africa 's  तीन  national capitals – the  अन्य  two being Cape Town  ,  the legislative  पूंजी  , and Pretoria , the administrative capital .
Bloemfontein is popularly  और  poetically known as  ``  the city  of  roses `` , owing to  the  abundance of these flowers and  the  annual rose festival  आयोजित  there .
The city 's  sesotho  name is  mangaung  , meaning `` place of cheetahs `` and it has been included in the Mangaung Local Municipality since 2000 .
Bloemfontein is situated on dry  घासभूमि  at , at  an   ऊँचाई   of  above  समुद्र  level .
The city is home to 369,568  निवासियों  , while the Mangaung Local Municipality has a population of  645,455  .

The meaning of life is a philosophical question concerning the significance  of  life or existence in general .
It can also be expressed in different forms , such as ``  क्यों  are we here  ?  `` , `` What is life  सब   परिचय  ? `` , and  ``  What is the purpose  of  existence ? ''
It has  महरूम   the  subject of much  philosophical  , scientific  ,  and theological speculation throughout history .
There have been a large number of proposed answers to  ये  questions from many different  सांस्कृतिक  and ideological backgrounds .
the  meaning of life  is  in the philosophical and religious conceptions of existence  ,  social ties ,  चेतना  , and happiness , and borders  on  many other issues , such as symbolic meaning , ontology , value ,  purpose  , ethics , good and evil , free will , the existence of one or multiple Gods , conceptions of God , the soul ,  और  the  आफ्टरलाइफ  .
Scientific contributions focus primarily  on  describing related empirical  तथ्य   परिचय  the universe , exploring the context and  पैरामीटर्स  concerning the  'how   '  of life  .
Science also  अध्ययन   और  can provide recommendations for the pursuit  of  well-being  और  a related conception  of   नैतिकता  .
An alternative , humanistic approach poses the question `` What is the meaning of my life ? ''
the   मान  of the question pertaining  to  the purpose  of  life may  coincide   साथ   the  achievement of ultimate reality , or  a  feeling of  oneness  , or even a feeling of  sacredness  .
परिवार  Guy creator  सेठ  MacFarlane also provides the voices of Peter  griffin  ,  stewie  Griffin ,  ब्रायन  Griffin , and  ग्लेन  Quagmire .
Family  guy   is   an  American animated  sitcom  that  सुविधाएँ   पाँच   प्रमुख  voice  अभिनेताओं   ,  and  numerous  regular cast and recurring guest  सितारों  .
the  principal voice cast  consists  of show creator Seth  macfarlane  , Alex Borstein  ,  Seth  ग्रीन  , Mila Kunis ( who replaced Lacey  chabert  after the  पहला  season ) and Mike Henry  और  now  ,  the new actor Beau Osborne .
Recurring voice  अभिनेताओं  include Patrick  warburton  , Adam West , John G.  ब्रेनन  , Nicole Sullivan and Jennifer Tilly , and repeat guest stars  शामिल  Phyllis Diller ,  चार्ल्स  Durning , Rush Limbaugh , and Phil LaMarr  .
Many cast  सदस्यों  provide voices for  अनेक  characters .
The voice actors ,  in  portraying  the  various character  personalities   on  the show , draw  प्रेरणा  from celebrities  और  pop culture .
Family  guy  characters have been played  by   अधिक  than one actor  ,   बाद   सदस्यों  of the show left the series  or   था  conflicting obligations .
Kunis was nominated for an Annie Award for voicing Meg Griffin in  the  season 5 episode ``  मुश्किल  Legal `` and MacFarlane has also won  an  Emmy Award for Outstanding Voice-Over Performance  और  an Annie Award for Best  आवाज़   एक्टिंग  in an Animated Television Production , though no other  डाल  member has won  an   पुरस्कार   लिये   उनके  work on the series .
