``   the  Princess and the Pea '' ( ; literal translation : `` The Princess on the Pea ''  )  is a literary  परी  tale  by   hans  Christian Andersen about a  यंग  woman whose royal identity  is  established  by  a test of  उसके  physical  संवेदनशीलता  .
The tale was  पहला  published  साथ  three others by Andersen  in  an inexpensive booklet on 8 May 1835 in Copenhagen by  c.a  . Reitzel .
Andersen had heard the story as a child , and it  संभावित   रै  its source in folk material , possibly originating from  स्वीडन   as  it is  अनजान  in the Danish oral tradition .
Neither ``  the  Princess and the  मटर  '' nor Andersen 's  अन्य  tales of 1835 were well received  by  Danish  आलोचकों  ,  जो  disliked their casual  ,  chatty  स्टाइल   ,  and  उनके  lack of morals .
In 1959 ``  the  Princess and the  मटर  '' was adapted to the musical stage in a production called Once Upon a  गद्दा  starring Carol  burnett  .
German Americans ( ) are citizens of the United States  जो   यहूद  either born in Germany or are of German ancestry .
They  comprise  about 50  लाख  people , making them the  largest  ancestry group  ahead  of Irish Americans  ,  African Americans  और  English Americans .
They comprise about 1/3 of the German diaspora all over the  संसार   .
None of  the  German states had New World colonies .
Not until the 1670s did the first significant  समूह  of German immigrants arrive in the British colonies , settling primarily in New York and Pennsylvania .
Immigration continued  in  very large  संख्याएँ  during the 19th century , with  कुछ  eight  लाख  arrivals from Germany .
They were pulled by the  आकर्षण  of  जमीन  and religious freedom ,  और  pushed out  of  Europe  by  shortages of land and religious or political  दमन  .
Many  arrived  seeking religious or political freedom  ,  others for  आर्थिक  opportunities  वृहद  than those  in  Europe , and others  बस  for the chance to start fresh in  the  New World .
The arrivals before 1850 were mostly farmers who sought out the  सबसे  productive land , where their intensive farming techniques would pay  बंद  .
After 1840  ,  many came to cities , where ``  germania  '' —German-speaking districts—soon  उभरा  .
German Americans  स्थापित  the first kindergartens  in  the United States , introduced the Christmas tree tradition  ,  and originated popular American foods  ऐसे  as  hot   कुत्तो  and  hamburgers  .
जर्मनी  American celebrations are held throughout  the   देश  , one of the  सबसे  well-known  होने  the  german-american  Steuben Parade in New York City , held every third Saturday in September .
There  हैं  also major annual events in Chicago , Cincinnati , Milwaukee , Pittsburgh , St.  लुई  and other cities .
Like many other immigrants that came to the United States ,  an  overwhelming number of people of  जर्मनी  or  आंशिक  German descent have essentially become Americanized .
The Preamble to the  संयुक्त  States Constitution  is  a brief introductory  बयान  of the Constitution 's  आधारभूत  purposes and guiding principles .
It states in general terms , and courts have referred to it as reliable evidence of , the Founding Fathers ' intentions regarding the Constitution 's meaning and what they hoped  the   संविधान  would achieve as it pertains to all of the people of the  संयुक्त  States .
As the phrase , `` we the  लोगों  '' suggests that the new  सरकारी  originates from the  लोगों  of  the  United States and it sets into motion a question as it pertains  to  that vast population concerning the  व्यक्तिगत  rights and equality  among  all people ; this can be seen most broadly in  the  divide between republicanism and social democracy .
The history of the Internet  began  with the  विकास  of electronic computers in the 1950s .
The public was first introduced to the  अवधारणाओं  that would lead to the Internet when  a   संदेश  was sent  over  the ARPANet from computer science Professor  लियोनार्ड   kleinrock  's laboratory  at  University of California , Los Angeles ( UCLA ) , after the second piece of network equipment was installed at Stanford Research Institute ( SRI  )   .
Packet switched networks such as ARPANET , Mark I at NPL  in  the UK ,  cyclades  , Merit Network  ,  Tymnet , and Telenet , were developed in the late 1960s and early 1970s using  a  variety of  प्रोटोकॉल  .
The  arpanet  in particular led  to   the  development of protocols for internetworking , in which multiple separate networks could be joined  साथ  into a network of  संजाल   .
In 1982 , the  अंतरजाल  protocol suite (  tcp/ip  ) was standardized , and consequently ,  the  concept of  a  world-wide network of interconnected TCP/IP networks ,  पुकारा   the  Internet , was introduced .
अभिगम  to the ARPANET was expanded  in   1981  when  the  National Science  न्यास  (  nsf   )   विकसित  the Computer Science Network (  csnet  ) and  again   in  1986 when NSFNET provided access to supercomputer sites in the United States from research and education organizations .
Commercial  अंतरजाल  service providers ( ISPs )  began  to emerge in the late 1980s and early 1990s .
the   arpanet  was decommissioned in 1990 .
The Internet was commercialized  in   1995  when NSFNET was decommissioned ,  निकालना   the  last restrictions on the use of the  अंतरजाल  to  carry  commercial traffic .
Since the mid-1990s  ,  the Internet has had  a  revolutionary impact on culture and commerce ,  सहित  the rise of near-instant  संचार  by  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक  mail , instant messaging , Voice over Internet Protocol  (  VoIP ) `` phone calls '' , two-way interactive  वीडियो  calls , and the World  चौड़ी  Web with its discussion forums ,  ब्लॉग  ,  सोशल   नेटवर्किंग  , and  ऑनलाइन  shopping  साइट  .
the   शोध  and education community continues to develop  और  use advanced networks such as NSF 's  बहुत  high  गति   रीढ़  Network Service  (   vbns  ) ,  internet2  ,  और  National LambdaRail .
Increasing amounts of data are  transmitted  at higher and  उच्चतर  speeds over fiber optic networks operating at  1-gbit/s  , 10-Gbit/s  ,  or  अधिक  .
The Internet 's takeover over  the  global  संचार   लैंडस्केप   थी  almost instant in historical terms : it only communicated 1  %   of  the  सूचना  flowing through two-way telecommunications networks in  the  year 1993 , already 51 %  by   2000  , and more than 97 % of the telecommunicated information  by  2007 .
Today the Internet continues to grow , driven by  कभी  greater amounts of online information , commerce  ,   entertainment  , and social networking .
Southwest Airlines Co. ( ) is a major U.S. airline and the world 's largest  low-cost   वाहक  , headquartered in Dallas ,  टेक्सास  .
It was established in 1967 and adopted its current name in 1971 .
The  एयरलाइन   रै  more than 46,000  कर्मचारी   और   operates   अधिक  than  3,400  flights per day .
As of June  5   ,  2011 , it carries the most domestic passengers of any U.S. airline  .
as  of April 2013 , Southwest Airlines has scheduled service to 84 destinations in 41 states and Puerto Rico .
Southwest Airlines  रै  solely operated  बोइंग  737s , except for a few  सालो  in the 1970s and  1980s  , when  it   संचालित  Boeing  727s  .
As of August 2012 , Southwest  is  the largest  ऑपरेटर  of the  737   विश्वव्यापी  with  over  550 in service , each operating an average of six flights per day .
in  May 2011  ,   the   एयरलाइन  acquired AirTran  एयरवेज़   ,  with integration of the carriers expected  to  be complete by 2014  .
On March 1 ,  2012  , the company  थी  issued a single operating  प्रमाणपत्र  , technically becoming one airline .
रोलिंग  Rock is a 4.6 % abv pale lager launched in 1939 by the Latrobe Brewing  कम्पनी  .
Although founded as a local  बियर  in Western Pennsylvania , it was  marketed   aggressively  and eventually became a national product .
The brand was sold to Anheuser-Busch of  st.   लुई  , Missouri , in mid  2006   ,  which transferred brewing operations to New Jersey .
बेनेडिक्ट  XVI  (  ,  ,  ; born  जोसेफ  Aloisius  ratzinger  on 16 April 1927 ) is Pope emeritus of the Catholic Church  .
he  served as Pope from  2005  to 2013 .
In that position , he was both the leader of the Catholic Church and Sovereign of the Vatican City State .
Benedict was elected on 19 April 2005 in  a  papal conclave , celebrated his Papal Inauguration  द्रव्यमान   on  24  अप्रैल  2005 , and took possession of his cathedral  ,  the Archbasilica of St. John Lateran  ,   on  7 May 2005  .
Ordained as  a  priest in 1951  in  his native Bavaria , Ratzinger established  खुद  as a highly regarded university theologian by the late 1950s and was appointed a full  प्राध्यापक  in  1958  .
After  a   long   करियर   as  an academic  ,  serving  as  a professor of theology at  अनेक  German  universities—the  last being the University  of  Regensburg ,  जहाँ   he  served as Vice  अध्यक्ष   of  the university in 1976 and 1977—he was  नियुक्त  Archbishop of  म्यूनिख   और  Freising and cardinal by Pope  पॉल  VI in 1977  ,  an unusual  प्रमोशन  for someone with little  लुभावने   अनुभव  .
in  1981 , he settled in Rome when  he  became  prefect  of the Congregation for the  doctrine   of  the Faith  ,  one  of  the most important dicasteries of the Roman Curia .
From  2002  until his election as pope  ,  he was also Dean of the College of Cardinals , and  as  such  ,  the primus inter pares  among  the cardinals .
Prior to becoming pope ,  he  was ``  a  major figure on  the  Vatican stage  लिये  a quarter  of  a century '' as `` one of  the  most respected , influential and controversial members of  the  College  of  Cardinals '' ;  he  had an influence ``  दूसरी  to none when it  आए   to  setting  गिरिजाघर   प्राथमिकताएं   और  directions '' as one of Pope John  पॉल  II 's  closest  confidants .
he  was  originally  a liberal theologian , but adopted  रूढ़िवादी  views after 1968 .
उसके  prolific  कृतियाँ  defend traditional Catholic  doctrine  and values .
During his papacy  ,   बेनेडिक्ट  XVI advocated a return to fundamental Christian values to  काउंटर  the increased secularisation of many Western countries .
He views relativism  's   denial  of objective truth , and  the  denial of moral truths in  particular  ,  as  the  सेंट्रल  problem  of  the 21st  सदी  .
He taught  the  importance of both  the  Catholic Church and an  समझना  of  परमेश्वर  's redemptive love .
Pope Benedict also revived  a  number of traditions  सहित  elevating the Tridentine Mass to a  अधिक  prominent position .
He renewed  the  relationship between the Catholic Church and art , viewing the use of beauty as a path to the sacred  ,  promoted the use of Latin , and reintroduced traditional papal  garments  , for which reason he was called `` the pope of aesthetics '' .
He has been described as `` the main intellectual force in the Church ''  चूंकि  the mid-1980s .
Several of Pope  बेनेडिक्ट  's students from his academic career are also prominent churchmen today and confidantes of him  ,  notably Christoph Schönborn .
On 11 February  2013  , Pope Benedict announced his resignation  in  a speech  in   लैटिन   पहले   the  cardinals , citing a `` lack of strength  of   दिमाग  and body  ''  due  to  his advanced age .
His  इस्तीफा  became  प्रभावी  on  28  February 2013 .
He is the first pope to resign since Pope  ग्रेगरी  XII in 1415 , and the first to do so  on  his own initiative since Pope Celestine V in 1294 .
As pope emeritus , Benedict retains the style of His Holiness , and the title of Pope  ,  and will continue to dress in the  papal  colour of white .
he  was  succeeded  by  पोप  Francis on 13 March  2013  , and  he  moved into the newly renovated Mater Ecclesiae  मठ  for his retirement on 2 May 2013..

Stereoscopy  (  also called stereoscopics or 3D imaging )  is   a  technique for creating or enhancing  the  illusion of depth in an image by  अर्थात्   of  stereopsis  लिये  binocular vision .
the  word stereoscopy derives from the Greek `` στερεός '' ( stereos )  ,   ``  firm ,  ठोस   ''   +  `` σκοπέω '' ( skopeō  )  , `` to  dekh  ''  ,  `` to see '' .
Most stereoscopic methods present two offset images separately to  the  left and right eye  of  the  दर्शक  .
These two-dimensional images are then  संयुक्त  in the  दिमाग   to  give the perception of 3D depth  .
इस  technique is distinguished from 3D  प्रदर्शक  that display an image  in  three full  आयाम  , allowing the  निरीक्षक   to   बढ़ाएँ   सूचना  about  the  3-dimensional objects being  प्रदर्शित  by  सिर   और  eye  आंदोलनों  .
John Adams ( October 30 ,  1735   (  O.S . October 19 , 1735 ) – July 4 ,  1826  ) was the second president of  the   संयुक्त   राज्य  (  1797–1801  )  ,  having earlier  परोसा  as the first  वाइस  president of the United States .
An  अमरीकी  Founding Father , he was a statesman , diplomat , and a  अग्रणी  advocate of American  स्वतंत्रता  from Great Britain .
Well  शिक्षित   ,   he  was an Enlightenment political theorist who promoted  republicanism   और  wrote  prolifically  about his often  seminal   विचार  , both in published works and in letters to his wife and key  adviser  Abigail as  खूब   as  to other Founding Fathers .
Adams  आए  to  prominence  in  the  early stages of the American  क्रान्ति  .
a  lawyer and public figure  in   बोस्टन  ,  as  a  प्रतिनिधि  from Massachusetts  to  the Continental Congress  ,  he played a leading role in persuading Congress to declare  स्वतंत्रता  .
He assisted Thomas Jefferson in  drafting  the  घोषणा  of Independence in 1776 ,  और  was its primary  एडवोकेट  in the Congress .
Later ,  as   a  diplomat in Europe , he  helped  negotiate the eventual  सलाम  treaty  साथ  Great Britain , and was responsible  लिये  obtaining  vital  governmental loans from  एम्सटर्डम  bankers .
A  राजनैतिक  theorist  और  historian , Adams largely wrote the Massachusetts Constitution in 1780  ,  which together with his earlier Thoughts  on  Government , influenced American political thought .
One  of  his greatest roles  थी  as a judge  of  character : in 1775 ,  he  nominated George Washington to be commander-in-chief , and 25 years later nominated John Marshall to be Chief Justice  of  the United  राज्य  .
Adams ' revolutionary credentials secured him two terms as George Washington 's vice  अध्यक्ष  and his own election in 1796 as  the  second president  .
दौरान  his one term , he encountered ferocious attacks by the  jeffersonian  Republicans , as  खूब  as the dominant faction in his own Federalist Party  led  by  उसके  bitter enemy Alexander Hamilton .
Adams  हस्ताक्षरित  the controversial Alien and Sedition Acts  ,  and built up the  फौज  and navy especially in the face of an undeclared naval war ( called the `` Quasi-War `` )  साथ  France  ,  1798–1800  .
the  major accomplishment  of  his presidency was his peaceful resolution of the  विरोध   in  the face of Hamilton 's  विपक्ष  .
in   1800   ,   एडम्स  was defeated for re-election by  थामस  Jefferson  और  retired to Massachusetts .
He later resumed  उसके  friendship with Jefferson .
He  और   उसके  wife , Abigail Adams  ,  founded an  संपन्नता  family line  of   राजनेता  , diplomats  ,  and  इतिहासकारों  now referred  to   as  the Adams  राजनैतिक   परिवार  .
Adams was the father of  जॉन   क्विंसी   एडम्स  , the sixth  अध्यक्ष  of the  संयुक्त   राज्य  .
His  उपलब्धियाँ  have received greater  मान्यता  in modern times , though his contributions were not initially as  मनाये   as  those of other Founders .
एडम्स  was  the  first U.S.  अध्यक्ष  to reside  in   the  building that eventually became known as the White House .
The United States ten-dollar bill ( $ 10 ) is  a  denomination  of  United States  करेंसी  .
The first U.S. Secretary  of  the Treasury ( 1789–95 ) , Alexander Hamilton , is  फिलहाल  featured on the obverse of the bill , while the  u.S.  Treasury Building is featured on the reverse  .
( Hamilton is one of two  non-presidents  featured on currently issued U.S. bills .
The other is Benjamin Franklin , on the $  100   विधेयक  .
हैमिल्टन  is one of only four people featured on U.S. paper currency ( 1861 to the present ) who was not  born   in   the   महाद्वीपीय  United States , as  he  was from the West Indies .
The others  हैं  : Albert Gallatin ,  स्विट्ज़रलैंड  (  $  500 1862/63 Legal Tender ) ; George Meade , Spain ( $ 1,000 1890/91  राजकोष  Note ) ; and Robert Morris ,  इंग्लैण्ड  (  $   1,000  1862/63 Legal Tender ; $ 10  1878/80  Silver Certificate  )   .
in   जोड   ,  Kamehameha I , appears  on  the  2008   हवाई  state quarter .  )
सब   $  10 bills  जारी  today are Federal Reserve  टीप  .
The  ब्यूरो  of  नक्काशी  and Printing says the  औसत  life of a $ 10 bill  in  circulation is 18 months  पहले  it is replaced  due  to wear .
Approximately 6 % of all US banknotes printed in 2009 were  $  10 bills  .
Ten dollar bills are delivered by Federal Reserve Banks in  पीला  straps .
The source of the face on the  $  10  विधेयक  is John Trumbull ’s 1805 portrait of Hamilton  कि  belongs to the portrait collection of New York City Hall .
The  $  10  विधेयक  is the only U.S. paper currency in circulation in which the portrait faces to  the   बाएँ  ( the  $  100,000  विधेयक   प्रदर्शित   a  portrait of  वुडरो  Wilson facing to the left , but was used only for intra-government transactions ) .
A rider on a Yamaha  waverunner  XL performing a high-speed  फेरे  .
A jetboat  is  a boat propelled by  a  jet  of  water ejected from the back of  the  craft .
Unlike a  powerboat  or  motorboat  that uses a propeller in the water below or behind the boat , a jetboat draws the  जल  from under the  नाव  into a pump inside  the  boat  ,  then expels it through a nozzle at the stern .
Jetboats were originally designed by Sir William Hamilton ( who developed a waterjet  in  1954 ) for  आपरेशन   in  the fast-flowing and shallow rivers of  नई   जीलैंड   ,  specifically to  overcome  the problem  of   propellers  striking  रॉक्स   in   ऐसे   waters  .
पिछला   कोशिशें  at waterjet  नोदन   था   बहुत  short lifetimes ,  generally  due to the inefficient design of the units and the fact that they offered few advantages  over  conventional  propellers  .
Unlike these previous waterjet developments , such as  campini   's  and the  hanley  Hydrojet  ,  Hamilton had  a  specific  need   लिये   a   नोदन  system to operate  in   very-shallow  water , and  the   waterjet   proved  to  be  the ideal solution  .
From this , the popularity  of  the jet unit and jetboat increased rapidly .
Through further  developments   ,  it was found  the  waterjet offered  अनेक  other  लाभ  over propellers for a wide range of  पोत  types , and as such ,  waterjets  are used widely today for many high-speed vessels , including  यात्री  ferries , rescue craft , patrol boats and  offshore  supply vessels .
Jetboats are  अत्यधिक  maneuverable , and many  can  , from full speed , be reversed and brought to a stop within little more than their  अपना  length ,  in  a maneuver  ज्ञात  as a `` crash stop '' .
The well  ज्ञात  Hamilton  फेरे  or `` jet spin '' is a  high-speed  maneuvre where the boat 's engine throttle is  काटें   ,  the steering is turned sharply  और  the  throttle  opened again ,  causing   the  boat to spin quickly around with a large  स्प्रे  of water .
वहीँ  is  no  engineering limit  to   the   आकार  of  jetboats  , though the validity of their  उपयोग  depends a lot on the type of application .
Classic prop-drives are generally more efficient and  किफायती  at low speeds , up to about , but as boat speed increases beyond this , the extra hull resistance generated by struts , rudders , shafts  (  etc .  )   अर्थात्  waterjets are more  कुशल   in  the  20-50  knot range ( up to ) .
Also , in situations with very large propellers turning  at   slow  speeds ( such  as  tug  नौकाएँ  ) ,  the  equivalent size  waterjet  would be  too  big to be  व्यावहारिक  .
लिये  these reasons , the vast majority of waterjet  इकाई  are installed  in   high-speed  vessels and  in  particular situations  जहाँ   उथले  draught , maneuverability , and load flexibility are main concerns .
the  biggest jet-driven  बरतन  are found in military use or the high-speed passenger/car ferry industry .
South Africa 's  s  (  लगभग  long  )  are  the  biggest  jet-propelled  vessels  so   दूर  .
Even these German-built vessels are capable of performing `` crash stops '' .
Uveitis is broadly  पारिभाषित   as  inflammation  of  the uvea .
The uvea  consists  of the middle ,  pigmented  , vascular structures of  the  eye and includes the iris , ciliary body , and choroid .
Uveitis  requires  an urgent referral and  thorough   परिक्षा  by an ophthalmologist or optometrist along with urgent treatment  to  control the inflammation .
eric   ``  E . ''
Murphy  is  a fictional  अक्षर  on  the  comedy-drama television series Entourage .
He is  निभाई  by Kevin Connolly .
The  जगमगाता  is a 1980 psychological horror film produced and directed by  स्टेनली   kubrick  , co-written with  उपन्यासकार  Diane Johnson , and starring Jack Nicholson , Shelley  duvall  , Scatman  crothers   ,  and Danny Lloyd .
the  film is  आधारित  on  the   स्टीफन   किंग  novel The Shining .
A writer ,  जोकर  Torrance  ,   takes  a job  as  an off-season caretaker at an isolated hotel .
His  यंग  son  possesses  psychic abilities  और   is  able to  देखिए  things from the past and future  ,  such as the ghosts who inhabit the hotel .
Soon  बाद  settling  in  , the family is  फंस  in  the  hotel by a snowstorm ,  और  Jack gradually becomes influenced by a supernatural presence  ;  he descends into madness and attempts to murder his wife  और  son .
Unlike previous Kubrick films  ,  which developed an audience gradually by building on  word-of-mouth   ,  The Shining was released as a mass-market film , opening  at  first in  बस  two cities  on  Memorial Day  ,  then nationwide a month later .
Although initial response to the film  थी  mixed , later  नाजुक  assessment  थी   अधिक  favorable and it is now  viewed  as a  क्लासिक  of the horror  विधा  .
Film director  मार्टिन  Scorsese , writing in The Daily Beast , ranked it as one  of  the 11 scariest horror movies of all time .
Film critics , film  विद्यार्थी  , and  kubrick  's producer  ,  Jan Harlan  ,  have remarked  on  the  विशाल  influence the film has had  on   लोकप्रिय   संस्कृति   .
The initial  यूरोपीय  release of The Shining was  25  minutes shorter than  the  American version ,  हासिल   by  removing most  of  the scenes  लेने   प्लेस  outside the  environs  of the hotel .
Patio Cola Bottle
Patio Diet  कोला  was a brand of diet soda introduced by Pepsi in  1963  .
It  थी  created in response to Diet Rite Cola , which was  the  first diet cola on the  मार्केट  .
Fitness  प्रवर्तक  Debbie Drake  थी  Patio Diet Cola 's spokesperson .
In 1964 , Patio  released   नारंगी  , grape  ,  and root beer flavors  .
इस  flavor line was not meant  to  compete with brands  जैसे   नारंगी   crush  , but rather fill out  the   लकीर  .
Patio sodas were  उपलब्धियाँ  in the cold-bottle market : grocery and mom-and-pop stores .
विज्ञापन  for Patio was comparatively scarce ; at  the  time ,  bottlers  were regionally franchised , and  सम्बन्धित   विज्ञापन  was necessarily local .
In 1964 , Patio diet  कोला  became Diet Pepsi .
The newly branded diet soda  थी  advertised alongside Pepsi with the tagline `` Pepsi either way '' , which replaced the  स्लोगन  `` Dances  साथ  flavor ''  .
the  short life span of Patio Diet cola makes it a great  जोड   लिये  bottle collectors .
Most of the remaining Patio  लकीर  of flavors were phased out  by   the  early 1970s , while  a   few  survived until the mid 70s
Infrastructure is basic physical and organizational structures needed  लिये  the operation of a society or enterprise , or the services  और   सुविधाएं  necessary for an economy to function .
It  can  be generally  पारिभाषित  as  the   नियत  of interconnected structural elements that  provide  framework supporting an entire structure of development  .
It is an important  पद  for judging a country or region 's development .
The  पद  typically refers to the technical structures that support  a   समाज   ,  such as roads , bridges ,  जल  supply , sewers  ,   विद्युत  grids ,  दूरसंचार   ,  and so forth , and can be defined  as  `` the physical  components  of interrelated systems providing commodities and services essential to enable , sustain ,  or  enhance societal living conditions . ''
Viewed functionally , infrastructure  facilitates  the  उत्पादन  of goods and services , and also the distribution of  समाप्त  products to markets , as well as basic social  सेवाएं  such as schools and hospitals ;  लिये  example , roads enable the transport of raw  सामग्री   to  a factory .
In military  parlance  , the term  refers  to the buildings  और  permanent installations necessary for the support , redeployment , and operation of military forces .
To make it  सरल  , infrastructure is anything  कि  is needed everyday  ,  an everyday  मद   .
A graphical representation of the  आदर्श  human karyotype
Mitochondrial DNA .
Human genetic variation is the genetic differences both within and among populations .
There may be multiple variants of any given gene  in  the  इंसान  population (  जीनों  ) ,  अग्रणी  to polymorphism .
अनेक  genes are not  बहुरूपी  , meaning that only a single allele is present  in  the population  :  the gene is then said to  be  fixed .
No two humans are genetically identical .
Even monozygotic  जुड़वा  , who develop from one zygote , have infrequent genetic differences due  to  mutations occurring during development  और  gene copy number variation .
Differences  between  individuals , even  closely  related  individuals  , are the key  to   तकनीकों  such  as  genetic fingerprinting .
Alleles occur at different  बारंबारता  in different human populations  ,  with populations  कि   हैं   अधिक  geographically and ancestrally remote tending  to  differ  अधिक  .
Causes  of  differences  between  individuals include the exchange  of   जीनों  during meiosis and various mutational events .
There are at least two reasons why genetic  विभिन्नता  exists  between   populations  .
Natural selection may confer an  अनुकूली  advantage to individuals in a specific environment if an allele  provides  a competitive advantage .
Alleles under  चयन   हैं   संभावित   to   occur  only in those  भौगोलिक  regions where they confer  an  advantage .
The second main  कारण  of genetic variation is due to the high degree  of  neutrality of most mutations .
सबसे   mutations  do  नहीं  appear  to  have any selective effect  एक  way or the other  on  the organism .
The main  कारण  is genetic drift , this  is   the  effect of  यादृच्छिक   परिवर्तन  in the  जीन  pool .
In humans ,  संस्थापक  effect and past small population size ( increasing the likelihood  of   जेनेटिक  drift ) may have had  an  important influence in neutral differences between populations .
the  theory that humans recently migrated out of Africa supports this .
the   पढ़ाई  of human  जेनेटिक  variation has both  विकासवादी   significance  and medical applications  .
It can help  वैज्ञानिकों  understand  प्राचीन   इंसान  population migrations  as  well  as  how  अलग  human groups are biologically related to one  another  .
For  आयुर्विज्ञान  , study of human  जेनेटिक  variation  may  be important because some  disease-causing  alleles  occur  more often in  लोगों  from specific  भौगोलिक  regions .
New findings show that  प्रत्येक   इंसान  has on average 60  नई  mutations compared  to  their  अभिभावक  .
अलावा  from mutations , many  जीनों  that may have  aided   इंसानो   in   प्राचीन  times plague  इंसानो  today .
लिये   उदाहरण   ,  it is  suspected  that genes  कि  allow  इंसानो   to  more efficiently process  खाना  are those that make people  susceptible  to obesity and diabetes  आज  .
Tea  पार्टी  protesters on the West Lawn of  the  U.S. Capitol and the  नेशनल   मॉल  at the Taxpayer March on Washington on September  12   ,  2009 .
The Tea Party movement  is  an American political movement that advocates strict adherence  to  the United States Constitution  ,  reducing U.S. government spending and taxes , and reduction of the  u.S.  national debt and  संघीय  budget deficit .
The  गति  has been called partly conservative , partly libertarian  ,   और   partly  populist .
The movement  रै  sponsored protests and supported political  उम्मीदवार  since 2009 .
The name of  the  movement is derived  इससे  the  बोस्टन   चाय   पार्टी  of 1773 , an iconic event in  अमरीकी  history .
Anti-tax protesters  in  the United  राज्य  have often referred to  the  original Boston Tea Party for inspiration .
References  to  the  बोस्टन  Tea Party were part of Tax Day protests held throughout the 1990s and earlier .
by  2001 , a  कस्टम  had developed among  कुछ  conservative activists of mailing tea bags to  विधायक  and other officials as  a  symbolic act  .
The currencies of  प्यूर्टो  Rico closely  follow  the  ऐतिहासिक  development of Puerto Rico .
As a colony  of  Spain and  the   संयुक्त  States , Puerto Rico was granted the  उपयोग  of both  विदेशी  and provincial  मुद्राएँ  .
Following  the  Spanish colonization  in  1502 , Puerto Rico became an important port , with its own supply of gold .
However  ,   as  the mineral reserves  भागा   खाली  within  the   सदी  , the archipelago  's  economy suffered .
The Spanish  क्राउन   जारी  the Situado  mexicano  , which meant that a  semi-regular   शिपमेंट  of  सुनहरा  from  the  Viceroyalty  of  New Spain would  be   भेजा  to  the   द्वीप  , as  a  way  to  provide economic support .
Between 1636 and 1637 , Philip IV of Spain imposed a  कर  which had to  be   सशुल्क  using a revenue stamp .
प्रेरित  by this ,  प्यूर्टो  Rico began producing banknotes in 1766 , becoming the first colony to print  8-  real  banknotes  in the  स्पेनी  Empire  और  which  in   the  Spanish government 's approval of subsequent issues .
the  situado was discontinued during the  19th   सदी   ,   बनाना   an  economic crisis  ,  as a result of  मैक्सिको  gaining its independence from Spain .
Salvador Meléndez Bruna , the colonial governor in office , ordered  the  issue of provincial banknotes , creating the Puerto  rican  peso .
However , printing of these banknotes  ceased  after 1815  .
During  the  following decades  ,  foreign coins became the  फैली  currency  .
In the 1860s and  1870s  , banknotes reemerged .
On February 1 , 1890 , the Banco  español  de Puerto Rico was inaugurated and  began   issuing   banknotes  .
The bank designed  चार  series and placed three in circulation under  स्पेनी   नियम  .
In 1895 , a Royal Decree ordered the production  of   प्रांतीय  peso coins .
On August 13 ,  1898   ,  the Spanish-American War ended with Spain  ceding   प्यूर्टो   रीको  to the  संयुक्त  States .
the  Banco Español de Puerto Rico was renamed  बैंको  of Porto Rico and issued  बिल्स  equivalent to the United States dollar ,  बनाना  the Puerto Rican  डालर  .
In 1902 , the First National Bank of Porto Rico  जारी  banknotes in  a  parallel manner .
Two more series  यहूद  issued until 1913 .
बाद  Puerto Rico 's economy and monetary system was fully integrated  into  the United States  '  economic  और  monetary system , the Puerto  rican  dollars were  redeemed  for  those  issued by the  संयुक्त   राज्य  Treasury .
the  peso and dollar have been followed by other contemporary issues , including commemorative banknotes  ,  private currency ,  और  a  क्वार्टर  coin  designed   साथ  Fort San Felipe del  morro  in the face  .
Pepsi ( stylized  in  lowercase as pepsi , formerly stylized in  अपरकेस  as PEPSI ) is a carbonated soft drink that is  उत्पादित  and  manufactured  by PepsiCo  .
Created and developed in 1893 and introduced as  ब्रैड  's Drink , it was renamed as Pepsi-Cola on August  28   ,   1898  , then  to  Pepsi in 1961 .
The Book  of  Ezekiel  is  the third  of  the Latter Prophets in  the  Hebrew  बाइबल  , following  the  books of Isaiah and Jeremiah and  preceding  the  किताब  of the Twelve .
( The  अनुक्रम  is somewhat different in the Christian Old Testament  )   .
It derives its name  इससे  , and records  the  visions of  ,   the  6th century BC priest and prophet Ezekiel .
according  to the book  ,  the prophet  ,  exiled in  बाबुल  , experienced a series of seven visions  दौरान   the  22 years from 593 to 571  bc  ,  a  period  जिससे  spans the final destruction of Jerusalem in 586 .
The visions  ,  and the book , are structured around three themes  :   (  1 ) judgment on Israel  (  chapters 1-24  )  ; (  2  ) judgment on the nations ( chapters 25-32 ) ; and future blessings for Israel ( chapters 33-48 ) .
नई  Orleans  (   or  ,  locally  or ;  )   is  a major United  राज्य  port and the largest city and metropolitan area in the state of Louisiana .
The population of the city was 343,829  as  of  the  2010 U.S. Census .
The New Orleans metropolitan area ( New  orleans–metairie–kenner  Metropolitan Statistical  क्षेत्रफल  ) had  a   जनसांख्यिकी  of  1,167,764  in 2010 and was the 46th largest in the United States .
The New  orleans–metairie–bogalusa   संयुक्त  Statistical  क्षेत्रफल  , a larger trading  क्षेत्रफल  , had a 2010 population of 1,214,932  .
The city is named after Orléans  ,   a   नगर  located on the Loire River in Centre , France , and is well known for  इसके  distinct French Creole architecture , as well as its cross-cultural and multilingual heritage .
New Orleans  is   भी  famous for its cuisine , music ( particularly as the birthplace of jazz ) , and its annual  जश्न  and festivals , most notably Mardi Gras .
The city  is  often referred to  as  the `` most unique '' in America .
New  ऑरलियन्स   is  located  in  southeastern Louisiana ,  straddling  the Mississippi River .
The city and Orleans Parish (  )  are .
the  city and parish are bounded by the parishes  of  St. Tammany  to  the north , St. Bernard  to  the east  ,  Plaquemines to  the  south and Jefferson to the south and west .
Lake Pontchartrain  ,  part of  जिससे  is included in  the  city limits  ,  lies to  the  north and  झील   borgne  lies to the east .
The National Birth Control League was a birth control organization in the United States .
It was founded in  कूच  1915 by  मरियम  Dennett , Clara Gruening Stillman  और  Jessie Ashley .
Its  प्रमुख  purpose  थी  to  overturn   the  laws which banned contraceptives  इससे  the U.S. mails  .
Campaigns were mounted in New York , but in 1919  the   लीग  was disbanded and reformed into the Voluntary  parenthood  League .
Cancer  ,  known medically  as   a  malignant neoplasm ,  is  a broad group of various diseases  ,   सब  involving unregulated cell growth .
In cancer , cells divide and grow  uncontrollably  , forming malignant tumors , and  invade  nearby parts of the  देह  .
The cancer may also spread to  अधिक  distant parts  of  the  देह  through the lymphatic system or  bloodstream   .
Not all tumors are cancerous .
benign  tumors do not grow  uncontrollably  ,  do  not invade neighboring tissues , and do not  स्प्रेड   throughout  the body .
There are  over  200 different known cancers  कि  afflict humans .
Determining what causes cancer  is  complex .
Many things are known to increase  the  risk of cancer , including tobacco use , certain infections , radiation ,  कमी  of physical activity , obesity , and environmental pollutants .
These can directly damage genes or combine with existing genetic faults within cells to  कारण  the disease .
Approximately five  to   टेन  percent  of  cancers are entirely hereditary .
Cancer  can  be detected  in  a number of  तरीके  , including the presence of certain signs and symptoms , screening tests , or medical imaging .
एकबार  a  संभावित  cancer is detected it  is  diagnosed  by  microscopic examination of a tissue sample .
Cancer is usually treated with  कीमोथेरेपी  , radiation  चिकित्सा  and  सर्जरी  .
The chances of surviving the disease vary greatly by the type and location of the cancer  और  the extent of  बीमारी  at the start of treatment .
While cancer can affect  लोगों  of all  आयु  , and a few  प्रकार  of cancer  हैं   अधिक  common in children , the risk of developing cancer generally increases with  आयु  .
In 2007  ,  cancer  caused  about  13  % of all human deaths worldwide  (   7.9  million  )  .
Rates are rising  as  more people live to an  बूढ़ा   आयु  and  as  mass lifestyle changes occur in the  विकासशील  world .

Skiing  is   a  recreational activity and competitive sport in which the participant attaches long runners or skis to  बूट  or shoes on the feet and uses them to travel  on  top of snow .
Aside from recreation and  प्रतियोगिता  , skiing has been used  लिये   सैन्य  purposes and even travelling in areas  कि  experience heavy snowfall .
Many types of competitive skiing  कार्यक्रम  are recognized  by  the International  ओलम्पिक  Committee  ,  and the International Ski Federation .
John Maynard Keynes ,  1st  Baron Keynes  ,  CB , FBA  (  ; 5 June 1883  –  21 April 1946 ) was a British economist whose  विचार  have  fundamentally  affected the  सिद्धान्त  and practice  of   आधुनिक  macroeconomics , and informed the economic policies of governments  .
he  built on and greatly refined earlier work  on   the  causes of  कारोबार  cycles , and is widely considered to  be  one  of  the founders of modern macroeconomics and  the  most  influential  economist of the 20th century .
उसके  ideas are the basis for the school of thought  ज्ञात   as  Keynesian economics , as well  as  its  विभिन्न  offshoots  .
In many ways  ,  subsequent developments in  20th   सदी  economics can be viewed as either building on  keynes   '  ideas or reacting against them .
In  the  1930s , Keynes spearheaded a revolution in economic thinking  ,  overturning the older ideas of  neoclassical  economics  कि   आयोजित  that free markets would  ,  in the short  to  medium term ,  automatically  provide full employment , as long as workers were flexible  in  their  मजदूरी  demands  .
Keynes instead  argued   कि  aggregate demand determined the overall level of economic activity ,  और   कि  inadequate  कुल  demand could lead to  prolonged  periods of  ऊँची  unemployment .
he  advocated the use of fiscal and monetary  उपायों   to   mitigate  the adverse  प्रभाव   of   आर्थिक  recessions and depressions .
following  the  outbreak   of  the Second World War  ,   keynes  's ideas concerning economic policy were adopted by leading Western economies .
In 1942 , Keynes was awarded a hereditary peerage  as  Baron Keynes of Tilton in the County of Sussex  .
Keynes died in  1946  , but during  the  1950s and 1960s the  कामयाबी  of Keynesian  अर्थशास्त्र  resulted in almost all capitalist governments  adopting   इसके  policy  सुझाव  .
Keynes 's influence waned in  the  1970s , partly as  a  result of problems that  began  to afflict the  anglo-american   economies  from the start of the decade , and partly because of critiques  इससे   मिल्टन  Friedman and other  अर्थशास्त्रियों  who were pessimistic about the ability of governments to regulate the business cycle with fiscal policy .
However , the advent of  the  global financial crisis in 2007 caused  a  resurgence  in  Keynesian thought .
Keynesian economics provided  the   सैद्धांतिक  underpinning for economic policies undertaken in response to the crisis by Presidents George  W.  Bush and Barack  ओबामा  of  the  United States ,  प्रधान  Minister  गॉर्डन  Brown  of  the United  किंगडम   ,  and other heads of  सरकारें  .
In  1999  , Time magazine included  keynes  in  उनके  list of the 100 most important and influential people of  the  20th century , commenting that  :  `` His  कट्टरपंथी  idea that governments should  खर्च  money they do  n't  have  may   have  saved capitalism . ''
In addition to being an economist  ,  Keynes was also a  सिविल  servant , a  निदेशक  of the British Eugenics Society , a director of  the   बैंको  of England , a patron  of  the  कला   और  an art collector  ,  a part of the Bloomsbury Group of intellectuals , an advisor to several charitable trusts ,  a  writer , a philosopher , a  निजी   निवेशकों  , and a  किसान  .
This 1768 parchment ( 612×502 mm ) by Jekuthiel Sofer emulated the  1675  Ten Commandments at the  एम्सटर्डम  Esnoga synagogue .
The Ten Commandments  ,   भी  known as the Decalogue  ,  are  a  set of biblical  कानून  relating to ethics and worship , which play a fundamental role in Judaism , Islam and Christianity  .
They include instructions  to  worship only God , to  रखना   the  sabbath holy and prohibitions against idolatry , blasphemy ,  हत्या  , theft  ,  deception and adultery .
Different groups follow slightly different traditions for interpreting and  क्रमांकन   उन्हें  .
the  Ten Commandments  appear  twice  in  the Hebrew Bible  ,  in  the  books of Exodus and  deuteronomy  .
According to the story  in  Exodus  ,  God inscribed them on  दो   स्टोन   टैबलेट  , which he gave  to  Moses on Mount  sinai  .
Modern  स्कॉलरशिप   रै   मिला  likely influences in Hittite and  mesopotamian  laws  और   treaties  ,  लकिन  is divided over exactly when the Ten Commandments  यहूद  written and who  लिखा   उन्हें  .
The discography of the English alternative rock band The Smiths consists of four  स्टुडियो  albums , one extended play  (  EP  )  ,  एक  live album , ten compilation albums  ,  twenty singles  ,  one video  एल्बम  and fourteen music videos  on  the  अशिष्ट  Trade , Sire and  wea   रिकार्ड  labels .
The band was formed in 1982 in Manchester by  vocalist  Morrissey , guitarist  जॉनी  Marr , bass player  एंडी  Rourke and drummer Mike Joyce .
Despite being championed by BBC Radio 1  डिस्क  jockey John Peel , the band 's debut single , `` Hand  in  Glove `` ( May 1983 ) ,  विफल  to chart .
Its follow-up , `` This Charming Man `` (  अक्तूबर  1983 ) ,  मिले  with critical acclaim and  पहुँचे  number twenty-five on the UK Singles Chart .
The Smiths ' cult status was followed by mainstream success in 1984 ,  as  they reached  क्रमांक  twelve in the UK  साथ  the ``  कया  Difference Does It Make  ?  `` single and  पहुँचे  number two on the UK Albums Chart with their debut  एल्बम  ,  the  Smiths ( 1984 ) .
उनके  next three singles all reached the top twenty of  the  charts in the UK , helping  to  consolidate their previous chart success .
The next studio album , Meat Is  हत्या   (   1985  ) , reached the top  of  the British charts ; however , the  तभी  single to be released from the album , `` That Joke Is  n't  Funny  anymore  `` ( 1985 ) , failed  to  break the UK Top  40  .
Returning to form  ,   the  Smiths ' next six singles all reached the higher than number  तीस  in  the  UK and  उनके   तीसरा  album , The Queen Is  मुर्दे  ( 1986 ) , reached number  दो  in the UK  .
despite  the band 's chart  कामयाबी  , Marr  बाएँ  the group in August 1987 due to a strained relationship with Morrissey .
Failing  to  find a replacement , The Smiths disbanded by the time  उनके  final studio album ,  strangeways  , Here We Come , was released in  सितंबर  that year  .
Strangeways ,  यहाँ  We Come reached number two in the UK and became the band 's highest-charting  रिलीज  in  the  United States when it reached number fifty-five  on  the  बिलबोर्ड  200 .
In early 1992 , WEA acquired  the  entire back catalogue of The Smiths  और   उत्पादित  two compilations – Best ... I and ... Best II – the first of which reached  the  top of the UK Albums  चार्ट   .
wea  released  दो  further singles compilations  in  1995  और  2001 , with a further compilation , The Sound of The Smiths , released  in  November 2008 .
Gone  साथ  the Wind is a novel written by  मार्गरेट   मिशेल  ,  पहला  published in 1936 .
it  is often placed in  the  literary sub-genre of the historical romance novel .
However , it has  महरूम   argued  the novel  is  a `` near  मिस  '' and does not contain all of  the  elements of the romance genre ,  बनाना  it simply a historical novel .
The story is set  in  Clayton County , Georgia , and  अटलांटा  during the  अमरीकी  Civil War and Reconstruction  .
It depicts the experiences of Scarlett O'Hara , the spoiled daughter of a well-to-do plantation owner ,  जो  must use every means  at  her disposal  to  come out of the poverty  वो  finds  herself  in after Sherman  's  ``  कूच  to the Sea '' .
Margaret Mitchell began writing Gone with the Wind in  1926  to pass the time while recovering from an auto-crash injury that  refused  to  चंगा  .
in  April 1935 , Harold Latham of Macmillan , an editor who was  looking  for  नई   fiction  , read what she had written and saw that it could be a best-seller .
बाद  Latham agreed to  प्रकाशित  the book ,  मिशेल  worked for another six  महीने   checking  the historical  सन्दर्भ  , and rewrote the opening  अध्याय  several  टाइम्स   .
मिशेल   और  her  husband  John Marsh  ,  a copy editor  by  trade , edited the final  संस्करण  of the novel .
Mitchell wrote the  किताब  's final moments first , and  तब  wrote the events that led up to  it  .
As to what became of her  प्रेमियों   ,  Rhett and Scarlett , after the novel ended ,  मिशेल  did not know  ,   और  said  ,  `` For all I know , Rhett may  have  found someone  else  who  थी   कम  difficult .  ''
Mitchell received the  पुलित्जर   पुरस्कार  for  fiction  for  the  book in 1937 .
The  किताब   थी  adapted into a  1939  American film .
Gone with the Wind is  the  only novel  by  Mitchell published during her lifetime .
Endodontics ( from the Greek endo `` inside '' ; and odons `` tooth '' ) is one  of  the  दंत   specialties  recognized by the  अमरीकी  Dental Association , Royal College of Dentists of Canada  ,  and  royal  Australasian College of Dental Surgeons , and deals with the tooth pulp and the tissues surrounding the  रूट  of a tooth .
endodontists  perform a variety  of  procedures including endodontic therapy ( commonly  ज्ञात  as `` root canal therapy  ''  ) , endodontic retreatment  ,  surgery ,  treating  cracked  दांत  , and treating dental  आघात  .
Root  कनाल  therapy is  एक  of the most common procedures .
If the pulp  (  containing nerves , arterioles  ,  venules  ,  lymphatic tissue , and  तंतुमय  tissue )  becomes  diseased or injured ,  endodontic  treatment is required to save the tooth .
Serial Attached SCSI ( SAS  )  is a point-to-point serial protocol  कि  moves data to and from  कंप्यूटर  storage devices such as hard drives and tape drives .
SAS replaces the older Parallel SCSI ( pronounced ``  scuzzy  '' )  बस  technology  कि   पहला  appeared in  the  mid-1980s  .
SAS , like its predecessor , uses  the  standard SCSI  कमांड  set  .
SAS  offers  backward compatibility with second-generation SATA drives  .
SATA 3 Gbit/s drives may be  कनेक्ट  to  sas  backplanes  ,  but SAS  ड्राइव   can   नहीं   कनेक्ट  to SATA backplanes .
the  T10 technical  कमेटी   of  the International Committee for Information Technology  मानकों  ( INCITS ) develops  और   maintains  the SAS protocol  ;  the  scsi  Trade Association ( SCSITA ) promotes the technology .
Part of the constitutional provision  as  it appeared in  1787
औकात  as  a  natural-born citizen of  the  United  राज्य  is one  of  the  पात्रता  requirements established in the United States Constitution for election to the office  of  President or Vice President .
This  आवश्यकता  was intended to protect the nation  इससे  foreign influence .
The Constitution does not define the phrase natural-born citizen , and various  राय   have  been offered over time regarding  इसके  precise meaning .
A 2011 Congressional Research Service  रपट   stated
the  natural-born-citizen clause has been  उल्लेखित  in passing in  अनेक  decisions of  the   संयुक्त  States Supreme Court and lower courts dealing with  the   सवाल  of eligibility for citizenship  by  birth , but the  परम्  Court has never directly addressed the question of a specific presidential  or  vice-presidential candidate 's eligibility as  a   natural-born  citizen  .
Kurtis Eugene `` Kurt '' Warner ( born June 22 , 1971 )  is  a former  अमरीकी   फ़ुटबॉल  player .
He  निभाई  quarterback for three National Football  लीग  ( NFL ) teams : the  st.  Louis Rams ,  the  New York Giants , and the  एरिज़ोना  Cardinals .
He  थी   originally   हस्ताक्षरित  by  the  Green Bay Packers  as   an  undrafted  फ़्री  agent in 1994 after playing college  फ़ुटबॉल  at Northern  आयोवा  .
Warner would go on to be considered  the  best undrafted player  of  all time , following a 12-year career regarded as one  of  the greatest stories  in  NFL history .
Warner  पहला  attained  स्टारडम  while playing  लिये  the  st.   लुई  Rams from 1998 to 2003 , where he won  दो  NFL MVP  पुरस्कार  in 1999 and 2001 as well as the Super  कटोरी   mvp  award in Super Bowl XXXIV .
He led  the  2008 Arizona Cardinals to Super Bowl XLIII ( the  मताधिकार  's first Super Bowl berth )  ,   और  owns the  तीन  highest  single-game   गुजर  yardage totals in Super Bowl history  .
Warner currently holds the seventh-highest career passer rating of all-time ( 93.7  )   ,  and the third-highest career completion percentage in NFL history with  65.5  % .
In 13 career playoff games ,  warner  ranks first all-time  in  completion percentage ( 66.5 %  )   ,  yards per  attempt  ( 8.55 ) , and second  in   passer  rating (  102.8  ) .
He also holds the highest completion  प्रतिशत   लिये   a   सिंगल  game during the regular season , at 92.3 percent  (  24/26 )  ,  on September 20 , 2009 , against the  jacksonville  Jaguars .
He announced his retirement on  जनवरी  29 ,  2010.  < ref name='CNN 2010-01-29 ' >
Janet Kay Ruthven Hagan ( ;  born  May 26 , 1953 ) is  the  junior United States  सीनेटर  from North Carolina  ,  in office since January 2009 .
Previously she  परोसा  in  the  North Carolina Senate from 1999  to  2009  .
She  is  a member  of   the  Democratic Party  और  is  viewed  as a  मॉडरेट  member of her party .
When Hagan  पराजित  Republican incumbent  एलिज़ाबेथ  Dole in the 2008  संयुक्त  States Senate election ,  वो  became the first woman to defeat an incumbent woman in a Senate election .
The  heisman  Memorial Trophy Award  (  usually known  colloquially  as the Heisman Trophy or  the  Heisman )  ,  is  awarded  annually to  the   खिलाड़ी  deemed the  सबसे  outstanding player in collegiate football .
It was created in 1935 as the Downtown Athletic Club trophy and renamed in 1936 following the death of the  क्लबों   's  athletic director , John  heisman  (  पूर्व  Brown  विश्वविद्यालयों  and University of Pennsylvania player ; head football coach at  oberlin  College , Auburn University  ,  Clemson University , Rice University , and the University of Pennsylvania ; and  फ़ुटबॉल  , basketball , and baseball head coach and athletic director at Georgia Tech )  .
The award is presented by the  heisman  Trophy Trust in early  दिसम्बर  before the postseason bowl games  .
It is  the  oldest of  अनेक  overall  पुरस्कार   in  college football , including  the  Maxwell Award  ,  Walter Camp Award ,  और  the AP Player of the Year .
The Heisman and  the  AP Player of the Year are the only awards to honor the most outstanding player , while the Maxwell Award and Walter Camp Award recognize  the  best player , and the Archie Griffin Award recognizes the most valuable player  .
The United  राष्ट्र  Command  (  UNC ) is  the  unified command structure for the  बहुराष्ट्रीय  military forces  supporting  the Republic of Korea ( South Korea or ROK ) during  और  after the  कोरियाई  War .
After troops of  the   लोकतांत्रिक   लोगों   's  Republic of Korea ( North Korea  or  DPRK )  invaded  South  कोरियाई  on June 25  ,  1950 , the United Nations Security Council adopted Resolution 82 calling on North Korea to  cease  hostilities and  withdraw  to the 38th parallel .
On June 27 , 1950 , it adopted Resolution 83 , recommending that members of the United Nations provide assistance to the Republic of Korea `` to  repel   the   हथियारबंद  attack  और  to  restore  international peace and security  to   the  area '' .
Security Council  रेज़ोल्यूशन  84  ,  adopted on July 7 , 1950 , recommended that members  providing  military forces and  अन्य   सहायता   to  South Korea  ``  make such  शक्तियां   और  other assistance available  to  a unified command under the United States  of  America  ''   .
Although the resolutions suggested the forces under the UNC were  ``  United Nations forces '' , and United Nations  itself   could  be considered a belligerent  ,  in practice  the  United Nations  exercised  no control over  the  combat forces , which were controlled by the  संयुक्त  States .
Most observers concluded that  the  forces  अंतर्गत  the  unc   यहूद   नहीं  in  विधि  United  राष्ट्र  troops  ,  and the  अधिनियमों  of the UNC were  नहीं   the  acts of the United Nations  .
The UNC can be  regarded  as an alliance of national armies , operating  अंतर्गत  the collective right of  self-defense   .
On August  29  ,  1950  , the British  राष्ट्रमंडल  's 27th  infantry  Brigade arrived at Busan to join the UNC ,  जिससे  until then included only ROK and U.S. forces .
The 27th Brigade  स्थानांतरित  into  the  Naktong River  लकीर   वेस्ट  of  daegu   .
Troop units from other countries  of  the UN followed in rapid succession ; Australia , Belgian United Nations Command  ,  Canada , Colombia , Ethiopia , France , Greece , Luxembourg , the  नीदरलैंड्स   ,  New  जीलैंड  , the Philippines , Thailand and Turkey .
The  संघ   of  South  अफ़्रीकी   provided  air units which fought alongside the  एयर   शक्तियां   of  other  सदस्य  nations .
डेनमार्क  ,  इण्डिया  ,  नार्वे  ,  और  Sweden provided medical units  .
Italy provided a hospital  ,  even though it  थी  not a UN member .
The United  राष्ट्र  Command and the Chinese-North  कोरियाई  Command signed the Korean Armistice Agreement on 27 July 1953 ,  समाप्ति  the  भारी   लड़   .
the  armistice agreement  स्थापित  the Military Armistice Commission ( MAC ) , consisting of  प्रतिनिधि  of the two signatories  ,  to supervise  the  implementation of the armistice terms .
the  North Korean-Chinese MAC  रै  been  replaced  by Panmumjon Representatives under exclusive North Korean management  .
Regular meetings have been stopped , although duty  अधिकारियों  of Joint Security Area , commonly known as the Truce Village of Panmunjom , from  प्रत्येक  side  मिलें  regularly  .
Lincoln Heights  is  an  अमरीकी  family drama television series about Eddie Sutton  ,  a  मिशन   विस्टा  police  अधिकारी  who moves  उसके  family back to his old neighborhood , Lincoln Heights ,  to  start  a   नई   जीवन  and to help out his old neighborhood  .
It is a dangerous place to raise  a  family ,  और  through the many  ट्रायल  the family  goes  through  ,  they soon learn that  settling  in is not as easy as  it   seems  .
While Officer  सटन   struggles  to cope with every day life  as  a street cop in  लॉस  Angeles , his  बच्चे  try to fit in at their new  स्कूलों  and with their  नई  neighbors .
The show premiered January 8 , 2007 on  the  ABC Family network with 13 episodes  ordered  for the first season .
it  was  स्वीकृत  for  a  second  ऋतु   ,   जिससे  premiered  सितंबर  4  ,  2007  .
Vanessa Hudgens ' song ,  कह  OK  था   महरूम  used in a commercial to promote the second season  .
To promote  the   तीसरा  season ,  वे   दिखाया  clips of Cassie  और  Charles 's  संबंध  to the song , Crush by the  अमरीकी  Idol 's seventh season runner-up , David Archuleta  .
To promote season  4  , they 're using the song , Avalanche by Marie Digby .
The show 's theme song was written and  performed  by  bassist  Stanley Clarke and singer-songwriter Blaire Reinhard .
On  जनवरी  29 , 2010 , ABC Family announced the cancellation of the series after four seasons .
A Christian denomination is an  identifiable  religious body under a  आम   नाम  , structure , and doctrine within  christianity  .
In  the  Orthodox tradition  ,   चर्च   हैं  divided often  साथ   जातीय  and linguistic  लाइनों  , into separate churches and traditions .
Technically ,  विभाजन   between  one group and another are defined by doctrine and church authority .
Issues such as the nature of Jesus , the authority of apostolic succession  ,  eschatology ,  और  papal primacy separate one denomination from another  .
The  रोमन  Catholic Church is the largest denomination with  over  1.1 billion members , over  हाफ  of all Christians worldwide ,  बनाना  it  the  largest  denomination  for  कोई  religion worldwide  (  although the church does not view itself as a denomination , but as  the  original  pre-denominational  church  )   .
Protestant denominations comprise roughly 38–39 % of Christians worldwide , and  साथ  the  catholics  , Protestants  ,  Anglicans , and other closely  सम्बन्धित   denominations  comprise Western Christianity .
The Eastern Orthodox  गिरिजाघर  , Oriental Orthodox Churches and the Assyrian  गिरिजाघर   of   the  East are considered Eastern  ईसाई  denominations .
Western Christian  denominations  prevail in Western Europe  और  its  पूर्व  colonies .
Eastern Christian  denominations  are represented mostly in  पूर्वी  Europe , the Middle  ईस्ट  and North Africa .
Christians have various  doctrines  about the Church , the body of  वफादार   कि  they believe was established by Jesus Christ , and how  the  divine  गिरिजाघर   corresponds  to Christian denominations .
Both the Catholics and the Eastern Orthodox consider each of themselves solely to faithfully represent the One Holy Catholic and Apostolic  गिरिजाघर  to the exclusion of the other .
protestants  separated from the Catholic Church because of theologies  और   practices  that they considered to  be   in  violation of their interpretation .
Generally  ,  members of  the  various denominations acknowledge each other as Christians , at least to the  extent   कि   वे  have mutually  पहचाना   baptisms  and  acknowledge  historically  परंपरागत  views including  the  Divinity of Jesus and doctrines of sin and salvation  ,  even though doctrinal and ecclesiological obstacles hinder  पूरा  communion between churches .
चूंकि  the reforms  surrounding  Vatican  ii  , the Catholic Church has referred to Protestant  समुदायों  as `` denominations ''  ,  while  reserving  the term `` church '' for apostolic  चर्च  , including the Eastern Orthodox ( see  subsistit  in and branch  सिद्धान्त  ) .
There are however  कुछ   non-denominational  Christians who  do  not follow  कोई   particular  branch .
the  panda (  ailuropoda  melanoleuca , lit .
`` black and  श्वेत  cat-foot '' ) , also known  as  the giant panda to distinguish  it   इससे  the unrelated red  पांडा   ,  is a  भालू   देशी  to central-western and south western  चीन   .
It is easily recognized by the large  ,  distinctive black patches  around  its eyes , over  the  ears ,  और   आरपार  its round body .
Though it belongs to the order Carnivora ,  the  panda 's diet is 99 % bamboo .
Pandas in the wild will occasionally eat other grasses , wild tubers , or even meat in  the  form  of  birds , rodents or  carrion  .
In captivity , they may receive  मधु  , eggs , fish , yams , shrub leaves , oranges , or bananas along with specially prepared food .
The giant  पांडा  lives in a  few   पहाड़  ranges in central China , mainly  in  Sichuan province , but also  in  the  shaanxi  and Gansu provinces .
as  a result of farming , deforestation  और  other development , the panda has been driven  आउट  of the lowland areas where it once  जिया  .
the  panda is a  संरक्षण  reliant endangered species .
A 2007 report shows 239 pandas living in captivity inside China  और  another 27 outside the country .
Wild population estimates vary  ;   एक  estimate shows that there are about 1,590 individuals  जीना   in  the wild , while a  2006  study  via   डीएनए  analysis estimated that this figure could be as high  as  2,000 to  3,000  .
Some reports  भी  show  कि  the number of pandas  in  the wild is on  the  rise .
however  , the IUCN does not  मानना  there is enough certainty yet to reclassify the species from  endangered  to  vulnerable  .
जबकि  the dragon  रै  often served  as   चीन  's national emblem , internationally the panda  appears  at least  as   commonly  .
as  such  ,  it is becoming widely used within China in  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  contexts , for example the five  fuwa   mascots  of the Beijing  ओलंपिक  .
The Kite  धावक   is  a 2007 American drama film  निर्देशित  by Marc Forster based on the novel of the same name by Khaled Hosseini .
It tells  the  story of  आमिर  ,  a  well-to-do boy from the  वज़ीर  Akbar  खान  district  of   काबुल  , who is tormented by the guilt  of  abandoning his  dost   हसन  , the son of his father 's Hazara servant .
The story  is  set  विरूद्ध  a backdrop of  उग्र  events , from the  पतन   of   the   साम्राज्य   in  Afghanistan through  the  Soviet military intervention ,  the  mass exodus  of  Afghan refugees to Pakistan and the United States , and the Taliban regime .
हालांकि  most of the film is set in Afghanistan , these parts  यहूद  mostly shot in Kashgar , China , due  to  the dangers of filming in Afghanistan at the  समय   .
The majority  of  the film 's dialogue is in Dari , with  the  remainder spoken in English .
The child actors are native speakers ,  लकिन  several adult actors had  to  learn Dari .
Filming wrapped up on  दिसम्बर  21 , 2006 ,  और  the film was  अपेक्षित   to   be  released on November 2 , 2007 .
However , after concern  लिये  the safety of  the  young actors in the  फिल्मी  due to fears of violent reprisals to the sexual nature  of  some scenes in which they appear , its  रिलीज  date was pushed back six weeks to December 14 , 2007 .
The Kite Runner was  released  on  dvd  on  कूच  25 , 2008  .
A HD  dvd  release was announced for the same date  ,  but was canceled following  the  format 's demise .
The film was  मनोनीत   लिये  the Golden Globe Award for Best Foreign Language Film in 2007 .
The film 's score by Alberto Iglesias was  मनोनीत   लिये  Best Original Score at the Golden Globes and the Academy Awards  .
the  legality of cannabis varies from country to country .
Possession  of  cannabis is illegal  in  most countries and  रै   महरूम  since the beginning of widespread cannabis  निषेध  in  the  late 1930s .
However , many countries  have  decriminalized the possession  of  small quantities of cannabis  ,  particularly in  उत्तर  America ,  दक्षिण  America and Europe .
Furthermore , possession is  विधिक  or effectively legal in the Netherlands , North  कोरियाई  and  होता  be in the U.S. states of Colorado and Washington if it were not for federal law  ,   जिससे  governs persons in all  राज्य  .
The medicinal use of cannabis is legal in a number of  देशों  , including Canada  ,  the Czech Republic  और   इसराईल   .
While federal law  in  the United States  bans  all sale and possession of cannabis ,  प्रवर्तन  varies  widely  at the  राज्य  level  और  some states have established medicinal marijuana  कार्यक्रम  in that contradict federal law ; two states ( Colorado and Washington )  have  repealed  उनके  laws prohibiting the recreational use of  कैनबिस  and replaced  उन्हें  with a regulatory regime  ,  also contrary to federal statute  .
Some countries have  कानून  that are not  as  vigorously prosecuted as others but  ,  apart from  the   देशों  that offer access  to  medical  मारिजुआना  ,  सबसे  countries have various  दंड  ranging from lenient to very severe .
Some  infractions   हैं   लिया  more seriously in some countries than others in regard to  the  cultivation , use , possession  or  transfer of cannabis  लिये  recreational  उपयोग   .
A  few  jurisdictions have lessened penalties for possession of small  quantities  of cannabis ,  बनाना  it punishable by confiscation and a fine ,  बल्कि  than imprisonment .
Some jurisdictions/ drug  न्यायालयों  use mandatory  उपचार  programs  लिये  young or  बारंबार  users  ,  with freedom  इससे  narcotic drugs as the goal and a few jurisdictions permit  कैनबिस  use  लिये  medicinal  उद्देश्य  .
वहीँ  are also changes in  a  more  प्रतिबंधक  direction as in Canada .
Drug tests to detect cannabis are increasingly common in  अनेक  countries  और  have resulted in jail sentences  और  people losing their jobs .
However , simple possession can carry long jail sentences in  कुछ  countries  ,   विशेषकर  in parts of East Asia and  southeast   एशिया  where the sale of cannabis may  सीसे  to a sentence of life  in   थाना  or  भी  execution  .
Loxahatchee is a community located in Palm Beach County , Florida , United States .
It  is  located in the  क्षेत्रों   उत्तर  of Wellington and west and  उत्तरपश्चिम  of Royal Palm Beach , Florida and approximately west of West  ताड़  Beach .
Loxahatchee is also  the  name of the  पोस्ट  Office that  serves  this area , which is under  the  zip code of  33470  .
the  name  loxahatchee   अर्थात्   ``  turtle  नदी  . ''
Loxahatchee is located within the Indian Trails Improvement District and the Loxahatchee Groves Water Control  ज़िला  .
शेर  Country Safari , a drive-through safari park , is located in Loxahatchee .
In 2006 , the state of Florida approved incorporation of  भाग  of Loxahatchee as the  कस्बा  of Loxahatchee Groves to  become   the  38th municipality in  ताड़  Beach County .
the   प्रमुख   कारण  for incorporating was to better protect the area from encroaching growth  और   to   बचाना  the rural character of the neighborhood .
शायद  the most rural area within a close proximity to West  ताड़  Beach  ,  with lot sizes range  इससे  1-20  एकड़   .
Along  साथ  The Acreage  ,  it is notable for loose land restrictions and the  देशी  and exotic animal presence is quite notable .
Seminole Ridge High School serves  the   क्षेत्रफल  .
The Canadian Citizenship  परीक्षण  is a  परीक्षण   ,  administered by Citizenship  और  Immigration  कनाडा   (  CIC ) , that is required for  सब   आवेदकों   लिये  Canadian citizenship who are aged between 18  और   54   और  who meet  the   मौलिक  requirements  लिये  citizenship .
The test is available in both French and English , the official languages  of  Canada .
Renaissance  क्रूज़   ,  originally  संस्थापित   in  1989 owned by  fearnley  & Eger Rederi in Oslo - Norway , later purchased by Edward Rudner ( founder of Alamo Car Rental  )  as  the  company faltered during  the  Gulf War .
They operated  year-round   क्रूज  itineraries  to  the Mediterranean , the Greek Isles , Tahiti and the  दक्षिण  Pacific , Northern Europe and Scandinavia  .
The company ceased  परिचालन   on  25 September 2001 and accommodated up to 220,000  अतिथि  in 2000 .
While the company  था  been in poor financial health for quite  कुछ  time , the economic decline resulting from the  सितंबर  11th  आतंकवादी  attacks are  credited   साथ  the demise of this  क्रूज  line  .
The fleet is  सूचीबद्ध  under List of  क्रूज  ships .
It  थी   headquartered  in Fort  lauderdale  , Florida .
Epithelium is  एक   of  the four basic types of  एनिमल  tissue , along with connective tissue , muscle  ऊतक  and  बेचैन  tissue .
Epithelial tissues line the cavities and surfaces of structures  throughout  the  देह  , and also form many glands .
कृत्यों  of epithelial cells include secretion , selective absorption  ,  protection , transcellular transport and detection of sensation .
in  Greek `` ἐπί '' ( ``  epi  '' ) means `` on '' or `` upon '' , and `` θηλή '' ( ``  thēlē  '' ) means `` nipple '' .
Epithelial layers are  avascular  , so they  जरूर   प्राप्त  nourishment via diffusion of substances from  the  underlying  संयोजी  tissue ,  through  the  तहखाने  membrane .
epithelia  can also be  व्यवस्थित  into clusters  of  cells  कि  function as exocrine and endocrine glands .
Kent E.  hovind  ( born January 15  ,   1953   )  is an American  यंग   धरती  creationist .
Hovind has spoken  on  creation science and has aimed to  मनाना  listeners to  अस्वीकृत   theories  of evolution  ,  geophysics ,  और  cosmology in favor  of  his interpretation of the  उत्पत्ति  creation narrative from the Bible .
Hovind 's views are contradicted by scientific evidence  और  some of his ideas  have   भी   महरूम   criticized  by young  धरती  creationist organizations such as Answers in Genesis .
Hovind established  the  Creation Science Evangelism in 1991  ,  and frequently spoke  on  young Earth creationism at seminars at private schools and churches , debates , and on radio and television broadcasts  .
Since January  2007   ,   hovind   रै  been serving a ten-year prison sentence  बाद   होने  convicted of 58 federal counts , including 12 tax offenses  ,   एक  count of obstructing federal agents , and 45 counts of  structuring  cash transactions .
he  is  incarcerated  at the Federal  correctional   संस्था  at  बर्लिन  , New Hampshire .
Bride with Bindi decorated forehead
A bindi (  ,  from Sanskrit bindu , meaning `` a drop , small particle ,  बिन्दु  '' ) , or a pottu/bottu ( in Tamil , Telugu , and Malayalam ) is a forehead decoration worn in South  एशिया  ( particularly India , Bangladesh , Nepal , Sri Lanka and Mauritius )  और  Southeast Asia .
Traditionally it is  a  bright  बिन्दु   of  red color applied in the center of  the   माथे   बंद  to the eyebrows  ,  but  it  can also consist of a sign or  टुकड़ा  of jewelry worn  at  this location .
The New  यॉर्क  gubernatorial election  of  2010  थी  held on Tuesday , November 2  ,  2010 , to elect the Governor of  नई  York , to  serve   a   four-year   पद  that began in  जनवरी  2011 .
Incumbent Democratic Governor  दाउद  Paterson , elected as Lieutenant Governor in 2006  as  the running mate of former Governor Eliot Spitzer ,  chose  not to run  लिये  a full-term .

Green Party candidate Howie Hawkins received  over   57,000  votes ,  allowing  the New York Green Party to be listed on the ballot for the next 4 years .
the   प्रमुख  cast  of  Dragon Ball at the end of the manga .
The Dragon Ball  manga  and anime series features an extensive cast of  वर्ण   निर्मित  by Akira Toriyama .
The  श्रेणी  takes place  in  a fictional universe , the same as Toriyama  's  previous series Dr. Slump , and  फ़ॉलो  the  adventures   of  martial  कलाकार  Son Goku from childhood  to  adulthood  as   he  searches for the  सात  spheres  ज्ञात  as the  ड्रैगन  Balls , used to  summon  a wish-granting dragon .
During the  कोर्स  of the story , he encounters allies such as Bulma  ,   yamcha  , Kuririn  और  Trunks ,  विरोधियों  such as Tenshinhan , Piccolo and Vegeta  ,  and enemies such  as  Freeza and  कोशिका  .
While many of the  वर्ण  are humans with  superhuman  strength and/or  अलौकिक  abilities , the  डाल  also includes anthropomorphic  पशु  and later ,  extraterrestrial  lifeforms .
the  series also  शामिल  depictions of the afterlife , with  अनेक  characters being gods that govern  the  universe .

The Comanche  हैं  a Plains Indian tribe  जिनकी  historic territory ,  ज्ञात   as  Comancheria , consisted  of  present day  पूर्वी  New Mexico , southern Colorado  ,  northeastern Arizona  ,  southern  कान्सास  , all  of  Oklahoma , and most of northwest Texas .
The Comanche people are enrolled  in  the federally recognized Comanche  स्वदेश  , in  ओक्लाहोमा  .
Historically , the Comanches were  hunter-gatherers  with a horse culture  .
There may have been as many as 45,000 Comanches  in  the late  18th  century .
आज  , the Comanche  स्वदेश  Comanche  जनजातीय  enrollment  संख्याएँ  15,191 with approximately 7,763 members  residing  in the Lawton – Fort Sill and surrounding  क्षेत्रों  of  दक्षिणपश्चिम  Oklahoma  .
the   comanche  Nation Homecoming Powwow is held annually in Walters  ,  Oklahoma  in  mid-July .
the   comanche  spoke the Comanche language , a Numic language of the Uto-Aztecan family ,  sometimes  classified  as  a  shoshone  dialect ; however  ,  only about 1 % of Comanches  बोलो  it today  .
