Times Square  studios  ( TSS ) is an American television studio located  in  the Times Square  पड़ोस  of the Manhattan borough of New York City , New  यॉर्क  .
The studio is best  ज्ञात   as  the production home of ABC News ' Good Morning America (  जीएमए  ) , a morning news  और   बात   कार्यक्रम  and segments for GMA on ABC News Now .
The Las Vegas Strip World of Coca-Cola  संग्रहालय  in 2003
Coca-Cola  is   a  carbonated  नरम  drink  बेची  in stores ,  रेस्तरां  , and vending machines in every country except Cuba and  उत्तर  Korea .
it  is produced  by  The Coca-Cola  कम्पनी  of Atlanta  ,  Georgia ,  और   is  often referred to simply as  कोक  ( a registered  ट्रेडमार्क  of The Coca-Cola Company in the United States since March 27 , 1944  )  .
Originally intended as a patent medicine when  it  was  invented  in the late 19th century by John Pemberton , Coca-Cola was bought out by  बिजनेसमैन  Asa Griggs Candler , whose marketing tactics led Coke to its dominance of the  संसार  soft-drink market throughout  the   20th   सदी  .
the  company  produces  concentrate ,  जिससे  is then sold to licensed Coca-Cola bottlers throughout the world .
The bottlers , who  थाम  territorially exclusive contracts with  the  company , produce finished  उत्पाद  in cans and bottles from  the  concentrate in combination with filtered water and sweeteners  .
The bottlers then sell ,  वितरित   और  merchandise Coca-Cola to retail stores  और  vending machines .
ऐसे  bottlers include Coca-Cola Enterprises , which  is  the largest single  coca-cola   bottler  in North America and western Europe  .
The Coca-Cola Company also  बिकता  concentrate for soda fountains to major restaurants and  खाना  service distributors .
The Coca-Cola Company has , on occasion , introduced other cola drinks under the Coke brand  नाम  .
The most common of these  is  Diet  कोक   ,  with others including Caffeine-Free Coca-Cola ,  आहार  Coke Caffeine-Free ,  coca-cola  Cherry ,  coca-cola  Zero , Coca-Cola Vanilla , and  खास  versions  साथ  lemon , lime or  कॉफी  .
आधारित  on  interbrand  's best global brand 2011 , Coca-Cola was the world 's most valuable brand .
Types of  bar-lines
In musical notation , a bar ( or  माप  ) is a  खण्ड  of time defined by  a   दिए  number  of  beats  ,  each of  जिससे  are  आबंटित  a particular note value .
Dividing  म्यूज़िक  into bars provides regular reference points to pin point locations within a  टुकड़ा   of  music .
it  also makes  लिखा  music easier  to  follow , since  प्रत्येक   बार  of staff  प्रतीकों   can  be read  और   निभाई  as a batch .
Typically , a piece consists of  अनेक  bars  of  the same length , and in modern musical notation the number of beats in each bar is specified at  the  beginning of the score by the top number of a time  हस्ताक्षर   (  such as 3/4 ) , while the bottom number indicates the note value of the beat ( the  ताल  has a quarter note value in the  3/4  example )  .
the  word bar is more common in British English , and  the  word measure is more  आम   in  American English  ,  although musicians generally understand both usages  .
In American English , although the words bar and  माप  are often used interchangeably the correct use of  the  word 'bar ' refers only to the  लंबवत  line itself , while the word 'measure ' refers to  the   बीट्स  contained between bars .
In  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  usage  ,  it is equally correct to speak of bar  संख्याएँ  and measure numbers ,  e.g  . ‘bars 9–16’ or ‘mm  .   9–16’  .
साथ   the  same lines , it is wise to reserve  the   abbreviated  form ‘bb .
3–4’ etc  .  for beats only  ;  bars should be referred to by  नाम   in  full .
The first  metrically  complete measure within a piece of  म्यूज़िक   is   पुकारा  ‘bar 1’ or ‘m . 1’ .
When the piece begins with an anacrusis (  an  incomplete measure at the head of a piece of  म्यूज़िक  ) , ‘bar  1’  or ‘m . 1’  is  the following measure .
The 19.9 MW  gemasolar  solar plant in Spain features 15 hours of storage and  can   सप्लाई  power 24 hours a day .
Solar energy ,  रौशन  light  और  heat from  the  sun , has  महरूम  harnessed by humans since ancient times using a range of  ever-evolving  technologies .
Solar  उर्जा  technologies include solar  हीटिंग  ,  सौर  photovoltaics , solar thermal  विद्युत  , solar architecture and  कृत्रिम   photosynthesis  , which can make considerable  योगदान  to solving some of the most urgent energy problems the world now faces .
Solar technologies are broadly  characterized  as  either  passive solar or active solar depending on the way  वे   कैप्चर   ,   बदलें  and  वितरित  solar energy .
क्रियाशील  solar  तकनीकों   शामिल  the  उपयोग   of   photovoltaic  panels and solar  थर्मल  collectors to harness the energy .
Passive solar techniques include orienting  a  building  to   the  Sun , selecting materials  साथ  favorable thermal mass or light dispersing properties , and  डिजाइनिंग  spaces that  naturally  circulate air .
in   2011  , the International Energy Agency said that `` the development of  सस्ती  ,  inexhaustible  and clean solar energy  technologies  will have huge longer-term benefits .
It will increase  countries’  energy security through reliance on an indigenous , inexhaustible and  ज़्यादातर  import-independent resource , enhance sustainability ,  reduce  pollution ,  निम्नतर  the costs  of  mitigating  जलवायु  change , and keep fossil fuel prices  निम्नतर   than  otherwise .
These advantages are global .
Hence the additional costs of the incentives for early deployment  चाहिए  be considered learning investments  ;  they must be wisely spent and need to be widely shared '' .
प्राथमिक   परवाह  may be provided in community health centres .
Primary care is the health care given  by  a health care  प्रदाता  .
Typically this provider acts as the  प्रिंसिपल  point of consultation for patients within a  स्वास्थ्य  care system and coordinates  अन्य  specialists that the  रोगी   may   need   .
Such a professional can be a  प्राथमिक  care physician , such  as  a  सामान्य  practitioner or family  चिकित्सक  , or depending on  the   मोहल्ले  ,  स्वास्थ्य  system organization , and patient  's  discretion , they may see a pharmacist , a physician assistant , a nurse practitioner , a nurse ( such as in the United  किंगडम  )  ,  a  नैदानिक  officer ( such as in parts  of  Africa ) ,  or  an Ayurvedic or other traditional  आयुर्विज्ञान  professional (  ऐसे  as  in  parts of Asia ) .
Depending on the nature  of  the health condition  ,   मरीजों  may then  be   referred  for  द्वितीयक  or tertiary  परवाह  .
`` Ocean Avenue '' is  a   सोंग  recorded  by  American pop punk group Yellowcard .
It  थी   released  in February 2004 as  the  second single from  समंदर  Avenue and the third track .
It  is  known for bringing them into  the  mainstream , as it received  numerous  spins on MTV and increasing radio airplay .
समंदर  Avenue is a  गली   in  Jacksonville  ,  Florida , the  बैंड  's stomping grounds near  उनके  high school  ,  Douglas Anderson School of the Arts ,  और  another street mentioned  in  the song ,  चेरी  Street  .
the   नाम  of Ocean Avenue in Jacksonville is actually Beach  boulevard  .
They left their original  आधार  behind  जब  they moved to Los Angeles .
The song was  प्रदर्शित  on the Much Music compilation album Big Shiny Tunes 9 .
A psychiatrist  is   a   चिकित्सक  who specializes in psychiatry .
a  psychiatrist specializes  in  the treatment of mental disorders .
Psychiatrists are authorized  to  prescribe medicine  ,  conduct physical examinations ,  अनुक्रम  and interpret  प्रयोगशाला  tests , use psychotherapy and may order brain imaging  अध्ययन  such  as   computed  tomography ( CT/CAT Scan ) , magnetic resonance imaging  (   mri   )  ,  और  positron emission tomography  (  PET )  स्कैनिंग  .
Within the framework of  the  World Health Organization 's ( WHO ) definition of health  as  a state of complete physical , mental and social well-being  ,  and not  merely   the  absence  of  disease or infirmity ,  reproductive  health , or sexual health/hygiene , addresses the reproductive processes  ,   कृत्यों  and system at  सब  stages of life .
Reproductive  स्वास्थ्य  , therefore ,  implies   कि  people  हैं  able  to  have a responsible  ,   संतोषजनक  and safer sex life and that they have the capability to reproduce  और  the  स्वतंत्रता  to  decide  if  ,  when and how often to do so .
One interpretation of this implies that men  और   महिलाओं  ought to  be  informed  of  and to have  अभिगम  to safe , effective , affordable  और  acceptable methods of birth control ; also access  to  appropriate health care services of sexual , reproductive medicine and implementation of health education programs to stress the importance  of  women to go  सकुशल   through  pregnancy and  प्रसव  could provide  युगल  with the  बेहतरीन  chance of having  a  healthy infant .
On the other hand individuals do  फेस  inequalities  in  reproductive health services  .
Inequalities vary based on socioeconomic status  ,   शिक्षा  level ,  आयु  , ethnicity  ,  religion , and resources available in their environment  .
it  is  संभावित  for example , that low  आय  individuals lack the resources for appropriate  स्वास्थ्य  services and the knowledge to know what  is  appropriate for maintaining reproductive health .
According to the WHO , `` Reproductive  और  sexual ill-health accounts for 20 % of  the  global burden of ill-health  लिये  women , and 14 % for men . ''
reproductive  health is a part of Sexual and reproductive health  और  rights .
This is a list  of  episodes for the  डिज़्नी  Channel original series  the  Suite Life  on  Deck , which aired  लिये   तीन  seasons on Disney Channel  इससे  September 26 , 2008  to  May  6  , 2011 .
Core 2  is   a  brand encompassing a range of Intel 's consumer  64-bit  x86-64  single-  , dual- , and quad-core  microprocessors  based on the Core  microarchitecture   .
the  single- and dual-core models are single- die  ,  whereas the quad-core  मॉडल  comprise two dies  ,  each containing two cores  ,  packaged in  a  multi-chip module .
The introduction of Core 2 relegated  the  Pentium brand to the mid-range market ,  और  reunified laptop and  डेस्कटॉप   cpu  lines ,  जिससे   previously  had  महरूम   विभाजित   into  the Pentium 4 ,  pentium  D  ,  and Pentium M brands .
The  कोर   2   ब्रांड  was  introduced   on  27 July 2006 , comprising the Solo ( single-core ) , Duo ( dual-core )  ,  Quad ( quad-core ) , and in 2007 , the Extreme ( dual- or  quad-core  CPUs for enthusiasts  )  subbrands  .
Intel Core  2  processors with  vpro  technology ( designed  लिये  businesses ) include the dual-core and quad-core branches  .
The  सुपर   कटोरी  is the annual championship game of the National Football League  (  NFL ) ,  the   उच्चतम  level  of  professional  अमरीकी   फ़ुटबॉल  in the United States ,  culminating  a season that begins in the late summer of the previous calendar year .
The Super Bowl uses Roman numerals to identify each  खेल  ,  बल्कि  than the year in which it is held .
For example  ,   सुपर  Bowl I was played on January 15 , 1967 , following the  1966  regular season , while Super Bowl  xlvii  was played  on  February 3 ,  2013  , following the 2012 season .
The  खेल  was  निर्मित  as part of a merger agreement between  the  NFL and  इसके  then-rival league , the American Football League (  afl  ) .
It was agreed that the two leagues ' champion teams would play in an AFL–NFL World Championship Game until the  विलय  was to officially begin  in  1970  .
After the merger , each  लीग  was redesignated as a  ``  conference `` , and the game was  तब   निभाई  between the conference champions .
Currently , the National Football Conference ( NFC ) leads the series  साथ  25  विन्स  to 22 wins for the American Football  सम्मेलन  (  afc  ) .
The day on which the Super  कटोरी  is played , now considered by some a  de  facto American national holiday ,  is   पुकारा  `` Super Bowl Sunday `` .
It  is   the  second-largest  दिन  for U.S.  खाना  consumption  ,  after Thanksgiving Day  .
in  addition , the Super Bowl has frequently been the most watched American  टेलीविज़न  broadcast  of  the year  .
Super Bowl XLV  ,   निभाई  in  2011  , became the most-watched American television program in history , drawing  an   औसत   दर्शक  of 111  लाख   दर्शक  and taking over the spot held by the previous year 's  सुपर   कटोरी  , which itself had  लिया  over  the   #  1 spot held for twenty-eight years by the  फाइनल  episode of M*A*S*H .
The Super Bowl is also among the  सबसे  watched sporting events  in   the   संसार  , almost all being North  अमरीकी  audiences , and  is  second to  संघ  football ’s UEFA Champions League final as the  सबसे   देखी  annual  sporting  event  विश्वव्यापी   .
Because of its high viewership  ,  commercial  airtime  during the Super Bowl broadcast  is   the  most expensive of the  साल  .
due  to the high cost of investing in  विज्ञापन  on the Super  कटोरी  , companies regularly develop their most  महंगी  advertisements for this  ब्रॉडकास्ट  .
As a  परिणाम   ,  watching and  discussing   the   ब्रॉडकास्ट  's commercials has  become   a   significant  aspect of the  इवेंट   .
In addition , many popular singers and musicians have performed during the event  's   pre-game  and halftime  ceremonies  because of the exposure .
फिओना  is a feminine given  नाम  .
The name Fiona was invented  ,  and first used , by the Scottish poet James Macpherson  (  1736–96 ) ,  लेखक  of the  ossian  poems  ,  which he claimed  यहूद  translations from ancient Gaelic sources  (  sources , when challenged , he never produced ) .
The name was subsequently used  as  a pseudonym by  विलियम   शार्प   (  1855–1905  )  ,  जो  authored several romantic works under  the  name  ``   फिओना  Macleod  ''  .
The name  रै  since  become  popular in  इंग्लैण्ड  , Scotland  और   आयरलैंड   .
The name is considered  to  be a Latinised form of the Gaelic word fionn , meaning `` white '' , `` fair  ''  .
The name  फिओना  is also sometimes used as an Anglicisation  of  the  irish-language  name  fíona   ,  although  ये  names are otherwise unrelated (  as  Fíona is  निकला  from an element  अर्थ  ``  बेल  '' ) .
There is also a modern tendency to equate  the   प्रामाणिक   स्कॉटिश  Gaelic feminine  नाम   fionnghal  with Fiona .
The name  फिओना  is rising in  लोकप्रियता  particularly in German  -speaking  countries  .
Fiona was the 49th  सबसे   लोकप्रिय  name for baby girls born  in  2008 in Germany .
Fiona was tied for third place in the ranking of most popular names for  baby  girls born  in   the  tiny principality of Liechtenstein in 2008 .
The name was the 347th most  लोकप्रिय  name  लिये   लड़कियों  born in the United  राज्य  in  2008   ,  where it has ranked among the  शीर्ष  1,000 most popular  names  for girls since 1990 and among the top 500 since 1999 .
The  नाम  Fiona has been particularly popular for  लड़कियों  of Asian  or  Pacific  islander  descent in New York City , where Fiona ranked  as  the ninth most popular name for girls  इससे  those groups  in   2007  .
Many languages  हैं   प्रयुक्त  , or historically have been used  in  the United States .
The most  commonly  used  भाषा   is  English .
वहीँ  are  भी  many  भाषाएं  indigenous  to   उत्तर  America or to U.S. states or holdings in the  प्रशांत   प्रदेश  .
भाषाएं  brought  to  the  देश  by  colonists   or  immigrants from  यूरोपीय   ,  Asia , or other  भाग  of the world make up a large portion of the languages currently used ; several languages , including creoles and  चिह्न  languages , have also  विकसित   in  the  संयुक्त  States .
Approximately 337  भाषाएं  are spoken or signed by the population , of which 176  हैं  indigenous to  the  area .
Fifty-two languages formerly  बोला   in  the  देश  's territory are now extinct .
The variety of  अंग्रेज़ी  spoken in the United  राज्य   is  known as American English .
English  is  the de  facto   नेशनल  language of  the   संयुक्त  States , with 80 %  of  the population claiming  it  as a mother tongue  ,  and some 95 % claiming to speak it `` well '' or `` very well  ''  .
However , no official  भाषा   exists  at the federal level  .
There have been several proposals to make English the national language in  amendments   to  immigration reform bills , but none of these bills has become law with the amendment intact .
The situation is quite varied at the state and territorial levels  ,   साथ   कुछ   राज्य  mirroring the federal policy of adopting  no   आधिकारिक  language in a de  jure  capacity , others adopting English  अलोन  , others officially adopting English  as  well as local languages , and still others adopting  a  policy of de facto bilingualism .
Spanish is the second most common  भाषा   in  the country , and  is  spoken by over 12  %  of  the  population .
The United States holds the world 's  पांचवां  largest Spanish-speaking population , outnumbered only by Mexico  ,  Spain , Colombia , and Argentina .
throughout  the Southwestern United States , long-established Spanish-speaking communities coexist with large numbers of more  हाल  Hispanophone immigrants .
Although  अनेक   नई  Latin  अमरीकी   आप्रवासियों  are less  than   धाराप्रवाह  in English ,  nearly  all second-generation Hispanic Americans speak English fluently ,  जबकि   तभी  about half still speak Spanish  .
According to the 2000 US  जनसांख्यिकी   ,   लोगों  of German ancestry make up the largest  सिंगल  ethnic  समूह  in  the  United States ,  और  the German language ranks fifth .
Italian , Polish , and French are still  widely   बोला  among populations descending from immigrants  इससे  those  देशों  in the  जल्दी  20th century , but  the  use of these  भाषाएं  is  dwindling   as   the  older  पीढियां  die .
Russian is also spoken by immigrant populations  .
Tagalog and Vietnamese  have  over one million speakers  प्रत्येक  in  the  United States , almost entirely within  हाल  immigrant populations .
Both languages , along with the varieties of the Chinese language , Japanese , and Korean  ,  are  अभी  used  in  elections in Alaska , California , Hawaii , Illinois  ,  New York , Texas , and Washington .
Native American  भाषाएं  are spoken in smaller  pockets   of  the  देश   ,  but these populations are  अवरोहण  , and the languages are almost  never  widely used outside of reservations .
Hawaiian  ,  although having  few   देशी  speakers , is an official  भाषा  along with English at the state level in Hawaii .
The state government of Louisiana  offers  services and documents in French , as does  नई  Mexico in Spanish .
Besides English , Spanish ,  फ्रेंच  , German , Navajo and other Native American languages  ,   सब  other languages are usually learned from immigrant ancestors that came after the time of independence or learned through some form  of  education .
1990 's  pontiac  Grand  am  Sedan fender and quarter panel
On an  ऑटोमोबाइल  , a quarter panel ( or rear wing as it is known  in   अंग्रेजों  English ) is usually considered the body panel which  goes  between the rear door  और  the trunk and typically wraps around the wheel well ; however , the similar front  खण्ड  Fender ( vehicle ) , between the door and the hood , is sometimes incorrectly referred to  as  a quarter panel .
The quarter panel is typically  बना  of  चादर  metal ,  लकिन  is sometimes made of  fiberglass  or fiber-reinforced plastic ; although , this varies with different makes and models .
A quarter  फलक  is typically a welded on component  of  the uni-body structure or  monocoque  .
Replacement of a sheet  मेटल  quarter panel typically  requires   it  to  be  cut off the vehicle and a replacement part to be welded ( or  sometimes   बंधुआ  ) to  the   गाडी   .
Due to this high amount of  specialized  labor , a  क्वार्टर  panel may often  be   repaired  rather than replaced by  hammering  out  the   क्षति  , and a  देह  filler  sometimes  referred to as bondo to be applied to finalize the original surface .
Shropshire ( or ; alternatively  salop  ; abbreviated ,  in  print only  ,  Shrops  )  is  a  county in  the   वेस्ट   मिडलैंड्स  region of  इंग्लैण्ड  .
It  सीमायें   वेल्स   to   the  west , Cheshire to the north , Staffordshire  to  the east , Worcestershire  to  the south-east and Herefordshire to the  दक्षिण  .
A  एकात्मक  authority  (  Shropshire  परिषद  ) was created on 1 April 2009 , taking over from the previous county council  और  5 district councils  ,  and covers  सबसे  of the county .
The  बरो  of Telford and Wrekin  रै   महरूम  a  पृथक  unitary authority since 1998 but continues to be included in the ceremonial county  .
The county  's  population and economy  is  centred  on  five  कस्बों  : the county town  of  Shrewsbury  ,   जिससे   is   culturally   और  historically important and is located in the centre of the county  ;  Telford , a  नई  town in the  ईस्ट  which  थी  constructed around  a   क्रमांक  of older towns  ,  most notably Wellington  ,  Dawley and Madeley ,  जिससे  is  आज   the  most populous ;  और  Oswestry in the north-west  ,  Bridgnorth just  to   the  south  of  Telford , and Ludlow in  the  south .
The county has many further market towns , including Whitchurch in the north  ,  Newport just to  the  north-east of Telford ,  और  Market Drayton in the north-east  of  the county .
The Ironbridge Gorge area is a  युनेस्को  World Heritage  साईट  , covering Ironbridge , Coalbrookdale and a part of Madeley .
There are , additionally  ,  other notable historic industrial sites located around the county , such as at Shrewsbury , Broseley , Snailbeach and  highley  as well as the Shropshire Union  कनाल  .
The Shropshire Hills Area of Outstanding Natural Beauty covers  परिचय  a quarter of the county , mainly in the  दक्षिण  .
Shropshire is one  of   इंग्लैण्ड  's most rural and sparsely populated counties , with the population  घनत्व  of the Shropshire Council  क्षेत्रफल  being just  91/km2  ( 337/sq mi  )  .
The Wrekin is one of the most famous natural landmarks in  the  county  ,   हालांकि  the highest  पहाड़ियाँ  are  the  Clee Hills  ,  Stiperstones and the Long Mynd .
Wenlock Edge is  another  significant geographical and geological  लैंडमार्क  .
In the low-lying northwest of the  काउंटी  (  और   अतिव्यापी  the border with Wales ) is the Fenn 's  ,  Whixall and Bettisfield Mosses National Nature Reserve ,  एक  of  the  most important and best preserved  bogs  in Britain .
The River Severn ,  ग्रेट   ब्रिटेन  's longest river , runs through the county , exiting into Worcestershire via the Severn Valley .
Shropshire is landlocked ,  और  with an area  of  ,  is  England 's largest  अंतर्देशीय   काउंटी   .
The county flower is  the  round-leaved sundew  .
For Eurostat purposes , the county ( less the unitary  ज़िला  of Telford and Wrekin ) is a NUTS 3 region (  कोड  UKG22 ) .
the  two  shropshire  unitary areas ( covering all of the ceremonial  काउंटी  ) , together with the authorities covering the ceremonial county of Staffordshire , comprise the `` Shropshire and  staffordshire  '' NUTS 2 region .
The Big Bang Theory  डाल  at Comic  कॉन  2009 , from left :  कुणाल  Nayyar  ,  Simon  helberg  , Kaley Cuoco ,  जिम  Parsons  ,   और  Johnny Galecki
The American sitcom The Big Bang  सिद्धान्त  ,  निर्मित  and executive produced by  चक  Lorre and Bill Prady , premiered on CBS on September 24  ,   2007  .
The show centers on  पाँच  characters : roommates Sheldon Cooper and Leonard  hofstadter  ,  दो  Caltech physicists ; Penny  ,   a  waitress and aspiring  अभिनेत्री   जो  lives across the  हॉल  ; and Leonard and Sheldon 's friends and co-workers  aerospace   इंजीनियर  Howard Wolowitz  ,  and astrophysicist Rajesh Koothrappali .
Over time ,  अनेक   supporting   वर्ण  have been promoted to starring roles : Leslie Winkle ( season 1 recurring ;  ऋतु   2  regular ; season 3 guest ) , a physicist colleague ,  और  , at different times , a lover of both Leonard and Howard  ;  Bernadette Rostenkowski-Wolowitz (  ऋतु  3 recurring ; season  4-present  regular )  ,  a microbiologist ,  हावर्ड  's fiancée and subsequent wife , and former part-time  वेट्रेस  alongside Penny ; neuroscientist Amy Farrah Fowler ( season  3  guest ; season 4 recurring ;  ऋतु  4-present  नियमित   )  , who joins the group after  होने  matched to Sheldon on a  डेटिंग   जालस्थल  ; and comic  किताब  store-owner ,  स्टुअर्ट  Bloom ( seasons  2–5  recurring  ;  season 6-present regular ) ,  जो  replaces  हावर्ड  as Raj 's best friend when Howard is  in  space .
The show also features  numerous  supporting characters , each of whom plays a prominent role  in  a small  समूह  of episodes .
The  a-team   is   an  American action-adventure television series  ,  running from 1983  to  1987 , about a  fictional  group of  ex–  United  राज्य  Army Special Forces personnel who work  as  soldiers  of  fortune  ,   जबकि  on the run from the Army after being branded as war criminals for a `` crime they did n't commit `` .
A feature film based  on  the series  थी  released by 20th  सदी  Fox on  जून  11 , 2010 .
A comic  किताब  series  ,  A-Team : Shotgun Wedding , began March 9 , 2010 .
Diana Prince is a fictional character appearing regularly in stories published  by  DC Comics  .
She debuted in Sensation  कॉमिक्स  # 1 ( January 1942 ) and serves  as   the  civilian and secret  पहचान  of the superhero Wonder Woman .
The character was created  by  Charles Moulton and Harry  G.   पीटर  .
Wat Phra Kaew , Bangkok  ,  Thailand
There  is  no official state religion in the Thai constitution , which guarantees religious freedom for  सब   थाई  citizens , though the king is required  by   विधि  to be Buddhist .
According  to  the last census ( 2000 ) 94.6 %  of  Thais are Buddhists of the  थेरवाद   परंपरा  .
Muslims are the second largest religious group in Thailand at 4.6 %  .
Thailand 's southernmost  प्रांतों  - Pattani  ,  Yala , Narathiwat and part of Songkhla Chumphon have dominant Muslim populations , consisting  of   दोनो  ethnic Thai and  मलय  .
The southern tip of Thailand is mostly ethnic Malays .
Christians , mainly Catholics , represent 0.7 % of  the  population .
A small  लकिन  influential community of Sikhs in Thailand and some Hindus also live in the country 's cities , and are  heavily  engaged in retail commerce  .
There is also a small Jewish community in Thailand , dating back to the 17th century .
Since  2001  ,  मुस्लिम  activists , generally described by the Thai government as terrorists  or  separatists  ,  have rallied against the central government  क्युकी  of alleged corruption and  जातीय  bias on the part of officials .
थाईलैंड  's Department  of  Religion , currently under the  मंत्रालय  of Culture , is  formally  responsible  लिये  the registration of religious groups in Thailand URL_http which hold  गुण  through legally established  मूलाधार  .
It has oversight , along with the Immigration Police , over  the   कार्य  permits  of  missionaries who are `` expatriate religious workers '' of  सब  religions .
A value  added  tax ( VAT )  is  a form of consumption tax  .
इससे  the perspective of  the   खरीदार   ,  it is a tax on the purchase price  .
From  कि  of the  विक्रेता  ,  it   is  a tax only on the value  added  to a product , material ,  or   सेवा  , from an accounting point of view , by  इस  stage  of  its manufacture or distribution .
The  निर्माता  remits to  the  government  the  difference  between   ये  two amounts , and  retains  the rest for themselves to offset the taxes they had previously paid on the  inputs  .
The value added to a  उत्पाद   by  or with  a   कारोबार   is  the sale price charged  to  its customer , minus the cost  of   सामग्री  and other taxable inputs .
A VAT  is  like a sales tax in that ultimately only the end consumer is taxed .
It differs from the  बिक्री   कर   in  that  ,   साथ  the latter , the tax is collected and remitted to  the  government  तभी   एकबार  , at the point of purchase by the end consumer  .
साथ  the  vat   ,  collections , remittances to the government  ,  and credits  लिये  taxes already paid occur each time a business in  the  supply chain purchases products .
A referee calling a high-sticking  penaltyhigh
-sticking  is the name  of   दो   infractions   in  the sport of ice hockey that may  occur   जब  a player intentionally or  inadvertently   plays  with  उसके  or her  स्टिक  above the  ऊँचाई  of  the  shoulders or above the cross bar of a hockey goal .
This can result in a stoppage of  खेल   or  in a penalty .
In the  नियम  of the  नेशनल  Hockey League , high-sticking is  पारिभाषित  as  a  penalty in Rule 60  और  as a non-penalty foul in Rule 80 .
a  stoppage in  खेल  results if a  ऊँची  stick comes  in  contact  साथ   the  puck  और   the  team who touched it  regains  control  of   the  puck .
However , play usually continues if a player  छू  the puck with a high stick and the  opposing  team gains  कंट्रोल  of the puck .
if  the puck goes into the  opposing  net after  coming  into contact with a high stick , the  लक्ष्य  is  प्रतिबंधित  .
The level at  जिससे   a  stick  is  considered  too  high for a goal is the crossbar of  the  net .
However , if a player knocks the puck into  उसके   अपना  net  साथ  a high stick , the  लक्ष्य   is  allowed .
A penalty is assessed if a player strikes another player with a  ऊँची   स्टिक  .
the  player is  दिए  a minor penalty unless his high  स्टिक  caused an injury , in which case  the  referee has the option to assess a double-minor , major or match penalty .
it  is the referee 's discretion which penalty to assess : the  नियम   काल्स  for a double minor for an accidental  चोट   ,   or  a match penalty for a deliberate  attempt  to injure  (  whether the opposition player was actually injured ) .
Injury is usually  decided  by the  ऊँची  stick causing bleeding , but the presence of  रक्त   करता  not automatically mean  an  extra penalty is awarded .
कुछ  referees have  महरूम  known to award an extra penalty without  the  presence of blood if the referee determines that the injury sustained  थी  sufficient  to  warrant a double-minor penalty .
Typical modern memory card reader  ,  compatible with  अनेक  common formats
a   मेमोरी  card  रीडर  is a device  ,   typically  having a  usb   इंटरफ़ेस   ,  for accessing the data on  a  memory card such as  a  CompactFlash ( CF ) , Secure Digital (  sd  ) or MultiMediaCard ( MMC ) .
Most  कार्ड  readers also  प्रस्ताव  write capability ,  और  together with the card , this can function as a pen  ड्राइव  .
Some printers and personal computers have a built-in card reader .
A  मल्टी  card reader is used  लिये   संचार   साथ  more than one type of flash memory  कार्ड  .
Multi card readers do not have built-in memory capacity , but are  समर्थ  to accept multiple types and styles  of  memory cards .
The number  of  compatible memory cards  varies  from reader to  रीडर  and can  शामिल  more than 20 different types .
The number of different  मेमोरी  cards that a multi card reader can accept  is  expressed as x-in-1 , with x being  a  figure  of  merit indicating the  क्रमांक  of memory cards accepted , such as  35-in-1  .
There are three categories  of  card readers  sorted  by the  प्रकार  and quantity of  the  card slots : single card reader ( e.g . 1x SD-only ) , multi card reader ( e.g  .  9-in-1 )  और  series  कार्ड  reader ( e.g . 4x  sd  only ) .
Some kinds  of  memory cards  साथ  their own USB functions do not need  the  card reader ,  ऐसे  as the Intelligent Stick  मेमोरी  card , which can plug directly into  a  USB slot .
The USB device class used is 0x08 .
Bullying is detrimental to students ' well-being and development .
Bullying is the use of  फ़ोर्स  or coercion to abuse  or  intimidate  अन्य  .
The  बर्ताव  can be habitual and involve an imbalance of social or  शारीरिक  power .
It can include verbal  उत्पीड़न  or threat , physical assault or coercion and  may  be directed repeatedly towards particular victims , perhaps on grounds  of  race , religion  ,  gender ,  कामुकता  , or  क्षमता   .
If bullying  is   किया  by a group , it is called  mobbing  .
The victim of bullying is sometimes referred to as a `` target ''  .
Bullying can be defined in many different ways .
The UK currently has no  विधिक  definition of bullying  ,  while some U.S.  राज्य  have laws against it .
Bullying consists of three basic types of abuse – emotional ,  मौखिक  , and physical .
It typically involves subtle  विधि  of coercion such as intimidation  .
Bullying ranges  इससे  simple one-on-one bullying to more complex bullying in which  the  bully  may  have one or more `` lieutenants '' who may seem to be willing to assist the  प्राथमिक   बुली  in his or her bullying  क्रियाएँ  .
Bullying  in  school and  the  workplace is also referred to as  पीर  abuse .
रॉबर्ट  W. Fuller has analyzed  धमकाना  in the context  of  rankism  .
a  bullying culture  can  develop in  कोई  context in which human  beings  interact  साथ  each other .
इस  includes school , church , family  ,   the   कार्यस्थल  , home  ,  and neighborhoods .
Happy slapping  in  the Instituto Regional  federico  Errázuriz  ,  Santa Cruz , Chile
लौरा  Bush and Rae  leigh   bradbury  (  formerly  missing ) on April  4  , 2007  ,   in  Austin , Texas , after  the  8-year-old introduced Mrs.  बुश   दौरान  announcement of the  भविष्य  opening of the Texas  क्षेत्रीय  Office of the National Center for Missing  और  Exploited Children .
Rae Leigh  थी  the  पहला   चाइल्ड  in  the  U.S.  to  be recovered  as  a result of an  एम्बर  Alert when she was 8 weeks old in November 1998 .
an  AMBER Alert or a  चाइल्ड  Abduction Emergency ( SAME code : CAE )  is  a child abduction alert  प्रणाली   originating  in 1996  ,   अभी  employed in 9 countries .
AMBER is officially a backronym for America 's Missing : Broadcasting  आपात  Response , named  लिये  Amber  hagerman  , a  9-year-old  abducted and murdered  in   आर्लिंगटन  ,  टेक्सास  in 1996 .
Alternate regional alert names were once used ; in Georgia , `` Levi 's  कॉल  '' (  नामित  after  लेवी  Frady ) ; in Hawaii , ``  maile  Amber Alert  ''  ( after Maile Gilbert ) ; and Arkansas , ``  मॉर्गन  Nick Amber Alert '' ( in memory of  मॉर्गन   chauntel  Nick ) .
AMBER Alerts are distributed via commercial radio stations  ,  Internet radio , satellite radio , television stations , and cable  tv  by  the  Emergency Alert System and NOAA Weather Radio (  जहाँ  they are  termed   ``  Child Abduction  आपात  '' or `` Amber Alerts '' ) .
The alerts are also issued via e-mail  ,   इलेक्ट्रॉनिक  traffic-condition signs , the LED billboards which are located  बाहर  of newer Walgreens locations , along with the LED/LCD  लक्षण  of billboard companies  ऐसे  as Clear Channel  बाहरी  ,  सीबीएस  Outdoor and Lamar , or through  बेतार  device SMS  टेक्स्ट  messages .
AMBER Alert has also teamed up with Google and Facebook to relay information  regarding   an  AMBER  चेतावनी  to an ever growing demographic  .
Those interested in subscribing to receive  एम्बर   चेतावनियाँ  in their area via SMS messages can visit  बेतार  Amber Alerts , which are offered  by  law as  फ़्री  messages .
In some states , the  प्रदर्शक  scrollboards in front of  लॉटरी  terminals are also  प्रयुक्त  .
The  निर्णय  to declare an AMBER  चेतावनी  is made by each  पुलिस  organization (  in  many cases ,  the  state police or  राजमार्ग  patrol  )  which investigates  प्रत्येक  of  the  abductions .
Public information  in  an  एम्बर   चेतावनी  usually consists  of  the name and description of  the  abductee , a description of the suspected abductor ,  और  a description and license plate number  of  the abductor 's vehicle , if available .
Monica Samille Lewinsky ( born July  23   ,   1973  )  is  an American woman with whom United States President Bill Clinton admitted to having had an `` improper relationship '' while  वो   worked  at the White  हाउस  in 1995 and 1996 .
The affair and its repercussions (  जिससे  included Clinton 's impeachment ) became known  as  the Lewinsky scandal .
House of Night is a series of  पिशाच  -themed fantasy  novels  by  अमरीकी   लेखक  P. C. Cast and her daughter  kristin  Cast .
It follows the adventures of Zoey Redbird , a sixteen-year-old girl  जो  has  बस  become a `` fledgling  vampyre   ''   और  is  जरूरी  to attend the  हाउस  of Night  बोर्डिंग   स्कूल  in Tulsa , Oklahoma .
the   श्रेणी   रै   महरूम   on  the New York Times  बेहतरीन   विक्रेता  list for  63  weeks and there are over  सात   लाख   नक़ल  in print in North America  अलोन   .
The sixth novel , Tempted , which went on sale on October  27   ,  2009 with a first printing of  a  million copies ,  डाला  the USA  आज  bestseller list that week at # 1 .
In  जनवरी  , 2010  ,  Gezeichnet , a  जर्मनी  translation of Marked , reached the  #  1 spot on  the  Der Spiegel  बेस्टसेलर  list  .
The series has so far sold  अधिक  than ten million books in 39 countries .
burned  was  released  on April 27 , 2010 ,  और  like Tempted  ,  it  डाला  the USA Today bestseller  सूची  that  सप्ताह   at  # 1 .
Awakened ,  released  in January  ,  2011  ,  also  डाला  the list at # 1 .
The series  ,  which is published by St Martin 's Press  is   नियोजित  to  शामिल  twelve books .
In  2008   ,   योजनाएँ  for a film adaptation were also announced .
The  दसवाँ   किताब  in the series  ,  Hidden  ,  was released on October 16 , 2012 .
The  दूसरी   किताब  in the novellas ( which give backgrounds  on  supporting  वर्ण  )  ,  Lenobia 's Vow , was  released  January 31 , 2012 .
Book  ग्यारह  is currently called Revealed , and the Casts have announced that two  अधिक  novellas , Neferet’s Curse  ,  planned to be released February 19  ,   2013  , and a prequel novel about Kalona , are to be released to  coincide  with the eleventh and  बारहवीं  books .
in  Greek mythology , the  trojan  War was waged  विरूद्ध  the city of Troy by the Achaeans ( Greeks  )  after Paris  of  Troy took Helen from  उसके  husband Menelaus king  of  Sparta .
The war is  एक  of the most important  कार्यक्रम  in Greek  mythology  and has been narrated through many works of Greek  साहित्य  , most notably through  होमर  's Iliad  और  the Odyssey .
The Iliad relates a  भाग  of the last year of the siege of Troy  ;  the Odyssey  describes  Odysseus  's   यात्रा  home  .
Other  भाग  of  the  war are  contained   in  a  साईकिल  of  एपिक  poems , which have survived  through  fragments .
एपीसोड  from the war provided material  लिये  Greek tragedy and other works of Greek literature  ,  and  लिये  Roman poets including Virgil and  ओविड  .
The war originated from a quarrel between the goddesses Athena , Hera , and Aphrodite , after Eris , the goddess  of  strife and discord ,  दिया  them a golden apple , sometimes known as the  ठहराना  of Discord , marked  ``  for  the  fairest '' .
Zeus sent  the  goddesses to Paris , who  judged  that Aphrodite , as the `` fairest '' , should receive  the  apple .
In  एक्सचेंज  , Aphrodite made  हेलेन  , the most beautiful of all women and wife of Menelaus , fall in love with Paris  ,  who took her to  ट्रॉय  .
Agamemnon  ,  king of Mycenae and  the  brother of Helen 's husband  menelaus  ,  led  an expedition  of  Achaean troops to Troy and  besieged  the  नगर  for ten years because  of  Paris '  बेइज्जती  .
बाद  the deaths of  अनेक  heroes , including the Achaeans Achilles and  अजाक्स  ,  और  the Trojans  हेक्टर  and Paris , the city  गिरी  to  the  ruse  of   the  Trojan Horse  .
the  Achaeans slaughtered the  ट्रोजन्स   (  except for some of the women and children whom they kept or sold as  स्लेव  )  और  desecrated the  मंदिरों  , thus earning the gods ' wrath .
Few of the Achaeans returned safely to their homes and many  संस्थापित  colonies in distant  shores  .
The Romans later traced their origin  to  Aeneas  ,  one of the  ट्रोजन्स  , who was said to have led the surviving Trojans to modern-day  इटली  .
the  ancient Greeks  विचार   कि   the   trojan  War was a historical event that had  लिया  place in the 13th or 12th  सदी  BC , and believed that Troy was located in modern-day Turkey near the Dardanelles .
By modern times , both the war and  the   नगर  were widely  believed  to be non-historical  .
In 1868 , however , the German  पुरातत्ववेत्ताओं  Heinrich Schliemann met Frank Calvert ,  जो  convinced  schliemann   कि  Troy was at Hissarlik and Schliemann took over  calvert  's  excavations  on  प्रॉपर्टी  belonging to Calvert ; this claim  is  now accepted by most scholars .
whether  there is any historical reality behind the Trojan War is an open question .
Many  विद्वानों   मानना  that there is a historical core to the tale  ,  though this  may  simply mean that the Homeric stories are a fusion  of  various tales of sieges and expeditions by Mycenaean  यूनानियों  during the Bronze Age .
Those who believe that  the   कहानियां  of the Trojan War are  निकला  from  a  specific historical conflict  प्रायः  date it to the  12th   or  11th centuries BC , often preferring the  तिथियाँ  given by Eratosthenes , 1194–1184 BC ,  जिससे  roughly corresponds  साथ  archaeological evidence of  a   अनर्थकारी  burning of Troy VIIa .
Anarchists have employed  निश्चित  symbols for their cause , including  सबसे  prominently the circle-A and the black  ध्वज  , although  anarchists  have historically largely denied the importance of symbols to political  गति  .
Since the revival of anarchism around  the  start  of  the 21st-century concurrent with the rise of the  anti-globalization  movement , anarchist cultural symbols  हैं  widely present  .
The greater palatine canal ( or pterygopalatine canal ) is a  ड्योढ़ी  in the skull  कि  transmits the greater palatine artery ,  रग  , and nerve between  the  pterygopalatine  fossa  and the oral cavity .
Surface  तापमान  of  अंटार्कटिक  in winter and summer from the  यूरोपीय   केन्द्र  for Medium-Range  मौसम  Forecasts
The climate of Antarctica is the coldest on the  पूरे   of  Earth .
Antarctica has the lowest naturally occurring temperature  कभी  recorded  on  the ground  on  Earth : −89.2  °c  (  −128.6  °F ) at Vostok Station .
It is also extremely dry ( technically a desert ) ,  averaging  166  mm   (  6.5 in ) of  वर्षण  per  साल  .
Even so , on most parts  of  the continent the snow rarely melts and is  आखिरकार  compressed  to   become  the glacial  बर्फ  that  makes  up the ice  चादर  .
Weather fronts rarely penetrate far into the continent .
Most of Antarctica has an  बर्फ  cap climate  (  Köppen EF )  साथ  very cold , generally extremely  शुष्क  weather throughout  the  year  और  no month  averaging   ऊपर   0  °C ( 32  °f  ) .
कुछ  fringe  तटीय   क्षेत्रों  have a  टुण्ड्रा  climate ( Köppen ET ) with a short summer averaging above freezing ,  और  much higher precipitation  .
Current head coach Mike Tomlin ,  दौरान  the  2007  season
The Pittsburgh Steelers  मताधिकार  has had 16 head coaches throughout its history .
Founded as the Pittsburgh  pirates  in , the name was changed to the Steelers prior to the season to celebrate  the  city 's heritage of producing steel .
Joe Bach served two separate terms as head coach and Walt  kiesling  served three separate terms .
During the and seasons ,  due  to the amount of players who fought  in  World  युद्ध  II , the Steelers combined their team with  फिलाडेल्फिया  and Chicago ,  क्रमशः  .
During these seasons , Steelers '  कोच  Walt Kiesling  साझा  coaching duties with Greasy Neale and Phil Handler , who have not been  शामिल  within this list  .
Struggling for much of the franchise 's  जल्दी   सालो  , the team  's  first season with  अधिक  wins than losses was coached  by   jock  Sutherland in .
in   ,  under Sutherland ,  the  Steelers played their first playoff  खेल  against the Philadelphia  ईगल्स  .
Ten of  the  16 head  कोच  spent their  संपूर्ण  professional coaching careers  साथ  the franchise ,  सहित   जॉन  McNally , Walt Kiesling and Chuck Noll ,  जो  have  भी  been voted into  the   प्रो  Football  हॉल  of Fame .
One of only  चार  men  to  coach the same team for  23   सालो   ,  Chuck Noll  रिटायर्ड  in  .
Noll is  भी  the only coach in  नेशनल  Football League history to win four  सुपर  Bowls  .
विधेयक   cowher  , Noll  's  replacement  ,  coached the Steelers to their fifth Super  कटोरी   विजय  ,  in  2005  .
The Steelers  छठे   सुपर  Bowl win came in Super Bowl XLIII , while head coached by Mike Tomlin , the team 's current  सिर  coach .
in   दण्ड  law , fraud is intentional deception made for personal  लाभ  or to damage another individual  ;  the related adjective is fraudulent , and verb is defraud .
Fraud is a crime and a civil law violation , though  the  specific criminal  विधि   परिभाषा   varies  by legal jurisdiction .
Defrauding people or entities of money  or  valuables is  a   आम  purpose of fraud .
a  hoax also involves deception ,  लकिन   बगैर   the  intention of gain  or  of damaging or depriving the  शिकार  .
Fraud is a defense in a civil action  लिये  breach of contract or specific performance of  a   अनुबंध  .
Fraud is a basis  लिये  equitable  क्षेत्राधिकार  .
Passover ,  or  Pesach ( from  :  in Hebrew ,  यहूदी   )   ,  Tiberian :  ,   आधुनिक   यहूदी  : /ˈpesaχ/ Pesah , Pesakh , Yiddish  :  Peysekh ,  paysakh   ,  Paysokh ) is  an  important  biblically  -derived Jewish festival .
historically  , together with Shavuot (  ``   पेंटेकोस्ट  '' ) and  sukkot  ( ``  झोपड़ियों  '' ) , Passover is  एक  of the three pilgrimage festivals ( Shalosh Regalim  )  during which the entire population of the kingdom of Judah made a  यात्राएं  to the  टेम्पल  in Jerusalem .
Samaritans still make this  यात्राएं  to Mount  gerizim  , but  तभी  men participate  in   पब्लिक  worship  .
passover  commences on the 15th  of  the Hebrew month of Nisan  और  lasts for either seven days ( in Israel ) or eight  दिनों  ( in the diaspora ) .
In Judaism ,  a   दिन  commences  at   संध्या   और  lasts until the  following  dusk , thus  the  first day of Passover  तभी  begins after  संध्या  of the 14th of  nisan   और  ends at dusk of  the  15th day of the month of Nisan .
The rituals unique to the Passover celebrations commence with the  passover   seder   जब  the 15th of Nisan  रै  begun .
In the Northern Hemisphere Passover  takes  place  in   वसन्त  as the  तोरा   prescribes  it  :   ``   in   the   माह  of [ the ] spring ''  (  בחדש האביב ) .
It is one of the  सबसे  widely observed Jewish holidays  .
The Jewish people celebrate Passover as a commemoration of their liberation over 3,300 years ago  by  God  इससे  slavery in ancient Egypt that was ruled  by  the Pharaohs , and their  जनम   as  a  स्वदेश  under the leadership of  मूसा  .
It commemorates the  स्टोरी   of  the Exodus as  वर्णित  in  the  Hebrew Bible  विशेषकर   in  the Book of Exodus , in which the Israelites were freed from slavery  in  Egypt .
In the narrative of the Exodus , the Bible  tells  that God helped the Children of Israel escape from their slavery in Egypt by inflicting ten plagues upon the ancient Egyptians before  the   pharaoh  would release his Israelite slaves ; the tenth and worst of  the  plagues was the death of the Egyptian first-born  .
The Israelites were instructed to mark the doorposts  of  their  घरों  with the blood  of  a  slaughtered  spring lamb and ,  upon  seeing this , the spirit of the Lord knew to pass over the first-born in  ये  homes , hence the  नाम  of the holiday .
There is some debate over where the term  is  actually derived from .
When  the  Pharaoh freed the Israelites ,  it   is  said that they left in  ऐसे  a hurry that  वे   could   नहीं   इंतजार  for  ब्रैड  dough  to  rise ( leaven ) .
In  commemoration  ,  लिये  the duration  of  Passover no leavened  ब्रैड  is eaten  ,  for which reason it is called `` The  पर्व  of the Unleavened  ब्रैड  '' .
Thus  matzo  ( flat unleavened bread  )   is  eaten during Passover and it is  a  symbol of the holiday .
Halley 's Comet or Comet Halley  (  or ) , officially designated 1P/Halley , is  the  best-known of the short-period comets and is visible from Earth  प्रत्येक  75–76 years .
Halley is the only short-period comet that is  clearly  visible to the  नग्न  eye  इससे  Earth , and thus  the  only naked-eye comet that might appear  twice   in   a   इंसान  lifetime  .
Other naked-eye  धूमकेतुओं  may  be   उज्जवल  and  अधिक  spectacular , but  होगा  appear only  एकबार  in  हज़ारों  of  सालो  .
Halley 's returns to the  भीतरी  Solar  प्रणाली  have  महरूम  observed and recorded by astronomers since at least  240   bce  .
साफ   रिकॉर्ड  of the comet 's  दिखावे  were made by Chinese , Babylonian ,  और   मध्यकालीन  European chroniclers , but were not  पहचाना  as reappearances of the same object at  the   समय  .
the   धूमकेतु  's  periodicity  was first  संकल्पित  in 1705 by  अंग्रेज़ी  astronomer  edmond  Halley , after whom it is now named .
Halley 's Comet last appeared in the inner Solar System in 1986 and will next appear in mid-2061 .
During its 1986 apparition  ,  Halley became the first  धूमकेतु  to be observed in detail  by  spacecraft , providing the  पहला  observational  आंकड़ा  on the structure of a comet nucleus  और  the mechanism of coma and tail formation .
These observations supported a number of longstanding hypotheses about comet construction  ,   विशेषकर  Fred Whipple 's `` dirty snowball '' model , which  correctly  predicted that Halley would  be   रचित  of a mixture  of  volatile ices – such as water , carbon dioxide and ammonia –  और  dust .
The missions also  provided  data which substantially  reformed  and  reconfigured  these ideas  ;  for instance it  is   अभी  understood that Halley  's   सतह  is largely  रचित   of   dusty  , non-volatile materials  ,  and that only  a  small portion of it  is  icy .
anti-communism  is opposition to communism .
Organized anti-communism developed  in  reaction to the rise of communism , especially after the 1917  अक्तूबर   क्रान्ति  in Russia and reaching global dimensions  दौरान  the Cold  युद्ध   .
Most anti-communists reject  the   अवधारणा  of historical materialism , which  is  a central idea in Marxism .
Anti-communists reject  the  Marxist  विश्वास  that capitalism will be followed by socialism and communism  ,  just as feudalism was followed  by  capitalism .
anti-communists  question the validity  of  the Marxist  अर्जी  that the  समाजवादी   राज्य  will ``  wither  away '' when it  becomes  unnecessary in a  सच्चा   कम्युनिस्ट  society .
Anti-communists argue that the repression  in  the early  सालो  of Bolshevik rule , while  नहीं  as extreme  as  that during Joseph Stalin 's rule  ,  was still severe by reasonable standards , citing examples  ऐसे  as Felix Dzerzhinsky  's  secret police , which eliminated numerous political opponents  by  extrajudicial executions , and the brutal crushing of the Kronstadt  विद्रोह  and Tambov  विद्रोह   .
Some anti-communists  refer   to  both Communism and fascism  as  totalitarianism , seeing similarity  between  the actions  of  communist and  फासिस्ट  governments .
Historian Robert Conquest has argued that Communism was responsible  लिये  tens of millions of deaths during  the  20th century .
Opponents argue that  कम्युनिस्ट  parties that have come to power  have  tended to be rigidly intolerant of political opposition  .
These  प्रतिद्वंद्वियों  claim that  सबसे  Communist  देशों  have shown no signs of advancing from Marx 's  समाजवादी  stage  of  economy to  an  ideal communist stage .
Rather ,  कम्युनिस्ट  governments have been accused of creating a  नई  ruling  क्लास   (  a Nomenklatura )  ,  with powers and privileges  वृहद  than those  previously  enjoyed by the upper classes in  the  non- communist regimes .
Gil Heron ( 9 April 1922  –  27 November 2008 ) was a Jamaican  पेशेवर   footballer  .
he  was the first black player to play for Scottish club Celtic , and was the father of poet  और  musician  gil  Scott-Heron  .
He died in Detroit of a heart attack on 27 November 2008  .
The soybean ( US )  or  soya bean ( UK )  (  Glycine max ) is  a   प्रजाति  of legume native to East Asia  ,  widely grown for its edible bean which has numerous  उपयोग  .
the  plant is classed as an oilseed rather than  a   पल्स  by the  un  Food and  agricultural   संगठन  ( FAO ) .
Fat-free ( defatted ) soybean meal is a significant  और  cheap source of protein for  एनिमल  feeds and many prepackaged meals ;  सोया   सब्ज़ी  oil is another product of processing the soybean crop .
For example , soybean products such as textured  सब्ज़ी   प्रोटीन  ( TVP )  हैं  ingredients in  अनेक   मांस   और  dairy analogues .
Soybeans produce significantly more protein per acre  than   सबसे  other uses of land .
Traditional nonfermented food uses of soybeans  शामिल  soy  मिल्क   ,  and from the latter tofu and tofu skin .
fermented  foods include soy sauce , fermented  सेम  paste , natto , and tempeh ,  among  others .
The oil is used in many industrial applications .
The main producers of soy are  the   संयुक्त   राज्य  ( 35 % )  ,  Brazil ( 27 % ) ,  अर्जेंटीना   (  19 %  )  , China  (   6  %  )   और  India ( 4 % ) .
The  सेम  contain  significant  amounts of phytic acid ,  alpha-linolenic  acid  ,  and isoflavones .
Harrison Ford ( born July 13 ,  1942  )  is  an American film actor and producer .
he  is famous  लिये  his performances as Han  सोलो  in the original Star  युद्धों  trilogy and the title character of the Indiana  जोन्स  film series  .
Ford is also known for his  भूमिकाएँ  as  रिक  Deckard in Blade Runner  ,   जॉन  Book in Witness  और  Jack  रयान  in Patriot Games and Clear and Present Danger .
His  करियर  has spanned  छह   दशकों  and  शामिल  roles in several Hollywood blockbusters , including Presumed  निर्दोष  ,  the   भगोड़े  , Air Force One , and  कया  Lies Beneath .
At one  पाइंट  , four of the top six box-office hits of  सब   समय  included one of his roles .
Five of his films have been inducted into the National  फिल्मी  Registry .
In 1997 ,  घाट  was ranked No . 1 in Empire `` The Top 100 Movie Stars of All Time  ''  list  .
, the United States domestic box office grosses  of   घाट  's films total  over  US $ 3.5  अरब  , with worldwide grosses  surpassing  $  6  billion , making Ford the third highest grossing U.S. domestic box-office star .
Ford is the husband of actress Calista Flockhart .
A tube of ChapStick
ChapStick is a brand name  लिये  lip balm manufactured  by  Pfizer Consumer Healthcare  और   प्रयुक्त  in  अनेक  countries  विश्वव्यापी   .
It is  intended  to help treat and prevent chapped  होठ  ; hence the name .
Many varieties also  शामिल   सनस्क्रीन  in order  to  prevent  sunburn  .
Due to its popularity , the term has become a genericized trademark .
it  popularly refers to any lip balm contained in a  lipstick-style  tube and applied in the  वही  manner as lipstick .
however  , the  पद  is still  a  registered trademark , with  अधिकारों   exclusively  owned by Pfizer .
In Sweden  और   in  the United Kingdom , the product 's main competitor is Lypsyl  ,   बना   by  Novartis  उपभोक्ता  Health , which is  वितरित  in similar packaging  to  ChapStick .
George Berkeley ( ;  12  March  168514  January 1753 )  ,  also known as Bishop Berkeley ( Bishop of  cloyne   )   ,  was an Anglo-Irish philosopher whose primary achievement was the advancement of a theory he called `` immaterialism ''  (  later referred to as `` subjective idealism `` by others  )  .
इस  theory denies the  अस्तित्व  of material substance and instead contends that familiar objects  जैसे   टेबल  and chairs are  तभी  ideas in the minds of  perceivers  ,  और  as a result  can  not  मौजूद  without being perceived  .
Thus , as Berkeley famously put it ,  लिये  physical objects `` esse  est   percipi   ''  ( `` to be is  to   be  perceived `` )  .
Berkeley is also known  लिये  his critique of abstraction , an important premise in  उसके  argument for  immaterialism  .
In 1709 , Berkeley published his first major work , , in which he discussed the limitations of human vision  और  advanced  the  theory that the proper objects of  sight  are not material objects , but  लाइट  and  रंग  .
This foreshadowed his chief philosophical  कार्य  A Treatise Concerning  the  Principles of Human Knowledge  in  1710 which , after its poor  रिसेप्शन  , he rewrote in dialogue  रूप  and published  अंतर्गत  the title  तीन   संवाद  between Hylas and  philonous   in  1713 .
In this book , Berkeley 's views were represented by  philonous  ( Greek  :   'प्रेमr   of   दिमाग  ' ) ,  जबकि  Hylas ( Greek  :  'matter ' ) embodies the Irish thinker’s opponents  ,   in  particular John  locke  .
Berkeley  argued  against Sir Isaac Newton 's doctrine of absolute space  ,  time and motion in De Motu  (  on  गति  )  ,  published 1721 .
His arguments were a precursor to the views of Mach  और  Einstein .
In 1732 , he published  alciphron  , a  ईसाई  apologetic against  the  free-thinkers , and in 1734 , he published  the  Analyst , an empiricist critique  of   the  foundations of  infinitesimal  calculus , which was influential in the  विकास  of mathematics .
His  पिछला  major  philosophical  work , Siris (  1744  ) , begins by advocating the medicinal use  of  tar water  ,  and then continues to discuss a wide  दायरा  of topics including science , philosophy , and  धर्मशास्त्र  .
ब्याज   in  Berkeley 's work increased  बाद  World War  ii  , because he tackled many of the  मुद्दे   of  paramount interest to  दर्शनशास्त्र  in the 20th century  ऐसे  as the  समस्याएं   of  perception  ,  the difference between  प्राथमिक  and secondary qualities , and  the   महत्व  of  भाषा  .
Qingdao ( )  ,  historically known as Tsingtao  ,  is a major  नगर  in eastern  शानदोंग   प्रांत  ,  पूर्वी  China , with a population  of  over 8.715 million (  2010  census ) .
Its built up area , made  of  6  शहरी  districts and  4   county-level  cities , is home to about  4,896,000  inhabitants in 2010 .
It borders Yantai  to   the  northeast , Weifang to the west and Rizhao to  the  southwest .
Qīng  (  ) in Chinese means `` green '' or `` lush '' , while dǎo  (  ) means ``  द्वीप  ''  .
Qingdao is administered at the sub-provincial level .
Lying across the Shandong Peninsula while looking out to the Yellow Sea , Qingdao  is  a major  seaport  , naval  आधार   ,  and industrial centre  .
It is also the site of the Tsingtao Brewery .
the  world 's longest sea bridge , the Qingdao Haiwan Bridge ,  कड़ी  the main urban area  of   चिंगदाओ   साथ  Huangdao district ,  straddling  the Jiaozhou Bay sea areas .
चिंगदाओ  is named China 's most livable city .
Mimivirus  is  a viral genus containing  a   सिंगल  identified species named Acanthamoeba polyphaga mimivirus ( APMV ) , or is a  समूह  of  phylogenetically  related large viruses ( designated  प्रायः   mimin  ) .
In colloquial speech , APMV is  अधिक  commonly  referred  to as  बस  `` mimivirus  ''  .
Until  अक्तूबर  2011 , when a larger virus Megavirus  chilensis  was described , it had the largest capsid diameter of all  ज्ञात  viruses .
Mimivirus  रै  a large  और  complex genome compared with  सबसे  other  वाइरस  .
Mimivirus , short for ``  mimicking  microbe '' , is  so  called to  प्रतिबिंबित  its  विशाल  size  और  apparent Gram-staining  गुण  .
The Mexican War of Independence ( 1810–1821 )  थी  an armed conflict between  the  people of  मैक्सिको   और  the  स्पेनी  colonial  अधिकारियों  which started on  सितंबर  16 ,  1810   .
The  गति  , which became known as  the  Mexican War of  स्वतंत्रता   ,   थी  led  by   mexican-born  Spaniards ,  mestizos   और  Amerindians who sought independence from Spain .
It started as an  आदर्शवादी   peasants  ' rebellion against their colonial masters  ,  but ended as an unlikely alliance between Mexican ex-royalists  और  Mexican guerrilla insurgents .
Crohn 's disease , also known as Crohn syndrome and regional  enteritis  , is  a  type of inflammatory bowel disease that may affect any  भाग  of the gastrointestinal tract from mouth  to  anus , causing  a  wide  किस्में  of symptoms .
It primarily causes abdominal  पीड़ा  ,  अतिसार  ( which may  be  bloody if inflammation  is  at its worst )  ,  vomiting ( can be continuous ) ,  or  weight loss , but may  भी  cause complications outside the gastrointestinal tract such as skin rashes , arthritis , inflammation  of  the eye  ,  tiredness , and lack of concentration .
crohn  's  बीमारी   is  caused by interactions between environmental , immunological and  बैक्टीरियल  factors in genetically susceptible individuals .
This results in a chronic inflammatory disorder , in which the body 's immune system attacks the gastrointestinal tract possibly directed at microbial antigens  .
crohn  's disease has wrongly been described  as  an autoimmune disease  in  the past ; recent investigators have  वर्णित   it  as an immune deficiency state .
There is  a  genetic association  साथ  Crohn 's  बीमारी  , primarily with variations of the NOD2  जीन  and its protein ,  जिससे  senses  बैक्टीरियल  cell walls .
सहोदर  of affected individuals are at higher risk  .
Males  और  females are  बराबर  affected .
Smokers  हैं  two times more likely to develop Crohn 's disease than  nonsmokers   .
Crohn 's disease affects between 400,000  और   600,000  people in North America .
Prevalence estimates  लिये  Northern Europe  have   ranged  from 27–48 per 100,000 .
crohn   's  disease tends to present initially in the teens and twenties , with another peak incidence  in   the   fifties  to seventies , although the disease can occur  at  any age .
There  is  no known  फार्मास्युटिकल  or surgical cure  लिये  Crohn 's disease .
उपचार  options are restricted to  controlling  symptoms  ,  maintaining  remission  , and preventing relapse  .
The disease was named after gastroenterologist  burrill  Bernard Crohn ,  जो  , in 1932 , together  साथ  two  अन्य  colleagues at Mount Sinai Hospital in New York , described a series of patients with inflammation of the terminal ileum , the area most commonly affected by the  बीमारी  .
This is  an  incomplete list of the tallest buildings and structures by  देश   .
The  सूची  directly  शामिल  the tallest buildings  और  structures for each country ,  और   जहाँ  appropriate  ,   it  also  अंक   to   अधिक  detailed  country-specific  lists .
Rough  और  Ready is  a  census-designated place in Nevada County , California , United States  .
It is  स्तिथ  west of Grass Valley ,  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  , approximately 62 miles  (  100 km  )   इससे  Sacramento .
the  population was 963  at   the  2010 census  .
YouTube is  a  video-sharing website  ,   निर्मित  by three former PayPal employees in February 2005 , on which users can upload ,  दृश्य  and  share  videos  .
The company is based in San Bruno ,  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  , and uses Adobe Flash  वीडियो   और  HTML5 technology to display  a  wide  किस्में   of  user-generated video  सामग्री  , including movie clips , TV clips  ,   और  music videos , as well as amateur content such  as  video blogging , short  असली  videos ,  और  educational  वीडियो  .
Most of the content on YouTube has been uploaded by  individuals  , although media corporations including CBS , the BBC  ,  Vevo , Hulu  ,  and other organizations offer some of their material via the site ,  as   भाग  of the YouTube partnership program  .
Unregistered users can  देखें   वीडियो  , while registered users can upload an unlimited number of videos .
Videos  माना  to contain potentially offensive content are available only to registered users at least  18  years  बूढ़ा  .
In November  2006  , YouTube , LLC was bought by Google for  us  $ 1.65 billion  ,   और  operates  as  a subsidiary of Google .
Sister Act is a  musical  written by Cheri Steinkellner and Bill Steinkellner with  अतिरिक्त   किताब  material  by   डगलस  Carter Beane  ,  with lyrics by Glenn Slater  और  music by Alan  menken  .
It is based on  the  hit 1992 film comedy of  the  same name .
The  2009  West End production was  उत्पादित  by Stage  entertainment  , Whoopi Goldberg , and Michael Reno for Sis Acts LLC  .
Goldberg is  भी  a producer of the 2011 Broadway  अनुकूलन  .
Microsoft DirectX  is  a collection of application programming interfaces ( APIs ) for  हैंडलिंग  tasks related to multimedia ,  विशेषकर  game programming and video ,  on  Microsoft platforms .
Originally ,  the  names of these APIs  सब  began with Direct  ,  such as Direct3D , DirectDraw , DirectMusic ,  directplay   ,  DirectSound  ,  and so forth  .
The name DirectX was  coined   as  shorthand term for  सब  of these APIs  (  the X  खड़ा  in for the particular API names ) and soon became  the  name  of  the collection .
When Microsoft later set out to  develop  a gaming console ,  the  X was used as  the   आधार   of   the  name Xbox to  indicate  that the console was based  on  DirectX technology .
the  X initial has been  carried  forward in the naming of  api  designed for the Xbox  ऐसे  as XInput and the Cross-platform Audio Creation Tool ( XACT )  ,  while the  डाइरेक्टएक्स  pattern has been continued for Windows  api   ऐसे  as Direct2D and DirectWrite .
Direct3D  (   the  3D graphics  api   भीतर  DirectX ) is widely used in the  विकास  of video  खेल   लिये  Microsoft Windows , Microsoft  एक्सबॉक्स  , Microsoft Xbox 360  और  some Sega Dreamcast  खेल  .
direct3d  is  भी  used by other software applications  लिये  visualization and graphics tasks  ऐसे  as CAD/CAM  अभियान्त्रिकी  .
As Direct3D  is  the  सबसे  widely publicized component of DirectX , it is common to see the names `` DirectX '' and `` Direct3D '' used interchangeably .
The DirectX software  विकास   kit  (  sdk  ) consists of runtime libraries in redistributable binary form , along  साथ  accompanying documentation and headers  लिये  use  in  coding .
Originally , the runtimes were only installed by games or explicitly  by  the user  .
Windows 95 did not launch with  डाइरेक्टएक्स  , but DirectX  थी  included  साथ  Windows 95 OEM Service  रिलीज  2 .
Windows 98  और  Windows NT 4.0  दोनो  shipped with DirectX , as has every version of Windows released since .
The SDK is  उपलब्धियाँ  as  a  free download .
जबकि   the  runtimes are proprietary , closed-source software , source code  is  provided for most of the  sdk  samples .
starting  with the release of Windows 8 Developer Preview , DirectX SDK has been integrated into Windows SDK .
Direct3D 9Ex ,  direct3d  10 , and  direct3d  11  हैं  only available for Windows Vista and newer because each of these new versions was built to depend  upon   the  new Windows  प्रदर्शक   ड्राइवर  Model that was  introduced  for Windows Vista .
The  नई  Vista/WDDM graphics  वास्तुकला  includes a  नई  video memory manager supporting virtualization of graphics hardware for various applications  और  services like the Desktop Window Manager .
quetzaltenango  , also commonly known by its indigenous  नाम  , Xelajú , or  अधिक  commonly , Xela  ,  is  the  second  largest  city of Guatemala .
it  is both the capital  of  Quetzaltenango Department and the municipal seat of  quetzaltenango  municipality .
it  has an  अनुमानित  population of 224,703  .
the  population  is  about  61  % indigenous or Amerindian , 34 %  मेस्टिज़ो  or ladino and 5 %  यूरोपीय  .
Quetzaltenango is located in  a  mountain valley  at  an elevation of 2,330 meters (  7,655  ft )  ऊपर  sea level at its lowest part .
it  may reach above  2,400  meters within the  नगर   .
The Municipality of Quetzaltenango consists of  an  area of .
Municipalities abutting the  नगरपालिका  of  quetzaltenango  include : Salcajá , Cantel , Almolonga , Zunil , El Palmar , Concepción Chiquirichapa , San Mateo , La Esperanza , Olintepeque  ,   और  San  आन्द्रेस  Xecul .
All these municipalities are part of the Department of Quetzaltenango  ,   मगर   सैन  Andrés Xecul which is a part of  the  Department  of   totonicapán  .
the  Epic of Gilgamesh , an  एपिक  poem from Mesopotamia , is amongst the earliest  surviving  works of literature  .
the  literary history of Gilgamesh begins  साथ  five  स्वतंत्र  Sumerian poems about 'Bilgamesh  '  ( Sumerian for  gilgamesh  ) , king of  uruk  .
चार  of these were used  as  source material for a combined epic in Akkadian .
This first combined epic , known as the ``  बूढ़ा  Babylonian '' version  ,  dates to the  18th   सदी  BC and  is  titled after  इसके  incipit , Shūtur eli sharrī ( `` Surpassing All Other  किंग्स  '' ) .
Only  a  few fragments of it  have  survived .
The later ``  मानक   babylonian  ''  संस्करण  dates from  the   13th   to  the 10th centuries BC and  bears  the incipit Sha naqba īmuru ( `` He  जो  Saw the  गहन   ''   )   .
Fragments of approximately  दो  thirds of this  longer  , twelve-tablet version have been recovered .
Some of  the   बेहतरीन  copies were discovered in the library ruins  of  the 7th-century BC Assyrian king Ashurbanipal  .
The story centers  on  a  दोस्ती  between  gilgamesh  and Enkidu .
Enkidu  is  a wild man created  by  the  देवताओं  as Gilgamesh 's equal to distract him from oppressing the people of Uruk .
Together  ,  they journey to the Cedar  पहाड़  to defeat Humbaba , its monstrous guardian .
Later they kill the Bull of Heaven , which  the  goddess Ishtar sends to  सजा   gilgamesh  for  spurning  her advances .
As a punishment for these actions ,  the   देवताओं  sentence Enkidu  to  death .
The second half of the  एपिक   focuses  on Gilgamesh 's distress at Enkidu 's  मौत  , and his quest  लिये  immortality  .
in  order to learn the secret  of  eternal life , Gilgamesh undertakes a  long  and perilous  यात्रा  .
he  learns that `` The life  कि  you are seeking you  होगा  never find .
When the gods created man they allotted to him death , but  जीवन  they retained in their own keeping . ''
This quote was originally attributed to Siduri in the Old Babylonian version  of   the  epic , and then attributed to the immortal flood  नायिका  Utnapishtim in the Akkadian version of  the  epic  .
Nevertheless ,  gilgamesh  's fame lived on after his death , because of his great building projects ,  और   उसके  account  of  what Utnapishtim told him happened during the flood .
The  स्टोरी  has been translated into many different languages , and Gilgamesh has since become  adapted  in works of  लोकप्रिय  fiction .
There are numerous  debates   over   जो  created  the   पहला  video game  ,   साथ  the answer depending  largely  on how video games are defined .
The evolution  of  video games represents a tangled web of several different  उद्योग  , including scientific , computer , arcade  ,  and consumer electronics .
The  ``  video '' in `` video game `` traditionally refers to a raster display device  .
With the popular catch  phrase  use of the term ``  वीडियो  game '' ,  the  term now implies  सब  display  प्रकार  , formats , and platforms .
Historians have  भी  sought  to  bypass the issue by instead using the more specific ``  डिजिटल  games '' descriptive  .
This term leaves out the earlier analog-based computer games .

Unless otherwise  stated  ,  संख्याएँ  indicate worldwide  इकाई  sold ,  ordered  alphabetically whenever two  or  more list the same amount .
The  एक्सेप्शन  are the  ones  specifying shipments , which have lower  पूर्वता  than others  लिस्टिंग   बिक्री  .
Franchise sales include expansion packs even though they  हैं  not considered full video games .
For best-selling individual  वीडियो  games , see List of best-selling video games .
The sales figures given below do  नहीं   शामिल  arcade  खेल   बिक्री  , which can be found at List of highest-grossing arcade video  खेल  .

This does not necessarily apply for series  कि  are  नहीं  video  game-based  .
Dorothy Ann Willis Richards (  सितंबर  1  ,  1933 – September 13 , 2006 ) was an American politician and the 45th  राज्यपाल  of Texas  .
She  पहला  came  to  national attention as the  राज्य  treasurer of Texas ,  जब  she delivered the keynote address at the 1988 Democratic National Convention .
Richards served as the  45th  Governor of Texas from 1991 to 1995 and was defeated for re-election  in  1994 by George W. Bush .
Ann Richards was the  दूसरी  female governor of Texas .
Data  निष्पादन  Prevention ( DEP ) is  a  security feature included in modern operating  प्रणालियों  .
It is known to be  उपलब्धियाँ  in Linux , Mac  os  X  ,   आईओएस  , Microsoft Windows and Android operating systems and is intended to prevent  an   अनुप्रयोग  or service  इससे   निष्पादित  code  इससे  a non-executable memory region .
This helps  prevent  certain  कारनामे  that store code via a buffer overflow , for example .
dep  runs in two modes :  hardware-enforced   dep  for  cpu  that can mark memory pages  as  nonexecutable , and software-enforced DEP  साथ  limited protection for CPUs that do not have hardware support .
software-enforced   dep  does not protect against  निष्पादन  of code in  आंकड़ा  pages  ,  but instead counters SEH  मिटाकर   ,  another  प्रकार  of attack  .
DEP was introduced on Linux  in  2004  (  kernel 2.6.8  )  , on Windows in 2004 with  खिड़कियाँ  XP Service Pack 2 , while  ठहराना  introduced DEP when they moved to x86 in 2006 .
