, is the Japanese word for hermaphroditism , which is  भी  used in a  broader   भाव   लिये  androgyny .
Beyond Japan the term is  प्रयुक्त  to describe a commonly pornographic  विधा  of computer games , comics and animations , which  शामिल  characters that show both primary sexual  विशेषताएँ  .
But in today  's  language  it  refers almost exclusively for characters who  have   an   overall  feminine  रूप  .
in   कि  case the term is also often abbreviated as futa ( s  )  ,  जिससे   is  occasionally also  प्रयुक्त  as term  लिये  the works itself .
Early CAPTCHAs such as these ,  उत्पन्न  by the EZ-Gimpy program , were  प्रयुक्त   on  Yahoo !
A  आधुनिक  CAPTCHA , rather than attempting to create a  distorted   पृष्ठभूमि  and high  स्तर   of  warping  on  the text , might focus on making segmentation difficult by adding an angled line .
Another way to make segmentation difficult is to  भीड  symbols together , as in Yahoo  !   's  current CAPTCHA format .
कुछ  CAPTCHAs try to utilize  the  ability of people to  देखिए  three-dimensional objects .
on  this  चित्र  , symbols are  drawn  with lines of different thickness to make  an  effect of extrusion .
A CAPTCHA ( )  is   a  type of challenge-response test used in  कम्प्यूटिंग   as  an attempt to ensure that the response is generated by a human being .
The  प्रक्रम  usually involves a computer asking a user  to  complete a simple test which  the  computer is able  to   ग्रेड  .
ये  tests are designed  to  be  आसान  for a computer to generate but difficult for a computer to solve  ,  but again easy  लिये  a human .
If a correct solution is received , it can be presumed to  have  been entered by a human .
A common type of CAPTCHA requires the user to type letters and/or digits  इससे   a  distorted  चित्र  that  appears  on the  स्क्रीन   .
Such tests are commonly used to prevent unwanted internet bots from accessing websites , since a  सामान्य  human can easily read a CAPTCHA , while the  bot  can not  प्रक्रम  the image letters  और  therefore ,  can  not answer  properly  , or at all .
हालांकि   सबसे  CAPTCHAs  हैं  letter pictures randomly generated  ,  many of them have become difficult even for a human to  पढ़ा  , so picture  captchas  were created  in  which a human is shown  a  simple  परीक्षण  to show a picture of a  निश्चित  animal ( given few animal pictures )  ,  which is  सरल  for  a  human being to process  ,  and therefore  आसान  to pick , while a bot can not  प्रक्रम  and solve the  सवाल  because although it can analyze  the  picture  ,  it can not  easily   अंदाज़ा  the animal  .
The term ``  captcha  '' was  coined  in 2000  by  Luis von  ahn  , Manuel Blum  ,  Nicholas J. Hopper , and John  langford   (  all of Carnegie  mellon  University ) .
It  is   an  acronym based on the  शब्द  `` capture '' and standing for ``  completely  Automated Public Turing test to tell  कंप्यूटर  and Humans Apart '' .
Carnegie Mellon University  attempted   to   ट्रेडमार्क  the  पद  on 15 October 2004 ,  लकिन   the  trademark  अनुप्रयोग   थी  abandoned  on   21  April 2008  .
A  captcha  is sometimes described as a reverse Turing  परीक्षण   ,  because it is administered by a machine and targeted at a human  ,  in contrast  to  the standard Turing test  कि  is  typically   administered  by a human and targeted at a machine .
Jacques-Yves Cousteau ( ; commonly known  in  English  as  Jacques  cousteau  ;  11  June 1910 – 25 June 1997 )  थी   a  French naval officer , explorer , conservationist , filmmaker ,  innovator   ,   वैज्ञानिक   ,  photographer ,  लेखक   और  researcher who studied the sea  और  all forms of life in water .
he  co-developed the Aqua-Lung  ,  pioneered marine conservation  और  was a member of the Académie française  .
KFC ( Kentucky  fried  Chicken ) is a fast  खाना  restaurant chain headquartered in Louisville  ,  Kentucky , United States , which specializes in  fried   मुर्गा  .
An  ``  American icon '' , it is the world 's second largest restaurant  कड़ी  overall  (   as  measured  by  sales )  बाद  McDonald 's ,  साथ  over 18,000 outlets in 120  देशों  and territories  .
The company is a subsidiary of  यम   !
Brands ,  a  restaurant company  जिससे   भी  owns  पिज़्ज़ा  Hut and Taco Bell .
KFC was  संस्थापित  by Harland Sanders , who began selling fried  मुर्गा  from  उसके  roadside restaurant in Corbin , Kentucky during the Great Depression .
Sanders was one  of  the  पहला  people to  देखिए   the  potential of the restaurant franchising  अवधारणा  , with the first  ``   केंटकी  Fried  मुर्गा  ''  मताधिकार  opening in Utah in 1952 .
The franchise popularized chicken  in   the  fast  खाना  industry , thereby diversifying the market and challenging the dominance of the hamburger .
विपणन   खुद  as `` Colonel Sanders ''  ,  he became  a  legendary figure of American cultural history , and  उसके  image is still prominently used in KFC branding .
The  कम्पनी  's rapid expansion saw it grow  too  large for Sanders to manage , and in 1964  he  sold  the  company to  a   समूह  of investors  led  by  जॉन  Y  .  Brown , Jr. and Jack Massey .
KFC was one  of  the first fast food chains to expand internationally  ,  opening outlets in England , Mexico  और  Puerto Rico by the  mid-1960s  .
throughout  the 1970s  और  1980s , KFC experienced mixed  सौभाग्य   domestically   ,  as it  गई  through  a  series of  कॉरपोरेट  owners who had little or no experience in  the   रेस्तरां  business .
In  the  early  1970s  , KFC was  बेची  to the spirits firm Heublein ,  जो  were  लिया  over by the R.J. Reynolds  खाना  and tobacco conglomerate , who sold the chain to PepsiCo .
The chain continued to expand overseas however , and in 1987 KFC became the first Western restaurant chain to  खोलें  in China .
The chain has since expanded  rapidly   in  China ,  और  the country is now the company 's most  लाभप्रद  market .
PepsiCo spun off its restaurants division as  tricon  Global Restaurants , which later changed its name to Yum !
Brands .
KFC primarily sells fried chicken pieces and variations such as chicken  सैंडविच  and wraps , salads and side dishes such as French fries and coleslaw , desserts and  नरम  drinks ,  प्रायः  supplied by  पेप्सिको  .
Its  सबसे  famous product  is  pressure fried chicken pieces  ,  seasoned with Sanders ' `` Original Recipe '' of 11 herbs  और  spices  .
the  exact  प्रकृति  of these ingredients is unknown , and represents a notable trade  रहस्य  .
Larger  portions  of fried chicken are served in a distinctive cardboard `` bucket '' , which has  become  a signature  of  the  कड़ी  since  होने  introduced by franchisee  पीट  Harman .
KFC is famous for  the  slogan `` finger lickin ' good ''  ,   जिससे  has since  महरूम  replaced by  ``  Nobody does chicken like KFC '' and  ``  So  शुभ  '' .
Cnidaria  (  with  a  silent c ) or Coelenterata  is  a phylum containing over 10,000  प्रजाति   of  animals found exclusively in  जलीय  and mostly marine environments .
Their distinguishing feature is cnidocytes , specialized cells that  वे  use mainly  लिये   capturing  prey .
Their bodies  consist   of  mesoglea ,  a   non-living  jelly-like substance , sandwiched between two layers of  epithelium  that  हैं  mostly one cell thick .
They have two basic body forms  :  swimming medusae  और  sessile polyps  ,   दोनो  of which are radially symmetrical with mouths surrounded  by  tentacles  कि   भालू   cnidocytes  .
Both forms have a single orifice and  देह  cavity that are used for digestion and  श्वसन   .
Many cnidarian species produce colonies that are single organisms composed of medusa-like  or   polyp-like  zooids , or both .
Cnidarians ' activities are coordinated by a decentralized nerve net and simple  receptors  .
Several  free-swimming   cubozoa  and Scyphozoa possess  balance-sensing  statocysts , and  कुछ   have  simple eyes  .
Not  सब  cnidarians reproduce sexually  .
Many have complex lifecycles with  अलैंगिक  polyp stages and sexual medusae , but some  omit  either the polyp or  the  medusa stage .
Cnidarians were  लिये  a long time grouped with Ctenophores in  the  phylum  coelenterata  , but increasing awareness of  उनके  differences  caused  them to  be   लगाई  in separate phyla  .
cnidarians  are  वर्गीकृत  into four main groups : the almost wholly sessile Anthozoa (  समुद्र   anemones  ,  corals  ,  समुद्र   पेन   )  ; swimming Scyphozoa ( jellyfish  )  ; Cubozoa ( box jellies ) ; and Hydrozoa ,  a  diverse group  कि  includes all the  freshwater   cnidarians  as well as many  समुद्री  forms , and has both sessile members such as Hydra and  औपनिवेशिक  swimmers such  as  the Portuguese Man o  '  War  .
Staurozoa have  recently  been recognised  as  a class in their own  सही  rather than a sub-group of Scyphozoa , and there is debate about whether Myxozoa and Polypodiozoa are cnidarians or closer to  bilaterians  (  अधिक  complex  पशु  ) .
सबसे  cnidarians prey  on  organisms ranging in size from plankton to animals several times larger  than  themselves ,  लकिन  many obtain much of their nutrition from endosymbiotic algae , and a few are parasites .
Many are  preyed  upon  by   अन्य  animals including starfish  ,  sea slugs , fish  और  turtles .
Coral reefs  ,  whose polyps are rich in endosymbiotic  शैवाल  , support some  of  the world 's  सबसे  productive ecosystems  ,  and  protect  vegetation  in   tidal  zones and on shorelines from strong currents and tides .
While corals  हैं  almost  entirely  restricted to warm , shallow marine waters ,  अन्य  cnidarians live in  the   गहराइयों   ,  in polar seas and in freshwater  .
Fossil cnidarians  have  been found in rocks  formed  about , and other fossils show that corals may have been  उपस्थित  shortly before and diversified a few million  सालो   बाद  .
जीवाश्मों  of cnidarians that do  नहीं   निर्माण  mineralized structures are very  विरल   .
Scientists currently think that cnidarians  ,  ctenophores and bilaterians are  अधिक  closely  सम्बन्धित  to calcareous sponges than these are to other sponges , and that anthozoans  हैं  the evolutionary  ``  aunts ''  or  ``  बहनों  '' of other  cnidarians  , and the most closely related  to  bilaterians .
हाल   analyses   have  concluded that  cnidarians  , although considered  अधिक  ``  आदिम  ''  than  bilaterians , have a wider range of genes  .

Aztec cosmogram in the pre-Hispanic Codex Fejérváry-Mayer  -   the  fire  परमेश्वर   xiuhtecuhtli  is in  the   बीच  .
the  Aztec people were certain  जातीय  groups of central Mexico , particularly those groups who spoke  the  Nahuatl language and who  वर्चस्व  large parts of Mesoamerica  इससे  the 14th  to  16th centuries .
The Nahuatl words  aztecatl  (  एकवचन   )  and aztecah ( plural ) mean `` people from Aztlan `` ,  a   पौराणिक  place for the Nahuatl-speaking culture of  the  time , and later adopted as the word to define  the  Mexica people  .
प्रायः  the term `` Aztec '' refers exclusively to the Mexica people of Tenochtitlan  (  now the  स्थान   of  Mexico City ) , situated  on  an island in Lake Texcoco , who  referred  to themselves as Mexica  tenochca  or  cōlhuah   mexica  .
Sometimes the term also  शामिल   the  inhabitants of Tenochtitlan 's two principal allied city-states , the Acolhuas of  texcoco   और  the Tepanecs of Tlacopan ,  जो  together with the  mexica  formed  the   एज़टेक  Triple Alliance which controlled what is often known  as  ``  the   एज़टेक  Empire '' .
In other contexts , Aztec may  refer  to all the  विभिन्न  city  राज्य  and their peoples , who  साझा  large parts of  उनके   जातीय   इतिहास  and cultural  traits  with the Mexica , Acolhua  और  Tepanecs ,  और  who often  भी  used  the  Nahuatl language as a lingua franca .
in   इस  meaning  it   is  possible  to  talk  परिचय   an   एज़टेक   सभ्यता   सहित  all the particular cultural  पैटर्न  common for most of  the  peoples  inhabiting  Central Mexico in the late postclassic  काल  .
From  the  13th century , the  घाटी  of Mexico was the heart  of  Aztec civilization :  यहाँ  the capital of the Aztec Triple Alliance , the city of  tenochtitlan  ,  थी  built upon raised islets in Lake Texcoco .
The Triple Alliance formed a tributary empire expanding  इसके  political hegemony far beyond  the  Valley of Mexico , conquering other  नगर  states throughout Mesoamerica .
At its pinnacle , Aztec culture  था  rich and complex mythological  और  religious traditions , as  खूब  as reaching remarkable architectural  और  artistic  accomplishments   .
in  1521 Hernán  cortés  , along with a large number of  नावातल  speaking indigenous  allies   ,  conquered Tenochtitlan and defeated the Aztec Triple Alliance  अंतर्गत  the leadership of Hueyi Tlatoani Moctezuma  ii  .
Subsequently the Spanish founded the  नई  settlement of Mexico City on  the  site  of  the ruined Aztec capital ,  इससे   जहाँ  they  proceeded  with the process of colonizing Central  अमेरिका  .
Aztec  संस्कृति  and history  is  primarily known through archaeological evidence found in excavations such as that  of  the renowned Templo Mayor in Mexico City ; from indigenous  छाल  paper codices  ;  from eyewitness accounts by Spanish conquistadors  ऐसे   as  Hernán Cortés and Bernal Díaz del  कैस्टिलो  ; and especially from 16th  और  17th century descriptions of Aztec culture  और  history written by Spanish  clergymen  and literate  aztecs  in the Spanish or Nahuatl language , such as the famous Florentine Codex compiled by the Franciscan  भिक्षु  Bernardino de Sahagún with  the  help of  स्वदेशी   एज़टेक  informants .
Anderson Hays  कूपर  ( born June 3 , 1967 ) is an American journalist , author , and television personality  .
he   is  the  प्राथमिक  anchor  of   the  CNN news show Anderson Cooper 360° .
The program is normally  ब्रॉडकास्ट  live  इससे  a New  यॉर्क  City studio ; however  ,   कूपर  often broadcasts live on location for  तोड़कर  news stories .
As of September  2011  , he also serves as host of his own eponymous syndicated  दिन   बात  show , Anderson Live ,  जिससे  will be cancelled at the end  of  the second season  .
A plot of  a   सामान्य  distribution ( or  bell-shaped  curve ) where each band has a width  of   1  standard deviation – See also  :  68-95-99.7 rule
संचयी   संभाव्यता  of a normal  वितरण  with expected  मान  0 and standard deviation 1 .
In  आंकडे   और   संभाव्यता  theory , standard deviation (  represented   by  the symbol sigma , σ  )  shows how much  विभिन्नता  or dispersion exists from the average  (  mean ) ,  or  expected  मान   .
a   कम  standard  विचलन  indicates that the data points tend to be very close to the  औसत  ; high standard deviation indicates that the data points are spread out over a  विशाल  range of values .
The standard  विचलन   of  a random variable  ,  statistical population ,  आंकड़ा  set ,  or  probability  वितरण   is  the square root of  इसके   variance  .
It is algebraically simpler though practically less robust  than  the average  निरपेक्ष  deviation .
A useful property of standard deviation is that ,  नापसंद  variance  ,  it is expressed  in  the same units  as   the  data  .
Note  ,  however , that for measurements with percentage as unit ,  the   मानक  deviation will have percentage points as unit .
in  addition  to  expressing the variability of a population , standard  विचलन  is commonly used to measure confidence in statistical  conclusions  .
For  उदाहरण  , the margin of  गलती  in polling data is determined by calculating the expected standard deviation  in  the results if the same  पोल  were to be conducted  अनेक  times .
the  reported margin of error is  typically  about twice the standard deviation ­– the radius of a 95 percent confidence interval .
in  science  ,  researchers commonly report the standard  विचलन  of experimental data  ,   और  only effects  कि  fall far outside the range of standard deviation  हैं   माना  statistically significant – normal random error or variation in  the   माप  is in this  रास्ता   विशिष्ट  from causal variation .
Standard deviation is  भी  important  in  finance , where the  मानक  deviation  on  the rate of return on an investment is a measure of the  volatility  of the investment .
When only a sample of data from a  जनसांख्यिकी  is available ,  the  standard  विचलन   of  the  जनसांख्यिकी  can be estimated by  a  modified  मात्रा  called  the  `` sample standard deviation ''  .
जब  the sample is the entire  जनसांख्यिकी  , its  unmodified   मानक  deviation is called  the   ``  population standard deviation  ''  .
ulluco  (  u  :  ju   :   kɔ  : )  (  Ullucus tuberosus ) is a plant  grown   primarily  as a  रूट  vegetable  ,  secondarily as a leaf  सब्ज़ी  .
The ulluco  is  one of the most  widely   grown   और  economically important root crops in the Andean region of  दक्षिण  America , second only to  the  potato  .
It is known there  साथ   the  common name of papa lisa , but also by the regional names melloco ( Ecuador ) , olluco ( Peru )  ,  chugua ( Colombia  )   or  ruba ( Venezuela ) , among others .
the   पत्ता  and the tuber are edible , similar to spinach and the potato  ,  respectively .
They are known to contain high levels of protein , calcium  ,   और  carotene .
Papalisa  यहूद  used by the  incas  prior to arrival  of  Europeans in South America  .
ulluco  tubers are marketed as `` Earth Gems '' in New  जीलैंड   ,  by  halfords   exotic  Produce .
ulluco  tubers in New Zealand
An April  24  ,  1851  poster warning the ``  रंगीन  people of Boston  ''   परिचय  policemen acting  as  slave  catchers  .
The Fugitive Slave Law or Fugitive Slave Act was passed by the United States Congress on September 18 , 1850 , as part of the Compromise of  1850  between Southern slave-holding interests and Northern Free-Soilers .
This  थी  one  of   the   सबसे  controversial acts of  the   1850   सुलह  and heightened Northern fears of a `` slave power conspiracy '' .
It declared that all runaway slaves were ,  upon  capture , to be  लौटे   to  their masters  .
Abolitionists  nicknamed   it  the ``  bloodhound   विधि  '' for the dogs that were used  to  track down runaway  स्लेव   .
Frank Joseph Pallone , Jr.  (  born October 30 , 1951 ) is the  u.S.  Representative  लिये  , serving since  1993  .
He is a member of the Democratic Party  .
he  previously represented the 3rd district from 1988 to 1993 .
Trin-i-tee  5:7  is a  इन्जील  duo from New Orleans ,  louisiana   in  the United States .
The group  थी  marketed as a gospel alternative to  r  & B  लड़की  groups  ऐसे   as  Destiny 's Child and TLC .
Trin-i-tee  5:7   रै  sold over 2.5 million albums .
In 1998  ,  the group released their first  एल्बम   हकदार   trin-i-tee  5:7  जिससे   डेब्यू  at # 1 on the Top  इन्जील   चार्ट  .
the  album featured the songs `` God  's   अनुग्रह  '' and the cover  सोंग  `` Oh !
Mary Do  n't  You Weep '' .
The album later became certified gold .
in  1999 , Terri Brown left the group and  थी   बाद  replaced by singer Adrian Anderson  .
During that year , the group  अंकित  and released their second  एल्बम   ,  Spiritual Love .
the  album became the  समूह  's second #  1  album  on   the   शीर्ष  Gospel  चार्ट  .
The album contained the  singles  `` Put  अपना  Hands '' and  ``  My  देह   ''  .

In  2007   ,   the  group left GospoCentric Records and signed a record deal  साथ  Spirit Rising  म्यूज़िक  .

T57 charted  #  2 on  the  Top Gospel Albums , # 5 on the Top Christian  चार्ट  , and  #  12 on the Top R  &  B  चार्ट   .
The United States federal earned income tax credit  or  earned income credit ( EITC  or  EIC ) is a refundable tax credit for low-  और  medium-income individuals and couples , primarily for  those  who have qualifying children  .
When the credit  exceeds  the amount of  कर  owed , it results in a tax refund to those who claim the credit  .
इस  credit  is  provided  to  offset the  बोझ  of social security taxes and also to  प्रचार  an incentive to work .
In order  लिये  a person or couple to claim one  or  more persons as their qualifying child ( ren )  ,  the age , relationship , and shared residency requirements  जरूर  be met , as well as some other  आवश्यकताएँ  .
U.S.  कर   फ़ॉर्म  1040EZ , 1040A , or  1040  can be used to  अर्जी   eic  without qualifying children .
To claim the credit with  qualifying  children  ,  1040A or 1040 must be used , as well as  attaching   अनुसूची  EIC .
EIC phases in slowly , has a medium-length plateau , and then phases out more  धीरे  than it phased in .
Since the credit phases out at 21  %  ( for two children and for three or more  qualilfying  children  )  or  16  %  (  for one qualifying child ) , it  is   सदा  preferable to have one more dollar  of  actual salary or wages ( although technically ,  चूंकि  the  eic  table moves by fifty  डालर  increments  ,   it   's  always preferable to have an extra fifty-dollar increment of salary or wages ) .
For tax year 2011 , the maximum EIC for a single  व्यक्ति  or  युगल  filing without  qualifying  children  थी   $   464  .
the  maximum  eic  with one qualifying child was $ 3,094 , with  दो  children was $ 5,112 , and with three or more qualifying children was $ 5,751 .
These  amounts  are indexed  annually   लिये  inflation .
the  earned income tax credit  रै  been part of  राजनैतिक   debates  in the  संयुक्त  States  regarding  whether raising  the  minimum wage  or   increasing   eic  will better address a seeming shortage of good-paying jobs .
The following is a list  of  halftime shows held at the National Football  लीग  's championship game  ,  the Super Bowl .
जबकि   मध्यांतर  shows are a tradition  दौरान  football games at all levels of competition  ,  the  सुपर  Bowl halftime show represents a fundamental link to pop culture , which helps  broaden  the  टेलीविज़न   दर्शक   और  nationwide  ब्याज  .
In most years  चूंकि   the  mid-1980s , the halftime  दिखाएँ  of  the   सुपर   कटोरी  has featured  लोकप्रिय  recording artists and  अन्य  well-known celebrities .
It has measurably increased  टेलीविज़न  viewers  दौरान  and after the halftime show .
The  प्रदर्शन  is regarded one  of   the  most-watched  कार्यक्रम  in American television annually with over 100 million viewers in  the  United States alone .
Musical  जाति  over  the  years have represented a  व्यापक  range of music  प्रकार  , including pop , rock , classic rock  ,  country , hip hop  ,  rap  ,  blues , and  आत्मा  .
In  कुछ  years , short skits  or   नाटक  scenes are acted out on a  स्टेज  .
The performance group  up   साथ  People  रै  performed at the most Super Bowl halftime shows , starring in four during the 1970s and 1980s .
According to Nielsen ratings , Super Bowl XLVI halftime show headlined by  मैडोना  in 2012 remains the most-watched halftime  दिखाएँ  in  इतिहास  , with 114 million viewers  or  about  3  million more  than   the  actual  खेल  .
beyonce  's 2013 halftime show performance  थी   the  second most viewed show  in   इतिहास  .
It is listed  on   the   गिनीज   संसार   रिकॉर्ड   as  the largest TV  दर्शक  for  a   सुपर   कटोरी  half-time  प्रदर्शन  .
International  मेन  's Day (  imd  ) is an annual  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  event celebrated  on  19th November .
उदघाटन  in 1999 in Trinidad and Tobago  ,  the  दिन  and its events find  support  from a variety of individuals and groups in  ऑस्ट्रेलिया  , the  caribbean  , North America , Asia , Europe and  अफ़्रीकी  .
बोलना  on  निमित्त  of  युनेस्को  , Director  of   महिलाओं  and  संस्कृति  of Peace Ingeborg  breines  said of IMD , `` This is an  बेहतरीन  idea and would  दे   कुछ  gender balance  .  ''
She added  कि  UNESCO was looking  आगे   to  cooperating with the organizers  .
The objectives of celebrating an International  मेन  's Day include focusing on  मेन  's  और  boys ' health  ,   improving   लिंग  relations  ,  promoting gender  समता  , and highlighting positive male role models  .
It  is  an occasion to highlight discrimination against men and boys and  to  celebrate their achievements and  योगदान  , in particular for their contributions  to   जातियाँ  , family  ,  marriage , and child care .
the  broader and ultimate  उद्देश्य  of the event is to promote basic  humanitarian  values  .
International Men  's  Day is celebrated in  over  60  देशों  , including Trinidad and Tobago , Jamaica  ,  Australia , India , China ,  संयुक्त  States , Romania , Singapore , Malta , United Kingdom , South Africa  ,  Tanzania , Zimbabwe , Botswana , Seychelles , Burundi ,  हंगेरियाई  , Ireland , Isle of Man , Ghana , Canada , Denmark , Norway  ,  Austria , Bosnia and  हर्ज़ेगोविना  , Ukraine  ,  France , Italy , Pakistan  ,  Cuba , Antigua and Barbuda ,  st.  Kitts and  नेविस  , St. Lucia , Grenada and  केमन   आइलैंड्स  , on 19  नवम्बर  , and global support for the  जश्न  is broad .

Village is a district in the San Fernando Valley region  of  Los Angeles , California .
The median age of its population , at 36 , is `` old for the city of Los  एंजिल्स  . '' and its average household size  of   दो  people is low , compared  to  other parts of the city  .
developmental  psychology is  the  scientific study of changes that  occur  in human  beings  over the course of their life span  .
Originally concerned with infants and  children  ,  the  field has  विस्तारित   to  include adolescence  ,  adult development  ,   वृद्धावस्था   ,  and the entire life span .
This field examines change across  a  broad range of topics including motor skills and  अन्य  psycho-physiological  प्रक्रियाओं  ; cognitive development involving areas such as problem solving  ,   moral  understanding , and conceptual understanding ; language  अधिग्रहण  ; social , personality , and  emotional  development ;  और  self-concept and  पहचान   गठन  .
Developmental psychology includes issues such as the extent to  जिससे  development occurs  through   the  gradual accumulation of knowledge versus stage-like  विकास  , or the extent  to  which  children  are born with innate  दिमागी   structures   बनाम  learning  through  experience .
Many researchers are interested in the  बातचीत   between  personal characteristics , the individual 's behavior , and environmental  कारकों  including social context , and their impact  on  development ;  अन्य  take a  अधिक  narrowly-focused approach .
Developmental psychology  informs  several applied fields , including : educational psychology , child psychopathology  ,  and  forensic  developmental psychology .
Developmental psychology  complements  several other basic  शोध   फ़ील्ड   in  psychology including social psychology , cognitive psychology  ,  ecological psychology , and comparative psychology  .
जोसेफ   माइकल   ``  Joey '' Stivic is  a  fictional character who first  appeared  on the 1970s American sitcom All in the  परिवार  .
Joey Stivic was the son and only  चाइल्ड   of  Mike Stivic ( played  by  Rob Reiner ) and Gloria Stivic ( played  by   सैली  Struthers ) ,  और   the  grandson of Archie Bunker ( Carroll O'Connor )  और  Edith Bunker ( Jean Stapleton ) .
The character first  appeared   as  a newborn baby in a two-part episode  of  All in the Family which aired in December 1975 .
After  अनेक   दिखावे  on All in the Family until Reiner and Struthers  बाएँ  the  श्रेणी  in 1978  (  by that time , Joey  था  been  निभाई  most often by  प्रत्यावर्ती  twins Jason and Justin Draeger ) ,  the   जॉय  Stivic character  अगला  appeared  on  the All  in   the  Family spin-off series (  कुछ  call it a  continuation  of  the  original  )  Archie Bunker 's Place in a guest  रूप   in  the November 1979 episode `` Thanksgiving Reunion .  ''
In this instance , the character was played by child actor Dick  billingsley  and  थी  appropriately pre-school age .
With Gloria now  अलग  from Mike , she returned to Archie Bunker 's Place with Joey in the  फ़रवरी  1982 episode `` Gloria Comes Home . ''
In this episode , Joey  थी  played by Christopher Johnston .
Joey  stivic  was a regular  अक्षर  on the All in the Family spin-off series Gloria in 1982  और  1983 .
On this  श्रेणी   ,  in which the  now-divorced  Gloria Bunker character had moved  to   upstate  New York in order  to  work as  an   सहायक   veterinarian   ,  the  भाग  of  जॉय  Stivic was played by  ten-year-old  actor Christian Jacobs .
After Gloria was canceled in 1983 , Joey Stivic disappeared  इससे  prime time television for 11 years , until the character made one  पिछला  appearance on 704 Hauser , a short-lived 1994 series  परिचय   a   ब्लैक  family who had  स्थानांतरित   into  the old Bunker  घर   ,  years after  बंकर  had sold it .
in  this appearance  ,   the   जॉय  Stivic character was played by Casey Siemaszko  ,  an actor born  in  1961 ( 14 years before Joey Stivic 's fictional birth  )  .
In  1976   the  Ideal Toy Company released a 14-inch `` Joey Stivic doll '' ( called  ``   आर्ची   बंकर  's  पोता  '' )  जिससे  was billed as the `` first anatomically correct male doll .  ''
The doll inspired mild controversy  at  the time  ,  and is a collectors ' item today .
the  2011 Rose  कटोरी  was the 97th edition of  the  annual  कटोरी  game played on January 1 , 2011  ,  as part of  the  2010 college football  ऋतु   .
Played in  pasadena  ,  कैलिफ़ोर्निया   ,  the TCU Horned Frogs  of  the Mountain West Conference defeated the  विस्कॉन्सिन   badgers  of the Big Ten Conference by a  स्कोर  of 21 –  19  .
The Pasadena Tournament of Roses Association was the organizer of the  खेल  .
vizio  Inc. was the corporate sponsor  और  the game was officially named ``  the   रोज़  Bowl Game presented by Vizio '' .
इस  game  चिह्नित  the first time a team from a non-Automatic Qualifying Conference played in , and  जीती  , the Rose Bowl in its 97 years .
The  प्रतियोगिता  was broadcast  on   केबल  television station ESPN  साथ  a radio broadcast on ESPN Radio and  xm  Satellite Radio and ESPN3  स्ट्रीमिंग  video  over  the internet .
Coverage  began  at 1:30  pm  ( PST  )  with kickoff at 2:10 PM ( PST  )  .
This marked the first time that the  खेल  was not broadcast nationally `` over-the-air '' ( terrestrial television ) since the games  prior  to the 1952 Rose  कटोरी   ,  which was the first nationally televised college football game .
The Rose Bowl  खेल  , themed Building  सपनो   ,  Friendships , & Memories , was a  contractual  sell-out  ,  with 64,500 tickets  आबंटित  to the  participating  teams and conferences .
Ticket prices for all seats in the Rose  कटोरी  are  सूचीबद्ध   at  $ 145 .
The remaining  टिकटें  went to the Tournament of Roses members , sponsors , City of Pasadena residents , and  the   सामान्य  public .
The  रोज़  Bowl  स्टेडियम  capacity is listed at approximately 91,000  .
the  Declaration  of  Independence  is  a statement adopted by  the   महाद्वीपीय   कॉंग्रेस  on July 4 , 1776  ,  which announced that the  तेरह  American colonies , then at war  साथ  Great Britain , regarded themselves as independent states , and no longer a part of the  अंग्रेजों   साम्राज्य  .
बजाय  they now formed a new  nation—the   संयुक्त  States  of  America .
John Adams was  a   नेता  in pushing  लिये  independence , which was unanimously approved on  जुलाई  2 .
A  कमेटी  had already  drafted  the formal declaration , to  be  ready when  कॉंग्रेस  voted  on  independence .
Adams persuaded the committee to select  थामस  Jefferson to compose the original draft of the document  ,  which congress would edit to produce the final version .
the  Declaration  थी  ultimately a formal explanation of  क्यों  Congress had voted on July 2 to declare independence from  ग्रेट   ब्रिटेन  , more than a year after the  outbreak  of the American Revolutionary War .
The national birthday , the Independence Day is celebrated on July 4 , although  एडम्स  wanted July 2 .
After ratifying the text on July  4  , Congress issued the Declaration of Independence in several forms .
It was initially published  as   the   मुद्रित   डनलप  broadside that was widely distributed  और  read  to  the public  .
The  सबसे   प्रसिद्ध  version of the Declaration , a signed  नक़ल   कि   is  popularly  regarded  as the Declaration of  स्वतंत्रता  ,  is  displayed at  the  National  अभिलेख  in Washington , D.C  .
Although the wording of the Declaration was approved on July 4 , the date of its signing was August 2 .
The  असली  July 4 United States Declaration of Independence  पाण्डुलिपि  was  खोया   जबकि  all other copies have been derived from  इस  original  दस्तावेज़  .
The  स्त्रोत  and interpretation of the Declaration have  महरूम  the subject of  much  scholarly inquiry .
The Declaration  जायज  the independence of the United States by  लिस्टिंग  colonial grievances against King George III , and by asserting certain natural  और  legal rights , including a  सही   of  revolution .
having   परोसा  its original  purpose  in announcing independence  ,  the  टेक्स्ट  of the Declaration was initially ignored after the American Revolution .
Since then  ,  it has come to  be  considered  a   प्रमुख  statement  on  human rights , particularly its second sentence:
We hold  ये  truths to  be  self-evident , that all men are created  बराबर  , that  वे  are endowed by  उनके  Creator  साथ  certain unalienable Rights , that among these are Life ,  स्वतंत्रता  and the pursuit of  सुख  .
This has been called `` one of  the  best-known sentences  in  the  अंग्रेज़ी  language  ''  , containing  ``  the most  potent  and consequential words  in   अमरीकी   इतिहास  . ''
the  passage came to represent a moral standard to which the United  राज्य   चाहिए  strive  .
इस  view was notably promoted by Abraham Lincoln ,  जो  considered the Declaration to be the foundation of his political philosophy ,  और  argued that the  घोषणा  is a statement of principles through  जिससे  the United States Constitution should  be  interpreted .
It  रै   प्रेरित  work  लिये  the rights of marginalized people throughout the  संसार  .
Chitty Chitty Bang Bang is  a  1968 British  musical  film loosely based on Ian Fleming 's  अनोखा  .
The film 's script is by Roald  dahl  and Ken  ह्यूजेस   और  its songs by the Sherman  भाइयो  .
It  सितारों  Dick  वैन  Dyke as Caractacus Potts and Sally Ann Howes as  truly  Scrumptious .
The  फिल्मी  was directed by Ken  ह्यूजेस  and produced by Albert R. Broccoli ( co-producer of the James Bond series of films , also  आधारित   on  Fleming 's novels ) .
John Stears supervised the special effects .
Irwin Kostal supervised and conducted the music , while the musical  संख्याएँ   यहूद  staged by Marc  breaux   और  Dee  dee  Wood .
A region is arid when it is characterized by  a  severe lack of available water , to the extent of hindering or preventing the growth and  विकास  of plant and animal life .
Environments subject  to  arid climates tend  to   कमी  vegetation and  हैं  called xeric or desertic .
Most  ``   arid   ''  climates  घेर  the equator ; these places include most of  अफ़्रीकी   और  parts of South America and Central  अमेरिका   .
Cancer ( ♋ ) is an  astrological  sign  ,  which is  संबद्ध  with the constellation  कर्कट  .
It spans the 90-120th degree of the zodiac  ,  between  90  and  125.25   उपाधि   of  celestial longitude , which the Sun transits this area on average between June 22 to July 22 each year .
और   अंतर्गत   the   sidereal  zodiac , it is currently  इससे  July 21 to  अगस्त  9 .
The  संयुक्त  States presidential election  of  1960  थी  the 44th  quadrennial   अध्यक्षीय  election , held on Tuesday , November 8 , 1960  .
The Republican Party nominated incumbent  vice-president  Richard Nixon  ,  while the  लोकतांत्रिक  Party nominated John F. Kennedy , Senator from Massachusetts .
the  incumbent President  ,  Republican Dwight D. Eisenhower ,  थी   नहीं  eligible for re-election after serving  the  maximum two terms allowed  by  the Twenty-second Amendment .
कैनेडी   थी  elected with a lead of  112,827  votes ,  or  0.17 % of the popular vote ,  giving  him a victory of 303 to 219  in  the Electoral College , the closest  चूंकि  1916 .
This was the first election  in  which all fifty of the current United  राज्य  participated .
A number of factors explain why the election was so  बंद  .
Kennedy gained since there was  an   आर्थिक  recession which  ठेस   the  incumbent Republican , and  he  had the advantage of 17 million more  पंजीकृत  Democrats  than  Republicans .
Furthermore  ,  the new  मत  that Kennedy gained among Catholics almost  neutralized  the new votes  निक्सन  gained among  protestants   .
Kennedy 's campaigning skills decisively outmatched Nixon  's  .
In the end , Nixon 's emphasis on his experience carried  छोटी   वज़न  , and he wasted energy by campaigning in all 50 states instead of  concentrating  on the swing  राज्य   .
Kennedy  प्रयुक्त  his large , well-funded campaign organization to  जीत  the nomination , secure endorsements ,  और  , with the  सहायता  of  the  last of the big-city  bosses  , to get out the vote in the big cities  .
He relied on running  mate  Lyndon B. Johnson to hold  the  South and used television effectively .
This election is notable as being the first time  in  U.S. history that two sitting U.S . Senators ( Kennedy  और   जॉनसन  ) were elected as president and  vice-president  , a phenomenon  कि  has  महरूम  repeated  एकबार  , by Barack  ओबामा  and Joe Biden in 2008 ( in both cases , the  अध्यक्ष   थी  the  younger  , more junior  सीनेटर  ) .
Sherwood is  a  city in Washington County ,  ऑरेगॉन  , United States .
Located  in   the  southeast corner of the county , it is a residential community in the  tualatin   घाटी  southwest  of  Portland  .
The  जनसांख्यिकी   थी  11,791 at the  2000  census .
According to the 2010  जनसांख्यिकी  , the  जनसांख्यिकी  was 18,205 residents .
indirectly  named for  the  Sherwood Forest  in  England  ,  it was first incorporated in 1893 as a town .
The USA PATRIOT Act of 2001 is an Act of the U.S. Congress that was signed into  विधि  by President George W. Bush on October 26 , 2001  .
The  शीर्षक   of  the act is a ten letter acronym ( USA PATRIOT ) that stands for Uniting ( and ) Strengthening America  (  by ) Providing Appropriate Tools Required ( to ) Intercept ( and ) Obstruct Terrorism  अधिनियम  of 2001 .
The act , as a response to the terrorist attacks of September 11th  ,  significantly reduced restrictions in law enforcement agencies ' gathering of  प्रज्ञा   भीतर  the United States ; expanded the Secretary of the Treasury’s  प्राधिकार  to  विनियमित  financial transactions , particularly those involving foreign individuals and entities ; and broadened the discretion of  विधि  enforcement and immigration authorities in  निमाड़  and  deporting  immigrants suspected of terrorism-related acts .
The act also expanded the definition of  आतंक   to   शामिल  domestic terrorism , thus enlarging the number of activities to which the  यूएसए   patriot  Act’s expanded law enforcement powers can be  लागू  .
On May 26 , 2011  ,  President Barack Obama used an Autopen to  चिह्न   the  PATRIOT Sunsets Extension Act of 2011 ,  a  four-year  एक्सटेंशन   of  three  कुंजी  provisions in the USA PATRIOT  अधिनियम   जबकि  he was in France : roving wiretaps , searches of business records ( the `` library  रिकॉर्ड  provision ``  )  , and conducting surveillance of ``  लोन   भेड़ियों  '' — individuals suspected of terrorist-related activities  नहीं  linked  to  terrorist  समूह   .
Republican leaders questioned  if   the  use of the Autopen met the constitutional  आवश्यकताएँ  for signing a bill  into  law  .

Snohomish  is  a city in Snohomish County , Washington  ,  United States .
The population was 9,098 at the 2010 census .
The mayor  of  Snohomish is Karen Guzak , and the City Manager is Larry Bauman .
Snohomish  prides   itself  for its historical downtown , and was once known for  इसके  many antique shops when it was known  as  the `` Antique  पूंजी  of the Northwest . ''
The historic  कारोबार  and residential center of the town constitutes the Snohomish  ऐतिहासिक   ज़िला   ,   जिससे  is listed on the National Register of Historic Places .
Many  घरों  bear plaques  साथ  the year the house was built and the name of the family or individual who originally occupied  it  .
Once every  साल  , the city gives tours of the historic houses  ;  one of them , the Blackman House , is a year-round museum .
A general aviation  एयरफील्ड  ,  घनघोर  Airfield , is less than one mile southwest of Downtown Snohomish  .
डेव   matthews  Band (  dmb   )  is an American rock  बैंड  that was formed  in  Charlottesville , Virginia , United  राज्य   ,  in 1991 .
The founding members  यहूद  singer-songwriter  और  guitarist Dave  matthews  ,  bassist   stefan  Lessard , drummer  /backing  vocalist  कार्टर  Beauford and saxophonist LeRoi  मूर  .
Boyd  tinsley  was  added  to the band  as  a violinist soon after the band was  formed  .
Moore died suddenly  in  August  2008  due to complications from injuries sustained in an ATV accident .
GRAMMY  पुरस्कार  -winner Jeff Coffin of Béla  fleck   और  the Flecktones has since filled Moore 's  स्पॉट  as the  बैंड   's   saxophonist  .
Rashawn Ross and Tim  रेनॉल्ड्स  have also become full-time touring members of  the  band .
The  बैंड  's  2009  album  बिग   whiskey  and  the  GrooGrux  किंग  ( the first album  चूंकि   मूर  's  मौत  ) debuted at number one  on  the Billboard  200  , earning the band their fifth consecutive number-one  debut—  making them the second band behind Metallica to do  so   .
Their most recent  एल्बम  , Away from the World ,  थी  released in 2012 ,  और   भी  debuted at number one on the  बिलबोर्ड  chart .
as  of  2010  ,  the   डेव  Matthews Band has sold over 30 million records worldwide .
the  band is known  लिये  their  सालाना  summer-long tours of the United States and Europe  ,  featuring  lengthy  improvisational renditions of their songs , accompanied by an elaborate video and lighting show .
This portion of the tour has  become  a stamp  of  DMB and has grown with the band since Fenton Williams  began  working with them in the early 1990s .
After twenty consecutive  सालो  of touring the band  घोषित  that it would take the summer of  2011  off .
Dave Matthews Band has won  एक  GRAMMY Award , and was awarded  the  NAACP  अध्यक्ष  's  पुरस्कार  .
According to Julian Bond , `` they sell out the largest arenas  on  Earth ,  लकिन  frequently give their music away  .  ''
Transcendental  जंगली  Oats : A Chapter from  an  Unwritten Romance  is   a  prose satire written by Louisa May Alcott  ,  about her family 's  भागीदारी  with the Transcendentalist community Fruitlands in  the  early 1840s .
The work was first published in a New York newspaper in  1873  , and reprinted in 1874 , 1876 , and 1915 and after .
In  उसके  account , Alcott provides  the  real people involved with thin pseudonymous disguises .
उसके  father Amos Bronson Alcott is ``  abel  Lamb , '' while  उसके  partner and community co-founder Charles Lane is  ``  Timon Lion  ;   ''   अबीगैल  May Alcott , Louisa 's mother and Bronson 's  बीवी  , is `` Sister  आशा  . ''
Alcott  depicts  her  पिता  as dominated by his more forceful partner  ,   और  both men as feckless and impractical dreamers .
The  मेन  of the community spend  उनके  time in pointless debates while Sister Hope works from  भोर  to dusk to maintain their existence .
A  संकट  arises at harvest time ,  जब  the  अनाज  crop is threatened by an approaching storm  .
In Alcott 's words  ,   ``  About the time the grain  थी  ready to  हाउस  ,  कुछ  call  of  the Oversoul wafted all  the  men away . ''
Sister  आशा  organizes the  तभी  available help , three little girls and a  लड़के  , and manages to  सहेजें  the  क्रॉप  .
The little  जातियाँ  collapses as soon as the weather turns cold  ,   जब  it  becomes  clear  कि   उनके   प्रावधानों   हैं  too meager to  पिछला  the coming winter .
timon  Lion  और  his son  abscond  to join the Shakers  —  though Timon  is  unhappy to  सीख  that life among them  is  `` all work and no  खेल  . ''
Abel is crushed  by  the  विफलता  of the enterprise ;  बाद  days of  despair  he begins  to   खा  again only  जब  he realizes  कि  his family needs  उसे   .
सिस्टर  Hope finds a way for them to subsist and persevere .
Alcott 's view of male arrogance  और  female  शोषण  in this  टुकड़ा  is paralleled  in  her novel , published in the  वही  year as `` Transcendental  जंगली  Oats . ''
`` Transcendental  जंगली  Oats ''  रै  been reprinted in  अनेक   आधुनिक  editions .
Mount of the Holy Cross is the northernmost 14,000-foot mountain  in  the Sawatch Range , part of the  रॉकी  Mountains in Colorado .
it  is located in the Holy Cross Wilderness  निकट  the ghost town of Holy Cross City and in Eagle  काउंटी  .
it  was  नामित  for the distinctive  cross-shaped  snowfield  on  the northeast  फेस  .
Under  यूएसडीए  Forest Service administration ,  the   पहाड़  was  proclaimed  `` Holy Cross  नेशनल   स्मारक  '' by Herbert Hoover on  may  11 , 1929 .
The monument was transferred to the National Park Service  in   1933  .
In  1950  , it  थी  returned to the Forest  सेवा   और  lost its National Monument status—the number  of  visitors to the mountain and  the  nearby `` Pilgrim 's Hut '' had  waned  , and  the   व्यय  of full-time staff could not be justified .
This mountain  रै  been the subject of painters , photographers and even a poem  by   हेनरी  Wadsworth Longfellow , ( The  क्रॉस  of  हिम  ) .
The first publicly available photograph was published in National Geographic magazine .
Thomas Moran depicted the mountain in an  आयल  painting  ,  which  अभी  is  भाग  of the collection  of  the  संग्रहालय  of the American West , part  of  the Autry  नेशनल  Center  in  Los  एंजिल्स  , California  .
It is still much photographed but it is not as well known today as  it  was in the past .
Nearby features include  कटोरी  of Tears Lake  ,  directly under the east face  of  the peak  ,  Tuhare  झीलों   ,   in  a cirque that  झूठ   दक्षिण  of  a  significant subpeak , and several other lakes .
Notable  स्थितियाँ  within include the  dotsero  volcano  (  near Interstate  70  ) , Vail and Aspen .
US 24  रनों  near the  शिखर  through  gilman   .
Photochrom print of Mount  of  the Holy Cross  c.  1900 .
This  चित्र   is  a reversed view of  the  mountain compared to how it actually appears  .
The first  अंकित  ascent  of  Holy Cross was in 1873  ,  by F. V. Hayden and photographer W.  H.  Jackson during one of Hayden 's  भौगोलिक  surveys .
However , the peak  may  well  have  been ascended previously  by  miners or American  इंडियंस  .
the  first winter ascent of the peak was made  in  1943 by Russel  keene  and  हावर्ड   freedman  of the  10th  Mountain Division , then stationed at Camp Hale .
Holy Cross can  be  climbed by  at  least  चार  different routes  ,  with the easiest and most  आम  route being the North Ridge , which involves of vertical gain  over   और  is rated YDS Class 2  लिये  moderate scrambling .
The Cross  couloir  route forms the vertical portion of the famous cross  विशेषता  ,  और  provides an advanced snow climb or  चरम  ski descent .
Mount of the Holy Cross has a history of endangering the lives of many hikers .
primarily  , the hikers who require rescue are  unfamiliar  with the risks of entering wilderness areas and do not bring adequate equipment  और  supplies to  respond  to emergency conditions .
Although the summit on Mount of  the  Holy Cross is frequently reached on  a  long day hike , unprepared hikers are frequently  stranded  or  खोया   due  to changing environmental conditions and confusion regarding the surrounding landscape , especially on the  descent   of  North Ridge .
thorough  research and reasonable planning should prevent most tragedies .
Mount of the Holy cross is accessible  इससे  Tigiwon Road  ,   दक्षिण   of  Minturn ,  कोलोराडो  .
The Half Moon Pass Trail is the  मानक  route to the summit of  माउंट   of   the  Holy Cross via the  उत्तर  Ridge .
Following the Fall Creek  ट्रेल  to an  ascent  of Notch Mountain Trail  provides  the  बेहतरीन   दृश्य  of the Holy Cross snow feature from Notch Mountain  लकीरें   .
The  जीएसएम  logo  is  used to identify compatible handsets and equipment
GSM (  वैश्विक  System  लिये  Mobile Communications , originally ' ) , is a standard set developed  by   the  European Telecommunications  मानकों   संस्थान  (  etsi  ) to  describe  protocols for second generation ( 2G ) digital cellular networks used by mobile phones .
It became the  de  facto global standard  लिये  mobile communications with over  80  % market  share  .
the  GSM standard  थी  developed as a replacement for first generation ( 1G ) analog cellular  संजाल  , and originally described a digital , circuit  switched  network optimized for  पूरा  duplex voice  telephony   .
This was expanded over time to include  आंकड़ा  communications , first  by  circuit switched transport , then packet  आंकड़ा  transport via GPRS ( General  पैकेट  Radio Services ) and EDGE ( Enhanced Data rates for GSM Evolution or EGPRS  )   .
Further improvements were made  जब  the 3GPP  विकसित  third generation (  3g   )  UMTS  मानकों  followed by  चौथी   पीढी  (  4g  ) LTE Advanced standards .
`` GSM  ''  is a trademark owned by  the  GSM Association .
President Franklin D. Roosevelt signs the Lend-Lease bill to give aid to Britain and  चीन  ( 1941 )
The Lend  पट्टे  act was an act where  the  United States  था  supported its allies .
Lend-Lease  (  ) was the law that  प्रारंभ   a  program  अंतर्गत  which the United  राज्य  of America supplied the  संयुक्त  Kingdom , the  ussr  , Republic of China , Free France ,  और  other Allied nations with materiel  between  1941 and 1945 .
It was signed into law on  कूच   11  ,  1941   ,  a year and a half  बाद  the outbreak of World War II  in  Europe in September 1939 .
This was nine  महीने  before the U.S. entered the war in December 1941 .
Formally titled An Act to  further  Promote the Defense of the  संयुक्त  States  ,  the Act effectively ended the  संयुक्त  States ' pretense of neutrality .
A total of $ 50  .1  billion ( equivalent to $ today ) worth  of  supplies  यहूद  shipped : $  31.4  billion to Britain , $ 11.3 billion to the  सोवियत  Union ,  $  3.2  अरब  to  फ़्रांस  , $ 1.6 billion to China , and smaller sums  to   अन्य  Allies .
Reverse Lend-Lease comprised services  ऐसे  as  किराया  on air bases that went to the U.S. , and totaled $ 7.8 billion ;  of  this , $ 6.8 billion came from the British and the Commonwealth  .
The terms of the  अनुबंध  provided that the materiel was to be used until  समय  for their return or destruction .
Supplies after  the   termination  date  यहूद  sold to Britain at a  विशाल   छूट  for £1  .075   अरब  using  long-term  loans from the United States  .
Canada operated a similar program  कि  sent $ 4.7 billion in supplies to the  संयुक्त  Kingdom and the Soviet Union  .
The United States did not  चार्ज  for aid supplied  अंतर्गत  this legislation .
This program was a decisive step away from non-interventionist  नीति  , which  था  dominated  संयुक्त   राज्य   विदेशी  relations since the  समाप्त   of  World War I , towards international involvement  .
The Jerusalem artichoke  (  Helianthus tuberosus )  ,  also called sunroot , sunchoke , earth apple or topinambour ,  is   a  species of sunflower  देशी  to  पूर्वी  North  अमेरिका  ,  और   मिला  from eastern Canada and  maine   वेस्ट  to North Dakota , and south to northern Florida and Texas .
It is also  cultivated  widely across the  शीतोष्ण  zone for its tuber , which is used  as  a root  सब्ज़ी  .
Castillo San Felipe  डेल  Morro  भी   ज्ञात  as  फोर्ट  San  फेलिप  del Morro or Morro Castle  ,  is a  16th-century  citadel located in San Juan ,  प्यूर्टो  Rico .
Stonehenge  is  a prehistoric monument in Wiltshire , England , about  वेस्ट  of Amesbury and  उत्तर  of Salisbury  .
एक  of the most famous sites  in  the world , Stonehenge is the  remains  of  a   रिंग  of standing stones set within earthworks .
it   is  in the  मध्य  of the most dense complex of Neolithic and  कांस्य  Age monuments in England ,  सहित  several hundred burial mounds .
Archaeologists believe it was built anywhere from  3000  BC  to  2000 BC .
Radiocarbon  डेटिंग  in 2008 suggested that the  पहला  stones were raised between 2400 and  2200  BC , whilst another theory suggests that bluestones may have been raised at the  साईट   as  early as 3000 BC .
The  surrounding  circular earth bank and ditch , which constitute the earliest phase of the monument , have been dated to about 3100 BC .
The site and its surroundings were added to  the   युनेस्को  's list of World  विरासत   साइट  in 1986 in a  co-listing  with  avebury   henge  .
It is a national  legally  protected Scheduled Ancient Monument .
Stonehenge  is  owned by the Crown and managed by English Heritage , while the surrounding  जमीन  is owned by  the  National Trust .
Archaeological  प्रमाण  found by the Stonehenge  riverside  Project in 2008 indicates that Stonehenge could have been a  दफ़न  ground from its earliest beginnings  .
The  डेटिंग  of cremated remains found on  the  site indicate that deposits  contain   इंसान  bone from as early as 3000 BC , when the  खाई  and bank were first dug .
Such deposits continued at Stonehenge for at least another 500 years .
The site is a place  of  religious significance  और  pilgrimage in Neo-Druidry .
the   ncaa  Women 's Division I Championship  is  an annual college basketball  टूर्नामेंट   लिये  women .
Held each  अप्रैल  , the Women 's Championship was inaugurated  in  the  1981–82  season .
The NCAA tournament was preceded  by  the AIAW Women 's  बास्केट  Tournament , which  थी   आयोजित  annually from 1972 to 1982 .
Basketball was one of  बारह  women 's sports added to the NCAA championship  कार्यक्रम   लिये  the 1981-82 school year , as the NCAA  सगाई  in battle with the Association for Intercollegiate Athletics  लिये  Women for sole governance of women 's  कॉलेजिएट  sports .
The AIAW  जारी   to  conduct its established championship program in  the  same  बारह  ( and other  )   खेल  ;  however   ,   बाद  a  साल   of  dual  महिलाओं  's championships , the  ncaa  prevailed , while the  aiaw  disbanded .
Attendance and interest in the Women 's  प्रभाग  I Championship have grown over the years , especially since  2003  , when the final championship game was moved to  the  Tuesday  following  the Monday  मेन  's  चैंपियनशिप  game .
The women 's championship game is now the final overall game of the college basketball  ऋतु  .
Before that , the Women 's Final  चार  was usually played on  the   शुक्रवार  before the Men 's Final Four or the hours before the men played on the final  शनिवार   of   the  tournament .
The  फाइनल  was usually played the Sunday afternoon following  the  Men 's Final Four .
The  टूर्नामेंट  bracket  is  made up of champions from each Division  i  conference , which  प्राप्त  automatic bids .
the  remaining  स्लॉट  are at-large bids , with  टीमों  chosen by an NCAA selection committee .
The selection process and tournament  seedings  are based on several  कारकों  , including team rankings  ,  win-loss records  और  Ratings Percentage Index ( RPI ) data .
Unlike the men 's tournament , there are only 32  at-large   बोलियों  ( as of  the  next tournament in 2014 ) , and no play-in game .
The women  's  tournament , like  the  men  's  , is staged in a single elimination format  ,  and is part of  the  media  और  public frenzy known colloquially as  कूच  Madness or The Big Dance .
All  63  games  have  been  ब्रॉडकास्ट  on television since 2003 on ESPN and ESPN2  .
Similar to  the  pre-2011 men 's tournament coverage on CBS , local  टीमों  are shown on each channel when available ,  साथ  `` whip-around '' coverage designed to  शोकेस  the most competitive contests in the rest  of  the country .
The  rosetta  Stone in  the  British Museum
the  Rosetta Stone is an ancient Egyptian granodiorite  stele   inscribed  with  a  decree  जारी  at Memphis in 196 BC on behalf of  किंग  Ptolemy V .
The  डिक्री  appears  in   तीन  scripts : the upper  टेक्स्ट  is Ancient Egyptian hieroglyphs , the middle portion Demotic  स्क्रिप्ट  ,  और  the lowest Ancient Greek .
क्युकी  it presents essentially  the  same text in all  तीन  scripts  (  with some minor differences between them ) , it  provided  the key to  the  modern  समझना  of  मिश्र  hieroglyphs  .
Originally displayed within a  टेम्पल   ,   the  stone was probably moved during the early Christian or medieval  काल  and eventually used as building material in the construction of Fort Julien near the  कस्बा  of Rashid ( Rosetta  )  in the  nile  Delta .
It was rediscovered  वहीँ  in 1799 by  a  soldier  ,  Pierre-François  bouchard  ,  of  the French expedition to Egypt .
As  the  first Ancient Egyptian bilingual text recovered in modern times , the Rosetta Stone aroused  फैली  public interest with  इसके  potential  to  decipher  इस  hitherto untranslated ancient language  .
Lithographic copies and plaster casts began  circulating  among  यूरोपीय  museums and scholars .
Meanwhile  ,  British troops defeated the French in  मिश्र  in 1801 , and the original stone came  into  British possession  अंतर्गत  the  capitulation   of  Alexandria .
Transported to  लंदन  , it has been on public display  at  the British  संग्रहालय  since 1802  .
It is the  most-visited  object in the British Museum .
Ever since its rediscovery , the  स्टोन  has been the focus of nationalist rivalries  ,  including its transfer  इससे  French  to  British possession during the Napoleonic  युद्धों  , a long-running dispute over  the  relative value of Young  's  and  champollion   's  contributions to the  decipherment  , and since 2003  ,  demands for the stone 's return to Egypt  .
पढ़ाई   of   the   डिक्री  was already under way as the first  पूरा  translation of the Greek text appeared in 1803 .
It was 20 years  ,   however  , before the  लिप्यन्तरण   of  the  मिश्र  scripts was announced  by   jean-françois   champollion  in Paris in 1822 ; it took longer still before scholars were able to read  प्राचीन   मिश्र  inscriptions and literature confidently  .
Major advances  in   the   डिकोडिंग  were : recognition  कि   the   स्टोन  offered three versions  of  the  वही  text  (  1799 ) ; that the demotic  टेक्स्ट  used phonetic characters to spell foreign names ( 1802 )  ;  that the hieroglyphic  टेक्स्ट   किया  so as  खूब  , and  था  pervasive similarities to the  demotic  ( Thomas Young ,  1814   )  ; and  कि  , in addition to being used for foreign names , phonetic characters  यहूद  also used  to  spell native Egyptian words ( Champollion  ,  1822–1824 ) .
Two other fragmentary copies of the  वही  decree were discovered later  ,  and  अनेक  similar  मिश्र  bilingual or trilingual  inscriptions   हैं  now known , including two  थोड़ा   पहले  Ptolemaic decrees (  the  Decree  of  Canopus  in  238 BC , and the  मेम्फिस  decree of Ptolemy  iv  , ca .  218  BC ) .
The Rosetta  स्टोन  is therefore no longer unique , but it  थी  the essential key  to   आधुनिक  understanding  of   प्राचीन  Egyptian literature and civilization .
The term Rosetta Stone is now used in other  contexts  as the  नाम  for the essential clue to  a   नई   फ़ील्ड  of knowledge .
Poison  डार्ट  frog ( also  dart-poison   मेंढक  , poison frog or formerly poison  तीर  frog  )  is the common name of a group  of   मेंढक  in the family Dendrobatidae which are native to Central and South America .
These species are diurnal  और  often have brightly colored bodies  .
हालांकि  all wild dendrobatids are at least somewhat toxic , levels of toxicity vary considerably from one species to  the  next and from one population to another .
Many species are threatened .
These amphibians are often called `` dart frogs ''  due  to the Amerindians ' indigenous use  of  their to  ज़हर   the  tips  of  blowdarts .
However , of over 175 species ,  तभी  four have been documented as being  प्रयुक्त  for this purpose (  curare  plants are more commonly  प्रयुक्त  ) , all  of  which come  इससे  the Phyllobates genus ,  जिससे  is  characterized  by  the  relatively large  आकार  and high levels of toxicity of  इसके  members .
Cajeta is a Mexican confection of  thickened  syrup usually made of sweetened  caramelised  milk .
According to chef Rick Bayless , the  नाम   लिये   cajeta  came from  the  Spanish phrase al punto de cajeta  ,  which means  ``  a liquid thickened  to  the point at which a spoon  drawn  through the liquid reveals the bottom of the pot in  जिससे  it is being cooked '' .
another  hypothesis  is  that it takes its name from the small wooden boxes in  जिससे  it was traditionally packed .
मैक्सिकन  cajeta is  माना  a specialty of the city of Celaya in the state  of  Guanajuato ,  हालांकि  it  is  also produced with  the  traditional  विधि   in  several towns of  the  state of Jalisco , such as Mazamitla , Sayula  ,   और  Atotonilco  el   आल्टो  .
Cajeta is  बना  by  simmering  goat 's  मिल्क  , or  occasionally  a sweetened liquid , stirring frequently , until it becomes very  viscous  due to evaporation of water , and caramelized  .
While goat milk is the most  usual   आधार  , other liquids  or  juices may be used .
in  Celaya , and eventually the  बाकी   of  Mexico , the  confection  of half goat 's milk  और  half cow 's milk became  ज्ञात  by the name  cajeta  ,  लकिन  elsewhere , the milk candy became  ज्ञात   as  leche quemada , dulce de leche ,  इत्यादि  .
It has cousins in the many Indian milk-based sweets  जैसे  pera and the  मिल्क  fudge burfi , and in the opera fudge of the U.S. Cajeta  is  eaten on its own  as  a sweet  ,  as a spread or filling for breads and pastries , such as  churros  ,  और   as  a topping for ice cream .
Certain liquors are added to special recipes called  cajeta   envinada  .
In addition , cajeta envinada especial is enriched with raisins , almonds  ,  pecans or  nuts  .
Often it is used as a topping for crêpes , as a sweet sauce  boiled   और  softened down with milk to soak the crepes , resulting in a tasty dessert .
In Mexico  अनेक  brands make cajeta but  the  most common brand is Coronado .
It is also very  आम  to place  cajeta  between obleas to make a traditional  मैक्सिकन  dessert .
Prince William  ,  Duke  of  Cambridge  (   विलियम  Arthur  फिलिप  Louis ; born 21 June  1982  )  ,  is the elder  बेटे  of Charles , Prince of Wales  ,  and Diana ,  राजकुमारी  of Wales , and  third-eldest   पोता  of Queen Elizabeth II and Prince Philip  ,  Duke of Edinburgh .
he  is  दूसरी  in the  लकीर  of succession , behind his  पिता  , to the thrones  of  sixteen independent sovereign states known as the Commonwealth realms : the United Kingdom ,  कनाडा  , Australia  ,   नई   जीलैंड   ,  Jamaica , Barbados , The Bahamas , Grenada , Papua New Guinea , the Solomon Islands , Tuvalu , Saint Lucia , Saint Vincent  और  the Grenadines , Belize , Antigua and  बारबूडा  , and Saint Kitts and Nevis .
Prince William was educated at four  स्कूलों  in the  संयुक्त  Kingdom and obtained a degree from  the  University of St Andrews .
he  spent parts of a gap  साल  in Chile  ,  Belize , Tanzania , and Kenya where he has  जिया  and holidayed several  टाइम्स   .
Prince  विलियम  has  भी  taken Kiswahili  अध्ययन   at  universities in Kenya and Tanzania  .
He  थी  commissioned as a Lieutenant in  the   ब्लूज़  and Royals Regiment of the Household Cavalry —serving with his brother Prince Harry —and , two  सालो  later , earned his wings  by  completing pilot  प्रशिक्षण  at Royal Air Force  कॉलेज   cranwell   .
In 2009  ,  he  transferred  to the Royal  एयर  Force ,  थी  promoted to Flight Lieutenant  और  underwent helicopter flying training in order to become  a  full-time pilot  साथ  the  ढूंढें  and Rescue Force .
In 2010 , he completed his general and special-to-type helicopter training and went on  to  RAF  घाटी  on  no  .  22  Squadron  performing  co-pilot duties on board a Sea King  ढूंढें  and rescue helicopter .
Prince William married  उसके  longtime girlfriend , Catherine Middleton ,  on  29  अप्रैल  2011 at Westminster Abbey .
Hours  prior  to  उसके  wedding ,  प्रिंस  William was  निर्मित   ड्यूक   of  Cambridge ,  अर्ल   of  Strathearn ,  और  Baron Carrickfergus .
Mali is  a  multilingual country .
the  languages spoken  वहीँ  reflect ancient settlement  पैटर्न  , migrations , and its long history .
Ethnologue counts  50  languages .
Of these ,  फ्रेंच  is  the  official  भाषा  and  bambara  is  the   सबसे  widely spoken .
Altogether  13  of  the  indigenous  भाषाएं  of  माली  have the legal status of national language  .
Sign in French  ,  at  a   स्मारक   in  Bamako  .

Rogers Building , the headquarters of Rogers Communications
Rogers Communications  inc.   is  a  diversified  public  कनाडाई  communications and media company .
It is particularly in  the  field  of   बेतार  communications , cable television ,  टेलीफोन  , and Internet  कनेक्टिविटी  with significant additional  दूरसंचार   और  mass media assets .
The  कम्पनी  is headquartered in the Rogers  भवन  in  टोरंटो   ,   ओंटारियो   .
The  कम्पनी   दावा  the  विरासत  of the Rogers Vacuum Tube Company ,  संस्थापित   in  1925 by Edward  रोजर्स   ,   जिससे   प्रारंभ  the CFRB radio station  in  Toronto , which was later acquired  by   बाहर   रूचि  .
The present enterprise dates to 1960  ,  when Rogers ' son ,  टेड   रोजर्स  , founded  रोजर्स  Radio  प्रसारण  Ltd .
That company acquired CHFI that year , as well as Aldred-Rogers Broadcasting , a partnership with Joel Aldred which  helped  launch CFTO in 1961 .
Rogers later bought out Aldred and started  the  current cable and wireless  परिचालन  , known  as  Rogers Cablesystems Ltd .
The  मुख्य  competitor to the  कम्पनी  is Bell Canada , which has a  similarly  extensive portfolio  of  radio and  टेलीविज़न   मीडिया  assets , as well as wireless , television distribution , and telephone services  ,  particularly in Eastern and Central Canada  ;  the two companies are often seen as having a duopoly on communications services in their regions .
However ,  the  company also competes nationally with Telus for wireless services , and primarily indirectly  साथ  Shaw  संचार  for television service .
the   कम्पनी  also competes with a number  of  other media companies in the broadcasting  उद्योग  .
The Internet is  a  global system of  interconnected  computer networks that use the standard Internet  प्रोटोकॉल  suite (  tcp/ip   )  to  serve  billions  of  users worldwide .
It is a network of networks that consists of millions of private , public , academic , business  ,  and government  संजाल  , of local to global  पैमाना  , that are linked  by  a  व्यापक  array of  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक  , wireless and optical networking  technologies  .
The Internet carries an extensive range of information resources and services , such  as  the inter-linked hypertext documents of the World Wide Web ( WWW  )  and the infrastructure to  support  email .
Most traditional  संचार  media including telephone  ,  music , film , and television  हैं   होने   reshaped  or redefined  by  the Internet , giving birth to new  सेवाएं  such  as  voice over  अंतरजाल  Protocol  (  VoIP  )  and Internet Protocol television (  iptv  ) .
Newspaper ,  किताब  and  अन्य  print  प्रकाशन   हैं  adapting  to  Web site technology , or are reshaped into blogging and web feeds .
The  अंतरजाल  has enabled and  त्वरित   नई   फ़ॉर्म  of human interactions through instant messaging  ,  Internet  forums  , and social networking .
Online shopping  रै   boomed  both for major retail outlets and  छोटी  artisans and traders  .
business-to-business  and  वित्तीय  services on  the  Internet affect supply chains across entire industries .
The origins of the Internet  पहुँचें  back to research commissioned by the United States government in the 1960s  to  build  मजबूत  ,  fault-tolerant  communication via computer networks .
The funding of a new U.S. backbone  by  the National Science Foundation in the 1980s ,  as  well as private funding for other commercial backbones , led to  विश्वव्यापी   भागीदारी  in the development of new networking  technologies   ,  and the merger of many networks .
The commercialization of  कया  was by  the  1990s an international network resulted in its popularization and incorporation into virtually every  पहलू  of modern human life  .
,  अधिक  than 2.4 billion people—over  a  third of  the  world 's human population  —have  used the services of the Internet ; approximately 100 times more people than were  using  it in 1995 , when it was mostly used by tech-savvy  मध्य  and upper  क्लास   लोगों  in the United  राज्य  and  अनेक  other  देशों  .
the   अंतरजाल  has  no  centralized governance in either technological  क्रियान्वयन  or policies for access and usage ; each  constituent  network sets its own  नीतियों  .
Only the  overreaching   परिभाषाएं   of  the two  प्रिंसिपल  name spaces in the Internet ,  the  Internet Protocol address space and  the  Domain  नाम   प्रणाली   ,  are directed by a maintainer organization , the Internet Corporation for Assigned Names and Numbers ( ICANN ) .
The  तकनीकी  underpinning and standardization  of  the  कोर  protocols ( IPv4  और   ipv6   )  is  an  activity of the Internet Engineering Task Force  (  IETF  )  , a non-profit organization of loosely affiliated international participants that anyone  may   संबद्ध  with by contributing technical expertise .
The  2006  Winter Olympics , officially known as the XX Olympic Winter Games , was a winter multi-sport event which was celebrated in Turin , Italy from February 10  ,   2006   ,  through  फ़रवरी  26  ,  2006 .
This marked the second time  इटली  hosted the Olympic Winter Games , the first being the  सात  Olympic Winter Games in  cortina  d'Ampezzo  in  1956 .
Italy  भी  hosted  the  Games of the XVII  ओलंपियाड  in  रोम  in 1960 .
Turin was selected  as  the host  नगर   लिये  the 2006  खेल  in 1999 .
the  official  लोगो  displayed  the  name `` Torino  ''  , the Italian name of the city ;  the  city is known as  ``  Turin ''  in   दोनो  English and the local traditional language , Piedmontese .
The  ओलम्पिक   mascots  of Torino 2006 were Neve ( `` snow '' in Italian ) , a female  स्नोबॉल  ,  और  Gliz ,  a   पुरूष   बर्फ  cube .
the   आधिकारिक  motto of the XX Olympic Winter Games was `` Passion lives here '' .
`` Help ! '' is a song by  the  Beatles that served as the title song for both the 1965  फिल्मी  and its soundtrack album .
it  was also released as a single , and was number one  लिये  three  सप्ताह  in both the United States and  the  United Kingdom .
`` Help ! '' was written primarily  by  John Lennon , but credited to Lennon–McCartney .
During an interview  साथ  Playboy in 1984 , Paul McCartney  stated   कि  the title was  ``   आउट  of desperation '' .
Poster  लिये  the  2005   प्रदर्शनी
siegfried  Bing ( 26 February 1838 – 6  सितंबर  1905  )  , who usually  दिया  his name  as  S. Bing ,  और   थी   यूँ  often  संदर्भित  erroneously as ``  सैमुएल   bing   ''  ( Samuel Otto Bing , 1850–1905 , was his brother ) was  a   जर्मनी  art dealer who  जिया  in Paris as an adult , and who helped  introduce  Japanese  आर्ट  and artworks to the West and  थी  a factor in the  विकास   of  the Art Nouveau style during the late nineteenth century .
Comparison of  पुरूष  and female  जीवन  expectancy  at  birth for countries and territories as defined in the 2011 CIA Factbook , with selected bubbles labelled .
The dotted line corresponds  to  equal  मादा  and male life expectancy .
The apparent 3D volumes of the bubbles are linearly proportional to their population .
