Kennewick is a city in Benton County in the southeastern part of the  u.S.  state  of  Washington  ,  near  the  Hanford nuclear site .
It is the most  populous  of the three  शहरों   collectively  referred to as the  tri-cities  ( the others being Pasco  और  Richland  )  .
Kennewick is  स्तिथ   साथ  the southwest bank of the  कोलंबिया  River , opposite  pasco  and just south of  the  confluence of  the  Columbia and  yakima   नदियाँ  .
The population was 73,917 at the 2010  जनसांख्यिकी   .
April 1  ,  2012 estimates from the Washington State Office of Financial Management  put   the  city 's population at 75,160 .
The nearest commercial airport is the Tri-Cities Airport in Pasco  ,   a  regional  वाणिज्यिक  and private airport  .
Forbes  पत्रिका  named Kennewick the # 2 area in the United  राज्य  for  जॉब  growth  ,  while nearby Yakima was named  #  1 .
The article cites the number of scientists employed  by  the Pacific Northwest National Laboratory and  क्षेत्रफल  farmland  लिये  this  आउटलुक  .
the  prothrombin time ( PT  )  and its derived  उपायों  of prothrombin ratio ( PR ) and international normalized  अनुपात  ( INR ) are measures of the extrinsic pathway of coagulation .
This test is also  पुकारा   ``  ProTime INR ''  और  `` PT/INR '' .
They are used  to   determine  the clotting tendency of blood ,  in   the  measure of  warfarin   dosage  , liver damage , and vitamin K status .
PT measures factors I ( fibrinogen  )   ,   ii  ( prothrombin ) , V  ,   सात  , and X .
It is used in conjunction with the activated partial  thromboplastin  time  (  aPTT ) which  उपायों  the intrinsic pathway .
`` I 'm  in   the  Mood  लिये   प्रेम  '' is a popular song  .
The  म्यूज़िक   थी  written  by   jimmy  McHugh ,  the   गीत  by Dorothy Fields .
The song was published in 1935 .
It was  introduced   by  Frances  langford  in the movie Every Night  at  Eight  released   कि  year .
The song  थी  featured in the  1936  Our  गिरोह  ( Little Rascals ) short , The Pinch Singer , sung by Carl  ``   अल्फाल्फा   ''  Switzer , and in the 1936 film Palm Springs .
It is often known to be Switzer 's signature song .
जेम्स   मूडी   's  saxophone solo on  a  1952  रिकॉर्डिंग  of this song inspired  the  song  ``  Moody 's Mood for Love `` .
हिप  hop  कलाकार  Prince Paul  sampled   the  song  as   the  basis for the track ``  मनोदशा  for Love '' on his album A Prince Among Thieves ( 1999  )  ,  साथ  Don  newkirk  singing its original lyrics .
The song  's  title inspired the  अंग्रेज़ी  title of Wong  kar  Wai 's movie In the Mood  लिये  Love  .
Cross-cultural psychology is the scientific  पढ़ाई   of  human behavior and mental processes , including both their variability and invariance , under diverse cultural conditions .
through  expanding research methodologies to  recognize  cultural variance in  बर्ताव  , language  ,   और   अर्थ   it   seeks  to extend  और  develop psychology .
Since psychology as an academic discipline  थी   विकसित  largely  in  North America  ,  some  psychologists   became  concerned that constructs accepted as universal were not as invariant as previously assumed , especially since many  कोशिशें  to replicate notable experiments  in   अन्य  cultures had  varying  success .
चूंकि   वहीँ  are questions as to whether theories dealing with central themes  ,  such as  affect  , cognition , conceptions of the self , and issues such as psychopathology , anxiety ,  और  depression  ,  may lack external validity  जब   ``  exported '' to other  सांस्कृतिक  contexts , cross-cultural psychology re-examines them  using   methodologies  designed to factor in  सांस्कृतिक  differences so as to account  लिये  cultural variance .
Although some critics have pointed to methodological flaws  in  cross-cultural  मनोवैज्ञानिक  research and claim that serious shortcomings in the theoretical and methodological bases used impede rather than help the scientific search for  सार्वभौमिक   सिद्धान्त  in  मनोविज्ञान  , cross-cultural psychologists are turning more to  the  study of how differences ( variance ) occur , rather than searching for  universals  in the style of physics or chemistry .
In 1972 the International Association of Cross-Cultural Psychology ( IACCP  )  was established .
This branch of psychology has continued to expand as  वहीँ   रै  been an  increasing  popularity of  incorporating  culture and diversity into studies .
cross-cultural  psychology is differentiated from Cultural  मनोविज्ञान  .
The latter is the branch  of   मनोविज्ञान  that  holds  that human  बर्ताव   is  significantly influenced  by  cultural differences , meaning that psychological  phenomena   can   तभी  be compared with  प्रत्येक   अन्य  across  संस्कृतियों  to  a  very limited  extent  .
In contrast , cross-cultural psychology includes a search for possible universals in behavior and mental processes .
Walter J. Lonner , writing for Eye on Psi Chi , has stated that ``  cross-cultural  psychology can be  विचार  of  as  a type research methodology , rather than an entirely separate field  भीतर   मनोविज्ञान   (  2000 ) . ''
`` Judas ''  is  a song by American  रिकॉर्डिंग   कलाकार  Lady Gaga , from  उसके  second  स्टुडियो   एल्बम   born  This Way ( 2011 ) .
It was  released  by  interscope  Records on April 15 , 2011 , four days ahead of its  अनुसूचित   रिलीज  .
Written and produced  by  Lady Gaga and RedOne  ,  `` Judas  ''  is a dance and electro house song about  a  woman in love with a man  जो  betrayed her .
It  embodies  the incidents that  have   haunted  Gaga in the past , and its core meaning refers  to   the  negative parts  of  her life that she ca n't escape .
Gaga has further  समझाया   कि  the song was also about honoring one 's inner darkness  in  order  to  bring oneself  into  the light .
The artwork for the single was designed by Gaga  in  Microsoft Word .
In spite of a polarizing  प्रभाव   on  several religious groups ,  the  song was  generally  well received by critics , who likened the song to  ``   ख़राब   रोमांस  `` with  कुछ  noting it should  have  been the album 's lead single .
The song has a similar  ध्वनि  to Gaga 's previous RedOne-produced tracks , including `` Poker Face `` , `` LoveGame  ``   ,   ``  Bad Romance '' ,  और   ``  Alejandro `` .
It contains three distinct hooks and a house  -influenced  break down .
Gaga explained  कि  the lines spoken during the breakdown  बात  about her as  परे  redemption , regarding  the  traditional  दृश्य  of  कया   a   स्त्री  should  be  .
``  यहूदा  '' initially had  a  strong sales opening , but was  कम  successful commercially in comparison to Gaga 's previous singles .
The song reached the top ten  of   the   चार्ट  in most major music markets , and also reached  the  top of  the  charts in South Korea  .
a  music video for the  सोंग  was filmed in April 2011 ,  co-directed  by Gaga and Laurieann Gibson and co-starring Norman Reedus .
It has  a   biblical  storyline where  reedus  played Judas Iscariot and Gaga  निभाई  Mary Magdalene  .
The video portrays  उन्हें  as modern day  प्रचारकों  going  to  Jerusalem .
it   शामिल  the Biblical story of  यहूदा  betraying  यीशु   ,  and ended with Gaga as Magdalene getting stoned to death .
Before its  रिलीज  , the Catholic League  condemned   गागा  for the alleged use of religious imagery and her role in  the  video .
However , critics generally praised the video , not finding any  अप्रिय  content .
The video was  मनोनीत  for  दो  awards  at   the   2011   एमटीवी  Video Music Awards .
Gaga has performed ``  यहूदा  ''  on  a number of  टेलीविज़न  shows , including The Graham Norton Show , Saturday Night Live , Good Morning Americas  ``  Summer Concert Series '' , the French X Factor as well as on The Ellen  degeneres  Show .
h.264/mpeg-4  Part 10  or  AVC ( Advanced Video Coding ) is a standard for  वीडियो  compression ,  और  is currently one  of  the most commonly used formats for  the  recording  ,  compression , and distribution of high definition video .
The final drafting work on the first version of the standard was completed in May 2003  .
H.264/MPEG-4 AVC is  a  block-oriented  motion-compensation   -आधारd   कोडेक  standard developed by the ITU-T Video Coding  विशेषज्ञ  Group (  vceg  ) together with the ISO/IEC JTC1 Moving Picture Experts Group ( MPEG )  .
the   प्रोजेक्ट  partnership effort  is  known as  the  Joint Video Team ( JVT ) .
The ITU-T H.264 standard and the  iso/iec  MPEG-4 AVC standard  (  formally , ISO/IEC 14496-10 – MPEG-4 Part 10 ,  उन्नत  Video Coding )  हैं  jointly maintained so  कि  they have identical technical content .
H.264  is  perhaps best known as being one of the codec  मानकों  for Blu-ray Discs  ;  all  blu-ray  Disc players must  be  able to decode H.264 .
It is also widely used by streaming internet  स्त्रोत   ,  such as videos from Vimeo , YouTube , and the iTunes Store  ,  web software such as the Adobe Flash Player and Microsoft Silverlight , and  भी  various  hdtv  broadcasts over  स्थलीय  (  atsc  ,  isdb-t   ,  DVB-T or DVB-T2 ) , cable ( DVB-C  )  and satellite ( DVB-S and DVB-S2 ) .
Non-binding arbitration is a type of arbitration  in  which the arbitrator makes  a   determination   of  the rights of the parties to the dispute , but this determination is not binding upon them  ,  and  no  enforceable arbitration award is issued .
The `` award '' is  in  effect an advisory opinion of the arbitrator 's view of the respective merits of  the  parties cases .
Non-binding arbitration  is  used in connection with attempts to reach a negotiated  उपनिवेश  .
The role  of  an arbitrator in non-binding arbitration is  ,   on  the  सतह  , similar to  कि  of a mediator in a mediation  .
However , the principal distinction  is  that whereas a mediator  होगा  try to help the parties find  a   मध्य  ground to compromise at , the arbitrator  remains   totally  removed from the settlement process and will  तभी  give a determination of liability  और  , if appropriate  ,  an indication of the quantum of  क्षतिपूर्ति  payable .
subsequent  to a non-binding  मध्यस्थता  , the  पार्टियों  remain free  to  pursue their claims either through  the  courts , or by way  of  a binding  मध्यस्थता   ,   हालांकि  in practice a settlement is the most common outcome  .
The  पुरस्कार  and reasoning in a non-binding  मध्यस्थता  is almost invariably  inadmissible   in  any subsequent action in the  न्यायालयों   or  in another arbitration tribunal  .
Non-binding  मध्यस्थता  is utilised mostly  in  the  संयुक्त  States and Canada .
It is largely unknown  in  Europe , although  in  the United Kingdom  वहीँ   is   a  practice of parties who are  seeking   a   उपनिवेश  to jointly instruct a Queen 's Counsel for an opinion on the  merits  and  संभावित  quantum of a  अर्जी  , and then to  negotiate  on  the  basis of the  दृश्य   expressed  in that opinion  .
Augustine Volcano is a  लावा  Dome Complex on Augustine Island in southwestern Cook Inlet in the Kenai Peninsula Borough  of  southcentral coastal Alaska  ,   दक्षिणपश्चिम  of Anchorage .
The  अलास्का   ज्वालामुखी  Observatory currently rates Mount Augustine as Level of Concern Color  कोड  Green for aviation and the  ज्वालामुखी   चेतावनी  Level is at Normal .
Augustine Island has a land area of , while  वेस्ट   द्वीप  , just off Augustine 's  पश्चिमी   shores  ,  रै  .
the  island is  बना  up mainly of past eruption deposits .
वैज्ञानिकों  have been  समर्थ   to   discern  that  पास्ट   गुम्बद  collapse has resulted in large avalanches .
A map  of  Belize .
The country of Belize has roughly 386 km of  तटरेखा   ,  and has many coral  reefs   ,   cays   ,  and islands  in   the   caribbean  Sea .
सबसे  of these form  the  Belize Barrier  रीफ  , the longest  in  the western  गोलार्ध   stemming  approximately  .
The reef and its  आइलैंड्स  have been a UNESCO World  विरासत   साईट  since 1996 .
the  following is a list  of  oceanic islands of Belize , arranged according  to   प्रदेश  but all of  जिससे  are in the Caribbean Sea .
Most of the  आइलैंड्स  variate in  स्पेलिंग  between `` cay '' and `` caye '' , and also use the Spanish `` cayo '' .
River islands have not been listed .
Drive Letter Access ( DLA ) is a  discontinued  commercial packet writing application for  the  Microsoft Windows operating  प्रणाली  that allows optical disc data storage devices to  be   प्रयुक्त  in a manner similar to  फ्लॉपी  disks .
dla  is  a  packet writing  प्रौद्योगिकी  for  cd  and  dvd  media  कि   उपयोग  the UDF file system  .
DLA is  नहीं   संगत  with  खिड़कियाँ  Vista and  नए  , although a patch  exists  to fix this issue  अंतर्गत   खिड़कियाँ  Vista  .
Roxio Burn was  introduced  on April  30  , 2009 .
As a replacement for  dla  , it  remedies   संगतता  issues  अंतरजाल  Explorer 8 .

Alaska ( ) is a state in the United States , situated in the northwest  extremity  of the North American continent , with the international  boundary  with Canada to  the  east ,  the  Arctic Ocean to  the  north ,  और  the Pacific Ocean to  the   वेस्ट  and south  ,  with Russia further west  आरपार  the  बेरिंग  Strait .
Alaska is the  largest  state in the United States  by   क्षेत्रफल  , the 4th least populous and the least  densely  populated of  the   50   संयुक्त  States .
Approximately half of Alaska 's  731,449  residents  सजीव  within the Anchorage metropolitan  क्षेत्रफल  .
Alaska 's economy is  वर्चस्व   by   the   आयल  , natural  गैस  ,  और  fishing industries ; it has these resources in abundance .
अलास्का  was  खरीदा  from Russia on March 30 ,  1867  ,  लिये  $ 7.2 million ( $  समायोजित  for inflation ) at  लगभग   दो  cents per acre  (  $ 4.74/km2 )  .
The  जमीन  went through several administrative changes before becoming an organized  (   or   incorporated  ) territory on  may  11 , 1912  ,  and the 49th state of the U.S. on  जनवरी   3   ,  1959 .
The name  ``  Alaska '' ( Аляска ) was already introduced  in   the   रूसी   औपनिवेशिक   काल  , when it was  प्रयुक्त  only for the peninsula  और   is  derived from the Aleut alaxsxaq  ,  meaning ``  the  mainland '' or , more literally , `` the object  towards  which the  कार्रवाई  of the sea is directed '' .
It  is  also  ज्ञात  as  alyeska  , the  ``  great  जमीन   ''  , an Aleut word derived from the same root .
Nelson Mandela Metropolitan University ( NMMU ) is a  दक्षिण  African tertiary education institution with its main administration in the coastal city  of  Port  एलिज़ाबेथ  .
A merging  of  three institutions  संस्थापित  NMMU in January  2005  but  इसके  history dates back to 1882 with  the  foundation  of  Port Elizabeth Art School  .
the  University draws international students from  सब  over the world .
There  हैं   over  3000 international students and include students from the United  राज्य  , France , China , Germany , Belgium , Denmark , Finland , Netherlands , Norway ,  स्वीडन  , United Kingdom and  अनेक  other countries .
NMMU is a comprehensive university  offering  professional and vocational  प्रशिक्षण  .
The University has six campuses - five in  बंदरगाहों  Elizabeth and one  in  George .
the  main campus is the  दक्षिण  Campus  .
Students at  nmmu  can study towards diplomas and degrees up to and including  डॉक्टरेट  level  योग्यता  .
a  number of courses include workplace experience as part of the  curriculum  .
CoverGirl  is  an American cosmetics brand founded in  मेरीलैंड   ,  by the Noxzema  रासायनिक  Company ( later called Noxell ) and acquired by  procter  &  gamble  in 1989 .
the  Noxell Company  advertised  this cosmetics line by allowing ``  कवर  girls '' , fashion  मॉडल  who appear on the front cover of women 's  मैगज़ीन  , to wear its products .
CoverGirl makes  up  for lack of direct individual customer service  by  providing a wide variety  of  cosmetics available at reasonable prices .
On the  उत्पत्ति  of Species , published on  24  November 1859 , is a work of scientific literature by Charles Darwin which is considered to be the foundation of evolutionary  जीवविज्ञान  .
Its full title was On the  उत्पत्ति  of Species by Means of Natural Selection , or  the  Preservation of Favoured Races  in  the  संघर्ष  for Life .
For the sixth  संस्करण  of 1872 ,  the  short title was changed to The Origin of Species .
Darwin 's book introduced the scientific theory that  populations  evolve over  the  course of generations through a process  of   प्राकृतिक   चयन  .
It  प्रस्तुत  a body of evidence that  the  diversity of life arose by common descent  through  a branching pattern of evolution .
Darwin included evidence that he  था  gathered on the Beagle expedition in the 1830s and his subsequent  निष्कर्षों  from research ,  पत्राचार  , and experimentation .
Various evolutionary ideas had already been proposed  to   बताइये  new findings in biology .
वहीँ  was growing  support  for  ऐसे   विचार  among dissident anatomists and  the  general public , but during the first half of the 19th century the English  वैज्ञानिक  establishment was closely tied to the Church of England , while science was part  of   प्राकृतिक  theology .
Ideas about  the  transmutation of species were  विवादास्पद   as  they conflicted with the beliefs that species were unchanging  भाग  of a designed  पदानुक्रम  and that  इंसानो  were unique , unrelated to other animals .
The political and theological  implications  were intensely  debated  , but transmutation was not  स्वीकृत   by  the scientific mainstream .
The  किताब  was written for non-specialist readers and attracted  फैली  interest upon its publication  .
As Darwin was an eminent scientist , his findings  यहूद   लिया  seriously and the  प्रमाण  he presented generated scientific , philosophical  ,  and religious discussion .
The debate  over   the  book contributed to the campaign by  t.h  .  हक्स्ले  and his  fellow  members  of  the X Club to secularise science by promoting scientific naturalism .
भीतर  two decades  वहीँ  was widespread scientific agreement that  एवोल्यूशन   ,  with a branching  पैटर्न  of common descent , had occurred  ,  but  वैज्ञानिकों  were slow to give natural selection the significance that Darwin thought appropriate .
दौरान   the  `` eclipse of Darwinism `` from the  1880s  to the 1930s , various other mechanisms of evolution  यहूद   दिए  more credit .
With the development of the modern evolutionary synthesis in the 1930s and 1940s , Darwin 's concept of evolutionary adaptation through natural selection became  सेंट्रल  to modern evolutionary theory  ,  now the unifying concept of the  जीवन  sciences .
Charles Dillon `` Casey '' Stengel (  ;  July 30 , 1890 – September 29 , 1975 )  ,  nicknamed `` The Old Perfessor  ''  , was  an  American Major League Baseball outfielder and manager  .
He was elected to the Baseball Hall of  कीर्ति  in  .
Stengel  थी   born  in  कान्सास   नगर  , Missouri ,  और  originally nicknamed `` Dutch '' ,  a  common nickname at that time for Americans of  जर्मनी  ancestry .
After  उसके  major  लीग  career  began  , he acquired the nickname `` Casey '' , which originally came from the initials of  उसके  hometown ( `` K. C. '' ) , which evolved into  ``  Casey '' , influenced by the wide popularity of the poem Casey at the Bat  .
In the 1950s , sportswriters  उतावले  him with yet  another  nickname , ``  the  Old Professor  ''   (  or `` Perfessor '' )  ,  for his sharp wit and his ability to talk at length on  anything  baseball -related .
Although his  बेसबॉल  career spanned a  क्रमांक  of teams  और  cities , he is primarily associated with clubs in New York City  .
between  playing and managing , he is the  तभी  man to have worn four of New York 's major league clubs ' uniforms .
He  थी  the first of  चार  men  (   through  the season )  to  manage both  the   नई  York  यांकीज़  and New  यॉर्क  Mets ;  योगी  Berra ,  डलास  Green , and Joe  टोरेस   हैं  the  अन्य  .
Like Torre , he also managed the Braves and the Dodgers .
He ended his baseball career as the beloved manager  लिये  the then  विस्तार  New York Mets ,  जिससे  won over the hearts of  नई  York  partly  due to  the  unique character of their veteran  नेता  .
June (  )  is the sixth month of the  साल  in  the   जूलियन  and Gregorian calendars and one of the four months  साथ  a length of  30  days .
Ovid provides two etymologies for June  's   नाम  in his poem concerning the months entitled the Fasti .
The first is that  the   माह  is  नामित  after the Roman goddess Juno , wife  of  Jupiter and  समतुल्य  to the Greek goddess Hera ; the  दूसरी  is that the name comes from  the  Latin word iuniores ,  अर्थ  `` younger ones ,  ''  as opposed to maiores (  ``  elders '' ) for which  the  preceding month  may  may be  नामित   (   fasti  VI.1–88 ) .
See  :   महीने  in  विभिन्न  calendars also called the season of the June is the month with the longest daylight hours of  the  year in the Northern Hemisphere and  the  shortest daylight  घंटों  of the year in the Southern  गोलार्ध   .
जून  in the  उत्तरी   गोलार्ध  is the seasonal equivalent to December in the Southern  गोलार्ध  and vice versa .
In  the   उत्तरी  hemisphere ,  the  beginning of the meteorological  गर्मियाँ   is  1 June .
In the Southern hemisphere , the beginning of the meteorological winter  is  1  जून   .
At the start of June ,  the   सूर्य  rises in the constellation of Taurus  ;   at   the  end of  जून  , the sun rises in  the   नक्षत्र  of  मिथुन  .
However , due to the  precession   of  the equinoxes  ,  June  begins  with the sun in the astrological sign of Gemini  ,  and  ends  with the sun in the astrological sign  of   कर्कट   .
June is known for the large number of marriages that occur over the course of  the  month .
according  to one etymology , June is named after  juno  (  hera  )  .
Juno was the goddess of marriage and a married couple 's  household  ,  so  some consider it good luck to be married in this month .
according  to  another  etymology provided  by   the  Roman poet  ओविड  , June is named for the  iuniores  , latin for `` young  लोगों  '' ( Fasti VI.88 ) and  कि  the month of  may  is named for the maiores ,  लैटिन  for `` elders '' .
In Iceland , folklore says  कि  if you bathe naked in the morning dew on the  morning  of  जून  24 , you  हैं  supposed to keep aging at bay for  longer  .
a  constitution is  a  set  of  fundamental  सिद्धान्त  or established precedents according to which a state or other organization is governed .
These rules  साथ   मेक  up , i.e . constitute  ,  what  the   एंटिटी  is .
जब  these  सिद्धान्त  are written down into  a  single document or set of legal documents , those documents may be  कहा  to embody a  लिखा   संविधान  ; if they are  लिखा  down in a single  व्यापक  document ,  it  is said to embody  a  codified  संविधान  .
Constitutions concern different  स्तर  of organizations , from sovereign  राज्य  to companies and unincorporated associations .
A treaty which establishes an international organization is also its constitution , in that it  होता   define  how that organization is  गठित  .
भीतर  states , whether sovereign or federated , a constitution defines the principles upon which the state  is  based , the procedure in  जिससे  laws are made and  by   जिसको   .
Some constitutions  ,   विशेषकर  codified  constitutions  , also act as limiters of state power ,  by   establishing  lines which a state 's rulers can not cross , such as  आधारभूत  rights .
जार्ज  Washington at Constitutional Convention of 1787 ,  हस्ताक्षर  of U.S.  संविधान  .
The  संविधान  of India is the longest written  संविधान  of any  sovereign  country in the world , containing 448  आलेख  ,  12  schedules and  100  amendments , with 117,369 words  in  its  अंग्रेज़ी   भाषा  version , while the United States Constitution is the shortest written  संविधान  , at 7 articles and 27  amendments  .
Ron  diftler   (  left )  ,  NASA Robonaut  मैनेजर  assisting  in  a Robonaut  familiarization  training  सत्र  in the Space Environment Simulation Laboratory at NASA 's Johnson  स्पेस  Center  .
Engineering management is  a  specialized form of management that is  चिंतित  with the application of  अभियान्त्रिकी  principles  to  business  अभ्यास  .
Engineering  प्रबन्धन  is a  करियर  that brings together the technological  problem-solving  savvy of engineering and the  organizational  , administrative ,  और  planning abilities of  प्रबन्धन  in order  to  oversee complex  उद्यमों  from conception  to  completion .
Example  क्षेत्रों  of engineering are product development , manufacturing , construction  ,  design  अभियान्त्रिकी   ,  industrial engineering  ,  technology , production ,  or  any other field that employs personnel who perform an  अभियान्त्रिकी  function  .
कामयाब  engineering managers  typically  require training and experience in business and engineering  .
Technically inept managers tend to be deprived  of  support by their technical team ,  और  non-commercial  प्रबंधक  tend to  कमी   वाणिज्यिक  acumen to deliver in a market economy .
Largely  ,  engineering  प्रबंधक  manage engineers who are driven  by   non-entrepreneurial  thinking ,  यूँ  require the  जरुरी  people  कौशल   to  coach , mentor and motivate technical professionals  .
Engineering professionals joining manufacturing companies sometimes become engineering managers by default after  a  period of time .
वे  are  जरूरी  to  सीख  how to manage once they  हैं  on  the  job , though this is usually an ineffective way to  develop  managerial abilities  .
in   an  insurance policy , the deductible is the amount of expenses that must  be  paid  आउट   of  pocket before an insurer will pay  कोई  expenses .
In general  उपयोग  , the  पद   deductible  may be used to describe one of several types of  clauses   (  see below ) that are used  by  insurance companies as a threshold for policy payments .
Deductibles  हैं  typically used to deter the  विशाल  number of  नगण्य  claims that a  उपभोक्ता   can  be reasonably expected  to  bear  the  cost of  .
by  restricting its coverage  to  events  कि  are significant enough  to  incur  विशाल  costs , the insurance firm expects  to   अदा  out slightly smaller amounts much less frequently ,  रूष्ट  much  उच्चतर   बचत  .
As a result , insurance premiums are typically cheaper when they  involve   उच्चतर  deductibles .
deductibles  are  सामान्यतः  provided as clauses in an  बीमे  policy that  dictate  how much of an insurance-covered expense is  borne  by the policyholder  .
They  हैं  normally quoted as a fixed quantity and is a part of most policies covering losses to the  नीति   होल्डर  .
The insurer  तब  becomes liable for claimable expenses that exceed this amount ( subject to  the  maximum sum claimable indicated in the contract ) .
Depending  on  the policy , the deductible may apply per covered  घटना   ,  or per year  .
For policies where  incidences  are not  आसान  to delimit  (  for example health insurance  )  , the deductible  is   typically   लागू  per year .
Several deductibles can be  नियत  by  the   insurer  based on the cause  of  the claim .
For example , a single housing insurance  नीति  may contain multiple deductible  amounts  for loss  or  damage arising from  चोरी   ,  fire , natural  calamities  , evacuation etc .
वहीँ  are  भी  deductible reimbursement programs that  reimburse  a  deductible  in  the  event of  an  auto  ,   घर  , boat/yacht or health insurance claim .
An invoice or bill is a  वाणिज्यिक  document issued by  a  seller to  a   खरीदार  , indicating the  उत्पाद  , quantities , and agreed  कीमतें  for products or services the seller has provided the buyer .
An invoice indicates the sale  लेनदेन  only .
भुगतान   शर्तें  are independent of  the  invoice and are negotiated by the  खरीदार  and the seller  .
Payment terms are usually included on the  चालान  .
The buyer could  have  already paid for  the  products  or  services listed on the invoice .
Buyer can also have a maximum number  of  days in which to pay for these goods and is sometimes offered  a  discount if paid  पहले  the due date .
In the rental industry , an invoice must include a specific reference to the  अवधि   of  the time being  billed  , so in addition to quantity ,  दाम  and  छूट   the  invoicing  राशि   is  also based on duration  .
generally  each line of a rental invoice will refer  to  the actual hours , days ,  सप्ताह  , months ,  etc.  , being billed .
From the point of view of a seller , an invoice  is   a  sales invoice  .
From the  पाइंट  of view of a buyer , an invoice is a purchase  चालान  .
The document indicates the  खरीदार  and  विक्रेता  , but  the  term invoice indicates money is owed  or  owing  .
In English , the context  of   the  term invoice is usually used  to  clarify its meaning , such as `` We sent them an invoice '' ( they owe us money ) or `` We received an invoice from them '' ( we owe them  धन  )  .
The right main bronchus ( or  सही   प्राथमिक  bronchus , or right principal bronchus ) is a bronchus of the respiratory system .
It  is   wider  , shorter , and more vertical  in  direction than the left .
It is  परिचय  2.5 cm  long  , and enters  the  right lung nearly opposite  the   पांचवां   thoracic  vertebra .
the   azygos  vein arches  over  it  इससे  behind ; and the  सही   pulmonary  artery lies  at  first below and then in front of  it  .
About 2 cm  इससे  its commencement it gives off a branch  to  the upper lobe of the right lung .
इस  is termed the eparterial branch  of  the bronchus  ,   क्युकी  it  arises  above the right pulmonary artery .
The bronchus now  गुजरता   नीचे  the artery  ,  and is known  as  the hyparterial  शाखा  ; it divides into two branches for the  मध्य  and lower lobes  .
If a foreign  देह  in the airway passes  through  the trachea  ,  it  होगा  most likely  डालें  the right main bronchus  बजाय  of the  बाएँ  , due to the  straighter  alignment of the right bronchus  to   the  trachea .
स्क्वैश  is  a  racquet sport played  by  two (  singles  )  or  four players  (  doubles ) in a four-walled court with a small ,  खोखला  rubber ball .
The players must alternate in striking the ball with their racquet and hit the ball onto the playable surfaces of  the  four walls of the court .
The game  थी   formerly  called squash racquets , a  सन्दर्भ   to  the `` squashable '' soft ball used in the game ( compared  साथ  the fatter ball  प्रयुक्त   in  its parent game  racquets  or  rackets  ) .
Squash is recognized by the IOC  और  supporters are lobbying  लिये  its  incorporation  in a future Olympic program .
in   2003  , Forbes rated squash as the number one healthiest sport  to   खेल  .
Residual oil is  आयल  found  in  low  एकाग्रता  naturally or in exhausted oil fields .
Often mixed with water , it can not be recovered by conventional techniques .
However , it  can  be recovered using  कार्बन  dioxide-enhanced  आयल  recovery ( CO2 EOR )  जिससे  involves injecting carbon  डाइऑक्साइड   into  the well  reducing   श्यानता  and enhancing flow of the oil .
The technique is not new but has not been used extensively on  अवशेष  oil zones , low-grade  जमा  of petroleum such as the 38 square  मील  in the Permian Basin of Texas leased  by  Elliott Roosevelt Jr  .
The technique is  सीमित   by  availability of  कार्बन   डाइऑक्साइड  .
It  करता  not result in sequestration of the carbon dioxide but  the  gas is recycled  as  much as possible .
United States  reserves  of residual oil  हैं  estimated to be 100 billion barrels .
Artist 's rendering of  the   आग  , by  जॉन  R. Chapin , originally printed in Harper 's Weekly ; the  दृश्य  faces northeast across the  randolph  Street Bridge .
The Great Chicago  आग  was a conflagration that burned from Sunday  ,   अक्तूबर  8 , to early Tuesday , October 10 , 1871  ,  killing hundreds and destroying  परिचय  in Chicago ,  इलिनोइस  .
Though the fire was one of the largest U.S. disasters of the 19th century , the  पुनर्निर्माण   कि  began helped develop  शिकागो  as  एक   of  the most populous and economically important American cities  .
हेनरी  VIII ( 28 June 1491  –  28 January 1547  )  was  किंग  of England from 21 April 1509 until  उसके  death .
He was lord , and  बाद  king , of  आयरलैंड   ,  as well as continuing  the  nominal claim by  the  English monarchs to the Kingdom of France .
हेनरी  was  the  second monarch of the  ट्यूडर  dynasty , succeeding his father , Henry  सात  .
Besides his six  विवाह  , Henry VIII is known for  उसके   भूमिका  in the separation of the Church of England from the Roman  कैथोलिक  Church .
Henry  's  struggles with Rome led to  the  separation of the Church of England from papal  प्राधिकार  ,  the  Dissolution of the Monasteries  ,  and his own establishment as the Supreme Head of the Church of England .
yet  he  remained  a believer in core Catholic  theological  teachings ,  भी  after his excommunication from the  रोमन  Catholic Church  .
हेनरी   oversaw  the legal union of  इंग्लैण्ड  and  वेल्स  with the Laws in Wales  अधिनियमों  1535 and 1542 .
In 1513 , the new king allied with the Holy Roman Emperor  ,   maximillian  I  ,  and  invaded  France in 1513 with  a  large , well-equipped army , but achieved little  at  a  considerable  financial cost .
maximillian  , for  उसके   भाग   ,  used the  अंग्रेज़ी  invasion to his  अपना  ends ,  और  this  prejudiced  England 's  क्षमता  to defeat the French .
This foray would  prove  the  प्रारंभ   of  an obsession for Henry , who invaded again in 1544 .
इस  time , Henry 's forces  captured  the important city of Boulogne ,  लकिन  again the Holy Roman Emperor ,  चार्ल्स  V  ,   समर्थित  Henry only as  long  as he needed to and England ,  strained  by  the   विशाल  cost  of  the war , ransomed  the  city back for peace  .
His contemporaries considered Henry in  उसके   प्रधान  to  be   an  attractive ,  शिक्षित  and accomplished king , and  he  has  महरूम  described as `` one  of  the  सबसे  charismatic rulers to  बैठना   on  the English throne '' .
Besides ruling with  निरपेक्ष  power , he also engaged himself as an author and composer .
His desire  to   provide   इंग्लैण्ड   साथ  a male heir – which stemmed partly from personal vanity  और  partly because  he  believed a daughter would  be  unable  to  consolidate  the  Tudor dynasty and the fragile peace that existed  following  the Wars of the Roses – led to  the   दो   बाते  for which Henry is most remembered : his  छह  marriages and the  अंग्रेज़ी  Reformation .
Henry became morbidly obese and his  स्वास्थ्य  suffered , contributing to his death  in  1547  .
he  is frequently characterised in his later life  as   a  lustful , egotistical , harsh ,  और  insecure  किंग  .
La Reina del Sur ( The Queen of the South  )  is a Spanish-language telenovela produced by  the  United States  टेलीविज़न  network Telemundo  ,  in conjunction with  the   एंटेना  3 network  और  RTI Producciones  .
Based on a novel of the same name by  स्पेनी   लेखक  Arturo Pérez-Reverte , the drama  depicts  the rise of  टेरेसा  Mendoza ( Kate del Castillo ) , a young woman from  मैक्सिको  who becomes the most powerful drug trafficker in  दक्षिणी   स्पेन  .
Patricio Wills , the president of Telemundo Television Studios , was the executive producer .
Though La  reina  del Sur was nominated for Novela of  the   साल  , Favorite Lead Actress ,  और  Best Bad  लक   वीडियो  , it won no awards .
With a $  10   लाख  budget  ,  La Reina del Sur was the most expensive telenovela  कभी  produced by Telemundo  .
The program 's premiere on  फ़रवरी  28  ,  2011 ,  थी   the   संजाल  's highest  रेटेड  premiere for  a  telenovela  to   तिथि  .
The  कार्यक्रम  frequently dominated its  समय  slot , even over  अंग्रेज़ी  language  प्रोग्रामिंग  on other major  u.S.   संजाल  .
La Reina del  सूर  completed  इसके  63 episode  चलाएं  on Telemundo  और  its 13 episode run on  एंटेना  3 simultaneously on May 30 , 2011 .
The final episode was the highest rated broadcast in Telemundo 's 19-year history  (  4.2 million viewers ) , and beat all of the English language U.S. television networks to earn the number one slot in the 18-49 adult  जनसांख्यिकी  .
The program 's success spurred Telemundo to launch its first campaign  to  gain the series  an   एमी  Award  नामांकन  .
a  one-night special featuring several  डाल  members aired on May  31  , 2011 , and marked the  telemundo  debut  of   विख्यात  Latina  टेलीविज़न  personality Cristina Saralegui .
La Reina del Sur is  ब्रॉडकास्ट  in several other  बाज़ार  , including Serbia ,  कोलंबिया  , Chile , Cyprus ,  निकारागुआ  , Costa  रिका  ,  मैक्सिको  , Albania ,  हंगेरियाई  , Slovenia  ,  Croatia  ,  Romania , ( among others ) .
An example of rack mounted servers
A  वेब  hosting  सेवा  is  a  type of  अंतरजाल  hosting service that allows individuals  और   संगठन  to make their website accessible via the  संसार  Wide Web .
Web hosts are  कंपनियाँ  that  provide  space on a  सर्वर  owned or leased for  उपयोग  by clients  ,  as well as providing Internet connectivity  ,  typically  in  a data center .
Web hosts can also provide data center  स्पेस  and connectivity to the Internet for  अन्य  servers located in their data center ,  पुकारा   colocation  , also  ज्ञात   as  Housing in  लैटिन   अमेरिका   or  France  .
the  scope of web  होस्टिंग  services varies greatly .
the  most basic is web page and small-scale file  होस्टिंग  , where files can  be  uploaded via  संचिका  Transfer Protocol  (  FTP ) or  a  Web interface .
The files are usually delivered to the Web  ``  as is  ''  or  साथ   minimal  processing .
अनेक  Internet  सेवा  providers ( ISPs  )  offer this service free  to  subscribers .
Individuals and organizations may also obtain Web  पेज  hosting  इससे  alternative service providers .
निजी   वेब  site hosting is typically free ,  advertisement-sponsored  , or inexpensive .
Business web site hosting often has a higher expense  depending  upon  the  size and type of the website .
Single page hosting is generally sufficient  लिये  personal web pages .
A complex site  काल्स   लिये  a more comprehensive package that provides database support  और  application development  प्लेटफ़ॉर्म  ( e.g . PHP ,  जावा   ,   माणिक्य   on  Rails , ColdFusion , or ASP.NET )  .
ये  facilities  allow  customers  to  write  or   स्थापना  scripts for applications like forums  और  content management .
भी  , Secure Sockets Layer  (  SSL )  is  typically used for e-commerce .
The host may also provide an  इंटरफ़ेस   or   कंट्रोल  panel  लिये   मैनेजिंग   the  Web  सर्वर   और  installing scripts , as well as other modules  और  service applications like  e-mail  .
Some hosts specialize in certain software or services  (  e.g . e-commerce  )  , which are commonly used by larger companies that outsource network infrastructure .
Madden NFL ( known as John Madden  फ़ुटबॉल  before 1993 ) is an American football video game  श्रेणी  developed by Electronic Arts Tiburon for EA Sports  .
The game series is  नामित  after  प्रो  Football Hall of  famer  John Madden , a well-known former Super  कटोरी  –winning coach  of  the Oakland Raiders and color commentator .
The series  is  the best  selling   ea  Sports series  .
The  खेल  have consistently  महरूम  a  बेहतरीन  seller , and  रै  even spawned TV  shows   जहाँ  players compete  .
Among the  खेल   's  realistic  सुविधाएँ   शामिल  sophisticated playbooks and  खिलाड़ी  statistics , and voice commentary that allows  खिलाड़ी   to  hear  the   खेल  as if it were a real TV broadcast .
The Madden NFL series has been nicknamed the NFL  's   33rd  Franchise .
the  series was  originally   conceived   by  Electronic Arts founder Trip Hawkins , who then  approached  Madden in  1984  for his  समर्थन  and expertise  .
due  to Madden 's insistence  कि   the  game be as  यथार्थवादी   as  possible ,  the  first version  of  John  मैडेन  Football was not  released  until 1988 .
The second version  of  the game  थी  released in 1990  ,  with annual versions since then .
The series '  नाम  was changed to Madden  एनएफएल  in 1993 after  ea  acquired  the  rights to use NFL teams and players  .
Despite Madden  's   रिटायरमेंट  as a broadcaster in 2009 , he continues  to   lend   उसके  name  और  provide expertise for the  खेल  .
Cindy  ली  Miller Sheehan ( born July 10 ,  1957  ) is an American antiwar  activist  whose son , U.S. Army Specialist  केसी  Sheehan , was killed by  दुश्मन  action during the Iraq War .
वो   आकर्षित  national  और  international media attention in August 2005 for her extended antiwar protest  at  a  makeshift  camp  बाहर  President George W.  बुश  's Texas ranch —a stand that drew  दोनो  passionate support and angry criticism .
Sheehan  भागा  unsuccessfully  लिये  Congress in  2008  .
She is  a  vocal critic of President Barack Obama 's foreign  नीति  .
Her memoir  ,   सलाम  Mom : A  माँ  's Journey Through Heartache  to  Activism , was published in  2006   .
Sheehan  थी  the 2012 vice-presidential nominee of the  सलाम  and Freedom Party .
Wyclef Jeanelle Jean ( ;  ;  born October 17 ,  1969  )  wyclef  Dumped From Haiti 's Presidential Ballot – TIME  ,  Aug 21 , 2010 .
``  पहले  he announced on August 5 that he was  कार्यशील  for President of Haiti , Wyclef  जां  was still listing his age as only 37 years  बूढ़ा  .
But after declaring himself a presidential candidate ,  the  Haitian-American-Irish hip-hop  स्टार  also  decided  to come clean and confirm  कि  he  थी  really 40 .  ''  is a  three-time   ग्रैमी  Award -winning Haitian-American rapper ,  singer-songwriter   ,  musician ,  रिकार्ड  producer , and politician  .
At age  नौ  , Jean  स्थानांतरित  to the United States  साथ  his  परिवार   और   रै  spent much  of  his life in  the  country .
he  first received fame as a member of the acclaimed New Jersey hip hop group the Fugees .
On August 5 , 2010  ,  Jean filed for candidacy  in  the 2010 Haitian presidential election , although the Electoral Commission subsequently ruled  उसे  ineligible to  स्टैंड   as  he  था   नहीं  met  the   आवश्यकता  to  have  been resident in Haiti  लिये   पाँच  years .
wyclef  Jean to appeal against Haiti election ruling – BBC News  ,  Aug 22 , 2010 .
Haiti 's electoral commission  कहा  that Mr Jean was ineligible to stand  as  the Haitian constitution requires candidates to have lived in the country for five years prior to an  चुनाव  .
The 40-year-old singer lives  in  the US  .
Jean 's efforts at earthquake relief  ,  highly  publicized  in 2010 throughout  हैती  and the United  राज्य  , were channeled through his charitable organization , Yéle Haiti .
The charity , which performed a variety of charitable works in  हैती  between 2005 and 2010 , effectively closed in 2012 .
In law , a set-off is a statutory defense to  the  whole or to a portion of  a  plaintiff 's claim  .
It had no  अस्तित्व   अंतर्गत  the English common law  ,  being created by  2  Geo . II c. 22 for the relief of insolvent debtors , although set-off was recognized in  इक्विटी  .
Such a defense could be  pleaded  only in respect of mutual debts of a definite character  ,  and did not apply to cases  in  which  क्षतिपूर्ति  were claimed  ,  nor to equitable claims or demands .
by  the rules of the Supreme Court ( O. XIX . r. 3 ) a  प्रतिवादी  in  an  action may set off or  नियत  up any right or claim by way  of  counterclaim against the claims of a plaintiff , and such set-off  or  counterclaim has the same effect as a statement of claim in a  cross-action   .
The legal defense  of  set-off ( above ) was originally introduced to prevent the unfair situation whereby a person  (  `` Party A  ''  ) who owed  धन  to another ( ``  पार्टी  B '' ) could be sent to debtors prison , despite the fact that Party  b  also owed money to Party  a  .
the  law thus allows both parties to  टालना  payment until their respective claims have  महरूम   सुना  in  अदालत  .
Upon judgment , both claims  हैं  extinguished and  replaced  by  a  single net  योग   owing  ( e.g  .  If Party  a  owes Party B 100 and Party B  owes  Party A 105 , the two sums are set off  और   replaced   साथ  a single obligation of 5 from Party B to Party A  )  .
Set-off can also be incorporated by  contractual  agreement  so  that , where a  पार्टी  defaults , the mutual amounts owing are  automatically  set off and  बुझे  .
in  certain jurisdictions ( including the UK ) , set-off takes place automatically upon the  insolvency  of a company .
This means  कि  , for each party  जिससे  is both a  creditor  and  debtor  of the insolvent company , mutual debts are set-off against each  अन्य  , and  तब  either the  दिवालिया  's creditor  can  claim  the  balance in the bankruptcy or the trustee in bankruptcy can ask for  the  balance remaining to be paid , depending on which side owed  the  most .
इस   रै   महरूम  criticized  as  an undeclared security  ब्याज  that  violates  the principle of pari  passu  .
the   वैकल्पिक  , where  a  creditor has  to  pay all  इसके   debts  ,  लकिन  receive only  a  limited portion  of  the leftover  moneys   कि   अन्य  unsecured creditors get , poses the  खतरे  of  'knock-on  ' insolvencies .
The right  to  set off is  विशेषकर   महत्वपूर्ण  when reporting a bank 's exposures to regulatory authorities  .
The situation where a bank has to  रपट  that it has lent a  विशाल  sum to a borrower  (  and is therefore  उजागर  , because there  is  a risk that the borrower might default thereby leading to the loss of  the   बैंको  's or its depositors  '  money ) is  यूँ  replaced ( where the bank has  लिया   सुरक्षा   over  shares or securities of the borrower ) with an exposure of the money lent  ऋण  the  मान  of the security taken .
Jennifer  joanna   एनिस्टन  ( born February 11 , 1969 ) is an  अमरीकी  actress , film director , and producer .
Aniston gained worldwide recognition in the 1990s for  portraying  Rachel  ग्रीन  on the television sitcom Friends ,  a   भूमिका  which earned her an Emmy Award , a  सुनहरी   ग्लोब  Award , and a  स्क्रीन  Actors Guild Award .
Aniston  रै  also enjoyed a successful Hollywood  फिल्मी  career  .
She gained critical acclaim for her performances in  the  independent films She 's the One  (  1996 ) , Office  स्पेस   (  1999 ) , The Good Girl (  2002  ) and Friends with Money ( 2006 ) .
She  रै   था  her greatest commercial successes with the films Bruce Almighty ( 2003  )  ,  the  Break-Up  (   2006   )  , Marley & Me ( 2008 ) , Just Go with It ( 2011  )  and Horrible  bosses  ( 2011 ) .
एनिस्टन  received a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame  on  February 22 , 2012 .

A White tiger at  tobu  Zoo  ,  in  saitama  , Japan .
The white tiger  is  a recessive mutant  of   the  Bengal tiger  ,  which was reported in the wild from time to time in Assam , Bengal  ,  Bihar and especially from the former State  of  Rewa .
Conventional PCI ( PCI is an  initialism  formed from  परिधीय  Component Interconnect , part  of  the  पीसीआई  Local Bus standard and often shortened  to  just PCI ) is a local computer bus for attaching  हार्डवेयर  devices in  a  computer .
The PCI  बस  supports the  कृत्यों  found on a processor bus , but in a standardized format  कि  is independent of any  particular   प्रोसेसर   .
Devices connected to  the  bus appear to the  प्रोसेसर   to  be  कनेक्ट  directly to the processor bus , and are assigned addresses in the  प्रोसेसर  's  पता   स्पेस  .
संलग्न  devices can take either the form of an integrated circuit  fitted  onto the motherboard itself , called a planar device in  the  PCI  specification  , or an expansion  कार्ड   कि  fits into a  स्लॉट   .
The PCI Local Bus was first implemented in IBM PC compatibles , where it displaced  the  combination of ISA plus one VESA Local Bus as the bus configuration  .
It has subsequently been  अपनाया  for  अन्य  computer types .
PCI  और  PCI-X  हैं  being replaced  by   पीसीआई  Express  ,   लकिन  , most motherboards are still made with one or more PCI slots  ,  which are  sufficient   लिये   अनेक  uses  .
The PCI specification covers  the   शारीरिक   आकार  of the bus ( including the size and spacing of the circuit board edge electrical  सम्पर्क  )  ,   विद्युत  characteristics ,  बस  timing , and protocols .
The specification can be  खरीदा  from the  पीसीआई  Special  ब्याज  Group ( PCI-SIG ) .
Typical PCI cards  प्रयुक्त  in PCs include  :  network cards ,  ध्वनि  cards , modems  ,  extra ports such as USB or  सीरियल   ,  TV  ट्यूनर  cards  और   डिस्क   परिरक्षक   .
PCI video cards replaced ISA and VESA cards , until growing bandwidth requirements outgrew the capabilities  of  PCI ; the preferred interface for  वीडियो   ताश  became AGP , and then PCI Express .
PCI video cards  remain  available for use  साथ  old PCs without  अगप  or PCI Express  स्लॉट  .
Many devices previously provided on PCI expansion cards  हैं  now commonly integrated  onto  motherboards or  उपलब्धियाँ   in  universal  सीरियल   बस  and PCI Express versions .
कैफीन   is  a  कड़वा  , white  crystalline  xanthine  एल्कलॉएड   कि  acts as  a  stimulant drug  .
Caffeine  is  found  in  varying quantities in the seeds , leaves  ,  and  फल  of some  पौधे  , where it acts as  a  natural  कीटनाशक  that paralyzes and kills  निश्चित  insects feeding on  the  plants , as well as enhancing the reward memory  of  pollinators .
It is most  commonly  consumed  by  humans in infusions extracted from the seed of the coffee plant and the leaves of the tea bush , as well as from various foods  और  drinks containing products derived  इससे  the kola nut .
Other  स्त्रोत  include yerba  maté  , guarana berries , guayusa , and the  yaupon  holly  .
in  humans , caffeine acts as a central nervous system stimulant  ,   temporarily  warding off drowsiness and restoring alertness .
it  is  the   संसार  's most widely consumed psychoactive drug , but unlike many other psychoactive substances ,  it  is legal and unregulated in  nearly  all parts of the world .
Beverages containing  कैफीन   ,  such as coffee , tea  ,  soft drinks , and energy drinks , enjoy great popularity .
In North America , 90 % of adults  consume   कैफीन  daily .
भाग  of  the  reason caffeine  is  classified by the  खाना  and Drug Administration as GRAS ( generally recognized as safe  )  is that toxic doses ( over 10 grams ) are much higher than typically used  doses   (  less than 500 milligrams )  .
ordinary  consumption can have low health risks , even when  carried  on for years –  वहीँ  may be a modest protective  प्रभाव  against some diseases , including Parkinsons Disease , and certain types of cancer .
Caffeine  can  have both positive and  ऋणात्मक  effects on anxiety disorders .
Some  लोगों   अनुभव   नींद  disruption if they consume caffeine , especially during the evening hours , but others show little disturbance and the effect of caffeine on  नींद  is  अत्यधिक  variable .
Evidence of a risk to pregnancy is equivocal , but  कुछ  authorities have  concluded   कि  prudent  सलाह  is  लिये  pregnant women to limit  खपत  to  the  equivalent of two cups of coffee per day or less .
The American Congress of Obstetricians and  स्त्रीरोग  (  acog  ) concluded in  2010  that caffeine consumption is safe  up  to 200 mg  प्रति  day  in  pregnant women .
Caffeine has pressor and mild diuretic  प्रभाव  when administered  to   लोगों  who are not used to it , but regular users  develop   a   सहिष्णुता  to this effect , and  अध्ययन  have generally failed to  support   the  common notion that ordinary consumption contributes  significantly  to dehydration .
With heavy use , tolerance develops rapidly to  autonomic  effects  ऐसे  as elevated heart rate and muscle  twitching  ,  लकिन  not to the cognitive  or  arousal effects of caffeine .
the   उपाधि   to  which caffeine can produce clinically significant  शारीरिक  and mental dependence remains  a  subject of controversy in the medical literature .
A kicktail  क्रूजर
a   longboard  is a  longer  variant of a skateboard .
It is commonly used for cruising ,  downhill  racing , slalom racing , sliding , and/or transport .
स्त्रोत  outside  of  Wikipedia  दे  differing estimates:
The CIA 's World Factbook gives the world population  as  7,021,836,029 ( July 2012 est . )  और  the  वितरण  of religions as Christian 100 % ( of  जिससे  Roman Catholic 18.85  %  , Protestant  8.15  % , Orthodox 4.96 % , Anglican 1.26  %   )  ,  मुस्लिम  22.74 % , Hindu 13.8 % ,  बौद्ध  6.77 % , Sikh 0.35  %  , Jewish 0.22 % , Baha'i 0.11 %  ,  other religions 10.95 % , non-religious 9.66  %   ,  atheists 2.01 % .

the  Coast Ranges of California span from Humboldt  काउंटी   ,  California south to  सांता  Barbara County  .
The  अन्य  three coastal California mountain ranges are the Transverse Ranges ,  प्रायद्वीपीय  Ranges and the Klamath  kyu  .
Physiographically , they  हैं   a  section of the larger Pacific Border province , which in turn  हैं  part  of  the larger Pacific Mountain System physiographic division  .
UNESCO has included the `` California Coast Ranges Biosphere Reserve  ``   in  its Man and the  जीवमंडल  Programme  of  World Network of Biosphere Reserves since  1983   .

An automobile , autocar  ,  motor car or car is a wheeled motor  गाडी   प्रयुक्त  for  transporting  passengers , which also carries  इसके  own engine or  मोटर  .
Most definitions of the term specify that automobiles  हैं   designed  to  चलाएं   primarily  on roads , to have  seating  for one to eight people , to typically have four wheels , and to be constructed principally for the transport of people  बल्कि  than goods .
the  term motorcar  रै  also been used in the context of electrified rail systems to denote a car which functions as a small  लोकोमोटिव  but also provides space for passengers and baggage  .
These  लोकोमोटिव  cars were often used on suburban routes by both interurban and intercity railroad  प्रणालियों  .
It was  अनुमानित  in 2010  कि  the number  of   ऑटोमोबाइल  had risen to over 1  अरब  vehicles ,  up   इससे   the  500 million of 1986 .
The numbers are increasing rapidly , especially in China and India .
John Fitzgerald `` Jack '' Kennedy ( May 29 , 1917  –  November  22  , 1963 ) , often referred to by  उसके  initials JFK , was the 35th President  of  the United States  ,  serving  इससे   1961   जबतक  his death in 1963  .
बाद   सैन्य  service as commander  of  the Motor Torpedo Boats  pt-109  and  pt-59  during World  युद्ध  II in  the  South Pacific , Kennedy represented Massachusetts ' 11th congressional district in  the  U.S. House of Representatives from 1947 to  1953  as  a  Democrat .
thereafter  , he served in the  u.S.  Senate from 1953 until 1960 .
Kennedy  पराजित  Vice  अध्यक्ष  and Republican candidate Richard Nixon in the  1960  U.S. presidential election .
at   43   सालो  of age  ,  he is the youngest to have been elected  to  the office ,  the   second-youngest  President ( after Theodore Roosevelt ) , and the first  व्यक्ति  born in the  20th  century  to  serve as  अध्यक्ष  .
A Catholic , Kennedy is the only non- Protestant president , and is the only president to have won a Pulitzer Prize .
Events during his presidency  शामिल  the Bay of Pigs Invasion  ,   the   क्यूबन  Missile Crisis , the building of the Berlin Wall  ,  the Space  रेस  , the  african-american  Civil Rights Movement  ,  and  जल्दी  stages of  the   वियतनाम  War .
Therein , Kennedy increased the number of military advisers , special operation forces , and helicopters in  an  effort to curb  the   स्प्रेड  of communism in South  ईस्ट  Asia .
the   कैनेडी  administration adopted  the   नीति  of the Strategic  हैमलेट   कार्यक्रम  which  थी   implemented  by the South Vietnamese government .
it   शामिल  certain  मजबूर  relocation , village  internment  , and segregation of rural South Vietnamese from the  उत्तरी  and  दक्षिणी  communist  insurgents  .
Kennedy was assassinated on November 22 , 1963  in  Dallas ,  टेक्सास  .
Lee  घनघोर  Oswald  थी  charged  साथ  the crime , but he was shot  और  killed by Jack Ruby  दो  days  बाद  , before  a  trial could take place .
The FBI and the Warren Commission officially concluded that  ओसवाल्ड  was the  लोन  assassin .
however   ,  the United  राज्य  House Select Committee on Assassinations (  hsca  ) concluded  कि   those  investigations  यहूद  flawed and that  कैनेडी  was probably assassinated  as   the  result of a conspiracy .
However ,  एबीसी  News in their investigation , The Kennedy Assassination : Beyond  षड्यंत्र  , confirmed the findings of the Warren Commission ; having concluded  ओसवाल्ड  acted alone .
Kennedy 's  विवादास्पद  Department of Defense TFX fighter bomber program led to a Congressional investigation  कि  lasted from 1963 to 1970 .
Since the 1960s information concerning Kennedy 's private life has come to light .
Details  of  Kennedy 's health  समस्याएं  in  जिससे  he struggled have become better known , especially since  the   1990s  .
हालांकि  initially kept secret from the general  पब्लिक  , reports of  कैनेडी  's philandering have garnered much press .
Kennedy ranks  अत्यधिक   in   पब्लिक  opinion ratings of U.S.  राष्ट्रपतियों  .

A Fire Alarm  कंट्रोल  Panel ( FACP ) ,  or  Fire Alarm  कंट्रोल   ईकाई   (   facu   )   ,   is   the   controlling  component  of  a Fire  सचेतक  System .
The panel receives information from environmental sensors  designed  to detect changes  संबद्ध  with fire  ,  monitors their operational integrity and provides for automatic control of equipment  ,  and transmission of  सूचना  necessary to prepare  the  facility for  आग   आधारित  on a predetermined  अनुक्रम  .
The panel may  भी  supply electrical energy  to   operate  any associated sensor  ,  control ,  ट्रांसमीटर  , or  रिले  .
There are  चार  basic types of panels  :  coded panels , conventional  panels  , addressable panels , and multiplex systems  .

MTV 's  पहला  day  on  the air was rebroadcast on VH1 Classic in  2006  and uploaded onto YouTube in 2010 ( although only the  पहला  four  घंटों  were  प्रामाणिक  ;  the  rest were edited VH1 rebroadcasts ) .
Bandaranaike International Airport ( BIA ) (  भी  known as Katunayake  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Airport and Colombo International Airport ) is one of  the  two  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  airports serving  the  city of Colombo , the  अन्य  is Ratmalana International Airport  .
Mattala Rajapaksa International Airport located in southern city  of  Hambantota  is  the other  अंतरराष्ट्रीय   विमानक्षेत्र  in Sri Lanka .
Bandaranaike International Airport is located in Katunayake , 22 miles  (  35 km ) north of  कोलोन   .
It  is  administered by  विमानक्षेत्र  and  विमानन  Services (  श्री  Lanka ) Ltd .
It is the hub of SriLankan  एयरलाइंस  ,  the  national carrier of Sri Lanka , and Mihin Lanka , the budget airline of Sri Lanka .
Black Swan is a 2010 American psychological thriller and horror film directed by Darren Aronofsky and starring  नताली   पोर्टमैन  , Vincent  cassel  , and Mila Kunis .
the  plot revolves  around  a  उत्पादन   of  Tchaikovsky 's Swan Lake ballet by  a  prestigious New York  नगर  company  .
The production  requires  a ballerina to play the innocent and  नाजुक  White Swan , for which the  वचनबद्ध  dancer Nina ( Portman ) is  a  perfect fit  ,  as well  as   the   अंधेरा   और  sensual Black Swan , which are qualities embodied by the new arrival Lily ( Kunis  )  .
Nina  is   अभिभूत  by  a  feeling of  immense  pressure when she finds herself competing for the part  ,  causing her to lose  उसके  tenuous  पकड़  on reality and descend into a living nightmare .
Aronofsky conceived  the  premise by connecting his viewings of a production  of  Swan Lake with an unrealized screenplay  परिचय  understudies  और  the notion of being haunted  by  a  दोगुना  , similar to the folklore  surrounding  doppelgängers .
Aronofsky cites Fyodor Dostoyevsky 's  ``  The Double `` as another inspiration for  the  film  .
the  director also considered  ब्लैक  Swan a companion piece  to  his 2008 film The  पहलवान  , with  दोनो  films  involving   demanding  performances for  अलग   kinds  of art  .
He and Portman first discussed the  प्रोजेक्ट  in 2000 , and  बाद  a brief attachment to Universal Studios  ,   ब्लैक  Swan was  उत्पादित  in New  यॉर्क  City in  2009   by  Fox Searchlight Pictures .
पोर्टमैन  and Kunis trained in ballet for several months prior  to   फिल्मांकन  , and  notable  figures from the ballet  संसार  helped with film production to shape the ballet presentation .
The film premiered as the opening film  लिये  the 67th Venice International Film Festival on September 1 , 2010 .
it  had a limited release in the  संयुक्त  States starting December  3  , 2010  और  opened nationwide on December 17 .
Black Swan received critical praise upon its release ,  विशेषकर  for Portman 's performance and Aronofsky 's direction , and  थी  a significant box office success , grossing $ 329 million worldwide .
the   फिल्मी   प्राप्त  five Academy Award nominations and Portman  जीती  the Best Actress  पुरस्कार  for the film  ,  as  खूब  as many  अन्य  Best  अभिनेत्री  awards in several guilds  और  festivals , while  aronofsky  was  मनोनीत  for  बेहतरीन  Director  .
In addition , the film itself received a nomination for Best Picture .
The world’s first ice-calorimeter , used  in  the winter of 1782-83 , by Antoine Lavoisier and Pierre-Simon Laplace , to determine  the  heat involved in various  रासायनिक  changes ; calculations which were based on Joseph Black ’s prior discovery of latent  ऊष्मा   .
These experiments mark the  न्यास  of thermochemistry .
A calorimeter ( from Latin  calor  ,  अर्थ  heat )  is  an object used for calorimetry , or the process of measuring  the  heat  of   रासायनिक  reactions or physical changes  as  well as heat capacity .
Differential  स्कैनिंग   calorimeters   ,  isothermal microcalorimeters , titration calorimeters and  त्वरित   रेट   calorimeters  are  among   the  most common types .
a  simple calorimeter  बस  consists  of  a thermometer attached to  a  metal  संग्राहक  full of water suspended above a combustion chamber  .
To find the enthalpy change per mole of  a  substance A in  a  reaction between two substances A  और  B , the substances are added to a calorimeter and the initial  और  final temperatures ( before the reaction  प्रारंभ  and after  it  has finished ) are noted .
Multiplying the temperature change by  the  mass and specific heat  capacities  of the  substances  gives  a   मान  for  the   उर्जा  given off or absorbed during the reaction .
dividing   the  energy change by how many moles  of  A were present  देता  its  enthalpy  change  of   प्रतिक्रिया  .
This method  is  used primarily in academic  शिक्षण  as it describes the theory of calorimetry .
It does not account for the heat loss through the  संग्राहक  or the heat capacity  of  the thermometer  और  container itself  .
in  addition , the  ऑब्जेक्ट  placed  अंदर  the calorimeter shows that the objects transferred their heat to the calorimeter and  into  the liquid  ,   और  the heat absorbed  by  the calorimeter  और  the liquid is equal to the heat given off by the metals  .
A pair of green flip-flops
Flip-flops  (  also called zōri , thongs , jandals , or a variety of other  names  throughout the world )  हैं  a type of open-toed sandal typically worn in casual situations ,  ऐसे  as outside  or  at the beach .
They  consist  of a flat sole held loosely on  the  foot by  a  Y-shaped strap  कि  passes between the first and second toes and around either side  of  the  पैर  .
वे  may also be  आयोजित  to the foot with a  सिंगल   डोरी  over  the  front of the foot  बल्कि  than a  थोंग  .
The name `` flip-flop '' originated because of the  ध्वनि  that is made by slapping between the sole  of  the  पैर  and the floor when  चलना   .
This style of footwear has been worn by  the  people of  अनेक  cultures throughout  the   संसार  , originating  as  early as the ancient Egyptians in 4,000  b.c  .
the  modern flip-flop descends from  the  Japanese zōri , which became popular after World  युद्ध   ii  when  सैनिको  returning to the United  राज्य  brought them back .
They became  लोकप्रिय  in casual settings during  the  1960s , 1990s , and 2000s , and some varieties have  भी  found their  रास्ता  into more formal attire , despite  आलोचना  .
The  उपयोग  of flip-flops  can  result in many pains and injuries , including ankle sprains and broken bones .
कुछ   individuals  who walk for long periods report  पीड़ा   in  the feet ,  ankles   ,  and lower legs .
The  कमी  of support provided  by   flip-flops  often results in over-pronation injuries  ,  caused by  the   पैर  slipping inwards  further  than normal  .
This can lead to flat feet and  tendonitis  .
Other injuries that may result are due to  the   जूते  's open-toed nature , such as stubbed toes , cuts , and bruises  .
डॉक्टर  recommend purchasing pricier sandals with thick-cushioned soles , as well  as  those that  have   a  strap that is not canvas and that  आता   वापस  almost to the ankle  .
The owners of Hanjin Osaka , seen here transiting the Panama  कनाल  in 2008 , declared  सामान्य  average following an explosion in the ship 's engine room  on  .
The law of  सामान्य  average  is  a legal principle of maritime law according to which all parties in a  समुद्र  venture proportionally share any losses resulting from a  voluntary  sacrifice of part of the ship  or  cargo to save the whole in an emergency .
in  the exigencies of hazards faced at sea , crew members  प्रायः  have  अनमोल  little  समय   in  which to  determine  precisely whose cargo they are  jettisoning   .
Thus , to avoid quarrelling  कि  could waste valuable time ,  वहीँ  arose the equitable practice whereby all the merchants whose cargo landed safely would  be   पुकारा  on to  योगदान  a portion ,  आधारित  upon a share or  प्रतिशत  ,  to   the  merchant or merchants whose goods  था   महरूम   tossed  overboard  to   avert  imminent peril .
While general average traces its origins in ancient maritime law , still  it  remains part of the admiralty law of most countries .
the  first codification  of   सामान्य   औसत  was the York Antwerp Rules of  1890   .
American  कंपनियाँ  accepted it in  1949  .
सामान्य  average requires three  तत्व   जिससे  are clearly stated by  mr.   इंसाफ  Grier in Barnard v. Adams:
``  1st  .
A common  खतरे   :  a  खतरे  in which vessel ,  कार्गो  and crew all participate ; a  खतरे  imminent  और  apparently  'inevitable  , ' except by voluntarily incurring the loss of  a  portion  of  the whole to save the  शेष  . ''
``  2nd   .  There must  be  a  voluntary  jettison  ,   jactus  , or casting away ,  of  some portion of the joint concern  लिये  the purpose of avoiding this imminent peril  ,  periculi imminentis evitandi causa , or , in other words ,  a  transfer  of   the  peril from the whole to a particular  portion   of  the whole . ''
`` 3rd .
इस  attempt to avoid the imminent common peril must  be  successful  ''  .
Example Polish call for  टीकाकरण  against Diphtheria and  टेटनस  .
A vaccination schedule is a series of vaccinations , including the timing  of  all doses  ,  which may be either  अनुशंसित   or  compulsory ,  depending   on  the  देश   of  residence  .
A vaccine is  an   antigenic  preparation used to produce active immunity to a disease , in order to prevent  or   reduce  the effects of infection by any natural  or   ``   जंगली  '' pathogen .
अनेक  vaccines require  अनेक  doses  लिये   अधिकतम  effectiveness , either to produce sufficient initial immune response or to boost response that fades over time .
For example , tetanus vaccine  boosters  are often recommended every 10 years .
Vaccine schedules are  विकसित   by  governmental agencies or physicians  समूह  to achieve  अधिकतम  effectiveness using required and recommended vaccines for  a   मोहल्ले   जबकि   महती   the  number of  स्वास्थ्य  care system interactions .
Over the  पास्ट   दो  decades , the recommended vaccination schedule has  grown   rapidly  and become more complicated as many new  टीके  have been developed  .
Some vaccines  हैं  recommended only in  निश्चित  areas ( countries , subnational areas  ,  or at-risk populations ) where a  बीमारी  is  आम  .
लिये  instance , yellow  ज्वर  vaccination  is  on the routine vaccine schedule of French Guiana , is recommended in certain regions of Brazil but in the  संयुक्त  States is  तभी  given to travelers heading to countries with a history  of  the  बीमारी  .
In developing countries , vaccine recommendations also  लो  into account the level of health care access , the cost of vaccines and  मुद्दे   साथ  vaccine availability and storage .
Sample vaccinations schedules discussed  by   the  World  स्वास्थ्य   संगठन  show a developed country  using   a   अनुसूची  which  extends  over the  पहला  five years of a  चाइल्ड  's  जीवन   और   उपयोग  vaccines which cost over $  700  including  प्रशासन  costs  जबकि  a developing country uses a schedule  providing  vaccines in the  पहला  9  महीने  of  जीवन  and costing only $ 25 .
This difference  is  due to the  निम्नतर  cost of health care , the lower  लागत  of many  टीके  provided to developing nations ,  और  that more expensive vaccines , often for  कम  common diseases , are not  utilized  .
In 1900  ,   the  smallpox vaccine was  the  only one administered to children .
by  the early 1950s , children routinely received  चार  vaccines ,  लिये  protection against ( diphtheria , pertussis  ,  tetanus , polio , and smallpox ) ,  और  as many as five shots by two years  of  age .
Since the mid-1980s , many vaccines have been added to the schedule .
, the US Centers  लिये  Disease Control and  रोकथाम  (  सीडीसी  ) now recommends vaccination against at least fourteen diseases .
by  two years of age , U.S. children receive as  अनेक  as 24  टीका  injections , and might  प्राप्त  up to five shots during one  विज़िट  to the doctor .
The  उपयोग  of combination vaccine products means  कि   ,   ,  the  संयुक्त  Kingdom 's immunization  कार्यक्रम  consists of  10  injections  by  the age of two  ,  rather than 25 if vaccination for each disease was  दिए  as a separate injection .
