the  Trinidad and Tobago Carnival is an  सालाना  event held on the Monday  और  Tuesday before Ash Wednesday  ,  and is well known for participant  's  colorful costumes and exuberant celebrations .
Carnival in Trinidad and Tobago is the most significant event  on   the  islands ' cultural and  पर्यटन  calendar , with numerous cultural events running in  the   सीसे  up to  the  street parade on Carnival Monday and Tuesday .
It  is  said that if the islanders  हैं  not celebrating it , then they  हैं  preparing for  it  , while reminiscing about the past year 's festival  .
The heart of the musical celebration has been calypso  ;   recently  soca  रै  replaced calypso  as  the  सबसे  celebrated type  of  music  .
Costumes , stickfighting and limbo competitions are also important components of the festival .
Carnival as  it  is celebrated in Trinidad and Tobago is also celebrated  in  cities  विश्वव्यापी  .
ये  including  टोरंटो  's Caribana , Miami 's Miami  कार्निवल   ,   ह्यूस्टन  Carifest  ,  London 's Notting  हिल  Carnival as well  as   नई   यॉर्क   नगर   's  Labor  दिन  Carnival  to  name a few .
Carnival was created when West African slaves mimicked their French owners who where known for their  lavish  costumes  गेंदें   .
हराम  to  partake  in  ये  festivities and  confined  to their quarters ,  स्लेव  combined elements from their own cultures to their master  's  fete .
Hence the creation of  वर्ण  such as  jab  Jab or Jab Molassie ( Devils ) , Midnight Robbers ,  imps  , Lagahroo , Soucouyant  ,  La Diablesse and Demons .
With the abolition of  गुलामी  in 1838 , freed Africans took  उनके   संस्करण  of Carnival to the streets  through  expression of drums  ,   riddim   भाग  like tamboo bamboo and as each new immigrant population  डाला  Trinidad  ,  Carnival  विकसित  into what we  जान  today .
The  नगर  of Chicago  ,  Illinois held a nonpartisan mayoral election on Tuesday ,  फ़रवरी  22  ,   2011  .
Incumbent Mayor Richard M. Daley , a member  of  the  लोकतांत्रिक  Party who had been  in  office since 1989 , did not seek a seventh term as mayor .
Candidates needed to collect  12,500  petition signatures by November  22  ,  2010  to qualify  लिये  a place on  the  ballot .
April 5 , 2011 was  अनुसूचित   to  be  a  runoff election date if no candidate  प्राप्त  an absolute majority .
Rahm Emanuel won the  रेस  for mayor  साथ  more than  55  % of the vote  .
He was inaugurated on May  16  ,  2011  .
``  Pumped  up  Kicks  ''  is  a  song  by   अमरीकी  indie  पॉप  band Foster the People  .
it  was released as  the  group 's debut single in September 2010 , and  the   following  year was included  on  their EP Foster the  लोगों  and  उनके  debut album Torches .
`` Pumped Up Kicks '' became the group 's breakthrough hit and was one of the most popular songs of  2011  .
The song was written and recorded by frontman  चिह्नित  Foster  जबकि  he was working as  a  commercial jingle writer  .
Contrasting with the  upbeat  musical composition , the  गीत  describe the homicidal  विचार  of  a  troubled youth .
The track received considerable attention after it was posted online in 2010 as a free download , and it helped the group garner a multi-album  रिकार्ड  deal with Columbia Records imprint Startime  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  .
``  उत्तेजित  Up  kicks  '' proved to be a sleeper hit  ;  in  2011  , after receiving significant  airplay  on  आधुनिक  rock  स्टेशन   ,   the  song crossed-over onto  समकालीन  hit radio stations .
The song spent  आठ  consecutive weeks at number three on the Billboard Hot 100 chart in  the  United States , making it  the   पहला  Billboard Alternative Songs number-one  सिंगल  to crack the U.S. top 5  चूंकि  Kings of Leon 's ``  उपयोग  Somebody `` in 2009 .
The song was widely praised by critics , and it has been licensed  लिये  use in a wide range of popular media since its release .
`` Pumped Up Kicks '' received a Grammy Award nomination  लिये  Best Pop  duo/group   प्रदर्शन  .
The State Fair of West Virginia is an annual  राज्य  fair for West Virginia .
It is held  annually  in mid-August  on   the  State Fairgrounds  in   fairlea  , near Lewisburg , West Virginia in the southeastern part of the state .
The State Fairgrounds consists of a  विशाल  open field for carnivals and exhibitions , a horse track , grandstands ,  और  several exhibition buildings .
Free  पार्किंग  is provided adjacent  to  the fairgrounds and ,  जबतक  2006 , free camping was  भी  available in a large field with  running-water  toilets and showers , but no hookups .
Campers  हैं  now charged a small  शुल्क  .
The White House  ,   the  president 's official  निवास  and  बीच  of the administration
अंतर्गत   the  United States Constitution , the President of  the  United States is the head of state and head of government of the United States  .
As chief of  the  executive branch  और  head  of   the  federal government as a  पूरे   ,  the presidency is the highest political office  in  the  संयुक्त  States by influence and recognition  .
The  अध्यक्ष  is  भी  the commander-in-chief  of  the United States Armed  शक्तियां  .
the  president is indirectly elected to a four-year term by an Electoral College ( or by the House of  प्रतिनिधि   चाहिए  the Electoral College  असफल  to award an absolute majority of votes to  कोई  person ) .
Since the ratification of the  twenty-second   amendment   to  the United States Constitution in  1951  , no person may be elected President more than twice  ,  and no  एक   जो  has served more than two years of a  पद  to which someone else  थी  elected may  be   निर्वाचित  more than once .
Upon the death , resignation  ,  or removal  इससे  office of an  लाज़िम  President , the Vice President assumes  the   दफ्तर   .
The President must  be   at  least  35  years of age and a `` natural  born   ''  citizen of the United States  .
इस  list includes only  those  persons who were  sworn   into   दफ्तर  as president  following  the ratification of the United  राज्य   संविधान  ,  जिससे  took effect on March 4 , 1789  .
For  अमरीकी   नेताओ  before this ratification , see  अध्यक्ष  of  the  Continental Congress .
the  list does not include any Acting  राष्ट्रपतियों  under the Twenty-fifth Amendment to the United  राज्य  Constitution .
There have  महरूम  43 people sworn into office , and 44 presidencies , as Grover Cleveland served  दो  non-consecutive terms  और  is  गिने  chronologically as both the 22nd and 24th president .
Of the individuals elected as  अध्यक्ष   ,  four died  in  office of natural causes  (  William Henry Harrison , Zachary Taylor ,  वारेन  G.  हार्डिंग  , and Franklin D. Roosevelt ) , four  यहूद  assassinated ( Abraham Lincoln , James A. Garfield , William McKinley , and John F. Kennedy  )  and one resigned ( Richard  निक्सन  ) .
जार्ज  Washington  ,  the first president , was inaugurated in 1789  बाद   a  unanimous  vote  of  the  Electoral College .
William Henry Harrison  खर्च  the shortest time  in  office with  32  days  in  1841 ,  और   फ्रैंकलिन  D. Roosevelt spent  the  longest with over twelve years , but died shortly into his fourth term in  1945  .
He  is  the  तभी   अध्यक्ष  to serve more than two terms , and  a  constitutional amendment , affecting presidents after Harry Truman ,  थी  passed to limit the number of times an individual can be elected president .
Andrew Jackson , the seventh  अध्यक्ष   ,   थी  the first to be elected by  मेन  of all classes in 1828 after most laws barring  non-land-owners  from voting were  repealed  .
Warren Harding was the first elected after women gained voting rights  in  1920 .
History records four presidents – John Q Adams , Rutherford  B.  Hayes ,  बेंजामिन  Harrison and George  W.  Bush – who lost the  लोकप्रिय   vote   लकिन  assumed office .
John F. Kennedy has been the only  अध्यक्ष  of  रोमन   कैथोलिक   आस्था  , and the current president  ,  Barack Obama , is the first president of African descent  .
`` Lombardi Trophy '' redirects here .
For the award  awarded  annually to the best college football lineman or linebacker , see Lombardi Award  .
The  विंस  Lombardi Trophy is the trophy  awarded  each year to the winning team of the National  फ़ुटबॉल   लीग   's   चैंपियनशिप  game  ,  the  सुपर   कटोरी  .
the  trophy is named in honor of legendary NFL coach Vince  लोम्बार्डी  .
This is a list of tables of the verified oldest people in  the  world  in   ordinal  rank  ,  such as oldest person or  oldest  man .
In these tables  ,   a  supercentenarian is  माना   'verified   '  if  उसके  or her  अर्जी  has been  validated  by  an  international body  कि  specifically deals in longevity research  ,   ऐसे  as the Gerontology Research  समूह   (   grg  ) or Guinness  संसार   रिकॉर्ड  .
The longest unambiguously  प्रलेखित  human  जीवनकाल  is that of Jeanne Calment of France ( 1875–1997 ) , who died at age 122  सालो  , 164 days .
She met Vincent van Gogh when she was 12 or  13   .
This led to  न्यूज  media  ध्यान  in 1985 , after Calment turned 110 .
Subsequent investigation found documentation for Calment 's age ,  परे  any reasonable question , in the records of her native city ,  arles  , France .
More evidence of Calment 's  जीवनकाल   रै  been produced  than  for any other supercentenarian ; her  मामला  serves as an archetype in  the  methodology  लिये  verifying  the   आयु   of  the  संसार  's oldest  लोगों  .
The longest undisputed lifespan for male supercentenarians is that of Jiroemon Kimura , who currently lives in Japan and is  आयु  as of .
Since the death of 115-year old Dina Manfredini of the United States , on  17  December 2012 , Kimura ,  born  19 April 1897 , is  the  oldest  जीना   व्यक्ति  in the world whose age can be documented  .
he  has also  महरूम  the oldest living man since the death  of  114-year old Walter Breuning on  14  April 2011  .
Since the death  of  115-year old Koto  okubo   of   जापानी  on 12  जनवरी  2013 ,  the  oldest living woman has  महरूम  -year-old Misao Okawa , also from  जापानी  , born  on  5 March 1898 .
The People 's Court  is  an American arbitration-based reality  अदालत  show , currently presided  over  by retired Florida State Circuit Court  न्यायधीश  Marilyn Milian , in which  छोटी  claims  विवादों   हैं   संभाला  .
The  लोगों  's Court is the first  अदालत  show to use binding arbitration , introducing  the  format into the genre in  1981  .
The system has been duplicated by most of the show 's successors  in  the judicial genre .
Moreover , The People  's  Court is the first popular , long-running reality in  the  judicial genre .
It was preceded only  by  a few short-lived realities in the genre ; these short-lived predecessors  यहूद  only loosely related  to  judicial proceedings , except for one : Parole ( 1959 ) took footage from real-life courtrooms  पकड़कर   विधिक  proceedings .
Prior to The  लोगों  's  अदालत  , the  विशाल  majority of  tv  courtroom  shows  used actors  ,  and recreated or fictional cases (  as  did radio before that )  .
among  examples of these types of court shows include Famous Jury Trials and Your Witness .
The People 's Court has had two contrasting lives .
the   दिखाएँ  's first life was presided  over   solely  by former Los Angeles County Superior Court Judge Joseph Wapner .
उसके  tenure lasted  इससे  the show  's  debut on September  14  , 1981  ,  until  may  21 , 1993 , when the show was cancelled due to  कम  ratings .
इस   बाएँ   the  show with a total of  2,484  1⁄2-hour  एपीसोड  and 12 seasons  .
The  दिखाएँ  was taped in Los Angeles during its first life .
After  होने  cancelled  ,  reruns aired until September  9  , 1994 .
on  September  8  , 1997 , after being out of production for four years  ,  The People  's  Court was revived for  a  second life in first-run syndication as a 60-minute program .
Former lawyer  और   महापौर  of New York Ed Koch was chosen as arbiter ,  जिससे  he  कायम  for 2 seasons from the  1997–98  season through the 1998–99 season ( the present  जीवन  's 2nd season and overall show 's 14th )  .
By the 1999–00 season ,  husband  of Judith  sheindlin  ( who presides over Judge Judy ) and former New York  राज्य  Supreme Court Judge Jerry Sheindlin  succeeded   koch  .
sheindlin  lasted  एक  and a half seasons  as   he  was  replaced  towards the end of  the  2000–01 season ( present life 's  4th   ऋतु  and overall show 's 17th ) .
Beginning in spring 2001 , Florida judge Marilyn Milian took over The  लोगों  's  अदालत  and has presided over the show ever since .
Once  milian  completes the 2012–13 season , she will have served as longest  arbiter  over the series with 12  और  a half seasons  .
As of the present , however  ,  her years on the program tie Wapner at 12 seasons  .
In the 2009-10  टेलीविज़न   ऋतु  , The People 's Courts  2nd/present  life outlasted its first when  it  reached 13 seasons .
While  the  show taped  in  New York City for the first 15 seasons of its  दूसरी  life ,  it  now tapes in Stamford , Connecticut as  of  the  2012-13   ऋतु  .
on  September  3  , 2012 , The People 's Court 's 2nd/present life entered  इसके  16th season ( 28th overall  ऋतु   )  .
With 28 total seasons ,  the  People 's Court ranks as the  2nd  longest-running courtroom program behind the  जारी   तलाक  Court at  33  seasons  (  from its 3 combined lives ) .
Utah ( or ) ( Arapaho  :  Wo'tééneihí  '  ) is a state in the Western United States .
It became the 45th state  admitted  to the Union on  जनवरी  4 , 1896 .
यूटा  is the 13th-largest , the 34th-most populous ,  और  the 10th-least-densely populated of the 50  संयुक्त  States .
Approximately 80 % of Utah 's 2,817,222 people live along  the  Wasatch Front , centering on Salt Lake City , leaving vast expanses  of  the state  nearly   uninhabited   और  making the population the sixth most urbanized in  the   u.S.  Utah  is  bordered by Colorado on the  ईस्ट  , Wyoming on the northeast , Idaho on the north  ,  Arizona on the south , and Nevada on  the   वेस्ट   .
It  भी  touches a corner of New Mexico on the southeast .
यूटा  is  the  most religiously homogeneous state in the Union .
लगभग  63 % of Utahns are reported to be members of  the  Church  of   यीशु  Christ  of  Latter-day  संतो  or LDS ( Mormons ) , which  greatly  influences Utah culture  और  daily life  .
The world  मुख्यालय  of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints ( LDS Church  )  is located in Utah 's  राज्य  capital .
The state is a center of  परिवहन  , education , information technology and  शोध  , government services ,  खनन  , and a  प्रमुख  tourist  गंतव्य  for outdoor recreation .
According to the U.S.  जनसांख्यिकी   ब्यूरो  's population estimates , Utah is the fifth fastest-growing state in the United States as  of  2012 .
St. George , was the  fastest–growing  metropolitan area in the United States from 2000  to  2005 .
A 2012 Gallup  नेशनल  survey  मिला   यूटा   overall  to be the `` best state to  सजीव  in  ''  based on 13 forward-looking measurements including various  आर्थिक   ,  lifestyle  ,  and health-related outlook metrics .
Coldwater is a small town in Tate County  ,  Mississippi .
It is in the Memphis Metropolitan  क्षेत्रफल   .
The population was 1,674 at the 2000 census  .
the  hard palate  is  a thin horizontal  बोनी  plate of the skull , located in the roof of the mouth .
It spans the arch formed by the upper teeth .
it  is formed  by  the palatine process of the maxilla  और   आड़ा  plate of palatine bone .
It forms a  विभाजन  between the  nasal   passages   और   the  mouth .
Also on the anterior portion of  the  roof of the hard  तालु  is the  rugae  which are  the   irregular  ridges in the mucous membrane that help facilitate the  गति  of  खाना  backwards towards the pharynx .
This  विभाजन   is  continued  deeper  into the mouth by a fleshy extension  पुकारा  the soft  तालु  .
Complete set of  scrolls  , constituting the  संपूर्ण  Tanakh .
The Tanakh  (  , or  ;  also Tenakh , Tenak ,  tanach  ) is a name used in Judaism for  the  canon of the Hebrew Bible .
The Tanakh  is  also known as the Masoretic Text or the Miqra .
The  नाम  is  an  acronym formed  इससे   the  initial  यहूदी  letters of the Masoretic Text 's three  परंपरागत  subdivisions : The Torah  (  `` Teaching  ''  , also known as the Five Books of Moses ) , Nevi'im  (   ``   नबियों  ''  )  and Ketuvim ( ``  कृतियाँ  '' ) —hence TaNaKh  .
The name `` Miqra ''  (  מקרא ) ,  अर्थ   ``   कि  which is read '' , is an alternative Hebrew term for the Tanakh .
The books  of  the Tanakh were relayed with an accompanying oral tradition  passed  on  by  each generation , called the Oral Torah .
Sobriety checkpoint in Germany
ड्राइविंग  under  the  influence (  dui  ) , driving while intoxicated ( DWI  )  ,  शराबी  driving ,  नशे   ड्राइविंग  , drink driving  ,   ऑपरेटिंग  under the influence , drinking and driving  ,   or  impaired driving  is  the  अपराधों  of driving  a   मोटर  vehicle with blood levels of alcohol in excess of  a  legal limit ( `` Blood Alcohol Content ''  ,  or `` BAC '' ) .
Similar  regulations   कवर  driving  or  operating certain types  of  machinery while affected by drinking alcohol or taking other drugs , including , but not limited to  नुस्खा  drugs .
This is a criminal offense in most nations .
Convictions do not necessarily involve actual driving  of  the vehicle .
In most jurisdictions a measurement  ऐसे   as  a blood alcohol content (  bac   )   in  excess of a specific threshold level , such as 0.05 % or 0.08 % defines the offense , with no need to prove impairment or being  अंतर्गत   the   influence  of alcohol .
in  some jurisdictions , there is an aggravated category of the  ठोकर  at  a  higher level e.g . 0.12 % .
in   सबसे  countries , anyone who is convicted  of  injuring  or  killing someone while under  the  influence of alcohol or drugs can be heavily fined , as in France ,  in   जोड  to  होने  given  a   lengthy  prison sentence .
Some  कार्य   have  their own rules and BAC limits , for example  वाणिज्यिक  pilot , and  the   संघीय  Railroad Administration  in  the United States has a 0.04 % limit  लिये  train crew  .
Some jurisdictions have  अनेक   स्तर  of BAC ;  लिये  example ,  the   राज्य  of  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  has a 0.08  %   bac  limit  ,   जिससे  is lowered to  0.04  % if the operator holds  a  commercial driver 's license .
The California BAC limit is 0.01 % for those younger than 21 years of  आयु  and those on probation for a previous DUI conviction .
Some large corporations have their own rules ; Union Pacific Railroad has their  अपना  BAC limit of  0.02  % that , if violated during a random test or a for-cause test  —  for example , after a traffic  दुर्घटना  — can result in termination  of  employment  साथ  no chance of future re-hire .
अनेक  states in the U.S. and provinces in Canada have  अपनाया  truth in sentencing laws that enforce  सख्त   दिशानिर्देश   on  sentencing  ,  differing from previous practice where prison time was reduced or suspended after sentencing had been issued .
Some jurisdictions have judicial guidelines requiring a  अनिवार्य   न्यूनतम  sentence .
Penalties for DUI charges  दायरा  from expensive fees to  forfetiruree  of your license plates and in  कुछ   गंभीर   हालातों  , your vehicle .
a  drunk  ड्राइविंग  simulator in  montréal  , Canada
The  विशिष्ट  criminal offense  may   be  called  ,  depending on the jurisdiction , driving under  the   influence   [  of alcohol or  अन्य  drugs ]  (  DUI ) ,  ड्राइविंग  under  तीव्र  influence ( DUII ) , driving while intoxicated  (  DWI )  ,  operating under the  influence  ( OUI )  ऑपरेटिंग   जबकि  intoxicated (  owi  )  ,  operating a motor  गाडी  while intoxicated ( OMVI  )  , driving under the combined influence  of  alcohol and/or other drugs , driving  अंतर्गत   the  influence per se  or  drunk in  चार्ज   [  of  a   गाडी  ] .
Many  ऐसे  laws apply also to motorcycling , boating , piloting aircraft , use  of  motile farm equipment such  as  tractors and combines , riding horses or driving  a   horse-drawn   गाडी  ,  or   bicycling   ,  possibly with different BAC level than driving  .
In some  jurisdictions  there are  पृथक  charges  depending  on the vehicle used , such as  bwi   (  bicycling while intoxicated ) , which may carry  a  lighter sentence .
In the United States , local  विधि  enforcement  एजेंसियों  made 1,467,300 arrests nationwide for driving under the influence of alcohol in 1996 , compared to 1.9 million such arrests during the peak year in 1983 .
In 1997 an estimated 513,200 DWI offenders were in prison or  कारावास  , down from  593,000  in 1990 and up from 270,100 in  1986  .
Officers from US Customs and Border Protection boarding a ship
Law enforcement in the United States is one of three major components  of  the criminal justice system of  the  United States , along with courts and corrections .
Although there exists  an  inherent  interrelatedness  between the different groups that  मेक  up  the  criminal justice system based on  उनके   अपराधों   deterrence  purpose  ,   प्रत्येक   घटक  operates  independently  from one another .
However , the judiciary  is   vested  with the power to make legal determinations regarding the conduct of the other two components .
Apart from maintaining order and service functions , the purpose of policing  is  the investigation of suspected criminal activity and the  referral  of the results of investigations and of suspected criminals to the courts .
Law  प्रवर्तन  ,  to  varying degrees at  अलग  levels of  सरकारी  and  in  different agencies , is also commonly charged with the responsibilities of deterring criminal activity and of preventing the successful commission  of  crimes in progress ;  the  service and enforcement of warrants , writs  और   अन्य  orders of the  न्यायालयों  .
विधि   प्रवर्तन  agencies are also involved  in  providing  पहला  response to  emergencies  and other threats to public safety ; the protection of certain public facilities and  अवसंरचना   ;  the maintenance of public order ; the protection of public officials ; and the operation of  कुछ  correctional facilities ( usually at  the  local level ) .
Elmer Figueroa  arce   (  born June 28 , 1968 ) , best known under the stage name Chayanne , is a Puerto Rican Latin pop singer and actor .
As a solo artist , Chayanne has released  21  solo  एल्बम  and sold over 15 million albums worldwide .
``  संसार  War  हल्क   ''  is a comic book crossover storyline  कि  ran through a self titled limited series and various other titles published by  आश्चर्य  Comics in 2007  ,  featuring the Hulk .
the   श्रेणी   consists  of  पाँच  main issues titled World  युद्ध   हल्क  ,  साथ   ग्रेग  Pak as writer and  जॉन  Romita , Jr.  as  penciller  ,  and three other limited series : World  युद्ध   हल्क  : Front  लकीर  , World War Hulk : Gamma Corps  ,   और  World War Hulk : X-Men  .
it   भी   भागा   through  several other Marvel comics  श्रेणी  .
The plot is the culmination of a series  of   कार्यक्रम  that began with  the  Hulk  होने  tricked into  स्पेस  by the Illuminati  और  a  जीवन  model decoy of Nick Fury , the  हल्क  's subsequent exile seen in Planet Hulk  और   उसके   निकट   वापसी  to Earth  to  seek revenge on  the  Illuminati .
Marion Mitchell Morrison ( born Marion  रॉबर्ट  Morrison ;  may  26 , 1907 – June 11  ,  1979 ) ,  बेहतर  known by his  स्टेज   नाम  John Wayne , was an American film actor , director  और  producer .
An Academy  पुरस्कार  -winner  ,   वेन  was among the top box office  draws  for  तीन  decades ,  और  was  नामित  the  all-time  top money-making star .
an  enduring American icon  ,  he epitomized  खुरदरा   मर्दानगी  and is famous for his demeanor , including his distinctive calm voice , walk  ,   और   ऊँचाई  .
वेन  was born  in  Winterset  ,  Iowa but his family relocated to the greater Los Angeles area when he  थी  four years old .
He found work at local film  studios   जब  he lost his football scholarship to USC  as  a result  of  a bodysurfing  दुर्घटना  .
initially  working for the  फॉक्स  Film Corporation  ,   he   ज़्यादातर  appeared in  छोटी  bit parts .
His first leading role came in the widescreen epic The Big  ट्रेल  (  1930  ) , which led to leading roles in numerous films  throughout  the 1930s , many of them in the western genre .
His  करियर  rose to further heights in 1939  ,   साथ   जॉन  Ford 's Stagecoach making him an instant superstar  .
वेन  would go on to star in  142   तस्वीरें  , primarily typecast in Western films .
among  his best known later  films  are The Quiet Man ( 1952 ) , which follows him as an Irish-American boxer  और  his love affair with a fiery  spinster  played by Maureen O'Hara ; The Searchers  (  1956 )  ,  in which he  plays  a Civil War  दिग्गज  who seeks out  उसके  abducted niece  ;  Rio Bravo (  1959  ) , playing a  शेरिफ  with Dean Martin ; True Grit ( 1969 )  ,  playing a  humorous   u.s  . Marshal who sets out to avenge a  man  's death in the role that  जीती  Wayne an Academy Award  ;   और  The  shootist   (  1976 ) , his final screen performance in  जिससे   he   plays  an aging gunslinger  battling   कर्कट  .
Wayne moved to Orange County , California in  the  1960s , and  थी  a  prominent  Republican in Hollywood , supporting anti-communist positions .
He  died  of stomach cancer in 1979 .
In  जून  1999 , the American Film Institute named Wayne  13th  among  the  Greatest Male Screen Legends of All Time .
Galileo Galilei ( ; 15 February 1564 – 8 January 1642 ) , was an Italian physicist , mathematician , astronomer , and philosopher  जो   निभाई   a  major role in  the   वैज्ञानिक  Revolution .
His achievements include improvements to the telescope  और  consequent astronomical observations  और  support for Copernicanism .
Galileo has been called the `` father of modern observational astronomy ``  ,  the `` father  of  modern physics ``  ,  the ``  पिता   of  science '' ,  और  `` the Father  of  Modern Science  ''  .
His  योगदान  to  observational  astronomy include  the  telescopic  पुष्टि  of  the  phases  of   शुक्र  , the discovery of the four largest satellites of Jupiter ( named the Galilean moons in his  इज्ज़त  ) ,  और  the observation and  विश्लेषण  of sunspots .
गैलीलियो  also worked  in  applied science and technology , inventing  an  improved military compass and other instruments .
Galileo 's championing of heliocentrism was controversial  भीतर   उसके   आजीवन  ,  जब  most subscribed to either geocentrism or the Tychonic system .
He met with opposition from astronomers , who doubted heliocentrism due to the absence of an observed  तारकीय  parallax .
The matter was  investigated  by the Roman Inquisition in  1615  , and they concluded that  it   could  be  समर्थित  as only a possibility , not  an  established fact  .
Galileo later  defended  his views  in  Dialogue  concerning  the Two Chief World Systems , which appeared to attack  पोप  Urban VIII and thus alienated him and  the   jesuits  , who had both  समर्थित   गैलीलियो  up  जबतक  this point  .
He  थी  tried by  the  Inquisition ,  मिला  ``  ओजस्वी  suspect of heresy '' , forced to  recant  , and spent the rest of  उसके  life under house arrest .
It was  जबकि  Galileo  थी  under house arrest that he wrote one  of  his finest works , Two New Sciences , in which he  summarised  the  कार्य   he  had  किया  some forty years earlier , on the two sciences now called kinematics and strength of  सामग्री  .

प्रोटोटाइप  OLED lighting  फलक  developed by Lumiotec
Demonstration  of   a  flexible OLED  यंत्र
an  OLED ( organic light-emitting diode )  is  a light-emitting diode ( LED ) in which the emissive electroluminescent layer is a film  of  organic compound which emits light in response to an electric  वर्तमान  .
This layer of  सशुल्क  semiconductor is situated between two electrodes  .
Generally , at least one of these electrodes is transparent .
OLEDs are used to  बनाएँ   डिजिटल  displays in devices such  as  television screens , computer monitors  ,  portable systems such  as  mobile phones , handheld games  consoles  and PDAs .
A  प्रमुख   क्षेत्रफल  of research is the development  of   श्वेत  OLED devices  लिये  use in solid-state lighting applications .
There are two main families of OLEDs : those based on small molecules  और  those  employing  polymers .
Adding mobile ions  to  an OLED creates  a  light-emitting electrochemical cell  or   लैक  , which has a slightly different mode  of  operation .
OLED displays can use  either  passive-matrix ( PMOLED ) or active-matrix addressing schemes .
Active-matrix OLEDs  (  AMOLED  )   आवश्यकता  a thin-film transistor backplane to  स्विच  each  व्यक्तिगत  pixel on or off ,  लकिन   allow  for higher resolution and larger  प्रदर्शक   आकार  .
An OLED display  works  without a backlight  .
यूँ   ,  it can display  गहन   ब्लैक  levels and can be thinner  और  lighter than a liquid crystal  प्रदर्शक  ( LCD ) .
In low  परिवेश   लाइट  conditions  ऐसे  as a dark room an OLED screen can achieve  a   उच्चतर  contrast ratio than  an  LCD , whether  the  LCD uses cold cathode fluorescent lamps or LED backlight  .
A carton  और  a  कांच  of eggnog from Montreal  ,   कनाडा  , showing its French facade  (  English reverse ) and the French term lait de poule  (  literally , `` hen 's  मिल्क   ''  )
eggnog  , or  अंडा  nog , is a sweetened dairy -based beverage traditionally made with milk and/or  मलाई  , sugar ,  और  whipped eggs ( which gives  it  a frothy texture ) .
Brandy , rum ,  व्हिस्की  ,  bourbon   ,  vodka  ,  or a combination of liquors are  प्रायः  added .
the  finished serving is often garnished with  a  sprinkling of ground cinnamon or  जायफल  .
It was also known as the egg milk punch .
Eggnog is  a  popular  पेय  throughout  the  United States and Canada , and  is  usually  संबद्ध  with Christmas .
Eggnog  may  be added  as  a flavoring to food or drinks such as coffee and tea .
Eggnog as a custard can also be used as  an  ice cream base .
a  pasty ( , ) , ( sometimes known in Britain as a Cornish  pasty  , and in the United States as a  pastie  or British  pasty  ) is a baked  पेस्ट्री  , a traditional  किस्में  of which is  विशेषकर  associated  साथ   कॉर्नवॉल  , the westernmost county  in  England .
It is made  by  placing uncooked filling  typically  of meat and vegetables , without meat in vegetarian versions , on a  चपटा  pastry circle  और  folding  it  to  रैप  the filling  ,  crimping  the   किनारे  to form a seal .
बाद  baking , the  परिणाम  is a raised semicircular  comestible  .
The traditional Cornish pasty , which has  सुरक्षित  Geographical  indication  ( PGI ) status in Europe , is filled with  बीफ  , sliced or diced potato , swede (  भी  known  as  a  पीला  turnip or rutabaga  –  referred to in  कॉर्नवॉल  as turnip ) and onion ,  seasoned   साथ  salt and pepper ,  और   is  baked .
Today , the  pasty   is  the  खाना  most associated with  कॉर्नवॉल  , it is regarded as the national dish  ,  and it accounts for  6  % of the  cornish  food economy  .
Pasties with many different fillings are  बना   ;   कुछ   दुकानें  specialise in  selling  all sorts of  pasties  .
The  origins  of the pasty are unclear ,  हालांकि  there are many  सन्दर्भ  to them  throughout  historical  दस्तावेज़  and  fiction   .
the   pasty  is now popular world-wide due to  the   स्प्रेड  of Cornish miners , and variations can be found in  ऑस्ट्रेलिया   ,  the United States , Mexico  और  elsewhere .
The ( ortho-  )  sympathetic  बेचैन  system  (  SNS ) is one of three major  भाग  of  the  autonomic nervous system : the others being the  enteric  and parasympathetic systems .
इसके   सामान्य  action is  to   mobilize  the body  's  nervous system fight-or-flight response .
It is  ,  however  ,  constantly  क्रियाशील  at a basic level to  maintain   समस्थापन  .
Secure Digital or ( SD )  is  a non-volatile memory  कार्ड  format for  उपयोग  in  पोर्टेबल  devices , such as mobile phones  ,  digital  कैमरे  , GPS navigation devices ,  और  tablet computers .
The Secure Digital standard is maintained by the SD Card Association ( SDA ) .
SD technologies  have  been implemented in more  than   400  brands across dozens  of  product categories and  अधिक  than 8,000 models  .
the   सुरक्षित  Digital  स्वरूप  includes four card  परिवारों  available  in  three different  रूप  factors .
The four families are the original  standard-capacity  (  sdsc  ) , the High-Capacity (  sdhc  ) , the eXtended-Capacity ( SDXC ) , and  the  SDIO ,  जिससे  combines input/output functions with  आंकड़ा  storage .
The three form  कारकों  are the  असली  size ,  the  ``  मिनी  '' size , and the `` micro ''  आकार  ( see illustration ) .
There  हैं  many combinations of form factors  और  device families .
Electrically passive adapters allow the use of a smaller card in  a  host device built to hold a larger card .
Host devices that comply  साथ  newer versions of the specification provide backward compatibility and accept older SD cards , but  इस  article explains  अनेक  factors  कि  can prevent the use  of   a  newer  sd  card:
a   नए  card  may  offer  वृहद   क्षमता  than the host device can handle .
A  नए  card  may  use a  संचिका  system the host device can not  navigate   .
Use of an SDIO card requires the  मेजबान  device be designed for the input/output functions the  कार्ड  provides  .
The organization of  the  card  थी  changed  starting  with the SDHC family .
Some vendors produced SDSC  ताश  above 1  gb  before the SDA had standardized a method of  doing   so  .
The SDA uses  अनेक  trademarked  लोगो  to enforce compliance with  इसके  specifications and assure users of  संगतता  .

Daniel Lawrence  व्हिटनी  (  born   फ़रवरी   17  , 1963 ) best known by his stage name and character Larry the  केबल  Guy , is an American stand-up comedian , actor , country music artist , voice actor , and former radio personality .
He was one of the members of the Blue Collar Comedy  दौरे  , a comedy troupe  जिससे  included  विधेयक  Engvall , Ron  श्वेत  , and Jeff Foxworthy ( with whom he  रै   स्ट्रक्चर  on Blue Collar TV )  .
व्हिटनी  has released  सात  comedy  एल्बम  , of  जिससे  three have been certified  सुनहरा  by the  riaa   लिये  shipments of 500,000 copies .
in  addition  ,   he   रै   स्ट्रक्चर  in  तीन  Blue  कॉलर  Comedy  tour-related  movies , as  खूब  as in the  films  Larry the Cable Guy : Health  इंस्पेक्टर  , Delta Farce , and Witless  सुरक्षा  , as well as voicing Mater in  the  Cars franchise  .
Whitney 's catchphrase : ``  git-r-done  ! '' is  भी  the title of his book .
On January 26 , 2010 , the TV channel History  घोषित  that it was ordering a series starring Whitney called Only in America with Larry the Cable Guy , in  जिससे  he would  explore   the  country and  immerse  himself in different lifestyles  ,  jobs , and hobbies .
The first episode  of  the series aired on February 8  ,  2011  .
Vitamin D  is  a group  of   fat-soluble  secosteroids responsible for intestinal absorption of calcium and phosphate  .
In humans ,  the  most  महत्वपूर्ण   सम्बन्धित  compounds of  विटामिन  D are vitamin D2 and vitamin  d3   .
Cholecalciferol ( vitamin D3 )  और  ergocalciferol (  विटामिन  D2 ) are  अद्वितीय  as they constitute  कया  we know  as  vitamin D and can  be  ingested from the diet  and/or  supplements .
the  body can  भी   synthesize   विटामिन   d   (  from cholesterol ) when sun  एक्सपोज़र  is adequate ( hence its nickname  ,  the ``  सनशाइन  vitamin '' ) .
Although vitamin D is commonly called  a  vitamin , it  is   नहीं  actually an  अनिवार्य   dietary  vitamin in the  सख्त  sense , as  it  can be synthesized in adequate amounts by  सबसे   स्तनधारियों  exposed to  धूप  .
( Cats  और   कुत्तो  can not  synthesize  vitamin D efficiently and must receive it in their  आहार  . )
An organic chemical compound (  or   सम्बन्धित   नियत  of  यौगिकों   )  is only scientifically called a vitamin  जब  it can not be  synthesized  in sufficient quantities  by  an organism , and must be obtained from their  आहार  .
however  , as with other compounds commonly called  विटामिन  , vitamin D  थी   खोजा   in   an  effort  to   ढूँढें  the dietary substance that was lacking  in  a disease , namely , rickets , the childhood form  of  osteomalacia .
Additionally , like other compounds called vitamins ,  in  the developed  संसार  vitamin  d  is  added  to staple  भोजन  , such as milk , to avoid disease  due  to deficiency .
Measures of  सीरम  levels  प्रतिबिंबित  endogenous  संश्लेषण  from  एक्सपोज़र  to sunlight as  खूब  as intake  इससे  the diet , and it  is   believed  that synthesis may contribute generally to the maintenance of adequate serum concentrations .
The  प्रमाण  indicates  कि  the  संश्लेषण   of  vitamin D from  सूर्य   एक्सपोज़र   works   in   a  feedback loop that prevents toxicity but , because of uncertainty about the cancer  रिस्क  from sunlight , no recommendations  हैं  issued by the Institute of  आयुर्विज्ञान   ,  USA ,  लिये  the amount of sun exposure required to meet vitamin D requirements .
तदनुसार  , the Dietary Reference Intakes for  विटामिन  D assume that  no  synthesis occurs  और  that all of  a  person  's   विटामिन  D is from their diet , although that will rarely occur in  अभ्यास  .
In the liver vitamin  d  is converted to calcidiol , which is also known as calcifediol (  इन   )  , 25-hydroxycholecalciferol , or 25-hydroxyvitamin  d—abbreviated  25 ( OH )  d  ; and which  is   the  specific vitamin D metabolite that is  measured  in serum to determine a person 's vitamin D status .
Part of  the  calcidiol is converted  by  the kidneys  to  calcitriol  ,  the biologically active  रूप   of  vitamin  D.  Calcitriol  circulates   as  a hormone in the blood ,  regulating  the concentration of  कैल्सियम  and phosphate in the bloodstream and promoting the healthy  विकास  and  remodeling  of bone .
Calcidiol is also converted to calcitriol outside of the kidneys  लिये  other purposes , such as the proliferation  ,  differentiation  और   apoptosis  of  कोशिकाएं  ;  calcitriol  also affects  neuromuscular  function and  सूजन  .
Beyond its use to prevent osteomalacia  or  rickets , the  प्रमाण  for other health effects of vitamin D supplementation in the  सामान्य   जनसांख्यिकी   is  inconsistent .
the   बेहतरीन  evidence of benefit is for  अस्थि  health and  a  decrease  in  mortality in elderly women .
Standard form of the periodic  तालिका  .
the  colors represent different  श्रेणी  of elements  समझाया  below .
The periodic table  is   a  tabular  प्रदर्शक  of the chemical elements , organized on the basis of  उनके  atomic numbers  ,  electron configurations , and recurring chemical  गुण  .
तत्व  are  प्रस्तुत  in order of increasing  परमाणु  number ( number of protons ) .
the  standard form of table  comprises  an 18 × 7 grid  or  main  देह  of elements ,  positioned  above a smaller double row  of  elements .
The table  can   भी  be  deconstructed  into four  आयताकार  blocks : the s-block to  the  left ,  the   p-block  to  the  right , the d-block in  the  middle , and the f-block below that .
The rows of the table are called  अवधि  ; the  कालम  of the s- , d- , and  p-blocks  are called groups , with some of these  having  names such as the  हैलोजन्स  or the noble gases .
चूंकि  , by definition , a periodic table incorporates recurring trends , any such table can be used to derive  संबंध  between the  गुण  of the elements and  भविष्यवाणी  the  गुण   of  new , yet to be discovered or synthesized  ,  elements .
As  a  result  ,   a  periodic table—whether in  the  standard form or some other variant—provides a  उपयोगी  framework for analyzing chemical behavior , and such tables are widely used in  रसायन  and other  sciences  .
Although precursors  मौजूद  ,  dmitri  Mendeleev is generally credited with the publication , in 1869 , of the first widely  पहचाना   आवधिक   तालिका  .
He  विकसित  his  तालिका  to illustrate periodic trends in the  गुण   of  the then-known elements  .
mendeleev  also predicted some properties of  then-unknown  elements that would be expected to fill  गैप  in  इस  table .
Most  of  his predictions were proved correct when the elements in  सवाल  were subsequently discovered  .
Mendeleev  's  periodic table has since  महरूम  expanded and refined with  the  discovery or synthesis of further new elements and the development of  नई  theoretical  मॉडल   to  explain chemical behavior .
All elements from atomic numbers 1 ( hydrogen ) to 118 (  ununoctium  ) have been  खोजा   or  synthesized .
The  तत्व  from 1 to 98 ( californium ) have  महरूम   मिला  to exist  naturally  , although some are found only  in  trace amounts and were  initially  discovered by synthesis in laboratories  .
The  तत्व   बाद  98 have only been synthesized in  laboratories  .
Production of elements beyond ununoctium is being pursued  ,  with  the   सवाल   of  how  the  periodic table may need  to  be modified  to   accommodate   कोई  such additions being a matter of ongoing  बहस  .
Numerous  सिंथेटिक  radionuclides  of   naturally  occurring elements have also been produced in laboratories .
न्यूनतम  wage  by  U.S. state  और  U.S. territory (  अमरीकी  Samoa  ,  Guam , Puerto Rico , Virgin Islands ) , as of  jan.  1 , 2013 .
In the United States , workers are generally entitled to be paid  no  less than the  statutory   न्यूनतम  wage .
The federal  सरकारी  mandates  a  nationwide minimum wage level of  $  7.25 per hour , while some states and municipalities have set minimum wage levels higher than  the  federal level , with  the  highest state minimum wage being $ 9.19 per  घंटा  in  वॉशिंगटन  as of 2013  .
Among those paid by the  घंटा   in  2012 , 1.6  लाख  were reported as earning  exactly   the  prevailing federal minimum wage  .
परिचय  2.0 million were reported as  कमाई  wages below the  न्यूनतम   .
Together , these 3.6 million workers with wages at or below  the  minimum made  up  4.7  प्रतिशत  of all hourly-paid workers .

Evan Williams bourbon whiskey
Bourbon  whiskey  is a type of American whiskey  –  a  barrel-aged   आसुत  spirit made primarily  इससे  corn .
The name of  the  spirit  गर्भाशयी  from  इसके  historical association with an area known as  बूढ़ा  Bourbon , around what is now Bourbon  काउंटी  , Kentucky ( which , in turn ,  थी  named after  the  French House of Bourbon royal family ) .
it  has been produced since the 18th century .
While it may  be  made anywhere in the  संयुक्त   राज्य  ,  it  is  strongly  associated with  the  American South  in  general  ,  and Kentucky in particular .
The Mona Lisa  (  La Gioconda or La Joconde ) is  a   half-length  portrait of a  स्त्री  by the Italian artist Leonardo  da   विंची  , which  रै  been acclaimed as `` the best known , the most visited , the most written about ,  the  most sung about  ,   the  most parodied  कार्य  of art  in  the  संसार   .   ''
The painting , thought to be a portrait of Lisa Gherardini , the wife  of   francesco  del Giocondo , is  in  oil on a poplar panel  ,  and is believed  to  have  महरूम  painted  between  1503 and  1506  .
It was acquired  by   किंग  Francis I of France  और  is now the property of the French  गणतंत्र  , on  स्थाई  display at the  musée  du Louvre in Paris  चूंकि  1797 .
The  ambiguity  of  the  subject 's expression , which is  अक्सर  described as enigmatic , the monumentality  of  the composition  ,  the subtle modeling  of  forms and the atmospheric  illusionism  were  अनोखा  qualities that have contributed to the  continuing  fascination and  पढ़ाई  of the work .
Robert  एलन  Palmer ( 19  जनवरी  1949  –  26 September 2003 ) , was an English singer-songwriter and  संगीतकार  .
He was known for his distinctive voice and the eclectic mix of musical styles  on   उसके   एल्बम  , combining soul , jazz , rock , pop , reggae and  ब्लूज़  .
he  found success both in his solo career  और   in  the musical  अधिनियम   the  Power  स्टेशन  , and  था  Top 10 songs  in   दोनो  the UK and the US .
His iconic music videos by Terence Donovan for the hits `` Addicted to Love ``  और   ``   बस  Irresistible `` featured identically dressed dancing  महिलाओं  with  पाले  faces ,  अंधेरा  eye makeup  और  bright red lipstick , which resembled the women in the art of Patrick Nagel , an  कलाकार  popular in the 1980s .
Sharp-suited , his involvement in the music industry commenced in  the  1960s  ,  covered  पाँच  decades and included  a   वर्तनी   साथ  Vinegar Joe .
Palmer received  a   क्रमांक  of awards throughout his  करियर  , including two Grammy Awards for Best  पुरूष   चट्टान  Vocal Performance ,  an   एमटीवी  Video Music Award , and was twice nominated for the Brit Award  लिये   बेहतरीन  British Male .
Computed tomography angiography ( CTA )  is  a computed tomography technique used to visualize arterial and venous vessels throughout  the  body  .
This ranges from arteries serving  the   दिमाग  to  those  bringing blood to the lungs , kidneys , arms and legs  .
the  Champs-Élysées decorated with flags for Bastille Day
Horseman  of  the French Republican Guard during the 2007 military  परेड  on the  champs-élysées  .
Prise  de  la Bastille  by  Jean-Pierre-Louis-Laurent Houel
Bastille Day is the  नाम  given in  english-speaking   देशों  to the French National  दिन   ,  which is celebrated  on  the 14th of July each year .
In France , it is  formally   पुकारा   la  Fête  nationale  ( ; The National Celebration ) and commonly Le  quatorze  juillet (  ;   the  fourteenth of July  )   .
it  commemorates the  1790  Fête  de  la Fédération , held on  the   पहला  anniversary  of  the storming of the Bastille on 14 July  1789  ; the anniversary of  the  storming of  the  Bastille fortress-prison was seen  as  a symbol of  the  uprising of the  आधुनिक  nation  ,  and of the reconciliation of all the French inside the constitutional  साम्राज्य   जिससे  preceded the First Republic  ,  during the French Revolution .
Festivities and official ceremonies are held all over France .
The oldest and largest regular military parade in Europe is held on  the   morning   of  14 July  ,  on the Champs-Élysées  एवेन्यू  in Paris in front of the President of  the   गणतंत्र  , French officials and foreign  अतिथि  .
The United States of America ( USA  or  U.S.A. ) , commonly called the United States ( US or U.S. )  or  America ,  is  a federal republic  consisting   of  fifty states and a federal district .
The  निम्नतर  forty-eight contiguous states and the federal district of Washington  ,  D.C. are in  सेंट्रल  North America between Canada and  मैक्सिको  .
the  state of Alaska  is  west of  कनाडा  and east of Russia  आरपार  the Bering Strait , and  the  state of Hawaii is in the mid-North Pacific .
The country also has five populated and nine unpopulated territories in the Pacific and the Caribbean .
At 3.79 million square miles  (  9.83 million km2 ) and with around 315 million people , the United States is  the  third-  or  fourth-largest  देश   by  total area and the third-largest  by  both  जमीन  area  और  population .
It  is  one of the  संसार  's most ethnically diverse and multicultural nations  ,  the product  of  large-scale immigration from many countries  .
The geography and climate of the U.S. is  भी  extremely diverse  ,  with deserts , plains  ,  forests , and mountains that are home to a wide variety  of  species .
Paleoindians  migrated  from Asia to  कया  is now  the  United States  मेनलैंड  around 15,000 years ago .
बाद  1500  ,  Old World diseases introduced by Europeans greatly reduced  उनके   populations  .
European colonization began around  1600  and came mostly from England .
The  संयुक्त  States emerged  इससे   तेरह  British colonies  स्तिथ  along the  अटलांटिक  seaboard .
Disputes between Great Britain and  the   अमरीकी  colonies  led  to  the  American Revolution .
On July 4  ,   1776  , delegates from the 13 colonies unanimously issued  the  Declaration of Independence , which  स्थापित  the  संयुक्त  States of America .
the  American  क्रांतिकारी  War  ,  which  ended  with  the  recognition  of  independence of the United States  इससे  the  किंगडम   of  Great Britain , was the  पहला  successful war of independence against a European colonial empire .
The current  संविधान  was adopted on  सितंबर  17 , 1787 ; twenty-seven  amendments  have since been  added   to  the  संविधान  .
The first  टेन  amendments ,  collectively   नामित  the  विधेयक  of Rights , were  ratified  in 1791 and  गारंटी  many fundamental civil rights and freedoms .
Driven by  the  doctrine of manifest destiny , the United States embarked on a vigorous  विस्तार  across North America throughout the 19th century  .
This involved displacing native  जनजातियों  ,  acquiring  new  territories   ,  and  धीरे  admitting new states .
The American Civil  युद्ध   ended  legalized slavery in the United States  .
By the end  of   the  nineteenth century ,  the  United States extended into the Pacific Ocean  ,  and its economy was the  संसार  's largest  .
The  spanish–american  War and  पुष्टि   the  country 's status as a global military power .
The  संयुक्त  States emerged from as a global superpower  ,   the  first country with nuclear weapons  ,   और  a permanent member of the United Nations Security Council .
The end of  the  Cold War and the  विच्छेद   of  the  सोवियत  Union left the United States  as  the  एकमात्र   महाशक्ति  .
The United States is a developed country and has  the  world 's  largest  national economy , with  an   अनुमानित  2012 GDP  of  $ 15.6  खरब  19 % of global GDP at purchasing-power parity  ,  as  of  2011 .
The per capita GDP of the U.S.  थी  the world 's sixth-highest as of 2010 , although America 's wealth  असमानता   थी  also ranked highest among OECD countries by the  संसार   बैंको  .
The economy is fueled  by  an  प्रचुरता   of   प्राकृतिक   संसाधन  , a well-developed infrastructure  ,  and high productivity ;  और  while its economy is considered post-industrial it continues to  be   एक  of the world 's largest  निर्माताओं  .
The country accounts for 39 % of  वैश्विक  military spending , and is a leading economic ,  राजनैतिक  , and cultural force in the world ,  as  well as a  नेता   in  scientific research and  technological  innovation  .
The NCAA Men 's Division I Basketball Championship is  a  single-elimination tournament played each spring in the United  राज्य  , currently featuring  68  college basketball teams , to determine the national championship of the  प्रमुख  college basketball teams  .
The tournament , organized  by  the National Collegiate Athletic Association ( NCAA ) ,  थी   निर्मित  during 1939  by  the National  संघ   of  Basketball Coaches , and was the idea of  ओहियो  State University coach  हेरोल्ड   olsen   .
निभाई  mostly  दौरान  March  ,  it is known informally as March Madness or the Big Dance , and has become one  of  the most famous annual sporting  कार्यक्रम  in the United  राज्य  .
The  ncaa   रै   credited  Bob  वाल्श  of the Seattle Organizing Committee for starting the  कूच  Madness celebration during 1984 .
the  tournament teams include champions from  31  Division  i  conferences (  जिससे   प्राप्त   स्वचालित  bids )  ,   और  37 teams  जिससे  are  awarded  at-large berths .
These `` at-large '' teams  हैं  chosen by an NCAA selection committee , as detailed below .
the  64 teams are divided into four  regions  and organized into  a  single  विलोपन   ``   कोष्ठक  ''  ,  which  predetermines  , when a team wins a game , which team it  होगा  face next .
Each team is `` seeded '' ,  or  ranked  ,  within its region .
बाद  an initial four games between eight lower-ranked teams , the  टूर्नामेंट  occurs during the course of three weekends  ,  at pre-selected neutral  साइट  around the United States .
Lower-ranked teams are placed in the bracket  विरूद्ध  higher ranked teams .
Each weekend eliminates three-fourths of the teams , from a round of 64 , to a `` Sweet Sixteen '' ,  और  for the last weekend of the  टूर्नामेंट  a Final Four ; the Final Four is usually played during the first weekend of April .
ये   चार  teams  ,  one from  प्रत्येक  region , then  compete  in one location for the national championship  .
The tournament  रै  been  at   तनिक  partially televised since 1969 .
presently  ,  the  games are reported by CBS ,  tbs  ,  टीएनटी   ,  and truTV  by  the trade-name NCAA March Madness .
Since 2011 , all games are available for viewing nationwide  .
As television coverage has grown , so  too   रै  the tournament 's popularity .
Presently , millions of Americans `` fill out a bracket '' ,  predicting  winners of all 67 games .
With 11 national titles , UCLA has the record for the most NCAA Men 's Division I Basketball Championships ;  जॉन  Wooden coached UCLA to 10 of its 11 titles .
The University of Kentucky is  दूसरी  ,  साथ  8 national titles ,  जबकि  Indiana University and the University of North Carolina are  tied  for third with  5   नेशनल  titles .
Duke University ranks fifth with 4 national  शीर्षक  .
A sample of synthetic  मोटर  oil
सिंथेटिक  oil is a  स्नेहक   consisting  of chemical compounds that are artificially  बना  (  synthesized  ) .
Synthetic lubricants can be  manufactured  using  chemically  modified petroleum components rather than  पूरे  crude oil , but can also  be  synthesized  इससे  other raw materials .
सिंथेटिक   आयल  is used as a substitute for lubricant refined from  पेट्रोलियम  when operating in extremes of temperature ,  क्युकी  , in general , it provides superior mechanical and chemical  गुण   than  those found in traditional mineral oils .
Aircraft jet  इंजन   ,  for example , require  the   उपयोग  of  सिंथेटिक   oils   ,  whereas  वायुयान  piston engines do not .
Jackass is an American reality series , originally shown on MTV from 2000  to   2002  , featuring people  performing  various dangerous ,  crude  self-injuring stunts and  pranks   .
The show  परोसा  as  a  launchpad for the television and acting careers of  bam  Margera  ,  Steve-O , and also  जॉनी  Knoxville , who previously had only a few  नाबालिग  acting  भूमिकाएँ  .
चूंकि  2002 , three  बेवकूफ़  films have been produced and released by  एमटीवी  corporate sibling Paramount Pictures , continuing the franchise after its  चलाएं  on television .
the   दिखाएँ   sparked  several spin-offs including Viva La Bam  ,   wildboyz  , Homewrecker  ,  Dr. Steve-O and Blastazoid .
The show  लगाई   #  68  on  Entertainment Weekly `` New  tv  Classics '' list .
Roseanne Cherrie Barr (  born   नवम्बर  3 , 1952 )  is  an American  अभिनेत्री  , comedienne , writer , television producer  ,  director  ,  and  2012  presidential nominee  of  the California -based Peace and Freedom Party .
Barr  began  her career in  stand-up  comedy at clubs before  gaining   कीर्ति   लिये  her role in the sitcom Roseanne .
The show was a hit  और  lasted nine seasons  ,  from 1988  to  1997 .
She won both an Emmy and a Golden Globe Award for Best Actress  लिये  her work  on  the show .
barr   था  crafted a `` fierce working-class domestic goddess '' persona in the eight  सालो   preceding  her  sitcom  and  चाही   to  do a  यथार्थवादी   दिखाएँ  about a strong mother who  थी  not a  शिकार  of patriarchal  भोगवाद  .
the  granddaughter of immigrants from Europe and Russia ,  barr  was the oldest of four children in a  working-class   यहूदी  Salt Lake City family ; she was also active in the LDS Church .
In  1974  ,  वो  married Bill Pentland , with  जिसको  she had three children , before divorcing in 1990 and marrying comedian Tom Arnold for four  सालो  .
Controversy arose when she  संग  `` The Star-Spangled Banner `` off-key at a 1990 nationally  aired  baseball game , followed  by   grabbing  her crotch  और  spitting .
After her sitcom ended , she launched her own talk show , The Roseanne Show ,  जिससे  aired from 1998 to 2000 .
In 2005 , she returned to stand-up comedy with a world  दौरे  .
In  2011  , she starred in an  unscripted   tv  show , Roseanne 's Nuts , that  lasted  from July to  सितंबर  of that year , about her life on a  हवाई  farm .
In early 2012 , Barr announced her candidacy for the Presidential nomination of the  ग्रीन   पार्टी  .
Barr lost  the   नामांकन  to Jill Stein .
She then sought the  अध्यक्षीय  nomination  of  the Peace  और   स्वतंत्रता  Party ,  जिससे  she  जीती   on   अगस्त  4 , 2012  .
Barr received  61,971  votes in the general election  ,  placing sixth  overall  .
Francesco Albani 's 17th century Baptism  of   मसीह  is a typical depiction with the sky opening and the Holy Spirit descending as a dove .
The  बपतिस्मा  of Jesus marks the beginning  of  his public  मंत्रालय  .
This  इवेंट   is  recorded in the  canonical  gospels of Matthew , Mark and  ल्यूक   .
जॉन  's gospel does  नहीं  describe Jesus ' baptism , but John the Baptist does  गवाही  of the other things in .
In the New Testament , John the Baptist preached the baptism of  तौबा  for the remission of sins (  )  , and declared himself a forerunner of he that would baptize ``  साथ  the  पावन  Ghost and  साथ  fire '' (  )   .
In so doing  he  was preparing the  रास्ता  for Jesus .
Jesus  आए  to the  जॉर्डन  River where he  थी   baptized  by John .
the   baptismal  scene includes the heavens  खोलने  , a dove-like descent of the Holy  स्पिरिट  ,  और  a voice from  स्वर्ग  saying , `` This is my beloved Son  ,   in   जिसको  I am  खूब  pleased . ''
Most modern scholars view the fact that Jesus  थी  baptized by  जॉन  as an historical event to which  a  high degree of certainty can be  आबंटित  .
Along with the  crucifixion   of   यीशु  most  विद्वानों  view it as one  of  the two historically certain  तथ्य  about him , and often use it as the  starting  points for the study of  the  historical Jesus .
The  बपतिस्मा   is  one of the  पाँच  major milestones  in  the gospel narrative of the life of  यीशु  , the others being the  बासीलीक  , Crucifixion , Resurrection , and  आरोहण  .
Most Christian denominations view the baptism of Jesus  as  an important  इवेंट  and a basis  लिये   the   ईसाई  rite of baptism ( see also ) .
In Eastern Christianity ,  यीशु  ' baptism is commemorated  on  6 January , the  feast   of   epiphany  .
In the  रोमन  Catholic Church , the Anglican  नियाज़   ,  the Lutheran Churches  और  some other Western denominations , it is recalled on a  दिन  within the following week , the feast of the baptism of  the  Lord .
In Roman  catholicism  , the  बपतिस्मा  of Jesus  is   एक  of the Luminous  रहस्यों  sometimes  added  to the Rosary  .
It is  a  Trinitarian feast in the Eastern Orthodox Churches .
Methylcobalamin ( shown )  is  a form  of  vitamin  b12  .
Physically it resembles the other forms of  विटामिन  B12 , occurring  as  dark red crystals that freely form cherry-colored transparent solutions in water .
Vitamin B12 ,  विटामिन  B12 or vitamin B-12  ,  also called cobalamin , is a water-soluble vitamin with  a   कुंजी   भूमिका   in   the  normal functioning of the brain and nervous system , and for the  गठन  of blood .
It  is  one of the eight B vitamins  .
It  is  normally involved in the metabolism of every cell of the human body  ,   विशेषकर  affecting DNA synthesis and regulation , but also fatty acid synthesis and energy  उत्पादन  .
Neither fungi , plants  ,  nor animals are capable of producing vitamin B12 .
Only bacteria and archaea  have  the enzymes required for  इसके  synthesis ,  हालांकि  many foods are  a  natural source of B12 because  of   बैक्टीरियल  symbiosis  .
The vitamin is the largest  और  most structurally complicated vitamin and can be produced  industrially  only through bacterial  fermentation-synthesis  .
विटामिन  B12 consists  of   a  class of chemically related  यौगिकों   (  vitamers ) ,  सब  of  जिससे  have vitamin activity .
It contains  the  biochemically rare element cobalt .
Biosynthesis  of   the  basic structure of the  विटामिन  is  संपन्नता  only by bacteria ( which  प्रायः  produce hydroxocobalamin ) ,  लकिन  conversion  between  different forms of the vitamin can be accomplished in the human body .
A common semi-synthetic  रूप  of the vitamin , cyanocobalamin ,  करता  not occur in nature , but is produced from bacterial  hydroxocobalamin  and then used in many  दवाएँ  and supplements  ,  and as  a   खाना  additive , because  of   इसके  stability and lower production cost  .
In the  देह  it is converted to the human physiological  फ़ॉर्म  methylcobalamin and adenosylcobalamin , leaving  पीछे  the cyanide , albeit in minimal concentration .
More  recently  , hydroxocobalamin , methylcobalamin ,  और  adenosylcobalamin can be found in more expensive pharmacological products  और   खाना  supplements .
The extra  यूटिलिटी  of these is currently debated .
Vitamin B12 was  खोजा   इससे  its relationship to the disease pernicious anemia , which  is  an autoimmune  बीमारी  in which  parietal  cells of the stomach  जिम्मेदार   लिये  secreting intrinsic factor are destroyed .
Intrinsic factor is crucial for the normal absorption of B12  ,  so a lack  of  intrinsic factor , as  देखी  in  घातक   रक्ताल्पता  ,  कल्याणकारी   a  vitamin B12  कमियां  .
Many other subtler kinds of vitamin B12 deficiency and their biochemical effects  have   चूंकि   महरूम  elucidated .
Full Metal Jacket  is  a  1987  war film  उत्पादित  , directed and co-written by  स्टेनली   kubrick  .
It is an adaptation of Gustav Hasford 's  1979  novel The  short-timers  and stars Matthew  modine  , Vincent D'Onofrio , R. Lee  ermey  ,  arliss  Howard , and Adam  baldwin  .
The film follows a platoon of U.S.  marines  through their training and the experiences of  दो   of  the platoon  's  Marines in the  tet  Offensive during  the  Vietnam War  .
The film 's title refers to  the   पूरा   मेटल   जैकेट  bullet used  by  infantry riflemen .
The film  प्राप्त   नाजुक   acclaim  .
it  received  an  Academy Award  नामांकन  for Best Adapted Screenplay  लिये  Kubrick , Michael  हेर   और  Gustav Hasford  .
In 2001  ,   the   अमरीकी  Film  संस्थान  placed Full Metal Jacket at # 95 in  उनके  `` AFI 's 100 Years ... 100  thrills  `` poll .
tmz  is  a  celebrity news website  कि  debuted on November 8 , 2005 .
It  थी   a  collaboration between AOL and Telepictures Productions , a division of  warner  Bros.  ,  until  समय  Warner divested AOL in 2009 .
However  ,   it  remained affiliated with AOL News and has the AOL News logo  affixed  in  the  upper right corner .
The name  tmz  stands for the historic `` studio  मण्डल  ``  or   30-mile  zone radius  इससे  the intersection of  वेस्ट  Beverly  boulevard  and North La Cienega Boulevard in Los Angeles  .
TMZ 's managing editor is  घनघोर  Levin , a  lawyer-turned-journalist  who was  previously  a legal expert for the  लॉस  Angeles television station KCBS-TV .
the  site claims  कि  it does not pay for stories  or  interviews  ;  however , Levin has admitted that TMZ does `` sometimes pay sources for  लीड  on stories '' .
Levin has stated that `` everything is researched and vetted for accuracy . ''
A  साथी  TV series , TMZ on TV , debuted on September 10 ,  2007  .
चीख  3 is a 2000 American slasher film created by  केविन  Williamson , directed by Wes Craven  और  written by Ehren Kruger ,  अभिनीत  Neve Campbell , Courteney  कॉक्स  Arquette and David Arquette .
it  was  released  on February 4  ,  2000  as  the third  किश्त  in the Scream film series .
The  कार्यक्रम  of the story are set three years after  those  of Scream 2  और  follows  sidney  Prescott ( Campbell )  जो  has gone into self-imposed  अलगाव  following the events of  the   पिछला  two films but is drawn  to  Hollywood after a new Ghostface begins killing the cast of the film within a film `` Stab 3 '' .
Scream 3 combines the violence of  the  slasher  विधा  with comedy  और  `` whodunit `` mystery while satirizing  the  cliché of film trilogies  .
नापसंद  the previous Scream films ,  वहीँ   थी   an  increased  जोर  on comedic  तत्व  and the violence and horror was reduced in response to increased public scrutiny  परिचय  violence  in  media  following  the Columbine High  स्कूल  massacre .
The film was the concluding  अध्याय  of the Scream series until  it  was revived with a sequel , Scream 4 , in 2011 .
Williamson  provided   a  five-page outline for two  सिक्वेल  to Scream when auctioning  उसके   असली  script ,  उम्मीद   to   entice   bidders   साथ  the  संभावित   of  buying a franchise .
Williamson 's commitments to other projects meant he was unable to develop a complete script for  चीख   3   और  writing duties were undertaken  by  Ehren Kruger who discarded much of Williamson 's  टीप  .
craven  and  मार्को  Beltrami returned to direct and score the film respectively as they had with the previous two series  प्रविष्टियां  .
Production was troubled with script rewrites , with pages sometimes only ready  on   the  day of filming  ,  and scheduling difficulties with  the  main cast  .
Scream 3 performed both financially and  critically  worse than its preceding films , earning  over  $ 161 million  और  with many critics  claiming  that the film had become  कया  Scream  originally  `` spoofed  ``  .
Despite negative  आलोचना   the  film did receive praise  साथ   reviewers  calling it the perfect  समाप्त  to the  चीख  trilogy  .
as  of  2012  , the film is currently  the  number  3   highest-grossing  slasher-film in North America , following Scream at number 1 and Scream 2 at number 2 .
The film 's soundtrack was well-received  ,  spending fourteen weeks  on  the Billboard 200 and reaching a high of #  32  .
Shoulder impingement  सिंड्रोम   ,  also called painful arc syndrome , supraspinatus syndrome , swimmer  's  shoulder , and thrower 's shoulder ,  is  a clinical  सिंड्रोम  which occurs when the tendons of the rotator  कफ  muscles  become   irritated   और  inflamed  as  they pass through the subacromial space , the passage beneath the  acromion   .
This can  परिणाम  in pain  ,  weakness and loss of movement at the shoulder .
