the  colonial history  of  the United States covers the history of European  settlements   इससे  the start  of  colonization of America until their incorporation into the United States .
In the late 16th  सदी  , England , France ,  स्पेन  and the Netherlands launched major colonization programs in eastern North America .
Small early attempts—such as the  अंग्रेज़ी  Lost  उपनिवेश  of Roanoke —often  disappeared  ;  everywhere  the death rate of the  पहला   आमद  was very high  .
nevertheless  successful colonies were established .
European  settlers  came from a variety of social and religious groups .
No  aristocrats   settled  permanently , but  a  number of adventurers , soldiers  ,   किसानो  ,  और  tradesmen arrived .
विविधता  was an American  characteristic  as the Dutch of New Netherland , the Swedes and  finns  of New  स्वीडन  , the English Quakers of Pennsylvania  ,   the   अंग्रेज़ी  Puritans of New England , the English  settlers   of  Jamestown  ,   और  the ``  worthy  poor '' of Georgia  ,   आए  to  the  new continent and built colonies with distinctive social , religious , political  और  economic styles .
Occasionally one colony took  कंट्रोल  of another  (  during wars between their European parents ) .
तभी  in Nova Scotia ( now part  of  Canada ) did the conquerors expel the  पिछला   colonists  .
Instead they all lived side  by  side in  सलाम   .
There were no major civil  युद्धों   among   the  13 colonies , and the  दो  chief armed rebellions ( in Virginia in  1676  and  in  New  यॉर्क  in 1689–91 ) were  short-lived  failures .
युद्धों  between the  फ्रेंच   और   the  British—the  फ्रेंच  and Indian Wars and Father Rale 's War —were recurrent ,  और  involved French-support for Wabanaki Confederacy  हमले   on  the frontiers .
By 1760 France was  पराजित  and  the  British seized its colonies .
the  four distinct regions were : New  इंग्लैण्ड  , the Middle  colonies  ,  the  Chesapeake Bay Colonies  (  Upper  दक्षिण   )  and the Lower South .
Some  इतिहासकारों  add a  पांचवां  region  ,  the Frontier , which was never separately organized  .
By the  समय   यूरोपीय   settlers  arrived around 1600–1650 , the majority of the Native Americans living in  the   पूर्वी  United States had  महरूम  decimated  by  new diseases , introduced to them decades before by explorers and  sailors  .
See timeline of Colonial America for list  of  historical events .
Gloria Laura Vanderbilt ( born February 20 ,  1924   )  is  an  American  कलाकार   ,  author ,  अभिनेत्री   ,  heiress ,  और  socialite  सबसे  noted as an early developer of designer blue jeans  .
She is a member  of   the  prominent Vanderbilt family of New York and the mother of CNN 's Anderson  कूपर  .
यूनानियों  ( Romanization of Greek| ) ,  officially   the  Hellenic  गणतंत्र   (  ' )  ,  is a country in Southeast Europe .
According to the 2011 census , Greece 's population  is   around  11 million  .
Athens is  the  nation 's capital and largest city , its urban area also including Piraeus .
Greece is strategically located  at  the crossroads  of  Europe , Asia , the Middle East , and Africa , and has land  सीमायें   साथ  Albania  ,  the Republic of  मकदूनिया   और  Bulgaria to the north , and Turkey to the northeast  .
the  Aegean Sea lies to  the   ईस्ट   of  mainland Greece , the Ionian Sea to  the  west , and the Mediterranean  समुद्र  to the south .
Greece has the 11th  longest  coastline in the world at in length , featuring  a  vast number  of   आइलैंड्स  ( approximately 1,400 , of which 227  हैं  inhabited ) ,  सहित   क्रेट  ,  the  Dodecanese  ,  the  cyclades  , and the  आयोनियन   आइलैंड्स   among  others .
Eighty  प्रतिशत  of Greece consists of mountains , of which Mount Olympus is the highest  at   .
Modern Greece traces  इसके  roots to the civilization  of   प्राचीन  Greece , generally considered  the  cradle of  पश्चिमी   सभ्यता  .
As such , it is the birthplace of  लोकतंत्र  ,  पश्चिमी  philosophy  ,  the Olympic  खेल  ,  पश्चिमी   साहित्य  and historiography , political science , major scientific and  गणितीय   सिद्धान्त   ,   और  Western drama , including  दोनो   त्रासदी   और  comedy .
इस   विरासत  is partly  reflected  in  the  seventeen UNESCO  संसार  Heritage Sites located in Greece , ranking it 7th in Europe  और  13th in the world .
The modern Greek state was  स्थापित  in 1830  ,  following the Greek War of  स्वतंत्रता  .
Greece  is  a founding member  of  the United Nations , has been a member of  कया  is  अभी   the  European Union since 1981  (   और  the eurozone since  2001  ) , and has been  a  member of NATO since 1952 .
Greece  is  a  विकसित  country with an advanced  ,  high-income economy and very high standards of living , including  the  world 's 21st highest quality of life as  of  2010  .
Greece 's  अर्थव्यवस्था  is also  the  largest in the Balkans  ,  where Greece is an  महत्वपूर्ण  regional investor  .
A prime meridian is a meridian , i.e  .  a line  of   देशांतर  , at which longitude  is  defined to be 0°  .
A  प्रधान  meridian and its opposite in a 360°-system , the 180th meridian  (  at 180° longitude ) , form a great  वृत्त  .
This great circle divides the sphere , e.g .  the  Earth  ,  into two hemispheres .
if  one  उपयोग  directions of East and  वेस्ट  from a defined prime meridian  ,  then they  can  be called Eastern Hemisphere and Western Hemisphere  .
Gerardus Mercator in his  एटलस  Cosmographicae ( 1595 ) uses a  प्रधान  meridian somewhere  बंद  to 25°W , passing just to the west of Santa Maria Island in the Atlantic  .
His 180th meridian runs  साथ  the Strait  of  Anián ( Bering Strait )
A prime meridian is ultimately arbitrary , unlike an equator , which is determined by the axis of rotation—and various conventions  have   महरूम  used or  advocated  in different regions and throughout history .
Minka Dumont Kelly  (  born Minka Dumont  dufay  ; June 24  ,  1980 ) is an  अमरीकी   अभिनेत्री  .
She is perhaps  बेहतरीन  known  लिये  her roles  in   चार्ली  's Angels , Friday Night  लाइट्स  , and  the   रूममेट  .
R.O.B .  (  Robotic Operating Buddy ) , released in Japan as the , is an accessory for the  निन्टेंडो  Entertainment System ( NES ) .
It  थी  released in July 1985 in Japan and later that year in  उत्तर  America .
It had a short  उत्पाद  lifespan  ,  with support for only two games which comprised the `` Robot Series ''  ;  Gyromite and Stack-Up .
R.O.B .  थी  released  साथ  the intention of portraying the Nintendo Entertainment System as something novel in order to alleviate retail fears following  the  video  खेल   क्रैश  of  1983  .
R.O.B . was available in the  डीलक्स  Set  ,  a  विन्यास   लिये  the console that included , among other things , R.O.B  .  and Gyromite  .
Stack-Up was purchased separately and included its own physical  खेल  pieces .
The Walking Liberty half  डालर  was a silver  50-cent  piece or half dollar coin issued by  the   संयुक्त  States Mint from 1916 to 1947  ;  it  थी  designed by Adolph A.  weinman  .
in  1915 , the new Mint  निदेशक  , Robert W. Woolley , came  to  believe that  he  was not only  अनुमत  but required by law  to  replace coin  डिजाइन  that had been in use for  25  years .
He therefore began  the  process of replacing the Barber  coinage   :  dimes , quarters and half  डॉलर  , all  bearing  similar  डिजाइन  by long-time Mint Engraver Charles E. Barber , and first struck in 1892 .
Woolley had the  आयोग  of Fine Arts conduct  a  competition , as a result of which Weinman was selected to design the dime and half dollar .
weinman  's design of  स्वतंत्रता  striding towards the Sun  लिये  the half dollar proved difficult  to   पूर्ण   ,  and  राजकोष  Secretary  विलियम  G. McAdoo ,  जिनकी   विभाग  included  the  Mint , considered having Barber create his  अपना  design .
मिंट  officials were successful in getting Weinman 's  डिज़ाइन   into  production , although it never struck very well , which may  have  been a factor in its replacement  by  the Franklin half dollar  शुरूआत  in 1948 .
Nevertheless , art historian Cornelius Vermeule  माना   the  piece  to  be among the most beautiful US coins  .
Since 1986 , a  परिवर्धन  of Weinman  's   obverse   डिज़ाइन   रै  been  प्रयुक्त  for the  अमरीकी  Silver  त्रिभुज  .
The Toyota 4Runner is a mid-size sport utility vehicle  (  SUV )  उत्पादित  by the  जापानी  manufacturer  टोयोटा   और  sold  throughout  the world from 1984 to  उपस्थित  .
In Japan it was known as the  टोयोटा  Hilux Surf .
The  असली  4Runner was a compact SUV and little more  than  a Toyota pickup truck with a fiberglass shell  over  the bed ,  लकिन  the model  रै  since undergone significant independent development  into  a  क्रॉस   between  a compact and a mid-size  एसयूवी   .
सब  4Runners have been built at  टोयोटा  's Tahara plant in Tahara  ,  Aichi , Japan ,  or  at Hino Motors  '  Hamura , Japan plant , and in Brazil .
इसके  mid-size crossover SUV counterpart is the Toyota Highlander .
इस  article  सौदे  with medicine  as  practiced  by  trained professionals from ancient times to the present  .
The ancient Egyptians had a  प्रणाली  of medicine  कि  was very advanced  लिये  its time and  बहकावे  later medical  परंपराओं  .
The Egyptians and Babylonians both introduced  the  concepts  of  diagnosis , prognosis , and medical  परिक्षा  .
The Greeks went  भी   further  , and advanced as  खूब   चिकित्सा  ethics .
The Hippocratic Oath , still  लिया  by doctors today , was written in Greece in the 5th century BCE .
In the medieval era , surgical practices  inherited  from the ancient masters were  improved  and  तब  systematized in Rogerius 's The  अभ्यास  of Surgery  .
Universities  began  systematic training  of  physicians around the years 1220 in Italy .
During the Renaissance , understanding of anatomy improved ,  और   the  microscope was invented .
The  रोगाणु  theory of disease in the 19th century led to  cures  for many infectious diseases .
Military doctors  उन्नत  the  विधि  of trauma treatment and  सर्जरी   .
Public health measures  यहूद  developed especially in the 19th century as the  रैपिड  growth  of  cities required systematic sanitary measures .
Advanced  शोध  centers opened in the early 20th  सदी  , often connected with  प्रमुख  hospitals  .
the  mid-20th century was characterized by  नई  biological treatments  ,   ऐसे  as antibiotics .
ये  advancements ,  साथ  with developments in chemistry ,  आनुवंशिकी  , and lab  प्रौद्योगिकी  ( such as the x-ray ) led to modern medicine  .
Medicine was heavily  professionalized  in the 20th century  ,   और  new careers opened  to   महिलाओं  as nurses ( from the 1870s  )  and as physicians ( especially  बाद  1970  )  .
The 21st century  is  characterized by very advanced research involving numerous fields of  विज्ञान  .
The  hippocratic  Corpus  ,  is a  संग्रहण  of early medical works  इससे   प्राचीन  Greece strongly associated with the ancient Greek physician Hippocrates and his teachings .
Potassium is a chemical element with symbol K ( from Neo-Latin  kalium  ) and atomic  क्रमांक  19 .
Elemental  पोटैशियम  is a soft silvery-white alkali  मेटल  that oxidizes rapidly in air  और  is very reactive with  जल  , generating sufficient heat to ignite the  हाइड्रोजन  emitted in the reaction  और  burning with a lilac flame .
Because potassium and sodium are  chemically  very similar , their salts were not at first differentiated .
The existence of multiple elements in their salts was suspected from 1702 , and  इस  was proven in  1807  when potassium and  सोडियम  were individually isolated from different  लवण  by electrolysis .
Potassium in nature occurs only in ionic salts .
As such , it  is  found dissolved in seawater ( which is 0.04 %  पोटैशियम  by weight  )  , and is  भाग   of  many minerals .
Most  औद्योगिक   रासायनिक   अनुप्रयोग  of potassium employ the relatively high solubility in water of potassium compounds , such  as  potassium soaps .
Potassium  मेटल  has only a few special applications , being replaced in most chemical reactions with  सोडियम  metal  .
पोटैशियम  ions are necessary for  the   फलन  of all living  कोशिकाएं  .
पोटैशियम  ion  diffusion  is  a   कुंजी   यांत्रिकी  in nerve transmission  ,  and potassium depletion in  पशु  ,  सहित  humans , results in various cardiac  डिस्फंक्शन   .
Potassium  accumulates  in plant cells  ,  and thus fresh fruits  और  vegetables are  a  good dietary source of  it  .
Conversely , most plants except  विशेषज्ञ  halophytes are intolerant  of  salt  ,  and sodium is  उपस्थित  in them only  in  low concentration .
This resulted  in  potassium  पहला  being  पृथक  from  potash  , the ashes of  पौधे  ,  giving  the element its name .
लिये  the same reason ,  भारी  crop  उत्पादन  rapidly depletes soils of potassium , and agricultural fertilizers consume  95  % of global potassium chemical production .
The Singapore dollar or dollar  (  sign  :  $ ; code :  sgd   )  is  the  official currency of Singapore .
It is normally  abbreviated   साथ  the dollar sign $ , or alternatively S  $  to distinguish it from  अन्य  dollar -denominated currencies  .
it  is divided  into  100  सेंट  .
the  Monetary Authority of  सिंगापुर  and  the  Brunei  करेंसी  and Monetary Board still maintain the historic exchangeability of their two currencies ,  the  Singaporean  डालर  and the Brunei dollar , respectively .
the  dollar is accepted  as   ``  customary  टेंडर   ''  in Brunei according  to  the Currency Interchangeability Agreement  .
Likewise ,  the  Brunei dollar is  customarily  accepted  in  Singapore
James  सैमुएल  Coleman ( May 12 , 1926  –  March 25 , 1995 ) was an American sociologist , theorist and empirical researcher  ,  based chiefly  at  the University of Chicago  .
He was elected president  of  the American Sociological Association .
Coleman studied the sociology of education  ,  public policy  ,  and was one of the  earliest  users of the term ``  सोशल   पूंजी   ``  .
His Foundations of Social Theory influenced  समाजशास्त्रीय  theory .
His The  adolescent   समाज   (   1961  ) and `` Coleman  रपट  ''  (  Equality of Educational Opportunity , 1966 ) were  दो  of the  सबसे  heavily  cited  books in  शैक्षणिक   समाजशास्त्र   .
The landmark Coleman Report  helped  transform  शैक्षणिक  theory , reshape national education  नीतियों  , and influenced  पब्लिक   और  scholarly opinion regarding  the   भूमिका  of schooling in determining  समता   और   उत्पादकता  in the United States .
Superman ( from DC comics  )  was the first superhero created , art by Jim Lee .
A superhero ( sometimes  rendered  super-hero  or  super hero  )   is  a type of stock character possessing `` extraordinary or  superhuman   शक्तियां  '' and dedicated to protecting the public .
Since the debut of  the  prototypical superhero Superman in 1938 , stories of superheroes—ranging  इससे   ब्रैड  episodic  adventures  to continuing years-long sagas—have dominated American comic  किताबे  and crossed over  into  other  मीडिया  .
The word itself dates to at  तनिक   1917  .
A female superhero  is  sometimes called a superheroine ( also rendered super-heroine or super heroine  )  .
``  सुपर  HEROES '' is a trademark co-owned  by  DC Comics  और  Marvel Comics .
By most definitions , characters do not strictly require actual  superhuman  powers to be deemed superheroes , although terms  ऐसे  as  costumed   अपराधों  fighters or masked vigilantes  हैं   sometimes   प्रयुक्त  to refer to those such as Batman and Green Arrow without such  शक्तियां  who share  अन्य  common superhero traits .
Such characters were generally referred to as `` mystery men '' in the so-called Golden Age of Comic Books to distinguish them from characters with  super-powers   .
Normally , superheroes use their powers to counter day-to-day crime while also combating threats against  मानवता   by  supervillains , their  दण्ड  counterparts .
Often  ,   एक  of these supervillains  होगा   be   the  superhero 's archenemy  .
As well , some longrunning superheroes , such as Superman  ,   बैटमैन  , Spider-Man and  आयरन   man  each has  a  rogues  दीर्घा   of  enemies  .
as  well , superheroes sometimes will combat such irregular  खतरे  as aliens , magical/ fantasy  entities  , American  युद्ध  enemies  ऐसे  as nazism or communism , and godlike or demonic creatures  .

The Shawshank Redemption is  a  1994 American  नाटक  film written and directed  by  Frank Darabont  और   अभिनीत  Tim Robbins and  मॉर्गन  Freeman .
adapted  from the Stephen  किंग  novella Rita Hayworth and Shawshank Redemption , the film tells the story of  एंडी  Dufresne  ,  a banker who spends nearly two decades in Shawshank State Prison  लिये  the  हत्या  of  उसके  wife and  उसके  lover despite his claims  of  innocence .
During his time at the  थाना  ,  he  befriends  a  fellow inmate  ,  Ellis Boyd `` Red '' Redding , and finds himself protected  by  the guards after  the  warden  begins  using him in his money laundering operation  .
Despite a  गुनगुने  box office reception that barely  recouped  its budget , the film  प्राप्त  favorable reviews from critics , multiple award nominations  ,  and  रै   चूंकि  enjoyed  a   उल्लेखनीय  life  on  cable television ,  vhs  , DVD , and Blu-ray .
It was included in the American  फिल्मी  Institute  's   100   सालो  ... 100 Movies 10th Anniversary Edition  .
IT management is the discipline  whereby   सब  of the technology resources of a firm  हैं  managed in accordance with  इसके  needs and priorities  .
ये  resources may include  ठोस   निवेश   जैसे  computer hardware  ,  software , data , networks and data  केन्द्र   सुविधाएं   ,  as well  as   the  staffs who are  नियुक्त  to maintain them  .
Managing  इस  responsibility within a company entails many of the basic  प्रबन्धन  functions , like budgeting , staffing , and organizing and controlling  ,  along with other aspects that  हैं  unique to technology ,  जैसे  change management , software design , network planning ,  तकनीक  support etc .
the  Penitentiary of  नई  Mexico Prison Riot  ,  which took place on February  2  and  3  , 1980 , in the state 's maximum security prison  दक्षिण   of  Santa Fe ,  थी   एक  of the most violent prison riots  in  the history of the American correctional system : 33 inmates  died  and more than 200 inmates were treated  लिये   चोटों   .
None of  the  12  अधिकारियों  taken hostage were killed , but  सात   यहूद   treated  for injuries caused by beatings and rapes .
This was the third major riot at  the  NM State Penitentiary  ,  the first occurring on 19 July 1922 and the second on 15  जून  1953 .
Author Roger Morris suggests the death toll may have been higher , as a number of bodies  यहूद  incinerated or dismembered during  the  course of  the   mayhem  .

For the plant Erythrina herbacea , see Coral  सेम  .
The Northern Cardinal ( Cardinalis cardinalis ) is a  उत्तर   अमरीकी  bird  in  the genus Cardinalis ; it is also known  colloquially  as the redbird or common cardinal  .
it  can  be  found in southern Canada  ,  through the eastern United States from  maine  to Texas and south through Mexico .
it  is found in woodlands  ,  gardens ,  shrublands  ,  और  swamps .
The  उत्तरी  Cardinal is a mid-sized songbird with a body length of 21  सेंटीमीटर   (   8.3   इंच  )  .
It has a  distinctive  crest  on  the head and  a  mask on the face which is black in the male and gray in the female .
The male is a vibrant  रेड  , while the female is a dull red-brown shade .
The Northern Cardinal  is  mainly granivorous , but  भी  feeds on  कीट  and fruit .
The male  behaves  territorially , marking out his territory with  सोंग  .
During  प्रेमालाप  , the male feeds seed to the  मादा  beak-to-beak .
a  clutch of  तीन   to  four eggs is laid  ,  and two to four clutches are  उत्पादित   प्रत्येक  year .
It was once prized as a pet , but  इसके   बिक्री  as cage  पक्षियों  is now banned in the United States by the Migratory Bird Treaty Act of 1918  .
Surface  runoff  ,  भी  called nonpoint  सोर्स  pollution , from a  फार्म  field in  आयोवा  during a rain storm .
Topsoil as well as farm fertilizers and  अन्य  potential pollutants run  बंद  unprotected farm fields when heavy rains occur .
Topsoil is  the   अपर  ,  outermost   परत   of  soil , usually the top to .
It  रै   the  highest concentration of organic matter and  microorganisms  and is where most of the Earth 's biological soil activity occurs  .
Musical cryptogram : `` Aschbeg '' set in Schoenberg 's Sechs kleine Klavierstücke  ,   op  . 19 ,  no  . 1 , m. 5 .
Note that the notes  do  not come  in   स्पेलिंग  order  लकिन  are all adjacent ( not separated by other notes ) .
Sechs kleine Klavierstücke , Op  .  19 (  or  Six Little Piano Pieces  )   is   a  set of  टुकड़े  for solo piano written by the Austrian composer Arnold Schoenberg , published in 1913 .
McAfee , Inc. ( ) is an American global computer security software  कम्पनी  headquartered in Santa Clara  ,  California  ,  and the world 's  largest  dedicated security  प्रौद्योगिकी  company  .
as   of  February 28 , 2011  ,  McAfee is  a  wholly owned subsidiary of Intel .
McAfee 's  प्रतिस्पर्धी  in the antivirus  उद्योग  are  avira  ,  bitdefender  , BullGuard ,  f-secure  , Frisk , Kaspersky , Symantec , and  ट्रेंड  Micro to  नाम  a few  .
Saint Rita of  cascia  ( Born Margherita  lotti  1381 - May 22 , 1457 ) was an Italian Augustinian nun , widow and saint venerated in the Roman Catholic Church .
रीता  was married at an early age .
The marriage lasted for 18 years , during which she is remembered for her Christian values as a model wife and mother who made efforts to convert  उसके  husband from his abusive behavior .
Upon  the  murder of her husband by  another  feuding family , she sought to dissuade her sons from revenge .
वो  subsequently joined an  augustinian   जातियाँ  of  धार्मिक  sisters  ,   जहाँ   वो  was known for practicing mortification of the  flesh  ,  साथ  with  the  apparent efficacy of  उसके  prayers .
St. Rita is venerated due to various miracles attributed to her intercession , and is often portrayed  साथ  a bleeding wound  on  her forehead , which the Roman  कैथोलिक  Church claims to have been  a  partial  stigmata  .
The Roman Catholic Church ,  अंतर्गत  the pontificate of Pope Leo XIII officially canonized Rita on  may   24   ,  1900 ,  जबकि  her feast  दिन  is celebrated every May 22 .
In  अनेक  pious Catholic countries  ,  Rita is known to  be  a patroness for abused wives  और  mourning  महिलाओं   .
North America  is  a continent  wholly  within the Northern  गोलार्ध  and almost wholly within the Western Hemisphere  .
It is also considered a northern subcontinent of the Americas .
It is bordered to  the  north by the Arctic  समंदर   ,  to  the   ईस्ट  by the Atlantic Ocean , to the west and south  by  the Pacific Ocean , and to  the  southeast by South  अमेरिका  and the Caribbean Sea .
North America covers an area of about  24,709,000  square kilometers  (   9,540,000  square miles ) , about 4.8  %  of the planet 's surface or about 16.5  %  of its land area .
as  of July 2008 , its population  थी  estimated at nearly 529 million people  आरपार  23 independent states , representing about  7.5  % of  the  human population .
North America is the third-largest continent in area ,  following  Asia and Africa , and  the  fourth in population after Asia , Africa , and  यूरोपीय  .
The first people  to  live in North America  यहूद   paleoindians  who began to arrive  दौरान   the  last glacial period by crossing the Bering land bridge .
They differentiated into a number  of  diverse cultures  और  communities across the continent .
the  largest and most advanced Pre-Columbian  सभ्यताओं   in  North America were the  aztecs   in   कया  is now Mexico and the Mayans  in   सेंट्रल  America .
European  colonists  began to arrive  starting  in  the   16th  and 17th centuries  ,  wiping  आउट  large numbers of the  देशी   populations  and beginning an era of European  दबदबा  .
Jermaine Lamarr Cole ( born January 28 , 1985  )  , better known  by   उसके   स्टेज  name J. Cole , is  an  American hip-hop recording artist and record producer from Fayetteville , North  कैरोलिना  .
In 2009  ,   he  became the first artist  to  sign to Jay-Z 's  आरओसी   स्वदेश  label .
His  long-awaited  debut album ,  हकदार  Cole World  :   the  Sideline Story , was released on September 27 , 2011 .
The album debuted  at  number one  on   the  US Billboard 200 , Top R  &  B Albums and  शीर्ष  Rap Albums chart , selling more than 218,000  in   इसके  first  सप्ताह   .
He received  a  nomination for Best New Artist  at   the  54th Grammy Awards .
The two main characters of the series , Ratchet  (  right  )  and Clank ( left )  .
Ratchet & Clank is a series of platform video  खेल   .
The franchise was created and  विकसित  by Insomniac Games and  प्रकाशित  by Sony Computer Entertainment for  अनेक  different PlayStation consoles , such as PlayStation  2  and PlayStation 3 with  the   exclusion  of  आकार   matters  and  रहस्य   एजेंट  Clank , which were developed by High  प्रभाव  Games for the PlayStation Portable .
प्रत्येक  game in the series has been released for every console , as the  ip  is owned by Sony Computer  entertainment  .
an  animated  विशेषता   फिल्मी  adaptation produced by  rainmaker   entertainment  and Blockade Entertainment is scheduled for a theatrical release sometime in  2015   .
The games take  प्लेस  in a science fiction setting and follow the adventures of Ratchet ( an animalistic human-like character known  as   a   lombax  , who is a mechanic ) and  clank  ( a diminutive  ,  sentient  रोबोट  ) as they travel through the universe , saving it from evil forces  on  a regular basis .
The series is noted  लिये  the inclusion of  अनेक  exotic and unique ,  over   the  top weapons and devices  ,  a concept that Insomniac  खेल  also expanded into their other games .
A will  or  testament  is  a legal declaration by which a person , the testator , names one or more persons to  मैनेज  his/her estate  और   provides  for the  ट्रांसफ़र  of his property at  मौत  .
For the devolution of property not disposed of by  होगा  , see inheritance  और  intestacy .
In the  strictest  sense , a `` will '' has historically been limited to  रियल  property while `` testament '' applies only to dispositions of  निजी  property ( thus giving rise to the  लोकप्रिय   शीर्षक  of the document as ``  पिछला  Will and Testament ''  )  , though this distinction is seldom observed today .
A  होगा  may also create  a  testamentary trust that is effective only  बाद  the death of the testator  .
the  19.9  mw  Gemasolar solar plant  in  Spain features 15 hours of storage and can supply  शक्ति  24 hours a day .
Solar  उर्जा  ,  रौशन  light and heat from  the  sun ,  रै  been harnessed  by  humans since  प्राचीन  times using a range of ever-evolving  technologies  .
Solar energy technologies  शामिल  solar heating , solar photovoltaics , solar thermal electricity  ,  solar architecture and  कृत्रिम  photosynthesis , which can  मेक  considerable contributions to solving some of the most urgent energy problems the  संसार  now faces  .
सौर  technologies  हैं  broadly characterized as either passive solar or active solar depending on the  रास्ता   वे  capture ,  बदलें  and  वितरित  solar energy .
Active solar techniques include the use  of  photovoltaic panels and  सौर  thermal collectors to harness the energy .
Passive solar techniques include orienting  a  building to the Sun , selecting materials with favorable thermal mass or light  dispersing  properties , and designing spaces that naturally circulate air .
In 2011 , the International Energy Agency said  कि  `` the development of affordable , inexhaustible and clean solar energy technologies will have  विशाल   longer-term  benefits .
It will increase  countries’   उर्जा  security through reliance on  an  indigenous , inexhaustible and mostly import-independent resource  ,  enhance sustainability  ,  reduce pollution , lower  the   लागत  of mitigating  जलवायु  change , and  रखना  fossil fuel  कीमतें  lower than  वरना   .
ये  advantages  हैं   वैश्विक  .
Hence the additional costs of the incentives for early deployment should be considered learning investments ;  वे  must be  बुद्धिमानी  spent  और  need to be  widely  shared '' .
Sir Thomas More ( ; 7 February 14786 July 1535  )  , known to Roman  catholics  as Saint Thomas More  चूंकि  1935 , was  an  English lawyer ,  सोशल  philosopher ,  लेखक  , statesman , and noted Renaissance humanist .
he  was an important councillor to Henry VIII  of  England and was Lord Chancellor from October 1529 to 16 May 1532 .
He was canonized  by  Pope  पायस  XI in 1935 as one of the  जल्दी   शहीदो  of the schism that  अलग  the Church  of   इंग्लैण्ड  from Rome in the 16th century .
in  2000 , Pope John Paul  ii  declared him patron  of   कैथोलिक  statesmen and  राजनेता   .
More was an  प्रतिद्वन्दी  of the Protestant Reformation , in  particular  of Martin Luther and  विलियम  Tyndale .
However  ,  since  1980  ,  he  is also commemorated by the  गिरिजाघर   of  England  as  a reformation martyr .
More  coined   the  word `` utopia  ``  – a name he gave to the ideal and imaginary  द्वीप  nation , the political system  of  which he  वर्णित  in  यूटोपिया   ,  published in 1516 .
He  opposed  the King 's separation from the  रोमन  Catholic Church and refused to accept  उसे  as Supreme  सिर  of the  गिरिजाघर  of England , a title which  था  been  दिए   by  parliament through  the  Act  of  Supremacy of 1534 .
He was imprisoned in 1534 for  उसके  refusal to take  the  oath required by the First Succession Act , because the act  disparaged  Papal Authority and Henry’s  विवाह  to Catherine  of  Aragon .
in   1535  , he was tried for treason  ,  convicted on perjured testimony  ,  and beheaded .
More also helped to originate the phrase `` grasp  at   लोभी  '' to mean  ``  desperately trying even  व्यर्थ  things '' , in his Dialogue of Comfort Against  tribulation  .
intellectuals  and statesmen across Europe were stunned by  अधिक  's execution .
Erasmus saluted him as one `` whose soul  थी  more pure than any snow , whose  प्रतिभाशाली   थी  such that England never had and never again will have its like '' .
There was  a  more controversial side to More 's life , because he advocated  the  persecution and execution of Protestants who refused to  recant  their faith .
however  , the judgement of history  रै  been largely willing to forgive this  in   लाइट  of  the  times  he   जिया  in and  उसके   शहादत  in the  रोमन  Catholic cause  .
Two  सदियां  later Jonathan  स्विफ्ट   कहा  More was `` the  व्यक्ति  of the greatest virtue this  किंगडम   कभी  produced  ''  , a sentiment with which Samuel Johnson agreed .
इतिहासकार  Hugh Trevor-Roper said  in   1977   कि  More was  ``  the first great Englishman whom we feel that we know ,  the  most saintly of humanists  ,  the  सबसे  human of saints ,  the   सार्वभौमिक  man of our  कूल  northern renaissance .  ''
Captain Nemo  ,  also known as Prince  dakkar   ,  is a  fictional  character  invented  by the French science fiction author Jules  वर्न  .
Nemo  appears   in  two of Verne 's novels , Twenty Thousand Leagues Under the Sea ( 1870 )  और  The Mysterious Island ( 1874 )  ,  and makes a cameo appearance in  वर्न   's  play Journey Through the Impossible  (  1882  )   .
Nemo , one  of  the most famous antiheroes in fiction ,  is  a mysterious  फिगर  .
The  बेटे  of an Indian Raja , he is a scientific genius who roams the depths  of  the  समुद्र  in his submarine  ,  the Nautilus ,  जिससे  was built on a  उजाड़  island  .
Nemo tries to  प्रोजेक्ट  a stern , controlled confidence , but  he  is driven  by  a thirst  लिये  vengeance and a hatred of imperialism ( particularly the British Empire  )   .
He is also wracked by remorse over the deaths of  उसके  crew members and  भी  by the  मौतों  of enemy sailors .
Nemo has appeared in  विभिन्न  adaptations of  वर्न   's  novels  ,  including films  ,   जहाँ  he has  महरूम   portrayed  by a number of  अलग  actors  .
He has  furthermore  been adopted by  अन्य  authors for inclusion in their  novels  , most notably in Alan Moore 's The League  of  Extraordinary Gentlemen and Philip José Farmer 's The Other Log of Phileas  fogg  .
Listed below  हैं   the  Major League  बेसबॉल  teams with the  बेहतरीन  season won-lost  रिकॉर्ड   in  history , as determined by  जीतना  percentage ( .700 or better ) , minimum 120  खेल   निभाई  .
Acoustic  coupler  modem
A modem  (  modulator-demodulator  )  is a device that modulates an analog  वाहक  signal to encode digital information , and also demodulates such a carrier signal to decode the transmitted information  .
The goal is to produce a signal that can be  transmitted   easily  and decoded to reproduce the  असली   डिजिटल  data .
Modems can be used over any means of transmitting analog signals , from light emitting diodes to radio .
the  most familiar example is a voice band modem that turns the  डिजिटल  data of a personal computer into modulated  विद्युत  signals in the voice  आवृत्ति  range  of  a telephone  चैनल  .
These signals can be transmitted over telephone lines  और  demodulated by another modem at the receiver side  to   रिकवर  the digital  आंकड़ा  .
Modems are generally classified by the  राशि  of data they  can  send  in  a given unit of  समय  , usually expressed in  बिट्स  per second (  bit/s   ,   or  bps  )  , or bytes per second (  b/s  ) .
Modems  can  alternatively be classified  by  their symbol rate , measured in baud .
The  baud  unit denotes symbols per second , or the number of times per second the modem  भेजना  a new signal  .
For example , the ITU V.21 standard used  ऑडियो  frequency shift keying  साथ  two  संभावित  frequencies  सम्बन्धित  to two distinct symbols ( or  एक  bit per  प्रतीक   )   ,  to  carry  300 bits  प्रति   दूसरी  using 300  baud  .
By contrast , the  असली  ITU V.22 standard ,  जिससे   थी  able to transmit and receive four distinct  प्रतीकों   (   दो  bits per symbol ) , handled 1,200  bit/s   by  sending 600  प्रतीकों  per second  (  600 baud ) using  phase  shift keying .
The Declaration of Independence is  a  statement adopted by the Continental Congress on July 4 , 1776 ,  जिससे  announced that the thirteen American colonies , then at war with Great Britain , regarded themselves as independent  राज्य  , and no  longer  a part of  the  British Empire .
Instead  वे  now formed a new nation—the  संयुक्त  States of America .
जॉन   एडम्स  was  a  leader in pushing  लिये   स्वतंत्रता  , which  थी   unanimously  approved on July 2 .
a  committee had already drafted  the  formal declaration , to be ready when  कॉंग्रेस  voted  on  independence .
Adams persuaded the committee to select Thomas Jefferson to compose  the  original draft of the document , which congress  होता  edit  to  produce  the  final  संस्करण  .
The Declaration was ultimately  a  formal explanation  of  why Congress had  voted  on July 2 to declare independence from Great Britain , more than a year after the  outbreak  of the American Revolutionary War .
The national birthday  ,  the Independence Day is celebrated on July 4 , although Adams wanted July 2  .
After  ratifying   the   टेक्स्ट  on July 4 , Congress issued the  घोषणा  of Independence  in  several  फ़ॉर्म  .
It was initially published as  the  printed Dunlap broadside that was widely distributed and read to  the  public .
The most famous version of the  घोषणा  , a  हस्ताक्षरित  copy that is popularly  regarded  as  the  Declaration of Independence , is displayed at  the  National Archives in Washington ,  d.c  .
Although the wording  of  the Declaration was approved on  जुलाई  4 , the date  of  its signing was August 2 .
the  original July  4   संयुक्त  States Declaration of Independence  पाण्डुलिपि   थी  lost while all other copies  have  been derived from this original document  .
The sources and interpretation of the Declaration have been  the   विषय  of much scholarly inquiry .
The  घोषणा  justified the independence  of  the United States by listing colonial grievances against  किंग  George III ,  और  by asserting certain natural and legal rights , including  a  right of revolution .
Having  परोसा  its original purpose in announcing independence , the text  of  the Declaration was  initially  ignored  बाद  the American Revolution .
Since then , it has come to be considered a  प्रमुख  statement on human rights , particularly its  दूसरी  sentence:
We hold these truths  to  be  self-evident  , that all men are  निर्मित   बराबर  , that they  हैं  endowed by their Creator with certain  unalienable  Rights  ,  that among these are Life  ,   स्वतंत्रता  and the  pursuit  of Happiness  .
इस  has  महरूम   पुकारा  ``  एक  of the best-known sentences in  the   अंग्रेज़ी  language '' , containing `` the most potent and consequential words in American history .  ''
The passage  आए  to represent a  moral  standard to which the United States  चाहिए  strive  .
This view was  notably  promoted by Abraham  lincoln  , who considered  the  Declaration to be the foundation of his political  दर्शनशास्त्र  , and argued that the Declaration is  a  statement of  सिद्धान्त  through which the  संयुक्त  States Constitution should be interpreted .
It has inspired work for the rights of  अधिकारहीन   लोगों  throughout the world .
The  अर्थव्यवस्था   of  Greenland can be characterized as small ,  मिश्रित   और  vulnerable .
The present economy consists of a big  पब्लिक  sector and comprehensive foreign  व्यापार  ,  जिससे  has resulted in an economy with periods  of  strong  विकास  , considerable  महंगाई  , unemployment  समस्याएं  and  चरम  dependence  on  capital inflow from Denmark and  उपयोग  of outside , mainly Danish , skilled labor .
GDP per capita  is  similar to the average European economies but  the  economy is critically dependent  upon  substantial  support  from the Danish government , which supplies about half the revenues  of  the home rule government who  in  turn employ about 8,000  greenlanders  out of a labor force of 40,156 ( Jan. 2012 )  .
बेरोजगारी  nonetheless  remains  high , with the rest of the economy dependent upon demand for exports  of  shrimp and fish .
Hydrogen is a  रासायनिक  element with  प्रतीक  H and atomic number 1  .
With an atomic weight of ( for hydrogen-1 ) , hydrogen is the  lightest   तत्व  and its monatomic form (  h1  ) is the most abundant chemical  पदार्थ  ,  constituting  roughly 75 % of the  ब्रह्मांड  's  baryonic  mass  .
non-   remnant  stars are mainly composed of hydrogen in its  प्लाज्मा  state  .
At standard temperature and pressure , hydrogen is a colorless , odorless ,  tasteless  ,  non-toxic  , nonmetallic , highly combustible  diatomic  gas with the molecular  सूत्र  H2  .
Most of the hydrogen on  धरती  is in molecules such as  जल  and organic compounds  क्युकी  hydrogen  readily  forms  covalent  compounds  साथ  most  non-metallic  elements .
Hydrogen plays  a  particularly  महत्वपूर्ण  role  in  acid-base chemistry with many reactions exchanging protons between soluble molecules  .
In ionic compounds  ,  it can take a negative charge ( an anion known as a hydride  और  written  as  H−  )  , or  as  a positively charged species H+ .
The latter  cation  is written as  हालांकि  composed of a  bare  proton , but  in  reality , hydrogen cations in ionic  यौगिकों  always occur as more complex species  .
The most common  समस्थानिक   of   हाइड्रोजन  is protium ( name  rarely  used , symbol 1H  )  with a single proton and no neutrons .
As the  सरलतम  atom known ,  the  hydrogen atom has been of theoretical use  .
For  उदाहरण   ,  as  the  only  न्यूट्रल  atom with an  analytic  solution to the Schrödinger equation  ,  the study of the  energetics  and bonding  of  the hydrogen atom played a key role in the development of quantum mechanics .
Hydrogen  गैस  was first artificially  उत्पादित  in the early 16th century ,  via  the  mixing   of  metals  साथ   acids  .
In 1766–81 , Henry Cavendish was the first to recognize that hydrogen gas was a discrete substance  ,  and that it produces water when burned  ,   a  property which later  दिया  it its name  :   in  Greek  ,  hydrogen  अर्थात्  `` water-former '' .
औद्योगिक  production  is  mainly  इससे  the steam reforming of natural gas  ,   और   कम   प्रायः   इससे  more energy-intensive hydrogen production  विधि   जैसे  the electrolysis of water .
Most hydrogen is  employed  near its production site , with the two  largest  uses  होने  fossil fuel processing  (  e.g. ,  hydrocracking  )  और  ammonia production , mostly  लिये  the fertilizer market .
Hydrogen is a concern in metallurgy as it can embrittle  अनेक  metals  ,  complicating the  डिज़ाइन  of pipelines and  भंडार  tanks .
Unstoppable is a 2010 American  कार्रवाई  thriller film directed by Tony Scott  ,   लिखा   by   चिह्नित  Bomback , and starring Denzel Washington and  क्रिस   पाइन  .
The film  ,   loosely  based  on  the real-life CSX 8888 incident ,  tells   the  story of a runaway freight train ,  और  the two  मेन  ( Washington  और  Pine ) who  मैनेज  to  रोकें  it  .
It  थी   स्कॉट  's final  विशेषता  film  पहले   उसके  death in 2012  .
The film was released in the United States and Canada on November 12  ,  2010 , and in  the  United Kingdom on November 24  ,  2010  .
It received mostly favorable reviews from film  आलोचकों   ;  it garnered  a  ``  certified   भैस  '' rating on Rotten Tomatoes based upon aggregated  समीक्षाएँ  and  a  rating of ``  generally   अनुकूल  reviews ''  at   metacritic  .
The film  थी   मनोनीत   लिये  an Academy Award  लिये  Best Sound Editing  at   the  83rd Academy Awards  ,  but lost  to   inception  .
In photography ,  bracketing  is  the  general technique of taking several shots of the same subject using different camera settings  .
Bracketing is useful and often recommended in situations  कि  make it difficult to obtain a satisfactory image with a single shot , especially when a small variation  in  exposure parameters has a comparatively large  प्रभाव  on  the  resulting image .
Autobracketing is  स्वचालित  bracketing  by  using  a  setting on the camera to take  अनेक  bracketed  गोलियाँ  (  in  contrast  to  the  फ़ोटोग्राफ़र  altering the  जमावट  by hand between each shot  )  .
दिए  the time  it   takes  to accomplish multiple shots , it is typically , but not always  ,  used for static subjects .
Insulated glazing ( IG )  ,  more commonly known as double glazing ( or double-pane  ,  and increasingly  ट्रिपल  glazing/pane ) are double or triple glass window panes separated by an air or other gas filled space to reduce heat transfer  आरपार  a part  of  the building envelope .
Insulated Glass Units  हैं  manufactured with glass in range of  मोटाई  from 3 mm to  10   mm  or more in special applications .
laminated  or tempered glass may also be used as part of the construction  .
Most units are manufactured with the  वही  thickness  of  glass used  on   दोनो  panes but special applications  ऐसे  as acoustic attenuation or  सुरक्षा   may   आवश्यकता  wide ranges  of  thicknesses to be incorporated in the same unit  .
A sectioned  आरेख   of  a fixed Insulated Glazed Unit ( IGU  )  , indicating the  क्रमांकन  convention used  in   इस   आलेख  .
Surface  #  1 is  facing  outside , Surface #  2  is the  अंदर  surface of  the  exterior  फलक   ,   सतह   #  3 is the outside  सतह  of the interior pane ,  और  Surface # 4 is the  अंदर  surface of  आंतरिक  pane  .
The window frame is  labelled  # 5 , a  spacer  is  indicated  as # 6 ,  seals  are shown in  रेड   (  # 7 ) ,  the  internal reveal is on the right hand side  (  # 8 ) and the  exterior  windowsill  on  the left  (  #  9  )
To reduce  shear  effects on  the  sealed unit (  a  major cause  of  premature failure ) , manufacturers use a  नियम   of   अंगूठा  that  permits  a  अंतर  of 1 mm  between  the thickness of the panes of  कांच  used in the unit and still maintain the warranty for the unit .
For  उदाहरण  ,  a  unit may be ordered with a 4 mm pane on the exterior and a 3 mm  फलक  on the interior .
These variations are  अनुमत  for architectural  और  cost reasons .
Other combinations can be specified  और  produced but the manufacturer  may  reserve the  सही  to limit  the  term of the  वारंटी  or  इंकार  to warranty the  ईकाई  altogether  .
For ease of description the surfaces  of  a double paned unit are named according  to  the following convention : Surface # 1 ( facing outside  )  ,  सतह  # 2  (  inside of outside pane ) , Surface # 3 ( outside of inside pane ) and  सतह  # 4  (  inside surface of inside  फलक   )  .
Applying the corresponding nomenclature  लिये  triple paned units  परिणाम   in   सतहों  # 1  through  # 6  .
the  performance of insulating glazing can be modified through  the  use  of   the  following:
a   ठेठ  installation of insulated  glazing   खिड़कियाँ  with uPVC window frames .
Selenium is a chemical element with symbol Se and atomic number 34 .
It is a nonmetal  साथ  properties that are  इंटरमीडिएट  between those of its periodic table  column-adjacent  chalcogen elements sulfur  और  tellurium .
It  rarely   occurs  in its elemental state  in  nature , or as pure ore compounds .
Selenium  (  Greek σελήνη selene meaning ``  चंद्रमा  ''  )  was discovered in 1817  by  Jöns Jacob Berzelius  ,   जो  noted the  समानता  of the  नई  element to  the  previously-known tellurium ( named for the Earth )  .
सेलेनियम   is  found impurely in metal sulfide ores  ,  where it  partially  replaces  the  sulfur .
Commercially , selenium is produced as a byproduct  in   the  refining  of  these  ores   ,  most often during copper  उत्पादन  .
खनिज  that are pure selenide or selenate compounds are known , but  हैं  rare .
The chief  वाणिज्यिक   उपयोग  for selenium today are in glassmaking and in pigments .
Selenium is a  सेमीकंडक्टर  and  is  used in photocells .
Uses in  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स   ,   एकबार  important ,  have  been mostly  supplanted  by  सिलिकॉन  semiconductor devices .
Selenium continues to  be  used in a few types of DC power surge protectors and one type  of  fluorescent quantum dot .
सेलेनियम  salts are toxic in large amounts , but trace amounts are necessary for cellular  फलन  in  अनेक  organisms  ,  including all  पशु  .
सेलेनियम  is a component of the antioxidant enzymes  glutathione  peroxidase and thioredoxin  reductase  ( which indirectly reduce certain oxidized molecules in animals and some plants ) .
It is also  मिला  in three deiodinase enzymes , which  बदलें   एक  thyroid hormone to another .
सेलेनियम  requirements in plants  differ  by species , with some plants requiring relatively large amounts , and  अन्य  apparently requiring none .
The United  राज्य  presidential  चुनाव  of 2008 was the 56th quadrennial presidential election .
it  was held on Tuesday , November 4 , 2008 .
Democrat Barack Obama  ,  then the junior  सीनेटर  from Illinois , defeated Republican John McCain  ,  the senior Senator from Arizona .
As  the  campaign progressed , the War  in  Iraq and outgoing Republican President George W.  बुश  had  become  increasingly unpopular ,  और   the  major-party candidates ran  on  a platform of change and reform .
Domestic  नीति  and the economy eventually emerged  as  the main themes in  the  last few months of the election campaign after the  onset  of the  worst  recession since  the  1930s .
ओबामा  would go  on  to  जीत  a decisive victory over McCain in both the  चुनावी  and popular vote .
Obama received  the   सबसे   मत  for a presidential candidate in American history  ,  and  जीती  the popular and  चुनावी  vote  by  the largest margin in 12 years  ,  as well as the  largest  percentage of the popular vote for a Democrat in  nearly   a  half-century .
This was the first U.S.  अध्यक्षीय  election in which an African American was elected , having also been  the  first  in  which  an  African American won  the  nomination of either  प्रमुख  party .
इस   चुनाव   थी  also notable for  होने  the first time  in  U.S. history that both major party candidates were  बैठे  U.S . Senators , only  the  third time ( after 1920 and 1960 ) that any sitting U.S . Senator was elected president , and only  the  second time that the winning President  और   वाइस  President  (  Obama and Biden  )   यहूद  both sitting U.S . Senators .
This was also the first election since  1952  in which neither of the major  पार्टियों  '  नामांकित   थी  the incumbent President or  वाइस  President .
The  sovereign  Prince  or  Princess  of  Monaco  is  the reigning monarch and head of state of the Principality of  मोनाको   .
All princes or  राजकुमारियों   have  officially taken the name of  the  House of Grimaldi , but have belonged to various other houses  (  Goyon de Matignon , Polignac ) in  पुरूष  line .
The reigning Prince is Albert II .
Visualization of fragmentation  और   तब   of  defragmentation
in  the  मेंटेनेंस  of  संचिका  systems  ,   defragmentation  is a process that  reduces  the amount of fragmentation .
It does this by  physically   आयोजन   the   सामग्री  of the mass storage device used  to   स्टोर   फाइलें  into the smallest number of contiguous regions (  fragments  ) .
It also attempts to create larger regions of free space using compaction to impede the return of fragmentation .
Some defragmentation utilities try to keep smaller files within a single directory together , as  वे  are  प्रायः   पहुँचा   in  sequence .
Defragmentation is advantageous and relevant to file  प्रणालियों  on electromechanical disk  ड्राइव  .
The movement of  the  hard drive  's  read/write heads over different areas of the disk when accessing fragmented files is slower , compared to accessing  the   संपूर्ण  contents of a non-fragmented  संचिका  sequentially without  चलती  the read/write heads to seek other fragments .
A service-level agreement ( SLA )  is   a   भाग  of a service contract where a service is formally defined .
In practice , the term  sla  is  sometimes  used to refer  to  the  contracted  delivery time ( of  the   सेवा  or  प्रदर्शन  ) .
As  an  example , internet  सेवा   प्रदाताओं  will  commonly  include service level agreements within the terms of their contracts with  ग्राहक  to define the  स्तर  ( s ) of  सेवा  being sold in plain language terms .
In this case the  sla  will typically have a technical definition in terms  of  mean time between  असफलताओं  ( MTBF ) , mean  समय   to  repair or mean time  to  recovery  (  MTTR ) ; various data rates  ;  throughput ; jitter ; or similar measurable details .
Union Station is a former shopping mall in Union City  ,  Georgia  ,  in southwest  मैट्रो  Atlanta adjacent to Interstate 85 .
After  नई  ownership  और  renovations in 2006 , the  नाम  was  बदला   इससे  Shannon Southpark Mall  in  2007 to  संघ  Station Mall .
A previous renovation  थी  done in  the  late  1990s  .
The mall has  महरूम  closed since November  2010  .
इस  map shows the  संलग्न  United  राज्य  and ,  in  insets at the lower left ,  the   दो  states that  हैं   नहीं  contiguous  .
the  contiguous  संयुक्त  States  हैं  the 48 adjoining U.S. states  on  the continent of North  अमेरिका  that are  दक्षिण  of Canada and north of Mexico  ,  plus the District  of  Columbia .
The term excludes the  राज्य  of  अलास्का  and Hawaii  ,   और  all off-shore U.S. territories and possessions , such as Puerto Rico .
Together ,  the   48  contiguous states and D.C. occupy  a  combined  क्षेत्रफल   of   ,  which is 1.58 % of the total surface area  of  the Earth .
Of this , is land , composing  83.65   %  of U.S. land area .
Officially  ,   is  water area , composing 62.66 % of the  स्वदेश  's water area .
The  2010  census population was  306,675,006  ,  composing  99.33 % of the nation  's   जनसांख्यिकी  ,  और  a density of  103.639  inhabitants/sq mi ( 40.015/km2 ) , compared to  87.264/sq  mi  (  33.692/km2 ) for  the  nation as a whole .
`` Why '' is the title  of   a   सोंग  recorded by  अमरीकी  country band Rascal Flatts .
It  is   the  third  सिंगल   इससे   उनके  sixth studio album ,  अजेय  .
It was released to radio stations on  सितंबर   29  ,  2009  and debuted at # 44 on the U.S  .  Billboard US Billboard Hot Country Songs chart for the week  of  October 10 ,  2009  .
It was written  by  Rob Mathes and  एलन   shamblin  .
Utilization  प्रबन्धन  is the evaluation of  the  appropriateness , medical need and efficiency of  स्वास्थ्य  care  सेवाएं  procedures and facilities according to established  मापदण्ड  or guidelines  और  under the provisions of an applicable  स्वास्थ्य   लाभ  plan  .
Typically it includes  नई  activities or  निर्णय   आधारित  upon the analysis of a case .
Utilization management  describes  proactive procedures ,  सहित   निर्वहन   नियोजन  , concurrent planning , pre-certification and clinical case  appeals  .
It also covers proactive processes  ,  such as concurrent clinical reviews and peer reviews , as well as appeals  introduced  by the provider , payer or patient .
As  pre-certification  and concurrent review of cases grew , utilization management spun out of utilization review .
जबकि  not synonymous , health care professionals tend to use  the  terms as interchangeable .
The difference is utilization  प्रबन्धन   is  and intends  to  manage health care cases efficiently and cost  effectively  before  और  during  स्वास्थ्य  care administration .
Utilization review  is  more considering whether  स्वास्थ्य  care  थी  appropriately  लागू   बाद  it was administered .
There are four basic techniques  in  utilization management:
Demand Management
Utilization Review
Case  प्रबन्धन
बीमारी  Management
The Outsiders is a  coming-of-age   अनोखा  by  S.  E.  hinton  , first published in 1967 by Viking Press .
Hinton was 15 when she started writing the novel , but did  सबसे  of the work when she  थी  sixteen and a junior in high school .
hinton  was  18  when the  किताब  was published .
The book  फ़ॉलो  two rival  समूह  ,  the  Greasers and the Socs  (  pronounced by the author  as  , short for Socials  )   ,  who are divided by their socioeconomic  औकात  .
the  book takes place in Tulsa , Oklahoma , in  1965   ,  but it is never stated in  the  book .
a  film  अनुकूलन  was  उत्पादित  in 1983 , and a little-known  short-lived  television series appeared in  1990  , picking up where the movie left off .
The  संयुक्त  States House  of  Representatives is one  of  the two houses  of  the United States Congress  (  a bicameral legislature )  .
It  is  frequently referred to as the House .
the   अन्य  house  is   the  Senate .
The composition and powers of the House  हैं  established  in   आलेख  One of the United States Constitution .
The major  शक्ति  of the House is  to  pass federal legislation that affects the  संपूर्ण   देश  although its bills must also be passed by  the  Senate and  further  agreed to by the U.S. President before becoming law ( unless both  the   हाउस  and Senate re-pass the legislation  साथ  a two-thirds majority  in  each chamber  )  .
The House has several exclusive powers : the power to initiate revenue  बिल्स  , to impeach officials  ,   और  to  elect  the U.S. President in  मामला  there is no majority in the Electoral College .
Each  u.S.  state is represented in the  हाउस   in   proportion  to its population but is entitled to  at   तनिक  one representative .
The most  populous   राज्य  ,  कैलिफ़ोर्निया   ,  currently has 53 representatives .
The total number of  मतदान  representatives is fixed by law at 435  .
Each representative serves for a two-year term .
The  स्पीकर  of the United States House  of  Representatives , who presides over the  कक्ष  , is  निर्वाचित  by the members  of   the  House  ,  and is  इसलिए  traditionally the  नेता  of the House  लोकतांत्रिक   caucus  or the  हाउस  Republican  सम्मेलन  , whichever party has more voting members .
The House meets in  the  south wing of the  संयुक्त  States Capitol .
A  सप्लाई  chain is actually a complex and dynamic  सप्लाई   और  demand network .
( cf . Wieland/Wallenburg , 2011 )
A supply chain is a system  of   संगठन  ,  लोगों  , activities , information , and resources  शामिल  in moving a product or service  इससे  supplier to customer .
Supply chain activities transform natural  संसाधन  , raw materials , and components into a finished product that is delivered to  the  end  ग्राहक  .
in  sophisticated supply chain systems , used products may re-enter the supply chain at any point where  अवशेष   मान  is recyclable  .
Supply  जंजीरों  link value chains  .
``  Purple Haze '' is a  सोंग   लिखा  and recorded  by  Jimi Hendrix  in  1967 , released as the second single  by  The  जिमि  Hendrix  अनुभव  in both the  संयुक्त  Kingdom and the United States .
It later appeared  on  the American  संस्करण  of  the  band 's 1967 album  हैं  You Experienced .
`` Purple  haze  ''  रै   become  one of the  ``  archetypical psychedelic drug songs of the sixties '' .
``  Purple Haze 's ''  गिटार  virtuosic techniques would  be  emulated by many  मेटल  guitarists .
a   बंद  up picture of a rhinoceros skin .
Skin is the soft outer  covering  of vertebrates .
अन्य   एनिमल   छतरियाँ  such as the arthropod exoskeleton  have  different developmental origin , structure and chemical  संयोजन  .
The  क्रियाशील   cutaneous   अर्थात्  `` of the skin '' ( from Latin cutis , skin ) .
in   स्तनधारियों  , the skin is the largest  अंग   of  the integumentary system made up of multiple layers of ectodermal tissue , and guards the underlying muscles  ,  bones  ,  ligaments and internal organs .
Skin of  a  different  प्रकृति  exists in  amphibians  , reptiles , and birds .
All mammals  have  some hair on their skin  ,   भी  marine mammals which appear to be hairless .
the  skin interfaces  साथ  the environment and is the first line of defense from  बाह्य  factors .
For example , the skin  plays  a key role in protecting the body against pathogens and excessive water loss  .
इसके  other functions are insulation ,  तापमान   विनियमन  , sensation , and the production of vitamin D folates .
Severely damaged skin may heal by  forming  scar tissue .
इस  is sometimes discoloured and depigmented .
the   मोटाई  of skin also varies  इससे  location to location  on  an  सजीव  .
in   इंसानो  for  उदाहरण  , the skin located  अंतर्गत  the eyes and  around   the  eyelids is the thinnest  स्किन  in the body at  0.5  mm thick ,  और  is one of  the  first  क्षेत्रों  to show signs of aging such  as   ``  crows feet '' and wrinkles .
The skin on  the  palms and the soles of the feet  is  4 mm thick and the thickest skin in the body .
Fur  is  dense hair .
Primarily , fur augments the  इन्सुलेशन  the skin provides but  can  also  serve   as  a secondary sexual characteristic  or  as camouflage .
On some  पशु   ,  the skin is very hard and  मोटा  , and can be  processed  to create leather  .
Reptiles and fish have  मुश्किल  protective scales on their  स्किन  for protection ,  और  birds have  मुश्किल  feathers ,  सब  made of tough β- keratins .
उभयचर  skin is not a strong barrier to passage of chemicals and is often subject to osmosis and diffusive forces .
लिये   उदाहरण  , a  मेंढक  sitting in an anesthetic solution would be  sedated  quickly , as the chemical diffuses through its skin .
थामस  Scott
The Rev . Thomas Scott (  1747-1821  ) was  an  influential preacher and author  जो  is principally  ज्ञात  for his best-selling work A Commentary On The  पूरे  Bible and The Force of Truth ,  और  as one of the founders of the Church Missionary Society  .
डेनियल  Radcliffe  ,  who portrays Harry Potter  ,  has been the icon of the film  श्रेणी   चूंकि   the  release of the first film in 2001  .
Some of the most renowned actors  of   the  United Kingdom and Ireland have voiced or portrayed  वर्ण  appearing  in  the Harry Potter film series based on the book series by J. K. Rowling  .
Daniel Radcliffe , Rupert Grint and Emma Watson have played Harry Potter , Ron Weasley and Hermione Granger in all the films .
When they were cast only  radcliffe  had previously acted in a  फिल्मी  .
Complementing them on  स्क्रीन  are such actors as Helena Bonham  कार्टर  , Jim Broadbent ,  जॉन  Cleese , Robbie Coltrane , Warwick Davis ,  ralph  Fiennes , Michael Gambon  ,  Brendan Gleeson , Richard Griffiths , Richard Harris ,  जॉन  Hurt  ,  Jason Isaacs  ,  Miriam Margolyes ,  हेलेन  McCrory , Gary Oldman , Alan  rickman  ,  फिओना   शॉ  , Maggie  स्मिथ  , Timothy Spall  ,   imelda  Staunton , David Thewlis  ,  Emma Thompson ,  और  Julie  walters  , among others .
Thirteen actors have appeared  as  the same  अक्षर  in all eight films of the franchise .
Some well-known British actors who have not appeared in  the  series  ,  are asked  in  jest why they have not  महरूम  cast .
जब  David Yates was directing  the   पांचवां   फिल्मी   ,  Bill Nighy , who had previously collaborated with Yates on three  of  his television projects ,  कहा  that he  joked  with Yates  कि  maybe now he would n't  be  the only actor in England  जो  had n't been in Harry Potter .
`` But nobody called '' ,  nighy  added  .
But in 2009 ,  येट्स  cast Nighy as  मंत्री  of Magic Rufus Scrimgeour  in  Deathly Hallows .
Nighy said , ``  i   am  no longer the only  अंग्रेज़ी  actor  नहीं  to be  in  Harry Potter  और  I  am   बहुत  pleased . ''
Jude Law has quipped , `` Nobody 's asked me  .
I was a bit too old for Harry  ''  .
When a reporter compared potions professor Horace  slughorn  's obsession with famous  names  to the  श्रेणी  ' connection to `` every notable British actor  ,  '' Jim  broadbent  , who  plays  Slughorn said , ``  खूब  ,  नहीं   प्रत्येक  actor gets invited .
I  जान  some who are still waiting  .  ''
With the exception  of  Chris Columbus , each  निदेशक  has had a cameo appearance in his respective film : Alfonso Cuarón appears as  a   जादूगर   पकड़कर   a  candle  दौरान  a  झाँकी  at The Three Broomsticks in Prisoner of Azkaban ; Mike Newell is heard briefly as the radio presenter in Frank Bryce 's  हाउस   in  Goblet  of  Fire ; and  दाउद  Yates  सुविधाएँ  as a wizard within a magical moving portrait in  अनुक्रम  of  the   फीनिक्स  .
Producer David Heyman also  makes  a cameo appearance  as  a wizard featured within a magical  चलती  portrait in the third film , Prisoner of  azkaban  .
J. K. Rowling gave a speech during the world premiere  of  the final film  in  the series— Harry Potter and the Deathly  hallows  Part 2 —on  7  July 2011  in  London , England .
वो  announced that she  could   never  have dreamt of the  प्रतिभाशाली  actors and actresses who have appeared in  सब  the Harry Potter movies .
Rowling also  घोषित  that there are seven Harry  कुम्हार   फिल्मी   श्रेणी  cast members , who she refers to as `` The Big Seven  ''  , they  हैं   डेनियल  Radcliffe , Rupert  grint  , Emma  वाटसन  , Tom  felton  , Matthew  लुईस   ,  Evanna Lynch and Bonnie Wright  .

A twelve-step program is a set of guiding principles  (  accepted by members as 'spiritual principles  ,   '  based on the approved literature ) outlining a course  of  action for recovery  इससे  , compulsion , or other behavioral problems .
originally  proposed by Alcoholics Anonymous (  aa  ) as a method of recovery from alcoholism , the Twelve Steps were first  प्रकाशित  in  the   किताब  Alcoholics Anonymous : The Story of How More  than  One Hundred Men Have Recovered from Alcoholism in 1939  .
The method  थी  then adapted and became the foundation of other twelve-step programs .
As summarized by  the  American Psychological Association , the process involves  the  following:
admitting that  एक   can  not control one  's  addiction or compulsion ;
recognizing a  उच्चतर  power that can  दे  strength ;
examining past errors  साथ  the help of a  प्रायोजक  (  अनुभवी   सदस्य   )   ;
making amends for these errors ;
learning to live  a   नई  life with a new code  of   बर्ताव  ;
helping others who suffer from the same addictions or compulsions .
Witness impeachment  ,  in  the  law of  प्रमाण  of the United States  ,  is the  प्रक्रम  of  कॉलिंग  into question the credibility  of  an individual who  is  testifying  in  a trial .
The Federal  नियम  of Evidence contain the rules governing impeachment in federal courts  .
Party leaders and whips of the United States  हाउस  of Representatives are elected by their respective  पार्टियों   in  a closed-door caucus by  रहस्य  ballot  और  are  भी  known as floor leaders  .
The U.S. House of Representatives does not  officially  use the  पद  `` Minority  नेता  '' although the media  अक्सर  do .
The House instead  उपयोग   the  terms `` Republican  नेता  '' or ``  लोकतांत्रिक  Leader  ''  depending on which party holds a minority  of  seats .
The  वर्तमान  House Majority Leader is Republican  eric  Cantor , while the current House Minority Leader is Democrat Nancy Pelosi .
The current House Majority Whip is Republican Kevin McCarthy  ,  while the current House Minority Whip is Democrat  steny  Hoyer .
Following the  outbreak  of World War I in 1914 , the German Army opened the  पश्चिमी  Front  by  first invading Luxembourg  और  Belgium ,  तब  gaining military control  of  important industrial regions in France .
The tide of the  अग्रिम  was dramatically turned  साथ  the  बैटल  of the Marne .
Following the race to the  समुद्र  ,  दोनो   पहलू  dug in along a meandering  लकीर  of fortified trenches ,  stretching  from the North Sea  to  the Swiss frontier with France .
This line remained essentially unchanged for  सबसे   of  the war .
Between 1915 and 1917 there  यहूद  several major  offensives  along this front .
The attacks employed massive artillery bombardments and massed infantry advances .
However , a  संयोजन  of entrenchments , machine gun nests  ,  barbed wire  ,  and artillery repeatedly inflicted severe  हताहत  on the attackers and counterattacking defenders .
As a result , no significant  अग्रिम   यहूद  made .
Among  the  most costly of  ये  offensives were the Battle  of  Verdun with  a  combined [ estimated ] 700,000 dead , the Battle  of   the  Somme with more than [ an estimated ] million  हताहत  , and  the  Battle of Passchendaele  साथ  roughly [  an  estimated ] 600,000 casualties  .
In  an  effort to break the deadlock , this front saw the introduction of new military  प्रौद्योगिकी  , including poison  गैस  , aircraft and  टैंक  .
But it was only after the adoption of  improved  tactics that some degree of mobility was restored  .
The German Spring Offensive of  1918  was made  संभावित  by  the   सन्धि  of Brest-Litovsk that marked the end of the conflict  on  the Eastern  सामने  .
Using the recently-introduced infiltration tactics ,  the  German armies advanced nearly to the  वेस्ट   ,  which  चिह्नित  the  deepest   अग्रिम  by  either  side since  1914  and very nearly  succeeded  in forcing a breakthrough .
In spite of the generally  stagnant  nature of  इस  front , this theater would prove decisive .
The inexorable advance of the Allied armies  दौरान  the second half of 1918 persuaded the  जर्मनी  commanders that defeat  थी  inevitable  ,  and the government  थी   मजबूर  to sue for conditions of an armistice .
The terms of peace were agreed upon with the  हस्ताक्षर  of the Treaty of Versailles  in  1919 .
