In the case of Chef Paolo ,  जो  had no known first name , they  have   महरूम  listed by title .
The First Lady of the United States  (   flotus  ) is the hostess of the  श्वेत  House .
Because this position  is  traditionally filled by the wife of the President  of  the United  राज्य  , the title is most  प्रायः  applied to  the  wife of a sitting president .
The current First Lady is  मिशेल  Obama  .
After  उसके  husband Barack Obama  थी  re-elected on November  6  , 2012 ,  वो   is  scheduled  to  serve until January 20 , 2017 .
Septic shock is a medical condition as  a  result of severe infection and sepsis , though the microbe  may  be systemic  or  localized to a particular site .
it  can cause multiple organ dysfunction syndrome ( formerly known as  अनेक  organ failure )  और   मौत  .
Its  सबसे  common victims are children , immunocompromised  individuals  , and the elderly  ,   as   उनके  immune systems can not deal with  the   संक्रमण   as  effectively as  those  of healthy adults .
Frequently  ,  patients  कष्ट  from septic shock are cared for in  intensive  care units .
The mortality rate from septic shock is  लगभग  25–50  %  .
केविन  Brereton ( born  फ़रवरी  20 , 1972  )  , better known by his stage  नाम  k-os ( ; `` chaos '' ) , is a Canadian rapper , singer , songwriter  और  record  निर्माता  .
His given name  may   भी  be cited as Kheaven , a spelling he later adopted .
the  alias `` k-os '' , spelled with a lower case ``  k  '' ,  थी  intended to be  कम  aggressive than the pseudonyms of other rappers  जिनकी  names were all upper case , such as KRS-One .
It is an acronym for  ``  Knowledge of  स्वः   ,  '' although in a later interview he said that it originally  stood  for  ``  Kevin 's Original Sound  .  ''  k-os  ' music incorporates a  चौड़ी  variety of music genres , including rap  ,  funk , rock , and reggae .
the  lyrics frequently focus on promoting a `` positive message '' while  at   टाइम्स  expressing criticism of mainstream hip  हॉप  culture 's obsession with money ,  कीर्ति   और   glorification  of violence .
A musician as  खूब  as  a  producer ,  k-os  has written and  उत्पादित  nearly  प्रत्येक  part of all four of his albums .
k-os usually performs with a live band ,  कुछ  that is uncommon in the hip  हॉप  genre .
He sometimes plays guitar and keyboard both during live performances and in the  स्टुडियो   .
k-os received his first musical exposure with the single ``  musical  Essence '' , released in 1993 .
After the release of his second single `` Rise Like the Sun  ''  in  1996   ,  he withdrew from the industry because he was dissatisfied with his musical style .
He reappeared briefly  in  1999 and released his  डेब्यू  album Exit in 2002 .
the   एल्बम  received  धनात्मक  reviews but  बेची  relatively few copies  .
He released his second  एल्बम  Joyful Rebellion in 2004 , which received platinum status in  कनाडा  .
A third album ,  ,  was released in 2006 and  भी  went platinum .
His fourth  एल्बम  , Yes !
, was released  in  2009 .
His fifth album BLack on BLonde was  released  in 2013 .
The  आधिकारिक   2007  edition of the UCC .
Even  the  confidential rough drafts of  the   ucc  were saved and  प्रकाशित  as  a  10-volume set .
The Uniform Commercial Code  (  UCC or the Code  )  , first published in 1952 , is one of a number of uniform  अधिनियमों  that have been promulgated in conjunction with efforts to harmonize  the  law of  बिक्री   और  other  वाणिज्यिक  transactions in all 50 states  भीतर   the   संयुक्त  States of America .
multi-pitch  climbing is the ascent of climbing routes  साथ  one or more stops at  a   belay  station .
Each section of actual  चढ़ाई  between stops  at  the belay stations is  पुकारा  a pitch  .
The leader ascends the  पिच  , placing  गियर  and stopping  to   लंगर  themselves to the belay  स्टेशन  .
the  reason for the stops can be  संकल्पित  by choice ,  सम्मेलन  or  necessity  .
लिये  example:
The rope is too  छोटी  to do the entire  रूट   in  one pitch (  necessity  ) .
The leader has  चलाएं   आउट   of  protective gear ( necessity ) .
वहीँ   is  a  सुविधाजनक  protectable ledge  ,  or fixed bolts placed by  पिछला  climbers  ,   at  the location for a belay station (  सम्मेलन  ) .
The leader chooses to rest  or  exchange leads before  the  next section  of  the climb ( choice ) .
the  general  purpose  of these stops  is  to allow the second to  ascend   to   the  point of the lead climber while collecting the protective gear from the  रूट  in the course  of  the lead climber 's ascent .
At the belay station , the protective gear is collected , possibly exchanged  to  a new leader , and  the  leader of the next pitch ascends  the  route  .
A diagram showing an I Formation on offense and a 4-3 Formation on defense
In American football , each  टोली  has eleven players on the  फ़ील्ड   at   एक  time .
The specific  भूमिका  that a player takes on the field is called their position .
Under  the  modern rules of American football , teams are allowed unlimited subsititutions ,  कि  is teams may  बदलें  any  क्रमांक   of  players after any play .
इस  has  resulted   in   the  development of three `` platoons '' of players  ,  the offense ( the team with the ball  ,  who is trying to score  )  ,  the   रक्षा  ( the team trying to prevent  the  other  टोली  from scoring  ,  and  to  take the ball  इससे  them ) , and the special teams (  जो   खेल  in kicking situations ) .
Within those platoons  ,  various  विशिष्ट  positions exist depending on what the player 's main job is .
The Controlled Substances Act ( CSA )  थी  enacted  into  law by the Congress of the United States as Title II of  the  Comprehensive Drug  गाली  Prevention  और  Control  अधिनियम  of 1970 .
The CSA  is  the federal U.S. drug  नीति  under which the manufacture , importation , possession , use and distribution  of  certain  substances  is regulated .
The Act  भी  served as the national implementing legislation for the Single Convention on Narcotic Drugs  .
The  विधान   निर्मित  five Schedules (  classifications  ) , with varying qualifications for  a  substance to be included in  प्रत्येक  .
Two federal agencies ,  the   ड्रग  Enforcement  प्रशासन  and the Food and Drug Administration ,  determine   जिससे  substances  हैं   added  to or removed from the various schedules ,  हालांकि  the statute passed by Congress created  the  initial listing , and Congress has sometimes scheduled other  substances  through legislation such as  the  Hillory J. Farias and Samantha  reid  Date-Rape Prevention Act  of   2000  , which  लगाई  gamma  hydroxybutyrate  in Schedule I . Classification decisions  हैं  required  to  be made on criteria including  संभावित  for abuse (  an  undefined term ) , currently accepted  चिकित्सा  use  in   उपचार  in the United States  ,  and international  treaties  .
The  वेन  Route 23 Transit Center is a  नई  Jersey Transit park-and-ride station  in   वेन   ,  New Jersey along the Montclair-Boonton Line that provides  बस   सेवा  to New York City and various  अन्य   अंक  in the area  as  well as Montclair-Boonton  लकीर  train  सेवा  to New York , Hoboken  ,  and intermediate points along  the  line between Hackettstown and Montclair  राज्य   विश्वविद्यालयों   .
It  is  located off of the southbound lanes of New Jersey Route 23  on  West Belt  सड़क  , near the interchange  जहाँ  Route 23 , Interstate  80  , and U.S. Route 46 meet , across from  the  Willowbrook  मॉल   .
The station  खोली  in January 2008  और  has 1,000  पार्किंग  spaces  .
नई   जर्सी  Transit intends for this combined  रेल  and bus station to  become  an `` interceptor station  ,  ''  कि   होगा  help relieve the habitual  जमघट  at the West Belt Road Interchange , where the three major highways meet .
in  addition ,  the  construction of the station was  meant  to also  आसानी  the congestion at what  थी  then Route 23 Park & Ride , a bus depot on Route 23 North that  रै  since been renamed Mother 's Park & Ride , and the Willowbrook Mall Park  &  Ride ; the now-Mother 's site  था  limited parking while NJT was having trouble with overfull parking  क्षेत्रों   at   willowbrook  .
The Wayne Township  बस  garage is located on the opposite side of Route 23 .
There has  महरूम  a proposal  to   निर्माण  a parking deck with another  हजार  spots  और   develop  the land at the station .
In addition to Montclair-Boonton  रेल  , the Transit Center is served  by   the   following  New Jersey Transit bus  लकीरs:
75 to Newark Penn Station and  बटलर
194 to Port Authority Bus Terminal and Butler/Newfoundland
198 to Port Authority  बस  Terminal and William Paterson University
324 to Port  प्राधिकार   और  Wayne  रूट  23
748  to Willowbrook  मॉल  and Paterson
The at sign @  is   भी  commonly called the at symbol , ampersat , apetail or commercial at in English—and  कम   commonly  a wide range of other terms  .
The fact that there is no single word  in  English for the symbol has prompted  कुछ  writers to  उपयोग  the French arobase or Spanish and Portuguese  arroba—or   to   सिक्का  new words such as asperand , ampersat—but none of these has achieved  चौड़ी  currency .
Originally  an   हिसाब  and commercial invoice abbreviation meaning ``  at  the  रेट  of '' (  e.g  . 7 widgets @ $ 2 = $ 14 ) ,  it  was not included on the  कुंजीपटल   of   the   earliest   commercially  successful typewriters , but was on at  तनिक  one 1889 model and the very  कामयाब  Underwood models from the ``  underwood  No . 5 '' in 1900  onward  .
It  is  now universally included on computer keyboards .
In recent years ,  इसके  meaning  रै  grown to  शामिल   the  sense of being `` located at , '' `` and ,  ''  or  ``  directed  at  '' , especially in  ईमेल  addresses and social media  ,  particularly Twitter  .
The  चिह्नित  is encoded at  .
The Catcher in the Rye is a 1951 novel by J.  D.  Salinger .
Originally published for adults  ,  it has since become  लोकप्रिय  with  adolescent  readers for its themes of  teenage  angst and alienation  .
it  has been translated into almost all  of  the world 's major languages .
Around 250,000 copies are sold  प्रत्येक  year with  कुल  sales of more than 65 million books .
The  अनोखा  's  समर्थक  and antihero , Holden Caulfield ,  रै  become an icon for teenage rebellion .
The novel was included on Times 2005 list of the 100  बेहतरीन  English-language novels  लिखा  since 1923 ,  और  it was named by  आधुनिक  Library and its readers  as  one  of  the 100 best English-language novels of  the  20th century .
it  has  महरूम  frequently challenged in the United States and  अन्य  countries for its liberal use  of  profanity  और   portrayal  of sexuality  .
It also deals with  जटिल  issues of identity , belonging , connection  ,  and alienation .
Skeletal muscles homo sapiens
This is a table of muscles  of  the human anatomy .
There are approximately  642  skeletal muscles within the  ठेठ   इंसान  ,  और  almost every muscle constitutes  एक  part of a pair of identical bilateral muscles , found on both sides , resulting in approximately 320 pairs of muscles , as presented in this article .
Nevertheless  ,  the exact number is difficult to define because different  स्त्रोत  group  मांसपेशियां  differently  ,  e.g . regarding what is defined  as  different  भाग  of a single  मांसपेशी  or as  अनेक  muscles .
Examples  दायरा  from  640  to 850 .
the  muscles of the human body can  be  categorized into a number of groups  जिससे  include muscles relating  to  the head and neck , muscles of the torso or trunk , muscles of the upper limbs  ,  and muscles of  the  lower limbs .
The action refers to the action of  प्रत्येक  muscle  इससे   the  standard anatomical position .
in  other positions ,  अन्य  actions may be performed  .
Bad Girls Club  (  BGC ) is an American reality television series created by Jonathan Murray for the Oxygen television station  .
The show  centers   on  seven feisty  और  mischievous women with different backgrounds and personalities , who have a  क्रमांक  of psychological and behavioral problems .
They  हैं  introduced to the show off  उनके  pernicious behavior  और   accomplish  specific  लक्ष्य   .
The cast , deemed ``  ख़राब   लड़कियों   ''  ,  आनंद   a  luxurious lifestyle in  a  fine  mansion  for three months , during  जिससे  they must obey specified rules .
Their lives  अंदर  –  और   बाहर  – of the house are chronicled and  अंकित  by the production team .
The Bad Girls Club is broadcast in five  देशों  ( United States  ,  Netherlands ,  ऑस्ट्रेलिया  , Hungary , and Sweden ) .
It has received  ऋणात्मक  reviews from  आलोचकों  , who believe  the  show promotes violence by adolescent  दर्शक   .
Furthermore ,  अनेक  cast members made controversial remarks which outraged many viewers .
the  format of  the   दिखाएँ  has changed from early seasons  .
If a `` bad  लड़की  '' breaks a rule ,  वो  is evicted from the show and , if it is early in  the  season  ,  replaced by a new `` bad girl '' .
There have been nine complete seasons  of  The Bad Girls Club , with the tenth season  फिलहाल   airing  .
The fourth season  था   the  highest ratings in the  दिखाएँ  's  इतिहास  , becoming its ``  भेदन  season  ''   .
There have  महरूम  three spin-offs of  the  Bad Girls  क्लबों  .
One of  उन्हें  , Love  खेल   :   ख़राब  Girls Need Love Too , where  पास्ट  cast members seek  सच्चा  love  ,  has gained high  दरजा  .
Oxygen  रै   भी  released a mobile game  ,  comic  स्ट्रिप   और  merchandise to  प्रचार  the show  .
Of the  92  contestants , Kerry Harvick ( of season  एक  ) was a successful country singer before the  दिखाएँ  .
Tanisha Thomas ( of season two ) later  hosted  Oxygen 's  oxygenlive   !
और  the subsequent seasons  of   प्रेम  Games : Bad  लड़कियों  Need Love  too   .
Thomas , who has been dubbed  the  `` godmother '' to all contestants  ,   रै  her  अपना   टेलीविज़न  documentary entitled  tanisha  Gets Married .
As of Season 8 she  's  been the host of the  पुनर्मिलन  specials  .
The Iowa Senate is the upper house  of  the  आयोवा  General Assembly  .
There are 50 seats in  the  Iowa Senate , representing 50 single-member districts across the  राज्य  with populations  of  approximately  60,927  per  constituency  , .
Each Senate district is composed of two House districts .
the  Senate meets at  the  Iowa State Capitol in Des  moines  .
Unlike the lower house , the Iowa House of Representatives ,  सीनेटरों  serve  four-year  terms , with half of the  सीनेट  staggered for re-election every two years .
There are no term  हद  for the Senate .
Mechanical repair
मेंटेनेंस  , repair , and operations  (  MRO ) or  मेंटेनेंस  , repair , and overhaul involves fixing any sort of mechanical ,  plumbing  or electrical device should it become  आउट  of order or  टूटा   (  known as repair , unscheduled or casualty  मेंटेनेंस  ) .
It also includes performing routine actions which keep the  यंत्र   in  working order ( known  as  scheduled maintenance ) or prevent  ट्रबल  from arising (  निवारक   मेंटेनेंस  ) .
MRO may be defined as , `` All actions which have the objective of retaining  or  restoring an item in or to  a  state  in  which it  can  perform its  जरूरी   फलन  .
The actions include  the  combination of all technical and corresponding  प्रशासनिक  , managerial  ,  and  पर्यवेक्षण  actions .  ''
MRO  परिचालन  can be categorised by whether the product remains the property of the customer  ,  i.e .  a  service  is  being  offered  , or whether  the  product is bought by the reprocessing organisation and sold to any  ग्राहक  wishing to make the  खरीदें  (  guadette  , 2002 ) .
In  the  former case it  may  be a backshop  आपरेशन  within a larger organisation or smaller operation .
The former of  ये  represents a  बंद  loop supply chain and usually has  the  scope of maintenance , repair  or   of  the  उत्पाद  .
The latter of the  categorisations  is an open loop supply chain and is typified  by  refurbishment and remanufacture .
The main characteristic of the closed loop system is that  the  demand for a  उत्पाद  is matched with the supply of a used product .
Neglecting asset write-offs and exceptional  क्रियाएँ   the  total population of the  उत्पाद  between the customer and the service provider remains  निरंतर  .
Prince William , Duke of Cambridge ( William Arthur Philip Louis  ;  born 21 June 1982 )  ,  is the elder son of Charles ,  प्रिंस  of  वेल्स  ,  और  Diana , Princess of  वेल्स  , and third-eldest grandchild of Queen Elizabeth  ii   और  Prince  फिलिप  , Duke of Edinburgh .
He is second in  the  line  of   उत्तराधिकार  ,  पीछे  his father , to  the  thrones of sixteen independent sovereign states known as the Commonwealth  realms  : the United Kingdom ,  कनाडा   ,  Australia , New Zealand , Jamaica , Barbados  ,  The Bahamas , Grenada ,  पापुआ  New Guinea  ,   the  Solomon  आइलैंड्स  ,  तुवालू  ,  संत  Lucia  ,  Saint Vincent and the Grenadines  ,  Belize , Antigua and  बारबूडा  , and Saint Kitts and Nevis .
Prince William was educated at four schools in the  संयुक्त  Kingdom  और  obtained a degree from the University of St Andrews  .
he  spent parts  of  a  गैप   साल  in Chile ,  बेलीज़  , Tanzania , and Kenya where he has lived and holidayed several times .
Prince William has  भी   लिया   kiswahili  studies at universities in Kenya and Tanzania  .
He was commissioned  as  a Lieutenant in the Blues  और  Royals  रेजीमेंट  of the Household Cavalry —serving  साथ  his brother  प्रिंस  Harry —and , two years later , earned his wings by completing pilot  प्रशिक्षण  at Royal Air Force College  cranwell   .
In 2009 , he transferred to  the  Royal  एयर  Force  ,   थी  promoted to  उड़ान   लेफ्टिनेंट  and underwent helicopter flying  प्रशिक्षण  in  अनुक्रम  to become a full-time  पायलट   साथ  the Search  और   बचाव   फ़ोर्स  .
In 2010 ,  he  completed  उसके  general and special-to-type helicopter training and went  on   to   raf  Valley on No . 22 Squadron  performing  co-pilot duties on  फलक   a   समुद्र  King search and rescue  हेलीकाप्टर  .
Prince William married his longtime girlfriend , Catherine Middleton , on  29  April 2011 at Westminster Abbey .
Hours prior to his wedding , Prince William  थी   निर्मित  Duke of Cambridge , Earl of Strathearn ,  और  Baron Carrickfergus  .
DeAndre Cortez  रास्ता  ( born  जुलाई  28 , 1990 ) , better known  by   उसके   स्टेज  name Soulja Boy Tell 'Em  ,  or simply Soulja Boy  ,  is an American rapper  ,  record producer , actor , and entrepreneur .
In September  2007  , his single ``  crank  That ( Soulja Boy ) `` reached  क्रमांक   एक  on the  बिलबोर्ड  Hot 100  .
the  single was initially self-published on the internet , and it later became a  number-one  hit in the United States for seven non-consecutive  सप्ताह  starting in September  2007   .
On  अगस्त  17  रास्ता  was listed at # 18 on the Forbes list of Hip-Hop Cash  किंग्स  of  2010  earning $ 7 million for  कि  year .
रास्ता  has currently released three studio  एल्बम   और   एक   स्वतंत्र  album : his debut studio  एल्बम  Souljaboytellem.com ( 2007 ) was  certified  platinum by the RIAA .
however  , his next  दो  albums ,  isouljaboytellem  ( 2008  )   और  The DeAndre  रास्ता  ( 2010 ) did  नहीं  match  the  commercial success of his debut  ,  the latter only selling 100,000 copies  ,  despite the success of several singles across both albums ,  ऐसे   as  `` Kiss Me Thru the Phone  ``  and `` Turn My Swag  on   ``   (  iSouljaBoyTellem ) and `` Pretty Boy Swag `` ( The DeAndre Way )  .
This was  मुख्यतः  due to negotiation  समस्याएं  with Interscope Records which meant  a  limited amount of records were made available to the public .
As of 2011 , Way  रै  confirmed he is working  on  his fourth studio album , entitled USA DRE , which  होगा  be released in 2013 .
The electron transport chain in the mitochondrion is the site  of  oxidative phosphorylation  in  eukaryotes .
The NADH  और   succinate   उत्पन्न  in the  साइट्रिक   एसिड  cycle are oxidized , providing energy to power ATP synthase  .
Photosynthetic electron transport chain of the thylakoid membrane .
An electron  हस्तांतरण  chain ( ETC ) couples electron transfer  between  an electron donor ( such as NADH ) and  an  electron acceptor (  ऐसे  as O2 ) with the transfer of  H+  ions ( protons )  आरपार  a membrane .
The resulting electrochemical proton  अनुपात  is used to generate chemical energy in the form of  एडीनोसिन   ट्राइफॉस्फेट  ( ATP ) .
Electron transport chains  हैं  the cellular  mechanisms  used for extracting energy from  धूप  in photosynthesis and also  इससे   रेडॉक्स  reactions  ,  such as  the  oxidation of sugars ( respiration ) .
In chloroplasts , light drives  the  conversion  of   जल  to oxygen and NADP+  to  NADPH with transfer of H+ ions across chloroplast membranes .
in  mitochondria , it is the conversion of  ऑक्सीजन  to  जल  , NADH  to   naD+   और  succinate to  fumarate  that are required to generate the proton  अनुपात  .
Electron transport chains are major  साइट  of premature electron leakage to oxygen , generating superoxide and potentially resulting in increased oxidative  तनाव  .
Tramadol hydrochloride ( trademarked as Conzip  ,  Ryzolt , Ultracet ,  ultram  in  the  USA  ,  Ralivia  ,   zytram  XL Durella { CR-100/200 mg  }  in Canada  or  Adolonta  in  Spain ) is  a   centrally  acting  सिंथेटिक  analgesic used to  दावत  moderate to moderately severe pain  .
The drug has a  चौड़ी  range of applications ,  सहित  treatment of  आमवातीय   गठिया  , restless legs syndrome , motor neurone disease and fibromyalgia .
It  थी  launched and  marketed  as Tramal by the German pharmaceutical company Grünenthal GmbH in  1977  .
Tramadol is a  कमजोर  μ-opioid receptor agonist that also induces serotonin release and  inhibits  the  reuptake   of  norepinephrine .
Tramadol is metabolized to O-desmethyltramadol ,  a  significantly more potent  μ-opioid   agonist  .
Tramadol and its major metabolite  (  s ) are  विशिष्ट   इससे  other  अधिक  potent opioid  agonists  by  सापेक्ष  selectivity for μ-opioid receptors .
Bernard Lawrence `` Bernie '' Madoff (  ;  born April 29  ,  1938 ) is  an   अमरीकी  former stockbroker , investment advisor , financier , and white collar criminal .
He is the former non-executive Chairman of the NASDAQ stock market , and the admitted  ऑपरेटर  of  a  Ponzi scheme that is considered to be the largest  वित्तीय  fraud in  u.S.  history .
Madoff founded the Wall Street firm Bernard L. Madoff Investment  प्रतिभूति  LLC in 1960 , and  थी  its chairman until his arrest  on  December  11  , 2008 .
The  कड़  was one of the top market  मेकर  businesses on Wall Street , which bypassed `` specialist '' firms by directly executing orders over the counter from retail brokers  .
he   employed  at the firm his brother Peter as Senior Managing  निदेशक  and Chief Compliance Officer ;  पीटर  has since been  sentenced  to 10 years in prison .
Peter 's  बेटी  Shana  madoff  as the firm 's rules and compliance officer and attorney , and his sons  एंड्रयू  and  चिह्नित  ( Mark  वचनबद्ध  suicide  by  hanging exactly two  सालो   बाद   उसके   पिता  's arrest )  .
On December 10  ,  2008 ,  madoff  's sons told authorities that their father had confessed  to  them that  the  asset management  ईकाई  of his  कड़  was a massive Ponzi  योजना  ,  और  quoted him as describing it  as  ``  एक   बिग  lie .  ''
The following day  ,  FBI agents arrested Madoff  और  charged him with one  गिनती  of securities  धोखाधड़ी  .
the  U.S.  प्रतिभूति  and Exchange Commission (  सेक  ) had previously conducted investigations into Madoff 's business practices , but did not uncover the massive fraud  .
In March 2009 , Madoff pleaded guilty to 11  संघीय  felonies and admitted to  turning  his wealth management business into  a  massive Ponzi scheme that defrauded thousands of  निवेशकों  of billions  of  dollars .
Madoff  कहा  he  began  the Ponzi scheme in the early 1990s .
However , federal investigators believe  the  fraud began as  जल्दी  as the 1970s , and those charged  साथ  recovering the missing money believe the  निवेश  operation may  never  have been  legitimate  .
The amount missing  इससे  client accounts , including fabricated gains , was almost $  65  billion .
The  court-appointed  trustee  अनुमानित  actual losses to investors  of  $ 18  अरब  .
on  June  29  , 2009 , he  थी   sentenced   to   150  years in prison , the maximum allowed .
Administrative Professionals  दिन  ( also known as Secretaries Day or Admin Day ) is an unofficial secular holiday observed in several countries to recognize the work of secretaries , administrative  assistants   ,  receptionists ,  और  other  प्रशासनिक  support professionals .
In North America , it is celebrated  on  the Wednesday of the  पिछला  full week of April  (  April 24 in  2013   )  .
in  France it is celebrated on the third Thursday in  अप्रैल   (  April 18 in 2013 ) .
In Australia it is celebrated on the first Friday in May
A quasi-judicial  देह  is an entity such as an arbitrator or tribunal board  ,  generally of a public administrative  एजेंसी  , which  रै   शक्तियां   और   प्रक्रियाओं   resembling  those of a court of law or judge ,  और  which  is  obligated to objectively determine facts  और  draw conclusions from them  so  as to provide the basis  of  an official action .
Such actions  हैं  able to  उपाय   a  situation or impose legal penalties ,  और   may  affect the  विधिक   अधिकारों   ,  duties or privileges of specific parties .
Monument of Tycho Brahe and  योहानेस  Kepler in Prague
Tycho  ब्राहे  (  14  December 154624 October  1601   )  ,  born  Tyge Ottesen  ब्राहे  ,  थी  a  डैनिश  nobleman known  लिये  his accurate  और  comprehensive  खगोलीय  and  ग्रहीय  observations .
He was born in  स्कैनिया  , then  भाग  of Denmark , now part  of  modern-day Sweden .
Tycho was well known in his lifetime as an astronomer and alchemist .
In his De nova  स्टेला   (  On the new star ) of 1573 ,  he   refuted  the  aristotelian   विश्वास  in  an  unchanging  celestial  realm  .
His precise  माप  indicated that ``  नई  stars  ,  '' ( stellae novae , now known as supernovae ) in particular that  of   1572  ,  lacked  the  लंबन   अपेक्षित  in sub-lunar phenomena  ,  and  यहूद   इसलिए   नहीं   ``   वायुमंडलीय  '' tailless comets as  previously  believed , but were above the atmosphere and  चंद्रमा  .
Using similar measurements he  दिखाया  that comets were also  नहीं   वायुमंडलीय  phenomena ,  as  previously thought , and must pass through the supposedly  ``   अपरिवर्तनीय  '' celestial spheres .
As an  astronomer  , Tycho  worked  to  combine  what he saw as  the  geometrical  लाभ  of the Copernican system with the  philosophical  benefits of the  ptolemaic  system into his  अपना  model  of  the universe  ,  the Tychonic system .
Furthermore , he was  the   पिछला   of  the  प्रमुख  naked eye astronomers , working without telescopes for his  observations  .
Tycho Brahe was granted an estate on the island of  hven  and  the  funding to  निर्माण  the  uraniborg   ,  an  जल्दी  research  संस्थान  ,  जहाँ   he  built large astronomical instruments and took many  careful  measurements , and later Stjerneborg , underground , when he discovered that his instruments in the former  यहूद  not  fear  steady .
On  the  island (  on  which he  demonstrated  autocratic character and behavior toward the residents ) he founded manufactories such as paper-making to provide material for  मुद्रण  his  परिणाम  .
After  मतभिन्नता  with the new Danish king Christian IV in 1597 , he was invited by the Bohemian king and Holy  रोमन   सम्राट  Rudolph II to Prague , where he became the official  इम्पीरियल  astronomer .
He built the new observatory  at  Benátky nad Jizerou  .
यहाँ  , from 1600 until his death in  1601   ,   he  was assisted  by  Johannes Kepler  जो  later used  tycho  's astronomical  आंकड़ा   to  develop Kepler 's laws of planetary motion .
guro  District ( Guro-gu )  is  a district of Seoul , South Korea  ,  which was  अलग  from Yeongdeungpo District  on   अप्रैल  1 , 1980 .
स्तिथ  in the southwestern part of  the  city , where  besides  Yangcheon  ज़िला  and Geumcheon  ज़िला   guro   ज़िला  has an  महत्वपूर्ण  position as  a  transport link which contains railroads  ,   जमीन  routes from  the   बाकी  of Seoul to the south of the  देश  .
The  gyeongbu   और   gyeongin  railway lines connect  सियोल  to Busan  और  Incheon .
in  addition , Seoul Metropolitan Subway lines 1 ,  2  , and 7 ,  और  major highways intersect in  guro  District .
The name Guro originates from the legend that nine ( ) old men  (  Korean :  ro   )  enjoyed longevity in  the  district .
A digital industrial complex is located in  guro  District .
The Guro Digital Industrial Complex , which played a leading industrial role mainly with  वस्त्र  manufacturing , dressmaking and other labour-intensive industries in 1967  ,  has been  rapidly   बदला   into  an IT  औद्योगिक  complex .
This complex played a pivotal role  in  the economic  विकास  of the South  कोरियाई   's  development era , referred to as the `` Miracle on the Han River `` , and also contributed  10  percent of national export in the 1970s .
Twenty-one percent of the  कुल  area of Guro  ज़िला   is  a restricted zone  to  be used as  a  greenbelt  साथ  the only arboretum  in  Seoul .
the  zone is changing into a lively  ज़िला  as large  labour-intensive   कारखानों  are moving  इससे  the area and the council is developing  कया  it terms its four zones .
An `` e-government  ``  system based on this hosted the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  e-participation  फ़ोरम  on February 7–9 , 2007 , with  the   भागीदारी  of more than thirty-seven countries  .
The  फ़ोरम   थी  launched with the theme `` Promoting Democracy and Regional Development '' and twenty-five mayors including André Santini  (  Issy-les-Moulineaux , France ) , Kevin Foy ( Chapel Hill , US ) ,  apirak   kosayothin  ( Bangkok , Thailand ) , Uvais Mohamed Emthiyas  (  Colombo , Sri Lanka  )  , and world experts such  as  Dr William H.  dutton   (  Director  of  Oxford Internet Institute at the  विश्वविद्यालयों  of Oxford ,  uk  )  और  Dr  ari-veiko   anttiroiko  ( professor at the University of Tampere , Finland ) participated in  the   फ़ोरम   .
the  Guro Declaration  ,  adopted during the forum  ,  aims  to  set up a  पोर्टल  site for e-government development  और   to  establish a  कंक्रीट  project in  अनुक्रम  to  सेतु  the digital divide among the world 's  शहरों   .
This  अभ्यास  has been  recognised   लिये   providing  a new important step in the development of e-democracy .
The  e-participation   फ़ोरम  was  a  key factor for Guro to play the leading role in  bridging  the digital divide among cities , to provide I.T .  उद्यमों   स्तिथ  in Guro Digital Industrial Complex the opportunity  to  launch into  the   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  market  ,  to improve its image and become a global leader  to  concrete  e-democracy  .
the   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  e-participation forum on February 7–9 ,  2007
a  wonton (  भी   spelled   wantan  ,  wanton  ,  or  wuntun  in  transcription from Cantonese  ;  Mandarin  :  húndùn ) is  a   प्रकार  of dumpling commonly found  in  a number of Chinese  व्यंजन  .
Many people were  शामिल  in the invention  of  radio as we now know it .
Several  संभावित  methods of wireless communication were considered  ,  including  आगमनात्मक  and capacitive  प्रेरण  and transmission  through  the ground , however the method used for  रेडियो  today exclusively involves the  हस्तांतरण   और  reception  of  electromagnetic waves .
After early speculation on the subject ,  प्रायोगिक  work  on   the  connection between electricity and magnetism began  around  1820 with the work of Hans Christian  ओर्स्टेड  and continued with the  कार्य  of André-Marie Ampère ,  जोसेफ   हेनरी  , and Michael Faraday  .
ये  investigations culminated  in  the complete theory of electromagnetism developed  by   जेम्स  Clerk Maxwell .
इस  theory described the theoretical basis of the propagation of  इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक  waves .
After Maxwell  's  theory was published many people experimented with wireless communication  ,  some intentionally using  मैक्सवेल  's  सिद्धान्त   कुछ  not .
It is considered  संभावित  that the  पहला  intentional transmission of a signal by means of electromagnetic waves was  performed   by  David  एडवर्ड   ह्यूजेस   around  1880 , although  इस  was considered  to  be induction at the time .
The first systematic and  unequivocal   हस्तांतरण  of EM waves was performed by Heinrich  रुडॉल्फ  Hertz and described  in  papers published in  1887  and 1890  .
Hertz famously  माना   ये  results as  होने  of  छोटी  practical value  .
बाद  Hertz 's work many people were involved in the development of components and theory involved with the transmission and  रिसेप्शन  of electromagnetic waves .
Others ,  notably   guglielmo  Marconi ,  यहूद  concerned with practical improvements and the commercial  अनुप्रयोग  of radio to wireless telegraphy  .
Later on  रेगिनाल्ड  A. Fessenden  became  the first to send an audio signal by means of electromagnetic waves .
Scurvy  is  a disease resulting  इससे  a deficiency of vitamin  c  , which  is  required for the synthesis of collagen  in  humans  .
The  रासायनिक   नाम  for  विटामिन  C , ascorbic acid  ,  is derived from the Latin name of scurvy , scorbutus , which  भी  provides the adjective scorbutic ( `` of , characterized by or having to  do  with scurvy '' ) .
Scurvy  प्रायः  presents  itself  initially  as  symptoms  of  malaise and  lethargy   ,  followed by  गठन  of spots on the  स्किन  , spongy  मसूड़ों  , and  bleeding  from the mucous membranes .
धब्बे  are  सबसे  abundant on the thighs  और  legs ,  और  a person with the ailment looks pale  ,  feels depressed  ,  and is partially immobilized .
As scurvy advances , there can be open ,  suppurating  wounds  ,  loss of teeth  ,  jaundice , fever  ,  neuropathy and death .
स्कर्वी  was at  एक  time common among sailors  ,  pirates and others aboard ships at sea longer than perishable  फल  and vegetables could be stored (  subsisting  instead only  on  cured and  salted  meats and dried  दाने  )  और  by soldiers similarly deprived  of  these foods for extended periods .
It was  वर्णित  by Hippocrates  (  c. 460 BC–c  .  380 BC ) , and herbal cures for scurvy have been known in many native cultures since prehistory  .
Scurvy was  एक  of  the  limiting  कारकों  of marine  सफर  , often killing large numbers of the passengers and crew  on  long-distance  voyages  .
This became a significant issue in Europe from the beginning of the modern era  in  the Age of Discovery in the  15th  century , continuing to play  a   significant  role  through  World War  i  in  the   20th  century .
While  आज  scurvy is known  to  be caused  by  a nutritional deficiency  ,  until the isolation of vitamin C and direct  प्रमाण  of its link to  स्कर्वी   in  1932 , numerous theories and treatments were proposed ,  प्रायः   on  little or no experimental  आंकड़ा  .
This inconsistency is attributed to the lack of vitamin C as a distinct  अवधारणा  , an inability to reliably link different foods ( notably present  in   भैस   citrus   ,   watercress  , and organ meat ) to scurvy .
An additional  अवधारणा  required to understand scurvy was the degradation of vitamin C by exposure to air and copper and  अन्य  transition metal  लवण  such as those of iron , thus changing the links  of  foods to scurvy over  समय  .
उपचार  by  भैस  food , particularly citrus fruit , was periodically  implemented   ,  as it had been since antiquity  .
however  until  the   1930s  , treatment was inconsistent , with many ineffective treatments used  into  the 20th century .
It was a Scottish surgeon  in  the Royal  नेवी   ,   जेम्स  Lind who first proved it could be treated with  citrus  fruit in experiments  he  described in his 1753 book , A Treatise of the  स्कर्वी  , though his advice was  नहीं  implemented by the Royal  नेवी   लिये   अनेक  decades .
In infants ,  स्कर्वी  is  sometimes  referred  to  as Barlow 's disease , named after Sir Thomas  barlow  , a British physician  जो  described it .
However  ,  Barlow 's  बीमारी   may  also  refer  to mitral valve  prolapse  .
Other eponyms  लिये  scurvy include Moeller 's disease and Cheadle 's disease  .
Scurvy does  नहीं  occur  in  most animals because they can synthesize their own vitamin  c  .
However  ,  humans and  अन्य   उच्चतर  primates ( the simians - monkeys and apes - and tarsiers )  ,  guinea  सूअर  , most or all bats , and some species of birds and fish lack an  एंजाइम  ( L-gulonolactone  oxidase   )  necessary  लिये  such synthesis and  जरूर  obtain vitamin C through  उनके  diet .
Vitamin C is widespread in plant tissues , with particularly high concentrations occurring in  citrus  fruits ( oranges , lemons ,  limes   ,  grapefruits ) , tomatoes , potatoes  ,  cabbages , and green peppers .
Iron is a chemical element with the symbol  fe  ( from )  और  atomic number 26 .
It is a metal in the first transition series .
It is the most common  तत्व  ( by mass ) forming the planet  धरती  as  a  whole , forming much of Earth 's  बाहरी   और  inner core .
It is  the  fourth most common element in the  धरती   's  crust  .
Iron 's very common presence  in  rocky planets  जैसे  Earth is due  to  its  abundant  production as a  परिणाम  of  संलयन  in high-mass  सितारों  , where  the  production of  nickel-56  (  जिससे  decays  to  the most common isotope of iron ) is the last nuclear fusion reaction that is exothermic .
This  कल्याणकारी  radioactive nickel to become the last element to be  उत्पादित  before collapse of a supernova  लीड  to the explosive  कार्यक्रम  that scatter this precursor radionuclide of iron  abundantly   into  space .
Like other group 8 elements , iron  exists  in a wide range of oxidation  राज्य  ,  −2  to +6 ,  हालांकि  +2 and +3 are the most common .
Elemental iron occurs in meteoroids and other low oxygen environments , but is reactive to oxygen and water .
Fresh iron surfaces appear lustrous silvery-gray , but  oxidize  in normal air to give hydrated iron oxides , commonly  ज्ञात  as rust  .
नापसंद   अनेक  other metals which form  passivating  oxide layers , iron oxides occupy more volume than iron metal ,  और  thus iron oxides  फ्लेक  off and expose fresh surfaces for  संक्षारण  .
Iron  मेटल  has been used since ancient times , though copper  alloys   ,  which have lower melting temperatures , were used  पहला  in history .
Pure iron is  नरम  ( softer than aluminium  )  , but  is  unobtainable  by  smelting .
The material is significantly hardened and strengthened  by  impurities  इससे  the smelting  प्रक्रम  , such as  कार्बन  .
A certain proportion of carbon ( between  0.002   %   और  2.1 %  )  produces  स्टील  ,  जिससे  may be up  to  1000 times harder than pure iron  .
Crude  आयरन   मेटल  is produced  in  blast furnaces , where ore is reduced by coke  to  pig iron , which has  a  high carbon content .
Further refinement with oxygen reduces the carbon content to the correct  proportion  to make steel .
steels  and low carbon iron alloys  साथ  other metals ( alloy steels ) are by far the most common  धातुओं  in industrial use , due to their great range of desirable properties and the abundance of  आयरन   .
Iron chemical compounds ,  जिससे  include ferrous and ferric compounds  ,  have many uses .
आयरन  oxide mixed with aluminium  चूर्ण  can be ignited to create  a   थर्माइट  reaction , used in welding and purifying ores .
It forms binary compounds with the halogens and the  chalcogens  .
among  its  कार्बधातुक   यौगिकों  is ferrocene , the first sandwich compound discovered .
Iron plays an important role in biology , forming  देवालय  with molecular oxygen in hemoglobin  और  myoglobin ; these two compounds  हैं  common oxygen transport proteins in vertebrates .
Iron is also the  मेटल  used at the active site of  अनेक  important redox enzymes dealing  साथ  cellular respiration and oxidation and  कटौती  in plants and animals .
The Blue Cross Blue Shield Association ( BCBSA )  is  a federation of 38 separate health insurance organizations and companies in  the  United States  .
संयुक्त   ,  they directly or  indirectly   provide   स्वास्थ्य  insurance to over 99 million  अमेरिकी   .
The history of Blue Cross dates back  to  1929 , while the history  of  Blue Shield dates to 1939 .
the  Blue Cross Association  तिथियाँ  back  to  1960 ,  जबकि  its Blue Shield counterpart was created in 1948 .
The  दो  organizations  मिलाया  in  1982  , forming  the  current association .
A potato chip ( known as a chip in American  ,   ऑस्ट्रेलियाई  ,  नई   जीलैंड  , Canadian , Singaporean , Hong  काँग  , South  अफ़्रीकी  and  jamaican  English ; as a crisp in British  अंग्रेज़ी  and Hiberno-English , and as either a chip or  wafer  in Indian English ) is  a  thin slice of potato that is deep fried or baked until crunchy  .
Potato chips are commonly served as an appetizer , side dish , or snack .
The basic chips  हैं   पकाया   और  salted ; additional varieties  हैं  manufactured using various flavorings  और  ingredients including  seasonings  , herbs  ,   मसाले  , cheeses  ,  and artificial  एडिटिव   .
`` Crisps ''  ,   however  ,  may  also refer  to  many different types of savory snack products sold in the United Kingdom and Ireland  ,  some made from potato , but may  भी  be made  इससे   मक्का  ,  tapioca  or other cereals .
an   उदाहरण  of these kinds of savory snacks is Monster Munch .
Potato chips are a predominant part of the  स्नैक  food  मार्केट   in  English-speaking countries  और  numerous other Western nations .
The global  आलू  chip market generated  कुल  revenues of US  $  16.4 billion in 2005 .
This accounted for 35.5  %  of the total savory snacks market in that year ( US $ 46.1  अरब   )   .
Henry Clay ,  sr.   (  April 12 ,  1777  – June  29  , 1852 ) was a lawyer , politician  और  skilled orator who represented Kentucky  in  both the Senate and in the  हाउस   of  Representatives .
He served  तीन  different terms as Speaker of the United States House of Representatives and was also Secretary of State from  1825  to 1829 .
He lost his campaigns for president in 1824 , 1832 and  1844  .
मिट्टी  was a  प्रबल  figure in both the First and  दूसरी  Party  प्रणालियों  .
as  a leading  युद्ध  hawk in 1812 ,  he   favored  war  साथ  Britain  और   निभाई   a  significant role in leading the nation to war  in  the War of  1812  .
In 1824 he ran for president  और  lost , but threw his  चुनावी   मत  to John Quincy Adams , who  बना  him secretary of state as the Jacksonians denounced what  वे  considered a ``  भ्रष्ट   सौदेबाजी   .  ''
He  भागा   और  lost again in 1832 and  1844  as the candidate of the  whig  Party ,  जिससे   he  founded and usually dominated .
मिट्टी  was the  foremost  proponent of the American System , fighting for an increase in tariffs to foster  उद्योग  in the United  राज्य   ,  the use of federal funding to build and maintain infrastructure , and a  दमदार   नेशनल  bank .
He  opposed  the annexation of Texas , fearing it would inject  the  slavery issue into politics .
Clay also opposed  the  Mexican-American War and the  ``  Manifest  नियति  `` policy of Democrats  ,  which  लागत  him votes  in   the  close 1844 election  .
Dubbed the `` Great  pacificator  , '' Clay brokered important compromises during the  nullification  Crisis and  on  the slavery issue  .
As part of  the   ``  Great Triumvirate  ``   or  `` Immortal Trio , '' along  साथ  his colleagues Daniel Webster and John  C.  Calhoun  ,   he   थी  instrumental in formulating the Missouri Compromise  of  1820 and the Compromise of 1850 .
He was viewed as the primary  प्रतिनिधि  of Western interests in  इस  group , and was given the names  ``   हेनरी  of the  वेस्ट  ''  और  `` The Western Star . ''
A plantation owner , Clay held slaves during his  आजीवन   लकिन  freed them in his  होगा  .
Abraham Lincoln ,  the  Whig leader in Illinois , was  a  great admirer of Clay , saying  he  was `` my  आदर्श  of  a  great man .  ''
Lincoln wholeheartedly supported Clay 's economic programs  .
In  1957  , a  सीनेट  Committee  चयनित  Clay as one of  the  five greatest U.S . Senators , along with Daniel Webster  ,  John C. Calhoun , Robert La Follette ,  और  Robert Taft  .
BJ 's Wholesale Club  ,  Inc. ,  commonly  referred to simply as BJ 's  ,  is a membership-only warehouse club  कड़ी  operating  on  the United States East Coast , as well  as  in the state of Ohio .
The  कम्पनी  is  क्रमित   #  232 on Fortune  पत्रिका  's 2010 listing  of  America 's 500 largest  पब्लिक   corporations  .
The Wizard of Oz  ,  known  दौरान   उसके  reign as  the  Great and Powerful Oz ,  is   the  epithet  of   ऑस्कर  Zoroaster Phadrig Isaac Norman  henkel   emmannuel  Ambroise Diggs , a fictional  अक्षर  in the Land of Oz , created by American author  L.  Frank Baum .
the  character was further popularized by the classic  1939  movie ,  wherein  his full name is not  उल्लेखित  .
Kristinia Jamie  debarge  ( ; born March  8   ,  1990 ) is  an  American  सिंगर  , songwriter , dancer and actress .
She first appeared on national television in 2003  as  a  प्रतियोगी   on   the  American Idol  spin-off  , American Juniors  .
in  2009 , DeBarge signed a contract with the Island Records  विभाग  Sodapop , releasing her debut album Exposed in  जुलाई  of the same year .
The first single ,  ``  Goodbye  ``  , reached the top  20  in the US and Canada  .
the  lead single ( ``  क्राई  Wolf  ''   )   इससे   उसके  untitled sophomore album  थी  released on September  27  , 2012 .
The Hawaii Warriors football team represents the University  of  Hawaiʻi at  mānoa  in NCAA Division I  fbs  college football .
The team is coached by  norm  Chow .
It was  भाग  of the Western Athletic Conference  जबतक  July 2012 , when the team joined the  पहाड़  West Conference .
The  हवाई  Warriors were  the  third non-AQ team  to  play in a BCS bowl  खेल  ; losing to  जॉर्जिया  41–10 in the  शुगर  Bowl on  जनवरी  1 ,  2008  in New Orleans , Louisiana .
Marvin Gaye (  अप्रैल   2  , 1939April 1 ,  1984   )  , born Marvin Pentz Gay , Jr.  ,  was an American singer-songwriter and musician .
Gaye helped to shape the sound of Motown Records in  the  1960s with a string of  हिट्स  including `` How Sweet It Is ( To Be Loved By You ) `` and `` I Heard It  through  the Grapevine `` and duet recordings with Mary Wells and Tammi  terrell  , later earning the titles  ``  Prince of Motown  ''   और  `` Prince of  आत्मा  '' .
During the 1970s  ,  Gaye recorded the concept  एल्बम  What 's Going On and Let 's  मिलेंगी  It On and became among  the  first artists  in   motown  to  ब्रेक  away  इससे  the reins of its production company .
Gaye 's later  रिकार्डिंग   बहकावे  several R & B  subgenres  such as quiet storm and neo-soul .
Following a period in Europe  अंतर्गत  a  कर  exile in the  जल्दी  1980s  ,  Gaye released  the  1982  ग्रैमी   award-winning  hit `` Sexual Healing `` and the Midnight Love album .
चूंकि  his death in 1984 , Gaye  रै  been posthumously honored by many institutions  ,  including the Grammy  आजीवन  Achievement  पुरस्कार   और  the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame  .
स्थान  of Chernobyl nuclear  शक्ति  plant

The Chernobyl disaster (  ,   chornobylska  Katastrofa –  chornobyl   प्रलय   )  was a catastrophic nuclear accident that  occurred  on  26   अप्रैल  1986 at the Chernobyl Nuclear  शक्ति  Plant in Ukraine (  तब  officially the Ukrainian SSR ) , which  थी  under the  सीधा  jurisdiction of the central authorities of  the  Soviet  संघ  .
an  explosion  और  fire released large quantities of  रेडियोसक्रिय  particles into the  माहौल   ,  which spread over much of  the  western USSR and Europe .
the  Chernobyl disaster is widely considered to  have  been the worst nuclear  शक्ति  plant accident in history , and is  एक  of only two classified as  a  level 7  इवेंट  on the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Nuclear  इवेंट   स्केल  ( the other being the Fukushima Daiichi nuclear  विपत्ति  in 2011 ) .
The battle to contain the contamination and avert a greater catastrophe ultimately  शामिल  over 500,000 workers and cost an estimated 18 billion  rubles  .
The official Soviet casualty count  of   31  deaths has been disputed , and long-term effects such as cancers and deformities are  स्टिल  being accounted for .

Mrs. Claus is the  बीवी  of  सांता  Claus , the Christmas gift-bringer  in   उत्तर  American and  यूरोपीय  Christmas tradition  .
She is known for making  कुकीज़  with the elves  और  preparing toys with her husband Santa Claus  .
Her first name  is   a  mystery , though she has been  referred  to as Mary , Jessica ,  layla  ,  annette  , Heidi  ,  or Martha .
HijackThis ( also HiJackThis or HJT ) is  an  open source enumerating tool  लिये  Microsoft  खिड़कियाँ  originally created by Merijn Bellekom , and later  बेची   to  Trend Micro .
the  program  is  notable  लिये   लक्ष्यीकरण  browser-hijacking methods , rather than relying on  a   डेटाबेस   of   ज्ञात  spyware .
it  scans  a  user 's  कंप्यूटर  quickly , and displays browser hijacking locations ,  प्रर्दशित  what entries are there .
HijackThis is used  primarily  for diagnosis of  ब्राउजर   hijacking   ,  as uninformed use of its removal facilities can  कारण  significant software damage to  a  computer  .
HijackThis does not remove or detect spyware ; it lists  सबसे  common locations where  ब्राउजर  hijacking activity can  occur  .
Browser hijacking can cause malware to  be  installed on a computer .
On February 16 , 2012 , Trend Micro  released  the  hijackthis  source code as open source and it is now  उपलब्धियाँ  on  the  SourceForge site .
Saddle Creek Records is an American record label based in  ओमाहा  , Nebraska .
प्रारंभ  as a college  क्लास  project on entrepreneurship , the label  थी  founded by Mike Mogis and Justin Oberst in 1993 ( as Lumberjack Records )  .
mogis  soon turned over  उसके  role in the company to Robb Nansel  .
the  label is  नामित  after Saddle Creek Road  ,  a street that cuts through the east side of midtown Omaha , and  the  beginnings of a scene  जिनकी   सदस्यों   शामिल  Conor Oberst ( then a solo artist ,  फिलहाल  of Bright Eyes , Conor Oberst and the Mystic Valley Band , Desaparecidos and Monsters of  लोक  ) , Tim Kasher (  तब   of  Slowdown  वर्जिनिया  , currently of Cursive and  the  Good  जीवन  ) , and others .
collectively  , they were known unofficially  as  the `` Creekers '' .
Saddle Creek first appeared in  छपाई   on  a show  flyer  ,  offering   to  ``  खर्च   an  evening with Saddle Creek '' ( later to be the  शीर्षक  of the label 's DVD . )
Saddle Creek  became  an incorporated entity as a  परिणाम  of a class project  on  entrepreneurship .
Distribution is handled  by  the Alternative Distribution Alliance , which is under the Warner Music  समूह  umbrella .
Saddle Creek  रिकॉर्ड   continues  to  be   the  flagship label  of   a  style of music called `` The Omaha  ध्वनि   ``  , characterized by  a  slight  देश  twang .
This is increasingly inaccurate , though ,  साथ  the rise of more  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक  sounds such  as  those favored by  the  Faint and Broken Spindles .
The eclectic sounds of  काठी  Creek  's  disparate  सदस्य   bands  is somewhat explained by their history  ;  a  क्रमांक  of  the  original members  of   the  label  attended   ग्रेड  school together .
A `` sister label '' , of  sorts   ,  to Saddle Creek is Team Love , started by Conor Oberst in 2004  .
the  label  खोली  arms to their first bands  नहीं  based in Omaha in 2001 with releases by Now It 's Overhead and Sorry  परिचय   ड्रेसडेन   .
अन्य  non-Nebraskan artists  followed  , including Los Angeles 's Rilo Kiley , Eric Bachmann  (   formerly  leader  of  Archers of Loaf and Crooked Fingers  इससे  North Carolina ) , Georgie  जेम्स  ( Washington  d.C.   )  , Two Gallants  (  San Francisco ) , and most recently  टोकियो  Police  क्लबों   (  Toronto ) .
In 2005 , Spend an Evening  साथ  Saddle Creek , a documentary  detailing  the first ten years of the record label 's history  ,   थी  released .
The DVD features extensive interviews with  the   काठी  Creek bands , archival footage , and rare live  प्रदर्शन  .
On  जून  8 ,  2007  , the  लेबल  opened  उनके  own music venue named  slowdown  ( after the group Slowdown Virginia )  ,  located in downtown Omaha , Nebraska .
The following is a  सूची  of episodes for the television show Full House .
In total , there  यहूद  192  एपीसोड  filmed for the show over the course of its eight seasons , from 1987 to 1995  .
पूरा  House is a situation  कॉमेडी  which chronicles  a  widowed father 's struggles of  उठाने  his three young daughters and  the  lives  कि   वे  have touched .
The patriarch of the family , Danny ( Bob Saget )  ,  invites his  brother-in-law  Jesse ( John Stamos ) and his best friend Joey ( Dave  coulier  ) , to help raise his  children  (  candace   cameron  , Jodie Sweetin ,  और  Mary Kate/Ashley  olsen  ) , after  उसके  wife was killed during an automobile accident involving a drunk driver .
After episodes 88 and 89 , Jesse marries Becky  (   लोरी  Loughlin ) , and they move into the attic .
Then  ,  after episodes 104 and 105 , Becky  और   जेसी  have twin boys  नामित  Nicky and Alex (  डेनियल   और  Kevin Renteria/Blake  और  Dylan Tuomy-Wilhoit ) .
The series ends with episode 192 , `` Michelle Rides Again  भाग   2  '' , when Michelle loses her memory  और  the family  कोशिशें  to restore it  .
Notice of Stamp Act of 1765 in Newspaper
American newspapers reacted to  the  Stamp Act with anger and predictions  of  the demise of journalism .
The Stamp Act 1765 ( short title Duties in  अमरीकी  Colonies Act 1765 ; 5 George III , c. 12 ) imposed a direct tax by the  अंग्रेजों  Parliament specifically on the colonies of British America , and  it  required  कि  many  मुद्रित  materials in  the   colonies  be produced  on   stamped  paper produced in London , carrying an embossed revenue  स्टैम्प  .
These printed materials were legal documents ,  मैगज़ीन  , newspapers and many other types  of  paper  प्रयुक्त   throughout  the colonies  .
जैसे   पिछला  taxes , the  स्टैम्प   कर  had to  be  paid in  मान्य  British currency ,  नहीं  in colonial paper money .
the   purpose  of the tax was to help pay for troops stationed  in  North America after the  अंग्रेजों  victory  in  the Seven Years ' War .
The British government felt that the  colonies  were the primary beneficiaries of this military  उपस्थिति  ,  और   चाहिए  pay at least a portion of the expense  .
The Stamp  अधिनियम  met great resistance in the colonies .
the  colonies sent  no   प्रतिनिधि  to Parliament , and therefore had  no  influence over  कया  taxes were raised , how they  यहूद  levied , or how they would be spent .
Many colonists  माना  it a  उल्लंघन  of their rights as Englishmen to  be  taxed  बगैर  their consent —consent that  तभी   the  colonial  विधानमंडलों  could  ग्रान्ट  .
Colonial assemblies sent  याचिकाएं  and  विरोध  .
The Stamp Act Congress held in New York City , reflecting the first significant joint colonial response to any  अंग्रेजों  measure , also petitioned Parliament  और  the King .
लोकल  protest groups , led by colonial merchants and landowners , established  कनेक्शन्स  through correspondence that created a loose coalition that extended from New England to  जॉर्जिया  .
Protests and demonstrations initiated by  the  Sons  of   स्वतंत्रता  often turned violent  और  destructive as  the  masses became involved .
Very  जल्द  all stamp tax distributors  यहूद  intimidated into resigning  उनके   आयोग   ,   और  the  कर   थी  never effectively collected .
Opposition to the Stamp Act was not limited to the colonies .
British merchants  और  manufacturers , whose exports to the colonies were threatened by colonial economic problems exacerbated by the tax ,  भी   pressured  Parliament .
The Act was repealed on March  18   ,  1766 as a matter of  expedience  , but Parliament  affirmed   इसके  power to legislate for the  colonies   “in  all  मामले  whatsoever” by also passing  the  Declaratory Act .
There followed a series  of  new taxes  और  regulations , likewise opposed by the colonists .
The episode played a major role in  धमक  the grievances and enabling  the  organized colonial resistance  कि  led to the American Revolution in 1775 .
PT-105 underway .
PT boats were  a   किस्में  of torpedo-armed fast attack craft used by  the  United States  नेवी   in  World War II to attack larger surface ships .
`` PT '' is the US hull classification  प्रतीक  for `` Patrol Torpedo  ''  .
The PT boat  squadrons   यहूद  nicknamed `` the mosquito fleet '' .
The Japanese called them `` Devil Boats '' .
The original pre– World War I  torpedo  boats were designed with `` displacement  ''  hulls  .
They displaced up  to   300  tons  और  the top  गति   थी  .
The PT boats used in  संसार   युद्ध  II were built using the planing -type hull form developed for racing boats .
They were much smaller ( 30–75 tons ) and faster  (  35–40 knots ) .
Both types were designed to strike at larger warships with torpedoes , using relatively high speed to  मिलेंगी  close , and small size to avoid being spotted and hit  by  gunfire .
वे  were much less expensive than large warships .
PT boats were much faster , smaller ,  और   सस्ता  than conventional ( displacement  हल  ) vessels .
During World War  ii  , American PT boats engaged enemy  destroyers  and numerous other surface  शिल्प  , ranging from small  नौकाएँ  to large supply ships .
PT boats also operated as  gunboats  against enemy small craft ,  ऐसे  as  कराया   barges  used by the Japanese forces for inter-island transport .
Good Friday is a religious holiday observed primarily by Christians commemorating the crucifixion of Jesus  मसीह  and his death at Calvary .
The  अवकाश  is observed during  पावन  Week as part of  the   paschal  Triduum on the Friday preceding  ईस्टर   संडे  ,  और  may  coincide  with the  यहूदी   observance  of  passover  .
It  is  also known  as   पावन  Friday  ,  Great Friday , Black Friday , or Easter Friday , though  the  latter properly refers  to  the Friday in  ईस्टर  week .
Based on  the  details of the  canonical  gospels , the Crucifixion of Jesus  थी  most  संभावित  to have been  on  a Friday  (  the day before the Sabbath ) ( ) .
The estimated year of the Crucifixion  is   ad   33  ,  by  two different groups , and  originally  as AD 34 by Isaac Newton via the  मतभेद  between the  biblical   और  Julian calendars  और  the crescent  of  the  चंद्रमा  .
a  third method ,  using   a  completely different astronomical approach based on a lunar Crucifixion darkness and eclipse model ( consistent with Apostle Peter  's   सन्दर्भ   to  a `` moon of blood '' in Acts 2:20 ) ,  अंक  to Friday  ,  3 April AD  33  .
the   ग्रेट  Basin is  the  largest area of endorheic  watersheds  in North America  .
It is noted for both its arid conditions and its Basin and range topography that  varies  from the North American low point  at   badwater  Basin to the  उच्चतम  point of the contiguous United States  ,   कम  than  दूर  at  the  summit of Mount Whitney .
The  प्रदेश  spans several  physiographic  divisions ,  biomes  / ecoregions , and deserts .
Raster  may  refer to:
Raster  ग्राफिक्स  , graphical  तकनीकों   using  arrays  of  pixel values
Raster graphics editor , a  कंप्यूटर  program
Raster scan  ,  the pattern of image readout , transmission , storage ,  और   पुनर्निर्माण  in television  और  computer  बिंब
Rasterisation , or rasterization , conversion of a vector image to a raster image
Raster image processor , or RIP , a component of a printing system that performs rasterisation
Raster interrupt , a computer  इन्टरनेट  signal
Raster  to  vector ,  an  image conversion  प्रक्रम
Raster  बार  , an effect used in  कंप्यूटर  demos
raster-noton  , a record label
Rastrum ,  a   यंत्र  used in medieval music manuscripts  to  draw staff lines
Raster Document Object , a file format
बियोवुल्फ़  ( ;  बूढ़ा   अंग्रेज़ी   :  ) is  a  legendary Geatish  नायिका  and  बाद   turned  king in the epic poem named after  उसे  , one of the oldest surviving pieces of  साहित्य  in the English language .
The  आक्रमण  on  पर्ल   हार्बर  ( called  हवाई  Operation  or  Operation  ai  by the Japanese Imperial General Headquarters ( Operation Z in planning )  और   the  Battle of Pearl Harbor  )  was  a  surprise  सैन्य  strike conducted  by  the  इम्पीरियल  Japanese Navy against the United States naval  आधार  at Pearl Harbor , Hawaii ,  on  the morning  of  December 7 , 1941  (   दिसम्बर  8 in Japan ) .
From  the  standpoint  of  the defenders , the attack  commenced  at  7:48  a.m. Hawaiian Time .
The attack was intended as a preventive action in order to keep the U.S. Pacific Fleet from interfering  साथ  military actions the Empire  of  Japan was  नियोजन  in  southeast  Asia  विरूद्ध   विदेशी  territories of  the  United  किंगडम   ,  the Netherlands , and  the   संयुक्त  States .
The base was attacked by  353  Japanese fighters , bombers and torpedo  planes  in  दो  waves , launched from six aircraft carriers .
सब   आठ  U.S. Navy  battleships  were damaged , with four being  sunk   .
Two of these were later raised , and with  the  remaining four repaired  ,  six battleships returned to service later in the war .
The Japanese also sank  or  damaged three cruisers , three destroyers ,  an   anti-aircraft  training  जलयान  , and one minelayer .
188 U.S. aircraft were  नष्ट  ; 2,402 Americans  यहूद   मारे  and 1,282 wounded .
Important base installations such as  the  power station ,  डॉकयार्ड  , maintenance , and fuel and  torpedo  storage  सुविधाएं  , as well as  the  submarine piers and headquarters building  (  also  घर   of   the  intelligence section  )  were not attacked .
जापानी  losses were light : 29 aircraft and five midget submarines  खोया  ,  और  65 servicemen killed or  wounded   .
एक  Japanese sailor was captured  .
The attack  आए  as  a  profound shock to the American people and led  सीधे   to  the American entry into World War II  in  both  the  Pacific and European theaters .
The following  दिन  ( December 8 ) , the United States declared war on Japan .
Domestic support for non-interventionism , which had been strong , disappeared .
Clandestine support  of  Britain ( for  उदाहरण  the  neutrality   पैट्रोल  ) was replaced by active alliance .
Subsequent operations by the  u.S.  prompted Germany and Italy to declare  युद्ध  on the U.S. on December 11  ,  which was reciprocated by the U.S. the same day  .
There were numerous historical precedents for unannounced military action by  जापानी  .
However  ,  the  कमी  of any formal warning  ,  particularly while negotiations were still apparently  जारी  , led President Franklin D. Roosevelt to  proclaim  December 7 , 1941 , `` a date which  होगा   सजीव  in infamy `` .
U.S. Route 85 ( US 85 ) is a  north–south  United States highway  कि  runs  लिये  in the Mountain - Northern Plains states  of  the United  राज्य  .
The  दक्षिणी  terminus  of  the route is at the United States-Mexico border in El Paso , Texas , connecting with Mexican Federal  राजमार्ग  45 .
The northern  टर्मिनस  is at  the  United  states-canada  border  in   fortuna  , North  डकोटा  , where the route  continues   उत्तर  as Saskatchewan Highway  35  .
In both  the  United States and Saskatchewan  ,  Canada  the  route is known  as  the CanAm  राजमार्ग  .
भाग  of US 85 are considered  भाग   of   the  Theodore Roosevelt Expressway .
The United States  अध्यक्षीय  election of 1968 was the 46th quadrennial presidential election , held on Tuesday  ,  November  5   ,   1968  .
The Republican nominee , former Vice-President Richard Nixon , won the election over  the  Democratic  nominee  , incumbent Vice-President Hubert Humphrey .
Nixon ran on a campaign  कि   promised  to restore law and order to the nation 's cities ,  फटा  by riots and crime .
Analysts  have   argued  the election of 1968  is  a realigning election as it permanently disrupted the New Deal Coalition that had dominated presidential politics for 36 years .
coming  four years  बाद  Democrat Lyndon B. Johnson  जीती  in  a  historic  भूस्खलन  , the election saw the incumbent president forced out of the race and  a  Republican elected for the first  समय   in  twelve years  .
It was a wrenching national experience  ,  conducted during  a  year of violence that included the assassination  of   सिविल  rights leader Martin Luther  किंग  , Jr. , and subsequent race  दंगे  across the nation , the assasination of Democratic presidential candidate Robert F.  कैनेडी  ,  फैली  opposition to the Vietnam  युद्ध  across university campuses ,  और   हिंसक   confrontations  between  पुलिस  and anti-war protesters at  the  1968 Democratic National Convention as the Democratic party split again and again .
The election featured the strongest  तीसरा  party effort since 1912 by former Alabama Governor  जार्ज   वालेस  ,  a  Democrat .
Because Wallace 's campaign opposed federal intervention in the South to end school segregation , he carried the Deep South  और   भागा  well  in  ethnic industrial districts in the North  .
This was  the  last election in which New York had the most votes in the electoral college  (  43 votes ) .
After the 1970 census , California  gained   the  most electoral  मत   और  has  remained  the most populous  राज्य  since then .
This is the  नवीनतम  election where a  अध्यक्षीय  ticket won without carrying  the  vice  अध्यक्षीय  candidate 's home state .
Windows Task Manager is a task manager or System monitor application included with the Microsoft Windows  nt  family of operating systems that provides limited information about computer  प्रदर्शन  and running applications , processes and CPU usage , commit charge and  मेमोरी  information  ,  network activity  और  statistics  ,   logged-in  users , and system services (  और  as often  is   the  case with software tools provided by  microsoft   लिये  Windows , 3rd  पार्टी  software is available which fills the requirements more  thoroughly  ,  e.g  ,  ``  Process  एक्सप्लोरर  '' , `` Extended Task Manager ''  ,  `` Anvir Task  मैनेजर  '' , `` Process Hacker '' , and `` System  एक्सप्लोरर   ''  )  .
The Task Manager  can  also be used to set  प्रक्रम   प्राथमिकताएं  ,  प्रोसेसर  affinity , forcibly terminate processes , and  shut  down  ,   restart  ,  hibernate  or  log  off from Windows .
Windows Task  मैनेजर  was introduced with Windows NT 4.0 .
Previous versions of Windows NT included the Task List application , which  था  far fewer features .
The task list was capable  of  listing currently running  प्रक्रियाओं  and killing them ,  or  creating a new process .
In Windows XP  तभी  , a Shutdown menu is also present that allows  अभिगम   to   standby  , Hibernate ,  फेरे   बंद  , Restart , Log Off and Switch User  .
Earlier versions of Microsoft Windows (  microsoft  Windows 3.x ,  खिड़कियाँ  95 , Windows  98  ) had a program known as tasks to display the  कार्यक्रम  currently  कार्यशील   .
This file  थी  executed by running the  taskman.exe  file from the C  :  \Windows directory .
Kanji ( ; )  हैं  the adopted logographic Chinese characters ( hanzi ) that are used in the modern Japanese writing system along with hiragana ( ひらがな ,  )  , katakana ( カタカナ , ) , Hindu-Arabic numerals , and  the   occasional  use of the Latin alphabet .
The Japanese term kanji  (  ) for the Chinese characters literally means `` Han characters '' and is written using the same  वर्ण  as  the  Chinese hanzi (  )   .
John R Williams ( May 4 , 1782 – October 20 , 1854 ) was  an  American soldier , merchant , and politician  जो  is most well known for serving as the  पहला  mayor of Detroit  ,  Michigan .
in  total  ,   he   परोसा  as  डेट्रॉयट   's  mayor for five other terms .
He also was a brigadier general  in   the  United  राज्य  Army during the  ब्लैक   हॉक  War  .
A simple dry magnetic portable  कम्पास  .
A smartphone that can be used as a compass because of the  magnetometer  inside .
An iPhone that can be used as a geological compass  क्युकी  of the 3-axis teslameter  और   3-axis   accelerometer  inside  it
a  military compass that was  प्रयुक्त  during World  युद्ध   i   .
a  compass is a navigational  यंत्र   कि   shows  directions in a frame of reference that is stationary relative to  the   सतह  of the earth .
The frame of  सन्दर्भ  defines the four  कार्डिनल   दिशानिर्देश  ( or points ) – north , south , east , and  वेस्ट  .
Intermediate directions are also defined .
प्रायः   ,   a  diagram called a compass  रोज़   ,  which shows  the  directions (  साथ   उनके  names  प्रायः  abbreviated to initials )  ,  is marked on the compass  .
When the compass is in  उपयोग   ,   the  rose is aligned with the real directions in the frame of reference , so ,  लिये  example ,  the  `` N ''  चिह्नित  on  the  rose really  अंक   to  the north .
अक्सर  ,  in  addition to the rose or sometimes instead of  it  , angle  markings  in degrees are shown on the compass .
उत्तर   corresponds  to  शून्य  degrees , and the angles increase clockwise  ,   so  east  is  90 degrees , south is 180 , and west  is  270 .
These numbers allow the compass to show  azimuths  or bearings ,  जिससे  are commonly stated in this notation .
The magnetic  कम्पास  was first invented as a device for divination as early as the Chinese Han Dynasty (  चूंकि  about 206 BC ) .
The compass was used in Song Dynasty China by  the  military for navigational  orienteering  by 1040-1044 , and was used for maritime  नेविगेशन  by 1111 to 1117 .
The use of a  कम्पास  is recorded in Western Europe between 1187  और  1202 , and in Persia  in  1232 .
The dry compass  थी  invented in Europe  around   1300  .
This  थी  supplanted in the early 20th  सदी  by the liquid-filled magnetic compass .
The Inca Empire or Inka Empire ( Quechua : Tawantinsuyu ) was the  largest  empire in pre-Columbian America .
the  administrative , political and military center of the  साम्राज्य   थी  located in Cusco in  modern-day  Peru .
the  Inca civilization  arose  from the highlands of  पेरू   sometime  in  the  early 13th century  .
From 1438 to  1533  , the Incas used a variety  of  methods , from conquest to peaceful assimilation  ,  to incorporate a large portion of western South America  ,  centered  on  the Andean mountain ranges , including , besides Peru , large parts  of  modern Ecuador , western and south central Bolivia ,  उत्तरपश्चिम  Argentina , north and central Chile  ,  and southern Colombia into a state  comparable  to the  ऐतिहासिक   empires  of Eurasia .
The official language of  the  empire was Quechua , although hundreds of local  भाषाएं  and dialects of Quechua were spoken .
The Inca referred to their  साम्राज्य  as Tawantinsuyu which can  be  translated as The Four Regions or  the  Four United Provinces .
वहीँ   यहूद  many local forms of worship , most of them  concerning  local sacred `` Huacas ``  ,   लकिन  the Inca leadership  प्रोत्साहित  the  इबादत   of  Inti —the  सूर्य  god—and imposed its sovereignty above other cults such as  कि   of  Pachamama .
The Incas considered their  किंग  , the Sapa Inca , to be the `` child of the sun . ''
The  गुर्दे  are organs that  serve  several essential regulatory  भूमिकाएँ  in most animals ,  सहित  vertebrates and some  invertebrates  .
They are essential in the urinary system and  भी  serve homeostatic functions such  as  the regulation of electrolytes , maintenance of acid–base balance , and  विनियमन  of blood pressure (  via  maintaining salt  और  water  संतुलन  ) .
They serve the body  as  a  प्राकृतिक  filter of the blood , and remove wastes which are diverted to the urinary bladder .
In producing urine , the kidneys excrete  wastes  such as urea and ammonium , and they are  भी  responsible  लिये  the reabsorption of  जल  , glucose , and  अमीनो  acids .
The kidneys also produce hormones  सहित   calcitriol   ,  erythropoietin , and the enzyme renin .
Located at the rear of the abdominal cavity in the retroperitoneum  ,  the kidneys receive blood  इससे  the  युग्म   renal  arteries , and drain into the paired  renal  veins .
Each kidney excretes urine into  a   ureter  , itself a  युग्म  structure that empties into the urinary  ब्लैडर   .
Renal physiology is the study of  गुर्दा  function , while  nephrology  is  the  medical  specialty  concerned with kidney diseases .
Diseases of the kidney are diverse , but individuals with kidney disease frequently display characteristic  नैदानिक  features  .
आम  clinical conditions involving the  गुर्दा  include  the  nephritic and nephrotic syndromes , renal cysts , acute kidney injury ,  दीर्घकालिक  kidney disease ,  urinary   ट्रैक्ट  infection , nephrolithiasis ,  और  urinary tract obstruction .
विभिन्न  cancers  of  the kidney  मौजूद  ; the  सबसे  common  वयस्क  renal cancer  is  renal  कोशिका  carcinoma .
Cancers , cysts  ,  and some other renal conditions can be managed  साथ   हटाना  of  the   गुर्दा  , or nephrectomy .
When renal function , measured by  glomerular  filtration rate , is persistently poor , dialysis and kidney transplantation may be treatment options  .
Although they are not severely harmful , kidney stones can be painful  और   a   nuisance  .
the  removal  of  kidney  पत्थरों  involves ultrasound treatment  to   ब्रेक  up the stones into smaller pieces , which are then  passed  through the urinary  ट्रैक्ट  .
One common symptom of  गुर्दा   पत्थरों  is a  शार्प  pain in the  medial/lateral  segments of the lower back  .
Lockton  कंपनियाँ  Inc. is  the  world 's largest privately held insurance brokerage firm , providing insurance ,  रिस्क   प्रबन्धन  and employee benefits solutions .
in   जोड  to its  कान्सास  City , Missouri  मुख्यालय  , Lockton  operates  60 locations in 17 countries  .
lockton   is  currently home to more than 4,450  शरीक  worldwide .
The company was  संस्थापित  by Jack  lockton  in  1966   और  has since become the world’s 9th largest  बीमे  brokerage firm .
Lockton  serves  a wide array of industries with  सेवाएं  that  शामिल  risk management , casualty , surety , professional indemnity and more  .
For 46  सालो  ,  lockton  posted extraordinary organic growth  ,  with global revenues reaching $ 915 million in fiscal 2012  .
Lockton  लाभ  Group : Lockton’s Employee Benefit’s team works closely with insurance carriers and administrators to create comprehensive and integrated benefits strategies for clients .
The Lockton Benefits Group provides services including compliance , executive benefits ,  स्वास्थ्य  and welfare , health  रिस्क  solutions , retirement and more .
Lockton Affinity : Lockton Affinity ,  an  affiliate of Lockton Companies , meets the  बीमे  needs of  अपनापन  groups ,  franchises   ,  professional organizations , and  एसोसिएशन  of all  आकार  .
Lockton Affinity offers  a  variety of insurance product options  और  programs .
Products include : General Liability  ,  Professional  देयता  ,  प्रॉपर्टी  , Workers Compensation  ,  Directors & Officers Liability , Commercial Auto , Specialty Coverage  ,  Excess  ,  Health Plans and more .
Lockton International : Lockton  अंतरराष्ट्रीय   operates  offices in the UK  और  Ireland , as well as offices throughout Asia  और  Latin America  .
in  Europe , Lockton International is a partner in EOS RISQ , Europe’s leading  बीमे  broking and risk management consultancy  .
EOS RISQ  is  an equity-based European  साझेदारी  of major independent insurance brokers with over  3,500  employees based in more than 30  देशों   in  Europe .
Lockton International provides  specialized  solutions for personal lines , SME’s  और  major multi-national  क्लाइंट   .
White chocolate is a  चॉकलेट  derivative .
It  commonly   consists  of cocoa butter , sugar , milk solids and salt , and  is  characterized by a  पाले  yellow or ivory  रूप  .
The melting point of cocoa  मक्खन  , its primary cocoa bean component , is  ऊँची  enough to keep white chocolate solid  at  room temperature .
Donald Leon `` Don '' Blankenship  (   born  March 14 , 1950  )  was  अध्यक्ष   और  CEO of Massey Energy Co.  ,  the sixth largest coal company (  by  2008 production ) in the United States .
He  परोसा  in those  भूमिकाएँ  from November 30 , 2000 , until  दिसम्बर   31  ,  2010  .
Blankenship is an active financial backer  of  the  रिपब्लिकन  party and participant  in  local and state  राजनीती   ,   विशेषकर  in his home  राज्य   of  West Virginia  .
He has frequently spoken out publicly about politics , the environment , unions , and coal production .
u.S.  Securities and  एक्सचेंज  Commission filings show Blankenship  थी  paid $ 17.8 million  in   2009  , the highest in the  कोयले  industry .
His 2009 pay represents a $ 6.8 million  उठाएँ   over   2008  and almost double his  मुआवजे   पैकेज  in 2007 .
Blankenship  भी  received a deferred compensation package  valued  at $ 27.2 million  in  2009 .
On December 3 , 2010 , Blankenship announced that he  थी  retiring  as  CEO at the end of the year , and would be succeeded by Massey President Baxter F. Phillips  jr  .
