Negligence ( Lat  .  negligentia , from neglegere , to  उपेक्षा  , literally `` not to pick up something ''  )   is  a failure to exercise the care that a  reasonably  prudent person would  कसरत  in like circumstances .
The area of  अपकृत्य  law known as negligence involves  नुक़सान  caused  by   carelessness   ,  not intentional harm .
According to Jay M. Feinman of the  rutgers   विश्वविद्यालयों  School of Law ;
`` The core idea  of  negligence is that  लोगों  should exercise reasonable care  जब  they act by  लेने  account of the potential harm that they might  foreseeably  cause harm to other people . ''
`` those  जो  go personally or bring property where they know that they or  it  may come into collision with the persons or property of others have  by  law  a  duty cast  upon  them  to   उपयोग   उचित  care and skill to  avoid  such a collision . ''
Fletcher  v  Rylands ( [ 1866 ] LR 1 Ex 265 )
Through civil litigation  ,  if  an  injured person proves that another person acted negligently  to  cause their  चोट  ,  वे   can  recover damages to compensate  लिये  their harm .
Proving a  मामला  for negligence can potentially  entitle   the  injured plaintiff to compensation for harm to  उनके   देह  , property , mental well-being , financial status , or intimate relationships .
However , because negligence cases are very  fact-specific  , this general definition does not  fully  explain  the  concept of  जब  the law will require one  व्यक्ति  to compensate another for  नुकसान  caused by  आकस्मिक  injury .
Further , the law of negligence at common law is only one aspect  of  the law of  देयता   .
Although resulting damages must be proven in order to recover compensation  in   a  negligence action , the nature and extent of  those  damages are not the primary  फ़ोकस   of  negligence cases  .
A melanocytic nevus (  भी  known as `` Nevocytic  nevus  '' ) is a type of lesion that contains nevus cells ( a  प्रकार  of melanocyte ) .
Some  स्त्रोत  equate the term mole with ``  melanocytic  nevus '' .
Other  स्त्रोत  reserve the term `` mole '' for other purposes .
The  बहुमत   of  moles appear  दौरान  the  पहला   दो  decades of  a  person’s  जीवन  ,  जबकि  about one in  प्रत्येक  100 babies is born with moles  .
Acquired moles are  a  form of benign neoplasm , while congenital moles , or  जन्मजात  nevi , are considered  a  minor malformation or hamartoma and may be at  a  higher risk for melanoma .
A mole  can  be either subdermal ( under the skin ) or a pigmented growth  on  the skin , formed mostly of a  प्रकार   of  cell  ज्ञात  as a melanocyte .
The high concentration of the body’s pigmenting agent  ,  melanin , is responsible  लिये   उनके  dark  रंग  .
Moles are  a  member of the family of skin  lesions  known  as   nevi  .
The  व्यापक  metabolic panel  ,  or chemical screen  ,  ( CMP ;  cpt  code 80053 ) is a panel of 14 blood tests  जिससे  serves as an  आरंभिक  broad  चिकित्सा  screening  औजार  .
The CMP  provides  a rough check of kidney  फलन  , liver function ,  और  electrolyte and  द्रव   संतुलन   ,  but it is far from perfect .
Abnormal values from a CBC  may  be a result  of   गलत  positives  और  thus  the  CBC may  need  to be repeated for a  रोगी  ( or replaced with a more specific  परीक्षण  ) .
The CMP  is  an expanded version  of  the basic metabolic panel ( BMP ) , which does  नहीं  include  जिगर  tests .
A  cmp  ( or BMP ) can  be  ordered as part of  a  routine physical examination  ,  or may be used  to  monitor a patient with a chronic disease  ,   ऐसे  as  मधुमेह  mellitus or hypertension .
Previous  names  for the panel of  परीक्षण  have been Chem 12 , Chemistry panel ,  रसायन   स्क्रीन  , SMA 12 ,  sma  20 and SMAC  (   sequential  Multiple Analysis - Computer  )  .
the  tests are performed on machines based on the AutoAnalyzer invented in 1957 .

Natural gas is a naturally occurring  हाइड्रोकार्बन  gas mixture consisting primarily  of  methane  ,   लकिन  commonly including varying amounts  of   अन्य   hydrocarbons  , carbon dioxide , nitrogen , and hydrogen sulfide  .
Natural gas is an energy  सोर्स  often  प्रयुक्त  for  हीटिंग  , cooking , and electricity generation .
It is also used  as  fuel for vehicles and as a chemical  फर्टिलाइजर  in the manufacture of plastics and other  commercially  important organic chemicals .
Natural gas is found in deep  भूमिगत   प्राकृतिक  rock formations or  संबद्ध  with other hydrocarbon reservoirs in coal beds  और  as methane  clathrates   .
Petroleum  is  also another resource found in  निकटता  to and with natural gas .
सबसे  natural gas was created over time by two mechanisms : biogenic and thermogenic .
Biogenic gas is created by methanogenic organisms in marshes  ,  bogs , landfills  ,  and shallow sediments  .
Deeper  in  the earth , at  वृहद  temperature  और  pressure , thermogenic gas is created from  दफ्न  organic  सामग्री  .
Before natural gas can  be  used as a fuel  ,  it must  undergo  processing to remove impurities  ,  including water , to meet  the  specifications of marketable natural gas .
The by-products of  प्रसंस्करण  include ethane , propane , butanes  ,  pentanes , and higher  आणविक  weight hydrocarbons , hydrogen sulfide ( which may  be  converted into pure sulfur ) , carbon dioxide , water  वाष्प  ,  और  sometimes  हीलियम  and nitrogen .
प्राकृतिक  gas is often  informally  referred to simply as gas , especially when compared to other energy sources such  as  oil or  कोयले  .
This page is about the  कल्पना  Movers band  .
For information  परिचय  the TV show starring the band , see Imagination Movers (  tv  series ) .
कल्पना  Movers  is  a band  formed  in  नई  Orleans , Louisiana , in 2003 .
The lineup  शामिल  Rich Collins  ,   स्कॉट   durbin  , Dave Poche , and Scott  ``  Smitty '' Smith .
Members of the group were longtime  मित्रों  and  पड़ोसी  .
the  group started as a television/music concept which was pitched to  लोकल   pbs  affiliates in  नई  Orleans .
WLAE-TV was the first to take an interest in the group and later introduced  उन्हें  to Beth Courtney , the President  &  Chief  कार्यपालिका  Officer at Louisiana Public Broadcasting .
Soon after , LPB  began  airing one-minute  वीडियो  produced by the Imagination Movers themselves .
The Movers built  a  sizable  क्षेत्रीय  following by setting educational songs for kids to melodies and  लय  that adults appreciate  as  well .
वे  sold more than 100,000 copies of their  self-produced  CDs and DVDs .
Their three indie CDs  :  `` Good  विचार  , '' `` Calling All  मूवर्स  , '' and `` Eight Feet ''  साथ  with their grass  जड़ें  DVD `` Stir It Up '' have , combined , won fourteen national awards , from such groups as the National Association of Parenting Publications  (  NAPPA  )  and Parents  '  Choice .
In early 2005 , Disney took notice  ,  and  initiated  negotiations  to  add  the  Movers to  the  company 's  रोस्टर  .
These were interrupted in August when the flood protection  designed  and built by the Army Corps of Engineers to protect New Orleans failed .
The resulting  floodwater  claimed the band 's office , as well as the  घरों  of  कॉलिन्स  , Durbin and Poche  –   लकिन  the deal was signed in  the   वसन्त  of  2006  .
In 2008 ,  वॉल्ट  Disney Records  introduced   the   कल्पना  Movers  '  music to the nation  साथ  the release of  the   मूवर्स  ' first nationally-released CD ,  ``  Juice Box  नायक  .  ''
In September  2008  , a 30-minute show  featuring  the  समूह  began airing on  the   डिज़्नी   चैनल   's  preschool programming block known as Playhouse Disney ,  और  currently airs on Playhouse  डिज़्नी  's replacement , Disney Junior .
The Movers write and  perform  all  the   गीतों  on their show .
Moreover , the Imagination Movers have received critical kudos for their live  कॉन्सर्ट  performances  .
in  October  2009   ,  the Imagination Movers started the ``  सजीव  from the  विचार   गोदाम  Concert Tour  2009  '' .
Traveling from  mid-october  to mid-December  2009  their live performances include lots of their favorite songs and  नाचना  ,  as   खूब  as video appearances of Warehouse Mouse .
Beginning in early-February 2011 and  wrapping  up  in  late May  2011   ,  the  कल्पना  Movers presented their ``  in   a  Big Warehouse Concert Tour , '' playing more  than  100 shows in 50+ cities across North America .
From  कूच  to October 2012 , the Imagination Movers toured North America on their post-Disney  ``   rock-o-matic  '' tour .
The show maintained several elements of the  असली  TV  अवधारणा  , such as an on-stage `` idea emergency '' and several sets from their older  कैटलॉग  ;  however  ,  साथ  the  प्रस्थान  of Wendy Calio  वापस  to her native Hawaii , the  अक्षर  ``  नीना  ''  ,  along with her musical numbers  ,  is  नहीं  present .
The  दौरे   promotes  the Imagination Movers '  नई  album/DVD release , `` Rock-O-Matic '' , which  सुविधाएँ  all new music from the  बैंड  .
The album itself  is  produced independently of  डिज़्नी   और  has a notably more mature  ,  contemporary rock-and-roll sound , though  स्टिल  very  उचित   लिये  children  .
Several performance dates were moved to  बाद  in 2012 to benefit from the increased  एक्सपोज़र  of the Imagination Movers  tv  show now  playing  daily  on   डिज़्नी  Junior .
The platypus ( Ornithorhynchus  anatinus  ) is a semiaquatic mammal endemic  to  eastern Australia , including Tasmania .
Together with the four species of echidna ,  it  is one of the  पाँच  extant  प्रजाति  of monotremes  ,  the only mammals that lay  अंडे  instead  of  giving  जनम  .
It is the sole living representative of its family ( Ornithorhynchidae ) and genus ( Ornithorhynchus ) , though a number of related species have been  मिला   in  the fossil record .
the  unusual appearance  of  this egg-laying , duck -billed  ,  beaver -tailed ,  otter   -footed  mammal baffled European naturalists when they first encountered it  ,  with some considering it  an   विस्तृत  fraud  .
It is one  of  the few venomous mammals , the male  platypus  having a spur on the hind foot that delivers a venom capable of causing severe pain to humans .
The unique features of the platypus make it an important  विषय  in the study of evolutionary biology and a  recognisable  and  iconic  symbol of Australia ; it has appeared as  a  mascot  at  national events and is featured  on  the reverse of its  20-cent  coin .
The platypus is the animal  emblem  of the state of New South  वेल्स  .
Until the early 20th century , it was hunted  लिये  its  फर  , but it is now protected  throughout  its range .
Although captive  प्रजनन  programmes have  था  only limited  कामयाबी  and the  platypus  is vulnerable to the effects of pollution  ,  it is not  अंतर्गत  any immediate threat .
the   chupacabra  or Chupacabras ( ,  इससे   chupar  ``  to   चूस  '' and cabra `` goat ''  ,  literally  ``  goat sucker '' )  is  a legendary  cryptid   rumored  to inhabit parts of the Americas .
It is associated more  recently   साथ  sightings of an allegedly unknown animal in Puerto Rico ( where these sightings  यहूद  first reported ) ,  मैक्सिको  , and the  संयुक्त  States  ,  especially in the  latter  's Latin American communities .
The name  आता   इससे  the animal 's reported habit of attacking and drinking the blood of livestock , especially  बकरियों  .
Physical descriptions of  the  creature vary .
Eyewitness sightings have been claimed as  जल्दी  as 1995 in Puerto Rico  ,   और  have since  महरूम   reported  as far  उत्तर  as Maine ,  और  as far south as Chile , and even being spotted outside the Americas in countries  जैसे  Russia and The Philippines .
It  is   माना  a heavy creature , the  आकार  of a  छोटी  bear ,  साथ   a   पंक्ति  of spines reaching  इससे   the   गर्दन  to the  आधार   of  the tail .
Sighting reports of the Chupacabra have  महरूम  disregarded as uncorroborated or lacking evidence , while most reports  in  northern  मैक्सिको  and the  दक्षिणी  United States have been verified  as  canids  afflicted   by   mange  .
biologists  and wildlife management officials view the  chupacabra  as a contemporary legend .
the  North  अमरीकी  Free Trade Agreement  (  NAFTA ) is an agreement signed by Canada  ,  Mexico , and the United  राज्य  , creating a trilateral trade bloc in North America .
The agreement came into force on January  1  , 1994 .
It superseded the  canada–united  States  फ़्री  Trade Agreement  between  the U.S. , Canada , and  मैक्सिको
NAFTA has two  पूरक  : the North American Agreement on Environmental Cooperation  (  NAAEC ) and the  उत्तर  American Agreement on Labor Cooperation  (   naalc  ) .
Thermal comfort is  the  condition of mind that expresses  संतोष  with the thermal environment and is assessed by subjective evaluation  (   ansi  /  ashrae  Standard 55 ) .
Maintaining this standard of  थर्मल  comfort for occupants of buildings or other enclosures is  एक  of the important goals of HVAC  (  heating  ,  ventilation , and air conditioning  )  design engineers .
The Predicted Mean Vote ( PMV ) model stands among  the  most recognized thermal comfort models .
It was developed  using  principles of heat balance  और   प्रायोगिक   आंकड़ा  collected in a  नियंत्रित  climate chamber under steady state conditions .
क्युकी   the  PMV model  थी  derived from data collected  in   a  controlled climate , it is not suitable  लिये   अनुप्रयोग   in  naturally ventilated spaces  जिससे  often  have  high levels of air movement .
This shortcoming motivated the development of a family of  अनुभवजन्य  statistical  मॉडल  of thermal  सुकून  in naturally ventilated spaces known as  अनुकूली  models .
Adaptive models  of  thermal comfort consider occupants as  dynamically  interacting with  उनके  environment , and controlling their thermal comfort by means of  कपडे  or window-opening  और   closing  .
इस  is  in   कंट्रास्ट  to thermal comfort in  sealed  buildings , in which occupants experience the environment passively  .
Thermal comfort is affected by heat conduction  ,  convection ,  विकिरण  ,  और  evaporative  ऊष्मा  loss .
थर्मल  comfort  is  maintained when the heat generated by human metabolism  is  allowed to dissipate  ,  thus  maintaining  thermal equilibrium with  the  surroundings .
It has been long recognized that the sensation of feeling hot or cold is  नहीं  just dependent on  एयर  temperature alone .
Thermal comfort calculations according to ANSI/ASHRAE Standard  55  can be freely performed with the CBE Thermal  सुकून  Tool for ASHRAE-55 .
Durante degli Alighieri , simply referred to as Dante  (  ,  ;  ; c. 1265–1321 ) , was a major Italian poet of  the  Middle Ages  .
His Divine Comedy , originally called ' and later called ' by Boccaccio , is widely considered  the  greatest literary work composed in  the  Italian language and  a   कलाकृति  of world literature .
In Italy he  is  known as ' ( `` the  परम्  Poet ''  )  or just ' .
He , Petrarch and Boccaccio  हैं  also known as `` the three fountains ''  or  `` the three crowns '' .
Dante  is  also called the  ``  Father of the Italian language '' .
Headquarters ( Kobe , Japan )
(   )  is a tire and rubber company based  in  Japan  .
It is part of the Sumitomo Group .
the  company  traces  its origins to 1909 , when the Sumitomo Group  बना  an investment in Dunlop  जापानी  , the newly formed Japanese subsidiary of the British  कम्पनी  Dunlop  रबर  .
Over the years Sumitomo and Dunlop developed  a  close business relationship , and in 1963 the  sumitomo  Group acquired  कंट्रोल  of Dunlop Japan and renamed it Sumitomo  रबर  Industries Ltd .
In 1985 , when Dunlop Rubber  थी   लिया  over by  btr   पीएलसी  , the company acquired the automobile tire  एसेट   of  Dunlop , including the right  to  use the Dunlop brand on automobile tires .
the  acquisition did not include the US  और  Australian businesses ,  जिससे   यहूद  separately owned , but in 1986  sumitomo  also acquired the Dunlop Tire Corporation of the US from its management .
In 1997 , Sumitomo formed a  संयुक्त  venture with Goodyear Tire and  रबर  Company , by which  goodyear  and Sumitomo agreed to manufacture tires  लिये  each other 's markets , including Dunlop branded tires .
As part of the agreement ,  goodyear  acquired  75  % interests  in  Dunlop Tyres , the UK company which Sumitomo had formed  ,   और  in Dunlop Tire Corporation .
Goodyear and Sumitomo also made investments in  प्रत्येक   अन्य  .
Today , the company  makes  a wide range of rubber based products ,  सहित  automobile tires , golf balls and tennis balls .
microsoft  Visual Studio Express is a  नियत  of freeware integrated development environments ( IDE ) developed by  microsoft  that are lightweight versions  of  the Microsoft Visual  स्टुडियो  product line .
Express Editions  यहूद  conceived beginning with Visual Studio 2005 .
The idea of  एक्स्प्रेस  editions is to provide streamlined  ,  easy-to-use and easy-to-learn  ides  for users other than professional  तन्त्र  developers  ,   ऐसे  as hobbyists and students .
The Alps are one  of   the  great mountain range systems of Europe stretching approximately  आरपार  eight Alpine countries  इससे  Austria and Slovenia in  the  east , Switzerland ,  liechtenstein   ,  Germany , France to the west and Italy and Monaco to the south .
the  mountains were  formed  over  सैंकड़ों   of  millions of  सालो  as the  अफ़्रीकी  and Eurasian tectonic  प्लेटों  collided .
Extreme shortening  caused  by the  इवेंट  resulted in marine sedimentary rocks rising by thrusting and folding into high mountain peaks such as Mont Blanc  और   the  Matterhorn .
Mont Blanc spans the French–Italian border , and at is the highest mountain in  the  Alps .
The Alpine region  क्षेत्रफल   contains  many peaks higher than , known as the `` four-thousanders  ``  .
The altitude  और  size of the range affects the climate in Europe ; in  the  mountains precipitation  स्तर  vary greatly  और  climatic conditions consist of distinct zones .
Wildlife such  as  ibex live  in  the higher peaks to elevations  of  ,  और  plants such as Edelweiss grow in rocky areas in lower elevations  as   खूब  as in higher elevations  .
Evidence  of   इंसान  habitation in the Alps goes back to the Paleolithic era .
A mummified man  ,  determined to  be  5,000 years old , was discovered on  a  glacier at the Austrian–Italian border in  1991  .
by  the 6th century  bc  , the  सेल्टिक  La Tène  संस्कृति  was well established .
Hannibal may have crossed  the  Alps with a herd of elephants ,  और  the Romans had settlements in the region  .
In 1800 Napoleon crossed one of the mountain passes  साथ  an army of 40,000  .
The 18th and  19th   सदियां  saw an  influx  of naturalists ,  लेखक  , and  कलाकारों  , in  particular   the  Romantics , followed  by  the  सुनहरी   आयु  of  alpinism  as mountaineers  began  to  ascend  the  चोटियों   .
In World War II the Third  reich   invaded  the Alpine  देशों   ,   साथ   the   एक्सेप्शन  of  स्विट्ज़रलैंड   और  Liechtenstein ; Adolf Hitler kept a  आधार  of operation  in  the Bavarian Alps throughout the  युद्ध  .
The Alpine region  रै  a strong cultural identity .
the  traditional culture of  खेती  , cheesemaking ,  और   woodworking  still exists in Alpine  गांवों  , although the tourist industry began to  grow  early in the 20th century  और  expanded greatly  बाद  World War II  to  become the dominant industry by the end of the century .
The Winter Olympic Games have been hosted in  the  Swiss , French  ,   इतालवी  ,  आस्ट्रिया  and German Alps .
At present the region is home to 14 million people and has  120  million annual visitors .
Lois Patrice Griffin ( née  pewterschmidt  ) is a character from the animated television  श्रेणी  Family  guy  .
She is voiced by writer Alex  borstein  and first appeared on television , along with the rest of the family in the 15-minute short on December 20  ,  1998 .
Lois was created  और  designed by series creator Seth MacFarlane .
macfarlane  was asked to pitch a pilot  to  the Fox  प्रसारण   कम्पनी   आधारित  on Larry and Steve , a short made by  macfarlane  which featured a middle-aged character named  लैरी   और  an intellectual dog , Steve .
After the pilot was  दिए  the green light ,  the  Griffin  परिवार  appeared  on  the  एपीसोड  ``  मौत  Has a Shadow  ``  .
Lois is the mother of the Griffin family .
With her husband Peter , she has had three children :  मेग  , Chris , and Stewie .
लोइस   is  often portrayed  as  a stereotypical television mother , despite her admitting to  होने  a drug  उपयोक्ता  ,  a   recovering  meth addict kleptomaniac .
Lois has  भी  had several affairs , one  of   जिससे  allegedly resulted in the conception of Meg .
वो  has appeared in other media relating to  परिवार  Guy—including a video game , commercials and books—and inspired an entire line of merchandise  .
Lois  's  distinctive New York accent originated from  a   अक्षर   in  a stage show  कि  Alex Borstein had performed  in   ,  which  थी  largely inspired by a relative who grew up  on  Long  द्वीप  , New York .

Location of the Basque-language provinces within  स्पेन  and France
बास्क  ( endonym : , ) is  the  ancestral language of the Basque people  ,  who inhabit the  बास्क  Country  ,  a region spanning an  क्षेत्रफल   in  northeastern Spain and  southwestern  France .
It is spoken by  27  % of Basques in all territories  (  714,136 out of 2,648,998 )  .
Of these , 663,035 live  in  the Spanish part  of  the Basque country and the remaining 51,100 live in the French  भाग  .
In academic discussions of the distribution of Basque  in   स्पेन   और  France , it is customary  to  refer  to   तीन  ancient provinces in  फ़्रांस  and four Spanish provinces .
Native speakers are concentrated in  a  contiguous area including parts of  the  Spanish  autonomous  communities  of  the Basque Country and Navarre  और  in  the  western half  of  the French département of Pyrénées-Atlantiques .
The Basque Autonomous Community is an administrative entity within the binational ethnographic Basque Country incorporating the  परंपरागत  Spanish provinces of Biscay , Gipuzkoa , and  álava  , which retain their existence as politico-administrative divisions  .
ये  provinces  और   अनेक  areas of Navarre  हैं   heavily  populated by ethnic Basques , but  बास्क  was , at least until the 1990s ,  नहीं   बोला  as a native  भाषा  in most of  álava  , western parts of Biscay and  सेंट्रल  and southern  क्षेत्रों   of  Navarre , either because it had been replaced by Spanish along the  सदियां  , in some areas ,  or  because it had never  महरूम  spoken there  ,  in  अन्य  areas .
In southwestern France , the ancient  basque-populated   प्रांतों   यहूद   labourd  , Lower Navarre ,  और  Soule .
They and other regions were  संचित  into a single département in 1790 under the  नाम   basses-pyrénées  , a name which persisted until  1970   .
A standardized form of the Basque language , called  euskara  Batua ,  थी  developed by the Basque Language  अकादमी  in  the  late 1960s .
Euskara Batua was created so  कि  Basque language could  be  used—and easily understood by  सब   बास्क   speakers—in  formal situations ( education , mass media , literature  )  , and  इस  is its main use today  .
The role of this standard  बास्क  language depends on the linguistic educational model  of  each  प्रदेश   और  each school .
In most  क्षेत्रों   of  the Spanish Basque  देश  ,  the   शैक्षणिक  Model D  ,   जहाँ  all subjects  हैं  taught in Basque ,  मगर  `` Spanish  भाषा  and literature  ''  (  जिससे  is taught in Spanish  )  is  अभी   the  predominant model .
In France , the Basque language school  seaska  and the association for a bilingual ( Basque and French ) schooling Ikasbi meet a wide range of Basque language educational needs  up   to  the Sixth Form , while often  struggling  to surmount financial and administrative constraints .
Apart from this  मानकीकृत  version , there are  पाँच  main  बास्क  dialects  :  Bizkaian ,  gipuzkoan  , and Upper Navarrese in  स्पेन   ,  and Navarrese–Lapurdian and Zuberoan ( in France ) .
Although they take their names from the mentioned historic provinces , the dialect  सीमाएँ   हैं  not congruent  साथ  province boundaries  .
The President , Directors and Company , of the Bank of the United  राज्य   ,  commonly known  as  the First Bank of the United States , was  a  central bank  ,  chartered for  a  term of twenty  सालो   ,  by the United States Congress on February 25  ,  1791  .
Establishment of the Bank was included  in   a   three-part   विस्तार  of federal fiscal and  मौद्रिक  power ( along with a federal  मिंट   और   excise  taxes  )  championed by  सिकंदर  Hamilton  ,  first Secretary of the Treasury  .
Hamilton believed a central bank was necessary to stabilize and  improve  the  स्वदेश   's  credit , and  to  improve handling of the financial business of  the  United States government under the newly enacted Constitution .
Officially proposed to the first session of the First  कॉंग्रेस  in 1790 , Hamilton 's Bank faced widespread resistance from opponents of  increased  federal power .
Secretary of State Thomas Jefferson and James Madison  led   the  opposition , which claimed  कि  the bank was unconstitutional , and that it benefited merchants and  निवेशकों  at the expense of the majority of the  जनसांख्यिकी  .
The First Bank  भवन  is now a National Historic Landmark located  in  Philadelphia , Pennsylvania within Independence National Historical Park .
James Wesley Marsters (  born  August 20 , 1962 ) is an American actor and musician .
Marsters first  आए  to the attention of the  सामान्य  public playing the popular character Spike , a  platinum-blond  yobbish English vampire in the television  श्रेणी  Buffy the  पिशाच   slayer  and its  spin-off  series , Angel , from 1997 to 2004 .
Since  तब  ,  he  has gone  on  to play other  विज्ञान  fiction roles , such as the alien supervillain  brainiac   on   the  Superman -inspired series  smallville  ,  the  omnisexual time traveller Captain  जॉन   हार्ट  in British science-fiction  दिखाएँ  Torchwood  और  terrorist Barnabas Greeley in Sci  fi  's  caprica  .
Marsters  appeared  in a supporting  भूमिका  in the 2007  फिल्म  P.S .
I Love You and as the main antagonist  ,  Piccolo ,  in  the 2009 fantasy adventure film Dragonball Evolution .
he  appeared as a recurring character  in  the first season of  the  revival of Hawaii  5-0  .
In molecular biology ,  इंसान   chorionic  gonadotropin  (  hCG ) is a hormone produced by the  निषेचित  egg  बाद  conception  .
Later  दौरान   गर्भावस्था  it is made by the developing placenta , and later  by  the  placental  component syncytiotrophoblast .
कुछ   cancerous   tumors   उपज   इस  hormone ; therefore , elevated levels measured when  the  patient is not  गर्भवती  can lead to a cancer diagnosis .
However , it is not known whether this production  is  a  contributing  cause or an effect of tumorigenesis .
The pituitary analogue of hCG , known as luteinizing hormone ( LH ) , is produced in the pituitary gland of  males   और   महिलाओं  of  सब  ages .
, the FDA has  निषिद्ध  the sale  of  `` homeopathic '' and  over  the counter hCG diet products and declared them  बेईमान  and  illegal   .
Beyoncé Giselle  knowles-carter   ,   ज्ञात  by  उसके  stage name Beyoncé  (   ;  born September  4  , 1981 ) , is an American singer  ,  songwriter , dancer  ,  and actress .
Born and  उठाया   in  Houston  ,  Texas , she performed in singing and dancing competitions as a child  पहले  forming in 1990 a group with  केली  Rowland and LaTavia Roberson that was eventually named Destiny 's Child  .
एकबार  signed to Columbia  रिकॉर्ड  ,  the  girls subsequently became one of the  संसार  's  best-selling   लड़की  groups of all time .
The  समूह   थी  plagued by internal  विरोध  and legal turmoil and Knowles suffered from depression that  lasted  for a number of  सालो  .
During the group 's hiatus ,  नॉलेस  released her debut solo album Dangerously in  प्रेम  (  2003   )  , which earned her five Grammy Awards and has sold a total of  4.9  million  नक़ल  in the US alone .
it  spawned Billboard  क्रमांक  one singles `` Crazy in  प्रेम  , '' considered by VH1 to be the  ``  Greatest Song Of the 00 's , '' and ``  baby  Boy  .  ''
Following the disbandment of Destiny  's  Child  in   2005  , Knowles 's second solo album B'Day ( 2006  )  contained the top  पाँच  singles  ``  Déjà Vu  ``  , `` Irreplaceable `` ,  और  `` Beautiful Liar `` .
Her performance in  dreamgirls   (  2006 ) earned her two  सुनहरी  Globe  nominations  .
Knowles ' work playing Etta James in  कि  film inspired her subsequent  एल्बम  I Am ...
Sasha  fierce  ( 2008 ) which  शाखित  hits ``  if  I  यहूद  a Boy `` , `` Single Ladies  (  Put a Ring on It  )  `` ,  ``  Halo `` , and `` Sweet Dreams `` .
the  album  भी  helped Knowles  earn  six Grammys in  2010  , breaking the record for most Grammy Awards won by a female artist in one night .
उसके  fourth album 4 ( 2011  )  deviated towards traditional R & B  और  became  उसके  fourth consecutive number  एक  album on the  बिलबोर्ड   200  .
In  जनवरी  2012 , Knowles gave birth  to   बेटी  Blue Ivy Carter ,  उसके  first child with  husband  Jay-Z .
Knowles has sold over  13  million albums  in  the US and  118  million  रिकॉर्ड  worldwide ( as well  as  a further 50 million records with  नियति  's Child ) , and is one of the best-selling  म्यूज़िक   कलाकारों  of all time .
The Recording Industry Association of America (  riaa   )  recognized  नॉलेस   as  the Top Certified Artist of  the   2000s  .
In 2009 , Billboard named  उसके  the Top Radio Songs Artist of the decade and  क्रमित  her the  शीर्ष  Female Artist and the fourth Artist of the Decade .
Beyoncé Knowles is  the  most nominated woman in Grammy Award history  ,   receiving  17 awards ;  अन्य  accolades include 12 MTV Video  म्यूज़िक   पुरस्कार  , 7  बिलबोर्ड  Awards including a Millennium Award , and a star  on  the Hollywood  चलना   of  Fame as part of Destiny 's Child .
``  एंग्री  All the Time '' is the  शीर्षक  of a  सोंग  written by Bruce Robison and first recorded on his 1998 album Wrapped .
It was later covered by Tim McGraw with guest  vocalist  Faith  हिल  .
Released in July 2001 , McGraw 's  संस्करण  was the second single from McGraw 's Set This  सर्कस  Down album .
The song  पहुँचे  Number  एक  on the  बिलबोर्ड  Hot Country Singles & Tracks  (  now  hot  Country Songs  )   चार्ट  .
Dear  जॉन  is  a  2010 American romantic drama - war  फिल्मी   अभिनीत  Amanda Seyfried and Channing Tatum .
it  was released theatrically  in  North America on February 5 , 2010 .
The film  थी  directed by Lasse Hallström , and it  is  an  अनुकूलन  of  निकोलस  Sparks 's novel  of  the same name .
It follows the life of a  सिपाही  ( Channing Tatum  )  after he falls in love with a young woman ( Amanda  seyfried  ) .
वे   decide   to  exchange letters to each other after he is deployed  to  the war .
The movie  थी  filmed in 2009 in  चार्ल्सटन  , South Carolina .
Despite  receiving  negative  समीक्षाएँ  ,  the  film made a strong box  दफ्तर  performance , knocking off  अवतार  after seven weekends in  पहला  place and grossing  a  total of $ 114,977,104 worldwide .
The film was released on  may  25 , 2010 on DVD and Blu-ray .
These are lists of the busiest airports  in  the  संयुक्त   राज्य  .
Hartsfield–Jackson Atlanta  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Airport is  the  busiest single airport in  the  United  राज्य  .
However , all of the New York  नगर  metropolitan area 's airports  combine  to  बनाएँ   the  largest airport system in the United States , second in the world in terms of passenger traffic , and first in the world in terms of total flight  परिचालन  .
Dora the  एक्सप्लोरर  is an American animated  टेलीविज़न  series created by Chris Gifford , Valerie Walsh  ,  and Eric Weiner .
Dora the  एक्सप्लोरर  became  a   नियमित  series  in  2000 .

It aired on CBS until September  2006  .

सांता  Fe ( ;  (  Tewa : Ogha  po'oge  , ) ) is the  पूंजी  of the U.S. state  of   नई  Mexico .
It is  the  fourth-largest  नगर  in the  राज्य   और  is the seat of .
सांता  Fe ( meaning “holy faith” in Spanish ) had a  जनसांख्यिकी  of  67,947   in  the  2010  census .
It is the principal city  of  a Metropolitan Statistical Area which  encompasses  all  of  Santa Fe  काउंटी  and is part of  the  larger  albuquerque-santa  Fe-Las Vegas Combined  सांख्यिकीय  Area .
The city’s  पूरा  name when founded was La Villa Real de la Santa Fé de San  फ्रांसिस्को  de Asís  (  “The  royal   कस्बा  of the Holy Faith of St. Francis of Assisi” ) .
पेप्सी  (  stylized  in lowercase as pepsi , formerly  stylized  in uppercase as  पेप्सी  ) is a carbonated soft drink that is produced  और  manufactured by PepsiCo  .
Created and  विकसित   in  1893 and introduced  as  Brad 's Drink , it was renamed as Pepsi-Cola  on  August  28  , 1898 , then to Pepsi in 1961 .

The Sons  of  Liberty was a group consisting of American patriots  कि  originated  in  the  pre-independence  North American  अंग्रेजों  colonies  .
the  group was formed to protect the rights of the colonists and to take to the streets against the taxes by  the  British government  .
They are  बेहतरीन  known  लिये  undertaking the Boston Tea  पार्टी  in 1773  ,  which led to the Intolerable Acts ( an intense  crackdown  by  the  British government ) , and a counter-mobilization  by  the Patriots .
Osaka castle
is  a  नगर  in  the   कन्साई   प्रदेश  of Japan 's  प्रमुख  island of Honshu ,  a   designated   नगर  under the Local  स्वायत्तता   विधि  , the capital city of Osaka Prefecture  और  also the  largest   भाग   of   the  Keihanshin  metropolis  , which comprises three  प्रमुख  cities of Japan , Kyoto , Osaka and Kobe  .
स्तिथ   at   the  mouth of the Yodo River on Osaka Bay  ,  Osaka is Japan 's third largest  नगर  by population after Tokyo ( special  wards  ) and Yokohama .
Keihanshin is the second largest metropolitan area in Japan  by  population and one of the largest metropolitan areas highly  क्रमित   in  the  संसार  , with nearly 19 million  लोगों  ,  और  by GDP  the  second  largest  area in Japan and  the  seventh largest area in the world .
Historically  the  commercial center of Japan , Osaka functions as  एक  of the command centers for the Japanese economy .
The ratio between  दिन   और  night  समय  population is 141 % , the highest in  जापानी  , highlighting  इसके   औकात  as an economic  बीच  .
Its nighttime population is  2.6  million ,  the  third in the country  ,  but  in  daytime the  जनसांख्यिकी   surges   to  3.7  लाख  , second only after Tokyo (  combining  the special wards of  टोकियो  , which is not a  सिंगल   incorporated  city , for statistical purposes ; see the Tokyo article  लिये   अधिक  information on the  परिभाषा  and makeup of Tokyo ) .
Osaka used to be referred to as the in  सामंती  Edo period because it was  the  centre of trading for rice ,  बनाना  the  पहला  modern futures  एक्सचेंज   मार्केट  in the world .
The  छोटी  Mermaid is a 1989 American animated  musical  fantasy film produced  by   वॉल्ट  Disney Feature  एनिमेशन   और  distributed by Walt Disney  तस्वीरें   .
Based on  the  Danish fairy tale by Hans Christian Andersen  ,  The Little Mermaid tells the story of a beautiful mermaid who dreams of  बनने  human .
Written , directed , and produced by Ron Clements and John  musker  ,  साथ  music by Alan Menken and Howard Ashman , the film features the voices Jodi Benson , Christopher  डेनियल  Barnes , Pat  कैरल  , Samuel  E.  Wright  ,  Jason  मारिन   ,  Kenneth  मंगल  ,  दोस्त  Hacket  ,  and Rene Auberjonois .
the  28th film  in  the Walt Disney Animated Classics series , The Little Mermaid was released to theaters on  नवम्बर   14  , 1989  to  largely positive reviews , garnering $ 84  लाख  at the box office during its initial release  ,  and $ 211 million in total  आजीवन  gross .
After  the  success  of  the 1988 Disney / Amblin film Who Framed Roger Rabbit , The Little Mermaid is given  क्रेडिट  for breathing  जीवन  back into  the   आर्ट  of  डिज़्नी  animated  विशेषता  films  बाद  a string of critical or  वाणिज्यिक   असफलताओं   उत्पादित   by  Disney that dated back to the early  1970s  .
It also marked  the  start of the era  ज्ञात  as  the  Disney Renaissance .
A stage  अनुकूलन  of the film with  a   किताब  by Doug Wright and additional songs by Alan  menken  and new  गीतों  Glenn Slater opened in Denver in July 2007 and began performances on Broadway January  10   ,  2008  .
alt=Close-up photo of a metal spoon  भर  with a viscous  ,  clear purple  द्रव
जामुनी  drank is a slang term  लिये  a  recreational  drug popular  in  the  हिप  hop community in the southern  संयुक्त  States ,  originating  in Houston , Texas  .
Its main ingredient is prescription -strength  खांसी   सिरप  containing  codeine  and promethazine  .
Cough syrup is  typically  mixed with  संघटक  such as Sprite soft  पेय  or Mountain Dew and pieces of Jolly Rancher  कैंडी  .
The  purplish  hue of purple drank comes from  dyes   in  the cough syrup .
There are numerous  कठबोली   शर्तें  for purple  पिया   ,   सहित  sizzurp , lean , syrup , drank , barre , purple jelly ,  टेक्सास   चाय   ,   और  Tsikuni  .
First/given , middle ,  और   last/family/surname   आरेख  with J. S. Bach as  उदाहरण  .
J. S.  बच   साझा  his given  नाम  with six  तात्कालिक  family members and many  विस्तारित  family  सदस्यों  .
He shared his family name  साथ  most  परिवार  members .
A given name , in Western contexts often referred  to  as a first name , is a personal name that  specifies  and differentiates between  सदस्यों  of a group  of  individuals , especially in a family  ,  all of whose  सदस्यों  usually share  the  same family name ( surname  )  .
A given name is purposefully  दिए  , usually by a child 's parents at or near birth  ,  in contrast to  an  inherited one  ऐसे  as a  परिवार  name  .
A given name  is  sometimes legally changed through a name  बदलें  .
दिए  names are often used in a  परिचित  and friendly manner in informal situations .
In more formal situations the surname is  प्रयुक्त  instead , unless it is necessary to distinguish between people  साथ   the  same surname .
The idiom ``  on  a first-name basis  ''  ( or ``  on  first-name  शर्तें  '' ) alludes to the  अपनेपन   of  addressing another by a given  नाम  .
The  पश्चिमी  style of having  दोनो  a family name ( surname )  और   a  given name  is  far  इससे  universal .
In many countries it is common for ordinary people to have  तभी  one name  (  a mononym ) .
Hydrochloric acid  is  a clear , colourless solution  of  hydrogen chloride ( H Cl ) in water  .
It is a highly corrosive , strong  खनिज  acid with many  औद्योगिक  uses .
हाइड्रोक्लोरिक  acid is found  naturally  in gastric acid .
Historically called  muriatic   एसिड  , and spirits of salt ,  हाइड्रोक्लोरिक  acid was produced from vitriol ( sulfuric acid ) and common salt  .
it  first appeared during the Renaissance , and  तब  it  थी  used by chemists such as  glauber   ,  Priestley and Davy in their scientific research .
With major production starting in  the  Industrial Revolution ,  हाइड्रोक्लोरिक  acid is used in the chemical industry as a chemical  अभिकर्मक  in  the  large-scale production  of  vinyl chloride  लिये  PVC  प्लास्टिक  , and MDI / TDI for polyurethane .
It has numerous smaller-scale applications , including household cleaning , production  of  gelatin and  अन्य  food additives , descaling , and leather processing  .
About 20 million tonnes of  हाइड्रोक्लोरिक  acid are  उत्पादित  annually .
Wheat  (  Triticum spp .  )  is a  खाद्यान्न  grain , originally from the Levant region  of  the Near East and Ethiopian Highlands ,  लकिन  now cultivated worldwide .
in  2010 , world  उत्पादन  of wheat was 651 million  टन  , making it  the  third most-produced cereal after maize ( 844 million  टन   )   और  rice ( 672 million tons ) .
गेहूं  was the  दूसरी  most-produced  खाद्यान्न  in 2009 ; world production  in  that year was 682 million  टन   ,  after  मक्का  ( 817 million tons ) , and with rice as a  बंद  third  (  679 million tons ) .
This grain is grown on more land area than any  अन्य  commercial food  .
World trade in  गेहूं  is greater than for all other crops combined .
Globally , wheat is the leading source of vegetable  प्रोटीन  in human  खाना  ,  having  a higher  प्रोटीन  content than soybeans  or  the  अन्य  major cereals , maize ( corn ) or rice .
in  terms of  कुल  production  tonnages  used for food ,  it  is currently  दूसरी  to rice as the main human food crop and ahead of maize , after allowing for maize 's more extensive  उपयोग  in animal feeds .
Wheat was a  कुंजी  factor  enabling  the emergence  of  city-based  समाजों  at the start of  सभ्यता   क्युकी  it was one of the  पहला  crops that could be easily cultivated on a large scale , and had the additional advantage  of  yielding a harvest that provides long-term  भंडार   of  food .
Wheat contributed to  the  emergence of  city-states  in the Fertile Crescent  ,  including  the  Babylonian and Assyrian  empires  .
Wheat  अनाज  is a staple food used  to  make flour for leavened  ,   चपटा  and steamed  breads  ,  बिस्कुट  , cookies ,  cakes  , breakfast cereal , pasta , noodles , couscous and for fermentation to  मेक  beer ,  अन्य  alcoholic  पेय  , or  biofuel  .
Wheat is planted  to  a limited extent as  a  forage crop  लिये  livestock , and its straw  can  be used as a construction material for roofing thatch  .
The whole  अनाज  can be milled to leave just the  भ्रूणपोष  for white flour .
The by-products of this are bran  और  germ  .
The  पूरे  grain is a concentrated source of vitamins , minerals , and protein , while  the  refined  अनाज   is  mostly starch .
Printing
To publish is to make content available to the general public .
While  विशिष्ट  use of the  पद  may vary among countries , it is usually applied to  टेक्स्ट  , images , or other audio-visual content on  कोई  traditional medium , including paper ( newspapers , magazines , catalogs , etc . ) .
The word publication means the act of publishing , and also refers to any printed copies .
Melissa & Joey is an  एबीसी  Family  असली  television series  अभिनीत  Melissa Joan Hart and Joey Lawrence .
It first aired on ABC Family on August 17 , 2010 .
the  series follows local politician Mel Burke  (  Melissa Joan Hart ) and Joe Longo ( Joey Lawrence ) , whom Mel hires to  dekh  after her  भांजी   और  nephew after a Ponzi  योजना  leaves him broke .
The series was renewed by  एबीसी  Family for a second  ऋतु  of fifteen episodes ,  जिससे  began  airing  on  may  30 , 2012 and ended on August 29 , 2012 .
Melissa & Joey ranks as cable  tv  's #  1  telecast at 8 o'clock across target  ऑडियंस  18–34 , 18–49 and 12–34 demographics .
On August 17 , 2012 , ABC Family renewed Melissa & Joey  लिये  a third  ऋतु  ,  नियत  to premiere in spring  2013  .
The  धर्मं  wheel , often used to  represent  the Noble Eightfold Path
The Noble  eightfold  Path ( , ) is one of the principal teachings of the Buddha , who described it as the way leading  to  the cessation  of  suffering  (  dukkha ) and  the  achievement of self-awakening .
It is used  to  develop insight into  the   सच्चा  nature  of  phenomena ( or reality ) and to eradicate  लोभ  , hatred , and delusion .
The  प्रतिष्ठित   eightfold   पाथ  is the  चौथी   of  the  बुद्ध  's  चार  Noble Truths ; the  पहला  element of  the  Noble Eightfold Path is , in  फेरे  , an understanding  of  the Four Noble  सच्चाई  .
It  is  also known  as  the Middle Path  or   मध्य  Way .
All eight elements of the Path  शुरू  with the word `` right '' , which translates the  शब्द  samyañc ( in Sanskrit  )  or sammā  (  in Pāli ) .
These denote completion , togetherness , and coherence , and  can  also suggest the senses of `` perfect '' or `` ideal  ''  .
'Samma  '  is also translated as `` wholesome '' , `` wise '' and ``  skillful  '' .
In Buddhist symbolism  ,  the Noble Eightfold Path is often  represented  by means of the dharma wheel ( dharmachakra  )  , whose eight spokes  represent  the eight  तत्व  of the path .
The  ग्रैमी  Award for Song of the Year is an honor  प्रस्तुत  at the Grammy Awards  ,  a ceremony  कि  was established in 1958 and originally called the  gramophone  Awards .
Awards in several  श्रेणी  are distributed annually by the National Academy  of   रिकॉर्डिंग  Arts  और  Sciences  of  the United  राज्य  to `` honor artistic  उपलब्धि   ,  technical  proficiency  and  overall  excellence in the recording industry ,  बगैर  regard to  एल्बम  sales or  चार्ट  position  .  ''
Economics is the social science that analyzes the production , distribution  ,  and consumption of goods and services .
the  term  अर्थशास्त्र  comes  इससे  the  प्राचीन  Greek  (   '  , `` management of a  household   ,  administration '' ) from  (  '  ,  `` house ''  )  + ( '  ,  `` custom ''  or  `` law '' ) , hence  ``  rules of the house  (  hold  )   ''  .
राजनैतिक  economy was the earlier name for the subject , but economists in the  लेट   19th  century suggested `` economics '' as a shorter  पद  for  ``  economic science '' that also  avoided  a  सीमित  political-interest  connotation  and as similar in form to `` mathematics  ``  , ``  आचार  '' , and so forth .
a   फ़ोकस  of the subject is how economic agents  व्यवहार  or interact and how economies  कार्य  .
Consistent with this ,  a  primary textbook distinction is between  microeconomics  and macroeconomics .
Microeconomics examines the behavior of  मौलिक  elements in the economy ,  सहित  individual agents  (   ऐसे  as households  और  firms or as buyers and sellers ) and  बाज़ार   ,   और  their interactions .
macroeconomics  analyzes the  संपूर्ण  economy and issues affecting  it  , including  बेरोजगारी  , inflation  ,  economic  विकास  , and monetary and  फिस्कल  policy  .
अन्य  broad distinctions include those  between  positive economics ( describing `` what is  ''  ) and normative economics  (  advocating `` what ought to be  ''  ) ; between economic  सिद्धान्त   और  applied economics ; between  तर्कसंगत   और   behavioral  economics ; and between mainstream economics ( more  ``   परंपरागत  '' and dealing with the ``  rationality-individualism-equilibrium  nexus '' ) and heterodox economics ( more `` radical '' and  dealing  with the  ``  institutions-history-social structure nexus  ''  ) .
आर्थिक   विश्लेषण  may be applied throughout society ,  as  in business , finance  ,  health care , and government , but also to  ऐसे  diverse subjects as crime , education  ,  the  परिवार  , law , politics , religion  ,  social  संस्थानों  , war , and science  .
At the  फेरे   of  the 21st  सदी  , the expanding domain of  अर्थशास्त्र  in the social sciences has been  वर्णित   as  economic imperialism .
an  increasing number of economists have called for increased  जोर  on environmental sustainability ; this  क्षेत्रफल   of  research is known as Ecological economics .
This is  a  list of Schedule IV drugs under the Controlled Substances Act for the United States .
Required findings for  दवाएँ  to be  लगाई  in this schedule:
The drug  or  other substance has a low potential for abuse relative to the drugs or other substances in  अनुसूची  III .
The  ड्रग  or  अन्य  substance  रै  a currently accepted  चिकित्सा   उपयोग   in  treatment in  the  United States .
Abuse of the drug or other substance may lead  to  limited  शारीरिक  dependence or psychological dependence  सापेक्ष   to   the  drugs or other  substances  in schedule III .
The complete  सूची  of Schedule IV drugs are as follows .
The Administrative Controlled Substances Code Number for each drug is included .
US county household median income  2009   .
Median  us  household  आय  , 2001-2011
Household  आय   is  a measure commonly used by the United States government and private  संस्थानों   .
Each household  is   measured  by  the  income of every  निवासी   over  the age  of  15 .
Income  शामिल  wages and salaries , unemployment  बीमे   ,  disability  भुगतान  , child support payments  प्राप्त   ,   नियमित  rental  रसीदें  , as  खूब  as any personal business , investment ,  or  other kinds of income received routinely .
While inflation-adjusted  (  `` real  ''   )  household  आय  had been increasing almost every year from 1945  to  1999 ,  it  has  चूंकि  been flat and even  decreased  recently .
U.S. median household income fell from $  51,144  in 2010  to  $  50,502   in  2011 .
Extreme poverty in the United States , meaning  households  living on  कम  than $  2  per day before government benefits , doubled from 1996  to  1.5 million households in 2011 , including  2.8  million children .
The residents of the household do not  have  to  be  related to the head of the household for their earnings to be considered part  of  the  household  's income .
As  households  tend to share a similar economic context , the use of household income remains among the most widely  स्वीकृत   उपायों  of income .
That the size of a household is  नहीं  commonly taken into account in  ऐसे  measures may distort any analysis  of  fluctuations within  or   among   the  household  आय  categories , and may render direct comparisons between  quintiles  difficult or even impossible .
The lapse rate is defined as the rate of  घटी  with height for an atmospheric  परिवर्तनीय  .
The variable involved is temperature unless specified otherwise  .
The terminology arises from the word lapse in the sense of a decrease  or  decline .
While  सबसे   प्रायः  applied to  धरती  's atmosphere the concept  can  be extended to any gravitationally  समर्थित  ball of gas .
ब्लू  Mountain State is an American comedy  श्रेणी  that premiered on Spike  on  January 11 , 2010 .
The  श्रेणी  producers include Chris Romano and  eric  Falconer , and it  is  produced  by  Lionsgate Television .
The series is about a fictional university ,  ब्लू  Mountain State  ,  and  इसके   फ़ुटबॉल  team  ,   ``  The Mountain  बकरियों   .   ''
It portrays certain  पहलुओं  of American university life , including football  ,  sex , binge  पीने  , drugs , wild partying , and hazing  .
in  February 2012 ,  it  was  reported   कि   ब्लू  Mountain State would  नहीं  be renewed for a fourth season .
In March  2013  , Ed  marinaro   stated  that he  is   working  on a Blue Mountain  राज्य  film  .
Apple Inc.  ,  formerly Apple  कंप्यूटर  , Inc. , is  an  American multinational corporation headquartered in  cupertino   ,  California that designs , develops , and sells consumer electronics ,  कंप्यूटर  software and personal computers .
Its best-known hardware products are the Mac line of computers ,  the  iPod music player  ,  the  iphone  smartphone , and the iPad tablet computer .
Its software includes the  os  X  और   आईओएस  operating systems  ,  the iTunes  मीडिया  browser , the Safari web browser , and the iLife and iWork creativity and  उत्पादन  suites  .
The company was founded on April 1 , 1976 , and  incorporated  as Apple Computer , Inc.  on  January  3  , 1977 .
The word `` Computer  ''  was removed from its  नाम  on  जनवरी  9 , 2007 ,  reflecting  its  shifted  focus towards  उपभोक्ता   इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स   बाद  the introduction  of  the iPhone  .
Apple is the  संसार   's   second-largest  information technology company by  आय  after Samsung Electronics , and the world  's  third-largest mobile  फोन  maker after Samsung  और  Nokia .
Fortune magazine  नामित  Apple the  सबसे  admired company  in  the  संयुक्त  States in  2008  , and in the world from 2008 to 2012 .
However  ,  the company  रै  received criticism for its contractors '  मजदूर  practices ,  और   लिये  Apple 's own environmental and business practices .
,  Apple  maintains   394  retail stores  in  fourteen countries as well  as  the  ऑनलाइन  Apple  स्टोर  and iTunes Store  .
It is the  second-largest  publicly  traded  corporation in the world  by   मार्केट   capitalization  , with an estimated value of US $ 414 billion as  of  January  2013   .
, the company had 72,800 permanent full-time employees and 3,300 temporary  full-time  employees worldwide .
Its worldwide annual  आय   in  2012 totalled $ 156 billion .
Section 8 housing  in  the South  bronx
Section 8 of the  आवास  Act of 1937 ( ) , often simply known  as  Section 8 ,  as  repeatedly amended , authorizes the payment of rental  आवास  assistance to private landlords  on   निमित्त  of approximately 3.1 million low-income households .
It  operates  through several programs ,  the  largest of  जिससे  , the Housing Choice Voucher program , pays a large portion of  the  rents and  उपयोगिताएँ  of  परिचय   2.1  million households .
The US  विभाग  of Housing and  शहरी  Development manages  the   खण्ड  8 programs .
The Housing Choice Voucher Program provides `` tenant-based '' rental  सहायता  , so  a  tenant can move from one unit of at least minimum housing quality to another .
It also allows individuals to apply their monthly voucher towards the purchase of a home , with over $  17  billion going towards such purchases each year ( from ncsha.org analysis ) .
The maximum allowed voucher  is  $ 2200 a  माह  .
खण्ड  8 also  authorizes  a variety  of  `` project-based '' rental  सहायता  programs ,  अंतर्गत  which the  मालिक  reserves some or all of the  इकाई   in  a building for low-income  किरायेदारों   ,  in  वापसी  for a Federal government guarantee to  मेक   up  the  अंतर  between the  किरायेदार  's contribution and the rent for 1 cent in  the  owner 's  अनुबंध   साथ   the  government  .
A tenant who leaves a subsidized project will lose access to  the  project-based subsidy .
The United States Department of Housing  और   शहरी  Development and United States Department of  दिग्गजों  Affairs have a special  खण्ड  8 program called VASH ( Veterans Affairs Supportive Housing )  ,  or HUD-VASH , which  देता  out a  निश्चित   क्रमांक  of Section 8 vouchers to eligible homeless and otherwise vulnerable US armed forces veterans .
